text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Jesucristo David yäbei , Abraham yäbei , je wätsikiwa ̱ k wa kie äyëí yöle rä jikäi :

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Abraham te Isaac wätsikiwa ̱ , Isaac te Jacob wätsikiwa ̱ , Jacob te Judá irä iel wa irä wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Judá te Tamar da Fares irä Zara irä wätsikiwa ̱ . Fares te Esrom wätsikiwa ̱ , Esrom te Aram wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Aram te Aminadab wätsikiwa ̱ , Aminadab te Naasón wätsikiwa ̱ , Naasón te Salmón wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Salmón te Rahab ra Booz wätsikiwa ̱ . Booz te Rut da Obed wätsikiwa ̱ . Obed te Isaí wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Isaí te sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i David wätsikiwa ̱ . David te Salomón wätsikiwa ̱ , Urías alaklä ra .

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Salomón te Roboam wätsikiwa ̱ , Roboam te Abías wätsikiwa ̱ , Abías te Asa wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Asa te Josafat wätsikiwa ̱ , Josafat te Joram wätsikiwa ̱ , Joram te Uzías wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Uzías te Jotam wätsikiwa ̱ , Jotam te Acaz wätsikiwa ̱ , Acaz te Ezequías wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Ezequías te Manasés wätsikiwa ̱ , Manasés te Amón wätsikiwa ̱ , Amón te Josías wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Josías te Jeconías irä iel wa irä wätsikiwa ̱ , Israel wa jalemi Babilonia ska ke ̱ i ska ra .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Ijalemi Babilonia ska ukä ska Jeconías te Salatiel wätsikiwa ̱ . Salatiel te Zorobabel wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Zorobabel te Abiud wätsikiwa ̱ , Abiud te Eliaquim wätsikiwa ̱ , Eliaquim te Azor wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Azor te Sadoc wätsikiwa ̱ , Sadoc te Aquim wätsikiwa ̱ , Aquim te Eliud wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Eliud te Eleazar wätsikiwa ̱ , Eleazar te Matán wätsikiwa ̱ , Matán te Jacob wätsikiwa ̱ .

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Jacob te José , María se ̱ naklä , wätsikiwa ̱ , ata je ne te Jesús kinak Säbäkäkksa ̱ ni ku ̱ a rä .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Jekäi Abraham ska bite däka ̱ David ska ibatala wätsikinaté deka ̱ catorce . David ska bite däka ̱ ijalemi Babilonia ska ke ̱ i kje ibatala wätsikinaté deka ̱ catorce . Ijalemi Babilonia ska bite däka ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ ska kje , ibatala wätsikinaté deka ̱ catorce .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jesucristo ko ̱ le rä jikäi : Ia ̱ mi María rä kablele e ̱ ná José ra je ̱ k jula kukäkwa ̱ . Ata ka ijewa däwa ̱ ba ñaja ̱ mi ra , ibitewa ̱ yaba ki ̱ Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Ije se ̱ naklä José se ̱ r dä wämo , je ka ssëne iäinewa ̱ kwa ̱ biköle wäna , je ki ̱ ka ije te ijaklewa ̱ ka ju ̱ ñelewa ̱ kuna .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ije te ibiketse kate ji ̱ abä ra , Säkekewa ángel í ekla je ̱ k kjasha iia ̱ kausu ̱ e naka , te isha iia ̱ : “ José , David yäbei , ke ba suana María kukäkwa ̱ ma se ̱ naklä ye , ije bitewa ̱ yaba ki ̱ rä Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Ije te yaba su ̱ emi jäiyi , je kiemi ba te rä Jesús ni . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ite ije cha wa tsa ̱ tkemiksa ̱ inui yika . ”

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Je biköle o ̱ na rä io ̱ naklä jishtä Säkekewa wa ̱ iyile jile bata shäk ja ̱ mi je te ishe käi :

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: “ ¡ Issö ! Busi ka se ̱ le kuna bitämiwa ̱ yaba ki ̱ , je te yaba su ̱ emi rä jäiyi , je kirmi rä Emanuel ” ni . ( Je wà rä “ Säkeklä kaldu sa ra ” ni . )

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Ñerä José shki ̱ naka ̱ ra , ite iwá ̱ jishtä je Säkekewa ángel í te ipaka iwa ̱ k käi . Jekäi ite ikukawa ̱ ise ̱ naklä ye .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Ata ka idenewa ̱ ija ̱ mi , mine rä je yaba ku ̱ a ite kje , je yaba kia ije te Jesús ni .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Jesús ko ̱ na Belén , Judea ke ̱ i ki ̱ . Je ke ̱ i ska ra Herodes dä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i . Ñerä ka ̱ chakäk wa dar ka ̱ wä däkläka ̱ wà , jewa dejulu Jerusalén ska .

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: Ijewa te ichaka : — ¿ Mai Judío wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ko ̱ na kalme rä na ? Iwa rä sá te ibekwäí su ̱ a ka ̱ wä däkläka ̱ wà , je ki ̱ ka sá bitejulu ioloi tsäk .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Herodes te je ssa ra , ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ . Jerusalén wa biköle je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ña ije ra .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Jera ite chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä biköle tapawa ̱ wa ̱ , je te mai Säbäkäkksa ̱ ko ̱ rmi rä chaka ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Je ko ̱ rmi rä Belén , Judea ke ̱ i ki ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je yöle jile bata shäk wa ̱ rä jikäi :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: ‘ Ba Belén , Judá ke ̱ i ki ̱ , ka ba rä ka ̱ wäkiri wa tso ̱ Judá ska wa katäbäka kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä wäkiri ko ̱ rmi ba sha ̱ na , je dämiwa ̱ Israel wa yis cha wa kjänanak ye . ’

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Jekjepa Herodes te ka ̱ chakäk wa kia jaté jaki jewa ia ̱ ite ichaka bikökje si ̱ je bekwä juena iwäna rä käi .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Jera ite ijewa patkami Belén ska , te isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Bas ma je yaba ktei ju ̱ ñak bulee ; ata bas te je yaba ku ̱ a ra , plaa bas te ibata sheni yis ia ̱ yis minakläña ioloi tsäk . ”

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha je ssa ijewa te ra , iminejulu . Ñerä ale bekwä su ̱ le iwa ̱ ka ̱ wä däkläka ̱ wà , je rami iwätsa ̱ kba , je demi wäkolonawa ̱ yaba kalme tsa ̱ ka .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Ijewa te je bekwä su ̱ a ra , ijewa ssëna a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Jekäi idewa ̱ julu ju ja ̱ rka ra , ijewa te yaba ku ̱ a ia ̱ mi María ra , jera iñatulawa ̱ wakte ioloi tsäk , kjepa ji säkei ta doloiebä shkä iwa ̱ me ̱ nak je kjäya ite , cha ̱ tulami ite iia ̱ oro yaka irä , ji dälänak jalar ta ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ irä , mirra irä .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Ata kausu ̱ e naka ijewa ia ̱ ikjayina ka iminaklä ni Herodes wäki ̱ , je ki ̱ ka ijewa minemi ni ike ̱ i wà ña ̱ la saka wà .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Ñerä ijewa minejuluni ra , Säkekewa ángel í ekla je ̱ k kjasha José ia ̱ kausu ̱ e naka , te isha iia ̱ : “ Ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma tu ̱ nomi yaba irä ia ̱ mi irä wäkseka Egipto ska . Ma se ̱ no jeska bikökje yis te ba ia ̱ isheke ̱ ni kje . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Herodes te je yaba yule mar kota ̱ nakwa ̱ . ”

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Jekäi José je ̱ kaka ̱ te je yaba irä ia ̱ mi irä jámi jela tuinaka däkmi Egipto ska .

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: Jeska ise ̱ na deka ̱ Herodes duawa ̱ kje , je rä io ̱ naklä jishtä Säkekewa wa ̱ iyile jile bata shäk ja ̱ mi te ishe käi : “ Yis yaba katke Egipto ska je kiaté ni yis te . ”

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Herodes te isu ̱ a ka ̱ chakäk wa te iwäyuawa ̱ ra , ikju ̱ atkawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ . Ñerä ite ka ̱ wei ma bena yabala jäiyi wa dos año katäbäka wa tso ̱ Belén ska irä ipája ̱ mi biköle ska irä ktächa ̱ kläwa ̱ , ke ̱ i shtao ̱ le je ka ̱ chakäk wa te isha iia ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jekäi io ̱ na jishtä iyile jile bata shäk Jeremías ja ̱ mi te ishe käi :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: “ Ekla ktä ssëna Ramá ska , iji ̱ á ta ̱ i ia ̱ r ta ̱ i . Raquel te iyabala ji ̱ etse kate , ka issëne je ̱ r pablenak ijewa ka kuna ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka . ”

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Ñerä Herodes duawa ̱ ukä ska ra , Säkekewa ángel í ekla je ̱ k kjasha José ia ̱ kausu ̱ e naka Egipto ska ,

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: je te isha iia ̱ : “ Ma je ̱ köka ̱ . Bä ma ni yaba irä ia ̱ mi irä wäkseka däkmi ni Israel wa ke ̱ i ska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ale je ̱ r ssëna yaba ktäkwa ̱ wa duacha ̱ wa ̱ . ”

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ je yaba irä ia ̱ mi irä wäkseka däkmi ni Israel wa ke ̱ i ska .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Ata ite iju ̱ ña Arquelao dewa ̱ iká Herodes itäri wà Judea ke ̱ i tsa ̱ ku ̱ i yeni ra , isu ̱ anawa ̱ minak jeka . Ñerä imineju ̱ Galilea ke ̱ i ska , je kjayina iia ̱ kausu ̱ e naka ki ̱ ka .

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: Jekäi idemiju ̱ ra , ise ̱ na jukläyäkä kie Nazaretka . Je rä io ̱ naklä jishtä iyile jile bata shäk wa ja ̱ mi te ishe käi : Ije kirmi rä Nazaret wa ni .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska Juan säwäukewa ̱ k je ̱ kaka ̱ sa paktäk Judea ke ̱ i ki ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska .

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Je te ishe : “ Bas ñamanewo ̱ ksa ̱ , yëwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno kjäkläwa ̱ dewa ̱ irä ki ̱ ka . ”

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Ije ne rä ale yile Isaías jile bata shäk ja ̱ mi jikäi rä : “ Ekla a ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska . ‘ Ña ̱ la bäiwo ̱ Säkekewa yika , iña ̱ le ̱ i paruöksa ̱ bulee . ’ ”

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Juan paiklä rä yöle camello kä wà , ikipa mu ̱ aklä rä bewak kjuä , ije yäkäklä rä bitsiki irä bul ña ka ̱ niki ̱ ka diä irä .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Jera Jerusalén wa irä , Judea wa biköle irä , Jordán kjä ja ̱ mi wa biköle irä , daté ije wäki ̱ .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Jeska ijewa nui shaka ̱ ra , ite ijewa wäukewa ̱ tulami Jordán na .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Ata Juan te isu ̱ a fariseo wa irä Saduceo wa irä jewa de ta ̱ i wäoka ̱ nak iwa ̱ ra , jera ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : “ ¡ Tkäbe si ̱ yäbeila ! ¿ Yi te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a Säkeklä kju ̱ atkämiwa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ je cha ̱ k rä na ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Jirä bäi o ̱ nak sa ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ra , je ja ̱ mi bas wäno .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Ata ke bas ku ̱ ibiketsa je ̱ r na : ‘ Abraham ne rä sá ká rä ’ ni ; ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ishe bas ia ̱ , Säkeklä ia ̱ jí jak tso ̱ manermiksa ̱ Abraham batala ye .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Jira bak rä tkelewa ̱ e ̱ ná kal ñak ja ̱ mi . Jekäi mane kal wänak wä ta ka bäi kuna , je biköle rä tenak tulämi tulunakka ̱ yökö ki ̱ ka .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Iyina si ̱ yis te bas wäukewe ̱ ke ̱ diklä wà , bas ñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ ye . Ata ale daju ̱ ji ̱ a yis itäka je rä oloi ta yis tsa ̱ ta , jekäi ka yis dä bäi si ̱ kuna ije sandalia tsa ̱ kmibä jibä . Ije te bas wäukewe ̱ mi Wikblu Sikina wà , ñakäi yökö wà .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Ije wa ̱ itrigo wäkpäklä kala kja ijula na , je wà ite ikpäklä ke ̱ i ska iboroi tulemiksa ̱ . Ite itrigo wä tapawe ̱ mi ibläklä jui ska . Ata ite iboroi tulemiksa ̱ dälänakcha ̱ wa ̱ yökö ka wäita ̱ nak kuna mik a ̱ ni ja ̱ rka . ”

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús biteju ̱ té Galilea ke ̱ i ska , deju ̱ Jordán kjä ska Juan wäki ̱ iwa ̱ wäoka ̱ nak .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Ata Juan ssëna iwätkewa ̱ k te isha ia ̱ : — Yis ki ̱ ba ne shena yis wäukewa ̱ k rä ; ¿ maikäi je bite yis wäki ̱ rä na ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — Jí kje ra ' sia ̱ ka ̱ mopa . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ ka ̱ wä ta ji rä wämo biköle wawa ̱ k . Jera ite ka ̱ ma ̱ iia ̱ .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Jesús wäoka ̱ naju ̱ mi ra , plaa ideksa ̱ ju ̱ diklä na . Jera ije wäna ka ̱ jöir kjä buka ̱ naju ̱ mi . Jeska ite Säkeklä wikblu su ̱ a idawa ̱ ju ̱ té namala käi , dewa ̱ iwakei ki ̱ .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ñerä kte ssënaté ka ̱ jöir je te ishe : “ Jí ne rä yis yaba shka ̱ ta rä , je ra yis ssëna baa . ”

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Je ukä ska Jesús wäsikami Säkeklä wikblu te ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska je ̱ r ki ̱ nak su ̱ nak be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Ibatsa ka ̱ piana tuina deka ̱ cuarenta día , jeska ra iktawa ̱ bäli te .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Ñerä je sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ wa ̱ k je ̱ k sikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Ba rä Säkeklä yaba ra , jí jak wä tso ̱ pakö ianakwa ̱ pan ye .

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Ata ije te ikúka te isha : — Iyöle katke rä : ‘ Ka pan ebä oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ se ̱ r dä kuna , ata kte biköle däkksa ̱ Säkeklä kjä na je ne oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ se ̱ r dä . ’

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ iminetse ̱ jukläyäkä dälätsalewa ̱ ska te iduaka ̱ Templo bata si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Ba rä Säkeklä yaba ra , ma je ̱ k psö ju ̱ omi i ̱ ski ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : ‘ Ba bata ki ̱ ka ite iángel wa patkemi , jewa te ma tse ̱ mi ijula na , ka bä klä tkenaklä kuna jak ja ̱ mi . ’

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ñaebä iyöle katke rä : ‘ Ke ba ku ̱ Säkekewa ba Kekläí mabla su ̱ a wäsi ̱ wa . ’

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Jera etäbä kicha be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ imineka ̱ tse ̱ ka ̱ tsä kaleka ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ si ̱ bata ki ̱ ka . Jeska ite ka ̱ jiska ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ke ̱ i biköle irä , ji baa tso ̱ iska biköle irä kjasha iia ̱ .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Ma je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte yis oloitsäk ra , yie je biköle me ̱ mi ba ia ̱ .

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Satanás , ma cho ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : ‘ Säkekewa ba Kekläí oloitsö ba ku ̱ , je ebä kja ̱ nei wo ̱ ba ku ̱ . ’

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Jera be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na . Ñerä ángel wa dejulu iwäki ̱ te ichewa ̱ jile wà .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Jesús te issa Juan kolonawa ̱ ra , ibiteju ̱ ni Galilea ska .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Jera ite Nazaret jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , demiju ̱ se ̱ ná Capernaúm . Je jukläyäkä rä tipä kjä ja ̱ mi , Zabulón wa irä Neftalí wa irä jewa ke ̱ i ki ̱ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Je rä io ̱ naklä jishtä iyile jile bata shäk Isaías ja ̱ mi te ishe käi :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: “ Zabulón wa ke ̱ i irä Neftalí wa ke ̱ i irä , ña ̱ la tipä kjä ja ̱ mi Jordán a ̱ mikata , Galilea ke ̱ i ale ka Judío kuna wa tso ̱ ska .

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Ka ̱ yee naka se ̱ nak wa te ka ̱ oloi ta ̱ iwa ̱ su ̱ a . Ka ̱ ki ̱ kololewa ̱ duewa ̱ oloi wa ̱ ska se ̱ nak wa ki ̱ ka ka ̱ oloi ñinaka ̱ . ”

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Jeska Jesús te sa paktami te isha : “ Bas ñamanewo ̱ ksa ̱ , yëwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno kjärawa ̱ irä ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Jesús damiju ̱ Galilea tipei kjä ja ̱ mi ra , ite bol ñawakwa ebä su ̱ a ; je rä Simón , kinak Pedro ni irä , iel Andrés irä . Ijewa kla ju ̱ a kate tipä na , ijewa rä nima kukäk wa ki ̱ ka .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas kute yis da minak , jera yis te bas dulawe ̱ mi ditsä kukäk nima säkei ye .

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Jera plaa ijewa te ikla jawa ̱ ta ̱ na minejulumi ira .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Jeska ije mine ji ̱ a te isaka su ̱ ani bol ñawakwa ebä : Zebedeo yaba Jacobo irä je el Juan irä , jewa kla wä mu ̱ a tso ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka ijewa ká Zebedeo ra ñara . Jewa kia ite .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Jera plaa ijewa te ko ̱ no irä iká irä jawa ̱ ta ̱ na minejulumi ira .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Jekäi Jesús damiju ̱ Galilea ke ̱ i kalabe sha ̱ na . Ite sa pakte rami ijewa ñapaktäklä jui na , ite gobierno ktei baa wapakte rami , ite sä kteke ̱ duë te biköle bäiwe ̱ rami , ji duëi biköle dami sa ̱ sha ̱ na käi .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Jekäi ije palei minemi Siria ke ̱ i biköle ska . Jera ditsä te duë ta wa biköle jaté iwäki ̱ : sä kteke ̱ duë te kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa käi , sä dälärke ̱ wa käi , kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ wa käi , wäialeksa ̱ wa käi , karalewa ̱ wa käi . Jewa bäiwa ̱ tulaka ̱ ni ije te .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ Galilea ska wa , Decápolis ska wa , Jerusalén ska wa , Judea ska wa , Jordán a ̱ mikata wa , minemi ira .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa su ̱ a ite ra , imineju ̱ ka ̱ kichei ki ̱ . Jeska ije ̱ tkawa ̱ , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Jera iktami te ijewa pakta , te isha :

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: “ Bäije sä ssërke ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ska shi ̱ ana ka jita käi wa rä , jewa ne ia ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: “ Bäije sa ̱ je ̱ r iarke ̱ wa rä , jewa je ̱ r pablermi ni ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: “ Bäije sa ̱ je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ wa rä , jewa ia ̱ ka ̱ jiska dämiksa ̱ däli ukä ye ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: “ Bäije sa ̱ ki ̱ ji wämo sherke ̱ pjoo jishtä sä kte bäli te käi , sa ̱ je ̱ r bárke ̱ te käi wa rä , jewa ia ̱ ime ̱ rmi ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: “ Bäije sa ̱ je ̱ r bäi shäk wa rä , jewa ia ̱ je ̱ r bäi yirmi ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: “ Bäije sa ̱ je ̱ r ta yëë wa rä , jewa te Säkeklä su ̱ emi ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: “ Bäije kju ̱ atke paruäk wa rä , jewa kirmi Säkeklä yabala ni je ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: “ Bäije sä weikanak ji wämo ki ̱ ka wa rä , jewa ia ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: Bäije bas dä mika ̱ bas yirke ̱ yakei , bas kolorke ̱ weikanak , bas ki ̱ yörke ̱ ji yakei biköle wà ka ̱ yue ebä wà yis kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka ra rä .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Jera bas ssëno a ̱ naa , bas ka ̱ ssö , bas ia ̱ je säkei tso ̱ däksa ̱ ta ̱ i ka ̱ jöir ska ki ̱ ka . Ata je su ̱ ta ijewa te jile bata shäk wa bakle bas yikaba wa kukacha ̱ wa ̱ weikanak rä .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: “ Bas dä däyë ye ka ̱ jiska . Ata däyë iianawa ̱ ka kjei ta ji ̱ a ra , jera ¿ jibä wà je bäirmini na ? Je ka kiar ji ̱ a ji a ̱ ni ye , ata itulunaksa ̱ ra wätunakwa ̱ sä klä wà ebä ye ikiar dä .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: “ Bas dä ka ̱ oloi ye ka ̱ jiska . Jukläyäkä ka ̱ tsä bata ki ̱ ka ka je blenak kuna .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Ñaebä ka tsi ̱ ni wäkawe ̱ rä dunakcha ̱ cajón niki ̱ ka kuna , ata je dueka ̱ rä iduäkläka ̱ ki ̱ , jekäi ra ioloi te yi tso ̱ ju ja ̱ rka kalabe ñiwe ̱ mi .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas oloi ñiwo ̱ ka ̱ ditsä wäna , ji we ̱ bas te bäi su ̱ aklä ijewa wa ̱ , je oloi ja ̱ mi ijewa wa ̱ bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir kjeishäklä .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: “ Ke bas ku ̱ ibiketsa yis de rä ka ̱ wei yöle , ñakäi kte yile jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ , je ju ̱ akksa ̱ ni . Ka yis dene rä je ju ̱ akksa ̱ kuna , ata yis de rä iwawa ̱ k .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä ka kjäju ̱ ba bala na ka ̱ wei yöle äyë wä tsi ̱ neí , itsa ̱ tkeleíbä jibä ka tse ̱ nak ju ̱ nakmi etka wä a ̱ ni , ata je biköle wao ̱ na e ̱ ná kjepa itse ̱ rju ̱ mi rä .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yi te sa pakale ji wa ̱ k etka tsi ̱ nebä jibä jawa ̱ ka wao ̱ le kuna , ñakäi sa saka pakte ite jekäi iwa ̱ k ra , jera ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí ska je kirmi rä bena katäbäka . Ata yi te je wawá ̱ ra , je wapakta ra , jera ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí ska je kirmi rä bakleka ̱ .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ka bas se ̱ ne wämo fariseo wa tsa ̱ ta , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa tsa ̱ ta ra , jera a ̱ ni ka bas däkwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno ja ̱ mi .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: “ Bas wa ̱ issële iyileta ̱ na sa bakle mikle wa ia ̱ : ‘ Ke sa ktawa ̱ , ’ ñakäi : “ Yi te sa ktawa ̱ ra , je ki ̱ nui rä ja ̱ nakka ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ ska .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , yi je ̱ r ki ̱ iel iarke ̱ ra , je ki ̱ nui rä ja ̱ nakka ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wa wa ̱ ; ñaebä yi te ishe iel ia ̱ : ‘ Ba rä ka ka ̱ ta ’ ni ra , je ki ̱ nui rä ja ̱ nakka ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wa wa ̱ ; ñaebä yi te ishe : ‘ Ba rä ka je ̱ r ta ’ ni ra , je wakei rä ju ̱ nakmi sä tuläklämi yökö í wäkaleka ̱ ska .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka ba wa ̱ ji detse ̱ me ̱ nak jile däläwa ̱ klä ska ra , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ na ba el je ̱ r ki ̱ ba iarke ̱ ska ra ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: jera je ma wa ̱ me ̱ nak ju ̱ ota ̱ na jeska idäläwa ̱ klä säkätä ja ̱ mi , jekäi ba ma säkätä je ̱ r bäinak ni ba el da , jekjepa bä bitä ni je ma wa ̱ me ̱ nak je däläwa ̱ k .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: “ Ba dami ba kjatiäk ra , jera ña ̱ la wà ebä iparuöksa ̱ iia ̱ plaa , ata kai ra , tsi je ba kjatiäk te ma ju ̱ eksa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäk ia ̱ , jera sä ktei wabiketsäk te ma ju ̱ eksa ̱ guardia ia ̱ , jeska ra bä rä wätenakwa ̱ .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Kte siwa ̱ yie ishe ba ia ̱ , ka bä däkksa ̱ jeska , ata ba te ma nui tju ̱ a ju ̱ ami kalabe cuadranteje kjepa bä dämiksa ̱ ni rä .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: “ Bas wa ̱ issële iyileta ̱ na : ‘ Ke ma manena . ’

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ ; bena yi te alaklä wa su ̱ a je tkena ija ̱ mi ra , jera je rä imanena e ̱ ná ira ije ̱ r ska .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: “ Jekäi ba wäbala wämo te bä shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , je yöksa ̱ ju ̱ omi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bäi si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra rä bä wäjienaklä etka weikarwa ̱ , ka ba yaka kalabe ju ̱ naklämi kuna sä tuläklämi ska .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Ñakäi bä jula wämo te bä shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , je tiökksa ̱ ju ̱ omi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bäi si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra rä bä wäjienaklä etka weikarwa ̱ ka ba yaka kalabe däklämi kuna sä tuläklämi ska .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: “ Ñakäi iyileta ̱ na : ‘ Yi te ialaklä jeke ̱ wa ̱ ra , je kiana ñajewa ̱ äyëí cha ̱ kmi iia ̱ . ’

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ : Biköle yi te ialaklä jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , ata ka je rä ika ̱ wakblewa ̱ ke ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna ra , jera je wà ite je iawa ̱ wa ̱ manenak . Ñakäi yi se ̱ nawa ̱ je jalewa ̱ ta ̱ na ra , jera je rä imaner .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: “ Ñakäi bas wa ̱ issële iyileta ̱ na sa bakle mikle wa ia ̱ : ‘ Ba kabla etkabä ke wäshewa ̱ kwa ̱ , ata je ba kabla etkabä wawo ̱ si ̱ Säkekewa wäna . ’

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ke a ̱ ni bas kabla kable etkabä wà ka ̱ jöir wäkata ska iräle , je rä Säkeklä je ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ki ̱ ka ;

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: ka ̱ jiska wäkata ska iräle , je rä iklä tkäkläka ̱ ye ki ̱ ka ; Jerusalén wäkata ska iräle , je rä Sa ̱ Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta ne jukläyäkäí ki ̱ ka .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Ñakäi ke ba kabla etkabä ma tsa ̱ ku ̱ wäkata ska , je kä ka manenakksa ̱ ba ia ̱ etababä jibä suruu iräle yee iräle ki ̱ ka .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Ata tsa ̱ na ra bas ku ̱ ishö rä : “ Ta ” ni kjela , “ Kai ” ni kjelabä ; ata sa te iki ̱ sha ji ̱ a ra , jera je datse ̱ rä ale yakei wakei ska .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: “ Bas wa ̱ issële iyileta ̱ na : ‘ Yi te bä wäbala shka ̱ wa ̱ ra , nui ki ̱ ije wäbala shka ̱ wo ̱ , ñaebä yi te ba kà pja ̱ wa ̱ ra , nui ki ̱ ije kà pjo ̱ wa ̱ . ’

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ : Ke bas je ̱ k tsa ̱ tka sä yakeila wa yika ; ata yi te ba kpa ma ja ̱ kätä wämo kja ̱ ne ra , jera ma ja ̱ kätä ekta manewo ̱ iia ̱ iwa ̱ buka ̱ nak .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Yi ssëna ba kjatiäk iwa ̱ ba paiklä bäkäkläksa ̱ ra , ñakäi ma wa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ cho ̱ mi iia ̱ .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Yi te ba pakeke ̱ täkili wà däli tsa ̱ kmi un kilómetro kjena ra , jera itso ̱ mi iia ̱ dos kilómetro .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Yi te ba ia ̱ ji kia ra , je ia ̱ imo ; yi te ba ia ̱ jile peitakle ra , ke ikúka kai ni .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: “ Bas wa ̱ issële iyileta ̱ na : ‘ Ba te ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ ble , ata bä bolki dokoitse ba te . ’

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ : Bas ku ̱ bas bolki wa shka ̱ li ̱ blö , bas ka ̱ kiö bas kukäk weikanak wa ki ̱ ka .

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Je rä bas däkläwa ̱ bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir je yabala ye . Je wakei te ka ̱ wä patke ñinak sä yakeila wa ia ̱ , sä bäi bäi wa ia ̱ , ñaebä je te ka ̱ li ̱ patke ja ̱ nak sä wämo wa ia ̱ , ka sä wämo kuna wa ia ̱ .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Ata bas te bas shka ̱ li ̱ bläk wa ebä shka ̱ li ̱ ble ra , ¿ je säkei dämiksa ̱ bas ia ̱ na ? ¿ Ka irä je su ̱ ta inaklä bäkäk wa te iwe ̱ rä na ?

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Ñakäi bas te bas el wa ebä chake ra , ¿ je rä ji bäi si ̱ wá ̱ bas te na ? ¿ Ka irä je su ̱ ta ka Judío kuna wa te iwe ̱ rä na ?

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Jekäi bas se ̱ no bulee si ̱ , jishtä bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir je se ̱ r dä bulee si ̱ käi .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na bas ji wa ̱ ke ̱ wämo ka wa ̱ klä kuna ditsä wäna , ijewa wa ̱ su ̱ nak käi kuna . Ata jekäi ra , bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni ka me ̱ nak bas ia ̱ isäkei .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka mika ̱ ba te jile kaku me ̱ ke ̱ ra , ke ipalei bulawa ̱ k kökö bular ssër käi , jishtä ji wa ̱ k su ̱ nak ebä wa te iwe ̱ ke ̱ käi , ñapaktäklä jui na irä ña ̱ la wà irä , ditsä wa ̱ ikjeishäklä ebä . Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ijewa ia ̱ je säkei rä deleksa ̱ e ̱ ná .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Ata ba te jile kaku me ̱ ke ̱ ra , je wo ̱ blelewa ̱ , ba jula wämo te jile wá ̱ ka ju ̱ ñele kuna ba jula shule wa ̱ käi ;

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: je rä bä jile kaku ma ̱ ke ̱ ka ju ̱ ñenakläwa ̱ kuna . Jera ba Ká , ji blelewa ̱ su ̱ ak , te ba ia ̱ ji me ̱ mi isäkei .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Ñaebä bas ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ra , jera ke je wa ̱ ji wa ̱ k su ̱ nak ebä wa käi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jewa wäbätsä rä je ̱ k duäkka ̱ ka ̱ kiäk ñapaktäklä jui na , ña ̱ la ukä shtä ska ditsä wa ̱ su ̱ nak . Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ijewa ia ̱ je säkei rä deleksa ̱ e ̱ ná .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Ata mika ̱ ba ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ra , ma cho ̱ ju ja ̱ r etkä na , je ̱ k kjäshtöwa ̱ ; jeska ma ka ̱ kiö ba Ká ka juenak kuna ia ̱ . Jera ba Ká , ji blelewa ̱ su ̱ ak , te ba ia ̱ ji me ̱ mi isäkei .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: “ Jekäi bas ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ra , ke kte etkabä sha jirä jirä ka wata , jishtä ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi wa te iwe ̱ käi , ijewa te ibiketse iktä ssërmi ite ishe jaree ki ̱ ka ni .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Ke bas ku ̱ iwa ̱ ijewa käi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas Ká wa ̱ ji sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ je ju ̱ ñer kja ka bas wa ̱ ji kirba iia ̱ yika .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Ata bas ka ̱ kiö rä jikäi : ‘ Sa Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir , ba kie oloitsanopa .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Ba gobierno kjöwa ̱ pa . Jishtä ka ̱ jöir ji o ̱ rke ̱ ba wakei ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi , je su ̱ ta ji o ̱ nopa ka ̱ jiska .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Ba ku ̱ ñanak sherke ̱ sá ki ̱ buliri buliri je mopa sá ia ̱ jir .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Ba ku ̱ sá nui jöwa ̱ pa bitaba , jishtä sá te nui ta sá ra wa jawa ̱ bitaba käi .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Ke ba ku ̱ sá jawa ̱ je ̱ r kinak sa ̱ me ji yakei wakblä käi , ata ba ku ̱ sá wetsöksa ̱ ale yakei yika . Je rä ba ne rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ba ne rä täkili ta , ba ne rä oloi kaleka ̱ jekjeyemi rä ki ̱ ka . Amén . ’

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: “ Iwa rä bas te sa saka nui jawa ̱ bitaba ra , ñakäi bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir te bas jemiwa ̱ bitaba .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Ata ka bas wa ̱ sa saka janewa ̱ bitaba ra , ñaebä bas Ká wa ̱ ka bas janakwa ̱ bitaba bas shirile ki ̱ ka .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Mika ̱ bas bätsäke ̱ ra , ke bas je ̱ k ja je ̱ r ialewa ̱ , jishtä ji wa ̱ k su ̱ nak ebä wa te iwe ̱ käi . Ijewa wäktä iawa ̱ ke ̱ ijuenaklä ditsä wäna ibätsäke ̱ irä . Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ijewa ia ̱ je säkei rä deleksa ̱ e ̱ ná .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Ata ba bätsäke ̱ ra , ma tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ aceite tköka ̱ , bä wä paskuö ,

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: ka ijuenaklä ditsä wäna bä bätsäke ̱ irä ; ata je wo ̱ ba Ká ka juenak kuna je wäna . Jera ba Ká , ji blelewa ̱ su ̱ ak , te ba ia ̱ ji me ̱ mi isäkei .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: “ Ke bas ku ̱ ji säkei ta bla bas wakwa ia ̱ ka ̱ jiska , mai yäle irä , ji äwewa ̱ k irä te iweikeke ̱ wa ̱ shtä ska , mai jakbläk wa kjäkläwa ̱ jakbläk shtä ska .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: Ata bas ku ̱ ji säkei ta blö bas wakwa ia ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska , mai iwak irä , iäwëwa ̱ k irä te ka iweikewa ̱ kuna ska , mai jakbläk wa ka kjäkläwa ̱ kuna jakbläk ska .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , mai bas ji säkei ta tso ̱ blele ra , je ne ska bas je ̱ r kämami rä .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: “ Sä wäbala rä tsi ̱ ni käi sa wakei ia ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka bä wäbala rä bäi ra , jera ba wakei kalabe rä wäñinakka ̱ .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Ata bä wäbala rä ka bäi kuna ra , jera ba wakei kalabe rä wätuinakwa ̱ . Jekäi ka ̱ oloi tso ̱ ma ja ̱ mi rä wätuilewa ̱ ra , jera je rä wätuilewa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: “ Ka yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ blu wa bol kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ite ekla dokoitsemi , ata ite iel shka ̱ li ̱ blemi ; ite ekla bawe ̱ mi , ata iel iarmi ije ̱ r ki ̱ . Jekäi ka bas ia ̱ Säkeklä irä blune irä kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak ñara .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Ke bas je ̱ r iana bas je ̱ k se ̱ newa ̱ klä ki ̱ , jibä ñe sä te , jibä ye sä te ; ñakäi bas yaka ki ̱ , jibä jie sä te . Ñera se ̱ ne kseka rä ka ji ñe kjelabä kuna ; sa yaka rä ka pajienak kjelabä kuna , ¿ ka irä je ne käi na ?

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka wa su ̱ o : Ka jewa rä däli tkäk kuna , iwä kukäk kuna , itapawa ̱ k kuna ibläklä jui ska . Ata bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir te jewa chewe ̱ rä . ¿ Ka irä bas säkei rä jewa tsa ̱ ta na ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Jekäi ¿ mane bas sha ̱ se ̱ rmi ki ̱ ta bakleka ̱ ji ̱ a una hora kje jikje ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ ebä oloi ja ̱ mi rä na ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: “ Jera ¿ jiye bas je ̱ r iawe ̱ ke ̱ je ̱ k pajie te na ? Jishtä ka ̱ ki ̱ ka tsitsi wä jè ̱ r dä je biketsö : Ka irä shka ̱ bläk kuna , ka irä sua yuäk kuna .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , Salomón bakle je ̱ k pajiäk baawa ̱ si ̱ , ka je ̱ k pajiene jewa sha ̱ mane a ̱ ni käi .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ kä je ̱ nak ka ̱ ki ̱ ka jir ebä , ata bulia ra irä tulunakmi yökö ye pan kukäklä ja ̱ rka , je pajie Säkeklä te jekäi ra , jera je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ ¿ ka iwa ̱ bas ka ji biketsäk etkabä si ̱ kuna wa pajienak na ?

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ke bas je ̱ r ianakwa ̱ ishäk : ¿ Jibä ñemi sa te na ? ¿ Jibä yemi sa te na ? ¿ Jibä wà sa ̱ ñapajiämi na ?

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna wa te je shtä biköle yule rami , ata bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wa ̱ je biköle sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ ju ̱ ñer .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Ata ji biköle tsa ̱ ta bas ku ̱ rä Säkeklä gobiernoí , iji wämoí ne yulö rä , jera je shtä biköle ki ̱ dämiksa ̱ bas ia ̱ .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Ji rä bulia ku ̱ ke bas je ̱ r iawa ̱ k . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bulia ra ji tso ̱ ni sa ̱ je ̱ r iawa ̱ k . Ji rä jir iyakei ne kjela kata irä .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: “ Ke bas ku ̱ sa saka wabiketsaksa ̱ , ka bas wakwa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ kuna .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji wà bas te sa saka wabiketsaksa ̱ ra , je ja ̱ mi bas wakwa wabiketsarmiksa ̱ . Ji wà bas te ji mabla sa saka ia ̱ , je ja ̱ mi ji mablermi bas ia ̱ .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: ¿ Jiye ba te ka ̱ pjoi su ̱ e bä el wäbala na , ata ba wakei wäbala na kal kuklei kate je ka su ̱ e ba te rä na ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Jera ¿ maikäi ba te ishemi bä el ia ̱ : ‘ Ka ̱ mo yis ia ̱ je ka ̱ pjoi tsa ̱ kläksa ̱ bä wäbala na ’ ni , ata jera ba wakei wäbala na kal kuklei kate rä na ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Ba ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , säkätä ba ku ̱ ba wakei wäbala na kal kuklei tso ̱ ksa ̱ . Jekäi ra ba wä wajuermi bäi , ba wa ̱ ka ̱ pjoi kate bä el wäbala na je tsa ̱ kläksa ̱ .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: “ Ke jile oloitsalewa ̱ cha ̱ mi chichi ia ̱ , ke suiwä säkei ta shtä tulami köchi ia ̱ . Ata jekäi ra , tsi ite iwätuewa ̱ klä wà , imanerka ̱ te ba wakei kshetkewa ̱ .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: “ Bas ku ̱ ji kiö , jera je me ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ ; bas ku ̱ ji yulö , jera je ko ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ ; bas ku ̱ ju kjä bulawo ̱ , jera je kjä yermi bas ia ̱ .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji kiäk wa biköle ia ̱ ji me ̱ rmi ; ji yuläk wa ia ̱ ji ko ̱ rmi ; ju kjä bulawa ̱ k wa ia ̱ ikjä yermi .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: “ Ikuna ba yaba te pan kia ra , ¿ bas sha ̱ mane te jak me ̱ mi iia ̱ na ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Ite nima kia ra , ite tkäbe me ̱ mi iia ̱ na ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Jekäi bas se ̱ nak yakei wa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji bäi ne me ̱ bas yabala ia ̱ rä , jera je tsa ̱ ta bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir te ji bäi me ̱ mi ji kiäk iwakei ia ̱ wa ia ̱ .

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka ji biköle sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ sa saka wa ̱ o ̱ nak bas ia ̱ , jera je su ̱ ta bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ ijewa ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je ne rä ika ̱ wei yöle irä , ji yile jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ irä , je wà si ̱ rä .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: “ Bas kjöwa ̱ julu ña ̱ la kjäshtäklä bala siklewa ̱ tsi ̱ ne ja ̱ rka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä weikanacha ̱ kläwa ̱ ska sä kjäkläwa ̱ kjäshtäklä ja ̱ r dä shoo , je ña ̱ le ̱ i rä bukleju ̱ mi sho ̱ lo ̱ o ̱ ; je wà sä kjämi rä ta ̱ i .

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: Ata sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka ska sä kjäkläwa ̱ je kjäshtäklä ja ̱ r dä siklewa ̱ tsi ̱ ne , je ña ̱ le ̱ i bala rä siklewa ̱ tsi ̱ ne ; jekäi elkjebä te je ku ̱ emi rä .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: “ Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ sä wäyuäk jile bata shäk wa ye yika . Jewa rä däkwa ̱ bas sha ̱ na juenak ipa ki ̱ oveja käi , ata ije ̱ r na ra irä lobo sälwii käi .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Ijewa juermi bas wäna rä iwärke ̱ ne wà . ¿ Baishe uva wä kicha tie rä dika yäkä ja ̱ mi na ? ¿ Higuera wä shte rä ka ̱ shche ̱ i ja ̱ mi na ?

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Jekäi kal bäi biköle wär dä wä ta bäi , ata kal yakei wär dä wä ta shi ̱ ana .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Kal bäi ka wänak wä ta shi ̱ ana , ñaebä kal yakei ka wänak wä ta bäi .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Kal ka wänak kuna wä ta bäi wa biköle rä tenak tulämi tulunakka ̱ yökö ki ̱ .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ijewa juermi bas wäna rä iwärke ̱ ne wà .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Ka biköle ishäk yis ia ̱ : ‘ Säkekewa , Säkekewa ’ ni wa , kjäkwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí ska . Ata ji sherke ̱ yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir ki ̱ je wa ̱ k wa ebä .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ishemi yis ia ̱ : ‘ Säkekewa Säkekewa , ¿ ka irä sá te jile bata sha ba kie ja ̱ mi , be kjäia ba kie ja ̱ mi , ji wá ̱ täkili ta ba kie ja ̱ mi na ? ’

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Jera yie ijewa ia ̱ ishemi bulee : ‘ Ka yis wa ̱ bas su ̱ le mik a ̱ ni . ¡ Bas ji wakbläk ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi wa , cho ̱ kju ̱ awa yis yika ! ’

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka biköle yi te jí yie ishe datse ̱ ssa , je wawá ̱ ite ra , je rä jishtä ditsä je ̱ r ta bäi te iju yua jak ki ̱ ka käi .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Jera ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ nawa ̱ , diklä deju ̱ té , si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ naté tena je ju ja ̱ mi , ata ka iyeneju ̱ mi , jak ki ̱ irä ñak tkelewa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: Ata biköle yi te jí yie ishe datse ̱ ssa , ata ka iwa ̱ iwao ̱ ne ra , je rä jishtä ditsä ka je ̱ r ta te iju yua kje ksa ̱ ki ̱ ka käi .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Jera ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ nawa ̱ , diklä deju ̱ té , siwa ̱ ju ̱ naté , tena je ju ja ̱ mi ; jekäi iyenaju ̱ mi , jera weikanawa ̱ itjä . ”

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Jesús te jekäi isha e ̱ ná ra , je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ite sa pakteke ̱ te .

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ite ijewa pakteke ̱ rä ssër ta oloi ta irä käi ; ka je rä iwakwa sha ̱ na ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa käi kuna .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Je ka ̱ kichei ska ibiteju ̱ ni ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ dar wa ̱ ni ije ra .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Ñerä ekla paiale lepra wa ̱ je ̱ k sikawa ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwä ja ̱ mi , te isha : — Säkekewa , ba ki ̱ ishena ra , ba ia ̱ yis bäirmi ni yëë .

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Jera Jesús jula tkawa ̱ ija ̱ mi te isha : — Yis ki ̱ ishena ; bä bäino ni yëë . Jera ñawäsaka ipaiale bäinani yëë .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Issö ! Ka bä te je she kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , ata ma cho ̱ chui ia ̱ je ̱ k kjashäk . Jeska ji rä me ̱ nak je mo ̱ Säkeklä wäna , jiräni Moisés wa ̱ sa pakale iwa ̱ k käi , ijewa wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä .

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Ideju ̱ Capernaúm ska ra , ekla guardia wa cien wäsikäk je ̱ k sikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi ka ̱ kiäk iia ̱ ,

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: te isha : — Säkekewa , yis kjanaklä karanawa ̱ kalme kipaka ju na , je te ji shka ̱ l ssë kalme e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Jera ije te isha iia ̱ : — Yis maju ̱ ibäi wa ̱ k ni .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Ata je cien wa wäsikäk te ikúka , te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ka yis dä bäi kuna je ju na ka ba däkleiwa ̱ . Ata ba ku ̱ ishö yile ebä , jera yis kjanaklä bäirmini .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis wakei rä patkenak , ata ñaebä yis wa ̱ guardia wa tso ̱ patkenak . Jekäi yie ishe ekla ia ̱ : “ Ma cho ̱ ” , jera je maju ̱ ; isaka ia ̱ : “ Bä kute ” , jera je bitäju ̱ ; yie ishe yis kjanaklä ia ̱ : “ Jikäi iwo ̱ ” , jera je te je we ̱ .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Jesús te je ssa ra , je te issëwa ̱ baa . Jera ite isha iwakei ra dami wa ia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yis wa ̱ ka yi a ̱ ni ko ̱ ne Israel wa sha ̱ na ji biketsäk etkabä je kjekla .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Jekäi yie ishe bas ia ̱ , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ bitämi ka ̱ wä däkläka ̱ wà , ka ̱ wä minakläwa ̱ wa , jewa ñatulämiwa ̱ yäkäk ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí ska , Abraham irä , Isaac irä , Jacob irä , jewa ra ñara .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ata mane wa ia ̱ igobierno rä däkksa ̱ , jewa tulurmiksa ̱ ka ̱ ekta yee si ̱ ka ; jeska rä sa ̱ ji ̱ ami , sa kà wätiämi .

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha je cien wa wäsikäk ia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ ni ; ba te ibiketsa käi io ̱ nopa ba ia ̱ . Jera je horaí ebä wà ikjanaklä bäinani .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Jesús minewa ̱ ju ̱ Pedro ju naka , je te je yak duä kalme kipaka su ̱ a , wäkalewa ̱ oloowa ̱ .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Jera ijula tkawa ̱ je jula ja ̱ mi , jera iwäkarke ̱ oloo tse ̱ naju ̱ mi . Jekäi ije ̱ kaka ̱ ni te ijewa pasu ̱ a jile wà .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra , ije wäki ̱ kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ de ja . Jera ite ji sheke ̱ ebä wà ite ji wikbluí kjäiatulaksa ̱ , ñaebä duë ta wa biköle bäiwa ̱ ni ite .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Je rä io ̱ naklä jishtä iyile jile bata shäk Isaías ja ̱ mi te ishe käi : “ Ije wakei te sa ̱ ja ̱ lmawa ̱ kcha ̱ wa ̱ kukawa ̱ , ñakäi ite sä duë cha ̱ jámi . ”

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Jesús te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tapar tso ̱ ipája ̱ mi su ̱ a ra , ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa patkami kjäksa ̱ julu tipä a ̱ mikata .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Ñerä ekla je ̱ k yöle ka ̱ wei wà je ̱ k sikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , yis maju ̱ ba ra mai ma mike ̱ käi .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Chichi ka ̱ rbä rä ka ̱ wäja ̱ r í ta , du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka rä ju ta , ata ditsä yäbei wa ̱ ka ka ̱ kuna mai a ̱ ni itsa ̱ ku ̱ katabläkläwa ̱ .

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa saka te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , säkätä ka ̱ mo yis ia ̱ yis minaklä yis ká itäbiäkwa ̱ ta ̱ na .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Ata Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Sä shkä yis da , ata tsu dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa te isaka dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa itäbie .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no na , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa minejulumi ira .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Ñerä si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ naté täkii tipä ki ̱ ka , je tjuäke ̱ te ko ̱ no ki ̱ tierawa ̱ kje , ata ije kapawa ̱ .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ ishki ̱ wa ̱ k te isha : — ¡ Säkekewa , sá tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ pa , sa tuar dawa ̱ irä !

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Jera ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas ka ji biketsäk etkabä si ̱ kuna wa , jiye bas suarke ̱ rä na ? Ñerä ije je ̱ kaka ̱ te si ̱ wa ̱ irä , tipä irä uña , jera iwäkolonawa ̱ bii .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Jera je ditsä wa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi ite ichaka ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Mane shtä wa ije rä , je ktä ssë si ̱ wa ̱ te tipä te rä na ?

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Jekäi ikjaksa ̱ ju ̱ a ̱ mikata Gadara wa ke ̱ i ki ̱ ra , bol wäialeksa ̱ be wa ̱ daksa ̱ julu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska , dejulu iwäki ̱ . Jewa rä sälwii si ̱ ki ̱ ka ka yi a ̱ ni shkäklei je ña ̱ la wà .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Ñerä jewa a ̱ na te isha : — ¿ Säkeklä yaba , jiye ba bite sá wäki ̱ rä na ? ¿ Ba bite jiska rä sá pakäk ji shka ̱ l ssäk ka ike ̱ i däwa ̱ ba yika na ?

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Ijewa ska ra , ka ̱ miika köchi ka ̱ biä tso ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Jera je be ka ̱ kia iia ̱ , te isha : — Ba te sá tulaksa ̱ ra , sá patkömi je köchi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ja ̱ rka .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas cho ̱ jera . Jekäi ijewa kjaksa ̱ julu minejulumi köchi ja ̱ mi , ñerä je köchi kalabe ñatka jolowa ̱ mi ka ̱ ukä ki ̱ tipä na , tuanacha ̱ wa ̱ diklä na .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Jera je kjänanak wa julunami demi jukläyäkä na , te je paka biköle ji o ̱ na je wäialeksa ̱ be wa ̱ wa ia ̱ rä käi .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Ñerä jukläyäkä wa kalabe biteksa ̱ julu Jesús wäki ̱ . Ijewa te isu ̱ a ra , ite isha iia ̱ pjoo iminakläpa ijewa ke ̱ i yika .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no na , dateksa ̱ ni jíkata , deju ̱ ni iwakei jukläyäkäí ska .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Ñerä ekla karalewa ̱ detse ̱ iwä ki ̱ ka ije ̱ k katashuäklä na . Ijewa te ji biketsa etkabä su ̱ a Jesús te ra , ite isha je karalewa ̱ ia ̱ : — Yaba , bä ssëno täkii , ma nui rä jalewa ̱ bitaba .

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Ñerä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa sha ̱ te ibiketsa je ̱ r na : “ Je kta rä yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Ata jiräni ijewa je ̱ rika rä te Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a . Jera ite isha : — ¿ Jiye bas te ji biketse yakei bas je ̱ r na rä na ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: Jera ¿ mane yila tjabana rä na : ‘ Ma nui rä jalewa ̱ bitaba ’ ni iräle , ta ‘ ma je ̱ köka ̱ shkäk ’ ni iräle ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Ata bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä ditsä yäbei ia ̱ ka ̱ wei tso ̱ sa ̱ nui jäkläwa ̱ bitaba ka ̱ jiska — jera ite isha je karalewa ̱ ia ̱ — : Ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma je ̱ katashuäklä kuköwa ̱ , ma cho ̱ ni bä juka .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Jekäi ije je ̱ kaka ̱ , mineju ̱ ni ijuka .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te je su ̱ a ra , ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi ite Säkeklä , ale ka ̱ wei ma ̱ k ditsä ia ̱ jekäi ji wa ̱ klä , je wakei kjeisha .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Jeska Jesús mineju ̱ ji ̱ a ra , ite ekla kie Mateo ni su ̱ a je ̱ tkelewa ̱ inaklä bäkäklä ska , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Sä shkä yis da . Jera je je ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ ira .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Jekjepa ije ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk ju ska . Ñerä inaklä bäkäk wa irä , ji yakei wakbläk wa irä daté chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , ñatulawa ̱ yäkäk Jesús irä , iwa ̱ dulanak wa irä ra .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa te je su ̱ a ra , ijewa te iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ ichaka : — ¿ Jiye bas paktäk yäkäke ̱ inaklä bäkäk wa ra ji yakei wakbläk wa ra rä na ?

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Jesús te je ssa ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Sa ̱ tso ̱ bäi wa ki ̱ ka sä bäiwa ̱ k sher kuna , ata sä duäke ̱ wa ne ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Bas cho ̱ ni ñayuäk jiräni jí kte wà rä wà : “ Yis ki ̱ je ̱ r bäi she ne kiana rä , ka yis ki ̱ ji me ̱ ka ̱ kiar kuna . ” Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yis dene rä sä wämo wa kiäk kuna , ata yis de rä ji yakei wakbläk wa ne kiäk .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Jekjepa Juan wa ̱ dulanak wa demi ije wäki ̱ te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye sá irä fariseo wa irä jewa bätsäke ̱ ka ̱ raa , ata ba wa ̱ dulanak wa ka bätsä kuna rä na ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — ¿ Bas ia ̱ ra julakolone diei ye ska tso ̱ wa je ̱ r iarmiwa ̱ jula kolonak kaldu ji ̱ a ijewa ra bala na ra na ? Ata ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a je jula kolonak minaklätse ̱ ijewa yika , je ne kjepa ijewa bätsämi rä .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: “ Yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ paiklä nu ̱ l da ka wäbatsa ̱ nak sua kukä spa ̱ na wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je sua kukä te je paiklä nu ̱ l sikemi ti ̱ nii , je te iki ̱ kshe ju ̱ emi e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Ñaebä ka sa ̱ wa ̱ vino blona ji ̱ a tenak bewak kjuä yöle bolsa ye nu ̱ l da shtä naka . Ata ikuna jekäi ra , je bewak kjuä tsikirju ̱ mi , jera vino tkerju ̱ mi , ñaebä ijui weikarmiwa ̱ . Bäi si ̱ ra sä te vino blona ji ̱ a tie rä bewak kjuä spa ̱ na ja ̱ rka , jera je botkäwe se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a . ”

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Je she rami ji ̱ a ite ijewa ia ̱ ebä ra , ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ekla deju ̱ té , je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwä ja ̱ mi te isha : — Ji plaa yis yaba alaklä duawa ̱ , ata bä kute jula ma ̱ kka ̱ iki ̱ ka , jera ise ̱ rmi ni .

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Jekäi Jesús je ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ ira , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra ñara .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Ñerä alaklä ekla duäke ̱ pi ju ̱ ne e ̱ e ̱ na te , bitewa ̱ doce año kje , je je ̱ k sikawa ̱ ishäbe kja ̱ ne , te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ bata passawa ̱ .

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Je rä ite ibiketsa je ̱ r na : “ Yis te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ ebä passawa ̱ ra , yis bäirmini , ” ki ̱ ka .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ k manewa ̱ té isu ̱ ak te isha iia ̱ : — Yaba , bä ssëno täkii , ba te ji biketsa etkabä wà ba tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ . Jera je wäsaka je alaklä bäinani .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Ñerä Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ je sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ju naka te bulanak flauta wà wa irä , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ kjoyir te wa irä su ̱ a ra ,

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ñatso ̱ tulömi jiska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka je yaba rä dulewa ̱ kuna , ata ikapawa ̱ irä . Jera ijewa te ija ̱ ñetsa .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Ata je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ patkena tulaksa ̱ ra , iwakei kjawa ̱ ju ̱ te je yaba kukawa ̱ ijulaka , jera ije ̱ kaka ̱ ni .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Jekäi je palei ju ̱ ñenamika ̱ je ke ̱ i biköle ska .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Jeska Jesús mineju ̱ ji ̱ a ra , jäiyi wa bol ka wä wajuenak kuna wa minemi iitäki ̱ ka , jewa a ̱ na jela te isha : — David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sá dälänopa .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Jekäi idewa ̱ ju ̱ ju ja ̱ rka ra , je ka wä wajuenak kuna wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi , jewa ia ̱ Jesús te isha : — ¿ Bas te ibiketse yis ia ̱ je o ̱ rmi na ? Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , jekäi irä .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Jera ijula tkawa ̱ ijewa wäbala ja ̱ mi te isha : — Jishtä bas te ibiketsa io ̱ rmi käi , jekäi io ̱ nopa bas ia ̱ .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Jera ijewa wäbala wajuena . Jera Jesús te ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a tsa ̱ na , te isha : “ ¡ Issö ! Ke yi a ̱ ni ku ̱ ijuñopa . ”

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Ata ijewa minejulu te ije pakaka ̱ je ke ̱ i biköle ska .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Ijewa minejulubä ra , ekla detse ̱ iwäki ̱ ktä wäblelewa ̱ be wa ̱ .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Jekäi je be kjäienaksa ̱ ra , je ktä wäblelewa ̱ ktaka ̱ ni . Je te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , te isha : — ¡ Mik a ̱ ni ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ji su ̱ le jikäi Israel wa sha ̱ na !

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Ata fariseo wa te isha : — Be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ne oloi ja ̱ mi ije te be kjäieke ̱ ksa ̱ rä .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Jesús damiju ̱ jukläyäkä ta ̱ i ta ̱ i irä tsi ̱ dala irä biköle sha ̱ na . Ite sa pakte rami iwakwa ñapaktäklä jui na ; ite gobierno ktei baa wapakte rami , sä kteke ̱ duë te biköle bäi we ̱ rami ite ñaebä , ji duëi biköle käi .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa su ̱ a ra , ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi ijewa dälänacha ̱ wa ̱ , ijewa tso ̱ rä shtirilecha ̱ wa ̱ irä weikalecha ̱ wa ̱ irä ki ̱ ka , jishtä oveja ka kjänanak ta käi .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Jera ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Iyina si ̱ ra däli wäna rä ta ̱ i , ata shka ̱ bläk wa rä elkjebä .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas ka ̱ kiö je däli wakei ia ̱ , iwa ̱ shka ̱ bläk wa patkäklä idäli wäna tiäk .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Jera ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa doce kiaté , jewa ia ̱ ite ka ̱ wei ma ̱ wikblu ñá shtä kjäiäkläksa ̱ iwa ̱ , ñakäi sä kteke ̱ duë te biköle bäiwa ̱ klä iwa ̱ , ji duëi biköle käi .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Jí wa ne rä Jesús ktei bata shäk wa doce kie rä : Isäkätä rä Simón kinak Pedro ni irä , iel Andrés irä ; ñakäi Zebedeo yaba Jacobo irä , iel Juan irä ;

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Felipe irä , Bartolomé irä , Tomás irä , Mateo ale inaklä bäkäk irä , Jacobo Alfeo yaba irä , Tadeo irä ,

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Simón ale bakle kju ̱ atkäk gobierno ra irä , Judas Iscariote wa , ale Jesús ju ̱ akksa ̱ irä .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Je doce wa patka Jesús te , jewa je ̱ r ku ̱ ami ite , je te isha : “ Ka bas mi kuna ka Israel wa kuna ña ̱ le ̱ i wà , ka bas miwa ̱ kuna Samaria wa jukläyäkäí na ,

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: ata bäi si ̱ ra , bas ma rä Israel batala oveja shelecha ̱ wa ̱ käi ska .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Bas mar da , sa paktö , ishö : Yëwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno kjäkläwa ̱ dewa ̱ .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Due ta wa bäiwo ̱ , dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ wo ̱ tulöka ̱ , paiale lepra wa ̱ wa bäiwo ̱ ni yëë , be kjäiöksa ̱ . Bas ia ̱ ideksa ̱ kjermita , je wawo ̱ kjermita .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: “ Ka bas wa ̱ oro iräle inaklä iräle cobre iräle mi kuna bas kipa ja ̱ mi ,

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: ji kianak ña ̱ la ki ̱ tsa ̱ klä iräle , paiklä etkä iräle , sandalia iräle , kata iräle . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , shka ̱ bläk wa kiana rä denak .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: “ Mane jukläyäkä ta ̱ i iräle tsi ̱ ne iräle ska bas dewa ̱ ra , yi se ̱ nak jeska bäi wa yulö , jeska ebä bas se ̱ r bikö bas marmi ni kje .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Bas dewa ̱ julu ju na ra , bas ku ̱ ijewa chakö .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Jekäi je ju ska wa rä bäi ra , jera je bas te ji bäi sha , je o ̱ nopa ijewa ia ̱ , ata ka ijewa rä bäi kuna ra , jera je bas te ji bäi sha , je döksa ̱ pani bas wakwa ia ̱ .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Jekäi yi te ka bas kiewa ̱ ra , ñakäi ka bas ktä ssë ra , jera bas maksa ̱ julu je ju ska iräle , je jukläkläyä ska iräle , jera bas klä pjoi pakpöta ̱ na .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
