text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ra , je jukläyäkä wa buka ̱ nami rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ Sodoma irä Gomorra irä ke ̱ i ska wa buka ̱ nami tsa ̱ ta .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: “ ¡ Issö ! Yie bas patke mar jishtä oveja patke tulemi lobo sha ̱ na käi . Je ki ̱ ka bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ta ta ̱ i tkäbe käi , ñakäi bitaba namala käi .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Jekäi bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ ditsä yika . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te bas tulemiksa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wa ia ̱ , ñakäi ijewa te bas kpemi iñapaktäklä jui shtä ska .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Bas dä janakmi ka ̱ wäkiri wa wäki ̱ , sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wäki ̱ yis kju ̱ ei , bas wa ̱ yis ktei shäklä ijewa ia ̱ , ñakäi ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Ata mika ̱ bas tulunaksa ̱ ra , jera ke bas je ̱ r ianak maikäi iräle , ji ni iräle bas te ishemi käi ; ata je wäsaka ra bas ia ̱ ime ̱ rmi jini bas kiana ishäk rä käi .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Jera ka je rä bas wakwa si ̱ ktä kuna , ata bas Ká wikblu je ne ktäke ̱ bas ja ̱ mi rä .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: “ Jekäi iel te iel ebä ju ̱ emiksa ̱ kota ̱ nakwa ̱ ; ñakäi iká te iyaba ju ̱ emiksa ̱ ; ñakäi iyabala manermika ̱ iká wa ktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Jekäi biköle te bas dokoitsemiwa ̱ yis kie kju ̱ ei . Ata yi chatkawa ̱ ma rä ibata jekje ra , je rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Mika ̱ bas yolorke ̱ weikanak jukläyäkä etka ska ra , jera bas julunomi iyika ietkä ska ; ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ishe bas ia ̱ kte si ̱ wà , ditsä yäbei däni yikaba , shke Israel wa jukläyäkäí biköle sha ̱ na ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ bas ia ̱ .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: “ Dulanak rä ka ipaktäk tsa ̱ ta kuna , ñaebä kjanaklä rä ka iblui tsa ̱ ta kuna .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Jekäi dulanak dewa ̱ ipaktäk ra ñaebä ra , ñakäi kjanaklä dewa ̱ iblui ra ñaebä ra , je ne kjela isherke ̱ rä . Ijewa te ju wakei kia Beelzebú ni ra , jera je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ ijewa te iju ska tso ̱ wa shemi .

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: “ Je ki ̱ ka ke bas suana ijewa yika . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ji a ̱ ni kuna ki ̱ kololewa ̱ ka juenakwa ̱ kuna käi ; ñakäi ka ji a ̱ ni kuna blelewa ̱ ka ju ̱ ñenakwa ̱ kuna käi .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Ji sha yis te bas ia ̱ ka ̱ yee na , je shöni ka ̱ oloi ka ; ji ssa bas te yile ja ̱ lmana käi , je shöka ̱ ni ju tsi ̱ bata yöle shpatke ki ̱ ka .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Ke bas suana yi rä sä ktäk , ata ka iia ̱ sä wikblu duäk jewa yika . Ata bäi si ̱ ra , bas suano rä yi ia ̱ sä wikblu irä sa yaka irä weikarmiwa ̱ sä tuläklämi ja ̱ rka je wakei yika .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: “ ¿ Baishe ka du yuleila botkä watju ̱ e rä inaklä wäka etka ebä na ? Ata je du etka a ̱ ni ka ja ̱ nak bäklä iski ̱ ka , ka ka ̱ wei me ̱ le kuna bas Ká wa ̱ käi .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä kalabe rä shtao ̱ leksa ̱ .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ke bas suana ; bas säkei rä du yuleila chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ säkei tsa ̱ ta ki ̱ ka .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Jekäi yi te yis shaka ̱ ditsä wäkata ska ra , jera ñaebä yis te ije shemika ̱ yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wäkata ska .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ñakäi yi te ka yis sheka ̱ ditsä wäkata ska ra , jera ñaebä yis wa ̱ ka ije yinakka ̱ yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wäkata ska .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: “ Ke ibiketsa yis de rä sa ̱ se ̱ naklä je ̱ r bäi wà ñara ka ̱ jiska ni . Ka yis dene rä sa ̱ se ̱ naklä je ̱ r bäi wà kuna , ata yis de rä sa ̱ ñakpäkläka ̱ espada wà .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis de rä jäiyi kju ̱ atkäkläka ̱ iká ra , sä yaba alaklä kju ̱ atkäkläka ̱ ia ̱ mi ra , sä yak kju ̱ atkäkläka ̱ iyak ra .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Jekäi sa wakei ju ska tso ̱ wabä manermika ̱ sä bolki ye .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: “ Yi wa ̱ iká ia ̱ mi shka ̱ l yis tsa ̱ ta ra , ka je rä bäi kuna däkwa ̱ yis ia ̱ ye ; yi wa ̱ iyaba jäiyi iräle , alaklä iräle shka ̱ l yis tsa ̱ ta ra , ka je rä bäi kuna däkwa ̱ yis ia ̱ ye ;

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: yi wa ̱ ka icruz buka ̱ neka ̱ minak yis da ra , ka je rä bäi kuna däkwa ̱ yis ia ̱ ye .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Yi je ̱ r ja ̱ mi je ̱ k dälänawa ̱ ra , je wà iweikarmiwa ̱ . Ata yi je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ yis kju ̱ ei ra , je wà ije ̱ k tsa ̱ tkämiksa ̱ .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: “ Yi te bas kiawa ̱ ra , je te rä yis ne kiawa ̱ ; yi te yis kiawa ̱ ra , je te rä yis patkäkté ne kiawa ̱ .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Yi te jile bata shäk kiawa ̱ irä jile bata shäk ki ̱ ka ra , jera ji säkei ta tso ̱ däkksa ̱ jile bata shäk wa ia ̱ je dämiksa ̱ ñaebä ijewa ia ̱ . Yi te sä wämo kiawa ̱ wämo irä ki ̱ ka ra , jera ji säkei ta tso ̱ sä wämo wa ia ̱ je dämiksa ̱ ñaebä ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Yi te jí yabala käi wa ekla tia etka diklä tse ̱ ta kjela kakjelabä wà , irä yis wa ̱ dulanak ki ̱ ka ra , kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je wakei ia ̱ ji säkei ta dämiksa ̱ ka wäshäkwa ̱ a ̱ ni . ”

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa doce ia ̱ isha e ̱ ná o ̱ nak ra , jera jeska imineju ̱ mi sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ ak irä , sa paktäk irä , ijewa jukläyäkäí ska .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Juan kate wätelewa ̱ ska ite Säbäkäkksa ̱ te ji we ̱ ke ̱ je palei ju ̱ ña ra , ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa patkami iwäki ̱ ,

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: ichakäk iia ̱ : — ¿ Ba ne rä ale däke ̱ ju ̱ rä na , ata sa kiana isaka ki ̱ ssäk ji ̱ a na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka te isha : — Bas cho ̱ ni ipakäk Juan ia ̱ , ji ssa , ji su ̱ a , bas te käi :

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: ka wä wajuenak kuna wa wä wajuerke ̱ ni , klä ialewa ̱ wa shkäke ̱ ni , paiale lepra wa ̱ wa bäirke ̱ ni yëë , kukä balewa ̱ wa kukä wassërke ̱ ni , dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ r tuläke ̱ ka ̱ ni , ñakäi ka jita wa ia ̱ kte baa bata yirte .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: ¡ Bäije yi ka dokonewa ̱ jishtä yis dä käi je wa ̱ rä !

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Ñerä ijewa marmini ra , Jesús te Juan ktei chakami je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ : “ ¿ Jibä su ̱ ak bas dasta ̱ na ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska rä na ? ¿ Kje uka wäkpeke ̱ si ̱ wa ̱ te je su ̱ ak na ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Ata ka irä jekäi kuna ra , ¿ ji su ̱ ak bas dasta ̱ na rä na ? ¿ Ekla je ̱ k pajiele yëë su ̱ ak na ? Ñera , je ̱ k pajiele yëë wa tso ̱ rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ju na .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Jera , ¿ jibä su ̱ ak bas dasta ̱ na rä na ? ¿ Ekla jile bata shäk na ? Tsa ̱ na ra jekäi irä , ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka ije rä jile bata shäk ebä kuna .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Ata ije ne rä ale ktei yöle katke jikäi rä : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Yie yis ktei bata shäk patkemi bä wätsa ̱ kba . Je te ma ña ̱ le ̱ i bäiwe ̱ miba bä yika . ’

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , sa ̱ ko ̱ le alaklä wa wa ̱ , jewa sha ̱ na ka yi deneka ̱ Juan säwäukewa ̱ k tsa ̱ ta ; jeiräta ka ̱ jöir gobierno ja ̱ mi wa sha ̱ na yi rä ja ̱ lewa ̱ biköle katäbäka , je rä ije tsa ̱ ta .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: “ Juan säwäukewa ̱ k ke ̱ i skaté bite rä jira kje , ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí weikaté ji sälwii te ; jekäi yi rä sälwi wa ne te je bäkeke ̱ ksa ̱ rä .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Iwa rä jile bata shäk wa biköle irä ka ̱ wei yöle irä te je bata sha Juan deju ̱ kje .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Jekäi bas ssëna jí kte kiäkwa ̱ ra , ije ne rä ale Elías däke ̱ ju ̱ rä .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Yi rä kukä ta ra , ¡ je ku ̱ issö !

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: “ Ata ¿ jibä ja ̱ mi yis te jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa pakemi na ? Ijewa rä jishtä yabala käjäklä sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska , jewa a ̱ r isaka tsa ̱ ka käi ,

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: jewa te ishe : ‘ Sá bulana bas ia ̱ kabe wà , ta ka bas klä ju ̱ a ta ; sá kjoyina sä dulewa ̱ ji ̱ etsäklä shtä wà , ta ka bas ji ̱ á ta . ’

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Juan deju ̱ wa ̱ ka ji ñane , ji yane , ata je yirke ̱ rä : ‘ Ije rä kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ ’ ni .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Ata ditsä yäbei deju ̱ , je te ji ñeke ̱ , ji yeke ̱ , ata je yirke ̱ rä : ‘ Isu ̱ o , ije rä yäkäk ta ̱ i , vino yäk ta ̱ i , je ̱ k bawa ̱ k inaklä bäkäk wa ra , ji yakei wakbläk wa ra ’ ni . Ata sä rä ka ̱ biketsä ta ra , je juerke ̱ rä sä te ji we ̱ ke ̱ ja ̱ mi . ”

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Jera ite jukläyäkä mai iwa ̱ ji täkili ta o ̱ le ta ̱ i ska wa uña , ka ijewa ñamaneneksa ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka :

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: “ ¡ Säli bas Corazín wa rä ! ¡ Säli bas Betsaida wa rä ! Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas sha ̱ na ji o ̱ na täkili ta je kuna rä o ̱ le Tiro irä Sidón irä ska ra , mik ijewa ñamaneneksa ̱ , ñapajiene sua yönak saco ye shtä wà , muli ̱ tä tulune je ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ra , bas buka ̱ nami rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , Tiro wa irä Sidón wa irä buka ̱ nami tsa ̱ ta .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Ñakäi bas Capernaúm wa , ¿ bas ia ̱ ra bas oloi karmika ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska kje na ? Ñera bas dä oloi ja ̱ nakwa ̱ sä wikblu bläklä ska kje . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas sha ̱ na ji o ̱ na täkili ta je kuna rä o ̱ le Sodoma ska ra , ji kje ijewa tso ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ra , Sodoma ke ̱ i ska wa buka ̱ nami ja ̱ lewa ̱ bas buka ̱ nami katäbäka . ”

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska Jesús kta ji ̱ a te isha : “ Papá , ka ̱ jöir ka ̱ jiska wakei , yis te ba kjeishe kte bäi wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba te jí ktei blawa ̱ ka ̱ biketsä ta wa yika , je ̱ r ta wa yika , ata ba te yabala wäji ̱ atkewa ̱ je wà .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Papá , jekäi irä , ba wäbatsa jekäi ki ̱ ka .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: “ Yis Ká wa ̱ ji biköle rä ju ̱ leksa ̱ yis ia ̱ . Yi a ̱ ni ka je ̱ r ko ̱ r iyaba ia ̱ , ata iKá ebä je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite rä . Ñakäi yi a ̱ ni ka je ̱ r ko ̱ r iKá ia ̱ , ata iyaba ebä je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite rä , ñakäi yi wäji ̱ atkewa ̱ kle iyaba te , jewa ebä je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ ite rä .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Bas shtirilecha ̱ wa ̱ wa irä , ji kirii cha ̱ kka ̱ wa irä , kalabe kute yis wäki ̱ , jera yis te bas je ̱ rewe ̱ mi .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Yis yugo jiöka ̱ mi je ̱ k ki ̱ ka , bas ñadulawo ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ; yis dä jurbä , ñakäi yis je ̱ r ska yis dä je ̱ k jalewa ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jera bas te je ̱ räklä ku ̱ emi bas wakwa ia ̱ .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Iwa rä yis yugo rä tjabana , yis däli rä jabona . ”

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska sábado wà Jesús damiju ̱ trigo tkele sha ̱ na , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa kteche ̱ rawa ̱ bäli te . Jekäi ijewa te je wä butse rami , käte rami .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Je su ̱ a fariseo wa te ra , ite isha iia ̱ : — Isu ̱ o , ba wa ̱ dulanak wa te ji rä ka o ̱ nak kuna sábado wà je we ̱ kate .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Jera ale David wa ̱ ji o ̱ le , mika ̱ ije irä shkäk ira wa irä ktacha ̱ wa ̱ bäli te ra , ¿ ka bas wa ̱ je ktei wayile na ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ Säkeklä ju na , te pan tso ̱ me ̱ leka ̱ je ñacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ata ka ka ̱ kuna ije irä , ira shkäk wa irä ia ̱ je ñaklä , ata je ñe rä chui wa ebä te .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Ñaebä chui wa te jile we ̱ Templo naka sábado wà , je wà ka iwa ̱ sábado dälätsane , jeiräta ka irä nuita , ¿ ka je rä wayile kuna bas wa ̱ ka ̱ wei ki ̱ ka na ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jiska ekla kaldu Templo tsa ̱ ta .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Bas je ̱ r ko ̱ nopa ji ni : ‘ Yis ki ̱ je ̱ r bäi she ne kiana rä , ka yis ki ̱ ji me ̱ ka ̱ kiar kuna ’ jewa rä ia ̱ ra , jera ka bas wa ̱ nui ja ̱ neka ̱ kuna ka nuita wa ki ̱ ka .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ditsä yäbei , je rä sábado wäkirií .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Jeska imineju ̱ demiju ̱ ijewa ñapaktäklä jui ska .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Ñerä jeska ekla jula ssi ̱ lewa ̱ katke . Jera ijewa te Jesús chaka iwa ̱ ikjatiäkläwa ̱ pa , te isha : — ¿ Ka ̱ tso ̱ sä bäiwa ̱ klä sábado wà na ?

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Ata ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Mane bas sha ̱ tso ̱ oveja ta etaba , je kuna ja ̱ nakmi ishäkä wä ja ̱ rka sábado wà ra , ¿ ka ije jula tkäkwa ̱ itsa ̱ kka ̱ ni na ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Jera oveja tsa ̱ ta si ̱ ditsä säkei rä . Je ne ki ̱ ka sábado wà ka ̱ tso ̱ ji bäiwa ̱ klä .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Jekjepa ite isha je ekla ia ̱ : — Bä jula paruöksa ̱ . Jera ite iparuaksa ̱ , jekäi je bäinani bäi ietkä käi .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Ata fariseo wa mineksa ̱ julu ra , iñaje ̱ rku ̱ a ji wa ̱ k Jesús ukä ja ̱ mi iwa ̱ iweikäkläwa ̱ pa .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Je ju ̱ ñawa ̱ Jesús te ra , jeska ije ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ . Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ minemi ira , jekäi ite ijewa biköle bäiwa ̱ ni .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Jera jewa ka pakane iwa ̱ yi ije rä je shäkka ̱ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Je rä io ̱ naklä jishtä iyile jile bata shäk Isaías ja ̱ mi te ishe käi :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: “ Isu ̱ o , jí ne rä yis kjanaklä , yis wa ̱ kolole rä , jí ne rä yis wa ̱ shka ̱ ta , yis ssëwa ̱ k a ̱ naa rä . Yis wikblu tkämiwa ̱ ije ja ̱ mi , jekäi ije te ka ̱ biköle ska wa ia ̱ ji we ̱ bulee bata shemi .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Ka ikju ̱ atkäk , ka ia ̱ nak ; ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ia ̱ r ssënak ña ̱ la ki ̱ .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Uka pa ̱ r dawa ̱ , je ka ki ̱ pa ̱ nakwa ̱ iwa ̱ . Tsi ̱ ni mechaí shka ̱ le ̱ i buka ̱ nake ̱ ji ̱ a , je ka ki ̱ wäita ̱ nakwa ̱ iwa ̱ , marä ji we ̱ bulee tsa ̱ tka ite tu ̱ nakka ̱ kje ,

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: ñakäi ije kie ja ̱ mi ka ̱ biköle ska wa je ̱ r blämi . ”

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Jera ekla detse ̱ iwäki ̱ ialewa ̱ be wa ̱ ka wä wajuenak kuna , ka ktäk kuna , je bäiwa ̱ ni ite ; je wà je ktä wäblelewa ̱ ktaka ̱ ni , wä wajuenani .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Je te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , te isha : “ ¿ Baishe ije ne rä ale David yäbei rä na ? ”

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Ata fariseo wa te je ssa ra , ijewa te isha : “ Ka ije wakei ia ̱ be kjäienakksa ̱ , ata je kjäieke ̱ ksa ̱ ite rä be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Beelzebú ne oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Ata ije ̱ r na idewa ̱ jiräni ijewa je ̱ rikä tso ̱ rä käi , je ki ̱ ka ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Gobierno eyaka ñabalabutsa kju ̱ atkäk ñawakwabä ra , jera je shtä biköle rä weikanakwa ̱ itjä . Jekäi ñaebä jukläyäkä etka ska wa iräle , el jui ta ska wa iräle , ñabalabutsa kju ̱ atkäk ñawakwabä ra , jera jewa mane a ̱ ni ka tkenakwa ̱ ji ̱ a idël ye .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Ikuna Satanás wakei je ̱ k kjäiaksa ̱ ra , je rä ije ̱ k bala butsä kju ̱ atkäk je ̱ k ebä ra . Jekäi ra , ¿ maikäi je gobierno tke ̱ rmiwa ̱ ji ̱ a idël ye na ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Jekäi ikuna yis te be kjäieksa ̱ Beelzebú oloi ja ̱ mi ra , jera ¿ yi oloi ja ̱ mi bas ktä ssäk wa cha kjäiäksa ̱ rä na ? Ñera je wà tsu ijewa te bas kjashewa ̱ .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Ata yis te be kjäie tuleke ̱ ksa ̱ rä Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi ra , iyina si ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí rä delewa ̱ e ̱ ná bas sha ̱ na .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: “ Jekäi , ¿ maikäi yile kjäwa ̱ ditsä täkii ju naka idäli jakibläk , iwakei ka mo ̱ ne iwa ̱ säkätä ra na ? Jekäi ebä ne ra ite iju wajemiksa ̱ rä .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: “ Jekäi yi rä ka yis ja ̱ mi kuna , je rä kju ̱ atkäk yis da ; ñakäi yi rä ka ji tapawa ̱ k yis daña , je rä ituläk ju ̱ ami ebä .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ishe bas ia ̱ : ji nui biköle , kteka ̱ yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi biköle , je ki ̱ ka sä rä janakwa ̱ bitaba , ata kteka ̱ yakei Säkeklä Wikblu ukä ja ̱ mi ka je rä janakwa ̱ kuna bitaba .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Ñakäi yi te ji sha ditsä yäbei ukä ja ̱ mi ra , je rä janakwa ̱ bitaba , ata yi kta Wikblu Sikina ukä ja ̱ mi ra , ka je rä janakwa ̱ kuna bitaba , jí ke ̱ i ska iräle , sa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a ska iräle .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: “ Kal bäiwo ̱ bas ku ̱ , jera iwärmi rä wä ta bäi ; iräle , kal yakei tewo ̱ bas ku ̱ , jera iwärmi rä wä ta yakei . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , kal juer dä iwä ne wà .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Tkäbe si ̱ yäbeila , bas dä yakei , ¿ je ia ̱ maikäi jile bäi yir na ? Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ji tso ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ska je ne ja ̱ mi sä kjäbata ska sä ktä rä .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Ditsä bäi te ji säkei ta bäi tso ̱ iwa ̱ ne ja ̱ mi ji bäi tse ̱ ksa ̱ rä , ata ditsä yakei te ji säkei ta yakei tso ̱ iwa ̱ ne ja ̱ mi ji yakei tse ̱ ksa ̱ rä .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ra , kje kte ka wata yile sa ̱ wa ̱ je biköle kiana sa ̱ wa ̱ yinak tuläkka ̱ .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas wa ̱ ji yile , jewa bas dä wetsanakksa ̱ iräle ; bas wa ̱ ji yile , jewa bas ki ̱ nui rä ja ̱ nakka ̱ iräle . ”

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Jekjepa ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä fariseo wa irä sha ̱ te ikúka te isha : — Sapaktäk , sá ssëna ba te ji we ̱ ijuenaklä ye su ̱ ete .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — Jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa rä yakeila ebä , manenak wa ebä ; jewa te ji kieke ̱ ijuenaklä ye . Ata ka jewa ia ̱ ji a ̱ ni kjayinak ijuenaklä ye , ata jile bata shäk Jonás käi ebä ijuenaklä kjayirmi .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jishtä Jonás se ̱ na nima ta ̱ i ña na ka ̱ piana tuina däka ̱ tres día , je su ̱ ta ditsä yäbei se ̱ rmi ishäkä na ka ̱ piana tuina däka ̱ tres día .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Jekäi sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska , Nínive wa ñajämika ̱ te jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa kjatiemika ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Jonás te sa pakta ra ijewa ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ . Ata ¡ issö ! Jiska ekla kaldu , je rä Jonás tsa ̱ ta .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Ñakäi sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska alaklä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i dar sur wa , je ̱ kämika ̱ te jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa kjatiemika ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je biteju ̱ ishäkä wätkerke ̱ wa ̱ ska Salomón ka ̱ biketsäk ta ̱ i te ji pake ssäk . Ata ¡ issö ! Jiska ekla kaldu , je rä Salomón tsa ̱ ta .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: “ Mika ̱ wikblu ñá shtä je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ manele ska ra , imike ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska ka ̱ yuläk ije ̱ räklä , ata ka iwa ̱ iko ̱ ne ra ,

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: ite ishe : ‘ Yis maju ̱ ni yis ju mai yis bitele ska . ’ Ñerä ideni ra , ite iku ̱ a ja ̱ r ebä , sikle yëë , bäileni baa .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Jera imike ̱ ni wikblu saka siete yakei si ̱ iwakei tsa ̱ ta , jewa kiäk jäkté iwakei ra . Jekäi ijewa dewa ̱ julu ra , ise ̱ rke ̱ jeska ; bata ska ra je ditsä iarke ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ säkätä iialewa ̱ tsa ̱ ta . Je su ̱ ta io ̱ rmi jira sa ̱ tso ̱ yakei wa ukä ja ̱ mi rä . ”

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Iktä kaldu ji ̱ a je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ra , jera ia ̱ mi irä iel wa irä de kajali je tapalewa ̱ ektaka , jewa ktakle ira .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Jera yilé te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Issö ! Ma a ̱ mi irä bä el wa irä de kajali jí sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ektaka , jewa ktakle ba ra .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Jera ite jekäi ishäk iia ̱ kúka , te isha : — ¿ Mane rä yis a ̱ mi rä , mane wa rä yis el wa rä na ?

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Jera ijula tkacha ̱ iwa ̱ dulanak wa kja ̱ ne te isha : — ¡ Isu ̱ o ! Jí wa ne rä yis a ̱ mi rä , yis el wa rä .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te ji sherke ̱ yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir ki ̱ o ̱ nak je wawá ̱ ra , je ne rä yis el dä , yis kuta rä , yis a ̱ mi rä .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà ju ska Jesús mineju ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ tipä kjä ja ̱ mi .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Jeska chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ tapanawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi , je ki ̱ ka ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka , jera ije ̱ tkawa ̱ , ata je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa biköle tapar tso ̱ tipä kse ̱ i ki ̱ .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Jera ite ji paka ijewa ia ̱ saka saka jile she ja ̱ mi , te isha : “ ¡ Issö ! Däli tkäk ekla mineju ̱ ituläk .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Jekäi ite itule rami ra , iwä sha ̱ jolona ña ̱ la ki ̱ , jeska du dejulu te ikatacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Sha ̱ jolona jak yäkä na , ishäkä ka ta bäi shtä ska , tsikinaka ̱ mane mane , je rä ka irä ishäkäí ta bäi ki ̱ ka .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Ata ka ̱ wä deka ̱ ju ̱ ra , je te idäläwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ; jera issi ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , ka irä ñak kicha ta bäi ki ̱ ka .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Sha ̱ jolona dika yäkä na , jera je dika yäkä kibina te iki ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Sha ̱ jolona ishäkä bäi ki ̱ ka , je wäna elka cien , ielka sesenta , ielka treinta .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Yi rä kukä ta ra , ¡ je ku ̱ issö ! ”

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ba ktäke ̱ ijewa ra jile she ja ̱ mi rä na ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — Je rä bas ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ na bas wa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí ktei blelewa ̱ je ju ̱ ñakläwa ̱ ki ̱ ka , ata ijewa ia ̱ ka ka ̱ me ̱ ne jekäi .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Iwa rä yi wa ̱ ji tso ̱ , je ia ̱ iki ̱ me ̱ rmi ukä bakleka ̱ . Ata yi wa ̱ ka ji kuna , je yika ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ kjelabä jibä bakanamiksa ̱ .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ktäke ̱ ijewa ra jile she ja ̱ mi rä . Je rä ijewa te isu ̱ eke ̱ , ata ka ijewa ia ̱ ijuer ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ijewa te issëke ̱ , ata ka ijewa ia ̱ issër , ñaebä ka ijewa je ̱ r na idäwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Jekäi io ̱ na ijewa ia ̱ jishtä Isaías wa ̱ jile bata yile te ishe rä käi : ‘ Bas te issëmi ssële , ata a ̱ ni ka bas je ̱ r na idäk , Bas te isu ̱ emi su ̱ le , ata a ̱ ni ka bas wäna ijuenak ,

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Iwa rä jí ditsä wa je ̱ r doloi tenacha ̱ wa ̱ , ijewa kukä wassëla rä därërë , ijewa wätiacha ̱ wa ̱ , ka iwa ̱ isu ̱ aklä kuna wäbala wà , ka iwa ̱ issäklä kuna kukä wà , ka ije ̱ r na idäkläwa ̱ kuna , ka iñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ kuna , ka yis wa ̱ ijewa bäinewa ̱ klä ye . ’

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: “ Ata bäije bas wäbala rä , iwajuerke ̱ ki ̱ ka , ñakäi bas kukä rä , iwassërke ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jile bata shäk wa bakle chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , sä wämo wa bakle chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , jewa ia ̱ issëna ime isu ̱ awa ̱ bas te isu ̱ ete käi , ata ka iwa ̱ isu ̱ nepa ; ñakäi ime issäwa ̱ bas te issëte käi , ata ka iwa ̱ issënepa .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: “ Ñekja , bas ku ̱ je ji pake däli tkäk ja ̱ mi je ssö .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Mika ̱ yilé te gobierno ktei ssa , ata ka ije ̱ r ko ̱ r iia ̱ ra , jera ale yakei si ̱ däke ̱ ju ̱ , te ji tkelewa ̱ ije ̱ r ska tse ̱ ju ̱ eke ̱ mi ; je ne rä ale iwä jolona ña ̱ la ki ̱ ka käi rä .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Je ijolona jak yäkä na , je ne rä yi te kte ssa , je te ikuke plaa je ̱ r ssële a ̱ naa rä .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Ata iwakei rä ka ñak kicha ta bäi , ki ̱ ka ka ise ̱ nak shka ̱ ja ̱ ; jera mika ̱ weikane iräle , sälwi su ̱ ne iräle dewa ̱ kte kju ̱ ei ra , plaa ite ijeke ̱ wa ̱ .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Je ijolona dika yäkä na , je ne rä yi te kte ssa , ata jí ke ̱ i ska ji te sa ̱ je ̱ r iawe ̱ käi , sa ̱ je ̱ k wäyuä blune wà käi , je te je kte ki ̱ tieke ̱ wa ̱ , je te iawe ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ ka wä ta .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Ata ijolona ishäkä bäi ki ̱ ka , je ne rä yi te kte ssëke ̱ je te ije ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ rä , jera je wärke ̱ si ̱ , däke ̱ ksa ̱ elka cien , ielka sesenta , ielka treinta . ”

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Jera ite isaka pakani ijewa ia ̱ jile she ja ̱ mi te isha : “ Ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä ekla te däli wä bäi tula ishka ̱ bläklä ska käi .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Ata iwakwa kapacha ̱ wa ̱ dälei ja ̱ mi , ibolki deju ̱ , te cizaña wä tula je trigo sha ̱ na , jekäi iwakei mineju ̱ mi .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Mika ̱ däli je ̱ na , je wäna ra , cizaña juenaña isha ̱ na .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Jera ikjanaklä wa ñasikawa ̱ je ka ̱ wakei wäja ̱ mi te ichaka iia ̱ : ‘ Säkekewa , ¿ ka irä ba te däli wä bäi ne tula ma shka ̱ bläklä ska rä na ? Jera ¿ maka cizaña tsöna rä na ? ’

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : ‘ Yis bolki ekla ne te iwakbla rä . ’ Jera ikjanaklä wa te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Jera ba ki ̱ ishena sá mi ishtäk tulämi na ? ’

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Ata ije te isha : ‘ Kai , bas te cizaña shta tulami ra , tsi trigo yer tuläka ̱ ña ira .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Sa ̱ ku ̱ ijöwa ̱ kibinak ñara ma rä iwätiäklä ke ̱ i kje . Ata mika ̱ iwä ter mar ke ̱ i ska ra , yie itiäk wa ia ̱ ishemi ; je cizaña shtökksa ̱ säkätäba , tsa ̱ mueche ̱ wa ̱ eyaka eyaka dälänakcha ̱ wa ̱ , ata trigo wä tapawo ̱ yis wa ̱ ibläklä jui ska . ’ ”

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Jera ite isaka pakani jile she ja ̱ mi ijewa ia ̱ , te isha : “ Ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä mostaza wä kukewa ̱ ekla te tkeme ̱ ite ishka ̱ bläklä ska käi .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Je rä tsi ̱ ne si ̱ jile wä biköle saka katäbäka , ata ikibinaka ̱ ra irä ta ̱ i isaka tkele tsa ̱ ta , däke ̱ ka ̱ kal käi , du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka däke ̱ ju yuäk ijula naka kje . ”

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Ite isaka pakani ijewa ia ̱ jile she ja ̱ mi : “ Ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä levadura kukewa ̱ alaklä te je wà ite harina mableleksa ̱ mañatkä wätueka ̱ , je te je yaka kalabe papu ̱ we ̱ ka ̱ käi . ”

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Jesús te je biköle paka je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ rä jile she ja ̱ mi ebä . Ka iwa ̱ ji pakane ijewa ia ̱ ka yile kuna jile she ja ̱ mi käi .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Je rä io ̱ naklä jishtä iyile jile bata shäk ja ̱ mi te ishe käi : “ Yis ktämika ̱ jile she ja ̱ mi . Jile blelewa ̱ ka ̱ jiska yöleksa ̱ skaté , shemika ̱ yis te . ”

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Jekjepa ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , dewa ̱ ni ju naka . Jeska iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi te isha : — Sá je ̱ r ku ̱ o , jile she cizaña tso ̱ shka ̱ bläklä ska ja ̱ mi , je wà .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Jera ite ikúka te isha : — Je däli wä bäi tkäk je ne rä ditsä yäbei rä .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Je shka ̱ bläklä ke ̱ i , je ne rä ka ̱ jiska rä . Je däli wä bäi , je ne rä je gobiernoí ja ̱ mi wa rä . Ñakäi je cizaña wä , je ne rä je yakei ja ̱ mi wa rä .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Ale ibolki je ituläk , je ne rä be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä . Je itiäklä ke ̱ i , je ne rä sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ nakläwa ̱ ke ̱ i rä ; je itiäk wa , je ne rä ángel wa rä .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Jishtä je cizaña rä kita ̱ nakksa ̱ dälänakcha ̱ wa ̱ yökö na , je su ̱ ta io ̱ rmi sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ nakläwa ̱ ke ̱ i ska rä .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Ditsä yäbei te iángel wa patkemi igobiernoí ska sä shirinewa ̱ k wa irä , ji wa ̱ k ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi wa irä jewa kalabe shtäkksa ̱ ,

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: jewa tulemi ite tabeli yaka diawa ̱ klä yökö wà jui ja ̱ rka ; jeska rä sa ̱ ji ̱ ami , sa kà wätiämi .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ata sä wämo wa oloi ñirmika ̱ ka ̱ wä käi , ijewa Ká gobiernoí ska . Yi rä kukä ta ra , ¡ je ku ̱ issö !

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: “ Ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä ji säkei ta blelewa ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ naka ku ̱ e ekla te ra , ite je blewa ̱ ni , kjepa imiju ̱ ni ssële baa te iji tso ̱ biköle watju ̱ e tulemi , jera ite je ke ̱ i tju ̱ eksa ̱ käi .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: “ Ñaebä ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä däli watju ̱ ak te perla babaa yule käi ;

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: jekäi ite perla säkei ta därërë etka ku ̱ aksa ̱ ra , imiju ̱ ni te iji tso ̱ biköle watju ̱ e tulemi , je ra ite itju ̱ eksa ̱ käi .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: “ Ñakäi ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä kla ja ̱ we ̱ mi tipä naka , je ja ̱ rka nima biköle kolor kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa käi ;

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: je pshinawa ̱ ra , ite isikeksa ̱ tipä kse ̱ i ki ̱ ka , ñajäkläwa ̱ te ibäi bäi shtekksa ̱ jienak jile na , ata iyakeila tuleksa ̱ käi .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Je su ̱ ta sa ̱ e ̱ r dawa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ra io ̱ rmi rä : ángel wa bitämi te sa yakeila wa bala butsemiksa ̱ sä wämo wa yika ,

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: jewa tulemi ite tabeli yaka diawa ̱ klä yökö wà jui na ; jeska rä sa ̱ ji ̱ ami , sä kà wätiämi . ”

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: ¿ Je biköle te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Taa .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Je ne ki ̱ ka biköle ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa dulale ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí ja ̱ mi , je rä jishtä ju wakei te iji säkei ta ska jile jeksa ̱ spa ̱ na irä mikle irä käi .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te je ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi e ̱ ná ra , jeska imineju ̱ mi ;

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: deju ̱ ni ike ̱ i ki ̱ te ijewa pakta iwakwa ñapaktäklä jui ska , je te ijewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka ite isha : — ¿ Maka ije te je je ̱ rike tsa ̱ rä , täkili ji wa ̱ klä tsa ̱ rä na ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: ¿ Ka je ne rä ale ju yuäk yaba rä na ? ¿ Ka je a ̱ mi ne kie María ni rä na , ñakäi iel wa rä ka Jacobo , José , Simón , Judas rä na ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: ¿ Ka ikuta wa bena tso ̱ rä jí sajewa sha ̱ na kuna na ? Jekäi ra , ¿ maka je te je biköle tsa ̱ rä na ?

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Je te ijewa ktewa ̱ tulaka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na . Ata Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ka jile bata shäk mane a ̱ ni kuna ka dälätsalewa ̱ kuna käi , ata iwakei ke ̱ i ska , iwakei ju ska ka irä dälätsalewa ̱ kuna .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Jekäi jeska ka iwa ̱ ji o ̱ ne täkili ta shka ̱ ja ̱ , ijewa te ka ibiketse kju ̱ ei .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska ra Herodes ka ̱ bala pa ̱ le cuatro je eyaka tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te Jesús palei ssa .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Jekäi ite isha ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa ia ̱ : “ Ije rä Juan säwäukewa ̱ k , je ne shki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na rä . Je ne ki ̱ ka ije wa ̱ täkili tso ̱ jile wa ̱ klä kju ̱ awa rä . ”

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Iwa rä Herodes wa ̱ Juan rä kololewa ̱ ; je mu ̱ awa ̱ ite cadena wà , patkawa ̱ ite sä wätiäklä ska , iel Felipe se ̱ naklä Herodías kju ̱ ei .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Je rä Juan te isheke ̱ iia ̱ : “ Je ma wa ̱ ikatke ma se ̱ naklä ye , ka jekäi ma ia ̱ ka ̱ kuna , ” je ki ̱ ka .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Jera issëna iktäkwa ̱ , ata isuanawa ̱ ditsä yika , ijewa ia ̱ ra Juan rä jile bata shäk ki ̱ ka .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Ata Herodes ki ̱ año deka ̱ ni , je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ ite ra , Herodías yaba busi klä ju ̱ a ijewa sha ̱ na ; je wà Herodes wäbatsawa ̱ .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ikabla kable etkabä wà ji ma ̱ k iia ̱ ji kieke ̱ ite käi .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Ije rä je ̱ r tkele ia ̱ mi wa ̱ , ki ̱ ka ite isha : — Jiska ba te Juan säwäukewa ̱ k tsa ̱ ku ̱ ne che ̱ té yis ia ̱ plato ki ̱ ka rä .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Ñerä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je ̱ r ianawa ̱ , ata ikabla etkabä kju ̱ ei , ñakäi ñatululewa ̱ yäkäk ira wa kju ̱ ei , ite ika ̱ wei ma je me ̱ naklä iia ̱ .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Jekäi ite ditsä patkami Juan tsa ̱ ku ̱ tiäkksa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Je tsa ̱ ku ̱ detse ̱ plato ki ̱ te ̱ námi je busi ia ̱ , kjepa je te icha ̱ mi ia ̱ mi ia ̱ .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Je ukä ska iwa ̱ dulanak wa dejulu , jewa wa ̱ inu ̱ l minetse ̱ blenakwa ̱ , kjepa iminejulu te je pakani Jesús ia ̱ .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Jesús te je ssa ra , ije ̱ k butsa ju ̱ ami jeska eklabä mineju ̱ ko ̱ no ki ̱ ka , ka ̱ wakei ebä ska . Je ju ̱ ñawa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ra , jera jukläyäkä saka saka ska wa minejulumi iitäki ̱ klä wà .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Ñerä ideksa ̱ ju ̱ ra , ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ a , jera ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi jewa dälänacha ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi ite ijewa sha ̱ duë ta wa bäiwa ̱ ni .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Ata ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi te isha : — Jiska rä ka ̱ wakei ebä , ñakäi ka ̱ wä deewa ̱ kja irä . Wë je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa patkö iminaklä jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala shtä ska ñanak tju ̱ ak iwakwa ia ̱ .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Ata Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ka jiye ijewa sher kuna minak , bas ne ku ̱ ijewa chewo ̱ rä .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Ñera ka sá ji ta jiska , ata pan cinco irä nima botäbä irä je ebä .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Jera ite isha : — Ijöté ' sia ̱ jika .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Jekjepa ite chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa paka ñajäkläkwa ̱ tala ki ̱ . Jera ite je pan cinco irä je nima botäbä irä kukawa ̱ , jera iwä kaka ̱ jöikje , ka ̱ kia iki ̱ , kjepa je pan bala butsa ma ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , jekäi jewa te je ma ̱ je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Biköle yaká , jekäi issënacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ijewa te iukäla a ̱ ta ̱ na shtani canasta na doce pshipshii .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Jera yäkäk wa rä cinco mil kjena jäiyi wa ebä , ka alaklä wa irä yabala irä jerä shtao ̱ leña kuna .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Jera plaa ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa paka ñajiäkka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka , kjäkksa ̱ ba a ̱ mikata iwätsa ̱ k , je dälei ja ̱ mi ije wa ̱ je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa patkäklämini .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Jekäi ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa patkami ni ra , imineka ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ bata ki ̱ ka ka ̱ kiäk iwakei ebä . Ka ̱ tuinawa ̱ ra , jeska ikaldu eklabä .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Jera ko ̱ no dami kja tipä kjä ska ra ka ̱ mii , je tie rami itjuaka ̱ yölí te , si ̱ wa ̱ te ijewa patke kate shäbeka ki ̱ ka .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Ñerä sä wäñinaklä tuina idäkläka ̱ cuatro wa ra , Jesús daju ̱ ijewa wä ki ̱ , klä wà tipä bata ki ̱ .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Ata iwa ̱ dulanak wa te isu ̱ a idaju ̱ té tipä bata ki ̱ klä wà ra , ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ te isha ñaia ̱ : — Wikblu irä . Jekäi ijewa kjoyina ta ̱ i , sua wa ̱ .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka Jesús kta ijewa ra te isha : — ¡ Bas ssëno täkii ! Yis ne irä , ke bas suana .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Jera Pedro te ikúka te isha : — Säkekewa , ba ne irä ra , yis pakö shkäkmi diklä bata ki ̱ ka däkmi ba ska .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Jera ije te isha : — Bä kute . Jera Pedro je ̱ k ja ̱ wa ̱ ksa ̱ ko ̱ no na , shkami diklä bata ki ̱ , mineju ̱ Jesús wä ki ̱ .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Ata ite si ̱ wa ̱ täkii su ̱ a ra , isuanawa ̱ , ñakäi iwä itäbinami , jera ia ̱ na te isha : — ¡ Säkekewa , yis tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ pa !

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Jera ñawäsaka Jesús jula tkacha ̱ te ikukawa ̱ , je te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Ba rä ka ji biketsäk etkabä si ̱ kuna , jiye ka ba wa ̱ ibiketsane rä na ?

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Ñerä ijewa ñajiaka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka ra , si ̱ wa ̱ wätkenawa ̱ .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Jera ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka tso ̱ wa ñajaklawa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi te isha : — Iyina si ̱ ba rä Säkeklä yaba .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Jekäi ikjaksa ̱ julu demijulu Genesaret ke ̱ i ska .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Ñerä se ̱ nak jeska wa te isu ̱ a ra ije ne irä , jera ijewa te ibata sha je ke ̱ i pája ̱ mi biköle ska . Jekäi ijewa te duë ta wa biköle jaté ije wä ki ̱ ,

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: jewa te ka ̱ kia iia ̱ iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ bata passäkläwa ̱ kjelabä , jekäi je passäk wa biköle bäinani .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Jekjepa fariseo wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä datse ̱ Jerusalén ska ñasikawa ̱ Jesús wä ja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: — ¿ Jiye ba wa ̱ dulanak wa te sä wäkiri wa wädular weikawa ̱ rä na ? ka ijewa jula skuä kuna iyäkä mar da .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — Ata ñe bas , ¿ jiye bas te Säkeklä wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k je weikawa ̱ bas wakwa wädular ebä kju ̱ ei rä na ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Säkeklä te isha rä : ‘ Ba ká irä ma a ̱ mi irä dälätsö ’ , ietkä rä : ‘ Yi kta yakei iká iräle , ia ̱ mi iräle ukä ja ̱ mi ra , je kiana duäkwa ̱ . ’

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Ata bas te ishe rä : ‘ Yilé te ishe iká iräle , ia ̱ mi iräle ia ̱ : “ Jile tso ̱ yis wa ̱ bas tsa ̱ tkäklä , je rä yis wa ̱ me ̱ nak Säkeklä ia ̱ ” ni ;

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: jera je ka kiar ji ̱ a iká dälätsäk ’ . Ñera je wà bas te Säkeklä ktä wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ bas wakwa wädular ebä kju ̱ ei .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: ¡ Ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà wa ! Bulee Isaías te bas ktei bata sha rä , je te ishe rä :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: ‘ Jí ditsä wa te yis dälätse ̱ ke ̱ rä kjäbata ebä ska , ata ije ̱ r ska ra ijewa rä butsäle tulämi ka ̱ mii yis yika .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Ijewa te yis oloitseke ̱ rä ka wata , jewa te sa pakteke ̱ rä kje ditsä wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ le ebä wà . ’

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Jera ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa kiaté iwakei wäja ̱ mi , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — ¡ Issö ! Jí ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa :

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Ji kjäkwa ̱ sä kjä na , je wa ̱ ka sa ianakwa ̱ ñá ye , ata ji däke ̱ ka ̱ sä kjä ki ̱ ka , je ne te sa iawe ̱ ñá ye rä .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Ñerä iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Fariseo wa te je kte ssa ra , je te ikju ̱ atkewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , ¿ je te ba je ̱ r ku ̱ a na ?

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Ata ije te ikúka te isha : — Ji tkele biköle , ka tkele kuna yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wa ̱ , je rä yenak tuläkmi .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Jewa jöwa ̱ , ijewa rä ka wä wajuenak kuna , ka wä wajuenak kuna wa wajiäk . Ata ka wä wajuenak kuna te ka wä wajuenak kuna wajia ra , bolwë ijolormi ishäkä wä ja ̱ r naka .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Jera Pedro te ikuka te isha iia ̱ : — Sá je ̱ r ku ̱ o je jile she wà .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — ¿ Ata bas ñaebä , ka je ̱ r ko ̱ r ji ia ̱ na ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji biköle kjäkwa ̱ sä kjä na mike ̱ rä sa ̱ ñabäli ska , je rä kjäkksa ̱ ni ñá jui naka na ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Ata ji däke ̱ ka ̱ sä kjä ki ̱ ka , datse ̱ rä sa ̱ je ̱ r ska , je ne te sa iawe ̱ ñá ye rä .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Iwa rä sa ̱ je ̱ r ska ji däke ̱ ksa ̱ rä : ka ̱ biketse yakei käi , sä ktewa ̱ käi , manene käi , ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ käi , jakble käi , ka ̱ yue sa saka ukä ja ̱ mi käi , sa saka sheka ̱ yakei käi .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Jeshtä wa ne te sa iawe ̱ ñá ye rä , ata jula ka sukle kuna waña sa te , je ia ̱ ka sa ianakwa ̱ ñá ye .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Jeska Jesús je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ , mineju ̱ Tiro irä Sidón irä ke ̱ i sha ̱ na .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Ñerä alaklä ekla Canaán wa biteju ̱ je ke ̱ i sha ̱ na , je a ̱ na te isha : — ¡ Säkekewa , David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi yis dälänopa ! Yis yaba alaklä rä kololewa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ be wa ̱ .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Ata ka ije wa ̱ ikúkane a ̱ ni . Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi , je ka ̱ kia iia ̱ te isha : — Ipatkömi ni , ia ̱ rke ̱ sä itäki ̱ ka kju ̱ ei .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Jera ite ikúka te isha : — Ka yis patkene yi ia ̱ , ata Israel ju ska wa shelecha ̱ wa ̱ oveja käi jewa ebä ia ̱ .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Jera je alaklä deju ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwä ja ̱ mi , te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , yis tsa ̱ tköpa .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Jera ite ikúka , te isha : — Yabala yika pan bäkeksa ̱ ju ̱ nakmi chichi ia ̱ , ka je rä bäi kuna .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Ata ije te isha : — Säkekewa , jekäi irä . Jeiräta chichi rä iwakei yäkäke ̱ mesa ki ̱ je pjoi jolorke ̱ je ña ta .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús te ikúka , te isha iia ̱ : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , ba te ji biketse etkabä rä bäi si ̱ wa ̱ . Io ̱ nopa ba ia ̱ maikäi ba ki ̱ ishena käi . Ñerä je wäsaka ra , iyaba bäinani .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Jeska Jesús biteju ̱ ni , dáteju ̱ Galilea tipei kjä ja ̱ mi ; mineka ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ bata ki ̱ ka , jeska ije ̱ tkawa ̱ .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi ; jewa wa ̱ isaka date klä ialewa ̱ wa käi , ka wä wajuenak kuna wa käi , jula medelewa ̱ wa käi , ka ktäk kuna wa käi , dueta wa saka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa käi . Jewa tapawa ̱ wa ̱ ijewa te iklä kicha ja ̱ mi , jekäi jewa bäiwa ̱ ni ite .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Jera ditsä male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ite isu ̱ a ka ktäk kuna wa ktaka ̱ , jula medelewa ̱ wa bäinani , klä ialewa ̱ wa shkami , ka wä wajuenak kuna wa wä wajuena . Jera ijewa te Israel wa Kekläí kjeisha .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Jera Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa kia jaté , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Yis je ̱ r ja ̱ mi jí chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa dälänacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , tres día kana ijewa se ̱ naté yis da , ijewa wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni ka kuna ñanak . Ka yis ssëne ijewa patkäkmini bäli ebä , iö iwätuir jolormi ña ̱ la wà ki ̱ ka .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Mai sä te pan tse ̱ ta ̱ i jí ka ̱ wakei ebä ska sa ̱ wa ̱ jí chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ kjekla chewa ̱ klä na ?

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bitäbä bas wa ̱ pan shkä rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Siete , ñakäi nima tsi ̱ dala elkje .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Jera ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa paka ñajäkläkwa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Jera ite je pan siete irä nima irä kukacha ̱ wa ̱ , je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ , kjepa je bala butsa ma ̱ ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , jera ijewa te ima ̱ je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Biköle yaká , jekäi issënacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ijewa te iukäla a ̱ ta ̱ na shtani canasta na siete pshipshii .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Jera yäkäk wa jäiyi wa ebä däka ̱ rä cuatro mil , ka alaklä wa irä yabala irä , jewa rä shtao ̱ leña kuna .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Jekäi je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa patkami ni ite ra , ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka , dateksa ̱ ni Magdala ke ̱ i ki ̱ .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Fariseo wa irä Saduceo wa irä , ñasikawa ̱ te wäsi ̱ wa ipaka jile kjashäk ijewa ia ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska ijuenaklä ye .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Ata ije te ikúka te isha : “ Ka ̱ miskla ra bas te ishe : ‘ Ka ̱ kjämi rä baa , ka ̱ jöir manaka ̱ bätsëë ki ̱ ka , ’

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: je su ̱ ta sa ̱ ñir da ra bas te ishe : ‘ Jir ka ̱ iarmiwa ̱ , ka ̱ jöir manaka ̱ bätsëë , mo ̱ janawa ̱ tuii ki ̱ ka . ’ Bas wädular ji juerke ̱ ka ̱ jöir ja ̱ mi su ̱ akksa ̱ , ata jishtä sa ̱ ke ̱ i dami rä je juenaklä ka juer bas wäna .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa rä yakeila ebä , manenak wa ebä , jewa te ji kieke ̱ ijuenaklä ye . Ata ka jewa ia ̱ ji a ̱ ni kjayinak ijuenaklä ye , ata Jonás käi ebä ijuenaklä kjayirmi . ” Jera ite ijewa jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , mineju ̱ mi .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Ñerä iwa ̱ dulanak wa kjaksa ̱ julu a ̱ mikata , jera ijewa je ̱ r shenacha ̱ wa ̱ pan tsa ̱ k .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¡ Issö ! Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ fariseo wa irä Saduceo wa irä jewa levadura yika .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Jekäi je te ijewa ktewa ̱ tulaka ̱ te isha : — ¡ Je rä ka sa ̱ wa ̱ pan shkä ne ki ̱ ite isheke ̱ rä !

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Ata je de Jesús je ̱ r na , jera ite isha : — Bas ka ji biketsäk etkabä si ̱ kuna wa , ¿ jiye bas ktewe ̱ ke ̱ ka bas wa ̱ pan shkä te rä na ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ Ka bas je ̱ r na ji däba na ? ¿ Ka bas je ̱ r ja ̱ ne ji ̱ a pan cinco wà cinco mil dele ska , ñakäi canasta bitkä na bas te ishtani rä ska na ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ Ñaebä pan siete wà cuatro mil dele ska , ñakäi canasta bitkä na bas te ishtani rä ska na ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Jera ka yis wa ̱ pan si ̱ yine bas ia ̱ , ¿ maikäi je ka denewa ̱ bas je ̱ r na rä na ? Ata bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ fariseo wa irä Saduceo wa irä jewa levadura yika .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Je ne kjepa ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra ka iwa ̱ iyine rä levadura pan papu ̱ wa ̱ klä si ̱ yika ise ̱ r je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ kuna , ata fariseo wa irä saduceo wa irä ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ne yika ise ̱ r je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ rä .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Ñerä Jesús demi Cesarea Filipo ke ̱ i sha ̱ na ra , ite ichaka iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , te isha : — ¿ Jiräni ditsä yäbei she ditsä te , yi iräni na ?

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Moska te ishe Juan säwäukewa ̱ k ni ; isaka te ishe Elías ni ; ata isaka te ishe Jeremías le irä , jile bata shäk wa bakle sha ̱ ekla le irä ni .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ata ¿ ñe jini bas te ishe , yi yis dä na ?

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Jera Simón Pedro te ikúka , te isha : — Ba ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ , ale Säkeklä kseka yaba rä .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka , te isha iia ̱ : — Simón , Jonás yaba , bäije ba rä , ka yi yakata pita wa ̱ je kjayine ba ia ̱ , ata yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir je ne te ma ia ̱ je kjasha rä .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Ñakäi yie ishe ba ia ̱ : Ba rä Pedro , je jak ki ̱ ka yie ñatapawa ̱ k yis ia ̱ wa yuemika ̱ . Jekäi sä wikblu bläklä je kjäshtäklä ka tu ̱ nakka ̱ iki ̱ ka .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Yie ba ia ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí je llaveí me ̱ mi . Jekäi ji mu ̱ awa ̱ ba te ka ̱ jiska je rä mo ̱ nakwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir ; ji wäyaksa ̱ ba te ka ̱ jiska , je rä wäyenakksa ̱ ka ̱ jöir .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa ka pakane iwa ̱ ishäk kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , ije rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ni .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Je skaté Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa je ̱ r ku ̱ ami ije kiana minakju ̱ Jerusalén ska weikanak ta ̱ i , sä wäkiri wa wa ̱ , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa wa ̱ , ñakäi kota ̱ nakwa ̱ , ñakäi tres día ra shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni je wà .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Jera Pedro te ikia tsa ̱ mi iwakei ebä , jeska ite iuñami , te isha : — Säkekewa , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi je ̱ k dälänopa . ¡ A ̱ ni ka je o ̱ nak bä ukä ja ̱ mi !

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Ata ije ̱ k manewa ̱ té , je te isha Pedro ia ̱ : — Satanás , ma je ̱ k tso ̱ kju ̱ awa yis yika , ba rä yis wätkewa ̱ k ebä . Ka ba wa ̱ ibiketsane Säkeklä käi , ata ditsä käi ebä .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús te isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Yilé shkakle yis ja ̱ mi ra , ke je je ̱ k biketsa , ata je cruz kpöka ̱ , minak yis da .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkakleksa ̱ , je weikarmiwa ̱ . Ata yi je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ yis kju ̱ ei ra , je tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Ñakäi ikuna ka ̱ jiska ji biköle deksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ , ata sa wakei weikanawa ̱ ra , ¿ jiye je kiar sa ̱ ki ̱ na ? Jera ¿ jibä me ̱ mi sa te sa wakei je ̱ k tsa ̱ tju ̱ a ju ̱ aklämi na ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ditsä yäbei je rä däkju ̱ oloi kaleka ̱ iKá oloi wà , iángel wa ra . Jekjepa ite ji säkei me ̱ mi sa ̱ ia ̱ ekla ekla ji wá ̱ sä te ja ̱ mi .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jiska kajali sha ̱ wa ̱ ka duewa ̱ shka ̱ l ssënak , ata jewa te ditsä yäbei su ̱ a idaju ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye kjepa .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ seis día ra , Jesús te Pedro irä Jacobo irä iel Juan irä kia jámi iwakwa ebä , ka ̱ tsä bata ka ̱ miika .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Jeska ra imanenaksa ̱ kju ̱ awa ijewa wäna . Iwäktä wäñinaka ̱ ka ̱ wä käi , ipaiklä ianawa ̱ suruu ka ̱ oloi käi .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka ijewa wänaka Moisés irä Elías irä juena , jewa ka ̱ pakä tso ̱ ije ra .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Jera Pedro ktaka ̱ te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¡ bäi ebä sa kajali jiska rä ! Ba ki ̱ ishena ra , yis ma ju yabala yuäk mañatkä : etka ba ia ̱ , etka Moisés ia ̱ , etka Elías ia ̱ .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Ñerä ije ktä rami ji ̱ abä ra , ijewa ki ̱ kukawa ̱ mo ̱ wäñileka ̱ oloo te . Jera kte ssëna mo ̱ ja ̱ rka , je te ishe : “ Jí ne rä yis yaba shka ̱ ta rä , je ra yis ssëna baa . Je ne ktä ssö rä . ”

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je ssa ra , ijewa ñatulacha ̱ wa ̱ wakte , isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Ata Jesús je ̱ k sikawa ̱ , jula tkawa ̱ ijewa ja ̱ mi te isha : — Bas ñajöka ̱ ni , ke bas suana .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Jekäi ijewa wäkatulaka ̱ isu ̱ ak ra , ka yi juena ji ̱ a ; ata Jesús wakei ebä kaldu .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Jera ijewa dajuluni ka ̱ tsä ja ̱ mi ra , Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ji kjayina ka je she kuna bas te yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ; ata ditsä yäbei shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na kjepa .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Jekjepa iwa ̱ dulanak wa te ichaka iia ̱ , te isha : — ¿ Jiye ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa te ishe Elías ne rä däkju ̱ säkätäba ni rä na ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka , te isha : — Iyina si ̱ ra , Elías ne rä däkju ̱ ba ji biköle paruäkba rä .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , Elías rä deleju ̱ e ̱ ná , je ka juene ijewa wäna , ata je ukä ja ̱ mi ijewa te ji wá ̱ jishtä iwakwa ki ̱ ishena käi . Jekäi ñaebä ditsä yäbei weikarmi ijewa jula na .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Je ne kjepa iwa ̱ dulanak wa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra , Juan säwäukewa ̱ k ne sha ite rä .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Ñerä ijewa dejulu chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa taparte ska ra , jera ekla deju ̱ iwäki ̱ , je ̱ tkawa ̱ köchowä ki ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi ,

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: te isha : — Säkekewa , ma je ̱ r bäi shöpa yis yaba dulaklei ia ̱ ; je kteke ̱ wäiane te , je te je weikerawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ; jera ka ̱ raa je te ija ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ mi yökö na , ñakäi diklä naka .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Yis wa ̱ je detse ̱ ba wa ̱ dulanak wa wäki ̱ , ata ka ijewa ia ̱ ibäir .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha : — ¡ Bas tso ̱ jira wa ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna , shirilecha ̱ wa ̱ ebä ! ¿ Bikö räka ̱ yis kiana ji ̱ a se ̱ nak bas da rä ? ¿ Bikö räka ̱ yis kiana ji ̱ a bas katabläk rä na ? Itso ̱ té ' sia ̱ jika .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Jera Jesús te be uña , jekäi je te ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na . Jera je wäsaka je yaba bäinani .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Jekjepa Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi te ichaka iia ̱ iwakwa ebä : — ¿ Jiye ka sá ia ̱ je kjäierksa ̱ rä na ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
