text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas dä ka ji biketsäk etkabä si ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas kuna ji biketsäk etkabä mostaza wä doloi kjelabä ra , bas te ishemi jí ka ̱ tsä ia ̱ : ‘ Ma je ̱ k tso ̱ ju ̱ omi jeska ’ , jera je tse ̱ rju ̱ mi . Jekäi ka ji a ̱ ni kuna ka bas ia ̱ o ̱ nak käi .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Ata jeshtä be kjäier dä ka ̱ kie irä bätse irä ebä ne wà .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Ijewa tapar kajali Galilea ska ra , Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ditsä yäbei rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ditsä jula na ;

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: jeska jewa te iktemiwa ̱ , ata tres día ra ishki ̱ rmika ̱ ni . Jera je te ijewa je ̱ r iawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Ijewa demijulu Capernaúmka ra , jera dracma botkä bäkäk wa ñasikawa ̱ Pedro wä ja ̱ mi te isha : — ¿ Ka bas paktäk te dracma botkä me ̱ kuna na ?

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Taa . Jekäi idewa ̱ ju naka ra , Jesús ktaka ̱ ba ira te isha : — Simón , ¿ maikäi ba ia ̱ ra irä ? ¿ Ka ̱ jiska ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te mane wa ia ̱ jile tsa ̱ tju ̱ e bäkeke ̱ rä , sa ̱ je ̱ k tsa ̱ tju ̱ aklä bäkeke ̱ rä na ; iwakwa ke ̱ i ska wa ia ̱ , ta kju ̱ awa wa ia ̱ ?

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Kju ̱ awa wa ia ̱ . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Jekäi irä ra , ka jera iwakwa shene je tju ̱ ak .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Ata ka iwa ̱ iktewa ̱ tuläkläka ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka , ma cho ̱ tipä kjä ja ̱ mi biklö ja ̱ wa ̱ k . Jera ba te nima kukaka ̱ säkätä ra , je kuköwa ̱ , kjä ji ̱ atkö ; jeska ba te inaklä wäka ku ̱ emi . Je tso ̱ ksa ̱ , cho ̱ mi ijewa ia ̱ yis dä ba irä ñatsa ̱ tju ̱ aklä .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi te isha : — ¿ Yi bä rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno ja ̱ mi wa sha ̱ na rä na ?

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Jera ite yaba kiaté , duacha ̱ ite ijewa sha ̱ na .

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Jera ite isha : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka bas maneneksa ̱ däkwa ̱ jishtä yabala käi ra , a ̱ ni ka bas däkwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno ja ̱ mi .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Jekäi yi je ̱ k jawa ̱ jí yaba käi ra , je ne rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno ja ̱ mi wa sha ̱ na rä .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Jekäi yi te yaba jí ije käi kiawa ̱ yis kie oloi ja ̱ mi ra , je te rä yis wakei ne kiawa ̱ .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Yi te jí tsi ̱ dala yis biketsäk wa manele shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , bäi si ̱ ije ia ̱ ra rä je wakei kuli kicha ja ̱ mi jak waunak burro wa shtä mo ̱ noka ̱ pa , jekäi iwakei wäitäbinowa ̱ pa däyë ja ̱ r ka ̱ mii ska .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: ¡ Wekte sä shiriwa ̱ k shtä kju ̱ ei ka ̱ jiska wa rä ! Jekäi sä shiriwa ̱ k shtä ka wätkenak , ata ¡ wekte sä shiriwa ̱ k wakei rä !

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Jekäi bä jula te bä klä te bä shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , je tiökksa ̱ ju ̱ omi . Bäi si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra rä bä kjäwa ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka ska jula medelewa ̱ klä ialewa ̱ , ata ka ju ̱ nakmi kuna jula botkäwe klä botkäwe yökö jekjeye ja ̱ rka .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Ñakäi bä wäbala te bä shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , je yöksa ̱ ju ̱ omi . Bäi si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra rä bä kjäwa ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka ska wäbala ta etkabä , ata ka ju ̱ nakmi kuna wäbala bötkäwe sä tuläklämi yökö í wäkaleka ̱ ja ̱ rka .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ ¡ Issö ! Ke bas ku ̱ jí tsi ̱ dala wa mane a ̱ ni dokoitsa . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ijewa ángel í wa ka ̱ jöir ska te del yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wäktä su ̱ e rä .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Iwa rä ditsä yäbei de rä ji shelewa ̱ ne tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: “ ¿ Jishtä bas ia ̱ ra irä na ? Ikuna ekla wa ̱ oveja tso ̱ cien , ata je etaba shenawa ̱ ra , ¿ ka iwa ̱ noventa y nueve tulunakta ̱ na ka ̱ bata na iminaklä je shenawa ̱ yuläk na ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Ata ikuna ite je ku ̱ ani ra , kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ je te issëwe ̱ mi a ̱ naa , isaka noventa y nueve ka shele kuna tsa ̱ ta .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir je ki ̱ jí tsi ̱ dala wa mane a ̱ ni ka kiar weikanakwa ̱ .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: “ Jekäi bä el te yakei wakbla bä ukä ja ̱ mi ra , ma cho ̱ iwäki ̱ , jekäi iu ̱ ño , ba irä ije irä ebä . Jera ite bä ktä ssawa ̱ ra , je rä ba te bä el je ̱ r bäiwa ̱ ni ba ra .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Ata ka ite issë ra , jera ekla iräle bol iräle kiömiña ba ra , ‘ ji yirke ̱ biköle ju ̱ ñenaklä bulee isu ̱ ak wa bol mañal wa ̱ yileka ̱ käi . ’

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Ata ka ite ijewa ktä ssë ra , jera ishö ñatapawa ̱ k wa ia ̱ ; ata ka ite ñatapawa ̱ k wa ktä ssë ra , jera ikuköwa ̱ ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna wa käi , inaklä bäkäk wa käi .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: “ Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ji mu ̱ awa ̱ bas te ka ̱ jiska , je rä mo ̱ nakwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir . Ñakäi ji wäyaksa ̱ bas te ka ̱ jiska , je rä wäyenakksa ̱ ka ̱ jöir .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Etäbä kicha yie isheni bas ia ̱ , bas bol ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a ka ̱ jiska jile kiäk ji kieke ̱ ite käi , jera yis Ká ale se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir te je we ̱ mi ijewa ia ̱ .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , mai bol iräle mañal iräle ñatapawa ̱ yis kie ja ̱ mi ra , jeska yis kaldu jewa sha ̱ na . ”

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Jekjepa Pedro je ̱ k sikawa ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ yis el te ji wakbla yis ukä ja ̱ mi ra bitäbä kicha däka ̱ yis kiana je jäkwa ̱ bitaba rä na ? ¿ Siete vece kjë na ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ka yis te ishe ba ia ̱ siete vece ebä , ata setenta vece däka ̱ siete .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ekla ssëna ikjanaklä wa ra nui paruäk käi .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa nui paruami ra , ekla detse ̱ iwäki ̱ nuita diez mil talento .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Ata ka iwa ̱ itju ̱ aklä ta ki ̱ ka iblui te je sha wato ̱ nakju ̱ mi ise ̱ naklä ra , iyabala ra , ji biköle tso ̱ iwa ̱ käi , inui to ̱ nakläju ̱ mi .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Jera je kjanaklä je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwä ja ̱ mi , te isha : ‘ Yis ki ̱ ssöpa ji ̱ a yis wa ̱ ma tju ̱ a ju ̱ aklämi kalabe . ’

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Jekäi je kjanaklä blui je ̱ r ja ̱ mi idälänawa ̱ , je te iwäyaksa ̱ , ñakäi inui jawa ̱ bitaba .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: “ Ata je kjanaklä mineju ̱ mi , te kjanaklä isaka ekla ku ̱ a nuita iia ̱ cien denario . Je kukawa ̱ ite , kuli ñatuawa ̱ ite , te isha : ‘ ¡ Ma nui tju ̱ o ju ̱ omi ! ’

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Jekäi je iel je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwä ja ̱ mi , je ka ̱ kia iia ̱ te isha : ‘ Yis ki ̱ ssöpa ji ̱ a yis wa ̱ ma tju ̱ a ju ̱ aklämi . ’

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Ata ka ije ki ̱ jekäi ishene , je te itsa ̱ mi jiawa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska , ma rä inui tju ̱ a ju ̱ ami ite kje .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Jekäi kjanaklä saka te je o ̱ na su ̱ a ra , ijewa je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i ; jekäi jewa minejulu te ipakani iblui ia ̱ biköle maikäi io ̱ na käi .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Jekjepa iblui te ikiaté , je ia ̱ ite isha : ‘ ¡ Kjanaklä yakei si ̱ ! Ale ba nui biköle wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ yis te bitaba , ba te yis ia ̱ ka ̱ kia ki ̱ ka ;

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: ¿ ka irä ba kiana ñaebä kjanaklä saka ia ̱ je ̱ r bäi shäk , jishtä yis je ̱ r bäi sha ba ia ̱ käi na ? ’

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Jera iblui kju ̱ atkawa ̱ , te iju ̱ aksa ̱ sä jiäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ weikanak inui tju ̱ a ju ̱ ami ite kalabe kje . ”

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Je su ̱ ta yis Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir te iwe ̱ mi bas ukä ja ̱ mi ka bas wakwa wa ̱ sa saka janewa ̱ bitaba bas je ̱ r ska ra rä .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Jekäi Jesús te je paka e ̱ ná ra , ije ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ Galilea ska mineju ̱ Judea ke ̱ i ki ̱ Jordán a ̱ mikata kja ̱ neka .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ damijulu ira , jewa bäiwa ̱ ni ite jeska .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ wäsi ̱ wa : — ¿ Ka ̱ tso ̱ jäiyi wa wa ̱ ise ̱ naklä jäkläwa ̱ , kje jile ka wata ki ̱ ka na ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Jera ite ikúka te isha : — Säkätä sä yuäkksa ̱ te ‘ sa yuaksa ̱ rä jäiyi irä alaklä irä , ” ¿ ka bas wa ̱ je ktei wayile na ? ’

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Ñakäi ite isha : ‘ Je bata ki ̱ ka jäiyi wa rä iká irä ia ̱ mi irä jäkwa ̱ ta ̱ na ije ̱ k bawa ̱ kläwa ̱ ialaklä ra . Jekäi je bol wa dämiwa ̱ eklabä yaka ye . ’

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Jekäi ka ijewa rä bol ji ̱ a kuna , ata ijewa rä ekla yaka yebä . Je ki ̱ ka sä yälilewa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ ñaja ̱ mi , je ke butsa ju ̱ ami sa ̱ ku ̱ .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye jera Moisés te sa paka ñajewa ̱ äyëí cha ̱ kmi ipatkäklämi rä na ?

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Jera ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas je ̱ r dä därërë ki ̱ Moisés te ka ̱ ma ̱ bas ia ̱ bas wa ̱ bas se ̱ naklä wa jäkläwa ̱ , ata säkätä ra ka irä jekäi kuna .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te ialaklä jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , ata ka irä ika ̱ wakblewa ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna ra , je wakei se ̱ nawa ̱ ni isaka ra , jera je rä imaner .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te isha iia ̱ : — Jekäi jäiyi wa kiana se ̱ nak ialaklä wa ra rä ra , jera we ke sa ̱ se ̱ nak .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Jera ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ka biköle ia ̱ jekäi io ̱ nak , ata yi ia ̱ irä me ̱ le jekäi ra , jewa ebä ia ̱ je o ̱ rmi rä .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , eunuco wa tso ̱ bitele ia ̱ mi sha ̱ skaté ko ̱ le jekäi . Eunuco wa tso ̱ ialewa ̱ ditsä wa ̱ eunuco wa ye . Ñakäi eunuco wa tso ̱ , iwakwa ña iawa ̱ ke ̱ eunuco ye ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí kju ̱ ei . Yi ia ̱ jekäi io ̱ rmi ra , je ku ̱ je wo ̱ .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Jekjepa yabala de ja iwäki ̱ , ijula ma ̱ kläka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ , ika ̱ kiäklä , ata iwa ̱ dulanak wa te jewa uña .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ata Jesús te isha : — Yabala jöwa ̱ ibitäklä yis wäki ̱ ka , ke iwätkewa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa käi wa ne dämiwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobierno ja ̱ mi rä .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Jekäi ijula ma ̱ ka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka . Jeska ra imineju ̱ mi .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Ñerä ekla je ̱ k sikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , ¿ ji wämo käi we ̱ yie , yis ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye däkläksa ̱ rä na ?

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Jera ije te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ba te ji rä wämo ktei chake yis ia ̱ na ? Ekla ebä ne rä wämo rä . Ata ba je ̱ r ssëna se ̱ nak kseka ra , sa pakale ji wa ̱ k je wawo ̱ .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Jera je te ichakani : — ¿ Mane käi ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — ‘ Ke sa ktawa ̱ . Ke ma manena . Ke ba jakbla . Ke ji shaka ̱ ka ̱ yue wà ñakjatiäklä shtä ska .

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ba ká irä ma a ̱ mi irä dälätsö . Ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ blö jishtä ba wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi . ’

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Jera je dulaklei te isha iia ̱ : — Je biköle wao ̱ le yis wa ̱ , jera ¿ jibä ska yis sher ji ̱ a rä na ?

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ba ki ̱ se ̱ ne bulee si ̱ shena ra , ma cho ̱ bä ji tso ̱ watju ̱ ak tulämi , je säkei mo ka jita wa ia ̱ , jekäi ra ba ia ̱ ji säkei ta dämiksa ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska . Je ukä ska bä kute minak yis da .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Ñerä je dulaklei te je kte ssa ra , imineju ̱ mi je ̱ r ialewa ̱ , ije rä jile ta ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ ; blu wa ia ̱ ra därërë dewa ̱ ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Etäbä kicha yie ishe ni bas ia ̱ , tjabana si ̱ camello kjäksa ̱ ju ̱ tuluk wä ña ̱ la ja ̱ rka rä , ata därërë si ̱ blu däwa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je ssa ra , imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i , te isha : — Jekäi ra , ¿ yi tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ rä na ?

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Jera Jesús te jewa su ̱ a , te isha ijewa ia ̱ . — Ditsä ia ̱ ka je o ̱ nak , ata Säkeklä ia ̱ ji biköle o ̱ r dawa ̱ .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Jera Pedro te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — Ñera sá wa ̱ ji biköle rä jalewa ̱ ta ̱ na sá minaklä ba ra , jera ¿ ji tso ̱ sá ia ̱ rä na ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , sa ̱ manerke ̱ ksa ̱ ni spa ̱ na ke ̱ i ska , mika ̱ ditsä yäbei je ̱ tkärawa ̱ ije ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye baa si ̱ ki ̱ ka ra , bas minele yis ja ̱ mi wa ñajäklämiwa ̱ ña sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa je ̱ tkäklä doce ki ̱ ka , Israel wa ditsei wä doce ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Ñakäi yi te iju iräle , iel wa iräle , ikuta wa iräle , iká iräle , ia ̱ mi iräle , ise ̱ naklä iräle , iyabala iräle , ika ̱ iräle , je jawa ̱ ta ̱ na yis kie kju ̱ ei ra , je ia ̱ isäkei me ̱ rmini cien cien , ñakäi je ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye dämiksa ̱ däli ukä ye .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Ata chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ delewa ̱ isäkätä wa ye kolormiwa ̱ ibatala ye , ata delewa ̱ ibatala ye dämiwa ̱ ni rä isäkätä wa ye .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: “ Ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä ekla däli klä wakei miju ̱ sa ̱ ñireebä shka ̱ bläk wa yuläk shka ̱ bläk iia ̱ iuva yäkä sha ̱ na käi .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Jekäi je shka ̱ bläk wa ra iñaje ̱ rku ̱ a un día wà to ̱ nak denario etka . Jera ite ipatkami iuva yäkä sha ̱ na .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Ñakäi imineju ̱ ni las nueve käi . Je te isaka su ̱ a kje ikajali sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Jewa ia ̱ ite isha : ‘ Bas cho ̱ ña yis uva yäkä sha ̱ na , jera yie bas tju ̱ emi sa ̱ to ̱ r käi bulee . ’ Jera ijewa minejulu .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Etäbä kicha imineju ̱ ni las doce käi , ñakäi las tres käi , je te iwa ̱ ni je su ̱ ta .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Ñakäi las cinco käi imineju ̱ ni te isaka ku ̱ a kje ikajali , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : ‘ ¿ Jiye jiska bas kajali día kalabe kjermita rä na ? ’

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : ‘ Ñera yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka shka ̱ ble ma ta sá ia ̱ . ’ Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : ‘ Jera bas cho ̱ ña yis uva yäkä sha ̱ na . ’

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: “ Jekäi ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra je uva yäkä blui te isha iji tso ̱ ju ̱ ñak ia ̱ : ‘ Shka ̱ bläk wa kiö jöté , tju ̱ o tulömi , säkätä ibata jekje ska wa ma rä isäkätä wa ska . ’

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Jekäi ale demi las cinco wa dejulu to ̱ nami denario wà etka etka .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Jekäi mika ̱ isäkätä wa dejulu ra , ijewa te ibiketsa ito ̱ rmi bakleka ̱ ni ; ata ito ̱ na denario wà etka etka ñaebä .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Ñerä ijewa te ikukacha ̱ wa ̱ ra , ijewa te däli klä wakei sha yakei ,

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: te isha : ‘ Jí ibata jekje wa shka ̱ bla rä una hora ebä , ata ba te itju ̱ a sá ra ñaebä , ata sá ne te ji kirii käi , ka ̱ bal käi katabla día kalabe rä .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa sha ̱ ekla kúka , te isha : ‘ Salibä rikä , ka yis wa ̱ ba weika ̱ ne . ¿ Ka ba kabla yis ia ̱ rä to ̱ nak denario etkabä wà na ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Ji rä ba cha kuköwa ̱ , ma cho ̱ ni , ata yis ssëna jí ibata jekje tju ̱ ak ba käi ñaebä .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: ¿ Ka irä yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ ji rä yis cha wawa ̱ klä maikäi ' swakei ki ̱ ikiar käi na ? ¿ Ata ma je ̱ r ki ̱ yis ianawa ̱ yis dä je ̱ r bäi ki ̱ ka na ?

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: “ Je su ̱ ta ibata ska wa dämiwa ̱ isäkätä wa ye , ata isäkätä wa kolormiwa ̱ ibata ska wa ye ni . ”

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Jesús damika ̱ ju ̱ ji ̱ a Jerusalénka ra , ña ̱ la wà ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa doce kia jámi iwakwa ebä , te isha ijewa ia ̱ :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: — ¡ Jikäi issö ! Sa damika ̱ rä Jerusalén , jeska ditsä yäbei ju ̱ rmiksa ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä ia ̱ , jewa te iktei wabiketsemiksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ ,

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: kjepa ijewa te je ju ̱ emiksa ̱ ka ̱ etkä wa ia ̱ ijewa wa ̱ ja ̱ ñetsanak , buka ̱ nak , wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi . Ata tres día ra ishki ̱ rmika ̱ ni .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Jekäi Zebedeo yabala a ̱ mi je ̱ k sikawa ̱ Jesús wäja ̱ mi iyabala ra , je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte jile kiäk iia ̱ .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ji sherke ̱ ba ki ̱ ka rä na ? Jera je te isha iia ̱ : — Mika ̱ ba dewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ra , ba ku ̱ ka ̱ mo jí yis yabala bol ia ̱ iñajäkläkläwa ̱ ekla bä jula wämo kja ̱ ne ekla bä jula shule kja ̱ ne .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha : — Ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ ne ji kieke ̱ bas te rä ia ̱ . Jera copa waye mar kja yie ¿ je wayarmi bas ia ̱ na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Sá dormi .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Iyina si ̱ ra , bas te yis copa wayemi , ata je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne yis jula shule kja ̱ ne , ka yis ia ̱ ka ̱ kuna je ma ̱ klä , ata je rä yi ia ̱ irä yolole kja yis Ká wa ̱ jewa ia ̱ .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Jekäi isaka diez te je ssa ra , ijewa kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ je ñael wa bol ra .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Ata Jesús te ijewa kia jaté , te isha : — Bas wa ̱ ijuñer ka ̱ jiska wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ijewa patkeke ̱ , ñakäi yi rä oloi ta wa te ka ̱ wei me ̱ ke ̱ därërë ijewa ia ̱ .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Ata bas sha ̱ na ka jekäi ikiar , ata yi ssëna deka ̱ te bäi si ̱ bas sha ̱ na ra , je kiana rä bas kjanaklä ye .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Ñakäi yi ssëna däkwa ̱ isäkätä ye bas sha ̱ na ra , je kiana rä bas kjanaklä ye ,

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: jishtä ditsä yäbei käi : Ka je dene rä kjanak kuna , ata je de rä kjanaklä ye , ñakäi je ̱ k ju ̱ akksa ̱ sä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tsa ̱ tju ̱ ak ju ̱ ami .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Jericó ska ijewa minejulumi ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ minemi ira .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ñerä bol ka wä wajuenak kuna wa kajali ña ̱ jki ̱ ña ̱ la kjä ja ̱ mi te issa Jesús damaju ̱ ra , ijewa a ̱ na jela te isha : — ¡ Säkekewa , David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sá dälänopa !

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te ijewa uña isi ̱ wa ̱ tiächa ̱ kläwa ̱ , ata ijewa a ̱ na ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta , te isha : — ¡ Säkekewa , David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sá dälänopa !

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Ñerä Jesús je ̱ k wäkukawa ̱ , je te ijewa kia jaté , te isha : — ¿ Ji shena bas ki ̱ yis wa ̱ o ̱ nak bas ia ̱ rä na ?

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Säkekewa , sá wäbala ne wajuelepa rä .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ r ja ̱ mi idälänacha ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi ijula tkawa ̱ ijewa wäbala ja ̱ mi . Jera plaa ra ijewa wä wajuena , jekäi iminejulu ira .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Mika ̱ ijewa damijulu kja Jerusalén ska , deka ̱ julu Betfagé Olivo Yäkä Bata ñak ska ra , Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa patkami bol ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Bas cho ̱ a ̱ mi bas wäsaka jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne juerke ̱ ska . Jera ñawäsaka bas te burro ku ̱ emi mo ̱ lewa ̱ yaba ta . Je yeksa ̱ , jeté bas te ' sia ̱ .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Ata yilé te bas ia ̱ jinile ishe ra , bas te ikúke : ‘ Säkekewa ne ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä , ata jirä ite ipatke tuleténi . ’

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Je biköle o ̱ na rä , io ̱ naklä jishtä iyile jile bata shäk ja ̱ mi te ishe käi :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: “ Yaba busi Sión ia ̱ ishö : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Ma tsa ̱ ku ̱ i daju ̱ té bä wäki ̱ je ̱ k jalewa ̱ , je ̱ tkeleka ̱ burro ki ̱ ka , burro yaba , ale bewak chichanak shtä yaba ki ̱ ka . ’

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa minejulu , te iwá ̱ maikäi Jesús te ipaka iwa ̱ k käi .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Ñerä ijewa wa ̱ je burro detse ̱ iyaba ra , jewa ki ̱ shuawa ̱ ijewa te iwakwa wa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ wa , jewa ki ̱ ije ̱ tkaka ̱ .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Jekäi je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wäbäli wa te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ je shuami ña ̱ la ki ̱ , ata isaka te kal kä tia , shuami ite ña ̱ la ki ̱ .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dami iwätsa ̱ k wa irä iitäki ̱ datse ̱ wa irä , kjoyir dami te isha ; — ¡ Hosana , David yäbei kjeiyinopa ! ¡ Bäije ale daju ̱ Säkekewa kie ja ̱ mi rä ! ¡ Hosana , ikjeiyinopa ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ si ̱ ska !

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Jekäi ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ Jerusalén ska ra , je jukläyäkä wa biköle malete ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , te isha : — ¿ Yi je rä na ?

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te isha : — Je rä Jesús , jile bata shäk dar Nazaret Galilea ska .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Jera Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ Templo ska , te jile watju ̱ ak wa , jile tju ̱ ak wa tso ̱ je Templo ska biköle patka tulaksa ̱ je ektaka , ñakäi ite inaklä manewa ̱ k wa mesa irä , namala watju ̱ ak wa kalwá irä , je manewa ̱ tulami .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Iyöle katke rä : ‘ Yis ju kirmi rä ka ̱ kiäklä jui ’ , ata bas te je iawa ̱ wa ̱ jakbläk wa ñabläklä jui ye .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Jera ka wä wajuenak kuna wa irä klä ialewa ̱ wa irä ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi Templo ska ; jewa bäiwa ̱ ni ite .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Ata chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä jewa te isu ̱ a jishtä ije te iwe ̱ kate baa si ̱ käi , ñakäi yabala kjoyina täkii jela Templo ska te ishe : “ ¡ Hosana ! ¡ David yäbei kjeiyinopa ! ” je ra ijewa kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ ,

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ijewa te ishe kate ssa ba te na ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Taa . ¿ Ata ka bas wa ̱ iyöle jikäi su ̱ le na ? ‘ Ba te yabala tsi ̱ dala irä , tsu yäke ̱ ji ̱ a wa irä , kjä ki ̱ ka bä kjeishe tkawa ̱ . ’

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , biteksa ̱ ju ̱ ni je jukläyäkä ska deni Betania ka , jeska ikapawa ̱ .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Sa ̱ ñireebä imineju ̱ ni jukläyäkä sha ̱ na ra , iktawa ̱ bäli te .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Jera ña ̱ la wà ite higuera su ̱ a , jekäi imine isu ̱ ak , ata ka iwä juena , kä ja ̱ r ebä irä . Ñerä ite je ia ̱ isha : — ¡ Ke bä wäno pa mik a ̱ ni ! Jera ñawäsaka je higuera ssi ̱ nawa ̱ .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je su ̱ a ra , je te ijewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , te isha : — ¿ Maikäi je higuera ssi ̱ nawa ̱ plaa rä na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas te ji biketsa etkabä ka biketsale kuna kaile ni ra , jera bas te iwe ̱ mi ka jishtä jí higuera ia ̱ io ̱ na käi ebä kuna , ata ñakäi jí ka ̱ tsä ia ̱ bas te isha : “ Bä tse ̱ no ju ̱ nomi däyë naka ” ni ra , jekäi io ̱ rmi .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Jekäi ji biköle kieke ̱ bas te käi ka ̱ kie na biketsale etkabä ra , je me ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ñerä ideju ̱ ni Templo ska ra , ite ditsä pakte kaldu dälei ja ̱ mi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , je ke ̱ i ska wäkiri wa irä ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi , te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Yibä ka ̱ wei wà ba te jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä na ? ¿ Yi te ba ia ̱ je ka ̱ wei ma rä na ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka te isha : — Ñaebä yie etka ichake bas ia ̱ , bas te yis kúka ra , jera ñakäi yie ishemi bas ia ̱ yibä ka ̱ wei wà yie jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä käi .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Juan te sä wäukewa ̱ , ¿ je datse ̱ rä mai ska ? ¿ Ka ̱ jöir ska na , ata ditsä ska na ? Jera ijewa te ipaka ñaia ̱ te isha : “ Sa te ikúkemi ka ̱ jöir ska ni ra , tsi ite ishe sa ̱ ia ̱ rä : ‘ Jekäi irä ra , ¿ jiye ka bas wa ̱ iktä kolone rä na ? ’

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Ata sa te ikúkemi ditsä ska ni ra , däläna je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ rä , biköle ia ̱ ra Juan rä jile bata shäk ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te Jesús kúka te isha : — Ka sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer . Jera ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ñaebä ka yis wa ̱ iyinak bas ia ̱ , yibä ka ̱ wei wà yis te jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä ni .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: “ Ata , ¿ jishtä bas ia ̱ irä na ? Ekla yabala ta bol , je je ̱ k sika wa ̱ te isha ikibi ia ̱ : ‘ Yaba , jir ba ma shka ̱ bläk uva yäkä sha ̱ na . ’

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Jera je te ikúka te isha : ‘ Ka yis minak . ’ Ata jekjepa ite ibiketsaksa ̱ ni , jekäi imineju ̱ .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ k sikawa ̱ te isha iel ia ̱ , je ssëta . Jera ije te ikúka te isha : ‘ Bäirä säkekewa , yis maju ̱ . ’ Ata ka iminene .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Jera ¿ je bol wa mane te iwá ̱ iká ki ̱ ishena käi rä na ? ” Jera ijewa te isha : — Ikibi te . Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , inaklä bäkäk wa irä , alaklä wa pato ̱ nak shtä wa irä , ñapatkäte kja bas wätsa ̱ k Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta Juan dasta ̱ na bas wäki ̱ shke ji wämo ja ̱ mi shäk , ata ka bas wa ̱ iktä kolone kuna . Ata inaklä bäkäk wa irä alaklä wa pato ̱ nak shtä wa irä jewa te iktä kuka . Bas te je su ̱ a , jeiräta jeska ra ka bas ñamaneneksa ̱ , bas wa ̱ je ktä kukäklä .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: “ Ji pake jile she ja ̱ mi saka ssö : Ekla ka ̱ wakei bakle , te uva yäkä je ̱ wa ̱ bakla , kjätkaksa ̱ ite shkiritke , jeska ite iwä wätuäklä bia , ñakäi ikjänanaklä yua ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ , jekäi ite je peitata ̱ na shka ̱ bläk wa ia ̱ , kjepa iwakei mineju ̱ mi ka ̱ ka ̱ mii .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Mika ̱ iwä älinaklä ke ̱ i dewa ̱ ra , ije te ikjanaklä wa patkaté je shka ̱ bläk wa wäki ̱ , iwä kukäk .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Ata shka ̱ bläk wa te je ikjanaklä wa kukacha ̱ wa ̱ , ekla kpa ite ta ̱ i , ekla ktawa ̱ ite , ekla tia ite jak wà .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Jera ite kjanaklä wa saka patkaténi ukä ta ale isäkätä wa tsa ̱ ta , ata jewa ukä ja ̱ mi ijewa te iwá ̱ je su ̱ ta .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: “ Bata jekje ra ite iwakei yaba patkaté ijewa wäki ̱ , te isha : ‘ Yis yaba je dälätsemiwa ̱ ijewa te . ’

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Ata je shka ̱ bläk wa te je yaba su ̱ a ra , ite isha ñaia ̱ : ‘ Ije ne ia ̱ iká däli ukä rä däkksa ̱ rä , je ki ̱ ka sä shkä iktäkwa ̱ , kjepa sa ̱ ku ̱ ji rä däkksa ̱ iia ̱ je kuköwa ̱ saje cha ye . ’

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ikukawa ̱ ju ̱ aksa ̱ uva yäkä ektaka , jeska ite iktawa ̱ .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: “ Jera je uva yäkä wakei deni ra , ¿ me ite je shka ̱ bläk wa we ̱ mi rä na ? ”

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Je yakeila wa weikemi ite e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , kjepa ite uva yäkä peitemini shka ̱ bläk wa saka ia ̱ , mane wa te iwä kukäklä ke ̱ i ska iwä me ̱ mi iia ̱ jewa ia ̱ .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Jekäi Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Ata kte yöle jikäi rä ka wayile kuna bas wa ̱ na ? ‘ Jak ju ̱ leksa ̱ ju yuäk wa wa ̱ , je ne rä delewa ̱ ju ñak wäkukäk bäi si ̱ ye rä . Säkekewa ne wa ̱ je o ̱ le rä , juer ta baa si ̱ sä wäna rä .

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Je kju ̱ ei yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Säkeklä gobiernoí bakanamiksa ̱ bas yika , je me ̱ rmi ni ditsä saka je gobierno wawänewa ̱ k wa ia ̱ .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Jekäi yi ja ̱ naka ̱ je jak ki ̱ ka ra , je pa ̱ rtkämiwa ̱ ; ñaebä yi ki ̱ ka je jak ja ̱ naka ̱ ra , je te iwëtkemiwa ̱ .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Ite je paka jile she ja ̱ mi , je ssa chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä fariseo wa irä te ra , je te ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a , ijewa ne sheke ̱ ite rä .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Jera ijewa te ibiketsa maikäi ra ite ikukemiwa ̱ ; ata isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ yika , ijewa te ikuka jile bata shäk ye ki ̱ ka .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Jesús ka ̱ paka ji ̱ a , ktani ijewa ra jile she ja ̱ mi te isha :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: “ Ka ̱ jöir gobierno je rä jishtä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ekla te jile we ̱ kja iyaba je ̱ k jula kukäke ̱ diei yäklä käi .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Jera ite ikjanaklä wa patkami ibata shäk kile jula kolone diei yäk wa ia ̱ , ata ka ijewa je ̱ r ssëne bitäk .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Jekäi ite kjanaklä saka patkami ni ia ̱ ite isha : ‘ Ishö kile wa ia ̱ : ¡ Issö ! Yis ji äliwa ̱ e ̱ ná , yis toro ktacha ̱ wa ̱ , bewak saka oleka ̱ ktacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ji biköle rä älile e ̱ ná ; je ki ̱ bas kute jula kolone diei yäk . ’

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Jeiräta ka jewa wa ̱ iktä ssë ne , ata minejulu iyika , ekla mineju ̱ ika ̱ ka , ekla mineju ̱ idäli watju ̱ akläka ;

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: isaka te je kjanaklä wa kukacha ̱ wa ̱ , weika diekjela , ktacha ̱ wa ̱ ite .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Ñerä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kju ̱ atkawa ̱ , te iguardia wa patkami , je te je sä ktäkwa ̱ wa ktacha ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi ijukläyäkä däläwa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Jekjepa ite isha ikjanaklä wa ia ̱ : ‘ Ñera yis yaba je ̱ k jula kukäke ̱ diei yäklä tso ̱ älile e ̱ ná ; ata ale kile wa rä ka bäi kuna .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: ‘ Je ki ̱ ka bas cho ̱ ña ̱ la ukä shtä ska , yi ku ̱ a bas te käi jewa kiäk jula kolone diei yäk . ’

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Jekäi je kjanaklä wa minejulu ña ̱ la wà , te biköle yi ku ̱ a ite käi tapawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , sä bäi bäi wa käi , sa yakeila wa käi . Jekäi jula kolone diei yäklä ska ju pshiwa ̱ wa ̱ yäkäk wa te .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: “ Ata ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i dewa ̱ ju ̱ yäkäk wa su ̱ ak ra , jeska ite ekla su ̱ a , je rä ka pajiele kuna ñajulakuke ska jienak shtä wà .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Je ia ̱ ite isha : ‘ Salibä , ¿ maikäi ba dewa ̱ ju ̱ jiska , ka je ̱ k pajiele kuna ñajulakuke ska jienak shtä wà rä na ? ’ Ata ije si ̱ wa ̱ tiawa ̱ iyika .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Jera je ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa ia ̱ : ‘ Je mu ̱ owa ̱ ikläka ijulaka , ju ̱ omi ka ̱ ekta yee si ̱ ka , jeska rä sa ̱ ji ̱ ami , sä kà wätiämi . ’

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , kinak wa rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , ata elkje ebä ne rä kolonak rä . ”

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Jekjepa fariseo wa minejulumi , ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a maikäi ra ite ije wäbutremiwa ̱ manele kte wà käi .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Jera ijewa wa ̱ dulanak wa patkami ijewa te iwäki ̱ , Herodes ja ̱ mi wa ra ñara ; te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba ktä rä bulee , ñakäi ba te sa pakteke ̱ rä bulee maikäi shke Säkeklä ja ̱ mi rä je ktei wà , jekäi ba ia ̱ ra yi irä käi , ka je rä ji iá kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ba te sa ̱ su ̱ e rä sa pa juer ebä wà kuna .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Jekäi sá ia ̱ ishö , maikäi ba ia ̱ ra irä : ¿ Ka ̱ tso ̱ inaklä ma ̱ klä César ia ̱ na , ata kai ?

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Ata Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a ijewa je ̱ rike yakei te , jekäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà wa , ¿ jiye bas te yis mable su ̱ eke ̱ wäsi ̱ wa rä na ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Je inaklä wäka me ̱ nak kjashö ' sia ̱ . Jera ijewa te denario cha ̱ mi iia ̱ ,

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: jera ite ijewa ia ̱ ichaka : — ¿ Yibä me ̱ i jí rä , yibä kie yöle ija ̱ mi rä na ?

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — César je ̱ . Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jera ji rä César ia ̱ , je mo César ia ̱ ; ata ji rä Säkeklä ia ̱ , je mo Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Je ssa ijewa te ra , imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na , minejulu iyika .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Je ke ̱ i ebä wà saduceo wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi . Jewa te ishe rä ka sä rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ; jewa te ichaka iia ̱ , te isha :

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: — Sapaktäk , Moisés te isha : ‘ Ikuna yile duawa ̱ ka yabala ta ra , iel se ̱ rwa ̱ ni je alaklä ra , yaba su ̱ ak iel yäbei ye . ’

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Jekäi sá sha ̱ na ñael wa ebä bakle siete ; ikibi si ̱ se ̱ nawa ̱ , ata je duawa ̱ ka yäbei a ̱ ta ̱ leta ̱ na kuna , jekäi je alaklä a ̱ ta ̱ na iel ia ̱ .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Je su ̱ ta iel ukä ja ̱ mi io ̱ na ñaebä , je su ̱ ta idäkläka ̱ mañal ukä ja ̱ mi io ̱ na ñaebä , mine rä je siete wa kje .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Je biköle ukä ska , je alaklä duawa ̱ ñaebä .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Jewa kalabe wa ̱ je bakle ra , jera sa ̱ shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni ska ra , ¿ je siete wa mane si ̱ se ̱ naklä ye ije dämiksa ̱ ni rä na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka te isha : — Bas shirinacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ ne kte yöle ia ̱ , ñakäi Säkeklä täkili ia ̱ .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Iwa rä sa ̱ shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni ska ra , ka jewa rä se ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna , ñakäi ka jewa rä me ̱ nak kuna se ̱ nakwa ̱ , ata jewa rä jishtä ángel wa tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska käi .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Ata dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni je wapakäklä ra , ¿ ka bas wa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ ji yile bas ia ̱ je ktei wayile na ? Je te ishe rä :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: ‘ Yis dä Abraham Kekläí , Isaac Kekläí , Jacob Kekläí ni . ’ Ka ije rä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa Kekläí kuna , ata ije rä sä kseka wa ne Kekläí .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Jekäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te je ssa ra , ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , ije te sa pakteke ̱ te .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Ñerä fariseo wa te issa ije te Saduceo wa si ̱ wa ̱ tiewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , jera ijewa ñatapawa ̱ wa ̱ etka yebä .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Jekäi ijewa sha ̱ ekla je ̱ k yöle ka ̱ wei wà te ichaka iia ̱ wäsi ̱ wa :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: — Sapaktäk , ¿ mane rä ka ̱ wei ska ra sa pakale ji wa ̱ k bäi si ̱ rä na ?

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Jera ije te isha iia ̱ : — ‘ Ba ku ̱ Säkekewa ba Kekläí shka ̱ li ̱ blö ma je ̱ r ska ji tso ̱ kalabe wà , ba wakei kalabe wà , bä ka ̱ biketsä kalabe wà . ’

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Je ne rä sa pakale ji wa ̱ k bäi si ̱ rä , isaka tsa ̱ ta rä .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Je itäki ̱ rä je ssëta : ‘ Ba ku ̱ ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ blö jishtä ba wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi . ’

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Je botkä sa pakale ji wa ̱ k , je ne ja ̱ mi ika ̱ wei yöle biköle irä ji yile jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ irä bite rä .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Fariseo wa tapar tso ̱ ji ̱ a ra , Jesús te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ ,

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: te isha : — ¿ Jiräni bas te Säbäkäkksa ̱ biketse , je rä yi yäbei na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — David je ̱ .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Jera ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jera ¿ maikäi Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi David te ije kia Säkekewa ni rä na ? Je te ishe rä :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: ‘ Säkekewa te isha yis Säkekewaí ia ̱ : Ma je ̱ tköwa ̱ yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne , bikökje yie bä bolki wa tulacha ̱ wa ̱ bä klä tkäkläka ̱ iki ̱ ka kje . ’

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Jekäi David te ikia Säkekewa ni ra , ¿ maikäi jera je rä iyäbei rä na ?

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Jekäi ka yi a ̱ ni täki ta ikúkäk jini a ̱ ni , ñakäi je ke ̱ i skaté ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ iwächakewa ̱ klei ji ̱ a .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Jekjepa Jesús ktami je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa irä , iwa ̱ dulanak wa irä ra ,

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: te isha : ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä fariseo wa irä tso ̱ ñajäklelewa ̱ rä Moisés säkei ye .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka biköle ji sheke ̱ ijewa te bas ia ̱ käi , je wo ̱ , je wawo ̱ . Ata ke ji wa ̱ k ijewa te ji we ̱ ke ̱ ja ̱ mi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te ji sheke ̱ , ata ka iwakwa te je we ̱ kuna .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Ijewa te däli mu ̱ eke ̱ kirii ka kjäk kje , je kpeke ̱ ka ̱ ite sa saka bak ki ̱ ka , ata ka iwakwa ssër kuna je käkka ̱ ña ijulasku batabä jibä wà .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Ji biköle we ̱ ke ̱ ite rä ditsä wa ̱ su ̱ nak ebä . Ijewa te kte yöle tso ̱ mo ̱ nak wätsa ̱ ja ̱ mi , jula ja ̱ mi , je kicha mu ̱ eke ̱ matsi ̱ i ̱ , ñakäi iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ kjä yöle tsolo tsolo je ki ̱ yueke ̱ ite matsi ̱ i ̱ matsi ̱ i ̱ .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Ijewa wäbätsä rä yakana mar ska ra , oloi ta wa je ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ wà , ñapaktäklä jui ska ra , oloi ta wa je ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ wà ,

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: ime chakarpa sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska wà , ime kirpa ditsä wa ̱ ‘ Rabí ’ ni wà .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: “ Ata ke bas ñama kinak ‘ Rabí ni . ’ Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas paktäk rä eklabä , ata bas biköle rä ñawakwa ebä .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Ñaebä ke bas ku ̱ yi a ̱ ni kia bas ká ni ka ̱ jiska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas Ká rä eklabä , je se ̱ r dä ka ̱ jöir .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Ñaebä ke bas ñama kinak sä wäsikäk wa ni . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas wäsikäk rä eklabä , je rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Ata bas sha ̱ na yi rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ ra , je kiana rä je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ bas kjanaklä ye .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi je ̱ k ssaka ̱ , je rä ja ̱ nakwa ̱ ni , ata yi je ̱ k jawa ̱ , je oloi karmika ̱ .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: “ Bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa , bas fariseo wa , bas dä ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , ¡ säli bas dä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te ka ̱ jöir gobierno kjätiawa ̱ sa saka yika . Ata ñera ka bas wakwa ñapatkäwa ̱ , ñaebä yi ñapatkäke ̱ wa ̱ jeska , jewa ka jewa ̱ bas te kjäkwa ̱ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: “ Bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa , bas fariseo wa , bas dä ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , ¡ säli bas dä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te alaklä wa chichö wa ju bäke ju ̱ eke ̱ mi , ñakäi bas ka ̱ kiäke ̱ jaree kje juenak ebä . Je kju ̱ ei bas buka ̱ nami e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: “ Bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa , bas fariseo wa , bas dä ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , ¡ säli bas dä ! Bas shkäke ̱ ka ̱ mii däyë ki ̱ , ishäkä ki ̱ , ekla kjela kukäk däkwa ̱ bas ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ja ̱ mi . Jekäi idewa ̱ ra , bas te iiawe ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ sä tuläklämi ska tso ̱ wa ye , e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ bötäbä kicha bas wakwa tsa ̱ ta .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: “ Bas sä wäsikewa ̱ k ka wä wajuenak kuna wa , ¡ säli bas dä ! Bas te ishe rä , yi kabla etkabä Templo wäkata ska ra , je rä ka ji iá kuna ; ata yi kabla etkabä oro tso ̱ Templo na wäkata ska ra , je ka kiar iwäshewa ̱ kwa ̱ .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: ¡ Bas ka je ̱ r ta wa , ka wä wajuenak kuna wa ! ¿ Mane rä bäi si ̱ rä , oro , ata Templo je oro siki tewa ̱ k na ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Ñakäi bas te ishe rä , yi kabla etkabä jile däläwa ̱ klä wäkata ska ra , je rä ka ji iá kuna ; ata yi kabla etkabä ji me ̱ leka ̱ wäkata ska ra , je ka kiar iwäshewa ̱ kwa ̱ .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: ¡ Bas ka wä wajuenak kuna wa ! ¿ Mane rä dälätsalewa ̱ si ̱ rä , ji me ̱ leka ̱ , ata idäläwa ̱ klä je me ̱ leka ̱ siki tewa ̱ k na ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yi kabla etkabä je ji däläwa ̱ klä wäkata ska , jera je rä ikabla etkabä ji däläwa ̱ klä irä , ji biköle tso ̱ iki ̱ ka irä je wäkata ska .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Ñaebä yi kabla etkabä Templo wäkata ska , jera je rä ikabla etkabä je Templo irä , ale kaldu jeska wakei irä je wäkata ska .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Ñaebä yi kabla etkabä ka ̱ jöir wäkata ska , jera je rä ikabla etkabä Säkeklä je ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye wäkata ska , ñakäi ale katke je ̱ tkelewa ̱ je ki ̱ ka je wäkata ska .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ Bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa , bas fariseo wa , bas dä ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , ¡ säli bas dä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te menta käi , eneldo käi , comino käi , je diezmoí me ̱ ke ̱ . Ata bas te ka ̱ wei wao ̱ nak bäi si ̱ jawa ̱ , ji wabiketse wämo käi , je ̱ r bäi she käi , ji biketse etkabä käi ; jera je ne kiana o ̱ nak rä , ñaebä je isaka ka jäkwa kuna .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Bas sä wäsikewa ̱ k ka wä wajuenak kuna wa , bas te yanak na ka ̱ wak tsi ̱ la kukeke ̱ ksa ̱ , ata bas te camello male ̱ ja ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ mi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: “ Bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa , bas fariseo wa , bas dä ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , ¡ säli bas dä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te vaso , plato paskue ipa ki ̱ ka , ata ija ̱ rka rä ji bäke käi , ji we ̱ ka wätkelewa ̱ ta käi ebä ne tso ̱ rä .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Ba Fariseo ka wä wajuenak kuna , ba ku ̱ vaso ja ̱ r ne paskuöksa ̱ ba rä , jekäi ra ipa ki ̱ ka juermi yëë .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: “ Bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa , bas fariseo wa , bas dä ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , ¡ säli bas dä ! Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas dä jishtä sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä pate ̱ le suruu käi ; iyina si ̱ ra je juer dä baa ipa ki ̱ ka , ata ija ̱ rka ra irä dulewa ̱ wa chichei ebä , ñá saka saka ebä ne tso ̱ rä .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Je su ̱ ta iyina si ̱ ra bas pa juer wämo ditsä wäna , ata bas ja ̱ rka rä kje sä wäyue ebä , ji rä ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi kuna ebä ne tso ̱ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: “ Bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa , bas fariseo wa , bas dä ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , ¡ säli bas dä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te jile bata shäk wa nu ̱ l blele jui yueke ̱ , ñakäi bas te ji yöleka ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä sä wämo wa ska je ki ̱ tke baa .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Jekäi bas te ishe : ‘ Sá kajali kuna sa ká wa bakle ke ̱ i ska ra , ka sá ñapatkeneña jile bata shäk wa pi kjewa ̱ k tuläkmi kuna . ’

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Ata je ebä wà bas ñakjatiacha ̱ wa ̱ bas dä je jile bata shäk wa ktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ wa yäbeila .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: ¡ Jekäi ji sher ji ̱ a o ̱ nak bas ká wa wa ̱ , je ki ̱ e ̱ newo ̱ pa bas ku ̱ !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: “ ¡ Tkäbe wa , tkäbe si ̱ yäbeila ! ¿ Maikäi bas ia ̱ buka ̱ ne sä tuläklämi ska je te ̱ rmi na ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Je kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka ¡ jikäi issö ! Yis te jile bata shäk wa irä ka ̱ biketsäk wa irä sa paktäk wa irä patke mar bas wäki ̱ . Ata bas te moska kteche ̱ miwa ̱ , isaka wätiemika ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi , isaka kpemi bas ñapaktäklä jui na , isaka yulemi weikanak jukläyäkä etkä etkä ska .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Jekäi Abel , ale wämo pi bakleju ̱ je ke ̱ i skaté sä wämo wa biköle pi baklejulu ishäkä ki ̱ bite rä Zacarías Berequías yaba pi bakleju ̱ kje , ale ktawa ̱ bas te Templo irä jile däläwa ̱ klä irä moska , je biköle nui ja ̱ rmika ̱ bas ki ̱ ka .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je biköle nui ja ̱ rmika ̱ jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ki ̱ ka .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: “ Jerusalén , Jerusalén ! ¡ Ba te jile bata shäk wa kteche ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ , mane patkele ba ia ̱ wa tieke ̱ ba te jak wà ! ¡ Bikö yis je ̱ r ssëna ba yabala me taparwa ̱ pa yis ja ̱ mi jishtä oshkoro a ̱ miyake wa te iyabala ble ipik niki ̱ ka käi , jeiräta ka ba ki ̱ jekäi ishene kuna !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Bas ju a ̱ ta ̱ nami bas ia ̱ rä ja ̱ r ebä .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Jekäi yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jírami ka bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ata bikökje bas te ishe : ‘ ¡ Bäije je daju ̱ Säkekewa kie ja ̱ mi rä ! ’ kjepa bas te yis su ̱ emini rä . ”

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Jesús deksa ̱ ju ̱ Templo ska je damiju ̱ ra , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi Templo ska ju yöle tso ̱ kjashäk iia ̱ .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Jera ite ikúka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas te ka je biköle su ̱ a na ? Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jeska jak etka a ̱ ni ka a ̱ ta ̱ nak isaka bata ki ̱ ka , ka miletkäwa ̱ kuna käi .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ tkawa ̱ Olivo yäkä Bata ska ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi iwakwabä , te ichaka iia ̱ : — Sá ia ̱ ishö , ¿ bikökje jile o ̱ rmi jekäi rä na ? ¿ Jibä wà ijuermi ba daju ̱ té ni irä , ñakäi sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ r dawa ̱ irä na ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ bas wäyuäkläwa ̱ .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Iwa rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dämi ji ̱ a yis kie ja ̱ mi ishäk : “ Yis ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä ” ni , jewa te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wäyueche ̱ miwa ̱ .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Bas te ipalei ssëmi ñabuka ̱ nate iräle , ñabuka ̱ na mar iräle , ata ¡ issö ! Ke bas je ̱ r ianak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jekäi ikiana o ̱ nak rä , jeiräta ka sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ rwa ̱ ba .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Jera ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa ñajämika ̱ ñakpäk ñara , ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ñajämika ̱ ñakpäk ñara , ka ̱ etkä etkä ska bäli ja ̱ rmi sa ̱ ki ̱ , ñakäi ka ̱ wäbuka ̱ nami .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Ata je biköle rä weikane säkätäba , alaklä wa duäksa ̱ yaba ki ̱ käi .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Jera bas tulurmiksa ̱ weikanak , bas kota ̱ nacha ̱ miwa ̱ . Jekäi ka ̱ etkä etkä biköle ska wa te bas dokoitsemiwa ̱ yis kie kju ̱ ei .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te yis jemiwa ̱ , ñaju ̱ amiksa ̱ , ñadokoitsämi .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Jekäi sä wäyuäk jile bata shäk ye wa ñajämika ̱ ta ̱ i , te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wäyueche ̱ miwa ̱ .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Ji rä ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi tsikirmi jöikwä ta , je bata ki ̱ ka Säkeklä shka ̱ li ̱ bläk wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ iarmiwa ̱ ka ishka ̱ li ̱ bläk ji ̱ a .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Ata yi chatkawa ̱ ma rä ibata jekje ra , je rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Jera jí Säkeklä gobierno ktei baa wapauta ̱ nami ka ̱ biköle ska sä ditsei wä biköle wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak , je ne kjepa sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ rmiwa ̱ rä .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka mika ̱ bas te isu ̱ e ale ji dokoitsalewa ̱ ji weikäkwa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na dewa ̱ ka ̱ sikii ska ra , ale sha jile bata shäk Daniel te , ( je kte washäk je ̱ r ko ̱ nopa je ia ̱ ) ,

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: jera yi tso ̱ Judea ska wa julunomipa ka ̱ tsä naka iyika .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Yi kaldu ju tsi ̱ bata yöle shpatke ki ̱ ra , ke je bitawa ̱ ni jile tso ̱ iju na tsa ̱ kksa ̱ .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Yi kaldu shka ̱ bläklä ska ra , ke je bitani shäbeka iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ tsa ̱ k .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Wekte je ke ̱ i ska alaklä wa tso ̱ kjä ye wa rä , ñakäi tsu ma ̱ ke ̱ ji ̱ a wa rä !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Bas ka ̱ kiö ka bas julunaklämi kuna ka ̱ tse ̱ l ke ̱ i wà iräle , sábado wà iräle .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je wäsaka ra sä weikarmi e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , ka jekäi weikane bakle mik a ̱ ni säkätä ka ̱ jiska yöleksa ̱ skaté bite rä jira kje , ñakäi je su ̱ ta ji ka o ̱ nakni mik a ̱ ni .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Ikuna je ke ̱ i ke wäja ̱ nopa ra , yi a ̱ ni ka tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ ; ata sä kolole wa bata ki ̱ ka je ke ̱ i wäja ̱ rmiwa ̱ .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: “ Jera ikuna yilé te ishe bas ia ̱ : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Säbäkäkksa ̱ kaldu jiska ’ ni iräle , ‘ a ̱ mi ska ’ ni iräle , jera ke iktä kuka .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä wäyuäk sä bäkäkksa ̱ ye wa irä , jile bata shäk ye wa irä , ñajämika ̱ te ijuenaklä e ̱ e ̱ na shtä irä , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä irä kjashemi , sä kolole wa kuna wäyönak ra , jewa wäyönakläwa ̱ pa ye .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Yis te je bata sha bas ia ̱ ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ kba .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ikuna sa saka te ishe bas ia ̱ : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Ikaldu ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska ni ra ’ , ke bas mina ; je iräle ite ishe : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Ikaldu ju ja ̱ r etkä na ni ra ’ , ke iktä kuka .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jishtä ka ̱ wä ju ̱ rke ̱ té ka ̱ wä däkläka ̱ wà olotjä ma rä ka ̱ wä minakläwa ̱ wà kje , je su ̱ ta ditsä yäbei däke ̱ ni rä .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Mai jile nu ̱ l balakli ska ra , olo taparmiwa ̱ .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: “ Ata je weikane ta ̱ i ke ̱ i kjaju ̱ ukä ska plaa ra , ka ̱ wä wätuirmiwa ̱ , tulu oloi ka ñinak ji ̱ a , ka ̱ jöir bekwä jolortémi , ñakäi ka ̱ jöir ji tso ̱ oloi ta wa wäbuka ̱ namika ̱ .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Jekjepa ditsä yäbei kjayirmi ka ̱ jöir ska ijuenaklä ye . Jera ditsei wä ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa biköle tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska ji ̱ ami ta ̱ i , jewa te ditsä yäbei dawa ̱ ju ̱ té ka ̱ jöir mo ̱ bata ki ̱ ka oloi ta , wäñileka ̱ ta ̱ i su ̱ emi .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Kökö bularmi etka täkiiwa ̱ si ̱ ra , ije te iángel wa patkemi , jewa te iwa ̱ kolole wa tapawe ̱ miwa ̱ etka yebä si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ nak cuatro , jöi wà dia wà a ̱ mi wà jí wà skaté , ka ̱ jöir wätkerke ̱ wa ̱ ska ma rä iwätkerke ̱ wa ̱ etkä ska kje .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: “ Jile she higuera ja ̱ mi , je kukö bas ku ̱ : Mika ̱ ijula dului peri jè ̱ r mar da , je wà bas je ̱ r ku ̱ e ite duas tker dawa ̱ kja irä .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Je su ̱ ta mika ̱ bas te jekäi ji biköle su ̱ a ra , jera je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ kja alemana ju kjä ska irä .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je biköle o ̱ rmi jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ka tuarcha ̱ wa ̱ ba yika .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä je e ̱ rmiwa ̱ , ata yis ktä ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ mik a ̱ ni .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: “ Ata bikökje je díaí , je horaí räle , je ka ju ̱ ñer yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ , ángel ka ̱ jöir ska wa wa ̱ iräle , iyaba wa ̱ iräle , ata Sa Ká ebä ne wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer dä .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: “ Jishtä Noé bakle ke ̱ i ska io ̱ le käi , je su ̱ ta io ̱ rmi ditsä yäbei däke ̱ ni ra rä .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Je rä jishtä ka diklä talarka ̱ ba yikaba ra käi : jera sä yäkä rami , sä ji yä rami , sa ̱ se ̱ r dami , sa ̱ ñama rami se ̱ nakwa ̱ , mine rämi Noé minewa ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka díaí ska kje ,

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: ata ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne mine rämi diklä talanaka ̱ kje , jekäi je te ijewa kalabe jámi , je su ̱ ta io ̱ rmi ditsä yäbei däke ̱ ni ra rä .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska ra , sä käjäklämi bol shka ̱ bläklä ska , jera ekla rä minaktse ̱ , iel dä ju ̱ nakta ̱ na .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ñakäi alaklä wa bol jak wawä tso ̱ , jera ekla rä minaktse ̱ , iel dä ju ̱ nakta ̱ na .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ , ka bas wa ̱ ijuñer mane horaí wà bas blui däju ̱ ni rä ki ̱ ka .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Ata jí ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa , ju wakei wa ̱ ijuñelewa ̱ pa ka ̱ wä bikö käi jakbläk däju ̱ rä ra , jera iwäñinene wa ̱ ka ka ̱ me ̱ ne ikjäkläwa ̱ iju na .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ñaebä bas se ̱ no kukale kja , je rä ditsä yäbei je däju ̱ ni rä mane hora ka biketsale kuna bas wa ̱ ska ki ̱ ka .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: “ ¿ Yi rä chatkelewa ̱ bäi iblui kjanaklä ye , ka ̱ biketsä ta kolole iblui wa ̱ iju ska kjanaklä wa tso ̱ ju ̱ ñak , jewa chewa ̱ k hora bulee ska rä na ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Bäije je kjanaklä rä , iblui deju ̱ ni te iku ̱ a ite ikja ̱ nei we ̱ te jekäi ra rä .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je ia ̱ ije te iji tso ̱ biköle ju ̱ emiksa ̱ iwa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Ata ikuna je ikjanaklä rä yakei ra , te ibiketse je ̱ r na : ‘ Yis blui ka da juena yewa ̱ , ’

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: jera ije ̱ käka ̱ kjanaklä wa saka kpäk , yäkäk ta ̱ i , ji yäk ta ̱ i se ̱ nak diyëë wa ra ,

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
