text2: jera je kjanaklä blui dämiju ̱ ni ka ite ike ̱ i ki ̱ ssë kate kuna ska , ka hora ju ̱ ñele kuna iwa ̱ ska ,

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: je te ikshe ̱ mika ̱ te ka ̱ me ̱ mi iia ̱ rä mai ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà wa tso ̱ shtä ska , jeska rä sa ̱ ji ̱ ami , sä kà wätiämi .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: “ Je ke ̱ i wà ra ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä busi wa diez te itsi ̱ ni kukeche ̱ wa ̱ mijulu dulaklei jula kolonak ña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k käi .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Jewa sha ̱ cinco rä ka je ̱ r ta , ata cinco rä je ̱ r ta .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Jekäi je ka je ̱ r ta wa wa ̱ tsi ̱ ni minemi ra , ka iwa ̱ idiä mineneña .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Ata je je ̱ r ta wa wa ̱ idiä mine ijui na itsi ̱ ni ra ñara .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Ata jula kolonak wätkenawa ̱ . Jera biköle käpeche ̱ e ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi ikapacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Ñerä ka ̱ sha ̱ sha ̱ ra , a ̱ ne ssëna : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Jula kolonak daju ̱ té ; bas kute je ña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k . ’

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Jera je busi wa biköle ñaja tulaka ̱ , te itsi ̱ ni bäi wa ̱ mi .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Jera ka je ̱ r ta wa te isha je ̱ r ta wa ia ̱ : ‘ Bas tsi ̱ ni diä kaku mo sá ia ̱ , sá tsi ̱ ni wäita ̱ nacha ̱ rawa ̱ irä ki ̱ ka . ’

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Ata je je ̱ r ta wa te ikúka te isha : ‘ Kai , jekäi ra tsi ikiarwa ̱ ka däkksa ̱ sá wakwa ia ̱ irä bas ia ̱ irä . Bäi si ̱ ra bas ma itju ̱ ak bas wakwa ia ̱ iwatju ̱ ak wa ska . ’

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Ñerä ijewa minejulu itju ̱ ak dälei ja ̱ mi je jula kolonak deju ̱ té . Jera kukale e ̱ ná wa kjawa ̱ julu ira jula kolorke ̱ ska , jekäi ju kjäita ̱ nawa ̱ .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Je itäki ̱ ka je busi wa saka dejuluni te isha jela : ‘ Säkekewa , Säkekewa , sá kjäyöpa . ’

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Ata ije te ijewa kúka te isha : ‘ Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka yis wa ̱ bas su ̱ le . ’

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ , ka bas wa ̱ je díaí iräle je horaí iräle ju ̱ ñer ki ̱ ka .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: “ Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ jöir gobiernoí rä jishtä ekla miju ̱ ka ̱ mii ra ite ikjanaklä wa kie jeté , jewa ia ̱ ite iji tso ̱ ju ̱ eta ̱ na käi ;

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: ekla ia ̱ ite ima ̱ cinco talento , iel ia ̱ dos talento , iel ia ̱ un talento , iwakwa ia ̱ iwao ̱ r ja ̱ mi ekla ekla . Jekäi imineju ̱ ka ̱ mii .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Jera plaa ebä ra , je cinco talento kukäk te iwawá ̱ , ki ̱ tapawa ̱ ni ite cinco .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Je su ̱ ta je dos talento kukäk te iki ̱ tapawa ̱ ni dos talento .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Ata je un talento kukäk mineju ̱ te ishäkä ja ̱ r bia , jeska ite iblui inaklä blawa ̱ .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: “ Ñerä ka ̱ miipa je kjanaklä wa blui deni , te je inaklä ktei paruami ijewa ra .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Jekäi cinco talento kukäk deju ̱ té iwäki ̱ , je wa ̱ iki ̱ shkäni cinco talento . Je te isha : ‘ Säkekewa , ba te cinco talento ma yis ia ̱ , ata ¡ isu ̱ o ! Yis te iki ̱ tapawa ̱ ni cinco talento . ’

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Jera iblui te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Kjanaklä bäi chatkelewa ̱ , baa ba te iwá ̱ rä . Ba te ji elkje wawá ̱ rä bäi , je ki ̱ ka yie ba ia ̱ ji me ̱ mi ta ̱ i ma wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak . Ba ssënoña a ̱ naa bä blui ra . ’

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Jekäi dos talento kukäk deju ̱ té iwäki ̱ te isha : ‘ Säkekewa , ba te dos talento ma yis ia ̱ , ata ¡ isu ̱ o ! Yis te iki ̱ tapawa ̱ ni dos talento . ’

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Jera iblui te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Kjanaklä bäi , chatkelewa ̱ ; baa ba te iwá ̱ rä . Ba te ji elkje wawá ̱ rä bäi , je ki ̱ ka yie ba ia ̱ ji me ̱ mi ta ̱ i ma wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak . Ba ssënoña a ̱ naa bä blui ra .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: “ Jekäi un talento kukäk deju ̱ té iwäki ̱ , te isha : ‘ Säkekewa , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba je ̱ r dä därërë ; ba te däli wä kuke mai ka ba wa ̱ itkene shtä ska , ñakäi ba te iwä tie mai ka ba wa ̱ itulune shtä ska .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Jekäi yis suanawa ̱ ba yika , je ki ̱ ka yis mine te ba talento blacha ̱ ishäkä naka , ata ¡ isu ̱ o ! Yis wa ̱ je rä ba cha je shkäni . ’

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Jera iblui te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Kjanaklä yakei , ka ̱ nilbi ; ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis te däli wäkuke mai ka yis wa ̱ itkene shtä ska , ñakäi yie iwä tie mai ka yis wa ̱ itulune shtä ska ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: jera ba ku ̱ yis inaklä cho ̱ mipa inaklä bläk wa ia ̱ , yis deni ra yis wa ̱ ji rä yis cha ku ̱ akläni ukä ta . ’

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka je talento bököksa ̱ iyika , cho ̱ mini mane wa ̱ diez talento kate ra je ia ̱ .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Iwa rä biköle yi wa ̱ ji tso ̱ je ia ̱ iki ̱ me ̱ rmi ukä bakleka ̱ ; ata yi wa ̱ ka ji kuna , je yika ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ kjelabä jibä bakanamiksa ̱ .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Jekäi jí kjanaklä ka bäi kuna ju ̱ omi ka ̱ ekta yee si ̱ ka , jeska rä sa ̱ ji ̱ ami , sä kà wätiämi .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: “ Mika ̱ ditsä yäbei daju ̱ ni oloi kaleka ̱ iwakei oloi wà , ñakäi ángel wa biköle darña ije ra , jera je je ̱ tkämiwa ̱ ije ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye baa si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Jera ka ̱ biköle wa taparmiwa ̱ ije wäja ̱ mi , je bala butsemi ite kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa , jishtä oveja kjänanak wa te oveja bala butse cabra yika käi .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Jekäi je te oveja tapawe ̱ mi ijula wämo kja ̱ ne , ata je te cabra tapawe ̱ mi jula shule kja ̱ ne .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Jera Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te ishemi ijula wämo kja ̱ ne tso ̱ wa ia ̱ : ‘ Bas kjeiyile bäi yis Ká wa ̱ wa kute , bas ia ̱ gobierno yolole däkksa ̱ ka ka ̱ jiska yörksa ̱ ba yika , je kukö däli ukä ye .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis ktawa ̱ bäli te ra , bas te yis chewa ̱ ; yis je ̱ r banawa ̱ ra , bas te yis tia ; yis kjaju ̱ ka ̱ etkä wa käi ra , bas te yis kiawa ̱ ;

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: ñakäi ju ̱ li ̱ shye ra , bas te yis pajiewa ̱ ; yis duärawa ̱ ra , bas te yis pasu ̱ a ; yis kate wätelewa ̱ ra , bas dasta ̱ na yis su ̱ ak . ’

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Jera sä wämo wa te ikúkemi te ishemi : ‘ Säkekewa , ¿ bikökje sá te ma su ̱ a ba ktawa ̱ bäli te je chewa ̱ sá te rä na , ma je ̱ r banawa ̱ je tia sá te rä na ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: ¿ Bikökje sá te ma su ̱ a ka ̱ etkä wa käi je kiawa ̱ sá te rä na , ju ̱ li ̱ shye je pajiewa ̱ sá te rä na ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: ¿ Bikökje sá te ma su ̱ a ba duärawa ̱ , bä kate wätelewa ̱ , je su ̱ ak sá dasta ̱ na rä na ? ’

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Ata je Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te ikúkemi te ishemi : ‘ Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas te ji wá ̱ jí yis saka wa manele emana si ̱ ia ̱ ra , jera je rä yis ne ia ̱ bas te je wá ̱ . ’

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: “ Jekjepa ite ishemi ñakäi jula shule kja ̱ ne tso ̱ wa ia ̱ : ‘ Bas yakeila wa ñatso ̱ tulömi yis yika minakmi yökö jekjeye yolole e ̱ ná be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ irä , iángel wa ia ̱ irä , je ja ̱ rka .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bäli te yis ktawa ̱ ra , ka bas wa ̱ yis dené ; yis je ̱ r banawa ̱ ra , ka bas wa ̱ yis tene ;

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: yis kjaju ̱ ka ̱ etkä wa käi ra , ka bas wa ̱ yis kinewa ̱ ; ñakäi ju ̱ li ̱ shye ra , ka bas wa ̱ yis pajiene ; yis duaksa ̱ ra , ñakäi yis kate wätelewa ̱ ra , ka bas dene yis su ̱ ak . ’

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúkemi te ishemi : ‘ Säkekewa , ¿ bikökje sá te ma su ̱ a bäli te ba ktawa ̱ käi , ma je ̱ r banawa ̱ käi , ba kjaju ̱ ka ̱ etkä wa käi , ju ̱ li ̱ shye käi , ba duärawa ̱ käi , ba kate wätelewa ̱ käi , jeska ka sá wa ̱ ma tsa ̱ tkene rä na ? ’

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Jekjepa ije te ijewa kúkemi te ishemi : ‘ Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka bas wa ̱ ji o ̱ ne manele jí emana wa ia ̱ ra , je rä ka bas wa ̱ ji o ̱ ne yis ia ̱ .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Jekäi ijewa mar dä buka ̱ nak jekjeye , ata sä wämo wa mar dä se ̱ nak jekjeye . ”

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ñerä Jesús te je kte biköle sha e ̱ ná ra , ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: — Bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä sher ji ̱ a ka ̱ böiki ebä . Jeska ditsä yäbei rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , je ke ̱ i ska wäkiri wa irä , ñatapawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kie Caifás je ju ska .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Jeska ijewa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a iwa ̱ Jesús kukäkläwa ̱ ka ̱ yue ebä wà kota ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Ata ijewa te isha : — Ke sa ̱ ku ̱ iwa ̱ ike ̱ i kjewe ̱ sha ̱ na , iö ditsä wätji ̱ rka ̱ ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Jesús katke Betania ska , Simón ale kotäle lepra wa ̱ je ju ska ,

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: jera alaklä ekla je ̱ k sikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi , je wa ̱ perfume säkei ta doloiebä shkä , jui yöle alabastro wà , je tkaka ̱ ite itsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ , ije ̱ k bäklelewa ̱ yäkäk ska .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Ñerä iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je su ̱ a ra , ijewa kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ te isha : — ¿ Jiye ite iweikawa ̱ jekäi rä na ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Ñera je kuna wato ̱ le ju ̱ lemi ra , je säkei deksa ̱ rä shka ̱ ja ̱ , me ̱ nak ka jita wa ia ̱ .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Je te Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas te je alaklä weike na ? Ije te ji baa ne wá ̱ yis ia ̱ rä .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , del ka jita wa tso ̱ bas sha ̱ na rä , ata yis je ka se ̱ nak del bas sha ̱ na .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Jekäi ite je perfume tkaka ̱ yis yaka ki ̱ ka , je wá ̱ kja ije te rä yis itäbinakläwa ̱ .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka ̱ biköle ska mai jí kte baa wapauta ̱ nami käi ra , ji wá ̱ ije te je ktei pakarmiña sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä ije ska .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Jera ale doce wa sha ̱ ekla kie Judas Iscariote wa ni , je mineju ̱ mi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wäki ̱ ka ,

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: te isha : — ¿ Jibä ma ̱ k bas ssëna yis ia ̱ yis wa ̱ ije ju ̱ akläksa ̱ bas ia ̱ na ? Jekäi ijewa te inaklä wäka mablaksa ̱ iia ̱ treinta .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Jeska ra ite ibiketsami maikäi si ̱ ra ka ̱ dämiksa ̱ iia ̱ iwa ̱ iju ̱ akläksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ käi .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Jekäi pan ñaklä ka levadura ta , je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä säkätä dewa ̱ ra , Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi , te isha : — ¿ Mai ba ki ̱ sá shena jile äliwa ̱ k ba ia ̱ , ma wa ̱ ñanak Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä rä na ?

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Jera ije te isha : — Bas cho ̱ jukläyäkä sha ̱ na ekla wäki ̱ , je ia ̱ bas te ishe : ‘ Sapaktäk te ishaté : Yis ke ̱ i tkenawa ̱ kja alemana , jekäi yis te Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ ke ̱ ba ju ska yis wa ̱ dulanak wa ra . ’

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ñerä iwa ̱ dulanak wa te iwá ̱ jishtä Jesús te ipaka iwa ̱ k käi . Jera ijewa te Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je äliwa ̱ .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Jera ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra ije je ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk ale doce wa ra .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Jekäi ijewa yäkä tso ̱ ra , ite isha : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas sha ̱ ekla te yis ju ̱ emiksa ̱ .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Jera ijewa je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i , te ishami iia ̱ ekla ekla : — Säkekewa , ¿ yis le irä ?

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Jera ije te ijewa kúka te isha : — Mane jula patkawa ̱ ña yis da taza na ra , je ne te yis ju ̱ emiksa ̱ rä .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Iyina si ̱ ra , ditsä yäbei maju ̱ mi rä jiräni ije ktei yöle katke rä ja ̱ mi , ata ¡ wekte ditsä yäbei ju ̱ akksa ̱ wakei rä ! Ije wakei ia ̱ ra bäi si ̱ rä ke iko ̱ nopa .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Jera Judas iju ̱ akksa ̱ te ikúka te isha : — ¿ Rabí , jera yis le irä ? Jera ite isha ia ̱ : — Ba te je shaka ̱ .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Ijewa yäkä kajali ji ̱ a ra , Jesús te pan kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ika ̱ kia , kjepa je butsa ma ̱ ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , te isha : — A ̱ ju ̱ , jí ño . Jí rä yis yaka .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Kjepa ite copa kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ ; kjepa ite ima ̱ ijewa ia ̱ , te isha : — Jí yö bas biköle ku ̱ .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jí rä yis pi , sa kabläklä ñaia ̱ spa ̱ na je pií ; je rä tkenakju ̱ mi sä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa nui janakläwa ̱ bitaba .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jí maju ̱ jöiwäta ka yis wa ̱ jí uva diä yanakni , ma rä ike ̱ i dewa ̱ yis wa ̱ iyäkläni spa ̱ na bas da yis Ká gobiernoí ska kjepa .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Jekäi ijewa ksa etka ra , iminejulumi Olivo Yäkä Bataka .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jir tuina bas biköle te yis jemiwa ̱ ta ̱ na . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : ‘ Yie oveja kjänanak ktemiwa ̱ , jera oveja butsa ̱ nami . ’

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Ata yis shki ̱ naka ̱ ni ra , yis maju ̱ bas wätsa ̱ kba Galileaka .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Jera Pedro te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — Bena te bä jawa ̱ ra , yis je wa ̱ mik a ̱ ni ka ba ja ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ba ia ̱ , jir tuina ka oshkoro a ̱ rka ̱ ba yikaba , ba ka ̱ yuämiwa ̱ mañatäbä kicha ka ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ni .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Ata Pedro te isha iia ̱ : — Ikuna yis kiana duäkwa ̱ ña ba ra , jeiräta a ̱ ni ka yis ka ̱ yuäkwa ̱ ka yis wa ̱ ba su ̱ le ni . Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa biköle te isha ñassëta .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús demi ijewa ra ka ̱ kie Getsemaní ska , jera ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Bas ñajöklöwa ̱ jiska yis maju ̱ a ̱ mi ska ka ̱ kiäk dälei ja ̱ mi .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Ata ite Pedro irä Zebedeo yabala bol irä jewa kia jámi . Jeska ra ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ , issënawa ̱ shi ̱ ana si ̱ .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Ñerä ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis je ̱ r ianawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , sä duärawa ̱ kje . Bas a ̱ ta ̱ no jiska , bas wäñino yis da .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Jera imineju ̱ a ̱ mikwäta , jeska ije ̱ tkawa ̱ wakteka , je ka ̱ kia te isha : “ Papá rikä , io ̱ nopa ra , jí copa kjäju ̱ pa yis ki ̱ ka . Ata ka je rä yis wakei ki ̱ ishena käi kuna , ata jishtä ba ki ̱ ishena käi . ”

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Jera ideni je iwa ̱ dulanak wa ska ra , ite ijewa ku ̱ a käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ite isha Pedro ia ̱ : — Ata ¿ ka bas täkili deneka ̱ wäñinakña yis da una horabä jibä na ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Bas wäñino , bas ka ̱ kiö ka bas shirinakläwa ̱ kuna . Iyina si ̱ ra sä wikblu ssëna ji wa ̱ k , ata sa yaka rä ka täki ta .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha imineju ̱ ni ka ̱ kiäk , te isha : “ Papá , ikuna jí copa ka kjeneju ̱ yis ki ̱ ka ka yis wa ̱ yale kuna käi ra , jishtä ba ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi io ̱ nopa . ”

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Jera ideju ̱ ni te ijewa ku ̱ ani käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ , ka ijewa ia ̱ käpe wäkolor ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Jekäi ite itulata ̱ na mineju ̱ ni , je ka ̱ kiani jini ite isha ssëta deka ̱ mañatäbä kicha .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Jekjepa ideni je iwa ̱ dulanak wa ska , te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ata ¿ je rä bas käpä rami ji ̱ a , bas je ̱ rä dami ji ̱ a ebä na ? ¡ Issö ! Ihoraí dewa ̱ e ̱ ná . Ditsä yäbei , je rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ditsä yakeila jula na .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: ¡ Bas ñajöka ̱ , sä shkä ! ¡ Isu ̱ o ! Yis ju ̱ akksa ̱ daju ̱ té e ̱ ná .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Ñerä ije te je she kaldu ji ̱ a kjela bä ra , Judas ale doce wa sha ̱ ekla je deju ̱ té chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ wa ra , espada ta , kal wälbe ta , patkele chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ irä , je ke ̱ i ska sä wäkiri wa wa ̱ irä .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Je iju ̱ akksa ̱ wa ̱ ijewa rä je ̱ r ko ̱ le e ̱ ná jikäi : “ Mane wäjalassërawa ̱ yis te ra , je ne irä ; je kuköwa ̱ . ”

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Jera ije ̱ k sikawa ̱ plaa Jesús wäja ̱ mi , te isha : — ¡ Rabí ! ¿ Bäi ebä na ? Jera ite iwä jalassawa ̱ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Salibä , ji wa ̱ k bä de rä ra , je wo ̱ . Jera ijewa ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi , jula tkawa ̱ Jesús ja ̱ mi te ikukawa ̱ .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Je ebä ra Jesús da kajali wa sha ̱ ekla jula tkawa ̱ te iespada sikaksa ̱ , je wà ite chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kjanaklä bika , kukä tia ju ̱ ami .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ba espada patköwa ̱ ni ikjuä na . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , biköle espada sikäkksa ̱ wa rä kota ̱ nakcha ̱ wa ̱ espada wà .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: ¿ Ata ba te ibiketse ka yis ia ̱ ka ̱ kinak yis Ká ia ̱ na ? Jera jí kje ra ite ángel wa patkemi yis ia ̱ doce mil tsa ̱ ta .

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Ata jera ¿ maikäi io ̱ rmi jishtä iyöle te ishe ikiana o ̱ nak jikäi ni , käi rä na ?

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Je wäsaka Jesús te isha je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas bite espada ta , kal wälbe ta yis kukäkwa ̱ jishtä jakbläk wa kukewa ̱ käi na ? Buliri buliri yis je ̱ tkawa ̱ sa paktäk Templo ska ra , ñera ka bas wa ̱ yis kukäwa ̱ ta .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Ata jí biköle o ̱ rte rä io ̱ naklä jishtä kte yöle jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ te ishe käi . Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa biköle te ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na , julunami iyika .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Jesús kukäkwa ̱ wa wa ̱ iminetse ̱ chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Caifás wäki ̱ , mai ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä sä wäkiri wa irä tapar tso ̱ ska .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Ata Pedro damiju ̱ iitäki ̱ ka ̱ miika , demi je chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i juitäki ̱ kje , kjawa ̱ ju ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ Templo kjänanak wa sha ̱ na , me ite iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä í ̱ su ̱ ak .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä , Sanedrín wa biköle irä , jewa te Jesús kjatiäklä ka ̱ yue wà yula ijewa wa ̱ iktäkläwa ̱ .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Ata ka iwa ̱ iko ̱ ne , jeiräta ikjatiäk ka ̱ yue wà wa de ta ̱ i , bata ska ra bol dejulu ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: te isha : — Jí te isha : ‘ Yis dä täki ta Säkeklä Temploí miwa ̱ tkäkwa ̱ , ata tres día ra iyuäkka ̱ ni . ’

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je ̱ kaka ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — Ata ¿ ka ba te ikúke na ? ¿ Jiräni ijewa te ba kjatieke ̱ wà rä na ?

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Ata Jesús si ̱ wa ̱ tiawa ̱ . Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha iia ̱ : — Ba ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ Säkeklä yaba rä ra , yie ba pake Säkeklä kseka wäkata ska ishäkka ̱ etkabä sá ia ̱ .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ba te je shaka ̱ . Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jirami bas te ditsä yäbei su ̱ emi je ̱ tkelewa ̱ ale Täkili ta Ta ̱ iwa ̱ je jula wämo kja ̱ ne , ñakäi je dawa ̱ ju ̱ té ka ̱ jöir mo ̱ bata ki ̱ ka je su ̱ emi bas te .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te iwakei paiklä kshaju ̱ ami , te isha : — Je kta rä yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi . ¿ Jiye sa ̱ ki ̱ ikjatiäk wa shena ji ̱ a na ? Ñera bas te ikta yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi je ssa .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Jekäi ra , ¿ jishtä bas ia ̱ ra irä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka te isha : — Je kiana rä duäkwa ̱ .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Jera ijewa kjali tjua iwäktä ja ̱ mi , ite itia jula wà , jekäi isaka te ikpa jula ktä wà ,

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: te isha : — Säbäkäkksa ̱ , ¡ yi si ̱ te ba kpa rä shöka ̱ sá ia ̱ jile bata shäk ye !

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Pedro kalme je ̱ tkelewa ̱ ju shäbeka juitä ki ̱ . Ñerä alaklä ekla jeska wa kjanaklä je ̱ k sikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Ba ñaebä kalduña je Jesús Galilea wa ra .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Ata ije ka ̱ yuawa ̱ biköle wänaka te isha : — Jibä sheke ̱ ba te rä ka ju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Jekäi imineksa ̱ ju ̱ sä däkläwa ̱ ska ra , alaklä saka jeska kjanaklä te isu ̱ a , je te isha jeska tso ̱ wa ia ̱ : — Jí kalduña Jesús Nazaret wa ra .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Ata ije ka ̱ yuawa ̱ ni te isha etkabä : — Ka yis wa ̱ yi je rä su ̱ le .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Je berbena ebä ra , jeska kajali wa ñasikawa ̱ Pedro wäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Iyina si ̱ ra ba rä ijewa sha ̱ , bä ktä rä ijewa ktä ssëta ki ̱ ka .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Jera ije te jile shami je ̱ k ukä ja ̱ mi o ̱ nak shi ̱ ana , te isha etkabä : — Ka yis wa ̱ yi je rä su ̱ le . Jera je wäsaka oshkoro a ̱ naka ̱ .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Jera Pedro je ̱ r ja ̱ na jiräni Jesús te isha iia ̱ ska : “ Ka oshkoro a ̱ rka ̱ ba yikaba , ba ka ̱ yuämiwa ̱ mañatäbä kicha , ka ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ni . ” Ñerä Pedro mineksa ̱ ju ̱ jeska iji ̱ á e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , je ke ̱ i ska wäkiri wa irä jewa biköle ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a jile wa ̱ k Jesús ukä ja ̱ mi iwa ̱ iktäkläwa ̱ .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te imu ̱ awa ̱ tsa ̱ mi ju ̱ aksa ̱ ka ̱ wäkiri Pilato ia ̱ .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Jekjepa Judas ale iju ̱ akksa ̱ te isu ̱ a Jesús dä ktei wabiketsaleksa ̱ e ̱ ná ko ̱ ta ̱ nakwa ̱ ra , ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ ta ̱ i , ki ̱ ka ije te je inaklä wäka treinta cha ̱ mi ni chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä sä wäkiri wa irä jewa ia ̱ ,

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: te isha : — Yis te ji wakbla , ka nuita kuna ju ̱ akksa ̱ pi kjäkju ̱ . Ata ijewa te ikúka : — ¿ Je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ sá ia ̱ na ? Ba wakei ne wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer dä .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Jera ite je inaklä miwa ̱ plaa Templo na , jekäi ikjaksa ̱ ju ̱ mineju ̱ mi , je ̱ k kuli sikaka ̱ .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Ñerä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te je inaklä shtani te isha : — Ka ka ̱ kuna je jiäklä ji me ̱ le Säkeklä ia ̱ ska , je rä pi säkei ki ̱ ka .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Jekjepa ijewa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a , te je wà u ̱ yaka yuäk ka ̱ tju ̱ aksa ̱ , ka ̱ etkä wa itäbiäklä .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka je ka ̱ kinawa ̱ Sä Pi Ke ̱ i ni , bite rä jira kje .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Jekäi io ̱ na jishtä iyile jile bata shäk Jeremías ja ̱ mi te ishe käi : “ Ekla säkei biketsaleksa ̱ Israel batala wa ̱ inaklä wäka treinta kjena , je säkei kukawa ̱ ijewa te ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: mani ite u ̱ yaka yuäk ka ̱ tju ̱ aklä , jishtä Säkekewa te yis paka iwa ̱ k käi . ”

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Jesús kaldu ka ̱ wäkiri wäja ̱ mi , jera je ka ̱ wäkiri te iwächakewa ̱ te isha : — ¿ Ba ne rä Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä na ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ba te je shaka ̱ .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä sä wäkiri wa irä , jewa te ije kjatia ra , ka iwa ̱ ikúkane jini a ̱ ni .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Jekjepa Pilato te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ijewa te ba kjatieke ̱ saka saka , ka ssëne ma wa ̱ na ?

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Ata ije wa ̱ ka ikúkane jini a ̱ ni , je te ka ̱ wäkiri male ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Ka ̱ wäkiri wädular del ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä sha ̱ na ra , sä wätelewa ̱ wa sha ̱ ekla wäyäkksa ̱ ni ditsä ia ̱ , mane sherke ̱ ijewa ki ̱ käi .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Jera jeska ekla palei ta yakei si ̱ kate wätelewa ̱ ijewa wa ̱ kie rä Barrabás ni .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Ñerä ijewa tapanawa ̱ ra , Pilato te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Mane sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ yis wa ̱ wäyenakksa ̱ bas ia ̱ rä : Barrabás na , ata Jesús kinak Säbäkäkksa ̱ ni na ?

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Je rä ije wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ijewa je ̱ r ki ̱ Jesús ianawa ̱ rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wäbätsäke ̱ Jesús wà ijewa tsa ̱ ta kju ̱ ei , je ki ̱ ka ijewa te iju ̱ aksa ̱ iia ̱ rä .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Jera ikalme ji ̱ a je ̱ tkelewa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ ska ra , ise ̱ naklä te ishaté iia ̱ : “ Ka ba te je wämo me we ̱ kuna a ̱ ni . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jir tuina yis weikana e ̱ e ̱ na kausu ̱ e na , ije kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka . ”

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Ata chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä sä wäkiri wa irä , jewa te je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa je ̱ rtka iwa ̱ Barrabás kiäkläksa ̱ ni , ata iwa ̱ Jesús ju ̱ akläksa ̱ kota ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ wäkiri te ijewa kúka , te isha : — ¿ Jera ji bol mane sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ wäyenakksa ̱ ni bas ia ̱ rä na ? Jera ijewa te isha : — ¡ Barrabás !

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Jera Pilato te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jera me yie Jesús kinak Säbäkäkksa ̱ ni je we ̱ na ? Jera biköle te isha : — ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi !

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jera ji wá ̱ ije te yakei rä na ? Ata ijewa kjoyina ki ̱ ta si ̱ , te isha : — ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi !

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Ñerä Pilato te isu ̱ a ra ka ije ia ̱ ditsä wätker ji ̱ a , ata e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ iwätji ̱ r daka ̱ , jera ite diklä kukawa ̱ wà ijula skua je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wänaka , te isha : — Ka yis dä nuita , jí wämo pi tkermi ukä ja ̱ mi , ata bas wakwa ne ki ̱ je nui ja ̱ rmi rä .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Jera ditsä biköle te ikúka , te isha : — ¡ Je pi tkermi nui ja ̱ noka ̱ pa sa wakwa ki ̱ ka , sa batala ki ̱ ka !

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Jekjepa ite Barrabás wäyaksa ̱ ni ijewa ia ̱ . Ata ite Jesús ju ̱ aksa ̱ buka ̱ nak ksa bata wà , kjepa wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Jekjepa ka ̱ wäkiri guardiaí wa wa ̱ Jesús minetse ̱ mi Pretorio na , jeska ijewa te guardia eyaka wa kalabe tapawa ̱ wa ̱ ipája ̱ mi shkiritkeksa ̱ .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Ijewa te ipaya ju ̱ ami , te shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ bätsëë shtä ju ̱ aka ̱ iki ̱ .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Jekäi ijewa te dika butra corona ye tkaka ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ , ijula wämo kja ̱ ne ite kata cha ̱ mi iia ̱ . Jera ijewa ñajaklawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi , te ija ̱ ñetsa , te isha : — ¡ Judío wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ma se ̱ nopa ji ̱ a maitjä !

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Jera ijewa kjali tjua ija ̱ mi , te ikata kukawa ̱ , je wà ite ikpa ta ̱ i itsa ̱ ku ̱ na .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iweika e ̱ ná ra , ijewa te je shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ ya ju ̱ amini , jera ite iwakei paiklä jiawa ̱ ni iia ̱ , kjepa iwa ̱ iminetse ̱ wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Ijewa damijulu ji ̱ a ra , ijewa te ekla Cirene wa ku ̱ a , je kie rä Simón ni , je paka ijewa te täkili wà icruz í kpäk tsa ̱ mi .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Ijewa demijulu ka ̱ kie Gólgota ni ska , ( je wà rä “ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ Chichei Ke ̱ i ” ) ,

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: ijewa te itia vino ji ̱ akaleka ̱ jile bächii ra je wà ; ata ite iya ssa ra , ka issëne iyäk .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Ijewa te iwätiaka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ra , ijewa ina su ̱ a jile wà ijewa wa ̱ ji jienak iwa ̱ bala pja ̱ klä ñaia ̱ ,

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: jeska iña jaklacha ̱ wa ̱ ikjänanak .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ikjatele yöle wätia tka itsa ̱ ka , je te ishe rä : “ Jí ne rä Jesús , Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä . ”

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Jekjepa ijewa te jakbläk wa bol wätia tulaka ̱ ña ira cruz saka ja ̱ mi , ekla ijula wämo kja ̱ ne , ekla ijula shule kja ̱ ne .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Jera yi kjäke ̱ mi iwä ja ̱ mi jewa te isheke ̱ wäsi ̱ wa , tsa ̱ ku ̱ wäbuträke ̱ ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: te isheke ̱ : — ¡ Ba , Templo mia ̱ tkäkwa ̱ , tres día ra iyuäkka ̱ ni , ba wakei je ̱ k tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ ba rä Säkeklä yaba ra , ba je ̱ k wäyö ja ̱ wo ̱ té cruz ja ̱ mi !

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Je su ̱ ta chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ija ̱ ñetseke ̱ ka ̱ wei wà ñayöle wa ra , sä wäkiri wa ra , te isheke ̱ :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: — Kju ̱ awa je tsa ̱ tkaksa ̱ ite , ata iwakei ia ̱ ka je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkerksa ̱ . ¡ Ikuna ije rä Israel wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ra , ije ̱ k wäyö ja ̱ wo ̱ té cruz ja ̱ mi jí kje ra ! Je ra sä te ije biketsemi .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Ije je ̱ r bla Säkeklä ja ̱ mi ; jera ije sherke ̱ iki ̱ ra , je ebä ku ̱ itsa ̱ tköksa ̱ jí kje ra . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ije wa ̱ iyile rä , yis dä Säkeklä yaba ni .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Je su ̱ ta je jakbläk wa wäter tkete ije ra wa te iweika ñaebä .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Jera ka ̱ wä deka ̱ las doce ra , ka ̱ wätuinawa ̱ itjä yee ka ̱ biköle ska , mine rämi las tres kje .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Jera je hora kjena , Jesús a ̱ na täkii te isha : “ Elí , Elí , ¿ lama sabactani ? ” ( Je wà rä : “ Yis Kekläí , yis Kekläí , ¿ jiye ba te yis jawa ̱ ta ̱ na rä na ? ” )

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Jeska kajali wa sha ̱ te je ssa ra , jewa te isha : — Elías ne kieke ̱ ite rä .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka ijewa sha ̱ ekla tu ̱ nami , te esponja kukawa ̱ , nu ̱ wa ̱ ite uva diä jäi wa , tkaka ̱ ite kal bata ki ̱ ka , ma ̱ ite iia ̱ iwa ̱ kuyanak .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Ata isaka te isha : — Ijöwa ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä Elías dajuena itsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Ata Jesús a ̱ nani etäbä kicha täkii , jekäi ite iwikblu cha ̱ mita ̱ na .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Ñerä Templo bala tkäkläksa ̱ suaí klasha ̱ na ju ̱ nami mo ̱ ki ̱ atjä wakwäté . Ñakäi ka ̱ wäbuka ̱ naka ̱ , jak ker bala tsikina tulami .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Jera sä nu ̱ l bläklä kjäyena tulami , ñakäi sä sikii wa dulecha ̱ wa ̱ nu ̱ l tso ̱ jeska , jewa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ shki ̱ na tulaka ̱ ni .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Jera Jesús shki ̱ naka ̱ ni ukä ska , ijewa deksa ̱ julu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska , minemi jukläyäkä dälätsalewa ̱ ska , je su ̱ ani chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Ñerä guardia wa cien wäsikäk irä , ira kajali Jesús kjänanak wa irä te ka ̱ wäbuka ̱ naka ̱ irä jile o ̱ na saka saka irä je su ̱ a ra , ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i , te isha : — ¡ Iyina si ̱ jí rä Säkeklä yaba !

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Ñakäi jeska alaklä wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te isu ̱ e kajali ka ̱ miika . Jewa biteleté rä Galilea ska Jesús da ipasu ̱ ak .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Jewa sha ̱ na itso ̱ rä María Magdala wa , María ale Jacobo irä José irä jewa a ̱ mi , ñakäi Zebedeo yabala a ̱ mi .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra , ekla blu kie José ni je rä Arimatea wa je deju ̱ , je rä je ̱ k patkeleña Jesús ja ̱ mi ,

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: je mineju ̱ Pilato wäki ̱ Jesús nu ̱ l kiäkksa ̱ , jera Pilato te inu ̱ l sha ju ̱ nakksa ̱ iia ̱ .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Jekäi José te inu ̱ l kukawa ̱ butrawa ̱ dätsi yëë wa ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: blacha ̱ ite jak ker ja ̱ tkele iwa ̱ spa ̱ na iwakei nu ̱ l bläklä ye je naka . Jera ite jak ta ̱ i bulewa ̱ té , kjepa ite je wà sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kjäshtawa ̱ ta ̱ na , jekäi imineju ̱ ni .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Jera María Magdala wa irä , María saka irä jewa dejäklä je sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Bulirishtä ra , je jile wa ̱ klä sábado yikaba díaí ukä ska , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä fariseo wa irä tapanawa ̱ Pilato wäja ̱ mi ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: te isha : — Säkekewa , sá je ̱ r ja ̱ na , je säwäyuäk katke ji ̱ a ra , je te isha rä : “ Tres día ra yis shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni ” jeska .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ba ku ̱ guardia wa patkömi je inu ̱ l blele kate ska ikjänanak ma rä tres día kje , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ka däklä kuna itsa ̱ kmi jaki , ijewa wa ̱ ishäklä ditsä ia ̱ ishkinakani dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ni . Ata jekäi ra , sä wäyormi ibata ska rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ isäkätä tsa ̱ ta .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Jera Pilato te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jí guardia wa tso ̱ bas ia ̱ ; bas cho ̱ ikjänanak maikäi bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer käi .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Jekäi ijewa minejulu te jak ki ̱ bawa ̱ wa ̱ , te guardia wa tulata ̱ na sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kjänanak .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Sábado kjaju ̱ , ñinaksa ̱ ni semana säkätä ke ̱ i wà ra , María Magdala wa irä María saka irä jewa minejulu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä su ̱ ak .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Ñerä plaa ra ka ̱ wäbuka ̱ naka ̱ ta ̱ i . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Säkekewa ángel í ekla biteju ̱ té ka ̱ jöir deju ̱ , te jak bulewa ̱ ju ̱ ami , je ki ̱ ka ije ̱ tkawa ̱ .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Ije juer ka ̱ wä ju ̱ r juer käi , ipaiklä rä suruu si ̱ nieve käi .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Je yika ikjänanak wa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ , paju ̱ na tulaka ̱ , jolonacha ̱ wa ̱ dulecha ̱ wa ̱ käi .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Jera ángel te isha je alaklä wa ia ̱ : — Ke bas suana . Ka jiye kuna ta , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas te rä Jesús ale wäteleka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi , je ne yuleke ̱ .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Ka je kuna ji ̱ a jiska ; je shki ̱ naka ̱ ni , jiräni iwa ̱ iyile käi . Bas kutewa ̱ isu ̱ ak , jí ne ska ijewa te ima ̱ ka ̱ rä .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Jekäi bas cho ̱ ni plaa ishäk iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : ‘ Ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na . Jikäi issö : Ije maju ̱ ba bas wätsa ̱ k Galileaka ; jeska bas te isu ̱ emini . ’ ¡ Issö ! Je ebä ne sheke ̱ ta ̱ na yis te bas ia ̱ rä .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Je ñanera ra sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska ijewa minejulu sualecha ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi ssële a ̱ naa si ̱ , julunami ibata shäk iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Ñerä Jesús deksa ̱ ju ̱ ijewa wäki ̱ te isha : — ¿ Jishtä bas shki ̱ na ? Jera ijewa ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi , te iklä kukawa ̱ , te ioloitsawa ̱ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ke bas suana . Ata bas cho ̱ ishäk yis el wa ia ̱ ima Galileaka , jeska ijewa te yis su ̱ emini .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Ñerä ijewa dami ji ̱ a ra , guardia wa sha ̱ minejulu jukläyäkä na ibata shäk chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ia ̱ ji o ̱ na käi biköle .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Jera ijewa ñatapawa ̱ wa ̱ sä wäkiri wa ra , ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a te inaklä ma ̱ ta ̱ i je guardia wa ia ̱ ,

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: te isha : — Bas ku ̱ shö rä : Sá kapacha ̱ wa ̱ dälei ja ̱ mi iwa ̱ dulanak wa dasta ̱ na tuina , je te inu ̱ l tsa ̱ mi jaki .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Ata je ju ̱ ñawa ̱ ka ̱ wäkiri te ra , je paruemi sá te ije ra bas wetsanakläksa ̱ ije yika .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Jera ijewa te je inaklä kukacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jekäi ite isha jiräni ite ipaka ishäk käi . Jekäi je yir dami ji ̱ a Judío wa sha ̱ na jira kje .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Ata iwa ̱ dulanak wa once minejulumi Galileaka , ka ̱ bata mai Jesús wa ̱ iyile ijewa ia ̱ rä ska .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te isu ̱ a ra , ijewa te ioloitsawa ̱ , ata sha ̱ te ibiketsa je ̱ rike botkä wa .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ k sikawa ̱ ijewa wäja ̱ mi , kta ijewa ra , te isha : — Yis ia ̱ ka ̱ wei rä me ̱ le ji biköle wa ̱ klä ka ̱ jöir ska irä ka ̱ jiska irä .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas cho ̱ sä ditsei wä kju ̱ awa wa biköle kukäk bas wa ̱ dulanak , jekäi ijewa wäukewa ̱ k Sa Ká irä , iyaba irä , Wikblu Sikina irä kie ja ̱ mi ,

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: ñakäi ijewa paktäk yis wa ̱ bas pakale ji wa ̱ k je biköle wawa ̱ klä ijewa wa ̱ . ¡ Issö ! Yis kaldu bas da buliri buliri ma rä sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ rwa ̱ kje .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Jikäi Säkeklä yaba Jesucristo ktei baa pake säkätä rä .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Jekäi je o ̱ na rä jishtä Isaías jile bata shäk wa ̱ iyöle katke rä käi : “ ¡ Issö ! Yie yis ktei bata shäk patkemi bä wätsa ̱ kba , je te ma ña ̱ le ̱ i bäiwe ̱ miba .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Ekla a ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska : ‘ Ña ̱ la bäiwo ̱ Säkekewa yika , iña ̱ le ̱ i paruöksa ̱ bulee . ”

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska Juan säwäukewa ̱ k je ̱ kaka ̱ sa paktäk , sa kiana wäoka ̱ nak sa ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ kläksa ̱ , sa ̱ nui janakläwa ̱ bitaba .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Jera Judea ke ̱ i ska wa biköle irä , Jerusalén ska wa biköle irä , date ije wäki ̱ . Jekäi ijewa nui shaka ̱ ra , ite ijewa wäukewa ̱ tulami Jordán na .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Juan paiklä rä yöle camello kä wà , ikipa mu ̱ aklä rä bewak kjuä . Ije te rä bitsiki ne katá , ñakäi bul ñá ka ̱ niki ̱ ka ne diä ya .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Je te sa pakta te isha : “ Yis itäka ekla oloi ta yis tsa ̱ ta daju ̱ ji ̱ a . Jekäi ka yis dä bäi si ̱ kuna je ̱ k buäkwa ̱ ije ia ̱ isandalia wämu ̱ aklä wäyäkksa ̱ bä jibä .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yis te bas wäukewa ̱ rä diklä wà , ata ije te bas wäukewe ̱ mi rä Wikblu Sikina wà . ”

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Jera je ke ̱ i wà Jesús biteju ̱ té Nazaret Galilea ska . Je wäukewa ̱ ju ̱ ami Juan te Jordán na .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Ñerä idaksa ̱ ju ̱ ji ̱ a diklä na ra , ka ̱ jöir kjä buka ̱ naju ̱ ma su ̱ a ite , ñakäi ite Säkeklä wikblu su ̱ a idawa ̱ ju ̱ té namala käi iwäki ̱ .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ñerä kte ssënaté ka ̱ jöir je te ishe : “ Ba ne rä yis yaba shka ̱ ta rä , ba ra yis ssëna baa . ”

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka Säkeklä wikblu te iwäsikami ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Jekäi ise ̱ na ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo na cuarenta día bala na , je je ̱ r kiwa ̱ su ̱ a Satanás te . Jeska ije se ̱ na bewak sälwii ra , jera ángel wa te ichewa ̱ .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Juan wätenawa ̱ itä ska , Jesús deju ̱ ni Galilea ska . Je te sa pakta Säkeklä ktei baa wà ,

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: te isha : “ Ike ̱ i dewa ̱ e ̱ ná . Yëwa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno kjärawa ̱ irä . Bas ñamanewo ̱ ksa ̱ , kte baa kukö . ”

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Idamiju ̱ Galilea tipei kjä ja ̱ mi ra , ite Simón irä iel Andrés irä su ̱ a , ikla ju ̱ a kate tipä na , ijewa rä nima kukäk wa ki ̱ ka .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas kute yis da minak . Yis te bas dulawe ̱ mi däkwa ̱ ditsä kukäk nima säkei ye .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Jera plaa ijewa te ikla jawa ̱ ta ̱ na minejulumi ira .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Jeska ije mine ji ̱ a elkje a ̱ mikwäta ra , ite Zebedeo yaba Jacobo irä iel Juan irä su ̱ a , jewa kla wä mu ̱ a tso ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Jera plaa ite jewa kia ; jera ijewa te iká Zebedeo jawa ̱ ta ̱ na ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka itsa ̱ tkäk wa ra , jekäi iminejulumi ira .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Idemijulu Capernaúmka . Jera plaa ebä ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ sábado wà ñapaktäklä jui na sa paktäk .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Jera ijewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ite sa pakteke ̱ te . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ite ijewa pakteke ̱ rä ssër ta oloi ta irä käi , ka je rä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa käi kuna .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Jera ijewa ñapaktäklä jui na ekla kololewa ̱ wikblu ñá shtä wa ̱ katke , je a ̱ na täkii ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: te isha : — Jesús Nazaret wa , ¿ jiye ba bite sá wäki ̱ rä na ? ¿ Ba de rä sá weikäkcha ̱ wa ̱ na ? Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yi ba rä ; ba ne rä ale patkele Säkeklä wa ̱ wämo si ̱ rä .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Jera Jesús te iuña , te isha : — ¡ Ma si ̱ wa ̱ tiö , ma je ̱ k tso ̱ ksa ̱ ije ska !

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Jekäi je wikblu ñá shtä te je jäiyi paju ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na . Jera ia ̱ na ta ̱ i , jekäi ite ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Je te biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , jera ijewa ñachaka iki ̱ , te isha : — ¿ Je rä ji jekäi na ? ¿ Je rä mane shtä ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe spa ̱ na na ? Ije rä ka ̱ wei ta je wà ite wikblu ñá shtä wa patkeke ̱ ksa ̱ , jera jewa te iktä ssëke ̱ .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Jera Jesús palei ju ̱ ñenamika ̱ plaa Galilea ke ̱ i pája ̱ mi biköle .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Jera ideksa ̱ julu ñapaktäklä jui ska ra , ñawäsaka iminejulu Jacobo irä Juan irä ra , Simón irä Andrés irä juka .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Ñerä Simón yak duä kalme wäkalewa ̱ oloowa ̱ , je paka ñane ra ijewa te Jesús ia ̱ .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ k sikawa ̱ te ikukawa ̱ ijulaka , kaka ̱ ite . Jera iwäkarke ̱ oloo tse ̱ naju ̱ mi , kjepa ite ijewa pasu ̱ a jile wà .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ , ka ̱ wä minewa ̱ ju ̱ kja ra , ije wäki ̱ duë ta wa irä kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ wa irä biköle de ja .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Jera je jukläyäkä wa biköle tapanawa ̱ ju kjä ska .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Jera ite duë ta wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ bäiwa ̱ ni , sä kteke ̱ duë te kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa käi , ñakäi ite be kjäiaksa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ . Jekäi ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne be ia ̱ iktäkläka ̱ , jewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yi irä ki ̱ ka .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Jera aleji ̱ a ka ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a yee ra , Jesús je ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ mi ka yi kuna shtä ska , jeka ka ̱ kiäk .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Jera Simón irä isaka wa irä minejulu iyuläk .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Jekäi jewa te iku ̱ a ra , ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Bena te ba yule kate .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Sä shkä ka ̱ kju ̱ awaka jukläyäkä saka tso ̱ tsi ̱ dala ska , ñaebä yis wa ̱ sa paktäklä jeska , je ne ye yis de rä ki ̱ ka .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Jekäi ite sa pakte rami Galilea ke ̱ i kalabe sha ̱ na ijewa ñapaktäklä jui etkä etkä na , ñakäi ite be kjäie tuleke ̱ ksa ̱ .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Ekla paiale lepra wa ̱ deju ̱ iwäki ̱ ka ̱ kiäk iia ̱ , je je ̱ tkawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ , te isha : — Ba ki ̱ ishena ra , ba ia ̱ yis bäirmini yëë .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ r ja ̱ mi idälänawa ̱ ; jekäi ijula tkawa ̱ ija ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Yis ki ̱ ishena ; bä bäinoni yëë .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka lepra tse ̱ naju ̱ nami ija ̱ mi , jekäi ibäinani yëë .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Kjepa ite ije ̱ r ku ̱ a tsa ̱ na ra , ite ipatkamine plaa

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Issö ! Ka bä te je she kuna yi ia ̱ jini a ̱ ni , ata ma cho ̱ chui ia ̱ je ̱ k kjashäk . Jeska bä siki tenaklä je mo ̱ Säkeklä wäna , jiräni Moisés wa ̱ sa pakale iwa ̱ k käi , ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Ata ije mineju ̱ te ji o ̱ na ktei sha , je pakani ite ta ̱ i . Je kju ̱ ei Jesús ka däkleiwa ̱ ji ̱ a jukläyäkä na juenakwa ̱ käi , ata ise ̱ na je ektaka ka yi kuna shtä ska . Ata ka ̱ biköle ska wa däke ̱ ije wäki ̱ .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Je ̱ na je ̱ napa ra idemini etäbä kicha Capernaúm ka . Jera ipalei ju ̱ ñena ikatke ju ska .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapana wa ̱ , maikäi a ̱ ni ka sä kjäwa ̱ ji ̱ a ju kjä skabä jibä , jewa pakta ite Säkeklä ktä wà .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Ñerä ditsä dejulu iwäki ̱ ekla karalewa ̱ wäkse , je detse ̱ rä cuatro wa ̱ .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Ata ka sä däwa ̱ ji ̱ a iwäja ̱ mi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapanawa ̱ kju ̱ ei , je ki ̱ ka ijewa te ju tsi ̱ bata ja ̱ r kpaja ̱ wa ̱ Jesús kaldu wämo . Ijewa te ija ̱ r tkaja ̱ wa ̱ , kjepa je karalewa ̱ ja ̱ wa ̱ mi ijewa te ije ̱ katashuäklä naka .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Ijewa te ji biketsa etkabä su ̱ a Jesús te ra , ite isha je karalewa ̱ ia ̱ : — Yaba , ma nui rä jalewa ̱ bitaba .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Jera ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa sha ̱ kajali ñajäklelewa ̱ jeska , jewa te ibiketsa je ̱ r na :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: “ ¿ Jiye je kta jekäi rä na ? Je wà ikta rä yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi . ¿ Yi ia ̱ sa ̱ nui jarmiwa ̱ bitaba na ? Ata Säkeklä ebä ne ia ̱ sa ̱ nui jarwa ̱ bitaba rä . ”

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Jera ñawäsaka Jesús je ̱ r na ide jekäi ijewa te ibiketse tso ̱ je ̱ r na rä , je ki ̱ ka ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas te ibiketse bas je ̱ r na jekäi rä na ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: ¿ Mane yila tjabana jí karalewa ̱ ia ̱ rä na : ‘ Ma nui rä jalewa ̱ bitaba ’ ni iräle , ta ‘ ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma je ̱ katashuäklä kuköwa ̱ , bä shkömi ’ ni iräle ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Ata bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä ditsä yäbei ia ̱ ka ̱ wei tso ̱ sa ̱ nui jäkläwa ̱ bitaba ka ̱ jiska — jera ite isha je karalewa ̱ ia ̱ — :

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: — Yie ishe ba ia ̱ , ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma je ̱ katashuäklä kuköwa ̱ , ma cho ̱ ni bä juka .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Jera ije ̱ kaka ̱ te plaa ije ̱ katashuäklä kukawa ̱ , kjaksa ̱ ju ̱ biköle wäna . Je te biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera jewa te Säkeklä kjeisha te isha : — Ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni su ̱ le jekäi .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Jesús mineju ̱ ni etäbä kicha tipä kjä ja ̱ mi . Jera ditsä biköle demijulu iwäki ̱ . Jewa pakta ite .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Jekäi idamiju ̱ ra , ite Leví Alfeo yaba su ̱ a je ̱ tkelewa ̱ inaklä bäkäklä ska , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Sä shkä yis da . Jera je je ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ ira .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Je ukä ska Jesús je ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk ije ju ska . Jera inaklä bäkäk wa irä , ji yakei wakbläk wa irä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ñatulawa ̱ yäkäk Jesús irä , iwa ̱ dulanak wa irä ra , je rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa dami ira ki ̱ ka .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Mika ̱ ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , fariseo wa irä te iyäkä kalme ji yakei wakbläk wa ra , inaklä bäkäk wa ra su ̱ a ra , ijewa te iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ ichaka : — ¿ Jiye ije yäkäke ̱ inaklä bäkäk wa ra , ji yakei wakbläk wa ra rä na ?

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Je ssa Jesús te ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Sa ̱ tso ̱ bäi wa ki ̱ ka sä bäiwa ̱ k sher kuna , ata sä duäke ̱ wa ne ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä . Ka yis dene rä sä wämo wa kiäk kuna , ata yis de rä ji yakei wakbläk wa ne kiäk .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Juan wa ̱ dulanak wa irä fariseo wa irä bätsäte , ñerä jewa minejulu Jesús wäki ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye Juan wa ̱ dulanak wa irä fariseo wa wa ̱ dulanak wa irä , bätsäke ̱ , ata ba wa ̱ dulanak wa ka bätsä kuna rä na ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — ¿ Bas ia ̱ ra julakolone diei ye ska tso ̱ wa bätsämi jula kolonak kaldu ji ̱ a ijewa ra bala na ra na ? Ñera je jula kolonak kaldu ji ̱ a ijewa ra , jera ka ijewa bätsäklei .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Ata ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a je jula kolonak minaklätse ̱ ijewa yika , je ke ̱ i wà kjepa ijewa bätsämi rä .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ paiklä nu ̱ l da ka wäbatsa ̱ nak sua kukä spa ̱ na wà , ata ikuna jekäi ra , je sua kukä spa ̱ na te inu ̱ l sikemi ti ̱ nii , je te iki ̱ kshe ju ̱ emi e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Ñaebä yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ vino blonaji ̱ a ka tenak bewak kjuä yöle bolsa ye nu ̱ l da shtä naka . Ata ikuna jekäi ra , je vino blonaji ̱ a te bewak kjuä tsikiwe ̱ ju ̱ emi , jera vino irä ijui irä weikarmiwa ̱ . Bäi si ̱ ra vino blonaji ̱ a tie rä bewak kjuä spa ̱ na ja ̱ rka .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Etaba kicha sábado wà , Jesús damiju ̱ trigo tkele sha ̱ na , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa dami te je wä butse rami .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Isu ̱ o . ¿ Jiye ijewa te ji rä ka o ̱ nak kuna sábado wà , je weke ̱ rä na ?

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Jera ale David wa ̱ ji o ̱ le , mika ̱ idamiju ̱ ka jita , ije irä shkäk ira wa irä , ktacha ̱ wa ̱ bäli te ra , ¿ ka bas wa ̱ je ktei wayile na ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ Säkeklä ju na , Abiatar dä chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ra . Je te pan tso ̱ me ̱ leka ̱ ñawa ̱ , je ma ̱ ite ira shkäk wa ia ̱ . Ata ka ka ̱ kuna je ñaklä , ata je ñe rä chui wa ebä te .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Sábado yönaksa ̱ rä ditsä ia ̱ , ata ka ditsä yöneksa ̱ rä sábado ia ̱ kuna .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ditsä yäbei , je rä sábado wäkirií .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Etäbä kicha Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ni ñapaktäklä jui na , jeska jäiyi ekla jula ssi ̱ lewa ̱ katke .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Jera moska te isu ̱ e tso ̱ wäsi ̱ wa iwa ̱ je bäiwa ̱ ta sábado wà í ̱ ki ̱ ka , iwa ̱ ikjatiäkläwa ̱ pa .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Jera ite isha je ekla jula ssi ̱ lewa ̱ ia ̱ : — Ma je ̱ k duöka ̱ klä ki ̱ , biköle sha ̱ na .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Sábado wà ka ̱ tso ̱ ji bäi wa ̱ klä , ata ji yakei wa ̱ klä ? ¿ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkläksa ̱ , ta sä ktäkläwa ̱ ? Ata ijewa si ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Ñerä ikju ̱ atkawa ̱ te ipája ̱ mi tso ̱ wa su ̱ aksa ̱ , ñakäi ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ ijewa je ̱ r dä därërë ki ̱ ka . Jera ite isha je ekla ia ̱ : — Bä jula paruöksa ̱ . Jera ite iparuaksa ̱ , jekäi ijula bäinani .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Jera fariseo wa mineksa ̱ julu ebä ra , iñaje ̱ rku ̱ a Herodes ja ̱ mi wa ra maikäi ra ite Jesús weikemiwa ̱ rä wà .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Jekjepa Jesús je ̱ k tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami tipä kjäka iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra . Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ dar Galilea ska minemi ira . Ñakäi Judea ska wa ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Jerusalén ska wa , Idumea ska wa , Jordán a ̱ mikata wa , ñakäi Tiro irä Sidón irä pája ̱ mi wa , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ date iwäki ̱ , ji e ̱ e ̱ na we ̱ ke ̱ ite ssa ijewa te ki ̱ ka .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Ñerä ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , jewa wa ̱ ko ̱ no yulächa ̱ klä kja ije ia ̱ , iöle je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa terwa ̱ ija ̱ mi yika .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Jeska ite sä bäiwa ̱ ni chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ki ̱ ka duë ta wa biköle ñapatkäke ̱ täkili wà iwa ̱ ipassäkläwa ̱ pa .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Ñakäi wikblu ñá shtä wa te Jesús su ̱ eke ̱ ra , iñajäkläke ̱ wa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi , ia ̱ rke ̱ jela täkii te isheke ̱ : — Ba ne rä Säkeklä yaba rä .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Ata Jesús te iu ̱ ñeke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na ka iwa ̱ yi ije rä shäkläka ̱ .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús mineka ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ bata ki ̱ , jeska ra ite mane sherke ̱ iwakei ki ̱ jewa kia jaté , jera jewa dejulu iwäki ̱ .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Jewa kuka ite doce , se ̱ nak käjäklä ije ra , ñakäi iwa ̱ patkenak sa paktäk , ñakäi täkili ma ̱ klä ijewa ia ̱ be kjäiä tuläkläksa ̱ . Jewa kia ite iktei bata shäk wa ni .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Jewa kuka ite doce kie rä : Simón , je kiani ite Pedro ni ;

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: ñakäi Zebedeo yaba Jacobo irä , iel Juan irä , jewa kia ite Boanerges ni ( je kte wà rä “ Tala käi wa ” ) ;

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Andrés irä , Felipe irä , Bartolomé irä , Mateo irä , Tomás irä , Jacobo Alfeo yaba irä , Tadeo irä , Simón ale bakle kju ̱ atkäk gobierno ra irä ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Judas Iscariote wa , ale Jesús ju ̱ akksa ̱ irä . Jekäi ijewa dejuluni ju ska .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapanani jeska , jekäi ka ijewa deneksa ̱ yäkäkbä jibä .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Je ssa isaka wa te ra , ijewa bitejulu itsa ̱ kmi , je rä ijewa te isha iwäiarke ̱ irä ni ki ̱ ka .
