text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Jera ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa dar Jerusalén , jewa te isha : “ Ije rä kololewa ̱ Beelzebú wa ̱ , ñakäi be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ne oloi ja ̱ mi ite be kjäieke ̱ ksa ̱ rä . ”

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Ñerä ite ijewa kia jaté iwäja ̱ mi , jewa ia ̱ ite ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi : “ ¿ Maikäi Satanás wakei je ̱ k kjäiä na ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Ikuna gobierno eyaka ñabalabutsa kju ̱ atkäk ñawakwabä ra , jera jewa rä ka täki ta ji ̱ a ji wa ̱ k .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Ikuna el jui ta wa ñabalabutsa kju ̱ atkäk ñawakwabä ra , jera jewa rä ka täki ta ji ̱ a ji wa ̱ k .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Ikuna Satanás je ̱ kaka ̱ kju ̱ atkäk je ̱ k ra , je ̱ k bala butsäk ra , jera je rä ka täki ta ji ̱ a ji wa ̱ k , ata jera ike ̱ i dewa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: “ Yi a ̱ ni ka kjäkwa ̱ ditsä täkii ju naka idäli jakibläk , iwakei ka mo ̱ newa ̱ iwa ̱ säkätä ra . Jekäi ebä ne ra ite iju wajemiksa ̱ rä .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: “ Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ji nui biköle , kteka ̱ yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi jini irä käi biköle , je ki ̱ sä rä janakwa ̱ bitaba .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Ata yi kta yakei Wikblu Sikina ukä ja ̱ mi ra , mik a ̱ ni ka je rä janakwa ̱ kuna bitaba , ata je ki ̱ nui ja ̱ rmika ̱ jekjeye . ”

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Je sha ite rä , ijewa te isha ije ja ̱ mi wikblu ñá shtä tso ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Jera Jesús a ̱ mi irä , iel wa irä dejulu ñawäkukacha ̱ wa ̱ je tapalewa ̱ ektaka te ekla patkami ikiäk .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tso ̱ ñajäklelewa ̱ Jesús pája ̱ mi , jewa te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Issö ! Ma a ̱ mi irä bä el wa irä , bä kuta wa irä de kajali jí sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ektaka , jewa te ba yuleke ̱ .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — ¿ Mane rä yis a ̱ mi , yis el wa rä na ?

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Jera ite ñajäklelewa ̱ tso ̱ ipája ̱ mi shkiritkeksa ̱ wa su ̱ a , jekäi ite isha : — ¡ Isu ̱ o ! Jí wa ne rä yis a ̱ mi , yis el wa rä .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ o ̱ nak je wawá ̱ ra , je ne rä yis el dä , yis kuta rä , yis a ̱ mi rä .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Etäbä kicha Jesús te sa paktamini tipä kjä ja ̱ mi . Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ tapanawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi e ̱ e ̱ na , je ki ̱ ka ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no kate tipä ki ̱ ja ̱ rka , jeska ije ̱ tkawa ̱ . Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa biköle tapanawa ̱ tipä kjä ja ̱ mi .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Jeska ite ijewa pakta saka saka , jile she ja ̱ mi . Sa pakte kate ite ra ite isha ijewa ia ̱ :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: — ¡ Jikäi issö ! Däli tkäk ekla mineju ̱ ituläk .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Jekäi ite itule rami ra , iwä sha ̱ jolona ña ̱ la ki ̱ , jeska du dejulu te ikatacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Sha ̱ jolona jak yäkä na , ishäkä ka ta bäi shtä ska , tsikinaka ̱ mane mane , je rä ka irä ishäkäí ta bäi ki ̱ ka .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Ata ka ̱ wä deka ̱ ju ̱ ra , je te idäläwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , jera issi ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , ka irä ñak kicha ta bäi ki ̱ ka .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Sha ̱ jolona dika yäkä na , jera je dika yäkä kibina te iki ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ , ka wäne .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Sha ̱ jolona ishäkä bäi ki ̱ ka , je tsikina , kibina , je wäna treinta käi , sesenta käi , cien käi . ”

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Jera ite isha : — Yi rä kukä ta wassënak ra , ¡ je ku ̱ issö !

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Mika ̱ Jesús kaldu iwakei ebä ra , isäkätä ja ̱ mi kajali wa te ale doce wa ra ñara je ji paka ite jile she ja ̱ mi je wachaka iia ̱ .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Bas ia ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ji blelewa ̱ me ̱ na ju ̱ ñenak , ata kju ̱ awa ia ̱ , ji biköle yirke ̱ rä jile she ja ̱ mi ebä .

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: Je rä ijewa wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä su ̱ le , ata ka iwäna ijuenaklä , ñakäi ijewa wa ̱ issäklä ssële , ata ka ije ̱ r na idäkläwa ̱ . Je rä ka ijewa ñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ ijewa nui janakläwa ̱ bitaba . ”

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Jekjepa ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Je ji paka yie jile she ja ̱ mi , je ia ̱ ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ ne na ? Jera ¿ maikäi bas je ̱ r ko ̱ rmi ji pake jile she ja ̱ mi biköle ia ̱ na ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Je däli wä tkäk te rä Säkeklä ktä ne tula .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Je kte tuluna ska , ale ijolona ña ̱ la ki ̱ , jewa ne rä manele te kte ssá ra , plaa Satanás däke ̱ ju ̱ te je kte tkelema ̱ ije ̱ r ska tse ̱ ju ̱ eke ̱ mi .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Je ijolona jak yäkä na , jewa ne rä manele te kte ssa ra , ite ikuke plaa je ̱ r ssële a ̱ naa rä .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Ata iwakwa rä ka ñak kicha ta bäi , ki ̱ ka ka ise ̱ nak shka ̱ ja ̱ ; jera mika ̱ weikane iräle , sälwi su ̱ ne iräle dewa ̱ kte kju ̱ ei ra , plaa ijewa te ijeke ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Je isha ̱ jolona dika yäkä na , jewa ne rä kte ssäk wa rä .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Ata jí ke ̱ i ska ji te sa ̱ je ̱ r iawe ̱ käi , sa ̱ je ̱ k wäyuä blune wà käi , jile saka tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi käi , je kjäke ̱ wa ̱ te je kte ki ̱ tieke ̱ wa ̱ , je te iawe ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ ka wä ta .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Ata ijolona ishäkä bäi ki ̱ , jewa ne rä manele kte ssäk wa , je kukäk wa rä ; jewa wärke ̱ treinta käi , sesenta käi , cien käi . ”

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Baishe sä te tsi ̱ ni tse ̱ mité dunakcha ̱ cajón niki ̱ ka iräle , ja ̱ ka ̱ niki ̱ ka iräle na ? ¿ Ka je dueka ̱ rä iduäkläka ̱ ki ̱ ka na ?

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Iwa rä ka ji a ̱ ni kuna blelewa ̱ käi , ata je rä kjayinakwa ̱ ebä ; ñakäi ka ji a ̱ ni kuna jaki käi , ata je rä tse ̱ nakksa ̱ atjä ebä .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Yile rä kukäta wassënak ra , ¡ issö !

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ji ssa bas te wabiketsö tsa ̱ na . Ji wà bas te ji mabla sa saka ia ̱ , je ja ̱ mi ji mablermi bas ia ̱ , ji ki ̱ dämiksa ̱ bas ia ̱ .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Iwa rä yi wa ̱ ji tso ̱ , je ia ̱ iki ̱ me ̱ rmi . Ata yi wa ̱ ka ji kuna , je yika ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ kjelabä jibä bakanamiksa ̱ . ”

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Ñakäi ite isha : — Säkeklä gobiernoí rä jishtä ekla te däli wä tule ka ̱ ki ̱ ka käi .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Tuina ra ije käpäke ̱ wa ̱ , ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra ije ̱ käke ̱ ka ̱ ni , jera je däli wä tsikirte kibirte , maikäi iräle ka ke ̱ i ta ije wa ̱ ,

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: ata ishäkä te je tsikiwe ̱ ke ̱ rä je ̱ r wà ; säkätäba itäbä , itäki ̱ iwärukjei , itä ska iwä täle .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Ata mika ̱ iwä älina ra , plaa itabeli tkärawa ̱ ija ̱ mi , iwä tiäklä ke ̱ i dewa ̱ ki ̱ . ”

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Ñakäi ite isha : — ¿ Ji käi ja ̱ mi sä te Säkeklä gobiernoí pakemi na ? ¿ Mane shtä jile she ja ̱ mi sä te ipake na ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Je rä jishtä mostaza wä käi . Je tkenawa ̱ ishäkä na ra , je rä tsi ̱ ne si ̱ jile wä tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska biköle katäbäka .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Jeiräta itkenawa ̱ ra , ikibir mar ta ̱ i isaka tkele biköle tsa ̱ ta , ijula je ̱ rke ̱ ta ̱ i du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka ju yör dawa ̱ ijula na kje . ”

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa ia ̱ kte paka jile she ja ̱ mi saka saka jí ite ishe dar käi , bikö ijewa ia ̱ issërke ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Ka iwa ̱ ji pakane ijewa ia ̱ ka yile kuna jile she ja ̱ mi käi , ata iwakwa ebä ra , ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ je biköle wà .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Sä shkäksa ̱ tipä a ̱ mikata .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Jekjepa ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa patkami ra , ijewa te je ikatke ko ̱ no na käi itsa ̱ mi . Ñakäi ko ̱ no saka shkäteña ira .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Ñerä si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ naté ta ̱ i , je täkili te tipä tjuewa ̱ ka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka . Je te ko ̱ no pshiwe ̱ rawa ̱ .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Jera Jesús kapawa ̱ ko ̱ no ñak na , tsa ̱ ku ̱ katabläklä shtä ki ̱ ka . Jera ijewa te ishki ̱ wa ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , ¿ ba ia ̱ ra sa tuar dawa ̱ je wa ̱ ka ji kuna na ?

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Jera ishki ̱ naka ̱ te si ̱ wa ̱ uña , ñakäi ite isha tipä ia ̱ : — Ma si ̱ wa ̱ tiöwa ̱ bitaba . Jera si ̱ wa ̱ wätkenawa ̱ , ji biköle wäkolonawa ̱ bii .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas suanacha ̱ wa ̱ rä , maikäi ka bas ia ̱ ji biketsarba etkabä rä na ?

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Jera ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ te ichaka ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Jera yi si ̱ ije rä , je ktä ssë si ̱ wa ̱ te tipä te rä na ?

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Jekäi ikjaksa ̱ julu a ̱ mikata Gadara wa ke ̱ i ki ̱ .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Jera Jesús deksa ̱ ju ̱ ko ̱ no na ebä ra , ekla kololewa ̱ wikblu ñá shtä wa ̱ daksa ̱ ju ̱ sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska deju ̱ té iwäki ̱ .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Je se ̱ r dä sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska . Yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka imo ̱ r , cadena wà ji wà a ̱ ni .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Ije rä mo ̱ nak ta ̱ i ikläka tabeli yaka wà , ñakäi cadena wà , ata ite cadena butse tkeke ̱ wa ̱ , tabeli yaka ku ̱ eche ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ . Ka yi a ̱ ni täki ta iwätkewa ̱ k .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Del ka ̱ piana tuina , ia ̱ rke ̱ ije ̱ k shka ̱ wa ̱ ke ̱ jak wà , sä itäbiäklä ska irä , ka ̱ tsä na irä .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Mika ̱ je te Jesús su ̱ a ka ̱ miika ra , itu ̱ na pjoo je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: Jekäi ije a ̱ na täkii te isha : — Jesús , Säkeklä Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta yaba , ¿ jiye ba bite yis wäki ̱ rä na ? Yie ma ia ̱ ka ̱ kie pjoowa ̱ si ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ ka , ¡ ke yis paka ji shka ̱ l ssäk !

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Je rä Jesús te isha kja iia ̱ : “ ¡ Wikblu ñá shtä , ma je ̱ k tso ̱ ksa ̱ ije ska ni ! ” ki ̱ ka .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiräni ba kie rä ? Jera ite ikúka : — Yis kie rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ni , sá rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Jera ika ̱ kia ta ̱ i Jesús ia ̱ , ka iwa ̱ ijewa patkäklämi kju ̱ awaka je ke ̱ i yika .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Jeska alemana ka ̱ tsä na köchi ka ̱ biä tso ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Jera jewa ka ̱ kia iia ̱ te isha : — Sá patkömi köchi ska , sá kjäkläwa ̱ julu jewa ja ̱ rka .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Jera Jesús te ka ̱ ma ̱ ijewa ia ̱ . Jekäi je wikblu ñá shtä wa kjaksa ̱ julu , ñapatkacha ̱ wa ̱ köchi ja ̱ rka . Je köchi wa rä dos mil käi . Jewa ñatka jolowa ̱ mi ka ̱ ukä ki ̱ tipä na , shtacha ̱ wa ̱ diklä te .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Jera je kjänanak wa julunami te je ktei sha jukläyäkä na irä ipája ̱ mi na irä . Jekäi ijewa biterté ji o ̱ na rä su ̱ ak .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Jewa dejulu Jesús kaldu ska ra , ijewa te je wäialeksa ̱ be chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ a je ̱ tkelewa ̱ , pajielewa ̱ ni , je ̱ r tani bäi ; je te ijewa suawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Jera je su ̱ ak wa te ijewa ia ̱ ipaka ji o ̱ na ale wäialeksa ̱ be wa ̱ ia ̱ irä , ji o ̱ na köchi ukä ja ̱ mi irä käi .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Jera ijewa ñajaka ̱ Jesús ia ̱ ishäk pjoo iminakläju ̱ pani ijewa ke ̱ i yika .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Jekäi ije mawa ̱ ju ̱ kja ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka ra , ale säkätä ra wäialeksa ̱ be wa ̱ te ka ̱ kia pjoo iia ̱ iminakläña ira .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Jera ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne iia ̱ , ata ite isha iia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ ni bä juka ba saka wa wäki ̱ , jewa ia ̱ ba te ipake ji e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ wá ̱ Säkekewa te ma ia ̱ käi , ñakäi maikäi ije ̱ r bäi sha ma ia ̱ käi .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Jera imineju ̱ te Decápolis ska ji e ̱ e ̱ na wá ̱ Jesús te iia ̱ je pakami ; je te biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Jesús deksa ̱ ju ̱ ni ko ̱ no ki ̱ tipä jíkata ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ te ipamanewa ̱ cha ̱ . Jera ije kaldu tipä kjä ja ̱ mi .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Jera ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ekla deju ̱ té , je kie rä Jairo ni . Je te Jesús su ̱ a ra , ije ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: ka ̱ kia iia ̱ pjoo te isha : — Yëwa ̱ yis yaba alaklä duärawa ̱ . Bä kute jula ma ̱ kka ̱ iki ̱ ka , itsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ , ise ̱ naklä ji ̱ a .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Jera ije mineju ̱ ira , ñakäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ minemi ira , jewa ter dami ija ̱ mi .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Ñerä alaklä ekla duäke ̱ pi ju ̱ ne e ̱ e ̱ na te , bitewa ̱ doce año kje .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Ije je ̱ k weika ta ̱ i sä bäiwa ̱ k wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wà , je wà ite ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ biköle e ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ , ka wao ̱ nepa a ̱ ni , ata je te iwätji ̱ wa ̱ mi ki ̱ ta ebä .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Ñerä je te Jesús palei ssa ra , ideju ̱ je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa sha ̱ na ishäbe kja ̱ ne te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ passawa ̱ .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Je rä ite ibiketsa : “ Yis te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ ebä passawa ̱ ra , yis bäirmini ” ki ̱ ka .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Je ebä ra ipi ju ̱ rke ̱ wäkolonawa ̱ , jera iia ̱ issëna iyaka ska iweikarke ̱ biköle bäinani .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Je wäsaka Jesús wakei ia ̱ issëna iyaka ska täkili kjaksa ̱ ju ̱ . Jera ije ̱ k manewa ̱ té je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa su ̱ ak te isha : — ¿ Yi te yis wa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ passa rä na ?

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te ikúka : — Ba te isu ̱ a chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ne tenacha ̱ wa ̱ ma ja ̱ mi rä , ¿ je chaké ba te : ‘ Yi te yis passa rä í ̱ ’ ni rä na ?

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Jekäi ije te isäkätä ja ̱ mi tso ̱ wa su ̱ a , yi te iwa ̱ räí ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Jera je alaklä su ̱ anawa ̱ paju ̱ naka ̱ , ije wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji o ̱ na ije ia ̱ rä ki ̱ ka , je deju ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi te ji biköle shaka ̱ iia ̱ bulee .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Yaba , ba te ji biketsa etkabä wà ma tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ . Ma cho ̱ ni a ̱ naa . Bä bäinoni bä weikarke ̱ yika .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Ñerä ije ktä kaldu ji ̱ a ra , ale ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ju ska tso ̱ wa dejulu te isha : — Ba yaba duawa ̱ . ¿ Jiye bä te sa paktäk weikeke ̱ ji ̱ a rä na ?

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Ata je ijewa te isheke ̱ ssa Jesús te ra , ite isha ñe ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ : — Ke bä male ̱ te ̱ nak . Ba ku ̱ ji biketsö etka ebä .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Jera ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ iminakläña ira , ata Pedro irä Jacobo irä iel Juan irä , jewa ebä ia ̱ ite ka ̱ ma ̱ .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Jekäi idemijulu je ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ju ska ra , ite isu ̱ a ditsä kjoyirte ta ̱ i , iji ̱ ate ta ̱ i , ia ̱ rte ta ̱ i jela .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Jera ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas kjoyirke ̱ , bas ji ̱ ake ̱ rä na ? Ka je yaba rä dulewa ̱ kuna , ata ikapawa ̱ irä .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Jera ijewa te ija ̱ ñetsa . Ata ije te biköle patka juluwa ̱ ksa ̱ ju shäbeka , kjepa ite je yaba ká irä , ia ̱ mi irä , ira shkä wa irä kia jámi , kjawa ̱ julu je yaba kalme ska .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Je te yaba kukawa ̱ ijulaka te isha iia ̱ : — Talita , cumi . ( Je wà rä : “ Yaba , yie ishe ba ia ̱ , ma je ̱ köka ̱ . ” )

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka je yaba je ̱ kaka ̱ shkamini . Jera je rä doce año . Je te ijewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ isha tsa ̱ na , je ka kiar ju ̱ ñenakwa ̱ yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Jeska Jesús mineju ̱ demini ike ̱ i ki ̱ , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa damiña ira .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Mika ̱ sábado dewa ̱ ra , ije te sa paktami ñapaktäklä jui ska . Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ije ktä ssa ra , jewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ je te , ki ̱ ka ijewa te isha : — ¿ Mai je te jekäi ji tsa ̱ rä na ? ¿ Je rä mane shtä je ̱ rike me ̱ na iia ̱ rä na ? ¿ Je rä ji täkili ta o ̱ na ijula wa rä na ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: ¿ Ka je ne rä ale ju yuäk rä , María yaba rä na ? ¿ Ka je ne rä Jacobo irä , José irä , Judas irä , Simón irä , jewa el dä kuna na ? ¿ Ka ikuta wa tso ̱ rä jí sajewa sha ̱ na kuna na ? Je te ijewa ktewa ̱ tulaka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Ata Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ka jile bata shäk mane a ̱ ni kuna ka dälätsalewa ̱ kuna käi , ata iwakei ke ̱ i ska , iwakei saka wa ska , iwakei ju ska ka irä dälätsalewa ̱ kuna .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Je ki ̱ jeska ka iwa ̱ ji we ̱ täkili ta wa ̱ klei a ̱ ni , ata dueta wa elkje ebä bäiwa ̱ ni ite jula me ̱ leka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Jekäi ije je ̱ r ianawa ̱ , ijewa rä ka ji biketsäk kuna etkabä ki ̱ ka . Jera imineju ̱ sa paktäk je pája ̱ mi jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala shtä ska .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Je ukä ska ite je doce wa kiaté , kjepa ije ̱ kaka ̱ te jewa patka bol bol . Jewa ia ̱ ite ka ̱ wei ma ijewa wa ̱ wikblu ñá shtä kjäiäkläksa ̱ .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Ka iwa ̱ ijewa pakane ji a ̱ ni tsa ̱ kmi kuna kianak ña ̱ la ki ̱ käi , däli tsa ̱ klä iräle , ñanak iräle , inaklä tsa ̱ k ikipa ja ̱ mi iräle , ata kata ebä ;

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: sandalia ebä jiä jämi , ka paiklä tsa ̱ k kuna botkä .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Mai bas kjawa ̱ ju etka na ra , jeska ebä bas se ̱ r bikö je ke ̱ i ska bas marmini kje .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Maile ke ̱ i ta ska wa te ka bas kiewa ̱ ra , ñakäi ka bas ktä ssë ra , jera jeska bas maksa ̱ julu ra , bas klä ktä pjoi pakpöta ̱ na , bas wa ̱ jishtä ijewa rä kjashäklä ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Jekäi ijewa minejulumi te sa pakta , sa kiana je ̱ k manewa ̱ kksa ̱ ktei wà .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Ñakäi be chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ kjäiaksa ̱ ijewa te . Aceite tkaka ̱ ite duë ta wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ki ̱ ka , jekäi jewa bäiwa ̱ ni ite .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Herodes te Jesús palei ssa , ije kie ju ̱ ñenawa ̱ biköle wa ̱ bäi si ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jekäi moska te isheke ̱ : — Juan säwäukewa ̱ k ne shki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na rä . Je ne ki ̱ ka ije wa ̱ täkili tso ̱ jile wa ̱ klä kju ̱ awa rä .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Isaka te isheke ̱ : — Elías ne irä . Ata isaka te isheke ̱ : — Je rä jile bata shäk , jishtä jile bata shäk wa bakle käi .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Ata je ssa Herodes te ra , ite isha : — ¡ Juan ale tsa ̱ ku ̱ teleksa ̱ yis wa ̱ ne shki ̱ naka ̱ rä !

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Iwa rä Herodes ne wa ̱ Juan yile kolonakwa ̱ rä , je mu ̱ awa ̱ ite cadena wà sä wätiäklä ska Herodías kju ̱ ei , je rä iel Felipe se ̱ naklä , je ra ise ̱ nawa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Je rä Juan te isheke ̱ Herodes ia ̱ : “ Je ma wa ̱ bä el se ̱ naklä katke , ka jekäi ma ia ̱ ka ̱ kuna , ” je ki ̱ ka .

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Je ki ̱ ka , Herodías je ̱ r ki ̱ Juan ianawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na . Je ki ̱ ishena kota ̱ nakwa ̱ , jeiräta ka itäkita maikäi a ̱ ni .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Herodes suarke ̱ Juan yika , ñakäi ite iwetseke ̱ , iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je rä ditsä wämo sikii ki ̱ ka . Ije te ji sheke ̱ ssëke ̱ ite ra , je te ije ̱ r iawe ̱ ke ̱ ta ̱ i , jeiräta ite issëke ̱ je ̱ r bäi wà .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Bata jekjepa ike ̱ i dewa ̱ iia ̱ . Mika ̱ Herodes ki ̱ año deka ̱ ra , je diei yäklä ye ite jile yula itsa ̱ tkäk bäi bäi wa irä , iguardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , Galilea ska blu wa irä ia ̱ .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Jera Herodías yaba busi dewa ̱ ju ̱ , je klä ju ̱ a ; je wà Herodes irä , ije ra ñatululewa ̱ yäkäk wa irä , jewa wäbatsacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ñerä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha je busi ia ̱ : — Ji kiarke ̱ ba ki ̱ je kiö yis ia ̱ , jera je me ̱ mi yis te ma ia ̱ .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Jekäi ikabla iia ̱ etkabä : — Ji kia ba te yis ia ̱ käi me ̱ mi yis te ba ia ̱ , yis dä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye je ke ̱ i mowämo kje .

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Jera je mineksa ̱ ju ̱ te ichaka ia ̱ mi ia ̱ : — ¿ Jibä kie yie na ? Jera ia ̱ mi te ikúka : — Juan säwäukewa ̱ k tsa ̱ ku ̱ ne kiö rä .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Jera mane manebä idewa ̱ ju ̱ ni ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wäki ̱ je kiäk iia ̱ , te isha : — Yis ki ̱ ishena rä , ba te jí kje ra Juan säwäukewa ̱ k tsa ̱ ku ̱ ne che ̱ té yis ia ̱ plato ki ̱ ka rä .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Ñerä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je ̱ r ianawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na . Ata ikabla etkabä kju ̱ ei , ñakäi ñatululewa ̱ yäkäk ira wa kju ̱ ei , ka iwa ̱ je wäshewa ̱ klei .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Jera ñawäsaka je ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te guardia ekla patkami Juan tsa ̱ ku ̱ tsa ̱ kté , jekäi je mineju ̱ te itsa ̱ ku ̱ tiaksa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Je wa ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ detse ̱ plato ki ̱ cha ̱ mi ite je busi ia ̱ , kjepa je busi te icha ̱ mi ia ̱ mi ia ̱ .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Mika ̱ iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je ju ̱ ña ra , ijewa dejulu wa ̱ inu ̱ l minetse ̱ blacha ̱ sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Jesús ktei bata shäk wa tapanani iwakei ra . Jera ijewa te ipakani iia ̱ biköle ji wá ̱ ijewa te käi , jiräni ijewa te sa paktata ̱ na käi .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Jera ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Sä shkä kju ̱ awa ka ̱ wakei ebä ska , bas je ̱ räklä elkje . Je rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ mar irä , idar irä , ki ̱ ka ka ka ̱ däksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ yäkäkbä jibä .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Jekäi iminejulu iwakwa ebä ko ̱ no ki ̱ , ka ̱ wakei ebä ska .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Ata chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te iminejulu su ̱ a , jera ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite . Je ki ̱ ka jukläyäkä biköle ska wa julunami klä wà , demijuluba ijewa wätsa ̱ k .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Ñerä ideksa ̱ ju ̱ ra , ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ a , jera ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi jewa dälänacha ̱ wa ̱ , ijewa rä oveja ka kjänanak ta käi ki ̱ ka . Jera ite ijewa paktami kte saka saka wa .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Jera ka ̱ wä deewa ̱ kja ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi te isha : — Jiska rä ka ̱ wakei ebä , ñakäi ka ̱ wä deewa ̱ kja irä .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Wë ditsä patkö iminaklä sa pája ̱ mi ka ̱ tso ̱ shtä ska , jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala shtä ska , jile tju ̱ ak iwakwa wa ̱ ñanak .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — Bas ne ku ̱ ijewa chewo ̱ rä . Jera ijewa te isha : — ¿ Sá ma pan tju ̱ ak säkei ta dosciento denario kje , jewa sá te ijewa chewe ̱ na ?

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Jera ite ijewa chaka : — ¿ Bitäbä bas wa ̱ pan shkä rä ? Bas cho ̱ isu ̱ ak . Jera ijewa te isu ̱ a ra , ite isha iia ̱ : — Cinco , ñakäi nima botäbä .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Jera ite ijewa paka biköle pakäk ñajäkläk tala ki ̱ ka eyaka eyaka kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Jekäi iña jakla eyaka eyaka kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa cien cien käi , cincuenta cincuenta käi .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Jera ite je pan cinco irä , nima botäbä irä kukawa ̱ , jera iwä kaka ̱ jöikje ka ̱ kia iki ̱ , kjepa je pan bala butsa ma ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ ijewa wa ̱ wadenak , ñakäi je nima botäbä bala butsa ma ite biköle ia ̱ .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Biköle yaká , jekäi issënacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Jera ijewa te pan irä , nima irä , ukäla shtani canasta na doce pshipshii .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Jera je pan ñak jäiyi wa ebä däka ̱ rä cinco mil .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Jera plaa ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa paka ñajiäkka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka , kjäkksa ̱ ba a ̱ mikata iwätsa ̱ k Betsaida ka , je dälei ja ̱ mi ije te je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa patke kate .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa patkamini ra , imineka ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ bata ki ̱ ka ka ̱ kiäk .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Jera ka ̱ tuinawa ̱ ra , ko ̱ no dami tipä mo ̱ sha ̱ , ata Jesús kalduta ̱ na ka ̱ pjota ki ̱ iwakei ebä .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Je te isu ̱ a ka ̱ miika ra , ijewa chicharte ko ̱ no ju ̱ ak , si ̱ wa ̱ te ijewa patke kate shäbeka ki ̱ ka . Ñerä sä wäñinaklä tuina idäkläka ̱ cuatro wa ra , idaju ̱ ijewa wäki ̱ klä wà tipä bata ki ̱ . Jekäi issëna ijewa ktä cha ̱ k kjäkju ̱ ba .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Ata ijewa te isu ̱ a idaju ̱ té tipä bata ki ̱ klä wà ra , ijewa te ibiketsa wikblu irä ni , jera ikjoyina ta ̱ i .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bena te isu ̱ a , jekäi imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ñawäsaka ikta ijewa ra te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¡ Bas ssëno täkii ! Yis ne irä , ke bas suana .

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Ñerä ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ña ijewa ra ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka , jera si ̱ wa ̱ wätkenawa ̱ . Jera ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , pan ki ̱ je ̱ le , je ka wadéne ijewa je ̱ r na , ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ la rä doloiebä ki ̱ ka .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Jekäi ikjaksa ̱ julu demijulu Genesaret ke ̱ i ska . Jeska iko ̱ no mu ̱ acha ̱ ta ̱ na .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Ñerä iñajolowa ̱ ksa ̱ ko ̱ no na ra , ñawäsaka ditsä te isu ̱ a ra ije ne irä .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Jera ijewa minemi je ke ̱ i biköle sha ̱ na duë ta wa jäkté ikatashuäklä na mai ije kaldu rä ju ̱ ñer ijewa wa ̱ ska .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Jera mai Jesús dami käi , jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala shtä ska iräle , jukläyäkä ta ̱ i ta ̱ i shtä ska iräle , ju tso ̱ elkje shtä ska iräle , jera duë ta wa tapawe ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ isaka te sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska , jewa te ka ̱ kieke ̱ iia ̱ ijewa wa ̱ iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ batabä jibä passäkläwa ̱ pa , jera ipassäk wa biköle bäinani .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Jera fariseo wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa manele irä , datse ̱ Jerusalén ska tapanawa ̱ Jesús wäja ̱ mi .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Jewa te iwa ̱ dulanak wa sha ̱ su ̱ a ra , ijewa jula rä ñá je wà iyäkä tso ̱ ; je rä sä te ishe ra , ka jula sukle kuna .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: ( Iwa rä fariseo wa irä Judío wa biköle irä , jewa rä ka iwa ̱ diklä tkene ijula ki ̱ ra , ka iyäkä kuna ; je rä ijewa te sä wäkiri wa wädular je dälätseke ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Ñakäi ijewa tso ̱ sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska je däke ̱ ni ka oka ̱ ne ra , ka iyäkä kuna . Jekäi jile saka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ kuka ite dälätsanak , vaso paskue käi , jarro paskue käi , jile saka wao ̱ nak yöle bronce yaka wà paskue käi , ji ñaklä ja ̱ ke ̱ i käi . )

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Je ki ̱ ka fariseo wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , jewa te ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ba wa ̱ dulanak wa ka se ̱ r sä wäkiri wa wädular ja ̱ mi rä , ata jewa yäkäke ̱ ijula rä ñá wa rä na ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — ¡ Ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà wa ! Bulee Isaías te bas ktei bata sha rä , iyöle katke käi : ‘ Jí ditsä wa te yis dälätseke ̱ rä kjäbata ebä ska , ata ije ̱ r ska ra ijewa rä butsäle tulämi ka ̱ mii yis yika .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Ijewa te yis oloitseke ̱ rä ka wata . Jewa te sa pakteke ̱ kje ditsä wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ le ebä wà . ’

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Jekäi bas te ditsä wädular ebä dälätse , jewa bas te Säkeklä wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k jawa ̱ ta ̱ na .

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Jera ite isha ji ̱ a ijewa ia ̱ : — Bäi si ̱ ra bas te Säkeklä wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ rä bas wakwa wädular ebä tkenakläwa ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Ata Moisés te isha rä : ‘ Ba ká irä ma a ̱ mi irä dälätsö ’ , ietkä rä : ‘ Yi kta yakei iká iräle , ia ̱ mi iräle ukä ja ̱ mi ra , je kiana duäkwa ̱ . ’

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: Ata bas te ishe rä : ‘ Yilé te ishe iká iräle ia ̱ mi iräle ia ̱ : “ Jile tso ̱ yis wa ̱ bas tsa ̱ tkäklä je rä Corbán ” ’ ( je kte wà rä : me ̱ nak Säkeklä ia ̱ ) ;

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: jera ka bas te ka ̱ me ̱ kuna ji ̱ a iia ̱ jile wa ̱ klä iká irä ia ̱ mi irä ia ̱ .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Jekäi bas te Säkeklä ktä wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ bas wakwa wädular patkawa ̱ bas te ebä wà . Je su ̱ ta bas te jile saka we ̱ rami ta ̱ i .

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Jera etäbä kicha ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa kiaté ni iwäki ̱ , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Bas biköle ku ̱ yis ktä ssö , je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa :

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Ji a ̱ ni ka kuna kjäkwa ̱ sä kjä na sa iawa ̱ kwa ̱ ñá ye , ata ji däke ̱ ksa ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ska je ne te sa iawe ̱ ñá ye rä .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: ¡ Yile rä kukäta wassënak ra , issö ! ”

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Jekjepa ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa jawa ̱ ta ̱ na minewa ̱ ju ̱ ju na ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je ite ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi ktei chaka iia ̱ .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — ¿ Ata bas ñaebä , ka je ̱ r na ji däwa ̱ na ? ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji biköle tso ̱ kjäkwa ̱ sä kjä na ka je ia ̱ sa ianakwa ̱ ñá ye na ?

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Ñera je rä ka kjäkwa ̱ kuna däkmi sa ̱ je ̱ r ska , ata je däke ̱ mi rä sa ̱ ñabäli ska , kjäkksa ̱ ni ñá jui na . Jekäi je wà ite sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a ñanak biköle rä sikina .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Jekäi ite isha ji ̱ a : — Ji däke ̱ ksa ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ska je ne te sa iawe ̱ ñá ye rä .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Iwa rä sa ̱ ja ̱ rka , sa ̱ je ̱ r ska ji däke ̱ ksa ̱ rä : ka ̱ biketse yakei käi , ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ käi , jakble käi , sä ktewa ̱ käi ,

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: manene käi , jile ki ̱ tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi käi , ji shi ̱ ana käi , ñawäyue käi , ji äina tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ka wätkelewa ̱ ta käi , sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka iar ijile ki ̱ käi , sa saka sheka ̱ yakei käi , je ̱ k ssë käi , jile we ̱ ka je ̱ r ta käi .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Je yakei biköle datse ̱ rä sa ̱ ja ̱ rka , je ne te sa iawe ̱ ñá ye rä .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Jekäi jeska ije ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ Tiro irä Sidón irä ke ̱ i sha ̱ na , jera ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ ju na . Jera ka ije ki ̱ yi a ̱ ni shene ijuñakwa ̱ , jeiräta ka ibler a ̱ ni .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Jekäi plaa ebä alaklä ekla te iju ̱ ñawa ̱ . Je yaba alaklä rä kololewa ̱ wikblu ñá shtä wa ̱ . Je deju ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iklä kicha ja ̱ mi .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Je alaklä rä Sirofenicia wa delewa ̱ Griego wa ye , je ka ̱ kia iia ̱ iwa ̱ iyaba ki ̱ ka be kjäiäkläksa ̱ .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Yabala ne che säkätäba rä . Ata yabala yika pan bäkeksa ̱ ju ̱ nakmi chichi ia ̱ , ka je rä bäi kuna .

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Jera ije te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa jekäi irä . Jeiräta chichi rä yabala yäkäke ̱ pjoi jolorke ̱ je ñata mesa niki ̱ na .

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Jera ite isha ije ia ̱ : — Jekäi ba te isha ki ̱ ka ma cho ̱ ni , ba yaba jawa ̱ ta ̱ na e ̱ ná be te .

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Ñerä je alaklä mineju ̱ ni ijuka ra , ite iyaba ku ̱ a ikalme ja ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ , jalewa ̱ e ̱ ná be wa ̱ .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Tiro ke ̱ i ska Jesús biteju ̱ ni Sidón wa , dáteju ̱ Decápolis ke ̱ i sha ̱ na , deni Galilea tipei kjä ja ̱ mi .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Jera ekla detse ̱ iwäki ̱ kukä balewa ̱ , ktä wätelewa ̱ . Jekäi ijewa ka ̱ kia iia ̱ , ijula ma ̱ kläka ̱ ije ki ̱ ka .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Jera ite ikiami kju ̱ awa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tso ̱ yika . Ñerä ijulasku patkawa ̱ ikukä na , ikjali tjuaksa ̱ kjepa ikjäktä passawa ̱ ite .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Jera iwä kaka ̱ jöikje , ú ̱ na te isha iia ̱ : “ ¡ Epata ! ” ( Je kte wà rä : “ ¡ Bä kjäyenoju ̱ mi ! ” )

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka ikukä kjäyena , ikjäktä wäkukäk jälena tulami , jera iktaka ̱ ni bäi ebä .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Jera ka iwa ̱ ijewa pakane ishäk kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , ata ite ijewa uñeke ̱ ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ta si ̱ ijewa te ipakeke ̱ .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na te isha : “ Ji biköle wá ̱ ite rä baa . Kukä balewa ̱ wa bäiwa ̱ ni ite kte ssäk , ñakäi ktä wätelewa ̱ wa bäiwa ̱ ni ite ktäk ! ”

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Je bala na etäbä kicha chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ tapanani , ata ka ji a ̱ ni kuna ijewa wa ̱ ñanak . Je ki ̱ ka Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa kia jaté , jewa ia ̱ ite isha :

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: — Yis je ̱ r ja ̱ mi jí chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa dälänacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , tres día kana ijewa se ̱ naté yis da , ijewa wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni ka kuna ñanak .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Jekäi ikuna yie ipatkamini ijuka bäli ebä ra , iö iwätuir jolormi ña ̱ la wà , ijewa manele dar dä ka ̱ mii ki ̱ ka .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te ikúka : — ¿ Maka sä te pan tse ̱ jí ka ̱ wakei ebä ska sa ̱ wa ̱ jí wa chewa ̱ klä na ?

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Jera ije te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bitäbä bas wa ̱ pan shkä rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Siete .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Jera ite je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa paka ñajäkläkwa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ . Jera ite je pan siete kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ , kjepa je bala butsa ma ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , jewa wa ̱ wadenak . Jekäi ijewa te je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa chewa ̱ iwa .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Ñakäi ijewa wa ̱ nima tsi ̱ dala shkä elkje . Je ki ̱ ika ̱ kia , kjepa ite ijewa paka iwachewa ̱ k .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Ijewa yaká , jekäi issënacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera iukäla a ̱ ta ̱ na kita ̱ nani canasta na siete .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Ijewa rä cuatro mil kjena . Jekjepa ite ijewa patka tulami .

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: Je ukä ska ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra , dateksa ̱ Dalmanuta ke ̱ i ki ̱ .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Jera fariseo wa dejulu , ñajaka ̱ Jesús wächakewa ̱ k . Ijewa te wäsi ̱ wa ipaka jile wa ̱ k ka ̱ jöir ska ijuenaklä ye .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Jera iu ̱ na täkii ija ̱ rka te isha : — ¿ Jiye jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa te ji kieke ̱ ijuenaklä ye rä na ? Ata kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ia ̱ ka ji a ̱ ni kjayinak ijuenaklä ye .

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Jera ite ijewa jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , jekäi ije ̱ k jiaka ̱ ni ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka mineju ̱ mi tipä a ̱ mikata .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa je ̱ r shenacha ̱ wa ̱ pan tsa ̱ k , ata etababä shkä iwa ̱ ko ̱ no na .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Jera ite ijewa pakta tsa ̱ na , te isha : — ¡ Issö ! Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ fariseo wa levadura yika irä , Herodes levadura yika irä .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Jekäi je te iktewa ̱ tulaka ̱ te isha : — Je rä ka sa ̱ wa ̱ pan shkä ne ki ̱ ite isheke ̱ rä .

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: Je de Jesús je ̱ r na , jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas ktewe ̱ ke ̱ ka bas wa ̱ pan shkä te rä na ? ¿ Ka bas je ̱ r na ji däba , ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ rba na ? ¿ Bas je ̱ r ko ̱ la rä doloiebä na ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: ¿ Bas dä wäbala ta , ata ka iwajuer na ? ¿ Bas dä kukä ta , ata ka iwassër na ? ¿ Ka bas je ̱ r ja ̱ ne ji ̱ a na ?

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: Mika ̱ yie pan cinco bala butsa cinco mil wa ia ̱ ra , ¿ bitkä canasta pshina bas te iukäla shtani ra rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Doce .

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: — Ñakäi mika ̱ yie pan siete bala butsa cuatro mil wa ia ̱ ra , ¿ bitkä canasta pshina bas te iukäla shtani ra rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Siete .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Jera ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Ka bas je ̱ r däba jeska na ?

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: Jera idemiju ̱ Betsaidaka . Jera ekla ka wä wajuenak kuna detse ̱ isaka wa ̱ iwäki ̱ . Jekäi ijewa ka ̱ kia iia ̱ , ijula tkäkläwa ̱ ija ̱ mi .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Jera ite je ka wä wajuenak kuna kukawa ̱ ijulaka , minetse ̱ iwa ̱ je jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne ektaka . Jeska ikjali tjua iwäbala ja ̱ mi ra , ijula ma ̱ ka ̱ iki ̱ ka . Ñerä ite ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jile juer ta bä wäna ?

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Jera iwächa ̱ mi ka ̱ su ̱ ak te isha : — Yis wäna ditsä juerke ̱ , ata ijuer kal ne shkäke ̱ rä käi .

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha ijula tkawa ̱ iwäbala ja ̱ mi . Jekäi ite iwasu ̱ a jaree , jera ibäinani ; iwäna ji biköle juenani bäi ebä .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Jera ite ije patkamini ijuka te ishami iia ̱ : — Ka ma miwa ̱ kuna jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne shtä na .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Jesús mineju ̱ mi iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra Cesarea Filipo ke ̱ i sha ̱ na jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala shtä ska . Ñerä ña ̱ la wà ite ichaka iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , te isha : — ¿ Jiräni ditsä te ishe yi yis dä na ?

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Moska te ishe ba rä Juan säwäukewa ̱ k ni ; isaka te ishe ba rä Elías ni ; ata isaka te ishe ba rä jile bata shäk wa bakle sha ̱ ekla ni .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ ichaka : — Ata ¿ ñe jini bas te ishe , yi yis dä na ? Jera Pedro te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — Ba ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Jera Jesús wa ̱ ka ijewa pakane ishäk kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa paktami ditsä yäbei kiana weikanak ta ̱ i , ju ̱ nakksa ̱ sä wäkiri wa wa ̱ , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa wa ̱ , ñakäi kota ̱ nakwa ̱ , ñakäi je ukä ska tres día ra shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Je kte sha ite tsa ̱ na . Jera Pedro te ikia tsa ̱ mi iwakei ebä , jeska ite iuñami .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Ata ije ̱ k manewa ̱ té iwa ̱ dulanak wa su ̱ ak , te Pedro uña , te isha iia ̱ : — Satanás , ma je ̱ k tso ̱ kju ̱ awa yis yika . Ka ba wa ̱ ibiketsane Säkeklä käi , ata ditsä käi ebä .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Jera ite chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa kia jaté iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra ñara , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Yilé shkakle yis ja ̱ mi ra , ke je je ̱ k biketsa , ata je cruz kpöka ̱ , minak yis da .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkakleksa ̱ ra , je wà iweikarmiwa ̱ . Ata yi je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ yis kju ̱ ei irä kte baa bata ki ̱ ka irä ra , je wà ije ̱ k tsa ̱ tkämiksa ̱ .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Ñakäi ikuna ka ̱ jiska ji biköle deksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ , ata sa wakei weikanawa ̱ ra , ¿ jiye je kiar sa ̱ ki ̱ na ?

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Jera ¿ jibä me ̱ mi sa te sa wakei je ̱ k tsa ̱ tju ̱ a ju ̱ aklämi na ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Jekäi yi äinawa ̱ yis ki ̱ ka , yis te ji sheke ̱ ki ̱ ka , jí sa ̱ tso ̱ jira manenak wa ebä , ji yakei wakbläk wa ebä wäna ra , jera ñaebä je wakei ki ̱ ka ditsä yäbei äirmiwa ̱ mika ̱ je daju ̱ ni oloi kaleka ̱ iKá oloi wà , ángel sikii wa ra ñara ke ̱ i ska ra .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas kajali jiska wa sha ̱ manele wa ̱ ka duewa ̱ shka ̱ l ssënak , ata ijewa te Säkeklä gobiernoí su ̱ a ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ oloi ta ta ̱ i kjepa .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ seis día ra , Jesús te Pedro irä Jacobo irä Juan irä kia jámi iwakwa ebä , ka ̱ tsä bata ka ̱ miika . Jeska ra imanenaksa ̱ kju ̱ awa ijewa wäna .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Ipaiklä wäñinaka ̱ oloo suruuwa ̱ si ̱ , ka ̱ jiska sua skuäk wa ia ̱ ka isuka ̱ nak je kjekla surulita .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Jera ijewa wänaka Elías juena Moisés da ñara , jewa ka ̱ pakä tso ̱ Jesús da .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Jera Pedro ktaka ̱ te isha Jesús ia ̱ ; — Rabí , ¡ bäi ebä sa kajali jiska rä ! Sá ma ju yabala yuäk mañatkä : etka ba ia ̱ , etka Moisés ia ̱ , etka Elías ia ̱ .

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Iwa rä iktaka ̱ rä kje ka wabiketsale kuna , je rä ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Ñerä mo ̱ ja ̱ nawa ̱ te ijewa ki ̱ kukawa ̱ . Jera kte ssëna mo ̱ ja ̱ rka je te ishe : “ Jí ne rä yis yaba shka ̱ ta rä . Je ne ktä ssö rä . ”

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Jera plaa ijewa te isu ̱ a ra , ka yi juena ji ̱ a ijewa ra , ata Jesús wakei ebä kaldu .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Jera ijewa dajuluni ka ̱ tsä ja ̱ mi ra , Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ isha ka ijewa kiar ji su ̱ a ite shäk kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , ata ditsä yäbei shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na kjepa .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te je kte blawa ̱ bitaba iwakwa skabä . Ata iña chakäke ̱ iki ̱ , jini si ̱ ishki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je wà räí ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Jekjepa ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ te isha : — ¿ Jiye ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa te ishe Elías ne rä däkju ̱ säkätäba ni rä na ?

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Iyina si ̱ ra , Elías ne rä däkju ̱ ba ji biköle paruäkba rä . Jera ¿ jiye iyöle katke te ditsä yäbei ktei she ikiana weikanak ta ̱ i , ñakäi dokoitsanakwa ̱ biköle wa ̱ ni rä na ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , Elías je rä deleju ̱ e ̱ ná ; je ukä ja ̱ mi ijewa te ji wá ̱ jishtä iwakwa ki ̱ ishena käi , jishtä iyöle katke wa ̱ ije ktei yile käi .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Ñerä ijewa deni iwa ̱ dulanak wa wäki ̱ ra , jera ijewa te isu ̱ a chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ taparte ijewa pája ̱ mi , ñakäi ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa te ijewa wächakewe ̱ kate ta ̱ i .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te ije su ̱ a plaa ra , imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ julunaté iwäki ̱ ichakäk .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ ichaka : — ¿ Je rä jibä te bas kju ̱ atkewe ̱ tso ̱ ijewa ra na ?

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ekla te ikúka : — Sapaktäk , yis wa ̱ yis yaba dulaklei detse ̱ ba wäki ̱ . Je rä kololewa ̱ wikblu sä ktä wäblewa ̱ kwa ̱ shtä wa ̱ .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Mai ite ikukawa ̱ käi ra , ite ija ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ mi . Jera ikjali tjuäke ̱ juyaa ikjä na , ikà wächichäke ̱ , ikararke ̱ wa ̱ därërë . Yie isha ba wa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ ijewa wa ̱ ikjäiäkläksa ̱ , ata ka ijewa ia ̱ io ̱ r .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Jera ite ikúka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¡ Bas tso ̱ jira wa ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna ! ¿ Bikö räka ̱ yis kiana ji ̱ a se ̱ nak bas da rä na ? ¿ Bikö räka ̱ yis kiana ji ̱ a bas katabläk rä na ? Itso ̱ té ' sia ̱ .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te itsa ̱ té . Jera je wikblu yakei te ije su ̱ awa ̱ ra , plaa ite je dulaklei paju ̱ aka ̱ , je ja ̱ nawa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ , je ̱ k cha ̱ ta ̱ i , ikjali tjua juyaa .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka iká ia ̱ : — ¿ Bikökje jí o ̱ naté iukä ja ̱ mi rä na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Iji ̱ a tsi ̱ ne raté .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Ka ̱ raa je te ija ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ mi yökö na , ñakäi diklä naka , iwa ̱ iktäkläwa ̱ ye . Ata ba ia ̱ ji o ̱ nopa ra , ¡ ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sá dälänopa , sá tsa ̱ tkäk !

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — ¿ Maikäi ba ia ̱ ji o ̱ nopa ra ni na ? Yi te ji biketse etkabä , je ia ̱ ji biköle o ̱ rmi .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Jera plaa je dulaklei ká a ̱ na te isha : — Yis te ji biketse etkabä , ata yis tsa ̱ tköpa ka yis ia ̱ ji biketsar etkabä ki ̱ ka .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Jera Jesús te isu ̱ a chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ñayitä bitä kja ra , ite je wikblu ñá shtä uña te isha iia ̱ : — Wikblu sä ktä wäblewa ̱ kwa ̱ , sä kukä banewa ̱ kwa ̱ , yis te ba ia ̱ ishe , ma cho ̱ ksa ̱ ije yika , mik a ̱ ni ka ba däwa ̱ kunani ija ̱ mi .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Ñerä je wikblu a ̱ na , te dulaklei paju ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni e ̱ e ̱ na , kjepa ite ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na . Jera ija ̱ nawa ̱ dulewa ̱ käi , je ki ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te isha iduawa ̱ irä .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Ata Jesús te ikukawa ̱ ijulaka , je kaka ̱ ite . Jekäi ije ̱ k duaka ̱ ni .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ju ja ̱ rka ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa te ichaka iia ̱ iwakwa ebä : — ¿ Jiye ka sá ia ̱ je kjäierksa ̱ rä na ?

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Je shtä rä ji a ̱ ni wà ka kjäienaksa ̱ kuna , ata je kjäierksa ̱ rä ka ̱ kie irä bätse irä ebä ne wà .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Jeska ra ijewa bitejulu , datéjulu Galilea ke ̱ i kja ̱ neka , jera ka ije ki ̱ yi a ̱ ni shene iju ̱ ñak mai ikatke rä .

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije te iwa ̱ dulanak wa pakteke ̱ , te isheke ̱ ijewa ia ̱ : — Ditsä yäbei rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ditsä jula na , jeska jewa te iktemiwa ̱ , ata iduawa ̱ ukä ska tres día ra ishki ̱ rmika ̱ ni .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Jeiräta je kte ia ̱ ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne , ñakäi ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ je chakäk iia ̱ .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Ñerä idejuluni Capernaúm ska . Jekäi ikajali ju ska ra , Jesús te ijewa chaka : — ¿ Jibä te bas ktewe ̱ dar ña ̱ la wà rä na ?

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Jera isi ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ña ̱ la wà ijewa ktewa ̱ ka ̱ ñara yibä rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ rä te .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Jera ije ̱ tkawa ̱ , te je doce wa kia jaté , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Yi ssëna däkwa ̱ isäkätä ye ra , je kiana rä bena bata ye , ñakäi bena kjanaklä ye .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Jera ite yaba kukawa ̱ , duacha ̱ ite ijewa sha ̱ na , je kukacha ̱ ite jula naka , jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: — Yi te jí yaba käi wa kiawa ̱ yis kie oloi ja ̱ mi ra , je te rä yis wakei ne kiawa ̱ . Ñakäi yi te yis kiawa ̱ ra , ka je rä yis ebä kuna , ata je te rä yis patkäkté ne kiawa ̱ .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Jera Juan te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , sá te ekla su ̱ a , je te be kjäie kaldu ba kie oloi ja ̱ mi . Ata ka irä sajewa ja ̱ mi kuna , ki ̱ ka sá te iwätkewa ̱ .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Ata Jesús te ikúka : — Ka bas te iwätkewe ̱ kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te jile wá ̱ täkili ta yis kie oloi ja ̱ mi ra , jera ka je ia ̱ je itä ki ̱ ka yis yinak yakei .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra , yi rä ka kju ̱ atkäk kuna sa ra , jewa rä saje wa ra .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Jekäi yi te bas tia etka diklä kjela kakjelabä wà yis kie oloi ja ̱ mi , bas dä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka ra , jera kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je wakei ia ̱ ji säkei ta dämiksa ̱ ka wäshäkwa ̱ a ̱ ni .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: “ Yi te jí tsi ̱ dala yis biketsäk wa manele shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , bäi si ̱ ije ia ̱ ra rä je wakei kuli kicha ja ̱ mi jak waunak burro wà shtä mo ̱ noka ̱ pa , jekäi iwakei ju ̱ nomipa däyë naka .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Jekäi bä jula te bä shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , je tiö ju ̱ omi . Bäi si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra rä bä kjäwa ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka ska jula medelewa ̱ , ata ka minakju ̱ kuna jula botkäwe sä tuläklämi ska , yökö ka wäita ̱ nak kuna ja ̱ rka ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: mai ijewa chichöñaí rä ka duäk kuna , ñakäi yökö rä ka wäita ̱ nak kuna ska .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ñakäi bä klä te bä shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , je tiö ju ̱ omi . Bäi si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra rä bä kjäwa ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka ska klä ialewa ̱ , ata ka ju ̱ nakmi kuna klä botkäwe sä tuläklämi ska , yökö ka wäita ̱ nak kuna ja ̱ rka ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: mai ijewa chichöñaí ̱ rä ka duäk kuna , ñakäi yökö rä ka wäita ̱ nak kuna ska .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Ñakäi bä wäbala te bä shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , je yöksa ̱ . Bäi si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra rä bä kjäwa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ska wäbala ta etkabä , ata ka ju ̱ nakmi kuna wäbala botkäwe sä tuläklämi ska ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: mai ijewa chichöñaí rä ka duäk kuna , ñakäi yökö rä ka wäita ̱ nak kuna ska .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: “ Biköle ki ̱ ka yökö mirmi idäyeí ye .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Däyë rä bäi , ata iianawa ̱ ka kjei ta ji ̱ a ra , jera ¿ jibä wà je bäirmini na ? Jekäi däyë käi se ̱ newo ̱ bas wakwa ja ̱ mi , ñakäi bas se ̱ no bitaba ñara ekla ekla . ”

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Jeska ije ̱ ka ̱ ka ̱ mineju ̱ demi Judea ke ̱ i ki ̱ , ñakäi Jordán a ̱ mikata . Jekäi etäbä kicha chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tapanawa ̱ ije katke ska . Jera ite ijewa paktamini iwädular käi .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Jera fariseo wa ñasikawa ̱ iwäja ̱ mi te iwächakewa ̱ wäsi ̱ wa : — ¿ Ka ̱ tso ̱ jäiyi wa wa ̱ ise ̱ naklä jäkläwa ̱ na ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Jera ite ikúka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jini Moisés wa ̱ bas pakaleta ̱ na iwa ̱ k rä ?

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Moisés te ka ̱ ma ̱ rä ñajewa ̱ äyëí yuäkksa ̱ ipatkäklämi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas je ̱ r dä därërë ki ̱ ite je ka ̱ wei yuata ̱ na bas ia ̱ .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Ata säkätä ji yönaksa ̱ ra , Säkeklä te sa yuaksa ̱ rä ‘ jäiyi irä alaklä irä . ’

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Je bata ki ̱ ka jäiyi wa rä iká irä ia ̱ mi irä jäkwa ̱ ta ̱ na ije ̱ k bawa ̱ kläwa ̱ ialaklä ra .

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: Jekäi je bol wa dämiwa ̱ eklabä yaka ye . Jekäi ka ijewa rä bol ji ̱ a kuna , ata ijewa rä ekla yaka yebä .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sä yälilewa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ ñaja ̱ mi , je ke butsa ju ̱ ami sa ̱ ku ̱ .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Ijewa dejuluni ju ska ra iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je ktei chakani iia ̱ .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Yi te ialaklä jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , se ̱ nawa ̱ ni isaka ra , jera je rä imaner iukä ja ̱ mi .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Ñaebä alaklä te ijäiyi jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , se ̱ nawa ̱ ni isaka ra , jera je rä imaner .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Jera yabala de ja iwäki ̱ ijula tkäkläwa ̱ ijewa ja ̱ mi , ata iwa ̱ dulanak wa te jewa uña .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te je su ̱ a ra , je te ije kju ̱ atkewa ̱ wa ̱ te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yabala jöwa ̱ ibitäklä yis wäki ̱ ka , ke iwätkewa ̱ . Ka jiye kuna ta , ijewa käi wa ne dämiwa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ja ̱ mi rä .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi wa ̱ ka Säkeklä gobiernoí kinewa ̱ jishtä yaba käi ra , a ̱ ni ka idäkwa ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa kukacha ̱ jula na , jewa ki ̱ ijula ma ̱ ka ̱ , jekäi ji bäi sha ite o ̱ nak ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Jeska ije ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ minakju ̱ ra , ekla daju ̱ tu ̱ lee , je ̱ tkawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ iwäja ̱ mi , te ichaka iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk se ̱ nak wämo , ¿ ji we ̱ yie , yis ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye däkläksa ̱ däli ukä ye rä na ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
