text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : ¿ Jiye ba te yis kie wämo ni na ? Yi a ̱ ni rä ka wämo kuna , ata ekla ebä ne rä wämo rä , je rä Säkeklä .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Ñera ba wa ̱ jini sa pakale ji wa ̱ k ju ̱ ñer : ‘ Ke sa ktawa ̱ . Ke ma manena . Ke ba jakbla . Ke ji shaka ̱ ka ̱ yue wà ñakjatiäklä shtä ska . Ke sa saka waña . Ba ká irä , ma a ̱ mi irä , dälätsö . ’

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Jera ije te isha : — Sapaktäk , je biköle rä wao ̱ leté yis wa ̱ , yis ji ̱ a tsi ̱ ne raté .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Jera Jesús te isu ̱ a jaree , jekäi ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi idälänawa ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — Etka ska bä sher ji ̱ a : ma cho ̱ bä ji tso ̱ biköle watju ̱ ak tulämi , je säkei mo ka jita wa ia ̱ , jekäi ra ba ia ̱ ji säkei ta dämiksa ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska . Je ukä ska bä kute minak yis da .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Ñerä idokonawa ̱ je kte yika , imineju ̱ mi je ̱ r ialewa ̱ , ije rä jile ta ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Jera Jesús te ipája ̱ mi wa su ̱ a , jera ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Blu wa ia ̱ ra därërë si ̱ dewa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Je kte te iwa ̱ dulanak wa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , ata Jesús te ishani ijewa ia ̱ : — Yabala rikäla , därërë si ̱ dewa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Tjabana si ̱ camello kjäksa ̱ ju ̱ tuluk wä ña ̱ la ja ̱ rka rä , ata därërë si ̱ blu däwa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Jera ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ta si ̱ , te isha ñaia ̱ : — Jekäi ra , ¿ yi tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ rä na ?

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa su ̱ a , jera ite isha : — Ditsä ia ̱ ka je o ̱ nak , ata Säkeklä ia ̱ ka irä jekäi kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä ia ̱ ji biköle o ̱ r dawa ̱ .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Jera Pedro te ishami iia ̱ : — Ñera sá wa ̱ ji biköle rä jalewa ̱ ta ̱ na sá minaklä ba ra .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Kte si ̱ wà yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te iju iräle , iel wa iräle , ikuta wa iräle , ia ̱ mi iräle , iká iräle , iyabala iräle , ika ̱ iräle , je jawa ̱ ta ̱ na yis kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka iräle , kte baa bata ki ̱ ka iräle ra ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: jera jí ke ̱ i ska je wakei ia ̱ je säkei me ̱ rmini cien cien , ju käi , el wa käi , kuta wa käi , a ̱ mi wa käi , yabala käi , ka ̱ käi , jeiräta sälwi su ̱ neje jije ; ñakäi sa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a ska , je wakei ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye me ̱ rmi .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Ata chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ delewa ̱ isäkätä ye kolormiwa ̱ ibatala ye , ata delewa ̱ ibatala ye dämiwa ̱ ni rä isäkätä wa ye .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Ijewa damijulu ña ̱ la wà däkka ̱ Jerusalén ka , jera Jesús damiju ̱ ijewa wätsa ̱ k . Ijewa male ̱ te ̱ necha ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi ira dami wa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ite je doce wa kia jámi ni iwakwa ebä , jewa ia ̱ ite ji o ̱ r mar iukä ja ̱ mi rä pakami :

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: “ ¡ Jikäi issö ! Sa damika ̱ rä Jerusalén ka , jeska ditsä yäbei ju ̱ rmiksa ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä ia ̱ , jewa te iktei wabiketsemiksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ , kjepa ijewa te je ju ̱ emiksa ̱ ka ̱ etkä wa ia ̱ .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Jewa te je ja ̱ ñetsemi , ikjali tjuämi ija ̱ mi , te ikpemi , kjepa ijewa te iktemiwa ̱ . Ata je ukä ska tres día ra ishki ̱ rmika ̱ ni . ”

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Jekäi Zebedeo yabala Jacobo irä Juan irä , ñasikawa ̱ alemana ije wäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , sa ̱ ki ̱ ba shena ji wa ̱ k sá ia ̱ , ji kieke ̱ sá te ba ia ̱ käi .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Jera ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Ji sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ yis wa ̱ o ̱ nak bas ia ̱ rä na ?

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ka ̱ mo ̱ sá ia ̱ , ba oloi kanaka ̱ ra sá ñajäkläkläwa ̱ , ekla bä jula wämo kja ̱ ne , ekla bä jula shule kja ̱ ne .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ ne ji kieke ̱ bas te rä ia ̱ . Jera copa wayanak yis wa ̱ ¿ je wayarmi bas ia ̱ na ? Iräle , ji wà yis dä wäoka ̱ nak ¿ je wà bas ia ̱ wäoka ̱ nermi na ?

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Sá dormi . Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Copa wayanak yis wa ̱ je wayemi bas te , ñakäi ji wà yis dä wäoka ̱ nak je wà bas wäoka ̱ nami .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: Ata je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne yis jula shule kja ̱ ne , ka yis ia ̱ ka ̱ kuna je ma ̱ klä , ata je rä yi ia ̱ irä yolole kja jewa ia ̱ .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Jekäi isaka diez te je ssa ra , ijewa kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ Jacobo irä Juan irä ra .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikia jaté te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer manele rä ju ̱ ñenak ka ̱ jiska wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ye ra , jedigidagawa te ijewa patkeke ̱ , ñakäi ijewa sha ̱ na oloi ta wa te ka ̱ wei me ̱ ke ̱ därërë ijewa ia ̱ .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Ata bas sha ̱ na ka jekäi ikiar , ata yi ssëna deka ̱ te bäi si ̱ bas sha ̱ na ra , je kiana rä bas kjanaklä ye .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Ñakäi yi ssëna däkwa ̱ isäkätä ye bas sha ̱ na ra , je kiana rä bena kjanaklä ye .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ditsä yäbei ka je de ne rä kjanak kuna , ata je de rä kjanaklä ye , ñakäi je ̱ k ju ̱ akksa ̱ sä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tsa ̱ tju ̱ ak ju ̱ ami .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Ñerä idemijulu Jericó ska . Jera je Jericó ska imineju ̱ iwa ̱ dulanak wa irä , ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa irä ra , jera ekla ka wä wajuenak kuna kie Bartimeo ni , je rä Timeo yaba , katke ña ̱ la kjä ja ̱ mi inaklä kaku kiäk .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Je te issa Jesús Nazaret wa ne irä ra , ia ̱ nami te isha : — ¡ Jesús , David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi yis dälänopa !

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te iuña isi ̱ wa ̱ tiäkläwa ̱ , jeiräta ije a ̱ na ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta si ̱ : — ¡ David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi yis dälänopa !

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Ñerä Jesús je ̱ k wäkukawa ̱ te isha : — Ikiöté . Jekäi ijewa te je ka wä wajuenak kuna kiaté , te isha iia ̱ : — Ba ssëno täkii . Ma je ̱ köka ̱ , bä kieke ̱ ite .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Jera je te ije ̱ k ki ̱ shönak ju ̱ amita ̱ na , ije ̱ k kpa plaa deju ̱ té Jesús wäki ̱ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Ji shena ba ki ̱ yis wa ̱ o ̱ nak ba ia ̱ rä na ? Jera je ka wä wajuenak kuna te isha iia ̱ : — Rabí , yis me wä wajuerpa .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ ni . Ba te ji biketsa etkabä wà ba tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ . Jera plaa ra ije wä wajuena , jekäi imineju ̱ ira ña ̱ la wà .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Mika ̱ ijewa damijulu kja Jerusalén ska , Betfagé irä Betania irä ska , Olivo Yäkä Bata ñak ska ra , Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa patkami bol .

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: Jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Bas cho ̱ a ̱ mi bas wäsaka jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne juerke ̱ ska . Bas kjawa ̱ julu jeska ra , ñawäsaka bas te burro yaba ku ̱ emi mo ̱ lewa ̱ , yi a ̱ ni ka je ̱ tkerba iki ̱ käi ; bas te je yeksa ̱ tse ̱ té .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ata yilé te bas ia ̱ ishe : ‘ Je rä bas ji shä ’ í ̱ ni ra , bas te ikúke : ‘ Säkekewa ne ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä , ata jirä ite ipatketéni . ’

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa minejulu , te burro yaba ku ̱ a mo ̱ lewa ̱ ju ektaka ikjäshtäklä ska , ña ̱ la ukä botkä ukä ska , jekäi ijewa te je yaksa ̱ .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Jera manele tso ̱ jeska wa te ijewa iia ̱ isha : — ¿ Je rä bas ji shä burro yaba yäkksa ̱ na ?

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka jiräni Jesús te ishami ijewa ia ̱ käi , jera ite ijewa jawa ̱ .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Ñerä je burro yaba detse ̱ ijewa wa ̱ Jesús wäki ̱ , je ki ̱ shuawa ̱ ijewa te iwakwa wa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ wà , je ki ̱ ije ̱ tkaka ̱ .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Jekäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ je shuami ña ̱ la ki ̱ , ata isaka te ka ̱ kä tia shuami .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Jera iwätsa ̱ k dami wa irä iitäki ̱ datse ̱ wa irä kjoyir dami : “ ¡ Hosana ! ¡ Bäije ale daju ̱ Säkekewa kie ja ̱ mi rä !

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Bäije ale sa ká David gobiernoí däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a rä . ¡ Hosana ikjeiyinopa ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ si ̱ ska !

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Jekäi Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ Jerusalén ska , mineju ̱ Temploka . Jeska ite jibä tso ̱ biköle su ̱ a . Ata ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ irä ki ̱ ka ibiteju ̱ ni doce wa ra Betania ka .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Bulirishtä ra Betania ska iminejuluni , jera iktawa ̱ bäli te .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Jera higuera kate kä ta su ̱ a ite beshyeka , jekäi imineju ̱ isu ̱ ak wä ta irä í ̱ ki ̱ ka ; ata idemi iska ra , ka iwä juena , kä ja ̱ r ebä irä , ka irä higo wänaklä ke ̱ i kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Ñerä ite je ia ̱ isha : — Mik a ̱ ni ke yi ku ̱ bä wä kätöpa ji ̱ a . Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je ssa .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Jera idemijuluni Jerusalén ka , kjawa ̱ ju ̱ Templo na . Jera ije ̱ kaka ̱ jile watju ̱ ak wa , jile tju ̱ ak wa tso ̱ Templo ska patkä tuläkksa ̱ je ektaka , ñakäi ite inaklä manewa ̱ k wa mesa irä , namala watju ̱ ak wa kalwá irä , je manewa ̱ tulami .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Ñakäi ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ikjäkläju ̱ däli wäkseka Templo kja ̱ ne .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Jera ite sa pakta te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Ka iyöle katke rä : “ Yis ju kirmi rä ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa biköle ka ̱ kiäklä jui ni na ? ” Ata bas te je iawa ̱ wa ̱ jakbläk wa ñabläklä jui ye .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä jewa te je ktei ssa ra , ijewa te ibiketsa maikäi ra ite iktemiwa ̱ . Ata isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ iyika , je rä ditsä biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ite sa pakteke ̱ te ki ̱ ka .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ kja ra , je jukläyäkä ska iminejulumi .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Sa ̱ ñireebä ikjamini ra , ijewa te isu ̱ a ra , ale higuera je ssi ̱ nawa ̱ kalabe ñak kichaje .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Jera Pedro je ̱ r ja ̱ na te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Rabí , isu ̱ o . Je higuera ia ̱ ba te ji yakei sha o ̱ nak , je ssi ̱ nawa ̱ .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ku ̱ Säkeklä biketsö .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te ishe jí ka ̱ tsä ia ̱ : “ Bä tse ̱ no ju ̱ nomi däyë naka ” ni ra , ka biketsale kuna ije ̱ r ska kaile ni ra , ata ite ibiketsa ji sha ite je o ̱ rmi si ̱ ra , jera je o ̱ rmi iia ̱ .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ji kieke ̱ bas te käi ka ̱ kie wà , je biketsö etkabä , je rä me ̱ le kja bas ia ̱ ni , jera je o ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Bas je ̱ k duäraka ̱ ka ̱ kiäk ra , ikuna ji te bas kju ̱ atkewe ̱ ke ̱ sa saka ra , je jöwa ̱ bitaba bas ku ̱ , je rä ñakäi bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wa ̱ bas jäkläwa ̱ bitaba bas shirile ki ̱ ka .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Ata ka bas wa ̱ sa saka janewa ̱ bitaba ra , ñaebä bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir wa ̱ ka bas janakwa ̱ bitaba bas shirile ki ̱ ka .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Jekäi idemijuluni Jerusalén . Jera ishkä kaldu Templo ska ra , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä , jewa demijulu iwäki ̱ .

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: Jewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Yibä ka ̱ wei wà ba te jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä na ? ¿ Yi te ba ia ̱ ka ̱ wei ma ba wa ̱ jekäi iwa ̱ klä rä na ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ata Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Yis ma etka bas chakäk , bas te yis kúka ra , yie ishemi bas ia ̱ yibä ka ̱ wei wà yie jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä käi .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Juan te sä wäukewa ̱ , ¿ je datse ̱ rä ka ̱ jöir ska na , ata ditsä ska na ? Yis kúkö bas ku ̱ .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ipaka ñaia ̱ te isha : “ Sa te ikúkemi ka ̱ jöir ska ni ra , tsi ite ishe rä : ‘ Jekäi irä ra , ¿ jiye ka bas wa ̱ iktä kolone rä na ? ’

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Ata sä te ikúkemi ditsä ska ni ra , je rä däläna . ” Je rä ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ yika , biköle ia ̱ ra iyina si ̱ Juan rä jile bata shäk ki ̱ ka .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te Jesús kúka te isha : — Ka sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer . Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ñaebä ka yis wa ̱ iyinak bas ia ̱ , yibä ka ̱ wei wà yis te jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä ni .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Jekjepa ite ijewa ia ̱ ji pakami jile she ja ̱ mi jikäi : “ Ekla te uva yäkä je ̱ wa ̱ bakla , kjätkaksa ̱ ite shkiritke , ite iwä wätuäklä bia , ñakäi ikjänanaklä yua ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ , jekäi ite je peitata ̱ na shka ̱ bläk wa ia ̱ , kjepa iwakei mineju ̱ mi ka ̱ ka ̱ mii .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Iwä älinaklä ke ̱ i ska ra , ite kjanaklä ekla patkaté je shka ̱ bläk wa wäki ̱ , uva yäkä wä moska kukäk .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Ata ijewa te je kukawa ̱ kpa ta ̱ i , patkamini ite jula wäyaka .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Jera ite kjanaklä el patkaténi ijewa wäki ̱ , ata ijewa te je kpa itsa ̱ ku ̱ na , iweika diekjela .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Jera ite iel patkaténi , ata je ktawa ̱ ijewa te . Jekäi ite isaka patkaténi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , jewa moska kpa ite , moska ktacha ̱ wa ite .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: “ Ñerä ekla ebä a ̱ ta ̱ na iwakei ia ̱ , je rä iyaba iwa ̱ shka ̱ ta ; bata jekje ra ite je patkaté ijewa wäki ̱ , te isha : ‘ Yis yaba je dälätsemiwa ̱ ijewa te . ’

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Ata je shka ̱ bläk wa te isha ñaia ̱ : ‘ Ije ne ia ̱ iká däli ukä rä däkksa ̱ rä ; je ki ̱ ka sä shkä iktäkwa ̱ , jera ji rä däkksa ̱ iia ̱ je dämiksa ̱ saje cha ye . ’

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te je kukawa ̱ ktawa ̱ , nu ̱ l ju ̱ aksa ̱ ite uva yäkä ektaka .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: “ Jera ¿ jibä we ̱ mi je uva yäkä wakei te na ? Je bitämi te je shka ̱ bläk wa weikeche ̱ miwa ̱ , kjepa ite uva yäkä me ̱ mini isaka ia ̱ .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: “ ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ kte yöle jikäi rä wayile na ? Je te ishe rä : ‘ Jak ju ̱ leksa ̱ ju yuäk wa wa ̱ , je ne rä delewa ̱ ju ñak wäkukäk bäi si ̱ ye rä .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Säkekewa ne wa ̱ je o ̱ le rä , juer ta baa si ̱ sä wäna rä . ’ ”

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Jera ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra ijewa ne sha ite je jile she ja ̱ mi rä , je kju ̱ ei ijewa te ibiketsa maikäi ra ite ikukemiwa ̱ ; ata ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ ditsä yika , je ki ̱ ka ijewa te ijawa ̱ minejulu iyika .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Je ukä ska ijewa te fariseo wa irä , Herodes ja ̱ mi wa irä sha ̱ patkami iwäki ̱ iwächakewa ̱ k wäsi ̱ wa , jiräni iwa ̱ ishä ta í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Jewa dejulu te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba ktä rä bulee , jekäi ba ia ̱ ra yi irä käi , ka je rä ji iá kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ba te sa ̱ su ̱ e rä sa pa juer ebä wà kuna , ata ba te sa pakteke ̱ rä bulee maikäi shke Säkeklä ja ̱ mi rä je ktei wà . Jekäi ¿ ka ̱ tso ̱ inaklä ma ̱ klä César ia ̱ na , ata kai ? ¿ Sá te ime ̱ na , ata ka sá te ime ̱ ?

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Ata ijewa te ji sheke ̱ rä kjäbata ebä wà te ije ̱ r ku ̱ a , jekäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas te yis mable su ̱ eke ̱ wäsi ̱ wa rä na ? Denario cho ̱ té ' sia ̱ yis wa ̱ su ̱ nak .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Jera ijewa te icha ̱ mi iia ̱ , jera ite ijewa ia ̱ ichaka : — ¿ Yibä me ̱ i jí rä , yibä kie yöle ija ̱ mi rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — César je ̱ .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jera ji rä César ia ̱ je mo César ia ̱ , ata ji rä Säkeklä ia ̱ je mo Säkeklä ia ̱ . Jekäi jewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ije te .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Ñerä saduceo wa demijulu iwäki ̱ . Jewa te ishe rä ka sä rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ; jewa te ichaka iia ̱ te isha :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: — Sapaktäk , Moisés wa ̱ iyöleta ̱ na sa ̱ ia ̱ rä : ‘ Ikuna manele el duawa ̱ te ise ̱ naklä ju ̱ ata ̱ na , ka yaba a ̱ ta ̱ leta ̱ na kuna ra , iel se ̱ rwa ̱ ni je alaklä ra , yaba su ̱ ak iel yäbei ye . ’

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Jekäi ñael wa ebä bakle siete ; ikibi si ̱ se ̱ nawa ̱ alaklä ra , ata je duawa ̱ ka yäbei a ̱ ta ̱ leta ̱ na kuna .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Jekäi iel se ̱ nawa ̱ ni ira , ata ñaebä je duawa ̱ ka yaba a ̱ ta ̱ leta ̱ na kuna . Je su ̱ ta iel idäkläka ̱ mañal ukä ja ̱ mi io ̱ na ñaebä .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Jekäi ebä je siete wa biköle duacha ̱ wa ̱ ka yäbei a ̱ ta ̱ leta ̱ na kuna ; bata jekje ra je alaklä duawa ̱ ñaebä .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Jekäi je siete wa wa ̱ ibakle ialaklä ye ra , jera sa ̱ shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni ska ra ijewa shki ̱ naka ̱ ni ra , ¿ mane si ̱ se ̱ naklä ye ije dämiksa ̱ ni rä na ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ ne kte yöle ia ̱ , ñakäi Säkeklä täkili ia ̱ ; ¿ ka irä je ne ki ̱ bas shirinacha ̱ wa ̱ rä na ?

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Iwa rä ijewa shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ra , ka jewa rä se ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna , ñakäi ka jewa rä me ̱ nak kuna se ̱ nakwa ̱ , ata jewa rä jishtä ángel wa tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska käi .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Ata dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni je wapakäklä ra , Moisés wa ̱ äyë yöle ki ̱ ipakale , maikäi Säkeklä kta ira kal yaba ska käi , je te isha rä : ‘ Yis dä Abraham Kekläí , Isaac Kekläí , Jacob Kekläí ’ ni ¿ je ktei ka wayíle bas wa ̱ na ?

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Ka ije rä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa Kekläí kuna , ata ije rä sä kseka wa ne Kekläí . Ata e ̱ e ̱ na bas shirinacha ̱ wa ̱ rä .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Jera ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa ekla deju ̱ , je te ijewa ñawächake ̱ wa ̱ tso ̱ je ssa . Jera je te isu ̱ a ite ijewa kúka rä bäi ra , je te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Sa pakale ji wa ̱ k etkä etkä biköle ska ra , mane rä isaka tsa ̱ ta rä na ?

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Jí ne rä ibäi si ̱ rä : ‘ ¡ Israel wa , issö ! Säkekewa saje wa Kekläí , je Säkekewa rä eklabä .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Ba ku ̱ Säkekewa ba Kekläí shka ̱ li ̱ blö ma je ̱ r ska ji tso ̱ kalabe wà , ba wakei kalabe wà , bä ka ̱ biketsä kalabe wà , bä täkili kalabe wà . ’

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Je itäki ̱ rä jikäi : ‘ Ba ku ̱ ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ blö jishtä ba wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi . ’ Jí sa pakale ji wa ̱ k botkä je tsa ̱ ta ka isaka kuna .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Ñerä je je ̱ k yöle ka ̱ wei wà te isha ia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , bäi ba te isha je rä iyina si ̱ , ije rä eklabä , ka isaka kuna , ata ije ebä .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ishka ̱ li ̱ ble sa ̱ je ̱ r ska ji tso ̱ kalabe wà , sa ̱ je ̱ rikäke ̱ kalabe wà , sa wakei kalabe wà , sä täkili kalabe wà , ñakäi sa saka shka ̱ li ̱ ble jishtä sa wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi , je rä jile däläwe ̱ , jile me ̱ ka ̱ iwänaka bena tsa ̱ ta .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Jera Jesús te issa ra je ka ̱ wei wà sä yuäk te ikúka rä je ̱ r ta käi , jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Ka ba rä butsäleju ̱ mi kuna ka ̱ mii Säkeklä gobiernoí yika . Jeska ra ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ iwächakewa ̱ klei ji ̱ a .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Jekäi Jesús te sa pakte kate Templo ska ra , ite ijewa chaka te isha : — ¿ Jiye ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa te ishe Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä David yäbei ni rä na ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Ñera David wakei wa ̱ iyile Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi rä : “ Säkekewa te isha yis Säkekewaí ia ̱ : Ma je ̱ tköwa ̱ yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne , bikökje yie bä bolki wa tulacha ̱ wa ̱ bä klä tkäkläka ̱ iki ̱ ka kje . ”

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Jekäi David wakei te ikia Säkekewa ni ra , ¿ maikäi jera je rä iyäbei rä na ? Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ te iktä ssa bäi ebä .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Jekäi ite sa pakte rami ji ̱ a te isha : “ Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa yika . Jewa ssërke ̱ rä shkäk paiklä so ̱ lo ̱ rbe wà , ijewa wäbätsä rä ime chakarpa sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska wà ,

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: ñapaktäklä jui ska ra , oloi ta wa je ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ wà , yakana mar ska ra , oloi ta wa je ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ wà .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Jewa te alaklä wa chichö wa ju bäke ju ̱ eke ̱ mi , ñakäi ijewa ka ̱ kiäke ̱ jaree kje juenak ebä . Jewa buka ̱ nami e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ . ”

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Je ukä ska Jesús je ̱ tkawa ̱ ofrenda jiäklä jui wäja ̱ mi , je te maikäi biköle te inaklä jie kate ijui naka rä je su ̱ e kalme . Jera blu wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ijie kate ta ̱ i .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Jera ekla alaklä chichö ka jita deju ̱ , je te inaklä wäka botkä tsi ̱ dala si ̱ jiawa ̱ , säkei ta cuadrante etka .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Ñerä ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa kia jaté iwäja ̱ mi , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je chichö ka jita te ijia rä biköle te ijieke ̱ ofrenda jiäklä jui ja ̱ rka je tsa ̱ ta .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , biköle te rä iwa ̱ ji tso ̱ ta ̱ i wäukäla ne jia rä , ata je ka jita te rä ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ kalabe , ije ̱ k se ̱ newa ̱ klä kalabe ne jia rä .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Templo ska ideksa ̱ ju ̱ ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ekla te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , ¡ Jí kje kje jak tso ̱ su ̱ o ! ¡ Jí kje kje ju tso ̱ su ̱ o !

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Bas te jí ju tso ̱ ta ̱ i ta ̱ i su ̱ a na ? Jeska jak etka a ̱ ni ka a ̱ ta ̱ nak isaka bata ki ̱ ka , ka miletkäwa ̱ kuna käi .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ tkawa ̱ Olivo yäkä Bata ska Templo wäsaka . Jera Pedro irä Juan irä Jacobo irä Andrés irä , jewa te ichaka iia ̱ iwakwa ebä :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: — “ Sá ia ̱ ishö : ¿ bikökje jile o ̱ rmi jekäi rä na ? ¿ Jibä juermi säkätäba ijuenaklä ye je biköle o ̱ r mar kja irä na ? ”

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Jera Jesús te ishami ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ bas wäyuäkläwa ̱ .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dämi ji ̱ a yis kie ja ̱ mi ishäk : ‘ Yis ne irä ’ ni , jewa te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wäyueche ̱ miwa ̱ .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: “ Mika ̱ bas te ipalei ssa ñabukanate iräle , ñabukana mar iräle , jera ke bas je ̱ r ianak . Ikiana o ̱ nak rä jekäi , jeiräta ka sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ rwa ̱ ba .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Jera ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa ñajämika ̱ ñakpäk ñara , ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ñajämika ̱ ñakpäk ñara . Ka ̱ wäbuka ̱ nami ka ̱ etkä etkä ska . Bäli ja ̱ rmi sa ̱ ki ̱ . Je rä jishtä alaklä wa duäksa ̱ yaba ki ̱ käi .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: “ Ata bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na je ̱ k ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas tulurmiksa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wa ia ̱ . Bas buka ̱ nami ñapaktäklä jui shtä ska . Bas jäklermika ̱ ka ̱ wäkiri wa wäja ̱ mi , ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wäja ̱ mi , yis kju ̱ ei , bas wa ̱ yis ktei shäklä ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Ata säkätäba kte baa ne kiana wapauta ̱ nakksa ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska rä .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jekäi mika ̱ bas ma jar tulunakksa ̱ ra , ke bas je ̱ r ianak jini bas te ishemi käi . Ata je wäsaka ji me ̱ rke ̱ bas ia ̱ yinak käi , je shö bas ku ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka je rä bas wakwa ktäke ̱ kuna , ata je rä Wikblu Sikina ne ktäke ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Jera iel te iel ebä ju ̱ emiksa ̱ kota ̱ nakwa ̱ ; ñakäi iká te iyaba ju ̱ emiksa ̱ kota ̱ nakwa ̱ ; ñakäi iyabala manermika ̱ iká wa ktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Jekäi biköle te bas dokoitsemiwa ̱ yis kie kju ̱ ei . Ata yi chatkawa ̱ ma rä ibata jekje ra , je rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: “ Ata mika ̱ bas te isu ̱ e ale ji dokoitsalewa ̱ ji weikäkwa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na je dewa ̱ mai ka ikiar däkwa ̱ shtä ska ra ( je kte washäk je ̱ r ko ̱ nopa je ia ̱ ) , jera yi tso ̱ Judea ska julunomipa ka ̱ tsä naka iyika .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Yi kaldu ju tsibata yöle shpatke ki ̱ ra , ke je bitawa ̱ ni kjäkwa ̱ iju na jile tso ̱ tsa ̱ kksa ̱ .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Yi kaldu shka ̱ bläklä ska ra , ke ibitani shäbeka iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ tsa ̱ k .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Wekte je ke ̱ i ska alaklä wa tso ̱ kjä ye wa rä , ñakäi tsu ma ̱ ke ̱ ji ̱ a wa rä !

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Bas ka ̱ kiö ka je o ̱ naklä kuna ka ̱ tse ̱ l ke ̱ i wà .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je ke ̱ i ska sä weikarmi , ka jekäi weikane bakle mik a ̱ ni säkätä ji yöleksa ̱ yuaksa ̱ Säkeklä te skaté bite rä jira kje , ñakäi je su ̱ ta ji ka o ̱ nakni mik a ̱ ni .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Ikuna Säkekewa ku ̱ ke je ke ̱ i wäja ̱ wo ̱ pa ra , yi a ̱ ni ka tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ ; ata sä kolole wa kolole iwa ̱ jewa bata ki ̱ ka ite je ke ̱ i wäja ̱ we ̱ miwa ̱ .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: “ Jera ikuna yilé te ishe bas ia ̱ : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Säbäkäkksa ̱ kaldu jiska ’ ni iräle , ‘ ¡ Issö ! Ikaldu a ̱ mi ska ’ ni iräle , jera ke iktä kuka .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä wäyuäk sä bäkäkksa ̱ ye wa irä , jile bata shäk ye wa irä , ñajämika ̱ te ijuenaklä shtä irä , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä irä kjashemi , sä kolole wa kuna wäyönak ra , jewa wäyönakläwa ̱ pa ye .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Ata bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ , yie ji biköle bata sha bas ia ̱ ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ kba ki ̱ ka .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: “ Ata je weikane ta ̱ i ke ̱ i kjaju ̱ ukä ska ra , ka ̱ wä wätuirmiwa ̱ , tulu oloi ka ñinak ji ̱ a ,

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: ka ̱ jöir bekwä jolortémi , ñakäi ka ̱ jöir ji tso ̱ oloi ta wa wäbuka ̱ namika ̱ .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Jekjepa ijewa te ditsä yäbei dawa ̱ ju ̱ té mo ̱ ja ̱ rka oloi ta ta ̱ i , wäñileka ̱ oloo su ̱ emi .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Jera ite iángel wa patkemi , ije te iwa ̱ kolole wa tapawe ̱ miwa ̱ etka yebä si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ nak cuatro , jöi wà dia wà a ̱ mi wà jí wà skaté , ishäkä wätkerke ̱ wa ̱ ska ma rä ka ̱ jöir wätkerke ̱ wa ̱ ska . ’

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: “ Jile she higuera ja ̱ mi , je kukö bas ku ̱ : Mika ̱ ijula dului peri jè ̱ r mar da , je wà bas je ̱ r ku ̱ e ite duas tker dawa ̱ kja irä .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Je su ̱ ta mika ̱ bas te jekäi ji o ̱ rke ̱ su ̱ a ra , jera je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ kja alemana ju kjä ska irä .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je biköle o ̱ rmi jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ka tuarcha ̱ wa ̱ ba yika .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä je e ̱ rmiwa ̱ , ata yis ktä ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ mik a ̱ ni .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: “ Ata bikökje je díaí , je horaí räle , je ka ju ̱ ñer yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ , ángel wa tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska wa ̱ iräle , iyaba wa ̱ iräle ; ata Sa Ká ebä ne wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer dä .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: “ ¡ Issö , bas se ̱ no je ̱ rki ̱ i ̱ ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka bas wa ̱ bikökje je ke ̱ i rä ju ̱ ñer ki ̱ ka .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Je rä jishtä ekla miju ̱ ka ̱ mii ra , ite iju ju ̱ eta ̱ na te ikjanaklä wa ia ̱ ji ju ̱ eta ̱ na ju ̱ ñenak , te ekla ekla ia ̱ shka ̱ ble me ̱ ta ̱ na , te ju kjä kukäk pake se ̱ nak wäñilee käi .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas wa ̱ mika ̱ je ju wakei däni räle ka ju ̱ ñer ; ka ̱ miskla iräle , ka ̱ sha ̱ sha ̱ iräle , oshkoro a ̱ r wà iräle , sa ̱ ñir da iräle ;

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: je rä ideju ̱ plaa ra , ka iwa ̱ bas ku ̱ aklä käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Jishtä yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , jekäi biköle ia ̱ yie ishe : Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ . ”

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä , pan ñaklä ka levadura ta je ke ̱ i sher ji ̱ a böiki shtä ebä . Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä jewa te ibiketse kate maikäi si ̱ ra iia ̱ Jesús kolormiwa ̱ ka ̱ yue wà kota ̱ nakwa ̱ käi .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Ata ijewa te isha : — Ke sa ̱ ku ̱ iwa ̱ ike ̱ i kjewe ̱ sha ̱ na , iö ditsä wätji ̱ rka ̱ ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Jesús katke Betania ska ra , ije ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk Simón ale kotäle lepra wa ̱ je ju ska . Jera alaklä ekla deju ̱ , je wa ̱ perfume yöle nardo wak si ̱ wà säkei ta doloiebä shkä , jui ta yöle alabastro wà . Jekäi ite je jui yöle alabastro wà kuli pja ̱ ksa ̱ , je watkaka ̱ ite Jesús tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Ata jeska moska tso ̱ wa kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ite je perfume weikawa ̱ kjermita jekäi rä na ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Ñera je perfume kuna wato ̱ le ju ̱ lemi ra , je säkei deksa ̱ rä tresciento denario tsa ̱ ta , me ̱ nak ka jita wa ia ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te je alaklä sha yakei .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Ata Jesús te isha : — Ijöwa ̱ bitaba . ¿ Jiye bas te ije weike na ? Ije te ji baa ne wá ̱ yis ia ̱ rä .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , del ka jita wa tso ̱ bas sha ̱ na rä . Jekäi bas ki ̱ ishena ra ka ̱ tso ̱ bas ia ̱ bas wa ̱ ji wa ̱ klä bäi ijewa ia ̱ . Ata yis je ka se ̱ nak del bas sha ̱ na .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Ije te iwá ̱ bikö iia ̱ io ̱ r ja ̱ mi ; ije te yis yaka jalawa ̱ kja ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ kba yis itäbinakläwa ̱ .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka ̱ biköle ska mai kte baa wapauta ̱ nami käi ra , ji wá ̱ ije te je ktei pakarmiña sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä ije ska .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Jera Judas Iscariote wa , ale doce wa sha ̱ ekla , je mineju ̱ mi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wäki ̱ ka iwa ̱ Jesús ju ̱ akläksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te je ssa ra , issëna a ̱ naa , jera ijewa kabla iia ̱ inaklä ma ̱ k . Jeska ra ije te ibiketsami maikäi si ̱ ra ka ̱ dämiksa ̱ iia ̱ iwa ̱ iju ̱ akläksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ käi .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Jekäi pan ñaklä ka levadura ta , je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä säkätä dewa ̱ , je ke ̱ i wà oveja yaba rä kota ̱ nakwa ̱ , Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä . Jekäi iwa ̱ dulanak wa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Mai ba ki ̱ sá shena minak jile äliwa ̱ k Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä , je ñaklä ba wa ̱ rä na ?

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Jera ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa patkami bol , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Bas cho ̱ jukläyäkä sha ̱ na , jeska jäiyi ekla dämiksa ̱ bas wäki ̱ , je wa ̱ u ̱ yaka u ̱ í diklä tsa ̱ klä damitse ̱ . Je itäki bas mi ,

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: jera mai imawa ̱ ju ̱ ska ra , ju wakei ia ̱ ishö : ‘ Sapaktäk te ishaté : ¿ Mai yis ia ̱ ju ja ̱ r tso ̱ yis wa ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä ñaklä yis wa ̱ dulanak wa ra rä na ? ’

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Jera ije te ju ja ̱ r ta ̱ i yöle ietkä ki ̱ ka kjashemi bas ia ̱ , ja ̱ r bäile e ̱ ná , jile ta bäi . Jeska bas te jile äliwe ̱ ba sá yika .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ñerä iwa ̱ dulanak wa minemi kjawa ̱ julu jukläyäkä naka , te iku ̱ a jishtä ite isha iia ̱ käi . Jera ijewa te Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je äliwa ̱ .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Jera ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra , ideju ̱ ale doce wa ra .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Ijewa ñatulawa ̱ yäkä tso ̱ ra , Jesús te isha : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas sha ̱ ekla yäkäk yis da te yis ju ̱ emiksa ̱ .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Jera ijewa je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ te ichakami iia ̱ ekla ekla : — ¿ Yis le irä ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Je rä doce wa sha ̱ ekla . Mane te pan nu ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ yis daña taza na ne irä .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Iyina si ̱ ra , ditsä yäbei maju ̱ mi rä jiräni ije ktei yöle katke rä ja ̱ mi , ata ¡ wekte ditsä yäbei ju ̱ akksa ̱ wakei rä ! Ije wakei ia ̱ ra bäi si ̱ rä ke iko ̱ nopa .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Ijewa yäkä kajali ji ̱ a ra , Jesús te pan kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ika ̱ kia , kjepa je butsa ma ̱ ite ijewa ia ̱ , te isha : — A ̱ ju ̱ . Jí rä yis yaka .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Kjepa ite copa kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ ; kjepa ite ima ̱ ijewa ia ̱ , jekäi biköle te je ya .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jí rä yis pi , sa kabläklä ñaia ̱ spa ̱ na je pií ; je rä tkenakju ̱ mi sä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa kju ̱ ei .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka yis wa ̱ uva diä yanakni , ma rä ike ̱ i dewa ̱ yis wa ̱ iyäkläni Säkeklä gobiernoí ska kjepa .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Jekäi ijewa ksa etka ra , iminejulumi Olivo Yäkä Bataka .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas biköle te yis jemiwa ̱ ta ̱ na . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : ‘ Yie oveja kjänanak ktemiwa ̱ , jera oveja butsa ̱ nami iyika . ’

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Ata yis shki ̱ naka ̱ ni ra , yis maju ̱ bas wätsa ̱ kba Galileaka .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Jera Pedro te isha iia ̱ : — Bena te bä jawa ̱ ra , yis je wa ̱ ka ba janakwa ̱ .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ba ia ̱ , jir tuina ebä ka oshkoro a ̱ rka ̱ ba botäbä kicha yikaba , ba ka ̱ yuämiwa ̱ mañatabä kicha ka ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ni .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Ata ije te isha ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta : — Ikuna yis kiana duäkwa ̱ ña ba ra , jeiräta a ̱ ni ka yis ka ̱ yuäkwa ̱ ka yis wa ̱ ba su ̱ le ni . Jera biköle te isha ñassëta .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Jera idemijulu ka ̱ kie Getsemaní ska , jera ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Bas ñajöklöwa ̱ jiska yis maju ̱ ka ̱ kiäk dälei ja ̱ mi .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Ata ite Pedro irä , Jacobo irä , Juan irä jewa kia jámiña ira . Jeska ra ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ , issënawa ̱ shi ̱ ana si ̱ .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Ñerä ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis je ̱ r ianawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , sä duärawa ̱ kje . Bas a ̱ ta ̱ no jiska , bas wäñino .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Jera imineju ̱ a ̱ mikwäta , jeska ije ̱ tkawa ̱ wakteka i ̱ ski ̱ . Jera ika ̱ kia je hora kjäkläju ̱ pa iki ̱ , ikuna io ̱ nopa ra .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Je te isha : “ Abba , Papá , ji biköle o ̱ r ba ia ̱ . Jí copa tso ̱ ju ̱ omipa yis yika ; ata we ka yis wakei ki ̱ ishena käi kuna , ata jishtä ba ki ̱ ishena käi io ̱ nopa . ”

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Jera ideni te ijewa ku ̱ a käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ite isha Pedro ia ̱ : — Simón , ¿ ba kapawa ̱ na ? Ata ¿ ka bä täkili deneka ̱ wäñinak una horabä jibä na ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Bas wäñino , bas ka ̱ kiö ka bas shirinakläwa ̱ kuna . Iyina si ̱ ra sä wikblu ssëna ji wa ̱ k , ata sa yaka rä ka täki ta .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Jekäi etäbä kicha imineju ̱ ni ka ̱ kiäk , te ishani jiräni ite isha ssëta .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Jera ideju ̱ ni te ijewa ku ̱ ani käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ , ka ijewa ia ̱ käpe wäkolor ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ka ijewa je ̱ r na idene jiräni ite ikúkeí ̱ ska .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Jera ideni idäkläka ̱ mañatäbä kicha ra ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ata ¿ je rä bas käpä rami ji ̱ a , bas je rä dami ji ̱ a ebä na ? ¡ Bäi irä ! Ihoraí dewa ̱ e ̱ ná . ¡ Issö ! Ditsä yäbei , je rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ditsä yakeila jula na .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: ¡ Bas ñajöka ̱ , sä shkä ! ¡ Isu ̱ o ! Yis ju ̱ akksa ̱ daju ̱ té e ̱ ná .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Ije te je she kaldu ji ̱ a kjela bä ra , Judas ale doce wa sha ̱ ekla je deju ̱ té chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ra espada ta kal wälbe ta , patkele chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa wa ̱ , sä wäkiri wa wa ̱ .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Je iju ̱ akksa ̱ wa ̱ ijewa rä je ̱ r ko ̱ le e ̱ ná jikäi : “ Mane wäjalassërawa ̱ yis te ra , je ne irä ; je kuköwa ̱ , tso ̱ mi ka yele ju ̱ lemi ta . ”

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Jera ideju ̱ ra , ije ̱ k sikawa ̱ plaa iwäja ̱ mi te isha : — ¡ Rabí ! Jera ite iwä jalassawa ̱ .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Jera ijewa jula tka ̱ wa ̱ ija ̱ mi te ikukawa ̱ .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Ata jeska kajali wa ekla espada sikaksa ̱ , je wà ite chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kjanaklä bika , kukä tia ju ̱ ami .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas bite espada ta , kal wälbe ta yis kukäkwa ̱ jishtä jakbläk wa kukewa ̱ käi na ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Buliri buliri yis kaldu bas da sa paktäk Templo ska ra , ñera ka bas wa ̱ yis kukäwa ̱ ta . Ata jí o ̱ rte rä io ̱ naklä jishtä kte yöle te ishe käi .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa biköle te ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na , julunami iyika .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Ata dulaklei ekla je dami iitäki ̱ , je ̱ k pabutälewa ̱ dätsi ebä wà , je kukawa ̱ ijewa te .

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: Ata je dätsi yëna ju ̱ namita ̱ na , iwakei tu ̱ nami ju ̱ li ̱ shye .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Jera Jesús minetse ̱ ijewa wa ̱ chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wäki ̱ . Jera biköle chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä sä wäkiri wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä jewa ñatapawa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Jera Pedro damiju ̱ iitäki ̱ ka ̱ miika , demi chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i juitäki ̱ kje , je ̱ tkawa ̱ Templo kjänanak wa sha ̱ na banakña yökö kjä ja ̱ mi .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Ñerä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä Sanedrín wa biköle irä jewa te Jesús kjatiäklä yula iwa ̱ iktäkläwa ̱ , ata ka iwa ̱ iko ̱ ne .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Iwa rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ikjatia ka ̱ yue wà , jeiräta ite ikjatia rä ka ñasse ta kuna .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Jera isha ̱ ñajaklaka ̱ , je te ikjatia ka ̱ yue wà te isha :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: — Ije wa ̱ iyile ssa sá te jikäi : ‘ Yie jí Templo yöle jula wà je mie ̱ tkemiwa ̱ , ata tres día ra yie isaka yuemika ̱ ni ka jula wà kuna . ’

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Ata maitjä ka iwa ̱ ikjatene ñassëta .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je ̱ kaka ̱ ijewa sha ̱ na , je te ichaka Jesús ia ̱ , te isha : — Ata ¿ ka ba te ikúke na ? ¿ Jiräni ijewa te ba kjatieke ̱ wà rä na ?

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Ata ije si ̱ wa ̱ tiawa ̱ , wa ̱ ka ikúkane a ̱ ni . Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te ichakani etäbä kicha te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ba ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ , ale Kjeiyinak Baa je yaba rä na ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Yis ne irä . Jekäi bas te ditsä yäbei su ̱ emi je ̱ tkelewa ̱ ale Täkili ta Ta ̱ i je jula wämo kja ̱ ne , ñakäi je dawa ̱ ju ̱ té ka ̱ jöir mo ̱ ja ̱ rka je su ̱ emi bas te .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te iwakei paiklä ksha ju ̱ ami , te isha : — ¿ Jiye sa ̱ ki ̱ ikjatiäk wa shena ji ̱ a na ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Ikta yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi , je ssa bas te . Jekäi ra , ¿ jishtä bas ia ̱ ra irä na ? Jera ijewa biköle te isha nui ta irä , je kiana rä duäkwa ̱ .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Jera ijewa sha ̱ kjali tjuami ija ̱ mi , te iwä pamu ̱ awa ̱ tiami jula wà , te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Ji shöka ̱ jile bata shäk ye ! Jera ñaebä Templo kjänanak wa te ikukawa ̱ buka ̱ nak jula ktä wà .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Pedro katke diakja ̱ ne juitä ki ̱ . Ñerä alaklä wa chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kjanaklä wa ekla deju ̱ ,

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: te Pedro bar kalme su ̱ a ra , jera iwätka isu ̱ ak te isha : — Ba ñaebä kalduña je Jesús Nazaret wa ra .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Ata ika ̱ yuawa ̱ te isha : — Ka yis wa ̱ ije su ̱ le ; jibä sheke ̱ ba te rä ka ju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ . Jera imineksa ̱ ju ̱ sä däkläwa ̱ ska ra , oshkoro a ̱ naka ̱ .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Jera je kjanaklä te isu ̱ ani ra , ibanaka ̱ ni ishäk jeska tso ̱ wa ia ̱ : — Jí rä ijewa sha ̱ ekla .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Ata ije ka ̱ yuawa ̱ ni . Berbena ebä ra jeska kajali wa te ishani etäbä kicha Pedro ia ̱ : — Iyina si ̱ ra ba rä ijewa sha ̱ ekla , ba rä Galilea wa ki ̱ ka .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Jera ije te jile shami je ̱ k ukä ja ̱ mi o ̱ nak shi ̱ ana , te isha etkabä : — Ka yis wa ̱ yi sheke ̱ ba te je su ̱ le .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Jera je wäsaka oshkoro a ̱ naka ̱ ni etäbä kicha , jera Pedro je ̱ r ja ̱ na jiräni Jesús te isha iia ̱ rä ska : “ Ka oshkoro a ̱ rka ̱ ba botäbä kicha yikaba , ba ka ̱ yuämiwa ̱ mañatäbä kicha , ka ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ni . ” Ñerä Pedro je ̱ r ja ̱ na jeska ra , iji ̱ aksa ̱ .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ ñireebä ra , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a e ̱ ná sä wäkiri wa ra , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa ra , Sanedrín wa biköle ra , ijewa te Jesús mu ̱ awa ̱ tsa ̱ mi ju ̱ aksa ̱ Pilato ia ̱ .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Jera Pilato te iwächakewa ̱ : — ¿ Ba ne rä Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä na ? Jera ite ikúka te isha : — Ba te je shaka ̱ .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Jekäi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ikjatia ta ̱ i .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Jera Pilato te iwächakewa ̱ ni etäbä kicha te isha : — ¿ Ata ka ba te ikúke na ? Ijewa te ba kjatieke ̱ rä saka saka , ssö .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Jeiräta del Jesús wa ̱ ka ikúkane jini a ̱ ni , je te Pilato male ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Del ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä sha ̱ na ra , ije te sä wätelewa ̱ wa ekla wäyeke ̱ ksa ̱ ni ditsä ia ̱ , mane kieke ̱ ijewa te iia ̱ käi .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Jera ekla kie Barrabás ni kate wätelewa ̱ itsa ̱ tkäk wa ra , ijewa kju ̱ atka ka ̱ wei ta wa ra ska ijewa te sa ktacha ̱ wa ̱ je kju ̱ ei .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Jekäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ñajaka ̱ ka ̱ kiäk iwa ̱ iwa ̱ klä ijewa ia ̱ iwädular del käi .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Jera Pilato te ijewa kúka te isha : — ¿ Bas ki ̱ yis shena rä Judío Wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wäyäkksa ̱ ni bas ia ̱ na ?

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Je rä ije wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa je ̱ r ki ̱ Jesús ianawa ̱ rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wäbätsäke ̱ Jesús wà ijewa tsa ̱ ta kju ̱ ei , je ki ̱ ka ijewa te iju ̱ aksa ̱ iia ̱ rä .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Ata chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa je ̱ rtka iwa ̱ Barrabás wäyäkläksa ̱ pani ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Jera etäbä kicha Pilato te ichakani te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jera ji shena bas ki ̱ yis wa ̱ o ̱ nak , jí bas wa ̱ kinak Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ni , je ukä ja ̱ mi rä na ?

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha ijewa kjoyinani : — ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi !

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Jera Pilato te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jera ji wá ̱ ije te yakei rä na ? Ata ijewa kjoyina ki ̱ ta si ̱ : — Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Ñerä Pilato wa ̱ ditsä ssëwa ̱ klä bäi ki ̱ ka ite Barrabás wäyaksa ̱ ni ijewa ia ̱ . Ata ite Jesús ju ̱ aksa ̱ buka ̱ nak ksa bata wà , kjepa wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Jekäi guardia wa wa ̱ iminetse ̱ mi juitä kjätkeleksa ̱ , kie Pretorio ni je na . Jeska ijewa te guardia eyaka wa kalabe tapawa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ijewa te ipajiawa ̱ sua siöö yëna wà , jekäi ijewa te dika butra corona ye tkaka ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Jera ijewa ñajaka ̱ ishäk iia ̱ : — Judío wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ma se ̱ nopa ji ̱ a maitjä .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikpeke ̱ kata wà itsa ̱ ku ̱ na , ikjali tjuäke ̱ ija ̱ mi , ñakäi iñajäkläke ̱ wa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ iwäja ̱ mi .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iweika e ̱ ná ra , ijewa te je sua siöö yëna ya ju ̱ amini , jera ite iwakei paiklä jiawa ̱ ni iia ̱ , kjepa iwa ̱ iminetse ̱ wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Jera ekla tso ̱ kju ̱ awaka daju ̱ téni , je rä Simón Cirene wa , Rufo irä Alejandro irä jewa ká , je paka guardia wa te täkili wà Jesús cruz í kpä tsa ̱ mi .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ijewa wa ̱ iminetse ̱ ka ̱ kie Gólgota ni ska , ( je wà rä “ Tsa ̱ ku ̱ Chichei Ke ̱ i ” ) .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Ijewa te itia vino ji ̱ akaleka ̱ mirra ra je wà , ata ka iwa ̱ iyane .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iwätiaka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ra , ijewa ina su ̱ a jile wà , ijewa wa ̱ ji jienak iwa ̱ bala pja ̱ klä , jibä mi ekla ekla wa ̱ je su ̱ aklä iwa ̱ .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Ijewa te iwätiaka ̱ ra , ka ̱ wä rä las nueve .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Jera ikjatele yöle katke itsa ̱ ka te ishe rä : “ Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i . ”

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Ijewa te jakbläk wa bol wätia tulaka ̱ ña ira cruz saka ja ̱ mi , ekla ijula wämo kja ̱ ne , ekla ijula shule kja ̱ ne .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Jekäi io ̱ na jishtä iyöle te ishe käi : “ Je shtanaña ji yakei wakbläk wa ra . ”

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Jera yi kjäke ̱ mi iwä ja ̱ mi jewa te isheke ̱ wäsi ̱ wa , tsa ̱ ku ̱ wäbuträke ̱ , te isheke ̱ : — ¡ Issö ! Ba , Templo mia ̱ tkäkwa ̱ , tres día ra iyuäkka ̱ ni ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: ba wakei je ̱ k tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ , je ̱ k wäyö ja ̱ wo ̱ té cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Je su ̱ ta chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ija ̱ ñetseke ̱ ka ̱ wei wà ñayöle wa ra , te ishe ̱ ke ̱ ñaia ̱ : — Kju ̱ awa je tsa ̱ tkaksa ̱ ite , ata iwakei ia ̱ ka je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkerksa ̱ .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Säbäkäkksa ̱ , Israel wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , je je ̱ k wäyö ja ̱ wo ̱ té cruz ja ̱ mi sa ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ nak , sa ̱ wa ̱ ibiketsäkläpa . Jera wäter tkete ije ra wa te iweika ñaebä .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Ka ̱ wä deka ̱ las doce ra , ka ̱ wätuinawa ̱ itjä yee ka ̱ biköle ska , mine rämi las tres kje .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Je hora ska Jesús a ̱ na täkii te isha : “ Eloi , Eloi , ¿ lama sabactani ? ” ( Je wà rä : “ Yis Kekläí , yis Kekläí , ¿ jiye ba te yis jawa ̱ ta ̱ na rä na ? ” )

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Jeska kajali wa sha ̱ te je ssa ra , jewa te isha : — ¡ Issö ! Elías ne kieke ̱ ite rä .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Jera ekla tu ̱ nami , te esponja nu ̱ wa ̱ uva diä jäi wà , tkaka ̱ ite kal bata ki ̱ ka , ma ̱ ite iia ̱ iwa ̱ kuyanak , te isha : — Sa ̱ ku ̱ ijöwa ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä Elías dajuena iwäyä ja ̱ wa ̱ kksa ̱ í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Ata Jesús a ̱ na täkii , jera iduawa ̱ .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Jera Templo bala tkäkläksa ̱ suaí klasha ̱ na ju ̱ nami mo ̱ ki ̱ atjä wakwäté .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Ñerä guardia wa cien wäsikäk kaldu ije wäja ̱ mi te jekäi iduawa ̱ rä su ̱ a ra , ite isha : — Iyina si ̱ jí ditsä rä Säkeklä yaba .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Ñakäi jeska alaklä wa sha ̱ te isu ̱ e kajali ka ̱ miika . Jewa sha ̱ na itso ̱ rä María Magdala wa , Salomé , ñakäi María Jacobo ale dulaklei ji ̱ a irä , José irä jewa a ̱ mi .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Jewa ne dami ira , ipasu ̱ ak jile wà ikatke ji ̱ a Galilea ka ra rä . Ñakäi isaka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ rä delemika ̱ ira Jerusalén ka .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Jera je día rä jile wa ̱ klä sábado yika , je tuir dawa ̱ kja irä ki ̱ ka ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: José Arimatea wa deju ̱ . Je rä Sanedrín wa sha ̱ ekla dälätsalewa ̱ , ñakäi je te rä Säkeklä gobiernoí ne ki ̱ ssë kate . Jekäi je kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ka suale kuna Pilato wäki ̱ Jesús nu ̱ l kiäkksa ̱ .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Jera Pilato male ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ iduawa ̱ kja te . Jekäi ite guardia wa cien wäsikäk kia te je ia ̱ ite ichaka iduawa ̱ si ̱ irä í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Ñerä guardia wa wäsikäk te je paka e ̱ ná iia ̱ ra , ite inu ̱ l ju ̱ aksa ̱ José ia ̱ .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Jekäi ije te dätsi tju ̱ aksa ̱ , kjepa ite inu ̱ l wäya ja ̱ wa ̱ té butrawa ̱ ite je dätsi wà , blacha ̱ ite jak ker ja ̱ tkele sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä naka , kjepa ite jak bulewa ̱ té , je wà ite sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kjäshtawa ̱ .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Jera María Magdala wa irä , María José a ̱ mi irä , jewa te mai inu ̱ l blacha ̱ ite rä je su ̱ a .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Sábado kjaju ̱ ra , María Magdala wa irä , María Jacobo a ̱ mi irä , Salomé irä , jewa te ji jalanak ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ shtä tju ̱ a saka saka iwa ̱ minak inu ̱ l ki ̱ tkenak .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Jekäi semana día säkätä wà sa ̱ ñiree ka ̱ wä deka ̱ ju ̱ bä ra , ijewa minejulu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Jera ijewa ñachakä rami : — ¿ Yibä te sa ̱ ia ̱ jak sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kjäshtäklä bulewe ̱ mi na ?

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Ata ijewa wätka isu ̱ ak ra , je jak rä buleleju ̱ mi e ̱ ná ; jera je jak rä ta ̱ iwa ̱ .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Ñerä ikjawa ̱ julu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä na ra , ijewa te dulaklei ekla su ̱ a je ̱ tkelewa ̱ sä jula wämo kja ̱ ne , je ̱ k pajiele paiklä so ̱ lo ̱ o ̱ suruu wà . Jera ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Ata je te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ke bas male ̱ te ̱ na . Bas te rä Jesús Nazaret wa ale wäteleka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi je ne yuleke ̱ . Je shki ̱ naka ̱ ni ka kuna ji ̱ a jiska . ¡ Isu ̱ o ! Jí ne ska ijewa te ibla rä .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Ata bas cho ̱ ishäk iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ , ñakäi Pedro ia ̱ : ‘ Ije maju ̱ ba bas wätsa ̱ k Galileaka ; jeska bas te isu ̱ emini , jiräni iwa ̱ iyile bas ia ̱ käi . ’

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Jekäi ijewa deksa ̱ julu julunaté sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska , ijewa paju ̱ na tulaka ̱ imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka ; ka iwa ̱ iyine yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ isu ̱ anacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Semana säkätä ke ̱ i wà sa ̱ ñireebä ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni ra , ije ̱ k kjashani säkätäba rä María Magdala wa ia ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka iwa ̱ be siete kjäieleksa ̱ rä .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Jera ije mineju ̱ ibata shäk Jesús da shkäk wa je ̱ r iarte jela , ji ̱ áte jela jewa ia ̱ .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Ata ijewa te issa ije kalduni kseka su ̱ a María te ni ra , ka iwa ̱ iktä kolone .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Je ukä ska ije ̱ k kjasha ̱ ni juer ta kju ̱ awa ijewa bol ia ̱ ña ̱ la wà , ijewa damijulu kju ̱ awa ska .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Jera ibitejuluni ibata shäk isaka ia ̱ , ata ñaebä ka ijewa wa ̱ iktä kolone .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Je ukä ska ije ̱ k kjashani ale once wa ia ̱ ijewa ñatulawa ̱ yäkäk ra . Jewa uña ite ka ijewa te ikuke kte si ̱ ye ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ijewa je ̱ r dä därërë ki ̱ ka . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka ijewa wa ̱ ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni su ̱ ak wa ktä kolone ki ̱ ka .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Jekäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ma ka ̱ biköle ska kte baa wapaktäk sä yöleksa ̱ wa biköle ia ̱ .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Yi te je biketsa ra , ñakäi iwäoka ̱ na ra , je rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ . Ata yi wa ̱ je ka biketsane ra , je rä weikanakwa ̱ .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Jí shtä kjayirmi je biketsäk wa ja ̱ mi : Yis kie wà ijewa te be kjäiemi , iktämi kte saka wà ,

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: tkäbe kukemiwa ̱ ite jula wà . Päpäli sä ktäkwa ̱ yawa ̱ ite ra , ka je ia ̱ imedäk ; ijula mamika ̱ duë ta wa ki ̱ , jera jewa bäirmini .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
