text2: Ikta e ̱ ná ijewa ra ukä ska ra , Säkekewa Jesús minetse ̱ mi ka ̱ jöir ska . Je je ̱ tkawa ̱ Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Jera ijewa minejulumi ka ̱ biköle ska sa paktäk . Jekäi Säkekewa te iwe ̱ teña ijewa ra je kte ki ̱ kjashäk jile juerke ̱ kju ̱ awa shtä wà .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Jira chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te imabla su ̱ a ji o ̱ na sa ̱ sha ̱ na kalabe je pakäkksa ̱ bulee ,

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: jiräni isu ̱ ak isäkätä skaté wa delewa ̱ kte wakja ̱ ne ̱ iwa ̱ k ye wa te ipaka sa ̱ ia ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Je ki ̱ ka säkekewa Teófilo , ñaebä yis ia ̱ issër yis kiana je ktei yuäkksa ̱ ba ia ̱ ñakjee , ji biköle chakale tsa ̱ na isäkätä skaté ma rä ibataje ,

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: je rä ba pautäle ju ̱ ñaklä ba wa ̱ iyina si ̱ irä ni .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Herodes bakle Judea ke ̱ i tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , je ke ̱ i ska ra chui ekla bakle kie rä Zacarías . Ije rä ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ kña Abías wa ra . Ise ̱ naklä kie rä Elisabet . Je rä Aarón batala ekla .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Je bol wa se ̱ r dä wämo Säkeklä wäna . Säkekewa wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na käi , iwa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k käi , je wawe ̱ ke ̱ ijewa te kalabe ka shirile ta .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Jewa rä ka yaba ta , Elisabet dä ko ̱ le ka yaba su ̱ ak kuna ki ̱ ka , ñakäi je bol wa rä säkibii sa ̱ nu ̱ le ̱ e ̱ i .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Ñerä mika ̱ ike ̱ i dewa ̱ chui wa kolole Zacarías da jewa wa ̱ ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ klä , jera ije te ikja ̱ nei we ̱ kate chui ye Säkeklä wäna .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Chui wa wädular dä imablä su ̱ ak jile wà , yibä ia ̱ idäksa ̱ mi iminakläwa ̱ Säkekewa Temploí ja ̱ rka ji dälänak jalar ta ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ däläwa ̱ k . Jera Zacarías ia ̱ ideksa ̱ iminakläwa ̱ .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Je ji dälänak dälärte dälei ja ̱ mi ra , ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ biköle ka ̱ kiäte ju shäbeka .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka Säkekewa ángel í je ̱ k kjasha Zacarías ia ̱ , ikaldu je ji dälänak däläwa ̱ klä ska sä jula wämo kja ̱ ne .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Zacarías te isu ̱ a ra , imale ̱ te ̱ nawa ̱ isuanawa ̱ iyika ka itäkita ji ̱ a kje .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Ata je ángel te isha iia ̱ : — Zacarías , ke ba suana . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba wa ̱ kinak Säkeklä ia ̱ je rä ssële e ̱ ná . Ma se ̱ naklä Elisabet te ba ia ̱ yaba su ̱ emi jäiyi ; ba te ikiemi rä Juan ni .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Ba ssërmi baa a ̱ naa , ñakäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ssërmi a ̱ naa iko ̱ na ra .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije dämiwa ̱ oloi ta ta ̱ i Säkekewa wäna . Vino irä shkota irä , ka je yanak kuna iwa ̱ . Itso ̱ ji ̱ a ia ̱ mi sha ̱ wà ra , ipshirmiwa ̱ Wikblu Sikina wà .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Ije te Israel batala chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ mi ñamanewakksa ̱ Säkekewa ijewa Kekläí ia ̱ .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Ije minami Säkekewa wätsa ̱ kba je ̱ r ssële ta , täkili ta Elías käi . Jekäi ije te yabala ká wa je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ mini bäi iyabala ra ; ñakäi ite ka kte ssäk kuna wa je ̱ r ja ̱ we ̱ mini je ̱ rikäk tsa ̱ na , sä wämo wa käi . Je te ditsä paruemiba Säkekewa yika , iwa ̱ ijewa ku ̱ aklä dulale e ̱ ná bäi .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Jera Zacarías te isha je ángel ia ̱ : — ¿ Maikäi yie je kte kuke iyina si ̱ ye na ? Ñera yis dä säkibii , ñakäi yis se ̱ naklä rä sa ̱ nu ̱ le ̱ e ̱ i .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Jera je ángel te ikúka : — Yis dä Gabriel , je kaldu rä Säkeklä wäkata ska . Je te yis patkaté ktäk ba ra , ñakäi je kte baa bata shäk ba ia ̱ .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: ¡ Jikäi issö ! Ba te ibiketsa yis te isha ba ia ̱ je ka o ̱ nak ni . Ata mika ̱ ike ̱ i dewa ̱ ra , je o ̱ rmi . Je ki ̱ ka , bä ktä wätermiwa ̱ . Jekäi ba se ̱ rmi si ̱ wa ̱ rbe ma rä io ̱ na jekäi ke ̱ i kje .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Jera Zacarías ki ̱ ssäk tso ̱ wa te ibiketsa , jite iwätkewe ̱ te jaree Templo ja ̱ rka räí ̱ .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Ñerä ideksa ̱ ju ̱ ra , ka iia ̱ ktener ji ̱ a ijewa ra . Jera ijewa je ̱ r na ide jile kjayina su ̱ a ite Templo ja ̱ rka rä . Jera ije kta ijewa ra ka ̱ kjayile ebä wà , ka iktä däka ̱ ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Säkeklä kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ ite je e ̱ nawa ̱ ra , imineju ̱ ni iwakei juka .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ ise ̱ naklä Elisabet bitewa ̱ yaba ki ̱ ; jera ise ̱ na je ̱ k blelewa ̱ cinco mes bala na te isha :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: “ Säkekewa te jikäi iwá ̱ yis ia ̱ . Jí bala na ite yis su ̱ a je ̱ r bäi wà , jekäi yis ssërke ̱ äile wa ̱ ditsä wäna je tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami ite . ”

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Seis mes deka ̱ ra , Säkeklä te ángel kie Gabriel patkami Galilea ke ̱ i ki ̱ jukläyäkä tso ̱ etka kie Nazaret ni ska ,

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: busi ekla ka se ̱ le kuna wäki ̱ , je kie rä María . Ije rä kablele e ̱ ná je ̱ k jula kukäkwa ̱ jäiyi ekla kie José ra ; je rä David yäbei ekla .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Ñerä je ángel dewa ̱ ju ̱ ije katke ska ra , ite isha iia ̱ : — Bä ssënopa a ̱ naa . Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha ba ia ̱ ta ̱ i . Säkekewa kaldu ba ra .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Jera María male ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ite isha jekäi te . Jekäi ite ibiketsa je ̱ r na , jiräni jekäi ñachake wà rä í ̱ .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Jekäi je ángel te isha iia ̱ : — María , ke ba suana . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä je ̱ r ssëna bäi ba ra ki ̱ ka .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Jekäi ba bitämiwa ̱ yaba ki ̱ ; ba te yaba su ̱ emi jäiyi , ba te je kiemi rä Jesús ni .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Je dämiwa ̱ oloi ta ta ̱ i . Je kirmi rä Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta je yaba . Säkekewa Säkeklä te ije ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ mi je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ikalí David itäri wà ni .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Ije te Jacob batala patkemi sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä marämi jekjeye . Jekäi ije dewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ra ka iju ̱ nakksa ̱ kuna .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Jera María te isha je ángel ia ̱ : — ¿ Maikäi je o ̱ rmi , ka yis wa ̱ jäiyi wa ju ̱ ñerba ra na ?

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Jera je ángel te ikúka : — Wikblu Sikina dämiwa ̱ ba ja ̱ mi . Jekäi ale Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta täkili te ba ki ̱ kukemiwa ̱ ioloi wà . Je ki ̱ ka je Sikii Si ̱ ko ̱ nak ji ̱ a kirmi rä Säkeklä yaba .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: ¡ Jikäi issö ! Ba saka Elisabet dewa ̱ sa ̱ nu ̱ le ̱ e ̱ i , ata ñakäi je bitewa ̱ yaba ki ̱ . Je kile rä ka yaba su ̱ ak kuna ni , ata je wa ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ kja jira seis mes .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Ka rä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä ia ̱ ra ji a ̱ ni ka kuna ka o ̱ nak käi .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Jera María te isha : — Yis dä Säkekewa kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k . Jishtä ba te isha käi , io ̱ nopa yis ia ̱ . Ñerä je ángel minejuni .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ ka María kukana mineju ̱ mi mane mane ka ̱ bata tso ̱ Judea ke ̱ i sha ̱ na jukläyäkä etka ska .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Jeska ije kjawa ̱ ju ̱ Zacarías ju naka . Jera ite Elisabet chaka .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ñerä Elisabet chaka María te je ssa ite ra , iyaba dälinaka ̱ täkii isha ̱ wà . Jekäi Elisabet pshiwa ̱ wa ̱ Wikblu Sikina te .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Jera ite isha täkii : — Ba ia ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha alaklä wa biköle tsa ̱ ta . Ñakäi ije ̱ r bäi sha ba yaba tso ̱ ji ̱ a ma sha ̱ wà je ia ̱ .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: ¿ Jiye yis ia ̱ jikäi io ̱ na , ba yis Säkekewaí a ̱ mi bitäklä yis wäki ̱ rä na ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: ¡ Jikäi issö ! Yis chakaka ̱ ba te je ssa yis te ra , je wäsaka yis yaba dälinaka ̱ täkii , yis sha ̱ wà issëna a ̱ naa ki ̱ ka .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Säkekewa te ji sha ba ia ̱ je o ̱ rmi si ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka bäije ba rä , je biketsa ba te iyina si ̱ irä je ki ̱ ka .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Jera María te isha : “ Yis je ̱ r ska yis te Säkekewa kjeishe e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ,

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: ñakäi yis je ̱ r ssëna a ̱ naa Säkeklä yis Tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije ̱ r ja ̱ na yis ije kjanaklä emana ska . Jira ma rä jöikwä ta wa biköle te yis shemi , bäije yis dä .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ale Oloi Ta Ta ̱ i te yis ia ̱ ji wá ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ . ¡ Ije kie , je rä sikii si ̱ !

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ iwakei dälätsäk wa ia ̱ , ñakäi ijewa batala jewa batala ia ̱ maitjä .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Iwa ̱ ji o ̱ le ijula wà rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ . Je ̱ k ssäk wa wa ̱ ji biketsale ije ̱ r ska , ata ite ijewa bala butsa tulami .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Ite oloi ta wa tulaksa ̱ iñajäklelewa ̱ ije ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ska , ata ditsä emana wa oloikaka ̱ ite .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Yi kteke ̱ bäli te wa ssëwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ite jile baa wà , ata blu wa patka tulamini ite jula wäyaka .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Iwakei kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa Israel wa tsa ̱ tka ite . Je rä ije ̱ r ja ̱ naklä je ̱ r bäi shäk ,

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: jishtä ikabla sa ká wa ia ̱ käi , Abraham irä ibatala irä jewa ia ̱ del käi . ”

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Jekäi María se ̱ na Elisabet ska tres mes kjena . Je ukä ska ideju ̱ ni iwakei ju ska .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Elisabet ke ̱ i dewa ̱ iyaba ko ̱ naklä ra , je ku ̱ a ite jäiyi .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Jera se ̱ nak Elisabet pája ̱ mi wa irä isaka wa irä , jewa te ipalei ssa Säkekewa je ̱ r bäi sha iia ̱ ta ̱ i . Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa ssënaña a ̱ naa ije ra .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Jekjepa iko ̱ na ukäki ̱ ocho día ra , idejulu je yaba matsu kjuä tiäk . Jera ijewa te ikie mar Zacarías ni , iká kie wà .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Ata ia ̱ mi te isha : — Kai . Ije kir mar dä Juan ni .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ba saka wa a ̱ ni ka kuna kie ta jekäi .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka kjayile jula wà iká ia ̱ , jiräni ite ikieke ̱ rä käi .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Jera ite kal taklä yönak shtä kia , je ki ̱ ite iyua : “ Ije kie rä Juan ” ni . Je te ijewa biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka iktaka ̱ ni , ka iktä wätene ji ̱ a . Jekäi ite Säkeklä kjeishami kte baa wà .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Ñerä se ̱ nak ipája ̱ mi wa biköle suanacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera se ̱ nak ka ̱ bata na Judea ke ̱ i sha ̱ na , biköle te je o ̱ na pakeke ̱ ñaia ̱ .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Je palei ssäk wa biköle te ibiketse rami je ̱ r na : “ ¿ Jibä ye je yaba dämiwa ̱ rä na ? ” Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyina si ̱ Säkekewa te iki ̱ me ̱ kate .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Jekäi Wikblu Sikina te je yaba ká Zacarías pshiwa ̱ wa ̱ bäi si ̱ . Jera ite ji bata sha jikäi :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: “ ¡ Säkekewa , Israel wa Kekläí , je kjeiyinopa ! Ka irä jiye kuna ta , idewa ̱ iwakei cha wa tsa ̱ tkäk , ñakäi ibäkäkksa ̱ .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Ite iwakei kjanaklä David yäbei ekla kuka täki ta sajewa tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Je rä jishtä iwa ̱ ji yile iwa ̱ kolole jile bata shäk ye wämo wa bakle mikle jewa kjäbata ska käi .

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Ikabla sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ sä bolki wa yika , ñakäi biköle sa dokoitsäk wa jula yika ,

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: ije ̱ r bäi shäklä sa ká wa bakle mikle wa ia ̱ , ñakäi ije ̱ r ja ̱ naklä ikablele sa ̱ ia ̱ bulee ska ,

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: ale ikabla etkabä sa ká Abraham ia ̱ , ji wa ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ ;

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: sä wetsäkksa ̱ sä bolki wa yika , sa ̱ wa ̱ iwakei kja ̱ nei wa ̱ klä ka suale kuna ji yika ,

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: ji bulee wà , ji wämo wa iwäna sa ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka bala na .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Ata yaba , ba kirmi rä ale Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta wa ̱ kolole ji bata shäk ye ni . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba minami Säkekewa wätsa ̱ k ña ̱ la paruäkba iyika ,

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: ije cha wa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä ji yakei wakblele iwa ̱ nui rä janakwa ̱ bitaba , je wà irä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ ;

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: je rä saje wa Kekläí je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sä dälänawa ̱ ki ̱ ka , jekäi wà ka ̱ ñir biter oloi te sä yulemi ka ̱ jöir skaté .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Je te ka ̱ ñiwe ̱ mi sa ̱ se ̱ nak ka ̱ yee naka wa ki ̱ ka , ñakäi yewa ̱ sä duärawa ̱ jewa ki ̱ ka , iwa ̱ sa wajiäklä mane ña ̱ la wà sä kjämi bäi je wà . ”

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Jekäi je yaba kibir damika ̱ , ñakäi ije ̱ r ska itäkir damika ̱ . Jekäi ise ̱ na ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska mine däka ̱ ikjayina Israel wa ia ̱ kje .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Je ko ̱ le ke ̱ i kje César Augusto te ka ̱ wei ma ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska wa ñakie ma ̱ klä yönak .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Je ñashtawe ̱ säkätä o ̱ na rä Cirenio kaldu gobernador ye Siria ke ̱ i ska ke ̱ i kje .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Jekäi biköle minemi ñakie ma ̱ k yönak iwakwa dar je ke ̱ i ja ̱ mi .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Jera ñaebä jukläyäkä Nazaret Galilea ke ̱ i ska , José mineju ̱ Judea ke ̱ i ska mai David ko ̱ le jukläyäkäí kie Belén ni ska , José rä David yäbei iju ska wa batala sha ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Imineju ̱ ñakie ma ̱ k yönak ise ̱ naklä María ra ; je rä kablele José ra je ̱ k jula kukäkwa ̱ , ata je kaldu rä bol .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Ñerä jeska ikajali bala na ra , María ke ̱ i dewa ̱ iyaba su ̱ aklä .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Jekäi iyaba säkätä su ̱ a ite jäiyi , je pabutrawa ̱ ite sua wà , jiacha ̱ ite vaca chewa ̱ klä ja ̱ rka , ka sä kjäwa ̱ ji ̱ a käpäklä jui na ki ̱ ka .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ebä na oveja kjänanak wa wäñir kajali tuina ioveja kjänanak .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Ñerä Säkekewa ángel í deju ̱ ijewa ska , jera Säkekewa oloi te ijewa ñiwa ̱ tulaka ̱ ; jekäi isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Ata je ángel te isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Ke bas suana , ata ¡ issö ! Yis wa ̱ kte baa shkä bata yinak bas ia ̱ sä ssëwa ̱ k a ̱ naa ; je rä ditsä biköle ia ̱ .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Jir bas ia ̱ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ko ̱ na David jukläyäkäí ska ; je rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ sä Säkekewaí .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Jikäi ne wà bas wäna ijuermi ije ne irä ; bas te yaba ku ̱ emi pabutälewa ̱ sua wà , jielecha ̱ vaca chewa ̱ klä ja ̱ rka . ”

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Jera ñawäsaka ka ̱ jöir guardia wa juena chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ je ángel da . Jewa te Säkeklä kjeishe kate baa jikäi :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: “ ¡ Säkeklä oloi kanoka ̱ pa ka ̱ sha ̱ wa ̱ si ̱ ska ! Ñakäi ka ̱ jiska manele je ̱ r ssërke ̱ bäi jewa biköle se ̱ nopa bitaba ñara ! ”

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Ñerä ijewa ska ángel wa minejulu ni ka ̱ jöir ska ra , oveja kjänanak wa te isha ñaia ̱ : — Sä shkä Belénka , Säkekewa te ji o ̱ na bata sha sa ̱ ia ̱ je su ̱ ak .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Jera ijewa minemi mane mane isu ̱ ak . Jeska ite María irä José irä ku ̱ a , ñakäi yaba ku ̱ a ite jielecha ̱ vaca chewa ̱ klä ja ̱ rka .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Ijewa te je su ̱ a ra , je yaba ktei bata yina ijewa ia ̱ je pakani ite .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Jera je ssäk wa biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ oveja kjänanak wa te isha te .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Jera María je ̱ r kalme del je biköle ska , je biketseke ̱ ite maitjä .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Ñerä oveja kjänanak wa bitejulu ni te Säkeklä oloike datse ̱ ikjeishe datse ̱ , ji biköle ssa ite su ̱ a ite jishtä ijewa ia ̱ iyina käi , je ki ̱ ka .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Ocho día deka ̱ ra ike ̱ i dewa ̱ je yaba matsu kjuä tiäklä , jekäi ije kinawa ̱ Jesús ni , jishtä ángel wa ̱ iyileta ̱ na ia ̱ mi ka bitäwa ̱ ba iki ̱ ka ra käi .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Ike ̱ i dewa ̱ ijewa siki tenakläni Moisés ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ra , ijewa te je yaba tsa ̱ mi Jerusalénka kjayinak Säkekewa ia ̱ ,

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: jishtä Säkekewa ka ̱ wei ska iyöle katke käi : “ Sä wakjuä wako ̱ na säkätä jäiyi wa ra , je biköle rä ju ̱ naksa ̱ Säkekewa ia ̱ . ”

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Ñakäi ijewa minemi jile ma ̱ kka ̱ jishtä Säkekewa ka ̱ wei te ishe käi : tórtola botkä , etka jäyiri etka alaki , je iräle namala yabala botkä iräle , je rä me ̱ nakka ̱ iwäna .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Ñerä ekla se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska kie Simeón ni , je rä se ̱ nak wämo Säkeklä dälätsäk ; je te rä Israel wa je ̱ r pablermi ne ki ̱ ssë kate , ñakäi Wikblu Sikina katke ije ja ̱ mi .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Wikblu Sikina wa ̱ kjayile iia ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ patkemi Säkekewa te , je su ̱ emi ite ka iduäwa ̱ ba yika .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Je je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ Säkeklä Wikblu te minak , jekäi idemiju ̱ Templo ska . Jekäi Jesús ká wa dejulu jile ma ̱ kka ̱ iyaba säkei ye jishtä ika ̱ wei te isha käi ra ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: jera jeska Simeón te iyaba kukacha ̱ jula na . Jekäi ite Säkeklä kjeisha kte baa wà jikäi :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: “ Sä blui , ba kablele yis ia ̱ je wao ̱ na , je ki ̱ ka jira yis ba kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ia ̱ ba te ka ̱ me ̱ iminakläju ̱ bitaba .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis wakei wäbala wà yis te ma wa ̱ patkele Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ye je su ̱ a ,

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: je kolole ba wa ̱ rä ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa biköle wäna .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Ije rä ka ̱ oloi ye sä ditsei wä wa wäji ̱ atkenaklä , ñakäi Israel ba ia ̱ wa ssënaklä baa si ̱ ije ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Ite jekäi je yaba ktei sha , je te iká ia ̱ mi male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Ñerä Simeón te ji bäi sha o ̱ nak ijewa ia ̱ te isha je yaba a ̱ mi María ia ̱ : — ¡ Jikäi issö ! Jí yaba wabiketsaleksa ̱ rä Israel wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ oloi ja ̱ nacha ̱ kläwa ̱ , ñakäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ oloi kanakläka ̱ . Je rä patkele ijuenaklä ye sä wäna ditsä wa ̱ yinak yakei ,

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: je wà chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa je ̱ rike juenaklä wa ̱ . Ata ba je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ije dälärmi ta ̱ i , jishtä espada wà sä tkeksa ̱ dälär kje .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Jeska ñakäi jile bata shäk kie Ana kalme . Je rä Fanuel yaba , Aser batala sha ̱ ekla . Je rä sa ̱ nule ̱ i . Ije ji ̱ a busi ra , irä se ̱ lewa ̱ ise ̱ naklä ra deka ̱ siete año .

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: Jekäi ia ̱ ta ̱ na chichö ye deka ̱ ochenta y cuatro año . Del ikatke Templo ska ka minak kuna maka a ̱ ni ; ibätsäke ̱ irä ika ̱ kiäke ̱ irä , je wà ite Säkeklä kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ tuina ka ̱ piana .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Ñerä je wäsaka ra ije deju ̱ Templo ska . Jekäi ite Säkeklä kjeisha kte bäi wà . Jekäi Jerusalén ska sa bakanamiksa ̱ ki ̱ ssäk tso ̱ wa biköle ia ̱ ite je yaba ktei paka .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iwá ̱ jishtä Säkekewa ka ̱ wei yöle te ishe käi biköle , jekjepa ijewa bitejulu deni iwakwa jukläyäkäí Nazaret ska , Galilea ke ̱ i ki ̱ .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Jera je yaba kibir damika ̱ , ñakäi itäkir damika ̱ , ika ̱ biketsä damika ̱ ki ̱ ta , ñakäi Säkeklä je ̱ r ssëna bäi ira .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Año año wa iká irä ia ̱ mi irä shkäke ̱ Jerusalénka Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ k .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Ata ideka ̱ doce año ra , imineju ̱ ijewa ra Jerusalénka , jishtä iwädular ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ k käi .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Ñerä je ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ e ̱ nawa ̱ ra , ijewa bitejulu ni , ata je yaba Jesús a ̱ ta ̱ na Jerusalénka ka juene iká wa wäna .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Ijewa te ibiketsa idamiña saka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ shkä sha ̱ na . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa shka un día kje , jekjepa ijewa te Jesús yulami isaka wa sha ̱ na iwa ̱ su ̱ nak wa sha ̱ na .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Ata ka ijewa ia ̱ iko ̱ ne , je ki ̱ ka iminejuluni Jerusalén ka iyuläk .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Ñerä tres día kjepa ijewa te iku ̱ ani Templo ska ; ije kalme sa paktäk wa sha ̱ na . Ite ijewa ktä ssë kalme ; ñakäi ite jile ktei chake kalme ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Jera ije ktäke ̱ ssäk wa biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ika ̱ ju ̱ ñe rä ta ̱ i te irä , ite ijewa kúkeke ̱ te irä .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Iká wa te iku ̱ ani ra , ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ia ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Yaba rikä , ¿ jiye ba te jekäi iwa ̱ sá ukä ja ̱ mi rä na ? ¡ Issö ! Ba ká irä yis irä te ba yula ta ̱ i je ̱ r ialecha ̱ wa ̱ bäi si ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — ¿ Jiye bas te yis yula rä na ? ¿ Ata ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis kiana yis Ká wa ̱ ji tso ̱ o ̱ nak je wa ̱ k na ?

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Ata ji sha ite ijewa ia ̱ rä , je ia ̱ ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús biteju ̱ téni ijewa ra deni Nazaret ska . Jeska ije te iká wa ktä ssa tsa ̱ na . Ata ia ̱ mi je ̱ r kalme del je biköle ska .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Jera Jesús ka ̱ biketsä damika ̱ , ikibir damika ̱ ebä , ñakäi Säkeklä irä ditsä irä je ̱ r ssënami bäi ije ra .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: César Tiberio deka ̱ quince año sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ra , jera Poncio Pilato tso ̱ kja patkele Judea ska ka ̱ wäkiri ye , ata Herodes dä Galilea ke ̱ i tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ñakäi itsi ̱ se ̱ k Felipe rä Iturea ke ̱ i irä Traconite ke ̱ i irä je tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ata Lisanias dä Abilinia ke ̱ i tsa ̱ ku ̱ i .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Jera Anás irä Caifás irä jewa rä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa . Je ke ̱ i kje Säkeklä ktä dewa ̱ Juan Zacarías yaba ja ̱ mi ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Jekjepa Juan mineju ̱ Jordán ke ̱ i biköle sha ̱ na , je te sa pakta rä sa kiana wäoka ̱ nak sa ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ kläksa ̱ , sa ̱ nui janakläwa ̱ bitaba ni .

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Je rä jishtä Isaías jile bata shäk wa ̱ iyile je äyëí yöle katke käi : “ Ekla a ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska : ‘ Ña ̱ la bäiwo ̱ Säkekewa yika , iña ̱ le ̱ i paruöksa ̱ bulee .

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Ka ̱ dochoi biköle wätermika ̱ ñakjee . ka ̱ bata biköle ka ̱ ukä biköle paja ̱ rmiwa ̱ ñakjee , ña ̱ la wäbutälewa ̱ parurmiksa ̱ bulee , ña ̱ la wäkuchi ebä birmiksa ̱ ñakjee .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Jera sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkeke ̱ ksa ̱ Säkeklä te je su ̱ emi biköle te . ’ ”

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Jekäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ däke ̱ Juan wäki ̱ iwa ̱ wäoka ̱ nak ra , ite isheke ̱ ijewa ia ̱ : “ ¡ Tkäbe si ̱ yäbeila ! ¿ Yi te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a Säkeklä kju ̱ atkämiwa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ je cha ̱ k rä na ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Jirä bäi o ̱ nak sa ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ra , je ja ̱ mi bas wäno . Ata ke bas ku ̱ ibiketsa je ̱ r na : ‘ Abraham ne rä sá ká rä ’ ni ; ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ishe bas ia ̱ , Säkeklä ia ̱ jí jak tso ̱ manermiksa ̱ Abraham batala ye .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Jira bak rä tkelewa ̱ e ̱ ná kal ñak ja ̱ mi . Jekäi mane kal wänak wä ta ka bäi kuna , je biköle rä tenak tulämi tulunakka ̱ yökö ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te ichakeke ̱ iia ̱ : — ¿ Jera ji we ̱ sá te na ?

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yi wa ̱ paiklä tso ̱ botkä ra , je ku ̱ etka momi yi wa ̱ ka ikuna shtä wa ia ̱ ; ñakäi yi wa ̱ ñanak tso ̱ ra , je ku ̱ ikaku mo yi wa ̱ ka ikuna shtä wa ia ̱ .

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Ñakäi inaklä bäkäk wa sha ̱ demi wäoka ̱ nak , jewa te ichaka ije ia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , ¿ jibä we ̱ sá te na ?

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Jera Juan te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ke bas ku ̱ inaklä baka ka ̱ wei te isha bakanak tsa ̱ ta .

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Jera guardia wa te ichaka iia ̱ : — Ata ñe sá , ¿ jibä we ̱ sá te ? Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ke bas ku ̱ yi yika ji baka täkili wà . Ke sa kjatia ka ̱ yue wà . Bikö bas to ̱ na ra , je ku ̱ bas ssëwo ̱ pa bäi .

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà ditsä te Säbäkäkksa ̱ däke ̱ ki ̱ ssë kate pjoo ; je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa biköle te ibiketse te ije ̱ r ska Juanle irä . Je ne ki ̱ ka

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Juan te isha ijewa biköle ia ̱ : “ Yis te bas wäukewe ̱ ke ̱ diklä wà ; jeiräta ekla daju ̱ ji ̱ a oloi ta yis tsa ̱ ta . Jekäi ka yis dä bäi si ̱ kuna isandalia wämu ̱ aklä wäyäkksa ̱ bä jibä . Ije te bas wäukewe ̱ mi Wikblu Sikina wà , ñakäi yökö wà .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Ije wa ̱ itrigo wäkpäklä kala kja ijula na , iwa ̱ ikpäklä ke ̱ i ska iboroi tuläkläkksa ̱ , iwa ̱ iwä tapawa ̱ klä ibläklä jui ska . Ata ite iboroi tulemiksa ̱ dälänakcha ̱ wa ̱ yökö ka wäita ̱ nak kuna mik a ̱ ni ja ̱ rka . ”

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Jekäi Juan te sa pakta kte saka saka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wà , je wà ite kte baa bata sha ditsä ia ̱ .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Ñakäi Juan te ka ̱ bala pa ̱ le cuatro je eyaka tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Herodes uña , ise ̱ nawa ̱ itsi ̱ se ̱ k se ̱ naklä Herodías da je kju ̱ ei , ñakäi jile saka wakblele iwa ̱ yakei je biköle ki ̱ ka .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Ata ki ̱ ta Herodes te ji yakei wakbla , je rä ite Juan jiawa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Ñerä biköle wäoka ̱ nate sha ̱ na ra , Jesús wäoka ̱ na ñaebä . Jekäi jeska ika ̱ kiä kaldu ji ̱ a ra , ka ̱ jöir kjä buka ̱ naju ̱ mi ,

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: jera Wikblu Sikina dewa ̱ ju ̱ yakata namala ye iki ̱ ka , ñerä kte ssënaté ka ̱ jöir je te ishe : “ Ba ne rä yis yaba shka ̱ ta rä , ba ra yis ssëna baa . ”

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Jesús te ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ mi ra , jera irä treinta año kjena . Ditsä ia ̱ ra Jesús dä José yaba . Ata José rä Elí yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Elí rä Matat yaba , Matat dä Leví yaba , Leví rä Melqui yaba , Melqui rä Jana yaba , Jana rä José yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: José rä Matatías yaba , Matatías dä Amós yaba , Amós dä Nahum yaba , Nahum rä Esli yaba , Esli rä Nagai yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nagai rä Maat yaba , Maat dä Matatías yaba , Matatías dä Semei yaba , Semei rä José yaba , José rä Judá yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Judá rä Joanán yaba , Joanán rä Resa yaba , Resa rä Zorobabel yaba , Zorobabel rä Salatiel yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Salatiel rä Neri yaba , Neri rä Melqui yaba , Melqui rä Adi yaba , Adi rä Cosam yaba , Cosam rä Elmadam yaba , Elmadam rä Er yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Er dä Josué yaba , Josué rä Eliezer yaba , Eliezer dä Jorim yaba , Jorim rä Matat yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Matat dä Leví yaba , Leví rä Simeón yaba , Simeón rä Judá yaba , Judá rä José yaba , José rä Jonán yaba , Jonán rä Eliaquim yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Eliaquim rä Melea yaba , Melea rä Mainán yaba , Mainán rä Matata yaba , Matata rä Natán yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: Natán rä David yaba , David rä Isaí yaba , Isaí rä Obed yaba , Obed rä Booz yaba , Booz dä Sala yaba , Sala rä Naasón yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Naasón rä Aminadab yaba , Aminadab dä Admín yaba , Admín rä Arni yaba , Arni rä Esrom yaba , Esrom rä Fares yaba , Fares dä Judá yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Judá rä Jacob yaba , Jacob dä Isaac yaba , Isaac rä Abraham yaba , Abraham rä Taré yaba , Taré rä Nacor yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Nacor dä Serug yaba , Serug dä Ragau yaba , Ragau rä Peleg yaba , Peleg rä Heber yaba , Heber dä Sala yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: Sala rä Cainán yaba , Cainán rä Arfaxad yaba , Arfaxad dä Sem yaba , Sem rä Noé yaba , Noé rä Lamec yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Lamec rä Matusalén yaba , Matusalén rä Enoc yaba , Enoc rä Jared yaba , Jared dä Mahalaleel yaba , Mahalaleel dä Cainán yaba ,

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Cainán rä Enós yaba , Enós dä Set yaba , Set dä Adán yaba , Adán rä Säkeklä yaba .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Jera Wikblu Sikina wa ̱ Jesús dä pshilewa ̱ , jekäi Jordán kjä ska ibiteju ̱ teni , jeska Säkeklä wikblu te iwäsikami ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Jeska cuarenta día bala na ije ̱ r ki ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ a Satanás te . Je bala na ka iyakane . Jekäi je ke ̱ i kjaju ̱ ra , iktawa ̱ bäli te .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Jera be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha iia ̱ : — Ba rä Säkeklä yaba ra , ishö jí jak wä ia ̱ iianakläwa ̱ pan ye .

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Iyöle katke rä : ‘ Ka pan ebä oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ se ̱ r dä kuna . ’

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Je ukä ska be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ iminetse ̱ ka ̱ tsä kaleka ̱ ka ̱ mii bata ki ̱ ka . Jeska ite ka ̱ jiska ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ke ̱ i biköle kjasha iia ̱ plaa kjelabä .

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: Jera be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha iia ̱ : — Yie ba ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ mi ba däkläwa ̱ je ke ̱ i biköle tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , ñakäi ji baa tso ̱ iska biköle me ̱ miksa ̱ yie ba ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je biköle rä ju ̱ leksa ̱ yis ia ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jekäi yis te je me ̱ ke ̱ yi ia ̱ yis ssëna ima ̱ k käi .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ma je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte yis oloitsäk ra , je biköle rä ba ia ̱ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — Iyöle katke rä : “ Säkekewa ba Kekläí oloitsö ba ku ̱ ; je ebä kja ̱ nei wo ̱ ba ku ̱ . ”

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Je ukäki ̱ be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ iminetse ̱ Jerusalén ska te iduaka ̱ Templo bata si ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Ba rä Säkeklä yaba ra , ma je ̱ k psö ju ̱ omi ja ̱ nak i ̱ ski ̱ .

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : ‘ Ba bata ki ̱ ka ite iángel wa patkemi bä wetsäk ,

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: jewa te ma tse ̱ mi jula na , ka bä klä tkenaklä kuna jak ja ̱ mi . ’

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — Iyile katke rä : ‘ Ke ba ku ̱ Säkekewa ba Kekläí mabla su ̱ a wäsi ̱ wa . ’

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Jekäi be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te ije ̱ r ki ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ a ji biköle wà e ̱ ná ra , imineju ̱ mi iyika , maiskalepa je ̱ r kinak su ̱ nak .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Ñerä Jesús demini Galilea ska , Säkeklä wikblu täkili ta . Jekäi ije palei ju ̱ ñenami je ke ̱ i biköle ska .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Ite sa pakte rami ijewa ñapaktäklä jui saka saka ska . Jera biköle te ije kjeisheke ̱ bäi .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Jera idemi Nazaret mai ikibile ska . Jekäi sábado wà ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ ñapaktäklä jui na iwädular käi . Jeska ije ̱ k duaka ̱ äyë washäk .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Jera ijewa te iyöle jile bata shäk Isaías wa ̱ je äyëí butälewa ̱ cha ̱ mi iia ̱ . Jekäi ite ikjäyaksa ̱ ra , ite iyula mai jikäi iyöle katke ska :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: “ Säkekewa wikblu katke yis ja ̱ mi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ite yis kuka yis wa ̱ ka jita wa ia ̱ kte baa bata shäklä . Je te yis patka ishäk wätelewa ̱ wa ia ̱ , jewa rä wäyenakksa ̱ ni , ñakäi ishäk ka wä wajuenak kuna wa ia ̱ jewa rä wä wajuenakni , ñakäi sä weikalecha ̱ wa ̱ wa bäkäkksa ̱ ni ,

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: ñakäi ditsä ia ̱ ibata shäk Säkekewa je ̱ r ssënaklä bäi sa ra , je añoí dewa ̱ . ”

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Jekäi ite je äyë butrawa ̱ ni , cha ̱ mi ite äyë bläk ia ̱ , jekjepa ije ̱ tkawa ̱ ni . Jera biköle tso ̱ je ñapaktäklä jui ska wa te isu ̱ a jaree .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Jera ite ishami ijewa ia ̱ : — Jir io ̱ r te jishtä je yöle wa ̱ iyile je ssa bas te käi .

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Jera biköle te ije pake rami bäi , ñakäi iktäke ̱ rä baa , je te imale ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te isheke ̱ ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Ka je rä José yaba kuna na ?

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Tsa ̱ na ra bas te ishemi yis ia ̱ maikäi ishe käi : ‘ Sä bäiwa ̱ k , ba wakei je ̱ k bäi wo ̱ . ’ Tsa ̱ na ra bas te ishemi yis ia ̱ : ‘ Sá te issa ji o ̱ na Capernaúm ska käi , je su ̱ ta ba ku ̱ ji wo ̱ jí ba kibina ska . ’

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Jekjepa ite isha ji ̱ a : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Jile bata shäk mane a ̱ ni ka kinakwa ̱ iwakei ke ̱ i ska .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Jekäi bulee yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Elías bakle ke ̱ i kje , ale ka ̱ li ̱ ka ja ̱ ne kuna tres año y medio bala na ra , sa tuarcha ̱ rawa ̱ bäli wa ̱ je ke ̱ i biköle ska ra , jera je ke ̱ i ska alaklä wa chichö wa tso ̱ ta ̱ i Israel wa sha ̱ na ,

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: ata ka Elías patkene je chichö wa mane a ̱ ni tsa ̱ tkäk kuna , ata ije patkena rä ka ̱ etkä wa chichöí ekla se ̱ nak Sarepta ska , Sidón ke ̱ i ki ̱ , je ebä tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Ñakäi jile bata shäk Eliseo bakle ke ̱ i kje , paiale lepra wa ̱ wa tso ̱ ta ̱ i Israel wa sha ̱ na , ata ijewa mane a ̱ ni ka bäineni , ata Naamán Siria wa , je ebä .

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Ñerä ditsä tso ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska wa te je kte ssa ra , ijewa biköle kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Je kju ̱ ei ijewa ñajaka ̱ te iju ̱ aksa ̱ jukläyäkä ektaka . Je jukläyäkä rä yöle ka ̱ ukä ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ite itsa ̱ mi ju ̱ nakmi ka ̱ ktäka .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Jeiräta Jesús kjaju ̱ mi ijewa sha ̱ na mineju ̱ mi .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús demiju ̱ Galilea jukläyäkäí Capernaúmka . Jekäi ite ijewa pakteke ̱ sábado sábado wà .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Jera ijewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ite sa pakteke ̱ te , iktä rä oloi ta ki ̱ ka .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Jera je ñapaktäklä jui na ekla kolole wa ̱ be wikblu ñá shtä wa ̱ katke , je a ̱ na täkii , te isha :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: — ¡ Aaj ! Jesús Nazaret wa , ¿ jiye ba bite sá wäki ̱ rä na ? ¿ Ba de rä sá weikäkcha ̱ wa ̱ na ? Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yi ba rä ; ba ne rä ale patkele Säkeklä wa ̱ wämo si ̱ rä .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Jera Jesús te iuña , te isha : — ¡ Ma si ̱ wa ̱ tiö , ma je ̱ k tso ̱ ksa ̱ ije ska ! Jera je be te je jäiyi ja ̱ wa ̱ mi i ̱ ski ̱ ditsä biköle wäna . Jekäi ite ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na ka medele kuna .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Je te biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ijewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Je rä mane shtä kte na ? ¡ Ije rä ka ̱ wei ta , täkili ta , je wà ite wikblu ñá shtä wa patkeke ̱ ksa ̱ , jera imajulu !

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Jera Jesús palei ju ̱ ñenamika ̱ je ke ̱ i pája ̱ mi biköle .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Je ukä ska Jesús je ̱ kaka ̱ mineksa ̱ ju ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska , minewa ̱ ju ̱ Simón ju na . Jeska Simón yak kalme wäkalewa ̱ oloowa ̱ , jekäi ijewa te Jesús payula je kju ̱ ei .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ k buawa ̱ itsa ̱ ka te iwäkarke ̱ oloo uña , jera ipatse ̱ nawa ̱ ni . Jera plaa ije ̱ kaka ̱ te ijewa pasu ̱ a jile wà .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Jera ka ̱ wä mawa ̱ ju ̱ ra , biköle yi rä saka ta duäke ̱ duë ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa jewa de ja ijewa wa ̱ ije wäki ̱ . Jera ijula ma ̱ ka ̱ ijewa kalabe ki ̱ ka el el , te ijewa bäiwa ̱ ni .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Ñakäi be kjäienaksa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ki ̱ ka . Ijewa a ̱ rke ̱ täkii te isheke ̱ : — ¡ Ba ne rä Säkeklä yaba rä ! Ata ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne ijewa ia ̱ iktäkläka ̱ , je rä ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ije rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra Jesús deksa ̱ ju ̱ mineju ̱ mi ka yi kuna shtä ska . Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te iyulami , jewa demijulu ikatke ska ra , ijewa te Jesús kuka ji ̱ a ta ̱ i , ka iminakläju ̱ ijewa yika .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Ata ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis kiana minak jukläyäkä saka saka ska Säkeklä gobierno ktei baa bata shäk , je ne ye yis patkeleté rä ki ̱ ka .

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Jekäi ite sa pakte rami , Judea ke ̱ i ska ñapaktäklä jui etkä etkä na .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús kaldu Genesaret tipei kjä ja ̱ mi . Jera ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ñayataté tenacha ̱ wa ̱ ije ja ̱ mi , ijewa wa ̱ Säkeklä ktä ssäklä tsa ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Jera Jesús te ko ̱ no su ̱ a botäbä tipä kjä ja ̱ mi ; je na nima kukäk wa ñajolowa ̱ ksa ̱ kja , te ikla paskue tso ̱ .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Je etaba na Jesús je ̱ k jiaka ̱ ; je rä Simón cha . Jera ite iwakei paka ipatkäkmi a ̱ mikwäta berbena tipä ki ̱ ka . Jekjepa ije ̱ tkawa ̱ je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa paktäk je ko ̱ no skaté .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Jera ikta e ̱ ná ra , ite isha Simón ia ̱ : — Ba ko ̱ no patkömi tipä ja ̱ r ta ̱ i ska , jeska bas kla ja ̱ wa ̱ mi nima kolonaklä .

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Jera Simón te ikúka : — Säkekewa , sá nima kuka kja tuina jaree , ata sá wa ̱ ka ikolone etaba a ̱ ni ; ata ba te isha ki ̱ ka we yis ma kla ja ̱ wa ̱ kmi .

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Jekäi ite ija ̱ wa ̱ mi ra , nima kolona ta ̱ i , je te ijewa kla ja ̱ r butse raksa ̱ kje .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ijula ju ̱ a isaka tso ̱ ko ̱ no etäbä ki ̱ jewa bitäklä itsa ̱ tkäk . Jekäi jewa bite iwäki ̱ , je botäbä we pshiwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ijewa te nima wà , yewa ̱ je te iwä itäbiecha ̱ rawa ̱ kje .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Je su ̱ a Simón Pedro te ra , ije ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte Jesús klä kicha ja ̱ mi , jera ite isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Säkekewa , ma je ̱ k sikö yis yika , yis dä ji yakei wakbläk ki ̱ ka !

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Simón ssëna jekäi , ka jiye kuna ta , nima kolona ta ̱ i te Simón irä isaka tso ̱ ira wa biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Zebedeo yabala Jacobo irä Juan irä , jewa rä nima kukäkña Simón ra , jewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ je te ñakäi . Ata Jesús te isha Simón ia ̱ : — Ke ba suana . Ata jirami ba maju ̱ rä ditsä kukäk nima säkei ye .

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Jera ijewa te ko ̱ no sikaté ka ̱ ssi ̱ lka . Jeska ijile biköle jawa ̱ ta ̱ na ite , jekäi iminejulumi Jesús da .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús katke jukläyäkä etka ska ra , jeska jäiyi ekla pa kalabe iale lepra wa ̱ je deju ̱ ikatke ska . Ñerä ite Jesús su ̱ a ra , ije ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi , ka ̱ kia iia ̱ te isha : — Säkekewa , ba ki ̱ ishena ra , ba ia ̱ yis bäirmini yëë .

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Jera Jesús jula tkawa ̱ ija ̱ mi te isha : — Yis ki ̱ ishena ; bä bäinoni yëë . Jera ñawäsaka lepra tse ̱ naju ̱ mi ija ̱ mi .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Jera ka iwa ̱ ipakane je shäk kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , ata ite isha iia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ chui ia ̱ je ̱ k kjashäk . Jeska bä siki tenaklä je mo ̱ Säkeklä wäna , jiräni Moisés wa ̱ sa pakale iwa ̱ k käi , ijewa wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Jeiräta Jesús palei ju ̱ ñenamika ̱ jöikwä ta ki ̱ ta si ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ däke ̱ iktä ssäk irä , ijewa duäke ̱ bäiwa ̱ klä iwa ̱ irä .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Ata Jesús mike ̱ ka yi kuna shtä ska , jeska ika ̱ kiäke ̱ .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús te sa pakte kaldu ra , jeska fariseo wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä ñajäklelewa ̱ tso ̱ . Jewa dar jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala biköle tso ̱ Galilea ska , Judea ska , Jerusalén ska . Jera Säkekewa täkili tso ̱ ije wa ̱ sä bäiwa ̱ klä .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Ñerä ekla karalewa ̱ detse ̱ ditsä wa ̱ je ̱ k katashuäklä ja ̱ rka . Jera ijewa kiana itsa ̱ kmiwa ̱ bäklenakwa ̱ Jesús wäja ̱ mi .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Ata chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapanawa ̱ kju ̱ ei maikäi a ̱ ni ka ijewa däkleiwa ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka imineka ̱ ju ̱ lu ju tsi ̱ bata ki ̱ ka te ikjä kpaja ̱ wa ̱ . Jeska je karalewa ̱ ja ̱ wa ̱ té ijewa te ije ̱ k katashuäklä ja ̱ rka ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ sha ̱ na däkwa ̱ Jesús wäja ̱ mi .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Ijewa te ji biketsa etkabä su ̱ a ije te ra , ite isha : — El dikä , ma nui rä jalewa ̱ bitaba .

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , jewa te ibiketsa je ̱ r na : “ ¿ Yi ije rä , je ktäke ̱ yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi rä na ? ¿ Yi ia ̱ sa ̱ nui jarmiwa ̱ bitaba na ? Ata Säkeklä ebä ne ia ̱ sa ̱ nui jarwa ̱ bitaba rä . ”

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Ata jiräni ijewa je ̱ rika rä te Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a . Je ne ki ̱ ka ite ijewa wächakewa ̱ : — ¿ Ji biketsa bas te bas je ̱ r na rä na ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: ¿ Mane yila tjabana rä na : ‘ Ma nui rä jalewa ̱ bitaba ’ ni iräle , ta ‘ ma je ̱ köka ̱ shkäk ’ ni iräle ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Ata bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä ditsä yäbei ia ̱ ka ̱ wei tso ̱ sa ̱ nui jäkläwa ̱ bitaba ka ̱ jiska — jera ite isha je karalewa ̱ ia ̱ — : — Yie ishe ba ia ̱ , ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma je ̱ katashuäklä kuköwa ̱ , ma cho ̱ ni bä juka .

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka ije ̱ kaka ̱ ijewa wäna , te ije ̱ katashuäklä kukawa ̱ , mineju ̱ ni ijuka . Je te Säkeklä kjeishe rami ña ̱ la wà kte baa wà .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Je te biköle je ̱ r shewa ̱ kajakla . Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa te Säkeklä kjeisha kte bäi wà . Isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ je yika , je ki ̱ ka ite isha : — Jir jile su ̱ a sä te , ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ji su ̱ le käi .

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Je itäki ̱ Jesús mineju ̱ , jera ite inaklä bäkäk wa ekla kie Leví ni je su ̱ a je ̱ tkelewa ̱ inaklä bäkäklä ska , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Sä shkä yis da .

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Jekäi Leví je ̱ kaka ̱ te ijile biköle tulata ̱ na , mineju ̱ ira .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Jekjepa Leví te iju ska jile äliwa ̱ ta ̱ i Jesús yika . Jeska inaklä bäkäk wa irä , ditsä saka irä jewa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ ñatulawa ̱ yäkäk ijewa ra .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa irä , ijewa sha ̱ na ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , jewa te Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa sha yakei te isha : — ¿ Jiye ba te ji ñeke ̱ ji yeke ̱ inaklä bäkäk wa ra ji yakei wakbläk wa ra rä na ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Sa ̱ tso ̱ ka duë ta wa ki ̱ ka sä bäiwa ̱ k sher kuna , ata sä duäke ̱ wa ne ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ka yis dene rä sä wämo wa kiäk kuna , ata yis de rä ji yakei wakbläk wa ne pakäk ñamanewakksa ̱ .

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Jera jewa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Juan wa ̱ dulanak wa bätsäke ̱ ka ̱ raa , ñakäi ika ̱ kiäke ̱ . Je su ̱ ta fariseo wa te iwe ̱ ke ̱ . Ata ba wa ̱ dulanak wa te ji ñe rami ji ye rami ebä .

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — ¿ Bas ia ̱ ra sä te julakolone diei ye ska tso ̱ wa pakemi bätsäk jula kolonak kaldu ji ̱ a ijewa ra bala na ra na ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Ata ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a je jula kolonak minaklätse ̱ ijewa yika , je ke ̱ i wà kjepa ijewa bätsämi rä .

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Ñakäi ite ji paka ijewa ia ̱ jile she ja ̱ mi jikäi : — Yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ paiklä spa ̱ na ka kukä tenakksa ̱ paiklä nu ̱ l da wäbätsäklä . Ata ikuna jekäi ra , jera je paiklä spa ̱ na klasha ̱ naju ̱ mi , ñakäi je spa ̱ na kukä ka juenak bäi inu ̱ l ja ̱ mi .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Ñaebä yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ vino blona ji ̱ a ka tenak bewak kjuä yöle bolsa ye nu ̱ l da shtä naka . Ata ikuna jekäi ra , je vino blona ji ̱ a te bewak kjuä tsikiwe ̱ ju ̱ emi , jera vino tkerju ̱ mi , ñakäi ijui weikarmiwa ̱ .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Bäi si ̱ ra vino blona ji ̱ a tie rä bewak kjuä spa ̱ na ja ̱ rka .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Ñakäi yi te vino shko ̱ lewa ̱ kja ya ssa ra , ka je je ̱ r ki ̱ nak ji ̱ a iblona wa ̱ , ata je te ishemi rä : ‘ Shkolewa ̱ kja ne rä bäi si ̱ rä . ’

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Etaba kicha sábado wà , Jesús damiju ̱ trigo tkele sha ̱ na . Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je wä butse rami , käte rami wä che ̱ rami ite jela jula ktä na .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa sha ̱ te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas te ji rä ka o ̱ nak kuna sábado wà je we ̱ ke ̱ rä na ?

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Jera ale David wa ̱ ji o ̱ le , mika ̱ ije irä shkäk ira wa irä ktacha ̱ wa ̱ bäli te ra , ¿ ka bas wa ̱ je ktei wayile na ?

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ Säkeklä ju na , te pan tso ̱ me ̱ leka ̱ je kukacha ̱ wa ̱ , ñawa ̱ ite , ma ite shkäk ira wa ia ̱ . Ata ka ka ̱ kuna je ñaklä , ata je ñe rä chui wa ebä te .

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ditsä yäbei , je rä sábado wäkirií .

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Etäbä kicha sábado wà Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ñapaktäklä jui na te sa pakta . Jera jeska jäiyi ekla jula wämo ssi ̱ lewa ̱ katke .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Jera ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä fariseo wa irä jewa te isu ̱ e tso ̱ wäsi ̱ wa iwa ̱ je bäiwa ̱ ta sábado wà í ̱ ki ̱ ka , je kju ̱ ei ijewa wa ̱ ije kjatiäkläwa ̱ pa .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Ata ije wa ̱ jekäi ijewa je ̱ rika ju ̱ ñer . Jera ite isha je ekla jula ssi ̱ lewa ̱ ia ̱ : — Ma je ̱ k duöka ̱ klä ki ̱ , biköle sha ̱ na . Jera je je ̱ k duaka ̱ klä ki ̱ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yie ichake bas ia ̱ : ¿ Sábado wà ka ̱ tso ̱ ji bäi wa ̱ klä , ta ji yakei wa ̱ klä ? ¿ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkläksa ̱ , ta sä ktäkläwa ̱ ?

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Jera ite biköle tso ̱ ipája ̱ mi su ̱ aksa ̱ . Jera ite isha je ekla ia ̱ : — Bä jula paruöksa ̱ . Jera jekäi ite iwa ̱ ra , ijula bäinani .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Jera ijewa kju ̱ atkawa ̱ Jesús da e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ . Jekäi ijewa ñachakäke ̱ me ite iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä í ̱ wà .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús mineju ̱ ka ̱ bata na ka ̱ kiäk . Jeska ika ̱ kia Säkeklä ia ̱ tuina jaree .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra , ite iwakei wa ̱ dulanak wa kia jaté iwä ki ̱ , jewa sha ̱ kuka ite däka ̱ doce , jewa kia ite iktei bata shäk wa ni .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Jewa kie rä : Simón , je kiani Jesús te Pedro ni ; je el Andrés irä ; Jacobo irä , Juan irä , Felipe irä , Bartolomé irä ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Mateo irä , Tomás irä , Jacobo ale Alfeo yaba irä ; Simón ale bakle kju ̱ atkäk gobierno ra irä ;

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Judas ale Jacobo el irä ; Judas Iscariote wa , ale Jesús ju ̱ akksa ̱ irä .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Jesús bitewa ̱ ju ̱ ni ijewa ra dewa ̱ ni ka ̱ kje ̱ i ki ̱ . Jeska iwa ̱ dulanak wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ tapana iwakei ra , ñakäi Judea ke ̱ i kalabe ska wa , Jerusalén ska wa , ñakäi Tiro irä Sidón irä däyë kjäí ska se ̱ nak wa , jewa date chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ iktä ssäk irä , ijewa kteke ̱ duë te bäinaklä irä .

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: Jera wikblu ñá shtä wa ̱ weikanak wa bäiwa ̱ ni ite .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Biköle ssëna ipassäk ; ka irä jiye kuna ta , täkili kjäke ̱ ksa ̱ iska te biköle bäiwe ̱ ke ̱ ni .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Jera Jesús wä cha ̱ mi iwa ̱ dulanak wa su ̱ ak , te isha : “ Bäije bas ka jita wa rä , bas ne ia ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: “ Bäije bas kteke ̱ bäli te jira wa rä , bas ssërcha ̱ miwa ̱ ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka . “ Bäije bas ji ̱ ake ̱ jira wa rä , bas ja ̱ ñami ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: “ Bäije bas dä mika ̱ ditsä te bas dokoitsawa ̱ , bas tulaksa ̱ , bas sha yakei , bas ki ̱ yua yakei ditsä yäbei kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka ra rä .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà bas ssëno a ̱ naa , bas ka ̱ ssö jaboo , bas ia ̱ ji säkei ta tso ̱ däkksa ̱ ta ̱ i ka ̱ jöir ska ki ̱ ka . Ata je su ̱ ta ijewa kalí wa te jile bata shäk wa ukä ja ̱ mi iwá ̱ rä .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: “ Ata säli bas blu wa rä , bas dä je ̱ r pablele e ̱ ná jile wà ki ̱ ka .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: “ Säli bas tso ̱ jira yakle wa rä , bäli te bas ktechemiwa ̱ ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka . “ Säli bas ja ̱ ñake ̱ jira wa rä , bas je ̱ r iarcha ̱ miwa ̱ , bas ji ̱ ami ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: “ Säli bas dä , ditsä biköle te bas kjeisheke ̱ kte baa wà ra rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je su ̱ ta ijewa kalí wa te sä wäyuäk jile bata shäk wa käi , jewa kjeisha baa .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: “ Jekäi yis te isheke ̱ bas tso ̱ yis ktä ssäk wa ia ̱ : Bas ku ̱ bas bolki wa shka ̱ li ̱ blö , bas ku ̱ bas dokoitsäk wa ia ̱ ji wo ̱ bäi .

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: Ji shäk o ̱ nak yakei bas ukä ja ̱ mi wa ia ̱ , bas ku ̱ ji bäi shöpa o ̱ nak . Bas shäk yakei wa ki ̱ bas ka ̱ kiö .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Yi te ba kpa ma ja ̱ kätä ki ̱ ka ra , ma ja ̱ kätä ekta mo iia ̱ iwa ̱ buka ̱ nak . Ñakäi yi te ma wa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ tsa ̱ mi ra , jera ñakäi ka ̱ mo iia ̱ ba paiklä tsa ̱ klämi iwa ̱ .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Ñakäi yilé te ji kia ba ia ̱ ra , je ia ̱ imo . Yi te bä ji baka tsa ̱ mi ra , ke je kiaksa ̱ ni iia ̱ .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Jishtä bas ki ̱ sa saka sherke ̱ ji wa ̱ k bas ia ̱ käi , je su ̱ ta bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ ijewa ia ̱ .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: “ Ata bas te bas shka ̱ li ̱ bläk wa ebä shka ̱ li ̱ ble ra , ¿ je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ bäi bas ia ̱ na ? Ñera je su ̱ ta ji yakei wakbläk wa te ishka ̱ li ̱ bläk wa shka ̱ li ̱ ble rä .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Ñakäi bas te ji we ̱ ke ̱ bäi ji wa ̱ k bäi bas ia ̱ jewa ebä ia ̱ ra , ¿ je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ bäi bas ia ̱ na ? Ñera je su ̱ ta ji yakei wakbläk wa te iwe ̱ rä .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Ñakäi bas te inaklä peite bas wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak sa ̱ tju ̱ ak shtä ebä ia ̱ ra , ¿ je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ bäi bas ia ̱ na ? Ñera je su ̱ ta ji yakei wakbläk wa te inaklä peite ji yakei wakbläk wa ia ̱ rä , je rä je säkei däkläksa ̱ ni iia ̱ kalabe .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: Ata bas ku ̱ bas bolki wa shka ̱ li ̱ blö , ji wo ̱ bäi ijewa ia ̱ , ji peitö ijewa ia ̱ ka biketsale kuna säkei me ̱ nakni . Jekäi ra bas ia ̱ je säkei dämiksa ̱ ta ̱ i , ñakäi bas dämiwa ̱ rä ale Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta je yabala ye . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , iwakei je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ ka ikjeishäk kuna wa ia ̱ , ji yakei wakbläk wa ia ̱ .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas je ̱ r bäi shö sa saka ia ̱ , jishtä bas Ká rä je ̱ r bäi shäk käi .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: “ Ke bas ku ̱ sa saka wabiketsaksa ̱ , je ne ra ka bas wabiketsanakksa ̱ rä . Ke bas ku ̱ sa saka ki ̱ nui ja ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ , je ne ra ka bas ki ̱ nui ja ̱ nakka ̱ rä . Bas ku ̱ sa saka jöwa ̱ bitaba , je ne ra bas jarmiwa ̱ bitaba rä .

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Bas ku ̱ ji mo ̱ , je ne ra bas ia ̱ ji me ̱ rmi rä ; je säkei me ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ rä mablele bäi , wätelewa ̱ därërë , ñak tele , wäukä mileksa ̱ kje . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji wà bas te ji mabla sa saka ia ̱ , je ebä wà ji mablermini bas ia ̱ . ”

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Jekjepa ite ijewa ia ̱ ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi : “ ¿ Baishe ka wä wajuenak kuna ia ̱ isaka ka wä wajuenak kuna wajiermi na ? ¿ Ka je bolwë jolormi ishäkä wä ja ̱ r naka na ?
