text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Dulanak rä ka ipaktäk tsa ̱ ta kuna . Ata bena yi rä dulale e ̱ ná ra , je dämiwa ̱ ipaktäk ra ñaebä .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: “ ¿ Jiye ba te ka ̱ pjoi su ̱ e bä el wäbala na , ata kal kuklei kate ba wakei wäbala na je ka su ̱ e bä te rä na ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Jera , ¿ maikäi ba ia ̱ iyirmi bä el ia ̱ : ‘ El dikä , ka ̱ mo yis ia ̱ je ka ̱ pjoi kate bä wäbala na tsa ̱ kläksa ̱ ’ ni , ata ba wakei wäbala na kal kuklei kate ka su ̱ e ba te rä na ? Ba ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà , säkätä ba ku ̱ kal kuklei tso ̱ ksa ̱ ba wakei wäbala na . Jekäi ra ba wä wajuermi bäi , ba wa ̱ ka ̱ pjoi kate bä el wäbala na je tsa ̱ kläksa ̱ .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: “ Jekäi kal bäi rä ka wänak kuna wä ta yakei , ñaebä kal yakei rä ka wänak kuna wä ta bäi .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Iwa rä kal biköle juer dä iwä ne wà . Ñera ka higuera wä shte rä dika yäkä kicha ja ̱ mi kuna , ñakäi ka uva kicha tie rä ka ̱ kshe ̱ i ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Ditsä bäi te ije ̱ r ska ji säkei ta bäi tso ̱ ne ja ̱ mi ji bäi tse ̱ ksa ̱ rä . Ata ditsä yakei te ji yakei ne ja ̱ mi ji yakei tse ̱ ksa ̱ rä . Iwa rä sa ̱ je ̱ r ska ji tso ̱ , je ne ja ̱ mi sä kjäbata ska sä ktä rä .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: “ ¿ Jiye ba te yis kie : ‘ Säkekewa , Säkekewa ’ ni , ata ka bas te yis ktä wawe ̱ kuna rä na ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Ata biköle yi däke ̱ yis wäki ̱ te yis ktä ssëke ̱ , je wawá ̱ ite ra , jishtä käi je wakei rä pake mar yie :

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Ije rä jishtä ekla te ju yua käi . Ite ishäkä ja ̱ r bia ka ̱ mii , kjepa ite iñak wäkukäklä tkawa ̱ jak ki ̱ ka . Jera mika ̱ diklä butsa ̱ naté ta ̱ i ra , iyölí tena je ju ja ̱ mi , ata ka iia ̱ iwäbuka ̱ neka ̱ , irä yöle bäi ebä ki ̱ ka .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Ata yi te kte ssa , ata ka iwa ̱ iwao ̱ ne ra , je rä jishtä ekla te ju yua kje ishäkä ki ̱ ka , ka ñak wäkukäklä ta käi . Je ja ̱ mi diklä yölí tena kjelabä ra ija ̱ nawa ̱ , jera je ju weikanawa ̱ itjä . ”

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Jekäi Jesús te je ktei biköle sha e ̱ ná ikukei ssäk wa ia ̱ ra , imineju ̱ Capernaúmka .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Jeska ekla guardia wa cien wäsikewa ̱ k kjanaklä shka ̱ ta iwa ̱ je duärawa ̱ , yee ka täkili ta ji ̱ a .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Jera je te Jesús palei ssa ra , ite Judío wa wäkiri wa patkami Jesús kiäkté pjoo , ikjanaklä bäiwa ̱ kni .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Jekäi jewa demi Jesús wä ki ̱ ra , ijewa te ikia pjoo , te isha iia ̱ : — Ba kiana ije käi tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je wa ̱ saje ditsei wä shka ̱ l , ñakäi ije te sa ̱ ia ̱ ñapaktäklä jui yuacha ̱ .

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Jekäi Jesús mineju ̱ ijewa ra . Ata idamiju ̱ kja iju ska alemana ra , je guardia wa wäsikewa ̱ k te isalibä wa moska patkaté Jesús wäki ̱ ishäk iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ke ma je ̱ k weika bitäk , ka yis dä bäi kuna je ju na ka ba däkleiwa ̱ .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Je kju ̱ ei ka yis minakleiwa ̱ ba wäki ̱ ka yis dä bäi kuna ki ̱ ka . Ata ba ku ̱ ishö yile ebä , jera yis kjanaklä bäirmini .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis wakei rä patkenak yis tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ , ata ñakäi yis wa ̱ guardia wa tso ̱ patkenak . Jekäi yie ishe ekla ia ̱ : “ Ma cho ̱ ” , jera je maju ̱ ; isaka ia ̱ : “ Bä kute ” , jera je bitäju ̱ ; yie ishe yis kjanaklä ia ̱ : “ Jikäi iwo ̱ ” , jera je te je we ̱ .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Jesús te jekäi issa ra , je te issëwa ̱ baa . Jera ije ̱ k manewa ̱ té je te isha chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dami ira wa ia ̱ : — Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , yis wa ̱ Israel wa sha ̱ na ka yi a ̱ ni ko ̱ ne ji biketsäk etkabä je kjekla .

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Jera je patkele wa dejuluni ju ska ra , ijewa te je kjanaklä ku ̱ a bäileka ̱ ni kja .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Je ukä ska je ̱ nanapa Jesús mineju ̱ jukläyäkä kie Naín ska . Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa irä , ditsä saka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ irä damiña ira .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Ñerä idamijulu kja jukläyäkä kjäshtäklä ska ra , sa ̱ nu ̱ l damitse ̱ itäbinakwa ̱ . Je rä ia ̱ mi yaba eklabä , je ia ̱ mi rä chichö . Ije ra jukläyäkä wakwa dami chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Ñerä Säkekewa te je dulewa ̱ a ̱ mi su ̱ a ra , ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi idälänawa ̱ , jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Ke ma ji ̱ a .

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Jera ije ̱ k sikawa ̱ jula tkawa ̱ sa ̱ nu ̱ l tsa ̱ klä kalí ja ̱ mi . Jera itsa ̱ k wa ñawäkukacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ñerä Jesús te isha : — Dulaklei , yis te ishe ma ia ̱ : ¡ Ma je ̱ köka ̱ ni !

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Jera je dulewa ̱ je ̱ tkaka ̱ ktaka ̱ ni . Jera Jesús te ipatkami ia ̱ mi ia ̱ .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Je yika biköle suanacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i . Jewa te Säkeklä kjeisha te isha : — Sa ̱ sha ̱ ekla dewa ̱ jile bata shäk bäi si ̱ ye . Ñakäi : — Säkeklä deju ̱ iwakei cha wa wäki ̱ .

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Je ite iwa ̱ je palei ju ̱ ñena Judea ke ̱ i biköle ska , ñakäi je ke ̱ i pája ̱ mi biköle ska .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Juan ia ̱ iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je biköle ktei pakani . Jera Juan te iwa ̱ dulanak wa kia jaté bol .

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa patkami Säkekewa wäki ̱ ichakäk iia ̱ : “ ¿ Ba ne rä ale däke ̱ ju ̱ rä na , ata sa kiana isaka ki ̱ ssäk ji ̱ a na ? ”

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Jekäi je bol demi Jesús ska ra , ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Juan säwäukewa ̱ k te sá patkaté ba ia ̱ ichakäk : ¿ Ba ne rä ale däke ̱ ju ̱ rä na , ata sa kiana isaka ki ̱ ssäk ji ̱ a na ?

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Jera je horaí ebä wà , Jesús te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ bäiwa ̱ ni , duë ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa käi , duë wa ̱ weikanak wa käi , wikblu yakeila wa ̱ kololewa ̱ wa käi , ñakäi ite ka wä wajuenak kuna wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wä wajuewa ̱ .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — Bas cho ̱ ni ipakäk Juan ia ̱ , ji su ̱ a , ji ssa bas te käi ; ka wä wajuenak kuna wa wä wajuerke ̱ ni , klä ialewa ̱ wa shkäke ̱ ni , paiale lepra wa ̱ wa bäirke ̱ ni yëë , kukä balewa ̱ wa kukä wassërke ̱ ni , dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ r tuläke ̱ ka ̱ ni , ñakäi ka jita wa ia ̱ kte baa bata yirte .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: ¡ Bäije yi ka dokonewa ̱ jishtä yis dä käi je wa ̱ rä !

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Ñerä je Juan wa ̱ patkele wa minejulumini ra , ite Juan ktei chaka je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ : “ ¿ Jibä su ̱ ak bas dasta ̱ na ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska rä na ? ¿ Kje uka wäkpeke ̱ si ̱ wa ̱ te je su ̱ ak na ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Ata ka irä jekäi kuna ra , ¿ ji su ̱ ak bas dasta ̱ na rä na ? ¿ Ekla je ̱ k pajiele yëë su ̱ ak na ? Ñera sa ̱ je ̱ k pajielewa ̱ baa , se ̱ nak bäi ebä , jewa tso ̱ rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ju na .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Jera ¿ jibä su ̱ ak bas dasta ̱ na rä na ? ¿ Ekla jile bata shäk na ? Tsa ̱ na ra jekäi irä , ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka ije rä jile bata shäk ebä kuna .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Ata ije ne rä ale ktei yöle katke jikäi rä : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Yie yis ktei bata shäk patkemi bä wätsa ̱ kba . Je te ma ña ̱ le ̱ i bäiwe ̱ miba bä yika . ’

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Yie ishe bas ia ̱ , sa ̱ ko ̱ le alaklä wa wa ̱ , jewa sha ̱ na yi ka kuna Juan tsa ̱ ta , jeiräta Säkeklä gobierno ja ̱ mi wa sha ̱ na yi rä ja ̱ lewa ̱ biköle katäbäka je rä ije tsa ̱ ta . ”

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Je ssa biköle te ra , ñakäi inaklä bäkäk wa te ra , ijewa te isha Säkeklä te ji we ̱ rä wämo , ijewa rä wäokle Juan te sä wäukewe ̱ ja ̱ mi je ki ̱ ka .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Ata fariseo wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , jewa te Säkeklä wa ̱ ibiketsale o ̱ nak ijewa wa ̱ , je ju ̱ aksa ̱ , ijewa ka ñame ̱ ne iia ̱ wäoka ̱ nak ki ̱ ka .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Jesús te isha ji ̱ a : “ ¿ Jibä ja ̱ mi yis te ditsä tso ̱ jira wa pakemi na ? ¿ Jishtä käi ijewa rä na ?

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Ijewa rä jishtä yabala käjäklä sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska , jewa a ̱ r ñawäja ̱ mi käi , jewa te ishe : ‘ Sá bulana bas ia ̱ kabe wà , ta ka bas klä ju ̱ a ta ; sá kjoyina sä dulewa ̱ ji ̱ etsäklä shtä wà , ta ka bas ji ̱ a ta . ’

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Juan säwäukewa ̱ k deju ̱ wa ̱ pan ka ñane , vino ka yane , ata bas te ishe : ‘ Ije rä kolole wa ̱ be wa ̱ ’ ni .

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Ata ditsä yäbei deju ̱ , je te ji ñeke ̱ ji yeke ̱ , ata bas te je she rä : ‘ Isu ̱ o , ije rä yäkäk ta ̱ i , vino yäk ta ̱ i , je ̱ k bawa ̱ k inaklä bäkäk wa ra ji yakei wakbläk wa ra ’ ni .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Ata sä rä biketsä ta ra , je juerke ̱ rä sä te biköle ji we ̱ ke ̱ ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Fariseo wa ekla te Jesús kiami yäkäk ira . Jera idewa ̱ ju ̱ je fariseo ju ja ̱ rka ra , ije ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Ñerä alaklä ekla ka ̱ se ̱ newa ̱ k yakei se ̱ nak je jukläyäkä na , je te iju ̱ ña Jesús kalme yäkäk je fariseo ju ska ra , jera iwa ̱ perfume detse ̱ jui ta yöle alabastro wà .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Je ji ̱ a kaldu Jesús shäbe kja ̱ ne iklä säkätä ja ̱ mi . Je iwä riä wà ite ije klä nu ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ , je pjowe ̱ ke ̱ ni ite itsa ̱ ku ̱ kä wà , te ikläka iwä jalassëke ̱ , je ki ̱ ite perfume tkeke ̱ .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Ñerä je fariseo ikiäkmi yäkäk te isu ̱ a ra , ite ibiketsa je ̱ r naka : “ Ikuna ije rä jile bata shäk si ̱ ra ; jera ite iju ̱ ñemi mane shtä je alaklä iklä passäk rä , ije rä ka ̱ se ̱ newa ̱ yakei ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Simón , yis wa ̱ jile tso ̱ yinak ba ia ̱ . Jera Simón te ikúka : — Sapaktäk , jera ishö .

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Ekla inaklä peitäk te ditsä bol ñawe ̱ ke ̱ ; ekla ñawe ̱ ke ̱ ite quiniento denario , iel cincuenta denario .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Ata ka ijewa wa ̱ itju ̱ aklä ta , je ki ̱ ka ipeitäk te je bol wa nui wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ . Jera , ¿ jewa mane si ̱ te je ipeitäk shka ̱ li ̱ blemi bäi si ̱ rä na ?

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Jera Simón te ikúka : — Yie ibiketse , nui ta ̱ i jalewa ̱ te . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ba te ibiketsa rä bulee .

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Jera iwächa ̱ mi je alaklä su ̱ ak ra , ite isha Simón ia ̱ : — ¿ Ba te jí alaklä su ̱ a na ? Yis dewa ̱ ju ̱ bä ju na ra , ka ba wa ̱ diklä me ̱ ne yis ia ̱ yis klä paskuäklä , ata ije te yis klä nu ̱ wa ̱ iwakei wäriä wà , je pasikani ite itsa ̱ ku ̱ kä wà .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Ka ba wa ̱ yis chakane wäjalassële , ata yis dewa ̱ ju bä ju na je bala na ije te yis kläka yis wäjalassa jirä jirä .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Ka ba wa ̱ aceite tkene yis tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ , ata ije te yis klä ki ̱ perfume tka .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te ishe ba ia ̱ , ji yakei wakblele iwa ̱ ta ̱ i , je rä jalewa ̱ bitaba , iwa ̱ yis shka ̱ l ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka ; ata yi janawa ̱ bitaba inui elkje ebä ki ̱ ka ra , je wakei wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l dä elkjebä .

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Jera ite isha je alaklä ia ̱ : — Ba wa ̱ ji wakblele yakei je nui rä jalewa ̱ bitaba .

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Jera isaka tso ̱ ira ñatululewa ̱ yäkäk wa te ishami ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Yi ije rä , je te ñakäi sa nui je wa ̱ rä na ?

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha je alaklä ia ̱ : — Ba te ji biketsa etkabä wà ba tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ . Bäirä ma cho ̱ ni a ̱ naa .

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Jera je ukäki ̱ Jesús shka jukläyäkä ta ̱ i ta ̱ i irä tsi ̱ dala irä shtä ska Säkeklä gobierno ktei baa wapaktäk , je bata shäk . Jera ale doce wa damiña ira .

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: Ñakäi alaklä wa manele bäileni duë yika , wikblu yakeila yika , jewa damiña ira . Ekla rä María , kinak Magdala wa , je ki ̱ ka be siete rä kjäieleksa ̱ ;

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: iel dä Juana ; je rä Cuza , ale Herodes ia ̱ iji tso ̱ su ̱ ak , je se ̱ naklä ; ekla rä Susana ; ñakäi alaklä wa saka ta chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ . Jewa te ijewa pasu ̱ eke ̱ iwakwa wa ̱ ji tso ̱ wa .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ tapanawa ̱ , ñakäi jukläyäkä etkä etkä ska wa date Jesús wäki ̱ , jewa ia ̱ ite ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi :

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: “ Däli tkäk ekla mineju ̱ idäli wä tuläk . Jekäi ite itule rami ra , iwä sha ̱ jolona ña ̱ la ki ̱ , jewa wätunacha ̱ wa ̱ , jera du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka te ikatacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Sha ̱ jolona jak yäkä na ; jekäi je tsikinaka ̱ , ata issi ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ni , ka ka ̱ rä chi ̱ i ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Sha ̱ jolona dika yäkä na ; je kibina ñara , ata je dika yäkä te iki ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Sha ̱ jolona ishäkä bäi ki ̱ ka ; je kibinaka ̱ ra , iwäna cien cien . ” Je she kate ite ra , ia ̱ na täkii : “ Yi rä kukäta wassënak ra , ¡ je ku ̱ issö ! ”

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te ichaka iia ̱ : “ ¿ Je ji paka ba te jile she ja ̱ mi , jiräni je wà rä na ? ”

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Jera ite isha : “ Bas ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ na bas wa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ktei blelewa ̱ je ju ̱ ñakläwa ̱ , ata kju ̱ awa ia ̱ ji yinaklä jile she ja ̱ mi ebä . Je rä ijewa te isu ̱ a ra , ka ijewa wäna ijuenaklä ; ñakäi ijewa te issa ra , ka ijewa je ̱ r na idäkläwa ̱ .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: “ Je ji paka yie jile she ja ̱ mi , je wà rä jikäi : Säkeklä ktä ne rä je däli wä rä .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Je ijolona ña ̱ la ki ̱ , jewa ne rä kte ssäk wa rä , ata je ukä ska be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i däke ̱ ju ̱ te je kte tse ̱ ju ̱ eke ̱ mi ije ̱ r ska , ka iwa ̱ ikukäklä itsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ ye .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Je ijolona jak yäkä na , jewa ne rä manele te kte ssa ra , ite ikuke je ̱ r ssële a ̱ naa rä . Ata iwakwa rä ka ñak kicha ta bäi , ki ̱ ka je kukemi ite elkje bala ta ; ata mika ̱ imabler su ̱ rke ̱ ra , ije ̱ k tsa ̱ raksa ̱ .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Je ijolona dika yäkä na , jewa ne rä kte ssäk wa rä . Ata idami sha ̱ na ra , ji tso ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r iawa ̱ k käi , blune käi , ji wà sä wäbätsä sa ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka ra käi , je te je ki ̱ tieke ̱ wa ̱ , ka wä täler kuna .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Ata ijolona ishäkä bäi ki ̱ ka , jewa ne rä manele kte ssäk je ̱ r bäi wà , je ̱ rike bulee wà wa rä , te je kukeke ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi ichatkäke ̱ wa ̱ wà iwärke ̱ bäi .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: “ Yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ tsi ̱ ni ka wäkanakka ̱ ki ̱ kolonakwa ̱ u ̱ yaka wí ̱ wà iräle , dunakcha ̱ ja ̱ ka ̱ niki ̱ ka iräle , ata ite idueka ̱ rä iduäkläka ̱ ki ̱ , yi däke ̱ wa ̱ wa wa ̱ oloi su ̱ nak .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Iwa rä ji a ̱ ni ka kuna blelewa ̱ ka kjayinakwa ̱ kuna käi , ñakäi ji a ̱ ni ka kuna jaki ka ju ̱ ñenak wa ̱ kuna käi , ka tse ̱ nakksa ̱ kuna atjä käi .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: “ Maikäi bas te kte ssë rä , biketsö tsa ̱ na . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi wa ̱ ji tso ̱ je ia ̱ iki ̱ me ̱ rmi . Ata yi wa ̱ ka ji kuna , je te ibiketse iwa ̱ ji tso ̱ ni , jeiräta je rä bakanakksa ̱ iyika . ”

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Jera Jesús a ̱ mi irä iel wa irä dejulu , ata ka idäwa ̱ ikaldu ska , sa ̱ tso ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ kju ̱ ei .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Jera ibata sha iia ̱ : — Ma a ̱ mi irä bä el wa irä de kajali jí sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ektaka , ijewa ki ̱ bä shena su ̱ nak .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — Säkeklä ktä ssäk , ñakäi ikukäk wao ̱ nak , jewa ne rä yis a ̱ mi , yis el wa rä .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús je ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no na iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra ñara , jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Sä shkäksa ̱ tipä a ̱ mikata . Jera iminemi .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Idami ji ̱ a ra , Jesús kapawa ̱ . Ñerä si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ naté täkii te tipä tjuewa ̱ ka ̱ ta ̱ i , yëwa ̱ iwä itäbircha ̱ rawa ̱ däläna si ̱ .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasikawa ̱ ishki ̱ wa ̱ k te isha : — ¡ Säkekewa , Säkekewa ! ¡ Sa tuar dawa ̱ irä ! Jekäi ishki ̱ naka ̱ te si ̱ wa ̱ irä tipä tjuäke ̱ irä je uña . Jera ñawäsaka iwäkolonawa ̱ bitaba .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas te ji biketse etkabä me ra na ? Jera ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ malete ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ; jekäi ite ichaka ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Jera yi si ̱ ije rä , je te si ̱ wa ̱ irä tipä irä patke , jera ite iktä ssë rä na ?

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Jekäi ikjaksa ̱ julu demi Gadara wa ke ̱ i ki ̱ ; je rä Galilea wäsaka .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Jesús deksa ̱ ju ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka ka ̱ pjota ki ̱ ka ra , jeska jäiyi ekla dar je jukläyäkä ska deju ̱ té iwäki ̱ . Je rä wäialeksa ̱ be wa ̱ . Jekäi mikleté ka ije ̱ k pajiä kuna , ka ise ̱ r ji ̱ a ju na , ata ise ̱ r dä sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska ebä .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Je te Jesús su ̱ a ra , ia ̱ na täkii janawa ̱ wakte i ̱ ski ̱ Jesús wäja ̱ mi te isha täkii : — Jesús , Säkeklä Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta yaba , ¿ jiye ba bite yis wäki ̱ rä na ? Dunasi ̱ , ke yis paka ji shka ̱ l ssäk .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Ite jekäi isha rä , ije yika Jesús te je wikblu ñá shtä paka je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ ki ̱ ka . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka ̱ raa je te ikukeke ̱ ; jekäi imorke ̱ cadena wà , ñakäi tabeli yaka wà ikläka iwätkewa ̱ klä , ata ite je butse tuleke ̱ mi . Jera be te ipatkeke ̱ mini ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiräni ba kie rä ? Jera ite ikúka : — Yis kie rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ni . Je sha ite wà rä be chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ rä baklewa ̱ ija ̱ rka ki ̱ ka .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Jera jewa ka ̱ kia Jesús ia ̱ ka iwa ̱ ipatkäklämi kuna ka ̱ ja ̱ r ka ̱ mii ska .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Jera jeska köchi ka ̱ biä tso ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ka ̱ tsä ja ̱ mi . Jekäi ijewa ka ̱ kia iia ̱ iwa ̱ ka ̱ ma ̱ klä iñapatkäkläwa ̱ jewa ja ̱ rka . Jekäi ijewa ia ̱ ite ka ̱ ma ̱ .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Jera be te je jäiyi jawa ̱ ta ̱ na ñapatkacha ̱ wa ̱ köchi ja ̱ rka . Jera köchi ñatka jolowa ̱ mi ka ̱ ukä ki ̱ tipä na ita ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Jera je kjänanak wa te je o ̱ na su ̱ a ra , ijulunami te je ktei sha jukläyäkä na irä , ipája ̱ mi na irä .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Jeka ditsä minejulu ji o ̱ na rä su ̱ ak , demijulu Jesús kaldu ska te ale jäiyi ska be mineleksa ̱ julu je wakei ku ̱ a je ̱ tkelewa ̱ Jesús klä säkätä ja ̱ mi pajielewa ̱ ni , je ̱ r tani bäi ; je te ijewa suawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Jera je su ̱ ak wa te ipaka ijewa ia ̱ maikäi je wäialeksa ̱ be wa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ rä käi .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Jera Gadara ke ̱ i ska chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa biköle te Jesús ia ̱ isha iminakläju ̱ pani iyika isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka . Jera Jesús je ̱ k jiaka ̱ ko ̱ no na mineju ̱ mi .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Ata ale jäiyi ska be mineleksa ̱ julu je wakei te ka ̱ kia pjoo Jesús ia ̱ iminakläña ira . Ata ite ipatkamini te isha iia ̱ :

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: — Ma cho ̱ ni bä juka . Jeska ba te ipakeni jishtä Säkeklä te ji e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ wá ̱ ma ia ̱ käi . Jekäi imineju ̱ mi te ipaka jukläyäkä kalabe sha ̱ na , jishtä Jesús te ji e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ wá ̱ iia ̱ käi .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Jesús dateksa ̱ ni jíkata ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ssëna a ̱ naa ikiäkwa ̱ , ijewa te iki ̱ ssë kate ki ̱ ka .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Ñerä ekla kie Jairo , je rä ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , je deju ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte Jesús klä kicha ja ̱ mi te ikia pjoo minak ijuka .

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyaba alaklä eklabä doce año kjena yëwa ̱ je duärawa ̱ irä ki ̱ ka . Jera Jesús damiju ̱ ji ̱ a ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ter dami ija ̱ mi .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Ñerä alaklä ekla duäke ̱ pi ju ̱ ne e ̱ e ̱ na te , bitewa ̱ doce año kje . Jekäi sä bäiwa ̱ k wa tju ̱ e te ije je ̱ k se ̱ newa ̱ klä biköle e ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ , ata ka yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ibäir .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Je je ̱ k sikawa ̱ Jesús shäbe kja ̱ ne , je te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ bata passawa ̱ , jera ñawäsaka ipi ju ̱ rke ̱ wäkolonawa ̱ .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — ¿ Yibä te yis passa rä na ? Jera biköle te iblawa ̱ . Jera Pedro te isha : — Säkekewa , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tenacha ̱ wa ̱ ma ja ̱ mi ne te ba watie dami rä .

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Ata Jesús te isha : — Yilé te yis passa . Iwa rä yie issa ra , yis yaka ska täkili kjaksa ̱ ju ̱ .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Jera je alaklä te isu ̱ a ka ibler ji ̱ a ra , ibiteju ̱ paju ̱ leka ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi . Jera ite ishaka ̱ biköle wäna jiye ite ipassa rä käi , maikäi je plaa ra ibäinani rä käi .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Yaba , ba te ji biketsa etkabä wà ma tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ . Ma cho ̱ ni a ̱ naa .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Ñerä ije ktä kaldu ji ̱ a ra , ekla biteju ̱ ale ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ju ska je deju ̱ te isha : — Ba yaba duawa ̱ . Ke sa paktäk weika ji ̱ a .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Jesús te jekäi issa ra , ite isha Jairo ia ̱ : — Ke bä male ̱ te ̱ nak ; ba ku ̱ ji biketsö etka ebä , jera ba yaba tsa ̱ kermiksa ̱ .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Ñerä Jesús demi Jairo ju ska ra , ka iwa ̱ yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne kjäkwa ̱ ira , ata Pedro irä Juan irä Jacobo irä je yaba ká irä ia ̱ mi irä , jewa ebä ia ̱ ite ka ̱ ma ̱ .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Biköle ji ̱ ate , je ̱ r iarte jela je yaba ki ̱ ka . Ata ite isha : — Ke bas ji ̱ a . Ka ije rä dulewa ̱ kuna , ata ikapawa ̱ irä .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Jera ijewa te ija ̱ ñetsa , ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer iduawa ̱ si ̱ irä ki ̱ ka .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Ata Jesús te ikukawa ̱ ijulaka te isha täkii : — ¡ Yaba , ma jeköka ̱ !

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Jera je yaba wikblu deni ; jera ñawäsaka ije ̱ kaka ̱ . Jekäi Jesús te ijewa paka ichewa ̱ k jile wà .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Jera iká wa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , ata Jesús wa ̱ ka ijewa pakane ji o ̱ na shäk kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa doce tapawa ̱ wa ̱ . Jewa ia ̱ ite täkili ma ka ̱ wei ma be biköle kjäiäkläksa ̱ iwa ̱ , ñakäi sä kteke ̱ duë te bäiwa ̱ klä iwa ̱ .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Jera ite jewa patkami sa paktäk Säkeklä gobierno ktei wà , ñakäi sä duäke ̱ wa bäiwa ̱ k .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Ñakäi ite isha iia ̱ : — Ji a ̱ ni ka mi kuna bas wa ̱ kianak ña ̱ la ki ̱ käi , kata iräle , däli tsa ̱ klä iräle , ñanak iräle , inaklä iräle , ñakäi ke paiklä etkä tsa ̱ kmi .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Mane ju na bas kjawa ̱ käi , jera jeska ebä bas se ̱ r dä , jeska ebä bas miksa ̱ julumini rä .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Ata mai ka bas kirwa ̱ ra , je jukläyäkä ska bas maksa ̱ julu ra , bas klä pjoi pakpöta ̱ na ijuenaklä ijewa rä dokoitsalewa ̱ .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Jera ijewa minemi kjajulu jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala shtä etkä etkä sha ̱ na te kte baa bata she rami , ñakäi sä bäiwe ̱ rami je ke ̱ i biköle ska .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Ka ̱ bala pa ̱ le cuatro je eyaka tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Herodes te ji o ̱ r kate biköle je palei ju ̱ ña . Ata ka ije ̱ r ko ̱ r iia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , manele te isheke ̱ Juan ne shki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na rä .

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Isaka te isheke ̱ Elías ne juenani rä . Isaka te isheke ̱ jile bata shäk wa bakle mikle wa je ne shki ̱ naka ̱ ni rä .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Jera Herodes te isha : — Ñera Juan rä tsa ̱ ku ̱ teleksa ̱ yis wa ̱ , jera ¿ yibä Jesús dä je palei ssa rewa ̱ yie saka saka rä na ? Je ki ̱ ka ite biketse kate maikäi ra ite isu ̱ emiwa ̱ käi .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Ñerä Jesús ktei bata shäk wa deni ra , jewa te ipakani iia ̱ biköle ji wá ̱ ite käi . Jera ite ijewa kia jámi kju ̱ awaka jukläyäkä kie Betsaidaka ka yi kuna shtä ska .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Ata chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te je ju ̱ ñawa ̱ ra , ijewa minemi iitäki ̱ , jera ite ijewa kiawa ̱ ; jewa ia ̱ ite Säkeklä gobierno ktei paka , ñakäi yi ki ̱ bäine sherke ̱ jewa bäiwa ̱ ni ite .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Ka ̱ wä mawa ̱ ju ̱ kja ra , ale doce wa ñasikawa ̱ Jesús wäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Jí chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa patkö ijewa minaklä sa pája ̱ mi jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala shtä ska , ju tso ̱ elkje shtä ska , käpäklä yuläk , ñanak yuläk , jiska sa ̱ tso ̱ rä ka yi kuna shtä ska ki ̱ ka .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ne ku ̱ ijewa chewo ̱ rä . Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Ñera ka sá ji ta , ata pan cinco irä nima botäbä irä je ebä . Ata bä rä sá ma ñanak tju ̱ ak jí ditsä wa biköle chewa ̱ klä .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Jeska jäiyi wa ebä däka ̱ rä cinco mil kjena . Jera ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Ijewa pakö ñajäkläkwa ̱ bala pa ̱ le cincuenta cincuenta käi , eyaka eyaka .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Jera ijewa te iwá ̱ jekäi , jewa te biköle paka ñajäkläkwa ̱ .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Jera ite je pan cinco irä , nima botäbä irä kukawa ̱ , jera iwä kaka ̱ jöikje ka ̱ kia iki ̱ , kjepa je bala butsa ma ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ ijewa wa ̱ me ̱ nak je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Biköle yaká , jekäi issënacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera iukäla ju ̱ leksa ̱ ijewa wa ̱ kita ̱ nani canasta na doce pshipshii .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús ka ̱ kiä katke kju ̱ awaka , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa kajali ira . Ñerä ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — Jiräni chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ishe yi yis dä na ?

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Moska te ishe ba rä Juan säwäukewa ̱ k ni ; isaka te ishe ba rä Elías ni ; ata isaka te ishe ba rä jile bata shäk wa bakle sha ̱ ekla ne shki ̱ naka ̱ ni rä .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Jera ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — Ata ¿ ñe jini bas te ishe , yi yis dä na ? Jera Pedro te ikúka : — Ba ne rä kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ ye rä .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a tsa ̱ na si ̱ , ka ishäk kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Jera ite isha : — Ditsä yäbei kiana weikanak ta ̱ i , ju ̱ nakksa ̱ sä wäkiri wa wa ̱ , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa wa ̱ , ñakäi kota ̱ nakwa ̱ , ñakäi tres día ra shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Jera ite isha bena ia ̱ : — Yilé shkakle yis ja ̱ mi ra , ke je je ̱ k biketsa , ata je cruz kpöka ̱ buliri buliri , minak yis da .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkakleksa ̱ ra , je wà iweikarmiwa ̱ . Ata yi je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ yis kju ̱ ei ra , je wà ije ̱ k tsa ̱ tkämiksa ̱ .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Ñakäi ikuna ka ̱ jiska ji biköle deksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ , ata sa ̱ ju ̱ naksa ̱ , sa wakei weikanawa ̱ ra , jiye je kiar sa ̱ ki ̱ na ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Jekäi yi äinawa ̱ yis ki ̱ ka , yis te ji sheke ̱ ki ̱ ka ra , jera ñaebä je wakei ki ̱ ka ditsä yäbei äirmiwa ̱ mika ̱ je daju ̱ oloi kaleka ̱ iwakei oloi wà , Sa Ká oloi wà , ángel sikii wa oloi wà ke ̱ i ska ra .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ kte si ̱ wa ̱ ra , bas kajali jiska wa sha ̱ manele wa ̱ ka duewa ̱ shka ̱ l ssënak , ata jewa te Säkeklä gobierno su ̱ a kjepa .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Je sha ite ukä ki ̱ ocho día kjena ra , ite Pedro irä Juan irä Jacobo irä kiamiña , jekäi imineka ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ tsä bata ki ̱ ka ̱ kiäk .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Ika ̱ kiä kate ra , iwäktä juena kju ̱ awani , ipaiklä ianawa ̱ suruu wäñileka ̱ oloo .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Jera ñawäsaka jäiyi wa bol ktä tso ̱ ije ra , jewa rä Moisés irä Elías irä .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Jewa juena oloowa ̱ si ̱ , jewa te ipake kate rä ije rä minakju ̱ , je we ̱ mar ite rä Jerusalén ska .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Jera Pedro irä ira kajali wa irä käpeche ̱ wa ̱ . Ata ijewa wäji ̱ atka bäi ra , ijewa te Jesús wäñinaka ̱ oloo irä , jäiyi wa bol kajali ije ra irä jewa su ̱ a .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Ata je bol wa majulu kja Jesús yika ra , Pedro te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¡ bäi ebä sa kajali jiska rä ! Sá ma ju yabala yuäk mañatkä : etka ba ia ̱ , etka Moisés ia ̱ , etka Elías ia ̱ . Ata kje jekäi ite isha rä ka wabiketsale kuna .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Ñerä ije te je she kate ji ̱ a ebä ra , mo ̱ ja ̱ nawa ̱ te ijewa ki ̱ kukawa ̱ . Jekäi mo ̱ te iki ̱ kukawa ̱ ra , isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Jera kte ssëna mo ̱ ja ̱ rka , je te ishe : “ Jí ne rä yis yaba kolole yis wa ̱ rä . Je ne ktä ssö rä . ”

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Jera je kte ssëna e ̱ ná ra , Jesús wakei ebä kaldu . Jekäi ijewa te iblawa ̱ je balana , ka iwa ̱ iyine yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ji su ̱ a ite rä käi .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Bulirishtä , ijewa deni ka ̱ tsä ñak ska ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ demi ije wäki ̱ .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Ñerä je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa sha ̱ ekla a ̱ na itsa ̱ ka : — Sapaktäk , dunasi ̱ yis yaba dulaklei su ̱ opa ba ku ̱ , je ebä ne rä yis yaba rä ki ̱ ka .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Be te ije kukeke ̱ wa ̱ , je te plaa ia ̱ newe ̱ ke ̱ ipaju ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , je te ikjali tjuewe ̱ ke ̱ juyaa . Je te ishka ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ta ̱ i . Ka ite ije yëwa ̱ .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Yis te ba wa ̱ dulanak wa paka pjowa ̱ be kjäiäksa ̱ ije ki ̱ , ata ka ijewa ia ̱ io ̱ r .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha : — ¡ Bas tso ̱ jira wa ka ji biketsäk etkabä si ̱ kuna , shirilecha ̱ wa ̱ ebä ! ¿ Bikö räka ̱ yis kiana ji ̱ a se ̱ nak bas da rä na , bas katabläk rä na ? Ba yaba tso ̱ té jika .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Ñerä je bite tse ̱ ji ̱ a ebä ra , be te ija ̱ wa ̱ mi iski ̱ je te ipaju ̱ aka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na ; ata Jesús te je wikblu ñá shtä uña , jekäi ite je yaba bäiwa ̱ ni . Jera ite ipatkami iká ia ̱ .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä oloi juena ta ̱ i je te biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ . Bena male ̱ te ̱ r dami ji we ̱ ke ̱ Jesús te ki ̱ ka ra , ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ :

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: — Jí yie ishe mar ssë bas te tsa ̱ na : ditsä yäbei rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ji ̱ a ditsä jula na .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Jeiräta je kte ia ̱ ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne , ijewa yika irä blelewa ̱ ki ̱ ka , je rä ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä ye ; ñakäi ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ je chakäk iia ̱ jiräni iwa rä käi .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Je ukä ska Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ktewa ̱ ka ̱ ñara mane ijewa sha ̱ rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ rä te .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Ata Jesús je ̱ r na ide jiräni ijewa je ̱ rikä tso ̱ käi , jera ite yaba kukawa ̱ , duacha ̱ ite iwakei säkätä ja ̱ mi ,

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: ñerä ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yi te jí yaba kiawa ̱ , yis kie oloi ja ̱ mi ra , je te rä yis wakei ne kiawa ̱ . Ñakäi yi te yis kiawa ̱ ra , je te rä yis patkäkté ne kiawa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi rä ja ̱ lewa ̱ bas bena katäbäka , je ne rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ rä .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Jera Juan te ikúka te isha : — Säkekewa , sá te ekla su ̱ a , je te be kjäie kaldu ba kie oloi ja ̱ mi . Ata ka irä sajewa ja ̱ mi kuna , ki ̱ ka sá te iwätkewa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ka bas te iwätkewe ̱ kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi rä ka kju ̱ atkäk kuna bas da , jewa rä bas da .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ kja ikinakläwa ̱ ka ̱ jöir da , ite ibiketsaksa ̱ etkabä minak däkmi Jerusalén ska .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Jera ite ibata shäk wa patkamiba iwätsa ̱ k , jewa minejulu kjawa ̱ julu Samaria ke ̱ i sha ̱ na ju tso ̱ elkje shtä etka ska jile wa ̱ k kja iyika .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Ata se ̱ nak jeska wa wa ̱ ka Jesús kinewa ̱ idami rä Jerusalén ska ki ̱ ka .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Jekäi iwa ̱ dulanak wa Jacobo irä Juan irä te je ssa ra , ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ ba ki ̱ ishena sá te yökö ja ̱ we ̱ té ka ̱ jöir ijewa tuawa ̱ cha ̱ kläwa ̱ na ?

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Jera ije ̱ k manewa ̱ té , je te ijewa uña ,

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: jera iminejulu jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne saka ska .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Ñerä idamijulu ña ̱ la wà ra , ekla te isha iia ̱ : — Yis maju ̱ ba ra mai ma mike ̱ käi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Chichi ka ̱ rbä rä ka ̱ wäja ̱ r í ta , du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ rä ju ta , ata ditsä yäbei wa ̱ ka ka ̱ kuna mai a ̱ ni itsa ̱ ku ̱ katabläkläwa ̱ .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Jera ite isha isaka ia ̱ : — Sä shkä yis da . Ata ite ikúka : — Säkekewa , ka ̱ mo ̱ yis ia ̱ säkätä yis minaklä yis ká itäbiäkwa ̱ ta ̱ na .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Jera Jesús te sha iia ̱ : — Tsu dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa te isaka dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa itäbie . Ata ba wakei cho ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ktei bata shäk .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Isaka te sha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , yis shkakle ba ra , ata säkätä yis ia ̱ ka ̱ mo yis minaklä je ̱ k bata shäkta ̱ na yis ju ska tso ̱ wa ia ̱ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Ata Jesús te isha : — Yi jula tkawa ̱ buey wà ka ̱ biäk , ata jeska iwächa ̱ mini ji tso ̱ sä itä wà je su ̱ ak ra , je shtä ka kiar kolonak Säkeklä gobierno ia ̱ .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ ka Säkekewa Jesús te iwa ̱ dulanak wa saka kuka setenta y dos . Jekäi jewa patka ite bol bol iwätsa ̱ kba jukläyäkä saka saka bena ska irä ike ̱ i saka saka bena ska mai iwakei mike ̱ dämi käi .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Jekäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Iyina si ̱ ra , däli wäna rä ta ̱ i , ata shka ̱ bläk wa rä elkjebä . Je ki ̱ ka bas ka ̱ kiö je däli wakei ia ̱ iwa ̱ shka ̱ bläk wa patkäklä idäli wäna tiäk .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Jekäi bas cho ̱ . ¡ Issö ! Yis te bas patke mar jishtä oveja yabala patke tulemi lobo sha ̱ na käi .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Ka bas wa ̱ inaklä tsa ̱ klä jui iräle , däli tsa ̱ klä iräle , sandalia saka iräle , je mi kuna , ñakäi ka bas te yi a ̱ ni chake kuna ña ̱ la wà .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Mane ju na bas dewa ̱ julu käi , jera säkätä bas ku ̱ ishö jeska wa ia ̱ : “ Bas jí ju ska wa je ̱ r ssënopa baa . ”

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Jeska ekla rä se ̱ nak bitaba ra , jera bas te ji sha käi je o ̱ rmi ije ia ̱ . Ata ka ijewa rä jekäi kuna ra , jera je bas te isha ijewa ia ̱ je dämiksa ̱ ni bas wakwa ia ̱ .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Je ju skabä bas se ̱ no , jekäi ji me ̱ rke ̱ bas ia ̱ käi je ño , je yö . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , shka ̱ bläk wa kiana rä to ̱ nak . Ata ka bas se ̱ r kuna ju etkä ju etkä .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Mane jukläyäkä ska bas kjawa ̱ julu , ñakäi bas kinawa ̱ ra , ji me ̱ ke ̱ ite bas ia ̱ käi , je ño .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Jeska mane duäke ̱ wa bäiwo ̱ , ñakäi bas ku ̱ ishö ijewa ia ̱ : “ Yëwa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno kjärawa ̱ bas sha ̱ na irä . ”

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Mane jukläyäkä ska bas kjawa ̱ julu , ata ka bas kinewa ̱ ra , bas ma je na ña ̱ la wà ishäk :

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: ‘ Bas jukläyäkä na ka ̱ pjoi bana sá klä ja ̱ mi je bena kpe tuleke ̱ ta ̱ na sá te ijuenaklä bas dä dokoitsalewa ̱ . Ata bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa iku ̱ yëwa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno kjärawa ̱ irä . ’

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Jekäi yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , je ke ̱ i ska ra , je jukläyäkä wa buka ̱ nami rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ Sodoma wa buka ̱ nami tsa ̱ ta .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: “ ¡ Säli bas Corazín wa rä ! ¡ Säli bas Betsaida wa rä ! Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas sha ̱ na ji o ̱ na täkili ta ta ̱ i je kuna rä o ̱ le Tiro irä Sidón irä ska ra , mik ijewa ñamaneneksa ̱ , ñapajiene sua yönak saco ye shtä wà , ñajäklenewa ̱ muli ̱ tä ja ̱ rka .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ra , bas buka ̱ nami rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , Tiro wa irä Sidón wa irä buka ̱ nami tsa ̱ ta .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Ñakäi bas Capernaúm wa , ¿ bas ia ̱ ra bas dämika ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska kje na ? Ñera bas dä oloi ja ̱ nakwa ̱ sä wikblu bläklä ska kje .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: “ Yi te bas ktä ssa ra , je rä ite yis ne ktä ssa rä ; ñakäi yi te bas ju ̱ aksa ̱ ra , je rä ite yis ne ju ̱ aksa ̱ rä ; jekäi yi te yis ju ̱ aksa ̱ ra , je rä ite yis patkäkté ne ju ̱ aksa ̱ rä . ”

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Ñerä je setenta wa deni ssële a ̱ naa te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , beje jije te sá ktä dälätseke ̱ ba kie oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Yis te Satanás su ̱ a ija ̱ naté ka ̱ jöir ska ka ̱ wä ju ̱ r käi .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Yis te bas ia ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ bas klä tkäkläka ̱ tkäbe ki ̱ ka bächi ki ̱ ka , ñakäi sa ̱ na ̱ me ̱ i täkili bena wätkewa ̱ kläwa ̱ . Jekäi ji a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka bas meräk .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Jeiräta ke bas ssëna a ̱ naa jile wikblu te bas ktä dälätseke ̱ ki ̱ ka , ata bas ssëno a ̱ naa rä bas kie tso ̱ yöle ka ̱ jöir ska ki ̱ ka .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Jera je wäsaka Jesús ssëna a ̱ naa si ̱ Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi te isha : “ Papá , ka ̱ jöir ka ̱ jiska wakei , yis te ba kjeishe kte bäi wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba te jí ktei blawa ̱ ka ̱ biketsä ta wa yika je ̱ r ta wa yika , ata ba te yabala wäji ̱ atkewa ̱ je wà . Papá , jekäi irä , ba wäbatsa jekäi ki ̱ ka .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: “ Yis Ká wa ̱ ji biköle rä ju ̱ leksa ̱ yis ia ̱ . Yi a ̱ ni ka je ̱ r ko ̱ r yi rä iyaba rä ia ̱ , ata iKá ebä je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite rä . Ñakäi yi a ̱ ni ka je ̱ r ko ̱ r yi rä iKá rä ia ̱ , ata iyaba ebä je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite rä , ñakäi yi wäji ̱ atkewa ̱ kle iyaba te , jewa ebä je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ ite rä . ”

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ k manewa ̱ té te isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa wakwa ebä ia ̱ : “ Yi te isu ̱ a bas te isu ̱ ete jira käi , bäije jewa wäbala rä .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jile bata shäk wa bakle chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa bakle chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ jewa ia ̱ issëna ime isu ̱ awa ̱ bas te isu ̱ ete käi , ata ka iwa ̱ isu ̱ nepa ; ñakäi ime issäwa ̱ bas te issëte käi , ata ka iwa ̱ issënepa . ”

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Ñerä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà ekla je ̱ k duaka ̱ te iwächakewa ̱ wäsi ̱ wa : — Sapaktäk , ¿ jibä wa ̱ k yis kiana ra , yis ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye dämiksa ̱ rä na ?

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ji ni ka ̱ wei ska iyöle katke rä na ? ¿ Jiräni ba te isu ̱ a rä na ?

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Ba ku ̱ Säkekewa ba Kekläí shka ̱ li ̱ blö ma je ̱ r ska ji tso ̱ kalabe wà , ba wakei kalabe wà , bä täkili kalabe wà , bä ka ̱ biketsä kalabe wà ; ñakäi ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ blö jishtä ba wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ba te ikúka rä bäi . Ba te iwa ̱ jekäi ra , ba se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Ata ka ije ki ̱ ji nui shene ja ̱ nakka ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ , je kju ̱ ei ite ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Ata manewa rä yis saka rä na ?

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha : — Jäiyi ekla biteju ̱ Jerusalén ska damiju ̱ Jericó ska ra , jakbläk wa te ikukawa ̱ . Jewa te ipaiklä baka tsa ̱ mi te iwakei kpa ta ̱ i , jekäi iminejulu te iju ̱ a baklata ̱ na yee iduärawa ̱ käi .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Jera ji wà iräle je ña ̱ le ̱ i wà chui ekla damiju ̱ . Je te je su ̱ a ra , ite iktächa ̱ kjaju ̱ .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Jekäi Leví wa ekla damiju ̱ jeska te je su ̱ a ra , ite iktächa ̱ kjaju ̱ ñaebä .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Ata Samaria wa ekla damiju ̱ je ña ̱ la wà . Je deju ̱ isäkätä ja ̱ mi te isu ̱ a ra , jera je je ̱ r ja ̱ mi idälänawa ̱ .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Jekäi je je ̱ k sikawa ̱ ija ̱ mi te aceite irä vino irä tka ishka ̱ na wäki ̱ , je pamu ̱ awa ̱ ite , je tkaka ̱ ite iwakei burro ki ̱ , kjepa iwa ̱ iminetse ̱ käpäklä jui ska . Jekäi ite ikjänana ji ̱ a .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Ñerä bulirishtä ra ite denario tsa ̱ ksa ̱ botkä cha ̱ mita ̱ na ite käpäklä jui wakei ia ̱ te isha iia ̱ : “ Ikjänano ' sia ̱ . Ata ite bä ji e ̱ newa ̱ ki ̱ ta ra , yis deni ra yie ma ia ̱ itju ̱ e . ”

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Jera ba ia ̱ ra ¿ je mañal wa mane te je ditsä weikale jakbläk wa wa ̱ je ia ̱ iwá ̱ jishtä sa saka käi rä na ?

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Ale je ̱ r bäi shäk iia ̱ . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ba cho ̱ ni iwa ̱ k je su ̱ ta .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Ijewa damijulu ji ̱ a ra , iminewa ̱ ju ̱ jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne shtä na . Jeska ekla alaklä kie Marta , je te ikiawa ̱ iju ja ̱ rka .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Je rä el ta je kie rä María . Je je ̱ tkawa ̱ Säkekewa klä kicha ja ̱ mi te iktä ssë katke .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Ata Marta jile wa ̱ te ta ̱ i je te ije ̱ r iawa ̱ wa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ije ̱ k sikawa ̱ Jesús ja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ba ia ̱ ra yis tsi ̱ se ̱ k te yis jawa ̱ ta ̱ na eklabä ji bena wa ̱ k ¿ je rä bäi na ? Ata ipakö yis tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Jera Säkekewa te sha iia ̱ : — Marta , Marta , ba je ̱ r shewe ̱ ke ̱ ba je ̱ r iawe ̱ ke ̱ jile saka saka ta ̱ i te ,

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: ata etkabä ne rä shenak sa ̱ ki ̱ bäi si ̱ rä . María te ibäi ne kuka rä , ka je bakanakksa ̱ ije yika .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús ka ̱ kiäte kju ̱ awaka . Je e ̱ ná ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa sha ̱ ekla te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , sá yuö ka ̱ kie wà jishtä Juan te ije wa ̱ dulanak wa yua käi .

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ra , ishö : “ Sa Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir , ba kie oloitsanopa . Ba gobierno kjöwa ̱ pa . Jishtä ka ̱ jöir ji o ̱ rke ̱ ba wakei ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi , je su ̱ ta ji o ̱ nopa ka ̱ jiska .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Ba ku ̱ ñanak sherke ̱ sá ki ̱ buliri buliri , je mopa sá ia ̱ jir .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Ba ku ̱ ji yakei wakblele sá wa ̱ je nui jöwa ̱ pa bitaba , je rä sá te nui ta sá ra wa biköle jeke ̱ wa ̱ bitaba ki ̱ ka . Ke ba ku ̱ sá jawa ̱ je ̱ r kinak sa ̱ me ji yakei wakbläk käi . Ata ba ku ̱ sá wetsöksa ̱ ale yakei yika . ”

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Jekjepa Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Kje sä te ishe ra , bas sha ̱ ekla kuna salibä ta je wäki ̱ ije kuna minak tuina ka ̱ sha ̱ sha ̱ ishäk iia ̱ : ‘ Salibä , pan peitö ' sia ̱ mañatäbä .

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis yuläk deju ̱ , je bite rä ka ̱ mii , ata ka yis wa ̱ ji kuna me ̱ nak iia ̱ . ’

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Jera tsi je ju wakei te ikúkemi ju na rä : ‘ Ke yis weika . Yis ju kjäshtawa ̱ e ̱ ná , yis yabala ñatulawa ̱ kja yis da ja ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ ka ; ka yis je ̱ käkleika ̱ ji ma ̱ k ba ia ̱ . ’

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Jekäi yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Kale ije ̱ käkka ̱ isalibä irä ki ̱ ka kuna , ata ikjana ikiäk iia ̱ ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka tsi ije ̱ kämika ̱ ima ̱ k iia ̱ bikö iki ̱ isherke ̱ käi .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Bas ku ̱ ji kiö , jera je me ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ ; bas ku ̱ ji yulö , jera je ko ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ ; bas ku ̱ ju kjä bulawo ̱ , jera je kjä yermi bas ia ̱ .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji kiäk wa biköle ia ̱ ji me ̱ rmi ; ji yuläk wa ia ̱ ji ko ̱ rmi ; ju kjä bulawa ̱ k wa ia ̱ ikjä yermi .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: “ Ikuna ba yaba te nima kia ra , ¿ bas sha ̱ iká wa mane te tkäbe me ̱ mi iia ̱ nima säkei ye na ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Ñakäi ikuna ite oshkoro si ̱ a kia ra , ¿ bas te bächi me ̱ mi iia ̱ na ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Jekäi bas se ̱ nak yakei wa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji bäine me ̱ bas yabala ia ̱ rä ra , jera je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ bas Ká se ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir te Wikblu Sikina me ̱ mi je kiäk iwakei ia ̱ wa ia ̱ . ”

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús te be sä ktä wäblewa ̱ k kjäie kate ekla ki ̱ ka . Jera be kjäienaksa ̱ ra , je ktä wäblelewa ̱ ktaka ̱ ni . Je te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Ata ijewa sha ̱ te isha : “ Be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Beelzebú ne oloi ja ̱ mi ite be kjäieke ̱ ksa ̱ rä . ”

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Jera isaka te wäsi ̱ wa ije paka jile wa ̱ k ka ̱ jöir ska ijuenaklä ye .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Ata ije ̱ r na idewa ̱ jiräni ijewa je ̱ rikä tso ̱ rä käi ; je ki ̱ ka ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Gobierno eyaka ñabalabutsa kju ̱ atkäk ñawakwabä ra , jera je shtä biköle rä weikanakwa ̱ itjä . Jekäi ñaebä el jui ta ska wa ñabalabutsa kju ̱ atkäk ñawakwabä ra , jera jewa weikarmiwa ̱ .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Ikuna Satanás je ̱ k bala butsä kju ̱ atkäk je ̱ k ebä ra , jera ¿ maikäi je gobierno tkermiwa ̱ ji ̱ a idël ye na ? Yis te jekäi ishe , je rä bas te ishe yis te be kjäieke ̱ rä Beelzebú oloi ja ̱ mi ni ki ̱ ka .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Jekäi ikuna yis te be kjäieke ̱ Beelzebú oloi ja ̱ mi ra , jera ¿ yi oloi ja ̱ mi bas ktä ssäk wa te be kjäie rä na ? Ñera je wà tsu ijewa te bas kjashewa ̱ .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Ata yis te be kjäie tuleke ̱ ksa ̱ rä Säkeklä julasku oloi ja ̱ mi ra , iyina si ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí rä delewa ̱ e ̱ ná bas sha ̱ na .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: “ Ditsä täkii je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkäklä ta bäi te iju kjänaneke ̱ ra , jera idäli tso ̱ rä bäi ebä .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Ata isaka täki ta itsa ̱ ta deju ̱ tu ̱ naka ̱ iki ̱ ka ra , je te ije ̱ k tsa ̱ tkäklä iwa ̱ biketsanak bäkemiksa ̱ iyika . Jekjepa ite idäli bala pje ̱ mi isaka wa ia ̱ .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: “ Jekäi yi rä ka yis ja ̱ mi kuna , jewa rä kju ̱ atkäk yis da . Ñakäi yi rä ka ji tapawa ̱ k yis daña , je rä ituläk ju ̱ ami ebä .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: “ Mika ̱ wikblu ñá shtä je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ manele ska ra , imike ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska ka ̱ yuläk ije ̱ räklä ; ata ka iwa ̱ iko ̱ ne ra , ite ishe : ‘ Yis maju ̱ ni yis ju mai yis bitele ska . ’

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Ñerä ideni ra , ite iku ̱ a ja ̱ r sikle yëë , bäileni baa .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Jera imike ̱ ni wikblu saka siete yakei si ̱ iwakei tsa ̱ ta jewa kiäk jäkté . Jekäi ijewa dewa ̱ julu ra ise ̱ rke ̱ jeska ; bata ska ra , je ditsä iarke ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ säkätä iialewa ̱ tsa ̱ ta . ”

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Ñerä ite ishe kaldu ji ̱ a jekäi ra , ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa sha ̱ alaklä ekla a ̱ na täkii te isha iia ̱ : — Bäije ma tsa ̱ k isha ̱ wà je wakjuä rä , ma wa ̱ tsu yale je tsu rä .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Bäi si ̱ ra bäije Säkeklä ktä ssäk wa je wawa ̱ k wa ne rä .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapar dami Jesús pája ̱ mi ra , ite ishami ijewa ia ̱ : “ Jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa rä yakeila ebä , jewa te ji kieke ̱ ijuenaklä ye . Ata ka jewa ia ̱ ji a ̱ ni kjayinak ijuenaklä ye , ata Jonás käi ebä ijuenaklä kjayirmi .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jishtä Jonás ukä ja ̱ mi ji o ̱ le Nínive ska wa ia ̱ ra ijuenaklä ye , je su ̱ ta ditsä yäbei ukä ja ̱ mi ji o ̱ rmi jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ia ̱ ra ijuenaklä ye .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Ñakäi sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska , alaklä ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i dar sur wa je ̱ kämika ̱ te jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa kjatiemika ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je biteju ̱ ishäkä wätkerke ̱ wa ̱ ska Salomón ka ̱ biketsäk ta ̱ i te ji pake ssäk . Ata ¡ issö ! Jiska ekla kaldu , je rä Salomón tsa ̱ ta .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Jekäi sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska , Nínive wa ñajämika ̱ te jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa kjatiemika ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Jonás te sa pakta ra ijewa ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ . Ata ¡ issö ! Jiska ekla kaldu , je rä Jonás tsa ̱ ta .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: “ Yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka tsi ̱ ni wäkanakka ̱ dunakcha ̱ blelewa ̱ käi , cajón niki ̱ ka käi , ata ite idueka ̱ rä iduäkläka ̱ ki ̱ , yi däke ̱ wa ̱ wa wa ̱ oloi su ̱ nak .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Ba wäbala rä tsi ̱ ni käi ba wakei ia ̱ ; jekäi ba wäbala rä bäi ra , ba wakei kalabe rä wäñileka ̱ , ata ba wäbala rä ka bäi kuna ra , jera ba wakei rä wätuilewa ̱ .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ta iöle ka ̱ oloi tso ̱ ma ja ̱ mi rä ka ka ̱ oloi si ̱ kuna , ata ka ̱ yee ebä irä .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Jekäi ba wakei kalabe rä wäñileka ̱ ra , mai a ̱ ni ka ka ̱ yee ta ra , jera je kalabe rä wäñinakka ̱ , jishtä tsi ̱ ni te sa ̱ ñiwe ̱ ioloi wà käi . ”

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Jesús kta e ̱ ná ra , fariseo wa ekla te ikiami yäkäk ira , jekäi Jesús dewa ̱ ju ̱ iju ja ̱ rka je ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Ata je fariseo te isu ̱ a ra ka ijula suka ̱ ne iyäkä mar yika , je te ima ̱ le ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Säkekewa te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas fariseo wa te vaso plato paskue ipa ki ̱ ka , ata bas ja ̱ rka rä ji bäke käi , ji shi ̱ ana käi ebä ne tso ̱ rä .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Bas ka je ̱ r ta wa , ¿ ipa ki ̱ ka iyuäk je wa ̱ ka ija ̱ r yöneksa ̱ ñaebä na ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Ata bas ku ̱ ji tso ̱ ija ̱ rka je mo ji kaku ye , jera ji biköle rä bas ia ̱ ra yëë .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ ¡ Säli bas fariseo wa rä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te menta käi , ruda käi , ka ̱ kä saka tkele käi , jewa kä diezmoí me ̱ ke ̱ , ata ji wabiketse wämo käi , Säkeklä shka ̱ li ̱ ble käi je jawa ̱ bas te ; jera je ne kiana o ̱ nak rä , ñaebä je isaka ka jäkwa kuna .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: “ ¡ Säli bas fariseo wa rä ! Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas wäbätsä rä ñapaktäklä jui ska ra , oloi ta wa je ̱ tkäklä wà , bas me chakarpa sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska wà .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: “ ¡ Säli bas dä ! Bas dä jishtä sa ̱ nu ̱ l blelewa ̱ ka juer sä wäna ki ̱ ka yile shkä ka ju ̱ ñele kuna iwa ̱ käi . ”

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Ñerä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa ekla te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , je ba te isha wà ba te sá kukawa ̱ diekjela ñaebä .

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — ¡ Säli ñakäi bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa rä ! Bas te däli kpeke ̱ ka ̱ sa saka ki ̱ ka iia ̱ ikjä kje , ata bas wakwa rä ka je käk kuna itjä julasku batabä jibä wà .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: “ ¡ Säli bas dä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te jile bata shäk wa nu ̱ l blele jui yueke ̱ , ata bas ká wa ne wa ̱ jewa kotälecha ̱ wa ̱ rä .
