text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Je ebä wà bas te ikjashawa ̱ bas te ibiketse bas ká wa te iwá ̱ rä bäi ebä ni . Iyina si ̱ ra , ijewa te iktacha ̱ wa ̱ , ata bas te rä inu ̱ l blele ne jui yueke ̱ .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: “ Je kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka Säkeklä ka ̱ biketsäk ta ̱ i te isha : ‘ Yis te jile bata shäk wa irä , yis ktei bata shäk wa irä patkemi ijewa wäki ̱ . Ata ijewa te jewa sha ̱ ktechemiwa ̱ , isaka yulemi ite weikanak . ’

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Je rä jile bata shäk wa biköle pi baklejulu säkätä ka ̱ jiska yöleksa ̱ skaté bite rä jira kje , je nui ja ̱ nakläka ̱ jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ki ̱ ka ;

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: je rä Abel pi bakleju ̱ bite rä Zacarías pi bakleju ̱ kje , ale kotälewa ̱ Templo irä jile däläwa ̱ klä irä moska . Yie ishe bas ia ̱ , jekäi irä , je nui ja ̱ rmika ̱ jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ki ̱ ka .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: “ ¡ Säli bas ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa rä ! Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä llave baka sa saka yika , ka ikjäkläwa ̱ kuna iwa si ̱ ju ̱ ñakksa ̱ . Ata ñera ka bas wakwa ñapatkenewa ̱ , ñaebä yi ñapatkäke ̱ wa ̱ , je wätkewa ̱ wa ̱ bas te . ”

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Jekäi jeska imineju ̱ mi ra , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä fariseo wa irä ñajaka ̱ iweikäk e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , ñakäi iwächakewa ̱ k wäsi ̱ wa jile saka saka ki ̱ ka .

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iki ̱ ssa iwa ̱ jile shäkläpa yakei iwa ̱ ikjatiäkläwa ̱ pa iki ̱ ka .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Je bala na chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapana miles miles sä klä ja ̱ rke ̱ ñaki ̱ ka kje , jera Jesús te ishami säkätä iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : “ Fariseo wa levadura rä jile we ̱ ke ̱ ite su ̱ nak ebä , je yika bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ji a ̱ ni kuna ki ̱ kololewa ̱ ka juenakwa ̱ kuna käi . Ñakäi ka ji a ̱ ni kuna blelewa ̱ ka ju ̱ ñenakwa ̱ kuna käi .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ji sha bas te ka ̱ yee na , je ssërmi ka ̱ oloika , ñakäi ji sha bas te ja ̱ lmana kjätelewa ̱ ju na , je yirmika ̱ ni ju tsi ̱ bata yöle shpatke ki ̱ ka .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: “ Yis te ishe bas yis salibä rikä wa ia ̱ ; ke bas suana yi rä sä ktäk ukä ska ka iia ̱ sa ̱ meräk ji ̱ a jewa yika .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Ata mane yika bas kiana suanak rä , je she mar yie bas ia ̱ : Bas suano rä yi te sa ktawa ̱ ukä ska ra , irä ka ̱ wei ta sä tuläk sä tuläklämi ja ̱ rka je wakei yika . Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ jekäi irä , je ne yika bas suano rä .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: “ ¿ Baishe ka du yuleila cinco watju ̱ e rä inaklä wäka botkä ebä na ? Ata je du etka a ̱ ni ska Säkeklä ka je ̱ r sher kuna ,

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: ñakäi je wa ̱ bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä kalabe rä shtao ̱ leksa ̱ . Ke bas suana . Bas säkei rä du yuleila chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ säkei tsa ̱ ta ki ̱ ka .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: “ Yie ishe bas ia ̱ , biköle yi te yis shaka ̱ ditsä wäkata ska ra , jera ñaebä ditsä yäbei te ije shemika ̱ Säkeklä ángel wa wäkata ska .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Ata yi te ka yis sheka ̱ ditsä wäkata ska ra , jera je wakei ka yinakka ̱ Säkeklä ángel wa wäkata ska .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: “ Yi te ji sha ditsä yäbei ukä ja ̱ mi wa biköle rä janakwa ̱ bitaba . Ata yi kta yakei Wikblu Sikina ukä ja ̱ mi ra , ka je rä janakwa ̱ kuna bitaba .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: “ Mika ̱ bas ma jar ñapaktäklä jui ska iräle , sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wäki ̱ iräle , ka ̱ wei ta wa wäki ̱ iräle ra , ke bas je ̱ r ianak maikäi iräle jini iräle bas ñawetsämi käi , bas te ishemi käi .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je wäsaka ra Wikblu Sikina te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi jiräni bas kiana ishäk rä käi . ”

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa sha ̱ ekla te isha iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , ishö yis el ia ̱ , sá ká däli ukä bala pje ̱ ite yis ia ̱ ni .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — El dikä , ata ¿ yi te yis kuka bas ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ye bas ia ̱ däli bala pja ̱ k ye rä na ?

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Jekjepa ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na , jile saka saka ki ̱ tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi yika . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sa ̱ se ̱ r dä sa ̱ wa ̱ jile tso ̱ ta ̱ i oloi ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Jekjepa ite ijewa ia ̱ ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi te isha : “ Blu ekla däli wäna ta ̱ i ika ̱ ki ̱ .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Jekäi ite ibiketsa je ̱ r na : ‘ ¿ Ji we ̱ yie ? Ka yis wa ̱ yis däli bläklä ta ra . ’

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Jekäi ite ibiketsa : ‘ Jikäi yis ma iwa ̱ k . Yis ma yis däli bläklä jui tso ̱ mia ̱ tkäkwa ̱ , je itäki ̱ yis ma isäkei yuäk tuläkka ̱ ni ta ̱ i ta ̱ i . Jeska yie yis däli wä deke ̱ ksa ̱ bena tapawe ̱ mi , ñakäi yis jile saka tso ̱ tapawe ̱ mi . ’

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Jera yis je ̱ rikämi je ̱ r na : ‘ Yis wa ̱ däli blele tso ̱ ta ̱ i , año kjämi ta ̱ i ra ka je e ̱ nakwa ̱ . We yis je ̱ rä , yis ji ña , yis ji yä , yis ssër a ̱ naa . ’

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: Ata Säkeklä te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Ba rä ka je ̱ r ta . Ata ji jarere tuina bä duämiwa ̱ . Jera ji tso ̱ blele ma wa ̱ , ¿ yi te je kukemi na ? ’

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Je su ̱ ta yi te ji säkei ta ble je ̱ k ia ̱ , ata ka ite blune me ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ kuna ra , je wakei ia ̱ io ̱ rmi rä . ”

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Ñerä ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : “ Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Ke bas je ̱ r iana bas je ̱ k se ̱ newa ̱ klä ki ̱ , jibä ñe sä te , ñakäi bas yaka ki ̱ , jibä jie sä te .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Iwa rä se ̱ ne kseka rä ka ñanak kjelabä kuna ; sa yaka rä ka pajienak kjelabä kuna .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Jishtä zanate te ji we ̱ rä je biketsö . Ka jewa rä däli tkäk kuna , iwä kukäk kuna ; ñaebä ka jewa wa ̱ cuarto iräle ju iräle kuna ibläklä . Ata Säkeklä ne te jewa chewe ̱ rä . Ata bas säkei rä ta ̱ i si ̱ du tsa ̱ ta .

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Jekäi ¿ mane bas sha ̱ se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta bakleka ̱ una horabä jibä ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ ebä oloi ja ̱ mi na ?

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Je kjelabä ka o ̱ nak bas ia ̱ ra , jera jiye bas je ̱ r iawe ̱ ke ̱ jile saka te na ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: “ Jishtä tsitsi wä jè ̱ r dä je biketsö . Ka irä shka ̱ bläk kuna , ka irä sua yuäk kuna . Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , Salomón bakle je ̱ k pajiäk baawa ̱ si ̱ , ka je ̱ k pajiene ijewa sha ̱ mane a ̱ ni käi .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Ikuna ka ̱ kä je ̱ nak ka ̱ ki ̱ ka jir ebä , ata bulia ra irä tulunakmi yökö ye pan kukäklä ja ̱ rka , je pajie Säkeklä te jekäi ra , jera je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ ite bas ka ji biketsäk etkabä si ̱ kuna wa pajiemi .

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ke bas ku ̱ ji ñe sa te käi , ji ye sa te käi je ̱ r ianetsa , ke je biketsa .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: ¿ Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ jiska wa te je shtä biköle yule rami , ata bas Ká wa ̱ je shtä sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ ju ̱ ñer .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: “ Ata bäi si ̱ ra bas ku ̱ rä Säkeklä gobiernoí ne yulö rä , jera je shtä ki ̱ dämiksa ̱ bas ia ̱ .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: “ Oveja elkjebä wa , ke bas suana . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas Ká je ̱ r ssëna bas ia ̱ igobierno ma ̱ ksa ̱ bas wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak ki ̱ ka .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Bas wa ̱ ji tso ̱ watju ̱ o , je säkei kaku mo ka jita wa ia ̱ . Bas ku ̱ inaklä bläklä jui ka kënak kuna shtä yuö bas wakwa ia ̱ . Je ne rä ji säkei ta ka e ̱ nak kuna ka ̱ jöir ska rä , mai jakbläk ka däkwa ̱ , mai ji wak wa ̱ ka iweikanakwa ̱ kuna ska .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , mai bas ji säkei ta tso ̱ blele ra , je ne ska bas je ̱ r kämami rä .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: “ Bas se ̱ no je ̱ k pajiele kja tsi ̱ ni wäkaleka ̱ kja .

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: Bas ku ̱ iwo ̱ jishtä kjanaklä wa te iblui miju ̱ julakolone ki ̱ su ̱ ak je däke ̱ ni ki ̱ ssë käi . Je rä mika ̱ iblui deju ̱ te ju kjä bulawa ̱ ra , ijewa wa ̱ ikjäyäklä plaa .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Iblui deju ̱ ni ra ite ikjanaklä wa ku ̱ a ji ̱ a kseka ra , bäije ijewa rä . Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je iblui je ̱ k pajiämini ijile wa ̱ klä . Jera ite ijewa pakemi ñatuläkwa ̱ yäkäk , jeska idämi ijewa chewa ̱ k .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Ikuna ideni wäñine säkätä itäki ̱ wà iräle , wäñine däkka ̱ mañatäbä kicha wà iräle , jera ite iku ̱ ani ijewa te iki ̱ ssë tso ̱ ji ̱ a ra , bäije je kjanaklä wa rä .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Ata jí ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa , ju wakeiwa ̱ ijuñelewa ̱ pa ka ̱ wä bikö käi jakbläk däju ̱ rä ra , jera ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne ikjäkläwa ̱ iju na .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas se ̱ no kukale kja , je rä ditsä yäbei je däju ̱ ni rä mane hora ka biketsale kuna bas wa ̱ ska ki ̱ ka . ”

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Jera Pedro te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ je ba te ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi , je rä sá ebä ia ̱ na , ata ñaebä biköle ia ̱ na ?

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Jera Säkekewa te ikúka : “ ¿ Yi rä chatkelewa ̱ bäi iblui ju kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ka ̱ biketsä ta , kolonakta ̱ na iblui wa ̱ iju ska kjanaklä wa tso ̱ ju ̱ ñak , ijewa ia ̱ ñanak bala pja ̱ k hora bulee ska rä na ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Jera iblui deju ̱ ni te iku ̱ a ite ikja ̱ nei we ̱ te jekäi ra , bäije je kjanaklä rä .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je ia ̱ ite iji biköle tso ̱ ju ̱ emiksa ̱ iwa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Ata ikuna je ikjanaklä te ibiketse je ̱ r na : ‘ Yis blui ka da juena yewa ̱ ’ , jera ije ̱ käka ̱ kjanaklä wa saka kpäk jäiyi wa käi alaklä wa käi , yäkäk ta ̱ i , ji yäk ta ̱ i , se ̱ nak diyëë ebä ,

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: jera je kjanaklä blui dämiju ̱ ni ka ite ike ̱ i ki ̱ ssë kate kuna ska , ka hora ju ̱ ñele kuna iwa ̱ ska , je te ikshe ̱ mika ̱ te ka ̱ me ̱ mi iia ̱ rä mai ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna wa tso ̱ shtä ska .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: “ Mane kjanaklä je ̱ r ku ̱ a ji kiarke ̱ iblui ki ̱ iwa ̱ o ̱ nak te , ata ka iwa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne idaju ̱ ni yika , ka iwa ̱ ji sherke ̱ iki ̱ o ̱ ne ra , je buka ̱ nami e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Ata mane ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne iia ̱ , je kuna iwa ̱ k sä buka ̱ naklä iki ̱ ka käi ra , je buka ̱ nami elkjebä . Jekäi yi ia ̱ ime ̱ na ta ̱ i kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak ra , je wakei pakarmi iwa ̱ k bäi si ̱ . Yi ia ̱ iju ̱ naksa ̱ ta ̱ i iwa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak ra , je ki ̱ isäkei ja ̱ rmika ̱ ki ̱ ta .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: “ Yis de rä yökö ja ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ka ̱ jiska ki ̱ . Yis ki ̱ je shena pjowa ̱ je kunapa rä wäkaleka ̱ e ̱ ná käi .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Yis ka ̱ wä ta wäoka ̱ nak ji ̱ a weikane sälwi wà , je te yis je ̱ r iawe ̱ ke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ma rä io ̱ na kje .

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: “ ¿ Bas te ibiketse yis de rä sa ̱ se ̱ naklä je ̱ r bäi wà ñara ka ̱ jiska ni na ? Yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka irä jekäi kuna . Ata yis de rä sa ̱ ñabalabutsä tuläklämi ñayika .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Je wà rä jí maju ̱ jöikwä ta ikuna el jui ta wa rä cinco ra , jewa ñabalabutsämi ñayika . Mañal kju ̱ atkämi bol da , ñakäi bol kju ̱ atkämi mañal da .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Jekäi iká kju ̱ atkämi iyaba jäiyi ra , ñakäi iyaba jäiyi kju ̱ atkämi iká ra . Ia ̱ mi kju ̱ atkämi iyaba alaklä ra , ñakäi iyaba alaklä kju ̱ atkämi ia ̱ mi ra . Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa kju ̱ atkämi iyak ra , ñakäi iyak kju ̱ atkämi ije ra . ”

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Ñakäi Jesús te isha chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ : “ Mika ̱ mo ̱ su ̱ e bas te itker doloo ka ̱ wä minakläwa ̱ wà ra , bas te ishe rä , ‘ ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ rmiwa ̱ ’ ni . Jera jekäi io ̱ rke ̱ .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Je su ̱ ta mika ̱ si ̱ wa ̱ datse ̱ sur wà ra , bas te ishe rä , ‘ tsi ka ̱ bárka ̱ ta ̱ i ni . ’ Jera jekäi io ̱ rke ̱ .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: ¡ Ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà wa ! Bas wädular ji juerke ̱ ka ̱ jöir ja ̱ mi käi , ka ̱ jiska ja ̱ mi käi su ̱ akksa ̱ ra , ¿ maikäi ka bas wäna jishtä jira sa ̱ ke ̱ i dami rä juer dä na ?

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: “ ¿ Jiye ka bas wakwa te ibiketseksa ̱ jibä rä wämo rä na ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Jekäi ba dami ba kjatiäk ra sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wä ki ̱ ra , je ktei paruö su ̱ o iia ̱ pjoowa ̱ si ̱ ña ̱ la ebä wà . Ata kai ra , tsi ite ma tse ̱ mi sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wä ki ̱ ka , jera sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ te bä ju ̱ eksa ̱ guardia ia ̱ , jera guardia te bä wätiewa ̱ .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Yie ishe ba ia ̱ , ka bä däkksa ̱ jeska , ata ba te ma nui tju ̱ a ju ̱ ami kalabe inaklä wäka tsi ̱ neje kjepa bä dämiksa ̱ rä . ”

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ebä wà moska kajali wa te ipaka Jesús ia ̱ Galilea wa te bewak kte tso ̱ Säkeklä wäna ra , Pilato te ijewa ktacha ̱ wa ̱ , pi ji ̱ akaka ̱ ite je bewak me ̱ nakka ̱ pi ra ñara .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ ¿ Bas te ibiketse je Galilea wa wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ Galilea wa saka biköle tsa ̱ ta je kju ̱ ei io ̱ na jekäi iukä ja ̱ mi rä na ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ka irä jekäi kuna ; ata ka bas wakwa ñamaneneksa ̱ ra , bas bena weikarcha ̱ miwa ̱ je su ̱ ta .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Ñakäi ale ju yöle ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ kie Siloéni mileka ̱ sa ̱ ki ̱ ka te sa tuawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ dieciocho ra , ¿ bas te ibiketse ijewa rä nui ta e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ isaka tso ̱ se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska wa biköle tsa ̱ ta na ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ka irä jekäi kuna ; ata ka bas wakwa ñamaneneksa ̱ ra , bas bena weikarcha ̱ miwa ̱ je su ̱ ta . ”

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Jekjepa Jesús te ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi : “ Ekla wa ̱ higuera tker kalme iuva yäkä sha ̱ na , je wä yuläk imineju ̱ , ata ka iwa ̱ iwä ko ̱ ne .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Jera ite isha uva yäkä pasu ̱ ak ia ̱ : ‘ Issö , jí higuera wä yuläk yis shkaté tres año bala na , ata yis wa ̱ ka iwä ko ̱ ne . Je ki ̱ ka itiö ju ̱ omi . ¿ Jiye je kate ji ̱ a ka ̱ këwa ̱ k na ? ’

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Jera ije te ikúka : ‘ Säkekewa , ba ku ̱ ijöwa ̱ pa ji ̱ a jí año wà yis wa ̱ iñak paksha ̱ klä ñakäi yis wa ̱ jile ñá mia ̱ klä je ki ̱ ka .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Jeska iwänawa ̱ ra , bäi irä ; ata kai ra , sä te itie ju ̱ emi . ’ ”

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Etaba kicha sábado wà Jesús te sa pakte kaldu ñapaktäklä jui etka ska .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Ñerä alaklä ekla kololewa ̱ wikblu sä weikäk duë wà shtä wa ̱ dieciocho año bala na kaldu . Je rä ja ̱ ku ̱ lewa ̱ , ka maikäi a ̱ ni je ia ̱ je ̱ k parunerka ̱ bulee .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Jesús te je su ̱ a ra , ite ikiaté , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , bä wetsanaksa ̱ bä duë yika .

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Jeska ijula ma ̱ ka ̱ je alaklä ki ̱ ka , jera ñawäsaka ije ̱ k paruaka ̱ ni te Säkeklä kjeisha kte bäi wà .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Ata je ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kju ̱ atkawa ̱ Jesús da , ite sä bäiwa ̱ ni sábado wà ki ̱ ka . Jera je te isha tapale chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ : — Seis día bala na sa kiana shka ̱ bläk rä . Je ne ki ̱ ka je bala na bas bitä bäinak , ata ka sábado wà kuna .

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Jera Säkekewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ba rä kje ji shäk kjäbata ebä wà . ¿ Ka bas wakwa te sábado wà bas buey bas burro kjätele tso ̱ kjäyeke ̱ ksa ̱ sikeke ̱ mi diklä yäk na ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Jekäi ra jí alaklä Abraham bata mo ̱ lewa ̱ Satanás wa ̱ dieciocho año kjekla , ¿ ka irä je kiana wäyenakksa ̱ jí imolewa ̱ yika sábado ke ̱ i wà na ?

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te isha jekäi ra , je kju ̱ atkäk ira wa biköle äinacha ̱ wa ̱ ; ata isaka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ biköle ssëna a ̱ naa , ite ji we ̱ ke ̱ rä baa si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : “ ¿ Jibä su ̱ ta Säkeklä gobierno juer dä na ? ¿ Ji käi ja ̱ mi yie je pake na ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Je rä jishtä mostaza wä kukewa ̱ ekla te tkeme ̱ ite ijuitä ki ̱ käi , je kibina deka ̱ kal kje , jekäi du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka ju yua ijula na . ”

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Jera ite ishani : “ ¿ Ji käi ja ̱ mi yie Säkeklä gobierno pake na ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Je rä jishtä levadura kukewa ̱ alaklä te je wà ite harina mableleksa ̱ mañatkä wätueka ̱ , je te je yaka kalabe papu ̱ we ̱ ka ̱ käi . ”

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Jesús shka jukläyäkä ta ̱ i ta ̱ i irä tsi ̱ dala irä je shtä naka sa paktäk . Jera idami rä Jerusalén ska .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Ñerä ekla te ichaka iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ wa rä elkje ebä na ? Jera Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ isha :

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: — Bas chichano bas kjäkläwa ̱ ju kjäshtäklä bala siklewa ̱ tsi ̱ ne ja ̱ rka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te ishe bas ia ̱ : Chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ñajämika ̱ kjäkwa ̱ jeska , jeiräta ka ikjäkwa ̱ jeska .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Jekäi je ju wakei je ̱ kaka ̱ te ju kjäshtawa ̱ e ̱ ná ra , bas tso ̱ ju ektaka wa te ju kjä bulawe ̱ mi jaree , bas te ishemi : ‘ Säkekewa , sá kjäyöpa . ’ Ata ije te bas kúkemi : ‘ Ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai bas dar dä . ’

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Jera bas te ishemi ije ia ̱ : ‘ Sá yaká sá ji ya ba wäna ; ba te sá pakta sá wakwa ña ̱ la ki ̱ . ’

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Ata ije te ishemi : ‘ Yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai bas dar dä . Bas ji wakbläk ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi wa biköle cho ̱ kju ̱ awa yis yika . ’

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: Jeska bas te Abraham irä Isaac irä Jacob irä , ñakäi jile bata shäk wa biköle baklewa ̱ julu Säkeklä gobiernoí ska su ̱ a ra , ata bas tulunaksa ̱ ra , bas ji ̱ ami bas kà wätiämi .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ata ditsä bitämi ka ̱ wä däkläka ̱ wà irä ka ̱ wä minakläwa ̱ wà irä , norte wà irä sur wà irä , jewa ñatulämiwa ̱ yäkäk Säkeklä gobiernoí ska .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Jekäi ibata ska wa moska rä däkwa ̱ isäkätä wa ye , ata isäkätä wa moska rä ja ̱ nakcha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ na ibata ska wa ye .

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ebä wà fariseo wa sha ̱ dejulu iwäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Jiska ma cho ̱ kju ̱ awa Herodes ki ̱ ba shena kota ̱ nakwa ̱ je yika .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas cho ̱ ni ishäk je chichi ka ̱ rbä ia ̱ : ‘ ¡ Jikäi issö ! Jir irä bulia irä yis te be kjäie , ñakäi sä bäiwe ̱ . Ata tres día ra yis te ie ̱ newa ̱ wa ̱ . ’

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Ata yis kiana minak ji ̱ a mai yis dami wà , jir irä bulia irä böikia irä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka jile bata shäk wa duäkwa ̱ ka ̱ kju ̱ awa ska kuna , ata Jerusalén ska ebä .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: “ ¡ Jerusalén , Jerusalén ! ¡ Ba te jile bata shäk wa kteche ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ , mane patkele ba ia ̱ wa tieke ̱ ba te jak wà ! ¡ Bikö yis je ̱ r ssëna ba yabala me taparwa ̱ pa yis ja ̱ mi , jishtä oshkoro a ̱ miyake wa te iyabala ble ipik niki ̱ ka käi , jeiräta ka ba ki ̱ jekäi ishene kuna !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Bas ju a ̱ ta ̱ nami bas ia ̱ rä ja ̱ r ebä . Jekäi yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ata bikökje bas te ishe : ‘ ¡ Bäije je daju ̱ Säkekewa kie ja ̱ mi rä ! ’ , je ke ̱ i dewa ̱ kjepa bas te yis su ̱ emini rä . ”

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Etaba kicha sábado wà Jesús minewa ̱ yäkäk fariseo wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ekla ju naka , jera ijewa te isu ̱ e kate wäsi ̱ wa .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Jera jeska jäiyi jieleka ̱ nu ̱ l katke iwäja ̱ mi .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ñerä Jesús te ichaka ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä fariseo wa irä ia ̱ te isha : — ¿ Ka ̱ tso ̱ sä bäiwa ̱ klä sábado wà na , ata kai ?

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Ata ijewa si ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jera ite je kukawa ̱ bäiwa ̱ ni ite , jekäi ite ipatkamini .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Jera ite ishani ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas manele yaba iräle buey iräle ja ̱ nami ishäkä ja ̱ rna ra , ¿ ka ije wa ̱ je tse ̱ nakka ̱ ni plaa sábado wà ji wà na ?

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Jera ka maikäi iwa ̱ ikúkäklei ji ̱ a .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Jekjepa ite isu ̱ a ra kile wa te sä bakleka ̱ wa je ̱ tkäklä yuleke ̱ . Jewa ia ̱ ite ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi te isha :

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: — Bas kia yile te jula kolone diei yäk ra , ke ma je ̱ tka sä bakleka ̱ wa je ̱ tkäklä ki ̱ ka , ata iöle isaka bakleka ̱ ba tsa ̱ ta rä kile iwa ̱ ,

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: jera bas bol kiäk tsi däju ̱ ishäk ma ia ̱ : ‘ Ka ̱ mo ije ia ̱ ije je ̱ tkäklä jiska . ’ Je ra tsi ma miju ̱ rä äilewa ̱ je ̱ k tkäklä shi ̱ ana si ̱ kukäkwa ̱ .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ba kina ra , we bäi si ̱ ma je ̱ tkö je ̱ k tkäklä shi ̱ ana si ̱ ki ̱ ka , je rä bä kiäk deju ̱ ra iwa ̱ ishäklä ma ia ̱ : ‘ El dikä , ma je ̱ tköwa ̱ ji je ̱ tkäklä baa si ̱ ki ̱ ka . ’ Jekäi jeska bä juermini oloi ta , bena ñajäklelewa ̱ tso ̱ yäkäk ba ra wa wäna .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi je ̱ k ssaka ̱ je rä ja ̱ nakwa ̱ ni , ata yi je ̱ k jawa ̱ ra je rä oloi kanakka ̱ ni .

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ikiäk ia ̱ : — Mika ̱ ba te jile äliwa ̱ sa saka kiäklä ka ̱ wä wà iräle ka ̱ miskla iräle ra , ke ba ku ̱ ba salibä wa iräle , ba el wa iräle , ba saka wa iräle , blu wa se ̱ nak ba pája ̱ mi wa iräle , jewa kia , iö ijewa te ba kieni nui ki ̱ yäkäk kju ̱ ei , jera je rä ba ia ̱ isäkei deksa ̱ e ̱ ná .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Ata mika ̱ ba te jile äliwa ̱ ta ̱ i sa saka kiäklä ra , ba ku ̱ rä ka jita wa , jula medelewa ̱ wa , klä ialewa ̱ wa , ka wä wajuenak kuna wa ne kiö rä .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Jekäi ra bäije ba rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ijewa ia ̱ isäkei me ̱ nakni ba ia ̱ . Ata sä wämo wa shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni ska ra , ba ia ̱ je säkei me ̱ rmini .

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Jera ñatululewa ̱ yäkäk wa sha ̱ ekla te je ssa ra , ite isha Jesús ia ̱ : — ¡ Bäije yäkäk Säkeklä gobierno ska wa rä !

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Jekäi Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ekla te jile äliwa ̱ shka ̱ ja ̱ ; jekäi ite chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ kia .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Mika ̱ hora dewa ̱ iyäkäklä ra , ite ikjanaklä patkami ishäk kile wa ia ̱ : ‘ Bas kute , jile tso ̱ rä o ̱ le e ̱ ná ki ̱ ka . ’

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Ata ijewa biköle ñajaka ̱ ñawetsäk ekla ekla . Isäkätä te isha : ‘ Yie ma ia ̱ ka ̱ kieke ̱ ba wa ̱ ' sjäkläwa ̱ pa . Iwa rä yie ka ̱ tju ̱ a , je su ̱ ak ' skiana minak pjoo . ’

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Iel te isha : ‘ Yie ma ia ̱ ka ̱ kieke ̱ ba wa ̱ ' sjäkläwa ̱ pa . Iwa rä yie buey tju ̱ a diez , je mabläk yis maju ̱ pjoo . ’

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Ata iel te isha : ‘ Ka yis däkmi yis se ̱ nawa ̱ jirpa kju ̱ ei . ’

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: Jera ikjanaklä deni te je pakani iblui ia ̱ . Ñerä je ju wakei kju ̱ atkawa ̱ te isha ikjanaklä ia ̱ : ‘ Ba cho ̱ mane mane jukläyäkä na ña ̱ la ta ̱ i ta ̱ i wà irä , ña ̱ la tsidala wà irä ditsä kiäk jäkté ; ka jita wa irä , jula medelewa ̱ wa irä , ka wä wajuenak kuna wa irä , klä ialewa ̱ wa irä . ’

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: Ñerä ikjanaklä te isha : ‘ Säkekewa , ñekja io ̱ na ba te isha käi , ata ñera ka ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a . ’

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: Jera iblui te isha ikjanaklä ia ̱ : ‘ Ma cho ̱ jukläyäkä ektaka ña ̱ la ta ̱ i wà irä ña ̱ la tsi ̱ ne wà irä , sa kukäk täkili wà patkenakcha ̱ wa ̱ yis ju pshinakläwa ̱ .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Ata yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , kile säkätä wa mane a ̱ niwa ̱ ka yis ji äliwa ̱ kjei ssënak . ’

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa dami Jesús da , jera iwämanewa ̱ té je te isha ijewa ia ̱ :

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: “ Yi dewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ra , ata ka iwa ̱ iká , ia ̱ mi , ise ̱ naklä , iyabala , iel wa , ikuta wa dokoitsa ne ra , ñakäi ka iwakei je ̱ k dokoitsa ne ra , ka je donak yis wa ̱ dulanak ye .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Ñakäi yi wa ̱ ka icruz buka ̱ neka ̱ bitäk yis da ra , ka je donak yis wa ̱ dulanak ye .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: Jekäi bas manele ki ̱ ju shena yönak ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ ra , ¿ ka irä säkätä ije kiana je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ ibiketsäk bikö inaklä shermi iki ̱ iwa ̱ isu ̱ aklä isäkei tso ̱ iwa ̱ ie ̱ newa ̱ kläwa ̱ iräle kai iräle käi na ?

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Ata ka jekäi kuna ra , ite iñak wäkukäklä tkawa ̱ , kjepa ka itäki ta ie ̱ newa ̱ kwa ̱ kalabe ra , tsi je su ̱ ak wa biköle te ija ̱ ñetsemi ,

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: te ishemi : ‘ Je ditsä te ju yuami , ata ka itäki ta ie ̱ newa ̱ k wa ̱ . ’

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: Ñakäi sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i manele maju ̱ kju ̱ atkäk sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i saka ra , ¿ ka irä säkätä ije kiana je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ ibiketsäk ije ia ̱ je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkermi guardia wa diez mil ebä wà , sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i el daju ̱ kju ̱ atkäk ira guardia wata veinte mil je yikaí ̱ käi na ?

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Ata ka idonak ra , jera iel tso ̱ ji ̱ a ka ̱ mii ra , ite isaka wa patkemi ichakäk iia ̱ jibä shermi iki ̱ iwa ̱ ijäkläwa ̱ pa rä .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas sha ̱ manele wa ̱ ka ji biköle tso ̱ iwa ̱ je janewa ̱ ta ̱ na ra , ka je donak yis wa ̱ dulanak ye .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: “ Däyë rä bäi , ata iianawa ̱ ka kjei ta ji ̱ a ra , jera ¿ jibä wà je bäirmini na ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ka je kiar ishäkä waje ̱ wa ̱ klä iräle , ji ̱ abika ̱ nak bewak ñá ra ishäkä bäiwa ̱ klä iräle , ata je rä tulunakmi ebä . Yi rä kukä ta wassënak ra , ¡ je ku ̱ issö ! ”

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Jekäi inaklä bäkäk wa biköle irä ji yakei wakbläk wa biköle irä däke ̱ Jesús wäki ̱ iktä ssäk .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: Jekäi fariseo wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä te isha yakei ñaia ̱ : — Ije te yakei wakbläk wa kieke ̱ wa ̱ bäi ebä , ñakäi iyäkäke ̱ ijewa ra .

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ite ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi ijewa ia ̱ :

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: “ Ikuna bas sha ̱ manele wa ̱ oveja tso ̱ cien , je sha ̱ etaba shenawa ̱ ra , ¿ ka iwa ̱ noventa y nueve tulunakta ̱ na tala ki ̱ iminaklä je shenawa ̱ itäki ̱ iko ̱ nani kje na ?

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Mika ̱ ite iku ̱ ani ra , ite ikpemika ̱ kuli kicha ki ̱ ka je ̱ r ssëlewa ̱ a ̱ naa .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Jekäi ideni iju ska ra , ite isalibä wa irä se ̱ nak ipája ̱ mi wa irä tapawe ̱ miwa ̱ jewa ia ̱ ite ishemi : ‘ Bas ssënoña a ̱ naa yis da , yis te yis oveja shelewa ̱ ku ̱ ani ki ̱ ka . ’

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Jekäi yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , je su ̱ ta ji yakei wakbläk ekla je ̱ k manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ra , jera ka ̱ jöir ska wa ssërmi a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ ije ki ̱ ka , isaka wämo wa noventa y nueve ki ̱ je ̱ k manewe ̱ ksa ̱ ka sher kuna jewa tsa ̱ ta .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: “ Jekäi ikuna alaklä manele wa ̱ inaklä wäka tso ̱ diez , je etka shenawa ̱ ra , ¿ ka iwa ̱ tsi ̱ ni wäkanakka ̱ , ju ja ̱ r sika ̱ nakmi , iwa ̱ iyuläklä tsa ̱ na bikö iko ̱ nani kje na ?

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Mika ̱ ite iku ̱ ani ra , ite isalibä wa irä alaklä wa saka se ̱ nak ipája ̱ mi wa irä jewa tapewe ̱ mi jewa ia ̱ ite ishemi : ‘ Bas ssënoña a ̱ naa yis da , yis te yis inaklä shelewa ̱ ku ̱ ani ki ̱ ka . ’

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Jekäi yis te ishe bas ia ̱ je su ̱ ta ji yakei wakbläk wa ekla je ̱ k manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ra , jera Säkeklä ángel wa wäja ̱ mi tso ̱ wa ssërke ̱ a ̱ naa ije ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: Ñakäi ite isha ji ̱ a : “ Säkekewa ekla , yabala bakle bol jäiyi wa ,

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: jera iyaba tsi ̱ se ̱ k te isha iká ia ̱ : ‘ Papá , däli ukä däkksa ̱ yis ia ̱ ba duawa ̱ ra je mo kja yis ia ̱ jí kje ra . ’ Jekäi iká te iji biköle bala pja ̱ ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ elkjebä ra iyaba tsi ̱ se ̱ k te ji me ̱ na iia ̱ jaksa ̱ kalabe . Jekäi imineju ̱ ka ̱ mii ka ̱ kju ̱ awaka jeka ite iji bena e ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ ji ka wata bata ki ̱ ka .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Jekäi ite iji biköle e ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ ra , jera däli wäsika ̱ nawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ je ke ̱ i ki ̱ . Je ukä ska ije ki ̱ jile shenami ta ̱ i .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Jeska imineju ̱ shka ̱ ble kiäk ekla se ̱ nak je ke ̱ i ska ia ̱ . Jekäi je te ipatkami ika ̱ ka köchi chewa ̱ k .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Jera ije je ̱ r ssënawa ̱ ime jile wä ñeke ̱ köchi te ñawa ̱ käi , ata ka yi a ̱ ni te ji me ̱ iia ̱ .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Jekjepa ije ̱ r na ka ̱ dewa ̱ ni . Jekäi ite isha : ‘ ¡ Yis ká ju ska shka ̱ bläk wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wa ̱ ñanak tso ̱ ukä ta bakleksa ̱ kje , ata jiska yis kterawa ̱ bäli te !

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Yis ma je ̱ käkka ̱ minakju ̱ ni yis ká wäki ̱ . Jeska yis te ishemi iia ̱ : Papá , yis te ji yakei wakbla yi katke ka ̱ jöir ukä ja ̱ mi irä ba ukä ja ̱ mi irä .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Jekäi ka yis kiar ji ̱ a kinak ba yaba ni , ata we yis kukö ba ia ̱ shka ̱ bläk wa käi ebä . ’

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: “ Jera ije ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ mi iká wäki ̱ kani . Ata idamiju ̱ ji ̱ a beshyee ra , jera iká te isu ̱ a , jera ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi idälänawa ̱ ta ̱ i . Jekäi itu ̱ nami iyaba wäki ̱ ka te ikuka yita tsa ̱ ku ̱ ma ̱ ka ̱ ibak ki ̱ te iwä jalassa .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Jera iyaba te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Papá , yis te ji yakei wakbla yi katke ka ̱ jöir ukä ja ̱ mi irä ba ukä ja ̱ mi irä . Jekäi ka yis kiar ji ̱ a kinak ba yaba ni . ’

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Ata iká te isha ikjanaklä wa ia ̱ : ‘ Paiklä bäi si ̱ tso ̱ té , mane mane je wà ipajiöwa ̱ , anillo jiöwa ̱ ijulasku ja ̱ mi , sandalia jiöwa ̱ iia ̱ .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Ale vaca yaba kate onak tso ̱ té ktöwa ̱ , sä yäkö , sä ssëno a ̱ naa .

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jí yis yaba rä dulewa ̱ je ne deni kseka rä . Je rä shelewa ̱ je ne ko ̱ nani . ’ Jekäi iña jaka ̱ ssënak a ̱ naa .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: “ Jera iyaba kibi tso ̱ shka ̱ bläk , ata mika ̱ je daju ̱ kjani ju ska alemana ra , ite ditsä bularte ta ̱ i iklä ju ̱ ate ta ̱ i ssa .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Jeska ite kjanaklä ekla kiate , je ia ̱ ite ichaka : ‘ ¿ Jibä o ̱ r kate jekäi rä na ? ’

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Jera je te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Ma tsi ̱ se ̱ k deju ̱ ni ; jekäi ba ká te sá paka vaca yaba kate onak ktäkwa ̱ , ideju ̱ ni bäi ka medele ta ki ̱ ka . ’

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Jera ikibi kju ̱ atkawa ̱ , ka miwa ̱ ju na . Je ki ̱ ka iká deksa ̱ ju ̱ iwäki ̱ ka je te ikia pjoo minakwa ̱ ju naka .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Ata ije te isha iká ia ̱ : ‘ ¡ Issö ! Bikö año yis te ba kja ̱ nei wa ̱ té , mik a ̱ ni ka yis wa ̱ bä ktä janewa ̱ kuna , jeiräta je bala na mik a ̱ ni ka ba wa ̱ yis ia ̱ cabra yababä jibä me ̱ ne kuna yis ssënaklä a ̱ naa yis salibä wa ra .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Ata je ba yaba te bä ji weikawa ̱ kjermita alaklä wa pato ̱ nak shtä wa ebä ki ̱ ka deni ra , jera je ia ̱ bä te vaca yaba kate onak ktawa ̱ ji ̱ a . ’

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: “ Jera iká te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Yaba , ba se ̱ r dä yis da del . Yis ji tso ̱ kalabe rä ba ia ̱ .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Ata jira sa ̱ ka ̱ wä ta ssënak a ̱ naa . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jí bä el dä dulewa ̱ je ne deni kseka rä ; je rä shelewa ̱ je ne ko ̱ nani . ’ ”

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Ñakäi Jesús te ipaka iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ jikäi : “ Ekla blu däli su ̱ ak kjatena iblui ia ̱ idäli wawa ̱ k yakei käi .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka iblui te ikiaté te isha ia ̱ : ‘ Yie ba palei ssa , ¿ je rä ji ? Jishtä ba te ji wá ̱ rä je äyëí kjashö yis ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ka ̱ kuna ji ̱ a ba wa ̱ yis däli su ̱ aklä . ’

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: Jera je däli su ̱ ak te ibiketsa je ̱ r na : ‘ Jira ¿ ji we ̱ yie na ? Yis blui te ka yis pake idäli su ̱ ak ji ̱ a . Jera ka yis ia ̱ shka ̱ blenak pala wà , ñakäi yis äinawa ̱ jile kaku kiäk .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Ata jirje ji we ̱ mar yis te ka yis pakane ji ̱ a däli su ̱ ak ra , je de ' sje ̱ r na ; yis kinakläwa ̱ sa saka ju na . ’

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: Jekäi ite nui ta iblui ia ̱ wa kia te ekla ekla . Isäkätä ia ̱ ite ichaka : ‘ ¿ Bikö ba nui yis blui ia ̱ rä na ? ’

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : ‘ Aceite cien pichinga . ’ Jera ite isha iia ̱ : ‘ Jí ma nui äyëí kuköwa ̱ , ma je ̱ tköwa ̱ mane mane , ba ku ̱ ba nui yuö cincuenta ebä . ’

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Jekjepa ite ichaka iel ia ̱ : ‘ Ata ñe ba rikä ¿ bikö ma nui rä ? ’ Jera ite ikúka : ‘ Trigo wä imabläklä na däka ̱ cien . Jera ite isha iia ̱ : ‘ Jí ma nui äyëí kuköwa ̱ , ba ku ̱ ba nui yuö ochenta ebä . ’

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: Jekäi je blu te je idäli ju ̱ ñak yakei kjeisha bäi , ite iwa ̱ rä je ̱ r ta ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka . Jekäi jí ke ̱ i ska wa te iwe ̱ ñaia ̱ rä je ̱ r ta ta ̱ i ka ̱ oloika wa tsa ̱ ta .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te ishe bas ia ̱ : Bas ku ̱ blune ka wämo kuna je wà ji wo ̱ bäi sa saka je ̱ r ssënaklä bäi bas da , je oloi ja ̱ mi mika ̱ ka bas jita ji ̱ a ra , bas kinakläwa ̱ ju jekjeye ska .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: “ Yi te ji elkjebä wawe ̱ bulee ra , ñaebä je te ji shka ̱ ja ̱ wawe ̱ rä bulee . Jekäi yi te ji elkjebä wawe ̱ shi ̱ ana ra , ñaebä je te ji shka ̱ ja ̱ wawe ̱ rä shi ̱ ana .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Jekäi bas wa ̱ blune ka wämo kuna ka wao ̱ ne bulee ra , ¿ yi te blune si ̱ me ̱ mi bas ia ̱ bas wa ̱ wao ̱ nak na ?

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Jekäi ka bas wa ̱ kju ̱ awa däli wao ̱ ne bulee ra , ¿ yi te bas ia ̱ ji me ̱ mi bas cha ye na ?

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: “ Ka kjanaklä ekla a ̱ ni ia ̱ blu wa bol kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ite ekla dokoitsemi , ata ite iel shka ̱ li ̱ blemi , ite ekla bawe ̱ mi , ata iel iarmi ije ̱ r ki ̱ . Jekäi ka bas ia ̱ Säkeklä irä blune irä kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak ñara . ”

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: Fariseo wa te je ssa ra , ite ija ̱ ñetsa , ijewa rä inaklä ebä biketsäk ki ̱ ka .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Bas te ji we ̱ ke ̱ ditsä wäna ijuenaklä bas dä wämo ni . Ata Säkeklä wa ̱ bas je ̱ rike ju ̱ ñer . Jekäi ji rä ditsä ia ̱ ra bäi si ̱ , je rä Säkeklä ia ̱ ra dokona si ̱ .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: “ Ka ̱ wei yöle , ñakäi kte yile jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ , je wao ̱ na deka ̱ rä Juan deju ̱ kje . Jeskaté Säkeklä gobierno ktei baa bata yinaté , jekäi biköle ñapatkäte täkili wà je ja ̱ mi .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: “ Tjabana si ̱ ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä e ̱ rmiwa ̱ , ka ̱ wei yöle äyë wäí tsa ̱ tkelebä jibä wäte ̱ rju ̱ mi tsa ̱ ta .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: “ Yi te ialaklä jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , se ̱ nawa ̱ ni isaka ra , jera je rä imaner . Ñaebä je jalewa ̱ ta ̱ na ijäiyi wa ̱ ra yi se ̱ nawa ̱ ra , jera je rä imaner .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: “ Ekla bakle blu ta ̱ i , je je ̱ k pajiä rä sua siöö yëna ebä wà , lino shtä yöle bäitsa ̱ a ̱ ebä wà . Je te jile baa baa ebä tapawe ̱ ke ̱ iwa ̱ ñanak buliri buliri .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Ata je ju kjä ska ka jita ekla se ̱ r dä je ̱ k tsa ̱ tele bäklä pa ta wäli ebä , je kie rä Lázaro ni .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Je je ̱ r ssëna ime ji jolorke ̱ blu mesa niki ̱ ka je ñakwa ̱ käi . Ata ñakäi jeska chichi däke ̱ iwäli pakuyäk .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Jekjepa je ka jita duawa ̱ . Jera ángel wa te itsa ̱ mi yitawa ̱ Abraham ja ̱ mi . Jera je blu duawa ̱ ñaebä , jekäi iitäbinawa ̱ .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: “ Ñerä ije weikarte ta ̱ i sä wikblu bläklä ska ra , jeska iwä kaka ̱ te Abraham su ̱ a ka ̱ mii ka , ñakäi Lázaro kalme yitälewa ̱ ija ̱ mi su ̱ a ite .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: Jekäi ia ̱ na Abraham tsa ̱ ka : ‘ ¡ Papá Abraham , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi yis dälänopa ! Lázaro patkö ijulasku bata ja ̱ wa ̱ kcha ̱ diklä na , je wà iwa ̱ yis kjäktä bata patse ̱ wa ̱ klä , yis weikar kate ta ̱ i jí yökö ja ̱ rka ki ̱ ka . ”

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Ata Abraham te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Yaba , ma ji ̱ a kseka ra ji bäi deksa ̱ ba ia ̱ ba cha ye , ata Lázaro ia ̱ ji shi ̱ ana deksa ̱ , jeska ma je ̱ r ja ̱ no . Ata jira Lázaro je ̱ r pablenani jiska , ata ba weikar kate ta ̱ i .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Ka irä je ebä kuna . Ata bas tso ̱ kja ̱ ne irä sá tso ̱ kja ̱ ne irä , je moska ka ̱ kjlöi ka ̱ mii jalecha ̱ ta ̱ na kate ; je rä jí kja ̱ ne wa shkakle bas kja ̱ ne ra ka jewa kjäkläksa ̱ , ñakäi a ̱ mi kja ̱ ne wa ka däkläksa ̱ jí kja ̱ ne . ”

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: “ Ñerä je blu te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Jera Papá , dunasi ̱ ba ku ̱ Lázaro patkömi yis ká ju ska ,

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: yis el wa tso ̱ cinco jewa je ̱ r ku ̱ ak ka jewa däkläña kuna jí sä weikanaklä ska . ’

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: Ata Abraham te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Moisés irä jile bata shäk wa irä wa ̱ kte yöleta ̱ na je ju ̱ ñer ijewa wa ̱ : ¡ Je ssöpa ijewa ku ̱ ! ’

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : ‘ Kai , Papá Abraham , ikuna rä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ ekla delemipa iwäki ̱ ra , ijewa ñamanewa ̱ miksa ̱ . ”

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Ata Abraham te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Moisés irä jile bata shäk wa irä wa ̱ kte yöleta ̱ na je ka ssë ijewa te ra , je su ̱ ta ekla kuna shki ̱ leka ̱ ni sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ra , je ka ktä kolonak ijewa wa ̱ . ”

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Jesús te isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : “ Del jile o ̱ rmi sä wä buta ̱ nakläwa ̱ , ata ¡ säli yi te sä wäbutrewe ̱ wa ̱ wakei rä !

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Je wakei kuli kicha ja ̱ mi jak waunak mo ̱ naka ̱ pa jekäi iju ̱ nomipa däyë na ka . Je ne rä bäi si ̱ ije ia ̱ rä , jí tsi ̱ dala manele shiriwe ̱ ke ̱ ite ra .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ . “ Ba el te ji wakbla ra , ba ku ̱ ije uño ; jekäi ije ̱ k manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ra , ba ku ̱ ijöwa ̱ bitaba .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Ji yakei wakbla ite bä ukä ja ̱ mi día wà däka ̱ siete vece ra , jekjepa idaju ̱ ni ishäk ba ia ̱ día wà siete vece : ‘ Ka yis te jekäi iwe ̱ kuna ji ̱ a ni , ’ jera ba ku ̱ ije jöwa ̱ bitaba . ”

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Jekjepa Säkekewa ktei bata shäk wa te isha iia ̱ : — Ba ku ̱ sá tsa ̱ tkö ji biketsäk etkabä ki ̱ ta .

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Jera Säkekewa te isha : — Bas kuna ji biketsäk etkabä mostaza wä doloi kjelabä ra , bas ia ̱ iyirmi jí sicómoro ia ̱ : ‘ Bä yeno ju ̱ nomi tkenakni däyë ki ̱ ’ , jera bas ktä ssëmi ite .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: “ Manele bas sha ̱ kjanaklä ta , je tso ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ ka buey wà ka ̱ biäk iräle , oveja kjänanak iräle , je deju ̱ ni ra , ¿ ite ishemi iia ̱ : ‘ Bä kute plaa , je ̱ k bäkläkwa ̱ yäkäk ’ ni na ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Ata ¿ ka ite ishemi iia ̱ rä : ‘ Ba ku ̱ jile äliwo ̱ yis ia ̱ , je ukä ska ma je ̱ k pajiö ma wa ̱ yis pasu ̱ aklä . Yis ji ña yis ji ya e ̱ ná kjepa bä ji ña bä ji yä ’ ni na ?

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Jera ¿ ba te ishemi ba kjanaklä ia ̱ : ‘ Wekte ba ra ’ ni , ite iwá ̱ jishtä ipakana iwa ̱ k käi ki ̱ ka na ?

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas pakana ji wa ̱ k je biköle e ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ bas te ra , bas ku ̱ ishö : ‘ Sá rä kjanaklä wa ka bäi kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá te iwá ̱ bikö sa pakana iwa ̱ k kjelabä . ’ ”

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Ñerä Jesús damiju ̱ Jerusalén ska ra , ikjaju ̱ Samaria ke ̱ i wà irä Galilea ke ̱ i wà irä , je bala na

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ ju tso ̱ elkje shtä na ra , jeska jäiyi wa diez paiale lepra wa ̱ wa bitejulu iwäki ̱ , ñawäkukacha ̱ wa ̱ beshyeka ,

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: jewa kjoyina te isha : — ¡ Jesús , Säkekewa , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sá dälänopa !

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Ije te ijewa su ̱ a ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas cho ̱ ñakjashäk chui wa ia ̱ . Ñerä idamijulu ji ̱ a ña ̱ la ki ̱ ebä ra , ijewa bäinani yëë .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Jera ijewa sha ̱ ekla je ̱ k su ̱ a ibäinani ra , jeska ibiteju ̱ teni shäbeka , je te Säkeklä kjeishami a ̱ le täkii .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Je je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte wätkawa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ Jesús klä kicha ska te wekte sha iia ̱ . Ata ije rä Samaria wa .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka te isha : — ¿ Bäinani yëë wa rä ka diez na ? Ata ¿ ñe isaka nueve wa me de na ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: ¿ Ka ijewa mane a ̱ ni bitene Säkeklä kjeishäk kte bäi wà na ? ¿ Ata jí ka ̱ kju ̱ awa wa ebä na ?

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Jera ite isha ije ia ̱ : — Ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma cho ̱ ne . Ba te ji biketsa etkabä wà ba tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ .

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Ñerä fariseo wa te ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Bikökje Säkeklä gobiernoí kjämiwa ̱ rä na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Ka Säkeklä gobiernoí kjäkwa ̱ rä juenakwa ̱ kuna .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Ka yi wa ̱ iyinak : ‘ ¡ Isu ̱ o ! Jiska itso ̱ , a ̱ mi ska itso ̱ ’ ; ata tsa ̱ na ra Säkeklä gobiernoí katke kja bas sha ̱ na .

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Jekjepa ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Maiskale ra bas ia ̱ issërmi sa ̱ me ditsä yäbei ke ̱ i bakle su ̱ awa ̱ un díabä jibä käi , ata ka bas wa ̱ isu ̱ nak .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Bas ia ̱ ijewa te ishemi : ‘ ¡ Isu ̱ o , a ̱ mi ska ikaldu ’ ! ‘ ¡ Isu ̱ o , jiska ikaldu ’ ! Jera ke bas mina isu ̱ ak , ke bas mina ijewa ja ̱ mi .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jishtä ka ̱ wä ju ̱ rke ̱ olotjä te ka ̱ jöir ñiwe ̱ a ̱ mi wà jí wà kalabe , je su ̱ ta ditsä yäbei juermi ije díaí wà ra rä .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Ata säkätä ije kiana ji shka ̱ l ssäk ta ̱ i , ñakäi ju ̱ naksa ̱ jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa wa ̱ .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: Jishtä Noé bakle ke ̱ i ska io ̱ le käi , je su ̱ ta io ̱ rmini ditsä yäbei je ke ̱ i ska rä .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska sä yäkä rami , sä ji yä rami , sa ̱ se ̱ r dami , sa ̱ ñama rami se ̱ nakwa ̱ , mine rämi Noé minewa ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka día ska kje . Jeska ra diklä talanaka ̱ te sa tuawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ kalabe .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Ñaebä jishtä io ̱ na Lot bakle ke ̱ i ska je su ̱ ta io ̱ rmi : Sä yäkä rami , sä ji yä rami , sä ji tju ̱ a rami , sä ji watju ̱ a rami , sä däli tkä rami , sä ju yuä rami .

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Ata Lot je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ Sodoma ska ra , je día ebä wà ka ̱ jöir ska yökö wäkata jolonaté azufre ra ñara ka ̱ li ̱ käi , je te bena tuawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Je su ̱ ta io ̱ rmi ditsä yäbei kjayinaklä díaí wà rä .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: “ Je ke ̱ i wà yi kaldu ju tsi ̱ bata yöle shpatke ki ̱ ra , ke je bitawa ̱ ni iwa ̱ jile tso ̱ ju na tsa ̱ kksa ̱ . Yi kaldu shka ̱ bläklä ska ra , ke ibitani shäbeka .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no Lot se ̱ naklä ska .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Jekäi yi je ̱ k wetsakleksa ̱ duewa ̱ yika ra , je wà iweikarmiwa ̱ . Ata yi je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ ra , je wà ije ̱ k tsa ̱ tkämiksa ̱ .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: “ Yis te bas ia ̱ ishe ; je tuinei wà ra sä kätulämi ja ̱ ka ̱ etkabä ki ̱ ka bol , jera ekla rä minaktse ̱ , iel dä ju ̱ nakta ̱ na .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ñakäi alaklä wa bol käjäklämi jile wäk ñara , jera ekla rä minaktse ̱ , iel dä ju ̱ nakta ̱ na . ”

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Bol käjäklämi jile tkäklä ska , ekla rä minaktse ̱ , iel dä ju ̱ nakta ̱ na .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Ijewa te je ssa ra , ite ichaka ije ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ mai je o ̱ rmi rä na ? Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Mai jile nu ̱ l balakli ska ra olo taparmiwa ̱ .

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a jile she ja ̱ mi sa kiana ka ̱ kiäk maitjä ka shtirile ta ,

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: te isha : “ Jukläyäkä etka ska sä ktei wabiketsäk bakle ekla ka suanak kuna Säkeklä yika , ñakäi ka yi a ̱ ni dälätsäk kuna .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Ñakäi je jukläyäkä ska ekla alaklä chichö bakle , je däke ̱ ka ̱ raa sä ktei wabiketsäk wäki ̱ ishäk iia ̱ : ‘ Yis tsa ̱ tköpa yis da kju ̱ atkäk yika . ’

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Säkätä ra ka ite iktä ssë , ata je ukä ska ite isha je ̱ k ia ̱ : ‘ Ka yis suar Säkeklä yika , ñakäi ka yis te yi a ̱ ni dälätse ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: jeiräta jí chichö te yis weikeke ̱ ta ̱ i . Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ma itsa ̱ tkäk ka ibitäklä ji ̱ a yis wäki ̱ ka ka jalewa ̱ ta , yis shtiriwa ̱ k . ’ ”

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Jera Säkekewa te isha : “ Bas ku ̱ ji sha sä ktei wabiketsäk yakei te je ssö .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: ¿ Bas ia ̱ ra , sä kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ iwakei ia ̱ wa te iwakei a ̱ netse ka ̱ piana irä tuina irä jewa ka tsa ̱ tkenak iwa ̱ na ? ¿ Ite ijewa pakemi iki ̱ ssäk jaree na ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ite ijewa tsa ̱ tkemi rä mane manebä . Jeiräta mika ̱ ditsä yäbei dene ra , ¿ je te ji biketsäk etkabä wa ku ̱ emi ji ̱ a ka ̱ jiska na ? ”

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Jeska ijewa sha ̱ te ibiketse iwakwa oloi ja ̱ mi irä delewa ̱ je ̱ rikäk wämo ni , je ki ̱ ijewa te isaka bena dokoitse , je kju ̱ ei jewa ia ̱ Jesús te ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi jikäi :

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: “ Jäiyi wa bol mineka ̱ julu Temploka ka ̱ kiäk . Ekla rä fariseo wa , iel dä inaklä bäkäk .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Jekäi je fariseo wa ka ̱ kia klä ki ̱ je ̱ r na jikäi : ‘ Wekte ba ra Säkeklä , ka yis dä ditsä saka käi kuna ki ̱ ka : jakbläk wa käi kuna , ka wämo wa käi kuna , manenak wa käi kuna , ñaebä jí inaklä bäkäk käi kuna .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Yis bätsä rä semana wà botäbä kicha , ñakäi ji däke ̱ ksa ̱ yis ia ̱ biköle je ja ̱ mi yie diez sha ̱ etka tse ̱ ke ̱ ksa ̱ me ̱ nak . ’

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Ata je inaklä bäkäk kaldu je ̱ k butsäle elkje , ka ije ̱ r ssëne wä käkka ̱ bä jibä ka ̱ jöir wà , ata ije ̱ r bata pakpa ebä te isha : ‘ Säkeklä , yis ji wakbläk yakei nui tso ̱ ju ̱ omi . ’

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ije bitewa ̱ ju ̱ ni ijuka wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye , je iel säkei ye . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi je ̱ k oloi kaka ̱ ra , je rä ja ̱ nakwa ̱ ni ; ata yi je ̱ k jawa ̱ ra , je rä oloi kanakka ̱ . ’

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Jera yabala tsi ̱ dala de ja iwäki ̱ ijula tkäkläwa ̱ ijewa ja ̱ mi , ata iwa ̱ dulanak wa te je su ̱ a ra , jera ijewa te jewa uña .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Ata Jesús te yabala kiaté iwäki ̱ te isha : — Yabala jöwa ̱ , ibitäklä yis wäki ̱ ka , ke iwätkewa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa käi wa ne dämiwa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ja ̱ mi rä .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi wa ̱ ka Säkeklä gobierno kinewa ̱ jishtä yaba käi ra , a ̱ ni ka idäkwa ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Judío tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ekla te ichaka iia ̱ te isha : — Sapaktäk se ̱ nak wämo , ¿ ji we ̱ mi yie yis ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye däkläksa ̱ däli ukä ye rä na ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ba te yis kie wämo ni na ? Yi a ̱ ni rä ka wämo kuna , ata ekla ebä ne rä wämo rä , je rä Säkeklä .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Ñera ba wa ̱ jini sa pakale ji wa ̱ k ju ̱ ñer : ‘ Ke ma manena . Ke sa ktawa ̱ . Ke ba jakbla . Ke ji shaka ̱ ka ̱ yue wà ñakjatiäklä shtä ska . Ba ká irä ma a ̱ mi irä dälätsö . ’

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Jera ije te isha : — Je biköle rä wao ̱ leté yis wa ̱ , yis ji ̱ a tsi ̱ ne raté .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Jesús te je ssa ra , ite isha iia ̱ : — Etka ska bä sher ji ̱ a , bä ji tso ̱ biköle watju ̱ o tulömi , je säkei mo ̱ ka jita wa ia ̱ , jekäi ra ba ia ̱ ji säkei ta dämiksa ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska . Je ukä ska bä kute minak yis da .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Ñerä ije te je ssa ra , ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ bäi si ̱ wa ̱ , ije rä blu ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Jesús te isu ̱ a ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ bäi si ̱ wa ̱ ra , ite isha : — Blu wa ia ̱ ra därërë si ̱ dewa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Tjabana si ̱ camello kjäksa ̱ ju ̱ tuluk wä ña ̱ la ja ̱ rka rä , ata därërë si ̱ blu däwa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Je ssäk wa te isha : — Jekäi ra , ¿ yi tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ rä na ?

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Ji ka o ̱ nak ditsä ia ̱ , je o ̱ r dawa ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Jera Pedro te isha : — Ñera , sá ji tso ̱ , je rä jalewa ̱ ta ̱ na sá wa ̱ sá minaklä ba ra .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te iju iräle , ise ̱ naklä iräle , iel wa iräle , iká wa iräle , iyabala iräle , je jawa ̱ ta ̱ na Säkeklä gobiernoí bata ki ̱ ka ra ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: jera jí ke ̱ i ska je wakei ia ̱ je säkei me ̱ rmini ki ̱ ta , ñakäi sa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a ska , je ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye me ̱ rmi .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Jesús te doce wa kiami iwakwa ebä , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — ¡ Jikäi issö ! Sa damika ̱ rä Jerusalén ka . Jeska io ̱ rmi biköle jishtä jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ ditsä yäbei ktei yöle te ishe rä käi .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Jeska iju ̱ rmiksa ̱ ka ̱ etkä wa ia ̱ . Jekäi ije ja ̱ ñetsarmi , iweikarmi diekjela , kjali tjurmi iki ̱ ka .

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Ibuka ̱ na e ̱ ná ra ijewa te iktemiwa ̱ . Ata tres día ra ishki ̱ rmika ̱ ni . ’

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Ata ijewa a ̱ ni ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne je ia ̱ , je kte rä blelewa ̱ ijewa yika ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ka ijewa je ̱ r na idene ji sha ite räle .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Ñerä Jesús dami kja alemana Jericó ska ra , ekla ka wä wajuenak kuna katke ña ̱ la kjä ja ̱ mi inaklä kaku kiäk ,

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: je te ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa damar ssa ra , ite ichaka ji je rä .

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ije ̱ r ku ̱ a Jesús Nazaret wa ne damaju ̱ rä .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Jera ia ̱ na itsa ̱ ka : — ¡ Jesús , David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi yis dälänopa !

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ditsä dami iwätsa ̱ kba te iuña isi ̱ wa ̱ tiäkläwa ̱ , jeiräta ije a ̱ na ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta si ̱ : — ¡ David yäbei , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ mi yis dälänopa !

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Ñerä Jesús je ̱ k wäkukawa ̱ te yilé paka itsa ̱ kté iwäki ̱ . Idetse ̱ ra , ite ichaka iia ̱

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: te isha : — ¿ Ji shena ba ki ̱ yis wa ̱ o ̱ nak ba ia ̱ rä na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Säkekewa , yis me wä wajuerpa .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Bä wä wajueno . Ba te ji biketsa etkabä wà ba tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ .

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka ije wä wajuena , jekäi imineju ̱ ira te Säkeklä kjeishe rami . Jekäi bena tso ̱ te je su ̱ a ra , ijewa te Säkeklä kjeisha kte bäi wà .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Jekäi Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ Jericó ska , jera je sha ̱ na idamiju ̱ .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Ñerä ekla kie Zaqueo , je rä inaklä bäkäk wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ekla , ñakäi irä blu ta ̱ i .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Je ki ̱ yi Jesús rä shena su ̱ nak pjoo , ata ka iwä deneka ̱ isu ̱ akwa ̱ isaka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ sha ̱ naka , ije rä tsi ̱ nekla ki ̱ ka .
