text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Jera ije tu ̱ namiba mineka ̱ ju ̱ sicómoro julaka isu ̱ ak , je wà Jesús kjäke ̱ ju ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Ñerä jeska Jesús demi ra , iwä kaka ̱ jöikje te isu ̱ a , je te isha iia ̱ : — Zaqueo , bä kutewa ̱ ni mane mane i ̱ ski ̱ , jir yis kiana käpäk bä kjä ka ki ̱ ka .

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ k ja ̱ wa ̱ teni mane mane te ikiami a ̱ naa ijuka .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Ñerä ditsä tso ̱ jeska wa te je su ̱ a ra , biköle te Jesús sha yakei : ‘ Iminewa ̱ ju ̱ ñayuläk ji yakei wakbläk ju na . ’

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Jekjepa Zaqueo je ̱ k duaka ̱ te isha Säkekewa ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¡ jikäi issö ! Yis ma yis ji tso ̱ je moska ma ̱ kksa ̱ ka jita wa ia ̱ ; maile yis wa ̱ sa saka wañalewa ̱ ra , yis te je säkei me ̱ mini iwakwa ia ̱ tkitkä däka ̱ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Jir jí ju ska tso ̱ wa tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ , ije rä Abraham yäbei ñaebä ki ̱ ka .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ditsä yäbei de rä ji shelewa ̱ , yuläkksa ̱ , tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Ijewa te je ssë tso ̱ ji ̱ a ra , ite iki ̱ paka jile she ja ̱ mi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , idami kja alemana Jerusalénka , ñakäi ditsä te ibiketse tso ̱ plaawa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí kjämiwa ̱ rä .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ite isha : “ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa batala ekla mineju ̱ mi ka ̱ etkä ka ̱ miika jeska kolonakwa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , jekjepa däkni .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Ka imiju ̱ ba ra ite ikjanaklä wa kiaté diez , jewa ia ̱ ite mina ma diez , kjepa jewa ia ̱ ite isha : ‘ Bas ji wo ̱ iwa ka yis däba dälei ja ̱ mi . ’

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Ata iwakei ke ̱ i ska tso ̱ wa je ̱ r ki ̱ iianawa ̱ ta ̱ i . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te isaka patkami ije itäki ̱ ibata shäk : ‘ Ka sá ki ̱ ije shene däkwa ̱ sá tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye . ’

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: “ Jeiräta ije kolona sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye . Je dene ra , ikjanaklä wa ia ̱ iwa ̱ inaklä me ̱ le jewa kia jaté ite , iwa ̱ ichakäklä ji wá ̱ ite inaklä wà rä käi .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Jera isäkätä deju ̱ , te isha : ‘ Säkekewa , ba te mina ma yis ia ̱ je ki ̱ tapana deka ̱ diez . ’

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : ‘ Kjanaklä bäi , baa ba te iwá ̱ rä . Ba te ji elkjebä wawá ̱ rä bäi , je ki ̱ ka ba ku ̱ jukläyäkä diez kuköwa ̱ ba wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak . ’

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Je itäki ̱ iel deju ̱ , te isha : ‘ Säkekewa , ba te mina ma yis ia ̱ je ki ̱ tapana deka ̱ cinco . ’

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Jera je ia ̱ ite isha ñaebä : ‘ Ba ku ̱ jukläyäkä cinco kuköwa ̱ ba wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak . ’

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: “ Je itäki ̱ iel deju ̱ te isha : ‘ Säkekewa , jí ba mina su ̱ o . Yis te je se ̱ newa ̱ blele pañuelo na ,

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: je rä yis suanawa ̱ ba yika ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba rä sälwii ; ba te ji ka blele kuna ma wa ̱ ne tse ̱ ke ̱ ksa ̱ , ñakäi ba te ji ka tkele kuna ma wa ̱ ne wä kukeke ̱ . ’

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Jera je ia ̱ ite isha : ‘ Kjanaklä yakei , je ba te ji sha ebä wà yis te ba wabiketsemiksa ̱ . Ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis dä ditsä sälwii , je te rä ji ka blele kuna yis wa ̱ ne tse ̱ ke ̱ ksa ̱ , ñakäi ji ka tkele kuna yis wa ̱ ne wä kukeke ̱ .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: ¿ Jiye jera ka ba wa ̱ yis inaklä patkenewa ̱ pa ibläklä ska , yis dene ra yis wa ̱ iku ̱ akläni ukä ta rä na ? ’

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Jekjepa ite isha jeska tapar tso ̱ wa ia ̱ : ‘ Je mina bököksa ̱ iyika , cho ̱ mini mane wa ̱ diez mina kate ra je ia ̱ . ’

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Säkekewa , ¡ ata ije wa ̱ mina tso ̱ kja diez ! ’

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : ‘ Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , biköle yi wa ̱ ji tso ̱ , je ia ̱ iki ̱ me ̱ rmi ; ata yi wa ̱ ka ji kuna , je yika ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ kjelabä jibä bakanamiksa ̱ . ’

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Ñakäi ale yis bolki wa ki ̱ ka yis shene däkwa ̱ ijewa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , jewa jöté jiska , ktöcho ̱ wa ̱ yis wäna .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Jesús te jekäi isha e ̱ ná ra , imineju ̱ ba däkka ̱ Jerusalénka .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Yëë idamiju ̱ kja Betfagé irä Betania irä ska , ka ̱ kichei kie Olivo Yäkä je ñak ska ra , ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa patkami bol ,

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Bas cho ̱ a ̱ mi bas wäsaka jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne juerke ̱ ska . Bas kjawa ̱ julu jeska ra , bas te burro yaba ku ̱ emi mo ̱ lewa ̱ , yi a ̱ ni ka je ̱ tkäba iki ̱ käi ; bas te je yeksa ̱ tse ̱ té .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ata yilé te bas ia ̱ ichake : ‘ ¿ jiye bas te iwäyeke ̱ rä ? ’ jera bas te ikúke : ‘ Säkekewa ne ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä . ’

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Jera je patkele wa minejulu te iku ̱ a jishtä Jesús te isha iia ̱ käi .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Ite burro yaba ye kate ra , iwakwa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas te je burro yaba yeke ̱ ksa ̱ rä na ?

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Säkekewa ne ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te itsa ̱ té Jesús wäki ̱ , je ki ̱ shuawa ̱ ijewa te iwakwa wa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ wà , kjepa ijewa te Jesús paka je ̱ tkäkka ̱ iki ̱ .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Jekäi idamiju ̱ ra , ijewa te iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ je shuami ña ̱ la ki ̱ .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Yëë imawa ̱ ju ̱ kja Olivo Yäkä Bata ktä ja ̱ mi ra , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ biköle ssëna a ̱ naa , te Säkeklä kjeishami täkii ji o ̱ le täkili ta su ̱ le ijewa wa ̱ je biköle ki ̱ ka .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Jewa te ishe rami : “ ¡ Bäije Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i daju ̱ Säkekewa kie ja ̱ mi rä ! ¡ Ka ̱ jöir ska wa ssënopa baa ! ¡ Iwakei oloitsanopa ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ si ̱ ska ! ”

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Ñerä je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa sha ̱ na fariseo wa tso ̱ te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , ma wa ̱ dulanak wa uño .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ijewa si ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ ra , jera jak kjoyirmika ̱ .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Ñerä idamiju ̱ kja alemana te je jukläyäkä su ̱ a ra , jera ite iji ̱ etsa ,

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: te isha : “ Säli ma wa ̱ iju ̱ ñelewa ̱ pa jí ba díabä jibä wà , ji wà ba kjämi bäi , ata jira je rä ki ̱ kololewa ̱ ka je juer ba wäna .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Jekäi maiskale ra jile dämiwa ̱ ba ki ̱ . Jekäi kju ̱ atkäk ba ra wa te jile tapewe ̱ mika ̱ däkka ̱ ju kjätkele wäsaka . Jekäi ite bä kjä butremiksa ̱ , bä kjäshtemiwa ̱ kalabeksa ̱ .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Jeska ijewa te ba mie ̱ tkemiwa ̱ iski ̱ , ñakäi ba yabala tso ̱ ma sha ̱ na kteche ̱ miwa ̱ . Ka ijewa wa ̱ jak ju ̱ nakta ̱ na etka a ̱ ni isaka bata ki ̱ ka ma sha ̱ na . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bikökje Säkeklä dasta ̱ na ba yuläk , ka je juene ba wäna . ”

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Jera ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ Templo ska ra , ije ̱ kaka ̱ jile watju ̱ ak wa patkä tuläkksa ̱ je ektaka ,

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Iyöle katke rä : ‘ Yis ju rä ka ̱ kiäklä jui ’ , ata bas te je iawa ̱ wa ̱ jakbläk wa ñabläklä jui ye .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Buliri buliri ite sa pakteke ̱ Templo ska . Ata chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä , jewa te ibiketse kate maikäi ra ite iktemiwa ̱ .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Ata ka maikäi iwa ̱ imewa ̱ klei biköle te iktä ssëke ̱ tsa ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Etaba kicha Jesús te sa pakte kaldu Templo ska , ñakäi ite kte baa bata she kate . Ñerä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä jewa demijulu Jesús wäki ̱ .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Jewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ishöka ̱ sá ia ̱ , ¿ yibä ka ̱ wei wà ba te jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä na ? ¿ Yi si ̱ wa ̱ ba ia ̱ je ka ̱ wei me ̱ le rä na ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka te isha : — Ñaebä yie etka ichake bas ia ̱ , je kukö bas ku ̱ .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Juan te sä wäukewa ̱ , ¿ je datse ̱ rä ka ̱ jöir ska na , ata ditsä ska na ?

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ipaka ñaia ̱ : “ Sa te ikúkemi ka ̱ jöir ska ni ra , tsi ite ishe rä : ‘ Jekäi irä ra , ¿ jiye ka bas wa ̱ iktä kolone rä na ? ’

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Ata sä te ikúkemi ditsä ska ni ra , jera bena te sä kteche ̱ miwa ̱ jak wà , ijewa te ibiketse iyina si ̱ Juan rä jile bata shäk ni ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ikúka : — Ka sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai je datse ̱ räle .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ñaebä ka yis wa ̱ iyinak bas ia ̱ , yibä ka ̱ wei wà yis te jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä ni .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Jekjepa ite sa paktami jile she ja ̱ mi jikäi : “ Ekla te uva yäkä je ̱ wa ̱ bakla , jekäi ite je peitata ̱ na shka ̱ bläk wa ia ̱ , kjepa iwakei mineju ̱ mi ka ̱ ka ̱ mii däkni je ̱ naapa .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Iwä älinaklä ke ̱ i ska ra , ite kjanaklä ekla patkaté je shka ̱ bläk wa wäki ̱ ijewa wa ̱ uva yäkä wä moska ma ̱ klä iia ̱ . Ata je shka ̱ bläk wa te ikpa ta ̱ i , patkamini ite jula wäyaka .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Je ukä ska ite kjanaklä el patkaténi , ata ñaebä ijewa te je kpa ta ̱ i weika diekjela , patkamine ite jula wäyaka .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Je ukä ska ite isaka patkaténi idäkläka ̱ mañal , ata ñaebä ijewa te je shka ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i ju ̱ aksa ̱ ite .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: “ Ñerä uva yäkä wakei te isha : ‘ ¿ Ji we ̱ ji ̱ a yie na ? Wë yis ma yis yaba shka ̱ ta patkäkmi , bäräle je dälätsemiwa ̱ ijewa te . ’

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Ata je shka ̱ bläk wa te isu ̱ a ra , ite isha ñaia ̱ : ‘ Ije ne ia ̱ iká däli ukä rä däkksa ̱ rä ; je ki ̱ ka sä shkä iktäkwa ̱ , ji rä däkksa ̱ ije ia ̱ je däkläksa ̱ saje cha ye . ’

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iju ̱ aksa ̱ uva yäkä ektaka , jeska ite iktawa ̱ . “ Jera ¿ je uva yäkä wakei te me ijewa we ̱ mi na ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Je bitämi te je shka ̱ bläk wa weikeche ̱ miwa ̱ , kjepa ite uva yäkä me ̱ mini isaka ia ̱ . ” Ijewa te jekäi issa ra , ite isha : — ¡ Ke jekäi si ̱ io ̱ nopa rä !

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Ata Jesús te ijewa su ̱ a jaree te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jera iyöle katke jikäi : ‘ Jak ju ̱ leksa ̱ ju yuäk wa wa ̱ , je ne rä delewa ̱ ju ñak wäkukäk bäi si ̱ ye rä ’ , ¿ jiräni je wà rä na ?

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Jekäi biköle yi ja ̱ naka ̱ je jak ki ̱ ka ra , je pa ̱ rtkämiwa ̱ ; ñaebä yi ki ̱ ka je jak ja ̱ naka ̱ ra , je te iwëtkemiwa ̱ .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä jewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra , ijewa ne sha ite je jile she ja ̱ mi rä , je ki ̱ ka ijewa te ibiketsa maikäi ra ite ikukemiwa ̱ je ke ̱ i ebä wà . Ata ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ ditsä yika .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ije ̱ r me ̱ kate ki ̱ ka ijewa te isaka patkami iwäki ̱ , juer ta sä wämo wa käi , iwächakewa ̱ k wäsi ̱ wa , jiräni iwa ̱ ishä ta í ̱ ki ̱ ka , ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ akläksa ̱ ka ̱ wäkiri ia ̱ , me ite iwe ̱ käi , jini ite biketseksa ̱ käi .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ te isha : — Sapaktäk , sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba ktä rä bulee , ba te sa pakteke ̱ rä bulee , ñakäi ka ba te sa wabiketseksa ̱ kuna sa pa juer wà , ata maikäi shke Säkeklä ja ̱ mi rä je ktei wà ba te sa pakteke ̱ rä bulee .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Jekäi ¿ ka ̱ tso ̱ sá ia ̱ inaklä ma ̱ klä César ia ̱ na , ata kai ?

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Ata Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra , wäsi ̱ wa ijewa te iwächakewe ̱ ke ̱ rä , jekäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ :

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: — ‘ Denario kjashö ' sia ̱ . ’ ¿ Yibä me ̱ i jí rä , yibä kie yöle ija ̱ mi rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — César je ̱ .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jera ji rä César ia ̱ , je mo César ia ̱ , ata ji rä Säkeklä ia ̱ , je mo Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Jekäi ka ijewa ia ̱ iwäbuta ̱ newa ̱ kte etka a ̱ ni wà ditsä wäna , ata ite ikúka te imale ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi isi ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Ñerä saduceo wa sha ̱ ñasikawa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi . Jewa te ishe rä ka sä rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ; jewa te ichaka iia ̱ ,

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: te isha : — Sapaktäk , Moisés wa ̱ iyöleta ̱ na sa ̱ ia ̱ rä : Ikuna manele el duawa ̱ se ̱ naklä ta , ata ka iyaba a ̱ ta ̱ neta ̱ na ra , iel se ̱ rwa ̱ ni je alaklä ra , yaba su ̱ ak iel yäbei ye .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Jekäi ñael wa ebä bakle siete ; ikibi si ̱ se ̱ nawa ̱ alaklä ra , ata je duawa ̱ ka yaba ta .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Je su ̱ ta iel ukä ja ̱ mi io ̱ na ñaebä .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Jekäi iel idäkläka ̱ mañal je se ̱ nawa ̱ ira ñaebä . Jekäi ebä je siete wa biköle duacha ̱ wa ̱ ka yabala ta ;

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: bata jekje ra je alaklä duawa ̱ ñaebä .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Jekäi je siete wa wa ̱ ibakle ialaklä ye ra , jera sa ̱ shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni ska ra , ¿ mane si ̱ se ̱ naklä ye je alaklä dämiksa ̱ ni rä na ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Jí ke ̱ i ska wa se ̱ rke ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi iña ma ̱ ke ̱ se ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Ata mane wa rä biketsale kianak se ̱ nak ji ̱ a je ke ̱ i wà , ñakäi shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , ka jewa rä se ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna , ñakäi ka jewa rä me ̱ nak kuna se ̱ nakwa ̱ ,

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: ka jewa rä duäk kuna ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jeska ra ijewa rä jishtä ángel wa käi , ñakäi ijewa rä Säkeklä yabala ijewa rä shki ̱ leka ̱ ni ki ̱ ka .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Ata dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni je waje ̱ rku ̱ a Moisés te ñaebä , ale kal yaba ska ite Säkekewa kia Abraham Kekläí , Isaac Kekläí , Jacob Kekläí ni ska .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Jekäi ka ije rä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa Kekläí kuna , ata ije rä sä kseka wa ne Kekläí , ije ia ̱ ra sa ̱ tso ̱ kalabe wa rä kseka ki ̱ ka .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Jera ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa sha ̱ te ikúka te isha : — Sapaktäk , bulee ba te isha rä .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Jekäi ka ijewa wa ̱ iwächakewa ̱ klei ji ̱ a .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ishe sä bäkäkksa ̱ rä David yäbei ni rä na ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Ñera David wakeiwa ̱ iyile Salmos äyëí ki ̱ ka rä : “ Säkekewa te isha yis Säkekewaí ia ̱ : Ma je ̱ tköwa ̱ yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: bikökje yie bä bolki wa tulacha ̱ wa ̱ bä klä tkäkläka ̱ iki ̱ ka kje . ”

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Jekäi David te ikia Säkekewa ni ra , ¿ maikäi jera je rä iyäbei rä na ?

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ditsä biköle te issë tso ̱ ra , ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: “ Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa yika . Jewa ssërke ̱ rä shkäk paiklä so ̱ lo ̱ rbe wà , ijewa wäbätsä rä ime chakarpa sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska wà , ñapaktäklä jui ska ra , oloi ta wa je ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ wà , yakana mar ska ra , oloi ta wa je ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ wà .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Jewa te alaklä wa chichö wa ju bäke ju ̱ eke ̱ mi , ñakäi ijewa ka ̱ kiäke ̱ jaree kje juenak ebä . Jewa buka ̱ nami e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ . ”

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Templo ska Jesús wä kaka ̱ te blu wa te iji tso ̱ me ̱ nak jie kate ofrenda jiäklä jui ja ̱ rka je su ̱ a .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Ñaebä ite isu ̱ a alaklä chichö ka jita te jeska inaklä wäka botkä tsi ̱ dala si ̱ jiawa ̱ .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Jera ite isha : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je chichö ka jita te ijia rä biköle tsa ̱ ta .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ijewa biköle te rä iwa ̱ ji tso ̱ ta ̱ i wäukäla ne jia ofrenda ye rä , ata je ka jita te rä ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ ije ̱ k se ̱ newa ̱ klä kalabe ne jia rä .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Moska te ipake kate , Templo rä ki ̱ tkele jak babaa wà , jile saka me ̱ le ofrenda ye wà . Ñerä Jesús te isha :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: — ¿ Bas te je su ̱ a na ? Ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a jak etka a ̱ ni ka a ̱ ta ̱ naklä isaka bata ki ̱ ka , ka miletkäwa ̱ kuna käi .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , ¿ bikökje je o ̱ rmi rä na ? ¿ Jibä juermi säkätäba ijuenaklä ye je o ̱ r mar kja irä na ?

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Jera ite isha : “ Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ ka bas wäyönakläwa ̱ kuna . Iwa rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dämi ji ̱ a yis kie ja ̱ mi ishäk : ‘ Yis ne irä ’ , ñakäi ishäk : ‘ Ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ alemana . ’ Ata ke bas mina ijewa ja ̱ mi .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Mika ̱ bas te ipalei ssa ñabukanate , sä gobiernoí buka ̱ nate ta ̱ i ra , ke bas suana je yika . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je rä kjäkju ̱ säkätäba , ata ka sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ nakwa ̱ plaa . ’

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Jera ite iki ̱ sha ji ̱ a ijewa ia ̱ : “ Ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa ñajämika ̱ ñakpäk ñara , ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ñajämika ̱ ñakpäk ñara .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Ka ̱ wäbuka ̱ nami e ̱ e ̱ na , ñakäi ka ̱ etkä etkä ska bäli ja ̱ rmi duë ja ̱ rmi sa ̱ ki ̱ ; ñakäi sa ̱ male ̱ cha ̱ k shtä juermi , jile kjayirmi ka ̱ jöir ska e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Ata je yikaba , bas kolormiwa ̱ , bas yolormi weikanak , bas tulurmiksa ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska tso ̱ wa ia ̱ , sä wätiäk wa ia ̱ , ñakäi bas dä janakmi ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wäki ̱ ka ̱ wäkiri wa wäki ̱ yis kie kju ̱ ei .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Je oloi ja ̱ mi bas te yis ktei shemi .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Ata bas ku ̱ iwabiketsö bas je ̱ r ska , ka ibiketsäk kuna iwätsa ̱ kba jini sä te ikúkemi käi .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te bas ia ̱ kte me ̱ mi je ̱ rike me ̱ mi , je ka wätkenak je ka kúkanak bas da kju ̱ atkäk wa mane a ̱ ni ia ̱ .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Bas ká wabä , bas el wabä , bas saka wabä , bas salibä wabä te bas tulemiksa ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te bas manele ktemiwa ̱ .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Jekäi biköle te bas dokoitsemiwa ̱ yis kie kju ̱ ei .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Ata ka bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä etaba a ̱ ni weikanakwa ̱ .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Jekäi bas chatkawa ̱ ra , je wà bas je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkämiksa ̱ .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: “ Mika ̱ bas te isu ̱ a guardia wa te Jerusalén kjä kukaksa ̱ shkiritke ra , bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa iku ̱ ike ̱ i dewa ̱ e ̱ ná iweikanakläwa ̱ .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Jera yi tso ̱ Judea ska wa julunomipa ka ̱ tsä naka iyika , yi tso ̱ je jukläyäkä na wa julunoksa ̱ pa iyika , yi tso ̱ jile tkäklä sha ̱ na ke bita je jukläyäkä ja ̱ rka .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je ke ̱ i ska sä rä buka ̱ nak nui ki ̱ io ̱ naklä iyöle tso ̱ biköle te ji she je ja ̱ mi .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: ¡ Wekte je ke ̱ i wà alaklä wa tso ̱ kjä ye wa rä , ñakäi tsu ma ̱ ke ̱ ji ̱ a wa rä ! Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä weikarmi ka ̱ jiska e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , ñakäi Säkeklä kju ̱ atkämiwa ̱ jí sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ra .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Ijewa rä kota ̱ nakcha ̱ wa ̱ espada wà , ñakäi minak jar ka ̱ etkä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa bena ska . Ñakäi Jerusalén wäturmiwa ̱ ka ̱ etkä wa klä niki ̱ ka , bikö ijewa ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ rke ̱ kjaju ̱ kje .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: “ Jile kjayirmi ka ̱ wä ja ̱ mi tulu ja ̱ mi bekwä ja ̱ mi ; ñakäi ka ̱ jiska sä ditsei wä biköle je ̱ r iarcha ̱ miwa ̱ , je rä däyë tjuämika ̱ ta ̱ i bularmi ta ̱ i te imale ̱ che ̱ che ̱ miwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Suane irä , ji kjämi ji ̱ a ka ̱ biköle ska biketse irä , je te sa ̱ ja ̱ lmawe ̱ che ̱ miwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ jöir ji tso ̱ oloi ta wa wäbuka ̱ namika ̱ .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Jekjepa ijewa te ditsä yäbei dawa ̱ ju ̱ mo ̱ ja ̱ rka oloi ta , wäñileka ̱ ta ̱ i su ̱ emi .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Mika ̱ jekäi io ̱ rke ̱ kja ra , jera bas ñajöklöka ̱ wäköka ̱ jöikje . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas bakanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i tkenawa ̱ alemana ki ̱ ka . ’

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Ite ijewa ia ̱ jile paka jile she ja ̱ mi jikäi : “ Higuera irä kal biköle irä su ̱ o .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Mika ̱ ikä perí jè ̱ r mar su ̱ a bas te ra , je te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ e duas tker dawa ̱ kja irä .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Je su ̱ ta mika ̱ bas te jekäi ji o ̱ rke ̱ su ̱ a ra , jera je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa Säkeklä gobiernoí kjäkläwa ̱ tkenawa ̱ kja alemana irä .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: “ Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je biköle o ̱ rmi jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa ka tuarcha ̱ wa ̱ ba yika .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä je e ̱ rmiwa ̱ , ata yis ktä ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ mik a ̱ ni .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: “ Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ , ka bas je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ klä shtirilewa ̱ ji wakble ka wata di ye sha ̱ na käi wa ̱ , se ̱ ne diyëë käi wa ̱ , je ̱ k se ̱ newa ̱ klä te sa ̱ je ̱ r ia ̱ we ̱ käi wa ̱ , ka je día däklä wa ̱ bas ki ̱ plaa jishtä ji kuke ja ̱ ma te käi .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je día dämiwa ̱ se ̱ nak ka ̱ jiska jewa biköle ki ̱ .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ del ka ̱ kiäk bas täkili däkläka ̱ je ji shena däkwa ̱ ji ̱ a je bena cha ̱ k , bas je ̱ k duäkläwa ̱ ditsä yäbei wäja ̱ mi . ’

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Ka ̱ piana ra Jesús te sa pakteke ̱ Templo ska , tuina ra imike ̱ ka ̱ bata kie Olivo yäkä ska .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Ata sa ̱ ñiree ra ditsä biköle däke ̱ iwäki ̱ Templo ska ji sheke ̱ ite ssäk .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Pan ñaklä ka levadura ta ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä kie Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ je ke ̱ i tkenawa ̱ kja .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , jewa te ibiketse kate maikäi si ̱ ra iia ̱ Jesús dämiksa ̱ kota ̱ nakwa ̱ käi , je rä isuanachawa ̱ ditsä yika ki ̱ ka .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Jera Satanás kjawa ̱ Judas kinak Iscariote wa ni je je ̱ r na ; ije rä ale doce wa sha ̱ ekla .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Je mineju ̱ mi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä Templo kjänanak wa wäsikäk wa irä ra , ipakäk maikäi ra ite Jesús ju ̱ emiksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ käi .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Jera ijewa ssëna a ̱ naa , jekäi ijewa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a iia ̱ inaklä ma ̱ k .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Jera Judas te ikúka bäi , jeska ra ite ibiketsami maikäi si ̱ ra ka ̱ dämiksa ̱ iia ̱ iwa ̱ iju ̱ akläksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ , ka ju ̱ ñele kuna ditsä wa ̱ käi .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Jekäi pan ñaklä ka levadura ta je díaí dewa ̱ , je ke ̱ i wà oveja yaba kiana kota ̱ nakwa ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Jera Jesús te Pedro irä Juan irä patkami , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : — Bas cho ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä äliwa ̱ k , sa ̱ wa ̱ iñaklä .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Mai ba ki ̱ sá shena je äliwa ̱ k rä na ?

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — ¡ Issö ! Bas demijulu jukläyäkä sha ̱ na ra , jäiyi ekla dämiksa ̱ ju ̱ bas wäki ̱ , je wa ̱ u ̱ yaka u ̱ í diklä tsa ̱ klä damitse ̱ . Je itäki bas mi ma rä mai imike ̱ wa ̱ ju na ska .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Jera je ju wakei ia ̱ ishö : ‘ Sapaktäk te ishaté yinak ma ia ̱ : ¿ Mai ju ja ̱ r tso ̱ yis wa ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä ñaklä yis wa ̱ dulanak wa ra rä na ?

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Jera ije te ju ja ̱ r ta ̱ i yöle ietkä ki ̱ ka kjashemi bas ia ̱ , ja ̱ r bäile e ̱ ná . Jeska bas te ji äliwe ̱ ba .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ñerä ijewa minejulu ; je te iku ̱ a jishtä ite isha iia ̱ käi . Jera ijewa te Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je äliwa ̱ .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Jera ka ̱ wä dewa ̱ iwa ̱ iñaklä ska , jera Jesús je ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk iktei bata shäk wa ra ñara .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Ñerä ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¡ E ̱ e ̱ na yis ssëna jí Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je ñak bas da ka yis wa ̱ ji shka ̱ l ssërba yika rä !

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ka yis wa ̱ je ñanakni , ata jiye wata je rä je wakjayina e ̱ ná Säkeklä gobiernoí ska kjepa yie je ñemini rä .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Jera ite copa etka kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ , jera ite isha : — Jí kukö , je yö ñara .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , jí maju ̱ jöiwäta ka yis wa ̱ uva diä yanakni , ata Säkeklä gobiernoí kjawa ̱ ju ̱ kjepa yie je yëmini rä .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Jera ite pan kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ , kjepa je butsa ma ̱ ite ijewa ia ̱ , te isha : — Jí rä yis yaka . Je rä me ̱ leksa ̱ bas kju ̱ ei . Jikäi bas ku ̱ iwo ̱ bas je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä yis ka .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Je su ̱ ta iyaká e ̱ ná ra , ite copa kukawa ̱ te isha : — Jí copa ne rä sa kabläklä ñaia ̱ spa ̱ na ji wa ̱ k yis pi wà rä ; je rä tkenakju ̱ mi bas kju ̱ ei .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Ata yis ju ̱ akksa ̱ je wakei kalmeña yis da mesa ska .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Iyina si ̱ ra ditsä yäbei maju ̱ mi rä jiräni ibiketsaleksa ̱ käi , ata ¡ säli je ju ̱ akksa ̱ wakei rä !

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Jera ijewa te ichakami ñaia ̱ mane si ̱ te je we ̱ mi räí ̱ .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Je ukä ska ijewa kju ̱ atkaka ̱ ñara yi rä bäi si ̱ rä ki ̱ .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Ka ̱ jiska wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te isaka patkeke ̱ , ñakäi je ipatkäk wa kieke ̱ ijewa te rä sa ̱ ia ̱ ji wa ̱ k bäi ni .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Ata bas sha ̱ na ka jekäi ikiar . Ata bas sha ̱ na yi rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ ra , je je ̱ k jöwo ̱ pa idulunaí ye . Jekäi yi rä sä wäsikäk , je je ̱ k jöwo ̱ pa ikjanaklä ye .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Jekäi bas ia ̱ ra ¿ yi rä bäi si ̱ rä na , je ̱ k bäkläkwa ̱ yäkäk na , ata sä chewa ̱ k na ? ¿ Ka irä je ̱ k bäkläkwa ̱ yäkäk na ? Jeiräta yis kaldu bas sha ̱ na sä chewa ̱ k käi .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: “ Bas ne chatkawa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi yis mablerke ̱ sha ̱ na rä .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yis te bas kuke ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ye jishtä yis Ká te yis kuka sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye käi ,

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: bas ji ñaklä , bas ji yäklä yis mesa ska , mai yis dä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ska , ñakäi bas ñajäkläkläwa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa je ̱ tkäklä ki ̱ ka , Israel wa ditsei wä doce ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ . ”

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Jera Säkekewa te isha Pedro ia ̱ : — Simón , Simón , ¡ jikäi issö ! Satanás te ba kiaksa ̱ , iwa ̱ bas wäkpäkläksa ̱ trigo pjoi kpeksa ̱ käi .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Ata yis ka ̱ kia ba ki ̱ ba wa ̱ ji biketsäklä etkabä ji ̱ a ka shirilewa ̱ ta . Jekäi ba dewa ̱ ni ra , ba ku ̱ ba el wa täkiwo ̱ .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Jera Pedro te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , yis kaldu kja minakña ba ra ka sä wätiäklä ska ebä kuna , ata duäkwa ̱ ña .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Pedro , yie ishe ba ia ̱ , jir ebä ka oshkoro a ̱ rka ̱ ba yikaba , ba ka ̱ yuämiwa ̱ mañatabä kicha ka ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ni .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Jekjepa ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Yis te bas patkami ka inaklä tsa ̱ klä jui ta , ka jile tsa ̱ klä ta , ka sandalia saka ta ra , jera ¿ jile shena ji ̱ a bas ki ̱ na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Ji a ̱ ni .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ata jira yi wa ̱ inaklä tsa ̱ klä jui tso ̱ ra , je ku ̱ itso ̱ mi jile tsa ̱ kläje , ñakäi yi wa ̱ ka espada kuna ra , je ku ̱ iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ ka watju ̱ o ju ̱ omi , je säkei wà itju ̱ oksa ̱ .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , ikiana o ̱ nak yis ukä ja ̱ mi jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Ije shtanaña ji yakei wakbläk ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi wa ra ñara . ” Iwa rä yis ktei yöle rä bata e ̱ nakwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha : — Säkekewa , jiska espada tso ̱ botkä . Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Bäi rä , je ebä .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Jera ikjaksa ̱ ju ̱ , mineju ̱ mi däkmi Olivo Yäkä Bata ska iwädular käi , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa damiña ira .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Jekäi idemiju ̱ jeska ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ka ̱ kiö ka bas shirinakläwa ̱ kuna .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Jera ije ̱ k butsa ju ̱ ami ijewa yika sä te jak ju ̱ e dämi kjena . Jeska ije ̱ tkawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ ka ̱ kiäk ,

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: te isha : “ Papá , ma je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa iku ̱ ra , jí copa tso ̱ ju ̱ omipa yis yika . Ata we ka yis ki ̱ ishena käi kuna , ata jishtä ba ki ̱ ishena käi io ̱ nopa . ”

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Ñerä ángel dar ka ̱ jöir ekla juena iwäna , je te itäkili jiewa ̱ .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Jera ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka ika ̱ kia ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta , jera iparina pi käi wäta ta ̱ i ta ̱ i jolona ishäkä ki ̱ ka .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Ika ̱ kiä katke käi ije ̱ kaka ̱ deni iwa ̱ dulanak wa ska ra , ite ijewa ku ̱ a käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ , je rä ije ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — ¿ Jiye bas kapacha ̱ wa ̱ rä na ? Bas ñajöka ̱ . Bas ka ̱ kiö ka bas shirinakläwa ̱ kuna .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Ñerä ije te je she kaldu ji ̱ a kjela bä ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ patkena ñakataka , jewa wäkse ale doce wa sha ̱ ekla kinak Judas ni je daju ̱ , je je ̱ k sikawa ̱ Jesús wäja ̱ mi iwä jalassäkwa ̱ .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Ñerä Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Judas , ¿ sä wä jalassë wà ba te ditsä yäbei ju ̱ eke ̱ ksa ̱ na ?

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Jera Jesús da kajali wa te ji o ̱ r mar su ̱ a ra , ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ sä te ijewa bike espada wà na ?

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Jekäi ijewa sha ̱ ekla te chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kjanaklä bika , ikukä wämo tia ju ̱ ami .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kuka te isha : — We irä ; ijöwa ̱ . Jera ijula tkawa ̱ ikukä ja ̱ mi te ibäiwa ̱ ni .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , Templo kjänanak wa wäsikäk wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä dejulu ikukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas bite espada ta , kal wälbe ta , jishtä jakbläk wa kukewa ̱ käi na ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Buliri buliri yis kaldu bas da Templo ska ra , ñera ka bas jula tkäwa ̱ ta yis kukäkwa ̱ , ata jí ne rä bas horaí rä , ka ̱ tuil tsa ̱ ku ̱ i horaí rä .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Ijewa te Jesús kukawa ̱ tsa ̱ mi patkawa ̱ chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ju na . Jera Pedro damiju ̱ iitä wà ka ̱ miika .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Je juitä ki ̱ ijewa te yökö wäkawa ̱ ka ̱ je kjä ja ̱ mi iña jakla ̱ wa ̱ , jera Pedro je ̱ tkawa ̱ ña ijewa ra .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Ñerä alaklä ekla jeska wa kjanaklä te ije su ̱ a ikalme yökö kjä ja ̱ mi . Jera ite isu ̱ a jaree te isha : — Ñera ije ne kalduña Jesús da rä .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Ata ije ka ̱ yuawa ̱ te isha : — Sa ̱ nule ̱ nule ̱ wa ̱ , ka yis wa ̱ ije su ̱ le .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Je berbena ebä ra , isaka te isu ̱ a te isha : — Ba rä ijewa sha ̱ ekla . Jera Pedro te isha : — Säkekewa , ka yis dä ijewa kuna .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ ka una hora käi , isaka te isha ji ̱ a : — Iyina si ̱ ra ije kalduña Jesús da , ije rä Galilea wa ki ̱ ka .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Jera Pedro te isha : — Säkekewa , jibä sheke ̱ ba te rä ka ju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ . Ñerä iktä kalme ji ̱ a wäsaka ra , oshkoro a ̱ naka ̱ .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Jera Säkekewa wä manewa ̱ té Pedro su ̱ ak , jera Pedro je ̱ r ja ̱ na Säkekewa ktä ska , je te isha iia ̱ rä : “ Jir ebä ka oshkoro a ̱ rka ̱ ba yikaba , ba ka ̱ yuämiwa ̱ mañatäbä kicha , ka ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ni . ”

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ñerä Pedro mineksa ̱ ju ̱ jeska iji ̱ á e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Jera ditsä tso ̱ Jesús kjänanak wa te ija ̱ ñetseke ̱ , ñakäi ite ikpeke ̱ .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Ijewa te iwä pamu ̱ awa ̱ , jera ite isheke ̱ iia ̱ : — ¡ Yi si ̱ te ba kpa rä shöka ̱ jile bata shäk ye !

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te jile sha ta ̱ i iia ̱ saka saka iweikäklä .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra , je ke ̱ i ska wäkiri wa , ale chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä tapanawa ̱ ñara . Jera ijewa wa ̱ iminetse ̱ mi ijewa Sanedrín wa tapanawa ̱ wäki ̱ .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ba rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ra , ¡ ishöka ̱ sá ia ̱ ! Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Yis kuna ishäkka ̱ bas ia ̱ ra , ka bas wa ̱ yis ktä kolonak .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Ñakäi yis kuna bas wächakewa ̱ k ra , ka bas wa ̱ yis kúkanak .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Ata jirami ditsä yäbei je je ̱ tkämiwa ̱ Säkeklä täkili ta ta ̱ i jula wämo kja ̱ ne .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Jera ijewa biköle te iwächakewa ̱ : — Jera , ¿ ba rä Säkeklä yaba na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Bas ne te je sheke ̱ yis dä ije ni rä .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye sa ̱ ki ̱ ikjatiäk wa shena ji ̱ a na ? Ñera sa wakwa te ji sha ite iwakei kjäbata wa rä je ssa .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa biköle ñajaka ̱ , jewa wa ̱ iminetse ̱ Pilato wäki ̱ .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikjatiami te isha : “ Sá te jí ku ̱ a dua . Ije te sá ke ̱ i ska tso ̱ wa je ̱ r tkeke ̱ ta ̱ i , ije te ishe ka sa kiar César ia ̱ inaklä ma ̱ k , ñakäi ite ishe iwakei rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ni , je wà rä irä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i . ”

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Jera Pilato te iwächakewa ̱ te isha : — ¿ Ba ne rä Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Ba te je shaka ̱ .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Jera Pilato te isha chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ia ̱ , ñakäi isaka tso ̱ jeska chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ : — Ka yis wäna ijuer ta jí ditsä rä nui ta käi .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Ata jeska ijewa te isha ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta : — Ije te ditsä bena wätjiwe ̱ ke ̱ ite sa pakteke ̱ wà Judea ke ̱ i bena ska . Je te je wá ̱ té Galilea ke ̱ i skaté , je bite rä jiska kje .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Ñerä Pilato te je ssa ra , ite chaka je ditsä rä galilea waí ̱ .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Ata ite issa jekäi irä ni ra , ite ipatkami Herodes wäki ̱ , Herodes dä Galilea ke ̱ i tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ki ̱ ka . Je ke ̱ i wà ra ñakäi je katke Jerusalén ska .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Jekäi Herodes te Jesús su ̱ a ra , issëna a ̱ naa . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , mikleté ije ̱ r ssëna ime isu ̱ awa ̱ käi , iwa ̱ ije palei ssële ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka , ñakäi iia ̱ issërke ̱ ime ite jile we ̱ ijuenaklä ye su ̱ awa ̱ käi .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Jekäi ite iwächakewa ̱ ta ̱ i , ata Jesús wa ̱ ka ikúkane jini a ̱ ni .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Jeska chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä kajali ; jewa te ikjatieke ̱ täkili wà .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Jera Herodes irä iguardia wa irä te Jesús kukawa ̱ weikanak ja ̱ ñetsanak , jekäi ite ipajiawa ̱ baa si ̱ , kjepa ite ipatkamini Pilato wäki ̱ .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ebä wà Pilato irä Herodes irä je ̱ r bäinani ñara , ata säkätä ra iña su ̱ a rä sälwii ebä .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Jekjepa Pilato te chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ditsä saka irä tapawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas wa ̱ jí detse ̱ yis wä ki ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r tkäk käi ; ata yis te iwächakewa ̱ bas wäkata ska . Ñera ka yis wäna ijuer ta irä nui ta etka a ̱ ni bas te ikjatia käi .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Ñaebä Herodes wäna ka ijuer ta irä nui ta käi , je ki ̱ ka ite ipatkaténi sá wäki ̱ . ¡ Issö ! Ka iwa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne je ki ̱ ka iktäkläwa ̱ käi kuna .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Ata yie ikpa ksa bata wà e ̱ ná ra yis te iyemiksa ̱ ni .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Je rä ije kiana ekla wäyäkksa ̱ ni del ijewa ia ̱ ike ̱ i kjewe ̱ sha ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Ata chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa kjoyina täkii ñakataka te isha : — ¡ Iweiköwa ̱ ! ¡ Barrabás ne wäyöksa ̱ ni sá ia ̱ rä !

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Barrabás kate wätelewa ̱ rä iwa ̱ je jukläyäkä wa wäsikle kju ̱ atkäk ka ̱ wei ta wa ra kju ̱ ei , ñakäi irä sä ktäk kju ̱ ei .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Ata Pilato te Jesús wäyakleksa ̱ , je ki ̱ iktani etäbä kicha ijewa ra ,

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: ata ijewa kjoyina ji ̱ a te isha : — ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ! ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi !

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Jera Pilato te ishani idäkläka ̱ mañatäbä kicha : — ¿ Jera ji wá ̱ ije te yakei rä na ? Ka yis wäna ijuer ta nui ta irä , iktäkläwa ̱ iki ̱ ka käi kuna . Ata yis te ikpemi ksa bata wà kjepa yis te iwäyemiksa ̱ ni .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Ata ijewa kjoyina tkelewa ̱ täkii ipakäk iwätiäkka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi . Ñerä ijewa kjoyina wà itu ̱ naka ̱ .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Jekäi Pilato te iwabiketsaksa ̱ iwa ̱ k maikäi ijewa te ikia iia ̱ käi .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Jera ñe wätelewa ̱ sä wäsikle iwa ̱ kju ̱ atkäk ki ̱ ka , ñakäi irä sä ktäk ki ̱ ka , ale kieke ̱ ksa ̱ ijewa te , je wäyaksa ̱ ite . Ata ite Jesús ju ̱ aksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ me ite iwe ̱ käi .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Jera ijewa wa ̱ je dami tse ̱ ra , ekla Simón Cirene wa tso ̱ kju ̱ awaka daju ̱ téni , je kukawa ̱ ijewa te ki ̱ ka ite cruz kpaka ̱ tse ̱ nakmi iwa ̱ Jesús itä ki ̱ .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Jera ditsä dami chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ iitä ki ̱ , ñakäi alaklä wa damiña jewa te iji ̱ etse dami , kjoyir dami .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Ñerä Jesús wämanewa ̱ té ijewa su ̱ ak te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Alaklä wa Jerusalén wa , ke yis ji ̱ etsa , ata bas wakwa ne ñaji ̱ etsö rä , ñakäi bas yabala ne ji ̱ etsö rä .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ska ra bas te ishemi : “ Bäije alaklä wa ko ̱ le ka yaba su ̱ ak kuna wa rä , ka wakjuä wako ̱ le kuna wa wakjuä rä , ka tsu wayale kuna wa tsu rä . ”

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Je ra ite ishemi ka ̱ tsä ia ̱ : ‘ ¡ Ma minoté sá ki ̱ ka ! ’ , ñakäi ka ̱ ukäla ia ̱ : ‘ ¡ Sá ki ̱ kuköwa ̱ ! ’

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jí käi ijewa te ji we ̱ ke ̱ kal spa ̱ na ukä ja ̱ mi ra , ¿ ji o ̱ rmi kal ssi ̱ l ukä ja ̱ mi rä na ?

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Jera ñaebä ijewa wa ̱ ditsä saka bol ji yakei wakbläk wa damiña ira kota ̱ nakcha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Ijewa demijulu ka ̱ kie “ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ Chichei ” ni ska ra , jeska ijewa te iwätiaka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi , ñakäi je ji yakei wakbläk wa wätia tulaka ̱ ijewa te , ekla ijula wämo kja ̱ ne , ekla ijula shule kja ̱ ne .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : “ Papá , ba ku ̱ ijewa jöwa ̱ bitaba , ji we ̱ ke ̱ ite rä je ia ̱ ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne ki ̱ ka . Jera ijewa ina su ̱ a jile wà ijewa wa ̱ ji jienak iwa ̱ bala pja ̱ klä ñaia ̱ .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Ditsä te isu ̱ e tso ̱ klä ki ̱ ka , jera ñakäi sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ije ja ̱ ñetseke ̱ , te isheke ̱ : — Kju ̱ awa je tsa ̱ tkaksa ̱ ite ; ikuna ije rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ ra , iwakei je ̱ k tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Ñakäi guardia wa te ija ̱ ñetseke ̱ , ñasikäke ̱ wa ̱ iwä ja ̱ mi uva diä jäi ma ̱ k iia ̱ ,

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: te isheke ̱ : — ¡ Ba ne rä Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä ra , ba wakei je ̱ k tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ !

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ñakäi itsa ̱ ka iyör katke te ishe rä : “ Jí ne rä Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä . ”

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Ale ji yakei wakbläk wa wäter tkete je ekla te Jesús weika te isha : — ¡ Ba ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä ra , ba wakei je ̱ k tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ , ñaebä sá tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ !

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Ata iel te iuña te sha iia ̱ : — Ba weikarke ̱ ije käi ñaebä ; jera ¿ ka ba suane Säkeklä yika na ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Sa je weikarke ̱ rä wata , jishtä sä te iwá ̱ ja ̱ mi ideksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ rä . Ata ije wa ̱ ka ji a ̱ ni yakei o ̱ ne kuna .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Jekjepa ite isha : — Jesús , mika ̱ bä dewa ̱ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ra , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ nopa yis ska .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ba ia ̱ , jir bä dämika ̱ kätkäña yis da ka ̱ baa ska .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Ka ̱ wä deka ̱ las doce käi ra , ka ̱ wätuinawa ̱ itjä yee ka ̱ biköle ska mine rämi las tres kje .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Jera ka ̱ wä wätuinawa ̱ , ñakäi sua Templo bala tkäkläksa ̱ klasha ̱ naju ̱ mi moki ̱ .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Jera Jesús a ̱ na täkii , te isha : — ¡ Papá , yis te yis wikblu ju ̱ eta ̱ na ba jula na ! Je sha ite ra , iduawa ̱ .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Ñerä guardia wa cien wäsikäk te ji o ̱ na su ̱ a ra , ite Säkeklä kjeisha kte baa wà te isha : — Iyina si ̱ jí ditsä rä wämo .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapar tso ̱ iki ̱ su ̱ ak wa biköle te ji o ̱ na su ̱ a ra , iminejuluni je ̱ r bata pakpä rami jela .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Ata iwa ̱ su ̱ nak wa kajali ka ̱ miika , ñakäi alaklä wa biteleté ira Galilea ska jewa te ji o ̱ r te su ̱ e tso ̱ .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Ditsä ekla kie José ni , je rä Sanedrín wa sha ̱ , je rä ditsä bäi , ñakäi wämo .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Isaka te iwabiketsaksa ̱ irä , ijewa te iwa ̱ irä , je ia ̱ ka issëne bäi . Ije rä Judea jukläyäkäí Arimatea wa , je te Säkeklä gobiernoí ki ̱ ssë kate .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Je mineju ̱ Pilato wäki ̱ Jesús nu ̱ l kiäkksa ̱ iia ̱ .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Jekäi ite iya ja ̱ wa ̱ ksa ̱ ra , ite ibutrawa ̱ dätsi wà , blacha ̱ ite jak ker ja ̱ tkele sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä naka , je na yi a ̱ ni ka blerba .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Je día rä jile wa ̱ klä sábado yika , jera sábado dawa ̱ ju ̱ kja irä .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Jekäi alaklä wa bitele Jesús da Galilea ska wa minemiña José ra te sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä su ̱ a , ñakäi maikäi inu ̱ l me ̱ naka ̱ rä käi je su ̱ a .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Jera ijewa dejuluni te ji jalanak ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ shtä yula saka saka irä perfume irä . Ata ijewa je ̱ racha ̱ wa ̱ sábado wà jishtä sa pakale ji wa ̱ k rä ja ̱ mi .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Semana día säkätä sa ̱ ñireebä ra , ijewa minejulu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska , jewa wa ̱ ji jalanak ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ shtä yolole iwa ̱ saka saka je shkä .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te jak sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kjäshtäklä ku ̱ a buleleju ̱ mi kju ̱ awa ,

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: ata ikjawa ̱ julu ra , ka iwa ̱ Säkekewa Jesús nu ̱ l ko ̱ ne kuna .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Ñerä je te ijewa male ̱ che ̱ kajali ra , ñawäsaka jäiyi wa bol ñajaklaka ̱ ijewa wäja ̱ mi ñapajiele wäñileka ̱ olóo .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Jera ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ wäbuacha ̱ wa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ . Jera je jäiyi wa te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas te yi rä kseka yuleke ̱ dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na rä na ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Ka je kuna ji ̱ a jiska , ata ije shki ̱ naka ̱ ni . Bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no ikatke ji ̱ a Galilea ska ra jiräni iwa ̱ iyile bas ia ̱ rä jeska .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Ite isha rä ditsä yäbei shena ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ditsä yakeila wa jula na wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi , ata tres día ra shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Jekjepa ijewa je ̱ r ja ̱ na iwa ̱ iyile ska .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Jera sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska ijewa bitejuluni te je biköle bata shani once wa ia ̱ , ñakäi isaka kalabe ia ̱ .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Jewa rä María Magdala wa irä , Juana irä , María Jacobo a ̱ mi irä , isaka tso ̱ ña ijewa ra irä ; jewa ne te ji o ̱ na bata sha Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ia ̱ rä .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Ata ijewa ia ̱ iktä ssër ka wata käi , je ki ̱ ka ka iwa ̱ iktä kolone kuna .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Jeiräta Pedro je ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ tu ̱ lee sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska . Jera iwätka ija ̱ r su ̱ ak ra , ite ibuträklä ebä su ̱ a . Jera ibiteju ̱ ni male ̱ te ̱ lewa ̱ jekäi ji o ̱ na te .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Ñerä je día ebä wà ijewa sha ̱ bol dami jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne kinak Emaús nika , je rä Jerusalén ska ra once kilómetro käi .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Jewa te ji o ̱ na biköle pake rami ñaia ̱ .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te ipake rami , iñawächakewa ̱ rami ra , Jesús wakei je ̱ k sikawa ̱ shkamiña ijewa ra .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Ata ijewa yika irä blelewa ̱ , ka iwäna ijuenaklä yi irä käi .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Je rä jibä pake rami bas te ñaia ̱ jí bas dami ra rä na ? Jera ijewa ñawäkukacha ̱ wa ̱ je ̱ r ialecha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Jekäi ijewa ekla kie Cleofas ni te ikúka te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ka ̱ etkä wa déle Jerusalén ska wa sha ̱ na , ba ebä ne wa ̱ ji o ̱ na jeska jí bala na ka ju ̱ ñer dä na ?

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jibä käi na ? Jekäi ijewa te ikúka : — Ñe Jesús Nazaret wa je ̱ . Ije rä jile bata shäk , jekäi Säkeklä wäna irä , ditsä biköle wäna irä ite ji wá ̱ rä täkili ta bäi si ̱ , ñakäi je te sa pakta rä täki ta bäi si ̱ .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Jekäi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , sá tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , jewa te iju ̱ aksa ̱ ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ kota ̱ nakwa ̱ , je wätiaka ̱ ite cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Ata sá te ibiketsa ije ne te sá Israel wa wetsemiksa ̱ rä . Ka je ebä kuna , ata jira je o ̱ na wa ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ kja tres día .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Ñakäi alaklä wa tso ̱ sá sha ̱ na jewa te sá male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ . Iminejulu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska , ka ̱ pañir dawa ̱ kja ra ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: jeska ka ijewa wa ̱ inu ̱ l ko ̱ ne ji ̱ a , jekäi idejuluni te isha ángel wa kjayina su ̱ a ite ; jewa te ishe ije katke rä kseka ni .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Je ukä ska sá sha ̱ moska mine sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska te iku ̱ a jishtä alaklä wa te isha käi , ata ka ijewa wa ̱ ije su ̱ ne .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Jera ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ka je ̱ r ta wa , ji yile jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ biköle je biketseke ̱ bas te bas je ̱ r ska rä je ̱ naapa .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ¿ Ka irä Säbäkäkksa ̱ shena ji shka ̱ l ssäk je io ̱ na käi na , ñakäi oloi kanakka ̱ ioloi wa na ?

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Jera ite ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a biköle kte yöle wa ̱ iwakei ktei pakale käi je wà . Je shami ite Moisés wa ̱ iyile skaté mine rämi jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyile ska .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Jera idemijulu jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne na mai ijewa mike ̱ ska ra , ije juer imaju ̱ ji ̱ a käi .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ikúka ji ̱ a te isha iia ̱ : — Ba käpöwa ̱ sá kjäka , ka ̱ miskla ka ̱ wä dewa ̱ kja rä ki ̱ ka . Jekäi iminewa ̱ ju ̱ ijewa kjäka käpäk .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Ñerä ije ̱ k baklawa ̱ yäkäk ra , ite pan kukawa ̱ . Jeki ̱ ika ̱ kia , kjepa je butsa ma ite ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Jekjepa ijewa wäji ̱ atkena , jera ijewa wäna ijuena ije irä . Ata jeskabä ra ka ijuene ji ̱ a ijewa wäna .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Jera ijewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — Ije ka ̱ pakä rami sa ra ña ̱ la wà ra , ñakäi ite sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ e rami kte yöle wa ra , ¿ ka irä sa ̱ je ̱ r ska issër balii wäkaleka ̱ käi na ?

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Jera je hora ebä wà iña jaka ̱ bitejulu deka ̱ ni Jerusalén ska , jeska ijewa te ale once wa ku ̱ a tapalewa ̱ isaka tso ̱ ira wa ra ñara ,

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: jera jewa te isha je bol wa ia ̱ : — ¡ Iyina si ̱ Säkekewa shki ̱ naka ̱ ni ! Ije ̱ k kjasha Simón ia ̱ .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Jera ijewa te ipaka ji o ̱ na ijewa ia ̱ ña ̱ la wà käi , ñakäi maikäi Jesús te pan butsa ra ijewa wäna ijuena yi irä käi .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ijewa te jekäi ipake rami ji ̱ a ra , plaa ra Jesús kaldu ijewa sha ̱ moska , te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ssënopa baa .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Jera ijewa male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i , isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i . Ijewa te ibiketsa wikblu iá ne su ̱ ete ijewa te rä ni .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Ata ije te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas male ̱ te ̱ nachawa ̱ rä na ? ¿ Jiye bas je ̱ r ska bas je ̱ rika jekäi rä na ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Jikäi yis jula su ̱ o , yis klä su ̱ o . Yis wakei si ̱ irä . Yis passö bas wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , wikblu iá rä ka yakata ka chichei ta , ata bas te yis su ̱ a yis dä yakata yis dä chichei ta .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Ite jekäi isha ra , ite ijula irä iklä irä kjasha ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Ata ka ijewa wa ̱ ikolone iyina ye . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa ssëna a ̱ naa ki ̱ ka , ñakäi imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka . Je ne ki ̱ ka Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas wa ̱ jile tso ̱ ñanak jiska na ?

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te nima kúkle kaku ma iia ̱ , ñakäi bul ña ma ite iia ̱ .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Jekäi ite ikukawa ̱ , je katá ite ijewa wäna .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jí ne yile yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ yis kaldu ji ̱ a bas da ra rä , ishena o ̱ nak biköle jishtä yis ktei yöle Moisés ka ̱ wei ki ̱ ka irä , jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ irä , Salmos ki ̱ ka irä te ishe rä käi .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa wäji ̱ atkewa ̱ ijewa je ̱ r na kte yöle däkläwa ̱ ,

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jikäi iyöle katke rä : Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä weikanak kjepa tres día ra shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ,

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: ñakäi iwakei kie wà sä ditsei wä kju ̱ awa wa biköle rä pauta ̱ nak säkätäba jí Jerusalén skami sa kiana ñamanewakksa ̱ sa ̱ nui janakläwa ̱ bitaba .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Jekäi bas dä je ji o ̱ na biköle su ̱ a bas te je pakäk wa .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Yis Ká kabla ji ma ̱ k , je patkemi yis te däkwa ̱ bas ja ̱ mi . Ata bas a ̱ ta ̱ no jí jukläyäkä ska täkili datse ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ je wà bas pajiena kje .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kia ja ̱ mi jukläyäkä ektaka marä Betania ska , jeska ije jula tkacha ̱ te ji bäi sha o ̱ nak ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Ñerä ite jekäi ji bäi sherami ji ̱ a ijewa ia ̱ ra , ije ̱ k bala butsa ijewa yika , kjepa iminetse ̱ mi ka ̱ jöir ska .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Jera ijewa te iwakei oloitsa e ̱ ná ra , iminejulu ni Jerusalén ka ssële a ̱ naa si ̱ .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Jera del ye ikajali Templo ska Säkeklä kjeishäk kte bäi wà . Amén .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Säkätä ra Kte ne tso ̱ rä . Je Kte katke rä Säkeklä ra , ñakäi je Kte rä Säkeklä .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Säkätä ra je katke rä Säkeklä ra .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Ije ne oloi ja ̱ mi ji biköle yöleksa ̱ rä . Ke ije kuna ra , ji tso ̱ yöleksa ̱ , je etka a ̱ ni ka yöneksa ̱ kuna .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Ije ne wa ̱ se ̱ ne kseka tso ̱ rä . Je se ̱ ne kseka rä ka ̱ oloi ye ditsä ia ̱ .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Je ka ̱ oloi ñirte ka ̱ tuil sha ̱ na , ata ka ̱ tuil ka tu ̱ neka ̱ iki ̱ ka .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
