text2: Ekla bakle patkele Säkeklä wa ̱ , je kie rä Juan .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Ije de rä ji su ̱ le iwa ̱ je ktei shäk ye , iwa ̱ je ka ̱ oloi ktei shäklä , je wà biköle wa ̱ je biketsäkläpa .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Ka ije rä je ka ̱ oloi kuna , ata ije de rä je ka ̱ oloi ktei shäk .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Je ka ̱ oloi , ale ditsä biköle ñiwa ̱ kka ̱ , je ne däke ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ jiska rä .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Je katke kja ka ̱ jiska , je ne oloi ja ̱ mi ka ̱ jiska yöleksa ̱ rä . Ata ka ̱ jiska wa wäna ka ijuene yi irä .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Ije de rä ji rä iwakei cha ska , ata iwakei ia ̱ wa wa ̱ ka ikinewa ̱ kuna .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Ata ikiäkwa ̱ wa , ñakäi ikie biketsäk wa , jewa ia ̱ ite ka ̱ ma ̱ idäkläwa ̱ Säkeklä yabala ye .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Ijewa ko ̱ na rä ka sa yabala ko ̱ rke ̱ pi ta käi wà kuna , sa yaka ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi wà kuna , jäiyi wa ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi wà kuna , ata ijewa ko ̱ na rä Säkeklä ne oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Je Kte manenaksa ̱ yaka ye , je se ̱ na sa ̱ sha ̱ na . Sá te iji wá ̱ baa su ̱ a tsa ̱ na , je iji wá ̱ baa je rä Sa Ká yaba eklabä je ne oloi . Ije rä je ̱ r bäi shäk ebä , kte si ̱ shäk ebä .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Je ktei sha Juan te täkii : “ Jí ne rä ale ktei yile yis wa ̱ ekla däkju ̱ yis itä ki ̱ ka , je ne kjaka ̱ ni yis tsa ̱ ta , ije rä yis yikaba ki ̱ ka ni rä . ”

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Ije wa ̱ ji biköle tso ̱ , je ja ̱ mi sä biköle ia ̱ ideksa ̱ . Ije je ̱ r bäi sha sa ̱ ia ̱ ra , jeska ki ̱ ta ije je ̱ r bäi sha ji ̱ a sa ̱ ia ̱ .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na rä Moisés oloi ja ̱ mi . Ata je ̱ r bäi she irä , ñakäi ji rä iyina si ̱ irä , je deksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ rä Jesucristo ne oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka Säkeklä rä su ̱ le kuna mik a ̱ ni , ata iyaba eklabä kalme yitälewa ̱ Sa Ká ja ̱ mi , je ne te ipaka sa ̱ ia ̱ rä .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Judío wa se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska wa te chui wa irä Leví wa irä patkami iwäki ̱ ichakäk iia ̱ : “ ¿ Yi ba rä na ? ” Jera jikäi Juan je ̱ k paka .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Ite ishaka ̱ bulee , ka iwa ̱ iblenewa ̱ . Ata bulee ite ishaka ̱ rä : — Ka yis dä Säbäkäkksa ̱ kuna .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jera yibä ba rä ? ¿ Ba rä Elías na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Ka yis dä je kuna . — ¿ Jera ba ne rä ale jile bata shäk rä na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Kai .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Yibä ba rä na ? Sá ki ̱ ishena ju ̱ ñenak sá patkäkté wa ia ̱ yinak . Jera ¿ jiräni ba je ̱ k pakämi rä na ?

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Jera ite isha : — Yis ne rä ekla a ̱ nak ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska rä . Je te ishe : ‘ Ña ̱ la paruöksa ̱ Säkekewa yika ’ , jishtä Isaías jile bata shäk wa ̱ iyile rä käi .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Je iwächakewa ̱ k wa rä patkele fariseo wa wa ̱ .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Jewa te iwächakewa ̱ ni jikäi : — Jera ka ba rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ kuna , Elías kuna , ale jile bata shäk kuna ra , jera ¿ jiye ba te sä wäukewe ̱ ke ̱ rä na ?

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Jera Juan te jewa kúka te isha : — Yis te sä wäukewe ̱ ke ̱ diklä wà , ata ekla ka bas wa ̱ ju ̱ ñele kuna je kaldu bas sha ̱ na .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Je ne rä ale daju ̱ ji ̱ a yis itäka rä , ata ka yis dä bäi kuna isandalia wämu ̱ aklä wäyäkksa ̱ bä jibä .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Je o ̱ na rä Jordán a ̱ mi kata Betania ska . Je ke ̱ i kje ra Juan te sä wäukewe ̱ te jeska .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Bulirishtä ra Juan te Jesús su ̱ a idaju ̱ iwäki ̱ . Jera ite isha ditsä ia ̱ : “ ¡ Issö , a ̱ mi ne rä Säkeklä Oveja yaba , ka ̱ jiska wa te ji yakei wakble nui tsa ̱ k ju ̱ ami rä !

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Je ne rä ale yis wa ̱ ktei yile : ‘ Yis itä ki ̱ ka ekla däke ̱ ju ̱ , je ne kjaka ̱ ni yis tsa ̱ ta , ije rä yis yikaba ki ̱ ka ni rä . ’

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Yis wa ̱ ka iju ̱ ñer ije ne irä , ata yis dewa ̱ sä wäukewa ̱ k diklä na rä ije kjayinaklä Israel wa ia ̱ . ”

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Jera Juan te Jesús ktei sha jikäi : — Yis te Säkeklä wikblu dawa ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ jöir namala käi su ̱ a , se ̱ ná iki ̱ ka .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ije ne irä , ata Säkeklä yis patkäk sä wäukewa ̱ k diklä na je wa ̱ iyile yis ia ̱ : “ Yi ja ̱ mi ba te isu ̱ e Säkeklä Wikblu dawa ̱ ju ̱ se ̱ nak iki ̱ ka ra , je ne rä sä wäukewa ̱ k Wikblu Sikina wà rä . ”

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Jekäi yie isu ̱ a , ñakäi yis te iktei she ije ne rä Säkeklä yaba rä .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Bulirishtä ra Juan kalduni jeska iwa ̱ dulanak wa bol da ,

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: jera ite Jesús su ̱ a idamaju ̱ , jera Juan te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¡ Issö , a ̱ mi ne rä Säkeklä Oveja yaba rä !

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Je iwa ̱ dulanak wa bol te je ssa ra , iminejulumi Jesús itä ki ̱ .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ k manewa ̱ té te isu ̱ a ra idajulu iitä ki ̱ . Jera ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Ji shena bas ki ̱ rä ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Rabí , ¿ mai ba katke rä ? ( Je wà rä Sapaktäk ) .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Sä shkä isu ̱ ak . Jera ijewa minemi te mai ska ikatke rä su ̱ a . Jera ka ̱ wä rä las cuatro käi . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa se ̱ na ji ̱ a ira je ke ̱ i ska .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Je Juan wa ̱ iyile je ssäk wa bol minele Jesús da , jewa ekla kie rä Andrés ni . Je rä Simón Pedro el .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Jekäi säkätäba Andrés te iel Simón ku ̱ a , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Sá te Mesías ku ̱ a . ( Je wà rä Cristo ) .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Jera Andrés te Simón kia tsa ̱ mi Jesús wäki ̱ . Je su ̱ a Jesús te ra , jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Ba rä Simón , Jonás yaba , ata ba kirmi rä Cefas ni . ( Je kte wà rä Pedro ) .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Bulirishtä ra Jesús te ibiketsaksa ̱ minak Galilea ke ̱ i ska . Jera ite Felipe ku ̱ a . Jekäi ite isha iia ̱ : — Sä shkä yis da .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Je Felipe rä Betsaida wa . Je jukläyäkä ska Andrés irä Pedro irä se ̱ r dä .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Jekäi Felipe te Natanael ku ̱ a ra , ite isha iia ̱ : — Ekla ktei yöle Moisés wa ̱ ka ̱ wei ska , ñakäi ktei yöle jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ , je wakei ku ̱ a sá te . Je rä ale José yaba , Jesús Nazaret wa .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Jera Natanael te isha : — ¿ Jibä bäi je dar Nazaret ska na ? Jera Felipe te ikúka : — Sä shkä isu ̱ ak .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Ñerä Jesús te Natanael daju ̱ iwäki ̱ su ̱ a ra , ite isha : — Isu ̱ o , a ̱ mi daju ̱ rä Israel wa si ̱ , ka irä sä wäyuäk kuna .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Jera Natanael te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Mai ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le na ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ka Felipe wa ̱ ba kirba ra , jera yis te ma su ̱ a ba kalme higuera niki ̱ na .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Jera Natanael te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Rabí , ba ne rä Säkeklä yaba rä . Ba ne rä Israel wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Yie isha yis te ba su ̱ a higuera niki ̱ na , ¿ je kju ̱ ei ba te yis biketsa na ? Ata je tsa ̱ ta ba te jile su ̱ emi ji ̱ a .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Ñakäi ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Bas te ka ̱ jöir su ̱ emi kjä bukleju ̱ mi , ñakäi Säkeklä ángel wa marka ̱ , darwa ̱ ditsä yäbei bata ki ̱ , je su ̱ emi bas te .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Tres día ra jula kolone diei yana Caná Galilea ska . Jera jeska Jesús a ̱ mi katke .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Ñakäi Jesús irä iwa ̱ dulanak wa irä kina jula kolone ki ̱ su ̱ ak .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Ñerä vino e ̱ nawa ̱ . Jekäi Jesús a ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Vino e ̱ nawa ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , ¿ jiye ba te yis ia ̱ je she na ? Ka yis ke ̱ i däwa ̱ ba .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Jera ia ̱ mi te isha jeska kjanaklä wa ia ̱ : — Ji sheke ̱ ije te bas ia ̱ käi , iwo ̱ bas ku ̱ .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Jeska jak yöle diklä bläklä jui ye kajali seis . Je diklei rä Judío wa ñasikitewa ̱ klä iwädular käi . Je diklä jui na diklä kjäwa ̱ rä cincuenta litro käi , setenta litro käi ekla ekla .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te isha kjanaklä wa ia ̱ : — Je diklä bläklä na diklä tiö tulöka ̱ pshi pshii . Jera ijewa te itia ina pshi pshii .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Iyäköka ̱ tso ̱ mi iwatiäk tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ . Jera ijewa te itsa ̱ mi iia ̱ .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Ñerä je te diklä ialewa ̱ vino ye ya ssa ra , ka iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer maka je tsöna , ata kjanaklä wa tso ̱ iwayäkäk wa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer . Jera ite jäiyi jula kolonak kiaté .

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Bena te sä tieke ̱ säkätä rä vino bäi si ̱ shtä wà , ata ijewa te iya kja ta ̱ i ra , jekjepa ite vino ka bäi si ̱ kuna shtä tse ̱ ke ̱ ksa ̱ . Ata ba te vino bäi si ̱ shtä tsa ̱ ta ̱ na watenak jí kjepa .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Je ne rä säkätä Jesús te ji wa ̱ mi kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä ye . Je wá ̱ ite Caná Galileaka . Je wà ite ioloi kjasha ditsä ia ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka iwa ̱ dulanak wa te ije biketsa .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ Jesús bitewa ̱ ju ̱ ia ̱ mi ra , iel wa ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra , demi Capernaúmka . Jeska ijewa se ̱ na ka ta ̱ i kuna .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ Judío wa wa ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä . Jekäi Jesús mineju ̱ däkka ̱ Jerusalénka .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Jera Templo ska buey käi , oveja käi , namala käi watju ̱ ak wa tso ̱ , ñakäi inaklä manewa ̱ k wa tso ̱ ñajäklelecha ̱ wa ̱ , jewa ku ̱ a Jesús te .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Jera ksa simana butra ite ksabata ye . Jekjepa je wà ite biköle patka tulaksa ̱ Templo ektaka , ovejaje , bueyje ; ñakäi inaklä mia ̱ ju ̱ ami ite imanewa ̱ k wa yika , ñakäi mesa manewa ̱ tulami ite .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Jekäi ite isha namala watju ̱ ak wa ia ̱ : — Jiska jí wa jömi , ke bas ku ̱ yis Ká ju iawa ̱ wa ̱ jile watju ̱ aklä jui ye .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Jera Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa je ̱ r ja ̱ na iyöle katke etka ska , je te ishe rä : “ Yis te bä ju kju ̱ eitketse itjä ka yis täkili ta ji ̱ a kje . ”

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Jera Judío wa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Jibä kjashemi ba te kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä sá wäna ba ia ̱ ka ̱ wä tso ̱ jekäi iwa ̱ klä rä na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Jí Templo mio ̱ tköwa ̱ bas ku ̱ , jera tres día ra yie iyuemika ̱ ni .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Judío wa te ikúka : — Jí ju yöle cuarenta y seis año kje , jera ¿ maikäi ba ia ̱ je yörmika ̱ ni tres día ebä ra rä na ?

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Ata je Templo ja ̱ mi rä iwakei yaka ne sha ite .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Jesús shki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ra , jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa je ̱ r ja ̱ na iwa ̱ je ktei yileba ska . Jekjepa kte yöle irä , Jesús wa ̱ iyile irä , je kuka ijewa te iyina si ̱ ye .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Ñerä Jesús kalme Jerusalén ska Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä bala na ra , ite ji we ̱ ke ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä ye je su ̱ a chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te . Jekäi ijewa te ije kie biketsa .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Ata ka Jesús wäyöne ijewa ia ̱ , jishtä ijewa biköle je ̱ rikä rä ju ̱ ñer iwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Ka ije ki ̱ yi a ̱ ni shene sa ̱ je ̱ rike pakäk ije ia ̱ , ije wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer kja ji tso ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ska käi ki ̱ ka .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Judío wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ekla , je rä fariseo wa kie rä Nicodemo ni .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Tuina je deju ̱ Jesús wäki ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — Rabí , sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba patkeleté rä Säkeklä wa ̱ sa paktäk ye . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ba te ji we ̱ ke ̱ kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä ye je ka o ̱ nak yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , ka ije ra Säkeklä kaldu kuna ra .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ma ia ̱ , ka sa ̱ ko ̱ neni spa ̱ na ra , ka sa ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno su ̱ nak .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Jera Nicodemo te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Maikäi sä dewa ̱ säkibii ra je ko ̱ rni rä na ? ¿ Jera je dämiwa ̱ ni etäbä kicha ia ̱ mi ska ko ̱ nakni na ?

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ma ia ̱ ; ka sa ̱ ko ̱ ne diklä ja ̱ mi , ñakäi Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi ra , ka sä däkwa ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ja ̱ mi .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Sa ̱ ko ̱ le ditsä ja ̱ mi , je rä yaka iá . Ata sa ̱ ko ̱ le Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi , je rä wikblu iá .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Ke ba male ̱ te ̱ na yie isha : ‘ Bas kiana ko ̱ nakni spa ̱ na ’ , je yika .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ r maka ima käi . Ba te je bular ssë , ata ka ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai idar , mai imar . Je su ̱ ta biköle sa ̱ ko ̱ le Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi wa rä .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Jera Nicodemo te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Maikäi je o ̱ r na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ba rä Israel wa paktäk , ata ¿ ka ba wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer na ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ba ia ̱ ; ji ju ̱ ñer sá wa ̱ je pakeke ̱ sá te , ji su ̱ le sá wa ̱ je ktei sheke ̱ sá te , ata ka bas je ̱ r ssëne je sá te iktei sheke ̱ kukäkwa ̱ kte si ̱ ye .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Yis te ji pake bas ia ̱ ka ̱ jiska ji tso ̱ ja ̱ mi , je ka kuke bas te kte si ̱ ye ra , yis me ji pakä bas ia ̱ ka ̱ jöir ji tso ̱ ja ̱ mi ra , ¿ maikäi bas ia ̱ je kolor kte si ̱ ye na ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: “ Yi a ̱ ni ka deleka ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska . Ata ale biteleju ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska je ebä , je rä ditsä yäbei .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Jekäi jishtä Moisés wa ̱ tkäbe me ̱ i tkeleka ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo sha ̱ na , je su ̱ ta ditsä yäbei kiana tkenaka ̱ rä ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: je rä yi te ije biketsa ra , jewa biköle se ̱ nakläni jekjeye .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: “ Iwa rä Säkeklä wa ̱ ka ̱ jiska wa shka ̱ l e ̱ e ̱ na , ite iyaba eklabä ma ̱ ksa ̱ kje . Je rä yi te ije biketsa ra , jewa biköle ka weikanacha ̱ kläwa ̱ kuna , ata jewa se ̱ naklä jekjeye .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Jekäi ka Säkeklä wa ̱ iyaba patkeneté ka ̱ jiska rä ka ̱ jiska wa ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ buka ̱ nak kuna , ata je rä ka ̱ jiska wa tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ ije oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: “ Yi te ije biketsa ra ka je rä ktei wabitsaleksa ̱ buka ̱ nak kuna , ata yi wa ̱ ka ije biketsane ra , je rä ktei wabiketsaleksa ̱ e ̱ ná buka ̱ nak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka iwa ̱ Säkeklä yaba eklabä kie biketsane kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Jikäi ijewa ktei wabiketsanaksa ̱ rä . Ka ̱ oloi dewa ̱ ka ̱ jiska sa ̱ sha ̱ na . Ata ijewa wäbatsa ka ̱ tuil wà rä je ka ̱ oloi tsa ̱ ta , ijewa te ji wakbleke ̱ yakei ki ̱ ka .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Iwa rä biköle ji yakei wakbläk wa te je ka ̱ oloi dokoitseke ̱ , ñakäi ka je je ̱ k yitäwa ̱ je ka ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi . Je rä ite ji yakei we ̱ ke ̱ ka je juenaklä ye .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Ata se ̱ nak ji rä iyina si ̱ ja ̱ mi wa ñayitäke ̱ wa ̱ je ka ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi , ijuenaklä ji we ̱ ke ̱ ite rä Säkeklä oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ Jesús irä iwa ̱ dulanak wa irä dejulu Judea ke ̱ i ska . Jeska ise ̱ na ji ̱ a ijewa ra . Jekäi ditsä wäukewa ̱ ite .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Jera ñakäi Juan te sä wäukewe ̱ te Enón ska , je rä Salim ska ra alemana , jeska diklä tso ̱ ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ditsä däke ̱ ta ̱ i wäoka ̱ nak .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , je ke ̱ i ska ka Juan jierwa ̱ ba sä wätiäklä ska .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Ñerä Juan wa ̱ dulanak wa irä Judío wa ekla irä , jewa kju ̱ atka ñara je ̱ k siki tewe ̱ ktei bata ki ̱ ka .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Jekäi jewa demijulu Juan wäki ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — Rabí , ale shkele ba ra Jordán a ̱ mi kata ktei yile ba wa ̱ , ñera je te sä wäukewe ̱ kate . Jebä ja ̱ mi biköle marmi .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Jera Juan te ikúka : — Ke ji me ̱ nopa ka ̱ jöir skaté ra , yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka ji däkksa ̱ .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Bas wakwa ia ̱ iyirmi jiräni yie isha käi , ka yis dä Säbäkäkksa ̱ kuna , ata yis dä patkele ije wätsa ̱ kba .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Dulaklei jula kolonak busi ra , je ne ia ̱ je busi rä däkksa ̱ rä . Jekäi je dulaklei tsa ̱ tkäk kaldu te iktä ssa ra , jera issërke ̱ a ̱ naa , iktä ssërke ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jekäi jira yis ssëna a ̱ naawa ̱ .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Ije oloi kiana kanakka ̱ jöikwäta , ata yis oloi kiana ja ̱ nakwa ̱ wakwäta .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Ale dar ka ̱ jöir je rä biköle tsa ̱ ta . Ata yi datse ̱ ka ̱ jiska je rä ka ̱ jiska wa ebä , ñakäi iktäke ̱ rä ka ̱ jiska ji tso ̱ ja ̱ mi . Ale dar ka ̱ jöir ska je rä biköle tsa ̱ ta .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Iwakei wa ̱ ji su ̱ le iwakei wa ̱ ji ssële , je ktei sheke ̱ ite . Ata ije wa ̱ ktei yinak je ka kuke yi te kte si ̱ ye .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Ata yi te ije wa ̱ ktei yinak kuka kte si ̱ ye ra , je wà ijuena ite ibiketse Säkeklä ktä rä iyina si ̱ .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je patkeleté Säkeklä wa ̱ je te rä Säkeklä ktä she . Je rä Säkeklä te iwikblu me ̱ ke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ka mablenak kje ki ̱ ka .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Sa Ká wa ̱ iyaba shka ̱ l , jekäi ite ji biköle ju ̱ aksa ̱ ije ia ̱ iwa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Yi te iyaba biketsa ra , je se ̱ rmi jekjeye . Ata yi wa ̱ ka iyaba ktä ssëne ra , je ka se ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ata je ra Säkeklä kju ̱ atkämiwa ̱ .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Iyirke ̱ Säkekewa te sä kukete iwa ̱ dulanak wa ye , ite jewa wäukewe ̱ te Juan cha wäukewa ̱ te tsa ̱ ta . Je yirke ̱ ssa fariseo wa te ( ata ka Jesús si ̱ wa ̱ sä wäoka ̱ ne kuna , ata iwa ̱ dulanak wa te . ) Ñerä Jesús te je ju ̱ ña ra ,

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: jera ite Judea jawa ̱ ta ̱ na mineju ̱ etäbä kicha däkmini Galileaka .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Ije ka ̱ wä ta kjäkju ̱ Samaria ke ̱ i wà .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Jekäi idemi jukläyäkä tso ̱ etka Samaria ke ̱ i ki ̱ kie Sicar ni ska . Je rä alemana ka ̱ me ̱ le mikle Jacob wa ̱ iyaba José ia ̱ ska .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Jeska ishäkä ja ̱ r bile Jacob wa ̱ diklä talanaklä . Ñerä Jesús demi shtirinawa ̱ je ̱ tkawa ̱ je kjä ki ̱ ka . Jera ka ̱ wä rä las doce kjena .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Jera alaklä ekla Samaria wa deju ̱ té diklä wayäkäk . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Diklä mo ̱ ' sia ̱ ' swa ̱ yanak .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Ata jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa minemi jukläyäkäka ñanak tju ̱ ak .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Jera je Samaria wa te ikúka : — ¿ Ba rä Judío wa , ata yis dä alaklä Samaria wa , maikäi je ia ̱ ba te diklä kie yanak na ? Je sha ite rä , ka jiye kuna ta , Judío wa irä , Samaria wa irä , jewa rä ka däkwa ̱ kuna ñaska .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñelewa ̱ kuna ji tso ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ me ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ , ñakäi yi te ma ia ̱ isheke ̱ diklä mo ̱ ' sia ̱ rä ra , je ia ̱ ba te ikiemi , jera ije te ba ia ̱ diklä kseka me ̱ mi .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Jera je alaklä te ikúka : — Säkekewa , je diklä ja ̱ r dä ka ̱ mii , ñakäi ka ba wa ̱ ji kuna iwayäkäkläka ̱ . ¿ Mai jera ba te je diklä kseka tse ̱ na ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Ata ¿ ba rä sá ká Jacob tsa ̱ ta na ? Ije te jí diklä talanaklä biata ̱ na sá ia ̱ . Je ya ije te , iyabala te , ibewak te .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Jí diklä yäk wa biköle je ̱ r bármi ni ,

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: ata yi te diklä me ̱ ke ̱ yie je ya ra , ka je je ̱ r bának ji ̱ a mik a ̱ ni . Jekäi je diklä me ̱ ke ̱ yie je tsikirmi ije ja ̱ rka jöikwä jöikwä , ije se ̱ naklä kseka jekjeye .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Jera je alaklä te isha : — Säkekewa , je diklä mo ̱ ' sia ̱ ka yis je ̱ r bánaklä ji ̱ a , ñakäi ka yis däklä ji ̱ a jiska diklä wayäkäk .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Ma cho ̱ ma se ̱ naklä kiäk , jekäi bä bitäni .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Ñerä je alaklä te ikúka : — Ka yis dä se ̱ naklä ta . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Bäi ba te isha rä , ka yis dä se ̱ naklä ta ni .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Ma wa ̱ ibakle cinco , ata jira ma wa ̱ itso ̱ je rä ka ma se ̱ naklä si ̱ kuna . Jekäi ba te isha rä iyina si ̱ .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Jekäi je ssa je alaklä te ra , jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , yie issa ra , ba rä jile bata shäk .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Sá ká wa mikle wa te Säkeklä oloitsa rä jí ka ̱ tsä bata ska , ata bas te ishe Säkeklä oloitsäklä ke ̱ i rä Jerusalén ska ebä .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , yis ktä kukö . Ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a bas wa ̱ Sa Ká oloitsäklä ka jí ka ̱ tsä ska kuna , ñakäi ka Jerusalén ska kuna .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Bas ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne jibä oloitseke ̱ bas te rä ia ̱ , ata sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jibä oloitseke ̱ sá te rä . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ datse ̱ rä Judío wa ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Ike ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a , jira je dewa ̱ kja , Säkeklä oloitsäk si ̱ wa wa ̱ Sa Ká oloitsäklä iwikblu wà , ñakäi iwa ̱ ioloitsäklä si ̱ . Sa Ká te jekäi ioloitsäk wa ne yuleke ̱ rä .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Säkeklä rä wikblu iá . Je ki ̱ ka ioloitsäk wa kiana ioloitsäk rä wikblu wà , ñakäi ioloitsäk si ̱ .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Jera je alaklä te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Mesías däju ̱ , ale kinak Cristo ni . Mika ̱ je deju ̱ ra , ije te sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ji biköle wà .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Yis ne irä , je ne ktä kaldu ba ra rä .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Jera ñawäsaka iwa ̱ dulanak wa dejuluni . Jera iktäte alaklä ra te ijewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ . Ata yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka ichakane : “ ¿ Ji sherke ̱ ba ki ̱ rä ? ” “ ¿ Jiye ba ka ̱ pakäke ̱ ije ra rä ? ”

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Jekäi alaklä te iu ̱ yaka wi ̱ duacha ̱ ta ̱ na . Jekäi imineju ̱ jukläyäkä na . Jera ite isha ditsä ia ̱ :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: — Sä shkä ekla su ̱ ak . Ji biköle wakblele yis wa ̱ je sha tulaka ̱ ni ite yis ia ̱ . Je rä le Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Jekäi je jukläyäkä ska ditsä bitejulu Jesús su ̱ ak .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Je dälei ja ̱ mi ra iwa ̱ dulanak wa te isha iia ̱ : — Rabí , bä yäkö .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Yis wa ̱ ji tso ̱ ñanak ka ju ̱ ñer bas wa ̱ .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te isha ñaia ̱ : — Bäräle yilé wa ̱ jile de iia ̱ iwa ̱ ñanak .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Yis patkäkté ki ̱ ji shena o ̱ nak je we ̱ irä , ji me ̱ le iwa ̱ yis ia ̱ o ̱ nak je e ̱ newe ̱ wa ̱ irä , je ne rä yis ia ̱ ra ñanak käi rä .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: ¿ Ka irä bas te ishe : ‘ Däli tiäklä ke ̱ i sher ji ̱ a rä cuatro mes ’ na ? Ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas wätkö däli tkele ki ̱ su ̱ ak , iälinawa ̱ kja suruu tenak .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Itiäk wa to ̱ rte ̱ kja . Jekäi ijewa te iwä se ̱ nak jekjeye shtä tapawe ̱ kate . Je rä itkäk irä itiäk irä jewa ssënaklä a ̱ naa ñara .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Je rä jishtä ishe käi : ‘ Ekla rä itkäk , isaka rä itiäk . ’ Je rä iyina si ̱ .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Jekäi yis te bas patka däli tiäk , mai bas wakwa ka shka ̱ blele kuna shtä ska . Kju ̱ awa wa shka ̱ bla kja , ata jira bas dewa ̱ ña ijewa ra shka ̱ bläk .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Jekäi je jukläyäkä ska Samaria wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te Jesús biketsa je alaklä te ji paka ijewa ia ̱ ki ̱ ka . Ije te iktei sha rä jikäi : “ Ji biköle wakblele yis wa ̱ je shani ite yis ia ̱ . ”

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Je Samaria wa demi Jesús wäki ̱ ra , jewa te ikuka ji ̱ a se ̱ nak iwakwa sha ̱ na . Jekäi ise ̱ na jeska ka ̱ böiki .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa pakta oloi ja ̱ mi ditsä saka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ibiketsa .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ ijewa te isha je alaklä ia ̱ : — Jira sá te ije biketsa , ka irä ba te isha ebä ki ̱ ka kuna , ata sá wakwa te ije ktä ssa ki ̱ ka . Je wà sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer iyina si ̱ ije ne rä ka ̱ jiska wa tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ rä .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Dos día deka ̱ ra , jeska Jesús mineju ̱ mi däkmini Galileaka .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iwakei wa ̱ iyile rä : “ Jile bata shäk rä ka dälätsalewa ̱ kuna iwakei ke ̱ i ska . ”

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Idemi Galilea ke ̱ i ska ra , Galilea wa te ikiawa ̱ je ̱ r baa wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Jesús te ji wá ̱ saka saka Jerusalén ska ike ̱ i kjewe ̱ sha ̱ na je su ̱ a ijewa te , ijewa dasta ̱ naña ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Jekäi Jesús demini Caná Galilea ska , ale iwa ̱ diklä ialewa ̱ vino ye ska . Jekäi Capernaúm ska sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ekla yaba jäiyi duärawa ̱ .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Jera ije te iju ̱ ña Jesús biteju ̱ té Judea ska deni Galilea ska ra , imineju ̱ mi Jesús yuläk . Jekäi ite ikia pjoo minak iyaba bäiwa ̱ kni , yëë iduärawa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha je sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ia ̱ : — Ke bas ku ̱ jile o ̱ le kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä ye irä , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä irä , je su ̱ opa ra , ka bas wa ̱ yis biketsanak kuna .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Jera je sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k te ikúka : — Säkekewa , sä shkä ka yis yaba duäwa ̱ ba yika .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ ni . Ba yaba se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a . Jera ije te Jesús ktä kuka iyina si ̱ . Jekäi imineju ̱ mini .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Jera bulirishtä idamiju ̱ ji ̱ a ra , ikjanaklä wa bite iña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k . Jekäi ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ba yaba kalme ji ̱ a kseka .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Jera ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bikö ka ̱ wä ra ija ̱ lmanani rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Yiki la una ipatse ̱ nani rä .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Jera iká je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite je hora ne ska Jesús te isha iia ̱ : “ Ba yaba se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a ” ni rä . Je ne ki ̱ ka ije te Jesús biketsa , ñakäi iju ska tso ̱ kalabe te .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Je ne rä Jesús te ji wá ̱ idäkläka ̱ botäbä kicha ijuenaklä ye Galilea ska , itso ̱ Judeaka deni ra rä .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ Judío wa wa ̱ jile ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je dewa ̱ ni . Jekäi Jesús mineju ̱ mi däkka ̱ Jerusalén ska .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Je jukläyäkä kjätkeleksa ̱ kjäshtäklä etka kie Oveja ni , jeska diklä talanaklä yöle tso ̱ je kie Hebreo wa ktä wà rä Betesda ni . Je kjä ja ̱ mi ju jarbe tso ̱ yöle cinco .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Je niki ̱ na duë ta wa tso ̱ tapalewa ̱ ta ̱ i diklä wäbuka ̱ nake ̱ ki ̱ ssäk : ka wä wajuenak kuna wa käi , klä ialewa ̱ wa käi , karalewa ̱ wa käi .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , maiskale maiskale ra , ángel bitäke ̱ ju ̱ té te diklä wäkpeke ̱ . Jekäi je diklä wäbuka ̱ nake ̱ ukä ska yi je ̱ k ja ̱ wa ̱ cha ̱ ba säkätä ija ̱ rka ra , jera mane shtä duë te ikteke ̱ käi je rä bäinakni .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Jeska jäiyi ekla kalme . Je duaté treinta y ocho año kje .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Je kalme su ̱ a Jesús te ra , ite iju ̱ ña mikle iduaté rä . Jera ite ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Ba ki ̱ ishena ma me bäirpa na ?

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Jera je duë ta te ikúka : — Säkekewa , diklä wäbuka ̱ nake ̱ ra ka yis wa ̱ yi kuna yis tsa ̱ kmiwa ̱ diklä na , ata yis je ̱ käke ̱ ka ̱ minakwa ̱ diklä na ra , jera kju ̱ awa ebä kjäke ̱ wa ̱ yis wätsa ̱ kba .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma je ̱ katashuäklä kuköwa ̱ , bä shkömi .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka ibäinani . Jekäi ite ije ̱ katashuäklä kukawa ̱ , shkami . Ata je o ̱ na rä sábado wà .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Judío wa te isha je bäinani ia ̱ : — Jir dä sábado . Ka ka ̱ kuna bä je ̱ katashuäklä tsa ̱ klämi .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Jera ije te ikúka : — Ñera yis bäiwa ̱ k ne te yis ia ̱ isha : ‘ Bä je ̱ katashuäklä köka ̱ , ma cho ̱ ni rä . ’

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — ¿ Yi te ma ia ̱ isha : ‘ Bä käpäklä köka ̱ , ma cho ̱ ’ ni rä na ?

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Ata je bäinani wa ̱ ka iju ̱ ñer yi irä . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Jesús je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ jeska ditsä tso ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ sha ̱ na .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Jarere shtä ra Jesús te je bäinani ku ̱ ani Templo ska . Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Issö , bä bäinani , ata ke ba ku ̱ ji yakei wakbla ji ̱ a , ka jile e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ o ̱ naklä bä ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Jekäi imine te Judío wa ia ̱ ishani Jesús ne te ibäiwa ̱ ni rä .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Je bata ki ̱ ka Judío wa te Jesús weikami , sábado wà ite jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ kju ̱ ei .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Jekäi Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis Ká shka ̱ blä kate ji ̱ a . Jekäi yis shka ̱ blä kate ñaebä .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Je kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ta ijewa te Jesús ktaklewa ̱ . Ka je rä ite iwá ̱ sábado ukä ja ̱ mi ebä ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä ñakäi ite isha Säkeklä rä iKá ki ̱ ka . Je wà ije ̱ k sha irä Säkeklä ra ñaebä ni .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , Säkeklä yaba je wakei ia ̱ ka ji o ̱ nak , ata iKá te ji we ̱ ke ̱ je su ̱ eke ̱ ije te , je ja ̱ mi ebä ije te ji we ̱ ke ̱ . Jekäi ji we ̱ ke ̱ iKá te käi , ñaebä je we ̱ ke ̱ iyaba te .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iKá wa ̱ iyaba shka ̱ l ta ̱ i . Jekäi ji we ̱ ke ̱ ite je kjasheke ̱ ite iyaba ia ̱ . Ata ji o ̱ le iwa ̱ je tsa ̱ ta iKá te ikjashemi iyaba ia ̱ iwa ̱ o ̱ nak . Je te tsi bas male ̱ che ̱ che ̱ wa ̱ .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Maikäi iKá te sa ̱ shki ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ ni sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka je su ̱ ta iyaba te se ̱ ne kseka me ̱ ke ̱ yi ia ̱ issëna ima ̱ k käi .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Jekäi ñakäi iKá wa ̱ ka yi a ̱ ni ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ , ata iyaba ne kuka ite sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ rä .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Je rä biköle wa ̱ iyaba oloitsäklä jishtä ijewa te iKá oloitse käi . Ata manele wa ̱ ka iyaba oloitsane ra , je wa ̱ ñakäi ka iKá ipatkäkté oloitsane .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: “ Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ : Yi te yis ktä ssa ra , ñakäi yis patkäkté biketsa ra , je se ̱ rmi jekjeye . Ka je rä ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ kuna buka ̱ nak , ata je rä deleksa ̱ duewa ̱ ska , baklewa ̱ ni se ̱ ne kseka ska .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ , jira je dewa ̱ kja , jeska dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa te Säkeklä yaba ktä ssëmi . Jekäi je ktä ssäk wa se ̱ rmi kseka .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Jishtä iKá se ̱ r je ̱ k oloi ja ̱ mi , je su ̱ ta ite ima ̱ iyaba ia ̱ ije se ̱ naklä je ̱ k oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Ñakäi ite ka ̱ wä ma ̱ iyaba ia ̱ iwa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ , je rä ditsä yäbei ki ̱ ka .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Ke bas male ̱ te ̱ na je ktei yika . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ jeska ra sa ̱ tso ̱ sä itäbiäklä ska biköle te ije ktä ssëmi .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Jekäi ijewa dämiksa ̱ . Sa ̱ se ̱ le wämo wa shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni se ̱ nak kseka ; ata sa ̱ se ̱ le yakei wa shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni buka ̱ nak .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: “ Ka yis ia ̱ jile o ̱ nak je ̱ r wà . Ata yis te issëke ̱ käi , je ja ̱ mi yie sä ktei wabiketseksa ̱ rä . Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te sä ktei wabiketseksa ̱ rä wämo ebä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä ka yis wakei ki ̱ ishene o ̱ nak käi kuna , ata jishtä yis patkäkté ki ̱ isherke ̱ o ̱ nak käi .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Ikuna yis wakei je ̱ k pakä ra , je rä ka iyina si ̱ kuna .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Ata yis ktei shäk rä kju ̱ awa . Jekäi yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je te yis ktei sheke ̱ rä iyina si ̱ .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Bas te yis ktei chakäk wa patkami Juan säwäukewa ̱ k wäki ̱ , jera ije te ji rä iyina si ̱ je ktei sha .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Ka yis ki ̱ yi sher kuna yis ktei shäk , ata yie jí sheke ̱ rä bas tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Juan bakle rä jishtä tsi ̱ ni wäkaleka ̱ oloo käi ka ̱ ñiwa ̱ k . Bas ssëna ssënak a ̱ naa ije oloika berbena bala na .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Ata jile tso ̱ yis ktei shäk Juan te yis ktei sha tsa ̱ ta . ¿ Ka je rä maikäi kuna ta ? Yis te iwe ̱ te jishtä Sa Ká te iju ̱ ata ̱ na yis wa ̱ o ̱ nak käi , je ne te ikjasheke ̱ Sa Ká wa ̱ yis patkeleté rä .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Jekäi Sa Ká yis patkäkté , je wakei te yis ktei sha . Ka bas wa ̱ ije rä ktä ssële kuna ; ñakäi ka bas wa ̱ iwakei rä su ̱ le kuna .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Ñakäi ka bas wa ̱ ije ktä kuna bas je ̱ r na del ye . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka bas wa ̱ ale patkeleté ije wa ̱ je biketsane ki ̱ ka .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Bas je ̱ k yuäke ̱ tsa ̱ na kte yöle wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas te ibiketse je kte oloi ja ̱ mi bas se ̱ rmi jekjeye . Jekäi je yöle te yis ne ktei sheke ̱ rä .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Ata ka bas ssëne däkwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi bas se ̱ naklä kseka .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: “ Ditsä te sä kjeisheke ̱ , ka je kiewa ̱ yie .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Ata yis wa ̱ bas ju ̱ ñer bäi bas je ̱ r ska ka bas wa ̱ Säkeklä shka ̱ l .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Yis de rä yis Ká kie ja ̱ mi , ata ka bas wa ̱ yis kinewa ̱ , ata yilé me bitäk iwakei kie ja ̱ mi ra , jera je kiemiwa ̱ bas te .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Ka bas ia ̱ yis biketsanak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas wakwa ñakjeishäke ̱ je kieke ̱ wa ̱ bas te , ata Säkeklä eklabä me sä kjeishäpa , ka je payule kuna bas te .

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Ke bas ku ̱ ibiketsa yie bas kjatiemi Sa Ká ia ̱ ni . Ata Moisés , ale bas wa ̱ biketsanak bäi si ̱ , je ne te bas kjatiemika ̱ rä .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Ata bas ku ̱ Moisés ktä kuköpa kte si ̱ ye ra , bas te yis ktä kukemi kte si ̱ ye . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Moisés te yis ne ktei yuata ̱ na rä .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Ata ka bas wa ̱ Moisés wa ̱ iyöle je kolone kte si ̱ ye kuna ra , ¿ maikäi bas ia ̱ yis ktä kolor kte si ̱ ye na ? ”

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ Jesús mineju ̱ mi Galilea tipei a ̱ mi kata , je tipä kie etkä rä Tiberias ni .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ dami ije itä ki ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te isu ̱ a ra Jesús te duë ta wa bäiwe ̱ raka ̱ ijuenaklä ye .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Jera Jesús mineka ̱ ka ̱ kichei ki ̱ , jeska ije ̱ tkawa ̱ iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Jera Judío wa wa ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je ke ̱ i sher ji ̱ a elkje .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Ñerä Jesús wäkaka ̱ ra , ite isu ̱ a chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ dar iwä ki ̱ . Jera ite ichaka Felipe ia ̱ : — ¿ Mai sa ̱ ma pan tju ̱ ak jí ditsä wa ̱ ñanak na ?

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Jesús te jekäi ichaka iia ̱ iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä jiräni iwa ̱ ikúkä ta í ̱ , ata iwakei wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer kja ji we ̱ mar ite käi .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Jera Felipe te ikúka : — Dosciento denario ka je däkka ̱ pan tju ̱ aklä me ̱ nak ijewa biköle ia ̱ kje berberiri a ̱ ni .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Ñerä Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa saka Andrés , je rä Simón Pedro el , je te isha Jesús ia ̱ :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: — Jiska dulaklei yaba kaldu wa ̱ cebada wä yöle pan ye shkä cinco , ñakäi nima botäbä , ata ¿ maikäi je kjela däksa ̱ je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ki ̱ ka na ?

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Ditsä pakö ñajäkläkwa ̱ . Jeska ka ̱ rä tala ebä , jekäi iñajaklawa ̱ . Jera jäiyi wa ebä däka ̱ rä cinco mil kjena .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te pan kukawa ̱ . Jera ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ , kjepa ite ibala butsa ma ̱ ditsä tso ̱ ñajäklelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ia ̱ . Je su ̱ ta ite nima bala butsa bikö ijewa ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Jera biköle ssënacha ̱ wa ̱ ra , Jesús te isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Iukäla a ̱ ta ̱ na je tapawo ̱ ni ka iweikanakläwa ̱ kuna a ̱ ni .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Jekäi cebada wä yöle pan ye cinco je ukäla ju ̱ leksa ̱ yäkäk wa wa ̱ je tapawa ̱ ni ijewa te , je te canasta pshiwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ doce .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te jekäi iwá ̱ kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä ye je su ̱ a ditsä te ra , ijewa te isha : — Iyina si ̱ ije ne rä ale jile bata shäk däke ̱ ka ̱ jiska rä .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Jesús je ̱ r na ide ditsä datse ̱ kja iwäki ̱ itsa ̱ kmi täkili wà kolonakwa ̱ ijewa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye . Je ki ̱ ka ije mineka ̱ ju ̱ ni eklabä ka ̱ bata ki ̱ ka .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ ra iwa ̱ dulanak wa minejulumini tipä kjä ska .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Jeska iñajiaka ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka minemi tipä a ̱ mi kata däkmi Capernaúm ska . Jera ka ̱ tuinawa ̱ kja yee , ata ka Jesús dajuena .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Ñerä si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ naté ta ̱ i te tipä tjuewa ̱ ka ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Ijewa te ko ̱ no ju ̱ e rami cinco seis kilómetro kjena ra , ijewa te isu ̱ a Jesús daju ̱ té tipä bata ki ̱ klä wà alemana ko ̱ no säkätä ja ̱ mi . Jekäi ijewa suanacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Jera ije te isha : — Yis ne irä , ke bas suana .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Jekäi ijewa ssëna bäi ikiäkwa ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka . Jera ñawäsaka idemi mai imike ̱ rä ska .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Bulirishtä ra je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa a ̱ ta ̱ nata ̱ na a ̱ mi kata ibitejulu ska , jewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra jebä ko ̱ no rä , ata ka je ki ̱ Jesús mataña iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra , ata ijewa ebä minemi iki ̱ ka rä .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Jera ko ̱ no saka dar Tiberias ska dejulu mai ale Säkekewa te wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ e ̱ ná ra , ijewa te pan ña ska .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Jekäi je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te isu ̱ a ra ka Jesús juena ji ̱ a jeska , ñakäi iwa ̱ dulanak wa ka juena ji ̱ a jeska , jera iñajiaka ̱ je ko ̱ no dejulu naka minejulumi Capernaúm ska Jesús yuläk .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Jewa te Jesús ku ̱ a tipä a ̱ mi kataka ra , jera ite ichaka iia ̱ : — Rabí , ¿ bikökje ba de jí ka rä na ?

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas te yis yuleke ̱ , ka je rä yis wa ̱ ji o ̱ le ijuenaklä ye je su ̱ a bas te ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä bas te pan ña je te bas ssëwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ebä ne ki ̱ ka .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Ke bas shka ̱ bla ñanak weikanakwa ̱ shtä ebä yuläk , ata wë bas shka ̱ blö rä ñanak sa ̱ se ̱ newa ̱ k jekjeye ka weikanakwa ̱ kuna shtä je ne yuläk . Ditsä yäbei je te bas chewe ̱ mi je shtä wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Sa Ká Säkeklä te rä ije ne nia ioloi wà .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Jibä wa ̱ k sá kiana sá wa ̱ ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ o ̱ nak je wa ̱ klä rä na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ o ̱ nak je rä iwa ̱ patkeleté je ebä biketsäk .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ji we ̱ mi ba te ijuenaklä ye sá wa ̱ su ̱ nak sá wa ̱ ba biketsäklä ye ra rä na ? ¿ Ji we ̱ mar ba te rä na ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Sá ká wa te maná ña ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska . Je rä jishtä iyöle katke käi : ‘ Ije te pan dar ka ̱ jöir ma ̱ ijewa ia ̱ iwa ̱ ñanak . ’

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , je pan dar ka ̱ jöir ka je me ̱ ne bas ia ̱ Moisés wa ̱ kuna . Ata yis Ká ne te pan si ̱ dar ka ̱ jöir je me ̱ ke ̱ bas ia ̱ rä .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Iwa rä je pan me ̱ ke ̱ Säkeklä te , je ne rä ale ka ̱ jöir ska dawa ̱ ju ̱ se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ k ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ rä .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ba ku ̱ je pan mo ̱ sá ia ̱ del .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Yis ne rä pan sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka rä . Jekäi yi däke ̱ wa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi , je ka kota ̱ nak ji ̱ a bäli wa ̱ mik a ̱ ni . Yi te yis biketsa , je ka je ̱ r bának ji ̱ a mik a ̱ ni .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Ata je rä jishtä yis te isha bas ia ̱ käi , bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ le , ata ka bas wa ̱ yis biketsane kuna .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Ata bena yi me ̱ ke ̱ Sa Ká te yis ia ̱ , jewa ne rä däkwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi . Ñakäi yi däke ̱ wa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi , je ka ju ̱ naksa ̱ yis wa ̱ mik a ̱ ni .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis biteju ̱ ka ̱ jöir , ka je rä ji sherke ̱ yis wakei ki ̱ je wa ̱ k kuna , ata je rä ji sherke ̱ yis patkäkté ki ̱ je ne wa ̱ k .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Yis patkäkté ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä jikäi : Yi me ̱ le ije wa ̱ yis ia ̱ , ka jewa mane a ̱ ni weikanakläwa ̱ kuna yis ukä ja ̱ mi , ata sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra yis wa ̱ ijewa shki ̱ wa ̱ kläka ̱ ni kseka .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Yis Ká ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä jikäi : je rä biköle iyaba su ̱ ak wa käi , ibiketsäk wa käi , jewa se ̱ naklä jekjeye ; ñakäi sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra , yis wa ̱ ijewa shki ̱ wa ̱ kläka ̱ ni .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Jera Judío wa te Jesús sha yakei ñaia ̱ , ije te isha : “ Yis ne rä pan biteleju ̱ ka ̱ jöir dä , ” je ki ̱ ka .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Jekäi ijewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Ije rä ka Jesús José yaba na ? ¿ Iká irä ia ̱ mi irä jewa rä ka sa ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ nak na ? ¿ Maikäi jira je te ishe yis biteleju ̱ rä ka ̱ jöir ska ni rä na ?

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ke bas ku ̱ yis sha yakei ñaia ̱ .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Sa Ká yis patkäkté , je wa ̱ ka sä ssëne däkwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ra , jera yi a ̱ ni ka däkwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi . Jekäi sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra , yis te yi dewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi wa shki ̱ we ̱ mika ̱ ni .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyöle te ishe rä : ‘ Ijewa biköle paktemi Säkeklä te . ’ Jekäi bena yis Ká ktä ssäk wa , ñakäi yönak yis Ká ja ̱ mi wa , jewa dämiwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: “ Ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ Sa Ká su ̱ le ; ata ale dar Säkeklä ska , jebä ne wa ̱ isu ̱ le rä .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te yis biketsa je se ̱ rmi jekjeye .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Yis ne rä pan sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka rä .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Bas kalí wa te maná ña ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska , jeiräta ijewa duacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Ata jí ne rä pan dawa ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska , yi te je ñara je ka duäkläwa ̱ ye rä .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Yis ne rä pan kseka biteleju ̱ ka ̱ jöir dä . Yilé te je pan ñara , je se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a jekjeye . Je pan me ̱ nak yis wa ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska wa se ̱ naklä kseka , je rä yis wakei yaka . ”

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Jesús te jekäi isha te Judío wa kju ̱ atkewa ̱ ka ̱ ñara . Jekäi ijewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Maikäi ije te iwakei yaka me ̱ mi sa ̱ ia ̱ kata ̱ nak rä na ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka bas wa ̱ ditsä yäbei je yaka kata ̱ ne ra , ñakäi ka je pi yane ra , ka bas dä kseka kuna .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Yi te yis yaka katá ra , yis pi ya ra , je se ̱ rmi jekjeye . Jekäi sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra , yis te ije shki ̱ we ̱ mika ̱ ni .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis yaka rä kata ̱ nak si ̱ , yis pi rä yanak si ̱ .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Yi te yis yaka katá ra , yis pi ya ra , je se ̱ r dä balewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi , ñakäi yis se ̱ r dä balewa ̱ ije ja ̱ mi .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Jishtä Sa Ká se ̱ nak kseka te yis patkaté , jekäi yis se ̱ r dä ije oloi ja ̱ mi , je su ̱ ta yi te yis yaka katá ra , jera je se ̱ rmi yis oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Je ne rä pan biteleju ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska rä . Ka je rä jishtä sa kalí wa wa ̱ iñale bata ska ra del ijewa duacha ̱ wa ̱ käi kuna . Ata yi te je pan ña ra , je se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a jekjeye .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Je ktei wà Jesús te sa pakta Capernaúm ska ñapaktäklä jui na .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Ñerä ijewa te je ssa ra , Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te isha : — Je kte rä därërë . ¿ Yi ia ̱ je kolor na ?

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa ktewe ̱ kate je te , jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Je ne te bas ktewe ̱ kate rä na ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Jekäi ra ikuna rä bas te ditsä yäbei ma ̱ ka ̱ ju ̱ ni mai ikätkä säkätä ska je su ̱ a ra , ¿ jera me je we ̱ mi bas te na ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Säkeklä wikblu ne rä se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ rä , ata sa yaka ia ̱ ka sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenak . Yis wa ̱ ji yile bas ia ̱ je kte rä wikblu iá , ñakäi je rä se ̱ ne kseka .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Ata bas sha ̱ tso ̱ ka jewa wa ̱ yis biketsane kuna . Jesús te jekäi isha rä iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer kja säkätä mane wa wa ̱ ka ije biketsane kuna rä ki ̱ ka , ñakäi yibä te ije ju ̱ emiksa ̱ ikukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Jera ite isha : — Je ne ki ̱ ka yie isha kja bas ia ̱ , yi a ̱ ni ka däkwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi , ka Sa Ká wa ̱ issëne däkwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ra .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Jera je ke ̱ i wà iwa ̱ dulanak wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ijawa ̱ ta ̱ na ka shkene ji ̱ a ira .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka iwa ̱ dulanak wa doce ia ̱ : — ¿ Je su ̱ ta bas je ̱ r ssëna yis jäkwa ̱ na ?

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Jera Simón Pedro te ikúka : — Säkekewa , ¿ yibä ja ̱ mi sá mimi ? Ba te ji sheke ̱ ne wà sa ̱ se ̱ rmi jekjeye rä .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Sá te ba biketsa , ñakäi sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba ne rä ale sikii patkele Säkeklä wa ̱ rä .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Yis wa ̱ bas doce kolole yis wa ̱ dulanak wa ye , ata bas sha ̱ ekla rä be .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Je rä Judas ne sha ite rä , ale Simón Iscariote wa yaba . Ije rä iwa ̱ dulanak wa doce ekla , ata je ne te Jesús ju ̱ emiksa ̱ ji ̱ a ikukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ rä .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ ka Jesús shka Galilea sha ̱ na . Ka issëne shkäk Judea sha ̱ na , je rä jeska Judío wa ki ̱ ishena kota ̱ nakwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Ata ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ kja Judío wa wa ̱ Ju Yabala Yuäklä je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä ra ,

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: jera Jesús el wa te isha ije ia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ jiska däkmi Judea ke ̱ i ska , ba te ji we ̱ ke ̱ kju ̱ awa su ̱ aklä jeska ba wa ̱ dulanak wa wa ̱ .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Yi ssëna palei ju ̱ ñenak ra , je ka kiar ji wa ̱ k jakika . Ba te jekäi ji we ̱ ke ̱ ra , jera je wo ̱ biköle wäna .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Iwakei el wabä jibä wa ̱ ka ije biketsane kuna , je ki ̱ ka ite isha jekäi iia ̱ .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ka ike ̱ i däwa ̱ ba yis minaklä , ata bas ia ̱ ra ka ̱ tso ̱ rä kjermita minak .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Ka ̱ jiska wa je ̱ r ki ̱ ka bas iar kuna , ata jewa je ̱ r ki ̱ yis ne iarke ̱ rä , je rä ji we ̱ ke ̱ ijewa te je sheke ̱ yis te je rä yakei ni ki ̱ ka .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Jekäi bas cho ̱ je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ k . Ata ka yis mi kuna jí kje ra je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ k , ka yis ke ̱ i däwa ̱ ba ki ̱ ka .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Jekäi ite isha e ̱ ná ra , jera ia ̱ ta ̱ na Galilea ska .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Ata Jesús el wa minejulu kja ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ k ra , jera ñakäi ije mineju ̱ , ata jakika , ka ju ̱ ñele kuna .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Ñerä Judío wa te Jesús yule dami ike ̱ i kjewe ̱ ska . Jekäi jewa te ichake rami : — ¿ Me ale ekla de na ?

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Ñakäi ditsä tapana chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ipake tso ̱ ñaia ̱ ja ̱ lmana . Moska te ishe : “ Je rä ditsä bäi ” ; ata isaka te ishe : “ Kai , je te rä sä wäyueke ̱ . ”

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Ata yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka iyineka ̱ biköle wa ̱ ssënakwa ̱ käi , isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ Judío wa yika ki ̱ ka .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Jera je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä dami kja mosha ̱ ra , Jesús deka ̱ ju ̱ Templo ska te sa paktami .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Jera Judío wa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ije te ji sheke ̱ te . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te ichaka ñaia ̱ : — Ka ije rä yöle kuna . ¿ Jera maikäi ije wa ̱ ji ju ̱ ñer bäi na ?

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka te isha : — Yis ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ka je rä yis wakei cha kuna , ata je me ̱ le rä yis patkäkté ne wa ̱ .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Yilé je ̱ r ssëna iwa ̱ k Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena käi ra , jera je je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ite yis ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe rä me ̱ le Säkeklä wa ̱ iräle , ata ji sheke ̱ yie rä yis wakei je ̱ r wà iräle .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Yi te sa pakteke ̱ iwakei je ̱ r wà ra , je te iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä iwakei kjeishäkläpa ditsä wa ̱ . Ata yi ki ̱ ipatkäkté ne shena kjeiyinak bäi rä ra , je te ji we ̱ rä bulee . Ka je ja ̱ mi ji yakei kuna .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: “ Bas ia ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na Moisés wa ̱ , ata bas sha ̱ yi a ̱ ni te ka je wawe ̱ kuna . ¿ Jiye jera bas ki ̱ yis shena kota ̱ nakwa ̱ na ? ”

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te Jesús kúka : — Ba rä kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ . ¿ Yi ki ̱ ba shena kota ̱ nakwa ̱ na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Etkabä yis te ji wá ̱ , je te bas biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Jekäi Moisés wa ̱ bas pakale tene shkiri wa ̱ k , ata ka je rä Moisés te kuna , ata je rä sa kalí wa te . Ñera sábado wà yabala jäiyi wa ia ̱ bas te tene shkiri we ̱ rawa ̱ .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ikuna ike ̱ i deka ̱ sábado wà yabala jäiyi wa ia ̱ tene shkiri wa ̱ klä , jera je we ̱ ke ̱ bas te ka ̱ wei me ̱ le Moisés wa ̱ ka shiriwa ̱ klä ra , ¿ jiye bas kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ yis da , yie ekla bäiwa ̱ ni bäi sábado wà ki ̱ ka rä na ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Ke bas ku ̱ ji wabiketsaksa ̱ kje ji juerke ̱ ja ̱ mi kuna , ata bas ku ̱ ji wabiketsöksa ̱ bulee si ̱ .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Jera se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska wa sha ̱ te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Ka je Jesús ne kteke ̱ wa ̱ ijewa te rä na ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Ñera je ktä kaldu biköle wäkata ska , ata yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka ji shä ta iia ̱ . Bäräle sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ibiketsa iyina si ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ irä .

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai je Jesús dar dä , ata mika ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ de ra , yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka iju ̱ ñer mai idar dä .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Ñerä Jesús te sa paktami Templo na . Jekäi ite isha täkii : — Bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ le , ñakäi bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai yis dar dä . Ata ka yis dene rä yis wakei je ̱ r wà kuna . Yis patkäkté ka su ̱ le bas wa ̱ , je te ji we ̱ rä bulee .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Ata yis wa ̱ ije su ̱ le , yis bitele rä ije ska ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ije ne te yis patkaté rä .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Jekäi ite isha ki ̱ ka , ñawäsaka ditsä te ije kukeke ̱ wa ̱ . Ata ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ikolonewa ̱ si ̱ , ka ike ̱ i däwa ̱ ba ki ̱ ka .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
