text2: Ata sa tapar tso ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na sha ̱ na chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ije biketsa . Jekäi ite isha ñaia ̱ : — Mika ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ de ra , jera ¿ je te ji we ̱ mi kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä ye ije tsa ̱ ta na ?

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Fariseo wa te issa je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te jekäi Jesús pake tso ̱ ñaia ̱ ja ̱ lmana . Je kju ̱ ei chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , fariseo wa irä te Templo kjänanak wa patkami Jesús kukäkwa ̱ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Yis se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a rä elkjebä bas sha ̱ na , jera yis maju ̱ mini yis patkäkté wä ki ̱ ka .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Bas te yis yulemi , ata ka bas ia ̱ yis ko ̱ nak . Mai yis katke ska , ka bas däkmi .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Jera Judío wa te ichaka ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Maka ije te ibiketsa minak ka ko ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ rä na ? Bäräle iminaju ̱ rä Judío wa minelemi Griego wa sha ̱ naka , jeska Griego wa paktäk .

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Ije te isha : ‘ Bas te yis yulemi , ata ka bas ia ̱ yis ko ̱ nak , ñakäi ka bas däkmi mai yis katke ska . ’ ¿ Jiräni je wà rä na ?

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Jera je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä bata rä dälätsalewa ̱ si ̱ . Je díaí wà Jesús je ̱ k duaka ̱ te isha täkii : — Yi je ̱ r bárke ̱ ra , jewa kutepa yis ska iyäk .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Yi te yis biketsa ra jewa ia ̱ io ̱ rmi jishtä kte yöle te ishe käi , jewa ja ̱ rka diklä kataka kseka tsikirmika ̱ .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Je rä Säkeklä Wikblu ne sha ite . Je rä däkksa ̱ Jesús biketsäk wa ia ̱ . Ata je ke ̱ i wà ka Säkeklä Wikblu Sikina me ̱ rba , ka Jesús oloi karka ̱ ba ki ̱ ka .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te je kte ssa ra , moska te isha : — Iyina si ̱ ije ne rä jile bata shäk däke ̱ rä .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Ata isaka te isha : — Ije ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä . Ata isaka te isha : — ¿ Baishe Säbäkäkksa ̱ bitämi Galilea ska na ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Ñera kte yöle te ishe rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ däke ̱ rä David batala ekla , ñakäi je bitämi rä ju tso ̱ elkje kie Belén ska , mai David datse ̱ ska .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Jekäi ijewa ñabalabutsa Jesús kju ̱ ei .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Ijewa moska ssëna ikukäkwa ̱ , ata yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka ikolonewa ̱ .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Ñerä Templo kjänanak wa patkelemi Jesús kukäkwa ̱ wa dejuluni chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä fariseo wa irä jewa wäki ̱ ni . Jera jewa te ichaka je Templo kjänanak wa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ka bas te itse ̱ te rä na ?

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Jera Templo kjänanak wa te ikúka : — Mik a ̱ ni ka yi a ̱ ni ktä ta ije ktäke ̱ käi .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa te isha : — ¿ Bas wakwa ñajawa ̱ wäyönakcha ̱ wa ̱ ñaebä na ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ Mane sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä fariseo wa irä te Jesús biketsa rä na ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Ata je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wa ̱ ka ka ̱ wei ju ̱ ñer , jewa rä weikalecha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Jera Nicodemo , ale delesta ̱ na Jesús wäki ̱ , je rä ijewa sha ̱ ekla , je te isha ijewa ia ̱ :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: — ¿ Ka irä sa ̱ ka ̱ wei te ishe , säkätä yi rä kjatele kiana ktä ssënak iju ̱ ñaklä ji wá ̱ ite käi , kjepa iktei wabiketseke ̱ ksa ̱ rä na ?

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Jera jewa te ikúka : — ¿ Jera ñaebä ba rä Galilea wa na ? Ma je ̱ k yuö tsa ̱ na kte yöle ja ̱ mi . Je wà ba te iju ̱ ñemi jile bata shäk mane a ̱ ni ka je bitele Galilea ska kuna .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Jeska biköle minejulumi ijukani ekla ekla .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Ata Jesús mineju ̱ mi Olivo Yäkä Bata ska .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Bulirishtä sa ̱ ñireebä ra ideju ̱ ni Templo ska . Jera biköle ñatapawa ̱ ni ira . Jekäi ije ̱ tkawa ̱ te ijewa pakta .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Ñerä alaklä ko ̱ nawa ̱ ika ̱ wakblewa ̱ jäiyi saka ra käi , je detse ̱ Jesús wäki ̱ ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä fariseo wa irä wa ̱ . Je paka ijewa te je ̱ k duäkcha ̱ ijewa sha ̱ moska .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Sapaktäk , jí alaklä ko ̱ nawa ̱ ika ̱ wakblewa ̱ ke ̱ ska .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Jera ka ̱ wei yöle ska Moisés te sa paka je shtä wa ktäkwa ̱ tele jak wà . Ata ¿ jiräni ba te je she na ?

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Je chaka ite Jesús ia ̱ wäsi ̱ wa jiräni iwa ̱ ikúkä ta í ̱ ki ̱ ka , jewa ijewa wa ̱ ije kjatiäkläwa ̱ pa . Ata Jesús je ̱ k buawa ̱ te ishäkä yua ijulasku bata wà .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iwächakewa ̱ ki ̱ ta . Ñerä ije ̱ k paruaka ̱ ni te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas sha ̱ na yi tso ̱ ka nui ta , je ku ̱ je alaklä tiö jak wà säkätä .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Jera Jesús je ̱ k buawa ̱ ni te ishäkä yuani .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Ijewa te je ssa ra , jera iminemi ekla ekla , säkätä rä säkeyake wa . Jera Jesús irä , je alaklä kaldu ijewa sha ̱ moska irä , jewa ebä a ̱ ta ̱ na .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Ñerä Jesús je ̱ k paruaka ̱ ni te ichaka iia ̱ : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , ¿ me ijewa re na ? ¿ Yi a ̱ ni ka kuna ji ̱ a ba ki ̱ nui ja ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ na ?

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Jera je alaklä te ikúka : — Säkekewa , ka yi kuna ji ̱ a . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ñaebä ka yis wa ̱ nui ja ̱ nakka ̱ ba ki ̱ ka . Ma cho ̱ ni , ka bä te ji yakei wakble kuna ji ̱ a .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Jeska Jesús ktani ijewa ra te isha : — Yis ne rä ka ̱ oloi ye ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ rä . Jekäi yi mike ̱ yis da ra , jera ka je shkäk ji ̱ a ka ̱ yee naka mik a ̱ ni . Ata je dami rä ka ̱ oloi sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka oloika .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Jera fariseo wa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Je wà ba wakei je ̱ k pakäke ̱ , je rä ka iyina si ̱ kuna .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ikuna yis wakei je ̱ k pakä ra , je rä iyina si ̱ . ¿ Ka je rä jiye kuna ta ? Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai yis dar dä , maka yis ma rä . Ata ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai yis dar dä , maka yis ma rä .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Bas wakwa je ̱ rike ja ̱ mi bas te sä wabiketseksa ̱ , ata ka yis te yi a ̱ ni wabiketseksa ̱ .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Ata ikuna yis te sa wabiketsaksa ̱ ra , je rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ bulee . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yis wa ̱ je o ̱ nak rä eklabä kuna , ata yie je we ̱ rä Sa Ká yis patkäkté jera ñara .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Bas ka ̱ wei yöle te ishe rä , isu ̱ ak bol te ishaka ̱ ra , je rä iyina si ̱ .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Jekäi yis wakei je ̱ k pakä jishtä isu ̱ ak ekla käi , ñakäi Sa Ká yis patkäkté je te yis ktei sheke ̱ jishtä isu ̱ ak el käi .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Mai ba ká katke rä ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ r yi yis dä ia ̱ , ñakäi yi rä yis Ká rä ia ̱ . Ikuna rä yi yis dä ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa ra , jera ñaebä bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi yi rä yis ká rä te .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Jesús te je kte wà sa pakta Templo na mai ofrenda jiäklä ska , ata yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka ije kolonewa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ike ̱ i däwa ̱ ba ki ̱ ka .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Etäbä kicha Jesús te ishani ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis maju ̱ mi ; bas te yis yulemi , ata bas duämiwa ̱ ji yakei wakblele bas wa ̱ je nuije . Mai yis ma rä jeska ka bas däkmi .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Jera Judío wa te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Ije ̱ k ktäke ̱ wa ̱ le irä ? ¿ Jiye ite isha : ‘ Mai yis maju ̱ jeska ka bas däkmi ’ ni rä ?

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas dar dä ka ̱ jiska ; yis dar dä ka ̱ jöir ska . Bas dä ka ̱ jiska wa ; ka yis dä ka ̱ jiska wa kuna .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Yie isha , bas duämiwa ̱ ji yakei wakblele bas wa ̱ je nuije . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka bas wa ̱ ibiketsane yis ne ije rä ra , bas duämiwa ̱ ji yakei wakblele bas wa ̱ je nuije .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Yi ba rä na ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Je rä jishtä säkätä yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ iyileté je rami ji ̱ a käi .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Yis wa ̱ kte tso ̱ ji ̱ a yinak ta ̱ i bas ia ̱ , ñakäi yis kiana bas wabiketsäkksa ̱ ji ̱ a . Ata yis patkäkté ktä rä iyina si ̱ . Jekäi ije wa ̱ ji yile ssële yis wa ̱ je ebä sheke ̱ yie ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Ata ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne Jesús te Sa Ká ne sheke ̱ rä ia ̱ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Mika ̱ bas te ditsä yäbei tkaka ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ka ra , je ne kjepa bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ite yis ne ije rä . Ñakäi jekjepa bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ite ka yis wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne yis wakei je ̱ r wà kuna , ata Sa Ká wa ̱ yis pautäle je ebä sha yis te rä .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Yis patkäkté je kaldu yis da . Sa Ká wa ̱ ka yis dä jalewa ̱ kuna eklabä , je rä ji te ije ssëwe ̱ bäi je ebä we ̱ ke ̱ yis te maitjä ki ̱ ka .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Jesús te jekäi isha ra , jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ije biketsa .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Jera Jesús te isha je Judío wa ibiketsäk wa ia ̱ : — Bas chatkawa ̱ yis te kte sha ja ̱ mi ra , bas dämiwa ̱ yis wa ̱ dulanak wa si ̱ ye ,

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: ñakäi bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ji rä iyina si ̱ te . Jekäi ji rä iyina si ̱ te bas bäkemiksa ̱ .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Jera ijewa te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Sá rä Abraham batala . Jekäi mik a ̱ ni ka sá rä kololewa ̱ kuna yi a ̱ ni kjanaklä ye . Jera ¿ maikäi ba te ishe sá ia ̱ bas bakanamiksa ̱ ni na ?

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ji yakei wakbläk je rä kololewa ̱ ji yakei wakble wa ̱ ikjanaklä ye .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Jekäi kjanaklä ka se ̱ nak iblui ju na jekjeye , ata blu yaba se ̱ rmi iju na jekjeye .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä yaba te bas bakaksa ̱ ra , jera bas dämiksa ̱ kjermita si ̱ .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas dä Abraham batala . Ata bas ki ̱ yis shena rä kota ̱ nakwa ̱ , ka bas ki ̱ yis ktä kiar ki ̱ ka .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Sa Ká ra yis kaldu ra , ji su ̱ a yis te käi , je ne pakeke ̱ yis te rä . Ata ji sha bas ká te ssële bas wa ̱ , je ne we ̱ ke ̱ bas te rä .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Abraham ne rä sá ká rä . Jera Jesús te isha : — Ikuna iyina si ̱ bas dä Abraham batala ra , bas te iwe ̱ mi jishtä Abraham wa ̱ io ̱ le käi .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Säkeklä wa ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ yile ssële yis wa ̱ , je ebä ne sha yie bas ia ̱ rä , ata jira bas ki ̱ yis shena rä kota ̱ nakwa ̱ . Abraham wa ̱ ka jekäi io ̱ ne .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Ata bas te iwe ̱ ke ̱ jishtä bas ká te iwe ̱ ke ̱ käi . Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Ka sá ko ̱ le rä ña ̱ la wä wa käi kuna . Sá ká rä eklabä , je rä Säkeklä .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Ikuna rä Säkeklä rä bas ká ra , bas te yis shka ̱ li ̱ blemi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis bite rä ije ska , je ne deju ̱ jiska rä . Ka yis dene kuna yis wakei je ̱ r wà , ata ije te yis patkaté ki ̱ ka yis de rä .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ¿ Jiye ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ r yie ji sheke ̱ je ia ̱ na ? Je rä ka bas ia ̱ yis ktä kolor ki ̱ ka .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Bas dä bas ká be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ja ̱ mi . Jekäi bas ssërke ̱ iwa ̱ k jishtä je bas ká ki ̱ ishena o ̱ nak käi . Säkätä si ̱ bite rä jira , ije rä sä ktäkwa ̱ , ñakäi ije rä ji rä iyina si ̱ dokoitsäk , ije ja ̱ mi ji rä iyina si ̱ ka kuna ki ̱ ka . Ije ka ̱ yuäke ̱ ra , jera ite isheke ̱ iwakei del ja ̱ mi , idel dä ka ̱ yuäk ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ije ne rä ka ̱ yue wätsikiwa ̱ kka ̱ rä .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yis te kte si ̱ sha , je ka kuke bas te .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ¿ Mane bas sha ̱ ia ̱ yis kjatermi yis dä ji yakei wakbläk ni na ? Yis te kte si ̱ ne sha ra , ¿ jiye ka bas te yis ktä kuke na ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Yi rä Säkeklä ja ̱ mi ra , je te ji sheke ̱ Säkeklä te ne ssë . Ata ka bas dä Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna , je ki ̱ ka ka bas te ji sheke ̱ ite je ssë rä .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Jera Judío wa te Jesús kúka : — Sá te isha ba rä Samaria wa , ñakäi ba rä kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ , ¿ ka je sha sá te rä bulee na ?

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ka yis dä kololewa ̱ kuna be wa ̱ . Yis te rä yis ká ne oloi keka ̱ . Ata bas te yis kukawa ̱ diekjela .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Ka yis wakei ki ̱ ishene yis me oloi karka ̱ pa . Ata ekla kaldu je ki ̱ ishena rä yis me oloi karka ̱ pa . Jekäi ije rä sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te yis ktä wawá ̱ ra , mik a ̱ ni ka je duäkwa ̱ .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Jera Judío wa te ikúka : — Jirje sa te isu ̱ a ra ba rä kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ . Abraham duawa ̱ , ñaebä jile bata shäk wa duacha ̱ wa ̱ , ata ba te ishe yi te ba ktä wawá ̱ ra , mik a ̱ ni ka je wa ̱ duewa ̱ shka ̱ l ssënak .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: ¿ Ata ba rä sa ká Abraham tsa ̱ ta na ? Je duawa ̱ , ñaebä jile bata shäk wa duacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ata ¿ yi ba rä je je ̱ k shä jekäi rä na ?

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ikuna yis je ̱ k oloi kaka ̱ ra , je rä ka wata . Ata yis oloi käkka ̱ je rä yis Ká , ale bas wa ̱ kinak bas Kekläí ni .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Ka bas wa ̱ ije su ̱ le , ata yis wa ̱ ije su ̱ le . Yis kuna ishäk ka yis wa ̱ ije su ̱ le ni ra , jera yis dä ka ̱ yuäk bas käi . Ata yis wa ̱ ije su ̱ le , ñakäi yis te iktä wawe ̱ .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Bas ká Abraham ssëna a ̱ naa si ̱ , ije te yis díaí su ̱ emi ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ite je su ̱ a ; je te issëwa ̱ a ̱ naa .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Jera Judío wa te ikúka : — Ka ba däka ̱ ba cincuenta año , jera ¿ maikäi ba wa ̱ Abraham su ̱ le na ?

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka Abraham kunaba yika , yis dä .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa te jak katulaka ̱ iwa ̱ itiäklä . Ata ije je ̱ k blawa ̱ ijewa yika . Jekäi Templo ska imineju ̱ mi .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Jekäi Jesús damiju ̱ ña ̱ la wà ra , ekla ko ̱ le ka wä wajuenak kuna su ̱ a ite .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Jera Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa te ichaka iia ̱ : — Rabí , ¿ yi wa ̱ je ñak kate ije ko ̱ naklä ka wä wajuenak kuna rä na ? ¿ Iwakei wa ̱ na , ata ia ̱ mi wa ̱ , iká wa ̱ ?

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ka je ñak kuna iwakei wa ̱ , ia ̱ mi wa ̱ , iká wa ̱ . Ata je rä ji o ̱ r Säkeklä ia ̱ je kjayinaklä ije ja ̱ mi .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Ka ̱ wä kalme ji ̱ a ra , yis kiana yis patkäkté je kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k . Ata ka ̱ tuirmiwa ̱ , je ke ̱ i wà yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka ji o ̱ nak ji ̱ a .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Ata jí yis kaldu ji ̱ a ka ̱ jiska ra , jera yis dä ka ̱ oloi ye ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Je sha ite ukä ska ra , ikjali tjua ishäkä ki ̱ je wäjabawa ̱ ite , je dölií wà ite je ka wä wajuenak kuna wäbala pacha ̱ .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ wä paskuäkni diklä talawa ̱ klä kie Siloéni ska . ( Je kte wà rä patkelemi ) . Jekäi imineju ̱ wä paskuäk ; je daju ̱ ni ra iwäbala wajuena bäi .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Jera se ̱ nak ipája ̱ mi wa irä , ñakäi yi wa ̱ irä su ̱ nak del jile kaku kiäk irä , jewa te ichaka ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Ka je ne rä ale del kätkä jile kaku kiäk rä na ?

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Jera moska te isha ; — Je ne irä . Ata isaka te isha : — Ka irä je kuna , ata ijuer ije su ̱ ta . Ata iwakei te isha : — Yis ne irä .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — Jera , ¿ maikäi bä wä wajuena rä na ?

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Ekla kie Jesús , je te döli wäjabawa ̱ , je wà ite yis wäbala pacha ̱ . Jera ite isha ' sia ̱ : ‘ Ma cho ̱ Siloé ska wä paskuäk . ’ Jekäi yis dasta ̱ na wä paskuäk . Jera yis wä wajuena .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Me je de ? Jera ite ikúka : — Ka ' swa ̱ iju ̱ ñer .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Jera ijewa te je bakle ka wä wajuenak kuna je tsa ̱ mi fariseo wa wäki ̱ ka .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Jesús te döli wäjabawa ̱ , ñakäi iwä wajuewa ̱ rä sábado wà ki ̱ ka .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka fariseo wa te iwächakewa ̱ maikäi iwäbala wajuena rä käi . Jekäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ite yis wäbala pacha ̱ döli wà ; jekäi yis wä paskua ra , jera yis wä wajuena .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Jera fariseo wa sha ̱ te Jesús sha ñaia ̱ : — Ka je rä patkele kuna Säkeklä wa ̱ , ka ite sábado dälätse ki ̱ ka . Ata ijewa sha ̱ te isha : — Ikuna ije rä ji yakei wakbläk ra , ¿ maikäi ije ia ̱ ji o ̱ r jekäi ijuenaklä ye na ? Jekäi ijewa te ibiketsa kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha ijewa te je ka wä wajuenak wächakewa ̱ ni : — ¿ Ji ni ba wakei te bä wä wajuewa ̱ k wakei she na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Je rä jile bata shäk .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Ata Judío wa wa ̱ ka ibiketsane ije rä ka wä wajuenak kuna , je ne wä wajuena rä , ata ijewa te je wä wajuele a ̱ mi irä iká irä kiajaté wächakenak kjepa ijewa te ibiketsa ije ne irä .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Jera ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Jí rä bas yaba na ? ¿ Jí ne rä bas wa ̱ yinak iko ̱ le rä ka wä wajuenak kuna ni rä na ? Jera ¿ maikäi jira iwä wajuerke ̱ na ?

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Iyina si ̱ je rä sá yaba , iyina si ̱ je ko ̱ le rä ka wä wajuenak kuna .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Ata maikäi iwä wajuenani räle je ka ju ̱ ñer sá wa ̱ . Yi te iwä wajuewa ̱ räle je ka ju ̱ ñer sá wa ̱ . Je rä säkenawa ̱ , je wakei ia ̱ ichakö . Iwakei te bas kúkemi .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Iká irä ia ̱ mi irä suanacha ̱ wa ̱ Judío wa yika kju ̱ ei ijewa te ikúka jekäi rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Judío wa rä ñaje ̱ rko ̱ le kja , manele te ishe Jesús dä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ni ra , je rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka iká ia ̱ mi te isha : “ Je rä säkenawa ̱ , je wakei ia ̱ ichakö . ”

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Jekäi etäbä kicha jewa te je bakle ka wä wajuenak kuna kiateni . Jewa te isha iia ̱ : — Säkeklä ne kjeishö kte bäi wà . Ata sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je ditsä rä ji yakei wakbläk .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Yis wa ̱ ka iju ̱ ñer ije rä ji yakei wakbläk räle , kai räle , ata yis wa ̱ jí ebä ne ju ̱ ñer dä : Säkätä ra ka yis dä wä wajuenak kuna , ata jira yis wä wajuena .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Jera jewa te ichakani iia ̱ : — ¿ Me ma wá ̱ ite rä na ? ¿ Maikäi ba wäbala wajuewa ̱ ite rä na ?

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Yis te isha kja bas ia ̱ , ata ka bas wa ̱ issëne . Jera ¿ jiye bas te issakle ni ? Ata ¿ bas ssëna däkwa ̱ ña ije wa ̱ dulanak wa ye na ?

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Jera jewa te ija ̱ ñetsa te isha : — Ba rä ije ktä kukäk . Ata sá rä Moisés ktä kukäk .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer iyina si ̱ Säkeklä kta Moisés da . Ata ka sá wa ̱ ije ju ̱ ñer maka ije datse ̱ räle .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Jera je wä wajuele te ijewa kúka : — ¿ Je rä maikäi na ? Ije te yis wäbala wajuewa ̱ , ata ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer maka idatse ̱ rä .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Säkeklä wa ̱ ji yakei wakbläk wa ka ktä ssënak , ata yi rä Säkeklä oloitsäk ñakäi ji wa ̱ k jishtä iki ̱ ishena käi , je ne ktä ssë ite rä .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Mikle bite rä jira kje ka yi wa ̱ issële sa ̱ ko ̱ le ka wä wajuenak kuna je wä wajuewa ̱ yi te .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Ikuna ije rä ka patkele kuna Säkeklä wa ̱ ra , ka je ia ̱ ji o ̱ nak .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha : — Ba ko ̱ le del ji yakei ebä wakbläk ¿ maikäi je ia ̱ sá pauta ̱ nak na ? Jera ijewa te iju ̱ aksa ̱ .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Jesús te issa ijewa te iju ̱ aksa ̱ , kjepa ite je ku ̱ ani ra , ite ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Ba te ditsä yäbei biketsa na ?

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Säkekewa , yis ia ̱ ishö yi irä yis wa ̱ ije biketsäkläpa .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúkani : — Ba wa ̱ ije su ̱ le kja . Je ne ktä kaldu ba ra rä .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Jera ite isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , yie ba biketsa si ̱ . Jera ije ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iwäja ̱ mi .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Yis de ka ̱ jiska rä sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ , sä ka wä wajuenak kuna wa wä wajuenaklä , ñakäi sä wä wajuenak wa je ianakläwa ̱ ka wä wajuenak kuna .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Jera fariseo wa sha ̱ tso ̱ Jesús säkätä ja ̱ mi wa te je ssa ra , ijewa te ichaka iia ̱ : — Jera ¿ sá rä ka wä wajuenak kuna na ?

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Bas kuna ka wä wajuenak kuna ra , jera ka bas dä nui ta . Ata bas te ishe : ‘ Sá wä wajuer ’ , je ki ̱ ka bas dä nui ta ji ̱ a .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi ka baka ̱ newa ̱ oveja kjätkeleksa ̱ kjäshtäklä si ̱ ska ra , ata ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ kju ̱ awa ska ra , je wakei rä jakbläk , sa ̱ ki ̱ ssäk jakiblenak ña ̱ la ki ̱ .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Ata yi kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ikjäshtäklä ska ra , je ne rä oveja kjänanak si ̱ rä .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Je ia ̱ ikjä kukäk te ikjäye ja ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ . Ñakäi je ktä ssë oveja te . Jekäi ite ioveja chakeke ̱ ikie ja ̱ mi ; jekjepa ite ijeke ̱ ksa ̱ iektaka .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Jekäi ioveja biköle jaksa ̱ ite ra , ije mike ̱ iwäkse . Jekäi jewa mar iitä ki ̱ , ijewa wa ̱ iktä rä ssënak ki ̱ ka .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Ka oveja minak kju ̱ awa itä ki ̱ , ata je yika ijewa julurtkämi , ka ijewa wa ̱ kju ̱ awa wa ktä rä ssële kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Jekäi Jesús te ipaka ditsä ia ̱ jile she ja ̱ mi , ata ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne ji sha ite rä ia ̱ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Jesús ktani ijewa ra te isha : “ Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yis ne rä oveja kjäkläwa ̱ rä .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Biköle bakle yis yikaba jewa rä jakbläk wa ebä , sa ̱ ki ̱ ssäk jakiblenak ña ̱ la ki ̱ ebä . Ata je oveja wa wa ̱ ka ijewa ktä ssëne .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Yis ne rä sä kjäkläwa ̱ rä . Yilé kjawa ̱ ju ̱ jeska ra , je rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ . Jekäi ije kjämiwa ̱ ju ̱ dämiksa ̱ ju ̱ . Jekäi ite tala ku ̱ emi .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: “ Jakbläk wa däke ̱ rä oveja jakibläk , iktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ , iweikäkcha ̱ wa ̱ . Ata yis de rä ijewa se ̱ naklä kseka , ka kseka ebä kuna , ata ise ̱ naklä bäi si ̱ .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Yis ne rä oveja kjänanak bäi si ̱ rä . Oveja kjänanak bäi rä je ̱ k ju ̱ akksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ oveja tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Ata oveja kjänanak to ̱ nak , ka je rä iwakei si ̱ kuna , ka je rä ikjänanak si ̱ kuna . Jekäi mika ̱ je te lobo su ̱ a idaju ̱ ra , ite oveja jeke ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ na , iturke ̱ mi iyika . Jekäi lobo te oveja kteke ̱ , je te isaka juluwe ̱ tkeke ̱ mi iyika .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Ikjänanak tu ̱ rke ̱ mi ije rä to ̱ nak ebä ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ka je je ̱ r ja ̱ mi oveja dälär kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: “ Yis ne rä oveja kjänanak bäi si ̱ rä . Yis wa ̱ yis oveja rä su ̱ nak , ñakäi yis oveja wa ̱ yis dä su ̱ nak .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Je rä jishtä Sa Ká wa ̱ yis dä su ̱ nak , ñakäi yis wa ̱ ije rä su ̱ nak käi . Jekäi yis dä je ̱ k ju ̱ akksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ yis oveja tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Yis wa ̱ oveja saka tso ̱ , ka je rä jí oveja kjätkele tso ̱ wa kuna . Yis kiana ijewa jäkté ñaebä . Jewa te yis ktä ssëmi . Jekäi oveja biköle dämiwa ̱ eyaka yebä , kjänanak ta eklabä .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Yis Ká wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis dä je ̱ k ju ̱ akksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ , je ukä ska yis je ̱ käkläka ̱ ni se ̱ nakni .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka yis kota ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna , ata yis wakei je ̱ k ju ̱ ake ̱ ksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ . Jekäi yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ yis je ̱ k ju ̱ akläksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ , ñakäi yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ yis je ̱ käkläka ̱ ni se ̱ nakni . Yis ia ̱ je ka ̱ wei ma ̱ rä yis Ká te .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Jera Jesús te jekäi isha bata ki ̱ ka Judío wa ñabalabutsaksa ̱ ni .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Jekäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te isha : — Je rä kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ . Je rä yuletelewa ̱ . ¿ Jiye bas te ije ktä ssëke ̱ ji ̱ a rä na ?

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Ata moska te isha : — Ikuna ije rä kololewa ̱ be wa ̱ ra , jera ka ije ia ̱ uta ̱ nak jekäi . ¿ Maikäi be ia ̱ ka wäbala wajuenak kuna bäirni na ?

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Templo siki teleni mikle je ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä dewa ̱ ni . Je rä ka ̱ tse ̱ l ke ̱ i wà .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Jera Templo juitä ki ̱ ju yöle jarbe kie Salomón ni , je niki ̱ ka Jesús shkä kaldu .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Jera Judío wa te Jesús kjä butrawa ̱ te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Bikö sá kiana iki ̱ ssäk ba wa ̱ ishäklä sá ia ̱ rä na ? Ba rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ra , ishöka ̱ sá ia ̱ bulee .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Je rä yile kja yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ , ata ka bas wa ̱ yis ktä kolone iyina si ̱ ye . Ñakäi yis te ji we ̱ ke ̱ kju ̱ awa yis Ká kie oloi ja ̱ mi , je te ikjasheke ̱ yi yis dä .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Ata ka bas wa ̱ je biketsane , bas dä ka yis oveja wa kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Yis oveja wa te yis ktä ssëke ̱ ; ñakäi yis wa ̱ ijewa rä su ̱ nak . Jekäi ijewa mike ̱ yis itä ki ̱ .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Yie ijewa ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye me ̱ ke ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ka ijewa rä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ kuna mik a ̱ ni ; ñakäi yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka ijewa bakanakksa ̱ yis jula na .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Yis Ká ijewa ma ̱ k yis ia ̱ , je rä biköle tsa ̱ ta . Je ki ̱ ka yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ijewa ka bakanakksa ̱ Sa Ká jula na .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Yis irä Sa Ká irä je rä etka yebä .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha Judío wa te jak katulaka ̱ ni iwa ̱ Jesús tiäklä .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis te ji wá ̱ bäi ta ̱ i bas wäna jishtä Sa Ká te yis paka iwa ̱ k käi . ¿ Je sha ̱ mane bata ki ̱ ka bas te yis kteke ̱ wa ̱ jak wà rä na ?

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Jera Judío wa te ikúka : — Ka sá te ba tie jak wà rä ji o ̱ le bäi ba wa ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata ba kta yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi kju ̱ ei , ñakäi ba rä ditsä ebä , jeiräta ma je ̱ k shä ba rä Säkeklä ni je kju ̱ ei .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ijewa kúka : — Ata ¿ ka bas ka ̱ wei ki ̱ ka iyöle te ishe rä : ‘ Yie isha bas dä säkeklä wa ni na ? ’

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Jekäi kte yöle rä ka tse ̱ nakju ̱ mi kuna . Jekäi ikuna rä yi ia ̱ Säkeklä ktä rä me ̱ le je wakwa sha ite säkeklä wa ni ra ,

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: jera ¿ maikäi ale Sa Ká wa ̱ kolole patkeleté iwa ̱ ka ̱ jiska , je she bas te iktäke ̱ yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi , je ite isha : ‘ Yis dä Säkeklä yaba ’ ni je bata ki ̱ ka rä na ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Jekäi yis Ká te yis paka ji wa ̱ k je ka o ̱ ne yis wa ̱ ra , ke yis biketsa .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Ata ka bas wa ̱ yis ktä biketsane iyina si ̱ ra , jera wë bas ku ̱ yis biketsö yis Ká te yis paka iwa ̱ k je we ̱ ke ̱ yis te ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ra bas je ̱ r ko ̱ rmi , ñakäi bas te ibiketsemi Sa Ká rä yis ja ̱ mi , ñakäi yis dä Sa Ká ja ̱ mi .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Ñerä etäbä kicha Judío wa te Jesús kukeke ̱ wa ̱ , ata ikjaksa ̱ ju ̱ ijewa yika .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Jekäi imineju ̱ mii Jordán a ̱ mi kata mai Juan wa ̱ sä wäokle säkätä ska . Jeka ise ̱ na .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Jeska chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ date iwäki ̱ . Jera ijewa te isha : — Ñera Juan säwäukewa ̱ k wa ̱ ka ji o ̱ le kju ̱ awa kuna ijuenaklä ye . Ata jini ije te Jesús ktei sha je biköle rä iyina si ̱ .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Jekäi jeska chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te Jesús biketsa .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Ekla kie Lázaro duärawa ̱ . Je se ̱ r dä jukläyäkä tsi ̱ ne Betania ska . Jeska María irä iel Marta irä se ̱ r dä .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Je María ne rä ale Säkekewa klä ki ̱ ka perfume tkäkju ̱ mi rä , ñakäi iklä pasikäk itsa ̱ ku ̱ kä wà rä . Lázaro , ale duärawa ̱ , je rä ijewa jäke .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Ñerä ikuta wa te kte patkami Jesús ia ̱ jikäi : — Säkekewa , ma wa ̱ shka ̱ ta duärawa ̱ .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Ata Jesús te issa ra , ite isha : — Je duë ia ̱ ka iduäkwa ̱ kuna , ata je duë rä Säkeklä oloi kanakläka ̱ , je wà Säkeklä yaba oloi kanakläka ̱ .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Jesús wa ̱ Marta irä iel irä , Lázaro irä jewa shka ̱ l dä ta ̱ i .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Ata ite issa Lázaro duärawa ̱ ra , jera ise ̱ na ji ̱ a ka ̱ böiki ikatke ska .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Sä shkäni etäbä kicha Judea ke ̱ i ska .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Rabí , ata jí kukjuna Judío wa te bä kteke ̱ wa ̱ kia jak wà . ¿ Jera ma mike ̱ ni jeska na ?

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — ¿ Ka irä ka ̱ piana rä doce hora na ? Jekäi sa ̱ me shkä ka ̱ piana ra , ka sa klasku tkenakwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ oloi tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska je wà sä wä wajuerke ̱ .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Ata sa ̱ me shkä ka ̱ tuil na ra , jera sä rä klasku tkenakwa ̱ , ka sä wäna ka ̱ oloi juer ki ̱ ka .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Jesús te je sha e ̱ ná ra , jera ite isha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Sa ̱ wa ̱ shka ̱ ta Lázaro kapawa ̱ , ata yis maju ̱ mi ishki ̱ wa ̱ kni .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ikuna ikapawa ̱ irä ra , tsi ibäirka ̱ ni .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Jesús te rä Lázaro duawa ̱ ne sha , ata ijewa te je biketsa ite rä sä käpä si ̱ ne sha .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Je ki ̱ Jesús te ijewa ia ̱ ishaka ̱ bulee : — Lázaro duawa ̱ .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Ata yis ssëna a ̱ naa ka yis katke kuna jeska ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je rä kianak bas ia ̱ , bas wa ̱ yis biketsäklä . Jeiräta sä shkä iwäki ̱ .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak Tomás kie etkä Ko ̱ lo ̱ ni , je te isha isaka Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ : — Sä shkä ira duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ña .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Jesús demiju ̱ ra , ite iju ̱ ña Lázaro itäbinawa ̱ kja cuatro día .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betania rä alemana Jerusalén ska tres kilómetro kjena .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Jekäi Judío wa demi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ Marta irä María irä je ̱ r pabläk , ijäke duawa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Ñerä Marta te iju ̱ ña Jesús daju ̱ ra , jera imineju ̱ iña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k , ata María a ̱ ta ̱ na ju ska .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Jera Marta te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ikuna ba katkepa jiska ra , ka yis jäke dunewa ̱ .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Ata yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer del maitjä ji biköle kieke ̱ ba te Säkeklä ia ̱ je me ̱ mi ite ba ia ̱ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Bä jäke shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Jera Marta te isha : — Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ije shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni rä mika ̱ biköle shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ska .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Yis ne rä sa ̱ shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni rä , yis ne rä se ̱ ne kseka rä . Jekäi mane yis biketsäk wa duawa ̱ ra , jewa se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Je su ̱ ta bena yi tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka wa te yis biketsa ra , mik a ̱ ni ka jewa duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ . ¿ Ba te je kte biketsa na ?

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Säkekewa , jekäi irä , yis te ibiketsa iyina si ̱ ba ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä , Säkeklä yaba rä , ale däke ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ jiska rä .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Marta te jekäi isha ra , imineju ̱ iel María kiäk . Jera ite isha iia ̱ jakika : — Sapaktäk deju ̱ . Je te ba kia .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: María te je ssa ra , ije ̱ kaka ̱ plaa mineju ̱ mi iwäki ̱ .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Jera ka Jesús dämiba je ju tso ̱ elkje ska , ata ikaldu ji ̱ a mai Marta te iku ̱ a ska .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Jera Judío wa kajali María ra ju naka ije ̱ r pabläk te isu ̱ a ije ̱ kaka ̱ plaa mineju ̱ ra , jera ijewa minejulumi iitä ki ̱ . Ijewa te ibiketsa imineju ̱ rä sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska ji ̱ ak .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Jekäi María demi Jesús kaldu ska te isu ̱ a ra , ije ̱ k ja ̱ wa ̱ mi plaa wakte iklä säkätä ja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ikuna ba katkepa jiska ra , ka yis jäke dunewa ̱ .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Jesús te María ji ̱ ake ̱ su ̱ a , ñaebä Judío wa de ira wa ji ̱ ate jela su ̱ a ra , issënawa ̱ shi ̱ ana , ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Mai bas te iblawa ̱ rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Säkekewa , sä shkä isu ̱ ak .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Jera Jesús ji ̱ aksa ̱ .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Judío wa te isha ñaia ̱ : — Ije su ̱ o . Je rä iwa ̱ shka ̱ ta ta ̱ i .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Ata moska te isha : — Ije te ale ka wä wajuenak kuna je wä wajuewa ̱ ra , ¿ maikäi ka je ia ̱ ji o ̱ r ka Lázaro duäkläwa ̱ ye rä na ?

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Jera Jesús ssënawa ̱ ni shi ̱ ana . Jekäi idemi sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska . Je rä ishäkä wä ja ̱ r kjäitäle jak wà .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Jak tso ̱ ju ̱ omi . Ata je duawa ̱ kuta Marta te isha : — Säkekewa , ije jalanaka ̱ kja nu ̱ u ̱ , je wa ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ cuatro día ki ̱ ka .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ata ¿ ka yis wa ̱ iyine ma ia ̱ ma je ̱ r ja ̱ no ra , ba te Säkeklä te ji we ̱ baa su ̱ emini na ?

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Jera ijewa te jak tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami . Jera Jesús wäkaka ̱ jöikje te isha : — Wekte ba ra Papá , ba te yis ktä ssa ki ̱ ka .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba te yis ktä ssë maitjä . Ata yie ishe jikäi , yis säkätä ja ̱ mi tapar tso ̱ wa wa ̱ issäklä , ijewa wa ̱ ibiketsäklä iyina si ̱ ba ne wa ̱ yis patkeleté rä .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Ite je sha e ̱ ná ra , jera ia ̱ na täkii : — Lázaro , bä kuteksa ̱ .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Jera je dulewa ̱ deksa ̱ ju ̱ klä pabutälewa ̱ jula pabutälewa ̱ sua kukäla wà , ñakäi wä pabutälewa ̱ sua kukä saka wà . Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ipayöksa ̱ ni , ijöwa ̱ minak .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Ñerä Judío wa dele María wäki ̱ ka wa te ji wá ̱ Jesús te je su ̱ a ra , jewa sha ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te Jesús biketsa .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Ata moska minemi fariseo wa wäki ̱ , jewa te ji wá ̱ Jesús te pakani .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , fariseo wa irä , jewa te Sanedrín wa tapawa ̱ wa ̱ . Jeska ijewa te ichaka ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Me sa te iwe ̱ na ? Ije te ji we ̱ ke ̱ ta ̱ i ijuenaklä ye .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Jekäi sa te ije jawa ̱ bitaba ra , jera biköle te ije biketse mar . Jekjepa ra Roma wa dämijulu sa ̱ ka ̱ kiäklä jui irä , sä ditsei wä irä , weikäkcha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Jera ijewa sha ̱ kie Caifás , je rä chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je año wà , je te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ka bas wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni ju ̱ ñer .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Ka bas wa ̱ ibiketsane saje wa ia ̱ ra bäi si ̱ rä eklabä me duäwa ̱ sajewa biköle säkei ye , ka saje ditsei wä kalabe tuanakläwa ̱ ye .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Jekäi ite isha rä ka iwakei je ̱ r wà kuna . Ata ije rä chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je año bala na ki ̱ ka , ite ibata shaba jishtä Jesús kiana duäkwa ̱ ijewa biköle säkei ye rä käi .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Ata ka ijewa ditsei wä ebä säkei ye kuna , ata ñakäi Säkeklä yabala tso ̱ bala butsäle ka ̱ biköle ska jewa biköle tapanakläwa ̱ etka yebä .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Jekäi je día skami ijewa te ibiketsaksa ̱ Jesús ktäkwa ̱ .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ka Jesús shkene ji ̱ a su ̱ nak yile wa ̱ käi Judío wa sha ̱ na , ata ije ̱ k tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami kju ̱ awa demi jukläyäkä kie Efraín ska . Je ke ̱ i rä alemana ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska . Jeska ise ̱ na iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Judío wa wa ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je ke ̱ i tkenawa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka Judío wa dar je ke ̱ i biköle ska minejulumiba chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ Jerusalén ska je ̱ k siki tewa ̱ k , je ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ mar yika .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Jewa te Jesús yule rami . Jekäi idäke ̱ Templo ska ra , ite ichakeke ̱ ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Maikäi irä bas ia ̱ ra ? ¿ Ka idäk ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ k na ?

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Ñerä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , fariseo wa irä , jewa wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ le rä manele te iju ̱ ña mai Jesús katke ra , je wa ̱ ibata shäklä ijewa ia ̱ , ijewa wa ̱ ikukäkläwa ̱ .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Jekäi Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä sher ji ̱ a seis día ra , Jesús demiju ̱ Betania ska mai Lázaro katke ska . Ije ne rä ale shki ̱ leka ̱ ni Jesús wa ̱ dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na rä .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Jeska ijewa te jile äliwa ̱ Jesús ia ̱ . Je wachewa ̱ Marta te . Jeska Jesús da ñatululewa ̱ yäkäk wa sha ̱ na Lázaro kalmeña .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Ñerä María te perfume yöle nardo wak si ̱ wà säkei ta doloiebä je tsa ̱ ksa ̱ una libra . Jekäi je tkaka ̱ ite Jesús klä ki ̱ ka , pasikani ite itsa ̱ ku ̱ kä wà . Je te ju ja ̱ r kalabe jalawa ̱ ka ̱ ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Jekäi Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ekla Judas Iscariote wa , je ne te iju ̱ emiksa ̱ ikukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ rä , je te isha :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: — ¿ Jiye ka je perfume wato ̱ neju ̱ mi tresciento denario kjena säkei me ̱ nak ka jita wa ia ̱ rä na ?

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Ka iwa ̱ je yine rä ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi ka jita wa dälärke ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata ije rä jakbläk ne ki ̱ ite jekäi isha rä . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ije ne rä ijewa inaklä jui tsa ̱ k rä , ata je te ijierke ̱ ina je kaku jakibleke ̱ .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Ije jöwa ̱ bitaba . Je bla ite rä wao ̱ nak yis itäbir mar díaí wà .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , del ka jita wa tso ̱ bas sha ̱ na rä , ata yis je ka se ̱ nak del bas sha ̱ na .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Judío wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ te iju ̱ ña Jesús katke Betania ska ra , jera iminejulumi jeka , ka Jesús ebä su ̱ ak kuna , ata iwa ̱ Lázaro shki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na iwa ̱ je su ̱ ak ñaebä .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Ata chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te iwabiketsaksa ̱ ñaebä Lázaro ktäkwa ̱ .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je shki ̱ leka ̱ ni bata ki ̱ ka Judío wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ñabutsäte ijewa yika Jesús biketsäk .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Bulirishtä ra je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ dele Jerusalén ska ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ k jewa te iju ̱ ña Jesús daju ̱ .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te jäyuk kä tia , je wäkseka iminejulumi iña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k . Jewa te ikjeisha a ̱ le täkii : “ ¡ Hosana ! Bäije ale daju ̱ Säkekewa kie ja ̱ mi rä , ale Israel wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä . ”

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Jera Jesús te burro yaba ku ̱ a , je ki ̱ ije ̱ tkaka ̱ . Je rä iyöle katke käi :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: “ Yaba busi Sión , ke ba suana ji yika ; isu ̱ o , ba tsa ̱ ku ̱ i daju ̱ té je ̱ tkeleka ̱ burro yaba ki ̱ ka . ”

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Je o ̱ na ke ̱ i ska ra Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne iia ̱ . Ata Jesús oloi kanaka ̱ kjepa ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra jekäi io ̱ na je rä ije ne ktei yöle , ñakäi je kte te ishe ssëta ditsä te iwa ̱ iia ̱ rä .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Ditsä tso ̱ Jesús da iwa ̱ Lázaro kileksa ̱ ishäkä wäja ̱ r naka iwa ̱ ishki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ra , jewa te je ktei pakani .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka je ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ minejulumi Jesús ña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jewa te issa Jesús te jekäi iwá ̱ ijuenaklä ye ki ̱ ka .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Ata fariseo wa te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¡ Isu ̱ o ! Itjä ka bas wao ̱ r . Ñera biköle marmi ijebä ra .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Je ditsä delemi Jerusalén ska Säkeklä oloitsäk ale ike ̱ i kjewe ̱ marmi ska , jewa sha ̱ na Griego wa tso ̱ .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Ijewa demi Felipe wäki ̱ . Felipe dar Betsaida ska , je rä Galilea ke ̱ i ska . Ije ia ̱ ijewa te isha pjoo : — Säkekewa , sá kiana Jesús su ̱ ak .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Jera Felipe mineju ̱ je bata shäk Andrés ia ̱ . Jekäi Andrés mineju ̱ Felipe ra je bata shäk Jesús ia ̱ .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ike ̱ i dewa ̱ kja ditsä yäbei oloi kanakläka ̱ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ke trigo wädoloi ja ̱ nowa ̱ pa ishäkä ki ̱ ka duäkwa ̱ ra , jera maitjä irä etka wä ebä . Ata iduawa ̱ ra , jera ije ̱ rmika ̱ wänak ta ̱ i .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Je su ̱ ta yi je ̱ k shka ̱ li ̱ bla ra , je rä weikanakwa ̱ . Ata yi je ̱ k dokoitsa ka ̱ jiska ra , je rä ije ̱ k tsa ̱ tkaksa ̱ se ̱ nak jekjeye .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Yilé ssëna yis kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ra , je kiana minak yis da . Jekäi ra mai yis katke ska , yis kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k kätkämiña . Yilé te yis kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ ra , jera yis Ká te je oloi kemika ̱ .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: “ Jira yis je ̱ r ianawa ̱ ta ̱ i . ¿ Ata jiräni yie ishe na ? ‘ ¿ Papá , yis bäköksa ̱ jí hora yika ni na ? ’ Ata je ne ye yis de jí hora ska rä .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Papá , ba kie oloi köka ̱ pa . ” Jera kte ssënaté ka ̱ jöir , te isha : — Yis te ioloi kaka ̱ kja , ata yis te ioloi kemika ̱ ni etäbä kicha .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Ñerä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapar tso ̱ jeska wa te je ssa ra , jera moska te isha ñaia ̱ : — Tala ne bulana rä . Ata isaka te isha : — Ángel ne kta Jesús da rä .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Je kte ssënaté rä wata ye bas ne ia ̱ ; ka je rä yis ia ̱ kuna .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Jira ka ̱ jiska wa ktei wabiketsarmiksa ̱ , jira ka ̱ jiska tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ju ̱ rmiksa ̱ .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Ata mika ̱ yis tkenaka ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ka ra , yie biköle ssëwe ̱ mi däkwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Ije te isha jekäi wà rä ditsä wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä jishtä ije duämiwa ̱ rä .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Jera ditsä te isha : — Sá wa ̱ issële ka ̱ wei yöle te ishe rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ se ̱ rmi rä jekjeye . ¿ Jera maikäi ba te ishe ditsä yäbei kiana tkenakka ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ni na ? Ata yibä je ditsä yäbei rä na ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ka ̱ oloi ñirmi ji ̱ a elkje bas sha ̱ na . Jekäi ka ̱ oloi tso ̱ ji ̱ a ra , bas shkä ebä , ka ka ̱ tuil wa ̱ bas kukäkläwa ̱ kuna . Ata yi shkäke ̱ ka ̱ tuil na ra , ka iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer maka imar dä .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Ata je ka ̱ oloi tso ̱ ji ̱ a bas sha ̱ na ra , jera je ka ̱ oloi biketsö bas ku ̱ bas däkläwa ̱ je ka ̱ oloi yäbeila ye . Jesús te isha e ̱ ná jekäi ra , ije ̱ k butsaju ̱ mi je ̱ k blawa ̱ ditsä yika .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Jesús wa ̱ ji o ̱ le kju ̱ awa ijuenaklä ye ijewa wäna ta ̱ i , ata maitjä ka ijewa wa ̱ je biketsane kuna .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Je rä io ̱ nakläpa jishtä jile bata shäk Isaías te isha käi . Je te isha : “ Säkekewa , ¿ yi te sä ktä kuka na ? Säkekewa , ¿ yi ia ̱ ba jula täkili kjayile rä na ? ”

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ka ijewa ia ̱ ije biketsanak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Isaías te ietkä sha ji ̱ a rä :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: “ Ite ijewa iawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ka wä wajuenak kuna , ñakäi ite ijewa je ̱ r doloi tewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ . Je rä ka ijewa wä wajuenaklä kuna , ka ijewa je ̱ r na ji däkläwa ̱ kuna , ka ijewa je ̱ rike manenakläksa ̱ kuna , ka yis wa ̱ ijewa bäinewa ̱ klä ye . ”

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isaías te jekäi isha rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ite ije oloi su ̱ a ki ̱ ka , jekäi ite ije paka .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Jeiräta Judío wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te Jesús biketsa . Ñakäi itsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa sha ̱ manele te ibiketsa . Ata ka iwa ̱ iyineka ̱ kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ fariseo wa yika iö itulurksa ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska ki ̱ ka .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa ki ̱ ishena ditsä me sä kjeishäpa Säkeklä me sä kjeishäpa je tsa ̱ ta .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha täkii : “ Yi te yis biketsa ra , ka je wa ̱ yis ebä biketsane kuna , ata yis patkäkté ne biketsa ite rä .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Jekäi manele te yis su ̱ a ra , je rä sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä yis patkäkté ne su ̱ a ite rä käi .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Yis de ka ̱ jiska rä ka ̱ oloi ye , yis biketsäk wa biköle ka se ̱ naklä kuna ji ̱ a ka ̱ tuil na .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Mane yis ktä ssäk wa wa ̱ ka yis ktä dälätsane ra , jera ka yis wa ̱ ije ktei wabiketsanaksa ̱ buka ̱ nak kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yis de ne rä ka ̱ jiska wa ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ buka ̱ nak kuna , ata yis de rä ka ̱ jiska wa tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Ata mane yis dokoitsäk wa , ñakäi ka yis ktä kukäk kuna wa , jewa rä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ta . Ale kte yile yis wa ̱ ; je ebä te iktei wabiketsemiksa ̱ sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yis wa ̱ kte yine rä yis wakei je ̱ r wà kuna , ata Sa Ká yis patkäkté je wakei te yis ia ̱ ka ̱ wei ma ̱ jishtä yis kiana ishäk käi , jini yis kiana ipakäk käi .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ije wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ le je oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ se ̱ rmi jekjeye , jekäi ji sheke ̱ yis te je rä jiräni Sa Ká wa ̱ yis ia ̱ ji yile je ja ̱ mi bulee . ”

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Säktäkwa ̱ bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä tkenawa ̱ kja ra , Jesús wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ihoraí dewa ̱ iminakläju ̱ ka ̱ jiska däkmi Sa Ká wäki ̱ . Ije wa ̱ iwakei ja ̱ mi wa tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska jewa rä shka ̱ li ̱ blenak , jekäi ite ijewa shka ̱ li ̱ bla ma rä ibata jekje .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ tuinawa ̱ ra ijewa yäkä kajali . Jera Judas , Simón Iscariote wa yaba , je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ kja be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te Jesús ju ̱ akksa ̱ ikukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Ata Jesús wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Sa Ká wa ̱ ji biköle rä ju ̱ leksa ̱ ije ia ̱ iwa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak . Ñakäi irä patkeleté Säkeklä wa ̱ , je maju ̱ mini Säkeklä wäki ̱ ka , je ju ̱ ñer iwa ̱ .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ k duaka ̱ iyäkä tso ̱ ska te ije ̱ k ki ̱ shönak ya ju ̱ ami , jekäi ite paño mu ̱ awa ̱ ikipa ja ̱ mi .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Jera ite diklä tia u ̱ yaka yöle naka , je wà ite iwa ̱ dulanak wa klä paskuami , je pasikani ite paño mo ̱ lewa ̱ ikipa ja ̱ mi wà .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Ñerä ideju ̱ Simón Pedro kalme ska ra , je te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ ba te yis klä paskueke ̱ na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ji we ̱ ke ̱ yis te , ka je ia ̱ ba je ̱ r ko ̱ ne jira , ata je ̱ na je ̱ na ra , je te ba je ̱ r ku ̱ emi .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Ata Pedro te isha : — Ka yie ka ̱ me ̱ ba wa ̱ yis klä paskuäklä mik a ̱ ni . Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ka yis wa ̱ ba klä pasuka ̱ ne ra , jera ka ba rä yis ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Jera Simón Pedro te isha : — Säkekewa , jera ke yis klä ebä paskua , ata ñakäi yis jula irä yis tsa ̱ ku ̱ irä paskuö .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — Sä rä okle kja ra , ka jiye sä shene ji ̱ a ukäk . Ata sä klä ebä ne sherke ̱ pasuka ̱ nak rä , je ekta rä yëë ki ̱ ka . Bas dä yëë , ata ka bas bena rä yëë kuna .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Jesús wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yibä te iju ̱ emiksa ̱ ikukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ rä . Je ki ̱ ka ite isha : “ Bas bena rä ka yëë kuna . ”

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Ñerä Jesús te ijewa klä paskua e ̱ ná ra , ite iwa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ jiawa ̱ ni je ̱ k baklawa ̱ ni yäkäk , jera ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a je yis te iwá ̱ te na ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Bas te yis kie Sapaktäk ni , Säkekewa ni . Jera je sha bas te rä bäi , yis dä jekäi ki ̱ ka .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Jeiräta yis bas Paktäk bas Säkekewaí ne te bas klä paskua rä ra , je su ̱ ta bas kiana ñaklä paskuewa ̱ k .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Yis te je wá ̱ rä bas wa ̱ mablenak , bas wa ̱ iwa ̱ klä jishtä yis te iwá ̱ bas ia ̱ käi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , kjanaklä rä ka iblui tsa ̱ ta kuna , je su ̱ ta yi rä patkeleté je rä ka ipatkäkté tsa ̱ ta kuna .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Jekäi bas te je ju ̱ ña , je wawá ̱ bas te ra , bäije bas dä .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Ka yis wa ̱ bas bena yine kuna . Mane wa rä kolole yis wa ̱ jewa ju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ . Ata ishena o ̱ nak jishtä kte yöle te ishe käi : “ Pan ñak yis daña , je klä ñak kaka ̱ ni ji wa ̱ k yis ukä ja ̱ mi . ”

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Jira yie je she ka io ̱ rba yikaba . Je rä mika ̱ je o ̱ na ra bas wa ̱ ibiketsäklä yis ne irä .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te yis wa ̱ patkele kiawa ̱ ra , je rä ite yis ne kiawa ̱ rä ; jera yi te yis kiawa ̱ ra , je rä ite yis patkäkté ne kiawa ̱ rä .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Jesús te jekäi isha e ̱ ná ra , jera ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ ta ̱ i te ishaka ̱ : — Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas sha ̱ ekla te yis ju ̱ emiksa ̱ .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka iwa ̱ dulanak wa ñasu ̱ a bena , ka iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer manebä si ̱ sha ite rä .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Jera jewa sha ̱ ekla , ale Jesús wa ̱ shka ̱ ta , je kalme je ̱ k ku ̱ lewa ̱ Jesús pja ̱ ja ̱ mi ,

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: je je ̱ r ku ̱ a Pedro te julasku bata wà iwa ̱ ichakäklä Jesús ia ̱ manebä sha ite rä í ̱ .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Jera je je ̱ k ku ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ Jesús je ̱ r bata ja ̱ mi , te ichaka iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ yibä irä na ?

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Mane ia ̱ yis te pan nu ̱ we ̱ che ̱ mar da ra , je ne irä . Jekäi ite pan nu ̱ wa ̱ cha ̱ , cha ̱ mi ite Judas , ale Simón Iscariote wa yaba ia ̱ .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Judas te je pan ñara , jera ñawäsaka Satanás kjawa ̱ Judas ja ̱ rka . Jera Jesús te isha Judas ia ̱ : — Ji we ̱ ke ̱ ba te , je wo ̱ mane mane .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Jera ñatululewa ̱ yäkäk wa mane a ̱ ni ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne iia ̱ jiye ite jekäi isha iia ̱ rä .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Ata Judas ne wa ̱ ijewa inaklä jui tso ̱ rä , je ki ̱ ka ijewa manele te ibiketsa Jesús te isheke ̱ iia ̱ rä : “ Jile sherke ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ ike ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je tju ̱ o ” iräle , ata ite ipatkeke ̱ jile ma ̱ k ka jita wa ia ̱ iräle .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Jekäi ite je ña e ̱ ná ra , imineju ̱ mi . Jera ka ̱ tuinawa ̱ kja .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Judas mineju ̱ kja ra , jera Jesús te isha : — Jira ditsä yäbei oloi karmika ̱ , jekäi je wà Säkeklä oloi karmika ̱ .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Je wà Säkeklä oloi kanaka ̱ ra , jera ñaebä Säkeklä te ije oloi kemika ̱ iwakei ra . Je oloi kemika ̱ ite rä plaa .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Yabala rikä wa , yis se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a berbena bas da . Bas te yis yulemi , ata yie ishe bas ia ̱ jishtä yis wa ̱ iyile Judío wa ia ̱ käi : ‘ Mai yis ma rä jeska ka bas däkmi . ’

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Jira yis te ka ̱ wei spa ̱ na me ̱ bas ia ̱ , je rä bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö . Jishtä yis te bas shka ̱ li ̱ bla käi , bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Jekäi bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ bla ra , je wà biköle te isu ̱ emi bas dä yis wa ̱ dulanak wa .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Jera Simón Pedro te isha Jesús ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ maka ba maju ̱ rä ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Mai yis ma rä , jeska ka ba kjäk yis itä ki ̱ jira , ata je ̱ na je ̱ na ra bä kjämi yis itä ki ̱ jeska .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
