text2: Jera Pedro te ichaka iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ jiye jí kje ra ka yis kjäk ba itä ki ̱ na ? Yis je ̱ k ju ̱ amiksa ̱ ba kju ̱ ei .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — ¿ Ba je ̱ k ju ̱ amiksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ yis kju ̱ ei na ? Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ba ia ̱ , ka oshkoro a ̱ rka ̱ ba yikaba , ba ka ̱ yuämiwa ̱ mañatäbä kicha ka ba wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ni .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Ke bas je ̱ r iana . Bas te Säkeklä biketse käi , bas ku ̱ yis biketsö ñaebä .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Yis Ká ju ska ija ̱ r bala tkeleksa ̱ tso ̱ ta ̱ i . Ke ikuna jekäi ra , ka yis wa ̱ iyinak . Yis maju ̱ ka ̱ yuläkba bas ia ̱ .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Jekäi yis maju ̱ te ka ̱ yula bas ia ̱ ra , jera yis däni bas jäkmi yis da . Je rä bas se ̱ naklä mai yis katke rä ska .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Bas wa ̱ mai yis maju ̱ je ju ̱ ñer , ñakäi bas wa ̱ je ña ̱ le ̱ i ju ̱ ñer .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Jera Tomás te isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ka sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer maka ba maju ̱ rä , jera ¿ maikäi sá wa ̱ je ña ̱ le ̱ i ju ̱ ñer na ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Yis ne rä ña ̱ la rä , ji rä iyina si ̱ rä , ñakäi se ̱ ne kseka rä . Yi a ̱ ni ka däkmi Sa Ká wäki ̱ , ka idenewa ̱ yis oloi ja ̱ mi ra .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Ikuna yi yis dä ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa ra , jera ñaebä yi rä yis Ká rä te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ; ata jirami bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite , ñakäi bas te ije su ̱ a e ̱ ná .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Jera Felipe te isha : — Säkekewa , Sa Ká kjashö sá ia ̱ , je ne kjela sherke ̱ sá ki ̱ rä .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Felipe , ta ̱ i yis se ̱ na bas sha ̱ na , ¿ ata ka ba je ̱ r ko ̱ r yi yis dä ia ̱ na ? Yi wa ̱ yis su ̱ le ra , je wa ̱ Sa Ká su ̱ le ; jera ¿ maikäi ba te ishe : ‘ Sa Ká kjashö sá ia ̱ ni ? ’

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: ¿ Ka ba wa ̱ ibiketsane iyina si ̱ yis tso ̱ rä Sa Ká ja ̱ mi , ñakäi ije tso ̱ rä yis ja ̱ mi na ? Kte yinak yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ , ka je she kuna yis te yis wakei je ̱ r wà . Ata Sa Ká se ̱ nak yis ja ̱ rka te ji tso ̱ iwa ̱ o ̱ nak je ne we ̱ kate rä .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Yie isha yis dä Sa Ká ja ̱ mi , ñakäi Sa Ká rä yis ja ̱ mi , je kukö bas ku ̱ kte si ̱ ye . Ata ka bas wa ̱ ikolone kte si ̱ ye ra , bas ku ̱ yis ktä kukö kte si ̱ ye ji o ̱ le yis wa ̱ kju ̱ awa je ki ̱ ka .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , yi te yis biketsa ra , ñaebä ji we ̱ ke ̱ yis te je we ̱ mi ije te . Ijewa te je we ̱ mi yis wa ̱ ji o ̱ le tsa ̱ ta , je rä yis maju ̱ mi Sa Ká wäki ̱ je ki ̱ ka .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Ji kieke ̱ bas te yis kie ja ̱ mi ra , je biköle we ̱ mi yis te Sa Ká oloi kanakläka ̱ iyaba oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Jekäi bas te jile kia yis ia ̱ yis kie ja ̱ mi ra , yie je we ̱ mi .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: “ Bas wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l da , jera yis wa ̱ ji yile o ̱ nak je wawe ̱ mi bas te .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Jekäi Sa Ká ia ̱ yis ka ̱ kiämi , jekäi ite Sa ̱ Tsa ̱ tkäk saka me ̱ mi bas ia ̱ , je wa ̱ bas wapebläklä jekjeye .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Je rä iwikblu ktäk bulee . Ka je kolonak ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ijewa wäna ije juer , ñakäi ka ije ̱ r ko ̱ r yi irä ia ̱ . Ata bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite yi irä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije se ̱ r dä bas da , ñakäi ije se ̱ rmi bas ja ̱ rka .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: “ Ka yis wa ̱ bas janakwa ̱ ta ̱ na shchul wa käi . Ata yis dämini bas wäki ̱ .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Berbena ebä ra ka ̱ jiska wa wa ̱ ka yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ata bas te yis su ̱ emi ji ̱ a . Yis dä kseka . Je ki ̱ ka bas se ̱ rmi kseka .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà bas je ̱ r ko ̱ rmi yis dä yis Ká ja ̱ mi , ñakäi bas dä yis ja ̱ mi , ñakäi yis dä bas ja ̱ mi .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Yi wa ̱ yis wa ̱ ji yile o ̱ nak ju ̱ ñer , ñakäi je wawá ̱ ite ra , je ne wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l dä . Jekäi yi wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l da , je shka ̱ li ̱ blemi yis Ká te . Jekäi yie ije shka ̱ li ̱ blemi , ñakäi yis je ̱ k kjashämi ije ia ̱ . ”

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Jera Judas , ka Iscariote wa kuna te ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ jiye ba je ̱ k kjashämi sá ebä ia ̱ , ata ka ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ kuna rä na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Manele wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l da , je te yis ktä wawe ̱ mi . Jekäi yis Ká te ije shka ̱ li ̱ blemi . Ñakäi sá dämiwa ̱ ije ska , jekäi sá se ̱ rmi ije ra .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Yi wa ̱ ka yis shka ̱ l da , ije wa ̱ ka yis ktä wao ̱ nak . Jí kte ssënak bas wa ̱ je rä ka yis ktä kuna , ata je rä Sa Ká yis patkäkté je ne ktä .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: “ Yis te je sha bas ia ̱ yis kaldu ji ̱ a bas sha ̱ na ra .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Ata Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk , ale Wikblu Sikina patkenak ji ̱ a Sa Ká wa ̱ yis kie ja ̱ mi , je te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ji biköle wà , ñaebä ite bas je ̱ r ja ̱ we ̱ mini ji biköle yile yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ jeska . ”

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: “ Yis te ssëne baa ju ̱ eke ̱ ta ̱ na bas ia ̱ . Jishtä yis ssër baa käi yie bas ia ̱ ime ̱ ke ̱ . Je ssëne baa me ̱ nak yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ , ka je rä jishtä ka ̱ jiska ji tso ̱ te sä ssëwe ̱ baa käi kuna . Jekäi ke bas je ̱ r iana , ke bas suana .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Yis te isha bas ia ̱ yis maju ̱ , ata yis däni bas wäki ̱ ka , je ssa bas te . Ikuna rä bas wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l da , jera yis maju ̱ Sa Ká wäki ̱ ka te bas ssëwe ̱ mi rä a ̱ naa , je rä Sa Ká rä yis tsa ̱ ta ki ̱ ka .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Jí kje ra yie je sha bas ia ̱ , ka je o ̱ rba yika ; je rä mika ̱ je o ̱ na ra , bas wa ̱ yis biketsäklä . ”

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: “ Ka yis ktä ji ̱ a jaree bas da , ka ̱ jiska tsa ̱ ku ̱ i daju ̱ kja ki ̱ ka . Ka je tu ̱ nakka ̱ yis ki ̱ ka .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Ata je rä ka ̱ jiska wa wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä yis wa ̱ Sa Ká shka ̱ l , ñakäi jishtä Sa Ká te yis paka iwa ̱ k ra , jekäi yie iwe ̱ ke ̱ . “ Jekäi bas ñajöka ̱ , sä shkä . ”

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: “ Yis ne rä uva kicha si ̱ rä . Yis Ká ne rä uva kicha pasu ̱ ak rä .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Jekäi bena ijula tkelewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ka wänak kuna shtä , jewa tie tuleke ̱ ksa ̱ ite . Ata ijula wänak shtä , jewa bäi we ̱ ke ̱ ite iwänaklä ki ̱ ta .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Jekäi bas dä ijula bäile kja , kte yile yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Bas se ̱ no balewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi , jera yis se ̱ rmi balewa ̱ bas ja ̱ mi . Ka ijula wänak je ̱ r wà , ata je shena rä se ̱ nak balewa ̱ ikicha ja ̱ mi . Je su ̱ ta ka bas se ̱ ne balewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ra , jera ka bas wänak .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: “ Yis ne rä ikicha rä , bas dä ijula . Yi se ̱ r balewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ra , ñakäi yis dä balewa ̱ ije ja ̱ mi ra , jera je wärmi ta ̱ i . Ata bala butsäle yis yika ra , ji a ̱ ni ka o ̱ nak bas ia ̱ .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Yi ka se ̱ ne balewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ra , je rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ ka kianak ji ̱ a ijula ye . Je rä ssi ̱ nakwa ̱ kita ̱ nakni tulunakka ̱ yökö ki ̱ ka dälänakwa ̱ .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: “ Bas se ̱ r dä balewa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi ra , ñakäi yis ktä tso ̱ rä balewa ̱ bas ja ̱ mi ra , ji sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ käi je kiö bas ku ̱ , jera je o ̱ rmi bas ia ̱ .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Bas wäna ta ̱ i ra , je wà bas te ikjashemi bas dä yis wa ̱ dulanak wa . Je wà yis Ká oloi karmika ̱ .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Jishtä Sa Ká wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l , je su ̱ ta yis wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l . Jekäi bas se ̱ no balewa ̱ yis wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l ja ̱ mi .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Yis wa ̱ ji yile o ̱ nak wawá ̱ bas te ra , bas se ̱ rmi balewa ̱ yis wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l ja ̱ mi , jishtä yis Ká wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ le yis ia ̱ je wawá ̱ yie , je ki ̱ ka yis se ̱ r dä balewa ̱ ije wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l ja ̱ mi käi .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: “ Yie jekäi isha bas ia ̱ je rä bas ssënaklä a ̱ naa , yis käi , ñakäi bas ssënaklä a ̱ naa wa ̱ si ̱ .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Jikäi yie bas pake iwa ̱ k rä : Bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö , jishtä yis te bas shka ̱ li ̱ bla käi .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Sa ̱ je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ shka ̱ ta wa ki ̱ , jera je tsa ̱ ta ka sa ̱ ia ̱ ñashka ̱ li ̱ blenak ji ̱ a .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Ji sheke ̱ ta ̱ na yis te je wá ̱ bas te ra , bas dä yis wa ̱ shka ̱ ta wa .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Ka jira yie bas kie kuna ji ̱ a kjanaklä wa ni . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , kjanaklä wa wa ̱ ka iju ̱ ñer ji we ̱ ke ̱ iblui te rä käi . Ata yie bas kie rä yis wa ̱ shka ̱ ta wa ni , ji biköle yile yis ká wa ̱ je ssa yis te , je shani yie bas ia ̱ je ki ̱ ka .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Ka bas wa ̱ yis kolone kuna , ata yis ne te bas kuka rä , bas minaklä wänak ; ñakäi je bas wärke ̱ ka weikanakläwa ̱ kuna . Jekäi ra ji kieke ̱ bas te Sa Ká ia ̱ yis kie ja ̱ mi käi , je ma ̱ klä iwa ̱ bas ia ̱ .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Jikäi yie bas pakeke ̱ iwa ̱ k rä : Bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: “ Ka ̱ jiska tso ̱ wa je ̱ r ki ̱ bas iana ra , bas ku ̱ iju ̱ ñopa säkätä ra yis ne iana ijewa je ̱ r ki ̱ rä .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Bas kuna rä ka ̱ jiska wa ye ra , jewa te bas shka ̱ li ̱ blemi bas dä ijewa ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka . Ata ka bas dä ka ̱ jiska wa kuna , ata ka ̱ jiska wa sha ̱ na yis wa ̱ bas kolole , je ne ki ̱ ka ka ̱ jiska wa je ̱ r ki ̱ bas iarke ̱ rä .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ iyile : ‘ Kjanaklä rä ka iblui tsa ̱ ta kuna ’ , jeska bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no . Ijewa te yis kukawa ̱ weikanak ra , jera ite bas kukemiwa ̱ weikanak je su ̱ ta . Jekäi jewa te yis ktä wawá ̱ ra , jera ite bas ktä kukemi wao ̱ nak .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Ata ijewa te je biköle we ̱ mi bas ukä ja ̱ mi yis kie kju ̱ ei . Je rä ka iwa ̱ yis patkäkté ju ̱ ñer ki ̱ ka .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: “ Ke yis döpa , ke yis ku ̱ ijewa ia ̱ ji shöpa ra , jera ka ijewa rä nui ta . Ata jira ka ijewa je ̱ k wetsäklei ji ̱ a ji yakei wakblele iwa ̱ yika .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Yi te yis dokoitsawa ̱ ra , je te yis Ká dokoitsawa ̱ ñaebä .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Ke yis ku ̱ ji ka o ̱ le kuna yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ je wo ̱ pa ijewa sha ̱ na ra , jera ka ijewa rä nui ta kuna . Ata jira ijewa te je su ̱ a , jeiräta jewa te yis irä yis Ká irä je dokoitsa .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Je rä io ̱ nakläpa jishtä kte tso ̱ ijewa ka ̱ wei ska yöle te ishe käi : ‘ Jewa te yis dokoitsawa ̱ ka ji a ̱ ni wata ki ̱ . ’

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: “ Ata Sa ̱ Tsa ̱ tkäk deju ̱ ra , je te yis ktei shemi . Je patkemi yis te bas ia ̱ . Je me ̱ mi Sa Ká te . Je rä iwikblu ktäk bulee , je daksa ̱ ju ̱ rä Sa Ká ska .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Ñakäi bas te yis ktei shemi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas kja yis da säkätä ska bite rä jira kje ki ̱ ka .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: “ Yie jekäi isha bas ia ̱ ka bas wäbuta ̱ nakläwa ̱ kuna .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Ijewa te bas tulemiksa ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska , ñakäi ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a mika ̱ yilé te bas ktawa ̱ ra , ijewa te ibiketsemi rä ite Säkeklä ne kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ rä .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Ite jekäi iwe ̱ mi ka iwa ̱ Sa Ká ju ̱ ñer ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ka iwa ̱ yis ju ̱ ñer ki ̱ ka .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Jekäi yis te je ktei sha bas ia ̱ , je rä mika ̱ je ke ̱ i dewa ̱ ra , bas je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä yis wa ̱ iyile bas ia ̱ ska . “ Ka yis wa ̱ je yine bas ia ̱ säkätä ra , yis katke ji ̱ a bas sha ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Ata jira yis maju ̱ mi yis patkäkté wäki ̱ . Jeiräta bas sha ̱ na yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka ichakane yis ia ̱ : ‘ ¿ Maka ma maju ̱ rä ? ’

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Ata bas je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ yie isha jekäi ki ̱ ka .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Ata yis te kte si ̱ she mar bas ia ̱ : Yis maju ̱ ni je rä kianak bas ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yis minene ra , ka Sa ̱ Tsa ̱ tkäk däkju ̱ bas ska . Ata yis mineju ̱ ra , jera yie ipatkemi bas ia ̱ .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Jekäi ije de ra , jera ite ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ ikjashemi ijewa rä nui ta , ñakäi ji wämo kjashemi ite iia ̱ , ñakäi ktei wabiketsaneksa ̱ je kjashemi ite iia ̱ .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ijewa rä nui ta , je juermi ka iwa ̱ yis biketsane ki ̱ ka .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Ñakäi ji wämo juermi yis maju ̱ mi Sa Ká ska je ki ̱ ka , jekäi ka bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Ñakäi ktei wabiketsaneksa ̱ juermi , ka ̱ jiska tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä ktei wabiketsaleksa ̱ e ̱ ná ki ̱ ka .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: “ Yis wa ̱ itso ̱ ji ̱ a ta ̱ i yinak bas ia ̱ , ata jí kje ra ka bas täki ta iwä kukäk .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Ata mika ̱ iwikblu ktäk bulee si ̱ dewa ̱ ra , jera ite bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ji rä iyina si ̱ biköle wà . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka iwa ̱ ji yinak iwakei je ̱ r wà kuna , ata ji ssa ite käi je biköle shemi ite , ñakäi ji dämi ji ̱ a sa ̱ ki ̱ ka je bata shemi ite bas ia ̱ .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Je te yis oloi kemika ̱ . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ji tso ̱ yis wa ̱ je kukemi ite yinakni bas ia ̱ .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ji tso ̱ Sa Ká wa ̱ je biköle rä yis cha . Je ne ki ̱ ka yie isha rä je iwikblu te ji tso ̱ yis wa ̱ je kukemi yinakni bas ia ̱ .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: “ Jirä berbena ra ka bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ata je itä ska berbena ra bas te yis su ̱ emini . ”

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa sha ̱ te ichaka ñaia ̱ : — Je ite isha : ‘ Jirä berbena ra ka bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ata je itä ska berbena ra bas te yis su ̱ emini ’ , ¿ jiräni je wà rä na ? Ñakäi ite isha : ‘ Yis maju ̱ mi Sa Ká ska , ’ ¿ jiräni je wà rä na ?

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Jekäi ite ichaka ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Je berbena sheke ̱ ite je wà rä jiräni na ? Ji sheke ̱ ite je ia ̱ ka sa ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ ne .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ijewa te ichakakle iki ̱ ka . Je ki ̱ ka ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Je yie isha : ‘ Jirä berbena ra ka bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ata je itä ska berbena ra bas te yis su ̱ emini ’ , ¿ je ne chakeke ̱ bas te ñaia ̱ rä na ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , bas ji ̱ ami bas kjoyirmi , ata ka ̱ jiska wa ssërmi a ̱ naa . Jekäi bas je ̱ r iarcha ̱ miwa ̱ , ata je je ̱ r iane rä tse ̱ nakju ̱ mi , jekäi bas je ̱ r ssërmini a ̱ naa .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Mika ̱ alaklä wa jula wako ̱ r mar da , jera ije ̱ r iarke ̱ ike ̱ i dewa ̱ ki ̱ ka . Ata mika ̱ iyaba su ̱ a ra , ka ije ̱ r ja ̱ r kuna ji ̱ a idua ska , je rä iyaba ko ̱ na te issëwa ̱ ni a ̱ naa ki ̱ ka .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Je su ̱ ta jira bas je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ , ata yie bas su ̱ emini , jera bas ssërmini a ̱ naa . Jekäi yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ je ssëne a ̱ naa ka tse ̱ nak ju ̱ nami kuna bas yika . ’

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: “ Je ke ̱ i wà ka bas wa ̱ ji chakanak ji ̱ a yis ia ̱ a ̱ ni . Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ji kia bas te yis kie ja ̱ mi Sa Ká ia ̱ käi , je me ̱ mi ite bas ia ̱ .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Ka bas wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni kirba yis kie ja ̱ mi , ata bas ku ̱ ji kiö , jera je dämiksa ̱ bas ia ̱ , bas ssënaklä a ̱ naa wa ̱ si ̱ .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: “ Yie ji paka jile she ja ̱ mi , ata ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ka yis ktäklä kuna ji ̱ a jile she ja ̱ mi , ata yis te Sa Ká ktei pakemi bulee .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà bas te jile kiemi yis kie ja ̱ mi . Ka yie ishe yis ka ̱ kiämi Sa Ká ia ̱ bas säkei ye ni .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Sa Ká wakei wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l bas wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l ki ̱ ka , ñakäi bas te ibiketsa yis dar dä Säkeklä ska je ki ̱ ka .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Yis bite Sa Ká ska je deju ̱ ka ̱ jiska , ata ka ̱ jiska jeke ̱ wa ̱ yie , jekäi yis maju ̱ ni Sa Ká ska . ”

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa te isha : — Jirje ba te isha rä bulee ka jile she ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Ba wa ̱ ji biköle ju ̱ ñer , je te jira sá je ̱ r ku ̱ a . Ñakäi ka jiye ba ki ̱ yi sher kuna ba wächakewa ̱ k , je te jira sá je ̱ r ku ̱ a . Ata je ba te isha wà sá te ibiketse ba dar dä Säkeklä ska .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jí kjepa bas te yis biketsa rä na ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Hora däke ̱ wa ̱ je dewa ̱ kja bas butsa ̱ na tuläklämi ekla ekla , maka bas mar käi . Jekäi bas te yis jemiwa ̱ ta ̱ na eklabä , ata ka yis a ̱ ta ̱ nak eklabä , je rä Sa Ká kaldu yis da ki ̱ ka .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Yie jekäi isha bas ia ̱ bas ssënaklä baa bas dä yis ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka . Ka ̱ jiska bas weikarmi ta ̱ i , ata bas je ̱ r ssëno täkii . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis dä tu ̱ leka ̱ ka ̱ jiska ji tso ̱ je ki ̱ ka .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Jesús te je sha e ̱ ná ra , jera iwä kaka ̱ ka ̱ jöir te isha : “ Papá , ike ̱ i dewa ̱ e ̱ ná . Ba ku ̱ ba yaba oloi köka ̱ , je ba yaba wa ̱ ba oloi käkläka ̱ .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Ba te ka ̱ wä ma ̱ ije ia ̱ ditsä biköle ju ̱ ñaklä , je rä iwa ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye ma ̱ klä ba wa ̱ me ̱ le ije ia ̱ wa biköle ia ̱ .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Jí ne rä se ̱ ne jekjeye rä , je rä ijewa ñayitäklä ba Säkeklä si ̱ eklabä ja ̱ mi , ñakäi Jesucristo patkeleté ba wa ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: “ Yie ba oloi kaka ̱ ka ̱ jiska . Ji ma ̱ ba te yis ia ̱ o ̱ nak je e ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ yis te .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Jekäi Papá , jira ba ku ̱ yis oloi köka ̱ ni ba wakei ra jishtä yis dä oloi kaleka ̱ ba ra ka ̱ jiska ka yörksa ̱ ba yika käi .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: “ Ditsä ma ̱ ba te yis ia ̱ ka ̱ jiska wa sha ̱ na , jewa ia ̱ yie ba kie paka . Ijewa rä ba cha ; jewa ma ̱ ba te yis ia ̱ , jekäi ijewa te ba ktä wawá ̱ .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Jira ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji biköle me ̱ le ba wa ̱ yis ia ̱ je dar dä ba ska .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba te yis ia ̱ kte ma ̱ , je ma ̱ ni yis te ijewa ia ̱ . Ijewa te je kuka , ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite si ̱ yis bite rä ba ska , jekäi ijewa te ibiketsa ba ne te yis patkaté rä .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: “ Yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ rä ijewa ki ̱ ka . Ka yis ka ̱ kiä kuna rä ka ̱ jiska wa ki ̱ ka kuna . Ata yis ka ̱ kieke ̱ rä ba wa ̱ me ̱ le yis ia ̱ wa ki ̱ ka , jewa rä ba cha ki ̱ ka .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Ji rä yis cha je biköle rä ba cha , ji rä ba cha je biköle rä yis cha . Jewa ja ̱ mi yis oloi kanaka ̱ .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: “ Ka yis kätkäk ji ̱ a ka ̱ jiska , ata ijewa käjäklämi ji ̱ a ka ̱ jiska , jekäi yis maju ̱ mi ba ska . Papá sikina si ̱ , ba ku ̱ ijewa kjänanopa ba kie me ̱ le ba wa ̱ yis ia ̱ je oloi ja ̱ mi , ijewa däkläwa ̱ etka yebä jishtä saje wa rä etka yebä käi .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Yis kja ijewa sha ̱ na ka ̱ jiska ra , jera yis te ijewa kjänana ba kie me ̱ le ba wa ̱ yis ia ̱ je oloi ja ̱ mi . Yis te ijewa wetsa , jekäi jewa mane a ̱ ni ka weikanewa ̱ kuna , ata ekla bitele weikanakwa ̱ je ebä ne weikanawa ̱ rä . Je rä io ̱ nakläpa kte yöle kalme te ishe käi .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: “ Jira yis maju ̱ ba wäki ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka yie jí sheke ̱ ka ̱ jiska ka yis miju ̱ ba yika ijewa ssënaklä a ̱ naa wa ̱ si ̱ ije ̱ r ska , jishtä yis ssëna a ̱ naa wa ̱ si ̱ käi .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Yie ba ktä ma ̱ ijewa ia ̱ . Ata ka ̱ jiska wa te ijewa dokoitsa ka ijewa rä ka ̱ jiska wa kuna ki ̱ ka , jishtä ka yis dä ka ̱ jiska wa kuna käi .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Ka yis ka ̱ kiä kuna ba wa ̱ ijäkläksa ̱ ka ̱ jiska , ata ba wa ̱ ikjänanaklä ale yakei si ̱ wakei yika .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Ka ijewa rä ka ̱ jiska wa kuna , jishtä ka yis dä ka ̱ jiska wa kuna käi .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Ba ku ̱ ijewa siki tewo ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ wà , ba ktä rä kte si ̱ .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Jishtä ba te yis patkaté ka ̱ jiska wa sha ̱ na , jekäi ñaebä yis te ijewa patkami ka ̱ jiska wa sha ̱ na .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Jekäi ijewa bata ki ̱ ka yis je ̱ k ju ̱ ake ̱ ksa ̱ , je rä ijewa siki tenaklä ji rä iyina si ̱ wà .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: “ Ka yis ka ̱ kiä kuna ijewa ebä ki ̱ ka , ata ijewa te sa pakteke ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi yi dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a yis biketsäk ye , jewa ki ̱ ka ñaebä yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ,

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: ijewa biköle däkläwa ̱ etka yebä , ijewa däkläwa ̱ saje wa ja ̱ mi , jishtä Papá ba rä yis ja ̱ mi , ñakäi yis dä ba ja ̱ mi käi . Je rä ka ̱ jiska wa wa ̱ ibiketsäklä ba ne te yis patkaté rä .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Ba wa ̱ yis ia ̱ oloi me ̱ le je ma ̱ yie ijewa ia ̱ , ijewa däkläwa ̱ etka yebä jishtä saje wa rä etka yebä käi .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Yis dä ijewa ja ̱ mi , ba rä yis ja ̱ mi , je rä ijewa däkläwa ̱ etka yebä si ̱ . Je rä ka ̱ jiska wa wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä ba ne te yis patkaté rä , ijewa wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä ba wa ̱ ijewa shka ̱ l jishtä ba wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l käi .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: “ Papá , je me ̱ le ba wa ̱ yis ia ̱ wa , sherke ̱ yis ki ̱ se ̱ nakña yis da mai yis kätkä ska , je rä ijewa wa ̱ yis oloi su ̱ aklä . Je oloi rä me ̱ le ba wa ̱ yis ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l ka ̱ jiska ka yörksa ̱ ba yika .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Papá wämo si ̱ , yi ba rä je ia ̱ ka ̱ jiska wa ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne . Ata yi ba rä je te yis je ̱ r ku ̱ a , ñakäi jí wa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ba ne te yis patkaté rä .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Yie ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ba kie wà , jekäi yie ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ji ̱ a je wà , je rä ijewa ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläklä , jishtä ba wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l käi , ñakäi yis däkläwa ̱ ijewa ja ̱ mi . ”

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Jesús te je sha e ̱ ná ra , imineju ̱ mi iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra diklä dochoi kie Cedrón a ̱ mi kata däkmi mai kal yäkä wäbala je ̱ le bäklä ska , je na ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Judas , ale Jesús ju ̱ akksa ̱ ikukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ , je wa ̱ je ke ̱ i rä su ̱ le , je ne ska Jesús ñatapawa ̱ ka ̱ raa iwa ̱ dulanak wa ra rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Jeska Judas deju ̱ guardia eyaka wa wäkse , ñakäi Templo kjänanak wa patkele chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ , fariseo wa wa ̱ jewa wäkse , tsi ̱ ni ta , kal bata wäkaleka ̱ ta , ñakpäklä ta .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Ata Jesús wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer kja jibä o ̱ rmi iukä ja ̱ mi biköle käi , je ki ̱ ka imineju ̱ ijewa wäki ̱ ka te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Yi yuleke ̱ bas te rä ?

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Jesús Nazaret wa . Jera ite isha : — Yis ne irä . Judas ale iju ̱ akksa ̱ kalduña ijewa ra .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ yis ne irä ra , jera ñawäsaka iñasikani shäbeka jolonacha ̱ wa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Jera ite ichakani ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Yi yuleke ̱ bas te rä ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Jesús Nazaret wa .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Jera ite isha : — Yis te isha yis ne irä . Jekäi bas te yis yuleke ̱ ra , jí wa jöwa ̱ minakjulu bitaba .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Ite jekäi isha io ̱ naklä jishtä iwakei wa ̱ iyile käi : “ Ba wa ̱ me ̱ le yis ia ̱ wa mane a ̱ ni ka weikanewa ̱ kuna yis ukä ja ̱ mi . ”

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Simón Pedro wa ̱ espada shkä , je sikaksa ̱ ite , je wà ite chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kjanaklä bika , ikukä wämo tia ju ̱ ami . Je kjanaklä kie rä Malco .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Jera Jesús te isha Pedro ia ̱ : — Ba espada patköwa ̱ ni ikjuä na . Sa Ká ne te yis ia ̱ copa cha ̱ te ra , ¿ ka irä yis ka ̱ wä ta je yäkwa ̱ na ?

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Jera je guardia eyaka wa irä , itsa ̱ ku ̱ i irä , Templo kjänanak wa patkele Judío wa wa ̱ irä , jewa te Jesús kukawa ̱ mu ̱ awa ̱ ,

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: je minetse ̱ iwa ̱ säkätä rä Anás wäki ̱ , je rä Caifás nuakji ki ̱ ka . Jera je Caifás ne rä je año wà ra chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Je ne wa ̱ iyile Judío wa ia ̱ : “ Bäi si ̱ rä eklabä me duäwa ̱ saje wa biköle säkei ye ” ni rä .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Simón Pedro irä Jesús wa ̱ dulanak el irä , jewa minejulu iitä ki ̱ . Je iel dä su ̱ le chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka je kjawa ̱ ju ̱ Jesús da chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i juitä ki ̱ .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Ata Pedro a ̱ ta ̱ na juitä kjätkeleksa ̱ kjä ska . Jera je iel dulanak Jesús wa ̱ je rä su ̱ le chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ , je deksa ̱ ju ̱ te ka ̱ kia busi ikjä kukäk ia ̱ . Jera ite Pedro kiawa ̱ ija ̱ rka .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Jera je kjanaklä ikjä kukäk te ichaka Pedro ia ̱ : — ¿ Ka ba rä ije wa ̱ dulanak wa sha ̱ ekla kuna na ? Jera ite isha : — Ka yis dä jewa kuna .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Jeska kjanaklä wa irä , Templo kjänanak wa irä , jewa wa ̱ yökö wäkar katke ka ̱ tse ̱ li ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka , jeska ijewa tapar tso ̱ klä ki ̱ bának . Je ra Pedro bár kalduña ijewa ra .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te Jesús wächakewa ̱ iwa ̱ dulanak wa ki ̱ ka irä ika ̱ ju ̱ ñe ki ̱ ka irä .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Yis te ji sha ka ̱ jiska wa ia ̱ biköle wäkata ska . Del yis te sa pakta rä ñapaktäklä jui ska , ñakäi Templo ska . Jeska rä Judío wa biköle ñatapawa ̱ klä . Ka yis wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni yine rä jaki käi kuna .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Jera ¿ jiye ba te yis wächakewe ̱ na ? Manele wa ̱ yis ktä rä ssënak , ijewa ia ̱ ichakö jiräni yis wa ̱ iyile rä . Ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji ni yis te isha rä käi .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Ite jekäi isha ra , jera Templo kjänanak wa ekla kaldu jeska , je te Jesús kpa jula wà te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye ba te chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kúke jekäi rä na ?

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Yis te isha rä yakei ra , ishö yis ia ̱ , ¿ ji sha yis te yakei rä na ? Ata yis te isha rä bäi ra , ¿ jiye ba te yis kpa na ?

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Jera Anás te ipatkami mo ̱ lewa ̱ chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Caifás wäki ̱ .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Je dälei ja ̱ mi Pedro bár kaldu yökö kjä ja ̱ mi , jera jeska tso ̱ wa te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ka ba rä ije wa ̱ dulanak wa sha ̱ ekla kuna na ? Jera ite iblawa ̱ te isha : — ¡ Ka yis dä jewa kuna !

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kjanaklä ekla , je rä ale Pedro wa ̱ kukä teleju ̱ mi je saka wa , je te iwächakewa ̱ : — ¿ Ka ba ne su ̱ a yis te kal yäkä wäbala na Jesús da rä na ?

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Jera Pedro ka ̱ yuawa ̱ ni . Jera je wäsaka oshkoro a ̱ naka ̱ .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Ñerä ka ̱ ñir dawa ̱ kja ra , Caifás ska ijewa wa ̱ Jesús minetse ̱ Pretorio ska . Ata ka ijewa minenewa ̱ Pretorio na . Je rä ka ijewa ianacha ̱ kläwa ̱ kuna ñá ye , je rä ijewa wa ̱ Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä je kätäkläña .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Pilato deksa ̱ ju ̱ ijewa wäki ̱ te isha : — ¿ Ji kju ̱ ei bas te jí ekla kjatieke ̱ rä na ?

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Ke ije kuna ji yakei wakbläk ra , ka sá wa ̱ idenetse ̱ bä wäki ̱ .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Jera Pilato te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas wakwa ku ̱ itso ̱ mi ktei wabiketsöksa ̱ bas wakwa ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi . Jera Judío wa te isha iia ̱ : — Ata ka sá ia ̱ ka ̱ wei kuna yi a ̱ ni ktäkläwa ̱ .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Je sha ijewa te je rä io ̱ naklä jishtä Jesús wa ̱ iyile käi . Je sha ite rä iju ̱ ñenaklä jishtä iduämiwa ̱ rä käi .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Jera Pilato minewa ̱ ju ̱ ni Pretorio na . Jeska ite Jesús kiami iwäki ̱ . Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ba ne rä Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä na ?

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — ¿ Je ba te ichaka biketsa rä ba wakei te na , ata kju ̱ awa te ma ia ̱ yis paka rä na ?

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Jera Pilato te ikúka : — Ka yis dä Judío wa kuna . Ata ba wakei ke ̱ i ska wa irä , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , jewa ne te ba ju ̱ aksa ̱ yis ia ̱ rä . ¿ Jera ji wá ̱ ba te rä na ?

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Yis dä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ka je ke ̱ i rä ka ̱ jiska kuna . Ata yis kuna sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ka ̱ jiska ra , jera yis tsa ̱ tkäk wa kju ̱ atkämi ka yis ju ̱ nakläksa ̱ kuna Judío wa ia ̱ . Ata yis dä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ka je ke ̱ i rä ka ̱ jiska kuna .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Jera Pilato te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Jera iyina si ̱ ba rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i na ? Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ba te ishe yis dä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i . Ata je ne ye yis ko ̱ na rä , ñakäi je ne ye yis de ka ̱ jiska rä , je rä yis wa ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ ktei shäklä . Jekäi mane wa rä ji rä iyina si ̱ ja ̱ mi wa biköle te yis ktä ssëke ̱ .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Jera Pilato te ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Jibä rä ji rä iyina si ̱ rä na ? Ñerä Pilato te jekäi isha e ̱ ná ra , ideksa ̱ ju ̱ ni Judío wa wäki ̱ te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis wäna ijuer ka irä nui ta a ̱ ni .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ata bas wädular dä Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ sha ̱ na yis te sä wätelewa ̱ wa sha ̱ ekla wäyeksa ̱ ni bas ia ̱ . ¿ Jekäi bas ki ̱ yis shena Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wäyäkksa ̱ ni bas ia ̱ na ?

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Ata ijewa te ishani täkii : — Ke je ju ̱ aksa ̱ ni , ata Barrabás ne ju ̱ oksa ̱ ni rä . Je Barrabás dä sa ̱ ki ̱ ssäk iwa ̱ sä ji jakibläklä .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Jekjepa Pilato te Jesús patkami buka ̱ nak ksabata wà .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Jera guardia wa te dika butra corona ye tkaka ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ ka , jekäi ite shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ siöö yëna shuaka ̱ iki ̱ .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Jera ijewa ñasikäke ̱ wa ̱ jirä jirä iwäja ̱ mi te isheke ̱ iia ̱ : — Judío wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ma se ̱ nopa ji ̱ a maitjä . Ñakäi ite itieke ̱ jula wà .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Jekjepa Pilato deksa ̱ ju ̱ ni Judío wa wäki ̱ ka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — ¡ Jikäi issö ! Yis ma itsa ̱ kksa ̱ bas wäki ̱ bas je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä yis ia ̱ ra ka irä nui ta .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Jera Jesús deksa ̱ ju ̱ dika butälewa ̱ corona ye tkeleka ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ ka , pajielewa ̱ shönak je ̱ k ki ̱ so ̱ lo ̱ o ̱ siöö yëna wà . Jera Pilato te isha Judío wa ia ̱ : — Isu ̱ o , jí ne rä ije rä .

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , Templo kjänanak wa irä , te Jesús su ̱ a ra , jera ijewa kjoyina täkii : — ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ! ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ! Jera Pilato te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas wakwa ku ̱ itso ̱ mi wätenakka ̱ . Ata ka yis wäna ijuer ta nui ta irä käi .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Jera Judío wa te ikúka : — Sá wa ̱ ka ̱ wei tso ̱ , je sá ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ra ikiana duäkwa ̱ , ije ̱ k sha irä Säkeklä yaba ni ki ̱ ka .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Pilato te je ssa ra , isuanawa ̱ ki ̱ ta .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ite Jesús tsa ̱ miwa ̱ ni etäbä kicha Pretorio na . Jeska ite ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — ¿ Mai ba dar dä ? Jera Jesús wa ̱ ka ikúkane .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Pilato te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ka bä ktä yis da na ? ¿ Ka ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis ia ̱ ka ̱ wä tso ̱ bä yäkläksa ̱ iräle , bä wätiäkläka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi iräle na ?

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Jera Jesús te ikúka : — Ke ba ia ̱ ka ̱ wä me ̱ nopa ka ̱ jöir skaté ra , ka ba ia ̱ ji o ̱ nak yis ia ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ju ̱ akksa ̱ ba ia ̱ , je rä nui ta ba tsa ̱ ta .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Jeska ra Pilato te ibiketsami maikäi ra ite Jesús yemiksa ̱ kjermita . Ata Judío wa te isha täkii Pilato ia ̱ : — ¡ Ba te ije yaksa ̱ ni kjermita ra , ka ba rä César ja ̱ mi kuna ! ¡ Yi je ̱ k kukäke ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ra , jewa mar dä César bolki ye !

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Ñerä Pilato te je ssa ra , ije te Jesús tsa ̱ ksa ̱ ju shäbeka . Jekäi ije ̱ tkawa ̱ iwa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ ska . Je juitä kie rä Wätele Jak Wa ni . Hebreo wa ktä wà je kie rä Gábata ni .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Je día rä jile wa ̱ klä Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ mar yika . Jera ka ̱ wä rä las doce käi . Jera Pilato te isha Judío wa ia ̱ : — ¡ Jí bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ i su ̱ o !

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Jera ijewa kjoyina täkii : — ¡ Iweiköwa ̱ ! ¡ Iweiköwa ̱ ! ¡ Iwätiöka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ! Jera Pilato te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¿ Jera yis kiana bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wätiäkka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi na ? Ata chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ikúka : — Ka sá wa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i saka kuna , ata César ebä .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Jera ite iju ̱ aksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ wätenakka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi . Jekäi ijewa te Jesús tsa ̱ mi .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Jera iwakei wa ̱ icruz minetse ̱ demi ka ̱ kie Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ Chichei Ke ̱ i ska , ( Hebreo wa ktä wà je kie rä Gólgota ni ) .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Jeska ijewa te iwätiaka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi . Ditsä saka bol wätena tulaka ̱ ña ije ra cruz saka ja ̱ mi , ekla ijula wämo kja ̱ ne , ekla ijula shule kja ̱ ne . Ata Jesús dä ijewa moska .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Jera Pilato te kte yua wätia tka cruz ja ̱ mi itsa ̱ ka , je yöle te ishe rä : “ Jesús Nazaret wa , Judío wa Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i . ”

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Jesús wätenaka ̱ rä jukläyäkä ska ra alemana . Je ne ki ̱ ka Judío wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te je kte yöle katke su ̱ a . Je yöle rä Hebreo wa ktä wà , Latín wà , Griego wa ktä wà .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Judío wa chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te isha Pilato ia ̱ : — Ke iyua : ‘ Je rä Judío wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ’ , ata iyuö rä : ‘ Jí te isha yis dä Judío wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ’ ni .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Jera Pilato te ikúka : — Yis te iyua e ̱ ná , tsu itso ̱ jekäi .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Guardia wa te Jesús wätiaka ̱ e ̱ ná cruz ja ̱ mi ra , jera ijewa te ji jienak iwa ̱ bala pja ̱ iwakwa cuatro ja ̱ mi , däkksa ̱ iwakwa ia ̱ ekla ekla . Ata Jesús paiklä rä takärbe ka batsäle kuna , yöle etka yebä , wäbatsälemi wakwämi .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — Ke sa ̱ ku ̱ ikshatkawa ̱ ; ata sa ̱ ina su ̱ o jile wà sa ̱ wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä yi ia ̱ idämiksa ̱ rä ki ̱ ka . Je wá ̱ ijewa te rä io ̱ naklä jishtä kte yöle kalme te ishe käi : “ Jewa te yis sua bala pja ̱ ñaia ̱ . Jewa inami jile wà isu ̱ aklä yi ia ̱ yis paiklä dämiksa ̱ rä ki ̱ ka . ” Jera je su ̱ ta guardia wa te iwá ̱ .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Jesús a ̱ mi irä , ia ̱ mi el irä , María Cleofas se ̱ naklä irä , María Magdala wa irä , jewa kajali Jesús wätenaka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ska .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Ñerä Jesús te ia ̱ mi su ̱ a ra , ñakäi iwa ̱ dulanak shka ̱ ta iwa ̱ kaldu ia ̱ mi ra je su ̱ a ite ra , jera ite isha ia ̱ mi ia ̱ : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , je kaldu rä ba yaba .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Jera ite isha je iwa ̱ dulanak ia ̱ : — A ̱ mi rä ma a ̱ mi . Jekäi je ke ̱ i skami iwa ̱ dulanak te ikiawa ̱ iwakei ju ska .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Je ukä ska Jesús je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra ji bena o ̱ na e ̱ ná . Jekäi kte yöle wao ̱ naklä ki ̱ ka ite isha : — Yis je ̱ r bánawa ̱ .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Jeska uva diä jäi tso ̱ jile jui na pshii . Jekäi ijewa te je uva diä jäi wà esponja nu ̱ wa ̱ , je tkaka ̱ ite hisopo bata ki ̱ , je tka ite Jesús kjä ja ̱ mi .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Jesús te je uva diä jäi kuya e ̱ ná ra , ite isha : — Io ̱ na e ̱ ná . Jera itsa ̱ ku ̱ ja ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi ije ̱ k jawa ̱ duäkwa ̱ .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Je día rä jile wa ̱ klä Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ mar yika , je ki ̱ ka ka Judío wa ki ̱ sä nu ̱ l shene a ̱ ta ̱ nak cruz ja ̱ mi je sábado wà , ( je sábado rä dälätsalewa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na ki ̱ ka ) ijewa te ka ̱ kia Pilato ia ̱ iwa ̱ ijewa klä pja ̱ cha ̱ kläwa ̱ iduächa ̱ kläwa ̱ nu ̱ l wäyä tuläkläksa ̱ jeska .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Jera guardia wa minejulu jeka te bol tso ̱ wäteletuläka ̱ Jesús da je säkätä klä pja ̱ wa ̱ , je itä ki ̱ iel ñaebä .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Ata idemijulu Jesús ska ra , ite isu ̱ a iduawa ̱ e ̱ ná . Je ne ki ̱ ka ka iwa ̱ iklä pa ̱ newa ̱ .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Ata guardia wa ekla te itka uka bata wà ipare na . Jera ñawäsaka pi irä diklä irä deksa ̱ ju ̱ ñara .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Je su ̱ ak te je ktei she kate . Je te iktei she rä iyina si ̱ . Ije wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer kte si ̱ ne sheke ̱ ite rä . Je rä bas wa ̱ ibiketsäkläña .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Jekäi je biköle o ̱ na rä idäkläksa ̱ jishtä kte yöle te ishe käi : “ Ichichei mane a ̱ ni rä ka pa ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna . ”

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Ñakäi iyöle etkä te ishe : “ Iwa ̱ tkeleksa ̱ je ki ̱ su ̱ emi iwakwa te tsa ̱ na . ”

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ José Arimatea wa te Pilato ia ̱ ka ̱ kia iwa ̱ Jesús nu ̱ l tsa ̱ klämi . Je José rä je ̱ k patkele Jesús ja ̱ mi jakika , isuarke ̱ Judío wa yika ki ̱ ka . Jekäi Pilato te ka ̱ ma ̱ iia ̱ , jera imineju ̱ te inu ̱ l tsa ̱ mi .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Jera Nicodemo , ale delesta ̱ na tuina Jesús wäki ̱ je demiña . Je wa ̱ mirra irä áloes irä ji ̱ akaleka ̱ je demi cien libra käi .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Jekäi ijewa bol te Jesús nu ̱ l butrawa ̱ sua suruu wà ijalawa ̱ klä ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ ra ñara , jishtä Judío wa wädular sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläk käi .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Jesús wäteleka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ska kal yäkä wäbala tso ̱ . Je kal yäkä wäbala ska sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kate spa ̱ na , je na yi a ̱ ni ka nu ̱ l blerba .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Je día rä Judío wa wa ̱ jile wa ̱ klä sábado yika . Jera sábado dawa ̱ ju ̱ kja irä ki ̱ ka , ñakäi je sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kate rä alemana ki ̱ ka , ijewa te Jesús nu ̱ l blacha ̱ jeska .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Semana día säkätä wà aleji ̱ a ka ̱ ji ̱ a yee ra , María Magdala wa demiju ̱ sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska . Ñerä ite isu ̱ a ra , jak sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kjäshtäklä tse ̱ na ju ̱ nami .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Jera itu ̱ namini Simón Pedro irä Jesús wa ̱ dulanak el shka ̱ ta iwa ̱ irä jewa wäki ̱ , te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Ijewa te sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska Säkekewa nu ̱ l tsa ̱ mi , ata ka sä wäna ijuene mai ijewa te iblani räle .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Jera Pedro irä Jesús wa ̱ dulanak el irä jewa minejulu inu ̱ l blenawa ̱ ska .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Je bol julunami ñara . Ata iel tu ̱ na rä Pedro tsa ̱ ta , demi säkätäba sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ k buawa ̱ te isu ̱ a ra ibuträklä suruu ebä kalmeta ̱ na . Ata ka iminenewa ̱ ija ̱ rka .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Jekjepa Simón Pedro demi iitä ki ̱ , kjawa ̱ ju ̱ sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ja ̱ rka . Je te isu ̱ a ra , ibuträklä ebä kalme .

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Ñakäi ite isu ̱ a ra , itsa ̱ ku ̱ pabuträklä kalme ka ibuträklä ra kuna , ata pa ̱ lema kju ̱ awaka .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Jera Jesús wa ̱ dulanak el ale demiju ̱ säkätäba sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska je kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ña ira . Je te isu ̱ a , jekäi ite ibiketsa iyina si ̱ irä .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Jeiräta kte yöle wa ̱ iyile ishena rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , ka je ia ̱ ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ rba .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Jera je Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa bol bitejuluténi isaka wa tso ̱ ska .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Jekäi María Magdala wa ji ̱ á kaldu sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ektaka . Je ji ̱ á kaldu ra , ije ̱ k buawa ̱ ija ̱ r su ̱ ak .

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: Jera ite ángel wa su ̱ a bol pajiele sua suruu wà . Jewa kajali ñak ki ̱ inu ̱ l me ̱ leka ̱ ska , ekla itsa ̱ ku ̱ kja ̱ ne , iel iklä kja ̱ ne .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Jewa te isha María ia ̱ : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , ¿ jiye ma ji ̱ ake ̱ rä na ? Jera ije te ikúka : — Ijewa te yis Säkekewaí tsa ̱ mi . Ata ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mai ite je blani räle .

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Ite jekäi isha ra , ije ̱ k manewa ̱ shäbeka . Jera Jesús kaldu su ̱ a ite , ata ka iwäna ijuene ije ne irä .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ lewa , ¿ jiye ma ji ̱ ake ̱ rä na ? ¿ Yibä yuleke ̱ ba te rä na ? Ata María te ibiketsa ije rä je kal yäkä wäbala pasu ̱ ak . Je ki ̱ ka ite isha iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ba ne te inu ̱ l tsa ̱ mi rä ra , ishö yis ia ̱ mai ba te iblani rä yis wa ̱ itsa ̱ kläténi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha : — ¡ María ! Jera María je ̱ k manewa ̱ ni te isha iia ̱ Hebreo ktä wà : — ¡ Raboni ! ( Je wà rä Sapaktäk . )

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Yis jöwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yis dämika ̱ ba Sa Ká wäki ̱ . Ata ma cho ̱ yis el wa ia ̱ ishäk : “ Yis maka ̱ ju ̱ yis Ká ska , bas Ká ska , yis Kekläí ska , bas Kekläí ska . ”

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Jekäi María Magdala wa mineju ̱ Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ ibata shäk , te isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Yis te Säkekewa su ̱ ani . ” Jera ite ipaka ijewa ia ̱ jiräni ije te isha iia ̱ käi .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ñerä je semana día säkätä tuir dawa ̱ kja ra , iwa ̱ dulanak wa tapar tso ̱ ñakjätelecha ̱ wa ̱ , isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ Judío wa yika ki ̱ ka . Jera plaa ra Jesús de kaldu ijewa sha ̱ moska , te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ssënopa baa .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Ite jekäi isha ra , ite ijula irä ipare irä kjasha ijewa ia ̱ . Jekäi iwa ̱ dulanak wa te Säkekewa su ̱ ani ra , ijewa ssëna a ̱ naa .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Jera Jesús te ishani ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ssënopa baa . Jishtä Sa Ká te yis patkaté käi , je su ̱ ta yis te bas patkeke ̱ .

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ite jekäi isha ra , ite ijewa wäkju ̱ a te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Wikblu Sikina döksa ̱ pa bas ia ̱ .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Bas te yi nui jawa ̱ bitaba ra , je rä jalewa ̱ bitaba Säkeklä wa ̱ . Jekäi ka bas wa ̱ yi nui janewa ̱ bitaba ra , ka je rä jalewa ̱ bitaba kuna .

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Jesús dasta ̱ na ra , Tomás ale doce wa sha ekla , kie etkä Ko ̱ lo ̱ ni , je ka kaldu kuna ijewa ra .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Je ia ̱ Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa saka te isha : — Sá te Säkekewa su ̱ ani . Ata Tomás te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Ka yis wa ̱ ijula ki ̱ clavo itäri su ̱ ne ra , ka yis julasku patkenewa ̱ clavo itäri na ra , ka yis julasku patkenewa ̱ ipare na ra , mik a ̱ ni ka yis wa ̱ ikolonak kte si ̱ ye .

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ñerä ocho día ukäki ̱ Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa tapanawa ̱ ni etäbä kicha ju ja ̱ rka . Jera Tomás kalduña ijewa ra . Jera ju rä kjäitälewa ̱ , ata Jesús deju ̱ je ̱ k duawa ̱ ijewa sha ̱ na te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas ssënopa baa .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Jera ite isha Tomás ia ̱ : — Bä julasku tköwa ̱ jiska ; yis jula su ̱ o . Bä jula siköte patköwa ̱ yis pare na . Ke ba ku ̱ ibiketsa ka irä iyina kuna , ata ibiketsö iyina si ̱ irä .

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Jera Tomás te ikúka : — ¡ Yis Säkekewaí , yis Kekläí !

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Ba te yis su ̱ a ki ̱ ka ba te ibiketsa iyina si ̱ irä . Ata , ¡ yi wa ̱ ka isu ̱ ne te ibiketsa iyina si ̱ irä ra bäije jewa rä !

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Jesús te jile saka wá ̱ ta ̱ i ijuenaklä ye iwa ̱ dulanak wa wäna , ata jewa ka yöne jí äyë ki ̱ ka .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Ata jí yöle rä bas wa ̱ ibiketsäklä Jesús ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä , je ne rä Säkeklä yaba rä , jekäi bas te ibiketsa ra , je rä bas se ̱ naklä kseka ije kie oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ Jesús je ̱ k kjashani etäbä kicha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ tipä Tiberias kjä ja ̱ mi . Ije ̱ k kjasha rä jikäi :

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Simón Pedro irä , Tomás kie etkä Ko ̱ lo ̱ ni irä , Natanael dar Caná Galilea ke ̱ i ska irä , Zebedeo yabala bol irä , Jesús wa ̱ dulanak wa saka bol irä , jewa tapar kajali ñara ra .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Ñerä Simón Pedro te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Yis maju ̱ nima kukäk . Jera ijewa te isha : — Sá marmiña ba ra . Jekäi iminemi ñajiaka ̱ ko ̱ no na . Ata je tuinei wà ka iwa ̱ nima kolone itjä .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Jera ka ̱ ñir dawa ̱ kja ra , Jesús je ̱ k duawa ̱ tipä kse ̱ i ki ̱ ka . Ata iwa ̱ dulanak wa wäna ka ijuene Jesús ne irä .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — Yabala , ¿ ka sä ji kätäpa na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Kai .

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas kla ju ̱ omi ko ̱ no ektaka sä jula wämo kja ̱ ne . Jeska bas te ikukemi . Jekäi ijewa te iju ̱ ami je kja ̱ ne . Jera iwakolona ta ̱ i ka ijewa ia ̱ isika ̱ nakka ̱ kjekla .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Jera Jesús wa ̱ dulanak shka ̱ ta iwa ̱ te isha Pedro ia ̱ : — ¡ Säkekewa ne irä ! Simón Pedro te issa Säkekewa ne irä ni ra , jera ite ipaiklä jiani plaa , irä je ̱ k payeleju ̱ mi ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ije ̱ tka ja ̱ wa ̱ mi diklä ki ̱ ka .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Ata iwa ̱ dulanak saka bite ko ̱ no wäkseka . Jewa te nima kolona kla na sike dar iitä ki ̱ , jeska tipä kjä rä alemana cien metro kjena ki ̱ ka .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Iñajolowa ̱ ksa ̱ tipä kjä ska ra , ijewa te isu ̱ a yökö wäkata katke , je ki ̱ ka nima kuka ̱ na kalme pan ra ñara .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Je bas nima kuka jirä sha ̱ jöté .

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Jera Simón Pedro je ̱ k jiacha ̱ ko ̱ no ja ̱ rka te kla sikaksa ̱ ka ̱ pjota ki ̱ . Je na nima ta ̱ i ta ̱ i tso ̱ pshii ciento cincuenta y tres . Je kjekla irä jeiräta ka kla butsa ̱ ne tkäwa ̱ iia ̱ .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Jera Jesús te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas kute yäkäk . Jera iwa ̱ dulanak wa mane a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka ichakäklei iia ̱ : “ ¿ Yi ba rä na ? ” , iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Säkekewa ne irä ki ̱ ka .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Jera Jesús deju ̱ te pan kukawa ̱ , je wà ite ijewa chewa ̱ , jekäi ñaebä ite ichewa ̱ nima wà .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Je ne rä Jesús shki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ukä ska ra ije ̱ k kjasha deka ̱ mañatäbä kicha iwa ̱ dulanak wa ia ̱ rä .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Ijewa yaká e ̱ ná ra , Jesús te ichaka Simón Pedro ia ̱ : — Simón , Jonás yaba , ¿ ba wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l jí wa tsa ̱ ta na ? Jera Pedro te ikúka : — Säkekewa , jekäi irä . Ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ ba shka ̱ l . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Jera yis oveja yabala pasu ̱ o ba ku ̱ .

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha Jesús te ichakani iia ̱ : — Simón , Jonás yaba , ¿ ba wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l na ? Jera Pedro te ikúka : — Säkekewa , jekäi irä . Ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ ba shka ̱ l . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Jera yis oveja wa kjänano ba ku ̱ .

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Jera Jesús te ichakani iia ̱ idäkläka ̱ mañatäbä kicha : — Simón , Jonás yaba , ¿ ba wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l na ? Jera Pedro je ̱ r ianawa ̱ , ite ichaka iia ̱ mañatäbä kicha : “ ¿ Ba wa ̱ yis shka ̱ l na ? ” je ki ̱ ka . Jera ite ikúka : — Säkekewa , ba wa ̱ ji biköle ju ̱ ñer . Ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ ba shka ̱ l . Jera Jesús te isha iia ̱ : — Jera yis oveja wa pasu ̱ o ba ku ̱ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Kte si ̱ kte si ̱ wà yie ishe ba ia ̱ , ma ji ̱ a dulaklei ra , ba je ̱ k pajiäke ̱ ma mike ̱ maka ba shkakle käi ; ata mika ̱ bä dewa ̱ säkibii ra , jera ba jula ji ̱ atkämi jekjepa kju ̱ awa te ba pajiemi ba tse ̱ mi mai ka bä shkakle ska .

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Jesús te jekäi isha iju ̱ ñenaklä maikäi Pedro duämiwa ̱ rä käi , je wà iwa ̱ Säkeklä oloi käkläka ̱ . Jesús te je sha e ̱ ná ra , ite isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Sä shkä yis da !

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Jera Pedro wämanewa ̱ shäbeka te isu ̱ a Jesús wa ̱ dulanak shka ̱ ta iwa ̱ daju ̱ ijewa itä wà . Je ne je ̱ k ku ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ Jesús je ̱ r bata ja ̱ mi ijewa yakata ̱ na ska ichakäk iia ̱ : “ Säkekewa , ¿ mane te ba ju ̱ emiksa ̱ ba kukäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ rä na ? ”

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Je su ̱ a Pedro te ra , jera ite ichaka Jesús ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ ata me ije dämiwa ̱ rä na ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Jera Jesús te Pedro kúka : — Ikuna yis ki ̱ ije shena se ̱ nak ji ̱ a yis däni ke ̱ i kje ra , ¿ je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ ba ia ̱ na ? Ata ba shkä yis da .

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Je ki ̱ ka iyina sä el wa sha ̱ na , je iwa ̱ dulanak rä ka duäkwa ̱ kuna . Jeiräta ka Jesús wa ̱ iyine ka iduäkwa ̱ kuna , ata ite isha rä : “ Ikuna yis ki ̱ ije shena se ̱ nak ji ̱ a yis däni ke ̱ i kje ra , ¿ je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ ba ia ̱ na ? ”

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Je iwa ̱ dulanak ne te jí ipakale je ktei she iyina si ̱ irä . Je ne te je yua rä . Jekäi sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je te je ktei sha rä iyina si ̱ .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Jesús te jile saka wá ̱ rä ta ̱ i . Ata yie ibiketse je ktei biköle kuna yöleksa ̱ etka etka ra , je äyë kjuä kalabe ka kjäkwa ̱ ka ̱ jiska .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Teófilo , yis äyë yöle säkätä ska yie iyua , ji wa ̱ mi Jesús te käi biköle , jini ite sa paktami käi biköle ,

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: ma rä iminetse ̱ ka ̱ jöir ke ̱ i kje . Jekäi ka imitse ̱ ba yika , ite ji shata ̱ na Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi iwa ̱ kolole iktei bata shäk ye wa ia ̱ ijewa wa ̱ o ̱ nak .

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: Jekäi ije te ji shka ̱ l ssa itä ska ije ̱ k kjashani ijewa ia ̱ kseka , ite ji wá ̱ rä saka saka ijuenaklä iyina si ̱ ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni . Cuarenta día bala na ije ̱ k kjashäte ijewa ia ̱ , ite ka ̱ jöir gobierno ktei pakete ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Jekäi etaba kicha Jesús yäkä kalme ijewa ra ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ rä : “ Ke bas minakksa ̱ julu Jerusalén ska , ata Sa Ká kablele ji ma ̱ k , ale yis wa ̱ iyile ssële bas wa ̱ je ki ̱ ssö bas ku ̱ .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Juan te sä wäukewa ̱ rä diklä wà , ata kukjunabä ra bas dä wäoka ̱ nak tulämi Wikblu Sikina wà . ”

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Jera sa ̱ tso ̱ tapale wa te ichaka iia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ jira ba te Israel wa ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ mini sa wakwa ñawäsikewa ̱ klä na ?

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Jera ite ijewa kúka : — Sa Ká ne wa ̱ ibiketsale mane ke ̱ i wà ji we ̱ mi ite räle bikökje je räle jini iwakei te ibiketse käi , ata ka bas ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne je ju ̱ ñaklä .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Ata Wikblu Sikina dewa ̱ bas ja ̱ mi ra , bas ia ̱ täkili me ̱ rmi . Bas dä yis su ̱ ak wa ye , je ja ̱ mi bas te yis pakemi Jerusalén ska , Judea ke ̱ i kalabe ska , Samaria ke ̱ i ska , ka ̱ biköle ska mai ishäkä wätkerke ̱ wa ̱ kje .

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Ite jekäi isha e ̱ ná ra , jera ibutsa ̱ naka ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ijewa wäna . Jeska mo ̱ te iblawa ̱ ijewa yika .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Jekäi ijewa wäkatulaka ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska imaka ̱ juerke ̱ ji ̱ a su ̱ ak ra , je ebä ra jäiyi wa bol ñapajiele suruu juena plaa ijewa säkätä ja ̱ mi .

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
