text2: Je bol te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas galilea wa , ¿ jiye bas ñaduatulaka ̱ iweibläk ji ̱ a ka ̱ jöir ska rä na ? Je Jesús minetse ̱ bas yika ka ̱ jöir ska , je wakei dämiju ̱ ni jishtä imineju ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska su ̱ a bas te su ̱ ta .

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Jera ka ̱ kichei kie Olivo Yäkä Bata ni ska ijewa minejuluni Jerusalénka . Je rä sábado wà shke kjena .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Mika ̱ idemijuluni ra , jera imineka ̱ julu ju ja ̱ r yöle ietkä bata ki ̱ je ja ̱ rka . Ijewa rä Pedro irä , Jacobo irä , Juan irä , Andrés irä , Felipe irä , Tomás irä , Bartolomé irä , Mateo irä , Jacobo Alfeo yaba irä , Simón ale bakle kju ̱ atkäk gobierno ra irä , Judas Jacobo yaba irä .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Ijewa biköle chatkawa ̱ etka yebä ka ̱ kiäk , alaklä wa ra ñara irä , Jesús a ̱ mi María ra irä , Jesús el wa ra irä .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà Pedro je ̱ k duaka ̱ sä el wa tapanawa ̱ sha ̱ na , je tapalewa ̱ wa däka ̱ rä ciento veinte kjena . Jewa ia ̱ ite isha :

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: “ El wa , Wikblu Sikina ktele ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ kba David kjäbata ja ̱ mi , je te Judas ale Jesús kukäkwa ̱ wa kiäk jämi je ktei sha , je ktei yöle wa ̱ iyile ja ̱ mi ikiana o ̱ nak .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije rä shtao ̱ leña saje wa ra , jí ikja ̱ nei we ̱ je wa ̱ kña .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Jekäi ite ji yakei wakbla je säkei wà ite ka ̱ tju ̱ a . Jeska ija ̱ nami tsa ̱ bataka , iyaka tsikinaju ̱ , iñá minaksa ̱ .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Je palei ju ̱ ñaksa ̱ se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska wa biköle te . Je ki ̱ ka je ke ̱ i kinawa ̱ iwakwa ktä wà Acéldama ni . Je wà rä sä Pi Ke ̱ i .

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle Salmos äyëí ki ̱ ka je te ishe rä : ‘ Je ju janowo ̱ pa . Yi a ̱ ni ke se ̱ nopa ji ̱ a jeska . ’ Ñakäi ietkä te ishe rä : ‘ Yilé saka kjöwa ̱ pa ije säkei ye . ’

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: “ Je ki ̱ ka shkäkña sa ra del Säkekewa Jesús shka sa ̱ sha ̱ na jöiki ̱ diaki ̱ je bala naka ,

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: Juan te iwäukewa ̱ ke ̱ i skaté bite rä imineka ̱ tse ̱ sa ̱ sha ̱ na ke ̱ i kje , je sha ̱ ekla kiana kolonak däkwa ̱ saje wa ra ije shki ̱ leka ̱ ni je ktei pakäkña . ”

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te bol kuka . Ekla rä José , kinak Barsabás ni . Je kie etkä rä Justo ni . Ekla rä Matías .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Jeska ijewa ka ̱ kia te isha : “ Säkekewa , ba wa ̱ sä biköle je ̱ rike ju ̱ ñer . Ikjashö jí bol mane rä kolole ba wa ̱ rä

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: däkwa ̱ jí Jesús ktei bata she jí ikja ̱ nei we ̱ je wa ̱ kña . Je jawa ̱ Judas te iminaklä mai ije shena minak rä jeska . ”

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te imabla su ̱ a jile wà ijuenaklä yi ia ̱ idäksa ̱ käi . Jekäi Matías ne ia ̱ ideksa ̱ rä . Jekäi ije dewa ̱ ña Jesús ktei bata shäk ye ale once wa ra .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Pentecostés ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä díaí dewa ̱ ra , jera ijewa kalabe tapar tso ̱ etka yebä .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Jera plaa ra ji rä bular täkii ka ̱ jöir ska . Je ssër si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ r täkii ssër käi , je bular kjaju ̱ mai itso ̱ ñajäklelewa ̱ ska ju ja ̱ r kalabe na .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Jera ijewa te isu ̱ a ra yökö käi bala butsa ̱ nami juer ta kjäktä iá ja ̱ na iwakwa ki ̱ ekla ekla .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Jekäi ijewa biköle pshiwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ Wikblu Sikina te . Jera ekla ekla iktami kte kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa shtä wà , jiräni Säkeklä Wikblu te iktewe ̱ ke ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Jerusalén ska Judío wa se ̱ nak tsa ̱ na wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapar kajali . Jewa dar dä ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa ka ̱ biköle ska .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Ñerä jekäi ji rä bulana ssëna ra , jera ditsä tapanawa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , jewa je ̱ r shewa ̱ jakla je te . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te issa ra ijewa ktä kate rä iwakwa ktä wà kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Je te ijewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ je ̱ r shewa ̱ kajakla te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Je rä ji ? ¿ Ka je ktä tso ̱ wa kalabe rä Galilea wa na ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: ¿ Jera maikäi sä biköle te je ssa bäi , sa wakwa ktä käi , mane sä ktä ja ̱ mi sä kibile käi rä na ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Sa ̱ tso ̱ jiska wa rä Partia wa , Media wa , Elam wa , se ̱ nak Mesopotamia ska wa , Judea ska wa , Capadocia ska wa , Ponto ska wa , Asia ska wa ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Frigia ska wa , Panfilia ska wa Egipto ska wa , Libia wa se ̱ nak Cirene pája ̱ mi wa , ñakäi deleté ñayuläk dar Roma ska wa ;

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: sha ̱ rä Judío wa si ̱ , sha ̱ rä ñaialecha ̱ wa ̱ Judío wa ye , Creta wa , Arabia wa , je tso ̱ jiska . Ata ñewa te Säkeklä wa ̱ ji o ̱ le e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ne she kate rä , ssa sa te sa wakwa ktä käi kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa .

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Jekäi je te ijewa biköle je ̱ r shewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ r iia ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Jini je wà rä na ?

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Ata isaka te je ktäte wa ja ̱ ñetsa ta ̱ i te isha : — Ijewa tso ̱ rä diyëë .

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Jera Pedro je ̱ k duaka ̱ isaka once wa ra . Jekäi ikta täkii te isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Bas Judío wa , bas biköle se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska wa , yis ktä ssö bas ku ̱ tsa ̱ na , je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa ,

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: ka jí wa rä diyëë jishtä bas te ibiketsa käi kuna , ka ̱ ñina rä tres hora ebä ki ̱ ka .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: Ata jí ne rä iyile jile bata shäk Joel ja ̱ mi rä :

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: ‘ Sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ke ̱ i wà ra , io ̱ rmi rä jikäi : — jekäi Säkeklä te ishe rä — , Yis te yis wikblu tkeju ̱ emi sä biköle ki ̱ ka . Bas yabala jäiyi wa irä , bas yabala alaklä wa irä , jewa te jile bata shemi . Bas sha ̱ na dulaklei wa tso ̱ te jile kjayile su ̱ emi , bas sha ̱ na säkekewa shtä kausu ̱ ami .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: Iyina si ̱ je ke ̱ i ska yis kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa jäiyi wa käi , alaklä wa käi , jewa ki ̱ ka yis te yis wikblu tkeju ̱ emi . Jekäi ijewa ktämika ̱ jile bata shäk wa ye .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Yie ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä we ̱ mi ka ̱ jöir ka ̱ sha ̱ ka , ñakäi jile kjashemi ijuenaklä ye ka ̱ jiska i ̱ ski ̱ ka , pi juermi , yökö juermi , shka ̱ la buka ̱ namika ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Ka ̱ wä wätuirmiwa ̱ , tulu iarmiwa ̱ pi käi . Je o ̱ rmi rä Säkekewa wa ̱ ji wa ̱ klä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ oloi ta ta ̱ i , ka je ke ̱ i däwa ̱ ba yika .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Jera biköle yi te Säkekewa a ̱ netseke ̱ ikie wà , jewa rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ . ”

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: “ Bas Israel wa , jí kte ssöpa bas ku ̱ : Jesús Nazaret wa rä patkele Säkeklä wa ̱ je kjasha ite bas ia ̱ rä , ji wá ̱ ite täkili ta wà , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä wà , jile kjayile ijuenaklä ye je wà . Je wá ̱ Säkeklä te ije oloi ja ̱ mi bas sha ̱ na maikäi bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer käi .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Jekäi ije ju ̱ naksa ̱ , jishtä Säkeklä wa ̱ iwabiketsale e ̱ ná , ju ̱ ñele kja e ̱ ná käi . Je ktawa ̱ bas te wäteleka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi ditsä yakeila oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Ata je wakei shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni Säkeklä te . Je wà ite ibakaksa ̱ duewa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ yika , maikäi a ̱ ni duewa ̱ ia ̱ ka ikolonakwa ̱ ta ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , David wa ̱ ije ktei yile rä jikäi : “ Yie Säkekewa su ̱ a del yis wäja ̱ mi . Ikaldu yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne , ki ̱ ka ka yis paju ̱ nakka ̱ .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yis je ̱ r ssëna a ̱ naa , yis kta a ̱ naa , je ki ̱ ka yis duawa ̱ ra , yis te ji bäi ki ̱ ssëmi .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba wa ̱ yis wikblu ka janakwa ̱ sä wikblu bläklä ska . Je wämo kolole ba wa ̱ ka janakwa ̱ ba wa ̱ yaka tjabanakwa ̱ .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Jekäi ba te se ̱ ne kseka ña ̱ le ̱ i kjasha yis ia ̱ . Ba te yis ssëwe ̱ mi a ̱ naa ba te yis su ̱ e kaldu ki ̱ . ”

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: “ El wa , yis wa ̱ ijuñer ji sheke ̱ yis te je rä iyina si ̱ , sa ká David je rä dulewa ̱ itäbilewa ̱ . Jira je nu ̱ l bläklä kate ji ̱ a sa ̱ sha ̱ na .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Ata ije rä jile bata shäk . Jekäi iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Säkeklä kabla iia ̱ etkabä ji she etkabä wà ibatala sha ̱ ekla tkäkwa ̱ ije ̱ tkäklä ki ̱ iitäri wà sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Jekäi David je ̱ r ku ̱ a kja je te , ki ̱ ka ite Säbäkäkksa ̱ shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni je paka , ka iwikblu janewa ̱ sä wikblu bläklä ska , ka iyaka tjabanewa ̱ .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: Jekäi je Jesús shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni Säkeklä te . Sá biköle rä je su ̱ ak wa .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Jeska ra ipakana je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne , je wà ioloi kanaka ̱ . Jeska Sa Ká te Wikblu Sikina ma ̱ iia ̱ , jishtä ikablele iia ̱ käi . Jekäi je ne tka ju ̱ até ite , su ̱ a bas te , ssa bas te rä .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Ka David mineneka ̱ ka ̱ jöir , ata ite isha rä : “ Säkekewa te isha yis Säkekewaí ia ̱ : ‘ Ma je ̱ tköwa ̱ yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne ,

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: bikökje yie ba bolki wa tulacha ̱ wa ̱ bä klä tkäkläka ̱ iki ̱ ka kje . ’ ”

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: “ Jekäi bas Israel wa biköle , jí ju ̱ ñopa bas ku ̱ iyina si ̱ irä . Je Jesús ale wäteleka ̱ bas wa ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi , je wakei ebä ne kuka Säkeklä te Säkekewa ye , Säbäkäkksa ̱ ye rä . ”

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Je ssa ijewa te ra , ijewa je ̱ r ssënawa ̱ shi ̱ ana si ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa te ichaka Pedro irä isaka Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä , jewa ia ̱ : — El wa , ¿ ji we ̱ sá te na ?

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jera Pedro te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Bas ñamanewo ̱ ksa ̱ , bas ñawäukewo ̱ tulömi ekla ekla , Jesucristo kie ja ̱ mi , bas nui janakläwa ̱ bitaba . Jekäi ra Wikblu Sikina me ̱ nak däksa ̱ mi bas ia ̱ .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jekäi ikablele bas ia ̱ rä , bas yabala ia ̱ rä , biköle se ̱ nak ka ̱ mii wa ia ̱ rä , biköle yi kieke ̱ Säkekewa saje wa Kekläí te käi jewa ia ̱ rä .

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Jekäi ite ji su ̱ le iwa ̱ ktei paka ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta ijewa ia ̱ , ite ijewa pakta ji ̱ a jikäi : — Jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa rä shirilewa ̱ , jewa yika bas je ̱ k tsa ̱ tköksa ̱ .

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Jekäi iktä kukäk wa wäoka ̱ na tulami . Jekäi je ke ̱ i wà sä ki ̱ tapana deka ̱ tres mil kjena .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Jekäi ijewa chatkawa ̱ se ̱ nak jiräni Jesús ktei bata shäk wa te ipakteke ̱ ja ̱ mi , se ̱ nak ñara etka yebä irä , pan bala butsäk ije ̱ r ja ̱ naklä Jesús dulewa ̱ ska irä , ka ̱ kiäk irä .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Jera biköle suanacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i , Jesús ktei bata shäk wa te ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ wá ̱ rä ta ̱ i ijuenaklä ye ki ̱ ka .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Jera Jesús biketsäk wa biköle se ̱ na ñara rä etka yebä . Ijewa te idäli bena se ̱ newa ̱ rä etka yebä .

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Jekäi ijewa jile watju ̱ ake ̱ ka ̱ käi , däli käi , je säkei bala pje ̱ ke ̱ ite ñaia ̱ , yi ka jita ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ käi , je ja ̱ mi .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Jera buliri buliri ijewa chatkawa ̱ ñakjee tapanak Templo ska . Ñakäi ju etkä ju etkä ipan bala butsäke ̱ ije ̱ r ja ̱ naklä Jesús dulewa ̱ ska . Iyäkäke ̱ ñara a ̱ naa ka biketsale ta ,

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: ijewa te Säkeklä kjeisheke ̱ . Jekäi biköle ssëna ijewa ra bäi . Jera buliri buliri Säkeklä te mane wa rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ jewa ijewa ki ̱ tapawe ̱ kate .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Pedro irä Juan irä demika ̱ julu Templo ska ka ̱ kiäklä horaí ska . Je rä las tres .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Jera jäiyi ekla ko ̱ le ka shkäk kuna je däke ̱ tse ̱ buliri buliri ju ̱ nakta ̱ na Templo kjäshtäklä kie Baa Si ̱ ni ska inaklä kaku kiäk yi kjäke ̱ wa ̱ Templo na jewa ia ̱ .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Je te Pedro irä Juan irä mawa ̱ julu kja Templo ja ̱ rka su ̱ a ra , jera ite ijewa ia ̱ inaklä kaku kia .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Jekäi Pedro irä Juan irä te isu ̱ a jaree , jera ite isha iia ̱ : — Sá su ̱ o .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Jera je karalewa ̱ te isu ̱ a . Ite ibiketsa ijewa te rä jile kaku ne me ̱ ke ̱ iia ̱ rä .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Ata Pedro te isha iia ̱ : — Ka yis dä inaklä ta , oro ta a ̱ ni . Ata ji tso ̱ yis wa ̱ je me ̱ ke ̱ yis te ba ia ̱ . Jesucristo Nazaret wa kie wà ma je ̱ köka ̱ , bä shkömi .

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Jekäi ite ikukawa ̱ ijula wämo kja ̱ ne je kaka ̱ ite . Jera ñawäsaka iklä shpatke irä iklä wäkuchi irä je täkina .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Ñerä ije ̱ k kpaka ̱ plaa klä ki ̱ ka shkami , jekäi ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ ijewa ra Templo ska , shkami klä wà , tu ̱ rke ̱ psupsuu , te Säkeklä kjeishami .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Jekäi biköle te ishkäke ̱ su ̱ a , ite Säkeklä kjeisheke ̱ su ̱ a .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Jera ijewa te isu ̱ a ra je ne rä ale kätkä Templo kjäshtäklä kie Baa Si ̱ ni ska inaklä kaku kiäk rä . Ñerä ji o ̱ na ije ia ̱ te biköle male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , ije ̱ r shewa ̱ kajakla .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Jera ije te Pedro irä Juan irä kukawa ̱ därërë . Jera biköle male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ julunaté ijewa wäki ̱ Templo juiteí ki ̱ ju yöle jarbe kie Salomón ju jarbe ni ska .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Je su ̱ a Pedro te ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : “ Bas Israel wa , ¿ jiye je te bas male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ rä na ? ¿ Jiye bas te sá su ̱ e jaree sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä sá te jí jäiyi shkewa ̱ mi rä sá wakwa täkili wà , sá wakwa te ji we ̱ wämo oloi ja ̱ mi käi rä na ?

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Ata Abraham irä , Isaac irä , Jacob irä Kekläí , sa ká wa Kekläí , je te iwakei kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k Jesús oloi kaka ̱ . Je ne ju ̱ aksa ̱ bas te , je ne sha bas te Pilato ia ̱ ka sá ki ̱ isher , ale Pilato te ibiketsa wäyenakksa ̱ ni ra rä .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Je sikii si ̱ , wämo si ̱ ka shene bas ki ̱ . Ata bas te sä ktäk ekla kiaksa ̱ ni iia ̱ .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Jekäi je se ̱ ne kseka tsikiwa ̱ kka ̱ ktawa ̱ bas te . Ata Säkeklä te je shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na . Sá rä je su ̱ ak wa .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Jekäi ije kie biketse oloi ja ̱ mi jí ekla su ̱ nak bas wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak bas wa ̱ je täkinani rä , je o ̱ na rä Jesús kie ne wà . Jesús te sä täkiwe ̱ ibiketsäk je ne te jikäi ibäiwa ̱ ni bäi ebä bas biköle wäna rä .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: “ El wa , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas te je wá ̱ rä ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ ne ki ̱ ka , bas wäkiri wa ñaebä .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Ata je ne wà Säkeklä te iwá ̱ jishtä iwa ̱ ibata yileba jile bata shäk wa kjäbata ska käi , ale ite isha , iwa ̱ kolole Säbäkäkksa ̱ ye je kiana ji shka ̱ l ssäk .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ñamanewo ̱ ksa ̱ , bas ñaparuö bas nui wäte ̱ natkäkläwa ̱ , ike ̱ i däkläwa ̱ Säkekewa wa ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ kläni bäi ,

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: ñakäi iwa ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ patkäkläté . Je rä kolole kja Säkeklä wa ̱ säkätäba bas ia ̱ , je ne rä Jesús dä .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Ka ̱ jöir ska ji tso ̱ kiana ije ia ̱ ka ̱ ma ̱ k ise ̱ naklä jeska , ma rä Säkeklä wa ̱ ji biköle bäiwa ̱ kläni je ke ̱ i dewa ̱ kje , je rä yile iwa ̱ ka ̱ mikleté , iwa ̱ kolole jile bata shäk wa sikii wa ye jewa kjäbata ska .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Ñera Moisés te isha : ‘ Säkekewa bas Kekläí te bas wakwa sha ̱ na ekla kukemi jile bata shäk ye bas ia ̱ yis käi . Bas kiana je ktä ssäk ji biköle ska ji sheke ̱ ite bas ia ̱ käi .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Ata jikäi io ̱ rmi , yi te ka je jile bata shäk ktä ssë ra , jewa rä tulunakksa ̱ sa ̱ sha ̱ na ekwäta ye . ’

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: “ Jekäi jile bata shäk wa biköle Samuel skaté jöiwäta bena yi kta käi , jewa te ji o ̱ na jira bata sha ñaebä .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Jekäi jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ ji yile je wadeksa ̱ bas ia ̱ . Ñakäi Säkeklä kablele bas ká wa ia ̱ ji wa ̱ k je deksa ̱ bas ia ̱ . Je ne sha ite Abraham ia ̱ : ‘ Ba batala oloi ja ̱ mi ji bäi o ̱ rmi ka ̱ jiska sä ditsei wä tso ̱ biköle ia ̱ . ’

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä te ikjanaklä shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni ra , säkätä ite ipatka ji bäi wa ̱ k bas ia ̱ , bas ji shi ̱ ana wa ̱ ke ̱ dokoitsäkläwa ̱ bas wa ̱ . ”

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Ñerä ijewa ktä kate ji ̱ a ditsä ra , jera chui wa irä , Templo kjänanak wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i irä , saduceo wa irä , dejulu ijewa wäki ̱ .

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: Jewa kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ , ite ditsä pakte tso ̱ ki ̱ ka , ijewa te Jesús dä sa ̱ shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je ktei bata she tso ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa kukacha ̱ wa ̱ wätiacha ̱ wa ̱ bulirishtäpa ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ , ka ̱ tuir dawa ̱ irä ki ̱ ka .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Ata yi te iktä ssa jewa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te je biketsa iyina ye . Jera jäiyi wa ebä deka ̱ rä cinco mil kjena .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Jekäi bulirishtä ra sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , säwäkiri wa irä , ñayöle ka ̱ wei wà wa irä , jewa ñatapawa ̱ wa ̱ Jerusalén ska .

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Anás irä , Caifás irä , Juan irä , Alejandro irä , ñakäi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i saka wa biköle irä , jewa tapanawa ̱ ña ijewa ra .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Jera ijewa te Pedro irä Juan irä , jaklawa ̱ ijewa moska , jewa wächakewa ̱ ijewa te : — ¿ Yibä täkili wà , yibä kie wà bas te iwá ̱ jekäi rä na ?

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Jera Pedro pshiwa ̱ wa ̱ Wikblu Sikina te , jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , bas sä wäkiri wa irä ,

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: ekla duäke ̱ ia ̱ ji o ̱ na bäi ki ̱ ka jir bas te sá wächa ̱ kewe ̱ ke ̱ , ji wà ibäinani räí ̱ ni ra ,

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: jera bas biköle ku ̱ iju ̱ ñopa , ñaebä Israel wa biköle ku ̱ iju ̱ ñopa , je o ̱ na rä Jesucristo Nazaret wa ne kie oloi ja ̱ mi , je ne rä ale wäteleka ̱ bas wa ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi rä , ale Säkeklä wa ̱ shki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na rä , je ne oloi ja ̱ mi jí ekla kaldu klä ki ̱ bäi bas wäna rä .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Ije ne rä ale jak ju ̱ leksa ̱ bas ju yuäk wa wa ̱ , je ne dewa ̱ ju ñak wäkukäk bäi si ̱ ye rä .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Ka yi saka kuna Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ye . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yi saka ia ̱ kie me ̱ le ka ̱ jiska ije käi je oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ .

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te issa ra Pedro irä Juan irä ka suar , ñakäi ite issa ra ijewa rä ditsä emana wa ka yöle kuna ra , jera imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra ijewa rä shkeleña Jesús da .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Ñakäi jewa te je ekla bäileni kaldu klä ki ̱ ijewa ra je su ̱ a ra , jini a ̱ ni ka ijewa wa ̱ ishäklei ji ̱ a .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Jera ijewa paka ñatsa ̱ kksa ̱ kju ̱ awaka Sanedrín wa tapar kate ska , jeska ite iwabiketsaksa ̱ iwakwa ebä .

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: Ite isha ñaia ̱ : — ¿ Me sä te jí bol wa we ̱ na ? Tsa ̱ na ra iwa rä biköle se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska wa wa ̱ ijuñer , ji kju ̱ awa si ̱ o ̱ na ijuenaklä ye ijewa oloi ja ̱ mi , je ka shäklei sa ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ yue irä ni .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Ata ka je pakanaklä ji ̱ a jöiwäta sa ̱ sha ̱ na ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ ijewa wäsuawo ̱ je kie ka pakäklä ji ̱ a kuna ijewa wa ̱ yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ .

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikia jaténi ; jekäi ite ka ̱ wei ma ̱ ijewa ia ̱ ka ijewa wa ̱ Jesús kie pakäklä ji ̱ a , wapaktäklä ji ̱ a itjä .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Jera Pedro irä Juan irä te ijewa kúka : — Bas ku ̱ ibiketsö , mane rä bäi Säkeklä wäna rä , ¿ bas ktä ssë Säkeklä ktä ssë tsa ̱ ta na ?

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Iwa rä ka sá ia ̱ ji su ̱ le ji ssële sá wa ̱ je pake janak .

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Ijewa te iu ̱ ña ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta , je ukä ska ra ite ijewa yatulaksa ̱ ni . Ji a ̱ ni ki ̱ ka ka ijewa wa ̱ ikpäklei iö ditsä wätjirka ̱ kju ̱ ei , biköle te Säkeklä kjeisheke ̱ ji o ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Je wà rä je jäiyi wa ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ cuarenta año tsa ̱ ta ja ̱ mi ji e ̱ e ̱ na kjayina je ki ̱ ka .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Ñerä ijana tulamini ra , iminejulu isaka wa tso ̱ ska . Jera jiräni chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä te isha ijewa ia ̱ käi , je pakani ijewa te isaka wa ia ̱ .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Ñerä isaka wa te je ssa ra , jera ijewa te Säkeklä a ̱ netsa täkii etka yebä te isha : “ Sä blui , ba ne te ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä däyë irä , ji biköle tso ̱ jeska käi jewa yuaksa ̱ rä .

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: Ba wa ̱ bä Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi sa ká David ba kjanaklä kjäbata ska iyile : ‘ ¿ Jiye ditsei wä ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa wätji ̱ naka ̱ rä , jiye ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa te wäsi ̱ wa jile biketseke ̱ ka wata rä na ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Ka ̱ jiska ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ñajaka ̱ kja kju ̱ atkäk . Sä wäkiri wa ñatapawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ kju ̱ atkäk Säkekewa ra , iwa ̱ kolole Säbäkäkksa ̱ ye je ra . ’

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: “ Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyina si ̱ ra Herodes irä Poncio Pilato irä ñawätkaka ̱ jí jukläyäkä ska , ka ̱ etkä wa irä Israel wa irä jewa ra ñara , ba kjanaklä sikina Jesús ale ma wa ̱ kolole je ra kju ̱ atkäk .

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: Je rä ijewa wa ̱ iwa ̱ klä jishtä ba te ka ̱ ma ̱ kja iwa ̱ klä käi , jiräni ba wa ̱ iwabiketsaleksa ̱ ba o ̱ nak käi .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Jekäi Säkekewa , ijewa te sá pau ̱ ña je ssö ba ku ̱ . Sá ba kjanaklä wa tsa ̱ tkö sá wa ̱ ba ktä wapaktäklä ka suale ta kuna .

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: Ñakäi ba jula tköcho ̱ pa sä bäi wa ̱ k , jile kjashäk ijuenaklä ye , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä wa ̱ k , ba kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k sikii Jesús kie oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Ñerä ijewa ka ̱ kia e ̱ ná ra , jera iwäbuka ̱ naka ̱ ta ̱ i itapar tso ̱ ska . Jera ijewa biköle pshiwa ̱ Wikblu Sikina te . Jekäi ijewa te Säkeklä ktä wapakta ka suale ta kuna .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Jekäi je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ Jesús biketsäk wa je ̱ rikä rä , je ̱ r ssër dä etka yebä ñara . Mane a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka iyine je rä yis ebä ne cha ni , ata ji biköle tso ̱ iwa ̱ rä iwakwa biköle wa ̱ kanak .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Jera Säkekewa Jesús shki ̱ leka ̱ ni je ktei pake kate iktei bata shäk wa te ssër ta oloi ta ta ̱ i . Ñakäi Säkeklä te ijewa biköle tsa ̱ tke kate bäi si ̱ .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Ijewa sha ̱ na mane a ̱ ni ki ̱ ka ji a ̱ ni sher kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa sha ̱ manele ka ̱ ta ju ta , jewa te je watju ̱ eke ̱ je säkei däke ̱ iwa ̱ ,

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: je che ̱ ke ̱ mi ite Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ia ̱ bala pa ̱ nak ekla ekla ia ̱ , ijewa ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Jekäi ekla Leví wa dar Chipre ska je kie rä José ni . Ata Jesús ktei bata shäk wa te ikie rä Bernabé ni . ( Je wà rä sa ̱ je ̱ r pabläk ni . )

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Ñerä je te ka ̱ tso ̱ iwa ̱ watju ̱ a ju ̱ ami , je säkei detse ̱ iwa ̱ cha ̱ mi ite Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ia ̱ .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Ata ekla kie Ananías te ka ̱ tso ̱ iwa ̱ watju ̱ a ju ̱ ami ise ̱ naklä Safira ra ñara .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Jekäi Ananías te je säkei tsa ̱ ksa ̱ ta ̱ na elkje , ata iwa ̱ iekta detse ̱ cha ̱ mi ite Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ia ̱ . Jera je ju ̱ ñer ise ̱ naklä wa ̱ .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Jera Pedro te isha : — Ananías , ¿ maikäi Satanás dewa ̱ ba je ̱ r na ma ka ̱ yuäklä Wikblu Sikina ukä ja ̱ mi ba wa ̱ je ka ̱ säkei tsa ̱ kläta ̱ na elkje rä na ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Ka ba wa ̱ je ka ̱ wato ̱ rju ̱ ba yika ra , jera ¿ ka irä ba cha kuna na ? Ñakäi ba te iwatju ̱ a ju ̱ ami itä ska ra , jera ¿ ka je säkei rä ba wakei ji wá ̱ iwà käi kuna na ? ¿ Jiye ba te ibiketsa jekäi ma je ̱ r ska iwa ̱ k rä na ? Ka ba ka ̱ yöne rä ditsä ukä ja ̱ mi kuna , ata Säkeklä ne ukä ja ̱ mi ba ka ̱ yua rä .

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Ñerä Ananías te je ssa ra , idua ja ̱ nami . Jekäi je palei ssäk wa biköle suanacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Ñerä dulaklei wa ñajaka ̱ te inu ̱ l pabutrawa ̱ , te itsa ̱ mi itäbiawa ̱ .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Je itä ki ̱ ka tres hora kjena ise ̱ naklä deju ̱ , je wa ̱ ji o ̱ na rä ka ju ̱ ñer .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Jera je ia ̱ Pedro te ichaka : — Ishö yis ia ̱ , ¿ bas ka ̱ watju ̱ a säkei rä jeska na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Taa , jeska ito ̱ na rä .

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Jera Pedro te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Jiye bas ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a Säkekewa wikblu wätji ̱ wa ̱ k rä na ? Isu ̱ o , ma se ̱ naklä itäbiäk wa dajulu kja ju kjä ska ; jewa te ba nu ̱ l tse ̱ mi .

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka idua ja ̱ nami Pedro klä säkätä ja ̱ mi . Ñerä je dulaklei wa dewa ̱ julu ra , jera jewa te iku ̱ a dulewa ̱ . Jera jewa te inu ̱ l tsa ̱ mi , itäbiawa ̱ ise ̱ naklä ra ñara .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Jekäi tapanak wa kalabe irä je palei ju ̱ ñak wa biköle irä , jewa su ̱ anacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Jekäi Jesús ktei bata shäk wa jula wà ijuenaklä ye käi o ̱ rke ̱ , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä käi o ̱ rke ̱ saka saka ditsä sha ̱ na . Jekäi biköle däke ̱ wa ̱ etka yebä Salomón ju jarbe ska .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Ata ditsä saka mane a ̱ ni ka däwa ̱ ijewa ska isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka , jeiräta biköle te ijewa sheke ̱ bäi ebä .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Säkekewa biketsäk wa ki ̱ tapar damika ̱ jöikwäta ta ̱ iwa ̱ , jäiyi wa irä alaklä wa irä .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Jewa te duë ta wa jeke ̱ ksa ̱ ña ̱ laka tapawe ̱ ke ̱ ja ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ ka je ̱ katashuäklä ki ̱ ka ; je rä Pedro kjäke ̱ ju ̱ ra , kje ioloibä jibä tenakläwa ̱ ijewa manele ja ̱ mi .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Ñaebä jukläyäkä saka tso ̱ Jerusalén pája ̱ mi wa däke ̱ té ta ̱ i . Ijewa wa ̱ duë ta wa däke ̱ ja , kololewa ̱ wikblu ñá shtä wa ̱ wa däke ̱ ja . Jera jewa biköle bäirke ̱ ni .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Jera je ki ̱ chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i irä ije tsa ̱ tkäk wa kalabe irä , je ̱ r ki ̱ ijewa ianacha ̱ wa ̱ . Jewa rä ale saduceo wa ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ja ̱ mi . Jera ijewa ñajaka ̱ ,

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: te Jesús ktei bata shäk wa kuka jámi jiacha ̱ wa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Ata je tuinei wà Säkekewa ángel ekla te sä wätiäklä jui kjäya ju ̱ ami , te ijewa jaksa ̱ , te isha :

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: “ Bas cho ̱ ni Templo ka . Jeska bas ñaduöjöklö jí se ̱ ne kseka je ktei biköle bata shäk ditsä ia ̱ . ”

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Je ssa ijewa te ra , sa ̱ ñirebä ikjawa ̱ julu Templo ska , te sa paktami . Je dälei ja ̱ mi chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i irä itsa ̱ tkäk wa irä jewa ñatapawa ̱ wa ̱ . Jewa te Sanedrín wa irä Israel batala wäkiri wa kalabe irä kia jaté tapanakwa ̱ . Kjepa ijewa te Templo kjänanak wa patkami sä wätiäklä ska ijewa jäkté .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Ata jewa demijulu ra , ka ijewa juena ji ̱ a sä wätiäklä ska . Ñerä ibitejuluténi ibata shäk ,

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: te isha : — Sá te sä wätiäklä jui ku ̱ a kjätelewa ̱ tsa ̱ na si ̱ , je kjä ska sá te ikjänanak wa ku ̱ a jakla klä ki ̱ . Ata sá te ikjäya ja ̱ wa ̱ ra , yi a ̱ ni ka juena ji ̱ a ija ̱ rka .

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Ñerä Templo kjänanak wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i irä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä jewa te je ssa ra , ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne me ijewa de í ̱ ia ̱ . Jekäi ijewa je ̱ rika : “ ¿ Ji si ̱ te je wätkewe ̱ miwa ̱ na ? ”

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Jera ekla deju ̱ té ibata shäk ijewa ia ̱ jikäi : — ¡ Issö ! Ale jäiyi wa wätiacha ̱ wa ̱ bas te jewa demi jäkläni Templo ska , jewa te sa pakte tso ̱ .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Jera Templo kjänanak wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i mineju ̱ ikla wa ra , te ijámini . Ata ka iwa ̱ iweikane täkili wà , isu ̱ anacha ̱ wa ̱ iö ditsä te ikteche ̱ wa ̱ jak wà ki ̱ ka .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Ñerä ijewa wa ̱ ide ja dua jakla Sanedrín wa tapar tso ̱ wäja ̱ mi . Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te iwächakewa ̱ ,

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: je te isha : — ¿ Ka sá te bas paka rä ka sa paktäk kuna ji ̱ a itjä je kie ktei wà na ? Ata jira bas te Jerusalén wa biköle pakta bas ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe wà . Ñakäi bas ssëna rä ije ko ̱ tälewa ̱ je nui ja ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ sá ki ̱ ka .

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Jera Pedro irä isaka Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä jewa te ikúka : — Bäi si ̱ ra Säkeklä ktä ssë rä ditsä ktä ssë tsa ̱ ta .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Sa ká wa Kekläí te Jesús ale bas wa ̱ ko ̱ tälewa ̱ tkeleka ̱ kal ja ̱ mi , je shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Jekäi ite ipaka je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ iwakei jula wämo kja ̱ ne ioloi kanakläka ̱ , Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ye , ije wa ̱ Israel wa ssëwa ̱ klä ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ , ñakäi iwa ̱ ijewa nui jäkläwa ̱ bitaba .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Sá rä je ji su ̱ le sá wa ̱ je ktei pakäk wa , ñaebä Wikblu Sikina rä je ktei pakäk . Je rä me ̱ le Säkeklä wa ̱ mane wa te iktä ssëke ̱ jewa ia ̱ .

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Jera ijewa te je ssa ra , ikju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i . Ije ̱ r ssëna ijewa ktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Jera ekla fariseo wa kie Gamaliel ni , ije rä säyuäk ka ̱ wei wà , ije rä dälätsalewa ̱ ta ̱ i biköle wa ̱ , je je ̱ k duaka ̱ je Sanedrín wa tapar tso ̱ sha ̱ na , je te Jesús ktei bata shäk wa sha janakksa ̱ kju ̱ awaka berbena .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Kjepa ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas Israel wa , ji we ̱ mar bas te ijewa ukä ja ̱ mi je biketsö tsa ̱ na .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , mikle Teudas je ̱ kaka ̱ ishäk : Ije rä bäi si ̱ . Jekäi cuatrociento kjena minemi ije ja ̱ mi . Ata mika ̱ ije ko ̱ ta ̱ nawa ̱ ra , je shkäk ira wa butsa ̱ nami kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa . Jekäi iwäshawa ̱ .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Je itäki ̱ sa shtawa ̱ klä ke ̱ i ska Judas Galilea wa je ̱ kaka ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wäsikäk minak ija ̱ mi . Ata ñaebä ije weikanawa ̱ . Jekäi ije ja ̱ mi wa biköle butsa ̱ nami .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ke ijewa mewa ̱ k , ijöcho ̱ wa ̱ bitaba . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna jí ijewa wa ̱ ji biketsaleksa ̱ iräle , jí ijewa te ji we ̱ ke ̱ iräle , je rä ditsä ebä oloi ja ̱ mi ra , je wäshämiwa ̱ .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Ata je rä Säkeklä oloi ja ̱ mi ra , jera ka je wätkenak bas ia ̱ . Ata je rä bas kju ̱ atkä Säkeklä ra ebä .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te Gamaliel ktä ssawa ̱ . Jera ijewa te Jesús ktei bata shäk wa kia jaténi , jewa kpa ijewa te ksa bata wa , jera ka iwa ̱ ijewa pakane Jesús kie pakäk ji ̱ a . Jekäi ijewa te ijatulami .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Jera Sanedrín wa tapar tso ̱ ska Jesús ktei bata shäk wa mineksa ̱ julu ssële a ̱ naa . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa rä biketsale kianak weikanak Jesús kie bata ki ̱ ka .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Jekäi buliri buliri Templo ska , ju etkä ju etkä ska , ijewa te Jesús dä Säbäkäkksa ̱ ktei baa bata she rami wapakte rami ka jalewa ̱ ta kuna .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska ra kte kukäk wa wanaka ̱ ta ̱ i . Jera Judío wa ktäk Griego wa ktä wà , jewa te ktäk Hebreo wa ktä wà wa dälänetsa , je rä buliri buliri jile waderke ̱ ra , ktäk Griego wa ktä wà sha ̱ alaklä wa chichö wa ka der kuna ñakjee kju ̱ ei .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ale doce wa te kte kukäk chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tapawa ̱ wa ̱ . Jewa te isha : — Jile wachewa ̱ klä bata ki ̱ ka sá te Säkeklä ktä wapakte jewa ̱ ka je rä bäi kuna .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka el wa , bas sha ̱ na jäiyi wa su ̱ le bas wa ̱ palei ta bäi kukö siete , Wikblu Sikina ta bäi si ̱ wa ̱ käi , ka ̱ biketsä ta bäi si ̱ wa ̱ käi . Jewa kuke sá te je wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k ye .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Je rä sá däkläksa ̱ ka ̱ kiäk irä , kte wapaktäk irä .

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Jera je ibiketsanaksa ̱ te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa biköle je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ bäi . Jekäi ijewa te Esteban kuka . Ije rä Säkeklä biketsäk bäi si ̱ , Wikblu Sikina ta bäi si ̱ . Ñakäi ijewa te Felipe , Prócuro , Nicanor , Timón , Parmenas , Nicolás jewa kuka . Nicolás dä Antioquía wa je ̱ k ialewa ̱ Judío wa ye .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te jewa kjasha Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ia ̱ . Jera ijewa ka ̱ kia kjepa ijula ma ̱ ka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä ktä minemi ji ̱ a jöiwäta . Ñakäi kte kukäk wa wanaka ̱ ta ̱ i Jerusalén ska . Ñaebä chui wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ ñajacha ̱ wa ̱ Jesús biketsäk .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Esteban ra Säkeklä rä je ̱ r ssële bäi si ̱ , ije ia ̱ täkili rä me ̱ le bäi si ̱ . Jekäi ije te ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä we ̱ ke ̱ , ji kju ̱ awa we ̱ ke ̱ ite ijuenaklä ye sa ̱ sha ̱ na .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Ata ñapaktäklä jui kie “ Sä Deleksa ̱ Kjermita wa ” jeska tapanak wa sha ̱ manele dar Cirene ska wa , Alejandría ska wa , ñakäi isaka dar Cilicia ska wa , Asia ska wa , jewa banaka ̱ kju ̱ atkäk Esteban ra .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Ata Esteban ktäke ̱ rä je ̱ riketa ta ̱ i Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi . Je ja ̱ mi ka ijewa dor .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te kju ̱ awa wa patju ̱ a ishäk ka ̱ yue wà : “ Sá te issa ikta yakei Moisés irä Säkeklä irä ukä ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Jekäi ijewa te jeska wa irä säwäkiri wa irä , ka ̱ wei wà ñayöle wa irä , jewa wätjiwa ̱ ka ̱ . Jekäi ijewa ñajaka ̱ te isikami demitse ̱ iwa ̱ Sanedrín wa wäki ̱ .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Jeska iwa ̱ isaka date Esteban kjatiäkwa ̱ ka ̱ yue wà . Jewa te isha : — Jí ekla te jí ju sikina irä , ka ̱ wei irä , sheke ̱ yakei ka jalewa ̱ ta .

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sá te issa ite isheke ̱ rä je Nazaret wa , ale Jesús je te jí ju weikemiwa ̱ , sä wädular ju ̱ leta ̱ na Moisés wa ̱ je manewe ̱ miksa ̱ .

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Jera ñajäklelewa ̱ Sanedrín ska wa biköle te Esteban su ̱ a jaree , ñerä ijewa te isu ̱ a ra iwäktä juer sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä ángel ne wäktä irä käi .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha Esteban ia ̱ : — ¿ Je ba kjaterke ̱ rä iyina si ̱ na ?

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Jera ite ikúka : “ El wa , ' ská wa , issö . Säkeklä baa si ̱ je ̱ k kjasha saje wa ká Abraham ia ̱ ikatke ji ̱ a Mesopotamia ke ̱ i ska , ka ibitäju ̱ ba Harán ska ra .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Je te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Ma ke ̱ i jöwa ̱ ta ̱ na . Ba saka wa jöwa ̱ ta ̱ na , bä ma mai yie ma ia ̱ ka ̱ kjasheke ̱ ska . ’

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Jekäi Caldea wa ke ̱ i ska ije ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ mineju ̱ mi se ̱ ná Harán ska . Iká duawa ̱ ukä ska ra Säkeklä te ipatkaté se ̱ nak jí ka ̱ ska . Je ne ska bas se ̱ r jira rä .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Ka iwa ̱ jeska ka ̱ me ̱ ne iia ̱ idäli ukä ye iklä tkäkläwa ̱ kjelabä kabä . Ije rä ka yaba ta jeiräta Säkeklä kabla je ka ̱ ma ̱ k iwakei ia ̱ irä , ibatala ia ̱ irä iwakwa cha ye .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä te isha iia ̱ : ‘ Ba batala se ̱ rmi ka ̱ etkä wa ye kju ̱ awa wa ke ̱ i ki ̱ . Jeska jewa kolormiwa ̱ patkenak därërë . Jekäi ijewa weikarmi cuatrociento año bala na . ’

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Ata Säkeklä te isha : ‘ Yis te ijewa kukäkwa ̱ ikja ̱ naklä ye wa kpemi . Jekäi je ukä ska ijewa bitämijulu te yis kja ̱ nei we ̱ mi jí ka ̱ ska . ’

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Ite Abraham paka tene shkiri wa ̱ k , je wà ikabläklä ñaia ̱ . Je su ̱ ta iyaba Isaac ko ̱ na ra , ocho día ra ite imatsu ̱ kjuä tia ju ̱ ami . Je su ̱ ta Isaac te iwá ̱ Jacob ia ̱ . Jekäi Jacob te iwá ̱ sa kalí wa doce ia ̱ .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: “ Jera sa kalí wa te José ke ̱ i ssëke ̱ säli ebä ki ̱ ka ijewa te iwatju ̱ a ju ̱ ami , minaktse ̱ mi Egipto ska . Ata Säkeklä kaldu ije ra .

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: Je te itsa ̱ tkaksa ̱ iweikana biköle yika . Jekäi ite Egipto ke ̱ i tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Faraón je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ ira bäi , ñakäi je ̱ rike ma ite iia ̱ iktäklä Faraón ra . Je ne kuka Faraón te Egipto ke ̱ i wäkiri ye rä , iju wäkiri ye rä .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: “ Je ukä ki ̱ däli wäsika ̱ nawa ̱ Egipto irä , Canaán irä ke ̱ i biköle ska , jekäi sä weikana e ̱ e ̱ na . Jera ka sa kalí wa ia ̱ ñanak ko ̱ r ji ̱ a .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Jera Jacob te issa trigo wä tso ̱ Egipto ska ra , jera ite saje wa kalí wa patkami jela itju ̱ ak , je ne rä ijewa patkenami säkätäba rä .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Ata ijewa patkenani etäbä kicha ra , jeska José je ̱ k shaka ̱ iel wa ia ̱ . Jekjepa Faraón te José ju ̱ ñawa ̱ mane shtä ditsei wä irä .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Je itäki ̱ José te iká Jacob irä isaka wa kalabe irä kia jámi Egiptoka . Jewa däka ̱ rä setenta y cinco .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Jekäi Jacob mineju ̱ Egipto ska . Jeska ije irä saje wa kalí wa irä duacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Jekjepa ijewa nu ̱ l mine jámi Siquem ska , je blena Siquem ska sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä to ̱ le Abraham wa ̱ inaklä wäka wà Hamor yabala ia ̱ .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: “ Ata mika ̱ ike ̱ i tkenawa ̱ kja Säkeklä kablele Abraham ia ̱ je o ̱ naklä ra , jera ijewa wanaka ̱ ta ̱ i Egipto ska ,

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: jera Egipto tsa ̱ ku ̱ i saka dewa ̱ ni . Ata ka je wa ̱ José pake ju ̱ ñer .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Je je ̱ rika wäsi ̱ wa ji wa ̱ k saje wa ditsei wä ukä ja ̱ mi , te sa kalí wa weika ta ̱ i te ijewa paka yabala dulunala tuläkksa ̱ iduächa ̱ kläwa ̱ .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska Moisés ko ̱ na . Je juena Säkeklä wäna baa si ̱ . Jekäi je se ̱ nena tres mes balana ika ju ska .

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Ata mika ̱ iju ̱ naksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ ra , jera Faraón yaba alaklä wa ̱ iminetse ̱ kibiwa ̱ ite iyaba ye .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Jekäi Moisés yöna Egipto wa ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe biköle wà . Iktäke ̱ irä ite ji we ̱ ke ̱ irä je wà ijuer dä oloi ta käi .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: “ Mika ̱ ideka ̱ cuarenta año ra , jera ije ̱ r ska issëna ime miju ̱ isaka wa Israel batala su ̱ ak .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Jekäi ite ekla weikar kate su ̱ a , je wetsaksa ̱ ite , jekäi ite ñe Egipto wa ktawa ̱ . Je wà ite je ale weikanak nui kpa .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Ije te ibiketsa isaka wa je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ite ije ne oloi ja ̱ mi Säkeklä te ijewa bäkemiksa ̱ rä ni . Ata ijewa ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne je ia ̱ .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Jekäi bulirishtä ra ite Israel wa bol ku ̱ a iñakpäte . Jera ije ̱ kaka ̱ ijewa je ̱ r bäiwa ̱ kni ñara , jekäi ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : ‘ Bas dikäla bas dä ñawakwa ebä , ¿ jiye bas ñaweikäke ̱ rä na ? ’

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Jera ale iel weikäk je te Moisés tia ju ̱ a . Jekäi ite isha iia ̱ : ‘ ¿ Yi te ba kuka sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ye rä na ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: ¿ Ba ssëna yis ktäkwa ̱ , jishtä ba te je Egipto wa ktawa ̱ yiki käi na ? ’

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Ñerä Moisés te je ssa ra , je ra itunami icha ̱ k . Jekäi ise ̱ na rä ka ̱ etkä wa ye Madián ke ̱ i ska . Jeska iyabala ko ̱ na bol jäiyi wa .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: “ Jekäi cuarenta año ukäki ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ka ̱ tsä Sinaí ska ángel ekla je ̱ k kjasha Moisés ia ̱ kal yaba wäkaleka ̱ oloo je wäkataí ja ̱ rka .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Moisés te je kjayina iia ̱ su ̱ a ra je te imale ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i . Ata ije ̱ k sikawa ̱ isu ̱ ak ra , jera Säkekewa ktaté ira te isha :

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: “ Yis dä ba ká wa Kekläí , Abraham irä Isaac irä Jacob irä Kekläí . ” Jera Moisés paju ̱ naka ̱ ta ̱ i , suanawa ̱ isu ̱ ak .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Jera Säkekewa te isha iia ̱ : “ Ba sandalia yö tulöksa ̱ bä klä ja ̱ mi , ba kaldu ska ka ̱ rä sikina ki ̱ ka .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Yis cha wa weikarte ta ̱ i Egipto ska je su ̱ a yie . Ijewa u ̱ rke ̱ ssa yie . Je ne ki ̱ ka yis bitewa ̱ ijewa bäkäkksa ̱ . Jekäi bä kute ; yis te ba patkeke ̱ mi Egipto ska . ”

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: Ale iyina Moisés ia ̱ : “ ¿ Yi te ba kuka sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ye rä ? ” , je wà ijewa te iju ̱ aksa ̱ . Ata je ne kuka Säkeklä te däkwa ̱ ijewa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ibäkäkksa ̱ ye rä . Je kolona rä ale ángel je ̱ k kjayile iia ̱ kal yaba ja ̱ mi je oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: Jekäi je ne te ijewa jaksa ̱ Egipto ska rä . Ije te ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä wá ̱ , ji kju ̱ awa wá ̱ ijuenaklä ye Egipto ska , Däyë Bätsëë ska , ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska , cuarenta año bala na .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: Je Moisés ne te isha Israel batala ia ̱ : ‘ Säkeklä te bas wakwa sha ̱ na ekla kukemi jile bata shäk ye bas ia ̱ yis käi . ”

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: Je ne bakle ijewa tapalecha ̱ sha ̱ na ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska rä , je ne bakle ángel ale ktäk ira ka ̱ tsä Sinaí ska ra rä , je ne bakle sa ká wa ra rä . Ije ia ̱ kte kseka me ̱ na iwa ̱ yinakni sa ̱ ia ̱ .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: “ Ata sa ká wa ka je ̱ r ssëne ije ktä ssäk . Jewa te iktä ju ̱ aksa ̱ . Ata ijewa je ̱ r ssëna rä minakni Egipto ska .

text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa te isha Aarón ia ̱ : ‘ Je Moisés sä jäkksa ̱ Egipto ke ̱ i ska , me je da räle , ka sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer . Je ki ̱ ka ba ku ̱ jile kekläí wa me ̱ i yuö sá ia ̱ sä wäsikewa ̱ k wa ye . ’

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Jekäi je ke ̱ i wà ijewa te vaca yaba me ̱ i yuaksa ̱ . Jera ite bewak ma ̱ tulaka ̱ je me ̱ i wäja ̱ mi . Jekäi ijewa te ji yöleksa ̱ iwakwa jula wà diei ya a ̱ naa .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: Ata Säkeklä je ̱ k butsa ju ̱ ami ijewa yika , jera ite ijewa tulaksa ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska ji tso ̱ je kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k . Je rä jishtä jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ äyë yöle te ishe rä käi : “ Bas Israel wa , bas te bewak kta ma ̱ tulaka ̱ ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska cuarenta año bala na ra , ¿ jera bas te je wá ̱ rä yis ia ̱ na ?

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Bäi si ̱ ra , bas wa ̱ rä Moloc jui wäjienak irä , bekwä etka Renfán bas kekläí je me ̱ i irä , jile saka me ̱ i yöle bas wa ̱ oloitsanak irä , je ne dami rä . Je kju ̱ ei yis te bas patkemi Babilonia ektaka . ”

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: “ Jekäi ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska sa ká wa wa ̱ ju wäjienak bakle ji yileta ̱ na yöle se ̱ newa ̱ klä . Je ju yöle rä jishtä ale ktäk Moisés da te ipaka iyuäk käi , jishtä ije ia ̱ ime ̱ i kjayina rä je ja ̱ mi .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Sa ká wa ia ̱ je ju deksa ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te Josué ra ñara ditsei wä ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa ke ̱ i bakaksa ̱ , jewa tulaksa ̱ Säkeklä te sa ká wa ia ̱ , jera je ju damiña ijewa wa ̱ , jekäi je ju se ̱ na deka ̱ David bakle ke ̱ i kje .

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Säkeklä je ̱ r ssëna bäi David da . Je ki ̱ ka ije ka ̱ kia ka ̱ me ̱ naklä iia ̱ iwa ̱ ju yuäklä Jacob Kekläí ia ̱ .

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: Ata Salomón ne te je ju yua rä .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: Jeiräta ale Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta ka se ̱ nak ju yöle jula wà ja ̱ rka , jishtä jile bata shäk te ishe rä käi :

text: Heaven is my throne , and earth is my footstool : what house will ye build me ? saith the Lord : or what is the place of my rest ?
text2: “ Säkekewa te isha rä : Ka ̱ jöir dä yis je ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye . Ka ̱ jiska rä yis klä tkäkläwa ̱ . Jibä wà bas ia ̱ yis jui yörmi na ? ¿ Mane rä yis je ̱ räklä rä na ?

text: Hath not my hand made all these things ?
text2: ¿ Ka irä je biköle yöle rä yis wakei jula wà kuna na ? ”

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: “ Bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ rä doloiebä . Bas je ̱ rike irä , bas kukä irä , je rä jishtä ka tene shkiri ta käi . Bas dä kju ̱ atkäk Wikblu Sikina ra del . Jishtä bas kalí wa rä je su ̱ ta bas dä .

text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted ? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One ; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers :
text2: ¿ Mane jile bata shäk wa ka weikane bas kalí wa wa ̱ rä na ? Jewa te ale wämo däke ̱ ju ̱ bata shäkba wa ktacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ñakäi jira je ju ̱ aksa ̱ bas te , ktawa ̱ bas te .

text: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels , and have not kept it .
text2: Bas ia ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ na jini ángel wa te sa paka iwa ̱ k käi , ata ka bas wa ̱ je dälätsane kuna . ”

text: When they heard these things , they were cut to the heart , and they gnashed on him with their teeth .
text2: Ijewa te Esteban ji sha ssa ra , jera ijewa kju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na ijewa kà wätiacha ̱ wa ̱ kje .

text: But he , being full of the Holy Ghost , looked up stedfastly into heaven , and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing on the right hand of God ,
text2: Jera Wikblu Sikina te Esteban pshiwa ̱ wa ̱ . Jekäi iwäkaka ̱ ka ̱ jöir su ̱ ak , jeska ite Säkeklä oloi ñir kate su ̱ a . Ñakäi Jesús kaldu Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne je su ̱ a ite .

text: And said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God .
text2: Jera ite isha : — Issö , ka ̱ jöir kjä buka ̱ naju ̱ , jeska yie ditsä yäbei kaldu Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne je su ̱ e kate .

text: Then they cried out with a loud voice , and stopped their ears , and ran upon him with one accord ,
text2: Ata ijewa kukä kjäshtacha ̱ wa ̱ iyika . Jera ijewa kjoyina ta ̱ i minaka ̱ iki ̱ .

text: And cast him out of the city , and stoned him : and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man ' s feet , whose name was Saul .
text2: Jera ijewa te isikami je jukläyäkä ektaka , jeska ite itiami jak wà . Ikjatiäk wa paiklä tulata ̱ na dulaklei ekla kinak Saulo ia ̱ .

text: And they stoned Stephen , calling upon God , and saying , Lord Jesus , receive my spirit .
text2: Ijewa te Esteban tie kate jak wà ra , jera ika ̱ kia te isha : “ Säkekewa Jesús , yis wikblu kuköwa ̱ ba ku ̱ . ”

text: And he kneeled down , and cried with a loud voice , Lord , lay not this sin to their charge . And when he had said this , he fell asleep .
text2: Jera ija ̱ nawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ ka a ̱ na täkii : “ Säkekewa , jí ji wakbla ijewa te ke je nui ja ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ . ” Jekäi ite je sha e ̱ ná ra , iduawa ̱ .

text: And Saul was consenting unto his death . And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem ; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria , except the apostles .
text2: Ñerä Esteban duawa ̱ , je te Saulo ssëwa ̱ bäi . Je ke ̱ i ska tapanak Jerusalén ska wa sälwi su ̱ ami ditsä te e ̱ e ̱ na . Jera biköle pokonami , jewa minemi Judea ke ̱ i ska , Samaria ke ̱ i ska . Ata Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ebä a ̱ ta ̱ na ji ̱ a jeska .

text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial , and made great lamentation over him .
text2: Jera jäiyi wa je ̱ r ta bäi wa te Esteban itäbiawa ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te iji ̱ etsa ta ̱ i .

text: As for Saul , he made havock of the church , entering into every house , and haling men and women committed them to prison .
text2: Jera Saulo te tapanak wa weikami sälwi wà . Ikjäke ̱ wa ̱ ju etkä ju etkä ja ̱ rka isikäk jämi , jäiyi wa käi , alaklä wa käi , iwa ̱ patkenakmi sä wätiäklä ska .

text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word .
text2: Jera je pokonami wa te kte baa bata shami mai imine rä käi .

text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria , and preached Christ unto them .
text2: Jekäi Felipe mineju ̱ Samaria jukläyäkäí ska . Jeska jewa ia ̱ ite Säbäkäkksa ̱ ktei wapakta .

text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake , hearing and seeing the miracles which he did .
text2: Mika ̱ ditsä te ji sheke ̱ Felipe te ssa ra , ite jile we ̱ ke ̱ ijuenaklä ye su ̱ a ra , jera ijewa te etka yëbä iktä ssa tsa ̱ na .

text: For unclean spirits , crying with loud voice , came out of many that were possessed with them : and many taken with palsies , and that were lame , were healed .
text2: Je rä wikblu ñá shtä ta wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ja ̱ mi je wikblu mike ̱ ksa ̱ julu ra ia ̱ rke ̱ täkii , ñakäi karalewa ̱ wa irä , klä ialewa ̱ wa irä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ bäirke ̱ ni ki ̱ ka .

text: And there was great joy in that city .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka je jukläyäkä ska wa ssëna a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ .

text: But there was a certain man , called Simon , which beforetime in the same city used sorcery , and bewitched the people of Samaria , giving out that himself was some great one :
text2: Ata mikle kja je jukläyäkä ska ekla kaldu kie Simón ni , je rä ka ̱ chakäk , je wà iwa ̱ Samaria wa rä wäyölecha ̱ wa ̱ . Je te ishe ije ne rä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ rä .

text: To whom they all gave heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , This man is the great power of God .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka je ktä ssëke ̱ biköle te bakleka ̱ wa käi , emana wa käi jewa te . Ijewa te ishe : ‘ Ije ne rä Säkeklä täkili ta kinak oloi ta ta ̱ i ni rä . ’

text: And to him they had regard , because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries .
text2: Ijewa te iktä ssëke ̱ tsa ̱ na , mikleté iwa ̱ ijewa male ̱ teleté ka ̱ chake wà ji we ̱ ke ̱ ite wà ki ̱ ka .

text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God , and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
text2: Ata mika ̱ Felipe te Säkeklä gobiernoí irä Jesucristo kie irä je ktei baa bata sha ra , ijewa te iktä kukawa ̱ . Jekäi jäiyi wa irä alaklä wa irä ñawäuke ̱ wa ̱ tulami .

text: Then Simon himself believed also : and when he was baptized , he continued with Philip , and wondered , beholding the miracles and signs which were done .
text2: Je Simónje jije te iktä kukawa ̱ . Jekäi iwäoka ̱ na ju ̱ nami , jera ibanaka ̱ shkäkña Felipe ra . Je te ji kju ̱ awa o ̱ rke ̱ ji o ̱ rke ̱ täkili ta e ̱ e ̱ na ijuenaklä ye su ̱ a ra , je te imale ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God , they sent unto them Peter and John :
text2: Jera Jesús ktei bata shäk wa kajali Jerusalén ska te issá Samaria wa te Säkeklä ktä kukawa ̱ ni ra , jera ijewa te Pedro irä Juan irä patkami ijewa su ̱ ak .

text: Who , when they were come down , prayed for them , that they might receive the Holy Ghost :
text2: Jewa demijulu jeska ra , ika ̱ kia ijewa ki ̱ ka Wikblu Sikina me ̱ naklä ijewa ia ̱ .

text: ( For as yet he was fallen upon none of them : only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka je ja ̱ rwa ̱ ba ijewa mane a ̱ ni ki ̱ ka . Ata irä wäokle tulämi ebä , Säkekewa Jesús kie ja ̱ mi .

text: Then laid they their hands on them , and they received the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ñerä jewa jula ma ̱ ka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka , jera Wikblu Sikina deksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles ' hands the Holy Ghost was given , he offered them money ,
text2: Jesús ktei bata shäk wa jula ma ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ ditsä ki ̱ ka ra Wikblu Sikina rä me ̱ nak , je su ̱ a Simón te ra , ite inaklä washa ijewa ia ̱ ,

text: Saying , Give me also this power , that on whomsoever I lay hands , he may receive the Holy Ghost .
text2: te isha : — Je täkili mo ̱ ña yis ia ̱ , yis jula ma ̱ kläka ̱ yilé ki ̱ ka ra , Wikblu Sikina däkläksa ̱ je ia ̱ .

text: But Peter said unto him , Thy money perish with thee , because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money .
text2: Jera Pedro te ikúka : — ¡ Bä inaklä weikanowa ̱ pa ba wakei ra , ba te ibiketsa ji rä me ̱ nak Säkeklä wa ̱ däksa ̱ rä inaklä wà to ̱ le ni ki ̱ ka !

text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter : for thy heart is not right in the sight of God .
text2: Ka ba ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ nak itjä je wa ̱ kläña , je rä ka ba je ̱ rike rä bulee kuna Säkeklä wäna ki ̱ ka .

text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness , and pray God , if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee .
text2: Ata je ma wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yakei manewo ̱ ksa ̱ . Ma ka ̱ kiö Säkekewa ia ̱ , jekäirale ba jarmiwa ̱ bitaba ba te ibiketsa jekäi ma je ̱ r ska ki ̱ ka .

text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness , and in the bond of iniquity .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie isu ̱ a ra ma je ̱ rike rä kjei ta bächii si ̱ , ba rä mo ̱ lewa ̱ ji yakei wa ̱ .

text: Then answered Simon , and said , Pray ye to the Lord for me , that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me .
text2: Ñerä Simón te ikúka , te isha : — Bas ka ̱ kiöpa Säkekewa ia ̱ yis ki ̱ ka , je bas te isha mane a ̱ ni ka o ̱ naklä yis ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: And they , when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord , returned to Jerusalem , and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ji su ̱ le iwa ̱ je ktei paka e ̱ ná ra , ñakäi ijewa te Säkekewa ktä paka e ̱ ná ra , jera ibitejuluténi Jerusalénka . Jewa te Samaria wa ke ̱ i sha ̱ na jukläyäkä tsi ̱ dala tso ̱ saka saka ska kte baa bata sha .

text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip , saying , Arise , and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza , which is desert .
text2: Ñerä Säkekewa ángel í ekla kta Felipe ra , te isha : “ Ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma cho ̱ sur wà ña ̱ la tso ̱ däkksa ̱ Jerusalén ma rä Gaza ska je wà . ” Je kjäke ̱ rä ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo kja ̱ ne .

text: And he arose and went : and , behold , a man of Ethiopia , an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians , who had the charge of all her treasure , and had come to Jerusalem for to worship ,
text2: Jekäi ije je ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ mi . Ñerä ite Etiopía wa ekla eunuco su ̱ a , je rä alaklä kie Candace Etiopía wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je tsa ̱ tkäk bäi si ̱ , iji säkei ta kalabe bläk wäkirií . Je tso ̱ rä Jerusalénka Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k .

text: Was returning , and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet .
text2: Je ne damiju ̱ ni je ̱ tkeleka ̱ icarreta ki ̱ ka rä , je te jile bata shäk Isaías wa ̱ äyë yöle je washe rami .

text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip , Go near , and join thyself to this chariot .
text2: Jera Säkeklä wikblu te isha Felipe ia ̱ : “ Ma je ̱ k siköwa ̱ je carreta säkätä ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And Philip ran thither to him , and heard him read the prophet Esaias , and said , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
text2: Jera Felipe tu ̱ nami je ̱ k sikawa ̱ te issa ra ije te jile bata shäk Isaías wa ̱ äyë yöle je washe rami . Jera ite ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Je ba te iwashe rami te ma je ̱ r ku ̱ a na ?

text: And he said , How can I , except some man should guide me ? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him .
