text2: Jera ite ikúka : — Ka yi kuna yis paktäk ra , ¿ maikäi yis je ̱ r ko ̱ r je ia ̱ na ? Jera ite Felipe kiaka ̱ je ̱ tkäkka ̱ ña ira .

text: The place of the scripture which he read was this , He was led as a sheep to the slaughter ; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer , so opened he not his mouth :
text2: Je kte yöle washe rami ite , je te ishe rä : “ Ije mineletse ̱ rä oveja tse ̱ mi kota ̱ nakwa ̱ käi . Jishtä oveja yaba kä tieke ̱ ra , ka ia ̱ r kuna ikä tiäk wäna käi , je su ̱ ta ka iwa ̱ ji a ̱ ni yine .

text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away : and who shall declare his generation ? for his life is taken from the earth .
text2: Ijewa te iweika diekjela ra , ka ijewa wa ̱ ji o ̱ ne iia ̱ bulee . Ije rä tse ̱ leju ̱ mi ka ise ̱ naklä ji ̱ a ka ̱ jiska . Jekäi ka ije rä yäbeila ta pakanak kuna . ”

text: And the eunuch answered Philip , and said , I pray thee , of whom speaketh the prophet this ? of himself , or of some other man ?
text2: Jera eunuco te isha Felipe ia ̱ : — Dunasi ̱ ishö ' sia ̱ . Jí kte yile jile bata shäk wa ̱ , ¿ je te yibä paka rä na ? ¿ Iwakei na , ata kju ̱ awa na ?

text: Then Philip opened his mouth , and began at the same scripture , and preached unto him Jesus .
text2: Jera Felipe te ipaktami je iyöle skaté . Jekäi ite Jesús ktei baa sha iia ̱ .

text: And as they went on their way , they came unto a certain water : and the eunuch said , See , here is water ; what doth hinder me to be baptized ?
text2: Jekäi ijewa dami ji ̱ a ña ̱ la wà ra , idemijulu diklä balakli ska ra , je eunuco te isha : — Diklä su ̱ o . ¿ Ji tso ̱ yis wätkewa ̱ k ka yis wäoka ̱ naklä kuna na ?

text: And Philip said , If thou believest with all thine heart , thou mayest . And he answered and said , I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God .
text2: Jera Felipe te ikúka te isha : — Ba te ibiketsa si ̱ ra , ka ̱ tso ̱ ma ia ̱ . Jera ije te ikúka : — Yie ibiketse iyina si ̱ Jesús dä Säbäkäkksa ̱ , je rä Säkeklä yaba .

text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still : and they went down both into the water , both Philip and the eunuch ; and he baptized him .
text2: Jera eunuco te carreta sha wäkolonakwa ̱ . Ñerä Felipe irä eunuco irä minewa ̱ julu bolwe diklä na . Jekäi ite iwäukewa ̱ ju ̱ ami .

text: And when they were come up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip , that the eunuch saw him no more : and he went on his way rejoicing .
text2: Ijewa deksa ̱ julu diklä na ra , Säkekewa wikblu te Felipe tsa ̱ mi . Jekäi je eunuco wa ̱ ka isu ̱ ne ji ̱ a , ata imineju ̱ mi ssële a ̱ naa .

text: But Philip was found at Azotus : and passing through he preached in all the cities , till he came to Caesarea .
text2: Jera Felipe juenani Azoto ska . Jekäi mai idami käi ite kte baa bata she dami jukläyäkä saka saka biköle ska demi Cesarea ska kje .

text: And Saul , yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord , went unto the high priest ,
text2: Jera Saulo te ñapatkelewa ̱ Säkekewa ja ̱ mi wa pau ̱ ñe rami ji ̱ a weikanak irä kota ̱ nakcha ̱ wa ̱ irä . Jekäi imineju ̱ chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ ,

text: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues , that if he found any of this way , whether they were men or women , he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem .
text2: äyë kiäkksa ̱ te ̱ nakmi iwa ̱ ñapaktäklä jui tso ̱ Damasco ska je wakwa ia ̱ . Je rä ikuna ite Jesús ña ̱ le ̱ i wà minak wa ku ̱ a ra , je äyë wà iwa ̱ ijewa kukä jäkläté jäiyi wa iräle , alaklä wa iräle , wätenakcha ̱ wa ̱ Jerusalén ska .

text: And as he journeyed , he came near Damascus : and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven :
text2: Ñerä Saulo damiju ̱ ña ̱ la wà tkenawa ̱ kja Damasco ska alemana ra , jera plaa ka ̱ jöir ska ka ̱ oloi ñinaté ije ja ̱ mi shkiritkeksa ̱ .

text: And he fell to the earth , and heard a voice saying unto him , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Jekäi ija ̱ nawa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ ka , te kte ssa , te ishe iia ̱ : — Saulo , Saulo , ¿ jiye ba te yis yuleke ̱ weikanak rä na ?

text: And he said , Who art thou , Lord ? And the Lord said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest : it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Jera ije te isha : — Säkekewa , ¿ yi ba rä na ? Jera ite ikúka : — Yis dä Jesús je ne yuleke ̱ ba te weikanak rä .

text: And he trembling and astonished said , Lord , what wilt thou have me to do ? And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the city , and it shall be told thee what thou must do .
text2: Ata ba je ̱ köka ̱ cho ̱ je jukläyäkä na . Jeska ba ia ̱ iyirmi ji wa ̱ k ba kiana rä käi .

text: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless , hearing a voice , but seeing no man .
text2: Ñerä Saulo ra dami wa ñawäkukacha ̱ wa ̱ male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ , ka ijewa ia ̱ uta ̱ ner ji ̱ a kje . Ijewa te kte ssa , ata yi a ̱ ni ka juena .

text: And Saul arose from the earth ; and when his eyes were opened , he saw no man : but they led him by the hand , and brought him into Damascus .
text2: Jera Saulo je ̱ k duaka ̱ ni wäji ̱ atka ra , ka iwä wajuer ji ̱ a . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te iwajiami däkmi Damasco ska .

text: And he was three days without sight , and neither did eat nor drink .
text2: Jeska ise ̱ na tres día ka wä wajuele kuna , ka ji a ̱ ni ñale yale kuna .

text: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and to him said the Lord in a vision , Ananias . And he said , Behold , I am here , Lord .
text2: Damasco ska kte kukäk ekla kie Ananías ni je ia ̱ ji kjayile na Säkekewa te isha : — ¡ Ananías ! Jera ite ikúka : — ¿ Ji irä Säkekewa ?

text: And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the street which is called Straight , and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul , of Tarsus : for , behold , he prayeth ,
text2: Jera Säkekewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ma je ̱ köka ̱ , ma cho ̱ ña ̱ la kie Bulee ni wà Judas ju ska . Jeska ekla kinak Saulo ni dar Tarso ska je yulö . Iwa rä ije ka ̱ kiä kate ,

text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in , and putting his hand on him , that he might receive his sight .
text2: jera iia ̱ ekla kie Ananías ni kjayina je dewa ̱ ju ̱ jula ma ̱ kka ̱ ije ki ̱ ka iwä wajuenakläni .

text: Then Ananias answered , Lord , I have heard by many of this man , how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem :
text2: Jera Ananías te ikúka : — Säkekewa , ñera je pake ssële yis wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , bikö iwa ̱ jile o ̱ le yakei ba wa ̱ sikii wa tso ̱ Jerusalén ska jewa ukä ja ̱ mi käi .

text: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name .
text2: Ñaebä jíka kje ije rä ka ̱ wei ta me ̱ le iia ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ , je wà iwa ̱ ba a ̱ netsäk ba kie wà wa biköle kukächa ̱ kläwa ̱ .

text: But the Lord said unto him , Go thy way : for he is a chosen vessel unto me , to bear my name before the Gentiles , and kings , and the children of Israel :
text2: Jera Säkekewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ma cho ̱ . Ije rä yis wa ̱ kolole wao ̱ nak , yis kie bata shäk , ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ irä , ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ia ̱ irä Israel batala ia ̱ irä .

text: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name ' s sake .
text2: Yie ikjashemi je ia ̱ bikö ije kiana ji shka ̱ l ssäk yis kie kju ̱ ei rä käi .

text: And Ananias went his way , and entered into the house ; and putting his hands on him said , Brother Saul , the Lord , even Jesus , that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest , hath sent me , that thou mightest receive thy sight , and be filled with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jekäi Ananías mineju ̱ kjawa ̱ ju ̱ Saulo kalme ska , jula ma ̱ ka ̱ iki ̱ ka , te isha : — El dikä Saulo , Säkekewa Jesús ale je ̱ k kjasha ma ia ̱ ña ̱ la wà ba daju ̱ ra , je te yis patka bä wä wajuenakläni , ñakäi Wikblu Sikina wa ba pshinaklä .

text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales : and he received sight forthwith , and arose , and was baptized .
text2: Jera ñawäsaka iwäbala na jile jolonaksa ̱ nima kjuä käi , jekäi iwä wajuenani kjepa ije ̱ kaka ̱ wäoka ̱ na ju ̱ nami .

text: And when he had received meat , he was strengthened . Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus .
text2: Ñerä iyakani ra , itäkinani . Jekäi ise ̱ na ji ̱ a elkje kte kukäk wa tso ̱ Damasco ska jewa ra .

text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues , that he is the Son of God .
text2: Je ukä ska plaa ra Saulo te sa paktami Jesús ktei wà ñapaktäklä jui tso ̱ naka . Je te isha : — Ije rä Säkeklä yaba .

text: But all that heard him were amazed , and said ; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem , and came hither for that intent , that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests ?
text2: Jera je ssäk wa biköle male ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ te isha : — ¿ Ka je ne rä ale je a ̱ netsäk ikie wà wa weikäk ta ̱ i Jerusalén ska rä na ? ¿ Ka irä ije de jiska rä sä kukäk jämi minak iwa ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wäki ̱ rä na ?

text: But Saul increased the more in strength , and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus , proving that this is very Christ .
text2: Ata Saulo täkinami ki ̱ ta . Jekäi ite ikjasha Judío wa se ̱ nak Damasco ska wa ia ̱ iyina si ̱ Jesús ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä . Je wà ite ijewa kpacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And after that many days were fulfilled , the Jews took counsel to kill him :
text2: Jenaapa Judío wa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a maikäi ra ite iktemiwa ̱ wà .

text: But their laying await was known of Saul . And they watched the gates day and night to kill him .
text2: Ijewa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a iwa ̱ k jekäi je ju ̱ ñawa ̱ Saulo te . Jekäi ka ̱ piana irä tuina irä ijewa te jukläyäkä kjätkeleksa ̱ kjäshtäklä ska iki ̱ ssëke ̱ ko ̱ ta ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: Then the disciples took him by night , and let him down by the wall in a basket .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ka ̱ tuil na kte kukäk wa te jukläyäkä kjätkeleksa ̱ ekta wa ija ̱ wa ̱ mi ksá ja ̱ mi jaba ja ̱ rka .

text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem , he assayed to join himself to the disciples : but they were all afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
text2: Saulo mineju ̱ deka ̱ Jerusalén ska ra , ije ssëna je ̱ k bawa ̱ k kte kukäk wa ra . Jeiräta ijewa biköle su ̱ anacha ̱ wa ̱ iyika , ijewa wa ̱ ka ibiketsane ije rä Jesús ktei kukäk si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: But Barnabas took him , and brought him to the apostles , and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way , and that he had spoken to him , and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus .
text2: Jeiräta Bernabé te ikiawa ̱ te itsa ̱ mi Jesús ktei bata shäk wa wäki ̱ , te ijewa ia ̱ ipaka jishtä Säkekewa su ̱ a Saulo te ña ̱ la wà käi , jiräni ikta ira käi , jishtä Damasco ska Jesús kie wapakta ite ka suale ta käi .

text: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem .
text2: Jekäi Saulo shka ijewa ra jöina diana Jerusalén na .

text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus , and disputed against the Grecians : but they went about to slay him .
text2: Jekäi Säkekewa kie wapakta ite ka suale ta kuna , ite je pakeke ̱ Judío wa ktäk Griego wa ktä wà jewa ra , je wà ijewa ñaktewa ̱ ka ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te imabla su ̱ a iktäkwa ̱ .

text: Which when the brethren knew , they brought him down to Caesarea , and sent him forth to Tarsus .
text2: Mika ̱ sä el wa te je ju ̱ ña ra , ijewa te itsa ̱ mi Cesareaka . Jeska ite ipatkami Tarso ska .

text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria , and were edified ; and walking in the fear of the Lord , and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost , were multiplied .
text2: Je balana tapanak eyaka eyaka wa Judea ska irä , Galilea ska irä , Samaria ska irä , kja bäi . Jekäi ijewa täkili je ̱ na . Ijewa dami sualecha ̱ wa ̱ Säkekewa yika , ñakäi ijewa tsa ̱ tke dami Wikblu Sikina te ki ̱ ka ijewa war ebä .

text: And it came to pass , as Peter passed throughout all quarters , he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda .
text2: Jera Pedro shkä dami je ke ̱ i biköle saka saka ska . Jekäi idemiju ̱ sä sikii wa se ̱ nak Lida ska wa su ̱ ak .

text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , which had kept his bed eight years , and was sick of the palsy .
text2: Ñerä ite jeska jäiyi ekla kie Eneas ni ku ̱ a . Je rä karalewa ̱ . Je se ̱ naté ocho año ja ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ ebä .

text: And Peter said unto him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ maketh thee whole : arise , and make thy bed . And he arose immediately .
text2: Jekäi Pedro te isha ije ia ̱ : — Jesucristo te bä bäiwe ̱ ke ̱ ni . Ma jeköka ̱ ; ma ja ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ shuöni . Jera ñawäsaka ije ̱ kaka ̱ ni .

text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him , and turned to the Lord .
text2: Jekäi se ̱ nak Lida ska wa irä Sarón ska wa irä biköle te je su ̱ a , jera ijewa biköle ñamanewa ̱ kksa ̱ Säkekewa ia ̱ .

text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , which by interpretation is called Dorcas : this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did .
text2: Ñerä Jesús ktei kukäk se ̱ nak Jope ska wa ekla alaklä kie rä Tabita ni . Je manelé sä ktä wà ra , je rä Dorcas ni . Ije rä ji wa ̱ k bäi del , ka jita wa tsa ̱ tkäk del .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that she was sick , and died : whom when they had washed , they laid her in an upper chamber .
text2: Ata je ke ̱ i ska iduaksa ̱ , jekäi iduawa ̱ . Je nu ̱ l paskua isaka te , jekjepa ijewa wa ̱ imineka ̱ tse ̱ ju ja ̱ r etkä yöle ietkä bata ki ̱ ka je naka .

text: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa , and the disciples had heard that Peter was there , they sent unto him two men , desiring him that he would not delay to come to them .
text2: Lida ska ra Jope rä kukjuna . Jera kte kukäk wa te ijuña Pedro katke jeska ni , jera ijewa te bol patkami ishäk iia ̱ : “ Bä shkä sá wäki ̱ mane mane . ”

text: Then Peter arose and went with them . When he was come , they brought him into the upper chamber : and all the widows stood by him weeping , and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made , while she was with them .
text2: Jera Pedro je ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ ijewa ra . Ñerä idemiju ̱ ra , ijewa te ikiaka ̱ ju ja ̱ r etkäka . Jeska alaklä wa chichö wa biköle ñayitawa ̱ Pedro wäja ̱ mi . Jewa ji ̱ a tso ̱ , te paiklä käi dätsi käi , yöle Dorcas wa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ ikatke ji ̱ a ijewa ra ra , je kjasha ije ia ̱ .

text: But Peter put them all forth , and kneeled down , and prayed ; and turning him to the body said , Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes : and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
text2: Jera Pedro te biköle patka tulaksa ̱ . Jekjepa ije ̱ tkawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ ka ka ̱ kiäk . Jekäi iwächa ̱ mi inu ̱ l su ̱ ak te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Tabita , ma je ̱ köka ̱ ! Jera iwäji ̱ atkaksa ̱ ni te Pedro su ̱ a ra , ije ̱ tkaka ̱ .

text: And he gave her his hand , and lifted her up , and when he had called the saints and widows , presented her alive .
text2: Jera ite ikukawa ̱ kaka ̱ ijulaka . Jekäi ite sä sikii wa irä alaklä wa chichö wa irä kia jaté , jewa ia ̱ ite ikjashani kseka .

text: And it was known throughout all Joppa ; and many believed in the Lord .
text2: Je palei ju ̱ ña Jope wa biköle te . Je ki ̱ ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te Säkekewa biketsa .

text: And it came to pass , that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner .
text2: Jera Pedro se ̱ na ji ̱ a ta ̱ i Jope ska Simón bewak kjuä su ̱ iwa ̱ k ju ska .

text: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a centurion of the band called the Italian band ,
text2: Cesarea ska ekla kie Cornelio ni , je rä guardia wa cien wäsikäk . Je rä guardia wa eyaka kie Italia wa sha ̱ cien .

text: A devout man , and one that feared God with all his house , which gave much alms to the people , and prayed to God alway .
text2: Ije se ̱ r dä tsa ̱ na , ije rä Säkeklä dälätsäk iju ska tso ̱ wa biköle ra ñara . Ije rä ka jita wa tsa ̱ tkäk bäi si ̱ , Säkeklä payuläk tkelewa ̱ del .

text: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him , and saying unto him , Cornelius .
text2: Je ia ̱ ka ̱ wä wà las tres käi , Säkeklä ángel ekla kjayina je su ̱ a ite su ̱ lewa ̱ si ̱ , je dewa ̱ ije wäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Cornelio !

text: And when he looked on him , he was afraid , and said , What is it , Lord ? And he said unto him , Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God .
text2: Jera ite je ángel su ̱ a jaree , jekäi isu ̱ anawa ̱ iyika te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ji irä Säkekewa ? Jera ite ikúka : — Ba ka ̱ kiäke ̱ irä , ba te ka jita wa tsa ̱ tkeke ̱ irä , je demika ̱ Säkeklä wäki ̱ , je te ije ̱ r ja ̱ wa ̱ ba ska .

text: And now send men to Joppa , and call for one Simon , whose surname is Peter :
text2: Jekäi ba ku ̱ yile patkö jíkje ra Jope ska ekla kie Simón kinak Pedro ni je kiäk tsa ̱ té jika .

text: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner , whose house is by the sea side : he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do .
text2: Je katke ekla bewak kjuä su ̱ iwa ̱ k kie Simón ni je ju ska . Je ju katke rä däyë kjä ja ̱ mi .

text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed , he called two of his household servants , and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually ;
text2: Je ángel kta e ̱ ná Cornelio ra mineju ̱ mini , jera ite ikjanaklä wa bol irä , guardia wa ekla Säkeklä dälätsäk iwakei kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k irä kia jaté .

text: And when he had declared all these things unto them , he sent them to Joppa .
text2: Jewa ia ̱ ite ji o ̱ na biköle paka e ̱ ná ra , ite ijewa patka Jope ska .

text: On the morrow , as they went on their journey , and drew nigh unto the city , Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour :
text2: Bulirishtä las doce käi ijewa damijulu tkenawa ̱ kja alemana je jukläyäkä ska ra , je wäsaka Pedro mineka ̱ ju ̱ ju tsi ̱ bata yöle shpatke ki ̱ ka ̱ kiäk .

text: And he became very hungry , and would have eaten : but while they made ready , he fell into a trance ,
text2: Jera iktawa ̱ bäli te , issëna ime jile ñawa ̱ käi . Ata jile älir kate ji ̱ a iia ̱ dälei ja ̱ mi ije ̱ r na ka ̱ shena itjä ,

text: And saw heaven opened , and a certain vessel descending unto him , as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners , and let down to the earth :
text2: jera ite isu ̱ a ka ̱ jöir kjä buka ̱ na ju ̱ nami jeska jile sua iá ta ̱ i mo ̱ lecha ̱ wa ̱ ibata däka ̱ cuatro ska , je dewa ̱ ju ̱ té ka ̱ jiska .

text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Je ja ̱ rka bewak klä ta jula ta wa käi , je ̱ k sikäk i ̱ ski ̱ ka wa käi , du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka wa käi , biköle tso ̱ saka saka .

text: And there came a voice to him , Rise , Peter ; kill , and eat .
text2: Jera kte yinaté iia ̱ , te ishe : “ Pedro , ma je ̱ köka ̱ , je ktö ma wa ̱ kata ̱ nak . ”

text: But Peter said , Not so , Lord ; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean .
text2: Jera Pedro te isha : “ Ka irä jekäi kuna Säkekewa ! Ñera jile ñá käi , ka sikina kuna käi , mik a ̱ ni ka katäle yis wa ̱ . ”

text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Jera kte ssënani , je te ishe iia ̱ : “ Ji rä siki tele Säkeklä wa ̱ , ke je sha ñá irä ” ni .

text: This was done thrice : and the vessel was received up again into heaven .
text2: Jekäi io ̱ na däka ̱ mañatäbä kicha , jera ñawäsaka je sua iá mineka ̱ tse ̱ ni ka ̱ jöir ska .

text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean , behold , the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon ' s house , and stood before the gate ,
text2: Ñerä ji kjayina Pedro ia ̱ su ̱ a ite je biketse kaldu ji ̱ a ite jiräni jewa rä ra , jera Cornelio wa ̱ patkelemi wa te ichake dar mai Simón ju rä . Jera ijewa demijulu iju kjä ska .

text: And called , and asked whether Simon , which was surnamed Peter , were lodged there .
text2: Jera ijewa a ̱ na te ichaka : — ¿ Ekla kie Simón kinak Pedro ni , je katke jiska na ?

text: While Peter thought on the vision , the Spirit said unto him , Behold , three men seek thee .
text2: Jekäi Pedro te je ji kjayina iia ̱ biketse kate ji ̱ a ra , Säkeklä wikblu te isha iia ̱ : “ ¿ Ba te issa na ? Jäiyi wa mañal te ba yuleke ̱ .

text: Arise therefore , and get thee down , and go with them , doubting nothing : for I have sent them .
text2: Ma je ̱ köka ̱ ; ma cho ̱ wa ̱ ni i ̱ ski ̱ . Jekäi ma miña ijewa ra ka ji a ̱ ni biketsale kuna , yis ne te ijewa patkaté rä ki ̱ ka . ”

text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius ; and said , Behold , I am he whom ye seek : what is the cause wherefore ye are come ?
text2: Jekäi Pedro bitewa ̱ ju ̱ ñe patkele wa wäki ̱ , te ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — ¡ Bas te issa na ! Yis ne yuleke ̱ bas te rä . ¿ Jibä kju ̱ ei bas bite rä na ?

text: And they said , Cornelius the centurion , a just man , and one that feareth God , and of good report among all the nation of the Jews , was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house , and to hear words of thee .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Guardia wa cien wäsikäk kie Cornelio ni , je rä wämo , Säkeklä dälätsäk , palei ta bäi Judío wa biköle wa ̱ , je paka ángel sikina te ba kiäkmi iju ska , ji tso ̱ ba wa ̱ yinak je ssäklä iwa ̱ . ”

text: Then called he them in , and lodged them . And on the morrow Peter went away with them , and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him .
text2: Jera Pedro te ijewa kiawa ̱ ju naka , jeska ite ikäpewa ̱ . Jekäi bulirishtä ra ije ̱ kaka ̱ mineju ̱ ña ijewa ra . Ñakäi sa el wa tso ̱ Jope ska sha ̱ minemiña ije ra .

text: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius waited for them , and had called together his kinsmen and near friends .
text2: Jera bulirishtä ra ijewa demi Cesarea ska , jeska Cornelio te iki ̱ ssë kate , je te isaka wa irä isalibä wa irä tapawa ̱ wa ̱ kja iyika .

text: And as Peter was coming in , Cornelius met him , and fell down at his feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Jera Pedro mawa ̱ ju ̱ kja ju na ra , jera Cornelio deksa ̱ ju ̱ ikiäkwa ̱ , je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte iklä säkätä ja ̱ mi ioloitsäk .

text: But Peter took him up , saying , Stand up ; I myself also am a man .
text2: Ata Pedro te ikaka ̱ , te isha iia ̱ : — Ma je ̱ k duöka ̱ ni , yis dä ditsä ebä ba käi .

text: And as he talked with him , he went in , and found many that were come together .
text2: Iktä rami ji ̱ a ije ra , jera iminewa ̱ ju ̱ ju ja ̱ rka , te ditsä ku ̱ a tapalewa ̱ kja chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ .

text: And he said unto them , Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company , or come unto one of another nation ; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
text2: Jera ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer shi ̱ ana si ̱ sá Judío wa je ̱ k bawá ̱ kju ̱ awa wa ra iräle , däwa ̱ kju ̱ awa wa ra etka yebä iräle rä . Ata Säkeklä te yis ia ̱ ikjasha ka yis kiar yi a ̱ ni shäk irä ñá ka sikina kuna ni käi .

text: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying , as soon as I was sent for : I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me ?
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yis kinaté ra , yis biteju ̱ ka ji a ̱ ni biketsale ta kuna . Je ki ̱ ka yis te ichake , ¿ ji ye wata ba te yis kiaté rä na ?

text: And Cornelius said , Four days ago I was fasting until this hour ; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and , behold , a man stood before me in bright clothing ,
text2: Jera Cornelio te ikúka : — Jir da cuatro día jí hora ska , ka ̱ miskla las tres yis ka ̱ kiä katke yis ju ska ra , jera ñawäsaka ekla pajiele sua wäñileka ̱ olóo wa de kaldu yis wäja ̱ mi ,

text: And said , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God .
text2: te isha yis ia ̱ : ‘ Cornelio , ba ka ̱ kia je ssa Säkeklä te . Ba te ka jita wa tsa ̱ tkeke ̱ , jeska ije je ̱ r ja ̱ na .

text: Send therefore to Joppa , and call hither Simon , whose surname is Peter ; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side : who , when he cometh , shall speak unto thee .
text2: Jekäi yile patkö Jope ska Simón kinak Pedro ni kiäk tsa ̱ té . Je katke Simón bewak kjuä su ̱ iwa ̱ k ju ska , je rä däyë kjä ja ̱ mi . ’

text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee ; and thou hast well done that thou art come . Now therefore are we all here present before God , to hear all things that are commanded thee of God .
text2: Je plaabä ra , yie ijewa patkami bä wäki ̱ . Bäije ba deju ̱ rä . Jekäi jiska sá biköle tapana rä Säkeklä wäna , ji shäk Säkekewa te ba paka rä je biköle ssäk .

text: Then Peter opened his mouth , and said , Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons :
text2: Jera Pedro ktami te isha : — Iyina si ̱ yis je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra ka Säkeklä te ji we ̱ rä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa sa wakwa ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: But in every nation he that feareth him , and worketh righteousness , is accepted with him .
text2: Ata ditsei ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa jewa biköle mane te Säkeklä dälätseke ̱ irä , jile we ̱ ke ̱ wämo irä ra , je wà ije wäbätsä .

text: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel , preaching peace by Jesus Christ : ( he is Lord of all : )
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä te kte patkaté Israel batala ia ̱ , je kte baa te rä ñaje ̱ rbäiwe ̱ Jesucristo ji biköle Säkekewaí oloi ja ̱ mi ne bata she .

text: That word , I say , ye know , which was published throughout all Judaea , and began from Galilee , after the baptism which John preached ;
text2: Bas wa ̱ ji o ̱ na Judea ke ̱ i biköle ska ju ̱ ñer . Je o ̱ nami rä Galilea ska , Juan te sa pakta wäoka ̱ ne ktei wà je itä ska .

text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power : who went about doing good , and healing all that were oppressed of the devil ; for God was with him .
text2: Je rä Jesús Nazaret wa ki ̱ maikäi Säkeklä te Wikblu Sikina irä täkili irä tkaju ̱ até rä käi . Jekäi mai idami käi je te ji wá ̱ bäi , sä weikalecha ̱ wa ̱ diekjela be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ wa , je biköle bäiwa ̱ ni ite , Säkeklä kaldu ije ra ki ̱ ka .

text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews , and in Jerusalem ; whom they slew and hanged on a tree :
text2: Sá rä ji biköle wá ̱ ije te , Judea ke ̱ i ska käi , Jerusalén ska käi je su ̱ ak wa . Je ne ktawa ̱ ijewa te wäteleka ̱ kal ja ̱ mi rä .

text: Him God raised up the third day , and shewed him openly ;
text2: Ata tres día ra Säkeklä te ishki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni , ikjashani ,

text: Not to all the people , but unto witnesses chosen before of God , even to us , who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead .
text2: ka jeska wa biköle ia ̱ kuna , ata iwa ̱ kolole ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ k isu ̱ ak wa ye jewa ebä ia ̱ ite ikjasha rä , sá yäkäk ji yäk ije ra ishkileka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ukä ska jewa ia ̱ .

text: And he commanded us to preach unto the people , and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead .
text2: Je te sá paka sa paktäk , ñakäi ibata shäk Säkeklä te ije ne kuka sä kseka wa irä sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa irä jewa ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ye rä .

text: To him give all the prophets witness , that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins .
text2: Jile bata shäk wa biköle te ije ktei sha rä yi te ije biketsa ra , jewa biköle nui jarmiwa ̱ bitaba ije kie oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: While Peter yet spake these words , the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word .
text2: Pedro te jekäi ishe kaldu ji ̱ a ebä ra , Wikblu Sikina ja ̱ nawa ̱ je kte ssäk wa biköle ki ̱ .

text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished , as many as came with Peter , because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jera Jesús biketsäk wa de Pedro ra sha ̱ manele rä sa pakäk tene shkiri wa ̱ k . Jewa male ̱ cha ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ Wikblu Sikina me ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ je tkenaju ̱ ñaebä ka Judío kuna wa ki ̱ ka te ,

text: For they heard them speak with tongues , and magnify God . Then answered Peter ,
text2: ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ijewa te issa ra , ijewa ktäke ̱ kte saka wa irä , ite Säkeklä kjeishete irä . Jera Pedro te isha :

text: Can any man forbid water , that these should not be baptized , which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we ?
text2: — Wikblu Sikina deksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ jishtä sajewa ia ̱ irä deleksa ̱ käi . Jera ¿ yi je te ishe ka ka ̱ kuna ijewa ia ̱ iwäukewa ̱ klä na ?

text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord . Then prayed they him to tarry certain days .
text2: Jera ite isaka paka ijewa wäukewa ̱ k tulämi Säkekewa Jesucristo kie ja ̱ mi . Je ukä ska ijewa te Pedro kuka ji ̱ a se ̱ nak elkje ijewa kjäka .

text: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God .
text2: Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä , sa el wa tso ̱ Judea ska wa irä te issa ka Judío kuna wa te Säkeklä ktä kukawa ̱ .

text: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem , they that were of the circumcision contended with him ,
text2: Jera Pedro deka ̱ ni Jerusalén ska ra , sa pakäk tene shkiri wa ̱ k wa kju ̱ atkaka ̱ ira ,

text: Saying , Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised , and didst eat with them .
text2: jewa te isha : — ¿ Jiye ba dasta ̱ na ka tene shkiri ta wa ju na rä na ? ¿ Jiye ba yaká ijewa ra rä na ?

text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning , and expounded it by order unto them , saying ,
text2: Jera Pedro banaka ̱ iwapakäk tsa ̱ na iwa ja ̱ mi , te isha :

text: I was in the city of Joppa praying : and in a trance I saw a vision , A certain vessel descend , as it had been a great sheet , let down from heaven by four corners ; and it came even to me :
text2: — Yis ka ̱ kiäte Jope jukläyäkäí ska ra , yis je ̱ r na ka ̱ shena itjä , jera yis ia ̱ ji kjayina su ̱ a yis te . Jile sua iá ta ̱ i bitewa ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska mo ̱ lecha ̱ wa ̱ ibata däka ̱ cuatro ska , je dewa ̱ ju ̱ yis katke ska .

text: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes , I considered , and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Yis wätka isu ̱ ak ra , yie je ja ̱ rka bewak klä ta jula ta wa tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska käi , bewak sälwii käi , je ̱ k sikäk i ̱ ski ̱ ka wa käi , du ju ̱ nak ka ̱ sha ̱ ka wa käi je shtä su ̱ a .

text: And I heard a voice saying unto me , Arise , Peter ; slay and eat .
text2: Jera yie kte ssa , je te ' sia ̱ ishe : ‘ Pedro , ma je ̱ köka ̱ , je ktö ma wa ̱ kata ̱ nak . ’

text: But I said , Not so , Lord : for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth .
text2: Jera yie isha : ‘ ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna Säkekewa ! Ñera jile ñá käi , ka sikina kuna käi , mik a ̱ ni ka baklewa ̱ yis kjä na . ’

text: But the voice answered me again from heaven , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Jera etäbä kicha yis kúkanani ka ̱ jöir ska , te ishe : ‘ Ji rä siki tele Säkeklä wa ̱ ke je sha ña irä ni . ’

text: And this was done three times : and all were drawn up again into heaven .
text2: Jekäi io ̱ na deka ̱ mañatäbä kicha , kjepa je kalabe mineka ̱ tse ̱ ni ka ̱ jöir ska .

text: And , behold , immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was , sent from Caesarea unto me .
text2: Ñerä je wäsaka jäiyi wa mañal patkeleté Cesarea ska yis wäki ̱ , jewa demi mai sá kajali jui ska .

text: And the spirit bade me go with them , nothing doubting . Moreover these six brethren accompanied me , and we entered into the man ' s house :
text2: Jera Säkeklä wikblu te yis paka minak ijewa ra ka ji a ̱ ni biketsale ta kuna . Ñakäi jí sä el wa seis minemiña yis da , jekäi sá kjawa ̱ julu je säkekewa ju naka .

text: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house , which stood and said unto him , Send men to Joppa , and call for Simon , whose surname is Peter ;
text2: Jeska ije te ipaka jishtä ángel de kaldu su ̱ a ite iju naka te isha iia ̱ käi : ‘ Yile patkö Jope ska Simón kinak Pedro je kiäk tsa ̱ té .

text: Who shall tell thee words , whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved .
text2: Je te kte shemi ba ia ̱ maikäi ra ba irä ba ju ska tso ̱ wa kalabe irä tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ käi . ’

text: And as I began to speak , the Holy Ghost fell on them , as on us at the beginning .
text2: Jekäi yis ktami ra , Wikblu Sikina ja ̱ nawa ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka , jishtä ija ̱ le säkätä saje wa ki ̱ ka käi .

text: Then remembered I the word of the Lord , how that he said , John indeed baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jera yis je ̱ r ja ̱ na Säkekewa wa ̱ iyile ska , ale ite isha : ‘ Juan te sä wäukewa ̱ rä diklä wà , ata bas dä wäoka ̱ nak tulämi Wikblu Sikina wà . ’

text: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us , who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ ; what was I , that I could withstand God ?
text2: Jekäi ijewa ia ̱ Säkeklä te iwa ̱ me ̱ nak ma ̱ ñaebä , jishtä ite saje wa Säkekewa Jesucristo biketsäk wa ia ̱ ima ̱ käi ra , ¿ yi yis dä te Säkeklä wätkewe ̱ rä na ?

text: When they heard these things , they held their peace , and glorified God , saying , Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te je ssa ra , jera ijewa si ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ te Säkeklä kjeisha , te isha : — ¡ Ñera Säkeklä te ka ̱ ma ̱ ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ ñaebä iñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ ise ̱ naklä kseka !

text: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice , and Cyprus , and Antioch , preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only .
text2: Jekäi ale pokolemi Esteban ko ̱ tälewa ̱ ke ̱ i ska weikane dewa ̱ kju ̱ ei jewa minemi Fenicia ska , Chipre ska , Antioquía ska . Jekäi ka ijewa wa ̱ Jesús ktei pakane yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ , ata Judío wa ebä ia ̱ ite ipaka rä .

text: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene , which , when they were come to Antioch , spake unto the Grecians , preaching the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ata ijewa sha ̱ Chipre wa , Cirene wa minejulu Antioquía ska . Jeska ijewa te Säkekewa Jesús ktei baa bata sha Griego wa ia ̱ .

text: And the hand of the Lord was with them : and a great number believed , and turned unto the Lord .
text2: Jeska Säkekewa jula täkili te ijewa tsa ̱ tka ki ̱ ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te je ktei kuka iyina ye , jewa ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ Säkekewa ia ̱ .

text: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem : and they sent forth Barnabas , that he should go as far as Antioch .
text2: Jera tapanak Jerusalén ska wa te ipalei ssa jekäi ra , ijewa te Bernabé patka däkmi Antioquíaka .

text: Who , when he came , and had seen the grace of God , was glad , and exhorted them all , that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord .
text2: Je demiju ̱ te isu ̱ a maikäi Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shä kate iwa ̱ k käi ra , jera ije ssëna a ̱ naa . Jekäi ite ijewa täkiwa ̱ chatkäkwa ̱ je ̱ r ssële tkelewa ̱ del Säkekewa ja ̱ mi .

text: For he was a good man , and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith : and much people was added unto the Lord .
text2: Bernabé se ̱ r dä bäi , Wikblu Sikina ta bäi si ̱ , ji biketsäk etkabä bäi si ̱ . Jekäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ki ̱ wäjienami ji ̱ a Säkekewa ja ̱ mi .

text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus , for to seek Saul :
text2: Je itäki ̱ imineju ̱ mi Tarso ska Saulo yuläk . Je ku ̱ a ite , jekäi ite ikia tsa ̱ mi Antioquía ska .

text: And when he had found him , he brought him unto Antioch . And it came to pass , that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church , and taught much people . And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch .
text2: Jeska ijewa ñatapawa ̱ tapanak wa ra un año kalabe . Jekäi ijewa te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ pakta . Je Antioquía ne ska kte kukäk wa kina säkätä “ Cristo ja ̱ mi wa ” ni rä .

text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch .
text2: Je ke ̱ i wà jile bata shäk wa sha ̱ minejulu Jerusalén ska jewa demijulu Antioquía ska .

text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .
text2: Ijewa sha ̱ ekla kie Agabo ni , je je ̱ k duaka ̱ ishäk Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi däli wäsika ̱ namiwa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska mai sa ̱ se ̱ rke ̱ kjäju ̱ käi . Jekäi je o ̱ na Claudio rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ke ̱ i wà ra .

text: Then the disciples , every man according to his ability , determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea :
text2: Jera kte kukäk wa te ibiketsaksa ̱ inaklä ma ̱ k ekla ekla iwakwa wa ̱ itso ̱ ja ̱ mi , patkenak sä el wa se ̱ nak Judea ska wa tsa ̱ tkäklä .

text: Which also they did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iwá ̱ . Je cha ̱ mi ite Bernabé irä Saulo irä ia ̱ te ̱ nakmi tapanak wa wäkiri wa ia ̱ .

text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church .
text2: Jera je ke ̱ i ska ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Herodes te tapanak wa manele kukawa ̱ weikanak .

text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword .
text2: Jekäi ite ka ̱ wei ma Juan el Jacobo ktäkläwa ̱ espada wà .

text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews , he proceeded further to take Peter also . ( Then were the days of unleavened bread . )
text2: Judío wa wäbatsa je wà su ̱ a ite ra , jera ite ka ̱ wei ma Pedro kukäkläwa ̱ ñaebä . Je o ̱ na rä pan ñe ka levadura ta ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä sha ̱ naka .

text: And when he had apprehended him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him ; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people .
text2: Jekäi ite ikukawa ̱ jiawa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska ra , jera ite iju ̱ aksa ̱ kjänanenak guardia wa eyaka cuatro eyaka cuatro däka ̱ cuatro jewa wa ̱ . Jekäi ite ibiketsa tse ̱ nakksa ̱ ni Säktäkwa ̱ Bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ klä kjaju ̱ ukä ska wabiketsanakksa ̱ ditsä wäkata ska .

text: Peter therefore was kept in prison : but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him .
text2: Jera Pedro kate rä kjä kololewa ̱ guardia wa wa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska , ata tapanak wa te Säkeklä payule kate iki ̱ ka ka jalewa ̱ ta .

text: And when Herod would have brought him forth , the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains : and the keepers before the door kept the prison .
text2: Ata Herodes wa ̱ itsa ̱ kläksa ̱ kja ra , je tuinei wà Pedro kapawa ̱ guardia wa bol moska mo ̱ lewa ̱ ijewa ja ̱ mi cadena botäbä wà . Ata guardia wa saka kajali sä wätiäklä jui kjä ska ikjänanak .

text: And , behold , the angel of the Lord came upon him , and a light shined in the prison : and he smote Peter on the side , and raised him up , saying , Arise up quickly . And his chains fell off from his hands .
text2: Jera plaa ra Säkekewa ángel í ekla dewa ̱ , jera je jui ja ̱ r ñinaka ̱ . Jekäi ije te Pedro pakpa ikipa ki ̱ , jera ishki ̱ naka ̱ ra ángel te isha iia ̱ : “ Ma je ̱ köka ̱ mane mane . ” Jera cadena jolonaksa ̱ ijula ja ̱ mi .

text: And the angel said unto him , Gird thyself , and bind on thy sandals . And so he did . And he saith unto him , Cast thy garment about thee , and follow me .
text2: Ñerä je ángel te isha iia ̱ : “ Bä kipa mu ̱ owa ̱ , bä sandalia jiöwa ̱ . ” Jera ite iwá ̱ jekäi , kjepa ite isha iia ̱ : “ Ba je ̱ k ki ̱ shönak ju ̱ oka ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ ka . Sä shkä yis da . ”

text: And he went out , and followed him ; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel ; but thought he saw a vision .
text2: Jera ibiteju ̱ iitäki ̱ . Ata ka ije ̱ r ko ̱ ne iyina si ̱ ángel te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä ia ̱ . Ata ite ibiketsa jile kjayirke ̱ iia ̱ irä .

text: When they were past the first and the second ward , they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city ; which opened to them of his own accord : and they went out , and passed on through one street ; and forthwith the angel departed from him .
text2: Jera ijewa kjajulu guardia wa kajali säkätä ska , je itäki ̱ isaka tso ̱ ska . Jekäi ijewa demijulu ju kjäshtäklä yöle tabeli yaka wà sä kjäkläksa ̱ ju ̱ jukläyäkä sha ̱ na ska ra , jera je kjäyena ju ̱ nami je ̱ r wà ijewa ia ̱ . Jekäi ijewa deksa ̱ julu minejulu ña ̱ la wà . Jeska plaa ra je ángel je ̱ k tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami ije yika .

text: And when Peter was come to himself , he said , Now I know of a surety , that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod , and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews .
text2: Jekjepa Pedro je ̱ r na ka ̱ deni ra , ije ̱ rika : “ Jirje ite ' sje ̱ r ku ̱ a ra , iyina si ̱ Säkekewa te iángel patkaté , je wà ite ' sbakaksa ̱ Herodes jula naka , ñakäi Judío wa te ibiketse kate ñekäi io ̱ rmi yis ukä ja ̱ mi je yika . ”

text: And when he had considered the thing , he came to the house of Mary the mother of John , whose surname was Mark ; where many were gathered together praying .
text2: Je te ije ̱ r ku ̱ a ra , imineju ̱ mi María ju ska . Je rä Juan kinak Marcos ni je a ̱ mi . Jeska chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tapale tso ̱ ka ̱ kiäk .

text: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate , a damsel came to hearken , named Rhoda .
text2: Pedro te sä kjäkläwa ̱ kjäshtäklä bulawa ̱ ra , kjanaklä ekla busi kie Rode , je deksa ̱ ju ̱ isu ̱ ak yi irä í ̱ .

text: And when she knew Peter ' s voice , she opened not the gate for gladness , but ran in , and told how Peter stood before the gate .
text2: Ñerä ite issá Pedro ne ktä irä ra , issëna a ̱ naa wa ̱ ka ikjäyene , ata itu ̱ namini ju ja ̱ rka ibata shäk Pedro kaldu sä däkläwa ̱ kjäshtäklä ska ni .

text: And they said unto her , Thou art mad . But she constantly affirmed that it was even so . Then said they , It is his angel .
text2: Ata ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Ba wäiarke ̱ irä ! Ata ije te isha ji ̱ a : — Iyina si ̱ ije irä . Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Iwikblu irä .

text: But Peter continued knocking : and when they had opened the door , and saw him , they were astonished .
text2: Ata je dälei ja ̱ mi Pedro te ju kjä bulawe ̱ kate ji ̱ a . Jera ijewa te ju kjäyaju ̱ mi ra , ijewa te ije isu ̱ a , jera imale ̱ te ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: But he , beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace , declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison . And he said , Go shew these things unto James , and to the brethren . And he departed , and went into another place .
text2: Jera Pedro jula tkacha ̱ ijewa si ̱ wa ̱ tiächa ̱ kläwa ̱ . Jera ite ipaka ijewa ia ̱ maikäi Säkekewa te itsa ̱ ksa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska käi , kjepa ite isha : — Jí ktei shö Jacobo ia ̱ , ñakäi sä el wa ia ̱ . Jera imineju ̱ ka ̱ kju ̱ awa ska .

text: Now as soon as it was day , there was no small stir among the soldiers , what was become of Peter .
text2: Ñerä ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra guardia wa kjoyinaka ̱ ka elkje kuna me sí ̱ wa ̱ Pedro de í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And when Herod had sought for him , and found him not , he examined the keepers , and commanded that they should be put to death . And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea , and there abode .
text2: Jera Herodes te iyula , ata ka iwa ̱ iko ̱ ne ra , ite guardia wa wächakewa ̱ . Jekjepa ite ka ̱ wei ma je guardia wa ktächa ̱ kläwa ̱ . Je itäki ̱ Judea ska imineju ̱ mi se ̱ nak Cesarea ska .

text: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon : but they came with one accord to him , and , having made Blastus the king ' s chamberlain their friend , desired peace ; because their country was nourished by the king ' s country .
text2: Herodes dä kju ̱ atkelewa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na Tiro wa irä Sidón wa irä ra . Ata jewa te Blasto je ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ju wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k je ̱ rtka ijewa ktei shäk Herodes ia ̱ , jekäi idejulu iwäki ̱ ñaje ̱ rko ̱ le etka ye ebä te ka ̱ kia iia ̱ ije ̱ r bäinakläni ijewa ra . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te ñanak tse ̱ ke ̱ rä je ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ke ̱ i ska ki ̱ ka .

text: And upon a set day Herod , arrayed in royal apparel , sat upon his throne , and made an oration unto them .
text2: Jekäi je día biketsale dewa ̱ ra , jera Herodes je ̱ k pajiawa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ jienak shtä wa , je ̱ tkawa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäklä ska . Je kta ssër ta baa ijewa ra .

text: And the people gave a shout , saying , It is the voice of a god , and not of a man .
text2: Ñerä biköle kjoyinaka ̱ täkii : “ Säkeklä wa ekla ne kta rä , ka je rä ditsä kuna . ”

text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him , because he gave not God the glory : and he was eaten of worms , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Je wäsaka Säkekewa ángel í ekla te duë ja ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ije ki ̱ ka , ka iwa ̱ Säkeklä oloi kaneka ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ikatami chichöña te , kjepa iduawa ̱ .

text: But the word of God grew and multiplied .
text2: Ata Säkeklä ktä kibinami wanami .

text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem , when they had fulfilled their ministry , and took with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Ñerä Bernabé irä Saulo irä patka ji wa ̱ k Jerusalén ska je wá ̱ e ̱ ná ijewa te ra ibiterne . Jera ijewa te Juan kinak Marcos ni kiatéña .

text: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers ; as Barnabas , and Simeon that was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch , and Saul .
text2: Tapanak Antioquía ska jile bata shäk wa irä sa paktäk wa irä tso ̱ . Jewa sha ̱ rä Bernabé irä , Simón kinak Dolona ni irä , Lucio cirene wa irä , Manaén ale kibile Herodes ka ̱ bala pa ̱ le cuatro je eyaka tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ra ñara irä , Saulo irä .

text: As they ministered to the Lord , and fasted , the Holy Ghost said , Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them .
text2: Ijewa te Säkekewa ke ̱ i ki ̱ ssëte irä , ibätsäte irä , sha ̱ na ra Wikblu Sikina te isha : “ Bernabé irä Saulo irä jötulöksa ̱ jiye yis wa ̱ ijewa kolole rä je wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k . ”

text: And when they had fasted and prayed , and laid their hands on them , they sent them away .
text2: Jekäi ijewa batsa , ika ̱ kia , jera ijewa jula ma ̱ ka ̱ jewa ki ̱ ka , kjepa ite ijewa patkami .

text: So they , being sent forth by the Holy Ghost , departed unto Seleucia ; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus .
text2: Jekäi ijewa patkami Wikblu Sikina te ki ̱ ka iminejulu Seleucia ska . Jeska ijunami ko ̱ no ki ̱ ka demi Chipre ska .

text: And when they were at Salamis , they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews : and they had also John to their minister .
text2: Idemijulu Salamina ska ra ijewa te Säkeklä ktei bata sha Judío wa ñapaktäklä jui tso ̱ na . Jera ijewa wa ̱ Juan minetse ̱ ña itsa ̱ tkäk .

text: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos , they found a certain sorcerer , a false prophet , a Jew , whose name was Bar - jesus :
text2: Ijewa kjaksa ̱ julu je däyë wäbala ektaka , demijulu Pafos ska kje . Jeska ijewa te Judío wa ekla ka ̱ chakäk , sä wäyuäk jile bata shäk ye je ku ̱ a . Je kie rä Barjesús ni .

text: Which was with the deputy of the country , Sergius Paulus , a prudent man ; who called for Barnabas and Saul , and desired to hear the word of God .
text2: Je katke rä je ke ̱ i wäkiri patkele Roma wa wa ̱ kie Sergio Paulo ra . Je rä je ̱ rikäk tsa ̱ na . Jekäi je te Bernabé irä Saulo irä , kia jaté iwäki ̱ , ije ̱ r kia Säkeklä ktä ssëte ki ̱ ka .

text: But Elymas the sorcerer ( for so is his name by interpretation ) withstood them , seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith .
text2: Ata je Elimas ( je kie wà rä ka ̱ chakäk ni ) je te ijewa wätkewa ̱ ka je ka ̱ wäkiri wa ̱ Jesús biketsäklä kuna .

text: Then Saul , ( who also is called Paul , ) filled with the Holy Ghost , set his eyes on him ,
text2: Jera Saulo kinak Pablo ni je pshiwa ̱ wa ̱ Wikblu Sikina te , je te isu ̱ a jaree iwäki ̱ .

text: And said , O full of all subtilty and all mischief , thou child of the devil , thou enemy of all righteousness , wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
text2: Jera ite isha iia ̱ : — ¡ Ba rä sä wäyuäk ebä , ji biköle yakei ebä tso ̱ ma wa ̱ ! ¡ Ba rä be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i yäbei , kju ̱ atkäk ji wämo biköle ra . Ba te Säkekewa ña ̱ le ̱ i bulee je shiriwe ̱ ke ̱ ¿ je ka je ba te na ?

text: And now , behold , the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , not seeing the sun for a season . And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness ; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Jíkje ra Säkekewa te ba kpe mar , ka bä wä wajuenak ji ̱ a , ka ̱ wä oloi ka su ̱ nak ji ̱ a ba wa ̱ elkje bala na . Je ebä ra mo ̱ irä ka ̱ tuil irä ja ̱ naka ̱ iki ̱ ka . Jekäi ite ka ̱ passami yilé yuläk iwajiäk .

text: Then the deputy , when he saw what was done , believed , being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord .
text2: Ñerä je ka ̱ wäkiri te je o ̱ na su ̱ a ra , jera ite Jesús biketsa , Säkekewa ktei te imale ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos , they came to Perga in Pamphylia : and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem .
text2: Pafos ska Pablo irä shkäk ira wa irä jewa ju ̱ nami ko ̱ no ki ̱ ka , demijulu Perge ska , je rä Panfilia ke ̱ i . Ata jeska Juan te ijewa jawa ̱ biteju ̱ ni Jerusalén .

text: But when they departed from Perga , they came to Antioch in Pisidia , and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and sat down .
text2: Ñerä Perge ska ijewa minejulumi däkmi Antioquía , je rä Pisidia ke ̱ i . Jera sábado wà ijewa kjawa ̱ julu ñapaktäklä jui na , ñajaklacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them , saying , Ye men and brethren , if ye have any word of exhortation for the people , say on .
text2: Jera ka ̱ wei yöle irä , jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyöle irä je wayina e ̱ ná ra , je ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te isha ijewa ia ̱ yinak : — El wa bas wa ̱ kte sä täkiwa ̱ klä tso ̱ yinak ra , jera ishö .

text: Then Paul stood up , and beckoning with his hand said , Men of Israel , and ye that fear God , give audience .
text2: Jera Pablo je ̱ kaka ̱ jula tkacha ̱ ijewa wa ̱ iktä ssäklä , te isha : — Bas Israel wa irä bas Säkeklä dälätsäk wa irä , jikäi issö .

text: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers , and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt , and with an high arm brought he them out of it .
text2: Jí saje Israel wa Kekläí te sa kalí wa kuka . Ijewa bakle Egipto ke ̱ i ska kju ̱ awa wa ye ra , ite ijewa oloi kaka ̱ . Jeska ite ijewa jaksa ̱ iwakei jula tkacha ̱ wa .

text: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa katabla cuarenta año kjena ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo sha ̱ na .

text: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan , he divided their land to them by lot .
text2: Jekjepa ite Canaán ke ̱ i ska ditsei wä ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa däka ̱ siete tuawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , jewa ke ̱ i ma ̱ ksa ̱ ite ijewa ia ̱ däli ukä ye .

text: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years , until Samuel the prophet .
text2: Je o ̱ na rä cuatrociento cincuenta año bala na kjena . Je ukä ska ra ite manele kuka ijewa ia ̱ ji ktei paruäk ye mine dämi jile bata shäk Samuel dewa ̱ kje .

text: And afterward they desired a king : and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis , a man of the tribe of Benjamin , by the space of forty years .
text2: Jekjepa ijewa te ka ̱ kia Samuel ia ̱ iwa ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ i kukäklä . Jera Säkeklä te Saúl Quis yaba Benjamín ditsei wä kuka ijewa ia ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , cuarenta año bala na .

text: And when he had removed him , he raised up unto them David to be their king ; to whom also he gave testimony , and said , I have found David the son of Jesse , a man after mine own heart , which shall fulfil all my will .
text2: Säkeklä te je ju ̱ aksa ̱ ukä ska ra , ite David kuka ijewa ia ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , je ne ktei yile iwa ̱ : “ Yis te David Isaí yaba ne ku ̱ aksa ̱ . Ije je ̱ rikä rä yis je ̱ rikä käi . Yis ki ̱ ji sher o ̱ nak je biköle we ̱ mi ije te . ”

text: Of this man ' s seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour , Jesus :
text2: Säkeklä te David batala ekla patkaté Israel wa tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ye , jishtä ikablele käi , je rä Jesús .

text: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel .
text2: Ata ka ije däba yika ra , Juan te Israel wa biköle pakta rä wäoka ̱ ne sa ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ kläksa ̱ ktei wà .

text: And as John fulfilled his course , he said , Whom think ye that I am ? I am not he . But , behold , there cometh one after me , whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose .
text2: Jera Juan te je kja ̱ nei we ̱ e ̱ we ̱ rawa ̱ kja ra ite isha : ‘ ¿ Bas te ibiketse yis ne irä na ? Ka yis dä ije kuna . Ata issö , ekla daju ̱ ji ̱ a yis itäka , jekäi ka yis dä bäi kuna isandaliabä jibä wäyäkksa ̱ . ”

text: Men and brethren , children of the stock of Abraham , and whosoever among you feareth God , to you is the word of this salvation sent .
text2: “ Jekäi el wa Abraham batala wa , ñakäi bas sha ̱ na Säkeklä dälätsäk wa , saje wa ne ia ̱ je tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ ktei patkena rä .

text: For they that dwell at Jerusalem , and their rulers , because they knew him not , nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day , they have fulfilled them in condemning him .
text2: Ata se ̱ nak Jerusalén ska wa irä iwäkiri wa irä ka je ̱ r ko ̱ ne yi Jesús dä je ia ̱ , ñakäi jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyöle wayirke ̱ sábado sábado wà je ia ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te iwabiketsaksa ̱ ko ̱ ta ̱ nakwa ̱ ra , je wà ite iwá ̱ jini jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyile käi .

text: And though they found no cause of death in him , yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain .
text2: Ka iwa ̱ inui ko ̱ ne a ̱ ni iwa ̱ iktäkläwa ̱ , ata ika ̱ kia Pilato ia ̱ iwa ̱ iktäkläwa ̱ .

text: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him , they took him down from the tree , and laid him in a sepulchre .
text2: Ijewa te iwá ̱ biköle jishtä iyöle wa ̱ ije ktei yile ja ̱ mi , kjepa ijewa te inu ̱ l wäya ja ̱ wa ̱ té kal ja ̱ mi , bla ite sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä ska .

text: But God raised him from the dead :
text2: Ata Säkeklä te ishki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na .

text: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem , who are his witnesses unto the people .
text2: Je kjayinani shka ̱ ja ̱ bala ta , bitele ira Galilea ska ma rä Jerusalén ska jewa ia ̱ . Je isu ̱ ak wa ne rä jira iktei pakäk sa ̱ ia ̱ rä .

text: And we declare unto you glad tidings , how that the promise which was made unto the fathers ,
text2: “ Ñaebä sá te kte baa bata sheke ̱ bas ia ̱ , je rä Säkeklä kabla ji wa ̱ k sa kalí wa ia ̱ je ktei ,

text: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children , in that he hath raised up Jesus again ; as it is also written in the second psalm , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee .
text2: je ne wá ̱ ite saje iyabala ia ̱ rä . Je rä ite Jesús shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni , jishtä iyöle Salmo dos ki ̱ ka te ishe käi : ‘ Ba ne rä yis yaba rä ; jir yis ne te ba wätsikiwa ̱ rä . ’

text: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead , now no more to return to corruption , he said on this wise , I will give you the sure mercies of David .
text2: Säkeklä te ishki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni kseka dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ka tjabanakwa ̱ ji ̱ a kuna . Je sha ite jikäi : ‘ Yis kablele David ia ̱ ji wa ̱ k bäi ka jalewa ̱ ta , je su ̱ ta yie iwe ̱ mi bas ia ̱ . ’

text: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm , Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ietkä ska iyöle te ishe rä : ‘ Ba wa ̱ je wämo kolole ka janakwa ̱ ba wa ̱ yaka tjabanakwa ̱ . ’

text: For David , after he had served his own generation by the will of God , fell on sleep , and was laid unto his fathers , and saw corruption :
text2: Jekäi David te ikja ̱ nei wá ̱ je ke ̱ i ska tso ̱ wa ia ̱ , jishtä Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena käi . Je ukä ska ikapawa ̱ , demiña ikalí wa tso ̱ ska . Jekäi ije tjabanawa ̱ .

text: But he , whom God raised again , saw no corruption .
text2: Ata ale Säkeklä wa ̱ shki ̱ leka ̱ ni ka je tjabanewa ̱ kuna .

text: Be it known unto you therefore , men and brethren , that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Jekäi el wa , jí ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa , ije oloi ja ̱ mi sä rä nui janakwa ̱ bitaba , je ne ktei sheke ̱ sá te bas ia ̱ rä ,

text: And by him all that believe are justified from all things , from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses .
text2: ñakäi ji nui ka tse ̱ rju ̱ mi bas ki ̱ ka Moisés wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na oloi ja ̱ mi , je nui tse ̱ rju ̱ mi rä ije ne oloi ja ̱ mi , biköle yi te ije biketsa käi .

text: Beware therefore , lest that come upon you , which is spoken of in the prophets ;
text2: Tsa ̱ na bas se ̱ no ka io ̱ naklä bas ukä ja ̱ mi jishtä jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyileta ̱ na te ishe käi :

text: Behold , ye despisers , and wonder , and perish : for I work a work in your days , a work which ye shall in no wise believe , though a man declare it unto you .
text2: “ Issö , bas ji ja ̱ ñetsäk wa , bas male ̱ te ̱ nopa , bas weikanowa ̱ pa . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te ji we ̱ mar bas tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka ke ̱ i sha ̱ na . Yilé kuna je ji o ̱ rmi pakäkba bas ia ̱ , jera ka bas wa ̱ ikolonak iyina ye . ”

text: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue , the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath .
text2: Mika ̱ ijewa majulu kja ra , jera jeska wa te ikiani pjoo je ktei pakäkni ijewa ia ̱ je sábado etkä wà .

text: Now when the congregation was broken up , many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas : who , speaking to them , persuaded them to continue in the grace of God .
text2: Ñatapana e ̱ ná ra , Judío wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ irä , ñaialecha ̱ wa ̱ Judío wa ye Säkeklä dälätsäk wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ irä , minemi Pablo irä Bernabé irä ra . Jekäi ijewa ka ̱ paka ji ̱ a jewa ra , ite ipaka cha ̱ tkäkwa ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God .
text2: Sábado etkä wà ni ra , elkje ra je jukläyäkä ska wa biköle ñatapawa ̱ wa ̱ Säkekewa ktä ssäk .

text: But when the Jews saw the multitudes , they were filled with envy , and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul , contradicting and blaspheming .
text2: Je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa su ̱ a Judío wa te ra , jewa ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ijewa je ̱ r ki ̱ . Jera ijewa te Pablo te ji sheke ̱ sha yakei , je kukawa ̱ diekjela .

text: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold , and said , It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you : but seeing ye put it from you , and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life , lo , we turn to the Gentiles .
text2: Ata Pablo irä Bernabé irä kta ka suale kuna , te isha : — Tsa ̱ na ra bas ne ia ̱ Säkeklä ktä kiana yinakba rä . Ata bas te je ju ̱ aksa ̱ ; ka bas je ̱ k biketsane bas dä kianak se ̱ ne jekjeye kukäkwa ̱ ni . Issö , je ne ki ̱ ka sá te ka Judío kuna wa ebä pakte mar .

text: For so hath the Lord commanded us , saying , I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles , that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkekewa te jekäi sá paka iwa ̱ k rä , je te ishe : ‘ Yie ba tkawa ̱ ka ̱ oloi ye ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ , je oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ ma rä ishäkä wätkerke ̱ wa ̱ kje . ’

text: And when the Gentiles heard this , they were glad , and glorified the word of the Lord : and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed .
text2: Jera je ssa ka Judío kuna wa te ra , ijewa ssëna a ̱ naa si ̱ , te Säkekewa ktei kjeisha bäi ebä . Jera bil dä biketsale Säkeklä wa ̱ se ̱ nak jekjeye jewa te Jesús biketsa .

text: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region .
text2: Jekäi Säkekewa ktä minemika ̱ jöiwä ebä je ke ̱ i biköle ska .

text: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women , and the chief men of the city , and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas , and expelled them out of their coasts .
text2: Ata Judío wa te alaklä wa Säkeklä dälätsäk wa ju ̱ ñele bäi wa , ñakäi jäiyi wa oloi ta je jukläyäkä ska wa jewa je ̱ rtka ijewa wa ̱ Pablo irä Bernabé irä sälwi su ̱ aklä . Jekäi jewa te itulaksa ̱ je ke ̱ i ska .

text: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them , and came unto Iconium .
text2: Jera ijewa klä papjoi kpata ̱ na ji o ̱ naklä ijewa ukä ja ̱ mi . Jekäi iminejulu Iconio ska .

text: And the disciples were filled with joy , and with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ata kte kukäk wa ssëna a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ , ñakäi ijewa rä pshilewa ̱ Wikblu Sikina wa ̱ bäi si ̱ .

text: And it came to pass in Iconium , that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews , and so spake , that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed .
text2: Ñerä Iconio ska ijewa kjawa ̱ julu Judío wa ñapaktäklä jui ska . Jeska ijewa te sa pakta ssër ta bäi ebä , je ki ̱ ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te Jesús biketsa , Judío wa irä Griego wa irä .

text: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles , and made their minds evil affected against the brethren .
text2: Ata Judío wa ka je kte kukäk kuna wa te ka Judío kuna wa wätji ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ , jewa je ̱ rtka ite ikju ̱ atkäklä sä el wa ra .

text: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord , which gave testimony unto the word of his grace , and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands .
text2: Ata ijewa te sa pakta ji ̱ a ta ̱ i ka suale kuna , Säkekewa ebä biketsale . Ije te ije ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ ktei kjasheke ̱ iyina si ̱ irä , ite ijewa ia ̱ täkili me ̱ ke ̱ wà , je wà ijewa wa ̱ ijula wà ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ klä , ji kju ̱ awa wa ̱ klä ijuenaklä ye .

text: But the multitude of the city was divided : and part held with the Jews , and part with the apostles .
text2: Ata jukläyäkä ska tso ̱ wa ñabalabutsaksa ̱ , moska Judío wa ja ̱ mi , moska Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ja ̱ mi .

text: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles , and also of the Jews with their rulers , to use them despitefully , and to stone them ,
text2: Jera ka Judío kuna wa irä Judío wa irä ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a iwäkiri wa ra ijewa weikäk diekjela irä , itiäk jak wà irä .

text: They were ware of it , and fled unto Lystra and Derbe , cities of Lycaonia , and unto the region that lieth round about :
text2: Je ju ̱ ñawa ̱ ijewa te ra , ijulunami Licaonia jukläyäkäí Listra irä Derbe irä ska , ñakäi je ke ̱ i pája ̱ mi na .

text: And there they preached the gospel .
text2: Jeska ijewa te kte baa bata sha .

text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra , impotent in his feet , being a cripple from his mother ' s womb , who never had walked :
text2: Listra ska ekla klä ialewa ̱ , ko ̱ le del ka shkäk kuna , ka shkele kuna a ̱ ni ,

text: The same heard Paul speak : who stedfastly beholding him , and perceiving that he had faith to be healed ,
text2: je te Pablo ktä ssë kalme . Je wanana Pablo te jaree , ite isu ̱ a ra je te ji biketsa etkabä wà tsi ibäirka ̱ ni .

text: Said with a loud voice , Stand upright on thy feet . And he leaped and walked .
text2: Jera ite isha täkii : — Ma je ̱ köka ̱ je ̱ k duäkka ̱ klä ki ̱ . Jera ije ̱ k kpaka ̱ plaa shkami .

text: And when the people saw what Paul had done , they lifted up their voices , saying in the speech of Lycaonia , The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men .
text2: Jekäi mika ̱ ditsä tapar tso ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te ji wá ̱ Pablo te su ̱ a ra , ijewa kjoyina täkii Licaonia wa ktä wà : — ¡ Sä kekläí wa dewa ̱ julu sa ̱ sha ̱ na ditsä ye !

text: And they called Barnabas , Jupiter ; and Paul , Mercurius , because he was the chief speaker .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te Bernabé kia rä Zeus ni , Pablo kia ite rä Hermes ni , ije ne ktäke ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Then the priest of Jupiter , which was before their city , brought oxen and garlands unto the gates , and would have done sacrifice with the people .
text2: Ñerä jukläyäkä na sä kjäkläwa ̱ ska Zeus temploí kate , je chui te toro jaté , tsitsia wä butäle ksá ja ̱ mi jaté je jukläyäkä kjäshtäklä ska . Jera ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ra ñara issëna je ma ̱ kka ̱ ijewa wäna .

text: Which when the apostles , Barnabas and Paul , heard of , they rent their clothes , and ran in among the people , crying out ,
text2: Jera Jesús ktei bata shäk Bernabé irä Pablo irä te je ssa ra , ite ipaiklä ksha tkawa ̱ , ijuluna je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa sha ̱ na kjoyina jela te isha :

text: And saying , Sirs , why do ye these things ? We also are men of like passions with you , and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God , which made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all things that are therein :
text2: — Bas dikäla , ¿ jiye bas te jekäi we ̱ ke ̱ rä na ? Sá rä ditsä ebä bas käi ñaebä . Sá te bas ia ̱ kte baa bata sheke ̱ , je rä bas wa ̱ jekäi ji we ̱ ka wata jäkläwa ̱ , bas ñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ Säkeklä kseka ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä , däyë irä , ji biköle tso ̱ jeska irä je yuäkksa ̱ wakei ia ̱ .

text: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways .
text2: Mikle sa bakle wa ke ̱ i ska sä ditsei wä biköle jawa ̱ Säkeklä te shkäk iwakwa ki ̱ ji shena ja ̱ mi .

text: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness , in that he did good , and gave us rain from heaven , and fruitful seasons , filling our hearts with food and gladness .
text2: Jeiräta ite ji we ̱ ke ̱ bäi iwakei je ̱ k kjashäklä ye ka janewa ̱ iwa ̱ , bas ia ̱ ka ̱ li ̱ patkäk ka ̱ jöir ska käi , däli wäwa ̱ k iwänaklä ke ̱ i ska käi , ji ñanak yanak biköle ma ̱ k käi , ñakäi bas je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ k a ̱ naa käi .

text: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people , that they had not done sacrifice unto them .
text2: Jekäi ite jile sha , jeiräta je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa te ji me ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ iwäna elkje ra ka je wätkenewa ̱ .

text: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium , who persuaded the people , and , having stoned Paul , drew him out of the city , supposing he had been dead .
text2: Jera Judío wa datse ̱ Antioquía ska Iconio ska jewa dejulu te je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa je ̱ rtka , jekäi jewa te Pablo tia ta ̱ i jak wà , sika tsa ̱ mi jukläyäkä ektaka , ijewa te ibiketsa iduawa ̱ ni .

text: Howbeit , as the disciples stood round about him , he rose up , and came into the city : and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe .
text2: Ata kte kukäk wa ñatapawa ̱ ipája ̱ mi shkiritke , jera ije ̱ kaka ̱ ni mineju ̱ ni je jukläyäkä na . Jekäi bulirishtä ra imineju ̱ mi Bernabé ra Derbe ska .

text: And when they had preached the gospel to that city , and had taught many , they returned again to Lystra , and to Iconium , and Antioch ,
text2: Je jukläyäkä ska ijewa te kte baa bata sha , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ kuka Jesús ktei kukäk wa ye , je ukä ska ra , ijewa bitejuluni Listra ska , Iconio ska , Antioquía ska ,

text: Confirming the souls of the disciples , and exhorting them to continue in the faith , and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: ijewa te kte kukäk wa ki ̱ täkiwa ̱ , iki ̱ pakta ji biketsäk etkabä maitjä . Ijewa te isha : — Bäi si ̱ ra sa kiana weikane ta ̱ i dälär ssäk , sä kjäkläwa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi .

text: And when they had ordained them elders in every church , and had prayed with fasting , they commended them to the Lord , on whom they believed .
text2: Jera ijewa te tapanak wa wäkiri kuka iwakwa ke ̱ i ja ̱ mi . Jekäi ika ̱ kia ibatsa ijewa ki ̱ ka e ̱ ná ra , ite ijewa tulaksa ̱ Säkekewa ijewa wa ̱ biketsanak wakei ia ̱ iwa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak .

text: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia , they came to Pamphylia .
text2: Idatéjuluni Pisidia wà dejulu Panfilia ska .

text: And when they had preached the word in Perga , they went down into Attalia :
text2: Jekäi ijewa te kte wapakta Perge ska , kjepa imineni Atalia ska .

text: And thence sailed to Antioch , from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled .
text2: Jeska iju ̱ naté ko ̱ no ki ̱ däkni Antioquía ska . Je ne ska Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäk sa ̱ ia ̱ wakei ia ̱ ijewa tululeksa ̱ iwa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak , ijewa wa ̱ ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ klä rä . Je ne wawá ̱ e ̱ ná ijewa te rä .

text: And when they were come , and had gathered the church together , they rehearsed all that God had done with them , and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles .
text2: Ijewa dene ra ite tapanak wa tapawa ̱ wa ̱ . Jewa ia ̱ ite bikö Säkeklä te ji wá ̱ ijewa oloi ja ̱ mi käi , maikäi Säkeklä te ka Judío kuna wa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ji biketse etkabä wà käi , je biköle paka .

text: And there they abode long time with the disciples .
text2: Jeska ijewa se ̱ na ta ̱ i kte kukäk wa sha ̱ na .

text: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren , and said , Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses , ye cannot be saved .
text2: Jera manele datse ̱ Judea ska te sä el wa pakta , “ Moisés wa ̱ sa pakale tene shkiri wa ̱ k ka o ̱ ne bas wa ̱ ra , ka bas tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ . ”

text: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them , they determined that Paul and Barnabas , and certain other of them , should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question .
text2: Je te Pablo irä Bernabé irä kju ̱ atkewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ i ijewa ra , je ki ̱ iña uña ka elkje kuna . Je ne ki ̱ ka Pablo irä Bernabé irä ijewa sha ̱ manele irä kolona patkenak däkka ̱ Jerusalénka je ktei chakäk Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ia ̱ irä tapanak wa wäkiri wa ia ̱ irä .

text: And being brought on their way by the church , they passed through Phenice and Samaria , declaring the conversion of the Gentiles : and they caused great joy unto all the brethren .
text2: Jekäi je tapanak wa wa ̱ patkele wa kjajulu Fenicia wa , Samaria wa , jewa te ipaka maikäi ka Judío kuna wa dewa ̱ Jesús biketsäk wa ye . Je te sä el wa biköle ssëwa ̱ baawa ̱ si ̱ .

text: And when they were come to Jerusalem , they were received of the church , and of the apostles and elders , and they declared all things that God had done with them .
text2: Ijewa demijulu Jerusalén ska ra , jera tapanak wa irä iwäkiri wa irä Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä jewa te ijewa kiawa ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te ji wá ̱ Säkeklä te ijewa ia ̱ je biköle paka .

text: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees which believed , saying , That it was needful to circumcise them , and to command them to keep the law of Moses .
text2: Jera fariseo ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ja ̱ mi wa manele rä Jesús biketsäk jewa ñajaklaka ̱ te isha : — Sa kiana ijewa ia ̱ tene shkiri wa ̱ k , ñakäi ijewa pakäk Moisés wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na je wawa ̱ k .

text: And the apostles and elders came together for to consider of this matter .
text2: Jera Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä , tapanak wa wäkiri wa irä ñatapawa ̱ wa ̱ je ktei wabiketsäk .

text: And when there had been much disputing , Peter rose up , and said unto them , Men and brethren , ye know how that a good while ago God made choice among us , that the Gentiles by my mouth should hear the word of the gospel , and believe .
text2: Jekäi ijewa ñaktewa ̱ ta ̱ i , jera Pedro je ̱ kaka ̱ te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — El wa , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer säkätä Säkeklä te yis kuka bas sha ̱ na ka Judío kuna wa paktäk Jesús ktei baa wà , ijewa wa ̱ je ktei ssäklä , je biketsäklä .

text: And God , which knoweth the hearts , bare them witness , giving them the Holy Ghost , even as he did unto us ;
text2: Säkeklä sa ̱ je ̱ rike su ̱ ak , je te Wikblu Sikina ma ̱ ijewa ia ̱ , saje wa ia ̱ ite ima ̱ käi . Je wà ite ikjasha ijewa rä kolole iwa ̱ .

text: And put no difference between us and them , purifying their hearts by faith .
text2: Saje wa irä , ijewa irä ka su ̱ ne iwa ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kuna . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka ijewa je ̱ rike siki tewa ̱ ite .

text: Now therefore why tempt ye God , to put a yoke upon the neck of the disciples , which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear ?
text2: Jekäi ra , ¿ jiye bas te Säkeklä wätjiwe ̱ kte kukäk wa kuli kicha ki ̱ ka bas wa ̱ yugo ja ̱ wa ̱ kläka ̱ rä na ? Ñera sa kalí wa irä saje wa irä ka donak je ja ̱ mi .

text: But we believe that through the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ we shall be saved , even as they .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra saje wa te ibiketse sä rä tsa ̱ tkeleksa ̱ Säkekewa Jesús je ̱ r bäi sha sa ̱ ia ̱ ki ̱ ka , je ne su ̱ ta ijewa rä .

text: Then all the multitude kept silence , and gave audience to Barnabas and Paul , declaring what miracles and wonders God had wrought among the Gentiles by them .
text2: Jera je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa biköle si ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ , Bernabé irä Pablo irä te jishtä Säkeklä te ji kju ̱ awa ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä wá ̱ ijuenaklä ye ijewa oloi ja ̱ mi ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na je pakeke ̱ ssäk .

text: And after they had held their peace , James answered , saying , Men and brethren , hearken unto me :
text2: Ijewa ka ̱ paka e ̱ ná ra , Jacobo kta te isha : — El wa , yis ktä ssö .

text: Simeon hath declared how God at the first did visit the Gentiles , to take out of them a people for his name .
text2: Simón Pedro te ipaka maikäi säkätä Säkeklä je ̱ r ssëna ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ kukäk iwakei ia ̱ ye kinak ije kie ja ̱ mi rä käi .

text: And to this agree the words of the prophets ; as it is written ,
text2: Je ssëta jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyile rä , jishtä iyöle katke käi :

text: After this I will return , and will build again the tabernacle of David , which is fallen down ; and I will build again the ruins thereof , and I will set it up :
text2: ‘ Jí itä ska yis dämini . Jera yie David ju wäjienak ja ̱ lewa ̱ bäiwe ̱ mini . Yis te je weikalewa ̱ nu ̱ l bäiwe ̱ mika ̱ ni , yie je kemika ̱ ni .

text: That the residue of men might seek after the Lord , and all the Gentiles , upon whom my name is called , saith the Lord , who doeth all these things .
text2: Je rä Säkekewa payuläkläpa ditsä saka tso ̱ ji ̱ a wa wa ̱ , ñakäi ka Judío kuna wa biköle kile yis kie ja ̱ mi wa wa ̱ .

text: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world .
text2: Jekäi Säkekewa sa ̱ je ̱ rku ̱ ak je wà ka ̱ mikleté te ishe rä . ’

text: Wherefore my sentence is , that we trouble not them , which from among the Gentiles are turned to God :
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ibiketse ka sa kiar ka Judío kuna wa ñamanewa ̱ ke ̱ ksa ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ ra jewa je ̱ r iawa ̱ k .

text: But that we write unto them , that they abstain from pollutions of idols , and from fornication , and from things strangled , and from blood .
text2: Ata sa kiana äyë yuäkmi ijewa ia ̱ ijewa ñabutsä tuläklämi ji yakei telewa ̱ jile kekläí me ̱ i wa ̱ yika , ñakäi ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ irä , jile kuli sikleka ̱ irä , jile pi irä , je yika .

text: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him , being read in the synagogues every sabbath day .
text2: Iwa rä sa bakle mik ke ̱ i kjeté jukläyäkä etkä etkä ska Moisés wa ̱ ji yöle wapaktäk wa tso ̱ , jekäi sábado sábado wà je wayirke ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska .

text: Then pleased it the apostles and elders , with the whole church , to send chosen men of their own company to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas ; namely , Judas surnamed Barsabas , and Silas , chief men among the brethren :
text2: Jera Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä , tapanak wäkiri wa irä , tapanak wa biköle irä ia ̱ issëna bäi isha ̱ manele kukäk patkenak Antioquía ska Pablo irä Bernabé irä ra . Jera Judas kinak Barsabás ni irä , Silas irä kuka ijewa te . Jewa rä palei ta bakleka ̱ sä el wa sha ̱ na .

text: And they wrote letters by them after this manner ; The apostles and elders and brethren send greeting unto the brethren which are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia :
text2: Jekäi ijewa te äyë yuami jikäi ijewa wa ̱ minak : “ Sá Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä , sä el wa irä , sá te bas sá el wa ka Judío kuna wa tso ̱ Antioquía ska , Siria ska , Cilicia ska jewa chakami .

text: Forasmuch as we have heard , that certain which went out from us have troubled you with words , subverting your souls , saying , Ye must be circumcised , and keep the law : to whom we gave no such commandment :
text2: Sá te iju ̱ ña sá sha ̱ minemi bas wäki ̱ , jewa ka patkene sá wa ̱ . Jewa te bas je ̱ r iawa ̱ wa ̱ ijewa te ji sha wà , je wà ite bas je ̱ r shewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: It seemed good unto us , being assembled with one accord , to send chosen men unto you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sá ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a etka yebä , jekäi sá ia ̱ issëna bäi manele kukäk patkenak bas wäki ̱ , sá wa ̱ shka ̱ ta Bernabé irä Pablo irä jewa ra .

text: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ijewa kja ñatululeksa ̱ duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo kie bata ki ̱ ka .

text: We have sent therefore Judas and Silas , who shall also tell you the same things by mouth .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sá te Judas irä Silas irä patkami bas wäki ̱ , jewa te ji shemi bas ia ̱ jini jí äyë patkami sá te je te ishe ssë ta .

text: For it seemed good to the Holy Ghost , and to us , to lay upon you no greater burden than these necessary things ;
text2: Jekäi Wikblu Sikina irä sá irä ia ̱ issëna bäi , ka jile saka ja ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ kuna bas ki ̱ ka , ata jí ka ̱ wei kianak pjoo ebä :

text: That ye abstain from meats offered to idols , and from blood , and from things strangled , and from fornication : from which if ye keep yourselves , ye shall do well . Fare ye well .
text2: Je rä bas kiana je ̱ k wätkewa ̱ k ji me ̱ leka ̱ jile kekläí me ̱ i wäja ̱ mi irä , jile pi irä , jile kuli sikleka ̱ irä , ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ irä je yika . Bas je ̱ k wätkewa ̱ je shtä yika ra , bas te ji wá ̱ rä bäi . Bas kjöpa bäi . ”

text: So when they were dismissed , they came to Antioch : and when they had gathered the multitude together , they delivered the epistle :
text2: Jekäi ijewa ñabatashata ̱ na ra , iminejulu Antioquía , jeska ijewa te Jesús biketsäk wa tapawa ̱ wa ̱ ra , jera ite je äyë cha ̱ mi ijewa ia ̱ .

text: Which when they had read , they rejoiced for the consolation .
text2: Ijewa te je washa ra , je te ijewa ssëwa ̱ baa , je kte te ijewa je ̱ r pablani ki ̱ ka .

text: And Judas and Silas , being prophets also themselves , exhorted the brethren with many words , and confirmed them .
text2: Judas irä Silas irä jewa rä ñaebä jile bata shäk wa . Jekäi ijewa te ji sha ta ̱ i wà , ite sä el wa je ̱ r pabla , iki ̱ täkiwa ̱ .

text: And after they had tarried there a space , they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles .
text2: Jekäi ijewa se ̱ na ji ̱ a jeska . Je ukä ki ̱ ka sä el wa te ijewa patkaténi je ̱ r baa wà ipatkäkmi wa wä ki ̱ .

text: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still .
text2: Ata Silas ia ̱ issëna bäi ime a ̱ ta ̱ na jeka käi .

text: Paul also and Barnabas continued in Antioch , teaching and preaching the word of the Lord , with many others also .
text2: Jera Pablo irä Bernabé irä se ̱ na ji ̱ a Antioquía ska . Jeska ijewa te sa pakta Säkekewa ktä wà , ñakäi kte baa bata sha ite isaka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ra ñara .

text: And some days after Paul said unto Barnabas , Let us go again and visit our brethren in every city where we have preached the word of the Lord , and see how they do .
text2: Je ukä ska je ̱ naapa Pablo te isha Bernabé ia ̱ : — Sä shkäni jukläyäkä etkä etkä mai sa bakle Säkekewa ktä bata shäk jeka sä el wa su ̱ ak , jishtä idami ji ̱ a rä í ̱ käi .

text: And Barnabas determined to take with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Jera Bernabé ssëna Juan kie etkä Marcos ni je kiäk tsa ̱ miña .
