text: But Paul thought not good to take him with them , who departed from them from Pamphylia , and went not with them to the work .
text2: Ata Pablo ka ssëne bäi ikiäkmiña . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je te ijewa jawa ̱ ta ̱ na Panfilia ska ka shkene ji ̱ a ijewa ra Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: And the contention was so sharp between them , that they departed asunder one from the other : and so Barnabas took Mark , and sailed unto Cyprus ;
text2: Jekäi ka ijewa ia ̱ ibiketsar etkabä ki ̱ ka ijewa ñabalabutsa tulami . Jera Bernabé te Marcos tsa ̱ mi , ju ̱ nami ko ̱ no ki ̱ ka Chipre ska .

text: And Paul chose Silas , and departed , being recommended by the brethren unto the grace of God .
text2: Ata Pablo te Silas kia . Jekäi imineju ̱ ra sä el wa te ijewa tulaksa ̱ Säkekewa ia ̱ ije ̱ r bäi shäklä ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And he went through Syria and Cilicia , confirming the churches .
text2: Jekäi jeska imine kjaju ̱ Siria wa , Cilicia wa . Jeska ite tapanak eyaka eyaka wa ki ̱ täkiwa ̱ .

text: Then came he to Derbe and Lystra : and , behold , a certain disciple was there , named Timotheus , the son of a certain woman , which was a Jewess , and believed ; but his father was a Greek :
text2: Jekäi Pablo demiju ̱ Derbe ska , je itäki ̱ Listra ska . Jera jeska kte kukäk ekla kaldu kie rä Timoteo ni . Je rä ekla alaklä Judío wa Jesús biketsäk yaba , ata iká rä Griego wa .

text: Which was well reported of by the brethren that were at Lystra and Iconium .
text2: Sä el wa tso ̱ Listra ska , Iconio ska , jewa te ije sha ipalei rä bäi .

text: Him would Paul have to go forth with him ; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters : for they knew all that his father was a Greek .
text2: Jera Pablo ssëna ikiäkmiña ira . Jekäi ite tene shkiri wá ̱ iia ̱ , Judío wa tso ̱ je naka wa te ishemika ̱ ki ̱ ka , biköle wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Timoteo ká rä Griego wa ki ̱ ka .

text: And as they went through the cities , they delivered them the decrees for to keep , that were ordained of the apostles and elders which were at Jerusalem .
text2: Jera ijewa kjajulu jukläyäkä etkä etkä sha ̱ na ra , ijewa te Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä tapanak wa wäkiri wa irä tso ̱ Jerusalén ska wa te ji biketsaksa ̱ je wapaka ijewa ia ̱ , ijewa wa ̱ dälätsanak .

text: And so were the churches established in the faith , and increased in number daily .
text2: Jekäi tapanak eyaka eyaka wa ki ̱ täkir damika ̱ ji biketsäk etkabä , ñakäi buliri buliri ijewa wanamika ̱ .

text: Now when they had gone throughout Phrygia and the region of Galatia , and were forbidden of the Holy Ghost to preach the word in Asia ,
text2: Ijewa kjaksa ̱ julu Frigia irä Galacia irä ke ̱ i sha ̱ na , ata Wikblu Sikina te ijewa wätkewa ̱ wa ̱ ka ijewa wa ̱ kte shäklä Asia ska .

text: After they were come to Mysia , they assayed to go into Bithynia : but the Spirit suffered them not .
text2: Jekäi ijewa demijulu Misia kjä ska , jera ijewa ssëna minak Bitinia ska . Ata Jesús wikblu wa ̱ ka ka ̱ me ̱ ne ijewa ia ̱ iminaklä jeka .

text: And they passing by Mysia came down to Troas .
text2: Jekäi ikjajulu Misia ke ̱ i säkätä ja ̱ mi demijulu Troas ska .

text: And a vision appeared to Paul in the night ; There stood a man of Macedonia , and prayed him , saying , Come over into Macedonia , and help us .
text2: Jekäi tuina Pablo ia ̱ ikjayina , ekla Macedonia wa kaldu te ikieke ̱ pjoo te isha : “ Bä kuteksa ̱ jíkata Macedonia wà sá tsa ̱ tkäk . ”

text: And after he had seen the vision , immediately we endeavored to go into Macedonia , assuredly gathering that the Lord had called us for to preach the gospel unto them .
text2: Je kjayina iia ̱ su ̱ a ite ra , ñawäsaka sá kukana minakmi Macedonia , biketsale iyina si ̱ Säkeklä te sá kia jeska wa ia ̱ kte baa bata shäk rä ni .

text: Therefore loosing from Troas , we came with a straight course to Samothracia , and the next day to Neapolis ;
text2: Jera Troas ska sá ju ̱ nami ko ̱ no ki ̱ ka bulee demi Samotracia ska . Jekäi bulirishtä sá demijulu Neápolis ska .

text: And from thence to Philippi , which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia , and a colony : and we were in that city abiding certain days .
text2: Jeska sá minemi Filipo ska . Je ne rä jukläyäkä bäi si ̱ Macedonia ke ̱ i ska rä . Je ka ̱ ne kolole Roma wa wa ̱ ise ̱ naklä rä . Jeska sá se ̱ na ju ̱ aju ̱ ana .

text: And on the sabbath we went out of the city by a river side , where prayer was wont to be made ; and we sat down , and spake unto the women which resorted thither .
text2: Jera sábado wà sá minejulumi jukläyäkä kjätkeleksa ̱ kjäshtäklä ektaka diklä kjäka , sá te ibiketsa jeska ka ̱ kiäklä ke ̱ i tso ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jeska sá ñajaklawa ̱ . Jera sá te alaklä wa tso ̱ tapalewa ̱ jeska wa pakta .

text: And a certain woman named Lydia , a seller of purple , of the city of Thyatira , which worshipped God , heard us : whose heart the Lord opened , that she attended unto the things which were spoken of Paul .
text2: Ijewa sha ̱ ekla te iktä ssë kate kie rä Lidia ni . Je rä sua siöö yëna watju ̱ ak , je datse ̱ Tiatira ska . Je rä Säkeklä dälätsäk . Je je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ Säkekewa te Pablo ktä kukäk tsa ̱ na .

text: And when she was baptized , and her household , she besought us , saying , If ye have judged me to be faithful to the Lord , come into my house , and abide there . And she constrained us .
text2: Jekäi ije irä , iju ska tso ̱ wa irä wäoka ̱ na tulami , jera ite sá kia pjoo , te isha : — Bas te ibiketse yis dä Säkekewa biketsäk si ̱ ra , jera bas shkä yis ju ska se ̱ nak . Jekäi sá kuka ite jeka se ̱ nak .

text: And it came to pass , as we went to prayer , a certain damsel possessed with a spirit of divination met us , which brought her masters much gain by soothsaying :
text2: Etaba kicha sá damijuluni ka ̱ kiäkläka ra , sá wäki ̱ kjanaklä busi ekla deju ̱ , je rä wikblu ji ju ̱ ñakksa ̱ shtä ta . Je ite ji ju ̱ ñeke ̱ ksa ̱ wà inaklä däke ̱ ksa ̱ ta ̱ i iblui wa ia ̱ .

text: The same followed Paul and us , and cried , saying , These men are the servants of the most high God , which shew unto us the way of salvation .
text2: Je shkä dami Pablo irä sá irä itäki ̱ , a ̱ rke ̱ te isheke ̱ : — ¡ Jí jäiyi wa rä Säkeklä Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta kjanaklä wa ! Jewa te tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ ña ̱ le ̱ i ne bata sheke ̱ bas ia ̱ rä .

text: And this did she many days . But Paul , being grieved , turned and said to the spirit , I command thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her . And he came out the same hour .
text2: Ka ̱ raa je we ̱ ke ̱ ite . Je te Pablo dokowa ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka ije ̱ k manewa ̱ té , te isha je wikblu ia ̱ : — Yie ba pake Jesucristo kie oloi ja ̱ mi je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ je alaklä ska . Jera ñawäsaka ije ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ ije ska .

text: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone , they caught Paul and Silas , and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers ,
text2: Jera iblui wa te isu ̱ a ka ji kuna ji ̱ a iñabluwa ̱ klä ra , ijewa te Pablo irä Silas irä kukacha ̱ wa ̱ sika jámi sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska ka ̱ wei ta wa wäki ̱ ,

text: And brought them to the magistrates , saying , These men , being Jews , do exceedingly trouble our city ,
text2: te ikjatia iwäkiri wa ia ̱ , te isha : — Jí jäiyi wa rä Judío wa , jewa te jí sä jukläyäkäí ska sä wätji ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ .

text: And teach customs , which are not lawful for us to receive , neither to observe , being Romans .
text2: Jewa te ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe kju ̱ awa bata sheke ̱ , ka ka ̱ wei kuna sa ̱ wa ̱ je kukäklä iräle , je wawa ̱ klä iräle , sajewa rä Roma wa ki ̱ ka .

text: And the multitude rose up together against them : and the magistrates rent off their clothes , and commanded to beat them .
text2: Jekäi jeska wa biköle ñajaka ̱ kju ̱ atkäk ijewa ra . Jera iwäkiri wa te ipaya tulami kjepa ite isha buka ̱ nak kata wà .

text: And when they had laid many stripes upon them , they cast them into prison , charging the jailor to keep them safely :
text2: Ite ijewa kpa e ̱ e ̱ na ra , ijewa te ijiacha ̱ wa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska . Jeska ite sä wätiäklä jui kjänanak paka ikjänanak tsa ̱ na .

text: Who , having received such a charge , thrust them into the inner prison , and made their feet fast in the stocks .
text2: Ije pakana jekäi iwa ̱ k ra , ite ijewa patkawa ̱ sä wätiäklä jui ja ̱ r etkä doloiebä ja ̱ rka , wätiacha ̱ wa ̱ ikläka cepo wà .

text: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed , and sang praises unto God : and the prisoners heard them .
text2: Ata ka ̱ sha ̱ sha ̱ ra Pablo irä Silas irä ka ̱ kiäte , ijewa ksäte Säkeklä ia ̱ . Jera je ssë tso ̱ wätelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa te .

text: And suddenly there was a great earthquake , so that the foundations of the prison were shaken : and immediately all the doors were opened , and every one ' s bands were loosed .
text2: Ñerä plaa ra ka ̱ wäbuka ̱ naka ̱ ta ̱ i , sä wätiäklä jui ñak katabläklä wäkpaka ̱ kje . Jera ñawäsaka ju kjäyena tulami kalabe , cadena wà sa ̱ tso ̱ mo ̱ lecha ̱ wa ̱ wa biköle wäyena tulami .

text: And the keeper of the prison awaking out of his sleep , and seeing the prison doors open , he drew out his sword , and would have killed himself , supposing that the prisoners had been fled .
text2: Jera ikjänanak shki ̱ naka ̱ te isu ̱ a sä wätiäklä jui kjäyena tulami ra , ite iespada sikaksa ̱ ije ̱ k ktäkläwa ̱ , ite ibiketsa wätelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa biköle kjaksa ̱ julu ki ̱ ka .

text: But Paul cried with a loud voice , saying , Do thyself no harm : for we are all here .
text2: Ata Pablo a ̱ na itsa ̱ ka : — Ke ma je ̱ k ktawa ̱ , sá biköle tapar tso ̱ ji ̱ a jiska .

text: Then he called for a light , and sprang in , and came trembling , and fell down before Paul and Silas ,
text2: Jekäi ite tsi ̱ ni kia . Jera imine tu ̱ lee ju ja ̱ rka je ̱ tkawa ̱ wakte paju ̱ leka ̱ Pablo irä Silas irä wäja ̱ mi .

text: And brought them out , and said , Sirs , what must I do to be saved ?
text2: Jera ite ijewa jaksa ̱ . Jekäi ite ichaka ijewa ia ̱ : — Säkekewa , ¿ ji we ̱ yie yis tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ na ?

text: And they said , Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ , and thou shalt be saved , and thy house .
text2: Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Säkekewa Jesucristo biketsö , jera ba irä bä ju ska tso ̱ wa irä tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ .

text: And they spake unto him the word of the Lord , and to all that were in his house .
text2: Jera ijewa te Säkekewa ktä sha iia ̱ , ije irä , iju ska tso ̱ wa irä biköle ia ̱ .

text: And he took them the same hour of the night , and washed their stripes ; and was baptized , he and all his , straightway .
text2: Jera je tuinei ebä wà ite Pablo irä Silas irä shka ̱ na paskua . Jera ije irä je ju ska tso ̱ wa irä wäoka ̱ na tulami .

text: And when he had brought them into his house , he set meat before them , and rejoiced , believing in God with all his house .
text2: Jekäi ite ijewa kiawa ̱ iju na , te ichewa ̱ . Jera issëna a ̱ naa si ̱ , ite Säkeklä biketsa iju ska tso ̱ wa biköle ra ki ̱ ka .

text: And when it was day , the magistrates sent the serjeants , saying , Let those men go .
text2: Jera ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra jukläyäkä wäkiri wa te guardia wa patkami ishäk : “ Je jäiyi wa wäyö tulömi ” ni .

text: And the keeper of the prison told this saying to Paul , The magistrates have sent to let you go : now therefore depart , and go in peace .
text2: Jera je ikjänanak te je shani Pablo ia ̱ : — Sá wäkiri wa te ishaté yis ia ̱ bas wäyeksa ̱ ni . Je ki ̱ ka bas cho ̱ ni ka ji biketsale käi .

text: But Paul said unto them , They have beaten us openly uncondemned , being Romans , and have cast us into prison ; and now do they thrust us out privily ? nay verily ; but let them come themselves and fetch us out .
text2: Ata Pablo te ijewa ia ̱ isha : — Sá rä Roma wa , ata ijewa te sá kpa ditsä wäna ka ktei wabiketsale kuna , jekäi ite sá wätiacha ̱ wa ̱ . ¿ Ata jir ijewa te sá jetuleke ̱ ksa ̱ ni jakika käi na ? Ka irä jekäi kuna , iwakwa ne kiana bitäk sá jätuläksa ̱ ni rä .

text: And the serjeants told these words unto the magistrates : and they feared , when they heard that they were Romans .
text2: Jekäi je guardia wa te je ktei pakani iwäkiri wa ia ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te issá Pablo irä Silas irä jewa rä Roma wa ra , isuanacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And they came and besought them , and brought them out , and desired them to depart out of the city .
text2: Jekäi ijewa dejulu ñawetsa iwa ̱ ijäkläwa ̱ bitaba . Jera ijewa te ijaksa ̱ , te ipaka minak kju ̱ awa je jukläyäkä ska .

text: And they went out of the prison , and entered into the house of Lydia and when they had seen the brethren , they comforted them , and departed .
text2: Jekäi ijewa deksa ̱ julu sä wätiäklä ska ra , iminemi Lidia juka . Jekäi ijewa ñasu ̱ a sa el wa ra , jekäi ite ijewa paka chatkäkwa ̱ , kjepa iminejulumi .

text: Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia , they came to Thessalonica , where was a synagogue of the Jews :
text2: Jera ijewa kjajulu Anfípolis irä Apolonia irä wà demi julu Tesalónica ska . Jeska Judío wa ñapaktäklä jui kate .

text: And Paul , as his manner was , went in unto them , and three sabbath days reasoned with them out of the scriptures ,
text2: Pablo wädular käi , ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ tapanak ijewa ra . Jekäi sábado sábado däka ̱ mañatäbä kicha ite ji paka iyöle kalme ja ̱ mi ijewa ra .

text: Opening and alleging , that Christ must needs have suffered , and risen again from the dead ; and that this Jesus , whom I preach unto you , is Christ .
text2: Je wà ite ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a , ijewa ia ̱ ikjasha Säbäkäkksa ̱ kiana ji shka ̱ l ssäk , ñakäi shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na . Jera ite isha : — Jesús ale ktei yinak yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ , je ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ rä .

text: And some of them believed , and consorted with Paul and Silas ; and of the devout Greeks a great multitude , and of the chief women not a few .
text2: Jera ijewa sha ̱ te je kte kuka iyina ye , dewa ̱ Pablo irä Silas irä ra . Ñakäi Griego wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ Säkeklä dälätsäk wa irä , alaklä wa palei ta bakleka ̱ wa irä , dewa ̱ ña ka elkje kuna .

text: But the Jews which believed not , moved with envy , took unto them certain lewd fellows of the baser sort , and gathered a company , and set all the city on an uproar , and assaulted the house of Jason , and sought to bring them out to the people .
text2: Ata Judío wa je ̱ r ki ̱ Pablo ianawa ̱ . Je kju ̱ ei ijewa te kje ditsä ka bäi kuna wa , ka ji wa ̱ k kuna wa tapawa ̱ wa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ . Jewa ra ijewa te ditsä wätji ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ , jekäi je jukläyäkä wa kjoyinaka ̱ ta ̱ i , julunami kjawa ̱ julu Jasón ju naka , Pablo irä Silas irä jäkmi ditsä wäki ̱ .

text: And when they found them not , they drew Jason and certain brethren unto the rulers of the city , crying , These that have turned the world upside down are come hither also ;
text2: Ata ka iwa ̱ iko ̱ ne kju ̱ ei ijewa te Jasón irä sä el wa sha ̱ irä sika jámi jukläyäkä wäkiri wa wäki ̱ . Jewa kjoyina täkii : — Jí sä wätji ̱ wa ̱ k ka ̱ biköle ska , jewa dejulu jíka sä wätji ̱ wa ̱ k ñaebä .

text: Whom Jason hath received : and these all do contrary to the decrees of Caesar , saying that there is another king , one Jesus .
text2: Jewa kiawa ̱ Jasón te . Jewa biköle te ji we ̱ ke ̱ César ka ̱ wei me ̱ le ukä ja ̱ mi . Jewa te ishe sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kju ̱ awa tso ̱ , je rä Jesús ni .

text: And they troubled the people and the rulers of the city , when they heard these things .
text2: Je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa irä , iwäkiri wa irä te je ssa ra , je te ikju ̱ atkewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: And when they had taken security of Jason , and of the other , they let them go .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te Jasón irä , isaka irä paka ñatsa ̱ tju ̱ ak tulämi ra , ite ija tulamini .

text: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night unto Berea : who coming thither went into the synagogue of the Jews .
text2: Je tuinei ebä ra , sa el wa te Pablo irä Silas irä patkami Bereaka . Jekäi ijewa demijulu jeka ra , ikjawa ̱ julu Judío wa ñapaktäklä jui na .

text: These were more noble than those in Thessalonica , in that they received the word with all readiness of mind , and searched the scriptures daily , whether those things were so .
text2: Jeska wa rä ji ssäk tjabana Tesalónica wa tsa ̱ ta . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ijewa te je ktei kuka je ̱ r bäi wà , iñayuäke ̱ buliri buliri kte yöle wà iwa ̱ isu ̱ aklä ji yirke ̱ rä iyina si ̱ í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Therefore many of them believed ; also of honourable women which were Greeks , and of men , not a few .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te Jesús biketsa . Griego wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ jäiyi wa irä , alaklä wa palei ta bakleka ̱ wa irä jewa te ibiketsa ñaebä .

text: But when the Jews of Thessalonica had knowledge that the word of God was preached of Paul at Berea , they came thither also , and stirred up the people .
text2: Ata mika ̱ Judío wa se ̱ nak Tesalónica ska wa te iju ̱ ña Pablo te sa pakte kate Säkeklä ktä wà Berea ska ñaebä , jera ijewa bitejulu dejulu jeska . Jekäi jeska ijewa te biköle wätji ̱ wa ̱ tulaka ̱ ikju ̱ atkächa ̱ kläwa ̱ .

text: And then immediately the brethren sent away Paul to go as it were to the sea : but Silas and Timotheus abode there still .
text2: Jera sa el wa te Pablo patkami mane mane minakju ̱ däyë kjäka . Ata Silas irä Timoteo irä a ̱ ta ̱ nata ̱ na .

text: And they that conducted Paul brought him unto Athens : and receiving a commandment unto Silas and Timotheus for to come to him with all speed , they departed .
text2: Jekäi Pablo ña ̱ le ̱ i ju ̱ ak wa wa ̱ imine demi Atenas ska . Jera ite ijewa ia ̱ Silas irä Timoteo irä ktei patkaté ibitä mane mane iwäki ̱ . Jera jewa bitejulu .

text: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens , his spirit was stirred in him , when he saw the city wholly given to idolatry .
text2: Pablo te ijewa ki ̱ ssë katke ji ̱ a Atenas ska bala na ra , je jukläyäkä ska jile kekläí wa me ̱ i yöle tso ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na su ̱ a ite . Je te issëwa ̱ dokolewa ̱ .

text: Therefore disputed he in the synagogue with the Jews , and with the devout persons , and in the market daily with them that met with him .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ñapaktäklä jui ska ite ipakeke ̱ Judío wa ra irä , Säkeklä dälätsäk wa ra irä . Ñakäi sa tapanaklä däli watju ̱ ak shtä ska däke ̱ wa ra ite ipakeke ̱ buliri buliri .

text: Then certain philosophers of the Epicureans , and of the Stoicks , encountered him . And some said , What will this babbler say ? other some , He seemeth to be a setter forth of strange gods : because he preached unto them Jesus , and the resurrection .
text2: Ñakäi ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe epicúreo wa irä , estoico wa irä , jewa sha ̱ ñaktewa ̱ ka ̱ Pablo ra . Je rä ite ijewa ia ̱ Jesús irä sa ̱ shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni irä ktei baa bata sheke ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ijewa sha ̱ te isha : — ¿ Je ktäk ka wata te jibä pakeke ̱ rä na ? Isaka te isha : — Issër ije te rä ka ̱ etkä wa wa ̱ jile kekläí wa tso ̱ je ne ktei sheke ̱ rä .

text: And they took him , and brought him unto Areopagus , saying , May we know what this new doctrine , whereof thou speakest , is ?
text2: Jera jewa te Pablo kia tsa ̱ mi Areópago ska . Jeska ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Je ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe spa ̱ na ba wa ̱ pakanak je ka pakanak ba wa ̱ sá ia ̱ sá wa ̱ ssënak na ?

text: For thou bringest certain strange things to our ears : we would know therefore what these things mean .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba te ji pakeke ̱ kju ̱ awa ssá sá te , je ki ̱ ka sá je ̱ rkia je ssäk jiräni iwa rä käi .

text: ( For all the Athenians and strangers which were there spent their time in nothing else , but either to tell , or to hear some new thing . )
text2: Iwa rä Atenas wa irä ka ̱ etkä wa se ̱ nak jeska wa irä te ka ji saka we ̱ kuna . Ata ijewa ssër dä jile pake spa ̱ na je ebä pakäk , je ebä ssäk .

text: Then Paul stood in the midst of Mars ' hill , and said , Ye men of Athens , I perceive that in all things ye are too superstitious .
text2: Jera Pablo je ̱ k duaka ̱ ijewa sha ̱ na je Areópago ska te isha : — Bas Atenas wa , yie isu ̱ a ra ji biköle ska ra bas te rä jile oloitseke ̱ bäi si ̱ wa ̱ .

text: For as I passed by , and beheld your devotions , I found an altar with this inscription , TO THE UNKNOWN GOD . Whom therefore ye ignorantly worship , him declare I unto you .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis shka jí naka ra , jera yis te bas wa ̱ jile yöle oloitsanak je su ̱ a . Ata etka yie jile ma ̱ kläka ̱ su ̱ a , je ja ̱ mi iyöle katke te ishe rä : ‘ Jí rä Säkeklä Ka Ju ̱ ñele Kuna je ia ̱ . ’ Jekäi je bas wa ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak ka ju ̱ ñele yi irä käi , je ne ktei pake mar yie bas ia ̱ rä .

text: God that made the world and all things therein , seeing that he is Lord of heaven and earth , dwelleth not in temples made with hands ;
text2: “ Je Säkeklä ne rä ka ̱ jiska yuäkksa ̱ rä , ji biköle tso ̱ iki ̱ ka je yuäkksa ̱ rä , ije rä ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä wakei . Je ki ̱ ka ka je se ̱ nak templo yöle jula wà ja ̱ rka .

text: Neither is worshipped with men ' s hands , as though he needed any thing , seeing he giveth to all life , and breath , and all things ;
text2: Ka ije pasu ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ jula wà , ka je ki ̱ jile sher kuna ki ̱ ka . Ata ije ne te sä biköle ia ̱ se ̱ ne kseka me ̱ ke ̱ rä , si ̱ we ̱ i sike me ̱ ke ̱ rä , ji biköle me ̱ ke ̱ rä .

text: And hath made of one blood all nations of men for to dwell on all the face of the earth , and hath determined the times before appointed , and the bounds of their habitation ;
text2: “ Jekäi ditsä eklabä wà ite ditsei wä ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa biköle wawa ̱ ka ̱ rä , ijewa se ̱ naklä ka ̱ jiska ke ̱ i biköle ska . Jekäi bikö ijewa se ̱ rmi , mai ijewa ka ̱ kukä kjämi ise ̱ naklä käi , je rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ ba iwakei wa ̱ .

text: That they should seek the Lord , if haply they might feel after him , and find him , though he be not far from every one of us :
text2: Je rä ijewa wa ̱ Säkeklä yuläkläpa ka ̱ passe wà ji wà , je rale ite iku ̱ emiksa ̱ . Ata ka ikaldu rä ka ̱ mii kuna sa wakwa ska .

text: For in him we live , and move , and have our being ; as certain also of your own poets have said , For we are also his offspring .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ se ̱ r dä , sa ̱ dami rä , sa ̱ tso ̱ rä . Je rä jishtä bas sha ̱ na ji ksetsäk wa manele wa ̱ iyileta ̱ na käi : ‘ Je rä sä rä ije yäbeila ki ̱ ka . ’

text: Forasmuch then as we are the offspring of God , we ought not to think that the Godhead is like unto gold , or silver , or stone , graven by art and man ' s device .
text2: “ Jekäi sä rä Säkeklä yäbeila ra , ka sa kiane ibiketsäk sä Kekläí rä ji me ̱ i yöle oro wà , inaklä wà , jak wà käi kuna , yöle sa wakwa wädular ji me ̱ i yuäk ja ̱ mi , sa wakwa te ji biketse ja ̱ mi käi kuna .

text: And the times of this ignorance God winked at ; but now commandeth all men every where to repent :
text2: Sa bakle ka je ̱ r ko ̱ r ji ia ̱ , je katabla Säkeklä te ka ji yile kuna , ata jira Säkeklä te sä biköle ka ̱ bena ska wa paka ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ .

text: Because he hath appointed a day , in the which he will judge the world in righteousness by that man whom he hath ordained ; whereof he hath given assurance unto all men , in that he hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ite ike ̱ i biketsaksa ̱ kja iwa ̱ ka ̱ jiska wa ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ bulee , jäiyi ekla kolole iwa ̱ je oloi ja ̱ mi . Jekäi je we ̱ mi ite si ̱ , je kjasha ite rä ite ishki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je wà . ”

text: And when they heard of the resurrection of the dead , some mocked : and others said , We will hear thee again of this matter .
text2: Ñerä ijewa te sä dulewa ̱ shki ̱ naka ̱ ni ktei ssa ra , manele te ija ̱ ñetsa . Ata manele te isha : — Je ba te ipakeke ̱ je ssëmi ji ̱ a sá te mai skalepa .

text: So Paul departed from among them .
text2: Jera je itapar tso ̱ ska Pablo mineju ̱ mi .

text: Howbeit certain men clave unto him , and believed : among the which was Dionysius the Areopagite , and a woman named Damaris , and others with them .
text2: Ata manele ñapatkawa ̱ ija ̱ mi , jewa te je kte kuka iyina ye . Jewa sha ̱ rä Dionisio , ale tapanak Areópago ska wa ekla irä , alaklä ekla kie Dámaris ni irä , ditsä saka irä .

text: After these things Paul departed from Athens , and came to Corinth ;
text2: Je o ̱ na itäki ̱ Atenas ska Pablo mineju ̱ demiju ̱ Corinto ska .

text: And found a certain Jew named Aquila , born in Pontus , lately come from Italy , with his wife Priscilla ; ( because that Claudius had commanded all Jews to depart from Rome : ) and came unto them .
text2: Ñerä ite Judío wa ekla ku ̱ a , je kie rä Aquila ni . Je rä Ponto wa , ata ije biteleju ̱ Italia ska deju ̱ rä jirpa ji ̱ a ise ̱ naklä Priscila ra . Je rä Claudio te ka ̱ wei ma ̱ Judío wa biköle patkä tuläkläksa ̱ Roma ska ki ̱ ka . Jekäi Pablo mineju ̱ jewaka .

text: And because he was of the same craft , he abode with them , and wrought : for by their occupation they were tentmakers .
text2: Ije shka ̱ ble rä ijewa ra ñaebä . Jekäi ise ̱ na ijewa ra shka ̱ bläk , ijewa rä ju ji ̱ atkenak shtä yuäk ki ̱ ka .

text: And he reasoned in the synagogue every sabbath , and persuaded the Jews and the Greeks .
text2: Jekäi sábado sábado wà ite jile pakeke ̱ ñapaktäklä jui ska . Jeska ije te Judío wa irä Griego wa irä je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ iktä kukäkwa ̱ .

text: And when Silas and Timotheus were come from Macedonia , Paul was pressed in the spirit , and testified to the Jews that Jesus was Christ .
text2: Silas irä Timoteo irä bitejulu Macedonia ska dejulu Corinto ska , jera Pablo je ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ kte wapaktäk ebä . Je te Judío wa ia ̱ Jesús ne rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ je ktei pakeke ̱ .

text: And when they opposed themselves , and blasphemed , he shook his raiment , and said unto them , Your blood be upon your own heads ; I am clean : from henceforth I will go unto the Gentiles .
text2: Ata ijewa kju ̱ atkami ije ra , te je kte shami yakei . Jera ije te ipaiklä wäkpa te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Bas weikarmiwa ̱ je nui ja ̱ noka ̱ pa bas wakwa ki ̱ ka . Ka je rä yis nui kuna . Jí maju ̱ joiwäta yis maju ̱ mi ka Judío kuna wa paktäk .

text: And he departed thence , and entered into a certain man ' s house , named Justus , one that worshipped God , whose house joined hard to the synagogue .
text2: Jeska ije ̱ k tsa ̱ ksa ̱ mineju ̱ ekla kie Justo ni juka , je rä Säkeklä dälätsäk . Je ju rä ñapaktäklä jui säkätä ja ̱ mi .

text: And Crispus , the chief ruler of the synagogue , believed on the Lord with all his house ; and many of the Corinthians hearing believed , and were baptized .
text2: Crispo je ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te Säkekewa biketsa iju ska tso ̱ wa biköle ra ñara . Jekäi Corinto ska wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te kte ssa ra , ijewa te ikukawa ̱ iyina ye , jekäi iwäoka ̱ na tulami .

text: Then spake the Lord to Paul in the night by a vision , Be not afraid , but speak , and hold not thy peace :
text2: Jekjepa tuinaka ra Säkekewa te isha Pablo ia ̱ ji kjayile na : “ Ke ba su ̱ ana . Ata bä ktö ji ̱ a . Ke ma si ̱ wa ̱ tiawa ̱ .

text: For I am with thee , and no man shall set on thee to hurt thee : for I have much people in this city .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis kaldu ba ra . Ka yi a ̱ ni jula tkäkwa ̱ ji yakei wa ̱ k bä ukä ja ̱ mi , yis wa ̱ sa ̱ tso ̱ ta ̱ i däkwa ̱ yis ia ̱ ye jí jukläyäkä ska ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And he continued there a year and six months , teaching the word of God among them .
text2: Jekäi jeska ise ̱ na ji ̱ a un año y medio ijewa sha ̱ na sa paktäk Säkeklä ktä wà .

text: And when Gallio was the deputy of Achaia , the Jews made insurrection with one accord against Paul , and brought him to the judgment seat ,
text2: Galión tso ̱ ji ̱ a ka ̱ wäkiri ye Acaya ke ̱ i ska ra , Judío wa ñajaka ̱ etka yëbä kju ̱ atkäk Pablo ra , te ikuka tsa ̱ mi sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ ska ,

text: Saying , This fellow persuadeth men to worship God contrary to the law .
text2: jewa te isha : — Jí te sa pakeke ̱ Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ssër ta kju ̱ awa saje wa ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: And when Paul was now about to open his mouth , Gallio said unto the Jews , If it were a matter of wrong or wicked lewdness , O ye Jews , reason would that I should bear with you :
text2: Pablo ktä marmi kja ra , Galión te isha Judío wa ia ̱ : — Bas Judío wa , ikuna rä ije te ji shi ̱ ana wá ̱ ra ji e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ wakbla ra , yie bas katablemi jishtä ishena o ̱ nak ja ̱ mi .

text: But if it be a question of words and names , and of your law , look ye to it ; for I will be no judge of such matters .
text2: Ata bas kju ̱ atkewe ̱ ke ̱ rä kje kte ebä te , kje sä kie ebä te , bas wakwa ka ̱ wei ebä te ra , jera bas wakwa ku ̱ ije ktei paruö . Ka yie je shtä ktei parue .

text: And he drave them from the judgment seat .
text2: Jera ite ijewa patka tulaksa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäklä ska .

text: Then all the Greeks took Sosthenes , the chief ruler of the synagogue , and beat him before the judgment seat . And Gallio cared for none of those things .
text2: Jera ijewa biköle te Sóstenes ñapaktäklä jui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kukawa ̱ , kpa ijewa te ta ̱ i sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ wäsaka , ata Galión ia ̱ je rä ka jishtä kuna .

text: And Paul after this tarried there yet a good while , and then took his leave of the brethren , and sailed thence into Syria , and with him Priscilla and Aquila ; having shorn his head in Cenchrea : for he had a vow .
text2: Jekäi jeska Pablo se ̱ na ji ̱ a ta ̱ i . Je ukä ska ije ̱ k bata shata ̱ na sä el wa ia ̱ . Jera jeska iju ̱ naté ko ̱ no ki ̱ däkju ̱ Siria . Jera ije ra Priscila irä Aquila irä biterña . Jera Cencrea ska itsa ̱ ku ̱ kä sikaju ̱ mi . Je rä ikablele Säkeklä ia ̱ ke ̱ i deka ̱ e ̱ ná ki ̱ ka .

text: And he came to Ephesus , and left them there : but he himself entered into the synagogue , and reasoned with the Jews .
text2: Idejulu Éfesoka . Jeska ite ijewa tulata ̱ na , jekäi ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ ñapaktäklä jui na , te jile paka Judío wa ra .

text: When they desired him to tarry longer time with them , he consented not ;
text2: Jera ijewa te Pablo kuka ji ̱ a se ̱ nak , ata ka ikolor ji ̱ a .

text: But bade them farewell , saying , I must by all means keep this feast that cometh in Jerusalem : but I will return again unto you , if God will . And he sailed from Ephesus .
text2: Ata ije ̱ k bata shata ̱ na ijewa ia ̱ te isha : “ Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena ra yis däni bas su ̱ ak . ” Jekäi Éfeso ska iju ̱ naté ko ̱ no ki ̱ .

text: And when he had landed at Caesarea , and gone up , and saluted the church , he went down to Antioch .
text2: Ideju ̱ Cesareaka ra , imineju ̱ däkka ̱ Jerusalénka tapanak wa chakäk . Je itä ki ̱ ka imineju ̱ Antioquíaka .

text: And after he had spent some time there , he departed , and went over all the country of Galatia and Phrygia in order , strengthening all the disciples .
text2: Jeska ise ̱ na ji ̱ a , jekjepa imineju ̱ kjaju ̱ Galacia irä Frigia irä ke ̱ i etkä etkä ska . Je te kte kukäk wa biköle ki ̱ täkiwa ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: And a certain Jew named Apollos , born at Alexandria , an eloquent man , and mighty in the scriptures , came to Ephesus .
text2: Ñerä Judío wa ekla kie Apolos ni , je rä Alejandría wa , je demiju ̱ Éfeso ska . Iktäke ̱ ssër ta baa , täki ta kte yöle waje ̱ rku ̱ ak bäi si ̱ .

text: This man was instructed in the way of the Lord ; and being fervent in the spirit , he spake and taught diligently the things of the Lord , knowing only the baptism of John .
text2: Je rä pautäle Säkekewa ña ̱ le ̱ i ktei wà . Ije je ̱ r ssërke ̱ täkii ji wa ̱ k , je te Jesús ktei pakeke ̱ , wapakteke ̱ tsa ̱ na . Ata Juan wa ̱ sa pautäle wäoka ̱ ne ktei wà je ebä ne ju ̱ ñer iwa ̱ rä .

text: And he began to speak boldly in the synagogue : whom when Aquila and Priscilla had heard , they took him unto them , and expounded unto him the way of God more perfectly .
text2: Jekäi ite sa paktami ka suale kuna ñapaktäklä jui ska . Jera Priscila irä Aquila irä te iktä ssa ra , jewa te ije kia tsa ̱ mi kju ̱ awaka , ki ̱ pakta ite bulee si ̱ Säkeklä ña ̱ le ̱ i ktei wà .

text: And when he was disposed to pass into Achaia , the brethren wrote , exhorting the disciples to receive him : who , when he was come , helped them much which had believed through grace :
text2: Je itäki ̱ Apolos ssëna minak Acaya ska . Jekäi sä el wa te isha je rä baa si ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa te äyë yuami kte kukäk wa ia ̱ , jewa wa ̱ ije kiäkläwa ̱ . Jekäi idemiju ̱ jeska ra , ite je ̱ r bäi yirke ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi kte kukäk jewa tsa ̱ tka ta ̱ i .

text: For he mightily convinced the Jews , and that publickly , shewing by the scriptures that Jesus was Christ .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , kte yöle wà ite sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ Jesús dä iyina si ̱ Säbäkäkksa ̱ . Jekäi täkiiwa ̱ si ̱ wà ite Judío wa siwa ̱ tiewe ̱ che ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ biköle wäkata ska .

text: And it came to pass , that , while Apollos was at Corinth , Paul having passed through the upper coasts came to Ephesus : and finding certain disciples ,
text2: Apolos katke ji ̱ a Corinto ska ra , je bala na Pablo shka ka ̱ bata ka ̱ mii wà deju ̱ té Éfeso ska . Jeska ite kte kukäk wa ku ̱ a elkje .

text: He said unto them , Have ye received the Holy Ghost since ye believed ? And they said unto him , We have not so much as heard whether there be any Holy Ghost .
text2: Jewa ia ̱ ite ichaka : — ¿ Bas te Jesús biketsa ra , Wikblu Sikina me ̱ na bas ia ̱ na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Ka sá wa ̱ issëlebä jibä Wikblu Sikina tso ̱ ni .

text: And he said unto them , Unto what then were ye baptized ? And they said , Unto John ' s baptism .
text2: Jera ite ichaka : — ¿ Ji ja ̱ mi bas wäoka ̱ na rä na ? Jera ijewa te ikúka : — Juan te sä wäukewa ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: Then said Paul , John verily baptized with the baptism of repentance , saying unto the people , that they should believe on him which should come after him , that is , on Christ Jesus .
text2: Jera Pablo te isha : — Juan te sä wäukewa ̱ rä wäoka ̱ ne sa ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ kläksa ̱ shtä wà . Je te isha ditsä ia ̱ , sa kiana ije itäki ̱ däkju ̱ biketsäk , je rä Jesús .

text: When they heard this , they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ijewa te je ssa ra , iwäoka ̱ na tulami Säkekewa Jesús kie ja ̱ mi .

text: And when Paul had laid his hands upon them , the Holy Ghost came on them ; and they spake with tongues , and prophesied .
text2: Jekjepa Pablo jula ma ̱ ka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka , jera Wikblu Sikina dewa ̱ ju ̱ ijewa ki ̱ . Jekäi ijewa ktami kte kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa , ñakäi ijewa te jile bata sha .

text: And all the men were about twelve .
text2: Jewa rä jäiyi wa däka ̱ doce kjena .

text: And he went into the synagogue , and spake boldly for the space of three months , disputing and persuading the things concerning the kingdom of God .
text2: Jekäi tres mes bala na Pablo te sa pakta ñapaktäklä jui na ka suale ta kuna . Ite Säkeklä gobiernoí ktei pakeke ̱ ijewa ra , ite ijewa je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ je kte kukäkwa ̱ .

text: But when divers were hardened , and believed not , but spake evil of that way before the multitude , he departed from them , and separated the disciples , disputing daily in the school of one Tyrannus .
text2: Ata ijewa manele je ̱ r doloi tenacha ̱ wa ̱ , ka je ̱ rki ̱ ne je kte kukäkwa ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te Jesús ña ̱ le ̱ i sha yakei je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wäna . Je kju ̱ ei Pablo je ̱ k butsa ju ̱ ami ijewa yika , te kte kukäk wa kia jámi kju ̱ awaka . Jekäi Tirano wa ̱ sä yuäklä jui ska , ite ji paka buliri buliri .

text: And this continued by the space of two years ; so that all they which dwelt in Asia heard the word of the Lord Jesus , both Jews and Greeks .
text2: Jekäi je wá ̱ ite deka ̱ dos año kje . Je ki ̱ ka biköle se ̱ nak Asia ska Judío wa käi , Griego wa käi , jewa te Säkekewa ktä ssa .

text: And God wrought special miracles by the hands of Paul :
text2: Jeska Säkeklä te ji wá ̱ täkili ta ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ji su ̱ le käi Pablo jula oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: So that from his body were brought unto the sick handkerchiefs or aprons , and the diseases departed from them , and the evil spirits went out of them .
text2: Jekäi pañuelo käi , paiklä jienak ietkä ki ̱ ka käi , yitäle Pablo yaka ja ̱ mi je mike ̱ duë ta wa ia ̱ , jera ijewa jeke ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ na duë te , ñakäi wikblu yakeila mike ̱ ksa ̱ julu ijewa yika .

text: Then certain of the vagabond Jews , exorcists , took upon them to call over them which had evil spirits the name of the Lord Jesus , saying , We adjure you by Jesus whom Paul preacheth .
text2: Ata Judío wa sha ̱ shkäk wikblu yakeila kjäiäk , jewa te imabla su ̱ a Säkekewa Jesús kie oloi ja ̱ mi wikblu yakeila ta wa ki ̱ je kjäiäk , te isheke ̱ : “ Yis te bas pake ñatsa ̱ kksa ̱ Jesús ale Pablo wa ̱ wapauta ̱ nak je oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And there were seven sons of one Sceva , a Jew , and chief of the priests , which did so .
text2: Judío wa ekla chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kie Esceva ni , je yabala siete wa ne tso ̱ je wa ̱ k rä .

text: And the evil spirit answered and said , Jesus I know , and Paul I know ; but who are ye ?
text2: Ata je wikblu yakei te ikúka te isha : “ Yis wa ̱ Jesús ju ̱ ñer , yis wa ̱ yi rä Pablo ju ̱ ñer . Ata ¿ yibä bas dä na ?

text: And the man in whom the evil spirit was leaped on them , and overcame them , and prevailed against them , so that they fled out of that house naked and wounded .
text2: Jera je jäiyi kololewa ̱ wikblu yakei wa ̱ je ju ̱ nami ijewa ki ̱ ka , te ijewa kukawa ̱ diekjela tu ̱ naka ̱ ijewa kalabe ki ̱ ka . Jekäi je ju ska ijewa julunami ju ̱ li ̱ shye , shka ̱ le ta ̱ i .

text: And this was known to all the Jews and Greeks also dwelling at Ephesus ; and fear fell on them all , and the name of the Lord Jesus was magnified .
text2: Éfeso ska se ̱ nak wa biköle te je ju ̱ ñawa ̱ , Judío wa käi , Griego wa käi , jera su ̱ ane ja ̱ naka ̱ ijewa biköle ki ̱ . Ñakäi Säkekewa Jesús kie oloi kanaka ̱ .

text: And many that believed came , and confessed , and shewed their deeds .
text2: Jekäi Jesús biketsäk wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dejulu te ji wakbleke ̱ ite käi sheke ̱ ka ̱ pake ̱ ka ̱ .

text: Many of them also which used curious arts brought their books together , and burned them before all men : and they counted the price of them , and found it fifty thousand pieces of silver .
text2: Jera chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ jalibashäk wa te iäyë tapawa ̱ wa ̱ däläwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ biköle wäna . Je äyë kjuä säkei shtawa ̱ ijewa te ra isäkei rä cincuenta mil denario .

text: So mightily grew the word of God and prevailed .
text2: Jekäi Säkekewa ktä minemika ̱ täkii jöikwä jöikwä ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta .

text: After these things were ended , Paul purposed in the spirit , when he had passed through Macedonia and Achaia , to go to Jerusalem , saying , After I have been there , I must also see Rome .
text2: Je o ̱ na ukä ska Pablo te ibiketsa ije ̱ r ska minak Jerusalénka , kjäkju ̱ säkätä Macedonia irä Acaya irä wà , te isha : “ Yis ñayula e ̱ ná Jerusalén ska ra , yis kiana ji ̱ a minak Roma wa su ̱ ak . ”

text: So he sent into Macedonia two of them that ministered unto him , Timotheus and Erastus ; but he himself stayed in Asia for a season .
text2: Jera ite itsa ̱ tkäk wa bol Timoteo irä Erasto irä patkami Macedoniaka . Ata ije se ̱ na ji ̱ a elkje Asia ska .

text: And the same time there arose no small stir about that way .
text2: Ñerä je ke ̱ i ska sä wätji ̱ naka ̱ ka elkje kuna Jesús ña ̱ le ̱ i ktei kju ̱ ei .

text: For a certain man named Demetrius , a silversmith , which made silver shrines for Diana , brought no small gain unto the craftsmen ;
text2: Je wà rä ekla jile yuäk inaklä yaka wà kinak Demetrio ni , je te Diana temploí me ̱ i yueke ̱ inaklä yaka wà ; je wà ite ji me ̱ i yuäk wa bluwa ̱ ka ̱ ka elkje kuna .

text: Whom he called together with the workmen of like occupation , and said , Sirs , ye know that by this craft we have our wealth .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ite shka ̱ ble jeshtä wà wa saka tapawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ , jewa ia ̱ ite isha : “ El wa , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jí sa ̱ shka ̱ ble ne wà sä blurke ̱ rä .

text: Moreover ye see and hear , that not alone at Ephesus , but almost throughout all Asia , this Paul hath persuaded and turned away much people , saying that they be no gods , which are made with hands :
text2: Ata bas wa ̱ isu ̱ le , bas wa ̱ issële , ka jí Éfeso ska ebä kuna , ata ñaebä elkje ra Asia ke ̱ i kalabe ska , jí Pablo wa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa je ̱ rtkele , wäyöle , je te ishe ji yöle jula wà je rä ka säkekläí wa si ̱ kuna .

text: So that not only this our craft is in danger to be set at nought ; but also that the temple of the great goddess Diana should be despised , and her magnificence should be destroyed , whom all Asia and the world worshippeth .
text2: Ka jí sa ̱ shka ̱ ble yirmi yakei ebä rä däläna kuna , ata ñaebä säkekläí oloi ta Diana , je temploí kolormiwa ̱ ka säkei ta ji ̱ a . Jekäi ra je oloitsanak Asia ska wa biköle wa ̱ , ñakäi ka ̱ biköle ska wa wa ̱ , je oloi tsi ja ̱ lmarwa ̱ . ”

text: And when they heard these sayings , they were full of wrath , and cried out , saying , Great is Diana of the Ephesians .
text2: Ijewa te je ssa ra , ikju ̱ atkacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , kjoyina te isha : “ Diana Éfeso wa kekläí je ne rä oloi ta ta ̱ i rä . ”

text: And the whole city was filled with confusion : and having caught Gaius and Aristarchus , men of Macedonia , Paul ' s companions in travel , they rushed with one accord into the theatre .
text2: Jekäi je jukläyäkä wa biköle wätji ̱ naka ̱ . Jera jewa julunami etka ye ebä te Pablo tsa ̱ tkäk Gayo irä Aristarco irä sika jámi demi sa tapanaklä jui ska . Jewa rä Macedonia wa .

text: And when Paul would have entered in unto the people , the disciples suffered him not .
text2: Pablo ssëna minak je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wäki ̱ , ata kte kukäk wa wa ̱ ka iia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne .

text: And certain of the chief of Asia , which were his friends , sent unto him , desiring him that he would not adventure himself into the theatre .
text2: Ñakäi Asia ke ̱ i wäkiri wa sha ̱ Pablo salibä wa te ishaté iia ̱ : “ Dunasi ̱ ka ma miwa ̱ kuna ijewa tapanaklä jui ska . ”

text: Some therefore cried one thing , and some another : for the assembly was confused ; and the more part knew not wherefore they were come together .
text2: Ijewa kjoyinaka ̱ ñasha ̱ na kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa , jekäi je tapalewa ̱ wa je ̱ r shena kajakla , ñakäi iwäbäli wa wa ̱ ka ijuñer jiye itapar tso ̱ räle .

text: And they drew Alexander out of the multitude , the Jews putting him forward . And Alexander beckoned with the hand , and would have made his defence unto the people .
text2: Jera Judío wa te Alejandro patkami ditsä bena wäki ̱ , jekäi je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa moska te ije je ̱ r ku ̱ a ji shäk . Jekäi ijula tkacha ̱ ijewa si ̱ wa ̱ tiächa ̱ kläwa ̱ ije ̱ k wetsäklä ditsä wäna .

text: But when they knew that he was a Jew , all with one voice about the space of two hours cried out , Great is Diana of the Ephesians .
text2: Ata ije rä Judío wa , je te ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a ra , iñajaka ̱ kjoyinak etka yebä , elkje ra dos hora kje : “ Diana Éfeso wa kekläí , je ne rä oloi ta rä . ”

text: And when the townclerk had appeased the people , he said , Ye men of Ephesus , what man is there that knoweth not how that the city of the Ephesians is a worshipper of the great goddess Diana , and of the image which fell down from Jupiter ?
text2: Jera je jukläyäkä ska äyë yuäk te je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa paka si ̱ wa ̱ tiäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ra , ite isha : “ Bas Éfeso wa , ¿ baishe yi je wa ̱ ka iju ̱ ñer Éfeso jukläyäkäí ska wa ne rä Diana ale oloi ta , temploí irä ime ̱ i ja ̱ leté ka ̱ jöir ska irä je kjänanak wa rä ni na ?

text: Seeing then that these things cannot be spoken against , ye ought to be quiet , and to do nothing rashly .
text2: Yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka ishäklei ka ̱ yue irä ni . Je ne ki ̱ ka bas kiana si ̱ wa ̱ tiäkcha ̱ wa ̱ , ke ji wa ̱ k pa pa käi .

text: For ye have brought hither these men , which are neither robbers of churches , nor yet blasphemers of your goddess .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te jí ditsä jaté jiska . Jewa wa ̱ ka ji wakblene je templo ukä ja ̱ mi , ka ijewa wa ̱ saje wa kekläí yine kte yakei wà .

text: Wherefore if Demetrius , and the craftsmen which are with him , have a matter against any man , the law is open , and there are deputies : let them implead one another .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ikuna rä Demetrio irä ji me ̱ i yuäk ije ra wa irä , jewa ssëna yilé ra kju ̱ atkäk ra , je ne ye sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ tso ̱ rä , ka ̱ wäkiri wa tso ̱ rä ; jeska ijewa ñakjatiö .

text: But if ye inquire any thing concerning other matters , it shall be determined in a lawful assembly .
text2: Ata bas ki ̱ ishena ji ̱ a yinak ra , jera je parurmi rä sa taparke ̱ jile paruäk tsa ̱ na shtä ska .

text: For we are in danger to be called in question for this day ' s uproar , there being no cause whereby we may give an account of this concourse .
text2: Ata jir ji o ̱ na ki ̱ däläna si ̱ iö sa kjaterwa ̱ , ta ̱ i sa ̱ kju ̱ atkaka ̱ . Ikuna rä jekäi ra , ¿ jini sä te ikúkemi na ? Ñera sä wätjí ̱ naka ̱ rä ka wata . ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , he dismissed the assembly .
text2: Jekäi ite je sha e ̱ ná ra , ite je taparte wa patka tulaksa ̱ jeska .

text: And after the uproar was ceased , Paul called unto him the disciples , and embraced them , and departed for to go into Macedonia .
text2: Ñe iwätji ̱ na ukä ska ra Pablo te kte kukäk wa kia jaté . Je te ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ ata ̱ na , jera ije ̱ k bata sha mineju ̱ mi däkmi Macedonia ska .

text: And when he had gone over those parts , and had given them much exhortation , he came into Greece ,
text2: Jera ikjaju ̱ je ke ̱ i saka saka sha ̱ naka , te ijewa ki ̱ je ̱ rku ̱ a ji ̱ a . Jekäi idemiju ̱ Greciaka .

text: And there abode three months . And when the Jews laid wait for him , as he was about to sail into Syria , he purposed to return through Macedonia .
text2: Jeska ije se ̱ na tres mes , ata Judío wa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a iktäkwa ̱ imaju ̱ mi kja ko ̱ no ki ̱ däkmi Siria ska ra . Je ki ̱ ka ite ibiketsaksa ̱ minakju ̱ ni Macedonia wà .

text: And there accompanied him into Asia Sopater of Berea ; and of the Thessalonians , Aristarchus and Secundus ; and Gaius of Derbe , and Timotheus ; and of Asia , Tychicus and Trophimus .
text2: Jera ije ra shkäkña wa rä Pirro yaba Sópater , je rä Berea wa ; Aristarco irä Segundo irä , jewa rä Tesalónica wa ; Gayo irä Timoteo irä , jewa rä Derbe wa ; Tíquico irä Trófimo irä , jewa rä Asia wa .

text: These going before tarried for us at Troas .
text2: Jekäi jewa minejulumiba ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ kba te sá ki ̱ ssa Troas ska .

text: And we sailed away from Philippi after the days of unleavened bread , and came unto them to Troas in five days ; where we abode seven days .
text2: Jekäi pan ñaklä ka levadura ta je ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ je e ̱ ná ra , Filipo ska sá ju ̱ naté ko ̱ no ki ̱ ka , jekäi cinco día ra sá ñaku ̱ ani ijewa ra Troas ska . Jeska sá se ̱ na siete día .

text: And upon the first day of the week , when the disciples came together to break bread , Paul preached unto them , ready to depart on the morrow ; and continued his speech until midnight .
text2: Jera semana díaí säkätä wa sá taparte pan bala butsäk sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä Jesús dulewa ̱ ska ra , jera Pablo te ijewa pakta , ite ibiketsa imaju ̱ bulirishtä ki ̱ ka , ika ̱ paka jaree deka ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ sha ̱ kje .

text: And there were many lights in the upper chamber , where they were gathered together .
text2: Jeska tsi ̱ ni tso ̱ wäkale chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ju ja ̱ r yöle ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ mai sá tapar kate ska .

text: And there sat in a window a certain young man named Eutychus , being fallen into a deep sleep : and as Paul was long preaching , he sunk down with sleep , and fell down from the third loft , and was taken up dead .
text2: Jera dulaklei ekla kie Eutico ni je kalme je ̱ k tkelewa ̱ ventana kjä ki ̱ ka , käpärawa ̱ yëë . Jera Pablo ka ̱ pakä dami ji ̱ a sha ̱ na je dulaklei kapawa ̱ kee , buka ̱ na ja ̱ naté ju yöle ñabata ki ̱ ka mañatkä ska ja ̱ nani i ̱ ski ̱ ka . Jera ijewa te ikaka ̱ dulewa ̱ .

text: And Paul went down , and fell on him , and embracing him said , Trouble not yourselves ; for his life is in him .
text2: Jera Pablo bitewa ̱ ju ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ . Je je ̱ k ma ̱ ka ̱ je dulaklei ki ̱ ka te ikuka yitawa ̱ . Jera ite isha : — Ke bas je ̱ r iana kseka irä .

text: When he therefore was come up again , and had broken bread , and eaten , and talked a long while , even till break of day , so he departed .
text2: Jera Pablo mineka ̱ ju ̱ ni . Jekäi ite pan bala butsa ma ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä Jesús dulewa ̱ ska . Jekäi ite je ña e ̱ ná ra , ika ̱ paka ji ̱ a ma ̱ rä ka ̱ ñir suruu . Jekjepa ibiteju ̱ .

text: And they brought the young man alive , and were not a little comforted .
text2: Jekäi je dulaklei minetse ̱ ni ijewa wa ̱ kseka . Jekäi ijewa je ̱ r pablena ta ̱ i .

text: And we went before to ship , and sailed unto Assos , there intending to take in Paul : for so had he appointed , minding himself to go afoot .
text2: Jeska sá bitejuluba ko ̱ no ki ̱ ka ju ̱ na de Asón ska , jeska ñaku ̱ akni Pablo ra . Ije wa ̱ ibiketsale rä jekäi , issëna bitäk däkju ̱ jeska rä klä wa ki ̱ ka .

text: And when he met with us at Assos , we took him in , and came to Mitylene .
text2: Ñerä sá ku ̱ a ite Asón ska ra , ibitéju ̱ ña sá ra ko ̱ no ki ̱ , dejulu Mitilene ska .

text: And we sailed thence , and came the next day over against Chios ; and the next day we arrived at Samos , and tarried at Trogyllium ; and the next day we came to Miletus .
text2: Jeska bulirishtä ra sá ju ̱ naté dejulu Quío wäsaka . Je bulishtä ra sá dejulu Samos ska . Je bulirishtä ra sá dejulu Mileto ska .

text: For Paul had determined to sail by Ephesus , because he would not spend the time in Asia : for he hasted , if it were possible for him , to be at Jerusalem the day of Pentecost .
text2: Pablo wa ̱ ibiketsale kja rä kjäkju ̱ kju ̱ awa , ka Éfeso wa kuna , ka iwätkenaklä kuna Asia ska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikiana däkmi mane mane Jerusalén ska Pentecostés díaí ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ kña , ikuna rä io ̱ nopa ra .

text: And from Miletus he sent to Ephesus , and called the elders of the church .
text2: Mileto ska Pablo te yile patkami Éfeso ska tapanak wa wäkiri wa kiäk jäté .

text: And when they were come to him , he said unto them , Ye know , from the first day that I came into Asia , after what manner I have been with you at all seasons ,
text2: Ijewa dejulu iwäki ̱ ra , ite ijewa ia ̱ isha : “ Bas wa ̱ jishtä yis se ̱ le bakle del bas sha ̱ na , säkätä yis de Asia ska raté käi , je ju ̱ ñer bäi .

text: Serving the Lord with all humility of mind , and with many tears , and temptations , which befell me by the lying in wait of the Jews :
text2: Je rä yis te Säkekewa kja ̱ nei wá ̱ del je ̱ k jalewa ̱ wà , yis wäriä kja ta ̱ i wà , ñakäi Judío wa te ibiketsaksa ̱ o ̱ nak yis ukä ja ̱ mi je katable wà .

text: And how I kept back nothing that was profitable unto you , but have shewed you , and have taught you publickly , and from house to house ,
text2: Ñaebä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ka yis wa ̱ ji sherke ̱ yinak kianak bas ki ̱ wätkenewa ̱ a ̱ ni , bas paktäk bena wäkata ska , ju etkä ju etkä ska je a ̱ ni ka yine yis wa ̱ ka yie je she ni .

text: Testifying both to the Jews , and also to the Greeks , repentance toward God , and faith toward our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Jekäi yie Judío wa irä ka Judío kuna wa irä ia ̱ , je ̱ k manewe ̱ ksa ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ ktei paka , saje wa säkekewaí Jesús biketse ktei paka .

text: And now , behold , I go bound in the spirit unto Jerusalem , not knowing the things that shall befall me there :
text2: Issö , jira yis damiju ̱ Jerusalén , ssëlewa ̱ mo ̱ lewa ̱ käi . Ka yis wäna ijuene me ' sdämi jeska räle .

text: Save that the Holy Ghost witnesseth in every city , saying that bonds and afflictions abide me .
text2: Ata jukläyäkä etkä etkä ska Wikblu Sikina te yis ia ̱ ishe dami rä yis ki ̱ ssëte wätenewa ̱ irä , weikane irä te .

text: But none of these things move me , neither count I my life dear unto myself , so that I might finish my course with joy , and the ministry , which I have received of the Lord Jesus , to testify the gospel of the grace of God .
text2: Jeiräta ka yis wakei je ̱ k biketsä yis se ̱ r kseka rä sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä säkei ta ta ̱ i käi , ata yis pakale tu ̱ nak , ñakäi Säkekewa Jesús wa ̱ ji me ̱ le yis ia ̱ yis wa ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak je ne e ̱ lewa ̱ pa yis ia ̱ rä , yis wa ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ je ktei baa shäklä .

text: And now , behold , I know that ye all , among whom I have gone preaching the kingdom of God , shall see my face no more .
text2: “ Ata jir issö , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , bas sha ̱ na yis bakle sa paktäk Säkeklä gobierno ktei wà , jewa mane a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka yis su ̱ nak ji ̱ a .

text: Wherefore I take you to record this day , that I am pure from the blood of all men .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka jir yie ishe bas ia ̱ , manele weikanawa ̱ ra , ka yis wa ̱ je mane a ̱ ni nui kuna .

text: For I have not shunned to declare unto you all the counsel of God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis wa ̱ ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ o ̱ nak je ktei a ̱ ni ka blenewa ̱ kuna .

text: Take heed therefore unto yourselves , and to all the flock , over the which the Holy Ghost hath made you overseers , to feed the church of God , which he hath purchased with his own blood .
text2: Bas wakwa se ̱ no tsa ̱ na je ̱ k ki ̱ , ñakäi oveja kalabe ki ̱ . Jewa ne ia ̱ Wikblu Sikina wa ̱ bas kolole ikjänanak wa ye rä , je rä bas wa ̱ tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ wa to ̱ leksa ̱ iwa ̱ iwakei pi wà , jewa kjänanaklä .

text: For I know this , that after my departing shall grievous wolves enter in among you , not sparing the flock .
text2: Ka jiye kuna ta , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis maju ̱ itä ska ra , lobo sälwii wa dämiwa ̱ bas sha ̱ na , jewa wa ̱ je oveja wa ka janakwa ̱ bitaba .

text: Also of your own selves shall men arise , speaking perverse things , to draw away disciples after them .
text2: Ñakäi bas wakwa ebä sha ̱ manele ñajämika ̱ ji shi ̱ ana shtä pakäk , je wà iwa ̱ kte kukäk wa sikä jäklämipa minak ijewa ja ̱ mi .

text: Therefore watch , and remember , that by the space of three years I ceased not to warn every one night and day with tears .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ . Bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no yis te bas ia ̱ ji sha ekla ekla ka jalewa ̱ ta ji ̱ eleksa ̱ wà kje , tres año bala na ka ̱ piana irä tuina irä jeska .

text: And now , brethren , I commend you to God , and to the word of his grace , which is able to build you up , and to give you an inheritance among all them which are sanctified .
text2: “ Ata jira el wa , yie bas tuleta ̱ na Säkeklä ia ̱ , wetsanak iwakei je ̱ r bäi yile sa ̱ ia ̱ je ktei wa ̱ . Je kte rä täkili ta sa ̱ je ̱ rike ki ̱ wäjiäk , ji tso ̱ däkksa ̱ sä siki tele wa biköle ia ̱ je däkläksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ .

text: I have coveted no man ' s silver , or gold , or apparel .
text2: Yis ja ̱ mi yi a ̱ ni inaklä iräle , oro iräle , sua iräle ka tkene kuna .

text: Yea , ye yourselves know , that these hands have ministered unto my necessities , and to them that were with me .
text2: Ata bas wakwa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis shka ̱ bla jí yis wakei jula wà ji sherke ̱ yis ki ̱ irä yis da shkäk wa ki ̱ irä je däkläksa ̱ sá ia ̱ .

text: I have shewed you all things , how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak , and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus , how he said , It is more blessed to give than to receive .
text2: Ji bena wá ̱ yis te käi , je wà yis te ikjasha bas ia ̱ shka ̱ ble jekäi ne wà sa kiana ka jita wa tsa ̱ tkäk rä . Je rä sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä jini Säkekewa Jesús wakei wa ̱ iyile ska : ‘ Bäi si ̱ ra ji me ̱ ne rä , ji kuke tsa ̱ ta rä . ’ ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , he kneeled down , and prayed with them all .
text2: Ite jekäi isha e ̱ ná ra , ije ̱ tkawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ ka ̱ kiäk ijewa biköle ra .

text: And they all wept sore , and fell on Paul ' s neck , and kissed him ,
text2: Jekäi ijewa biköle ji ̱ a jela e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , ijewa te Pablo kuka yita ikuli kichaka te iwä jalassa .

text: Sorrowing most of all for the words which he spake , that they should see his face no more . And they accompanied him unto the ship .
text2: Ijewa je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ rä , ite isha ka ijewa wa ̱ isu ̱ nak ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka . Ñerä ijewa minemi iña ̱ le ̱ i ju ̱ akta ̱ na ko ̱ no ska .

text: And it came to pass , that after we were gotten from them , and had launched , we came with a straight course unto Coos , and the day following unto Rhodes , and from thence unto Patara :
text2: Sá ñabatashata ̱ na e ̱ ná ijewa ia ̱ ra , sá ñajiaka ̱ ko ̱ no ki ̱ bitéjulu bulee dejulu Cos ska . Bulirishtä sá dejulu Roda ska . Jeska sá bitejulu dejulu Pátara ska .

text: And finding a ship sailing over unto Phenicia , we went aboard , and set forth .
text2: Jeska sá te ko ̱ no saka ku ̱ a je kjäke ̱ ju ̱ rä Fenicia wà . Je ki ̱ ka sá ñajiaka ̱ bitejuluté .

text: Now when we had discovered Cyprus , we left it on the left hand , and sailed into Syria , and landed at Tyre : for there the ship was to unlade her burden .
text2: Jekäi sá dajulu ra Chipre su ̱ a sá te . Je a ̱ ta ̱ nata ̱ na sá jula shule kja ̱ ne . Jekäi sá ju ̱ na Siria wami dejulu ñajolowa ̱ ksa ̱ Tiro ska , jeska ko ̱ no na däli shkä jolowe ̱ ke ̱ ksa ̱ ta ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: And finding disciples , we tarried there seven days : who said to Paul through the Spirit , that he should not go up to Jerusalem .
text2: Jeska sá te kte kukäk wa ku ̱ a . Jekäi sá se ̱ na siete día ijewa ra . Jera Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi ijewa te isheke ̱ Pablo ia ̱ : “ Ke ma minak Jerusalén ska . ”

text: And when we had accomplished those days , we departed and went our way ; and they all brought us on our way , with wives and children , till we were out of the city : and we kneeled down on the shore , and prayed .
text2: Siete día kjaju ̱ ra , sá bitejuluté . Jera ijewa biköle biterña sá ra , ise ̱ naklä waje iyabalaje je jukläyäkä ektaka kje . Jeska sá ñajaklawa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ ka ̱ kiäk däyë kse ̱ i ki ̱ .

text: And when we had taken our leave one of another , we took ship ; and they returned home again .
text2: Jeska sá ñabatashata ̱ na ñaia ̱ , kjepa sá ñajiaka ̱ ko ̱ no na . Jera ijewa minejulumini iwakwa jukani .

text: And when we had finished our course from Tyre , we came to Ptolemais , and saluted the brethren , and abode with them one day .
text2: Jekäi Tiro ska sá ju ̱ naté dejulu Tolemaida . Jeskabä sa shkata ̱ na kono ki ̱ . Jeska sá mine ji ̱ a sa el wa chakäk , jekäi sá se ̱ na ijewa ra ka ̱ etka .

text: And the next day we that were of Paul ' s company departed , and came unto Caesarea : and we entered into the house of Philip the evangelist , which was one of the seven ; and abode with him .
text2: Bulirishtä ra sá bitejulu de Cesarea ska , dejulu Felipe kte baa bata shäk ju ska . Je rä ale kolole siete wa sha ̱ ekla . Je kjäka sá se ̱ na .

text: And the same man had four daughters , virgins , which did prophesy .
text2: Ije rä yabala busi wa ta cuatro , ka se ̱ le kuna . Jewa rä ji shäk jile bata shäk wa ye .

text: And as we tarried there many days , there came down from Judaea a certain prophet , named Agabus .
text2: Jeska sá se ̱ na shka ̱ ja ̱ , bala na ekla jile bata shäk kie Agabo ni biteju ̱ té Judea ska .

text: And when he was come unto us , he took Paul ' s girdle , and bound his own hands and feet , and said , Thus saith the Holy Ghost , So shall the Jews at Jerusalem bind the man that owneth this girdle , and shall deliver him into the hands of the Gentiles .
text2: Je deju ̱ té sá wäki ̱ , te Pablo kipa mu ̱ aklä yaksa ̱ , je wà ije ̱ k mu ̱ awa ̱ ikläka ijulaka , te isha : — Jikäi Wikblu Sikina te ishe : “ Jí kipa mu ̱ aklä wakei mu ̱ emiwa ̱ jikäi Judío wa te Jerusalén ska . Jekäi ite iju ̱ emiksa ̱ ka Judío kuna wa jula na . ”

text: And when we heard these things , both we , and they of that place , besought him not to go up to Jerusalem .
text2: Mika ̱ sá te je ssa ra , sá irä se ̱ nak je ke ̱ i ska wa irä te isha iia ̱ : — Dunasi ̱ ke ma minak Jerusalénka .

text: Then Paul answered , What mean ye to weep and to break mine heart ? for I am ready not to be bound only , but also to die at Jerusalem for the name of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Jera Pablo te sá kúka : — ¿ Ji te bas jiewe ̱ ke ̱ rä je wà bas te yis je ̱ r iawe ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ na ? Yis kaldu kja rä ka mo ̱ nakwa ̱ ebä kuna , ata duäkwa ̱ Jerusalén ska Säkekewa Jesús kie bata ki ̱ ka .

text: And when he would not be persuaded , we ceased , saying , The will of the Lord be done .
text2: Jekäi ka sá ia ̱ iwätker ji ̱ a ra , sá te ijawa ̱ te isha : — Io ̱ nopa jishtä Säkekewa ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi .

text: And after those days we took up our carriages , and went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Je ukä ska sá kukana bitejulu däkka ̱ Jerusalénka .

text: There went with us also certain of the disciples of Caesarea , and brought with them one Mnason of Cyprus , an old disciple , with whom we should lodge .
text2: Ñakäi kte kukäk Cesarea ska wa sha ̱ biteña sá ra . Jewa wa ̱ ekla Chipre wa kie Mnasón ni shkäña . Je rä kte kukäk mikle wa , jera je ne ju ska sá käpä mar dä .

text: And when we were come to Jerusalem , the brethren received us gladly .
text2: Sá deka ̱ julu Jerusalénka ra , sä el wa te sá kiawa ̱ je ̱ r ssële a ̱ naa .

text: And the day following Paul went in with us unto James ; and all the elders were present .
text2: Jekäi bulirishtä ra Pablo kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ña sá ra Jacobo su ̱ ak . Jeska ñatapawa ̱ k wa wäkiri wa biköle tapanawa ̱ .

text: And when he had saluted them , he declared particularly what things God had wrought among the Gentiles by his ministry .
text2: Jewa ñachaka e ̱ ná ra , jile saka saka o ̱ le Säkeklä wa ̱ ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na ije te ikja ̱ nei wá ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi je paka ite ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And when they heard it , they glorified the Lord , and said unto him , Thou seest , brother , how many thousands of Jews there are which believe ; and they are all zealous of the law :
text2: Je ssa ijewa te ra , ijewa te Säkeklä kjeisha , te isha iia ̱ : — El dikä , ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , Judío wa däka ̱ miles miles kje , jewa rä delewa ̱ Jesús biketsäk . Jewa kalabe rä ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na wetsäk .

text: And they are informed of thee , that thou teachest all the Jews which are among the Gentiles to forsake Moses , saying that they ought not to circumcise their children , neither to walk after the customs .
text2: Ata ijewa ia ̱ ba ktei pakale rä ba te Judío wa tso ̱ ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na biköle pakeke ̱ ñabutsäk tulämi Moisés wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na yika , te isheke ̱ ijewa ia ̱ , ka ijewa kiar ji ̱ a iyabala ia ̱ tene shkiri wa ̱ k , ka ikiar sä wädular wawa ̱ k ji ̱ a ni .

text: What is it therefore ? the multitude must needs come together : for they will hear that thou art come .
text2: ¿ Jera ji we ̱ mi sa te na ? Iyina si ̱ ra ijewa te ba palei ssëmi ba deka ̱ ju ̱ ni .

text: Do therefore this that we say to thee : We have four men which have a vow on them ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ba ku ̱ iwo ̱ jí sá te isheke ̱ ma ia ̱ käi . Jiska sá sha ̱ na ditsä tso ̱ cuatro kablele Säkeklä ia ̱ ji wa ̱ k .

text: Them take , and purify thyself with them , and be at charges with them , that they may shave their heads : and all may know that those things , whereof they were informed concerning thee , are nothing ; but that thou thyself also walkest orderly , and keepest the law .
text2: Jewa kiömiña ba ra , jekäi ma je ̱ k siki tewo ̱ ña ijewa ra . Jekäi ijewa tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä sikä ju ̱ ake ̱ mi kalabe tsa ̱ tju ̱ o ba ku ̱ . Jera biköle te isu ̱ emi ba palei yile rä ka iyina kuna , ata ba te ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na dälätseke ̱ ña .

text: As touching the Gentiles which believe , we have written and concluded that they observe no such thing , save only that they keep themselves from things offered to idols , and from blood , and from strangled , and from fornication .
text2: Ata Jesús biketsäk ka Judío kuna wa , jewa ia ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ äyë yöle rä jini sa ̱ wa ̱ ibiketsaleksa ̱ käi . Je rä ijewa ñabutsä tuläklämi ji rä me ̱ leka ̱ jile kekläí me ̱ i wäja ̱ mi irä , jile pi irä , jile kuli sikleka ̱ irä , ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ irä je yika .

text: Then Paul took the men , and the next day purifying himself with them entered into the temple , to signify the accomplishment of the days of purifcation , until that an offering should be offered for every one of them .
text2: Jera Pablo te ñe cuatro wa kiami ira . Ñerä bulirishtä ije ̱ k siki tewa ̱ ña ijewa ra e ̱ ná ra , imineju ̱ Temploka ibata shäk bikökje iñasikitewa ̱ ke ̱ díaí e ̱ rke ̱ wa ̱ rä , jera idäklä ji rä me ̱ nak ijewa ñasikitewa ̱ ki ̱ je ma ̱ k ekla ekla Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: And when the seven days were almost ended , the Jews which were of Asia , when they saw him in the temple , stirred up all the people , and laid hands on him ,
text2: Jekäi iñasikitewa ̱ klä siete día e ̱ r dawa ̱ kja ra , Judío wa dar Asia ska wa te isu ̱ a Templo na . Jera ijewa te ditsä biköle wätji ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te ikukawa ̱ ,

text: Crying out , Men of Israel , help : This is the man , that teacheth all men every where against the people , and the law , and this place : and further brought Greeks also into the temple , and hath polluted this holy place .
text2: kjoyina täkii : “ ¡ Israel wa , sá tsa ̱ tkö ! Jí ne te bena pakte rami ka ̱ biköle ska ji wa ̱ k saje wa irä , ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na irä , jí ke ̱ i irä ukä ja ̱ mi rä . Ka je ebä kuna , ata ite jí Templo ja ̱ rka Griego wa kiawa ̱ je wà ite jí ke ̱ i sikina yakeitewa ̱ wa ̱ . ”

text: ( For they had seen before with him in the city Trophimus an Ephesian , whom they supposed that Paul had brought into the temple . )
text2: Iwa rä je yikaba ijewa te Trófimo Éfeso wa su ̱ a idami ira je jukläyäkä sha ̱ na , je biketsa ijewa te rä Pablo te je kiawa ̱ Templo na ni .

text: And all the city was moved , and the people ran together : and they took Paul , and drew him out of the temple : and forthwith the doors were shut .
text2: Jekäi je jukläyäkä wa kalabe wätji ̱ naka ̱ , ditsä julunaka ̱ ñasha ̱ na ji wa ̱ k täkili wà , te Pablo kukawa ̱ sika tsa ̱ mi Templo ektaka . Jera ijewa te ju kjä kjätiawa ̱ plaa .

text: And as they went about to kill him , tidings came unto the chief captain of the band , that all Jerusalem was in an uproar .
text2: Ijewa te ikterawa ̱ kja ra , guardia wa eyaka wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ ibata yina , Jerusalén wa biköle wätji ̱ naka ̱ ni .

text: Who immediately took soldiers and centurions , and ran down unto them : and when they saw the chief captain and the soldiers , they left beating of Paul .
text2: Jera plaa ite guardia wa irä guardia wa cien wäsikäk wa irä kia jaté , tunami ijewa wäki ̱ . Mika ̱ ijewa te guardia wa irä itsa ̱ ku ̱ i irä jewa su ̱ a ra , ijewa te Pablo jawa ̱ ka buka ̱ ne ji ̱ a .

text: Then the chief captain came near , and took him , and commanded him to be bound with two chains ; and demanded who he was , and what he had done .
text2: Jekäi guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i deju ̱ te ikukawa ̱ . Jekäi ite isha mo ̱ nakwa ̱ cadena botäbä wà . Jera ite ijewa wächakewa ̱ yi ije rä í ̱ , ji wá ̱ ite rä í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And some cried one thing , some another , among the multitude : and when he could not know the certainty for the tumult , he commanded him to be carried into the castle .
text2: Ata je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa kjoyina ñasha ̱ naka kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa . Jekäi jibä iwà si ̱ rä je ia ̱ ka ije je ̱ r ko ̱ ne , ijewa kjoyinaka ̱ ta ̱ i kju ̱ ei . Je ki ̱ ka ite isha tse ̱ nakmi guardia wa jui ska .

text: And when he came upon the stairs , so it was , that he was borne of the soldiers for the violence of the people .
text2: Ijewa demijulu kläkata ska ra , guardia wa te itsa ̱ mi kaleka ̱ je chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa kju ̱ atka tulaka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ kju ̱ ei .

text: For the multitude of the people followed after , crying , Away with him .
text2: Je rä ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa dami itäki ̱ ka kjoyir dami : “ Iktöwa ̱ ” ni kju ̱ ei .

text: And as Paul was to be led into the castle , he said unto the chief captain , May I speak unto thee ? Who said , Canst thou speak Greek ?
text2: Ijewa wa ̱ imawa ̱ tse ̱ kja guardia wa jui na ra , Pablo te isha guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ : — ¿ Ba te ka ̱ me ̱ mi ' stäklä ba ra na ? Jera ije te isha : — ¿ Ba wa ̱ Griego wa ktä ju ̱ ñer na ?

text: Art not thou that Egyptian , which before these days madest an uproar , and leddest out into the wilderness four thousand men that were murderers ?
text2: Jera ¿ ka ba rä Egipto wa ekla kju ̱ atkäk sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ra ale bajaa sä ktäk wa jäkmi cuatro mil ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska je kuna na ?

text: But Paul said , I am a man which am a Jew of Tarsus , a city in Cilicia , a citizen of no mean city : and , I beseech thee , suffer me to speak unto the people .
text2: Jera Pablo te isha : — Ñera yis dä Judío wa , dar Tarso ska , je rä Cilicia ska ra jukläyäkä bäi si ̱ shtä . Dunasi ̱ ka ̱ mo ̱ ' sia ̱ , ' sktäklä ijewa ra .

text: And when he had given him licence , Paul stood on the stairs , and beckoned with the hand unto the people . And when there was made a great silence , he spake unto them in the Hebrew tongue , saying ,
text2: Jekäi ite ka ̱ ma ̱ iia ̱ ra , Pablo je ̱ k duaka ̱ kläkata ki ̱ ka , jula tkacha ̱ . Ñerä biköle si ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ bii , jera iktami ijewa ra Hebreo tä wa , je te isha :

text: Men , brethren , and fathers , hear ye my defence which I make now unto you .
text2: “ El wa , ' ská wa , jir yis je ̱ k wetsäke ̱ bas ia ̱ ssö . ”

text: ( And when they heard that he spake in the Hebrew tongue to them , they kept the more silence : and he saith , )
text2: Ijewa te issá Pablo ktaka ̱ ijewa ra Hebreo wa ktä wà ra , ijewa si ̱ wa ̱ tiacha ̱ wa ̱ itjä si ̱ . Jera ite isha :

text: I am verily a man which am a Jew , born in Tarsus , a city in Cilicia , yet brought up in this city at the feet of Gamaliel , and taught according to the perfect manner of the law of the fathers , and was zealous toward God , as ye all are this day .
text2: “ Yis dä Judío wa ko ̱ le Tarso Cilicia ska , ata yis kibina rä jí jukläyäkä ska , dulale Gamaliel wa ̱ , sa kalí wa ia ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na je dälätsäk tsa ̱ na si ̱ . Ñakäi yis dä Säkeklä ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ wetsäk , jishtä jira bas biköle rä käi .

text: And I persecuted this way unto the death , binding and delivering into prisons both men and women .
text2: Jera yis te jí Jesús ña ̱ le ̱ i ja ̱ mi wa yula iktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ kje , yie ijewa kuka wätenakcha ̱ wa ̱ jäiyi wa irä alaklä wa irä .

text: As also the high priest doth bear me witness , and all the estate of the elders : from whom also I received letters unto the brethren , and went to Damascus , to bring them which were there bound unto Jerusalem , for to be punished .
text2: Jekäi chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i si ̱ irä sä wäkiri wa biköle irä jewa rä je su ̱ ak wa . Ñakäi jewa ne te yis ia ̱ äyë ma ̱ te ̱ nakmi sa el wa ia ̱ . Jekäi yis mineju ̱ Damasco ska yis wa ̱ jeska tso ̱ wa kukä jäkläté buka ̱ nak jí Jerusalénka .

text: And it came to pass , that , as I made my journey , and was come nigh unto Damascus about noon , suddenly there shone from heaven a great light round about me .
text2: “ Ata jikäi yis ia ̱ io ̱ na rä . Ka ̱ moki ̱ käi yis tkenawa ̱ kja Damasco ska alemana ra , jera plaa ka ̱ jöir ska ka ̱ wäñinaté olowa ̱ si ̱ yis pája ̱ mi shkiritkeksa ̱ .

text: And I fell unto the ground , and heard a voice saying unto me , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Jera yis ja ̱ nawa ̱ i ̱ ski ̱ , te kte ssa , te ishe yis ia ̱ : “ Saulo , Saulo , ¿ jiye ba te yis yuleke ̱ weikanak rä na ? ”

text: And I answered , Who art thou , Lord ? And he said unto me , I am Jesus of Nazareth , whom thou persecutest .
text2: Jera yie ikúka : “ Säkekewa , ¿ yi ba rä na ? ” Jera ite yis ia ̱ ishe : “ Yis dä Jesús Nazaret wa , je ne yuleke ̱ ba te weikanak rä . ”

text: And they that were with me saw indeed the light , and were afraid ; but they heard not the voice of him that spake to me .
text2: Yis da shkä wa te je ka ̱ oloi su ̱ a , ata ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne je ikta yis da je ia ̱ .

text: And I said , What shall I do , Lord ? And the Lord said unto me , Arise , and go into Damascus ; and there it shall be told thee of all things which are appointed for thee to do .
text2: Jera yis te ichaka : ‘ Säkekewa , ¿ jibä we ̱ yie na ? ’ Jera Säkekewa te yis kúke : ‘ Ma je ̱ köka ̱ cho ̱ Damasco ska . Jeska ji rä biketsale o ̱ nak ma wa ̱ je yirmi ba ia ̱ . ”

text: And when I could not see for the glory of that light , being led by the hand of them that were with me , I came into Damascus .
text2: Ñerä je ka ̱ oloi rä oloo si ̱ te yis wäbala salawa ̱ wa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka yis da shkä wa te yis wajiami ' sjulaka demiju ̱ Damasco ska .

text: And one Ananias , a devout man according to the law , having a good report of all the Jews which dwelt there ,
text2: “ Jera ekla kie Ananías ni je rä se ̱ nak tsa ̱ na ka ̱ wei wa ̱ iyile ja ̱ mi . Je rä yinak bäi Judío wa se ̱ nak jeska wa biköle wa ̱ .

text: Came unto me , and stood , and said unto me , Brother Saul , receive thy sight . And the same hour I looked up upon him .
text2: Je dewa ̱ je ̱ k duawa ̱ yis wäja ̱ mi , te ishe yis ia ̱ : “ El dikä Saulo , bä wä wajueno . ” Jera ñawäsaka yie ije su ̱ a .

text: And he said , The God of our fathers hath chosen thee , that thou shouldest know his will , and see that Just One , and shouldest hear the voice of his mouth .
text2: Jera ije te yis ia ̱ ishe : ‘ Sa ká wa Kekläí wa ̱ ba rä kolole ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ kba ije ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ o ̱ nak je wà je ̱ r ko ̱ nak , ba wa ̱ ale wämo su ̱ aklä , ji sheke ̱ ite ssäklä .

text: For thou shalt be his witness unto all men of what thou hast seen and heard .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ba te ije ktei pakemi ditsä biköle ia ̱ , ji su ̱ a ba te käi , ji ssa ba te käi .

text: And now why tarriest thou ? arise , and be baptized , and wash away thy sins , calling on the name of the Lord .
text2: Jera , ¿ ji ki ̱ ssëke ̱ ji ̱ a ba te rä na ? Ma je ̱ k wäukewo ̱ , ia ̱ netsö ikie wà ba yakei pasuka ̱ naklä . ”

text: And it came to pass , that , when I was come again to Jerusalem , even while I prayed in the temple , I was in a trance ;
text2: “ Jekjepa yis deni Jerusalén ska , je ka ̱ kiä katke Templo na ra , yis je ̱ r na ka ̱ shena itjä .

text: And saw him saying unto me , Make haste , and get thee quickly out of Jerusalem : for they will not receive thy testimony concerning me .
text2: Jera yis te Säkekewa su ̱ a , je te ishe yis ia ̱ : ‘ Ma cho ̱ ksa ̱ jí Jerusalén ska mane mane , ba te yis ktei she kate je ka kinakwa ̱ ijewa wa ̱ ki ̱ ka . ’

text: And I said , Lord , they know that I imprisoned and beat in every synagogue them that believed on thee :
text2: Jera yie ikúka : ‘ Säkekewa , ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bäi ñapaktäklä jui saka saka ska yis te ba biketsäk wa kukeche ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ jienak , ñakäi ikpeke ̱ ,

text: And when the blood of thy martyr Stephen was shed , I also was standing by , and consenting unto his death , and kept the raiment of them that slew him .
text2: ñakäi bä ktei shäk Esteban pi tkerte ra , jeska yis kalduña ssëwa ̱ je te bäi , ñakäi yis te iktäkwa ̱ wa paiklä bla iia ̱ . ’

text: And he said unto me , Depart : for I will send thee far hence unto the Gentiles .
text2: Ata ije te yis ia ̱ isha : ‘ Ma cho ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ba patke mar ka ̱ mii ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na . ”

text: And they gave him audience unto this word , and then lifted up their voices , and said , Away with such a fellow from the earth : for it is not fit that he should live .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iktä ssa deka ̱ ite jekäi ishaka ̱ ska ra , ijewa kjoyina täkii te isha : — Je ditsä weiköwa ̱ , je shtä ka kiar ji ̱ a se ̱ nak ka ̱ jiska .

text: And as they cried out , and cast off their clothes , and threw dust into the air ,
text2: Jekäi ikjoyinaka ̱ , ipaiklä tulami , ijewa te ishäkä pjoi tula ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: The chief captain commanded him to be brought into the castle , and bade that he should be examined by scourging ; that he might know wherefore they cried so against him .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te Pablo sha tse ̱ nakmi je guardia wa jui ja ̱ rka . Jera ite ka ̱ wei ma Pablo buka ̱ naklä ksá bata wà , jiye ditsä kjoyirte ji shäk ije ukä ja ̱ mi je shäkläka ̱ iwa ̱ .

text: And as they bound him with thongs , Paul said unto the centurion that stood by , Is it lawful for you to scourge a man that is a Roman , and uncondemned ?
text2: Ijewa te ijula ji ̱ atkete mo ̱ nakwa ̱ ra , Pablo te guardia wa cien wäsikäk kaldu ia ̱ isha : — ¿ Ka ̱ tso ̱ bas ia ̱ Roma wa kpäklä ka iktei wabiketsarksa ̱ ba yika na ?

text: When the centurion heard that , he went and told the chief captain , saying , Take heed what thou doest : for this man is a Roman .
text2: Je guardia wa cien wäsikäk te je ssa ra , imine ishäk guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ : — ¿ Ji we ̱ mar ba te rä na ? Ñera ije rä Roma wa .

text: Then the chief captain came , and said unto him , Tell me , art thou a Roman ? He said , Yea .
text2: Jera guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i deju ̱ iwäja ̱ mi te isha iia ̱ : — Ishö ' sia ̱ ¿ ba rä Roma wa na ? Jera ije te ikúka : — Taa .

text: And the chief captain answered , With a great sum obtained I this freedom . And Paul said , But I was free born .
text2: Jera guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te isha : — Yis je ̱ k tsa ̱ tju ̱ a ta ̱ i , yis äyëí yönakläwa ̱ Roma wa ye . Jera Pablo te isha : — Ta yis dä ijewa , yis ko ̱ na ijewa ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: Then straightway they departed from him which should have examined him : and the chief captain also was afraid , after he knew that he was a Roman , and because he had bound him .
text2: Jebä ra tso ̱ kja ikpäk wa ñatsa ̱ tulami iyika . Ñakäi guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra Pablo rä Roma wa , je ne mu ̱ awa ̱ ite rä , je te isuawa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: On the morrow , because he would have known the certainty wherefore he was accused of the Jews , he loosed him from his bands , and commanded the chief priests and all their council to appear , and brought Paul down , and set him before them .
text2: Jekäi bulirishtä ra je guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ssëna iju ̱ ñete ji si ̱ kju ̱ ei Judío wa te ikjatiawa ̱ rä käi . Je ki ̱ ka ite iwäyaksa ̱ , te chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä Sanedrín wa biköle irä paka ñatapawa ̱ kwa ̱ . Jera ite Pablo tsa ̱ ksa ̱ , tsa ̱ mi ijewa wäki ̱ .

text: And Paul , earnestly beholding the council , said , Men and brethren , I have lived in all good conscience before God until this day .
text2: Jera Pablo te Sanedrín wa su ̱ a jaree te isha : — El wa , yis se ̱ naté Säkeklä wäna ji biköle ska je ̱ r ssële ka nuita däka ̱ jira kje .

text: And the high priest Ananias commanded them that stood by him to smite him on the mouth .
text2: Jera chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Ananías te kajali Pablo säkätä ja ̱ mi wa paka ikpäk ikjäbata ki ̱ .

text: Then said Paul unto him , God shall smite thee , thou whited wall : for sittest thou to judge me after the law , and commandest me to be smitten contrary to the law ?
text2: Jera Pablo te isha iia ̱ : — Säkeklä te ba juer ta wämo käi kpemi . Ba je ̱ tkawa ̱ yis ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi , ata ba te ditsä paka yis kpäk ra , ¿ je wà ka ba te je ka ̱ wei shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ na ?

text: And they that stood by said , Revilest thou God ' s high priest ?
text2: Jera kajali jeska wa te isha iia ̱ : — ¿ Ba te chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ she yakei na ?

text: Then said Paul , I wist not , brethren , that he was the high priest : for it is written , Thou shalt not speak evil of the ruler of thy people .
text2: Jera Pablo te isha : — El wa , ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ije rä chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ni . Ata iyöle katke rä : ‘ Ke ba ku ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i sha kte yakei wà . ’

text: But when Paul perceived that the one part were Sadducees , and the other Pharisees , he cried out in the council , Men and brethren , I am a Pharisee , the son of a Pharisee : of the hope and resurrection of the dead I am called in question .
