text2: Jera Pablo je ̱ r na ide Sanedrín wa moska rä saduceo wa , moska rä fariseo wa . Je ki ̱ ka ia ̱ na täkii Sanedrín wa ska : — El wa , yis dä fariseo wa , yis dä fariseo wa yäbei , yis ktei wabiketsarte rä sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni je ki ̱ ssë kju ̱ ei .

text: And when he had so said , there arose a dissension between the Pharisees and the Sadducees : and the multitude was divided .
text2: Mika ̱ ite jekäi isha ra , je te fariseo wa irä , saduceo wa irä kju ̱ atkewa ̱ tulaka ̱ ñara . Jera je tapalewa ̱ wa ñabalabutsa .

text: For the Sadducees say that there is no resurrection , neither angel , nor spirit : but the Pharisees confess both .
text2: Iwa rä Saduceo wa te ishe rä shki ̱ neka ̱ ni käi , ángel wa käi , jile wikblu käi , je ka kuna . Ata fariseo wa ia ̱ ra je biköle tso ̱ .

text: And there arose a great cry : and the scribes that were of the Pharisees ' part arose , and strove , saying , We find no evil in this man : but if a spirit or an angel hath spoken to him , let us not fight against God .
text2: Ñerä ijewa kjoyinaka ̱ ta ̱ i . Jera fariseo wa sha ̱ ka ̱ wei wà ñayöle wa ñajaka ̱ ñau ̱ ña saduceo wa ra , te isha : — Ka sá wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni ko ̱ ne jí kaldu shäklä nui ta irä ni ; bäräle wikblu manele iräle , ángel manele iräle kta ira rä .

text: And when there arose a great dissension , the chief captain , fearing lest Paul should have been pulled in pieces of them , commanded the soldiers to go down , and to take him by force from among them , and to bring him into the castle .
text2: Jekäi ijewa ñaktewa ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ ta , je yika guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i su ̱ anawa ̱ iö ijewa te Pablo butse tkewa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ite guardia wa paka bitäk itapar tso ̱ ska Pablo bäkäkksa ̱ , tse ̱ nakmi guardia wa jui ska .

text: And the night following the Lord stood by him , and said , Be of good cheer , Paul : for as thou hast testified of me in Jerusalem , so must thou bear witness also at Rome .
text2: Je tuinei wà Säkekewa deju ̱ iwäki ̱ te sha iia ̱ : “ Bä ssëno täkii . Jishtä ba te yis ktei sha Jerusalén ska , je su ̱ ta ba kiana yis ktei shäk Roma ska . ”

text: And when it was day , certain of the Jews banded together , and bound themselves under a curse , saying that they would neither eat nor drink till they had killed Paul .
text2: Ñerä ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra Judío wa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a , kabla etkabä ñashaksa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ , iji ñawa ̱ iji yawa ̱ ka iwa ̱ Pablo kota ̱ nawa ̱ ba yika ra .

text: And they were more than forty which had made this conspiracy .
text2: Je ñaje ̱ rko ̱ le iktäkwa ̱ wa däka ̱ rä cuarenta tsa ̱ ta .

text: And they came to the chief priests and elders , and said , We have bound ourselves under a great curse , that we will eat nothing until we have slain Paul .
text2: Jewa minejulumi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , sä wäkiri wa irä wäki ̱ ka te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Sá rä kablele etkabä ka ji ñak kuna , ka sá wa ̱ Pablo kota ̱ nawa ̱ ba yika . Ata ka je o ̱ ne ra sá weikanowa ̱ pa .

text: Now therefore ye with the council signify to the chief captain that he bring him down unto you to morrow , as though ye would inquire something more perfectly concerning him : and we , or ever he come near , are ready to kill him .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas irä Sanedrín wa irä jewa ku ̱ ka ̱ kiö guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ , iwa ̱ Pablo tsa ̱ kläté bulia bas wäki ̱ , sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä bas ki ̱ ishena ktei chakanak bulee si ̱ käi . Ata sá te iki ̱ ssëmi kukale e ̱ ná iktäkwa ̱ ka ije däju ̱ ba yika .

text: And when Paul ' s sister ' s son heard of their lying in wait , he went and entered into the castle , and told Paul .
text2: Ata Pablo kuta yaba te ijewa te iki ̱ ssë mar ktei ssa ra , imineju ̱ kjawa ̱ ju ̱ guardia wa jui ska je bata shäk Pablo ia ̱ .

text: Then Paul called one of the centurions unto him , and said , Bring this young man unto the chief captain : for he hath a certain thing to tell him .
text2: Jera Pablo te guardia wa cien wäsikäk ekla kiaté , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Jí dulaklei tso ̱ mi bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wäki ̱ , je wa ̱ jile tso ̱ yinak ije ia ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: So he took him , and brought him to the chief captain , and said , Paul the prisoner called me unto him , and prayed me to bring this young man unto thee , who hath something to say unto thee .
text2: Jera ite itsa ̱ mi guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wäki ̱ , te isha iia ̱ : — Pablo , ale wätelewa ̱ te yis kiami , jekäi ite yis paka jí dulaklei tsa ̱ kté bä wäki ̱ , ije wa ̱ jile tso ̱ yinak ba ia ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Then the chief captain took him by the hand , and went with him aside privately , and asked him , What is that thou hast to tell me ?
text2: Jera guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te ikukawa ̱ ijulaka te itsa ̱ mi kju ̱ awaka , te ichaka iia ̱ : — ¿ Ji tso ̱ ba wa ̱ yinak yis ia ̱ rä na ?

text: And he said , The Jews have agreed to desire thee that thou wouldest bring down Paul to morrow into the council , as though they would inquire somewhat of him more perfectly .
text2: Jera ije te ikúka : — Judío wa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a ka ̱ kiäk ba ia ̱ , ba wa ̱ Pablo tsa ̱ klämi bulia Sanedrín wa wäki ̱ , sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä ije ktei chakäklä bulee si ̱ käi .

text: But do not thou yield unto them : for there lie in wait for him of them more than forty men , which have bound themselves with an oath , that they will neither eat nor drink till they have killed him : and now are they ready , looking for a promise from thee .
text2: Ata ke iktä kuka . Ka jiye kuna ta , ijewa sha ̱ jäiyi wa cuarenta tsa ̱ ta te iki ̱ ssë kate kota ̱ nakwa ̱ . Ijewa kabla etkabä ñashaksa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ , iji ñawa ̱ iji yawa ̱ ka iwa ̱ Pablo kota ̱ nawa ̱ ba yika ra . Jekäi ijewa rä kukale kja iwa ̱ k , ata ijewa te rä ba kabläke ̱ ipatkäkmi ebä ne ki ̱ ssëke ̱ .

text: So the chief captain then let the young man depart , and charged him , See thou tell no man that thou hast shewed these things to me .
text2: Jera je guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te je dulaklei patkamine , je ia ̱ ite isha : — Ka ba te ishe kuna yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ba te je bata sha yis ia ̱ ni .

text: And he called unto him two centurions , saying , Make ready two hundred soldiers to go to Caesarea , and horsemen threescore and ten , and spearmen two hundred , at the third hour of the night ;
text2: Ñerä je guardia tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te guardia wa cien wäsikäk kiaté bol te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Tuina las nueve ra guardia wa kukanewo ̱ , dosciento shkäk klä wà , setenta shkäk caballo ki ̱ , dosciento ukabata ta , minakmi Cesareaka ,

text: And provide them beasts , that they may set Paul on , and bring him safe unto Felix the governor .
text2: ñakäi caballo ki ̱ jiöcha ̱ wa ̱ Pablo ia ̱ itsa ̱ klämi ka medele ta ka ̱ wäkiri Félix wäki ̱ .

text: And he wrote a letter after this manner :
text2: Ñakäi je guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te äyë yuami , te ishe rä jikäi :

text: Claudius Lysias unto the most excellent governor Felix sendeth greeting .
text2: “ Yis Claudio Lisias , je te iyuami ba ka ̱ wäkiri bäiwa ̱ si ̱ Félix ia ̱ : Ba se ̱ nopa bäi .

text: This man was taken of the Jews , and should have been killed of them : then came I with an army , and rescued him , having understood that he was a Roman .
text2: Jí ekla kukawa ̱ Judío wa te , yëë kterawa ̱ ijewa te . Ata yie iju ̱ ña ije rä Roma wa ni ra , yis mine guardia wa ra , te iwetsaksa ̱ .

text: And when I would have known the cause wherefore they accused him , I brought him forth into their council :
text2: Jekäi yis ki ̱ ishena ju ̱ ñenakwa ̱ ji kju ̱ ei ijewa te ikjatieke ̱ rä ki ̱ ka yis wa ̱ iminetse ̱ ijewa wa ̱ kolole sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wa ska .

text: Whom I perceived to be accused of questions of their law , but to have nothing laid to his charge worthy of death or of bonds .
text2: Jekäi yis te issa ra ijewa te ikjatieke ̱ rä iwakwa ka ̱ wei bata ki ̱ ka . Ata ka iwa ̱ ji a ̱ ni nui kuna , iktäkläwa ̱ iräle iwätiäkläwa ̱ iräle .

text: And when it was told me how that the Jews laid wait for the man , I sent straightway to thee , and gave commandment to his accusers also to say before thee what they had against him . Farewell .
text2: Ata yis ia ̱ ibata yina ijewa rä ñaje ̱ rko ̱ le e ̱ ná iktäkwa ̱ ra , ñawäsaka yie ije patkami bä wäki ̱ ka . Ñaebä yie ije kjatiäk wa paka minak bä wäki ̱ jeka ikjatiäk . ”

text: Then the soldiers , as it was commanded them , took Paul , and brought him by night to Antipatris .
text2: Ñerä guardia wa te iwá ̱ jishtä ipakana iwa ̱ k käi . Jewa wa ̱ Pablo minetse ̱ tuina demi Antípatris ska .

text: On the morrow they left the horsemen to go with him , and returned to the castle :
text2: Bulirishtä ra ijewa te caballo ki ̱ shkä wa ebä patkami ira , ata iwakwa bitejuluni guardia wa juika .

text: Who , when they came to Caesarea , and delivered the epistle to the governor , presented Paul also before him .
text2: Ñerä jewa demi Cesarea ska ra , ite äyë cha ̱ mi ka ̱ wäkiri ia ̱ , ñakäi iwa ̱ Pablo demitse ̱ iwäja ̱ mi .

text: And when the governor had read the letter , he asked of what province he was . And when he understood that he was of Cilicia ;
text2: Jera ka ̱ wäkiri te je äyë washa , jera ite ichaka mai ke ̱ i ta ska idar dä . Ite iju ̱ ña Pablo rä Cilicia wa ni ra ,

text: I will hear thee , said he , when thine accusers are also come . And he commanded him to be kept in Herod ' s judgment hall .
text2: ite isha iia ̱ : — Ji kju ̱ ei ba kjaterke ̱ rä je ssëmi yie , mika ̱ ba kjatiäkwa dejulu kjepa . Jekäi ite ijewa paka ikjänanak Herodes pretorio ska .

text: And after five days Ananias the high priest descended with the elders , and with a certain orator named Tertullus , who informed the governor against Paul .
text2: Cinco día ukä ska ra , chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Ananías deju ̱ té sä wäkiri wa sha ̱ manele irä , ekla sä ktäklei kie Tértulo irä jewa ra . Jewa tapanawa ̱ ka ̱ wäkiri ia ̱ Pablo kjatiäk .

text: And when he was called forth , Tertullus began to accuse him , saying , Seeing that by thee we enjoy great quietness , and that very worthy deeds are done unto this nation by thy providence ,
text2: Ñerä Pablo kinaté ra , Tértulo te ikjatiami te isha : — Ba ktä wà sa ̱ se ̱ rke ̱ bitaba , ba te ji biketse tsa ̱ na , je wà ba te ji bäiwa ̱ ta ̱ i jí sa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ,

text: We accept it always , and in all places , most noble Felix , with all thankfulness .
text2: ba Félix bäiwa ̱ si ̱ , del ka ̱ biköle ska , sá te isu ̱ a ra iyina irä , je ki ̱ ka sá te ba kjeishe je ̱ r baa wà .

text: Notwithstanding , that I be not further tedious unto thee , I pray thee that thou wouldest hear us of thy clemency a few words .
text2: Ata ka yis wa ̱ ba weikäklä issäk jaree ki ̱ ka yis te ba ia ̱ ka ̱ kieke ̱ ba rä je ̱ r bäi ki ̱ ka ba wa ̱ sá ktä ssäklä berbena .

text: For we have found this man a pestilent fellow , and a mover of sedition among all the Jews throughout the world , and a ringleader of the sect of the Nazarenes :
text2: Iwa rä sá te iku ̱ aksa ̱ ra jí ekla ne rä sä weikäk e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ rä , sä wätji ̱ wa ̱ k Judío wa biköle sha ̱ na ka ̱ biköle ska rä . Ije ne rä ale Nazaret wa ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ja ̱ mi wa wäkiri ekla rä .

text: Who also hath gone about to profane the temple : whom we took , and would have judged according to our law .
text2: Ije te Templo yakei tewa ̱ klewa ̱ , ata sá te ikukawa ̱ , jekäi sá ssëna ije ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ sá ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi .

text: But the chief captain Lysias came upon us , and with great violence took him away out of our hands ,
text2: Ata guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Lisias deju ̱ , je te täkili wà ije bakaksa ̱ sá jula na .

text: Commanding his accusers to come unto thee : by examining of whom thyself mayest take knowledge of all these things , whereof we accuse him .
text2: Jekäi je te ikjatiäk wa patkaté ba wäki ̱ , jekäi ba te iwächakewa ̱ ra , ba te isu ̱ emi ji ni sá te ikjatieke ̱ je biköle wà rä käi .

text: And the Jews also assented , saying that these things were so .
text2: Jera Judío wa te ishaña je biköle rä iyina si ̱ .

text: Then Paul , after that the governor had beckoned unto him to speak , answered , Forasmuch as I know that thou hast been of many years a judge unto this nation , I do the more cheerfully answer for myself :
text2: Jera ka ̱ wäkiri te Pablo ia ̱ ikjasha jula wà iktäklä . Jera ite isha : — Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ka ̱ mikleté ba rä jí ke ̱ i ska wa ktei wabiketsäk , je ki ̱ ka ka yis suane je ̱ k wetsäk ba ia ̱ .

text: Because that thou mayest understand , that there are yet but twelve days since I went up to Jerusalem for to worship .
text2: Ba te ichakakle ra ba te iju ̱ ñemi , jira doce día ebä yis deka ̱ Jerusalénka Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k rä .

text: And they neither found me in the temple disputing with any man , neither raising up the people , neither in the synagogues , nor in the city :
text2: Ata ka ijewa wa ̱ yis ko ̱ ne Templo ska iräle , ñapaktäklä jui ska iräle , jukläyäkä sha ̱ na iräle , yis ñau ̱ ña kate yilé ra käi , yis te sä wätji ̱ we ̱ kate käi kuna .

text: Neither can they prove the things whereof they now accuse me .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te jí yis kjatieke ̱ ba ia ̱ je ka yinak ijewa ia ̱ iyina ye .

text: But this I confess unto thee , that after the way which they call heresy , so worship I the God of my fathers , believing all things which are written in the law and in the prophets :
text2: Ata yis te ba ia ̱ jí ne sheke ̱ rä : yis dä yis kalí wa Kekläí kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k , jishtä Jesús ña ̱ le ̱ i kinak ijewa wa ̱ ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe saka ni je kiana kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak rä je ja ̱ mi . Ñakäi ka ̱ wei irä jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyöle irä je bena biketsäk yis dä .

text: And have hope toward God , which they themselves also allow , that there shall be a resurrection of the dead , both of the just and unjust .
text2: Ata ji etka Säkeklä wa ̱ me ̱ nak ki ̱ ssënak yis wa ̱ , je ebä ne ki ̱ ssëke ̱ ñaebä ijewa te rä ; je rä sä rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni , sä wämo wa käi , ka sä wämo kuna wa käi .

text: And herein do I exercise myself , to have always a conscience void of offence toward God , and toward men .
text2: Je kju ̱ ei yis chichar dami del ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na , ka yis ssënaklä nui ta käi , Säkeklä wäna iräle , ditsä wäna iräle .

text: Now after many years I came to bring alms to my nation , and offerings .
text2: “ Ñerä año kja ta ̱ i ukä ska yis deni inaklä ju ̱ ak yis ditsei wä sha ̱ ka jita wa ia ̱ , ñakäi jile ma ̱ k Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: Whereupon certain Jews from Asia found me purified in the temple , neither with multitude , nor with tumult .
text2: Yie je we ̱ kate ra , Judío wa datse ̱ Asia ska wa te yis ku ̱ a Templo ska je ̱ k siki tele e ̱ ná . Ka yi kuna yis da chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , ñakäi ka yis wa ̱ yi wätjineka ̱ .

text: Who ought to have been here before thee , and object , if they had ought against me .
text2: Jekäi ikuna jile wata ki ̱ ijewa te yis kjatieke ̱ ra , bäi si ̱ iwakwane shena däkjulu jiska bä wäki ̱ yis kjatiäk rä ,

text: Or else let these same here say , if they have found any evil doing in me , while I stood before the council ,
text2: ata kai ra , jí wakwa ku ̱ ishöka ̱ , ji ku ̱ a ite yis wa ̱ o ̱ le yakei käi , yis wächakena yis kaldu Sanedrín wa wäna ra rä .

text: Except it be for this one voice , that I cried standing among them , Touching the resurrection of the dead I am called in question by you this day .
text2: Ata bäräle jeska ijewa sha ̱ na yie isha täkii : “ Jir yis ktei wabiketsarte rä , sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni ktei kju ̱ ei . ’ Je ki ̱ le yis dä nui ta rä . ”

text: And when Felix heard these things , having more perfect knowledge of that way , he deferred them , and said , When Lysias the chief captain shall come down , I will know the uttermost of your matter .
text2: Jera Félix dä je ̱ r ko ̱ le tsa ̱ na Jesús ña ̱ le ̱ i ktei wa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ite iwätkewa ̱ wa ̱ , te isha : — Mika ̱ guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Lisias deju ̱ ne kjepa yie bas te isheke ̱ biketsemiksa ̱ tsa ̱ na rä .

text: And he commanded a centurion to keep Paul , and to let him have liberty , and that he should forbid none of his acquaintance to minister or come unto him .
text2: Jekäi ite guardia wa cien wäsikäk paka Pablo kjänanak , ata ka ̱ ma ̱ k iia ̱ ju na ikäruäklä kjermita , ñakäi isaka wa däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ma ̱ k iia ̱ ka wätkewa ̱ k kuna .

text: And after certain days , when Felix came with his wife Drusilla , which was a Jewess , he sent for Paul , and heard him concerning the faith in Christ .
text2: Je itäki ̱ je ̱ na je ̱ napa Félix deju ̱ ise ̱ naklä Drusila ra , je rä Judío wa . Jekäi Félix te Pablo sha tse ̱ nakté . Ñerä Pablo te Cristo Jesús biketse paka , je ssa ije te .

text: And as he reasoned of righteousness , temperance , and judgment to come Felix trembled , and answered , Go thy way for this time ; when I have a convenient season , I will call for thee .
text2: Jekäi Pablo te ji wämo käi , je ̱ k wätkewe ̱ ji yika käi , sä ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ käi , je ktei paka ra , Félix suanawa ̱ te isha iia ̱ : — Bäi rä , ma cho ̱ ni . Ata bikökje yis wä katke ra yie bä kieni .

text: He hoped also that money should have been given him of Paul , that he might loose him : wherefore he sent for him the oftener , and communed with him .
text2: Ka je rä isu ̱ anawa ̱ ebä kuna , ata ñakäi je rä ite iki ̱ ssëte tsu Pablo te inaklä me ̱ iia ̱ , iwa ̱ iyäkläksa ̱ ni . Je ki ̱ ka ite ikieke ̱ ka ̱ raa iktäklä ñara .

text: But after two years Porcius Festus came into Felix ' room : and Felix , willing to shew the Jews a pleasure , left Paul bound .
text2: Jera dos año deka ̱ ra Porcio Festo dewa ̱ Félix säkei ye . Jera Félix wa ̱ Judío wa ssëwa ̱ klä bäi ki ̱ ka ite Pablo ju ̱ ata ̱ na wätelewa ̱ .

text: Now when Festus was come into the province , after three days he ascended from Caesarea to Jerusalem .
text2: Jekäi Festo dewa ̱ je ke ̱ i wäkiri ye ukä ska tres día ra Cesarea ska ibiteju ̱ té deka ̱ Jerusalén .

text: Then the high priest and the chief of the Jews informed him against Paul , and besought him ,
text2: Jera chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä sä wäkiri bäi si ̱ wa ̱ wa irä dejulu iwäki ̱ Pablo kjatiäk . Jewa te ka ̱ kia Festo ia ̱ ,

text: And desired favour against him , that he would send for him to Jerusalem , laying wait in the way to kill him .
text2: ije ̱ r bäi shäkläpa Pablo patkäkté Jerusalénka . Ata ijewa rä ñaje ̱ rko ̱ le kja iki ̱ ssäk ña ̱ la wà ko ̱ ta ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: But Festus answered , that Paul should be kept at Caesarea , and that he himself would depart shortly thither .
text2: Ata Festo te isha : — Ñera Pablo tso ̱ rä wätelewa ̱ Cesareaka . Ata yis mike ̱ ni jeka rä plaa yena .

text: Let them therefore , said he , which among you are able , go down with me , and accuse this man , if there be any wickedness in him .
text2: Jekäi ite isha : — Bas sha ̱ mane kjöpa ra ima yis da jeka , ikuna ije wa ̱ ji yakei rä wakblele ra , ikjatiäk .

text: And when he had tarried among them more than ten days , he went down unto Caesarea ; and the next day sitting on the judgment seat commanded Paul to be brought .
text2: Festo se ̱ na ijewa sha ̱ na ocho día käi , diez día käi , jera imineju ̱ ni Cesareaka . Bulirishtä ra ije ̱ tkawa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ ska , jera ite Pablo sha tse ̱ nakté .

text: And when he was come , the Jews which came down from Jerusalem stood round about , and laid many and grievous complaints against Paul , which they could not prove .
text2: Idetse ̱ ra , Judío wa minele Jerusalén ska wa te ipajiaksa ̱ shkiritke , jewa te ikjatia saka saka nui ta e ̱ e ̱ na käi . Ata ka ijewa ia ̱ iyir kte si ̱ käi .

text: While he answered for himself , Neither against the law of the Jews , neither against the temple , nor yet against Caesar , have I offended any thing at all .
text2: Jera Pablo je ̱ k wetsa te isha : — Ka yis wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne nui ta käi , Judío wa ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi iräle , Templo ukä ja ̱ mi iräle , César ukä ja ̱ mi iräle .

text: But Festus , willing to do the Jews a pleasure , answered Paul , and said , Wilt thou go up to Jerusalem , and there be judged of these things before me ?
text2: Ata Festo kiana Judío wa je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ k bäi ki ̱ ka ite ichaka Pablo ia ̱ : — ¿ Ba ssëna minak Jerusalénka , jeska ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ yis wäna jí ktei ki ̱ ka na ?

text: Then said Paul , I stand at Caesar ' s judgment seat , where I ought to be judged : to the Jews have I done no wrong , as thou very well knowest .
text2: Jera Pablo te ikúka : — Yis kaldu e ̱ ná sä ktei wabiketsäklä tkelewa ̱ César wa ̱ ska . Je ne ska yis kiana wabiketsanakksa ̱ rä . Ka yis wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni yakei o ̱ ne Judío wa ukä ja ̱ mi , jishtä ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bäi käi .

text: For if I be an offender , or have committed any thing worthy of death , I refuse not to die : but if there be none of these things whereof these accuse me , no man may deliver me unto them . I appeal unto Caesar .
text2: Ata ikuna yie ji wá ̱ yakei nui ta ki ̱ ka yis shena kota ̱ nakwa ̱ ra , ka yis wa ̱ iyinak ke ' sktawa ̱ . Ata je yis kjatieke ̱ ijewa te je ktei rä ka iyina si ̱ kuna ra , yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka ka ̱ kuna yis ju ̱ akläksa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka yis ia ̱ ka ̱ mo ̱ ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ César wakei wa ̱ .

text: Then Festus , when he had conferred with the council , answered , Hast thou appealed unto Caesar ? unto Caesar shalt thou go .
text2: Ñerä Festo te ipaka itsa ̱ tkäk wa ra , jekäi ite isha : — Ba te ka ̱ kia ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ César wakei wa ̱ , jera je wäki ̱ ba ma rä .

text: And after certain days king Agrippa and Bernice came unto Caesarea to salute Festus .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ ka plaa yena ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa irä Berenice irä demijulu Cesareaka Festo su ̱ ak .

text: And when they had been there many days , Festus declared Paul ' s cause unto the king , saying , There is a certain man left in bonds by Felix :
text2: Jeska jewa se ̱ na ta ̱ i . Jera Festo te Pablo ktei paka ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa ia ̱ te isha : — Jiska Félix te ditsä ekla ju ̱ ata ̱ na wätelewa ̱ .

text: About whom , when I was at Jerusalem , the chief priests and the elders of the Jews informed me , desiring to have judgment against him .
text2: Yis dasta ̱ na Jerusalénka ra , chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , Judío wäkiri wa irä dejulu yis wäki ̱ , te ka ̱ kia ije wabiketsäkläksa ̱ weikanak .

text: To whom I answered , It is not the manner of the Romans to deliver any man to die , before that he which is accused have the accusers face to face , and have licence to answer for himself concerning the crime laid against him .
text2: Jera yie ijewa kúka , Roma wa ka wädular yi a ̱ ni ju ̱ akksa ̱ kota ̱ nakwa ̱ kjermita , ata säkätäba ka ̱ tso ̱ je kjatele wa ia ̱ ije ̱ k tsa ̱ tkäklä ikjatiäk wa wäna je ikjaterke ̱ yika .

text: Therefore , when they were come hither , without any delay on the morrow I sat on the judgment seat , and commanded the man to be brought forth .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa dejulu etka ye jiska ra , ka yis wa ̱ iwätkene , ata bulirishtä ebä yis je ̱ tkawa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ ska . Jera yie ije sha tse ̱ nakté .

text: Against whom when the accusers stood up , they brought none accusation of such things as I supposed :
text2: Ata ikjatiäk wa ñajaklaka ̱ ikjatiäk ra , ka ijewa wa ̱ iyine jishtä yie ibiketsa käi kuna .

text: But had certain questions against him of their own superstition , and of one Jesus , which was dead , whom Paul affirmed to be alive .
text2: Ata ijewa kju ̱ atkäke ̱ ira rä iwakwa ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ebä ki ̱ ka , ekla dulewa ̱ kie Jesús sheke ̱ Pablo te ikatkeni kseka ki ̱ ka .

text: And because I doubted of such manner of questions , I asked him whether he would go to Jerusalem , and there be judged of these matters .
text2: Jekäi ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer me yie je we ̱ ke ̱ räle . Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ichaka Pablo ia ̱ : ‘ ¿ Ma je ̱ r ssëna minak Jerusalénka ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ je ktei ki ̱ ka na ? ’

text: But when Paul had appealed to be reserved unto the hearing of Augustus , I commanded him to be kept till I might send him to Caesar .
text2: Ata Pablo te ka ̱ kia ia ̱ ta ̱ naklä wätelewa ̱ Augusto wa ̱ wabiketsanakksa ̱ ji ̱ a . Jekäi yie ka ̱ wei ma ise ̱ naklä wätelewa ̱ , bikökje yie ipatkeke ̱ César wäki ̱ kje .

text: Then Agrippa said unto Festus , I would also hear the man myself . To morrow , said he , thou shalt hear him .
text2: Jera Agripa te isha Festo ia ̱ : — Yis je ̱ r ssëna Pablo ktä ssëte . Jera ite ikúka : — Bulia ba te iktä ssëmi .

text: And on the morrow , when Agrippa was come , and Bernice , with great pomp , and was entered into the place of hearing , with the chief captains , and principal men of the city , at Festus ' commandment Paul was brought forth .
text2: Jera bulishtä ra Agripa irä Berenice irä jewa dewa ̱ julu ñassële yëë , kjawa ̱ julu ji ktei pakäklä ska guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , jäiyi wa bakleka ̱ wa irä , jewa ra . Jera Festo te Pablo sha tse ̱ nakté , je ki ̱ idetse ̱ .

text: And Festus said , King Agrippa , and all men which are here present with us , ye see this man , about whom all the multitude of the Jews have dealt with me , both at Jerusalem , and also here , crying that he ought not to live any longer .
text2: Jera Festo te isha : — Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa , ñakäi biköle bas tso ̱ jiska sá ra wa ; jí ekla su ̱ o , je kjatia yis ia ̱ Judío wa kalabe te , Jerusalén ska irä , jiska irä . Ijewa kjoyinaka ̱ ta ̱ i , ka ije kiar ji ̱ a se ̱ nak kseka ni .

text: But when I found that he had committed nothing worthy of death , and that he himself hath appealed to Augustus , I have determined to send him .
text2: Ata yis te isu ̱ a ra , ka ije wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne nui ta käi iktäkläwa ̱ , ata ije ka ̱ kia ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ Augusto wakei wa ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ yie ibiketsa patkenakmi je wäki ̱ .

text: Of whom I have no certain thing to write unto my lord . Wherefore I have brought him forth before you , and specially before thee , O king Agrippa , that , after examination had , I might have somewhat to write .
text2: Ata ka yis wa ̱ ji kuna yönak ishäklä tsa ̱ na si ̱ käi yis tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka yis wa ̱ idetse ̱ bas wäki ̱ , bäi si ̱ ra ba sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa wäki ̱ , je rä iwabiketsanaksa ̱ ra , je ja ̱ mi yis wa ̱ iyuäklä .

text: For it seemeth to me unreasonable to send a prisoner , and not withal to signify the crimes laid against him .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis ia ̱ ra wätelewa ̱ patkemi ka bata yile kuna tsa ̱ na ji ki ̱ ikjatena rä käi ra , je rä ka wata .

text: Then Agrippa said unto Paul , Thou art permitted to speak for thyself . Then Paul stretched forth the hand , and answered for himself :
text2: Jera Agripa te isha Pablo ia ̱ : — Yie ka ̱ me ̱ ba ia ̱ ba je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkäklä . Jera Pablo jula tkacha ̱ , je ̱ k wetsami jikäi :

text: I think myself happy , king Agrippa , because I shall answer for myself this day before thee touching all the things whereof I am accused of the Jews :
text2: “ Yis ia ̱ ra bäije jir yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ je ̱ k wetsäk ba Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa ia ̱ , ji kju ̱ ei Judío wa te yis kjatieke ̱ rä je biköle yika ,

text: Especially because I know thee to be expert in all customs and questions which are among the Jews : wherefore I beseech thee to hear me patiently .
text2: bäi si ̱ ra , sá Judío wa wädular irä , ji te sá ktewe ̱ ke ̱ irä , je biköle ju ̱ ñer bäi ba wa ̱ ki ̱ ka . Je ki ̱ ka yis te ba ia ̱ ka ̱ kie yis ktä ssöpa je ̱ r bäi wà .

text: My manner of life from my youth , which was at the first among mine own nation at Jerusalem , know all the Jews ;
text2: “ Jishtä yis se ̱ r yis ji ̱ a dulaklei raté , ale yis se ̱ na yis ditsei wä wa sha ̱ na Jerusalén ska ra , je ju ̱ ñer Judío wa biköle wa ̱ .

text: Which knew me from the beginning , if they would testify , that after the most straitest sect of our religion I lived a Pharisee .
text2: Ijewa wa ̱ yis dä su ̱ le mikté . Jekäi jewa kuna je ktei shäk ra , ijewa te ishemi rä , yis se ̱ le rä fariseo ye , jewa ne rä sá ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe wawa ̱ k tsa ̱ na si ̱ isaka tsa ̱ ta rä .

text: And now I stand and am judged for the hope of the promise made of God unto our fathers :
text2: Ata jir yis ktei wabiketsarte Säkeklä kablele sá kalí wa ia ̱ ki ̱ ssë kju ̱ ei .

text: Unto which promise our twelve tribes , instantly serving God day and night , hope to come . For which hope ' s sake , king Agrippa , I am accused of the Jews .
text2: Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa , je ikablele ki ̱ ssënak sá ditsei wä doce wa wa ̱ , je däkläksa ̱ sá ia ̱ ki ̱ ka sá te ikja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ tkenawa ̱ tuina , ka ̱ piana . Je ki ̱ ssë ebä ki ̱ ka Judío wa te yis kjatie kate rä ,

text: Why should it be thought a thing incredible with you , that God should raise the dead ?
text2: ¿ Jiye bas manele te ka ibiketse Säkeklä ia ̱ dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni rä na ?

text: I verily thought with myself , that I ought to do many things contrary to the name of Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: “ Iyina si ̱ yis wakei ia ̱ ra yie ibiketsa jile wa ̱ k saka saka Jesús Nazaret wa kie ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: Which thing I also did in Jerusalem : and many of the saints did I shut up in prison , having received authority from the chief priests ; and when they were put to death , I gave my voice against them .
text2: Jekäi yie je wá ̱ Jerusalén ska . Chui wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa te ka ̱ wei ma ̱ yis ia ̱ , je wà yis te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ sä sikii wa jiacha ̱ wa ̱ sä wätiäklä ska . Mika ̱ ijewa te ikteche ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ ra , yie ishaña je rä bäi ebä ni .

text: And I punished them oft in every synagogue , and compelled them to blaspheme ; and being exceedingly mad against them , I persecuted them even unto strange cities .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ raa yis mike ̱ ñapaktäklä jui etkä etkä ska ijewa kpäk . Jekäi yie ijewa kukeke ̱ wa ̱ täkili wà ijewa wa ̱ Jesús shäkläka ̱ kte yakei wà . Yis kju ̱ atkawa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ijewa ra , je ki ̱ yis te jukläyäkä tso ̱ ka ̱ etkä ska kje ijewa yule dami weikanak .

text: Whereupon as I went to Damascus with authority and commission from the chief priests ,
text2: “ Jekäi je ebä we ̱ ki ̱ ka yis damiju ̱ Damascoka patkelemi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa wa ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ le wà .

text: At midday , O king , I saw in the way a light from heaven , above the brightness of the sun , shining round about me and them which journeyed with me .
text2: Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa , ñerä ña ̱ la ki ̱ yis damiju ̱ ka ̱ mo ki ̱ ra , yie isu ̱ a ka ̱ jöir ska ka ̱ oloi ñinaté ka ̱ wä oloi tsa ̱ ta te ka ̱ ñiwa ̱ ksa ̱ yis pája ̱ mi shkiritke , ñakäi yis da shkäk wa pája ̱ mi shkiritke .

text: And when we were all fallen to the earth , I heard a voice speaking unto me , and saying in the Hebrew tongue , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ? it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Jekäi sá kalabe jolonacha ̱ wa ̱ kipaka . Jera yie kte ssa Hebreo wa ktä wà , te ishe yis ia ̱ : Saulo , Saulo , ¿ jiye ba te yis yuleke ̱ weikanak rä na ? E ̱ e ̱ na ma je ̱ k weikäke ̱ rä , jishtä buey te iñatkäklä kà sibuu tie klä wà käi .

text: And I said , Who art thou , Lord ? And he said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest .
text2: Jera yie ichaka ije ia ̱ : “ Säkekewa , ¿ yi ba rä na ? ” Jera Säkekewa te yis kúka : “ Yis dä Jesús je ne yuleke ̱ ba te weikanak rä .

text: But rise , and stand upon thy feet : for I have appeared unto thee for this purpose , to make thee a minister and a witness both of these things which thou hast seen , and of those things in the which I will appear unto thee ;
text2: Ata ma jeköka ̱ klä ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis je ̱ k kjasha ba ia ̱ rä , ba kukäk yis kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ye , yis ktei pakäk ye , ka ji su ̱ a ba te ebä ktei pakäk kuna , ata yis je ̱ k kjashämi ji ̱ a yie ba ia ̱ ji kjasheke ̱ na je ktei pakäk .

text: Delivering thee from the people , and from the Gentiles , unto whom now I send thee ,
text2: Yie ba wetsemiksa ̱ Judío wa yika , ka Judío kuna wa yika , jewa ne ska jira yie ba patke mar dä ,

text: To open their eyes , and to turn them from darkness to light , and from the power of Satan unto God , that they may receive forgiveness of sins , and inheritance among them which are sanctified by faith that is in me .
text2: ba wa ̱ ijewa wäji ̱ atkewa ̱ klä , se ̱ ne ka ̱ yee na yika ijewa ñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ ka ̱ oloika , ñakäi Satanás täkili yika , idäkläwa ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi , ijewa nui janakläwa ̱ bitaba , iwa ̱ däli ukä kukäkläwa ̱ ña siki tele wa ra , yis biketse ki ̱ ka . ”

text: Whereupon , O king Agrippa , I was not disobedient unto the heavenly vision :
text2: Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa , je ne ki ̱ ka je kjayile yis ia ̱ ka ̱ jöir skaté ka weikanewa ̱ yis wa ̱ .

text: But shewed first unto them of Damascus , and at Jerusalem , and throughout all the coasts of Judaea , and then to the Gentiles , that they should repent and turn to God , and do works meet for repentance .
text2: Ata säkätä si ̱ yie Damasco ska wa pakta . Je itäki ̱ Jerusalén ska wa irä , Judea ke ̱ i biköle ska wa irä , ka Judío kuna wa irä , ijewa ñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ , iñaparuäklä Säkeklä ia ̱ , ji rä kianak sa ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ra o ̱ nak je wa ̱ k .

text: For these causes the Jews caught me in the temple , and went about to kill me .
text2: Je ne kju ̱ ei Judío wa te yis kukawa ̱ Templo ska yëë ite ' sterawa ̱ .

text: Having therefore obtained help of God , I continue unto this day , witnessing both to small and great , saying none other things than those which the prophets and Moses did say should come :
text2: Ata Säkeklä te yis bakaksa ̱ , jekäi yis chatkärami ji ̱ a jira kje , je ktei pakäk emana wa ia ̱ , oloi ta wa ia ̱ , Moisés irä , jile bata shäk wa irä jewa wa ̱ ji o ̱ rmi ji ̱ a yile käi ebä , ka ji saka yile ta .

text: That Christ should suffer , and that he should be the first that should rise from the dead , and should shew light unto the people , and to the Gentiles .
text2: Je yile rä Säbäkäkksa ̱ shena weikanak , ñakäi shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni säkätäba dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , je rä iwa ̱ ka ̱ oloi bata shäklä Judío wa ia ̱ , ñakäi ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ . ”

text: And as he thus spake for himself , Festus said with a loud voice , Paul , thou art beside thyself ; much learning doth make thee mad .
text2: Ñerä Pablo je ̱ k wetsä dami ji ̱ a jekäi ra , Festo te isha täkii : — Pablo , ba yuletenawa ̱ , ba je ̱ k yua ta ̱ i , je te ba yuletewa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: But he said , I am not mad , most noble Festus ; but speak forth the words of truth and soberness .
text2: Jera Pablo te ikúka : — Säkekewa bäiwa ̱ si ̱ Festo , ka yis dä yuletelewa ̱ kuna . Ata yis te kte wata si ̱ ne sheke ̱ rä .

text: For the king knoweth of these things , before whom also I speak freely : for I am persuaded that none of these things are hidden from him ; for this thing was not done in a corner .
text2: Ñera jí sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa wäkata ska yis ktäke ̱ ka suale ta , je je ̱ r ku ̱ a je te bäi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te ibiketse je wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer bäi , je o ̱ na rä ka jakika kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: King Agrippa , believest thou the prophets ? I know that thou believest .
text2: Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Agripa , ¿ jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyile , je kuka ba te na ? Yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba te je kuka .

text: Then Agrippa said unto Paul , Almost thou persuadest me to be a Christian .
text2: Jera Agripa te isha Pablo ia ̱ : — ¿ Je elkjebä wà ba te yis je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ däkwa ̱ Cristo ja ̱ mi wa ye na ?

text: And Paul said , I would to God , that not only thou , but also all that hear me this day , were both almost , and altogether such as I am , except these bonds .
text2: Jera Pablo te ikúka : — Elkjebä wà iräle , shka ̱ ja ̱ wà iräle , Säkeklä ki ̱ ishenopa ra ka ba ebä kuna , ata bena jir yis ktä ssäk wa döwa ̱ pa yis käi , ata ka jikäi cadena ta kuna .

text: And when he had thus spoken , the king rose up , and the governor , and Bernice , and they that sat with them :
text2: Ñerä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i irä , ka ̱ wäkiri irä , Berenice irä , ijewa ra ñajäklelewa ̱ wa irä , ñajaklaka ̱ .

text: And when they were gone aside , they talked between themselves , saying , This man doeth nothing worthy of death or of bonds .
text2: Jekäi ijewa mineksa ̱ julu ra ijewa te ipaka ñara te isha : — Ka ije wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne nui ta käi , iktäkläwa ̱ iräle , iwätiäkläwa ̱ iräle .

text: Then said Agrippa unto Festus , This man might have been set at liberty , if he had not appealed unto Caesar .
text2: Ñakäi Agripa te isha Festo ia ̱ : — Ije rä wäyenaksa ̱ ni kjermita , ke iku ̱ ka ̱ kiöpa ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ César wa ̱ ra .

text: And when it was determined that we should sail into Italy , they delivered Paul and certain other prisoners unto one named Julius , a centurion of Augustus ' band .
text2: Mika ̱ ijewa te ibiketsaksa ̱ e ̱ ná sá patkäkmi ko ̱ no ki ̱ Italiaka ra , ijewa te Pablo irä , kololecha ̱ wa ̱ wa saka irä , tulaksa ̱ guardia wa cien wäsikäk ekla kie Julio ia ̱ . Je rä guardia wa eyaka wa kie Augusto ni wa sha ̱ .

text: And entering into a ship of Adramyttium , we launched , meaning to sail by the coasts of Asia ; one Aristarchus , a Macedonian of Thessalonica , being with us .
text2: Jera sá ñajiaka ̱ ko ̱ no dar Adramitio ska na , je maju ̱ rä däkmi Asia ska , däyë kjä ko ̱ no däkläwa ̱ etkä etkä ska . Je ki ̱ sá ju ̱ nami . Jera Aristarco Macedonia wa dar Tesalónica ska mineju ̱ ña sá ra .

text: And the next day we touched at Sidon . And Julius courteously entreated Paul , and gave him liberty to go unto his friends to refresh himself .
text2: Je bulirishtäí sá demi Sidón ska . Jekäi Julio je ̱ r bäi sha Pablo ia ̱ te ka ̱ ma ̱ iia ̱ iminaklä isalibä waka jewa wa ̱ Pablo pasu ̱ aklä .

text: And when we had launched from thence , we sailed under Cyprus , because the winds were contrary .
text2: Jeska sá ju ̱ namini , kjajulu Chipre ekta kja ̱ ne si ̱ wa ̱ te sä tie ju ̱ eke ̱ ktä cha ̱ k .

text: And when we had sailed over the sea of Cilicia and Pamphylia , we came to Myra , a city of Lycia .
text2: Jera sá kjajulu Cilicia irä , Panfilia irä wäsaka , däyë wakei ebä ki ̱ demijulu Mira ska , je rä Licia jukläyäkäí .

text: And there the centurion found a ship of Alexandria sailing into Italy ; and he put us therein .
text2: Jeska guardia wa cien wäsikäk te ko ̱ no saka dar Alejandría ska ku ̱ a , je maju ̱ rä Italia ska , je naka ite sá jiaka ̱ .

text: And when we had sailed slowly many days , and scarce were come over against Cnidus , the wind not suffering us , we sailed under Crete , over against Salmone ;
text2: Sá ju ̱ na je ̱ naa , ka ̱ kja ta ̱ i , därërë sá shka kjepa sá demi Gnido wäsaka , je rä si ̱ wa ̱ te sá wätkewe ̱ kate ki ̱ ka , je kju ̱ ei sá ju ̱ nami Creta ekta kja ̱ ne icha ̱ k Salmón wäsaka .

text: And , hardly passing it , came unto a place which is called The fair havens ; nigh whereunto was the city of Lasea .
text2: Jekäi sá dami ji ̱ a ka ̱ säkätä ebä ja ̱ mi , ka sä kjä yee . Jekjepa sá demijulu ka ̱ kie Ko ̱ no Däkläwa ̱ Bäi ska . Jeska ra alemana jukläyäkä Lasea rä .

text: Now when much time was spent , and when sailing was now dangerous , because the fast was now already past , Paul admonished them ,
text2: Ka ̱ kjaju ̱ kja ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ko ̱ no ki ̱ shke rä däläna si ̱ ki ̱ ka , ñakäi bätsäklä ke ̱ i kjaju ̱ kja ki ̱ ka , Pablo te ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a

text: And said unto them , Sirs , I perceive that this voyage will be with hurt and much damage , not only of the lading and ship , but also of our lives .
text2: te isha : — Bas dikäla , yie isu ̱ a ra , sa ̱ ju ̱ na ji ̱ a ra sä weikarmi e ̱ e ̱ na , jile weikarmi ta ̱ i , ka däli irä , ko ̱ no irä ebä kuna , ata sa wakwa duächa ̱ miwa ̱ ñaebä .

text: Nevertheless the centurion believed the master and the owner of the ship , more than those things which were spoken by Paul .
text2: Ata guardia wa cien wäsikäk wa ̱ ka Pablo ktä ssëne , ata ite ko ̱ no ju ̱ ak irä ko ̱ no wakei irä jewa ebä ktä ssa .

text: And because the haven was not commodious to winter in , the more part advised to depart thence also , if by any means they might attain to Phenice , and there to winter ; which is an haven of Crete , and lieth toward the south west and north west .
text2: Ñakäi jeska ko ̱ no däklä rä ka bäi si ̱ kuna , ka ̱ yakei ki ̱ ssäklä . Je ki ̱ ka wäbäli te ibiketsa ju ̱ nakmi ji ̱ a imablä su ̱ ak , tsule sä dämijulu Fenice ska , ka ̱ yakei ki ̱ ssäk . Je rä ko ̱ no däklä etkä , je Creta ska . Je rä kjä kololewa ̱ norte wà ra ka ̱ wä minakläwa ̱ wami yena , sur wà ra ka ̱ wä minakläwa ̱ wami yena .

text: And when the south wind blew softly , supposing that they had obtained their purpose , loosing thence , they sailed close by Crete .
text2: Jekäi si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ nami sur wami ra , jera ijewa te ibiketsa je rä bäi sá minaklämi . Jera ijewa te tabeli yaka ko ̱ no wäkukäklä je sikaka ̱ , te ko ̱ no ju ̱ ami Creta säkätä ja ̱ mi alemana .

text: But not long after there arose against it a tempestuous wind , called Euroclydon .
text2: Ata berbena ra si ̱ wa ̱ täkiwa ̱ si ̱ kinak noreste ni ju ̱ naté te ko ̱ no tia ju ̱ ami .

text: And when the ship was caught , and could not bear up into the wind , we let her drive .
text2: Jera si ̱ wa ̱ te ko ̱ na tia ju ̱ ami kju ̱ awami , ka sá ia ̱ iwämaner ji ̱ a si ̱ wa ̱ wami . Je ki ̱ ka sá ñajawa ̱ si ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ minaktse ̱ mi mai sá mi iwa ̱ käi .

text: And running under a certain island which is called Clauda , we had much work to come by the boat :
text2: Sá ju ̱ r dami däyë wäbala tsi ̱ ne kie Clauda ekta ja ̱ mi ra , je dälei ja ̱ mi sá te ko ̱ no tsi ̱ ne shkä iwa ̱ iitä wa sikaka ̱ , je sikla rä därërë .

text: Which when they had taken up , they used helps , undergirding the ship ; and , fearing lest they should fall into the quicksands , strake sail , and so were driven .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te je ma ̱ ka ̱ ietäbä ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ko ̱ no ta ̱ i pamu ̱ awa ̱ ijewa te . Jera ijewa te si ̱ wa ̱ kukäk ya ja ̱ wa ̱ té , isu ̱ anacha ̱ wa ̱ iö ko ̱ no wäterwa ̱ Sirte kse ̱ i naka yika . Jekäi ite ko ̱ no jawa ̱ si ̱ wa ̱ ebä wa ̱ patkenak .

text: And we being exceedingly tossed with a tempest , the next day they lightened the ship ;
text2: Bulirishtä ra si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ rte ji ̱ a täkii te sá wäkpe kate . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te däli tulami ijaboktenaklä .

text: And the third day we cast out with our own hands the tackling of the ship .
text2: Tres día ra jile shkä ko ̱ no ia ̱ kianak käi je tulami ite iwakwa jula wà .

text: And when neither sun nor stars in many days appeared , and no small tempest lay on us , all hope that we should be saved was then taken away .
text2: Ka ̱ kja ta ̱ i je bala na ka ̱ wä a ̱ ni bekwä a ̱ ni ka juer kuna , ata si ̱ wa ̱ ebä ju ̱ rte ka elkje kuna . Jekäi sá te ibiketsa ka sá däkksa ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: But after long abstinence Paul stood forth in the midst of them , and said , Sirs , ye should have hearkened unto me , and not have loosed from Crete , and to have gained this harm and loss .
text2: Sá se ̱ na ta ̱ i ka yakle kuna . Je ki ̱ ka Pablo je ̱ k duaka ̱ ijewa sha ̱ na te isha : — Bas dikäla , bas ku ̱ yis ktä ssöpa ra , ka sä bitenejulu Creta ska , jera ka sä weikar kate kuna , ñakäi ka däli weikanewa ̱ .

text: And now I exhort you to be of good cheer : for there shall be no loss of any man ' s life among you , but of the ship .
text2: Ata jir yie isheni bas ia ̱ , bas ssëno täkii . Bas sha ̱ mane a ̱ ni ka duäkwa ̱ , ata ko ̱ no ebä ne weikarmiwa ̱ rä .

text: For there stood by me this night the angel of God , whose I am , and whom I serve ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä ale yis kukäkwa ̱ , ale yis wa ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak je ángel í dewa ̱ yis wäki ̱ jir tuina ,

text: Saying , Fear not , Paul ; thou must be brought before Caesar : and , lo , God hath given thee all them that sail with thee .
text2: je te isha yis ia ̱ : “ Pablo , ke ba su ̱ ana . Bä dämi ji ̱ a César wäki ̱ je wa ̱ ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ . Issö , Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shämi te ba ra shkäk ko ̱ no ki ̱ wa biköle tsa ̱ tkemiksa ̱ . ”

text: Wherefore , sirs , be of good cheer : for I believe God , that it shall be even as it was told me .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas dikäla , ke bas je ̱ r iana , yis te Säkeklä biketse , ije oloi ja ̱ mi io ̱ rmi jishtä yis ia ̱ iyina käi .

text: Howbeit we must be cast upon a certain island .
text2: Ata ko ̱ no rä banakwa ̱ maile däyë wäbala kjä ja ̱ mi alemana .

text: But when the fourteenth night was come , as we were driven up and down in Adria , about midnight the shipmen deemed that they drew near to some country ;
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ tuina deka ̱ catorce ra , sá dami ji ̱ a patkele si ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ däyë kie Adriático na . Jera ka ̱ sha ̱ sha ̱ ra ko ̱ no ju ̱ akwa ia ̱ issëna , sa damijulu kja alemana ishäkä ki ̱ ka käi .

text: And sounded , and found it twenty fathoms : and when they had gone a little further , they sounded again , and found it fifteen fathoms .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te däyë ja ̱ r mabläklä ksaí ja ̱ wa ̱ mi , jera ite isu ̱ a ra ija ̱ r dä sä jula ji ̱ atkä ja ̱ mi däka ̱ veinte . Ite ipatka ji ̱ a a ̱ miwäta ra , ite ksá ja ̱ wa ̱ mini , jera ite isu ̱ a ra , ija ̱ r dä sä jula ji ̱ atkä ja ̱ mi däka ̱ quince .

text: Then fearing lest we should have fallen upon rocks , they cast four anchors out of the stern , and wished for the day .
text2: Jera isu ̱ anacha ̱ wa ̱ iö ko ̱ no terwa ̱ jak ja ̱ mi , ki ̱ ka ite iwäkukäklä jolowa ̱ mi cuatro ko ̱ no ñak kja ̱ ne . Jera ijewa ia ̱ issëna ka ̱ me ñirwa ̱ pa käi .

text: And as the shipmen were about to flee out of the ship , when they had let down the boat into the sea , under colour as though they would have cast anchors out of the foreship ,
text2: Jera ko ̱ no ju ̱ ak wa ssëna minakjulu te ko ̱ no jaklecha ̱ ta ̱ na . Je ki ̱ ka ijewa te ko ̱ no tsi ̱ ne ja ̱ wa ̱ mi däyë ki ̱ ka , ijuenaklä ijewa te rä ko ̱ no ta ̱ i wäkukäklä ne jolowe ̱ kate ko ̱ no wä kja ̱ ne käi .

text: Paul said to the centurion and to the soldiers , Except these abide in the ship , ye cannot be saved .
text2: Ata Pablo te isha guardia wa cien wäsikäk ia ̱ , ñakäi iguardiaí wa ia ̱ : — Ijewa minejulumi ra , ka bas tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ .

text: Then the soldiers cut off the ropes of the boat , and let her fall off .
text2: Jera guardia wa te ko ̱ no tsi ̱ ne ksei tia tulaksa ̱ , jawa ̱ ijewa te weikanakwa ̱ .

text: And while the day was coming on , Paul besought them all to take meat , saying , This day is the fourteenth day that ye have tarried and continued fasting , having taken nothing .
text2: Jera ka ̱ ñir dawa ̱ kja ra , Pablo te ijewa biköle paka yäkäk , te isha ijewa ia ̱ : — Jir da catorce día bala na bas se ̱ na rä wäñile ebä , bäli ebä , ka ji a ̱ ni ñale kuna .

text: Wherefore I pray you to take some meat : for this is for your health : for there shall not an hair fall from the head of any of you .
text2: Jekäi yis te ishe bas ia ̱ , bas yäköpa , bas täkinaklä je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkäk . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä etaba a ̱ ni ka weikanakwa ̱ kuna .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he took bread , and gave thanks to God in presence of them all : and when he had broken it , he began to eat .
text2: Ite jekäi isha ra , ite pan kukawa ̱ , je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ biköle wäna . Jekäi ite je butsaksa ̱ ña ite .

text: Then were they all of good cheer , and they also took some meat .
text2: Jekäi biköle ssënani bäi , jera ijewa ji ña ñaebä .

text: And we were in all in the ship two hundred threescore and sixteen souls .
text2: Sá shkä ko ̱ no na däka ̱ rä dosciento setenta y seis .

text: And when they had eaten enough , they lightened the ship , and cast out the wheat into the sea .
text2: Jewa ssëwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ iyaka te ra , ijewa te trigo tulami däyë na ko ̱ no jaboktenaklä .

text: And when it was day , they knew not the land : but they discovered a certain creek with a shore , into the which they were minded , if it were possible , to thrust in the ship .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ ra ka ijewa wäna ijuene mai ke ̱ i ta itso ̱ rä . Ata däyë kjä kololewa ̱ ka ̱ bala na bäi kse ̱ i ta atjä su ̱ a ijewa te , je biketsa ijewa te tsile sä dämi jeska , je ki ̱ ka ijewa te ko ̱ no ju ̱ ami däkmi jeska .

text: And when they had taken up the anchors , they committed themselves unto the sea , and loosed the rudder bands , and hoised up the mainsail to the wind , and made toward shore .
text2: Jera ite ko ̱ no wäkukäklä kicha tia tulami jolonakmi däyë na . Ñakäi ijewa te ko ̱ no wämanewa ̱ klä mo ̱ lecha ̱ wa ̱ wäjälewa ̱ tulami . Jera ijewa te si ̱ wa ̱ kukäk ji ̱ atkaka ̱ ni si ̱ wa ̱ wà ipatkäklä däkmi däyë kse ̱ ika .

text: And falling into a place where two seas met , they ran the ship aground ; and the forepart stuck fast , and remained unmoveable , but the hinder part was broken with the violence of the waves .
text2: Ata idemi däyë tjuäke ̱ a ̱ mi wà jí wà bala na ra , ijewa te ibawa ̱ wa ̱ ksa ̱ na . Jekäi iyik tkenawa ̱ doloiebä ka wädälir ta , jera däyë tjuäte täkii te iñak butse kate .

text: And the soldiers ' counsel was to kill the prisoners , lest any of them should swim out , and escape .
text2: Jera guardia wa te ibiketsaksa ̱ kololecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ , yi a ̱ ni ka minaklä okle tkuäk tulämi .

text: But the centurion , willing to save Paul , kept them from their purpose ; and commanded that they which could swim should cast themselves first into the sea , and get to land :
text2: Ata guardia wa cien wäsikäk te ijewa te jekäi iwe ̱ ke ̱ je wätkewa ̱ wa ̱ , ije te Pablo wetsakleksa ̱ ki ̱ ka . Je ki ̱ ka ite manele wädular ukäk wa paka ñapsäk tulämi säkätäba däyë ki ̱ kjäksa ̱ julu ka ̱ pjota ki ̱ .

text: And the rest , some on boards , and some on broken pieces of the ship . And so it came to pass , that they escaped all safe to land .
text2: Ata ite isaka paka minakmi moska tabla taklä ki ̱ ka , moska jile saka tso ̱ ko ̱ no na ki ̱ ka . Jekäi biköle deksa ̱ julu bäi ebä ka ̱ pjota ki ̱ .

text: And when they were escaped , then they knew that the island was called Melita .
text2: Ñerä sá deksa ̱ julu bäi ebä , jera sá je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra , je däyë wäbala kie rä Malta ni .

text: And the barbarous people shewed us no little kindness : for they kindled a fire , and received us every one , because of the present rain , and because of the cold .
text2: Je wakwa je ̱ r bäi sha sá ia ̱ baa , jewa te sá biköle kiawa ̱ bäi ebä , jewa te yökö wäkawa ̱ ka ̱ sá bánaklä , ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ rte ta ̱ i , ka ̱ tse ̱ lí ̱ ta ̱ i kju ̱ ei .

text: And when Paul had gathered a bundle of sticks , and laid them on the fire , there came a viper out of the heat , and fastened on his hand .
text2: Jera Pablo te yökö batala ssi ̱ l shta tukii . Ñerä je tulaka ̱ ite yökö na ra , tkäbe si ̱ tu ̱ wa ̱ ksa ̱ yökö bali te , je te ikuawa ̱ ijula ka .

text: And when the barbarians saw the venomous beast hang on his hand , they said among themselves , No doubt this man is a murderer , whom , though he hath escaped the sea , yet vengeance suffereth not to live .
text2: Mika ̱ jeska se ̱ nak wa te tkäbe kalmo ijula ja ̱ mi su ̱ a ra , jewa te isha ñaia ̱ : — Je ditsä rä sä ktäk si ̱ wa ̱ . Ije tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ däyë naka , jeiräta sä kpäk sa ̱ nui ki ̱ ka te ka ka ̱ me ̱ iia ̱ ise ̱ naklä ji ̱ a .

text: And he shook off the beast into the fire , and felt no harm .
text2: Ata ijula wäkpa ra tkäbe ja ̱ naksa ̱ yökö naka , je ia ̱ ka imedene .

text: Howbeit they looked when he should have swollen , or fallen down dead suddenly : but after they had looked a great while , and saw no harm come to him , they changed their minds , and said that he was a god .
text2: Ijewa te isu ̱ ete ijiër ta í ̱ , plaa iduäwa ̱ ta í ̱ . Je ki ̱ ijewa te iki ̱ ssa ta ̱ i , ata ijewa te isu ̱ a ra ka imedä ta . Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa te ibiketsa Pablo rä säkeklä wa ekla .

text: In the same quarters were possessions of the chief man of the island , whose name was Publius ; who received us , and lodged us three days courteously .
text2: Jeska alemana ka ̱ balakli ta ̱ i wakei kie rä Publio ni . Je rä je däyë wäbala ska oloi bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ , je te sá kia jámi , sá käpewa ̱ je ̱ r baa wà , tres día bala na .

text: And it came to pass , that the father of Publius lay sick of a fever and of a bloody flux : to whom Paul entered in , and prayed , and laid his hands on him , and healed him .
text2: Jera Publio ká kalme ja ̱ ka ̱ ki ̱ ka , kterawa ̱ kolone irä , kju ̱ ne pi ra irä te . Pablo kjawa ̱ ju ̱ ikalme ska , jera ika ̱ kia kjepa ijula ma ̱ ka ̱ iki ̱ ka , te ibäiwa ̱ ni .

text: So when this was done , others also , which had diseases in the island , came , and were healed :
text2: Je o ̱ na ukä ska duë ta wa saka tso ̱ je däyë wäbala ska , jewa date iwäki ̱ . Jekäi ijewa bäinani .

text: Who also honoured us with many honours ; and when we departed , they laded us with such things as were necessary .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te sá kjeisha jile wà ta ̱ i . Sá ñajiaka ̱ kja ko ̱ no ki ̱ ra , ji shenak sá ki ̱ käi , je ma ̱ ite sá ia ̱ .

text: And after three months we departed in a ship of Alexandria , which had wintered in the isle , whose sign was Castor and Pollux .
text2: Tres mes kjaju ̱ ra , sá ju ̱ nami ko ̱ no datse ̱ Alejandría dele je däyë wäbala ska , ka ̱ yakei ki ̱ ssäk je ki ̱ ka . Je ko ̱ no ja ̱ mi Cástor irä Pólux irä me ̱ i yöle tso ̱ .

text: And landing at Syracuse , we tarried there three days .
text2: Jekäi sá demijulu Siracusa ska ra , jeska sá se ̱ na tres día .

text: And from thence we fetched a compass , and came to Rhegium : and after one day the south wind blew , and we came the next day to Puteoli :
text2: Jeska sá ju ̱ nami däyë kjä ebä ja ̱ mi , demijulu Regio ska . Je bulirishtä ra si ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ naté sur wà . Jekäi böikishtä ra sá demijulu Puteoli ska .

text: Where we found brethren , and were desired to tarry with them seven days : and so we went toward Rome .
text2: Jeska sá te sa el wa ku ̱ a , jewa te sá kuka se ̱ nak ji ̱ a ijewa kjäka siete día . Jekjepa sá demijulu Roma ska .

text: And from thence , when the brethren heard of us , they came to meet us as far as Appiiforum , and The three taverns : whom when Paul saw , he thanked God , and took courage .
text2: Ñerä sä el wa se ̱ nak Roma ska wa te sá damijulu palei ju ̱ ña ra , ijewa date sá ña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k Foro de Apio ska , ñakäi Cantina Mañatkä ska . Pablo te ijewa su ̱ a ra , ite Säkeklä kjeisha je ki ̱ . Jekäi je te Pablo täkiwa ̱ ni .

text: And when we came to Rome , the centurion delivered the prisoners to the captain of the guard : but Paul was suffered to dwell by himself with a soldier that kept him .
text2: Sá demi Roma ska ra , guardia wa cien wäsikäk te kololecha ̱ wa ̱ wa tulaksa ̱ guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ , ata Pablo ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ na ise ̱ naklä kju ̱ awaka , guarda ekla ra , je wa ̱ ikjänanaklä .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days Paul called the chief of the Jews together : and when they were come together , he said unto them , Men and brethren , though I have committed nothing against the people , or customs of our fathers , yet was I delivered prisoner from Jerusalem into the hands of the Romans .
text2: Je ukä ska tres día ra Pablo te Judío wa wäkiri wa kia jaté . Jekäi ijewa tapanawa ̱ etka yebä ra , ite isha ijewa ia ̱ : — El wa , yie ishe bas ia ̱ , ka yis wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne saje saka wa ukä ja ̱ mi , sa kalí wa wädular ukä ja ̱ mi . Jekäi Jerusalén skaté yis ju ̱ naksa ̱ Roma wa jula na .

text: Who , when they had examined me , would have let me go , because there was no cause of death in me .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te yis wächakewa ̱ ra , ijewa ssëna yis wäyäksa ̱ ni yis wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni nui ka kuna yis ktäkläwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: But when the Jews spake against it , I was constrained to appeal unto Caesar ; not that I had ought to accuse my nation of .
text2: Ata Judío wa te ijewa wätkewa ̱ wa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka yis ka ̱ kia yis patkenakläté César wäki ̱ . Ata ka je rä yis wa ̱ yis ditsei wä wa kjatiäklä ji ki ̱ käi kuna .

text: For this cause therefore have I called for you , to see you , and to speak with you : because that for the hope of Israel I am bound with this chain .
text2: Jekäi je bata ki ̱ ka , yie bas kiaté yis wa ̱ bas su ̱ aklä , yis ktäklä bas da . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Israel wa wa ̱ ki ̱ ssënak kju ̱ ei yis kaldu mo ̱ lewa ̱ jí cadena wà rä .

text: And they said unto him , We neither received letters out of Judaea concerning thee , neither any of the brethren that came shewed or spake any harm of thee .
text2: Jera ijewa te isha iia ̱ : — Ñera Judea ska wa wa ̱ ka ba ktei patkä ta sá ia ̱ äyë ki ̱ . Ñakäi sä el wa mane a ̱ ni ka juena jika ibata shäk iräle , ba shäk yakei iräle .

text: But we desire to hear of thee what thou thinkest : for as concerning this sect , we know that every where it is spoken against .
text2: Ata sá ssëna jini ba te ibiketse rä je ssäk . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ka ̱ biköle ska wa te je ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe sheke ̱ yakei .

text: And when they had appointed him a day , there came many to him into his lodging ; to whom he expounded and testified the kingdom of God , persuading them concerning Jesus , both out of the law of Moses , and out of the prophets , from morning till evening .
text2: Ñerä ijewa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a ñatapawa ̱ k . Je díaí wa ra , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ si ̱ de iwäki ̱ , mai ije katke ska . Jewa ia ̱ ite Säkeklä gobiernoí ktei waje ̱ rku ̱ a , ktei paka , sa ̱ ñirebä ma rä ka ̱ miskla kje . Jekäi ite Jesús paka , ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na Moisés wa ̱ ja ̱ mi , ñakäi jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyile ja ̱ mi , iwa ̱ ijewa ssëwa ̱ klä ikukäkwa ̱ .

text: And some believed the things which were spoken , and some believed not .
text2: Jekäi manele te ji sheke ̱ ite kuka , ata isaka wa ̱ ka ikolone .

text: And when they agreed not among themselves , they departed , after that Paul had spoken one word , Well spake the Holy Ghost by Esaias the prophet unto our fathers ,
text2: Jekäi ka ijewa ia ̱ ji biketsarksa ̱ etkabä , ñerä iñajaka ̱ kja minakjulu ra , Pablo jí kte shata ̱ na ijewa ia ̱ : — Wikblu Sikina te isha rä bulee , jile bata shäk Isaías ja ̱ mi , yinak bas ká wa ia ̱ , je te ishe rä :

text: Saying , Go unto this people , and say , Hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and not perceive :
text2: “ Ma cho ̱ je ditsä wa ska , jekäi ishö : ‘ Bas te issëmi ssële , ata a ̱ ni ka bas je ̱ r na idäk , bas te isu ̱ emi su ̱ le , ata a ̱ ni ka bas wäna ijuenak .

text: For the heart of this people is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes have they closed ; lest they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Iwa rä jí ditsä wa je ̱ r doloi tenacha ̱ wa ̱ , ijewa kukä wassëla rä därërë , ijewa wätiacha ̱ wa ̱ , ka iwa ̱ isu ̱ aklä kuna wäbala wa , ka iwa ̱ issäklä kuna kukä wa , ka ije ̱ r na idäkläwa ̱ kuna , ka iñamanewa ̱ kläksa ̱ kuna , ka yis wa ̱ ijewa bäinewa ̱ klä ye . ’ ”

text: Be it known therefore unto you , that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles , and that they will hear it .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas ku ̱ iju ̱ ñopa , jí sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkeke ̱ ksa ̱ Säkeklä te je ktei patkena ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ . Jekäi ijewa te je ssëmi .

text: And when he had said these words , the Jews departed , and had great reasoning among themselves .
text2: Ije te jekäi isha ra , Judío wa minejulumi , ijewa kju ̱ atka tulaka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na ñara ki ̱ ka .

text: And Paul dwelt two whole years in his own hired house , and received all that came in unto him ,
text2: Pablo se ̱ na deka ̱ dos año ju peitale iwa ̱ tsa ̱ to ̱ nak naka . Jeska biköle däke ̱ iwäki ̱ ka wa kieke ̱ wa ̱ ite bäi ebä .

text: Preaching the kingdom of God , and teaching those things which concern the Lord Jesus Christ , with all confidence , no man forbidding him .
text2: Ite sa pakteke ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ktei wà . Ñakäi ite sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ Säkekewa Jesucristo ktei wà , ka suale ta , ka wätkele ta yi wa ̱ .

text: Paul , a servant of Jesus Christ , called to be an apostle , separated unto the gospel of God ,
text2: Pablo , Jesucristo kjanaklä , kile däkwa ̱ iktei bata shäk ye , tse ̱ leksa ̱ Säkeklä ktei baa wapaktäk ye ,

text: ( Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures , )
text2: ije kablele ka ̱ mikle jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iyile ja ̱ mi , kte dälätsalewa ̱ yöle ska .

text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord , which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh ;
text2: Je rä iyaba ne ktei . Ditsä ja ̱ mi ra , je rä David yäbei .

text: And declared to be the Son of God with power , according to the spirit of holiness , by the resurrection from the dead :
text2: Ñakäi ji sikina Wikbluí oloi ja ̱ mi ije kjayina ji täkii wà ije rä Säkeklä yaba ni , je rä ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je wà . Je rä saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo .

text: By whom we have received grace and apostleship , for obedience to the faith among all nations , for his name :
text2: Ije oloi ja ̱ mi sá ia ̱ täkili me ̱ na , sá kolona iktei bata shäk ye , sá wa ̱ ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa biköle je ̱ r ku ̱ aklä , ijewa ñajächa ̱ kläwa ̱ ji biketsäk etkabä ije kie kju ̱ ei .

text: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ :
text2: Bas dä ñaebä ijewa sha ̱ , kile däkwa ̱ Jesucristo cha ye .

text: To all that be in Rome , beloved of God , called to be saints : Grace to you and peace from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Jí äyë rä bas tso ̱ Roma ska shka ̱ ta Säkeklä wa ̱ , kile iwakei wa ̱ däkwa ̱ sikii wa ye jewa ia ̱ . Säkeklä Sa Ká irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: First , I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all , that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world .
text2: Säkätä yie wekte she yis Kekläí ia ̱ bas biköle ki ̱ ka Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi . Je rä bas te ji biketsa etkabä palei yirke ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska ki ̱ ka .

text: For God is my witness , whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son , that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers ;
text2: Säkeklä , ale yis wa ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak yis wikblu wà iyaba ktei baa shäk , je dul yis su ̱ ak ye , yis dä bas ktei shäk ka ̱ kie naka ka jalewa ̱ ta .

text: Making request , if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you .
text2: Del yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ , maikäi si ̱ ra yis däklämi ba ska Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena ra .

text: For I long to see you , that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift , to the end ye may be established ;
text2: Iwa rä yis ssëna bas su ̱ ak pjoo , yis wa ̱ bas tsa ̱ tkäklä Säkeklä wikblu wa ̱ itso ̱ me ̱ nak shtä manele wà bas täkinaklä .

text: That is , that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me .
text2: Je rä sa ̱ ñatäkiwa ̱ klä a ̱ miji ̱ a a ̱ miji ̱ a , sa te ji biketse etkabä wà , bas te ji biketse etkabä wà irä , yis te ji biketse etkabä wà irä .

text: Now I would not have you ignorant , brethren , that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you , ( but was let hitherto , ) that I might have some fruit among you also , even as among other Gentiles .
text2: Ata el wa , yis kiana jewa bas je ̱ r ku ̱ ak bitäbä kicha yis wa ̱ ibiketsale minak bas ska , yis wa ̱ däli wä käi kukäklä bas sha ̱ na , jishtä yis wa ̱ io ̱ le ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa sha ̱ na käi , ata mik yis wätkenaté däka ̱ jira kje .

text: I am debtor both to the Greeks , and to the Barbarians ; both to the wise , and to the unwise .
text2: Yis ja ̱ na Griego wa irä , ka Griego kuna wa irä , ñayöle wa irä , ka ñayöle kuna wa irä jewa tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: So , as much as in me is , I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis shkakleju ̱ pjoo kte baa bata shäk bas tso ̱ Roma ska wa ia ̱ ñaebä .

text: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ : for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth ; to the Jew first , and also to the Greek .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka yis äinak kte baa ki ̱ ka . Je rä Säkeklä täkili je oloi ja ̱ mi je biketsäk wa biköle tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ ki ̱ ka , säkätä Judío wa irä , ñaebä Griego wa irä .

text: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith : as it is written , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Je kte ne wà Säkeklä te sä wabiketseksa ̱ wämo ye juenawa ̱ rä , sa te ji biketse etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi , sa ̱ wa ̱ ji biketsäklä etkabä , jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Yi rä wämo se ̱ rmi rä ji biketse etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men , who hold the truth in unrighteousness ;
text2: Säkeklä kju ̱ atkawa ̱ ji ka bäi kuna , ji ka wämo kuna je wakbläk wa biköle ra , je kjayinaté ka ̱ jöir ska , jewa te ji ka wämo wà ji rä iyina si ̱ wätkewe ̱ ke ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them ; for God hath shewed it unto them .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji rä Säkeklä rä , je rä ju ̱ ñenakwa ̱ . Je kjayinawa ̱ ijewa wäna , Säkeklä te ikjasha ijewa ia ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen , being understood by the things that are made , even his eternal power and Godhead ; so that they are without excuse :
text2: Iji ka juenak kuna , itäkili jekjeye käi , ije rä säkeklä iá käi , je juenaté bäi ka ̱ jiska yöleksa ̱ ke ̱ i skaté . Ji yöleksa ̱ te je wà sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a . Je ki ̱ ka ka ijewa ñawetsäklei ji ̱ a .

text: Because that , when they knew God , they glorified him not as God , neither were thankful ; but became vain in their imaginations , and their foolish heart was darkened .
text2: Iwa rä ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ a yi rä Säkeklä rä te , ata ka ijewa wa ̱ ije oloi tsane Säkeklä käi , ñaebä ka ijewa wa ̱ wekte yine iia ̱ , ata iianacha ̱ wa ̱ je ̱ rikäk kje ka wata ebä , wätuilewa ̱ ka ka ̱ ta ji ̱ a ije ̱ r ska .

text: Professing themselves to be wise , they became fools ,
text2: Ijewa ñashä irä ka ̱ biketsäk ni , ata iianacha ̱ wa ̱ ka je ̱ r ta .

text: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man , and to birds , and fourfooted beasts , and creeping things .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä ka meräk kuna je oloi baa manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ijewa te jile me ̱ i ebä wà , ditsä duäkwa ̱ käi , du iá käi , bewak iá käi , je ̱ k sikäk iá käi ebä wà .

text: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts , to dishonour their own bodies between themselves :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Säkeklä te ijewa tulaksa ̱ ji shi ̱ ana ebä ia ̱ , ji tkerke ̱ ijewa ja ̱ mi ije ̱ r ska kju ̱ ei , iwakwa ñayaka kukäkläwa ̱ äina ka dälä ta ji ̱ a .

text: Who changed the truth of God into a lie , and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator , who is blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Ijewa te ji rä Säkeklä ia ̱ ra iyina si ̱ je manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ka ̱ yue wà . Jekäi ite ji yöleksa ̱ dälätsami , kja ̱ nei wa ̱ mi iyuäkksa ̱ säkei ye . Jeiräta ije ne rä kjeiyinak bäi jekjeyemi rä . Amén .

text: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections : for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature :
text2: Je kju ̱ ei Säkeklä te ijewa tulaksa ̱ ji äina tkerke ̱ pjoo iwakwa ja ̱ mi je ebä wakbläk . Jekäi alaklä wa del dä se ̱ nak jäiyi wa ra , je manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ijewa alaklä wa te ji wa ̱ k sä del ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: And likewise also the men , leaving the natural use of the woman , burned in their lust one toward another ; men with men working that which is unseemly , and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet .
text2: Je su ̱ ta ñaebä jäiyi wa te idel dä se ̱ nak alaklä wa ra je jawa ̱ , ata ijewa ja ̱ mi jäiyi wa ebä ne tkena pjoo rä . Jekäi ijewa ñajaka ̱ ji wakbläk äina ñara jäiyi wa jäiyi wa ebä . Jekäi bata ki ̱ ka ijewa ia ̱ weikane deksa ̱ iwakwa je ̱ k ki ̱ ka to ̱ ne käi , ijewa wäyönacha ̱ wa ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge , God gave them over to a reprobate mind , to do those things which are not convenient ;
text2: Jekäi ka ijewa ia ̱ issër ta sa ̱ me Säkeklä biketsä käi , je bata ki ̱ ka iwakei te ijewa tulaksa ̱ je ̱ rikäk weikalewa ̱ , ijewa wa ̱ ji rä ka o ̱ nak kuna shtä wakbläklä .

text: Being filled with all unrighteousness , fornication , wickedness , covetousness , maliciousness ; full of envy , murder , debate , deceit , malignity ; whisperers ,
text2: Jekäi iianacha ̱ wa ̱ ji biköle wakbläk , ji ka wämo kuna käi , ji shi ̱ ana käi , ji ki ̱ tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi käi , ji we ̱ wäsi ̱ wa käi , je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka iane ijile ki ̱ käi ; ñakäi ñaktewa ̱ wa ̱ , kju ̱ atke wa ̱ , ñawäyue wa ̱ , ñaweike wa ̱ , ñaki ̱ yue wa ̱ , je ebä wa ̱ ijewa rä kololecha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Backbiters , haters of God , despiteful , proud , boasters , inventors of evil things , disobedient to parents ,
text2: Ijewa rä sä shäk sälwi wà , Säkeklä dokoitsäk , kulitkäk , je ̱ k biketsäk bäi si ̱ , je ̱ k ssäk , ji yakei biketsäkksa ̱ o ̱ nak , ka iká ia ̱ mi ktä ssäk kuna ,

text: Without understanding , covenantbreakers , without natural affection , implacable , unmerciful :
text2: ka je ̱ r ta , ka ji wa ̱ k sa kabläke ̱ käi kuna , ka ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk kuna , ka je ̱ r shka ̱ nak kuna .

text: Who knowing the judgment of God , that they which commit such things are worthy of death , not only do the same , but have pleasure in them that do them .
text2: Ijewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji wakbläk jekäi wa biketsale Säkeklä wa ̱ rä ikiana duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ . Jeiräta ka jekäi ebä ijewa te iwe ̱ kuna . Ata ñaebä kju ̱ awa wa te iwe ̱ ke ̱ jekäi ra , je te ijewa ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ baa .

text: Therefore thou art inexcusable , O man , whosoever thou art that judgest : for wherein thou judgest another , thou condemnest thyself ; for thou that judgest doest the same things .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ba , sa wabiketsäkksa ̱ yi ba räle käi , ka maikäi ba je ̱ k wetsäklei . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba te sa saka wabiketseksa ̱ ra , je ebä wà ba te nui ja ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ ka , ba iwabiketsäkksa ̱ rä ji wakbläk ñaebä ki ̱ ka .

text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Säkeklä rä je shtä wa ̱ k wa ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ rä ji rä iyina si ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: And thinkest thou this , O man , that judgest them which do such things , and doest the same , that thou shalt escape the judgment of God ?
text2: Jekäi ba je shtä wa ̱ k wa wabiketsäkksa ̱ je te iwe ̱ ñaebä ra , ¿ ba te ibiketse ba ia ̱ sa wabiketseksa ̱ Säkeklä te je te ̱ rmi na ?

text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering ; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance ?
text2: ¿ Ata ije ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ irä , sa katableke ̱ ite e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ irä , ije ̱ r dä bäi si ̱ irä , je dokoitsawa ̱ ba te na ? ¿ Ka ba je ̱ r ko ̱ ne Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shä rami ma ia ̱ rä ba je ̱ k manewa ̱ kläksa ̱ je ia ̱ na ?

text: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God ;
text2: Ata ba je ̱ r dä därërë kju ̱ ei , ñakäi ka ma je ̱ rike manewa ̱ ksa ̱ kju ̱ ei , Säkeklä kju ̱ atkäklä irä , sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ bulee kjayinaklä irä , je ke ̱ i ska ra , ba te kju ̱ atke kiemika ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: Who will render to every man according to his deeds :
text2: Je ke ̱ i ska ite sa ̱ ia ̱ isäkei me ̱ mi ekla ekla jishtä sa ̱ wa ̱ io ̱ le ja ̱ mi .

text: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality , eternal life :
text2: Chatkäkwa ̱ del ji wa ̱ k bäi , ikjeiyinaklä ioloi kanakläka ̱ , ñakäi ka iduäkläwa ̱ , jewa ia ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye me ̱ rmi .

text: But unto them that are contentious , and do not obey the truth , but obey unrighteousness , indignation and wrath ,
text2: Ata ji wa ̱ k je ̱ k ssë tu ̱ leka ̱ wà , ka je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ ia ̱ , ata je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ ji ka wämo ia ̱ , jewa ia ̱ Säkeklä kju ̱ atkämiwa ̱ irä , ije ̱ r ki ̱ iarmiwa ̱ irä , je ne dämiksa ̱ rä .

text: Tribulation and anguish , upon every soul of man that doeth evil , of the Jew first , and also of the Gentile ;
text2: Weikane irä je ̱ r iane irä , ja ̱ rmika ̱ ji yakei wa ̱ k wa biköle ki ̱ , säkätä Judío wa ki ̱ ka , ñaebä Griego wa ki ̱ ka .

text: But glory , honour , and peace , to every man that worketh good , to the Jew first , and also to the Gentile :
text2: Ata kjeiyine , oloi kaneka ̱ , je ̱ r ssëne baa , dämiksa ̱ ji wa ̱ k bäi wa ia ̱ , säkätä Judío wa ia ̱ , ñaebä Griego wa ia ̱ .

text: For there is no respect of persons with God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä rä ka ji wa ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kuna .

text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law : and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law ;
text2: Jekäi sä ka ka ̱ wei ta wa te ji yakei wakbla ra , jewa biköle weikarcha ̱ miwa ̱ , ata ka ka ̱ wei bata ki ̱ ka kuna . Ata sä ka ̱ wei ta wa te ji yakei wakbla ra , jewa biköle wabiketsarmiksa ̱ ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi .

text: ( For not the hearers of the law are just before God , but the doers of the law shall be justified .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka irä ka ̱ wei ssäk wa rä wämo Säkeklä wäna kuna , ata yi te ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ra , jewa wabiketsarmiksa ̱ wämo ye .

text: For when the Gentiles , which have not the law , do by nature the things contained in the law , these , having not the law , are a law unto themselves :
text2: Mika ̱ ka Judío kuna wa ka ka ̱ wei ta wa te ji we ̱ je ̱ r wà ka ̱ wei te sa pake ja ̱ mi ra , ka ijewa rä ka ̱ wei ta , jeiräta je ebä dewa ̱ iwakwa ia ̱ ika ̱ wei ye .

text: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts , their conscience also bearing witness , and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another ; )
text2: Jekäi jewa te ji we ̱ ke ̱ ebä wà ite je ka ̱ wei tso ̱ yöle ije ̱ r ska kjasheke ̱ . Jishtä ijewa je ̱ r ssërke ̱ je ne rä ijewa su ̱ ak ye rä . Jekäi ijewa je ̱ rike te issëwe ̱ mi kjatele iräle wetsaleksa ̱ iräle ,

text: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel .
text2: sa ̱ je ̱ rikäke ̱ blelewa ̱ wabiketsäkläksa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi je ke ̱ i ska . Je rä jishtä yis wa ̱ kte baa yinak te ishe käi .

text: Behold , thou art called a Jew , and restest in the law , and makest thy boast of God ,
text2: Ata ba je ̱ k kiä Judío wa ni ra , ba te ka ̱ wei biketse ra , ba je ̱ k ssä Säkeklä wà ra ,

text: And knowest his will , and approvest the things that are more excellent , being instructed out of the law ;
text2: ba wa ̱ ji rä sherke ̱ ije ki ̱ ju ̱ ñer da , ba rä yöle ka ̱ wei wà ki ̱ ka ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jibä rä bäi si ̱ ra ,

text: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind , a light of them which are in darkness ,
text2: ba te ibiketse ba rä ka wä wajuenak kuna wa wajiäk ra , ka ̱ oloi ye se ̱ nak ka ̱ tuil na wa ia ̱ ra ,

text: An instructor of the foolish , a teacher of babes , which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law .
text2: ka je ̱ r ta wa paruäk ra , ka je ̱ r ko ̱ le wa paktäk ra , jera je rä ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe kalabe irä ji yina si ̱ kalabe irä je tso ̱ ba wa ̱ ki ̱ ka ,

text: Thou therefore which teachest another , teachest thou not thyself ? thou that preachest a man should not steal , dost thou steal ?
text2: jekäi ba rä sa saka yuäk ra , jera ¿ jiye ka ba wakei je ̱ k yuä rä na ? Ba te sa pakte , ka jakbler ni ra , ¿ jiye ba jakbläke ̱ na ?

text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? thou that abhorrest idols , dost thou commit sacrilege ?
text2: Ba te ishe , ka manener ni ra , ¿ jiye ba manerke ̱ na ? Ba te jile kekläí me ̱ i dokoitse ra , ¿ jiye ba jakbläke ̱ je shtä me ̱ i jui na rä na ?

text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law , through breaking the law dishonourest thou God ?
text2: Ba je ̱ k ssä ka ̱ wei wà . Ata ba te ka ̱ wei shiriwe ̱ ke ̱ ra , ¿ ka irä je wà ba te Säkeklä kukawa ̱ diekjela na ?

text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you , as it is written .
text2: Je rä jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Säkeklä kie yirke ̱ yakei bas kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka , ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na . ”

text: For circumcision verily profiteth , if thou keep the law : but if thou be a breaker of the law , thy circumcision is made uncircumcision .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra , tene shkiri kiar ikuna ba te ka ̱ wei wawá ̱ ra . Ata ba te ka ̱ wei shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ ra , ba ianawa ̱ sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä ka tene shkiri ta wa käi .

text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law , shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision ?
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ikuna ka tene shkiri ta wa te sa pakale ka ̱ wei wa ̱ je wawe ̱ ra , ije rä ka tene shkiri ta , ¿ ka je biketsarmi rä tene shkiri ta käi na ?

text: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature , if it fulfil the law , judge thee , who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law ?
text2: Jekäi yi rä ka tene shkiri ta iyaka ska , ikuna je te ka ̱ wei wawá ̱ bulee ra , je te ba kjatiemiwa ̱ . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ba rä kte yöle ta , tene shkiri ta jeiräta ba rä ka ̱ wei shiriwa ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: For he is not a Jew , which is one outwardly ; neither is that circumcision , which is outward in the flesh :
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sä Judío wa rä ka sä juer jekäi ebä ki ̱ ka kuna , ñakäi tene shkiri rä ka juenak sa yaka ska ebä kuna .

text: But he is a Jew , which is one inwardly ; and circumcision is that of the heart , in the spirit , and not in the letter ; whose praise is not of men , but of God .
text2: Ata ji ka juer ne wà sä rä Judío wa rä . Je rä sa ̱ je ̱ r ska sä rä tene shkiri ta , o ̱ le Säkeklä wikblu wà ka kte yöle wà kuna . Jewa rä ka kjeiyinak kuna ditsä wa ̱ , ata Säkeklä ne wa ̱ .

text: What advantage then hath the Jew ? or what profit is there of circumcision ?
text2: Jekäi ra , sä rä Judío wa ¿ je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ bäi na ? Ñakäi ¿ jiye tene shkiri kiar na ?

text: Much every way : chiefly , because that unto them were committed the oracles of God .
text2: Je rä kianak ta ̱ i ji biköle ska . Säkätä iwa rä Säkeklä te ijewa ne biketsa ji yile iwa ̱ je bläk rä .

text: For what if some did not believe ? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect ?
text2: ¿ Jera mane käi je rä na ? Iwa rä ikuna ijewa manele wa ̱ ka ji biketsane etkabä ra , ¿ baishe ijewa wa ̱ ka ji biketsane etkabä ki ̱ ka , ka Säkeklä chatkäkwa ̱ ji wa ̱ k ji ̱ a bulee na ?

text: God forbid : yea , let God be true , but every man a liar ; as it is written , That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings , and mightest overcome when thou art judged .
text2: ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Sä biköle rä ka ̱ yuäk ebä ra , del Säkeklä ktä rä iyina si ̱ , jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Je rä bä ktä däkläksa ̱ iyina ye , ñakäi ma tu ̱ nakläka ̱ bä ktei wabiketsarke ̱ ksa ̱ ska . ”

text: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God , what shall we say ? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance ? ( I speak as a man )
text2: Ikuna saje wa yakei ne ja ̱ mi Säkeklä rä wämo je juerke ̱ ra , ¿ jini sa te ishe na ? Säkeklä kju ̱ atkäke ̱ sa ra ¿ je rä yakei ni na ? Yie isha jekäi rä ditsä te ji she ja ̱ mi .

text: God forbid : for then how shall God judge the world ?
text2: ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! ¿ Ata maikäi jera Säkeklä te ka ̱ jiska wa ktei wabiketsemiksa ̱ na ?

text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory ; why yet am I also judged as a sinner ?
text2: Ñakäi yis ka ̱ yuäke ̱ wà ji rä Säkeklä ia ̱ ra iyina si ̱ , je kanaka ̱ ki ̱ ta ikjeiyinaklä ra , ¿ jiye yis dä wabiketsanakksa ̱ ji ̱ a ji yakei wakbläk ye rä na ?

text: And not rather , ( as we be slanderously reported , and as some affirm that we say , ) Let us do evil , that good may come ? whose damnation is just .
