text2: Jera jiye ka sa te ishe : “ Sa ̱ ku ̱ ji yakei wakblö ji bäi o ̱ naklä ” , jishtä moska te sá ki ̱ yue sá le te jekäi ishe ni käi . Je ne ki ̱ ka bäije ijewa rä , ijewa rä wabiketsanakksa ̱ buka ̱ nak .

text: What then ? are we better than they ? No , in no wise : for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles , that they are all under sin ;
text2: ¿ Jera maikäi irä na ? ¿ Saje wa rä Griego wa tsa ̱ ta na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Ata je rä jishtä sa te isha kja käi ; Judío wa irä , Griego wa irä , jewa rä kololewa ̱ ji yakei wakble wa ̱ ,

text: As it is written , There is none righteous , no , not one :
text2: jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Ka yi kuna wämo , ekla a ̱ ni ;

text: There is none that understandeth , there is none that seeketh after God .
text2: ka yi kuna je ̱ r ko ̱ le , ka yi kuna Säkeklä payuläk .

text: They are all gone out of the way , they are together become unprofitable ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Biköle minemi kju ̱ awani , kalabe ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ka kianak ji ̱ a . Ka yi kuna ji wa ̱ k bäi , ekla a ̱ ni ka ikuna .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Ijewa si ̱ we ̱ i ña ̱ la rä sa ̱ nu ̱ l bläklä kjäyelecha ̱ käi . Ijewa kjäktä wà ite sä wäyueke ̱ . Ijewa kjäbata ska rä tkäbe kablali ne tso ̱ .

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: Ijewa kjä ja ̱ r dä pshilewa ̱ ji sälwi she wa ̱ , ji bächii ebä wa ̱ .

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: Ijewa klä rä iminaklä plaa sä pi tkewa ̱ k ju ̱ mi .

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: Maka ishkäke ̱ käi , ijewa rä sä weikäkwa ̱ , ji shi ̱ ana ebä wa ̱ k .

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: Ka iwa ̱ se ̱ ne bitaba ña ̱ le ̱ i ju ̱ ñer .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Ji rä suane Säkeklä yika ka kuna ijewa wa ̱ . ”

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Ata sa ̱ wa ̱ ju ̱ ñer ji she ka ̱ wei te je bena sheke ̱ ite rä , sä kololecha ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ wa ia ̱ , je rä biköle si ̱ wa ̱ tiächa ̱ kläwa ̱ , ñakäi ka ̱ jiska wa biköle kolonakläwa ̱ ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ .

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ wá , ka yi a ̱ ni wabiketsanakksa ̱ wämo ije wäna , je rä ka ̱ wei ne wà sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ ite jibä rä ji yakei wakble rä ki ̱ ka .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: Ata jira Säkeklä wa ̱ sä wabiketsäklä wämo ye je kjayina e ̱ ná sa ̱ ia ̱ . Ka je rä ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ wà kuna . Je bata yile rä ka ̱ wei ska irä jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ irä .

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: Je rä Säkeklä te sä wabiketseksa ̱ wämo ye rä sa te Jesucristo biketse ki ̱ ka . Je rä biköle ia ̱ , yi te ibiketse käi , ka sa ̱ kuna kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa ki ̱ ka .

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: Iwa rä biköle te ji yakei wakbla , je ki ̱ ka ijewa kianawa ̱ ta ̱ na ka deneka ̱ Säkeklä rä baa käi .

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ata ije ̱ r bäi sha wà ijewa wabiketsanaksa ̱ kjermita wämo ye , sä rä to ̱ leksa ̱ Cristo Jesús wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: Je ne ma ̱ ksa ̱ Säkeklä te sa ̱ nui wäshewa ̱ kwa ̱ sa te ipi biketsa ki ̱ ka , je wà iwa ̱ irä wämo kjashäklä . Je kju ̱ ei ji yakei wakblele kja sa ̱ wa ̱ jawa ̱ ite bitaba , ije rä ji katabläk ki ̱ ka .

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: Je wà iwa ̱ irä wämo kjashäklä jí ke ̱ i ska , ijuenaklä ije rä wämo , ñakäi ije rä sä Jesús biketsäk wa wabiketsäksa ̱ wämo ye .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Jekäi ra , ¿ ji wà sa ̱ je ̱ k ssämi na ? Je rä ju ̱ leksa ̱ . ¿ Jibä ka ̱ wei wà na ? ¿ Jile we ̱ ka ̱ wei wà na ? Kai . Ata ji biketse etkabä ne ka ̱ wei wà .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite , sä rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye , sa te ji biketsa etkabä wà . Ka je rä sa te ka ̱ wei wawá ̱ wà kuna .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Jera ¿ Säkeklä rä Judío wa kekläí na ? ¿ Ka ije rä ñaebä ka Judío kuna wa kekläí na ? Ñera ije rä jewa kekläí ñaebä ,

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: je rä Säkeklä rä eklabä ki ̱ ka . Jebä te tene shkiri ta wa wabiketseksa ̱ wämo ye ijewa te ji biketsa etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi , ñakäi ka tene shkiri ta wa wabiketseksa ̱ wämo ye ijewa te ji biketsa etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Do we then make void the law through faith ? God forbid : yea , we establish the law .
text2: Jekäi ra ¿ sa te ji biketsa etkabä wà sa te ka ̱ wei wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Tsa ̱ na ra je wà sa te ka ̱ wei sha irä iyina si ̱ .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: ¿ Jini sä te ditsä ja ̱ mi ra sä säkätä Abraham pake na ? ¿ Ji ku ̱ a ite rä na ?

text: For if Abraham were justified by works , he hath whereof to glory ; but not before God .
text2: Ikuna Abraham wabiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye rä ije te ji wá ̱ ki ̱ ka ra , ije ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ je ̱ k ssäklä je ki ̱ , ata ka Säkeklä wänaka kuna .

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: ¿ Jiräni iyöle te ishe rä na ? “ Abraham te Säkeklä biketsa , je wà iwabiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye to ̱ ne käi . ”

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Jekäi yi shka ̱ bla ra , ka je säkei to ̱ rke ̱ rä me ̱ le iia ̱ kjermita käi kuna , ata je rä nui iá .

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: Jekäi yi wa ̱ ji ka o ̱ ne , ata ite ka sä bäi kuna wa wabiketsäkksa ̱ wämo ye je biketsa ra , je ite ji biketsa etkabä wà iwabiketsarmiksa ̱ wämo ye to ̱ ne käi .

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: Ñakäi je ssëta , bäije yi ka chichane ji wa ̱ k kuna je sheke ̱ Säkeklä te wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ni rä , je sha David te rä :

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: “ Bäije jalewa ̱ bitaba ji o ̱ le iwa ̱ ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka wa rä , ñakäi nui ki ̱ kololewa ̱ wa rä .

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: Bäije yi ka ñawe ̱ kuna Säkekewa te inui ki ̱ ka je wakei rä . ”

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: Jekäi ra , ¿ je yile bäi wa rä tene shkiri ta wa ebä na ? ¿ Ka irä ka tene shkiri ta wa ñaebä na ? Iwa rä sa te ishe datse ̱ rä Abraham te ji biketsa etkabä wà iwabiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye to ̱ ne käi .

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Jera ¿ maikäi je deksa ̱ iia ̱ rä na ? ¿ Irä tene shkiri ta kja kjepa na , ata ka iia ̱ tene shkiri o ̱ rba yikaba ra na ? Ka ideneksa ̱ iia ̱ rä ije rä tene shkiri ta kja kjepa kuna , ata ka ije ia ̱ tene shkiri o ̱ rba yikaba ideksa ̱ iia ̱ rä .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Jekäi ije ia ̱ tene shkiri me ̱ na rä ijuenaklä ye , je rä iniaklä ije rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye ite ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka , ka tene shkiri o ̱ rba iia ̱ yikaba ra , je rä idäkläwa ̱ sä ji biketsäk etkabä wà ka tene shkiri ta wa biköle káí ye , je wà ijewa wabiketsanaklä wämo ye to ̱ ne käi ,

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: ñaebä idäkläwa ̱ tene shkiri ta wa káí ye , ka irä yi rä tene shkiri ta wa ebä kuna , ata ñakäi yi te sa ká Abraham bakle itäri mable ji biketsäk etkabä ka ije ia ̱ tene shkiri o ̱ rba ra , jewa káí ye ñaebä .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Iwa rä Säkeklä kabla Abraham irä ibatala irä ia ̱ ka ̱ jiska ma ̱ ksa ̱ idäli ukä ye , ka je rä ijewa te ka ̱ wei wawá ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata iwabiketsa ̱ naksa ̱ wämo ye rä ite ji biketsa etkabä ne ki ̱ ka .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Ikuna rä ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi wa ne ia ̱ däli ukä däke ̱ ksa ̱ rä ra , ji biketse etkabä wadäke ̱ ksa ̱ rä ka wata , ñakäi ikablele rä wäshäkwa ̱ .

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: Iwa rä ka ̱ wei bata ki ̱ ka kju ̱ atke tsikirke ̱ . Ata ke ka ̱ wei kuna ra , ka sä shirinak ji ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka je wadäke ̱ ksa ̱ rä ji biketse etkabä wà , je rä iwadäkläksa ̱ ije ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ wà , jekäi ra je ikabla däkläksa ̱ Abraham batala biköle ia ̱ , ka ibatala ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi shtä wa ebä ia ̱ kuna , ata ibatala ji biketsäk etkabä ije käi jewa ia ̱ ñaebä . Jekäi ije ne rä sä biköle káí rä ,

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Yis wa ̱ ba kolole ditsei wä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ káí ye . ” Jera jekäi Säkeklä wäna irä , je ne rä iwa ̱ biketsanak rä , ale sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ia ̱ se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ kni , ale ji ka kuna shäk itso ̱ kja e ̱ ná ni .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Jekäi Abraham te ji ka ki ̱ ssënak sa ̱ wa ̱ , ki ̱ ssa ji ̱ a biketsale io ̱ rmi si ̱ . Jekäi idewa ̱ ditsei wä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ káí ye , jishtä iia ̱ iyile käi : “ Jekäi ba batala warmika ̱ rä ” .

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: Jekäi ije te ji biketsa etkabä ka shtirilewa ̱ ta . Jeiräta ije je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ra iyaka rä dulewa ̱ käi , ije rä cien año käi ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ise ̱ naklä Sara rä wakjuä dulewa ̱ kja käi ki ̱ ka .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Jeiräta Säkeklä kablele iia ̱ ka biketsane iwa ̱ ka le io ̱ nak ni , ata ite ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka itäkina , ñakäi ite Säkeklä kjeisha ,

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: je rä ite ibiketsa si ̱ ije rä täkili ta iwa ̱ k maikäi ikablele iia ̱ käi ki ̱ ka .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Je bata ki ̱ ka iwabiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye to ̱ ne käi .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Ata je iyöle wa ̱ ije ia ̱ ideksa ̱ to ̱ ne käi ka je ebä yine kuna ,

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: ata saje wa ia ̱ irä däkksa ̱ to ̱ ne käi , je sha ite ñaebä . Je rä saje wa , ale sä Säkekewaí Jesús shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je biketsäk wa .

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Ije rä ju ̱ leksa ̱ saje wa shirilewa ̱ wa kju ̱ ei , ata irä shki ̱ leka ̱ ni saje wa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Jekäi sä rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye sa te ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka , je ki ̱ ka Säkeklä je ̱ r bäinani sa ra saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: Ñakäi ije oloi ja ̱ mi je ̱ r bäi yina sa ̱ ia ̱ , sa te ibiketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka . Je ja ̱ mi sä rä chatkelewa ̱ . Jekäi Säkeklä ji baa ki ̱ ssënak sa ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ñassäke ̱ .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Ka je ebä kuna , ata ñaebä sa ̱ ñassäke ̱ weikane sha ̱ na , sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer weikane te sä dulawe ̱ chatkäkwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: Jekäi chatkewa ̱ te sä dulawe ̱ mi ji wa ̱ k bäi . Ji we ̱ bäi te sä dulawe ̱ mi ji ki ̱ ssäk .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Jekäi ji kissënak je wa ̱ ka sä tsulenakwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ ble Säkeklä te je rä tkeleju ̱ mi sa ̱ je ̱ r ska , Wikblu Sikina me ̱ le sa ̱ ia ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Jekäi saje wa dami ji ̱ a ka täki ta ra , ike ̱ i dewa ̱ ra , Cristo duawa ̱ sä ka bäi kuna wa ki ̱ ka .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Därërë si ̱ yilé duäwa ̱ sä wämo ki ̱ ka rä . Bäräle sä bäi ki ̱ ka ra , tsile sa ̱ je ̱ k ma ̱ ksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: Ata saje wa dami ji ̱ a ji yakei wakbläk ra , Säkeklä wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l kjasha ite sa ̱ ia ̱ , je rä Cristo duawa ̱ saje wa kju ̱ ei .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Jekäi ipi wà jira sä rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye ra , je tsa ̱ ta ije oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ Säkeklä kju ̱ atkäke ̱ sa ra yika .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ikuna sa dami ji ̱ a Säkeklä bolki wa ye käi ra , ije ̱ r bäinani sa ra iyaba duawa ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi , jera je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ ise ̱ r kseka oloi ja ̱ mi Säkeklä je ̱ r bäinani sa ra ki ̱ ka .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: Ka je ebä kuna , ata ñakäi sa ̱ ñassäke ̱ Säkeklä wà saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo kju ̱ ei . Je ne oloi ja ̱ mi jira Säkeklä je ̱ r bäinani sa ra rä .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: Jekäi jishtä ji yakei wakble dewa ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska ditsä ekla bata ki ̱ ka , kjepa duewa ̱ dewa ̱ ji yakei wakble kju ̱ ei , je su ̱ ta duewa ̱ kjaksa ̱ biköle ia ̱ , biköle te ji yakei wakbla ki ̱ ka .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Jekäi ka ka ̱ wei kuna yikaba ra , ji yakei wakble tso ̱ kja ka ̱ jiska . Ata ka ka ̱ wei kuna ra , ji yakei wakblerke ̱ rä ka nui bäke ta .

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: Jeiräta Adán ska bite däka ̱ Moisés ska , duewa ̱ rä delewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye . Jekäi mane wa wa ̱ ka ji yakei o ̱ ne jishtä Adán shirinawa ̱ käi , jewa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye duewa ̱ dewa ̱ ñaebä . Jekäi Adán rä ale däkwa ̱ ji ̱ a je me ̱ i .

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: Ata Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi yile ka je rä jishtä je shirine rä käi kuna . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ikuna ekla shirinawa ̱ bata ki ̱ ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa duacha ̱ wa ̱ ra , je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shä irä ji me ̱ nak irä deksa ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ rä , ale ditsä ekla Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi sha oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Jekäi ji me ̱ nak , ka je rä ale ekla wa ̱ ji wakblele käi kuna . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , je ji etka yakei o ̱ le bata ki ̱ ka sä rä ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ buka ̱ nak . Ata je ji me ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ , je wà sä shirile ta ̱ i wabiketsanakksa ̱ wämo ye .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: Jekäi ikuna ekla shirinawa ̱ bata ki ̱ ka duewa ̱ dewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ra , je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ yi te ije ̱ r bäi shä ta ̱ i je kuka ra , ñakäi sa ̱ ia ̱ ji me ̱ nak sä wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye je kuka ra , jewa se ̱ rmi kseka sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ye , ale ditsä ekla Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Jekäi shirine etka bata ki ̱ ka ditsä biköle rä buka ̱ nak , je su ̱ ta etka ji wämo o ̱ le ki ̱ ka , ditsä biköle rä wabiketsanakksa ̱ wämo ye , sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka .

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: Jekäi jishtä ditsä ekla te Säkeklä ktä weikawa ̱ ki ̱ ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ji yakei wakbläk wa ye , je su ̱ ta ñaebä ekla te Säkeklä ktä dälätsa ki ̱ ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dewa ̱ wämo ye .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ wei dewa ̱ sä shirinaklä ki ̱ ta . Ata mika ̱ ji yakei wakblena ki ̱ ta ra , ije ̱ r bäi sha ki ̱ ta si ̱ .

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Jekäi jishtä ji yakei wakble dewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye sä duäkläwa ̱ ra , je su ̱ ta je ̱ r bäi she dewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye sa ̱ se ̱ naklä jekjeye , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: Jera , ¿ jini sa te ishe na ? ¿ Sa ̱ ku ̱ ji yakei wakblöpa ji ̱ a ije ̱ r bäi shäklä ki ̱ ta na ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Saje wa rä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ , ka kuna ji ̱ a ji yakei wakbläk , ¿ jera maikäi sa te je we ̱ ji ̱ a na ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: ¿ Ata ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ r sä wäoka ̱ na Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi ra , sä wäoka ̱ na rä sä duäkläwa ̱ ña ira na ?

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Jekäi wäoka ̱ ne wà , sä rä itäbilewa ̱ ña ije ra , je tso ̱ rä dulewa ̱ kja . Je rä sa ̱ se ̱ nakläni spa ̱ na jishtä Cristo rä shki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , Sa Ká täkili baa oloi ja ̱ mi käi .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: Jekäi ikuna sä dewa ̱ Cristo ja ̱ mi dulewa ̱ ije käi ra , je su ̱ ta sa ̱ shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni ije käi .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Jikäi sa ̱ wa ̱ ijuñer dä . Sä del mikle wätenaka ̱ ña ira , sa yaka ji yakei wakbläk weikanakläwa ̱ ka kolonakläwa ̱ ji ̱ a ji yakei kjanaklä ye .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi dulewa ̱ rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye ka nui ta ji ̱ a .

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: Jekäi ikuna sa duawa ̱ Cristo ra , jera sa te ibiketse iyina si ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ rmi iwakei ra .

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Cristo shki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , ka je duäkwa ̱ ni , ñakäi duewa ̱ ka tu ̱ nakka ̱ ji ̱ a ije ki ̱ ka .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Je duawa ̱ ra , iduawa ̱ rä ji yakei wakble ki ̱ ka etaba kichabä . Ata ise ̱ nani kseka ra , je rä ise ̱ naklä Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Jekäi ñaebä bas ku ̱ ibiketsö bas dä dulewa ̱ , ka ji yakei wakbläk kuna ji ̱ a , ata bas dä kseka Säkeklä ia ̱ Cristo Jesús oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ke bas yaka duäkwa ̱ jawa ̱ patkenak ji yakei wakble wa ̱ , ji tkerke ̱ ija ̱ mi je ebä wa ̱ k .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Ke bas yaka wäjienaklä tulaksa ̱ ji yakei ia ̱ iwa ̱ wao ̱ nak ji ka wämo kuna wa ̱ klä . Ata bas ñatulöksa ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ shki ̱ le tuläka ̱ ni kseka dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na käi , ñakäi bas wäjienaklä tulöksa ̱ ije ia ̱ , iwa ̱ wao ̱ nak ji wämo wa ̱ klä .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Jera ka ji yakei wa ̱ bas patkenak ji ̱ a . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sa ̱ kuna kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ , ata je ̱ r bäi she ne wa ̱ .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: ¿ Jera maikäi irä na ? Ka sa ̱ kuna kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ , ata je ̱ r bäi she ne wa ̱ , jera ¿ sa te ji yakei wakblemi ji ̱ a na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna !

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Ata ¿ ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer sa ̱ je ̱ k ju ̱ ake ̱ ksa ̱ yilé ia ̱ ikjanaklä ye iktä ssäk ra , mane ktä ssëke ̱ sa te , ka je ne kjanaklä sä rä na ? Ji yakei wakble ia ̱ sä duäkläwa ̱ iräle , ata iktä ssë ia ̱ sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye iräle .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Ata wekte Säkeklä ra . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas bakle rä kololewa ̱ ji yakei we ̱ wa ̱ ikjanaklä ye . Jeiräta jira mane shtä pauta ̱ ne ia ̱ bas tulunata ̱ na je ne kuka bas te je ̱ r baa wà rä .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Jekäi bas wetsanaksa ̱ ji yakei wakble yika , je dewa ̱ ni ji wämo kjanaklä ye .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Yie jí pake ditsä te ji pake ja ̱ mi bas dä ka täki ta je ̱ r ko ̱ nak ki ̱ ka . Jishtä mikle ra bas te bas yaka wäjienaklä tulaksa ̱ ji shi ̱ ana ia ̱ , ñakäi ji we ̱ ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi ia ̱ ikjanaklä ye , ji ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi wa ̱ klä , jekäi jira bas yaka wäjienaklä tulöksa ̱ ji wämo ia ̱ , ikjanaklä ye ji sikii wa ̱ klä .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Jekäi bas bakle kololecha ̱ wa ̱ ji yakei wa ̱ ikjanaklä ye , jera ka bas patkene kuna ji wämo wa ̱ .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Ji wá ̱ bas te je te jira bas äiwe ̱ ke ̱ . Jekäi ¿ jibä säkei ta deksa ̱ bas ia ̱ je ki ̱ ka na ? Ñera je bata jekje rä duewa ̱ ebä .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Ata jira bas dä bakleksa ̱ ji yakei wakble yika , kololewa ̱ ni Säkeklä kjanaklä ye . Jekäi ji säkei ta däkksa ̱ bas ia ̱ , je wà bas siki tërke ̱ . Je bata je kje rä se ̱ ne jekjeye .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ to ̱ rke ̱ ji yakei wakble ki ̱ ka rä duewa ̱ wà . Ata se ̱ ne jekjeye ne tso ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ me ̱ nak rä , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: El wa , ka ̱ wei kiar dä sa patkäk ye sa ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka ebä ra , ¿ je ia ̱ ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ r na ? Bas wa ̱ ka ̱ wei ju ̱ ñer ne ki ̱ ka yie je sheke ̱ bas ia ̱ rä .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , alaklä se ̱ lewa ̱ rä kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ se ̱ nak ijäiyi ra je katke ji ̱ a kseka bala na . Ata ijäiyi duawa ̱ ra , ije deksa ̱ ni kjermita ijäiyi ka ̱ wei yika .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Jekäi ikuna ise ̱ nani jäiyi saka ra ijäiyi katke ji ̱ a ra , jera je kirmi rä manenak ni . Ata ijäiyi duawa ̱ ne ra ideksa ̱ ni kjermita je ka ̱ wei yika rä . Jeska ra ise ̱ nani jäiyi saka ra , jera ka je rä imaner kuna .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Yis el wa , je su ̱ ta bas dä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ wei yika , Cristo yaka oloi ja ̱ mi , bas se ̱ nakläwa ̱ kju ̱ awa ra , ale shki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulewa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je ra , bas wänaklä Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa dami ji ̱ a sa yaka ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ ja ̱ mi ra , ji yakei wakble tkenak sa ̱ ja ̱ mi pjoo je wätji ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ka ̱ wei te sa yaka wäjienaklä ssëwa ̱ k ji ki ̱ sä rä duäkwa ̱ shtä wa ̱ k .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Ata jira sä duawa ̱ ji wa ̱ sä rä kololewa ̱ je yika , je wà sä deksa ̱ kjermita ka ̱ wei yika , sa ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ kläni spa ̱ na iwikblu ja ̱ mi , ka mikle ikja ̱ nei we ̱ käi kuna kte yöle ja ̱ mi .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Jera , ¿ jini sa te ishe na ? ¿ Ka ̱ wei rä nui ta na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Ñera ke ka ̱ wei kuna ra , a ̱ ni ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jibä rä yakei rä käi . Ka ̱ wei ku ̱ ke ishöpa : “ Ke sa saka däli tkenak ma ja ̱ mi ” ni , jekäi ra ka yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji rä sa saka däli tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi rä .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Ata sa pakale ji wa ̱ k ki ̱ ka , ji yakei wakble te wäsi ̱ wa yis ssëwa ̱ ji biköle tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi je biketsäk . Jekäi ke ka ̱ wei ta ra , ji yakei wakble rä dulewa ̱ .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Uketa ra yis se ̱ le bakle rä ka ̱ wei ka ta . Ata mika ̱ yie sa pakale ji wa ̱ k ju ̱ ña ra , ji yakei wakble tsikinaka ̱ , jera yis duawa ̱ .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Jekäi yie isu ̱ a ra , je sa pakale ji wa ̱ k sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka ye , je deksa ̱ ni rä yis duäkläwa ̱ ye .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Jekäi sa pakale ji wa ̱ k ki ̱ ka , wäsi ̱ wa ji yakei wakble te yis wäyuawa ̱ , jekäi je wà ite yis ktawa ̱ .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Jekäi iyina si ̱ ka ̱ wei rä sikii , ñakäi sa pakale ji wa ̱ k , je rä sikii , je rä wämo , je rä baa .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Jera ¿ ji wämo ne dewa ̱ yis duäkläwa ̱ rä na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Ata ji yakei wakble kjayinaklä je rä yakei ra , je te ji wämo wà yis iawa ̱ wa ̱ duäkwa ̱ . Je rä sa pakale ji wa ̱ k oloi ja ̱ mi ji yakei wakble juenaklä irä yakei e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je ka ̱ wei rä wikblu iá . Ata yis dä yaka iá , wato ̱ le ju ̱ lemi ji yakei wakble ia ̱ iwa ̱ patkenak .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Ji we ̱ ke ̱ yie , ka je ia ̱ yis je ̱ r ko ̱ ne . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji wa ̱ kle yie , ka je o ̱ r yis ia ̱ . Ata ji dokoitseke ̱ yie , je ebä we ̱ ke ̱ yis te rä .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Ikuna ji ka wa ̱ kle yie je ebä we ̱ ke ̱ yis te ra , je wà ijuena yis te je ka ̱ wei biketsa je rä bulee ni .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Jekäi ra ka irä yis wakei si ̱ te je we ̱ kuna , ata ji yakei tso ̱ yis ja ̱ rka je ne te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Iwa rä yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis ja ̱ rka , ale yis yaka ska , jeska ji bäi ka kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis ssërke ̱ ji bäi wa ̱ k , ata ka yis ia ̱ je o ̱ r .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Jekäi ji bäi sherke ̱ yis ki ̱ o ̱ nak , je ka we ̱ yie , ata ji yakei ka sher kuna yis ki ̱ o ̱ nak , je ebä we ̱ ke ̱ yie .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Jekäi ji ka wa ̱ kle yie je we ̱ ke ̱ yis te ra , ka je rä yis wakei si ̱ te kuna , ata je rä ji yakei tso ̱ yis ja ̱ rka , je ne te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Yie issa ra jikäi ika ̱ wei tso ̱ , je rä yis ssëna ji wämo wa ̱ k , ata del ji yakei ne dami yis ja ̱ mi rä .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis je ̱ r ska yis wäbatsa ta ̱ i Säkeklä ka ̱ wei wà .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Ata yie issa ra , yis yaka wäjienaklä ska ka ̱ wei etkä tso ̱ , je kju ̱ atkäke ̱ yis je ̱ rikäke ̱ ka ̱ wei ra , jekäi je te yis yaka wäjienaklä ska ji yakei wakble ka ̱ wei wà yis kukeke ̱ wa ̱ därërë .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: ¡ Säli yis wakei rä ! ¿ Yi te yis wetsemiksa ̱ jí sa yaka duäkwa ̱ yika na ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Wekte Säkeklä ra , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi . Jekäi yis je ̱ rike wà yie Säkeklä ka ̱ wei wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ , ata yis yaka wà yie ji yakei wakble ka ̱ wei kja ̱ nei we ̱ .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Jekäi jira sä Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi wa , ka wabiketsanakksa ̱ ji ̱ a buka ̱ nak ji ki ̱ .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi se ̱ ne kseka tso ̱ Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi , je ka ̱ wei te yis bakaksa ̱ ji yakei wakble kju ̱ ei sä rä duäkwa ̱ , je ka ̱ wei yika .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Iwa rä ji ka o ̱ r ka ̱ wei ia ̱ irä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ sa yaka wa ̱ ki ̱ ka , je ne wá ̱ Säkeklä te rä . Je rä ite iyaba patkaté yaka ta sä ji yakei wakbläk wa yaka käi , sa te ji yakei wakble bata ki ̱ ka , iwa ̱ ji yakei wakble weikäkläwa ̱ sa yaka ska .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Je rä ka ̱ wei wa ̱ sa pakale ji wämo wa ̱ k je wawa ̱ klä saje wa ka se ̱ nak sa yaka ki ̱ ikiarke ̱ käi kuna wa wa ̱ , ata se ̱ nak Säkeklä wikblu ki ̱ ikiarke ̱ käi wa wa ̱ .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Jekäi mane wa se ̱ rke ̱ jishtä sa yaka ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi , jewa te rä ji sherke ̱ sa yaka ki ̱ ne biketseke ̱ . Ata mane wa se ̱ rke ̱ jishtä Säkeklä wikblu ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ käi , jewa te rä ji sherke ̱ iwikblu ki ̱ je ne biketseke ̱ .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa te sa yaka ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ je biketse ra sä rä duäkwa ̱ . Ata sa te ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä wikblu ki ̱ je biketse ra sa ̱ se ̱ rmi kseka , ñakäi sä ssërmi baa .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Iwa rä sa te ji sherke ̱ sa yaka ki ̱ biketseke ̱ ra , je rä sa ̱ kju ̱ atkäke ̱ Säkeklä ra . Je rä ka sa ̱ je ̱ k jäwa ̱ Säkeklä ka ̱ wei yika ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ka sa ̱ ia ̱ io ̱ nak .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Jekäi mane wa se ̱ r dä sa yaka ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ ja ̱ mi ra , ka jewa ia ̱ Säkeklä ssënak bäi .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Jekäi bas dä ka se ̱ nak kuna ji ̱ a sa yaka ja ̱ mi , ata Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi , ikuna Säkeklä wikblu se ̱ r dä bas ja ̱ rka ra . Jekäi yi wa ̱ ka Cristo wikblu kuna ra , ka je rä ije cha kuna .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Ata Cristo katke bas ja ̱ rka ra , jera bas yaka rä dulewa ̱ ji yakei wakble kju ̱ ei , jeiräta bas wikblu rä kseka sä rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye ki ̱ ka .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Jekäi ikuna Jesús shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni dulewa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je wikbluí se ̱ r dä bas ja ̱ rka ra , jera je Cristo shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni dulewa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je te ñaebä bas yaka duäkwa ̱ ia ̱ se ̱ ne me ̱ mini iwikblu se ̱ nak bas ja ̱ rka oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Jekäi el wa , sa pakana ji ̱ a ji wa ̱ k , ata ka je rä sa yaka te kuna , sa ̱ se ̱ naklä sa yaka ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi kuna .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna bas se ̱ rke ̱ sa yaka ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi ra , bas dä duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ . Ata ikuna iwikblu oloi ja ̱ mi bas te sa yaka ki ̱ isherke ̱ wawe ̱ weikawa ̱ ra , bas se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Jekäi biköle wäsika ̱ nak Säkeklä wikblu wa ̱ , jewa rä Säkeklä yabala .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka bas ia ̱ wikblu sä kukäkwa ̱ patkenakni etäbä kicha suane wa ̱ je rä deleksa ̱ kuna , ata wikblu sä kukäk iyabala ye je ne deksa ̱ bas ia ̱ rä , je ne oloi ja ̱ mi sa a ̱ rke ̱ : “ ¡ Abba , Papá ” ni rä !

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Iwikblu te sä ktei sheke ̱ ña saje wa wikblu ra ñara , sä rä Säkeklä yabala ni .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Jekäi sä rä iyabala ra , jera ñakäi sä rä däli ukä kukäk wa , Säkeklä däli ukä kukäk wa , ñakäi ikukäkña Cristo ra , ikuna Cristo wakei ra sä weikanaña ra . Je rä sä oloi kanakläka ̱ iwakei ra .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Ata yie ibiketse sä weikarke ̱ jí ke ̱ i ska je ja ̱ mi ji baawa ̱ si ̱ kjayir mar sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ka je pakanak bäi .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ji yöleksa ̱ te Säkeklä yabala kjayirmi ki ̱ ssëte pjoo .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Jekäi ji yöleksa ̱ rä kololewa ̱ ji ka wata wa ̱ , ka je o ̱ ne rä iwakei ki ̱ ishena jekäi ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä ikukäkwa ̱ ne te je wá ̱ rä , ite ibiketsa

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: ji yöleksa ̱ bakanamiksa ̱ itso ̱ kololewa ̱ tjabanakcha ̱ wa ̱ je yika , idäkläwa ̱ ña bakleksa ̱ baa Säkeklä yabala ra .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji biköle yöleksa ̱ u ̱ rte etka yebä , ñakäi etka yebä ji dälär ssërte iia ̱ alaklä wa duäksa ̱ yaba ki ̱ dälär käi , dami ji ̱ a jira kje .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Ka je rä ji yöleksa ̱ ebä te kuna . Ata ñakäi saje wa Säkeklä wikblu ta me ̱ le sa ̱ ia ̱ jile wä säkätä käi , jewa u ̱ rte sa wakwa je ̱ r ska , sa te iki ̱ ssëte pjoo sä kolonakläwa ̱ Säkeklä yabala ye , sa yaka bakanakläksa ̱ je bala na .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ rä sa ̱ wa ̱ ji ki ̱ ssäklä . Ata ji juena e ̱ ná ki ̱ ssë sa te , ka je shtä rä ji ki ̱ ssë kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ­ ¿ yibä te ji juena e ̱ ná ki ̱ ssëmi ji ̱ a na ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Ata sä te ji ka juerba je ne ki ̱ ssëke ̱ rä ra , sa te iki ̱ ssëmi pjoo ka shtirile ta .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Je su ̱ ta iwikblu te sa ̱ tsa ̱ tke ka sä rä täki ta ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji kinak sa ̱ wa ̱ jishtä isherke ̱ käi , ka je ia ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ ne . Ata iwikblu wakei te sä ktei sheke ̱ u ̱ leka ̱ ka yirka ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ kte wà .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ je ̱ rike su ̱ akksa ̱ , je wa ̱ ji sherke ̱ iwikblu ki ̱ ju ̱ ñer . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je te sä sikii wa ktei sheke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ ji shena je ja ̱ mi .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mane wa wa ̱ Säkeklä shka ̱ l wa ia ̱ , ale sä kile iwa ̱ wata ye wa ia ̱ , ji biköle o ̱ r dä ji bäi o ̱ naklä ye .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Ñakäi Säkeklä wa ̱ ju ̱ ñele kja wa ebä biketsaba ite manenaksa ̱ jishtä iyaba rä käi . Je rä ije däkläwa ̱ ñaje ̱ keta wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ kibi keklä ye .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Jekäi je biketsaleba iwa ̱ , jewa kia ite . Jekäi je kile wa wabiketsaksa ̱ ite wämo ye ; jekäi je wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye wa oloi kaka ̱ ite .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: ¿ Jini jera sa te je she na ? Ikuna Säkeklä rä saje wa ra , jera ¿ yi ia ̱ ji o ̱ rmi saje wa ukä ja ̱ mi na ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Ije wa ̱ ka iwakei yaba si ̱ kjeo ̱ ne kuna , ata je ma ̱ ksa ̱ ite sä biköle bata ki ̱ ka ra , ¿ maikäi ka je wa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ ji biköle me ̱ nakña kjermita ije ra na ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: ¿ Yibä te sä kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ wa kjatiemika ̱ na ? Ñera Säkeklä ne rä sa wabiketsäkksa ̱ wämo ye rä .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: ¿ Yibä te ijewa wabiketsemi buka ̱ nak rä na ? Ñera Jesucristo ne duawa ̱ rä . Ka je ebä kuna , ata ñakäi je ne shki ̱ naka ̱ ni katke Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne saje wa ktei shäk rä .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: ¿ Yibä ia ̱ sa bala butsa ̱ nakmi Cristo wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l yika na ? ¿ Weikane ia ̱ na , je ̱ r iane e ̱ e ̱ na ia ̱ na , sälwi su ̱ ne ia ̱ na , bäli ia ̱ na , ka je ̱ k pajiäklä ta ia ̱ na , ji däläna ia ̱ na , espada ia ̱ na ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Je rä jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Ka ̱ raa ba kju ̱ ei yewa ̱ sá kota ̱ na tulä mar ; sá rä biketsa ̱ leksa ̱ jishtä oveja tso ̱ kja iktäklä ska käi . ”

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Ata je biköle ki ̱ saje wa rä tu ̱ nakka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , ale sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bläk oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ibiketse , duewa ̱ iräle , se ̱ ne kseka iräle , ángel wa iräle , jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa iräle , ji jira iräle , ji dämi ji ̱ a iräle , ji täkili ta wa iräle ,

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: ji ka ̱ sha ̱ a ̱ ki ̱ wa iräle , ji ja ̱ r ka ̱ mii ska wa iräle , ji saka yöleksa ̱ iräle , ji a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka sa bala butsa ̱ nak Säkeklä wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi je yika .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Yie ji she iyina si ̱ Cristo ja ̱ mi , ka yis ka ̱ yuä kuna , ji ssërke ̱ yis je ̱ r ska je te yis ktei sheke ̱ ña isu ̱ ak ye Säkeklä wikblu sikina ja ̱ mi ,

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: je rä yis je ̱ r iarke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , yis je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sä dälärke ̱ del ye .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Jekäi yis ssërke ̱ rä yis wakei ne weikanowa ̱ pa rä bala butsäle Cristo yika yis el wa , yis yështä wa yis yaka ska jewa säkei ye .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Jewa rä Israel wa . Jewa ne kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ iyabala ye rä . Jewa ne ia ̱ ioloi baa kjayile rä . Jewa ne ra ikablele ñaia ̱ rä . Jewa ne ia ̱ ika ̱ wei me ̱ le rä . Jewa ne rä ji rä kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak wawa ̱ k wa rä . Jewa ne ia ̱ Säkeklä kablele ji wa ̱ k rä .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Jewa ne ká wa rä sa kalí wa rä , jewa ne ja ̱ mi Säbäkäkksa ̱ yaka bitele rä . Ije ne rä Säkeklä Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta rä , kjeiyinak bäi jekjeyemi rä . Amén .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Ka irä Säkeklä wa ̱ ji yile shirinawa ̱ kuna , ata iwa rä sa ̱ ko ̱ le Israel wa ye kalabe rä ka Israel wa si ̱ kuna ,

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: ñakäi Abraham batala kalabe rä ka iyäbeila si ̱ kuna . Ata ite isha rä : “ Isaac ne ja ̱ mi ba batala kirmi rä . ”

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Je wà rä ka sä rä Säkeklä yabala sä rä manele yäbeila ki ̱ ka kuna , ata yabala ko ̱ le Säkeklä kablele ki ̱ ka jewa ne shtao ̱ le ibatala ye rä .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikabla te isha rä jikäi : “ Jí ke ̱ i wà yis däni , je ra Sara rä yaba ta . ”

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Ka irä je ebä kuna . Ata ñaebä Rebeca buklunaka jäiyi eklabä ra , ale sa ká Isaac ra ,

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: jera ka je yabala ko ̱ rba yika , ka ijewa wa ̱ ji o ̱ rba bäi iräle yakei iräle ra , iyina iia ̱ rä : “ Ikibi dämiwa ̱ itsi ̱ se ̱ k kjanaklä ye . ” Je rä io ̱ naklä ji ye wata Säkeklä wa ̱ sä biketsale kolonak ebä ki ̱ ka , ka je rä sa te ji we ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata iwa ̱ sä kile ki ̱ ka .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Je rä jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Jacob shka ̱ li ̱ bla yis te , ata Esaú dokoitsa yis te . ”

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Jekäi ra , ¿ jini sa te ishe na ? ¿ Baishe Säkeklä rä ji ka wämo kuna wa ̱ ta na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna !

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Moisés ia ̱ ite isha rä : “ Yis je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ , yibä ia ̱ yis je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ käi . Ñakäi yis je ̱ r shka ̱ rke ̱ , yibä ra yis je ̱ r shka ̱ rke ̱ käi . ”

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ka je rä sa wakwa ki ̱ isher ki ̱ ka kuna , sa wakwa chichar ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä Säkeklä ale je ̱ r bäi shäk sa ̱ ia ̱ ebä ne ki ̱ ka .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Jekäi kte yöle ska iyile Faraón ia ̱ rä : “ Jí ne ye yie ba kuka rä , je rä yis wa ̱ yis täkili kjashäklä ba ja ̱ mi , je rä yis kie bata yinaklä ka ̱ biköle ska . ”

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ yi ra ije ̱ r bäi shakle käi , ñakäi yi je ̱ r doloi tewa ̱ kle ite käi , je je ̱ r doloi tewe ̱ ke ̱ ite .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Ata ba te ishemi yis ia ̱ : “ Jekäi irä ra , ¿ jiye ite nui ja ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ji ̱ a sa ̱ ki ̱ ka rä na ? Ñera ¿ yi ia ̱ ije ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ o ̱ nak wätkermi na ? ”

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Ata yie ishe , ¿ yibä ba rä , je te Säkeklä kúke jekäi rä na ? Baishe jile yönak te ishemi iyuäk ia ̱ : “ ¿ Jiye ba te yis yua jikäi rä ni na ? ”

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: ¿ Ata ka u ̱ yaka yuäk ia ̱ ka ̱ kuna je u ̱ yakabä wà u ̱ yuäklä wao ̱ nak bäi si ̱ ye na , ñakäi isaka yuäk wao ̱ nak kjermita ye na ?

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Bäräle Säkeklä te ikju ̱ atkawa ̱ kjashakle , ñakäi itäkili wà sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ akle ki ̱ ka ite u ̱ ikju ̱ atkewa ̱ k tso ̱ iwa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ , jewa katabla ji ̱ a ta ̱ i rä ,

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: iwa ̱ iji baawa ̱ si ̱ wà sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ aklä , ki ̱ ka ite je kjasha u ̱ ije ̱ r bäi shäklä wa ia ̱ . Jewa tso ̱ yolole kja iwa ̱ oloi kanakka ̱ .

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Jewa ne rä saje wa rä , ale kile iwa ̱ , ka je rä Judío wa sha ̱ na ebä kuna , ata ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na ñaebä .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Je rä jishtä Oseas ska ite ishe käi : “ Ka yis cha kuna wa , jewa kiemi yis te yis cha wa ni , ka shka ̱ li ̱ blenak kuna yi wa ̱ wa , jewa kiemi yis te yis wa ̱ shka ̱ ta wa ni . ”

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Ñakäi mai iyile ijewa ia ̱ : “ Ka bas dä yis cha wa kuna ni , jeska ijewa kirmi ‘ Säkeklä kseka yabala ni . ’ ”

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Ñakäi Isaías te Israel batala ktei sha täkii : “ Israel yäbeila kuna rä däyë kse ̱ i kjekla ra , elkjebä tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ rä .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkekewa wa ̱ ji yile o ̱ nak , je we ̱ mar plaa ite täkili wà ka ̱ jiska . ”

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Je rä jishtä Isaías te ji sha ña ̱ la wätsa ̱ kba käi : “ Guardia wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ku ̱ ke sa batala ju ̱ ota ̱ napa elkje ra , sa ianacha ̱ wa ̱ rä jishtä Sodoma wa käi , sä weikanacha ̱ wa ̱ rä Gomorra wa käi . ”

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Jera ¿ jini sa te ishemi na ? Ka Judío kuna wa wa ̱ wabiketsaneksa ̱ wämo ye ka yolone kuna , jeiräta ijewa donawa ̱ wabiketsaneksa ̱ wämo ye ja ̱ mi , je rä wabiketsaneksa ̱ wämo ye ji biketse etkabä wà , je ja ̱ mi .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Jekäi Israel wa te ka ̱ wei sä wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye yula , ata ka iwa ̱ iko ̱ ne .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: ¿ Jiye na ? Je rä ka iwa ̱ iyolone rä ji biketse etkabä wà ki ̱ ka , ata ite iyula rä biketsale je dämiksa ̱ rä ji we ̱ wà ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ijewa klasku tkenacha ̱ wa ̱ ale jak sa klasku tkenaklä je ja ̱ mi ,

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Issö , yis te Sión ska jak sa klasku tkenaklä , jak sa ̱ ja ̱ wa ̱ kbäklä , je tkewa ̱ , ata yi te je biketsa ra je ka äinakwa ̱ kuna . ”

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: El wa , yis je ̱ r ska issërke ̱ , ñakäi yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka , je rä ijewa tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Yis te ijewa su ̱ a iyina si ̱ ijewa te Säkeklä kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ pjoo , ata ka je ̱ r ko ̱ le kuna iwa si ̱ ia ̱ .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Iwa rä Säkeklä te sa wabiketseksa ̱ wämo ye ka je ia ̱ ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne , ata ite imabla su ̱ a iwakwa oloi ja ̱ mi iwabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye . Jekäi ka ijewa ñajäwa ̱ Säkeklä te sa wabiketseksa ̱ wämo ye , je wà wabiketsanakksa ̱ wämo ye .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Jekäi Cristo rä ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ e ̱ nakläwa ̱ , je rä biköle yi te ije biketsa wa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Iwa rä sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye ka ̱ wei oloi ja ̱ mi , je yua Moisés te jikäi : “ Yi te jekäi iwawa ̱ ra , je se ̱ rmi je oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Ata sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye ji biketse etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi , je te jikäi ishe rä : “ Ke isha ma je ̱ r na : ‘ ¿ Yibä mika ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska na ? ’ — je rä iwa ̱ Cristo tsa ̱ klätéwa ̱ ni —

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: iräle : ‘ ¿ Yibä minawa ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ ja ̱ r ka ̱ mii ska na ? ’ ” — je rä iwa ̱ Cristo tsa ̱ klätéka ̱ sä dulewa ̱ wa ska .

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: Ata ¿ jibä sha ite ? : “ Kte tso ̱ rä ma ja ̱ mi alemana , bä kjäbata ska , ñakäi ma je ̱ r ska . ” Je kte ne rä ji biketse etkabä ktei wapauta ̱ nak sá wa ̱ rä .

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Je rä ba te isheka ̱ bä kjäbata wà Jesús ne rä Säkekewa ni ra , ñakäi ba te ibiketse ma je ̱ r na Säkeklä te ishki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ni ra , ma tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sa ̱ je ̱ r ska sa te ibiketse , je rä sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye . Sä kjäbata wà sa te isheke ̱ ka ̱ , je rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Iyöle te ishe rä : “ Biköle yi te ije biketsa wa ka äinakcha ̱ wa ̱ kuna . ”

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Judío wa irä , Griego wa irä , jewa rä ka kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kuna . Ata ije ne rä sä biköle Säkekewaí rä . Je te ji we ̱ ke ̱ baa si ̱ ije a ̱ netsäk wa biköle ia ̱ .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta : “ Biköle yi te Säkekewa a ̱ netseke ̱ ikie wà , jewa rä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ . ”

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Ata yi wa ̱ ka ije biketsane ra , ¿ maikäi jewa ia ̱ ia ̱ netsarmi na ? Ñakäi yi wa ̱ ka ije ktei ssële ra , ¿ maikäi jewa te ibiketsemi na ? Ñakäi ka iktei wapaktäk ta ra , ¿ maikäi jewa te iktei ssëmi na ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Ñakäi ¿ maikäi je ktei wapauta ̱ nami ka yi patkene ra na ? Je rä jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Bäije kte baa bata shäk wa klä rä . ”

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Ata ka biköle wa ̱ kte baa dälätsane kuna . Je rä jishtä Isaías te isha käi : “ Säkekewa ¿ yibä te ji yile sa ̱ wa ̱ je kuka iyina ye na ? ”

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Jekäi sa te ji biketseke ̱ etkabä rä sa te kte ssë wà . Je ssë sa te rä Cristo ktei pakarke ̱ wà .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Ata yie ichake , ¿ baishe ra , ka ijewa wa ̱ je ssëne na ? Ñera je ssa ite . “ Ka ̱ biköle ska ijewa ktä ssëna demi , ji sha ite demi ishäkä wätkenawa ̱ kje . ”

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Ata yie ichake : ¿ Je wa ̱ ka Israel wa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne na ? Ñera säkätä Moisés te isha rä : “ Kju ̱ awa ka ji ye kianak kuna wa , je wà yis te bas kju ̱ atkewe ̱ mi . Yis te ka je ̱ r ta kuna wa , je wà bas wätji ̱ we ̱ mi . ”

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Ñakäi Isaías ka suane ishäk : “ Ka yis yuläk kuna wa , jewa te yis ku ̱ a ; Ka yis ktei chakäk kuna wa , jewa ia ̱ yis je ̱ k kjasha . ”

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Ata Israel wa sha ite rä : “ Día kalabe yis jula tkacha ̱ ka yis dälätsäk kuna wa ia ̱ , ka yis ktä ssäk kuna wa ia ̱ . ”

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ichake , ¿ baishe , Säkeklä te iwakei cha wa tulaksa ̱ na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Ñera yis rä ñaebä Israel wa , Abraham batala , Benjamín ditsei wä wa .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Säkeklä wa ̱ iwakei cha wa ju ̱ ñele kja iwa ̱ , jewa ka tuluneksa ̱ kuna . ¿ Ata ka bas wa ̱ jiräni kte yöle te Elías pake rä ju ̱ ñer na ? Ale ite Israel wa kjatia Säkeklä ia ̱ :

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: “ Säkekewa , ijewa te ba wa ̱ kolole jile bata shäk wa ye jewa ktacha ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi jile däläwa ̱ klä ba ia ̱ je mia ̱ tkawa ̱ . Yis ebä ne a ̱ ta ̱ na ji ̱ a kseka rä . Jeiräta ijewa ñajaka ̱ kja yis ktäkwa ̱ ñaebä . ”

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Ata jiräni Säkeklä te ije kuka rä na ? : “ Yis wa ̱ itso ̱ ji ̱ a kolole siete mil ka ñajäklenewa ̱ kuna köchöwä ki ̱ ka Baal wäja ̱ mi . ”

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Je su ̱ ta jir da Säkeklä wa ̱ kolole wa tso ̱ ji ̱ a iwakei je ̱ r bäi sha ki ̱ ka .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Jekäi je ̱ r bäi she ki ̱ ka irä ra , jera ka irä ji we ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna . Ata ikuna rä jile we ̱ ki ̱ ka ra , je ̱ r bäi she rä ka je ̱ r bäi she si ̱ kuna .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: ¿ Jera maikäi irä na ? Ji yula Israel wa te , ka je ko ̱ ne iwa ̱ . Ata kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ wa te je ku ̱ a . Ata isaka je ̱ r doloi tenacha ̱ wa ̱ ,

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Säkeklä te ijewa iawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ka ka ̱ ta ji ̱ a , ka wä wajuer ta ji ̱ a , ka kukä wassër ta ji ̱ a dami ji ̱ a jira kje . ”

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Ñakäi David te ishe : “ Ijewa ñayäke ̱ ebä manenoksa ̱ pa iwäbutrewa ̱ kwa ̱ , ikukäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ja ̱ ma käi , ijolonewa ̱ kcha ̱ wa ̱ , iweikäkcha ̱ wa ̱ nui ki ̱ .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Iwä tuinowa ̱ pa ka iwä wajuenaklä ji ̱ a , ijewa tsi ̱ bata bunowa ̱ pa maitjä . ”

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Jera yis te ichake , ¿ baishe ijewa klasku tkenacha ̱ wa ̱ rä ijolonacha ̱ kläwa ̱ ye na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna ! Tsa ̱ na ra ijewa shirinacha ̱ wa ̱ bata ki ̱ ka ka Israel wa kuna ia ̱ tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ deksa ̱ . Je rä je wa ̱ ijewa kju ̱ atkewa ̱ klä .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Ikuna ijewa shirinacha ̱ wa ̱ bata ki ̱ ka ka ̱ jiska wa bluna tulaka ̱ , ñakäi ijewa weikanacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka ka Israel wa kuna bluna tulaka ̱ ra , je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ ijewa dewa ̱ ni kalabe ra sä blurmi .

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Jekäi yis te ishe bas ka Israel wa kuna ia ̱ , yis dä Jesús ktei bata shäk ka Israel wa kuna ia ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka je yis wa ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak je oloi keka ̱ yis te ,

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: je rä maikäi ra yis wa ̱ yis ditsei wä wa kju ̱ atkewa ̱ kläka ̱ pa je wà yis wa ̱ ijewa manele tsa ̱ tkäkläksa ̱ pa .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Jekäi ikuna Israel wa tulunaksa ̱ bata ki ̱ ka Säkeklä je ̱ r bäinani ka ̱ jiska wa ra , jera ijewa kinawa ̱ ni ra , ¿ ka je rä ijewa shki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulewa ̱ wa sha ̱ na käi na ?

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Jekäi ikuna iwä säkätä rä sikina ra , jera ñakäi iyaka wätule ekta kalabe rä sikina . Ñakäi kal ñak kicha rä sikina ra , jekäi ijula rä ñaebä .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Ñakäi ikuna ijula manele klashäleksa ̱ jewa itäri ska ba rä Olivo ka ̱ niki ̱ ka tkenawa ̱ , banawa ̱ ña je ñak kicha ja ̱ mi , idiä baa ja ̱ mi ra ,

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: ke ma je ̱ k ssaka ̱ ijula saka tsa ̱ ta . Ikuna ba je ̱ k ssäke ̱ ra , ma je ̱ r ja ̱ nopa , ka ba oloi ja ̱ mi kal ña ̱ k se ̱ r dä kuna , ata je ñak ne oloi ja ̱ mi ba se ̱ r dä .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Ba te le ishemi : “ Je ijula klashäleksa ̱ rä yis ne tkenakläwa ̱ je itäri ska ” ni .

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Je rä iyina si ̱ . Ijewa wa ̱ ka ji biketsane etkabä ki ̱ ka iksha tulaksa ̱ rä . Ata ba te ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka ba rä tkelewa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ke ma je ̱ k ssaka ̱ , ata bä suanopa .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä wa ̱ ka je ijula si ̱ janewa ̱ bitaba ra , je wa ̱ ñaebä ka ba janakwa ̱ bitaba .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Ba ku ̱ Säkeklä rä je ̱ r bäi , ñakäi irä sä kpäk därërë je biketsö . Ale jololecha ̱ wa ̱ wa kpa ite därërë , ata ije je ̱ r dä bäi ba ia ̱ , ikuna ba chatkawa ̱ ije ̱ r dä bäi ja ̱ mi ra . Ata ka jekäi kuna ra , ba rä tenakksa ̱ ñaebä .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Ñaebä ikuna ijewa ka se ̱ ne ji ̱ a ka ji biketsale etkabä käi ra , ijewa tkermiwa ̱ ni ikalí ja ̱ mi . Je rä Säkeklä rä täkili ta ijewa tkäkwa ̱ ni spa ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ba rä teleksa ̱ Olivo ka ̱ niki ̱ ka ska , je ne tkenawa ̱ ni Olivo bäi ja ̱ mi rä , ata ka jekäi iwe ̱ rä kuna , jekäi ra tjabana ijula si ̱ tkercha ̱ miwa ̱ ni ikalí ja ̱ mi rä .

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Jekäi el wa , ka bas ñassäkläka ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka , yis kiana bas je ̱ r ku ̱ ak kte blelewa ̱ wà . Je rä Israel wa moska ianacha ̱ wa ̱ je ̱ r ta därërë , ma rämi bikökje ka Israel wa kuna kolole biköle dewa ̱ julu kje .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Jekäi Israel wa biköle tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ jishtä iyöle katke te ishe käi : “ Säbäkäkksa ̱ bitämi Sión ska . Ji ka bäi kuna tse ̱ ju ̱ emi ite Jacob ki ̱ ka .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Je ne rä yis kabläke ̱ ijewa ra , mika ̱ ijewa nui tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami yis te ra rä . ”

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Jekäi kte baa bata ki ̱ ka ijewa ianacha ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä bolki wa ye bas däkläwa ̱ kju ̱ ei , jeiräta sä rä kolonak ki ̱ ka ijewa rä shka ̱ ta ikalí wa kju ̱ ei .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä te ji me ̱ irä ite sä kie irä , je rä ka tse ̱ nakju ̱ mi kuna mik a ̱ ni .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Mikle ra bas dä ka Säkeklä ktä ssäk kuna ; ata jira bas ia ̱ ije ̱ r bäi sha , je rä ijewa wa ̱ ka iktä ssëne kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Jekäi ñakäi jira ijewa rä ka iktä ssäk kuna , je wà ije ̱ r bäi shäklä bas ia ̱ , kjepa ije ̱ r bäi shäklä ijewa ia ̱ .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä te sä biköle iawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ka iktä ssäk kuna , ije ̱ r bäi shäklä biköle ia ̱ .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: E ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ ji baa si ̱ irä , ka ̱ biketse irä , ji ju ̱ ñe irä tso ̱ rä . Ji biketsaleksa ̱ iwa ̱ , je ia ̱ ka yi a ̱ ni je ̱ r ko ̱ nak . Ji we ̱ ite käi , ka je däk sa ̱ je ̱ r na .

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: “ ¿ Yi rä je ̱ r ko ̱ le Säkekewa je ̱ rikä ia ̱ rä na ? ¿ Yi rä delewa ̱ ije ia ̱ jile shäk ye rä na ?

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: ¿ Yibä te ji ma ̱ säkätä iia ̱ iwa ̱ ji ma ̱ klä sa ̱ ia ̱ nui ki ̱ ka käi rä na ? ”

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji biköle datse ̱ rä ije ne ska , ije ne oloi ja ̱ mi , ije ne ia ̱ . ¡ Ije ne ia ̱ oloi kaneka ̱ döksa ̱ pa jekjeyemi rä ! ¡ Amén !

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Jekäi el wa , Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha sa ̱ ia ̱ ki ̱ ka , yie bas pake bas yaka tuläkksa ̱ jishtä ji me ̱ leka ̱ kseka käi , sikina , Säkeklä wäbätsäklä bäi . Je ne rä bas te ikja ̱ nei we ̱ si ̱ rä .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Ke bas ñadulawa ̱ k jira ji tso ̱ ja ̱ mi , ata bas je ̱ rikäke ̱ spa ̱ na ja ̱ mi bas ñamanewo ̱ ksa ̱ ni . Je ne ra ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi rä , ji rä bäi käi , ji rä kianak käi , ji rä deleksa ̱ bäi käi .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Ji me ̱ le yis ia ̱ wà yie bas biköle ia ̱ ishe ekla ekla , ke bas je ̱ k biketsa bas dä bakleka ̱ ju ̱ bäi si ̱ ni . Ata wë je je ̱ k biketsöksa ̱ tsa ̱ na bikö Säkeklä wa ̱ bas ia ̱ ji biketse etkabä bala pa ̱ le je ja ̱ mi .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Jekäi sa yaka wäjienaklä rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , ata je kalabe ka wao ̱ r dä ñaebä kuna .

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Jekäi ñaebä saje wa rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , jewa dewa ̱ rä ekla yaka yebä Cristo ja ̱ mi , wäjielewa ̱ ñara .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Jekäi ji wa ̱ klä tso ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa me ̱ le ije ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ ja ̱ mi . Sa ̱ ia ̱ ime ̱ le sä ktäklä jile bata shäk ye ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ ji shö bikö sa ia ̱ ji biketsar etkabä ja ̱ mi ;

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: sa saka tsa ̱ tkäklä ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ itsa ̱ tkö ; sa paktäklä ra , sa ku ̱ sa paktö ;

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: sa saka täkiwa ̱ klä ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ itäkiwo ̱ ; jile ma ̱ klä sa saka ia ̱ ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ imo ka kjele ta kuna ; sa saka wäsikäklä ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ je wo ̱ tsa ̱ na ; sa ̱ je ̱ r bäi shäklä ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ je wo ̱ je ̱ r baa wà .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö ka kje yile ebä kuna , ji yakei wakble dokoitsalewa ̱ , ji bäi ebä kololewa ̱ ,

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: ñashka ̱ li ̱ blele ekla ekla ñaje ̱ keta wa käi ; ñadälätsalewa ̱ , sa saka biketsale sa wakwa tsa ̱ ta ;

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: ji shena o ̱ nak tsa ̱ na , je wa ̱ k ka ka ̱ niblele ta kuna , je ̱ r ssële täkii , o ̱ le Säkekewa ia ̱ käi ,

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: ssële a ̱ naa ji ki ̱ ssäk , weikane katabläk je ̱ r baa wà , chatkelewa ̱ ka ̱ kiäk itkenawa ̱ ye ,

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: sä sikii wa ki ̱ jile shena ra , ijewa tsa ̱ tkäk ; sa saka kiäkwa ̱ je ̱ r baa wà .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Bas kukäkwa ̱ weikanak wa ia ̱ ji bäi shö o ̱ nak . Ji bäi shö o ̱ nak ijewa ia ̱ , ata ke ijewa shaksa ̱ iweikanowa ̱ pa .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Bas ssëno a ̱ naa ssënak a ̱ naa wa ra , ñakäi bas ji ̱ o ji ̱ ak wa ra ,

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: ssële ñara etka yebä , ka je ̱ k ssële ta sa saka tsa ̱ ta , ata je ̱ r ssële bäi emana wa ra . Ke bas je ̱ k biketsa ka ̱ biketsäk ta ̱ i ni .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Yi te ji yakei wakbla ba ukä ja ̱ mi , je ukä ja ̱ mi ke ji yakei wakbla nui ki ̱ . Bas ñajöksa ̱ se ̱ nak wämo biköle wäna .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ tsa ̱ na biköle se ̱ naklä bitaba bas da , bikö bas ia ̱ io ̱ r käi .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Bas dikäla , ke bas ku ̱ yi kukawa ̱ nui ki ̱ , ata je jöwa ̱ Säkeklä kju ̱ atkäklä ira . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke : “ Yis ne rä sä kukäkwa ̱ nui ki ̱ rä ; yis ne te je nui kpemi rä . ” Jekäi Säkekewa te ishe rä .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Ata “ bäli te bä bolki ktawa ̱ ra , ichewo ̱ , ñakäi ije ̱ r banawa ̱ ra , itiö . Ba te jekäi iwá ̱ ra , je wà ba te ije wäktä mawe ̱ miksa ̱ äine wà . ”

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Ke ji yakei tu ̱ noka ̱ pa ba ki ̱ ka . Ata ji bäi ne wà ba tu ̱ noka ̱ pa ji yakei ki ̱ ka rä .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Biköle ñajöcho ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ wei ta bakleka ̱ wa yika . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ wei ta wa ka kuna ka patkele Säkeklä wa ̱ käi . Ata ijewa tso ̱ rä kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yi te ka ̱ wei ta wa ka ktä ssë ra , je rä ite ji kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ ne ka ktä ssë rä . Jekäi yilé wa ̱ ka iktä ssëne ra , jewa te weikane kiemika ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Jekäi ji wäkiri wa tso ̱ rä ji bäi wa ̱ k wa ka suawa ̱ k kuna , ata ji yakei wakbläk wa ne suawa ̱ k . ¿ Ba ki ̱ sa suawe ̱ ka ̱ wei ta wa te ka sher na ? Jera ba ku ̱ ji bäi ebä wo ̱ . Jera je ki ̱ ba kjeiyirmi .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije rä Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k kianak bäi ba ia ̱ . Ata ba te ji yakei wakbla ra , ba suanopa . Je rä ka ije espada shkä rä kje ka wata käi kuna ki ̱ ka . Ije rä Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k sä kukäkwa ̱ ji yakei wakble ki ̱ buka ̱ nak .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas kiana ñajäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ije yika , ka je rä ite bas kpemi ebä ki ̱ ka kuna , ata ñakäi ka bas je ̱ r ssënaklä nui ta ye .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Je ne bata ki ̱ ka bas te inaklä kirke ̱ ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi je tju ̱ eke ̱ rä . Je rä ijewa rä Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa ki ̱ ka . Jekäi ijewa te je ebä ne kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ rä .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Biköle ia ̱ imo jishtä ishena me ̱ nak käi ; mane te inaklä kieke ̱ ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ra , je tju ̱ ak iia ̱ käi ; mane te inaklä bäkeke ̱ me ̱ nak ra , je ma ̱ k iia ̱ käi ; mane yika sa kiana suanak ra , je yika suanak käi ; mane kiana oloitsanak ra , je oloitsäk käi .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Ke bas nui kuka yi a ̱ ni ra , ata ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ne rä sa ̱ nui del dä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te isaka shka ̱ li ̱ bla ra , je te ka ̱ wei wawá ̱ .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , iyile : “ Ke ma manena , ke sa ktawa ̱ , ke ba jakbla , ke sa saka däli tkenak ma ja ̱ mi , ” je iräle sa pakale ji wa ̱ k saka iräle , je ñak rä jikäi : “ Ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ blö jishtä ba wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi . ”

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
