text: Or saith he it altogether for our sakes ? For our sakes , no doubt , this is written : that he that ploweth should plow in hope ; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope .
text2: Ata ¿ ka je yile rä saje wa ne je ̱ rku ̱ aklä na ? Ñera je yöle katke rä saje wa ne je ̱ rku ̱ aklä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te ka ̱ bieke ̱ watkenak ra , je kiana ibiäk biketsale jile dämiksa ̱ iia ̱ käi . Ñakäi yi te trigo wäkpeke ̱ ra , je kiana ibiketsäk iwä dämiksa ̱ iia ̱ .

text: If we have sown unto you spiritual things , is it a great thing if we shall reap your carnal things ?
text2: Jekäi sá te ji rä wikblu iá tkawa ̱ bas sha ̱ na kjepa sá te ji yaka iá wä kuke bas sha ̱ na ra , ¿ je rä she ta na ?

text: If others be partakers of this power over you , are not we rather ? Nevertheless we have not used this power ; but suffer all things , lest we should hinder the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ikuna kju ̱ awa wa ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ bas ji kiäklä ra , ¿ ka irä bäi si ̱ sá ne ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ rä na ? Sá ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ je kiäklä , ata ka sá wa ̱ je kine , ata sá te ji biköle katabla ka ji a ̱ ni wa ̱ Cristo ktei baa wätkewa ̱ klä kuna .

text: Do ye not know that they which minister about holy things live of the things of the temple ? and they which wait at the alter are partakers with the alter ?
text2: ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer shka ̱ bläk Templo ska wa te rä ji tso ̱ me ̱ le Templo ska je ne ñe rä na ? Ñakäi ¿ ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jeska jile däläwa ̱ klä wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k wa te ji me ̱ leka ̱ ne kaku käteke ̱ ña rä na ?

text: Even so hath the Lord ordained that they which preach the gospel should live of the gospel .
text2: Je su ̱ ta Säkekewa te kte baa bata shäk wa paka se ̱ nak je kte baa kja ̱ nei we ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: But I have used none of these things : neither have I written these things , that it should be so done unto me : for it were better for me to die , than that any man should make my glorying void .
text2: Ata sá ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ je kiäklä , ata ka sá wa ̱ je kine . Ñakäi ka yis wa ̱ jí äyë yöne bas wa ̱ jekäi ji ma ̱ klä yis ia ̱ kuna . ¡ Bäi si ̱ yis ia ̱ ra yis duäwa ̱ ne rä , yilé te yis je ̱ k ssäke ̱ wäshewe ̱ wa ̱ tsa ̱ ta rä !

text: For though I preach the gospel , I have nothing to glory of : for necessity is laid upon me ; yea , woe is unto me , if I preach not the gospel !
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , yis te kte baa ne bata sheke ̱ rä ra , ka yis je ̱ k kjeishäklei , je rä je we ̱ ke ̱ yis te rä yis dä kolole iwa ̱ k ki ̱ ka . Ata ka yis wa ̱ je kte baa bata yine ra , ¡ säli yis dä !

text: For if I do this thing willingly , I have a reward : but if against my will , a dispensation of the gospel is committed unto me .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te je we ̱ ke ̱ je ̱ r baa wà ra , yis ia ̱ je säkei rä däkksa ̱ . Ata yis te je we ̱ dokolewa ̱ wà ra , jera yie je we ̱ rä yis dä kolole iwa ̱ k je ebä ki ̱ ka .

text: What is my reward then ? Verily that , when I preach the gospel , I may make the gospel of Christ without charge , that I abuse not my power in the gospel .
text2: Jera ¿ mane rä yis ia ̱ je säkei deksa ̱ rä na ? Je rä yis te kte baa wapakteke ̱ ra , yis te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä ka to ̱ le kuna . Yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ ji kiäklä kte baa kju ̱ ei , ata yis te ka jekäi ikie kuna , je rä ka ̱ tso ̱ yis ia ̱ ji kiäklä je ka wawa ̱ klä kuna yis wa ̱ .

text: For though I be free from all men , yet have I made myself servant unto all , that I might gain the more .
text2: Ka yis dä kololewa ̱ yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ikjanaklä ye , ata yis je ̱ k jawa ̱ biköle kjanaklä ye , yis wa ̱ sä kukäklä ki ̱ ta .

text: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew , that I might gain the Jews ; to them that are under the law , as under the law , that I might gain them that are under the law ;
text2: Jekäi Judío wa ska ra , yis je ̱ k iawa ̱ wa ̱ Judío ye yis wa ̱ ijewa kukäklä . Ka yis dä kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ , jeiräta kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ wa ska ra , yis je ̱ k iawa ̱ wa ̱ kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ ye , yis wa ̱ kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ wa kukäklä .

text: To them that are without law , as without law , ( being not without law to God , but under the law to Christ , ) that I might gain them that are without law .
text2: Jekäi ka kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ wa ska ra , yis je ̱ k iawa ̱ wa ̱ ka kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ käi . Jeiräta ka yis dami rä ka Säkeklä ka ̱ wei ta käi kuna , ata yis dami rä Cristo ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi , yis wa ̱ ka kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ wa kukäklä .

text: To the weak became I as weak , that I might gain the weak : I am made all things to all men , that I might by all means save some .
text2: Jekäi ka täki ta wa ska ra , yis je ̱ k iawa ̱ wa ̱ ka täki ta wa käi , yis wa ̱ ijewa kukäklä . Jekäi biköle ia ̱ yis je ̱ kja ji wa ̱ k ijewa te ji we ̱ ke ̱ käi , ji biköle wà yis wa ̱ manele tsa ̱ tkäkläkksa ̱ .

text: And this I do for the gospel ' s sake , that I might be partaker thereof with you .
text2: Jekäi yis te je biköle we ̱ ke ̱ kte baa bata ki ̱ ka , yis ia ̱ ji bäi däkläksa ̱ ña .

text: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all , but one receiveth the prize ? So run , that ye may obtain .
text2: ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer estadio ska julunak wa biköle rä julunak , ata eklabä ne ia ̱ ji säkei ta däke ̱ ksa ̱ rä na ? Je ki ̱ bas juluno rä maikäi ra idäkläksa ̱ bas ia ̱ käi .

text: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things . Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown ; but we an incorruptible .
text2: Je su ̱ ta inak wa biköle ñadulawa ̱ ke ̱ bäi ji biköle we ̱ ke ̱ ite ska . Ijewa te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä corona ji ̱ alinakwa ̱ däkläksa ̱ iia ̱ ki ̱ ka . Ata saje wa te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä ka ji ̱ alinakwa ̱ kuna shtä ki ̱ ka .

text: I therefore so run , not as uncertainly ; so fight I , not as one that beateth the air :
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yis tu ̱ r dä bäi , ka jöina diana käi kuna . Ñakäi yis ñakpäke ̱ rä bäi , ka je rä ka ̱ tie si ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ jula wà käi kuna .

text: But I keep under my body , and bring it into subjection : lest that by any means , when I have preached to others , I myself should be a castaway .
text2: Ata yis je ̱ k yaka weikäke ̱ ije ̱ k jäkläwa ̱ yis ktä ssäk , ka yis wakei ju ̱ nakläksa ̱ kuna biköle pautäle yis wa ̱ je ukä ska .

text: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;
text2: El wa , yis ki ̱ bas shena je ̱ r ko ̱ nak sa kalí wa biköle bakle mo ̱ niki ̱ ka , ñakäi biköle bakleksa ̱ julu däyë na je ia ̱ ,

text: And were all baptized unto Moses in the cloud and in the sea ;
text2: ñaebä je ̱ r ko ̱ nak ijewa biköle wäoka ̱ na Moisés ja ̱ mi mo ̱ na irä däyë na irä je ia ̱ ,

text: And did all eat the same spiritual meat ;
text2: ñakäi ijewa biköle te rä ñanak wikblu iá ebä ne ña ,

text: And did all drink the same spiritual drink : for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them : and that Rock was Christ .
text2: ñakäi ijewa biköle te rä diklä wikblu iá ebä ne ya . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ijewa te jak wikblu iá dami iitä wà je diklei ne ya rä . Je jak rä Cristo .

text: But with many of them God was not well pleased : for they were overthrown in the wilderness .
text2: Ata ijewa wäbäli wà ka Säkeklä wäbatsa ̱ ne . Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa tuana nu ̱ la tulunata ̱ na ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska rä .

text: Now these things were our examples , to the intent we should not lust after evil things , as they also lusted .
text2: Je biköle o ̱ na rä sä wäji ̱ atkäklä ye , ka sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ji yakei tkenaklä jishtä ijewa ja ̱ mi itkena käi .

text: Neither be ye idolaters , as were some of them ; as it is written , The people sat down to eat and drink , and rose up to play .
text2: Ke bas ianakcha ̱ wa ̱ jile kekläí me ̱ i kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k , jishtä ijewa sha ̱ käi , jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Ditsä ñajaklawa ̱ yäkäk ji yäk , jekäi iñajaka ̱ inak . ”

text: Neither let us commit fornication , as some of them committed , and fell in one day three and twenty thousand .
text2: Ke sa ̱ ka ̱ wakblewa ̱ k jishtä ijewa sha ̱ ka ̱ wakblewa ̱ käi . Je bata ki ̱ ka ijewa tuanacha ̱ wa ̱ veintitres mil ka ̱ etkabä wà .

text: Neither let us tempt Christ , as some of them also tempted , and were destroyed of serpents .
text2: Ke sa ̱ ku ̱ Cristo wätji ̱ wa ̱ k jishtä ijewa sha ̱ manele te iwätji ̱ wa ̱ käi , je bata ki ̱ ka ijewa tuawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ tkäbe te .

text: Neither murmur ye , as some of them also murmured , and were destroyed of the destroyer .
text2: Ke sa kta yakei jishtä ijewa sha ̱ manele kta yakei käi , je bata ki ̱ ka ijewa tuawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ sä tuawa ̱ kwa ̱ te .

text: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples : and they are written for our admonition , upon whom the ends of the world are come .
text2: Je biköle o ̱ na ijewa ukä ja ̱ mi rä sä wäji ̱ atkäklä ye , je katke yöle rä saje wa tso ̱ jí sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä bakle bata jekje ska wa je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä .

text: Wherefore let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yi te ibiketse irä chatkelewa ̱ bäi , je se ̱ no tsa ̱ na , ka ishirinakläwa ̱ kuna .

text: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man : but God is faithful , who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able ; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape , that ye may be able to bear it .
text2: Sa ̱ je ̱ r kiwe ̱ ji shi ̱ ana te ka je rä ja ̱ leka ̱ kuna bas ki ̱ ka ka sa ̱ wa ̱ issële kje . Säkeklä rä ji wa ̱ k bulee , je wa ̱ ka bas janakwa ̱ je ̱ r kinak ji shi ̱ ana wà ka ikatabler ji ̱ a kje , ata je sha ̱ na ite bas tsa ̱ tkemi kjäkksa ̱ julu , bas täkili däkläka ̱ iwäkukäk ji ̱ a .

text: Wherefore , my dearly beloved , flee from idolatry .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas dikäla , jile kekläí me ̱ i kja ̱ nei we ̱ cho ̱ bas ku ̱ .

text: I speak as to wise men ; judge ye what I say .
text2: Yis ktäke ̱ bas da , jishtä je ̱ r ta wa ia ̱ ji she käi . Bas wakwa ku ̱ yie ji sheke ̱ wabiketsö .

text: The cup of blessing which we bless , is it not the communion of the blood of Christ ? The bread which we break , is it not the communion of the body of Christ ?
text2: Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäklä copaí kjeiyinak sa ̱ wa ̱ , ¿ ka je rä sä wäjienakläña Cristo pi ra na ? Pan butsa ̱ nak sa ̱ wa ̱ , ¿ ka je rä sä wäjienakläña Cristo yaka ra na ?

text: For we being many are one bread , and one body : for we are all partakers of that one bread .
text2: Jekäi pan rä etaba ebä , je wà saje wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dewa ̱ ekla yaka ye , sä biköle te je pan ebä ne ña rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Behold Israel after the flesh : are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the alter ?
text2: Bas ku ̱ ji biketsö Israel wa te iwe ̱ ja ̱ mi . Yi te jile me ̱ leka ̱ käte ra , ¿ ka jewa rä wäjielewa ̱ ña ikja ̱ nei o ̱ rke ̱ jile däläwa ̱ klä ska ra na ?

text: What say I then ? that the idol is any thing , or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing ?
text2: ¿ Jiräni yie isheke ̱ wà rä ? ¿ Ji me ̱ leka ̱ jile kekläí me ̱ i ia ̱ rä ji säkei ta käi na ? ¿ Jile kekläí me ̱ i rä ji säkei ta käi na ?

text: But I say , that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice , they sacrifice to devils , and not to God : and I would not that ye should have fellowship with devils .
text2: Kai , ata yie ishe , jile kekläí me ̱ i kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa te ji me ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ ra , je me ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ ijewa te rä be ne ia ̱ , ka je rä Säkeklä ia ̱ kuna . Jekäi ka yis ki ̱ bas shene ñawäjiäkwa ̱ be ra .

text: Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord , and the cup of devils : ye cannot be partakers of the Lord ' s table , and of the table of devils .
text2: Ka bas ia ̱ Säkekewa copaí irä be copaí irä wayanak . Ka bas ia ̱ Säkekewa mesaí irä be mesaí irä wañanak .

text: Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy ? are we stronger than he ?
text2: Ata ¿ sä te Säkekewa kju ̱ atkewe ̱ mi sa ra na ? ¿ Sä rä täkili ta ije tsa ̱ ta na ?

text: All things are lawful for me , but all things are not expedient : all things are lawful for me , but all things edify not .
text2: Ishe : “ Ka ̱ tso ̱ ji biköle wa ̱ klä . ” Ata ka ji biköle rä kianak kuna . Ishe : “ Ka ̱ tso ̱ ji biköle wa ̱ klä . ” Ata ka ji biköle ia ̱ sa ̱ ki ̱ wäjienak .

text: Let no man seek his own , but every man another ' s wealth .
text2: Ke yi a ̱ ni ku ̱ ji we ̱ bäi je ̱ k ia ̱ biketsa , ata je ku ̱ ji rä bäi isaka ia ̱ ne biketsö rä .

text: Whatsoever is sold in the shambles , that eat , asking no question for conscience sake :
text2: Ji yaka wato ̱ rke ̱ iwatju ̱ aklä ska , je kätö ka chakale kuna iöle sä ssërmi nui ta kju ̱ ei .

text: For the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ishäkä rä Säkekewa cha , ji tso ̱ iki ̱ biköle ñaebä .

text: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast , and ye be disposed to go ; whatsoever is set before you , eat , asking no question for conscience sake .
text2: Jekäi yilé ka Jesús biketsäk kuna te bas kieke ̱ yäkäk ra , jera bas ssëna minak ra , ji tapawa ̱ ite bas wäja ̱ mi käi kätö , ka chakale kuna iö sä ssërmi nui ta kju ̱ ei .

text: But if any man say unto you , This is offered in sacrifice unto idols , eat not for his sake that shewed it , and for conscience sake : for the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof :
text2: Ata yilé te bas ia ̱ ishe : “ Je rä me ̱ leka ̱ jile kekläí me ̱ i ia ̱ ” ni , jera ke ikata , je ishäk kju ̱ ei , ñakäi sä ssërmi nui ta ki ̱ ka .

text: Conscience , I say , not thine own , but of the other : for why is my liberty judged of another man ' s conscience ?
text2: Ata ka je rä yie jekäi ishe iöle ba ssërmi nui ta ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä ije ssërmi jekäi ki ̱ ka . Ata ¿ jiye yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ ji wa ̱ klä kjermita wabiketseke ̱ kju ̱ awa te ije ssërke ̱ nui ta bata ki ̱ ka rä na ?

text: For if I by grace be a partaker , why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks ?
text2: Ñera yis te wekte sha je ñanak ki ̱ ka ra , ¿ jiye yis yirke ̱ yakei ji ki ̱ yis te Säkeklä kjeisha kju ̱ ei rä na ?

text: Whether therefore ye eat , or drink , or whatsoever ye do , do all to the glory of God .
text2: Jikäi iwa rä : Sä te ji ña iräle , ji ya iräle , jile saka wá ̱ iräle , jera je biköle wo ̱ rä Säkeklä oloi kanakläka ̱ .

text: Give none offence , neither to the Jews , nor to the Gentiles , nor to the church of God :
text2: Ke bas ku ̱ sa saka yakei tewa ̱ k Judío wa iräle Griego wa iräle , tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ wa iräle .

text: Even as I please all men in all things , not seeking mine own profit , but the profit of many , that they may be saved .
text2: Ata bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ jishtä yis te ji biköle we ̱ tsa ̱ na käi , bena ssënaklä bäi käi . Ka yis te ji kiarke ̱ yis wakei ia ̱ je biketse kuna , ata ji rä bäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ia ̱ ijewa tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ , je ne biketse yie rä .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Bas ku ̱ yis mablö jishtä yis te Cristo mable käi .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Yis te bas kjeishe bäi , ji biköle we ̱ ke ̱ bas te ra bas je ̱ r ja ̱ na yis wa ̱ iyile ska je ki ̱ ka , ñakäi bas chatkawa ̱ yis wa ̱ bas pautäle ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Ata jira yis ki ̱ bas shena ijuñak Cristo rä jäiyi wa biköle tsa ̱ ku ̱ i . Je su ̱ ta jäiyi wa rä alaklä wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ñakäi Säkeklä rä Cristo tsa ̱ ku ̱ i .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Jekäi jäiyi wa ka ̱ kiä iräle ite ji bata sheke ̱ iräle tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ telewa ̱ ra , je rä ite ji äina wá ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Ata alaklä wa ka ̱ kiä iräle ite ji bata sheke ̱ iräle ka tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ tele kuna ra , je rä ite ji äina wá ̱ itsa ̱ ku ̱ ukä ja ̱ mi . Je rä jishtä tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä sikleju ̱ mi kalabe käi .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: Jekäi alaklä wa ka tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ tiakle ra , itsa ̱ ku ̱ kä tiö ju ̱ omi kalabe . Ata alaklä wa ia ̱ ra tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä tie iräle isike ju ̱ emi iräle je rä äina ra , je ku ̱ iki ̱ tiöwa ̱ .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Ata ka jäiyi wa kiar itsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ tiäkwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jäiyi wa ne rä Säkeklä wakei me ̱ i rä , ñakäi ijewa ne rä ioloi käkka ̱ rä , ata alaklä wa ne rä jäiyi wa oloi käkka ̱ rä .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka jäiyi wa bitele rä alaklä wa ska kuna , ata alaklä wa ne bitele jäiyi wa ska rä ,

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: ñakäi ka jäiyi wa yöneksa ̱ rä alaklä wa kju ̱ ei kuna , ata alaklä wa ne yönaksa ̱ jäiyi wa kju ̱ ei rä .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka alaklä wa kiana jile tkäkka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ ángel wa kju ̱ ei , ijuenaklä irä tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ta .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Jeiräta Säkekewa ja ̱ mi ra , ka jäiyi wa tso ̱ rä iwakwa je ̱ r wà kuna , ata je tso ̱ rä alaklä wa ne oloi ja ̱ mi , ñakäi ka alaklä wa tso ̱ rä iwakwa je ̱ r wà kuna , ata je tso ̱ rä jäiyi wa ne oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , jishtä alaklä wa bitele rä jäiyi wa ska , je su ̱ ta jäiyi wa ko ̱ rke ̱ ni rä alaklä wa oloi ja ̱ mi . Ata ji biköle bitäke ̱ rä Säkeklä ska .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Bas wakwa ku ̱ iwabiketsö , ¿ alaklä wa ka ̱ kiä Säkeklä ia ̱ ka tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ tele kuna , je rä bäi na ?

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: ¿ Baishe ka bas je ̱ r ku ̱ e ite sä bitele ja ̱ mi ra , jäiyi wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä je ̱ newa ̱ matsi ̱ i ̱ je wà ijuer dä äina na ?

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: Ata alaklä wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä je ̱ newa ̱ matsi ̱ i ̱ , je rä ijuenaklä baa , je rä me ̱ leta ̱ na iia ̱ ije ̱ k ki ̱ tiäklä ye ki ̱ ka .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: Je ktei te yilé kju ̱ atkewa ̱ kle ra , je je ̱ r ko ̱ nopa jekäi ebä saje wädular dä , tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ eyaka eyaka wa ñaebä .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Ata jí yie ishe mar bas ia ̱ , je ki ̱ ka ka yis wa ̱ bas kjeiyinak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka bas ñatapawa ̱ ke ̱ rä ñaki ̱ bäiwa ̱ k kuna , ata ñaki ̱ iawa ̱ k ebä .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , isäkätä rä jikäi : Je rä yie ipalei ssa mika ̱ bas taparke ̱ etkayebä ra , jeska bas ñabalabutsäke ̱ . Yie ibiketse je sha ̱ rä iyina .

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra bas shena ñabalabutsäkksa ̱ , bas sha ̱ na yi rä deleksa ̱ bäi juenakläwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Mika ̱ bas taparke ̱ ra , ka je rä ji ñak bas je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä Säkekewa dulewa ̱ ska kuna .

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Je rä bas yäkä mar da , biköle te ikukeke ̱ ba je ̱ k ia ̱ . Jera manele kte kate bäli te , ata isaka tso ̱ kja di yëë .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: Jera ¿ ka bas dä ju ta bas ji ñaklä ji yäklä na ? ¿ Jiye bas te tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ wa kuke diekjela rä na ? ¿ Jiye bas te ka jita wa äinewe ̱ ke ̱ rä na ? ¿ Ji she yie bas ia ̱ na ? ¿ Yis te bas kjeishe na ? Ka je ̱ ki ̱ yie bas kjeishe .

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ji wà Säkekewa te yis je ̱ r ku ̱ a , je wà yis te bas pakta rä . Je rä Säkekewa Jesús ju ̱ naksa ̱ tuinei wà ite pan kukawa ̱ ,

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: je ki ̱ ite wekte sha Säkeklä ia ̱ , kjepa ite ibutsa te isha : “ A ̱ ju ̱ , jí ño . Jí rä yis yaka . Je rä butsa ̱ nak tkäwa ̱ bas kju ̱ ei . Jikäi bas ku ̱ iwo ̱ bas je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä yis ska . ”

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Je su ̱ ta iyaká e ̱ ná ra , ite copa kukawa ̱ te isha : “ Jí copa ne rä sa kabläklä ñaia ̱ spa ̱ na yis pi wà rä . Bitäbä kicha bas te je yeke ̱ käi ra , je wo ̱ bas je ̱ r ja ̱ na ̱ klä yis ska . ”

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Jekäi bitäbä kicha bas te je pan ñeke ̱ käi , je copa wayeke ̱ käi , jera je wà bas te Säkekewa dulewa ̱ bata sheke ̱ marä ije däni kje .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Jekäi yi te je pan ña , je Säkekewa copaí waya , ka oloitsale kuna ra , je rä nui ta Säkekewa yaka irä ipi irä ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sa wakwa je ̱ k wabiketsöksa ̱ ekla ekla , je ne kjepa je pan ñeke ̱ je copa wayeke ̱ rä .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: Iwa rä sa te je ña je ya kjermita ka biketsale kuna je rä Säkekewa yaka ni ra , je rä sä te weikane ne ñawa ̱ yawa ̱ sa wakei je ̱ k ia ̱ rä .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Je ne bata ki ̱ ka bas sha ̱ na chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa tso ̱ duë ta rä , ja ̱ lma ̱ lecha ̱ wa ̱ rä , ñakäi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa duacha ̱ wa ̱ rä .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Ata sa wakei je ̱ k wabiketsaksa ̱ tsa ̱ na ra , jera ka sä buka ̱ nak kuna .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Jeiräta Säkekewa te sa kpa sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ aklä ra , je rä ka sä weikanakläwa ̱ kuna ka ̱ jiska wa ra .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Jekäi yis el wa , mika ̱ bas ñatapawa ̱ ke ̱ yäkäk ra , bas ñaki ̱ ssöpa .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: Ata yilé ktawa ̱ bäli te ra , je yäkö ijuka , ka bas ñatapawa ̱ klä nui kukäk ebä . Jekäi jile ktei saka tso ̱ paruemi yis te mika ̱ yis demiju ̱ ra .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Ata el wa , yis ki ̱ bas shena je ̱ r ko ̱ nak Säkeklä wikblu wa ̱ itso ̱ me ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ je wà .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mika ̱ bas dä ka Säkeklä biketsäk kuna ra , bas ñajawa ̱ sika ̱ nak janakmi jile kekläí me ̱ i ka ktäk kuna je itäki ̱ .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yis te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ e , yi ktäkka ̱ Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi je a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka iyinak : “ Jesús weikanowa ̱ pa ” ni , ñakäi yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka iyinak : “ Jesús ne rä Säkekewa rä ” , ata je rä Wikblu Sikina ebä ne oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Ji tso ̱ me ̱ le sa ̱ ia ̱ rä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa , ata wikblu ima ̱ k rä eklabä .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Jekäi ikja ̱ nei we ̱ tso ̱ rä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa , ata je Säkekewaí rä eklabä .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Ñaebä jile we ̱ tso ̱ rä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa , ata Säkeklä eklabä ne te ji biköle we ̱ sä biköle ia ̱ rä .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Jekäi je wikblu te ji kjasheke ̱ sa ̱ ja ̱ mi je rä me ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ ekla ekla sa ̱ ñatsa ̱ tkäklä .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Ekla ia ̱ irä me ̱ nak je wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi iktäklä je ̱ rike ta käi , ata isaka ia ̱ ji ka ju ̱ ñer iwa ̱ je rä kjayinak iwa ̱ pakanak je wikblu ebä oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Isaka ia ̱ irä me ̱ nak je wikblu ebä wa ̱ iwa ̱ ji biketsäklä etkabä , isaka ia ̱ sä bäiwa ̱ klä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa rä me ̱ nak je wikblu ebä wa ̱ ,

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: isaka ia ̱ rä ji wa ̱ klä täkili ta , isaka ia ̱ rä Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yinak bata shäklä , isaka ia ̱ rä isu ̱ aklä mane wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi ji o ̱ rke ̱ ji yirke ̱ iräle käi , isaka ia ̱ rä iktäkläka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa saka saka wà , isaka ia ̱ rä je kte kju ̱ awa wapakäklä .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Ata je biköle we ̱ ke ̱ rä je wikblu ebä te ; je te ime ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ ekla ekla jishtä iwakei te ibiketse ja ̱ mi .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Sa wakei rä eklabä , ata sä wäjienaklä rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ . Jewa rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , jeiräta sä wäjienaklä kalabe rä wäjielewa ̱ etkayebä sä yaka ye . Je su ̱ ta Cristo rä .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , wikblu eklabä wà sä biköle wäoka ̱ na däkwa ̱ ekla yaka ye , Judío wa iräle Griego wa iräle , kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye wa iräle ka kololewa ̱ kuna wa iräle , jekäi sä biköle ia ̱ je wikblu eklabä me ̱ na yanak .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Jekäi sä yaka wäjienaklä rä ka etkabä kuna , ata je rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Jekäi sä klä kuna ishäk : “ Ka yis dä jula kuna ki ̱ ka ka yis dä sä yaka ekta kuna ” ni , jera ¿ je ebä ki ̱ ka ka irä iyaka ekta kuna na ?

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Ñakäi sä kukä kuna ishäk : “ Ka yis dä wäbala kuna ki ̱ ka ka yis dä sä yaka ekta kuna ” ni , jera ¿ je ebä ki ̱ ka ka irä iyaka ekta kuna na ?

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: Sä yaka kalabe kuna wäbala ye ebä ra , ¿ ji wà sä ji ssämi na ? Ñakäi sa yaka kalabe kuna kukä ye ebä ra , ¿ ji wà sä ji jalassämi na ?

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: Ata Säkeklä te je sä wäjienaklä wäjiawa ̱ sa yaka ja ̱ mi etkä etkä maikäi ije ki ̱ ishena käi .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: Jekäi ikuna sä wäjienaklä kalabe rä etkabä ra , ¿ me sa yaka ekta dämi rä na ?

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: Jekäi sä wäjienaklä rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , ata sa wakei yaka rä eklabä .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: Sä wäbala wa ̱ ka ishäklei sä jula ia ̱ : “ Ka yis ki ̱ ba sher . ” Ñaebä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ wa ̱ ka ishäklei sä klä ia ̱ : “ Ka yis ki ̱ ba sher . ”

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: Ata tsa ̱ na ra , sä wäjienaklä juer ta ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ , je ne rä kianak bäi si ̱ rä .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Jekäi sä yaka wäjienaklä manele ssër sa ̱ ia ̱ ka bäi si ̱ kuna , je pajie sä te bäiwa ̱ si ̱ . Sä wäjienaklä juer ta äina , jewa se ̱ newe ̱ sä te tsa ̱ na si ̱ .

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: Ata sä wäjienaklä juer ta bäi , ka jewa ki ̱ ji sher kuna . Jekäi Säkeklä te sä wäjienaklä ka juer ta bäi kuka ibäi si ̱ ye isaka tsa ̱ ta . Jekäi ite sä yaka wäjia rä .

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: Je rä ka sa yaka bala butsa ̱ naklä kuna ñayika , ata je rä sä yaka wäjienaklä , jewa je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ñadälänaklä .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: Jekäi sä wäjienaklä etka te ji shka ̱ l ssëke ̱ ra , sä wäjienaklä kalabe te idälär ssëke ̱ ña . Ata sä wäjienaklä etka kjeiyina ra , sä wäjienaklä kalabe ssërke ̱ ña a ̱ naa ira .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Jekäi bas dä Cristo yaka . Ekla ekla bas dä iyaka wäjiele käi .

text: And God hath set some in the church , first apostles , secondarily prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , governments , diversities of tongues .
text2: Jekäi tapanak wa sha ̱ na Säkeklä te sä kuka säkätä rä Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ye , je itäki ̱ rä Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yinak bata shäk wa ye , je saka idäkläka ̱ mañatkä rä sa paktäk wa ye , je ukä ska ji wa ̱ k täkili ta käi , ñakäi ite ima ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ sä bäiwa ̱ klä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa käi , sa ̱ wa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäklä käi , sä wäsikäklä käi , sä ktäkläka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa saka saka wa käi .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: ¿ Baishe , kalabe rä Jesús ktei bata shäk wa ebä na ? Kalabe rä Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yinak bata shäk wa ebä na ? ¿ Kalabe rä sa paktäk wa ebä na ? ¿ Kalabe rä ji wa ̱ k täkili ta wa ebä na ?

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: ¿ Kalabe ia ̱ irä me ̱ nak sä bäiwa ̱ klä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa na ? ¿ Kalabe rä ktäkka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà ebä na ? ¿ Kalabe rä sä ktäke ̱ ka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà wapakäk wa ebä na ?

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: Ata je ji tso ̱ me ̱ nak mane rä bäi si ̱ , je shtä ne tkeno bas ja ̱ mi rä . Ata yie bas ia ̱ ji rä ji we ̱ bäi si ̱ rä ne pake mar dä .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Yis kuna ktäk ditsä kju ̱ awa wa ktä wà , ñakäi ángel wa ktä wà , ata ka yis wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l da , yis dä bronce yaka bular ssër shi ̱ ana käi , címbalo bulawe ̱ kjermita ssër käi .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Ikuna yis ia ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yinak bata yir da , ñakäi yis je ̱ r ko ̱ r ji biköle blelewa ̱ ia ̱ , jile ju ̱ ñe biköle ia ̱ , ñakäi ikuna yis dä ji biketsäk etkabä bäi si ̱ je wà yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tsä patkerju ̱ mi kju ̱ awa ra , ata ka yis wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l da , ka yis kiar ji a ̱ ni ye .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Ikuna yie yis ji tso ̱ kalabe bala pja ̱ ka jita wa ia ̱ , ñakäi ikuna yis je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ dälänakwa ̱ , ata ka yis wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l da , ka jiye je kiar yis ia ̱ .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble rä ñakatabläk je ̱ r baa wà . Ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble rä je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ñadälänak . Ka je rä je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka ianak jile ki ̱ kuna . Ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble rä ka je ̱ k kjeishäk kuna , ka je rä je ̱ k ssäk kuna ,

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: ka je rä ji äina wakbläk kuna , ka je rä je ̱ k ebä biketsäk kuna , ka je rä je ̱ r ki ̱ ji ianak plaa kuna , ka je rä ji yakei o ̱ le iukä ja ̱ mi biketsäk kuna ji ̱ a ,

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: ka je ssëwe ̱ baa ji yakei te , ata je ssëwe ̱ baa rä ji rä iyina si ̱ te .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Je te ji biköle dälässë , je te ji biköle biketse rä iyina ye , je te ji biköle o ̱ nak ji ̱ a ki ̱ ssë , je te ji biköle wäkuke .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble rä mik a ̱ ni ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna . Ata Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yinak bata she , je e ̱ rmiwa ̱ . Sä ktä kte kju ̱ awa wà , je wätkermiwa ̱ . Ji ju ̱ ñe je e ̱ rmiwa ̱ ñaebä .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Iwa rä sa ̱ wa ̱ ji ju ̱ ñer , je rä elkjebä . Ñakäi Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yinak bata she sa te , je rä elkjebä .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: Ata mika ̱ ji rä bäi si ̱ deju ̱ ra , je elkjebä rä e ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Yis ji ̱ a yabala ji ̱ a ra , yis kta jishtä yabala käi , yis je ̱ rika jishtä yabala käi , yis te jile wabiketsa jishtä yabala käi . Ata yis kënawa ̱ ra , yis te yabala je ̱ rike käi jawa ̱ ta ̱ na .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Iwa rä jira sä wäna ji juer espejo na ji su ̱ e käi , ka atjä kuna . Ata je ke ̱ i ska ra , sä te ji su ̱ emi a ̱ mikje si ̱ . Jira yis wa ̱ ji ju ̱ ñer dä elkjebä . Ata je ke ̱ i ska ra , yie iju ̱ ñemi kalabe jishtä Säkeklä wa ̱ yis ju ̱ ñer käi .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Jekäi jí mañatkä rä ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna , je rä ji biketse etkabä irä , ji bäi däke ̱ ji ̱ a ki ̱ ssë irä , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble irä . Ata ibäi si ̱ rä ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Bas chatköwa ̱ ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ja ̱ mi , ñakäi bas ja ̱ mi rä Säkeklä wikblu wa ̱ itso ̱ me ̱ nak je tkeno , ata bäi si ̱ bas ja ̱ mi ji bata she ne tkeno rä .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi ktäke ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà ra , ka je ktä kuna rä ditsä ra kuna , ata je ktäke ̱ rä Säkeklä ne ra , je ia ̱ ka yi a ̱ ni je ̱ r ko ̱ nak ki ̱ ka . Ata je te kte blelewa ̱ ne sheke ̱ Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi rä .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: Ata ji bata shäk , je ktäke ̱ rä ditsä ra ijewa ki ̱ wäjienaklä , issënaklä chatkäkwa ̱ , ñakäi ije ̱ r pablenaklä .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Jekäi yi ktäke ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wa ra , je wakei ebä ne je ̱ k ki ̱ wäjiäke ̱ rä . Ata yi te ji bata sheke ̱ ra , je te rä tapanak wa ne ki ̱ wäjieke ̱ .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Yis ia ̱ issër bas biköle me ktä kte kju ̱ awa wà käi , ata bäi si ̱ rä bas me ji bata shä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te ji bata sheke ̱ , je rä yi ktäke ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wa tsa ̱ ta . Ata ite iwapaka tapanak wa ia ̱ ijewa ki ̱ wäjienaklä ra , jera je rä yi te ji bata sheke ̱ ra ñaebä .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Jekäi el wa , ikuna yis demi bas ska , jera yis ktaka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wa ra , ¿ jiye je kiar bas ia ̱ na ? Ata yis te ji kjayile iräle , ji ju ̱ ñe iräle , ji bata she iräle , sa pakte iräle , je paka bas ia ̱ ra , jera je rä kianak bas ia ̱ .

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Jekäi jile bulanaklä ka kseka kuna , flauta käi , arpa käi , ke je kuna wäshtawe ̱ ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa ra , jera ¿ maikäi issërmi mane kse bulawe ̱ ke ̱ sä te flauta wà iräle arpa wà iräle rä na ?

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Je su ̱ ta ñakpe ska , ka kökö bulane tsa ̱ na ra , ¿ yi kukarmi ñakpä na ?

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas kta kte ka ssër sa ̱ ia ̱ shtä wà ra , ¿ maikäi sa ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ rmi ji yirke ̱ ia ̱ na ? Je rä jishtä bas ktä si ̱ wa ̱ ra käi .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Sä ktä tso ̱ ta ̱ i saka saka ka ̱ biköle ska , ata mane a ̱ ni ka kuna ka wata käi .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Jekäi yis da yilé ktäke ̱ ka ssër ' sia ̱ ra , yis dä ije ia ̱ ra jishtä ka ̱ etkä wa käi , ñaebä ije rä yis ia ̱ ra jishtä ka ̱ etkä wa käi .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Jekäi je su ̱ ta bas shena ji wa ̱ k rä tsa ̱ na . Ji rä me ̱ nak iwikblu wa ̱ tkerke ̱ bas ja ̱ mi bäi si ̱ ra , bas chichano rä tapanak wa ki ̱ wäjienaklä je ne wawa ̱ k bäi si ̱ .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yi ktäke ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wa ra , je ka ̱ kiö je kte wamanenaklä iia ̱ .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna yis ka ̱ kiä kte saka wa ra , je rä yis wikblu ne ka ̱ kia , ata yis je ̱ rike wà ka yis wa ̱ ji yine kuna .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: Jera , ¿ ji we ̱ yis te na ? Ñera yis ka ̱ kiämi yis wikblu wà , ata ñaebä yis ka ̱ kiämi yis je ̱ rike wà . Yis ksämi yis wikblu wà , ata ñaebä yis ksämi yis je ̱ rike wà .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Ata ikuna ba te Säkeklä kjeishe wikblu ebä wà ra , ¿ maikäi sa saka tso ̱ ba te wekte sheke ̱ ssäk je ia ̱ ikúkarmi “ Amén ” , ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne iia ̱ ra na ?

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Iyina si ̱ je rä ba te Säkeklä kjeisheke ̱ bäi , jeiräta ka je wà ba ia ̱ sa saka ki ̱ wäjienak .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Yis te wekte she Säkeklä ia ̱ , yis ktä rawa ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà bas biköle tsa ̱ ta ki ̱ ka .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Ata ñatapawe ̱ ska ra bäi si ̱ yis kuna kte shäk cinco kjela yis je ̱ rike wà sa saka pauta ̱ naklä , je rä yis ia ̱ ra kte kju ̱ awa wà kte she diez mil kje tsa ̱ ta .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: El wa , ke bas je ̱ rika jishtä yabala je ̱ rikä käi . Bas se ̱ no jishtä yabala käi , ka ji wa ̱ k wäsi ̱ wa kuna , ata sä kenacha ̱ wa ̱ wa käi , ji biketsäk tsa ̱ na .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Ka ̱ wei me ̱ leta ̱ na ki ̱ iyöle katke rä : “ Kte kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wà ñakäi kju ̱ awa wa kjäbata wà , yis ktämi jí ditsä wa ra , jeiräta a ̱ ni ka ijewa wa ̱ yis ktä ssënak , jekäi Säkekewa te ishe . ”

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Jekäi sä ktäka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà rä ka ijuenaklä ye Jesús biketsäk wa ia ̱ kuna , ata je rä ka Jesús biketsäk kuna wa ne ia ̱ . Ata ji bata she rä ka ijuenaklä ye ka Jesús biketsäk wa ia ̱ kuna , ata je rä Jesús biketsäk wa ne ia ̱ .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Ikuna tapanak eyaka wa kalabe taparke ̱ ska , biköle ktaka ̱ kte saka wà , jera jeska ka Jesús biketsäk wa iräle , ka delewa ̱ kuna wa iräle , jewa dewa ̱ bas sha ̱ na ra , ¿ ka ijewa wa ̱ iyinak bas yule tenacha ̱ wa ̱ irä ni na ?

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: Ata ikuna rä biköle te ji bata sheke ̱ ra , jera yilé ka Jesús biketsäk kuna iräle , ka delewa ̱ kuna iräle , dewa ̱ te ji yirte ssa ra , je te issëwe ̱ mi shi ̱ ana , je te issëwe ̱ mi nui ta käi .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Jekäi iwa ̱ ji blele tso ̱ ije ̱ r na je juermiwa ̱ . Jekäi ije ̱ tkämiwa ̱ wakte Säkeklä oloitsäk te ishemi : “ Iyina si ̱ Säkeklä kaldu bas sha ̱ na . ”

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: El wa , ¿ jera maikäi iwe ̱ rä na ? Mika ̱ bas taparke ̱ ra , jera manele ksä salmo wà , manele te sa pakte , manele te sä wäji ̱ atkele pake , manele ktäka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà , manele te je kte wapakeka ̱ . Je biköle wo ̱ rä sa ̱ ki ̱ wäjienaklä .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Jekäi manele ktäke ̱ ka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà ra , je wo ̱ bol kjelabä ku ̱ , kai ra mañal ebä ku ̱ , ata je ktö rä ekla ekla , ñakäi yilé kiana je kte wapakäk .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: Ata ka yi a ̱ ni kuna kte wapakäkka ̱ ra , je si ̱ wa ̱ tiöwa ̱ sa tapar tso ̱ ska ; wë iwakei ktö je ̱ k ra ñakäi Säkeklä ra .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Je su ̱ ta ji bata shäk wa ktö bol iräle mañal iräle . Isaka ku ̱ je wabitketsö iyina iräle kai iräle .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Ata isaka katke je ̱ tkelewa ̱ wäji ̱ atkena jile wà ra , ale ktä kaldu kiana si ̱ wa ̱ tiäkwa ̱ .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Jekäi bas biköle ia ̱ ji bata yirmiwa ̱ ekla ekla , je rä biköle pauta ̱ naklä , ñakäi biköle ssënaklä chatkäkwa ̱ .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Jekäi ji bata shäk wa ssërke ̱ ji shäk je wätkermi iia ̱ .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä rä ka Säkeklä ji wa ̱ k kje pa pa shtä kuna , ata je rä Säkeklä ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na shtä . Jishtä sä sikii wa tapanak eyaka eyaka biköle ka ̱ wei rä käi ,

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: alaklä wa si ̱ wa ̱ tiöcha ̱ wa ̱ bitaba ñataparke ̱ ska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ijewa ia ̱ ka ̱ kuna iktäkläka ̱ , ata ikiana ñajäkcha ̱ wa ̱ jishtä ñaebä ka ̱ wei te ishe käi .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Ata ijewa te jile ju ̱ ñakle ra , ijewa ku ̱ je chakö iwakwa ju ska ise ̱ naklä ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , alaklä wa ktäka ̱ ñatapawe ̱ sha ̱ na rä äina .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: ¿ Bas ia ̱ ra bas ne ska Säkeklä ktä bitele rä na ? ¿ Je kte rä delewa ̱ bas ebä ska na ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Bas sha ̱ manele te ibiketse irä ji bata shäk iräle , ji rä wikblu iá ja ̱ mi iräle ra , je kiana iju ̱ ñak jí kte yöle yis wa ̱ rä Säkekewa ne wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Ata yi te jí kte ka kuke ra , je wakei rä ka ktä kolonak kuna .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Jekäi el wa , bas ja ̱ mi ji bata she ne tkeno rä , ñakäi sä ktäka ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà , ke je wätkewa ̱ k bas ku ̱ .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Ata ji biköle wo ̱ rä bäi tsa ̱ na .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: El wa , jira yis te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ kte baa wapautäle yis wa ̱ bas ia ̱ je wà , je rä kolole e ̱ ná bas wa ̱ , je ja ̱ mi bas dami chatkelewa ̱ .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Ñakäi je ne wà bas dä tsa ̱ tkeleksa ̱ rä , ikuna bas chatkawa ̱ yis te bas pakta ja ̱ mi ra . Ata bärä le bas te je kte biketsa rä ka wata .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Jekäi ji wà yis dä je ̱ r ko ̱ le , je ne wà yie bas pakta säkätä rä . Je rä Cristo duawa ̱ rä sa ̱ wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele nui ki ̱ ka , jiräni kte yöle wa ̱ iyile käi ;

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: ñakäi iitäbinawa ̱ , jeska tres día ra ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni jiräni kte yöle wa ̱ iyile käi ;

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: jekäi ije ̱ k kjasha Pedro ia ̱ , je ukä ska doce wa ia ̱ .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ ije ̱ k kjasha sä el wa quinientos tsa ̱ ta ia ̱ etkayebä , jewa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a , ata moska kapacha ̱ wa ̱ kja .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Je ukä ki ̱ ije ̱ k kjasha Jacobo ia ̱ , je itäki ̱ iktei bata shäk wa biköle ia ̱ .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Bata ska ra , jishtä yaba ko ̱ r ike ̱ i kjäju ̱ kjepa käi , ije ̱ k kjasha yis ia ̱ ñaebä .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis dä ja ̱ lewa ̱ Jesús ktei bata shäk wa katäbäka . Ka yis kiar kinak Jesús ktei bata shäk ni . Je rä yis wa ̱ tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ wa yolole weikanak ki ̱ ka .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Ata Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ kju ̱ ei yis dewa ̱ jira jishtä yis dä käi ; jekäi ije je ̱ r bäi sha yis ia ̱ , ka je weikanewa ̱ ka wata käi . Ata yis shka ̱ bla e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ijewa biköle tsa ̱ ta , ata ka je rä yis wakei si ̱ kuna , ata Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha yis ia ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Yis iräle ijewa iräle , sá te jekäi ebä sa pakte rä . Jekäi je kte ebä ne biketsa bas te rä .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Jekäi Cristo ktei yirte rä ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , jera ¿ jiye bas sha ̱ na manele te ishe dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä ka shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ni rä na ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Jekäi dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä ka shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ra , ñaebä ka Cristo rä shki ̱ leka ̱ ni kuna .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Ata ikuna rä ka Cristo shki ̱ neka ̱ ni ra , sá te sa pakta rä ka wata , ñaebä bas te ji biketsa etkabä rä ka wata .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Ikuna jekäi ra , sá rä Säkeklä ktei shäk ka ̱ yue wà ebä , sá te ishe Säkeklä te Cristo shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni ki ̱ ka . Ata sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä ka shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ra , ka iwa ̱ ishki ̱ neka ̱ ni kuna .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Jekäi sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä ka shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ra , ka Cristo shki ̱ neka ̱ ni kuna .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Ikuna ka Cristo shki ̱ neka ̱ ni ra , bas te ji biketsa etkabä rä ka wata , ñakäi bas dami ji ̱ a rä nui ta ebä .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Jekäi ra Cristo ja ̱ mi wa käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä iweikanacha ̱ wa ̱ ye .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ikuna sä te jira ji tso ̱ ebä ki ̱ ka Cristo biketse ra , sä rä kshanala si ̱ ditsä biköle sha ̱ na .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Ata jira Cristo rä shki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ rke ̱ ni wä säkätä käi .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Jekäi ditsä ekla bata ki ̱ ka duewa ̱ ne deksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ rä , ata ekla bata ki ̱ ka sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shkirka ̱ ni ne deksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ rä .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , jishtä Adán ja ̱ mi biköle duächa ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ , je su ̱ ta Cristo ja ̱ mi biköle ia ̱ se ̱ ne kseka me ̱ rmini .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Ata je rä iwa ja ̱ mi . Cristo rä iwä säkätä käi , je ukä ska ideni ra iwakei cha wa biköle shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni ñaebä .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Je ukä ska sa ̱ ke ̱ i e ̱ rmiwa ̱ rä . Je ke ̱ i ska ra Cristo te jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ka ̱ wei ta wa irä täkili ta wa irä biköle weikeche ̱ miwa ̱ , kjepa ite ji rä ju ̱ ñenak iwa ̱ ju ̱ emiksa ̱ Säkeklä Sa Ká ia ̱ .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Je rä Cristo ka ̱ wä ta ji biköle ju ̱ ñak ma rä ite ibolki wa biköle tulacha ̱ wa ̱ iklä niki ̱ ka kje ki ̱ ka .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Jekäi duewa ̱ ne rä ibolki bata jekje iwa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ rä .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Je rä iyöle käi : “ Säkeklä te ji biköle kukawa ̱ ije klä niki ̱ ka . ” Je ite isha ji biköle rä kololewa ̱ iklä niki ̱ ka ra , ka je rä ale ji biköle yäliwa ̱ kwa ̱ iniki ̱ ka je wakeije kuna .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Mika ̱ ji biköle yälinawa ̱ ta ̱ na iniki ̱ ka ra , jera iyaba je ̱ k jämiwa ̱ ale ji biköle yäliwa ̱ kwa ̱ iniki ̱ ka je wakei yika . Je rä Säkeklä oloi kanakläka ̱ oloi ta ji biköle tsa ̱ ta ji biköle wäna .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Ke ikuna jekäi ra , ¿ sä wäoka ̱ nake ̱ sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa säkei ye me jewa dämi rä na ? Ikuna sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä itjä ka shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ra , ¿ jiye sä wäoka ̱ nake ̱ ijewa säkei ye rä na ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: ¿ Jera jiye sa ̱ je ̱ k ju ̱ ake ̱ ksa ̱ ji däläna shka ̱ l ssäk ka ̱ raa rä na ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: El wa , yis je ̱ k ssäke ̱ bas wa sä Säkekewaí Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi je wà yis te ishe , buliri buliri yëë yis kota ̱ narawa ̱ rä .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Ikuna yis dä ditsä ka shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni kuna ra , jera yis ñakpa bewak sälwii ra Éfeso ska , ¿ jiye je kiar yis ia ̱ ? Ikuna sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä ka shki ̱ nakka ̱ ni ra , bäi si ̱ “ sä yäkä sä ji yä , ata buliabä sä duächa ̱ wa ̱ . ”

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Ke bas ñajawa ̱ wäyönak . “ Sa yakeila ra , sa ̱ je ̱ k bawa ̱ ra , je te sä wädular bäi yakei tewe ̱ miwa ̱ . ”

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Bas däwo ̱ pani je ̱ r ta , jishtä ikiana o ̱ nak bäi käi . Ke ji yakei wakbla ji ̱ a . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas manele rä ka delewa ̱ kuna Säkeklä ja ̱ mi . Je sheke ̱ yis te rä bas äinaklä .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Ata yilé te ishemi : “ ¿ Jishtä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni rä na ? ¿ Mane shtä yaka wà idämini rä na ? ”

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: ¡ Ba rä ka je ̱ r ta je ̱ ! Ji tkeke ̱ ba te ka dunewa ̱ ra , je ka se ̱ nakni .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Ata ba te ji tkawa ̱ ra , ka je rä yaka iá idäke ̱ ksa ̱ ni käi kuna , ata je rä iwä doloi ebä , trigo iräle jile saka iräle .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Ata Säkeklä te yaka me ̱ iia ̱ jishtä iki ̱ ishena käi , jishtä iwä doloi rä je ja ̱ mi .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Jekäi ka ji biköle yaka rä ñaebä kuna , ata ditsä yaka rä kju ̱ awa , bewak yaka rä kju ̱ awa , du yaka rä kju ̱ awa , nima yaka rä kju ̱ awa .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Je su ̱ ta ka ̱ jöir ska wa yaka irä , ka ̱ jiska wa yaka irä tso ̱ rä . Ka ̱ jöir cha juer dä baa , ata kju ̱ awa , ka ̱ jiska cha juer dä baa , ata kju ̱ awa .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Ka ̱ wä oloi rä kju ̱ awa , tulu oloi rä kju ̱ awa , ñakäi bekwä oloi rä kju ̱ awa . Jekäi bekwä oloi ñir dä kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Je su ̱ ta dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni rä . Ji tkenawa ̱ rä tjabanakwa ̱ , je shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni rä ka tjabanak kuna .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Ji tkenawa ̱ rä dokoitsalewa ̱ , ata je shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni rä juer ta baa . Ji tkenawa ̱ rä ka täki ta , ata je shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni rä täkii .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Ji tkenawa ̱ rä yaka ta ditsä iá , ata je shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni rä yaka ta wikblu iá . Sa yaka tso ̱ ditsä iá ra , jekäi ñaebä sa yaka tso ̱ wikblu iá .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Jekäi ñaebä iyöle katke : “ Ditsä säkätä Adán yöleksa ̱ rä ditsä iá kseka , ” ata ibataka ekla Adán käi , je rä wikblu iá se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ k .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Jekäi ji rä wikblu iá rä ka isäkätä kuna , ata ji rä ditsä iá , je ne kjepa ji rä wikblu iá rä .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Ditsä säkätä yöleksa ̱ ishäkä pjoi wà dar dä ka ̱ jiska ; ata ditsä je itäki ̱ je dar dä ka ̱ jöir ska .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Jishtä ale yöleksa ̱ ishäkä pjoi wà wakei rä , je su ̱ ta ishäkä pjoi wà yöleksa ̱ wa rä . Ñakäi jishtä ale dar ka ̱ jöir ska wakei rä , je su ̱ ta ka ̱ jöir ja ̱ mi wa rä .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Jishtä sä juer dä ale yöleksa ̱ ishäkä pjoi wà su ̱ ta ; jekäi ñaebä sä juermi rä jishtä ale dar ka ̱ jöir ska su ̱ ta .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: El wa , yis te isheke ̱ bas ia ̱ , ji yaka ta pi ta ia ̱ Säkeklä gobierno ka däkksa ̱ . Je su ̱ ta ji tjabanak ia ̱ ji ka tjabanak kuna ka däkksa ̱ .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: ¡ Issö ! Yis te kte blelewa ̱ she bas ia ̱ : Ka sä biköle rä käpäkcha ̱ wa ̱ kuna , ata sä biköle rä manenakksa ̱ ni ,

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: plaabä sä wätiä pishä kjelabä , kökö bata jekje bulanak bulana ra . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , kökö bularmi , jera dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa rä shki ̱ nak tuläkka ̱ ni ka tjabanakwa ̱ ni , ñakäi saje wa rä manenakksa ̱ ni .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Iwa rä sä tjabanakcha ̱ wa ̱ wa kiana pajienak ji ka tjabanak kuna wà . Sä duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ wa kiana pajienak ji ka duäk kuna wà .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Jekäi mika ̱ sä tjabanakcha ̱ wa ̱ wa pajienani ji ka tjabanak kuna wà ra , sä duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ wa pajienani ji ka duäk kuna wà ra , jera io ̱ rmi jishtä kte yöle katke käi : “ Tu ̱ neka ̱ te duewa ̱ ma ̱ la ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ . ”

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Duewa ̱ , ¿ mai rä ma tu ̱ nakläka ̱ rä na ? Duewa ̱ , ¿ mai rä ba sul dä na ? ”

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Duewa ̱ sul í rä sä te ji yakei wakble nui . Jekäi sa ̱ nui rä täkili ta sä weikäkwa ̱ ka ̱ wei tso ̱ kju ̱ ei .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ata wekte Säkeklä ra . ¡ Je ne te sa ̱ tsa ̱ tke tu ̱ nakka ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi rä !

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka el wa shka ̱ ta yis wa ̱ , bas chatköwa ̱ därërë ka jalewa ̱ ta Säkekewa kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k del ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas shka ̱ bläke ̱ Säkekewa ia ̱ rä ka tsulenakwa ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Inaklä tapawe ̱ me ̱ nak sä sikii wa ia ̱ je rä jikäi . Bas ku ̱ iwo ̱ jishtä yis te tapanak eyaka eyaka Galacia ke ̱ i ska wa paka iwa ̱ k käi .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Semana díaí säkätä wà ekla ekla bikö bas to ̱ rke ̱ ja ̱ mi bas ku ̱ ji blö . Je rä mika ̱ yis damiju ̱ ra , ka jekjepa bas wa ̱ itapawa ̱ klä kuna .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Jekäi yis demiju ̱ ra , mane kolole bas wa ̱ , patkemi yie äyëí yölemi , bas wa ̱ ji tso ̱ tapale me ̱ nak tsa ̱ klämi ijewa wa ̱ Jerusalén .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Ata ikuna rä yis shena minakña ra , ijewa maña yis da .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Yis damiju ̱ bas su ̱ ak , ata yis kjaju ̱ Macedonia ska kjepa . Iwa rä Macedonia kja ̱ ne yis kjäke ̱ ju ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Bärä le yis se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a bas kjäka , ata jiräni ra yis se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a ka ̱ tse ̱ e ̱ ke ̱ i kjaju ̱ kje . Je rä bas wa ̱ yis tsa ̱ tkäklä yis minaklä maka yis maju ̱ käi .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Ka yis kiane kjäkju ̱ shkële bas ska , ata yis ssëna rä käma ji ̱ a bas kjäka , ikuna Säkekewa te ka ̱ ma ̱ ra .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Ata yis se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a Éfeso ska Pentecostés ke ̱ i kjaju ̱ kje .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis ia ̱ ka ̱ deksa ̱ ta ̱ i yis wao ̱ naklä . Ata ditsä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ñapatka yis na ̱ me ̱ i ye .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Timoteo demiju ̱ ra , bas se ̱ no bäi ije ra ka isu ̱ anakläwa ̱ ye , ije shka ̱ blä rä Säkekewa kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k yis käi ki ̱ ka .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ke yi a ̱ ni ku ̱ ikukawa ̱ diekjela , ata ipatköté ssële bäi , ibitäkläni yis wäki ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ije ki ̱ ssë kate sä el wa ra ñara ki ̱ ka .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Sä el Apolos pake rä jikäi . Yis te ije kuka pjoo minak bas wäki ̱ sä el wa ra , ata itjä ka issëne minak jíkje ra . Jeiräta iwä deksa ̱ ra iminaju ̱ mi ji ̱ a .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ . Bas chatköwa ̱ ji biketsäk etkabä . Bas ssëno ka suale ta . Bas ssëno täkii .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Ji biköle we ̱ ke ̱ bas te käi , je wo ̱ ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: El wa , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Estéfanas ju ska tso ̱ wa ne rä jile wä säkätä käi Acaya ke ̱ i ska rä , jekäi ijewa ñatulaksa ̱ sä sikii wa tsa ̱ tkäk . Jekäi yie bas pake ,

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: ñajäkcha ̱ wa ̱ yi rä ijewa käi wa yika , yi rä shka ̱ bläkña chichanakña ijewa käi wa yika .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Yis ssëwa ̱ a ̱ naa Estéfanas irä Fortunato irä Acaico irä jewa dejulu te . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te ji wá ̱ yis ia ̱ sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä bas ne kajali yis da rä käi .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Je rä ijewa te yis irä bas irä je ̱ r pabla ki ̱ ka . Jekäi yi rä ijewa käi wa kjeishöpa .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Tapanak eyaka eyaka Asia ska wa te bas chakami . Aquila irä Prisca irä jewa te bas chakami Säkekewa ja ̱ mi je ̱ r baa wà , ijewa ju ska tapanak wa ra ñara .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Jiska sä el wa biköle te bas chakami . Bas ñachakö ñawäjalassë wämo wà .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Yis Pablo te bas chakami yölemi yis wakei jula wà .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Yi wa ̱ ka Säkekewa shka ̱ l da , je wakei weikanowa ̱ pa . Maranata .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Säkekewa Jesús je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Yis wa ̱ bas biköle shka ̱ l sä rä Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka . Amén .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Pablo , Jesucristo ktei bata shäk Säkeklä ki ̱ jekäi ishena ki ̱ ka , je te sä el Timoteo ra ña ra jí yue mar , tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ Corinto ska wa ia ̱ , sä sikii wa tso ̱ Acaya ke ̱ i biköle ska wa kalabe ia ̱ .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Säkeklä saje wa Ká irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo Keklä iKá , Sa Ká je ̱ r bäi shäk , Säkeklä sa ̱ je ̱ r pabläk ji biköle ska , je kjeiyinopa .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Je ne rä sa ̱ je ̱ r pabläk sä weikarke ̱ biköle ska rä , je rä je wà sa ̱ ia ̱ sa saka je ̱ r pablenaklä ji te iweikeke ̱ käi , Säkeklä wa ̱ sa wakwa je ̱ r pablele je wà ,

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: je rä jishtä Cristo weikane däke ̱ ksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ bakleka ̱ käi , je su ̱ ta ñaebä je ̱ r pablene däke ̱ ksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ bakleka ̱ Cristo ebä oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Ata ikuna sá weikarke ̱ ra , je rä bas je ̱ r pablenaklä , ñakäi bas tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ . Je su ̱ ta ikuna sá je ̱ r pablerke ̱ ra , je rä bas je ̱ r pablenaklä , je wà bas dulanaklä weikane wäkukäk jishtä sá te je shtä weikane wäkuke käi ñaebä .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Jekäi sá te ibiketse bas chatkämiwa ̱ si ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jishtä bas weikarke ̱ ña , je su ̱ ta bas je ̱ r pablerke ̱ ña .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: El wa , sá ki ̱ bas shena ijuñak jishtä sá weikana Asia ska käi , sá ki ̱ ji dewa ̱ ka ikatabler ji ̱ a kje , sá te ibiketsa ka sa ̱ se ̱ nak ji ̱ a kseka .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Sá ssëna sa wakwa ska sá rä wabiketsaleksa ̱ e ̱ ná ko ̱ ta ̱ nakwa ̱ käi , je rä ka sá wakwa ebä je ̱ k biketsäklä kuna , ata sá wa ̱ Säkeklä sä dulewa ̱ wa shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni ebä biketsäklä .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Je ne te sá bakaksa ̱ yëë sá ko ̱ ta ̱ nacha ̱ rawa ̱ yika rä , je te sá bäkeke ̱ ksa ̱ ji ̱ a , ñakäi ije ne biketse sá te , ite sá bäkemiksa ̱ ji ̱ a rä .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Jekäi bas te sá tsa ̱ tke kate ka ̱ kie wà . Je rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä kjeishäklä sá ki ̱ ka , ije ̱ r bäi sha sá ia ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ka ̱ kia oloi ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Sá je ̱ r ska ka sa ssër ta kjatele käi . Jishtä sá ñawäsikle ka ̱ jiska , bäi si ̱ ra jishtä sá ñawäsikle bas wäna , ka je ̱ k ssë wà kuna ka wäsi ̱ wa kuna , jishtä Säkeklä käi , ka ditsä je ̱ rikä ja ̱ mi kuna , ata Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ wà , je ne wà sá ñassäke ̱ rä .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Iwa rä ka sá te jile saka yue kuna kju ̱ awa bas ia ̱ , ka bas ia ̱ iwayir käi , ka bas je ̱ r ko ̱ r iia ̱ käi . Jekäi yis ia ̱ issër bas me je ̱ r ko ̱ rpa iia ̱ kalabe ,

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: jishtä bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite yëna käi , sá ne rä bas ñassäklä , ñaebä bas dä sá ñassäklä Säkekewa Jesús díaí ska ra .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Yie ibiketsa jekäi irä ki ̱ ka yis ssëna minak bas su ̱ ak säkätä , je rä bas ia ̱ ji bäi däkläksa ̱ botäbä kicha ,

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: kjepa bas ska ra minakju ̱ Macedoniaka , je Macedonia ska ra bitäkni bas ska , bas wa ̱ yis tsa ̱ tkäklä yis minaklä Judea ska .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Jera yie jekäi ibiketsaksa ̱ ra , ¿ ka yis wa ̱ je biketsaneksa ̱ si ̱ na ? ¿ Ji biketseke ̱ ksa ̱ yie o ̱ nak , je biketseke ̱ ksa ̱ yie rä ditsä käi , je wà yis wa ̱ ji shäklä “ ta ” ni irä “ kai ” ni irä ñara na ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Ata Säkeklä rä ji wa ̱ k bulee ki ̱ ka , ji yinak sá wa ̱ bas ia ̱ rä ka “ ta ” ni irä “ kai ” ni irä kuna .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä yaba Jesucristo ne ktei wapautäle sá wa ̱ bas sha ̱ na , yis wa ̱ , Silvano wa ̱ , Timoteo wa ̱ , ka je rä “ ta ” ni irä “ kai ” ni irä ñara kuna , ata “ ta ” ni ebä ije ja ̱ mi .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Säkeklä kablele biköle rä “ ta ” ni ije ja ̱ mi , ñakäi ije oloi ja ̱ mi iyirke ̱ “ amén ” ni Säkeklä ia ̱ , ioloi kanakläka ̱ saje wa ja ̱ mi .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä ne rä sá kukäkña bas da Cristo ia ̱ , ñakäi sa ̱ ki ̱ iaceiteí tkäkju ̱ até rä ,

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: ñakäi je ne te sa ̱ nia rä , ñakäi iwikblu ma ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ska sa ̱ tsa ̱ tju ̱ aklä ye rä .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Jekäi yie Säkeklä kuke yis su ̱ ak ye , ka yis deneni Corinto ska , je rä ka yis wa ̱ bas je ̱ r ianewa ̱ kläwa ̱ kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Ka irä sá te bas patke täkili wà ji biketsäk etkabä kuna . Ata sá rä bas ki ̱ ma ̱ kña bas ssënaklä a ̱ naa . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji biketse etkabä wà bas dä tkelewa ̱ bäi .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis wakei te ibiketsaksa ̱ ka minak kunani etäbä kicha bas je ̱ r ianewa ̱ kcha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna yis te bas je ̱ r iawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ra , ¿ yibä te yis je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ mini a ̱ naa rä na ? ¿ Ka irä ale yis wa ̱ je ̱ r ialecha ̱ wa ̱ wakwa ebä te na ?

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te iyua bas ia ̱ jekäi rä . Je rä mika ̱ yis demiju ̱ ra , ka yis je ̱ r ianakläwa ̱ bas ale yis je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ k a ̱ naa wa ki ̱ ka . Jekäi yis te ibiketse , yis ssëna a ̱ naa ra , bas biköle ssërmi a ̱ naa .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Iwa rä yie je yua bas ia ̱ rä je ̱ r ialewa ̱ ta ̱ i , je ̱ r ssëlewa ̱ shi ̱ ana , wä riä bakle ta ̱ i , je rä ka bas je ̱ r ianaklä kuna , ata je rä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä bikö yis wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l dä käi .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Ikuna yilé te yis je ̱ r iawa ̱ wa ̱ ra , ka je wa ̱ yis ebä je ̱ r iane kuna , ata bäi si ̱ ra , ka yis wa ̱ iki ̱ talawa ̱ klä ra , bas kalabe je ̱ r iawa ̱ ite ñaebä .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Jekäi je ekla ki ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te nui ja ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ , je kjelabä ishena rä .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bäi si ̱ ra bas kiana ijäkwa ̱ bitaba , ñakäi ije ̱ r pabläk , je rä je ̱ r iane e ̱ e ̱ na wa ̱ ka iweikäkläwa ̱ .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yie bas pake ishka ̱ li ̱ bläkni , iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä bas wa ̱ ishka ̱ l si ̱ .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Jekäi wata ki ̱ ka yis te bas ia ̱ iyuami , je rä yis wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä bas dä ji biköle ska yis ktä ssä ta í ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Bas te yilé jeke ̱ wa ̱ bitaba jile ki ̱ ka ra , jera ñaebä yie je jeke ̱ wa ̱ bitaba . Yi jawa ̱ yis te bitaba , ikuna yis te yile jawa ̱ bitaba irä ra , je wá ̱ yis te rä bas kju ̱ ei Cristo wäkata ska .

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: Je rä Satanás wa ̱ ka saje wa wäyuächa ̱ kläwa ̱ kuna ye , sa ̱ wa ̱ ji we ̱ ite rä ju ̱ ñer ki ̱ ka .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Mika ̱ yis demi Troas ska Cristo ktei baa wapaktäk ra , yis ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ na yis wa ̱ Säkekewa ktä wapaktäklä .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Jeiräta , ka yis ssëne bäi yis je ̱ r ska , ka yis wa ̱ yis el Tito ko ̱ ne ki ̱ ka . Je ki ̱ ka yis je ̱ k bata sha ijewa ia ̱ , jekäi ' smineju ̱ Macedonia .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Ata wekte Säkeklä ra , je wa ̱ sá dami del tu ̱ leka ̱ ji biköle ki ̱ ka Cristo oloi ja ̱ mi , ñakäi ite je ̱ r ko ̱ ne yi ije rä ia ̱ , je kjasheke ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska , ji jalar ta ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ käi sá oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Iwa rä Säkeklä ia ̱ ra , sá rä Cristo jalar ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ käi , sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ wa sha ̱ na irä , sä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na irä .

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Moska ia ̱ ra , sá jalar dä ji nu ̱ l käi iduäkläwa ̱ , ata isaka ia ̱ ra , sá jalar dä ji kseka käi , ise ̱ naklä kseka . Jekäi ¿ yibä ia ̱ je kja ̱ nei o ̱ rmi bäi na ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
