text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka sá rä jishtä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ te Säkeklä ktä watju ̱ e rami käi kuna . Ata sá te ji sheke ̱ rä iyina si ̱ wà Säkeklä säkei ye , iwakei wäkata ska Cristo ja ̱ mi .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: ¿ Je rä etäbä kicha sá wakwa ebä ña ktei shäke ̱ ni na ? ¿ Ata sá ki ̱ isherke ̱ rä jishtä manele käi , ktei yilemi äyë ki ̱ bas ia ̱ iräle , bas wa ̱ iräle käi na ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Ñera , bas wakwa ne rä sá äyëí rä , yöle sá je ̱ r ska rä . Je rä su ̱ le , wayile ditsä biköle wa ̱ .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Je wà ijuena bas ne rä Cristo äyëí patkele sá wa ̱ rä . Ka je rä yöle tinta wà kuna , ata Säkeklä kseka wikblu wà , ka je rä tale kuna jak kjuä ki ̱ ka , ata je tale rä tabla yaka iá ki ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ska .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Säkeklä wäna sá te ibiketse jekäi irä , Cristo oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Ka je rä sá wakwa rä täkili ta kuna , je wà sá wa ̱ ibiketsäklä jile o ̱ le sá wa ̱ rä sá wakwa oloi ja ̱ mi ni kuna . Ata sá täkili bitele rä Säkeklä ne ska .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Je wakei te sá täkiwa ̱ ikablele spa ̱ na wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k , ka kte yöle cha wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k kuna , ata iwikblu cha wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k . Iwa rä kte yöle te rä sä kteke ̱ wa ̱ ebä , ata iwikblu te rä se ̱ ne kseka ne me ̱ .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Sä duäkläwa ̱ wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ ktei tale jak ki ̱ ka je bakle rä baa , ka Israel batala wä däwa ̱ Moisés su ̱ ak iwäktä ki ̱ kje , ije wäktä wäñinaka ̱ oloo ki ̱ ka , jekäi je oloi shenami je ̱ na je ̱ na . Jekäi irä ra ,

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: ¿ maikäi ka je tsa ̱ ta iwikblu cha wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ rä bakleka ̱ ju ̱ baa si ̱ kuna rä na ?

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ nui ta wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ , je bakle rä baa ra , jera sä wabiketsa ̱ nakläksa ̱ wämo ye wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ rä bakleka ̱ baawa ̱ si ̱ .

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Jekäi ji bakle baa , ka je kuna ji ̱ a baa , je rä ietkä rä baawa ̱ si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Jekäi je oloi shenakwa ̱ bakle rä baa ra , ji ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ kuna je rä bakleka ̱ ju ̱ baawa ̱ si ̱ .

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Sá te ibiketse jekäi ki ̱ ka , sá te ji we ̱ ke ̱ rä ka suale kuna ,

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: ka je rä Moisés käi kuna . Moisés wä ki ̱ tiawa ̱ sua wà , ka Israel batala wa ̱ ioloi sher dami su ̱ aklä ye .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Jeiräta ijewa je ̱ r doloi tenacha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sa kablele ñaia ̱ mikle Säkeklä ra yöle wayirke ̱ ra , je sua ebä wa ̱ ijewa dami ji ̱ a wä ki ̱ telecha ̱ wa ̱ , däka ̱ jira kje . Je rä ka tse ̱ leju ̱ mi kuna ijewa ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Cristo ebä oloi ja ̱ mi je tse ̱ rju ̱ mi rä .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Jekäi ebä däka ̱ jira kje , ka ̱ wei me ̱ le Moisés wa ̱ wayirke ̱ ra , ijewa je ̱ rike rä ki ̱ kololewa ̱ sua wa ̱ .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Ata mika ̱ sa ̱ ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ ni Säkekewa ia ̱ ra , je sua rä tse ̱ nakju ̱ mi .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Jekäi Säkekewa ne rä Säkeklä wikblu rä . Jekäi mai Säkekewa wikblu katke ra , jeska sä rä bakleksa ̱ .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Ata saje wa biköle rä wä ki ̱ tse ̱ leju ̱ mi te Säkekewa oloi ñirte su ̱ ete jishtä espejo na käi , sa ̱ maneleksa ̱ baa ki ̱ manerte ji baa wà marä ji baa wà ni däkwa ̱ jishtä ije wakei rä su ̱ ta , Säkekewa ale iwikblu je oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Jekäi ije ̱ r bäi sha deksa ̱ sá ia ̱ ki ̱ ka , sá dewa ̱ je wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k ye . Je ne ki ̱ ka ka sá tjuäkcha ̱ wa ̱ kuna .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Ata ji wakble jaki äina käi , je rä dokoitsalewa ̱ sá wa ̱ . Ka sá dami rä sä wäyuäk kuna , Säkeklä ktä wamanewa ̱ k kju ̱ awa kuna . Ata sá te ji rä iyina si ̱ ne wawe ̱ ke ̱ rä . Je wà Säkeklä wäkata ska sá ñatuläke ̱ ksa ̱ biköle ia ̱ ijewa wa ̱ sá wabiketsäkläksa ̱ jishtä ijewa ia ̱ issër ijewa je ̱ r ska käi .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Ata ikuna kte baa yinak sá wa ̱ je rä ki ̱ telewa ̱ ra , je rä ki ̱ telewa ̱ weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ wa yika .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Je rä ka ̱ jiska kekläí te ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna wa je ̱ rike wätuiwa ̱ wa ̱ , ka ijewa wäna Cristo rä baa je ktei oloi ñinaklä kuna . Ije ne rä Säkeklä me ̱ i rä .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Jekäi ka sá te sa pakte rä sá wakwa ktei wà kuna , ata Jesucristo rä Säkekewa je ne ktei wà , ñakäi sá rä bas kjanaklä Jesús kju ̱ ei , je ne ktei wà sá te bas pakte rä .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä ishäk : “ Ka ̱ ñinoka ̱ ka ̱ yee na ” , je wakei ne oloi ñina saje wa je ̱ r ska ka ̱ oloi ye rä , sa ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä Säkeklä oloi ñirke ̱ Jesucristo wäktä ska je ia ̱ .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Ata sá wa ̱ je ji säkei ta tso ̱ rä u ̱ yaka u ̱ í na , je wà ijuenaklä je täkili e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ je rä Säkeklä ne cha , ka je rä sá wakwa cha kuna .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Sá rä weikale ji biköle ska , ata ka medele ta ; je ̱ r iale , ata ka ji biketsale ta ,

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: yolole weikanak , ata ka jalewa ̱ sá wakwa ebä kuna , jololecha ̱ wa ̱ , ata ka weikalecha ̱ wa ̱ kuna .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Mai sá dami käi sá wa ̱ Jesús dulewa ̱ dami del sá yaka ja ̱ mi , je wà Jesús se ̱ r kseka kjayinaklä sá yaka ja ̱ mi .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Iwa rä sá se ̱ nak kseka wa del tulurke ̱ ksa ̱ ko ̱ ta ̱ nakcha ̱ wa ̱ Jesús kju ̱ ei , je rä Jesús se ̱ r kseka kjayinaklä sá yaka duäkwa ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Jekäi duewa ̱ wao ̱ rte sá ska , ata se ̱ ne kseka wao ̱ rte bas ska .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Jeiräta , sá te ji biketse dami etkabä jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Yis te ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka yis kta rä . ” Je su ̱ ta sá te ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka sá ktäke ̱ rä ,

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: je rä sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Säkekewa Jesús shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni je wakei te ñaebä sá shki ̱ we ̱ mika ̱ ni Jesús da , ñakäi ite sá jäklemiwa ̱ bas da ñara .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Iwa rä jí ji biköle o ̱ rke ̱ sá ukä ja ̱ mi rä bas kju ̱ ei , je wà wekte yinaklä ki ̱ ta si ̱ Säkeklä oloi kanakläka ̱ , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ia ̱ ije ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ka sá tjuäkcha ̱ wa ̱ . Sá pa ki ̱ ka sá e ̱ r dami , jeiräta sá ja ̱ rka sá spa ̱ na terke ̱ ni buliri buliri .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sá weikarke ̱ kje berbena , je te sá ia ̱ ji baa jekjeye ka pakanak kje , je ki ̱ talawe ̱ ke ̱ kala ta e ̱ e ̱ na ki ̱ ta ki ̱ tami .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ka sá wätkenewa ̱ ji juenak ska kuna , ata sá wätkawa ̱ rä ji ka juenak ne ska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji juenak sä wäna je rä kje berbena , ata ji ka juenak kuna sä wäna je rä jekjeye .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Iwa rä sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ikuna saje wa ju ka ̱ jiska , ale ju wäyenak shtä , je weikanawa ̱ ra , Säkeklä wa ̱ ju tso ̱ me ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ jekjeye ka ̱ jöir ska , je rä ka yöle kuna jula wà .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Je ju wäyenak tkäkwa ̱ na sa ̱ u ̱ rke ̱ , sa ̱ ia ̱ issërke ̱ sa ̱ me pajierni sä ju ka ̱ jöir ska wa käi .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Jekäi sä rä payenak tulämi , jeiräta ka sa ̱ a ̱ ta ̱ nak ju ̱ li ̱ shye .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Sa ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a je ju wäyenak ja ̱ rka wa u ̱ rke ̱ shtirilewa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sä ssërta payenak tulämi ki ̱ ka , ata pajienakcha ̱ wa ̱ ni , je rä duewa ̱ ma ̱ la ̱ kläwa ̱ se ̱ ne kseka wa ̱ .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Jekäi iwa ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ je rä Säkeklä , je ne te sa ̱ ia ̱ iwikblu ma sa ̱ tsa ̱ tju ̱ aklä ye rä .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka del sa te ibiketse , ñakäi sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , sa ̱ se ̱ rke ̱ ji ̱ a sa yaka ja ̱ mi ra , ka sa kajali kuna Säkekewa ra .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sa dami rä ji biketse etkabä ja ̱ mi , ka irä ji juerke ̱ sä wäna ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Jekäi sä te ibiketse , sa ̱ ia ̱ issër ka sa ̱ me se ̱ ná ji ̱ a sa yaka ja ̱ mi käi , ata däkmi se ̱ nak Säkekewa wäja ̱ mi .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa kajali ji ̱ a ra iräle ka sa kuna ji ̱ a ra iräle , sa ja ̱ mi ije ssëwa ̱ k baa ne tkerke ̱ rä .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä biköle ka ̱ wä ta däkmi Cristo wa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkläksa ̱ ska , ekla ekla sa ̱ to ̱ naklä ji o ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ sa yaka wà je ja ̱ mi bäi iräle , yakei iräle .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ ijuñer sa kiana Säkekewa dälätsäk . Je ki ̱ ka sá te ditsä je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ . Jekäi Säkeklä wa ̱ jishtä sá rä je ju ̱ ñer , jekäi yis ia ̱ issër jishtä sá rä me ssërpa bas je ̱ r ska ñaebä .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Ka irä sá ña ktei shäke ̱ ni etäbä kicha bas ia ̱ kuna , ata je rä sá te bas ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ke ̱ bas ñassäklä sá wà , je rä bas wa ̱ je ̱ k ssäk sa pajuer wà ka sa ̱ je ̱ r ska wà kuna , jewa kúkäklä .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Jekäi ikuna sá rä yule telewa ̱ ra , je rä Säkeklä ne ia ̱ , ata sá rä ka ̱ ta ra , je rä bas ne ia ̱ .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Jekäi Cristo wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l , je ne te sá ssëwe ̱ ibiketsäk jikäi rä : Eklabä duawa ̱ sä biköle ki ̱ ka , jekjepa biköle duacha ̱ wa ̱ ,

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: ñakäi ije duawa ̱ sä biköle ki ̱ ka , je rä sa ̱ tso ̱ kseka wa ka se ̱ naklä ji ̱ a iwakwa ia ̱ kuna , ata ise ̱ naklä ale ijewa ki ̱ ka dulewa ̱ shki ̱ leka ̱ ni je ia ̱ .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka jira ka sá te yi a ̱ ni biketse kuna ipa juer wà . Mikle ra sá te Cristo biketsa ipa juer wà , ata jira ka sá te ije biketse kuna ji ̱ a jekäi .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Jekäi yi rä Cristo ja ̱ mi ra , je rä yöleksa ̱ ni spa ̱ na . Ji mikle kjaju ̱ e ̱ ná . Ñera je rä maneleksa ̱ ni spa ̱ na .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Je biköle datse ̱ rä Säkeklä skaté . Je te sa ̱ je ̱ r bäiwa ̱ ni iwakei ra Cristo oloi ja ̱ mi . Jekäi je te sá ia ̱ je ̱ r bäine iwakei ra je kja ̱ nei we ̱ ma ̱ .

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Je rä Säkeklä te Cristo oloi ja ̱ mi ka ̱ jiska wa je ̱ r bäiwe ̱ te iwakei ra , sä shirile ka nui biketsane iwa ̱ kuna , ñakäi ite sá paka je ̱ r bäine iwakei ra je ktei bata shäk .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Jekäi sá rä patkele Cristo wa ̱ ije säkei ye , jishtä Säkeklä wakei te sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ sá oloi ja ̱ mi käi . Jekäi sá te ishe Cristo kju ̱ ei , ¡ dunasi ̱ bas je ̱ r bäinopa Säkeklä ra !

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Ale ka ji yakei wakbläk kuna , je iawa ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä te saje wa kju ̱ ei ji yakei wakbläk ye , je wà saje wa däkläwa ̱ ji wämo ye Säkeklä käi , ije oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Jekäi sá rä shka ̱ bläkña ije ra ki ̱ ka sá te ishe bas ia ̱ , dunasi ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi yile sa ̱ ia ̱ ke je kukawa ̱ ka wata käi .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ite ishe : “ Ike ̱ i dewa ̱ bäi ra , yis te ba ktä ssa . Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ díaí wà ra , yis te ba ki ̱ ma . ” ¡ Issö ! Jira ike ̱ i dewa ̱ bäi , jira ne rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ díaí rä .

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Ka ji a ̱ ni wà sá te yi a ̱ ni dokowe ̱ kuna , jí sá te ikja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ ka je yinaklä jini a ̱ ni .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Ata ji biköle wà sá te ikjashe rami sá rä Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa , ji katable ta ̱ i wà , weikane wà , sá ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ wà , je ̱ r ia ̱ ne ssë wà ,

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: buka ̱ ne wà , wätenewa ̱ wà , wätji ̱ neka ̱ sá ki ̱ ka wà , shka ̱ ble wà , wäñine wà , ka ji ñale kuna wà ,

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: ji wämo wà , ji ju ̱ ñe wà , ji katable wà , ji we ̱ je ̱ r baa wà wà , Wikblu Sikina wà , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble si ̱ wà ,

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: kte yina si ̱ wà , Säkeklä täkili wà ; ñakpäklä ta jula wämo wà jula shule wà ji wämo kju ̱ ei ;

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: oloi kaleka ̱ käi , oloi ja ̱ lewa ̱ käi ; yile bäi käi , yile yakei käi ; jishtä sä wäyuäk wa käi , ata sá rä kte si ̱ shäk wa ;

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: jishtä ka su ̱ le käi , ata su ̱ le bäi ; yee sä duächa ̱ rawa ̱ käi , ata ñera sá dami ji ̱ a ; bukle ta ̱ i , ata ka dulecha ̱ wa ̱ kuna ;

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: je ̱ r ialecha ̱ wa ̱ käi , ata del ssële a ̱ naa ; jishtä ka jita wa käi , ata sá te chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ bluwe ̱ te ; ka sá wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni kuna käi , ata sá wa ̱ ji biköle tso ̱ .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Bas Corinto wa , sá kta bas da rä bulee , ji tso ̱ sá je ̱ r ska je ja ̱ mi .

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Ka sá ñakjeo ̱ ne bas yika , ata bas ne ñakjewa ̱ ke ̱ bas wakwa je ̱ r ska rä .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Jekäi yie ishe bas ia ̱ jishtä yabala ia ̱ ji she käi , bas je ̱ r ssënopa bäi sá ra nui ki ̱ .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Ke bas ñawäjia ka Jesús biketsäk kuna wa ja ̱ mi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ¿ maikäi ji wämo irä , ji ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi irä ñabawa ̱ mi na ? Je su ̱ ta ¿ maikäi ka ̱ oloi irä , ka ̱ tuil irä ssërmi bäi ñara na ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: ¿ Maikäi Cristo irä Belial irä ji biketsämi ñara na ? Je su ̱ ta , ¿ maikäi Jesús biketsäk wa irä , ka Jesús biketsäk kuna wa irä , jewa däwa ̱ ña ja ̱ mi na ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: ¿ Maikäi Säkeklä templo irä , jile kekläí me ̱ i irä ña je ̱ r ku ̱ ami na ? Iwa rä saje wa ne rä Säkeklä kseka temploí rä , jishtä Säkeklä te isha käi : “ Yis se ̱ rmi ijewa sha ̱ na , yis shkämi ijewa sha ̱ na , yis dämiwa ̱ ijewa Kekläí ye , ñakäi ijewa dämiwa ̱ yis cha wa ye . ”

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Je ki ̱ ka : “ Bas cho ̱ ksa ̱ ijewa yika , bas ñatso ̱ tulömi . Jekäi Säkekewa te ishe rä . Ji rä ñá ke je ka , jekäi ra yie bas kiemiwa ̱ ,

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: ñakäi yis dämiwa ̱ bas ia ̱ bas Ká ye , jera bas dämiwa ̱ yis yabala jäiyi wa irä alaklä wa irä ye . Jekäi Säkekewa ji biköle tsa ̱ ta te ishe rä . ”

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas dikäla , sa ̱ ia ̱ ikablele rä jekäi ra , sa ̱ ku ̱ ji rä sa yaka irä sä wikblu irä ñá tewa ̱ k biköle paskuö ju ̱ omi , sa parunaklä sikii si ̱ Säkeklä dälätse kju ̱ ei .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Bas je ̱ r ssënopa sá ra bäi . Ka sá wa ̱ yi a ̱ ni ukä ja ̱ mi ji o ̱ ne , ka sá wa ̱ yi a ̱ ni yakei tene , ka sá wa ̱ yi a ̱ ni wäyöne .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Ka yis te jí she kuna bas ia ̱ rä yis wa ̱ bas ki ̱ nui ja ̱ wa ̱ kläka ̱ kuna , ata yis wa ̱ iyile kja sá wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l sá je ̱ r ska , je wà sä duächa ̱ kläwa ̱ etka yebä , ñakäi sa ̱ se ̱ nakläni etka yebä .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Yis te bas biketsa kianak ta ̱ i . Ta ̱ i yis je ̱ k ssäke ̱ bas wà . Yis ssëna je ̱ r pablele bäi . Sá weikarke ̱ biköle sha ̱ na ki ̱ ta si ̱ yis ssërke ̱ a ̱ naa .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Mika ̱ sá dejulu Macedonia ska ra , ka sá yaka je ̱ rene a ̱ ni , ata sá weika ji biköle te , sá pa ki ̱ ka sá weikarte , sá ja ̱ rka sa suarte .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Ata Säkeklä , ale je ̱ k jalecha ̱ wa ̱ wa je ̱ r pabläk , je te sá je ̱ r pabla Tito deju ̱ wà ,

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: ka irä ideju ̱ ebä wà kuna , ata ije ̱ r pabla bas te je wà ite sá je ̱ r pabla ñaebä . Je rä ite sá ia ̱ ipaka jishtä bas je ̱ r ja ̱ mi yis dälärke ̱ käi , bas ji ̱ ake ̱ käi , bas te yis biketse raa käi . Je te yis ssëwa ̱ a ̱ naa ki ̱ ta .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Ikuna yis te bas je ̱ r iawa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ äyë wà ra , ka yis ia ̱ je ssërta . Uketa ra je te yis je ̱ r iawa ̱ , je rä yie isu ̱ a ra bas je ̱ r ia ̱ wa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ je äyë te berbena bala na ki ̱ ka .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Jira yis ssëna a ̱ naa . Ka je rä bas je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä bas je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ bas ñamanewa ̱ tulaksa ̱ kje ki ̱ ka , je rä bas je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ jishtä Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena käi ki ̱ ka , je wà ka sá wa ̱ bas mewa ̱ klä kuna .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Je ̱ r ianewa ̱ jishtä Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena käi , je te sä wäsikewe ̱ je ̱ k manewa ̱ ksa ̱ je wà sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ . Je rä ka sä tsulewa ̱ kwa ̱ kuna . Ata je ̱ r ianewa ̱ jishtä ka ̱ jiska wa je ̱ r iarke ̱ käi , je te sä wäsikewe ̱ duäkwa ̱ .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Ata ¡ issö ! Je bas je ̱ r ianacha ̱ wa ̱ jishtä Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena käi , je wadeksa ̱ bas ia ̱ bäi , bas ssëna pjoo je ̱ k wetsäk e ̱ e ̱ na , äinakwa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , suanakwa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na , sä biketsäk e ̱ e ̱ na , ji bulee wa ̱ k pjoo , ji paruäk pjoo . Je biköle wà bas te ikjasha ka bas wa ̱ ji nui kuna .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Yis te jekäi iyua bas ia ̱ , ka je rä ale ji wakbläk kju ̱ ei ebä kuna , ñakäi ka je rä ji o ̱ na iukä ja ̱ mi kju ̱ ei ebä kuna , ata je rä bas je ̱ r ssërke ̱ sá ssëwa ̱ k bäi Säkeklä wäkata ska je kjayinakläwa ̱ .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Jekäi je te sá je ̱ r pablani . Sá je ̱ r pablena , ata ki ̱ ta si ̱ sá ssëna a ̱ naa , je rä Tito ssëna a ̱ naa te . Je rä ije je ̱ r täkinani bas oloi ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Ikuna jile ki ̱ ka yis te bas kjeisha bäi ije ia ̱ ra , ka yis äine kuna . Je rä jishtä ji biköle yile sá wa ̱ bas ia ̱ rä kte si ̱ wà , je su ̱ ta sá te bas kjeisha bäi Tito ia ̱ , je deksa ̱ rä iyina si ̱ .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Jekäi jishtä bas biköle ñajawa ̱ kte sssäk , ñakäi jishtä bas te ije kiawa ̱ sualewa ̱ wà , paju ̱ leka ̱ wà , jeska ije ̱ r ja ̱ rke ̱ ra ije je ̱ r ja ̱ mi bas dälärke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Yis te ibiketse ji biköle we ̱ mi bas te bäi , ji irä käi . Je te yis ssëwe ̱ a ̱ naa .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: El wa , jishtä Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shä deksa ̱ Macedonia ska tapanak eyaka eyaka wa ia ̱ käi , je wà sá te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Ijewa mablerte weikane ta ̱ i wà . Ata ki ̱ ta si ̱ ijewa ssëna a ̱ naa , ñakäi ijewa rä itjä ka ji a ̱ ni ta , je wà ijewa te ji ma ̱ shka ̱ ja ̱ si ̱ ji ta ta ̱ i käi .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Yis te ijewa ktei she , je ̱ r wà ijewa te ji ma rä bikö itäkili deka ̱ ja ̱ mi , ata ki ̱ ta si ̱ itäkili däka ̱ tsa ̱ ta .

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te ka ̱ kia sá ia ̱ pjoo iwa ̱ jile ma ̱ kläña sä sikii wa tsa ̱ tkäklä .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Jekäi ijewa te iwá ̱ sá te ibiketsa tsa ̱ ta . Jera säkätä iwakwa ñatulaksa ̱ Säkekewa ia ̱ , jekjepa sá ia ̱ , Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena jekäi ki ̱ ka .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Jekäi sá te Tito paka , bas te ji me ̱ ke ̱ je kuke e ̱ newa ̱ kläwa ̱ iwa ̱ , jishtä ite iwá ̱ mi kja käi .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Jekäi jishtä bas dä bakleka ̱ biköle ska , ji biketse etkabä ska käi , kte ska käi , ji ju ̱ ñe ska käi , ji biköle we ̱ tsa ̱ na ska käi , sá shka ̱ li ̱ bläk ki ̱ ta ska käi , je su ̱ ta bas ku ̱ je ji me ̱ je mo ̱ bakleka ̱ .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Ka yis te je she sa patkäk täkili wà käi , ata je rä bas mablä su ̱ aklä kju ̱ awa te ji we ̱ ja ̱ mi , bas wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l si ̱ í ̱ .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi sha ju ̱ ñer bas wa ̱ . Ije rä blu , ata bas shka ̱ l iwa ̱ ki ̱ ka ije ̱ k iawa ̱ wa ̱ ka ji ta , je rä bas däkläwa ̱ blu wa ye , ije ̱ k iawa ̱ wa ̱ ka jita oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Jikäi yis te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ e , je ne rä bäi bas ia ̱ rä ki ̱ ka . Jí año bakle waté bas ne te je tapawa ̱ miba rä , ka irä bas te je tapawa ̱ miba ebä kuna , ata bas wakwa ne je ̱ r ssënaba je ma ̱ k rä .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Jekäi jira je tapawe ̱ e ̱ newo ̱ bas ku ̱ . Je rä jishtä bas je ̱ r ssëna bäi je ma ̱ k käi , ñaebä bas je ̱ r ssënaklä itapawa ̱ k si ̱ bikö bas wa ̱ ji tso ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ je ̱ r ssërke ̱ ji ma ̱ k je ̱ r baa wà ra , je rä bäi Säkeklä ia ̱ bikö sa ̱ wa ̱ ji tso ̱ ja ̱ mi , ata ka je rä ji ka kuna sa ̱ wa ̱ ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Ka je rä kju ̱ awa tsa ̱ tkenaklä , ata bas weikanaklä kuna , ata je rä idäkläksa ̱ ñakjee .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Jira bas wa ̱ jile tso ̱ bäi , je wà sa saka ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ tsa ̱ tkermi , je rä bas ki ̱ ji shena ra , bas tsa ̱ tkenaklä ijewa ji tso ̱ wà , biköle ia ̱ idäkläksa ̱ ñakjee ,

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Yi te ikuka ta ̱ i ka je ia ̱ iwä ukä deneksa ̱ , yi te ikuka elkje ka je ki ̱ iki ̱ shene ji ̱ a . ”

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Wekte Säkeklä ra , je te Tito je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ bas tsa ̱ tkäk tsa ̱ na , jishtä yis wakei je ̱ r ssëna bas tsa ̱ tkäk käi .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Je rä sá te ipaka ji wa ̱ k je ssa ite bäi . Jekäi issëna ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na si ̱ ki ̱ ka imineju ̱ bas ska iwakei je ̱ r wà .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Jekäi sä el kjeiyile bäi tapanak eyaka eyaka wa biköle wa ̱ Jesús ktei baa kja ̱ nei we ̱ ki ̱ ka , je patkamiña sá te ije ra .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Ka je ebä kuna . Ata ñakäi ije rä kolole tapanak eyaka eyaka wa wa ̱ minakña sá ra je inaklä kolole ju ̱ ñakña sá ra , je inaklä kolole wà Säkekewa wakei oloi kanakläka ̱ , ñakäi je wà sá wa ̱ ikjashäklä sá je ̱ r ssërke ̱ bäi ijewa tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Jekäi je sä el maju ̱ ña sá ra ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ sá shäklä kuna je inaklä ta ̱ i dami sá wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Jekäi sá te ibiketsa ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na ka Säkekewa ebä wäna kuna , ata ñakäi ditsä wäna .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Ñakäi sá te sä el ekla patkamiña ijewa ra . Ije rä ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na , mablele su ̱ le ta ̱ i sá wa ̱ jile saka saka wà . Jekäi jira ki ̱ ta ije je ̱ r ssëna iwa ̱ k bäi , ite bas biketse bas dä bäi ki ̱ ka .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Ata Tito rä yis wapebläk shka ̱ bläkña yis da bas ia ̱ . Ata sä el wa , jewa rä patkele tapanak eyaka eyaka wa wa ̱ , Cristo oloi kanakläka ̱ .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa ia ̱ ikjashö iyina si ̱ bas wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l je su ̱ aklä tapanak eyaka eyaka wa wa ̱ , ñakäi jewa wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä sá te bas kjeisha je ki ̱ ka je rä iyina si ̱ ni .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Ka jiye yis sher sä sikii wa tsa ̱ tkäklä pake yuäk bas ia ̱ .

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas je ̱ r ssër dä bäi ji ma ̱ k , je ne rä yis wa ̱ kjeiyinak bäi Macedonia wa ia ̱ jikäi rä : “ Acaya wa rä itapawa ̱ k kja año bakle waté . ” Jekäi bas ssëna ji ma ̱ k pjoo , je ne te ijewa wäbäli ssëwa ̱ je wa ̱ k rä .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Ata yis te sa el wa patkami , je rä ka je sá ña ssäke ̱ bas wà däkläksa ̱ kuna ka wata käi , ata je rä bas wa ̱ inaklä yuläklä kja , jishtä yie bas pake dami käi .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Iö Macedonia wa manele miña yis da te bas ku ̱ ewa ̱ ka inaklä yolole kuna käi . Je te sá äiwe ̱ miwa ̱ , bas wakwa ñaebä , je ale sá te bas biketse ki ̱ ka .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te ibiketsa bäi si ̱ ra sa el wa pakäk minakba bas ska , bas kabla inaklä ma ̱ k je tapawa ̱ kba , ijuenaklä bas te ji ma ̱ rä je ̱ r baa wà ka baklé kuna täkili wà .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Jikäi yie ishe : Yi te ji tka elkje ra , je ia ̱ iwä dämiksa ̱ elkjebä ; ata yi te ji tka shka ̱ ja ̱ ra , je ia ̱ iwä dämiksa ̱ shka ̱ ja ̱ .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Jekäi ekla ekla ku ̱ imo ̱ , bikö sa wakei te ibiketsa käi , ka je ̱ r iale kuna , ka täkili wà kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji ma ̱ k je ̱ r baa wà je shka ̱ l Säkeklä wa ̱ .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä rä täkili ta ji ma ̱ k ki ̱ ta si ̱ bas ia ̱ , je wà ji biköle sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ däkläksa ̱ del ji bena ska , bas wa ̱ ji bäi biköle wa ̱ klä ta ̱ i ,

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Ite ji bala pja ̱ . Ite ji ma ̱ ka jita wa ia ̱ . Ije rä ji wa ̱ k wämo , je te jekäi ji we ̱ mi ji ̱ a jekjeye . ”

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Ale ditsä wä ma ̱ k itkäk ia ̱ , ñakäi ñanak ma ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ , je te bas ia ̱ ditsä wä yulemi ki ̱ tapawe ̱ mi , ñakäi bas ji wa ̱ ke ̱ wämo ki ̱ wäwe ̱ mi .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Je rä bas blunaklä ji biköle ska , bas wa ̱ ji biköle ma ̱ klä je ̱ r baa wà , je wà sá oloi ja ̱ mi iyinaklä wekte Säkeklä ra .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas te ji me ̱ ke ̱ je wá ka sä sikii wa ki ̱ ji shërke ̱ ebä däke ̱ ksa ̱ kuna , ata je ki ̱ wekte yirke ̱ ki ̱ ta Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Bas te itsa ̱ tkeke ̱ je su ̱ a ijewa te ra , jewa te Säkeklä kjeishemi Cristo ktei baa yinak bas wa ̱ je wawá ̱ bas te ki ̱ ka , bas te ji ma ̱ shka ̱ ja ̱ ijewa ia ̱ irä , biköle ia ̱ irä je ki ̱ ka .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Jekäi ijewa ka ̱ kiäke ̱ bas ki ̱ ka ra , ijewa ia ̱ bas ssërmi kshana si ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha ta ̱ i bas ia ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: ¡ Wekte Säkeklä ra , ite ji ma ̱ ka yinak kje ki ̱ ka !

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Yis Pablo wakei te ishe bas ia ̱ je ̱ k jalewa ̱ je ̱ r baa wà Cristo käi , yis ale bas sha ̱ na juer ta sualewa ̱ käi , ata ka yis katke kuna bas sha ̱ na ra ji shäk därërë bas ia ̱ ,

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: je te ishe bas ia ̱ yis demiju ̱ katke bas da ra , ke yis paka ji shäk därërë manele te ibiketse sá dami rä sa yaka ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi ni wa ia ̱ , jishtä yis wa ̱ itso ̱ biketsale kja ijewa u ̱ ña ̱ k ka suale kuna käi .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Sá dami sa yaka ja ̱ mi , jeiräta ka sá kju ̱ atkä kuna ji rä yaka iá ja ̱ mi .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ñakpäklä sá wa ̱ wao ̱ nak sá kju ̱ atkäklä , je rä ka ji yaka iá shtä wà kuna , ata jewa rä täkili ta Säkeklä ja ̱ mi ji täkili ta mia ̱ tkäkläwa ̱ ,

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: je wà sa ̱ wa ̱ ñawäyue käi , je ̱ keka ̱ je ̱ k ssäk Säkeklä biketse wätkewa ̱ k biköle käi , je weikäkläwa ̱ , ñakäi sa ̱ je ̱ rikäke ̱ biköle kjäshtäkläwa ̱ je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ Cristo yika iktä ssäk .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Jekäi bas te sá ktä dälätsawa ̱ kalabe ra , sá tso ̱ kja rä yi te ka sá ktä ssë jewa biköle kpäk .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Bas te jile su ̱ e rä ipa juer ebä wà . Ikuna yilé je ̱ k biketsä irä Cristo cha ni ra , je wakei ku ̱ ibiketsö jikäi : Ije rä Cristo cha ra , je su ̱ ta sá rä ñaebä .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá ia ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ le sa patkäklä . Ikuna je wà yis je ̱ k ssäke ̱ ka ̱ elkje ji ̱ a ra , jera ka je ia ̱ yis äinakwa ̱ . Je rä me ̱ le Säkekewa wa ̱ sá ia ̱ sá wa ̱ bas ki ̱ wäjiäklä , ka je rä bas weikäkläwa ̱ kuna .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Ka irä yis ki ̱ bas shena ibiketsäk yis ssëna bas suanewa ̱ k äyë wà irä ni .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ishe : Iktäke ̱ äyë ki ̱ ka ra , je ssër dä täkii därërë ; ata ikaldu ra , ijuer dä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ , ñakäi ka iia ̱ uta ̱ ner bäi .

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Ata je wakei je ̱ r ko ̱ nopa , jishtä sá ktäke ̱ äyë ki ̱ ka mika ̱ ka sá kajali kuna ra , je su ̱ ta sá ktämi sá kajali ra rä .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sá täkili däkka ̱ je ̱ k pakäk iräle , je ̱ k shäk iräle , manele je ̱ k ebä ktei shäke ̱ wa ra . Ata ijewa ñamabläke ̱ iwakwa skabä , ijewa ñapakäke ̱ iwakwa ja ̱ mibä , jekäi ijewa rä ka je ̱ r ta .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Ata ka sá ña ssä kuna bakleka ̱ ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta , ata Säkeklä te ibala pja ̱ sá ia ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak je ebä ja ̱ mi , jekäi je bala pa ̱ na demi bas ska kje .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Jekäi ka irä sá ia ̱ ibala pa ̱ le kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak ekta wà sá kjaksa ̱ julu kuna , sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä ka sá denemi bas ska käi . Ñera sá ne wa ̱ Cristo ktei baa delemi bas ska kje rä .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Ka sá ña ssä kuna bakleka ̱ ji ̱ a ki ̱ ta kju ̱ awa shka ̱ ble wà . Ata bas te ji biketse etkabä marka ̱ ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta ja ̱ mi , bas sha ̱ na sá ia ̱ ime ̱ rmi kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta , sá ia ̱ ibala pa ̱ le ja ̱ mi , je ne ssër sá ia ̱ ra ime ̱ o ̱ rpa rä .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Je rä sá wa ̱ kte baa bata shäklä bas ekta wà , ka ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k kuna kju ̱ awa te ikja ̱ nei we ̱ kate ska , ka ñassäk kuna kju ̱ awa wa ̱ ji o ̱ le kja wà .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Ata yi je ̱ k ssakle ra , je je ̱ k ssöpa rä Säkekewa ne wà .

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa wakei ebä je ̱ k kjeishä ka je wà sä däkksa ̱ bäi , ata ale yi kjeishe Säkeklä te ebä .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Säli yis te jile sheke ̱ yuletene wà katablöpa elkje . Jekäi irä , bas te yis katable ji ̱ a .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Yis te bas kju ̱ eitketse jishtä Säkeklä te sa ̱ kju ̱ eitketse käi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis dä kablele bas ma ̱ kksa ̱ jäiyi eklabä ia ̱ , jishtä busi ka se ̱ le kuna käi . Je rä Cristo ia ̱ .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Ata yis suarke ̱ , iö yilé te bas je ̱ r me ̱ ka Cristo biketsäk ji ̱ a etkabä bulee , jishtä tkäbe te Eva wäyuawa ̱ ije ̱ rikä wà käi .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yilé kuna däkmi Jesús saka kju ̱ awa ktei shäk , ka ale sá wa ̱ ktei yinak ssëta kuna iräle , bas kuna wikblu saka kukäkwa ̱ , ka ale bas wa ̱ kolole käi kuna iräle , kte baa saka kiäkwa ̱ , ka ale bas wa ̱ kolole kuna käi iräle ra , je katableke ̱ bäi bas te .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Ata yis ia ̱ ra ka yis dä ja ̱ lewa ̱ ji a ̱ ni ska je Jesús ktei bata shäk bäi si ̱ ye wa katäbäka kuna .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Bäräle yis ktä rä ka ssërta bäi , ata ka jekäi yis dä kuna ji ju ̱ ñe ska ra . Ñera ji biköle ska , ji biköle wà yis wa ̱ je kjayile bas ia ̱ rä .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Ata yis te bas ia ̱ Säkeklä ktei baa bata sha ka to ̱ le kuna , je wà yis je ̱ k jawa ̱ bas oloi kanakläka ̱ , ¿ je ki ̱ yis dä nui ta na ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Tapanak eyaka eyaka wa saka te yis ia ̱ inaklä ma ̱ yis wa ̱ bas tsa ̱ tkäklä kte wà . Je rä sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä yie ijewa waña käi .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Yis se ̱ na bas sha ̱ na ra , jeska yis ki ̱ ji shena ra , ka yis wa ̱ yi a ̱ ni weikane jile wà , ata sä el wa Macedonia wa date te ji shena yis ki ̱ je ma ̱ yis ia ̱ . Ji biköle ska yis ji wá ̱ tsa ̱ na , ka yis wa ̱ bas weikäklä . Jekäi yie iwe ̱ mi ji ̱ a .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Cristo ktä rä iyina si ̱ , je tso ̱ yis wa ̱ . Je wà yis te ishe , jí yis je ̱ k kjeishä ka je wätkenak Acaya ke ̱ i ska wa ia ̱ .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: ¿ Jiye na ? ¿ Je rä ka yis wa ̱ bas shka ̱ li ̱ blene na ? Ñera Säkeklä wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Ata yis wa ̱ o ̱ nak , je we ̱ mi ji ̱ a yie , je rä manele je ̱ k ssäke ̱ wà issëna däkwa ̱ sá käi , jewa ia ̱ ka ka ̱ me ̱ naklä kuna ije ̱ k ssäklä ji ki ̱ ka .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jewa rä Jesús ktei bata shäk wa me ̱ i ebä , sä wäyuäk shka ̱ bläk wa ye , je ̱ k iawa ̱ k Cristo ktei shäk wa ye .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Ata ka je rä ji sa ̱ ma ̱ le ̱ cha ̱ kwa ̱ käi kuna . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ñera Satanás wakei rä je ̱ k iawa ̱ k ka ̱ oloi ángel í ye .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka iwakei kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa je ̱ k iawa ̱ ke ̱ ji wämo kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa käi ra , ka je rä ji ta ̱ i sa ̱ ma ̱ le ̱ cha ̱ kwa ̱ käi kuna . Bata ska ra ijewa ia ̱ idämiksa ̱ jishtä ite ji wá ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Yis te ishe etäbä kicha ni , ke yi a ̱ ni ku ̱ ibiketsa yis yuletenawa ̱ irä ni , ata kai ra , je ku ̱ yis kukö jishtä yuletelewa ̱ käi , yis je ̱ k kjeishäklä elkje .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Ji sheke ̱ yie , ka je she kuna yie Säkekewa te ishe ja ̱ mi , ata jishtä yuletelewa ̱ käi , je rä yie ibiketse ji tso ̱ yis je ̱ k kjeishäklä ki ̱ ka .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ña kjeishäke ̱ iyaka wà . Je kju ̱ ei yis maju ̱ je ̱ k kjeishäk ñaebä .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Je rä bas dä je ̱ rikä ta ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka , bas te yuletenak wa katableke ̱ je ̱ r baa wà .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Jekäi yilé te bas kukeke ̱ wa ̱ kjanaklä wa ye iräle , yilé te bas wañeke ̱ iräle , yilé te bas ji kukeke ̱ wa ̱ iräle , yilé je ̱ k ssäke ̱ ka ̱ bas ki ̱ ka iräle , yilé te bas kpeke ̱ bas wäki ̱ iräle ra , je katableke ̱ bas te .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Äilewa ̱ wà yie ishe , ka sá täkili deneka ̱ jekäi iwa ̱ k . Yis ktäke ̱ yuletelewa ̱ käi , ata yie ishe manele ka suane je ̱ k kjeishäk ra , ka yis suanak je ̱ k kjeishäk ñaebä .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: ¿ Ijewa rä Hebreo wa na ? Ñera yis ñaebä . ¿ Ijewa rä Israel wa na ? Ñera yis ñaebä . ¿ Ijewa rä Abraham batala na ? Ñera yis ñaebä .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: ¿ Ijewa rä Cristo kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa na ? Ñera yis dä ijewa tsa ̱ ta . Je rä yis ktäke ̱ yuletelewa ̱ käi . Yis shka ̱ blele ki ̱ ta . Yis wätele ki ̱ ta . Yis bukle ki ̱ ta . Yis bakle ka ̱ raa duewa ̱ sha ̱ na .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Cinco veces däka ̱ Judío wa wa ̱ yis bukle ksa bata wà däka ̱ treinta y nueve veces .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Mañatäbä kicha yis bukle kal wà . Etaba kicha yis tena jak wà . Mañatäbä kicha ko ̱ no wäitäbina yis wäkseka . Etaba kicha yis kja däyë bata ki ̱ ka ka ̱ mii tuina irä ka ̱ piana irä .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Ka ̱ raa yis shkele ka ̱ mii , diklä ta ̱ i na , jakbläk wa däläna sha ̱ na , yis ditsei wä däläna sha ̱ na , ka Judío kuna wa däläna sha ̱ na , jukläyäkä ska däläna sha ̱ na , ka ̱ wakei ebä ska däläna sha ̱ na , däyë ki ̱ däläna sha ̱ na , säwäyuäk sä el wa ye däläna sha ̱ na ,

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: shka ̱ ble ta ̱ i sha ̱ na , chichane jaree sha ̱ na , wäñine ta ̱ i sha ̱ na , bäli irä je ̱ r ba ne irä ssë sha ̱ na , ka ji ña ̱ le kuna sha ̱ na , ka ̱ tse ̱ e ̱ irä ka pajiele kuna irä sha ̱ na .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Ka je ebä kuna , ata buliri buliri yis te tapanak eyaka eyaka wa biköle biketseke ̱ .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Yilé ja ̱ lmanawa ̱ ra , je te yis ja ̱ lmawe ̱ ke ̱ . Yilé shiriwa ̱ wa ̱ isaka te ra , je te yis kju ̱ atkewe ̱ ke ̱ .

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ikuna rä yis kiana je ̱ k ssäk ra , yis je ̱ k ssämi yis dä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ wà .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús Ká , ale kjeiyinak bäi jekjeyemi wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ka irä yis ka ̱ yuä kuna .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Damasco ska , ka ̱ wäkiri kolole ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i Aretas wa ̱ , je te guardia wa paka je jukläyäkä kjä ska ' ski ̱ ssäk iwa ̱ ' skukäkläwa ̱ .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Ata jukläyäkä kjätkele ventanaí na yis ja ̱ wa ̱ mi canasta na . Jekäi yis kja shiri ije jula na .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Yis kiana je ̱ k kjeishäk . Ka jiye je kiar , jeiräta Säkekewa wa ̱ yis ia ̱ ji kjayile irä yis wäji ̱ atkele irä je pake mar yis te .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Jekäi jäiyi ekla Cristo ja ̱ mi su ̱ le yis wa ̱ je mineletse ̱ ka ̱ jöir etkä je etkä idäkläka ̱ mañatkä ska . Je wa ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ catorce año . Imineletse ̱ rä yakaje iräle , ka yakaje iräle , ka yis wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer . Säkeklä ne wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer dä .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Yis wa ̱ je ekla su ̱ le je mineletse ̱ ale ka ̱ baa ska . Jeska je te kte baa ka yinak kje ssa , ata ka sa ̱ ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ ne je shäkläka ̱ . Je mineletse ̱ rä yakaje iräle , ka yakaje iräle , ka yis wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer . Säkeklä ne wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer dä .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Je ekla ne wà yis je ̱ k ssämi rä . Ka yis wakei je ̱ k kjeishä kuna , ata yis je ̱ k kjeishä rä yis dä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ ne wà .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Iwa rä ikuna yis ssëna je ̱ k kjeishäk ra , ka je rä yis yuleter kuna , yie ishemi rä iyina ki ̱ ka . Ata ka yie je we ̱ , je rä ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ yis biketsäklä bäi si ̱ ji we ̱ ke ̱ yie ji sheke ̱ yie je tsa ̱ ta kuna .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Jekäi ka yis je ̱ k ssäkläka ̱ bakleka ̱ yis wäji ̱ atkele e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ wà ki ̱ ka , yis ia ̱ ji me ̱ na dika ye yis yaka ska , je rä ji patkele Satanás wa ̱ yis weikäk ye , ka yis je ̱ k ssäkläka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Jekäi yis ka ̱ kia mañatäbä kicha Säkekewa ia ̱ iwa ̱ je tsa ̱ ju ̱ aklämi yis ki ̱ ka .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Ata ije te yis ia ̱ isha : “ Yis je ̱ r bäi shä je ne kjela shena ba ia ̱ rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis täkili juerke ̱ bäi si ̱ rä ji rä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ ja ̱ mi . ” Je ne ki ̱ ka bäi si ̱ ra yis ssërmi a ̱ naa je ̱ k ssäk yis dä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ wà , je wà Cristo täkili däkläwa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ssërke ̱ a ̱ naa yis dä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ ra , yile yakei ra , ji bälirke ̱ ra , yis sälwi su ̱ rke ̱ ra , yis weikarke ̱ Cristo kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ra . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , mika ̱ yis dä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ ra , jera yis dä täkii .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Yis ianawa ̱ yuletelewa ̱ je ñak rä bas ne wa ̱ . Bäi si ̱ ra , yis ne rä kjeiyinak bäi bas wa ̱ rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis dä kje emana , ata ka yis dä ja ̱ lewa ̱ kuna je Jesús ktei bata shäk bäi si ̱ ye wa katäbäka kuna .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Yis chatkawa ̱ bas sha ̱ na ka jalewa ̱ ta ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ shtä wa ̱ k , ji wa ̱ k ijuenaklä ye , ji wa ̱ k täkili ta . Je wà ijuena yis dä Jesús ktei bata shäk .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Jekäi ¿ jibä wà yis te bas biketsa tapanak eyaka eyaka wa saka katäbäka rä na ? Ata ka yis wa ̱ bas weikane jile kie wà ki ̱ kale irä . ¡ Yis jöwa ̱ bitaba je yie iwa ̱ yakei ki ̱ ka !

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Yis kaldu minakju ̱ mi kja bas ska idäkläka ̱ mañatäbä kicha . Ata ka yis wa ̱ bas jile kinak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yie bas jile payule kuna , ata bas wakwa ne sherke ̱ yis ki ̱ rä . Yabala ka shene rä iká wa ia ̱ jile ki ̱ tapawa ̱ k kuna , ata iká wa ne rä je wa ̱ k iyabala ia ̱ rä .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka je ̱ r baa wà yis wakei ji e ̱ wa ̱ miwa ̱ , ñakäi yis wakei je ̱ k e ̱ wa ̱ miwa ̱ bas wakwa ki ̱ ka . Jekäi yis te bas shka ̱ li ̱ bla ki ̱ ta ra , ¿ yis dä shka ̱ li ̱ blenak ja ̱ lewa ̱ na ?

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Jekäi irä ta , ka yis wa ̱ bas jile kine kuna . Ata bä rä yis dä je ̱ rikä ta ki ̱ ka wäsi ̱ wa yie bas je ̱ r ma ̱ kolonakcha ̱ wa ̱ rä .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: Baishe , ¿ yis wa ̱ manele patkele bas wäki ̱ je wà yis te bas wäyua na ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Yis te Tito paka minak , jekäi yie sä el patka ije ra . Jera ¿ Tito te bas wäyua na ? Ata ¿ ka sá te ji we ̱ rä ñaebä kuna na , je ̱ rikä ta ñaebä kuna na ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: ¿ Bas ia ̱ ra sá ña wetsä rami ji ̱ a ebä bas ia ̱ irä na ? Jekäi Säkeklä wäna Cristo ja ̱ mi sá ktäke ̱ rä . Ata bas dikäla , je biköle rä bas ki ̱ wäjienaklä .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Ata yis suanawa ̱ iö yis demiju ̱ ra , ka le yis wa ̱ bas ko ̱ nak jishtä yis ki ̱ ishena käi , ñakäi ka bas wa ̱ yis su ̱ nak jishtä bas ki ̱ ishena käi . Iö le kjätene käi , je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka ianewa ̱ ijile ki ̱ käi , kju ̱ atke käi , ñabalabutse käi , ñaki ̱ yue käi , biyö ble käi , je ̱ k ssë bakleka ̱ käi , ñawätji ̱ we ̱ käi ebä tso ̱ bas wa ̱ rä .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Iö le etäbä kicha yis demini ra , yis Kekläí te yis ssëwe ̱ mi äilewa ̱ bas ki ̱ ka , je rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa ̱ mikle ji yakei wakblele , ata ji shi ̱ ana käi , ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ käi , ji äina tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ka wätkelewa ̱ ta käi , o ̱ le iwa ̱ je ka dokoitsane iwa ̱ ra , yis je ̱ r iarmiwa ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Jí yis maju ̱ bas ska ne rä idäkläka ̱ mañatäbä kicha rä . Ji biköle wabiketsarke ̱ ksa ̱ rä ktei yile isu ̱ ak wa bol wa ̱ iräle mañal wa ̱ iräle .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Yis dasta ̱ na itäki ̱ yis dasta ̱ nani ra , yie ji sha kja . Jekäi jira ka yis katke kuna ra , yie ji sheke ̱ ni ji yakei wakbläk mikle wa ia ̱ irä isaka biköle ia ̱ irä , ikuna yis damiju ̱ ni etäbä kicha ra , ka yis wa ̱ yi janakwa ̱ kuna .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas te Cristo ktäke ̱ yis ja ̱ mi si ̱ irä í ̱ je juenaklä yule kate . Ka ije rä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ kuna bas sha ̱ na , ata ije rä täkii bas sha ̱ na .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Ije wäteleka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi rä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ , jeiräta ije se ̱ r kseka rä Säkeklä täkili oloi ja ̱ mi . Je su ̱ ta sá rä ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ ije ja ̱ mi , ata sá se ̱ rmini kseka ije ra Säkeklä täkili oloi ja ̱ mi bas ia ̱ .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Bas wakwa je ̱ k biketsöksa ̱ , bas wa ̱ isu ̱ aklä bas dä ji biketsäk etkabä iräle kai iräle . Bas wakwa je ̱ k mablö . Ata ¿ ka bas wakwa je ̱ k ju ̱ ñer na ? ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Cristo ne katke bas ja ̱ rka rä na ? ¡ Ata ka irä jekäi kuna ra , ka bas dä deleksa ̱ kuna bäi !

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Ata yis ia ̱ issër bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa iku ̱ , ka sá rä deleksa ̱ yakei kuna .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Sá ka ̱ kiä Säkeklä ia ̱ ka bas wa ̱ ji yakei a ̱ ni wakbläklä kuna . Ka je rä ijuenaklä sá rä deleksa ̱ bäi käi kuna , ata je rä bas wa ̱ ji rä bäi wa ̱ klä . Ata ikuna sá wakwa juer ka sá deneksa ̱ bäi käi ra , ka je wa ̱ ji kuna .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka sá ia ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ nak ji rä iyina si ̱ ukä ja ̱ mi , ata ji rä iyina si ̱ ebä shka ̱ l ja ̱ mi sá ia ̱ ji o ̱ r dä .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sá rä ja ̱ lma ̱ lecha ̱ wa ̱ ra , ata bas dä täkii ra , sá ssërke ̱ a ̱ naa . Jikäi sá ka ̱ kiäke ̱ bas ki ̱ ka rä , je rä bas däkläwa ̱ bulee ebä ye .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Jekäi yie jí yueke ̱ ka yis katke kuna ra . Je wà yis katke ra , ka yis wa ̱ bas uñaklä därërë ka ̱ wei me ̱ le yis ia ̱ Säkekewa wa ̱ je wà . Je me ̱ le yis ia ̱ rä yis wa ̱ bas ki ̱ wäjiäkläka ̱ , ata ka bas weikäkläwa ̱ kuna .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: El wa , ibata ska ra , bas ssëno a ̱ naa , bas döwa ̱ pa bulee , bas je ̱ r pableno , bas je ̱ rikö etka yebä , bas se ̱ no bitaba ñara . Säkeklä sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bläk , sä ssëwa ̱ k baa , je kälduämi bas da .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Bas ñachakö ñawäjalassë wämo wà .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Sä sikii wa biköle te bas chakami .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: Säkekewa Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , Säkeklä ku ̱ bas shka ̱ li ̱ blöpa , Wikblu sikina ku ̱ bas wäjiewo ̱ pa etka yebä ija ̱ mi .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Pablo , kolole Jesús ktei bata shäk ye , ka ditsä wa ̱ kuna , ka ditsä oloi ja ̱ mi kuna , ata Jesucristo wa ̱ , ñakäi Säkeklä Sa Ká ale ishki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je wa ̱ ,

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: je te sa el wa kajali yis da wa biköle ra ñara jí yue mar , tapanak eyaka eyaka Galacia ska wa ia ̱ .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Säkeklä Sa Ká irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä , je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa ,

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: ale je ̱ k ju ̱ leksa ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele kju ̱ ei , iwa ̱ sä bäkäkläksa ̱ jira ji dami yakei yika , jishtä saje wa Kekläí , Sa Ká ki ̱ ishena käi ,

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: je ne oloi kanoka ̱ pa sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi ji ̱ a rä . Amén .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Yis male ̱ te ̱ nawa ̱ bas ñabutsa tulami plaa ale bas kiäk Cristo je ̱ r bäi sha wà yika je te , bas minaklä kte baa saka ja ̱ mi .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ka irä isaka tso ̱ kju ̱ awa kuna , ata manele te bas je ̱ r iawe ̱ ke ̱ . Jekäi ite Cristo ktei baa wamanewa ̱ kleksa ̱ .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Ata ikuna rä sá wakwa iräle , ángel daju ̱ ka ̱ jöir iräle , te kte baa saka bata she bas ia ̱ ka sá wa ̱ ibata yile ssëta kuna ra , je wakwa weikanowa ̱ pa .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Jishtä sá te isha käi , jira je sheke ̱ ni yie . Ikuna yilé te bas ia ̱ kte baa saka bata she ka ale bas wa ̱ kolole ssëta kuna ra , je wakei weikanowa ̱ pa .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: ¿ Baishe jira yis te ditsä iräle Säkeklä iräle je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ bäi yis da na ? ¿ Yis te rä ditsä wäbätsewa ̱ k ebä ne yuleke ̱ rä na ? Ikuna rä yis te ditsä ebä ne wäbätsewe ̱ ke ̱ ji ̱ a rä ra , ka yis dä Cristo kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k kuna .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Ata el wa , yis ki ̱ bas shena iju ̱ ñak , kte baa bata yinak yis wa ̱ , ka je datse ̱ rä ditsä ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka je me ̱ ne rä ka je wà yis yöne rä ditsä wa ̱ kuna , ata Jesucristo ne wa ̱ yis wäji ̱ atkele je wà rä .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Bas wa ̱ jishtä yis wa ̱ ji o ̱ le bakle yis dami ji ̱ a Judío wa ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ja ̱ mi ra , je rä ssële , je rä yis te tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ wa yulaksa ̱ täkili wà , ñakäi iweika ta ̱ i .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Ñakäi je ke ̱ i ska ra yis te Judío wa ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe wawe ̱ rami bakleka ̱ ju ̱ yis saka Judío wa tsa ̱ ta , yis te yis ká wa wädular wetseke ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ wa ̱ je ki ̱ ka .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Ata mika ̱ Säkeklä , ale yis kukäk yis a ̱ mi sha ̱ ska raté , yis kiäk ije ̱ r bäi sha ki ̱ ka , je ssëna

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: iyaba kjashäk yis ja ̱ mi , yis wa ̱ ije ktei baa bata shäklä ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na , je plaa ebä ra ka yis wa ̱ je ktei chakane yaka ta pi ta wa ia ̱ ,

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: ñakäi ka yis deneka ̱ Jerusalénka Jesús ktei bata shäk yis yikaba wa wäki ̱ . Ata yis mineju ̱ mi Arabia ska , jekjepa yis deni etäbä kicha Damasco ska .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Tres año ukäki ̱ kjepa yis dasta ̱ na Jerusalénka Pedro su ̱ ak . Jekäi yis se ̱ na ijeka quince día .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Ata ka yis wa ̱ Jesús ktei bata shäk wa saka su ̱ ne , ata Jacobo Säkekewa el ebä .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Jí yuete yis te bas ia ̱ , je she yie Säkeklä wäkata ska , je rä ka yis ka ̱ yuä kuna .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Jekjepa yis mineju ̱ Siria ke ̱ i ska , ñakäi Cilicia ke ̱ i ska .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Ata ka yis dä su ̱ le kuna tapanak eyaka eyaka Cristo ja ̱ mi tso ̱ Judea ska wa wa ̱ .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Ata ijewa te rä ipalei ebä ne ssa : “ Ale mikle saje wa yuläkksa ̱ täkili wà , jira je te ji biketse etkabä ktei baa iwa ̱ weikanak ta ̱ i je bata she kate . ”

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Jera ijewa te Säkeklä oloi kaka ̱ yis kju ̱ ei .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Ñerä catorce año ukäki ̱ kjepa yis mineka ̱ ni etäbä kicha Jerusalénka Bernabé ra . Ñakäi yis wa ̱ Tito minetse ̱ ña .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Yis mine yis ia ̱ ji kjayina kju ̱ ei . Jekäi sá tapana sa wakwa ebä palei ta bakleka ̱ wa ra , ale kte baa bata sheke ̱ yis te ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na , je pakäklä yis wa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ . Je rä yis tu ̱ le , ñakäi yis tu ̱ rte , je ka tsulenaklä ye .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Jekäi ka yi wa ̱ Tito , ale shkäña yis da , pakane tene shkiri wa ̱ k . Jeiräta ije rä Griego wa .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Ata delewa ̱ jaki sä wäyuäk sä el wa käi , jewa ñapatkawa ̱ sa ̱ sha ̱ na sa ̱ su ̱ ak wäsi ̱ wa jishtä saje wa bakleksa ̱ Cristo Jesús wa ̱ wa te ji we ̱ rä käi , je wà iwa ̱ sä kukäkläwa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ kjanaklä wa ye .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Jeiräta ka sá ñajanewa ̱ kuna a ̱ ni ijewa yika una horabä jibä . Je rä ji rä iyina si ̱ kte baa ja ̱ mi , je a ̱ ta ̱ naklä ji ̱ a bas ia ̱ .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Jekäi ale palei ta bakleka ̱ käi wa wa ̱ ka ji ki ̱ yine ji ̱ a yis ia ̱ . Mikle ra ijewa rä bakleka ̱ räle ka je wa ̱ ji kuna yis ia ̱ , Säkeklä te ka sa wabiketseksa ̱ rä sa pajuer ebä wà kuna .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Ata ijewa te isu ̱ a ra , yis ia ̱ kte baa rä me ̱ le bata yinak ka tene shkiri ta wa ia ̱ , jishtä Pedro ia ̱ ime ̱ le bata yinak tene shkiri ta wa ia ̱ käi .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Pedro täkiwa ̱ k Jesús ktei bata shäk tene shkiri ta wa ia ̱ , je te ñaebä yis täkiwa ̱ Jesús ktei bata shäk ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka mika ̱ Jacobo irä Cefas irä Juan irä , ale palei ta ju kata ye wa , jewa te isu ̱ a jekäi yis ia ̱ täkili me ̱ le rä ra , ijewa jula wämo ma ̱ yis irä Bernabé irä ia ̱ ijuenaklä sá rä etka ye ebä , sá wa ̱ ibata shäklä ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ , ata ije wa wa ̱ ibata shäklä tene shkiri ta wa ia ̱ .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Ata ka sá kiar je ̱ r shenak kuna ka jita wa ska ebä sha ijewa te rä . Jera je ne wa ̱ k yis ssërke ̱ pjoo rä .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Ata mika ̱ Pedro demi Antioquía ska ra , yis te iu ̱ ña a ̱ mikje iwäna , ije rä nui ta ki ̱ ka .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , säkätä ditsä patkele Jacobo wa ̱ ka däba yika , ije yäkäke ̱ ka Judío kuna wa ra . Ata ijewa dejulu ra , ije je ̱ k butsa ju ̱ ami ka däkwa ̱ ji ̱ a ijewa ra . Je rä isuanawa ̱ sa pakäk tene shkiri wa ̱ k wa yika kju ̱ ei .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Jekäi Judío wa saka kalabe te jekäi iwá ̱ ña ije ra , kje ditsä wa ̱ su ̱ nak ebä , Bernabéje kaje je ̱ k jawa ̱ jekäi iwa ̱ kña , kje su ̱ nak ebä .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Je ki ̱ ka mika ̱ yis te isu ̱ a ka ijewa dami rä ji rä iyina si ̱ tso ̱ kte baa ja ̱ mi je ja ̱ mi kuna ra , yie isha Pedro ia ̱ biköle wäkata ska : “ Ba rä Judío wa ne se ̱ r jishtä ka Judío kuna wa käi ra , jera ¿ jiye ba te ka Judío kuna wa pake se ̱ nak Judío wa käi rä na ? ”

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Sá , ale ko ̱ le Judío wa ye , ka je rä ji yakei wakbläk wa tso ̱ ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na käi kuna ,

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: jeiräta sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , ka yi wabiketsanakksa ̱ wämo ye ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata Jesucristo biketse ebä ki ̱ ka . Jekäi sá te Cristo Jesús biketsa sá wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye Cristo biketse wà , ka je rä sa te ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ wà kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka yi a ̱ ni wabiketsanakksa ̱ wämo ye ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Ata ikuna rä sa te iyula sä wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ye Cristo ja ̱ mi ra , jeiräta sä deksa ̱ rä ji yakei wakbläk wa ye ra , baishe ¿ Cristo rä ji yakei wakble kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k na ? ¡ Ka irä jekäi kuna !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Jekäi ikuna rä yis te ji weikawa ̱ ta ̱ na je yueke ̱ ka ̱ ni ra , jera je wà ijuer yis dä ka ̱ wei shirinewa ̱ k .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ wei kju ̱ ei yis duawa ̱ ka ̱ wei ia ̱ , je rä yis se ̱ nakläni Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Jekäi yis dä wäteleka ̱ ña cruz ja ̱ mi Cristo ra . Ka yis se ̱ r kuna ji ̱ a , ata Cristo ne se ̱ rke ̱ ni yis ja ̱ mi rä . Jira yis se ̱ rke ̱ ji ̱ a yaka ja ̱ mi ra , yis se ̱ r dä yis te Säkeklä yaba ale yis shka ̱ li ̱ bläk , je ̱ k ju ̱ leksa ̱ yis ki ̱ ka , je biketse oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Ka yis te Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shä ju ̱ eksa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna sa wabiketsarke ̱ ksa ̱ wämo ye rä ka ̱ wei oloi ja ̱ mi ra , Cristo duawa ̱ rä ka wata .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Bas Galacia wa ka je ̱ rikä ta . ¿ Yibä jalibasha bas ukä ja ̱ mi rä na ? Bas ia ̱ Jesucristo pakana bäi sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä bas wä naka iwätenaka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi rä käi .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Ata jí ebä ne chakeke ̱ yie bas ia ̱ rä : ¿ Bas ia ̱ Säkeklä wikblu deksa ̱ rä bas te ka ̱ wei wawá ̱ ki ̱ ka na , ata bas te kte ssa je biketsa bas te etkabä ki ̱ ka irä na ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: ¿ Je kjekla bas yuletenacha ̱ wa ̱ rä na ? Säkätä bas te iwa ̱ té rä Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi , ata ¿ jira bas te je e ̱ newe ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ ni rä ji rä yaka iá ja ̱ mi na ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: ¿ Bas te ji shka ̱ l ssa ta ̱ i rä kje ka wata na ? ¿ Iyina ka irä wata na ?
