text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Jera iwikblu ma ̱ k bas ia ̱ , ñakäi ji wa ̱ k täki ta bas sha ̱ na , ¿ je te je we ̱ rä bas te ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka na , ata kte ssa bas te je biketse bas te etkabä ki ̱ ka irä na ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Jishtä Abraham te Säkeklä biketsa , je wà iwabiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye to ̱ ne käi ,

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: jekäi bas ku ̱ iju ̱ ñopa , je su ̱ ta sä ji biketsäk etkabä wa rä Abraham batala .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Jekäi kte yöle ska iyileba rä Säkeklä te ka Judío kuna wa wabiketseksa ̱ wämo ye rä ite ji biketse etkabä wà . Je ki ̱ ka Abraham ia ̱ je kte baa bata yinaba jikäi : “ Ba oloi ja ̱ mi ji bäi o ̱ rmi ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa biköle ia ̱ . ”

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Jekäi sä ji biketsäk etkabä wa ia ̱ ji bäi o ̱ rke ̱ Abraham ale ji biketsäk etkabä ra ñara .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Jekäi mane wa rä ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ja ̱ mi , jewa rä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : “ Bena yi ka chatkenewa ̱ ji biköle yöle katke ka ̱ wei äyëí ki ̱ je wawa ̱ k ra , jewa biköle rä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ . ”

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Jekäi iyina si ̱ ra ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka ka yi a ̱ ni wabiketsanakksa ̱ wämo ye Säkeklä wäna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : “ Sä wämo se ̱ rmi ite ji biketsa etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Ata wabiketsaneksa ̱ wämo ye sa te ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka , ka je rä ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka wabiketsaneksa ̱ käi kuna . Ata ietkä te ishe rä : “ Yi te jekäi iwawa ̱ ra , je se ̱ rmi je oloi ja ̱ mi . ”

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Je ka ̱ wei wa ̱ sä rä weikalewa ̱ , je yika Cristo te sa bakaksa ̱ , ije ̱ k iawawa ̱ weikalewa ̱ saje wa ki ̱ je wà , jishtä iyöle katke käi : “ Bena yi rä tkeleka ̱ kal ja ̱ mi je rä weikalewa ̱ . ”

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Je rä ji bäi yile o ̱ nak Abraham ia ̱ je däkläksa ̱ ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi , je wà Säkeklä kablele iwikblu ma ̱ k je däkläksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ , sa te ji biketsa etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: El wa , yis ma ipakäk ditsä ja ̱ mi . Kje ditsä ebä kabläke ̱ ñaia ̱ , jewa ñaje ̱ rku ̱ a e ̱ ná ra , yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka je wäte ̱ nak je ki ̱ yönak ji ̱ a .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä kablele rä Abraham ia ̱ ñakäi iyäbei bata ia ̱ . Ka iwa ̱ iyine , “ Ibatala ia ̱ ” sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ia ̱ käi kuna , ata eklabä ia ̱ . Ite isha rä : “ Ba yäbei bata ia ̱ ” , je rä Cristo .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Jí ne käi yie isheke ̱ rä : Ka ̱ wei me ̱ le cuatrociento treinta año ukä ska , je wa ̱ ijewa kablele ñaia ̱ yile kja Säkeklä wa ̱ iyina , je ka tse ̱ neju ̱ mi . Ke jekäi ikuna ra , ikablele rä wäyilewa ̱ .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna ji däkksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ däke ̱ ksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka ra , ka je rä ikablele ki ̱ ka kuna ; ata Säkeklä te je ma ̱ Abraham ia ̱ rä , ikabla ebä ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Jera , ¿ jiye ka ̱ wei me ̱ na rä na ? Je me ̱ na rä sä rä shirinak ki ̱ ka , marä je iyäbei bata ia ̱ ikablele deju ̱ kje . Jekäi ka ̱ wei me ̱ le rä ángel wa oloi ja ̱ mi , sä ktei shäk a ̱ miki ̱ jiki ̱ julaí wà .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Del sä ktei shäk a ̱ miki ̱ jiki ̱ wa te ka sä ktei she rä ekta yebä kuna , ata Säkeklä rä eklabä .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Jekäi ra , ¿ ka ̱ wei te Säkeklä kablele je wätkewe ̱ wa ̱ na ? ¡ Kai irä jekäi kuna ! Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna ka ̱ wei rä täki ta sa ̱ se ̱ newa ̱ k kseka ra , jera iyina si ̱ ra sä wabiketsarmiksa ̱ wämo ye rä ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Ata iyöle te ji biköle kjäshtawa ̱ ji yakei wakble ia ̱ . Je rä jini ikablele käi io ̱ naklä Jesucristo biketsäk wa ia ̱ , yi te ibiketseke ̱ käi .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Ata ji biketse etkabä ka ke ̱ i däwa ̱ ba yikaba ra , sa ̱ tso ̱ rä kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ , kjäitälewa ̱ ji biketse etkabä kjayir mar ki ̱ ssäk .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ wei kja rä sä kjänanak ye Cristo dewa ̱ kje , Cristo oloi ja ̱ mi sa wabiketsäkläksa ̱ wämo ye sa te ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Ata ji biketse etkabä dewa ̱ e ̱ ná , je ki ̱ ka ka sä rä kololewa ̱ ji ̱ a kuna je sä kjänanak wa ̱ .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Jekäi bas biköle rä Säkeklä yabala ye , bas te Cristo Jesús biketsa ki ̱ ka .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas wäokle Cristo ja ̱ mi wa biköle rä pajielewa ̱ Cristo wà .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Jekäi ka sa ̱ kuna ji ̱ a Judío wa iräle Griego wa iräle . Ka sa ̱ kuna ji ̱ a kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye iräle , deleksa ̱ kjermita iräle . Ka sa ̱ kuna ji ̱ a jäiyi wa iräle , alaklä wa iräle . Je rä bas biköle rä etka yebä Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Jekäi bas dä Cristo cha ra , bas dä Abraham batala , däli ukä kukäkwa ̱ ikablele ja ̱ mi .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Jekäi yie ishe : Däli ukä kukäkwa ̱ ji ̱ a tsi ̱ ne ra , je rä ñaebä kjanaklä wa ra , jeiräta ije ne rä ji biköle wakei rä .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Ata ije rä patkenak ikjänanak wa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñak wa wa ̱ marä iká wa ̱ ke ̱ i yileta ̱ na kje .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Je su ̱ ta saje wa rä sa bakle ji ̱ a tsi ̱ dala ra , sä rä kololecha ̱ wa ̱ ji we ̱ ka ̱ jiska ja ̱ mi je wa ̱ ikjanaklä ye .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Ata ike ̱ i deka ̱ e ̱ ná ra , Säkeklä te iyaba patkaté . Je ku ̱ a alaklä te , ñakäi iko ̱ na kololewa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ ,

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: je wà iwa ̱ sa ̱ tso ̱ kololecha ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ , jewa bäkäkläksa ̱ ikolonakläwa ̱ iyabala ye .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Jekäi bas dä iyabala ki ̱ ka , Säkeklä te iyaba wikblu patka sa ̱ je ̱ r ska , je a ̱ rke ̱ : “ Abba , Papá ” ni .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Jekäi ka ba rä kololewa ̱ ji ̱ a kjanaklä ye kuna , ata ba rä iyaba . Jekäi ba rä iyaba ra , jera ba rä däli ukä kukäkña Säkeklä oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Ata mika ̱ ka bas wa ̱ Säkeklä ju ̱ ñerba ra , bas te rä tsa ̱ na ra ji rä ka säkekläí wa kuna ne kja ̱ nei wá ̱ rä .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Ata jira bas wa ̱ Säkeklä ju ̱ ñer , ata bäi si ̱ ra Säkeklä ne wa ̱ bas ju ̱ ñer dä . Jera ¿ maikäi bas manermini jile we ̱ ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ shi ̱ ana je ia ̱ rä na ? ¿ Bas je ̱ r ssëna kolonakwa ̱ je kjanaklä ye etäbä kichani na ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Jekäi bas te manele díaí käi , tuluí käi , jile ke ̱ i käi , jile añoí käi , ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Ata yis suanawa ̱ bas ki ̱ ka , yis shka ̱ bla bas bata ki ̱ ka iö je weikarwa ̱ kje ka wata .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: El wa , yie ishe bas ia ̱ dunasi ̱ bas je ̱ k iawo ̱ yis käi , yis je ̱ k iawa ̱ bas käi ki ̱ ka . Ka bas wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni o ̱ ne yis ukä ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yie kte baa sha säkätä bas ia ̱ rä , yis duaksa ̱ bata ki ̱ ka .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Jekäi yis yaka ska ji tso ̱ te bas weika , je ki ̱ ka bas wa ̱ yis dokoitsane , ka bas wa ̱ yis ju ̱ neksa ̱ . Ata bas te yis kiawa ̱ jishtä ángel patkele Säkeklä wa ̱ käi , jishtä Cristo Jesús käi .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Jera ¿ me bas ssële a ̱ naa da na ? Yie ishe bas ia ̱ bulee , ikuna rä bas ia ̱ io ̱ r da ra , bas wa ̱ bas wäbala yeneksa ̱ me ̱ nak yis ia ̱ .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Jera ¿ maikäi yis ianawa ̱ bas bolki ye ji rä iyina si ̱ sha yie bas ia ̱ kju ̱ ei rä na ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Ijewa te bas kju ̱ eitketseke ̱ , ata ka je rä bas tsa ̱ tkäklä kuna . Ijewa te bas bala butsakle sá yika , bas wa ̱ ijewa biketsäkläpa .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Sä te ji bäi kju ̱ eitketse del je ne rä bäi rä , ka je rä mika ̱ yis katke bas sha ̱ na ebä ra kuna .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Yabala rikä wa , etäbä kicha yis shi ̱ akäte ma rä Cristo kibina bas ja ̱ rka kje .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Yis ssër jíkje ra yis me kätkä bas da , ka yis ktäklä jikäi , ka yis je ̱ r ko ̱ r maikäi yis te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ e räle .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Bas wäbätsäk kolonakwa ̱ ka ̱ wei wa ̱ wa ku ̱ ishö yis ia ̱ : ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ ka ̱ wei ssële na ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Iyöle katke te ishe Abraham yabala rä bol : Ekla ko ̱ na rä kololewa ̱ ikjanaklä ye ra , ekla ko ̱ na rä ka kololewa ̱ kuna ikjanaklä ye ra .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Jekäi kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye cha ko ̱ na rä sa wakwa yaka ja ̱ mi , ata ka kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye kuna cha ko ̱ na rä Säkeklä kablele oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Je rä jile pakäklä . Je bol wa rä sa kablele ñaia ̱ botäbä kicha käi . Etka datse ̱ rä Sinaí bata ska . Je cha ko ̱ rke ̱ rä kjanaklä wa ye . Je rä Agar .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Jekäi Agar ne rä Sinaí bata rä , je rä Arabia ska . Je rä jira Jerusalén käi , je rä kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye iyabala ra ñara ki ̱ ka , jishtä Agar bakle käi .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Ata Jerusalén ka ̱ sha ̱ ka je rä ka kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye kuna . Je ne rä saje wa a ̱ mi rä .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke rä : “ Ko ̱ le ka yaba su ̱ ak kuna , ba ssëno a ̱ naa , ba ka shi ̱ akäk kuna je ̱ k kpöka ̱ plaa a ̱ nak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , weikalewa ̱ eklabä yaba su ̱ ami ki ̱ ta se ̱ naklä ta tsa ̱ ta . ”

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Jekäi el wa , bas dä ko ̱ le ikablele ki ̱ ka jishtä Isaac käi .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Jekäi jishtä je ke ̱ i ska ale ko ̱ le sa wakwa yaka ja ̱ mi te ko ̱ le Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi kukawa ̱ weikanak , je su ̱ ta jira io ̱ rke ̱ ñaebä .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Ata ¿ jiräni iyöle te ishe rä na ? : “ Je kjanaklä ju ̱ oksa ̱ iyaba ra ñara . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je kjanaklä yaba ia ̱ ka däli ukä däkksa ̱ kuna ka kololewa ̱ kuna kjanaklä ye yaba ra ñara . ”

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka el wa , ka sä rä je kjanaklä yabala kuna , ata ka kololewa ̱ kuna kjanaklä ye ne yabala .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Cristo te sa bakaksa ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ nakläni bakleksa ̱ käi . Jekäi bas chatköwa ̱ därërë je ja ̱ mi . Ke bas ñajacha ̱ wa ̱ yugo wà mo ̱ nakwa ̱ ni kjanaklä ye .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Yis Pablo te ishe bas ia ̱ , ikuna bas ñajawa ̱ tene shkiri wa ̱ k ra , jera ka jiye bas ki ̱ Cristo kiane ji ̱ a kuna .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Yis te isheni bulee biköle yi te tene shkiri we ̱ ke ̱ wa ia ̱ , jewa ja ̱ na ka ̱ wei wawa ̱ k kalabe .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Bas ibiketsäk , sa wabiketsarmiksa ̱ wämo ye ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ki ̱ ka wa , bas dä butsäle tulämi Cristo yika . Ñakäi bas dä weikalewa ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ yika .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Iwa rä Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi sä te sä wabiketsarke ̱ ksa ̱ wämo ye ki ̱ ssëke ̱ sa te ji biketseke ̱ etkabä ki ̱ ka .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi ra , tene shkiri ta iräle ka tene shkiri ta iräle , je rä ka säkei ta . Ata ji biketse etkabä wao ̱ rte ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble oloi ja ̱ mi , je ne rä säkei ta rä .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Uketa ra bas julur dami bäi , ata ¿ yi si ̱ te bas wätkewa ̱ wa ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ ka ssäk kuna ji ̱ a rä na ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Je ka bas te issë ji ̱ a , je ka datse ̱ rä bas kiäk ska kuna .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Levadura elkje te harina yaka kalabe papu ̱ we ̱ ka ̱ ni .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Säkekewa ja ̱ mi yie ibiketse ka bas wa ̱ ibiketsa ̱ nak kju ̱ awa . Ata bas iawa ̱ k je buka ̱ nami , yi irä käi .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Ata el wa , ikuna yis te sa pakteke ̱ ji ̱ a tene shkiri ktei wà ra , ¿ jiye yis yolorke ̱ ji ̱ a weikanak na ? Ikuna jekäi ra , cruz pake te sa ̱ kju ̱ atkewe ̱ , je rä tse ̱ leju ̱ mi .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: ¡ Säli bas wätjiwa ̱ k wa je ̱ k tiö ju ̱ omipa kalabe !

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Jekäi el wa , bas kina rä bas se ̱ nakläni bakleksa ̱ käi . Ata sä rä bakleksa ̱ ke je wà bas ñajawa ̱ sa yaka ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ je wa ̱ k kuna , ata bas ñatsa ̱ tkö a ̱ miji ̱ a a ̱ miji ̱ a ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ wei biköle ñak rä jí kte etka : “ Ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ blö jishtä ba wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi . ”

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Bas ñakuäke ̱ bas ñakätäke ̱ ra , tsa ̱ na ata iö bas wakwa ñaweikäwa ̱ .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Jekäi yie ishe : Bas shkö Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi , ata ke bas ku ̱ sa yaka ja ̱ mi ji tkerke ̱ je ssëwa ̱ k bäi .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa yaka ja ̱ mi ji tkerke ̱ je ka kiar Säkeklä wikblu ki ̱ ; ñakäi Säkeklä wikblu ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ je ka kiar sä yaka ki ̱ . Jewa kju ̱ atkäke ̱ a ̱ mi ji ̱ a , ka bas wa ̱ ji sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ wa ̱ klä .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Ata bas dä wäsikle Säkeklä wikblu wa ̱ ra , ka bas dä kololewa ̱ kuna ka ̱ wei wa ̱ .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Sa yaka ja ̱ mi sa te ji we ̱ je juer dawa ̱ . Je rä ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ käi , ji shi ̱ ana käi , ji äina tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ka wätkelewa ̱ ta käi ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: jile kekläí me ̱ i kja ̱ nei we ̱ käi , jalibashe käi , ñasu ̱ e sälwii käi , ñakpe käi , jile kju ̱ eiketse käi , kju ̱ atke käi , je ̱ k ssë tu ̱ leka ̱ käi , ñabalabutse käi , ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe kju ̱ awa wawe ̱ käi ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka iar ijile ki ̱ käi , se ̱ nak diyëë käi , ka ̱ wakbläk di kabika käi , je su ̱ ta jile saka wakbläk käi . Jekäi yis te bas je ̱ r ja ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ba , jishtä yis wa ̱ iyile kja käi , yi te je shtä wakbleke ̱ ra , ka jewa ia ̱ Säkeklä gobierno däkksa ̱ däli ukä ye .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Ata Säkeklä wikblu cha rä ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble käi , ssëne a ̱ naa käi , ssëne baa käi , ji katable je ̱ r baa wà käi , je ̱ r bäi she käi , ji rä bäi käi , ji biketse etkabä käi ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: je ̱ k jewa ̱ käi , je ̱ k wätkewe ̱ ji yika käi . Ka ka ̱ wei kuna je shtä wätkewa ̱ klä .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Jekäi Cristo cha wa wa ̱ iyaka rä wäteleka ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi , ji ssër iia ̱ o ̱ nak pjooje jije , ñakäi ji tkenak ija ̱ mije kaje .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Ikuna sa ̱ se ̱ r dä Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi ra , jera sä shkö Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Ke sa ̱ ñassaka ̱ sa ̱ ñakju ̱ atkewa ̱ klä , sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ ñaianaklä .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: El wa , bas manele ko ̱ nawa ̱ jile ska ishirir kate käi ra , jera bas ji rä wikblu iá ja ̱ mi wa ku ̱ iparuöpa je ̱ r bäi wà . Ata tsa ̱ na si ̱ , iö ba wakei je ̱ r ki ̱ we ̱ ite ñaebä .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Bas ki ̱ ji ja ̱ rke ̱ kirii ra , je wà bas ñatsa ̱ tkö . Jekäi ra bas te Cristo ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ mi .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Iwa rä yi te ibiketse irä bakleka ̱ bäi si ̱ , ata ka irä jekäi kuna ra , je rä kje iwakei je ̱ k wäyuä .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Jekäi ekla ekla sa wakwa je ̱ k su ̱ oksa ̱ jishtä ji we ̱ sä te rä käi . Jekäi ra sa ̱ ia ̱ je ̱ k ssërmi sa wakei ki ̱ ka , ata ka kju ̱ awa wà kuna .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Iwa rä sa wakwa käi sa kiana sä ji kirii tsa ̱ kmi rä .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Yi rä pauta ̱ nak kte wà kiana jile bäi biköle wà ipaktäk tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Ke bas ñawäyua . Ka Säkeklä rä wäyönakwa ̱ kuna . Ata ji tkawa ̱ sa te , je ne wäkukemi sa te rä .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , yi te ji tkawa ̱ iyaka ia ̱ ra , je te iyaka ska tjabanewa ̱ ne kukemi iwä ye rä . Ata yi te ji tkawa ̱ Säkeklä wikblu ia ̱ ra , je te je Wikblu ska se ̱ ne jekjeye ne kukemi iwä ye rä .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Jekäi ke sä shtirina ji bäi wa ̱ k . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sä shtirinecha ̱ wa ̱ ra , sa te iwä kukemi ike ̱ i dewa ̱ ra .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ku ̱ ji bäi wo ̱ biköle ia ̱ bikö sa ̱ ia ̱ io ̱ r käi , bäi si ̱ ra sa saka ji biketsäk etkabä wa ia ̱ .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Isu ̱ o , jikäi yis te iyue mar bas ia ̱ äyë wä ta ta ̱ i ta ̱ i wà , yis wakei jula wà .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Ale ssërke ̱ sä ssëwa ̱ k bäi ira ji rä sa yaka ja ̱ mi ebä wà , jewa te bas pakeke ̱ tene shkiri wa ̱ k , je rä ka ijewa kolonakläwa ̱ weikanak Cristo cruz kju ̱ ei , je ebä ki ̱ ka .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Jeiräta tene shkiri ta wa wakwa si ̱ ne te ka ka ̱ wei dälätse kuna , ata ijewa ki ̱ bas shena tene shkiri wa ̱ k rä iñassäklä bas yaka wà .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Ke yis je ̱ k ssöpa ji ki ̱ , ata saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo cruz ebä ki ̱ ka yis je ̱ k ssöpa rä . Ije ne ja ̱ mi ka ̱ jiska rä wäteleka ̱ yis yika , ñaebä yis dä wäteleka ̱ ka ̱ jiska yika .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Jekäi tene shkiri ta iräle ka tene shkiri ta iräle , ka je rä säkei ta , ata sä yönaksa ̱ ni spa ̱ na je ne rä säkei ta rä .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Shkäk jí kte ja ̱ mi wa biköle , ñakäi Israel wa , ale Säkeklä ia ̱ wa je ̱ r ssënopa baa , jewa ia ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shöpa .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Jí jöiwätami ke yi a ̱ ni ku ̱ yis weika ji ̱ a . Je rä Jesús shka ̱ le käi yis shka ̱ le , je itäri tso ̱ yis yaka ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: El wa , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ bas je ̱ rikä ska . Amén .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Pablo , Jesucristo ktei bata shäk Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena jekäi ki ̱ ka , je te jí yue mar sä sikii wa sä chatkelewa ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi wa tso ̱ Éfeso ska jewa ia ̱ .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Säkeklä saje wa Ká irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo je kekläí je Káí , ji biköle bäi ka yaka iá shtä tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ke ̱ i ska je ma ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ Cristo ja ̱ mi , je kjeiyinopa ,

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: je rä ka ̱ jiska ka yörksa ̱ ba yika , ite sä kuka Cristo ja ̱ mi däkwa ̱ sikii ye , ka yakei ta iwäna iwa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l ki ̱ ka .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Ite sä biketsaksa ̱ ba kolonak iwakei yabala ye Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi , ije ̱ r ssëna jekäi iwa ̱ k , iwakei ki ̱ ishena ki ̱ ka ,

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: ikjeiyinaklä ije ̱ r bäi shä baawa ̱ si ̱ ki ̱ ka , ale ije ̱ r bäi sha sa ̱ ia ̱ iwa ̱ shka ̱ ta wakei oloi ja ̱ mi ra .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Je ne oloi ja ̱ mi sä rä to ̱ leksa ̱ ipi wà , ñakäi sä shirilewa ̱ rä jalewa ̱ bitaba rä , Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shä rä bäi si ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: Ije je ̱ r bäi sha sa ̱ ia ̱ ukä bakleka ̱ ka ̱ biketse bena wà je ̱ rike bena wà .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Jekäi ite sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a iki ̱ ji sherke ̱ o ̱ nak tso ̱ blele iwa ̱ je wà , jishtä ije ̱ r ssëna iwa ̱ k biketsale o ̱ nak Cristo ja ̱ mi käi .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Je rä ike ̱ i biketsale dewa ̱ ra , jeska ji biköle tapanakläwa ̱ etka yebä Cristo ja ̱ mi , ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä käi .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Ñakäi ije ja ̱ mi sä rä kololewa ̱ Säkeklä wakei däli ukä ye , biketsaleba ale ji biköle wa ̱ k jishtä iwakei wa ̱ ibiketsale iki ̱ ji sherke ̱ käi je wa ̱ ,

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: je rä sá je ̱ r bläk Cristo ja ̱ mi säkätäba wa bata ki ̱ ka ikjeiyinaklä ije rä baawa ̱ si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Ñakäi ije ja ̱ mi Wikblu Sikina iwa ̱ me ̱ nak Säkeklä kablele käi je wà bas nina , bas te kte yina si ̱ , ale bas tsa ̱ tkerke ̱ ksa ̱ ktei baa ssa ra , je biketsa ra .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Wikblu Sikina ne rä däli ukä däkksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ tsa ̱ to ̱ leba rä , sa ̱ wa ̱ je wà je däli kukäkläwa ̱ , je wà Säkeklä kjeiyinaklä irä baawa ̱ si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis te issa , bas te Säkekewa Jesús biketsa si ̱ ra , bas te biköle sä sikii wa shka ̱ li ̱ bleke ̱ ra ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: jera yie wekte sheke ̱ ka jalewa ̱ ta bas ki ̱ ka , yis te bas ktei sheke ̱ yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ra ,

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo je Kekläí , Sa Ká baa si ̱ , je wa ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ aklä ka ̱ biketse wà , wäji ̱ atkene wà , bas te ije ju ̱ ñe dami jöiwäta ska ra ,

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: ñakäi iwa ̱ bas je ̱ rikäklä wäbalaí na ka ̱ oloi ñiwa ̱ kläka ̱ , bas je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä iia ̱ ji ki ̱ ssäk bas kina rä käi , ji rä däli ukä baawa ̱ si ̱ je bluneí tso ̱ sä sikii wa ja ̱ mi rä käi ,

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: ñakäi bikö itäkili ta ̱ i bakleka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ tso ̱ saje ibiketsäk wa ia ̱ rä käi , ji we ̱ itäkili ta ̱ i te ja ̱ mi .

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: Je wawá ̱ ite mika ̱ dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ite Cristo shki ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ ni ra , tkawa ̱ ite ijula wämo kja ̱ ne ka ̱ jöir ke ̱ i ska ra .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Je tkawa ̱ ite rä bakleka ̱ ju ̱ jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa , ka ̱ wei ta wa , täkili ta wa , sa patkäk wa , ñakäi kie ta jini ikie käi wa , ka jí ke ̱ i ska itso ̱ wa ebä kuna , ata ñaebä sa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a ska itso ̱ wa , jewa biköle tsa ̱ ta .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Jekäi ite ji biköle kukawa ̱ ije klä niki ̱ ka , ñakäi ite itkawa ̱ tapanak wa biköle tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Ijewa rä iwakei yaka , wäjielewa ̱ kalabe ji biköle wäjiäkwa ̱ kalabe wakei wa ̱ .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Bas bakle rä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ shirinak ebä , ji yakei wakbläk ebä .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Je sha ̱ na bas kjami rä , bas dami ji ̱ a ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska ja ̱ mi ra , ñakäi ji ka ̱ wei ta ka ̱ sha ̱ ka tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ja ̱ mi ra , ale jira ka kte ssäk kuna wa ssëwa ̱ k ji wa ̱ k je wikbluí ja ̱ mi ra .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Jeshtä sha ̱ na sä biköle bakle rä , sa yaka ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ ja ̱ mi , sa yaka ia ̱ issërke ̱ irä , sa ̱ je ̱ r ska ji ssërke ̱ irä je wa ̱ k , jera je wà sä rä Säkeklä kju ̱ atkäklä wa , jishtä ditsä saka biköle käi .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Ata Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäk bäi si ̱ rä sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bläk ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka ite sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bla .

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: Sa ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a dulecha ̱ wa ̱ shirine sha ̱ na ra , ite sa ̱ ia ̱ se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ ña Cristo ra . Jekäi je ̱ r bäi she wà bas dä tsa ̱ tkeleksa ̱ .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Jekäi ite sa ̱ shki ̱ wa ̱ tulaka ̱ ña ira , ñakäi ite sa jaklacha ̱ wa ̱ ña ka ̱ jöir ke ̱ i ska Cristo Jesús da ,

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: je wà iwa ̱ ikjashäklä sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä datse ̱ wà bikö si ̱ ije ̱ r bäi shä je ̱ r baa wà sa ra Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi rä käi .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Iwa rä je ̱ r bäi she wà bas dä tsa ̱ tkeleksa ̱ , ji biketse etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi . Ka je rä bas wakwa oloi ja ̱ mi kuna , ata je rä me ̱ le Säkeklä wa ̱ .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Ka je rä bas wa ̱ ji o ̱ le ki ̱ ka kuna , je rä ka yi a ̱ ni je ̱ k ssäklä kuna .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Jekäi sä rä ije shka ̱ ble , yöleksa ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi . Je rä sa ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ ji bäi biketsale kja sa ̱ wa ̱ o ̱ nak je wa ̱ klä .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Jekäi bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no , mikle ra bas yaka ska ra bas dä ka Judío kuna wa , kinak “ ka tene shkiri ta wa ” ni ale kile “ tene shkiri ta wa ” wa ̱ , ata je rä tele jula wà iyaka ska .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Ñakäi je ke ̱ i ska ra bas tso ̱ rä ka Cristo ta , bala butsäle ka delewa ̱ Israel wa ye , ñakäi Säkeklä ñaje ̱ rko ̱ le ijewa ra saka saka ikablele ji wa ̱ k ki ̱ ka , je ka kuna bas wa ̱ , ñakäi bas dä ka ji bäi ta ki ̱ ssënak , ka Kekläí ta ka ̱ jiska .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Ata jira Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi bas ale mikle tso ̱ ka ̱ mii wa dejani alemana Cristo pi oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Iwa rä ije ne rä sa ̱ je ̱ r bäi wa ̱ k ñara rä . Ije te je boyäkä wa wäjiawa ̱ etka yebä . Ñasu ̱ e sälwii kju ̱ ei ijewa rä sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä bala tkeleksa ̱ , je mia ̱ tkawa ̱ ite ije yaka wà .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ wei wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k saka saka je wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ ite , je wà je boyäkä wa yuäkläksa ̱ iwakei ja ̱ mi eklabä ye spa ̱ nani , ijewa je ̱ r bäinaklä ñara ,

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: je wà je boyäkä wa je ̱ r bäinaklä Säkeklä ra däkwa ̱ ekla yaka yebä cruz oloi ja ̱ mi . Je wà ite je ñasu ̱ e sälwii ktawa ̱ .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Cristo dasta ̱ na te je ̱ r bäine ñara je ktei baa bata sha , bas tso ̱ ka ̱ mii wa ia ̱ , ñakäi sä tso ̱ alemana wa ia ̱ .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Iwa rä ije oloi ja ̱ mi je boyäkä wa ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ ikjäkläwa ̱ Sa Ká wäki ̱ Wikblu eklabä wà .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ka bas kuna ji ̱ a ka ̱ etkä wa käi , pë kju ̱ awa wa käi , ata bas dä delewa ̱ ña sä sikii wa ra , Säkeklä ju ska wa ye ,

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: yöleka ̱ ju katabläklä Jesús ktei bata shäk wa irä jile bata shäk wa irä bata ki ̱ ka . Je ju ñak wäkukäk ne rä Jesucristo wakei rä .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Ije ja ̱ mi ju kalabe wäjierte , kibinakka ̱ templo sikii ye Säkekewa ja ̱ mi .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Ije ja ̱ mi ñaebä bas yör kate ñara je na Säkeklä se ̱ naklä iwikblu ja ̱ mi .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Je bata ki ̱ ka yis Pablo wätelewa ̱ Cristo Jesús ia ̱ bas ka Judío kuna wa ki ̱ ka ,

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: iyina si ̱ yis ia ̱ ime ̱ le Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ klä bas ia ̱ , je palei ssa bas te .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Yis wäji ̱ atkena ne wà yis je ̱ r ku ̱ a ji blelewa ̱ te rä , jishtä yie iyua kja elkje käi .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Bas te je washa ra , bas je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ite maikäi Cristo ktei blelewa ̱ wà yis je ̱ r ko ̱ le rä käi .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Sa bakle mikle wa ke ̱ i ska ditsä tso ̱ wa rä ka je ̱ r ko ̱ le je wà , jishtä jira je wà Jesús ktei bata shäk sikii wa irä jile bata shäk wa irä wäji ̱ atkerke ̱ Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi käi .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Je wà rä : Ka Judío kuna wa rä däli ukä kukäkña , delewa ̱ ña yaka eklabä ye , ñakäi Säkeklä kablele je kukäkña Cristo ja ̱ mi kte baa oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Je wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k yis kolona rä . Je ji me ̱ le yis ia ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ ja ̱ mi , je me ̱ le yis ia ̱ rä itäkili te ji we ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Yis ja ̱ lewa ̱ biköle sä sikii wa katäbäka , je ia ̱ je ji we ̱ me ̱ na , yis wa ̱ ka Judío kuna wa ia ̱ Cristo blune e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ka yinak kje je ktei baa bata shäklä ,

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: ñakäi , yis wa ̱ maikäi ji blelewa ̱ wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ rä je wà sä biköle je ̱ r ku ̱ aklä , je kate rä blelewa ̱ sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä bakle raté ale Säkeklä ji biköle yuäkksa ̱ je wa ̱ .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Je rä jira tapanak wa ja ̱ mi , Säkeklä ka ̱ biketse ta ̱ i kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kjayinaklä jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa käi , ka ̱ wei ta wa käi tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ke ̱ i saka saka ska jewa ia ̱ .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Je rä jishtä iwa ̱ ibiketsale o ̱ nak sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä bakle raté käi . Je wá ̱ ite saje wa Säkekewaí Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Ije oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ sä kjäkläwa ̱ Säkeklä wäki ̱ ka suale ta , ka ji biketsale ta , sa te ije biketsa ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yie bas ia ̱ ishe dunasi ̱ ke bas shtirina yis weikarke ̱ bas kju ̱ ei je ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je rä bas oloi kanakläka ̱ .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis je ̱ tkäke ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ Sa Ká wäja ̱ mi ,

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: je ne ja ̱ mi sä yäbeila biköle ka ̱ jöir ka ̱ jiska kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kile rä ,

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: ije wa ̱ iji baa bluneí ja ̱ mi bas ia ̱ ka ̱ ma ̱ klä , bas täkinaklä itäkili wà iwikblu oloi ja ̱ mi bas ja ̱ rka .

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: Je rä bas kicha je ̱ na e ̱ ná bas tkenawa ̱ kja bäi ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà ra ,

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: bas donaklä sä sikii wa biköle ra je ̱ r ko ̱ nak bikö Cristo wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l je sho ̱ lo ̱ li rä , je matsi ̱ li ̱ rä , je kaleka ̱ rä , je ja ̱ r dä je ia ̱ ,

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: ñakäi Cristo wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , je ia ̱ ka sa ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ r kje , je ju ̱ ñaklä bas wa ̱ , je wà bas pshinaklä Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ ka kialewa ̱ ta je biköle wà .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Jekäi ale täkili ta je rä sa te ji kia , sa te ji biketsa je biköle tsa ̱ ta bäi si ̱ iwa ̱ k , itäkili wao ̱ nak sa ̱ ja ̱ mi je wà ,

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: je wakei kjeiyinopa tapanak wa ki ̱ ka irä , Cristo Jesús ki ̱ ka irä , sa batala ska je batala ska sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä rami . Amén .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis , ale wätelewa ̱ Säkekewa kju ̱ ei , je te bas pake shkäk tsa ̱ na , jiye bas kile bas kina ra rä je ja ̱ mi ,

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: a ̱ ni ka je ̱ k ssë wà kuna , je ̱ k jalewa ̱ ebä , ñakatabläk je ̱ r baa wà , ñashka ̱ li ̱ blele ,

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: chichale se ̱ nak etka yebä Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi , mo ̱ lewa ̱ ñaja ̱ mi se ̱ ne bitaba wà .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Yaka rä eklabä , wikblu rä etkabä , jishtä bas kina ra bas kina rä ji etkabä ki ̱ ssäk käi ,

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Säkekewa rä eklabä , ji biketse etkabä rä etkabä , wäoka ̱ ne rä etkabä ,

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Säkeklä rä eklabä , je rä sä biköle Ká , ale ji biköle tsa ̱ ta , ji biköle oloi ja ̱ mi , ji biköle ska .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Ata sa ia ̱ ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ klä me ̱ na ekla ekla iwa ja ̱ mi jishtä Cristo te imabla me ̱ nak sa ̱ ia ̱ käi .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Je ki ̱ iyile rä : “ Imineka ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ra , koloneche ̱ wa ̱ je tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami ite ñakäi ite jile ma ̱ ditsä ia ̱ . ”

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Je “ imineka ̱ ju ̱ ” , ¿ jiräni je wà rä na ? ¿ Ka irä säkätä iminewa ̱ ju ̱ ishäkä niki ̱ wà na ?

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Je ale minewa ̱ ju ̱ ebä ne mineka ̱ ju ̱ ni ka ̱ jöir saka saka ekta wà rä , iwa ̱ ji biköle pshiwa ̱ kläwa ̱ .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Ije wakei te manele ma ̱ rä iktei bata shäk wa ye , isaka Säkeklä wa ̱ ji tso ̱ yinak bata shäk wa ye , isaka kte baa bata shäk wa ye , isaka tapanak wa kjänanak wa ye , isaka sa paktäk wa ye .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Je rä sä sikii wa dulanaklä Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k , Cristo yaka ki ̱ wäjiäkläka ̱ ,

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: ma rämi sä biköle dewa ̱ ji biketsäk etkabä etka yebä je ̱ r ko ̱ nak Säkeklä yaba ia ̱ , sä kënakläwa ̱ ma ̱ tsi ̱ li ̱ ta Cristo ma ̱ tsi ̱ li ̱ kalabe kje .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Jekäi ra ka sä rä yabala ji ̱ a kuna , wäbuka ̱ nak däyë tjuäke ̱ wa ̱ , minaktse ̱ sa pauta ̱ nake ̱ saka saka biköle je si ̱ we ̱ i wa ̱ , wäyölewa ̱ ditsä wa ̱ wäsi ̱ wa , je ̱ r me ̱ lewa ̱ kte shirilewa ̱ wà .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Ata sa ̱ ku ̱ ji yina si ̱ wawo ̱ ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà , sa ̱ ki ̱ wäjienaklä ji biköle ska ale sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ ja ̱ mi , je rä Cristo .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Jekäi ije oloi ja ̱ mi sä yaka kalabe rä wäjielewa ̱ balewa ̱ ñaja ̱ mi sa ̱ ja ̱ me ̱ i etkä etkä biköle wa ̱ , iwäjienaklä etkä etkä te ikja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ ja ̱ mi , je wà sä yaka kibirke ̱ iki ̱ wäjienaklä ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yie jikäi ishe , je sheke ̱ yie täkili wà Säkekewa ja ̱ mi : Ke bas shka ji ̱ a ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna wa käi , jishtä ijewa shkä ji ka wata biketse ja ̱ mi käi .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Jewa je ̱ rikä rä wätuilewa ̱ , butsäle tulämi se ̱ ne kseka tso ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ yika , ka ijewa wa ̱ ji ju ̱ ñer ki ̱ ka , ije ̱ r dä därërë ki ̱ ka .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Ijewa ia ̱ ka ji ssër ta ji ̱ a yakei käi , iñatulaksa ̱ ji äina tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ka wätkelewa ̱ ta ia ̱ , ji biköle shi ̱ ana saka saka wa ̱ k ki ̱ ta ebä .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Ata ka bas pauta ̱ ne jekäi Cristo ktei wà kuna ,

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: ikuna bas te je ssa si ̱ ra , ñakäi ikuna bas yöna ije ja ̱ mi ji rä iyina si ̱ tso ̱ Jesús ja ̱ mi wà ra .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Je rä bas wa ̱ mikle sä del këyake wa ̱ o ̱ nak , yakei telewa ̱ sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ji tkerke ̱ te sä wäyueke ̱ wa ̱ , je ju ̱ akläksa ̱ ,

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: ñakäi bas manenakläksa ̱ spa ̱ na ka ̱ biketse ska ,

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: ñakäi bas ñapajiäkläni sä del spa ̱ na wà , ji wämo irä ji sikii irä tso ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ ja ̱ mi , je ja ̱ mi yöleksa ̱ Säkeklä wakei käi .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Jekäi bas wa ̱ ka ̱ yue jalewa ̱ ki ̱ ka , biköle bas wakwa ja ̱ mi bas ktö ji rä yina si ̱ wà sa saka wa ra , sä rä wäjiele ñaja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Bas kju ̱ atkawa ̱ ra , ke ji yakei wakbla . Ji te bas kju ̱ atkewe ̱ ke ̱ ke se ̱ newa ̱ k ma rä ka ̱ wä mawa ̱ ju ̱ kje ,

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: ñaebä ke ka ̱ ma ̱ k be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ia ̱ .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Jakbläk ke jakbla ji ̱ a , ata je shka ̱ blö ji rä bäi wa ̱ k iwakei jula wà jile däkläksa ̱ iia ̱ iwa ̱ me ̱ nak yi ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ ia ̱ .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Ke kte yakei döka ̱ pa bas kjä ki ̱ ka , ata ji rä kianak yinak iwa ja ̱ mi sa ̱ ki ̱ wäjienaklä shtä ebä , je wà bas wa ̱ bas ktä ssäk wa tsa ̱ tkäklä .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Ke Säkeklä Wikblu Sikina je ̱ r ianewa ̱ k , je ne wa ̱ bas dä nile sa bakanakläksa ̱ díaí ia ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Se ̱ ne sälwii käi , je ̱ r ki ̱ ji iane käi , kju ̱ atke käi , kulitke käi , sa saka she yakei käi , biköle tso ̱ ju ̱ omi bas sha ̱ na , biköle ji we ̱ wäsi ̱ waje .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Ata bäi si ̱ ra , bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ je ̱ r baa wà ñaia ̱ . Bas je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ñadäläno . Bas ñajöwa ̱ bitaba jishtä Säkeklä te bas jawa ̱ bitaba Cristo ja ̱ mi käi .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ku ̱ Säkeklä mablö , iyabala shka ̱ ta wa käi .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Ñakäi bas se ̱ no ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ja ̱ mi , jishtä Cristo te sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bla käi , iwakei je ̱ k ma ̱ ksa ̱ saje wa ki ̱ ka , jishtä jile me ̱ nakka ̱ , ji dälänak Säkeklä ia ̱ jalar ta ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ käi .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Ata ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ käi , biköle ji rä shi ̱ ana käi , ji ki ̱ tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi käi , je a ̱ ni ka kiar bas sha ̱ na yinakbä tenakbä , jishtä sä sikii wa shena se ̱ nak käi ,

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: ñaebä kte yakei käi , ji she yuletene wà käi , kjäbite äina shtä käi , je rä ka bäi kuna , ata bäi si ̱ rä wekte ne shäk Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Iwa rä bas wa ̱ jí ju ̱ ñer bäi : Ka ̱ wakbläk iräle , ji shi ̱ ana wa ̱ k iräle , ji ki ̱ tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi biketsäk iräle , je shtä rä jile kekläí me ̱ i kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k käi , jewa mane a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka däli ukä kuna Cristo irä Säkeklä irä jewa gobierno ska .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Ke bas ña ma ̱ yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ wäyönak kte ka wata wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je ne shtä kju ̱ ei Säkeklä kju ̱ atkawa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ka iktä ssäk kuna wa ki ̱ ka rä .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ke bas ku ̱ ji wa ̱ ña ijewa ra .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Jekäi bas bakle rä ka ̱ tuil ye , ata jira bas dä ka ̱ oloi ye Säkekewa ja ̱ mi . Je ki ̱ ka bas shkö ka ̱ oloi ye wa käi .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ oloi cha tso ̱ rä ji biköle bäi ja ̱ mi , ji wämo ja ̱ mi , ji rä iyina ja ̱ mi .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Bas shkö je ja ̱ mi bas je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä ji te Säkekewa ssëwe ̱ a ̱ naa rä käi .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Jekäi ji rä ka ̱ tuil cha ja ̱ mi o ̱ nak ka wata shtä ke je wa ̱ ña . Ata bäi si ̱ ra je tso ̱ ksa ̱ juenakwa ̱ .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji we ̱ ke ̱ ijewa te jakika , je pakeka ̱ bä jibä rä äina .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Ata ji tse ̱ leksa ̱ ka ̱ oloika ra , je kalabe rä juenakwa ̱ . Iwa rä ka ̱ oloi ne rä ji biköle juewa ̱ kwa ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka iyile rä : “ Ba käpelewa ̱ shki ̱ no , ma je ̱ köka ̱ dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , jera Cristo te bä wäñiwe ̱ mika ̱ . ”

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Je ki ̱ ka jishtä bas dami rä , je su ̱ o tsa ̱ na , ka jishtä ka je ̱ r ta wa käi kuna , ata je ̱ r ta wa käi ,

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: bas wa ̱ ka ̱ kjäke ̱ wawa ̱ klä bäi , sa ̱ ke ̱ i rä yakei ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ke bas yuletenak , ata ji sherke ̱ Säkekewa ki ̱ je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ku ̱ opa .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Ke bas ñakta vino wà . Je ne te sa iawe ̱ ke ̱ ji wa ̱ k ka wätkelewa ̱ ta rä ki ̱ ka . Ata bas se ̱ no pshilewa ̱ Säkeklä wikblu wa ̱ .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: bas ktäklä ñara salmo wà irä , Säkeklä ksei wà irä , ji wikblu iá kseí wà irä , bas ksäklä , kse shäklä Säkeklä ia ̱ bas je ̱ r ska ,

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: bas wa ̱ Säkeklä Sa Ká ia ̱ wekte shäklä ji biköle ki ̱ ka del , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo kie ja ̱ mi ,

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: bas ñajäkläwa ̱ ñayika , Cristo dälätse bata ki ̱ ka ,

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: alaklä wa ñajäkläwa ̱ iwakwa se ̱ naklä wa yika , jishtä Säkekewa yika ñajewa ̱ käi .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jäiyi ne rä ise ̱ naklä tsa ̱ ku ̱ rä , jishtä Cristo rä tapanak wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ käi . Ije ne rä iwakei yaka ekta tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ rä .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Jekäi jishtä tapanak wa rä ñajalecha ̱ wa ̱ Cristo yika käi , je su ̱ ta ñaebä alaklä wa kiana ñajäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ise ̱ naklä wa yika ji biköle ska .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Jäiyi wa , bas se ̱ naklä wa shka ̱ li ̱ blö , jishtä Cristo te tapanak wa shka ̱ li ̱ bla käi , je ki ̱ ka ije ̱ k ma ̱ ksa ̱ ijewa bata ki ̱ ka ,

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: iwa ̱ isiki tewa ̱ klä , pasukle yëë kte wà diklä ye ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: iwa ̱ tapanak wa ma ̱ kläksa ̱ iwakei je ̱ k ia ̱ juer ta baawa ̱ si ̱ , ka pate ̱ leka ̱ ta , ka bärileka ̱ ta , ka medele ta jekäi , ata wämo ka yakei ta .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Je su ̱ ta jäiyi wa kiana ise ̱ naklä wa shka ̱ li ̱ bläk jishtä iwakwa yaka käi . Yi te ise ̱ naklä shka ̱ li ̱ ble ra , je rä iwakei je ̱ k shka ̱ li ̱ bla .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi a ̱ ni rä ka iwakei yaka dokoitsäk kuna , ata je chewe ̱ ite je pasu ̱ e ite . Je su ̱ ta Cristo te iwe ̱ ke ̱ tapanak wa ia ̱ rä ,

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: sä rä iwakei yaka wäjienaklä ki ̱ ka .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: “ Je ne ki ̱ ka jäiyi wa rä iká irä ia ̱ mi irä jäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ta ̱ na ije ̱ k bawa ̱ kläwa ̱ ise ̱ naklä ra , jekäi je bol dämiwa ̱ eklabä yaka ye . ”

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Je kte rä blelewa ̱ bäiwa ̱ si ̱ , ata je rä yis te Cristo irä tapanak wa irä je ne sheke ̱ rä .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Jekäi yie ishe bas jäiyi wa kiana bas se ̱ naklä wa shka ̱ li ̱ bläk , jishtä bas wakwa je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi , ñakäi alaklä wa kiana ise ̱ naklä wa dälätsäk .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Yabala , bas ku ̱ bas ká wa irä bas a ̱ mi wa irä ktä ssö Säkekewa kju ̱ ei , je ne rä sa ̱ se ̱ r wämo rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Ka ̱ wei meleta ̱ na etka te ishe rä : “ Ba ku ̱ ba ká irä ba a ̱ mi irä dälätsö , je rä bä kjäklä bäi , ñakäi ma se ̱ naklä shka ̱ ja ̱ ka ̱ jiska . ” Ka ̱ wei saka yina kja , ata je ne rä ka ̱ wei me ̱ na ska säkätä ikabla ji wa ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ rä .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Yabala ká wa , ke bas ku ̱ bas yabala kju ̱ atkewa ̱ k . Ata ijewa kibiwo ̱ dulale pautäle Säkekewa ki ̱ ishena ja ̱ mi .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Kololewa ̱ kjanaklä wa ye , bas ku ̱ bas blui ka ̱ jiska wa ktä ssö sualewa ̱ paju ̱ leka ̱ wà , biketsale je ̱ r baa wà sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä Cristo ne ia ̱ bas te iwe ̱ ke ̱ rä käi ,

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: ka ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k sa ̱ su ̱ rke ̱ ebä ra kuna , jishtä manele te ditsä ebä ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ bäi käi , ata iwa ̱ k Cristo kjanaklä wa ye Säkeklä ki ̱ isherke ̱ o ̱ nak je wa ̱ k je ̱ r ssële bäi .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Jekäi je kja ̱ nei wo ̱ je ̱ r baa wà sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä Säkekewa ia ̱ käi , ata ka jishtä ditsä ia ̱ käi kuna ,

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: je ̱ r ko ̱ le sä kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye iräle , kai iräle , te ji bäi we ̱ ra , Säkekewa te ji bäi me ̱ mi jewa ia ̱ ekla ekla .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Blu wa , jekäi ñaebä bas ku ̱ iwo ̱ ijewa ia ̱ , ka ijewa wäsuawa ̱ k ji ̱ a kuna , je ̱ r ko ̱ le bas irä , ijewa irä Säkekewaí kaldu ka ̱ jöir ia ̱ . Jekäi ije rä ka ji wa ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kuna .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Bata ska ra , bas ñatäkiwo ̱ Säkekewa ja ̱ mi , ije wakei täkili te ji we ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Bas ñapajiöcha ̱ wa ̱ je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ kalabe wà , bas täkili däkläka ̱ je ̱ k wätkäk be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te sä wäyueke ̱ yika .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Iwa rä ka irä sa ̱ ñakukätuläke ̱ rä yaka ta pita ra kuna , ata sa ̱ ñakukätuläke ̱ rä jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ra , ka ̱ wei ta wa ra , ka ̱ wäkiri wa tso ̱ ka ̱ tuil yee naka ka ̱ jiska jewa ra , ji wikblu iá yakei tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ke ̱ i saka saka ska jewa ra .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ku ̱ je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkäklä tso ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ kalabe kuköcho ̱ wa ̱ , je wà bas täkili däkläka ̱ ji ka bäi kuna ke ̱ i wäkukäk , jekäi bas te ji biköle wá ̱ e ̱ ná ra , bas ñawätkäkläwa ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Jekäi bas ñawätkewo ̱ därërë , kipa mo ̱ lecha ̱ wa ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ wà kipa mu ̱ aklä ye , pajielecha ̱ wa ̱ ji wämo wà je ̱ r bata ki ̱ tiäklä ye ,

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: zapato jielewa ̱ kukale e ̱ ná sa ̱ je ̱ r bäinaklä ktei baa bata shäk .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Ji biköle ska bas ku ̱ ji biketse etkabä kuköwa ̱ söklä ye , bas wa ̱ ale yakei uka bata wäkaleka ̱ tiä ju ̱ aklämi wäita ̱ nakwa ̱ .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ kuköwa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ tkenakka ̱ ye . Ñakäi Säkeklä wikblu espadaí kuköwa ̱ . Je ne rä Säkeklä ktä rä .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Bas ka ̱ kiö Säkeklä wikblu oloi ja ̱ mi itso ̱ ye , ka ̱ kie wà jile kie biköle wà . Bas wa ̱ je wa ̱ klä ye ra bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ , chatkelewa ̱ ka ̱ kiäk del sä sikii wa biköle ki ̱ ka ,

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: yis ki ̱ ka ñaebä , yis ia ̱ kte me ̱ naklä mika ̱ yis ktä mar da yis wa ̱ kte baa blelewa ̱ waje ̱ rku ̱ aklä ka suale kuna .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Je kju ̱ ei yis dä patkeleté iwakei säkei ye mo ̱ lewa ̱ cadena wà . Bas ka ̱ kiö yis ktäklä ka suale ta , jishtä yis shena ishäk käi .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Sä el shka ̱ ta sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk bäi Säkekewa ja ̱ mi Tíquico , je te ji biköle pakemi bas ia ̱ bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä jishtä yis dami rä käi , ji we ̱ kate yie rä käi .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Je ne ye yie ije patke mar bas wäki ̱ ka rä , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä jishtä sá tso ̱ rä käi , ñakäi iwa ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ klä bäi .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: El wa , Säkeklä Sa Ká irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä ku ̱ bas ssëwo ̱ pa baa , je ku ̱ bas ssëwo ̱ pa ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk , ñakäi ji biketsäk etkabä .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Sä Säkekewaí Jesucristo shka ̱ li ̱ bläk ka jalewa ̱ ta kuna wa biköle ia ̱ je ̱ r bäi yinopa .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Cristo Jesús kjanaklä wa Pablo irä Timoteo irä te jí yue mar biköle sä sikii wa Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi tso ̱ Filipo ska jewa ia ̱ , ñakäi sä wäsikewa ̱ k wa irä sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk wa irä jewa ia ̱ .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Säkeklä saje wa Ká irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä , je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , iku ̱ bas ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Yis je ̱ r ja ̱ rke ̱ bas ska ra , del yis te wekte sheke ̱ yis Kekläí ia ̱ bas ki ̱ ka .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Jekäi yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ra , del yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ssële a ̱ naa wà bas biköle ki ̱ ka ,

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: je rä bas te yis tsa ̱ tkaña kte baa bata she wà isäkätä raté bite rä jira kje ki ̱ ka .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Jikäi yis ia ̱ ra irä : Ale ji bäi wa ̱ kmiba bas ja ̱ mi , je te je e ̱ newe ̱ mi ji ̱ a ma rämi Jesucristo díaí dewa ̱ kje .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Yis te bas biköle biketseke ̱ jekäi je rä bäi , yis wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l yis je ̱ r ska ki ̱ ka . Yis kate wätelewa ̱ ra iräle , yis te kte baa wetseke ̱ irä ikjasheke ̱ iyina ye ra iräle , jera bas biköle rä je ji bäi me ̱ le yis ia ̱ je wa ̱ kña .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Säkeklä rä yis su ̱ ak , bikö yis je ̱ r ja ̱ mi bas biköle dälärke ̱ käi Cristo Jesús wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l ta ̱ i je wà .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Jí ne käi yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ rä , je rä bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläklä ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta , je wà ji ki ̱ ju ̱ ñak ji ̱ a käi , je ̱ r ko ̱ nak ji ̱ a ji biköle ia ̱ käi ,

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: bas wa ̱ ji rä bäi si ̱ su ̱ akläksa ̱ , bas däkläwa ̱ bulee ka nui ta Cristo díaí ska ra ,

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: ji wämo ebä wa ̱ k Cristo Jesús oloi ja ̱ mi Säkeklä oloi kanakläka ̱ ikjeiyinaklä .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: El wa , yis ki ̱ bas shena iju ̱ ñak , yis ukä ja ̱ mi jile o ̱ na je rä bäi si ̱ ra je wà kte baa bata yinaklä ki ̱ ta .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Jekäi biköle jí Pretorio ska wa irä biköle tso ̱ kju ̱ awa wa irä sha ̱ na ijuena iyina si ̱ yis kate wätelewa ̱ rä Cristo ne kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka ,

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: ñakäi yis kate wätelewa ̱ je te sä el wa wäbäli wa täkiwa ̱ ki ̱ ta Säkekewa ja ̱ mi kte shäk ka suale kuna .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra moska te Cristo ktei wapakteke ̱ rä je ̱ r ki ̱ ñaiane kju ̱ ei , tuneka ̱ kju ̱ ei . Ata moska te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä iwakwa ssërke ̱ iwa ̱ k je ̱ rike bulee wà je kju ̱ ei .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Jewa te je we ̱ ke ̱ rä ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ne bata ki ̱ ka , iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis kolole rä kte baa wetsäk ki ̱ ka .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Ata ale Cristo bata shäk kjäte ̱ ne wà , ka bulee wà kuna , jewa te ibiketsa yis weikäk wäsi ̱ wa yis kate wätelewa ̱ dälei ja ̱ mi .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Ata ka je rä ji iá kuna . Cristo bata yirke ̱ wäsi ̱ wa iräle , ka wäsi ̱ wa kuna iräle , jishtä iräle käi , je te yis ka ̱ ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ a ̱ naa . Jekäi yis ka ̱ ssämi ji ̱ a a ̱ naa .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Iwa rä yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas ka ̱ kiäke ̱ yis ki ̱ ka oloi ja ̱ mi , ñakäi Jesucristo wikblu te yis tsa ̱ tkeke ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi yis yermiksa ̱ ni kjermita ,

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: jishtä issërke ̱ pjoo yis ia ̱ käi , jishtä ibiketseke ̱ yie käi , je rä ke ji a ̱ ni ska ji ki ̱ yis äinowa ̱ pa . Ata yie ibiketse etkabä jira irä del irä Cristo oloi karmika ̱ yis yaka ska , kseka iräle dulewa ̱ iräle .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Iwa rä yis ia ̱ ra sa ̱ se ̱ r kseka rä Cristo ia ̱ , ata duewa ̱ rä ji bäi däkläksa ̱ .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Jekäi yis tso ̱ ji ̱ a yis yaka ska ra , je rä kianak yis ia ̱ yis shka ̱ bläklä , iwadäkläksa ̱ . Jera mane kukewa ̱ yie rä , ka ju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Je te yis kukawa ̱ boktaka därërë . Yis ssëna minakju ̱ se ̱ nak kätkä Cristo ra , je ne rä bäi si ̱ rä .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Ata yis se ̱ na ji ̱ a yis yaka ska ra , je ne rä kianak bäi si ̱ bas ia ̱ rä .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Yis te jekäi ibiketsa si ̱ ki ̱ ka , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yis kätkämi ji ̱ a , yis se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a bas biköle ra , bas te ji biketse dami etkabä ska bas täkinaklä , bas ssënaklä a ̱ naa ,

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: bas ñassäklä jöiwäta yis wà Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi , yis katkeni etäbä kicha bas sha ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Jekäi bas se ̱ no jishtä Cristo ktei baa ja ̱ mi sa kiana se ̱ nak rä käi ebä . Je rä yis demi bas su ̱ ak iräle ka yis katke kuna iräle ra , yis wa ̱ bas ktei ssäklä bas dami rä je ̱ r ssële etka yebä , ji biketse etkabä kte baa ja ̱ mi wetsäk ñara etka yebä ,

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: ka suale ta a ̱ ni sa ̱ na ̱ me ̱ i wa yika , je wà ijuenaklä ijewa wäna ijewa rä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ , ata ijuenaklä bas wäna bas dä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ ; je datse ̱ rä Säkeklä ska .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Jekäi bas ia ̱ ime ̱ na Cristo bata ki ̱ ka , je rä ka ibiketsäk ebä kuna , ata ñakäi je rä ji shka ̱ l ssäk ije bata ki ̱ ka .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Bas weikarte jishtä yis weikale su ̱ le bas wa ̱ käi , ñakäi jira bas te issa yis ukä ja ̱ mi je o ̱ rte ji ̱ a .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ikuna Cristo ja ̱ mi je ̱ r pablene tso ̱ ra , ikuna ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble te sä ssëwe ̱ ji wa ̱ k ra , ikuna Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi sä ssërke ̱ etka yebä ra , ikuna ñabiketse je ̱ r baa wà irä je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ñadäläne irä tso ̱ ra ,

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: jera bas ku ̱ yis ssëwo ̱ a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ ji biketsäk ñaebä , ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk ñaebä , ssële etka yebä , jile etkabä biketsäk .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Ke ji a ̱ ni wa ̱ k je ̱ k oloi keka ̱ wà , je ̱ k ssë wà , ata ji wo ̱ rä je ̱ k jalewa ̱ wà , ibiketsäk sa saka rä sa wakei tsa ̱ ta .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Ke bas wakwa ebä ji biketsa , ata sa saka ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ je biketsö ñaebä .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Jikäi bas je ̱ riköpa jishtä Cristo Jesús je ̱ rika käi :

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Ije del dä jishtä Säkeklä rä käi , ata irä Säkeklä ra ñaebä je ka biketsane iwa ̱ kolonakwa ̱ ka ime ̱ ijäwa ̱ ta ̱ na käi .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: Ata ite iwakei oloi jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , je ̱ k kukawa ̱ kjanaklä käi , je ̱ k iawa ̱ wa ̱ ditsä ye , kolonawa ̱ ditsä käi ,

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: je ̱ k jawa ̱ Säkeklä ktä ssäk iduawa ̱ kje , duäkwa ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi kje .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Je ne wà Säkeklä te ije oloi kaka ̱ ji biköle tsa ̱ ta , te kie ma iia ̱ ji biköle kie saka tsa ̱ ta rä ,

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: je rä Jesús kie yika ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä ishäkä niki ̱ ka irä jewa biköle ñajäkläkläwa ̱ köchöwä ki ̱ ka ,

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: ñakäi biköle wa ̱ ishäklä Jesucristo ne rä Säkekewa rä , je wà Säkeklä Sa Ká oloitsanaklä .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas dikäla , jishtä bas te yis ktä ssa del ka mika ̱ yis katke ebä ra kuna , ata jira ki ̱ ta ka yis katke kuna ra , bas tsa ̱ tkerke ̱ ksa ̱ wawo ̱ sualewa ̱ paju ̱ leka ̱ .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Je rä Säkeklä ne te bas je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ ñakäi bas täkiwe ̱ ke ̱ ji sherke ̱ iwakei ki ̱ je wa ̱ k rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Ji biköle wo ̱ ka ñadälänetsale ta yakei , ka ñakteo ̱ leka ̱ ta ,

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: bas däkläwa ̱ ka shirile ta , ka ka ̱ taba käi , Säkeklä yabala , ka yakei ta jira sa ̱ tso ̱ shirilecha ̱ wa ̱ yakei telecha ̱ wa ̱ sha ̱ na . Jewa sha ̱ na bas wäñirte ji wäñinak ye ka ̱ jiska .

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: Se ̱ ne kseka ktei kuköwa ̱ därërë , je wà Cristo díaí ska ra yis je ̱ k ssäklä ka yis tu ̱ ne , ka yis shka ̱ blene ka wata .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Ata ikuna bas wa ̱ me ̱ nakka ̱ bas wa ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak bas te ji biketseke ̱ etkabä ki ̱ ka , je ki ̱ yis dä tkenakju ̱ mi ra , jera yis wakei ssërmi a ̱ naa , ñakäi yis ssërmiña a ̱ naa bas biköle ra .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas ssëno a ̱ naa , ñakäi bas ssënoña a ̱ naa yis da .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Yie ibiketse Säkekewa Jesús ki ̱ ka Timoteo patkäkmi plaa bas wäki ̱ , jekäi yie bas palei ju ̱ ña ra je wà yis täkinaklä ñaebä .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Iwa rä ka yis wa ̱ yi kuna bas biketsäk bäi si ̱ ije käi .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , biköle rä iwakwa ji ebä biketsäk , ata ka irä Jesucristo cha biketsäk kuna .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Ata Timoteo rä bäi je ju ̱ ñer bas wa ̱ . Je te yis tsa ̱ tka kte baa kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k jishtä yaba te iká tsa ̱ tke käi .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ije ne biketsa yie patkenakmi , jini yis ktei deksa ̱ je ju ̱ ña yis te ra .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Ata yie ibiketse Säkekewa oloi ja ̱ mi kukjunabä yis minaju ̱ mi bas ska .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Ata yie ibiketsa yis kiana yis el Epafrodito yis tsa ̱ tkäk kju ̱ atkäkña , je patkäkmi bas wä ki ̱ . Je rä ale patkele bas wa ̱ yis tsa ̱ tkäk ji sherke ̱ yis ki ̱ jewa .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Ije je ̱ r ja ̱ mi bas biköle dälänawa ̱ , ñakäi ije ̱ r ianawa ̱ bas te ije palei ssa iduaksa ̱ ki ̱ ka .
