text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Je rä iyina si ̱ , idua ta ̱ i yëë iduärawa ̱ . Ata Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha ije ia ̱ ; ka irä ije ebä ia ̱ kuna , ata yis ia ̱ ñaebä , yis je ̱ r iarke ̱ ka ki ̱ je ̱ r ianaklä kuna .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ssëna bäi si ̱ ije patkäkmi bas wäki ̱ , bas te isu ̱ ani ra , bas ssënaklä a ̱ naa , ñakäi ka yis je ̱ r ianaklä ji ̱ a ta ̱ i .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Jekäi ije kiöwa ̱ ssële a ̱ naa wà Säkekewa ja ̱ mi . Sä ije käi wa dälätsöpa bas ku ̱ .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , shka ̱ ble Cristo ia ̱ kju ̱ ei , elkje ra iduawa ̱ kia . Ije ̱ k ju ̱ akksa ̱ duäkwa ̱ yis tsa ̱ tkäklä , ka bas wakwa ia ̱ je o ̱ nak ki ̱ ka .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Jekäi yis el wa , bas ssëno a ̱ naa Säkekewa ja ̱ mi . Yie iyueni bas ia ̱ jiräni yis wa ̱ iyöle kja käi , je rä ka yis ia ̱ därërë kuna , je rä bas wetsäkläksa ̱ .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Bas se ̱ no je ̱ rki ̱ i ̱ chichi käi wa yika . Bas se ̱ no je ̱ rki ̱ i ̱ shka ̱ bläk yakei wa yika . Bas se ̱ no je ̱ rki ̱ i ̱ sä yaka wäbikäk wa yika .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra saje wa Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k sä wikblu wà , je ̱ k ssële tuläka ̱ Cristo Jesús wà , ka je ̱ k biketsäk kuna sa yaka ja ̱ mi , jewa ne rä tene shkiri ta si ̱ rä .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Jeiräta yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ je ̱ k yaka biketsäk . Ikuna yilé ia ̱ je ̱ k yaka biketsar da ra , je tsa ̱ ta yis ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ cha biketsäk , je rä jikäi :

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: ocho día ra tene shkiri o ̱ na yis ia ̱ . Yis dä Israel wa , Benjamín ditsei wä wa . Hebreo wa sha ̱ na yis dä Hebreo wa si ̱ . Ka ̱ wei wawe ̱ ska ra , yis dä fariseo wa .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Ikju ̱ eitketse ska ra yis dä tapanak wa yuläkksa ̱ weikanak . Wabiketsaneksa ̱ wämo ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ska ra , yis dä ka shirilewa ̱ ta .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Ata yis ia ̱ ra ji säkei ta je ke ̱ i kje ra je biketsaksa ̱ ni yie ka säkei ta ji ̱ a Cristo shka ̱ l ja ̱ mi .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Ka je ebä kuna , ata jira ji biköle biketsaksa ̱ yie rä ka säkei ta a ̱ ni yis Säkekewaí Cristo Jesús biketse baa si ̱ kju ̱ ei . Ije bata ki ̱ ka yis ji biköle weikanawa ̱ . Je biketsa yie kje jile boroila ye Cristo kukäkläwa ̱ yis wa ̱ ye ,

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: yis kolonakläwa ̱ ije ja ̱ mi ye , ka wabiketsaleksa ̱ wämo ye ' swakei ji wá ̱ ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi je wà kuna , ata wabiketsaleksa ̱ Cristo biketse wà , wabiketsale wämo ye Säkeklä wa ̱ , ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Yis ssëna yis me je ̱ r ko ̱ rpa Cristo ia ̱ , ñakäi ije shki ̱ leka ̱ ni täkili ia ̱ , ñakäi ije weikale shka ̱ l ssäkña , yis ianakläwa ̱ ije su ̱ ta duäkwa ̱ .

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Jekäi rale tsi yis shki ̱ rka ̱ ni sä dulewa ̱ wa sha ̱ na .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Ka je rä yie je kukawa ̱ e ̱ ná kuna , yis paruna bulee e ̱ ná kuna , ata yis chatkäke ̱ wa ̱ därërë , jiye wata Jesús te yis kuka rä je kukäkläwa ̱ yis wa ̱ .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: El wa , ka je rä yis te ibiketse je kukawa ̱ e ̱ ná yie ni kuna , ata jí ebä ne we ̱ ke ̱ yie rä , je rä ji a ̱ ta ̱ na yis itä wà je ka biketse kuna ji ̱ a yie , ata ji tso ̱ yis wätsa ̱ k ne kukeke ̱ yie pjoo rä ,

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: je ja ̱ mi yis tu ̱ r kate marä ibata jekje ska , yis kile minak ka ̱ sha ̱ kami Säkeklä wa ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi je däkläksa ̱ yis ia ̱ isäkei ye .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Biköle saje wa këlecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ku ̱ ibiketsö jekäi . Ata bas te ibiketseke ̱ kju ̱ awa ra , Säkeklä te bas wäji ̱ atkewe ̱ mi je wà .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Ata sa chatköwa ̱ tsa ̱ na bikö sa ̱ wa ̱ ikolole kja ja ̱ mi .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: El wa , bas ku ̱ yis mablö , ñakäi bas ku ̱ se ̱ nak jishtä sá se ̱ na bas wänaka käi wa su ̱ o .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis wa ̱ iyile bas ia ̱ ta ̱ i , ata jira yie isheni ji ̱ eleksa ̱ wà , chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ dami rä Cristo cruz í bolki wa ye .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Bata ska ra ijewa rä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ . Ijewa kekläí rä iñabäli ebä . Ijewa ñassäke ̱ rä iji äina ebä wà , ijewa te ji ka ̱ jiska ebä biketseke ̱ rä .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Ata ka ̱ jöir ke ̱ i ja ̱ mi saje wa äyëí yöle rä , mai Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ki ̱ ssënak sa ̱ wa ̱ pjoo bitäke ̱ ska , je rä Säkekewa Jesucristo .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Ije te sä yaka shi ̱ ana manewe ̱ miksa ̱ ni yaka ta baa ije cha su ̱ ta wà , itäkili iwa ̱ ji kukäkläwa ̱ iwakei niki ̱ ka te ji we ̱ wà .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis el wa yis wa ̱ shka ̱ ta wa , yis je ̱ r ja ̱ mi dälänak wa , yis ssëwa ̱ k a ̱ naa wa , ñakäi yis ia ̱ corona ye wa , bas dikäla , bas chatköwa ̱ därërë jekäi ebä Säkekewa ja ̱ mi .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Yie Evodia irä , Síntique irä , jewa pake je ̱ r bäinakni ñara Säkekewa ja ̱ mi .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Jekäi ba yis tsa ̱ tkäkña bäi , je ia ̱ yie ishe ba ku ̱ ijewa ki ̱ mo ̱ . Ijewa te kte baa wetsaña yis da , ñakäi Clemente irä yis da shka ̱ bläkña saka kie yöle tso ̱ se ̱ nak kseka wa äyëí ki ̱ wa irä ra ñara .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Bas ssëno a ̱ naa maitjä Säkekewa ja ̱ mi . Yie isheni etäbä kicha , bas ssëno a ̱ naa .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Bas se ̱ no bäi , je wà biköle wa ̱ ijuñaklä bas dami rä bäi . Säkekewa kaldu rä alemana .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Ke bas je ̱ r iana ji a ̱ ni ki ̱ , ata ji biköle ska , ka ̱ kie wà , ji kie wà , wekte she wà , ji sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ ktei shöpa Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Jekäi ra Säkeklä te sä ssëwe ̱ baa je ia ̱ ka sa ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ nak kje , je te bas kjänanemi bas je ̱ r ska irä bas ka ̱ biketsäke ̱ ska irä Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Bata ska ra , el wa , ji rä iyina käi , ji rä kianak käi , ji rä wämo käi , ji rä sikii käi , ji rä sä ssëwa ̱ k bäi käi , ji rä palei ta bäi käi , jekäi ikuna ji baa tso ̱ ra , ikuna ji kjeiyinak bäi tso ̱ ra , je ne biketsö bas ku ̱ rä .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Ji wà bas pauta ̱ na , ji kuka bas te , ji ssa bas te , ji su ̱ a bas te yis ja ̱ mi käi , je wà bas ñadulawo ̱ . Jera Säkeklä sä ssëwa ̱ k baa käruämi bas da .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Yis ssëna a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ Säkekewa ja ̱ mi . Je rä bata ska ra , bas ñajaka ̱ ni yis biketsäkni ki ̱ ka . Del bas te yis biketsa , ata ka maikäi bas wa ̱ yis tsa ̱ tkäkleí .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Ka yie je sheke ̱ rä yis ki ̱ ji bälirke ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis dä dulale ji biköle sha ̱ na ssënak a ̱ naa .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Se ̱ ne kshana ka ji ta ra ju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ , ñakäi se ̱ ne ji tso ̱ ta ̱ i ra je ju ̱ ñer yis wa ̱ . Yis dä je ̱ k dulale ji biköle wà ji biköle ska ji katabläk , ji ñale bäi iräle bäli ebä iräle , ji tso ̱ ta ̱ i ra iräle ji ka ta ra iräle .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Yis ia ̱ ji biköle o ̱ r dawa ̱ Cristo yis täkiwa ̱ k oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Jeiräta bäi bas te iwa ̱ rä , je wà bas te weikane shka ̱ l ssaña yis da .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Bas Filipos wa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , mika ̱ säkätä kte baa wapauta ̱ nami ra , Macedonia ska yis mineju ̱ ra , tapanak kju ̱ awa ska wa wa ̱ ka ji me ̱ ne irä ji kolone irä iwa ̱ ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ kläña yis da , ata bas ebä te .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Je su ̱ ta Tesalónica ska bas te inaklä patka botäbä kicha mañatäbä kicha yis tsa ̱ tkäklä yis ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ wà .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Ka je rä jile me ̱ lepa yis ia ̱ biketseke ̱ yie kuna , ata isäkei ki ̱ tapanaklä bas ia ̱ je ne biketseke ̱ yie rä .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Ata ji patkeleté kalabe kuka yie , jekäi yis ji tso ̱ ta ̱ i . Yis dä jileta bäi ebä , ji patkele bas wa ̱ je ma ̱ yis ia ̱ Epafrodito te . Je rä jile jalarta ja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ käi , jile me ̱ leka ̱ bäi , Säkeklä ssëwa ̱ k bäi käi .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Jekäi yis Kekläí wa ̱ blune tso ̱ baawa ̱ si ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi , je wà ite ji sherke ̱ bas ki ̱ biköle me ̱ mi bas ia ̱ .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: ¡ Saje wa Kekläí , Sa Ká , je ne oloi kanoka ̱ pa sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi ! Amén .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Bas te ishe sä sikii wa Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi biköle ia ̱ yis te ijewa chakami . Sä el wa kajali yis da wa te bas chakami .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Sä sikii wa biköle te bas chakami . Bäi si ̱ rä César ju ska tso ̱ wa ne te bas chakami rä .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Säkekewa Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ bas je ̱ rikä ska .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Pablo , Jesucristo ktei bata shäk Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena jekäi ki ̱ ka , je te sä el Timoteo ra ñara ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: jí yue mar bas sä el wa sikii wa chatkelewa ̱ bäi Cristo ja ̱ mi tso ̱ Colosas ska wa ia ̱ . Säkeklä saje wa Ká , je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Sá ka ̱ kiäke ̱ bas ki ̱ ka ra , del sá te Säkeklä saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo Ká je ia ̱ wekte sheke ̱ .

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá te issa bas te Cristo Jesús biketsa , ñakäi bas wa ̱ sä sikii wa biköle shka ̱ l ,

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: je rä ji ki ̱ ssënak tso ̱ blele ka ̱ jöir ska bas ia ̱ ki ̱ ka . Je ne ktei ssële bas wa ̱ , kte baa ja ̱ mi kte yina si ̱ ssa bas te ra rä .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Je kte rä delemi bas ska . Jekäi jishtä je wärte ̱ kibirte ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska , je su ̱ ta ñaebä io ̱ rte ̱ bas sha ̱ na rä , bas te Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ ktei ssaté ju ̱ ñaté si ̱ ke ̱ i kje raté ,

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: jishtä bas te ijuña shka ̱ bläkña sá ra shka ̱ ta Epafras ja ̱ mi käi . Ije rä Cristo kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k bäi bas tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Je te ñaebä bas wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l Säkeklä wikblu ja ̱ mi paka sá ia ̱ .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ñaebä sá te bas ktei ssa ke ̱ i skaté sá ka ̱ kiäte bas ki ̱ ka ka jalewa ̱ ta . Jekäi sá ka ̱ kiäte bas je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä bäi si ̱ ji sherke ̱ iwakei ki ̱ je ia ̱ , ka ̱ biketse biköle ska je ̱ rike ji rä wikblu iá ja ̱ mi biköle ska .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Je rä bas se ̱ naklä jishtä Säkekewa ja ̱ mi se ̱ ne rä käi , issëwa ̱ k bäi ji biköle ska , wänak ji bäi biköle we ̱ wà , kibinak je ̱ r ko ̱ ne Säkeklä ska wà ,

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: täkinak täkili biköle wà ioloi täkii ja ̱ mi , bas wa ̱ ji biköle wäkukäklä katabläklä je ̱ r baa wà ,

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: ssënak a ̱ naa wekte shäk Sa Ká ia ̱ . Je ne te sa ̱ ia ̱ ji wá ̱ sä kianaklä ji däke ̱ ksa ̱ sä sikii wa ia ̱ kukäkña ka ̱ oloika rä .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Ije te sä wetsaksa ̱ ka ̱ tuil wa ̱ sa ̱ tso ̱ kololewa ̱ yika , jaklamini ite iyaba shka ̱ ta je gobiernoí ja ̱ mi .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Ije wa ̱ sä rä to ̱ leksa ̱ , jalecha ̱ wa ̱ bitaba ji yakei wakble nui ki ̱ ka .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Ije ne rä Säkeklä ka juenak kuna je me ̱ i rä , ji biköle yöleksa ̱ je yikaba rä .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije ne oloi ja ̱ mi ji biköle tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir irä ka ̱ jiska irä jewa yöleksa ̱ rä , ji juenak käi , ji ka juenak kuna käi , ji wäkiri wa iräle , sa patkäk wa iräle , jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa iräle , ka ̱ wei ta wa iräle , je biköle yöleksa ̱ rä ije ne oloi ja ̱ mi iwakei ia ̱ .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Ije ne rä ji biköle yikaba rä . Ije oloi ja ̱ mi ji biköle tso ̱ rä .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Ije ne rä iyaka tsa ̱ ku ̱ rä , je rä tapanak wa . Ije ne rä säkätäba rä , bitele dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ska itsa ̱ säkätä ye rä , ije däkläwa ̱ bakleka ̱ ji biköle ska .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Sa Ká ssëna rä ji tso ̱ iwakei ja ̱ mi je kalabe me kätkä ije ja ̱ mi ,

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: ñakäi ji biköle je ̱ r bäiwa ̱ kni iwakei ra ije oloi ja ̱ mi ka ikju ̱ atkäklä ji ̱ a ñara , ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska iräle ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska iräle käi , ipi bakleju ̱ cruz ja ̱ mi je wà .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Mikle bas bakle ñabutsäle tulämi ibolki ye bas je ̱ rike ska , bas te ji yakei wakbleke ̱ ki ̱ ka ,

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: jewa je ̱ r bäiwa ̱ ni ite iyaka wà iduawa ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi , iwa ̱ bas ma ̱ kläksa ̱ sikii , ka yakei ta kuna , ka nui ta Sa Ká wäna ,

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: je rä ikuna bas chatkawa ̱ tkelewa ̱ därërë ji biketse etkabä ja ̱ mi ra , ñakäi ikuna ji ki ̱ ssënak pakale kte baa wa ̱ ssële bas wa ̱ je ja ̱ mi bas chatkawa ̱ ka tse ̱ leju ̱ mi ta ra . Je kte ne wapauta ̱ na ji biköle yöle tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir niki ̱ na ska rä . Je kte baa wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k yë yis Pablo delewa ̱ rä .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Jira yis weikarte bas kju ̱ ei te yis ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ a ̱ naa . Ñakäi Cristo weikarke ̱ ki ̱ sher ji ̱ a , je wäjieke ̱ ksa ̱ yis te yis yaka ska ije yaka kju ̱ ei . Je iyaka rä tapanak wa .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Yis dewa ̱ rä ijewa kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ye , Säkeklä te yis ia ̱ ima ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak bas ia ̱ käi , yis wa ̱ Säkeklä ktä wawa ̱ kläksa ̱ kalabe .

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Je kte ka ju ̱ ñele kuna rä blelewa ̱ ka ̱ bakle mikle etkä etkä raté sa wale bakle saka saka skaté , ata jira je kjayina ije wa ̱ sikii wa tso ̱ ia ̱ .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Säkeklä ssëna ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ ak mane rä je kte blelewa ̱ bluneí baa rä wà , ka Judío kuna wa sha ̱ na . Je kte rä Cristo rä bas ja ̱ mi , ji ki ̱ ssënak baawa ̱ si ̱ .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ije ne bata sheke ̱ sá te rä . Jekäi sá te ditsä biköle parueke ̱ , ñakäi ditsä biköle yueke ̱ ka ̱ biketse bena wà , sá wa ̱ ditsä biköle ma ̱ kläksa ̱ bäi ñakjee Cristo ja ̱ mi .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Je ebä wata ki ̱ ka yis shka ̱ bläke ̱ rä , chichale itäkili te ji we ̱ yis ja ̱ mi bäi si ̱ je wà .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ki ̱ bas shena iju ̱ ñak bikö yis chichale kju ̱ atkäk bas ki ̱ ka käi , ñakäi Laodicea wa ki ̱ ka käi , ñakäi yi wa ̱ ka yis su ̱ le kuna wa biköle ki ̱ ka käi .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Je rä ijewa je ̱ r täkinaklä , delewa ̱ etka yebä ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà , iblunaklä je ̱ rike biköle wà , je wà ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä Säkeklä ji blelewa ̱ ia ̱ , je rä Cristo .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Ije ne ja ̱ mi ji säkei ta biköle , ka ̱ biketse käi , ji ju ̱ ñe käi je tso ̱ blele rä .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Jí sheke ̱ yie rä yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka bas wäyuäkläwa ̱ kuna kte ssër ta iyina shtä wà .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Ka yis wakei kaldu kuna bas sha ̱ na , ata yis wikblu kaldu bas sha ̱ na . Jekäi yis ssërke ̱ a ̱ naa isu ̱ ak jishtä bas te ji we ̱ ke ̱ tsa ̱ na käi , ñakäi jishtä bas te Cristo biketsa tkelewa ̱ därërë käi .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Je ki ̱ ka jishtä bas te Cristo Jesús kuka Säkekewa ye käi ra , jekäi bas shkö ije ja ̱ mi ,

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: ñak kicha tkelewa ̱ därërë , ki ̱ yöleka ̱ ije ja ̱ mi , chatkelewa ̱ ji biketsäk etkabä , jishtä bas pautäle käi , ñakäi wekte shäk iia ̱ bäi si ̱ .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Ji su ̱ o tsa ̱ na ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ bas kukakläwa ̱ kuna wäyönak kje ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe wà , kje kte wà ditsä wädular ja ̱ mi , ji we ̱ ka ̱ jiska ja ̱ mi , ata ka je rä Cristo ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji tso ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kalabe tso ̱ ije ja ̱ mi yaka ye .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Jekäi ije ja ̱ mi bas dä wäjielewa ̱ kalabe , je ne rä jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä , ka ̱ wei ta wa irä , biköle tsa ̱ ku ̱ i rä .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Ñakäi ije ja ̱ mi bas ia ̱ tene shkiri o ̱ na , tene shkiri ka o ̱ le kuna jula wà , ata tene shkiri o ̱ le Cristo wakei wa ̱ , sa yaka ska sa patkäk ji wa ̱ k ju ̱ leksa ̱ .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: itäbilecha ̱ wa ̱ ije raña bas wäoka ̱ na ra , ñakäi ije ja ̱ mi shki ̱ leka ̱ ni iraña , je rä bas te Säkeklä ishki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni dulewa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je täkili te ji we ̱ je biketsa ki ̱ ka .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Bas tso ̱ ji ̱ a dulecha ̱ wa ̱ shirinak ebä , ka tene shkiri ta bas yaka ska , jera ite se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ bas ia ̱ ije raña , ñakäi ite bas shirile biköle jawa ̱ bitaba .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Ije te sa ̱ nui äyëí yöle wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ , jeska jini kte wa ̱ iyile ja ̱ mi sa kjatele rä , je tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami ite sa ̱ ki ̱ , wätiaka ̱ ite cruz ja ̱ mi .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Jekäi ite jile tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä ka ̱ wei ta wa irä tulaksa ̱ , äiwa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ite biköle wäna . Jekäi itu ̱ naka ̱ ijewa ki ̱ cruz wà .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ke bas ñama ̱ yinak yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ yakei ji ñe ki ̱ ka , ji ye ki ̱ ka , jile ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ ki ̱ ka , tulu spa ̱ na ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ ki ̱ ka , sábado ke ̱ i kjewe ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Je biköle rä ji rä däkwa ̱ ji ̱ a je ne kjashäk , ata iwa si ̱ rä Cristo .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Jekäi je ̱ k iawa ̱ k juer ta je ̱ k jalewa ̱ ta ̱ i käi , ángel wa oloitsäk käi , ji kjayile iia ̱ je ebä pakäk käi , je ̱ k ssäk ka wata ije ̱ rike ji rä yaka iá ja ̱ mi käi , jewa mane a ̱ ni ku ̱ ji rä däkksa ̱ bas ia ̱ ke wätkewo ̱ pa bas yika .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Jeshtä wa rä ka tkelewa ̱ kuna itsa ̱ ku ̱ ja ̱ mi . Ata itsa ̱ ku ̱ ne ja ̱ mi iyaka kalabe se ̱ rke ̱ rä , wäjierke ̱ rä , sä wäjienaklä wà , sa ̱ ja ̱ me ̱ i wà , ikibinaklä maikäi Säkeklä te ikibiwe ̱ käi .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Ikuna bas dä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ ña Cristo ra ji we ̱ ka ̱ jiska ja ̱ mi yika ra , ¿ jiye bas se ̱ rke ̱ sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä bas tso ̱ ji ̱ a rä ka ̱ jiska käi , je ̱ k jäkwa ̱

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: ale ke je wá ̱ ni , ke je ña ni , ke je ka ni ka ̱ wei yika rä na ?

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Je biköle rä e ̱ nakwa ̱ iwawe ̱ wà , je rä ditsä ebä wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k , sa pautäle ki ̱ ka .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Iyina si ̱ ra je juer dä je ̱ rike ta ̱ i käi , ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ta ̱ i käi , je ̱ kje ta ̱ i käi , yaka ska je ̱ k weike ta ̱ i käi . Ata ka jiye je kiar ji ssërke ̱ sa yaka ia ̱ je wätkewa ̱ k .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Ikuna bas dä shki ̱ le tuläka ̱ niña Cristo ra , jera bas ku ̱ ji tso ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ka ne yulö rä , mai Cristo katke je ̱ tkelewa ̱ Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne ska .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Bas ku ̱ ji tso ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ka ne biketsö rä , ata ka ka ̱ jiska ji tso ̱ kuna .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas duacha ̱ wa ̱ , jekäi bas se ̱ ne kseka tso ̱ rä blele Cristo ra Säkeklä ja ̱ mi .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Jekäi mika ̱ Cristo bas se ̱ ne kseka juermi ra , jera ñakäi bas juermi ije ra baawa ̱ si ̱ .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ji we ̱ ka ̱ jiska ja ̱ mi ktöwa ̱ bas ku ̱ bas yaka wäjienaklä ska , ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ käi , ji rä shi ̱ ana käi , tärene käi , ji yakei ebä sherke ̱ sa ̱ ki ̱ käi , ji ki ̱ tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi käi . Je rä jile kekläí me ̱ i kja ̱ nei we ̱ ebä .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Je ne shtä kju ̱ ei Säkeklä kju ̱ atkawa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ka iktä ssäk kuna ki ̱ ka rä .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Mikle ra je shtä ja ̱ mi bas kja rä , mika ̱ bas se ̱ na ji ̱ a je ja ̱ mi ke ̱ i kje ra .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Ata jira bas ku ̱ je shtä we ̱ jöwa ̱ kalabe : kju ̱ atke käi , sälwi tkewe ̱ käi , ji we ̱ wäsi ̱ wa käi , ji wämo she yakei käi , kte yakei she bas kjäbata ska käi .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Ke bas ka ̱ yua ñaukä ja ̱ mi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä del këyake wa ̱ o ̱ nak je rä ju ̱ leksa ̱ bas wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Jekäi bas dä ñapajieleni sä del spa ̱ na wà . Je spa ̱ na tërte , jishtä iyuäkksa ̱ wakei rä käi , je ̱ r ko ̱ nakwa ̱ kalabe .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Jekäi ra ka sa ̱ kuna Griego iräle Judío iräle , tene shkiri ta iräle ka tene shkiri ta iräle , ka ñayöle iräle , ka ̱ etkä kju ̱ awa wa iräle , kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye iräle ka kololewa ̱ kuna iräle . Ata Cristo ne rä ji biköle ye , ji biköle ska rä .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ñapajiö je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ñadäläne wà , je ̱ r bäi she wà , je ̱ k jewa ̱ wà , se ̱ ne bitaba wà , ji katable wà , jishtä sä kolole Säkeklä wa ̱ wa käi , sikii , shka ̱ ta iwa ̱ wa käi .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Bas ñakatablö ; yilé kju ̱ atkäke ̱ isaka ra , jera bas ñajöwa ̱ bitaba . Jishtä Säkekewa te bas jawa ̱ bitaba käi , je su ̱ ta bas ku ̱ iwo ̱ .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Ata je biköle tsa ̱ ta bas ñapajiö ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà , je ne wà sa ̱ ñawäjiämi bäi si ̱ rä .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Cristo te sä ssëwe ̱ baa , je ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ska bas wäsikewo ̱ pa bas ssënaklä baa ñara , je ne ye bas kile däkwa ̱ ekla yaka ye rä ki ̱ ka . Ñakäi bas ku ̱ wekte shö Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Cristo ktä se ̱ nopa ki ̱ ta si ̱ bas ja ̱ mi , bas ñapaktäklä bas ñaparuäklä ka ̱ biketse bena wà , bas kse shäklä je ̱ r baa wà Säkeklä ia ̱ bas je ̱ r ska , salmo wà käi , kse wà käi , ji wikblu iá kseí wà käi .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Ñakäi ji biköle we ̱ ke ̱ bas te käi , jile she iräle jile we ̱ iräle , je biköle wo ̱ Säkekewa Jesús kie ja ̱ mi , wekte yile ije oloi ja ̱ mi Säkeklä Sa Ká ia ̱ .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Alaklä wa , bas ñajöwa ̱ bas se ̱ naklä wa yika jishtä ishena o ̱ nak Säkekewa ja ̱ mi käi .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Jäiyi wa , bas ku ̱ bas se ̱ naklä wa shka ̱ li ̱ blö . Ke bas se ̱ na sälwii ijewa ra .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Yabala , bas ku ̱ bas ká wa ktä ssö ji biköle ska , jekäi ne wà Säkekewa wäbätsä rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Yabala ká wa , ke bas ku ̱ bas yabala kju ̱ atkewa ̱ k , ka ijewa je ̱ r ianaklä kuna .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Kjanaklä wa , bas ku ̱ bas wakwa blui wa ktä ssö ji biköle ska , ka ji wa ̱ k sa ̱ su ̱ rke ̱ ebä ra kuna , jishtä manele te ditsä ebä ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ bäi käi , ata ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na je ̱ r baa wà , sualewa ̱ Säkeklä yika .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Jekäi ji biköle we ̱ ke ̱ bas te , je wo ̱ je ̱ r baa wà , jishtä Säkekewa ia ̱ ji we ̱ käi , ka ditsä ia ̱ ji we ̱ käi kuna ,

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: ju ̱ ñelewa ̱ Säkekewa te bas ia ̱ däli ukä me ̱ mi isäkei ye , bas te rä Säkekewa Cristo ne kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Ata yi te ji wá ̱ yakei to ̱ rmi ite iwá ̱ yakei ja ̱ mi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sa ̱ ia ̱ ji däkksa ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kuna .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Blu wa , bas ku ̱ bas kjanaklä wa ia ̱ ji wo ̱ wämo , ñakjee , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas dä blui ta ñaebä ka ̱ jöir ska ki ̱ ka .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Bas chatköwa ̱ ka ̱ kiäk del , je ja ̱ mi bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ , wekte shäk Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Ñakäi bas ka ̱ kiö sá ki ̱ ka ka ̱ me ̱ naklä sá ia ̱ kte shäklä , sá wa ̱ Cristo ktei blelewa ̱ wapakäklä . Je ne kju ̱ ei yis kate wätelewa ̱ rä .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Bas ka ̱ kiö yis wa ̱ je waje ̱ rku ̱ akläksa ̱ , jishtä yis kiana ishäk käi .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na ka delewa ̱ kuna wa ra , bas wa ̱ ka ̱ kjäke ̱ wawa ̱ klä bäi .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Bas ktäke ̱ kiana rä del bäi ebä , däyë ta bäi käi , je wà bas je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä maikäi sä kúke ekla ekla rä käi .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Jishtä yis dami rä je biköle pakemi bas ia ̱ sá el shka ̱ ta sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk bäi , Säkekewa kjanakläña yis da Tíquico te .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Yie ije patke mar bas wäki ̱ jikäi wata ki ̱ , je rä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä jishtä sá dami rä käi , ñakäi iwa ̱ bas je ̱ r täkiwa ̱ klä .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Je patkeke ̱ yie sä el shka ̱ ta chatkelewa ̱ bäi Onésimo ale bas wa ekla je ra . Jewa te ji o ̱ rte jiska rä je biköle pakemi bas ia ̱ .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Yis da wätelewa ̱ ña Aristarco te bas chakami , Bernabé el Marcos te ñaebä . Je ktei rä yilemi kja bas ia ̱ . Idamiju ̱ ra , bas te ikiewa ̱ .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Ñaebä Jesús kie etkä Justo ni , je te bas chakami . Säkeklä gobierno wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ kña yis da wa sha ̱ na , ijewa ebä ne rä tene shkiri ta wa rä . Ijewa rä yis je ̱ r pabläk ta ̱ i .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Epafras , ale bas wa ekla , je te bas chakami , ije rä Cristo Jesús kjanaklä . Je chichar kate del ka ̱ kiäk bas ki ̱ ka , bas tkenakläwa ̱ därërë këlecha ̱ wa ̱ wa käi , ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ wa ̱ k kalabe .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Yis wa ̱ ije rä su ̱ nak , ije rä je ̱ k weikäk ta ̱ i bas bata ki ̱ ka , ñakäi Laodicea wa irä Hierápolis wa irä jewa bata ki ̱ ka .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Lucas , ale sä bäiwa ̱ k shka ̱ ta sa ̱ wa ̱ irä Demas irä , jewa te bas chakami .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Bas te she sä el wa tso ̱ Laodicea ska wa ia ̱ irä Ninfas ia ̱ irä tapanak ije ju ska wa irä ia ̱ sá te ijewa chakami ni .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Jí äyë wayina e ̱ ná bas sha ̱ na ra , jera Laodicea ska tapanak wa pake bas te iwashäk , ñaebä Laodicea wa ia ̱ ipatkele washe bas te .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Ñakäi bas te ishe Arquipo ia ̱ , ji kja ̱ nei we ̱ me ̱ le iia ̱ Säkekewa wa ̱ , je wawo ̱ iku ̱ rä kalabe .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Jí bas chakäklämi yua yis Pablo te yis wakei jula wà . Ka bas je ̱ r sher yis tso ̱ rä wätelewa ̱ ska . Bas ia ̱ je ̱ r bäi yinopa .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Pablo irä , Silvano irä , Timoteo irä , jewa te jí yue mar Tesalónica ska tapanak Säkeklä Sa Ká ja ̱ mi Säkekewa Jesucristo ja ̱ mi jewa ia ̱ . Je ̱ r bäi yinopa bas ia ̱ , bas je ̱ r ssënopa baa .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Maitjä sá te wekte sheke ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ bas ki ̱ ka ; sá te bas ktei sheke ̱ sá ka ̱ kiäke ̱ na ka jalewa ̱ ta .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Bas ji wa ̱ ke ̱ bas te ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka , bas shka ̱ bläke ̱ ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà , bas chatkäke ̱ wa ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo ki ̱ ssäk , jeska sá je ̱ r ja ̱ rke ̱ Säkeklä Sa Ká wäna .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: El wa shka ̱ ta Säkeklä wa ̱ wa , sá wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas dä kolole iwa ̱ .

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá wa ̱ kte baa yinak , ka denemi bas ska rä kte ebä wà kuna ata je rä ji täkii wà , Wikblu Sikina wà , biketsale bäi si ̱ wa ̱ wà . Ñakäi bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jishtä sá se ̱ na bas sha ̱ na bas kju ̱ ei käi .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Jekäi bas ñadulawa ̱ wa ̱ sá irä Säkekewa irä mabläk . Bas te kte kuka weikane ta ̱ i sha ̱ na ssële a ̱ naa Wikblu Sikina oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Jekäi bata ki ̱ ka bas dewa ̱ mablenak Jesús biketsäk wa tso ̱ Macedonia ska irä Acaya ska irä wa wa ̱ .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas ne ska Säkekewa ktä ssënami rä , ka Macedonia ska Acaya ska ebä kuna , ata bas te Säkeklä biketsa , je palei minemi rä ka ̱ biköle ska . Je ki ̱ ka ka sá shene ji shäk ji ̱ a .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je wakwa te ipakeke ̱ jishtä bas te sá kiawa ̱ bäi käi , maikäi bas ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ jile kekläí me ̱ i yika Säkeklä ia ̱ , bas wa ̱ Säkeklä si ̱ kseka kja ̱ nei wa ̱ klä käi ,

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: bas wa ̱ iyaba däke ̱ ka ̱ jöir ki ̱ ssäklä , ale shki ̱ leka ̱ ni iwa ̱ dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na . Je rä Jesús , je ne te sä bäkeksa ̱ Säkeklä kju ̱ atkawa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ yika rä .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: El wa , bas wakwa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , sá dasta ̱ na bas ska ka deneksa ̱ rä kje ka wata käi kuna .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Ata je yikaba sá te ji shka ̱ l ssa , sá weikana diekjela Filipo ska jishtä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer käi . Jekäi sá ñatäkiwa ̱ saje wa Kekläí ja ̱ mi sá wa ̱ bas ia ̱ Säkeklä ktei baa bata shäklä kju ̱ atke ta ̱ i sha ̱ na .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Iwa rä sá te sa pakte rä ka kte shirilewa ̱ wà kuna , ji shi ̱ ana wà kuna , sä wäyue wäsi ̱ wa wà kuna .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Ata Säkeklä wa ̱ sá rä su ̱ leksa ̱ bäi kianak kte baa bata shäk wa ye ki ̱ ka sá ktäke ̱ rä , ka ditsä ebä ssëwa ̱ k bäi kuna , ata Säkeklä sa ̱ je ̱ rike su ̱ akksa ̱ ssëwa ̱ k bäi .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Jishtä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer käi , ka sá wa ̱ bas kjeiyine ji ki ̱ bas wa ̱ sá ktä ssäkläpa kuna , ka sá wa ̱ ji o ̱ ne jile däkläksa ̱ sá ia ̱ ebä ki ̱ ka kuna . Säkeklä te je su ̱ a .

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Ka sá wa ̱ ibiketsane ditsä me sá oloi käka ̱ , bas iräle kju ̱ awa iräle wa ̱ käi . Jeiräta sá rä Cristo ktei bata shäk wa ki ̱ ka , sá ia ̱ ka ̱ tso ̱ bas weikäklä ji wà .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Ata sá dewa ̱ yabala dulunala käi bas sha ̱ na . Jishtä yabala a ̱ mi wa te tsu me ̱ iyabala ia ̱ käi ,

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: sá wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka , sá je ̱ r ssëna ka bas ia ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ kte baa tso ̱ ebä ma ̱ k kuna , ata ñaebä ñama ̱ tuläkksa ̱ bas ia ̱ , je rä bas dewa ̱ sá wa ̱ shka ̱ ta ta ̱ i ki ̱ ka .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , el wa , bas je ̱ r ja ̱ na sá shka ̱ bla ta ̱ i sá ji wá ̱ jaree ska . Jekäi sá ji wá ̱ tuina ka ̱ piana , ka sá wa ̱ bas mane a ̱ ni weikäklä , sá te bas pakta Säkeklä wa ̱ kte baa tso ̱ wa ra .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Bas irä , Säkeklä irä , jewa rä sá su ̱ ak , jishtä sá se ̱ na bas ji biketsäk etkabä wa sha ̱ na bulee , wämo , ka palei ta yakei käi .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Jekäi bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jishtä yabala pakte iká te käi , sá te bas je ̱ r täkiwa ̱ , bas je ̱ r pabla ,

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: bas paka shkäk kianak Säkeklä ja ̱ mi käi . Je ne te bas kia däkwa ̱ iwakei gobierno ja ̱ mi oloi kanakka ̱ ije ra .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sá te wekte sheke ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ ka jalewa ̱ ta . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá te Säkeklä ktä bata sha je ssa je kuka bas te ra , ka bas wa ̱ ikolone ditsä ktä käi kuna , ata je kiawa ̱ bas te jishtä Säkeklä ktä käi . Iyina si ̱ ra je rä jekäi . Je kte ne te ji we ̱ ke ̱ bas ji biketsäk etkabä wà sha ̱ na rä .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Jeki ̱ ka el wa , bas ñadulawa ̱ wa ̱ tapanak eyaka eyaka Säkeklä ia ̱ Judea ska Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi wa mabläk . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , jishtä ijewa weika Judío wa te , je su ̱ ta ñaebä bas weika bas wakwa ke ̱ i ska wa te .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: Judío wa te Säkekewa Jesús irä jile bata shäk wa irä ktacha ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi ijewa te sá tulaksa ̱ . Ka ijewa te Säkeklä ssëwe ̱ bäi , ata ijewa kju ̱ atkäke ̱ biköle ra .

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Ijewa te sá wätkewe ̱ ke ̱ ka sá wa ̱ ka Judío kuna wa paktäklä jewa tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ ye . Jekäi ijewa nui kukä rami däka ̱ pshii . Jeiräta kju ̱ atke dewa ̱ kja ijewa ki ̱ ka e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: El wa , sá bala butsa ̱ na bas yika berbena bala ta , ka su ̱ le ta , ata del ssële sa ̱ je ̱ r ska sá kajali bas da käi , jera ki ̱ ta sá ssërke ̱ sa ̱ me bas su ̱ awa ̱ ni käi .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sá ssëna minak bas ska . Jekäi yis Pablo te imabla botäbä kicha mañatäbä kicha , ata Satanás te sá wätkewa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Iwa rä mika ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús däni ra , ¿ ji ki ̱ ssëmi sá te , ji ki ̱ ka sá ssërmi a ̱ naa , ji tkemika ̱ sá te tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ corona ye sá je ̱ k ssäklä ije wäna rä na ? ¿ Ka bas ne je rä na ?

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Jekäi bas ne wà sá oloi karmika ̱ rä , sá ssërmi a ̱ naa rä .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ka sá ia ̱ iwäkolor ji ̱ a ra , sá te ibiketsaksa ̱ a ̱ ta ̱ nak sá wakwa ebä Atenas ska ,

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: jekäi sá te Timoteo , ale sá el shka ̱ bläkña Säkeklä ia ̱ sá ra Cristo ktei baa shäk , je patkami bas täkiwa ̱ k bas tsa ̱ tkäk bas wa ̱ ji biketsäklä ji ̱ a etkabä ,

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: ka bas mane a ̱ ni tjuäkläwa ̱ jí sä weikarte wa ̱ . Je rä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je ne ye sä rä ki ̱ ka .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Sá kajali ji ̱ a bas da ra , sá te isha kja bas ia ̱ sä weikarmi . Jekäi io ̱ na jishtä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer käi .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ia ̱ ka iwakolor ji ̱ a ra , yie Timoteo patkami bas wäki ̱ , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä jishtä bas dami ji biketse etkabä ja ̱ mi rä käi , iö sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ wa ̱ k te maikäi rale bas je ̱ r ki ̱ we ̱ che ̱ wa ̱ , jera sá shka ̱ bla ta ̱ i bas sha ̱ na weikarwa ̱ ka wata .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Ata jira Timoteo tso ̱ bas su ̱ ak je dene te bas te ji biketsete etkabä , bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläte je paka sá ia ̱ , bas te sá biketse kate , bas je ̱ r ssërke ̱ sá su ̱ ak , jishtä sá je ̱ r ssërke ̱ bas su ̱ ak käi , je paka .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Je ki ̱ ka el wa , bas ji biketsä dami ji ̱ a etkabä ki ̱ ka sá je ̱ r pablena , sá je ̱ r iarke ̱ sá weikarke ̱ biköle sha ̱ na ,

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: je wà jira sá se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a kseka , bas dami tkelewa ̱ därërë Säkekewa ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa ssëna a ̱ naa e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ bas ki ̱ ka saje wa Kekläí wäna , ¿ maikäi je kjekla ki ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ wekte yir Säkeklä ia ̱ na ?

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Ka ̱ piana tuina sá ka ̱ kiäke ̱ pjoo , sá wa ̱ bas wakwa si ̱ su ̱ aklä , sá wa ̱ bas sher ji ̱ a ji biketsäk etkabä je ki ̱ wäjiäkläksa ̱ .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Säkeklä saje wa Ká je wakei irä , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús irä jewa ku ̱ sá wäsikewo ̱ mipa däkmi bas wä ki ̱ .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Ñakäi Säkekewa ku ̱ bas ssëwo ̱ pa ki ̱ ta jöiwäta ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk , ñakäi biköle shka ̱ li ̱ bläk , jishtä sá wa ̱ bas shka ̱ l käi ,

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: je rä bas täkinaklä bas je ̱ r ska , bas ko ̱ naklä ka shirile ta a ̱ ni sikii si ̱ Säkeklä Sa Ká wäna , mika ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús däke ̱ ni ije wa ̱ sikii wa tso ̱ biköle ra ñara ra .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Jekäi bas yis saka wa , sá te bas ia ̱ isheke ̱ , bas pakeke ̱ Säkekewa Jesús ja ̱ mi , ji kolole bas wa ̱ sá ja ̱ mi , je rä jishtä bas kiana se ̱ nak käi , Säkeklä ssëwa ̱ k bäi käi , je wa ̱ k ki ̱ ta jishtä bas te iwe ̱ kate käi ,

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: je rä bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jini sá te bas ia ̱ ishata ̱ na Säkekewa Jesús ja ̱ mi käi ki ̱ ka .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Iwa rä jikäi Säkeklä ki ̱ bas sherke ̱ rä : je rä siki tenak , ñabutsäksa ̱ ka ̱ wakblewe ̱ yika ,

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: dulanak ekla ekla je ̱ k yaka se ̱ newa ̱ k sikii ka je ̱ k yao ̱ le ta ,

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: ka ji tkerke ̱ sa ̱ ja ̱ mi pjoo wa ̱ k , jishtä ka ̱ kju ̱ awa wa ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna wa te iwe ̱ ke ̱ käi kuna ,

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: ka jekäi ka ̱ wakblewa ̱ k kuna , ka je wà sä el weikäk ji wa ̱ k iukä ja ̱ mi kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkekewa te iwakbläk jekäi wa kpemi je shtä biköle kju ̱ ei ki ̱ , jishtä sá te bas ia ̱ isha käi iwaje ̱ rku ̱ a käi .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka Säkeklä wa ̱ sä kile rä ji shi ̱ ana wa ̱ k kuna , ata sikii tenak .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yi te je ju ̱ aksa ̱ ra , je rä ka iwa ̱ ditsä ju ̱ neksa ̱ kuna , ata Säkeklä , iwikblu Sikina ma ̱ k bas ia ̱ , je ne ju ̱ aksa ̱ ite rä .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Ata ka jiye yis shene ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ñaje ̱ keta wa käi je ktei yuäk ji ̱ a bas ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas wakwa rä pautäle e ̱ ná Säkeklä wa ̱ ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Iyina si ̱ ra bas te je we ̱ te sä el wa biköle tso ̱ Macedonia ke ̱ i kalabe ska wa ia ̱ . Ata el wa , sá te bas pake je wa ̱ k ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta ,

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: ñakäi ñatsa ̱ kksa ̱ se ̱ nak bitaba , bas wakwa ji tso ̱ o ̱ nak ebä biketsäk , shka ̱ bläk bas wakwa jula wà maikäi sá te bas ia ̱ isha käi ,

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: je rä bas se ̱ naklä tsa ̱ na ka delewa ̱ kuna wa ra , ñakäi ka bas ki ̱ ji shenaklä kuna .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: El wa , ñaebä sá ki ̱ bas shena sä käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ktei ju ̱ ñak , ka bas je ̱ r ianacha ̱ kläwa ̱ , jishtä ditsä saka wa ̱ ka ji bäi kuna ki ̱ ssënak wa käi .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Iwa rä ikuna sa te ibiketse iyina si ̱ Jesús duawa ̱ ishki ̱ naka ̱ ni ra , je su ̱ ta Säkeklä te sä käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ Jesús ja ̱ mi wa jetémi ira .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Jekäi sá te jí sheke ̱ bas ia ̱ Säkekewa ktä wà , saje tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka wa , a ̱ ta ̱ le Säkekewa däke ̱ ni kje , jewa ka minakmiba sä tso ̱ käpelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa yika .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Iwa rä Säkekewa wakei bitäju ̱ té ka ̱ jöir ska a ̱ le täkii iwa ̱ sa patkäklä wà , ángel wa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i a ̱ le wà , Säkeklä kökö bulale wà , jera dulecha ̱ wa ̱ Cristo ja ̱ mi wa shki ̱ rmika ̱ ni säkätä .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Jekjepa saje tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka a ̱ ta ̱ le wa rä kolonak janakmi ijewa ra ñara mo ̱ ja ̱ rka Säkekewa ku ̱ akwa ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ . Jekäi sa ̱ se ̱ rmi del Säkekewa ra .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka je kte wà bas ñaje ̱ rtäkiwo ̱ .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Jeiräta bikökje je räle mane ke ̱ i wà je räle , el wa , ka yis shene je yuäk ji ̱ a bas ia ̱ .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas wakwa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bäi , Säkekewa díaí dämiwa ̱ rä jishtä jakbläk wa däju ̱ tuina käi .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Jekäi mika ̱ iyirke ̱ , “ Sa dami rä bäi ebä , ka ji däläna ta ” , jera sa weikane dämiwa ̱ ijewa ki ̱ ka plaa , jishtä alaklä wa bitäwa ̱ yaba ki ̱ ka ke ̱ i däwa ̱ iduäkläksa ̱ käi . Jekäi maikäi a ̱ ni ka ijewa ia ̱ je te ̱ nak ja ̱ nak .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Ata el wa , ka bas tso ̱ rä ka ̱ tuil na kuna , je díaí wa ̱ bas kukäkläwa ̱ jishtä jakbläk wa käi kuna .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas biköle rä ka ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi wa , ka ̱ piana ja ̱ mi wa . Jekäi ka saje wa rä ka ̱ tuil ja ̱ mi kuna , ka ̱ yee ja ̱ mi kuna .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ke sa kapa jishtä ditsä saka käi , ata sa ̱ se ̱ no kseka je ̱ r ta .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Iwa rä käpäk wa käpä rä tuina . Di wà je ̱ k ktäk wa je ̱ k ktä rä tuina .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Ata saje ka ̱ piana ja ̱ mi wa se ̱ no je ̱ r ta , pajielewa ̱ ji biketse etkabä wà , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà je ̱ r bata ki ̱ tiäklä ye , pajielewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkerke ̱ ksa ̱ ki ̱ ssë wà casco ye .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka Säkeklä wa ̱ sa kolone rä ikju ̱ atkäklä sa ra ye kuna , ata je rä sa ̱ wa ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ kukäkläwa ̱ .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Je ne duawa ̱ saje wa ki ̱ rä , je rä sa ̱ tso ̱ ji ̱ a kseka iräle , sa kapacha ̱ wa ̱ iräle ra , sa ̱ se ̱ naklä etkayebä iwakei ra .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ñatäkiwo ̱ a ̱ mi ji ̱ a a ̱ mi ji ̱ a , bas ñaki ̱ wäjiö ekla ekla , jishtä bas te iwe ̱ datse ̱ käi .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: El wa , sá te bas ia ̱ ishe shka ̱ bläk bas sha ̱ na wa , bas wäsikewa ̱ k Säkekewa ja ̱ mi wa , bas paruäk wa , jewa dälätsö ,

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: jewa biketsö bäi si ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ blele , ijewa te ji kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ ki ̱ ka . Jekäi bas se ̱ no ñara bitaba .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: El wa , sá te bas pake , ka shka ̱ bläk kuna wa uñak ; ka täki ta wa je ̱ r pabläk ; ja ̱ lma ̱ lewa ̱ wa ki ̱ ma ̱ k ; ditsä biköle katabläk je ̱ r bäi wà .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Tsa ̱ na , ke yi ku ̱ ji yakei ki ̱ ji wa ̱ k yakeini yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ . Ata maitjä bas ku ̱ rä , ji rä bäi ne wo ̱ ñaia ̱ , ñaebä ditsä biköle ia ̱ .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Bas ssëno a ̱ naa maitjä .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Bas ka ̱ kiö itso ̱ ye .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Ji biköle ki ̱ wekte shö . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je ne käi Säkeklä ki ̱ bas sherke ̱ iwa ̱ k Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi rä .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Ke bas ku ̱ Säkeklä wikblu wäshtawa ̱ .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Ji kjayile Säkeklä wa ̱ bata yirke ̱ ra , ke je ju ̱ aksa ̱ .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Ata ji biköle su ̱ oksa ̱ . Ibäi kuköwa ̱ .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Bas ñatso ̱ ksa ̱ ji biköle yakei saka saka shtä yika .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Säkeklä sä ssëwa ̱ k baa , je ku ̱ bas siki tewo ̱ pa kalabeksa ̱ , bas däkläksa ̱ pa ka yakei ta , wikbluje , je ̱ rikeje , yakaje , sa wakei kalabe käi , sajewa Säkekewaí Jesucristo däke ̱ ni ra .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Bas kiäk rä ji wa ̱ k bulee , je ne te je we ̱ mi rä .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: El wa , bas ka ̱ kiö sá ki ̱ ka .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Sä el wa biköle chakö ñawäjalassë wämo wà .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Säkekewa wäkata ska yie bas pake jí äyë washäk sa el wa biköle ia ̱ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Pablo irä , Silvano irä , Timoteo irä , jewa te jí yue mar Tesalónica ska tapanak Säkeklä Sa Ká ja ̱ mi Säkekewa Jesucristo ja ̱ mi jewa ia ̱ .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Säkeklä Sa Ká irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä , je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: El wa , sá kiana Säkeklä ia ̱ wekte shäk maitjä bas ki ̱ ka jishtä ishena o ̱ nak käi . Je rä bas te ji biketse damika ̱ etkabä jöikwä ta ki ̱ ka , ñakäi bas biköle ñashka ̱ li ̱ blä dami ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ka .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sá ñassäke ̱ bas tapanak eyaka eyaka Säkeklä ia ̱ wa wà , je rä bas chatkäke ̱ wa ̱ , bas te ji biketseke ̱ etkabä , bas weikarke ̱ biköle sha ̱ na ki ̱ ka , sälwi su ̱ ne shka ̱ l ssëke ̱ bas te sha ̱ na ki ̱ ka .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Je wà ijuer Säkeklä te ji wabiketseksa ̱ rä bulee si ̱ , je wà bas kianaklä däkwa ̱ Säkeklä gobiernoí ja ̱ mi . Je gobierno bata ki ̱ ka bas te ji dälässëte rä .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Säkeklä te ji we ̱ rä wämo ki ̱ ka ije te bas weikäk wa kpemi nui ki ̱ ,

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: ñakäi ite bas weikane shka ̱ l ssäk wa pakemi je ̱ räkña sá ra , bikökje Säkekewa Jesús kjayirke ̱ ka ̱ jöir skaté iángel wa täkii wa ra ,

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: yökö wäkaleka ̱ oloo na , ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna wa irä , ka je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ kuna saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús ktei baa kukäk wa irä , jewa kpäk ke ̱ i ska ra .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Jewa buka ̱ nami weikane jekjeye wà , tululeksa ̱ Säkekewa yika , itäkili baa yika ,

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: mika ̱ ije däni oloi kanakka ̱ iwa ̱ sikii wa tso ̱ wa ̱ , su ̱ nak baawa ̱ ibiketsäk wa biköle wa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ra . Jekäi bas te ibiketsaña , je rä bas te sá wa ̱ ji su ̱ le paka sá te biketsa ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Je kju ̱ ei ki ̱ ka sá ka ̱ kiäke ̱ maitjä bas ki ̱ ka , je rä saje wa Kekläí wa ̱ bas biketsäkläksa ̱ kianak jiye wata ki ̱ iwa ̱ sä kile rä käi , itäkili oloi ja ̱ mi bas wa ̱ ji bäi biketse o ̱ nak käi , ji we ̱ ji biketse etkabä wà käi , je biköle wa ̱ klä bas wa ̱ kalabe .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Je rä saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús kie oloi kanakläka ̱ bas oloi ja ̱ mi , ñaebä bas oloi kanakläka ̱ ije oloi ja ̱ mi , saje wa Kekläí irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä je ̱ r bäi shä ja ̱ mi .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Ata saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo däke ̱ ni , ñakäi sä rä tapanakwa ̱ ije wäja ̱ mi , je pake mar sá te . Je ki ̱ ka sá te el wa bas ia ̱ ishe :

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: ke bas ñajawa ̱ ji biketsanak bas wa ̱ jäkwa ̱ tjabana , ke bas male ̱ te ̱ nakwa ̱ jile wikblu wa ̱ iräle , kte wa ̱ iräle , äyë juer ta sá wa ̱ yöle käi ssërta Säkekewa díaí dewa ̱ kja irä käi wa ̱ iräle .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Ke bas ñama ̱ yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ wäyönak ji a ̱ ni wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka je díaí däwa ̱ ba yika säkätä sa ̱ ñajämika ̱ Säkeklä dokoitsäkwa ̱ , ñakäi ekla ka ka ̱ wei dälätsäk kuna , ale bitele weikanakwa ̱ , je dämiwa ̱ .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Ji biköle kinak Säkeklä ye wa ra , ji rä dälätsalewa ̱ wa ra ikju ̱ atkämi , ije ̱ k ssämi ijewa tsa ̱ ta , je ̱ tkäkwa ̱ Säkeklä Templo na je ̱ k shäk Säkeklä ye kje .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Yis katke ji ̱ a bas da ra , yis te je sha bas ia ̱ , ¿ je ka ju ̱ ñer ji ̱ a bas wa ̱ na ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Jekäi bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jira ji te je wätkewe ̱ kate käi , je rä idäkläwa ̱ bikökje ike ̱ i dewa ̱ idäkläwa ̱ ra .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Iwa rä je ka ka ̱ wei dälätsäk kuna ktei blelewa ̱ wao ̱ rte kja . Ata jira iwätkewa ̱ k kate te iwätkewe ̱ mi ji ̱ a , ma rä je iwätkewa ̱ k tse ̱ na ju ̱ nami kje .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Je ne kjepa je ka ka ̱ wei dälätsäk kuna dämiwa ̱ rä . Ata Säkekewa Jesús te ije ktemiwa ̱ iwakei si ̱ we ̱ i wà wäkju ̱ le , weikemiwa ̱ ite idaju ̱ juerke ̱ wà .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Je ka ka ̱ wei dälätsäk kuna dämiwa ̱ rä Satanás te ji we ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi , ji wá ̱ ta täkii , ji kjashä ta ijuenaklä ye , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ wá ̱ ta sä wäyuäklä ,

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: sä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ wa wäyuemi ite ji biköle yakei wà , ka ijewa wa ̱ ji rä iyina kolone shka ̱ li ̱ blenak itsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Säkeklä te iwäyuäklä patkemi ijewa wa ̱ ka ̱ yue kukäklä kte si ̱ ye ,

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: je rä biköle ji rä iyina ka kukäk kuna kte si ̱ ye , ata wäbätsäk ji yakei wà wa buka ̱ naklä .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Ata sá kiana wekte shäk del Säkeklä ia ̱ bas sá el wa shka ̱ ta Säkekewa wa ̱ jewa ki ̱ ka , je rä Säkeklä te bas kuka säkätä skaté tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ iwikblu te sä siki tewe ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi , ñakäi ji rä iyina si ̱ biketse ki ̱ ka .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Je ne ye ite bas kia kte baa wapautäle sá wa ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi , je wà bas oloi ka ̱ nakläka ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo rä oloi kaleka ̱ käi .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka el wa , bas chatköwa ̱ därërë , sá wa ̱ bas dulale kte wà käi äyë wà käi je kuköwa ̱ därërë .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Jekäi saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo irä Säkeklä saje wa Káí ale sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bläk , sa ̱ ia ̱ je ̱ r pablene jekjeye irä ji baa ki ̱ ssënak irä ma ̱ k ije ̱ r bäi shä ki ̱ ka ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: je wakei ku ̱ bas je ̱ r pablewo ̱ pa , bas je ̱ r täkiwo ̱ pa , ji biköle bäi wa ̱ klä shäklä bas wa ̱ .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Ibata ska ra , el wa , bas ka ̱ kiö sá ki ̱ ka Säkekewa ktei minaklämi mane mane , ñakäi ioloi kanakläka ̱ , jishtä io ̱ na bas sha ̱ na käi ,

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: ñakäi sá wetsanakläksa ̱ ditsä sälwii yakei shtä wa yika . Iwa rä biköle rä ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Ata Säkekewa rä ji wa ̱ k bulee , je ne te bas jäklemiwa ̱ därërë , bas kjänanemi ale yakei yika rä .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Sá te ibiketse Säkekewa ki ̱ ka , jini sá te bas paka iwa ̱ k käi , je we ̱ te bas te , je we ̱ mi ji ̱ a bas te .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Säkekewa ku ̱ bas wäsikewo ̱ pa bas je ̱ r ska sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bläk Säkeklä käi , ji katabläk je ̱ r baa wà Cristo käi .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Jeiräta el wa , sá te bas pake Säkekewa Jesucristo kie ja ̱ mi : Bas ñabutsö tulöksa ̱ biköle sa el wa ka ji wa ̱ k kuna shtä yika , ka se ̱ nak kuna sá te bas dulawa ̱ ja ̱ mi je shtä wa yika .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Ñera bas wakwa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jishtä käi bas kiana sá mabläk rä . Iwa rä ka sá se ̱ ne bas sha ̱ na ka ji o ̱ le ta käi ,

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: ka sá wa ̱ yi a ̱ ni jile ñane kjermita . Ata sá shka ̱ bla ta ̱ i , sá ji wá ̱ jaree ka ̱ piana tuina , je rä ka sá wa ̱ bas mane a ̱ ni ki ̱ ji ja ̱ wa ̱ kläka ̱ därërë .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Ka je rä ka sá wa ̱ ka ̱ wei kuna ji kiäklä käi kuna , ata je rä sá wa ̱ ji wa ̱ klä bas wäna bas wa ̱ mablenak ye .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Jekäi sá kajali ji ̱ a bas da ra , sá te bas pakta jí kte wà : Yi ka kiane shka ̱ bläk ra , ke je yaka .

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sá te issa bas manele dami rä ka ji a ̱ ni wa ̱ k kuna , ka shka ̱ bläk kuna , je ̱ k patkäk kju ̱ awa ji o ̱ rke ̱ na .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sá te je shtä wa pake , sá te je shtä wa ia ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ Säkekewa Jesucristo ja ̱ mi bitaba shka ̱ bläk iwakwa ji ñaklä .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: El wa , ke bas shtirinak ji bäi wa ̱ k .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Ikuna manele te ji sha sá te yöle jí äyë ki ̱ ka ka ssë ra , je wakei kjashöwa ̱ , je yika bas ñabutsö tulöksa ̱ , iäinakläwa ̱ ye .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Jeiräta ke ikukawa ̱ sä bolki käi ata iparuö tsa ̱ na sä el käi .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Säkekewa sä ssëwa ̱ k baa , je ku ̱ bas ssëwo ̱ pa baa maitjä ji biköle ska . Säkekewa ku ̱ bas biköle wapeblöpa .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Ji bas chakäklämi yöle rä yis Pablo wa ̱ ' swakei jula wà . Bena yis äyë yuä ska yie iyue rä jekäi , ijuenaklä yis ne te iyua rä . Jekäi yis äyë yuä rä .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas biköle ia ̱ .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Pablo Cristo Jesús ktei bata shäk , Säkeklä saje wa tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ irä Cristo Jesús sa ̱ wa ̱ biketsanak irä je wa ̱ ipakale jekäi iwa ̱ k ki ̱ ka ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: je te jí yue mar Timoteo ba yis yaba si ̱ käi ji biketse etkabä ja ̱ mi je ia ̱ . Säkeklä Sa Ká irä , sajewa Säkekewaí Cristo Jesús irä je ̱ r ssënopa bäi ba ra , je ̱ r bäi shöpa ba ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ ma je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Jishtä yis kjana ba ra mika ̱ yis mineju ̱ mi Macedonia ska ra , jekäi wë ma a ̱ ta ̱ na ji ̱ a Éfeso ska , je rä ka ba wa ̱ manele pakäklä kuna sä paktäk ji kju ̱ awa wà ,

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: ka ijewa wa ̱ kje ka ̱ pake ka wata käi , sa bakle mikle wa kie yöle tso ̱ chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ pake käi , je ssäklä kuna . Je te sä ktewe ̱ ke ̱ ebä , je ia ̱ ka sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkenak Säkeklä cha kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k , ata je we ̱ rä ji biketse etkabä wà .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Ata jekäi bas pakana , je rä sa ̱ ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläklä iyina si ̱ , je ̱ r ssële ka nui ta käi , ji biketsale etkabä ka ime ̱ i ye kuna .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Ata manele te je jawa ̱ minemi kte ka wata pake ja ̱ mi .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Ijewa ssërke ̱ däkwa ̱ ka ̱ wei wà sä yuäk wa ye . Ata ji pakeke ̱ ijewa te , ji wapakteke ̱ ijewa te kte si ̱ käi , ka je wa ̱ iwakwa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne a ̱ ni .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Ata sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je ka ̱ wei rä bäi , ikuna sa te iwawá ̱ bulee ra .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Jikäi sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , ka ka ̱ wei me ̱ le rä sä wämo wa ia ̱ kuna , ata je me ̱ le rä ka ka ̱ wei dälätsäk kuna wa ia ̱ , ka sä ktä ssäk kuna wa ia ̱ , ka sä bäi kuna wa ia ̱ , ji yakei wakbläk wa ia ̱ , ka ji dälätsäk kuna wa ia ̱ , ji shi ̱ ana wa ̱ k wa ia ̱ , sa ká ktäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ , sa ̱ a ̱ mi ktäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ , sä ktäk wa ia ̱ ,

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: ka ̱ wakblewa ̱ k wa ia ̱ , jäiyi wa se ̱ r jäiyi wa ra wa ia ̱ , sa jakibläk wato ̱ nak wa ia ̱ , ka ̱ yuelbi wa ia ̱ , ka ̱ yue wà ji shäk Säkeklä wäkata ska wa ia ̱ , sa pautäle bäi ukä ja ̱ mi jile saka wa ̱ k wa ia ̱ ,

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: jishtä kte baa me ̱ le Säkeklä baawa ̱ si ̱ wa ̱ yis ia ̱ rä käi .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Yis je ̱ r ssëna baa sajewa Säkekewaí Cristo Jesús ale yis täkiwa ̱ k ra . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije te yis biketsa chatkelewa ̱ bäi , je ki ̱ ka ite yis tkawa ̱ ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ye .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
