text2: Mikle ra yis dä Jesús shäk yakei , iweikäk , ija ̱ ñetsäk . Ata ije je ̱ r bäi sha yis ia ̱ , ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie je wá ̱ rä ka yis dä je ̱ r ko ̱ le kuna ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna ki ̱ ka .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ata saje wa Säkekewaí je ̱ r bäi shä deksa ̱ yis ia ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi ji biketse etkabä irä , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble irä tso ̱ , jera ñara .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Jí kte rä bulee , kianak kinakwa ̱ biköle wa ̱ . Je rä Cristo Jesús deju ̱ ka ̱ jiska ji yakei wakbläk wa tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ . Jewa sha ̱ na yis ne rä ie ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ rä .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Ata ji ne bata ki ̱ ka Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha yis ia ̱ . Je rä Jesucristo wa ̱ yis ie ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ja ̱ mi ikjashäklä bikö ite sa katableke ̱ rä käi . Je rä je juenaklä yi te ije biketsemi ji ̱ a ise ̱ naklä jekjeye jewa biköle wäna .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä bakle Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ka duäk kuna , ka juenak kuna , je rä Säkeklä eklabä , je oloitsanopa je oloi kanoka ̱ pa sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi . ¡ Amén !

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Yaba Timoteo , yie ba ia ̱ jí ka ̱ wei me ̱ ta ̱ na jiräni ba bata yile kja je ja ̱ mi , ma ñakpö guardia wa ñakpäk bäi käi ,

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: ji biketsale etkabä bäi si ̱ , ka ji o ̱ le ta sä ssëwa ̱ k nui ta käi . Ata moska te je ju ̱ aksa ̱ . Jekäi iwäitäbinacha ̱ wa ̱ ji biketse etkabä ska .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Jewa sha ̱ na itso ̱ rä Himeneo irä , Alejandro irä . Jewa tulaksa ̱ yie Satanás ia ̱ , ijewa dulanaklä ka ktäk kuna yakei Säkeklä ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Säkätä yie ba ia ̱ ishe : sa kiana ka ̱ kiäk , Säkeklä payuläk , sä ktei shäk , wekte shäk Säkeklä ia ̱ ditsä biköle ki ̱ ka ,

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa irä biköle tso ̱ sä wäkiri ye wa irä ki ̱ ka , sa ̱ se ̱ naklä bitaba ka weikale ta , wämo , dälätsalewa ̱ .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Jekäi ne rä bäi rä , je ne wà Säkeklä Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ wäbätsä rä .

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Je ki ̱ ditsä biköle shena tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ , ñakäi je ̱ r ko ̱ nak ji rä iyina si ̱ ia ̱ .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä rä eklabä . Ñakäi Säkeklä ktei shäk ditsä ia ̱ , ditsä ktei shäk Säkeklä ia ̱ je rä eklabä . Je rä ale ditsä ekla Cristo Jesús ,

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: ale je ̱ k ju ̱ leksa ̱ biköle tsa ̱ tju ̱ ak ju ̱ ami , ijuenaklä ye ike ̱ i dewa ̱ bulee ra .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Je ne ktei waje ̱ rku ̱ ak ye , je ne ktei shäk ye yis kolole rä , ñakäi ka Judío kuna wa paktäk ji biketse etkabä wà ji rä iyina si ̱ wà . Je rä yis ktä si ̱ , ka yis ka ̱ yuä kuna .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Jekäi yis ki ̱ ka ̱ biköle ska jäiyi wa shena rä jula jäkläkka ̱ sikina ka ̱ kiäk , ka kju ̱ atkelewa ̱ ta ka kteleka ̱ ta ji wa ̱ .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Je su ̱ ta yis ki ̱ alaklä wa shena rä je ̱ k pajiäk tsa ̱ na ka äi ta käi , ka ̱ biketse bäi ta tsa ̱ na käi , ka tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä buträk käi , ka je ̱ k ki ̱ tkäk oro wà käi , perla wà käi , sua to ̱ nak därërë wà käi ,

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: ata je ̱ k ki ̱ tkäk ji we ̱ bäi wà , jishtä alaklä wa je ̱ k shäk Säkeklä oloitsäk ni wa kiana iwa ̱ k käi .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Alaklä wa kiana ipauta ̱ nake ̱ ssäk bitaba , je ̱ k jalewa ̱ bäi si ̱ .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Ka yis te ka ̱ me ̱ alaklä wa ia ̱ sa paktäklä iräle , jäiyi wa patkäklä iräle . Ata ikiana kätkäk bitaba .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Adán ne yönaksa ̱ säkätäba rä , je ne kjepa Eva rä .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Jekäi ka Adán wäyönewa ̱ . Ata alaklä ne wäyönawa ̱ ianawa ̱ shirinakwa ̱ rä .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Ata alaklä wa tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ yabala su ̱ e oloi ja ̱ mi , ikuna ichatkawa ̱ ji biketse etkabä ja ̱ mi , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ja ̱ mi , ji wämo ja ̱ mi , ka ̱ biketse bäi ja ̱ mi ra .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Jí kte rä bulee , yi ssërke ̱ däkwa ̱ sä wäsikewa ̱ k ye ra , jera je je ̱ r ssëna rä ji bäi kja ̱ nei we ̱ ne te .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Je sä wäsikewa ̱ k kiana se ̱ nak rä ka palei ta , alaklä ta eklabä , ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na , ka ̱ biketsä ta , dälätsale ditsä wa ̱ , sä kiäkwa ̱ je ̱ r baa wà , wädular sa paktäk ,

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: ka se ̱ nak diyëë kuna , ka sälwii kuna , ata se ̱ nak bitaba , ka kju ̱ atkäk kuna , ka inaklä ki ̱ biketsäk kuna ,

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: iju ska tso ̱ wa wäsikewa ̱ k bäi , iyabala dulawa ̱ k iktä ssäk dälätsale ji biköle ska .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Ata ka ije ia ̱ iwakei ju ska tso ̱ wa wäsika ̱ nak ra , ¿ jera maikäi je ia ̱ tapanak Säkeklä ia ̱ wa wäsika ̱ nermi na ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka irä delewa ̱ spa ̱ na ra ka ikiar däkwa ̱ sä wäkiri ye , je rä ka ije ̱ k ssäkläka ̱ kuna , je wà ikolonakläwa ̱ buka ̱ nak be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i käi .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Ñakäi ije kiana palei yile bäi ka delewa ̱ kuna wa wa ̱ , je wà ka iyinakläka ̱ kuna ikolonakläwa ̱ be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ sä kukäkläwa ̱ wà .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Je su ̱ ta sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk wa kiana se ̱ nak rä dälätsalewa ̱ käi , ktäk etkabä käi , ka vino yäk kuna ta ̱ i käi , ka wäbätsäk kuna sä wäyuäk jile wà sa ̱ ia ̱ inaklä däkläksa ̱ pa käi ,

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: ji biketse etkabä ktei blelewa ̱ wawa ̱ k je ̱ r ssële ka nui ta käi .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Ata säkätä ijewa kiana rä mablenak su ̱ nak . Jeska ideksa ̱ ka she ta ra , ikiarmi däkwa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk wa ye .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Ijewa alaklä wa kiana se ̱ nak dälätsalewa ̱ käi , ka sa saka ki ̱ yuäk kuna , ata ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na , ji biköle wa ̱ k bäi ebä .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk wa kiana rä alaklä ta eklabä , iyabala irä iju ska tso ̱ wa irä jewa wäsikewa ̱ k bäi .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk wa te ikja ̱ nei wá ̱ bäi ra , ijewa dälätsarmi , ñakäi ijewa ssërmi täkii Cristo Jesús biketsäk .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Yie ibiketsa minak plaa ba wäki ̱ . Ata yie jí yue kate ,

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: je rä ikuna yis wätkenawa ̱ ji ̱ a ra , ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñaklä maikäi se ̱ ne Säkeklä ju ska wa sha ̱ na rä käi . Jewa rä tapanak Säkeklä se ̱ nak kseka wakei ia ̱ wa , ju kläkata ye ju ñak wäkukäk ye ji rä iyina si ̱ wäkukäk .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Saje wa te ibiketse ra , ji wämo ktei blelewa ̱ rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ , je rä : Ije ne kjayina yaka ta , sha bäi Säkeklä wikblu te , su ̱ a ángel wa te , ktei wapauta ̱ na ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa sha ̱ na , biketsana ka ̱ jiska , mineka ̱ tse ̱ ka ̱ baawa ̱ si ̱ ska .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Säkeklä wikblu te ishe bulee sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata je kje ra , manele te sa ̱ wa ̱ ji biketsanak etkabä jemiwa ̱ ta ̱ na , iwa ̱ wikblu sä wäyuäk wa irä be wa ̱ sa paktäklä irä je ssäklä ,

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: wäyölewa ̱ ka ̱ yuäk wa te ji we ̱ ke ̱ su ̱ nak ebä wa ̱ . Ijewa je ̱ r dä shki ̱ malewa ̱ ia ̱ ka ji a ̱ ni ssër kuna ji ̱ a yakei .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Ka jewa te ka ̱ me ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ naklä alaklä wa ra , ka jewa te sa pake jile ñak jile kätäk . Ata Säkeklä wa ̱ je yöleksa ̱ rä ñanak kata ̱ nak , wekte yinaklä iia ̱ , ji biketsäk etkabä wa wa ̱ , kte si ̱ ju ̱ ñak wa wa ̱ .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Iwa rä ji biköle yöleksa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ , je rä bäi ebä . Ka ji a ̱ ni kiar ju ̱ nakksa ̱ kuna , sa ̱ ia ̱ ideksa ̱ ki ̱ sa te wekte sha ra .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je rä siki tele Säkeklä ktä wà irä , ka ̱ kie wà irä ki ̱ ka .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Ikuna ba te je wà sä el wa pakta ra , ba rä Jesucristo kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k bäi , kibileka ̱ ji biketse etkabä ktei ja ̱ mi , ba pautäle bäi kolole ma wa ̱ je ktei ja ̱ mi .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Ata ka ̱ pake shi ̱ ana käi , sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ le wa wa ̱ pakanak shtä käi , tulöksa ̱ ba ku ̱ . Ata ba je ̱ k dulawo ̱ ji rä wämo ia ̱ .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ je ̱ k dulawa ̱ yaka jälewa ̱ k ra , je kiar dä elkje bä . Ata ji wämo rä kianak ji biköle ska . Je wà ji dämiksa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ , jí sa ̱ se ̱ r dami ska irä , sa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a ska irä .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Je kte rä bulee , je rä kianak kinakwa ̱ biköle wa ̱ .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Je ne bata ki ̱ ka sá shka ̱ bläke ̱ ta ̱ i sá chicharke ̱ därërë rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sá je ̱ r bläke ̱ Säkeklä se ̱ nak kseka ja ̱ mi . Je ne rä ditsä biköle tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ rä , bäi si ̱ rä ibiketsäk wa ne tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Sa pakö je wa ̱ k , sa paktö je wà .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Ka ba däba säkenawa ̱ bäi käi ki ̱ , ke yi a ̱ ni ku ̱ ba kuköwa ̱ pa diekjela , ata ma se ̱ no Jesús biketsäk wa wa ̱ mablenak ; kte ska käi , ji we ̱ ska käi , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ska käi , ji biketse etkabä ska käi , ji wämo ska käi .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Ka yis dämiba dälei ja ̱ mi , ma je ̱ k tso ̱ ksa ̱ kte yöle washäk , sa paktäk , sa ̱ je ̱ rku ̱ ak .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Ji täkili tso ̱ ma wa ̱ , me ̱ le ma ia ̱ sä wäkiri wa te ji bata sha oloi ja ̱ mi , jula me ̱ leka ̱ wà , ke je weikawa ̱ ba ku ̱ .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Je kalabe wawo ̱ ba ku ̱ , je ja ̱ mi ba chatköwa ̱ , biköle wa ̱ ba ji wá ̱ marka ̱ ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta su ̱ aklä .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Ma je ̱ k su ̱ o tsa ̱ na jishtä ba dami rä käi , jishtä ba te sa pakte rä käi , je ja ̱ mi ba chatköwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je wá ̱ ba te ra , ma je ̱ k tsa ̱ tkämiksa ̱ , ñakäi bä ktä ssäk wa tsa ̱ tkemiksa ̱ ba te .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Ka ba te säkekewa shtä uñe kuna täkili wà , ata iparuö tsa ̱ na , jishtä sa ká wa ia ̱ ji she käi , ñaebä dulaklei wa ia ̱ ji shö jishtä sä el wa ia ̱ ji she käi .

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: Sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ le wa ia ̱ ji shö jishtä sa ̱ a ̱ mi ia ̱ ji she käi , ñaebä busi wa ia ̱ ji shö jishtä sä kuta wa ia ̱ ji she käi , je ̱ rike wämo wà .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Alaklä wa chichö wa si ̱ shtä wa tsa ̱ tkö .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Ata ikuna chichö wa manele rä yabala ta iräle , mikö wata iräle ra , säkätä jewa ne kiana dulanak iwakwa ju ska tso ̱ wa ia ̱ ji bäi wa ̱ k rä , ñakäi iká wa tsa ̱ tkäk nui ki ̱ rä , je käi ne rä baa si ̱ Säkeklä wäna rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Jekäi alaklä wa chichö wa si ̱ a ̱ ta ̱ leta ̱ na eklabä , je je ̱ r bläke ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä ebä ja ̱ mi , je chatkäke ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä payuläk irä ka ̱ kiäk irä ka ̱ piana tuina .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Ata chichö wa je ̱ k ju ̱ akksa ̱ ji tkerke ̱ ija ̱ mi ebä ia ̱ , je rä dulewa ̱ kja käi ikatke ji ̱ a kseka ra .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Jekäi ijewa pakö je wa ̱ k , ka ijewa yinaklä kuna .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Ata ikuna yi wa ̱ ka iwakei saka wa käi , bäi si ̱ ra iwakei ju ska tso ̱ wa käi tsa ̱ tkene ra , je te rä sa te ji biketse etkabä ne dokoitsawa ̱ ; je rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna wa tsa ̱ ta .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Jekäi alaklä wa chichö sesenta año jöikwä ta se ̱ le jäiyi eklabä ra , je shtä ebä ne kiarke ̱ kie yönak itsa ̱ tkäklä rä ;

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: ñakäi palei ta ji bäi wa ̱ k : yabala kibile iwa ̱ käi , sä kilewa ̱ iwa ̱ je ̱ r bäi wà käi , sä sikii wa klä pasukle iwa ̱ käi , sä weikale wa tsa ̱ tkele iwa ̱ käi , ji biköle bäi ebä o ̱ le iwa ̱ käi .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Ata ke ka ̱ ma ̱ k chichö wa busi ji ̱ a wa ia ̱ kie yönaklä . Iwa rä ji tkermi ijewa ja ̱ mi pjoo ra , ijewa te Cristo jemiwa ̱ , je ̱ r ssërmi se ̱ nakwa ̱ ,

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: je wà ite nui kiemika ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ ka , ikablele säkätä wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ ite kju ̱ ei .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Ñakäi ije ̱ k dulawa ̱ ke ̱ ka ji wa ̱ k kuna , shkäk ju etkä ju etkä . Ka irä iñadulawa ̱ ke ̱ ka ji wa ̱ k ebä kuna , ata biyö bläk , je ̱ k patkäk ji kju ̱ awa sha ̱ naka , ji ka kiar yinak ebä shäk .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ki ̱ ishena rä chichö wa busi ji ̱ a wa se ̱ rwa ̱ ni , ñakäi yabala su ̱ ak , iju ska wa wäsikewa ̱ k bäi , ka ka ̱ ma ̱ k sä bolki ia ̱ ji ki ̱ sä shäklä .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , moska ñabutsa tulami kja minakni Satanás ja ̱ mi .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Jekäi ikuna alaklä manele Jesús biketsäk rä yështä ta chichö wa ra , je kiana ijewa tsa ̱ tkäk , ka je ja ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ tapanak wa ki ̱ ka . Je rä ijewa wa ̱ chichö si ̱ wa tsa ̱ tkäklä bäi .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Sä wäkiri wa rä sä wäsikewa ̱ k bäi ra , jewa rä tsa ̱ tkenak shka ̱ ja ̱ si ̱ , ata bäi si ̱ ra rä manele shka ̱ bläk därërë kte shäk käi , sa paktäk käi .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Iwa rä iyöle te ishe rä : “ Ke buey ia ̱ ikjä pamu ̱ aklä jiaka ̱ isika ̱ nake ̱ trigo wä butsäk ra . ” Etkä rä : “ Shka ̱ bläk wa rä to ̱ nak . ”

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Sä wäkiri wa ekla kjaterke ̱ ra , ke je ssa , ka je yine isu ̱ ak wa bol iräle mañal iräle wa ̱ ra .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Ata jewa manele te ji yakei wakbleke ̱ ra , ijewa uño biköle wäna , je wà isaka wäsuanaklä .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Yis te ba pake tsa ̱ na Säkeklä irä , Säkekewa Jesucristo irä , ángel wa kolole iwakei ia ̱ wa wäkata ska , je wawa ̱ k ñakjee biköle ia ̱ , ka ji wa ̱ k ekla ia ̱ kju ̱ awa iel ia ̱ kju ̱ awa käi kuna .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Ke bä jula ma ̱ ka ̱ yilé ki ̱ ka plaa ikukäkwa ̱ sä wäkiri ye , je rä ije te ji yakei wakbla ra , ka je nui ja ̱ nakläka ̱ ña ba ki ̱ ka . Ma je ̱ k tso ̱ ksa ̱ se ̱ nak wämo .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Ke diklä ebä ya . Ata ba te vino ye elkje bä ña dälärke ̱ ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ba duäke ̱ ka ̱ raa ki ̱ ka .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Manele te ji yakei wakbleke ̱ juer dä tjabana ka iktei wabiketsarksa ̱ ba yika . Ata manele te iwe ̱ ke ̱ juer dä je ̱ na je ̱ napa .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Je su ̱ ta ji bäi o ̱ rke ̱ rä juenakwa ̱ tjabana . Ata ka ijuenewa ̱ ra , del ka je blenakwa ̱ .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Kololewa ̱ kjanaklä ye wa ku ̱ ibiketsö iwakwa blui wa kiana rä dälätsanak ji biköle ska . Je rä ka Säkeklä kie irä kte wapauta ̱ nak irä je yinaklä kuna kte yakei wà .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Yi rä blui ta Jesús biketsäk ra , ka ijewa kiar iblui wa kukäkwa ̱ diekjela irä sä el wa ki ̱ ka . Ata ikiana rä ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ki ̱ ta , je rä iblui tsa ̱ tkenak iwa ̱ bäi shka ̱ ble wà rä Jesús biketsäk ki ̱ ka , shka ̱ ta iwa ̱ ki ̱ ka . Je kte wapaktö ; ijewa pakö je wa ̱ k .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Ikuna yilé te sa pakteke ̱ kte kju ̱ awa wà , ka saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo wa ̱ ji bäi yile ssëta kuna ra , ka sä pautäle wämo ssëta kuna ra ,

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: je rä ijewa ñassäke ̱ ebä , ata ji a ̱ ni ka ju ̱ ñer ijewa wa ̱ . Ata ijewa kteche ̱ rawa ̱ rä kje kte ka wata te , kju ̱ atke kte ki ̱ ka te . Je shtä te sä ssëwe ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ ñaianak käi , kjätenak ñara käi , sa saka shäk yakei käi , ñabiketsäk yakei käi ,

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: ñawätji ̱ wa ̱ k del käi . Je shtä wa rä je ̱ rike yakei telewa ̱ , ka iwa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ji rä iyina si ̱ räle . Jewa te ibiketse ji wämo kiar dä sä blunaklä .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra ji wämo tso ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ ssëne a ̱ naa ra ñara , jera je ne rä blune ta ̱ i rä .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ji a ̱ ni dene kuna ka ̱ jiska . Jekäi ka sa ̱ ia ̱ ji a ̱ ni minak tse ̱ mi kuna .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ñanak irä je ̱ k pajiäklä irä tso ̱ ra , je ebä te sä ssëwe ̱ mi a ̱ naa .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Ata yi ssëna blunak ra , je wäbuta ̱ namiwa ̱ , kolormiwa ̱ jishtä ja ̱ ma te jile kuke käi , ñakäi ji ka wata ji däläna tkermi ija ̱ mi ta ̱ i ; je shtä te sä wäitäbiewa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ itjäwa ̱ .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , inaklä shka ̱ li ̱ ble ne rä ji biköle yakei ñak rä . Jekäi je tkena manele ja ̱ mi , je kju ̱ ei ijewa te sa ̱ wa ̱ ji biketsanak etkabä jawa ̱ ta ̱ na . Je wà iwakwa te je ̱ r ia ̱ ne ta ̱ i kiaka ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Ata ba chatkelewa ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi , je ku ̱ je shtä wa cho ̱ . Ata ba shkö ji wämo itä ki ̱ , ji bäi käi , ji biketse etkabä käi , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble käi , ji katable käi , se ̱ ne bitaba käi , je itä ki ̱ .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Ñakpe bäi ji biketse etkabä kju ̱ ei , je wà ma ñakpö . Se ̱ ne jekjeye kuköwa ̱ därërë . Je ne ye ba kile rä , je ne ktei sha ba te , ba te ji bäi ktei sha ma su ̱ ak chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa wäkata ska ra rä .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Säkeklä ji biköle ia ̱ se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ k je wäkata ska , ñakäi Cristo Jesús ale ji ktei yinak bäi shäkka ̱ Poncio Pilato ia ̱ je wäkata ska yie ba pake ,

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: je ma ia ̱ iyileta ̱ na wawa ̱ k , ka yakei tele ta kuna , ka yile ta kju ̱ awa wa ̱ kuna , sajewa Säkekewaí Jesucristo juenani kje .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Ike ̱ i dewa ̱ ra , je kjashemi ale eklabä baawa ̱ si ̱ biköle tsa ̱ ta te , ale sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa je Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , sä säkekewaí wa je Säkekewaí te ,

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: ale eklabä ka duäk kuna , se ̱ nak ka ̱ oloo ka sä däwa ̱ kuna je ja ̱ rka te , ale ka su ̱ le kuna yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ , ñakäi mane a ̱ ni ka wä däkwa ̱ isu ̱ ak te . Ije dälätsanopa , je se ̱ nopa ji ̱ a oloi ta ta ̱ i jekjeyemi . Amén .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Jira blu wa tso ̱ pakö ka je ̱ k ssäk kuna , blune medäkwa ̱ shtä ka biketsäk kuna . Ata ipakö Säkeklä ale ji biköle ma ̱ k sa ̱ ia ̱ bakleka ̱ sä ssënaklä baa je ja ̱ mi je ̱ r bläk ,

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: ji wa ̱ k bäi , blunakka ̱ ji we ̱ bäi wà , ji ma ̱ k ta ̱ i ka kjele ta .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Jekäi ra ijewa te ji säkei ta ta ̱ i blemi iwakwa ia ̱ kianak je ̱ nanapa . Je rä ijewa wa ̱ se ̱ ne kseka si ̱ kukäkläwa ̱ pa .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: Timoteo rikä , ji ju ̱ leta ̱ na ba ia ̱ je wawo ̱ tsa ̱ na , je ̱ k butsäleju ̱ mi kte shi ̱ ana ka wata pake yika , sa ̱ ñakju ̱ atkewa ̱ klä kinak ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe ni yika .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Manele te je ktei kukawa ̱ , je wà ijewa te ji biketse etkabä jawa ̱ . Je ̱ r bäi yinopa bas ia ̱ .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Pablo , Cristo Jesús ktei bata shäk Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena jekäi ki ̱ ka , ikablele se ̱ ne kseka tso ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi ma ̱ k kju ̱ ei .

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Je te jí yue mar ba Timoteo yis yaba shka ̱ ta je ia ̱ . Säkeklä Sa Ká irä , saje wa Säkekewaí Cristo Jesús irä je ̱ r ssënopa bäi ba ra , jewa je ̱ r bäi shöpa ba ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ ma je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Säkeklä yis wa ̱ kja ̱ nei o ̱ nak je ̱ r ssële ka nui ta käi wà , jishtä yis yika bakle wa te iwá ̱ käi , je ia ̱ yis te wekte she yis te ba ktei sheke ̱ yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ka jalewa ̱ ta ka ̱ piana tuina ra .

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Yis je ̱ r ja ̱ rke ̱ ba ji ̱ ele ska ra , yis ia ̱ issër yis me ba su ̱ awa ̱ ni käi , yis ssënaklä a ̱ naa .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Yis je ̱ r ja ̱ rke ̱ jishtä ba te ji biketse etkabä rä ka kje ime ̱ i ye kuna jeska . Je rä jishtä säkätä ma mikö Loida irä ma a ̱ mi Eunice irä te ji biketsa etkabä käi . Yie ibiketse iyina si ̱ ba te ji biketseke ̱ etkabä jekäi ñaebä .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yie ba je ̱ r ja ̱ we ̱ yis jula ma ̱ ka ̱ ba ki ̱ ka wà Säkeklä wa ̱ ba ia ̱ ji täkili me ̱ le , je wäkpöka ̱ ba ku ̱ yökö wäkpeka ̱ käi .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä wa ̱ ka sa ̱ ia ̱ wikblu sa pakäk suanak shtä me ̱ ne , ata ite sa ̱ ia ̱ wikblu sä täkiwa ̱ k , sä ssëwa ̱ k ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk , sä ssëwa ̱ k ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na shtä ne ma ̱ .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ke bä äina saje wa Säkekewaí ktei shäk , ñakäi yis ije kju ̱ ei wätenak je ki ̱ ka . Ata bäi si ̱ ra weikane katablöña yis da Säkeklä täkili oloi ja ̱ mi kte baa bata ki ̱ ka .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Je wakei te sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkaksa ̱ , sa kia ji wämo wa ̱ k , ka je rä sä wakwa te ji wá ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä ji wabiketsaleksa ̱ iwakei wa ̱ ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ije je ̱ r bäi sha sa ̱ ia ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi sa ̱ ke ̱ i bakle biköle yikaba ki ̱ ka .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: Ata jira je kjayina Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ Cristo Jesús juena wà . Je te duewa ̱ wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ . Jekäi ite se ̱ ne kseka irä ka tjabanewa ̱ kuna irä jaksa ̱ ka ̱ oloika , kte baa oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Jekäi yis kolole rä je waje ̱ rku ̱ ak ye , je bata shäk ye , je wapaktäk ye .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Je ne bata ki ̱ ka jikäi yie ji dälässë kate rä , ata ka je ia ̱ yis äinak . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yi biketsa yis te rä käi . Ñaebä yie ibiketse iyina si ̱ ije rä täkili ta ji ju ̱ leta ̱ na yis ia ̱ je kjänanak je díaí dewa ̱ kje .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Kte bäi ka duëi ta ssële ba wa ̱ yis ja ̱ mi je kuköwa ̱ ji ̱ a , ji biketsale etkabä , ñashka ̱ li ̱ blele Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Ji bäi ju ̱ leta ̱ na ba ia ̱ je kjänano Wikblu Sikina se ̱ nak saje wa ja ̱ mi je oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer kja Asia ska wa biköle te yis jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , jewa sha ̱ rä Figelo irä Hermógenes irä .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Säkekewa je ̱ r bäi shöpa Onesíforo ju ska tso ̱ wa ia ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je te yis je ̱ r täkiwa ̱ ka ̱ raa , ka iäine yis wätelewa ̱ cadena wà ki ̱ ka .

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: Jekäi ideju ̱ Roma ska ra , ite yis yula ta ̱ i , je ne kjepa ite yis ku ̱ a rä .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Säkekewa ku ̱ ka ̱ mo ̱ pa iia ̱ Säkekewa je ̱ r bäi shäklä iia ̱ je díaí ska ra . Ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bäi bikö iwa ̱ yis tsa ̱ tkele Éfeso ska käi .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ata ba yis yaba , Cristo Jesús je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ wà ba ssëno täkii .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Ji ssële ba wa ̱ yile yis wa ̱ ma su ̱ ak wa chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wäkata ska , je shöta ̱ na manele chatkelewa ̱ bäi kianak kju ̱ awa wa paktäk wa ia ̱ .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ba ku ̱ weikane katablöña jishtä Cristo Jesús guardia bäi käi .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: Kju ̱ atke ska guardia mane a ̱ ni rä ka je ̱ k wäbuträkwa ̱ kuna ji sherke ̱ iki ̱ wà , je rä iwa ̱ ikukäk guardia ye ssëwa ̱ klä bäi .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Je su ̱ ta manele ñamabläke ̱ ine ska ra , ka je tsa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ ji tkenakka ̱ ka iinene ika ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ra .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Ka ̱ watkäk shka ̱ bläk täkii je ne kiana idäli wä kukäk säkätä rä .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Yie isheke ̱ je wabiketsö tsa ̱ na , jekäi Säkekewa te ba je ̱ r ku ̱ emi ji biköle ska .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Ba je ̱ r ja ̱ no Jesucristo ska . Ije rä shki ̱ leka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , irä David batala , jishtä kte baa yis wa ̱ pakanak te ishe käi .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Je ktei bata ki ̱ ka yis weikarte wätelewa ̱ kje , jishtä ji yakei wakbläk wa käi . Ata Säkeklä ktä rä ka wätelewa ̱ kuna .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka yis te ji biköle katableke ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ kolole wa ki ̱ ka , je wà ijewa wa ̱ tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi kukäkläwa ̱ oloi kaleka ̱ jekjeye .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Ji kte rä bulee : Ikuna sa duawa ̱ ije ra , jera sa ̱ se ̱ rmini ije raña .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Ikuna sa te weikane katabla ra , jera sa te sa patkemi sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ije raña ; Ikuna sa te isha ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ije ju ̱ ñer ni ra , jera ñaebä ije te ishemi ka iwa ̱ sa ̱ ju ̱ ñer ni .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Ikuna sa te ijawa ̱ ra , jera maitjä ije chatkämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iwa ̱ ji biketsaleksa ̱ je ka manenaksa ̱ ni iwakei ia ̱ .

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Je wà ba ku ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ wo ̱ . Sa pakö Säkeklä wäkata ska ka kju ̱ atkäk kuna kje kte bata ki ̱ ka . Ka je kiar ji a ̱ ni ye , ata je rä issäk wa weikanacha ̱ kläwa ̱ ebä .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Ji wo ̱ tsa ̱ na si ̱ bä däkläksa ̱ bäi Säkeklä wäna , jishtä shka ̱ bläk bäi ka äinakwa ̱ ishka ̱ ble ki ̱ ka käi , ji yina si ̱ ktei wawa ̱ k bäi .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Ata kte shi ̱ ana ka wata cho ̱ ka ̱ mii . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je te ji rä ka bäi kuna wätjiwe ̱ ke ̱ jöikwä jöikwä .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Ijewa ktä jè ̱ r mar dä jishtä sa yaka tjabawa ̱ k käi . Jewa sha ̱ rä Himeneo irä Fileto irä .

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Jewa minekajulu kju ̱ awa ji rä iyina si ̱ yika . Jekäi jewa te isheke ̱ sä rä shki ̱ leka ̱ e ̱ ná kja . Je wà ijewa te ji biketsäk etkabä wa manele yakei tewe ̱ ke ̱ .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Jeiräta Säkeklä wa ̱ ju ñak wäkukäk tkelewa ̱ rä därërë . Je ja ̱ mi kte tale katke rä : “ Säkekewa wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer mane rä iwakei ia ̱ wa rä , ” ñakäi : “ Biköle Säkekewa a ̱ netsäk ikie wà wa ñabutsö tulöksa ̱ ji yakei yika . ”

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Ju ta ̱ i na jile jui yöle oro yaka wà käi , inaklä yaka wà käi , ka je ebä tso ̱ rä kuna , ata ñaebä itso ̱ yöle kal wà , u ̱ yaka wà . Je moska rä kianak jile wa ̱ klä bäi si ̱ , ata moska rä kje jile wa ̱ klä .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Jekäi ikuna sa ̱ je ̱ k butsaksa ̱ je shtä yika ra , jera sä dämiwa ̱ jile jui kianak jile wa ̱ klä bäi si ̱ shtä ye , siki tele , Sä Blui ia ̱ iwa ̱ wao ̱ nak , kianak ji bäi biköle wa ̱ klä .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Ji tkenak dulaklei wa ja ̱ mi , je cho ̱ ba ku ̱ . Ata ji wämo käi , ji biketse etkabä käi , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble käi , se ̱ ne bitaba käi , male ̱ yuö ba ku ̱ Säkekewa a ̱ netsäk je ̱ rike bulee wà wa raña .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Ata kje sä ktewe ̱ ke ̱ kte ka wata te , ji ia ̱ ka sa ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ r te , ke je kiawa ̱ ba ku ̱ , sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je te rä kju ̱ atke ne wätsikiwe ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkekewa kjanaklä ka kiar kju ̱ atkelbi ye , ata je kiana rä je ̱ r bäi biköle ra , dulale sa paktäk bäi , ji katabläk je ̱ r baa wà ,

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: kju ̱ atkäk ira wa paruäk je ̱ r baa wà . Jekäi ra bäräle Säkeklä te ijewa manewe ̱ miksa ̱ pa , iwa ̱ kte si ̱ ssäklä ,

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: je wà ijewa kjäkläksa ̱ julupa ikololecha ̱ wa ̱ be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ , jielecha ̱ wa ̱ ji wa ̱ k jishtä iwakei ki ̱ ishena käi je yika .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Jí ku ̱ ma je ̱ r ku ̱ opa : Sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra , sä weikanaklä därërë ke ̱ i dämiwa ̱ .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Je rä sä iarcha ̱ miwa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ mi je ̱ k dälänak ebä käi , inaklä ebä biketsäk käi , ñakjeishäk käi , ñassäk ta ̱ i käi , ji wämo shäk yakei käi , sa ká sa a ̱ mi ka ktä ssäk kuna käi , ka wekte shäk kuna käi , ka ji dälätsäk kuna käi ,

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: ka ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk kuna käi , ka je ̱ r bäinak kuna sa saka ra käi , sa saka ki ̱ yuäk kte wà käi , ji wa ̱ k ka wätkelewa ̱ ta käi , sälwii käi , ji wämo dokoitsäk käi ;

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: sa ̱ niki ̱ ñak käi , ji wa ̱ k pa pa käi , je ̱ k biketsäk bakleka ̱ käi , ji sä ssëwa ̱ k a ̱ naa je ebä biketsäk Säkeklä tsa ̱ ta käi ,

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: juer ta ji wämo biketsäk käi , ata ji we ̱ ke ̱ ijewa te wà ijuer ka ijewa ki ̱ je kiar kuna . Je shtä wa ja ̱ mi ke ba bana .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jewa sha ̱ kjäke ̱ wa ̱ ju etkä ju etkä . Jeska alaklä wa ka je ̱ rikä ta kololecha ̱ wa ̱ ji yakei wakble wa ̱ därërë , sikle täkili wà ji yakei tkerke ̱ sa ̱ ja ̱ mi saka saka je wa ̱ , jewa kukeche ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ ijewa te .

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Jewa yörke ̱ del , ata mik a ̱ ni ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ r ji rä iyina si ̱ rä ia ̱ .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Jishtä Janes irä Jambres irä kju ̱ atka Moisés da , je su ̱ ta ijewa kju ̱ atkäke ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ ra . Jewa je ̱ rikä rä yakei telecha ̱ wa ̱ , ka deleksa ̱ kuna bäi ji biketse etkabä ska .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Ka ijewa minakka ̱ jöiwäta . Je rä ijewa yule tenacha ̱ wa ̱ su ̱ emi biköle te ki ̱ ka , jishtä ale bakle wa käi .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Ata jishtä yie sa pakte käi , yis wädular se ̱ nak käi , ji wata yie ji we ̱ rä käi , yie ji biketse etkabä käi , yie ji katable käi , yie sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ ble käi , yis chatkäwa ̱ käi , je ja ̱ mi ba rä chatkelewa ̱ ,

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: sälwi su ̱ nak weikanak jishtä yis ki ̱ idewa ̱ Antioquía ska , Iconio ska , Listra ska käi . Jekäi bikö yis wa ̱ sälwi su ̱ ne wäkolole räle , ata je biköle yika Säkekewa te yis wetsaksa ̱ .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Tsa ̱ na ra biköle yi ssëna se ̱ nak wämo Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi ra , jewa biköle kolormiwa ̱ weikanak je ki ̱ ka .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Ata ditsä yakeila irä sä wäyuäk wa irä te jile wakblemika ̱ ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta . Ijewa te sä wäyuemi irä iwäyörmi irä .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Ata ba chatköwa ̱ ba pautäle ja ̱ mi , ba te ji biketsa etkabä je ja ̱ mi , ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer yi wa ̱ ba pautäle je wà rä käi .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ñakäi ma ji ̱ a tsi ̱ ne raté , kte dälätsalewa ̱ yöle je ju ̱ ñeleté ba wa ̱ rä . Je kiar dä ma je ̱ r ku ̱ aklä je wà ba tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ Cristo Jesús biketse wà .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Kte yöle biköle yöle rä Säkeklä si ̱ we ̱ i ju ̱ a wà . Je kiar dä sa paktäklä , sa ̱ uñaklä , sa paruäklä , sä dulawa ̱ klä ji wämo wà ,

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: je wà yi rä Säkeklä ja ̱ mi chatkelewa ̱ je däkläwa ̱ bäi si ̱ , dulale ji rä bäi biköle wa ̱ k .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Säkeklä wäkata ska irä Cristo Jesús ale sä kseka wa irä sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa irä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wäkata ska irä , ijuermi ki ̱ ka , idämiwa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ki ̱ ka , yie ba pake

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: kte wapaktäk tkenawa ̱ del , bä wä tso ̱ ra iräle ka bä wä kuna ra iräle . Jekäi ditsä paruö , iuño , itäkiwo ̱ ; je wo ̱ del ka dokole ta yile tsa ̱ na ijewa ia ̱ .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ sa pauta ̱ nake ̱ ji bäi wà ka ssäklä ji ̱ a ijewa wa ̱ . Ata ipablowe ̱ mika ̱ ji ssëte ki ̱ ka ijewa te sa paktäk wa tapawe ̱ mi ipaktäk ji tkerke ̱ iwakwa ja ̱ mi je wà .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Jekäi iñabalabutsämi ji rä iyina si ̱ yika , minakmi kje ka ̱ pake ka wata ja ̱ mi .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Ata ba se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ del , weikane katablö , ma shka ̱ blö kte baa bata shäk ye . Ji kja ̱ nei we ̱ ke ̱ ba te wawo ̱ kalabe .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Iwa rä yëwa ̱ yis tkerju ̱ mar kja ji tkenakju ̱ Säkeklä wäna käi , ike ̱ i dewa ̱ yis minakläju ̱ .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Jekäi yis ñakpa e ̱ ná ñakpe bäi wa . Yis tu ̱ na e ̱ ná tu ̱ ne ska . Ji biketse etkabä wawá ̱ yie ka jalewa ̱ ta .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yis ia ̱ ji wämo coronaí tso ̱ blele e ̱ ná . Je me ̱ mi Säkekewa sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ wämo te yis ia ̱ je díaí dewa ̱ ra ; ka yis ebä ia ̱ kuna , ata biköle yi ja ̱ mi ijuermini tkerke ̱ pjoo jewa ia ̱ ñaebä .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Bä kute yis su ̱ ak mane mane ka wätkele ta .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Demas te yis jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , ije wäbatsa jí ke ̱ i ska ji tso ̱ wà ki ̱ ka . Jekäi imineju ̱ Tesalónica ska ; Crescente mineju ̱ Galacia ska ; Tito mineju ̱ Dalmacia ska .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Lucas ebä ne katke ji ̱ a yis da rä . Ata ba ku ̱ Marcos kiö tso ̱ té ba ra , je rä kianak yis tsa ̱ tkäk ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k ki ̱ ka .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Yie Tíquico patkami Éfeso ska .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Mika ̱ bä bitäju ̱ ra , ba te yis je ̱ k ki ̱ shönak ju ̱ ata ̱ na Troas ska , Carpo ju ska je tse ̱ té ' sia ̱ . Ñakäi ba te yis äyë butäle wa jeté ' sia ̱ , bäi si ̱ ra yöle bewak kjuä ki ̱ ka wa .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Alejandro , ale cobre yaka wà jile yuäk , te jile yakei wá ̱ ta ̱ i yis ukä ja ̱ mi . Je ki ̱ ka Säkekewa te ije tju ̱ emi ite ji wá ̱ ja ̱ mi .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Je yika ma se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ , je te ta ̱ i saje wa ktä wätkewa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Säkätä yis je ̱ k wetsa ra , yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka yis tsa ̱ tkene kuna ; ata kalabe te yis jawa ̱ . Ata ke je nui ja ̱ noka ̱ pa ijewa ki ̱ ka .

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Ata Säkekewa te yis wapeblaña . Jekäi ite yis ia ̱ täkili ma ̱ je wà yis wa ̱ je ktei wapaktäklä kalabe , biköle ka Judío kuna wa wa ̱ issäklä . Jekäi yis bakanaksa ̱ yis na ̱ me ̱ i kà ja ̱ r yika .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Säkekewa te yis wetsemiksa ̱ ji yakei biköle o ̱ rke ̱ yika ; ije te yis tsa ̱ tkemi däkmi ka ̱ jöir igobiernoí ska . Ije oloi kanoka ̱ pa sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi . Amén .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Ba te Prisca irä Aquila irä Onesíforo ju ska tso ̱ wa irä jewa ia ̱ ishe yie ichakami jela .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Erasto a ̱ ta ̱ na Corinto ska ; yis te Trófimo ju ̱ ata ̱ na duë ta Mileto ska .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Bä kute pjoo yis su ̱ ak ka ka ̱ tse ̱ l ke ̱ i tkerwa ̱ ba yika . Eubulo irä , Pudente irä , Lino irä , Claudia irä , jewa te ba chakami , ñaebä sa el wa biköle te ba chakami .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Säkekewa ku ̱ ba tsa ̱ tköpa ba je ̱ rikä ska . Je ̱ r bäi yinopa bas ia ̱ .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Pablo Säkeklä kjanaklä , ñakäi Jesucristo ktei bata shäk , je rä je wà Säkeklä wa ̱ kolole wa wa ̱ ji biketsäklä etkabä , ñakäi ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä ji rä iyina si ̱ ia ̱ ji wämo ja ̱ mi ,

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: ijewa wa ̱ se ̱ ne jekjeye ki ̱ ssäklä . Säkeklä ka ka ̱ yuäk kuna , kabla je ma ̱ k sa ̱ ke ̱ i bakle biköle yikaba .

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Jekäi ike ̱ i dewa ̱ ra , ite iktä kjasha yis te sa pakta wà . Je me ̱ le yis ia ̱ rä Säkeklä Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ te yis paka je wapaktäk ra .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Je te jí äyë yue mar ba Tito yis yaba si ̱ , sä rä ji biketsäk etkabä ki ̱ ka je ia ̱ . Säkeklä Sa Ká irä , Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ Cristo Jesús irä , je ̱ r bäi shöpa ba ia ̱ , ijewa ku ̱ ba je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Yis te ba ju ̱ ata ̱ na Creta ska rä ba wa ̱ ji sher ji ̱ a parunak je paruäklä , ñakäi ba wa ̱ sä wäkiri wa kukäklä jukläyäkä etkä etkä ska , jishtä yis te ba paka iwa ̱ k käi .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Sä wäkiri kiana rä ka palei ta , se ̱ naklä ta eklabä . Iyabala kiana rä chatkelewa ̱ bäi , ka palei ta shi ̱ ana ji wa ̱ k ka wätkelewa ̱ ta käi , ka sä ktä ssäk kuna käi .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Jekäi sä wäsikewa ̱ k rä Säkeklä ji wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k ki ̱ ka je kiana rä ka palei ta , ka je ̱ k ssäk kuna tu ̱ leka ̱ käi , ka kju ̱ atkäk kuna tjabana käi , ka se ̱ nak kuna di yëë käi , ka ñakpäk kuna käi , ka wäbätsäk kuna sä wäyuäk jile wà sa ̱ ia ̱ inaklä däkläksa ̱ pa wà käi .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Ata ikiana rä sä kiäkwa ̱ je ̱ r baa wà käi , wäbätsäk ji bäi ebä wà käi , ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na käi , ji wa ̱ k bulee käi , se ̱ nak wämo käi , je ̱ k wätkewa ̱ k ji ska käi ,

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: kte bulee kukäkwa ̱ därërë , jishtä sa pautäle käi , je wà iwa ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ rike täkiwa ̱ klä kte bäi ka duëi ta wapakte wà , ñakäi iwa ̱ kte wätkewa ̱ k wa kukäklä .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sä ktä ssäk kuna wa , ji ka wata pakäk wa , sä wäyuäk wa tso ̱ ta ̱ i , bäi si ̱ ra sa pakäk tene shkiri wa ̱ k wa rä jeshtä wa .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Jewa kiana rä kjä pakolonakwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te inaklä bata ki ̱ ka ji ka kiar wapauta ̱ nak je ebä wapakteke ̱ . Je wà ite ju etkä ju etkä wakwa kalabe yakei tewe ̱ ke ̱ .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Creta wa wakwa ka ̱ pakäk ekla wa ̱ iyile : “ Creta wa rä del ka ̱ yuelbi wa ebä , bewak yakei wa ebä , yäkelbi ka ̱ nilbi wa ebä . ”

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Je yile rä iyina si ̱ . Je ne ki ̱ ka ijewa uño därërë , ijewa kjäklä bäi ji biketse etkabä ja ̱ mi ,

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: ka iwa ̱ kje Judío wa ka ̱ pake ssäklä kuna , ka iwa ̱ ditsä ñabutsäle tulämi ji rä iyina si ̱ yika jewa te sa pake ji wa ̱ k je ssäklä kuna .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Sä sikii wa ia ̱ ra ji biköle rä sikii , ata sa yakei telecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ia ̱ ra , sä ka ji biketsäk etkabä kuna wa ia ̱ ra , ka ji a ̱ ni kuna sikina , je rä ijewa rä ialewa ̱ ije ̱ rike ska ñá ye ki ̱ ka , ka jewa ia ̱ ji ssër ta ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Jewa te ishe iwa ̱ Säkeklä ju ̱ ñer ni , ata ijewa te ji we ̱ ke ̱ wà ka ijuer ta iyina irä . Ijewa rä dokona , ka kte ssäk kuna , ka deleksa ̱ kuna bäi ji biköle bäi we ̱ ska .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Ata ba ktö rä ji rä sa paktäklä bäi wà .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Jekäi säkekewa shtä wa kiana rä ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na käi , se ̱ nak dälätsalewa ̱ ditsä wa ̱ käi , ka ̱ biketsäk tsa ̱ na käi , chatkäkwa ̱ ji biketsäk etkabä bäi käi , ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk käi , ji katabläk käi .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Je su ̱ ta sa ̱ nu ̱ le nu ̱ le wa shtä wa kiana se ̱ nak rä tsa ̱ na Säkeklä dälätsäk , ka sa ̱ ki ̱ yuäk kuna , ka vino yäk kuna ta ̱ i , ata sa paktäk ji bäi wà .

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: Je rä ijewa wa ̱ alaklä wa paktäklä ise ̱ naklä wa irä iyabala irä shka ̱ li ̱ bläk ,

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: ji wa ̱ k tsa ̱ na , se ̱ nak sikii , ñakäi jile wa ̱ k ju ska , ji wa ̱ k bäi , ñajäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ise ̱ nakläí wa yika . Je rä ka Säkeklä ktä yinaklä kuna .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Je su ̱ ta dulaklei wa pakö se ̱ nak tsa ̱ na .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Ji biköle ska ba ku ̱ ji bäi wo ̱ mablenak sa ̱ wa ̱ käi , sa pakte ska ji yina si ̱ wà käi , dälätsalewa ̱ käi ,

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: kte bäi wà käi , ka yile ta jini . Je rä ka sä ktä kiäkwa ̱ kuna wa äinacha ̱ kläwa ̱ , ka iwa ̱ sä shäklä ji a ̱ ni ki ̱ yakei .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Kjanaklä wa kiana rä je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ iblui wa yika ji biköle ska , ji wa ̱ k iwa ̱ iblui ssëwa ̱ klä bäi , ka ikúkäk kuna ikjäbata ja ̱ mi ,

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: ka ji jakibläk kuna , ata ji biköle wa ̱ k bäi tsa ̱ na . Je rä ji biköle wà ijewa wa ̱ Säkeklä Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ ktei wapautäle je kjashäklä baa si ̱ irä .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ je juena sä biköle wäna .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Je te sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ e ji shi ̱ ana käi , ka ̱ jiska ji yakei tkerke ̱ sa ̱ ja ̱ mi käi je jäkwa ̱ , sa ̱ se ̱ naklä jí ke ̱ i ska ra tsa ̱ na , wämo , bulee ,

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: jí sa te ji baa ki ̱ ssënak , saje wa Kekläí kibiwa ̱ si ̱ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ Jesucristo juermi oloi ta ta ̱ i je ki ̱ ssëke ̱ dälei ja ̱ mi .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Je je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ saje wa ki ̱ ka , sä bäkäkksa ̱ ji we ̱ ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi biköle yika , ñakäi sä siki tewa ̱ k iwakei ia ̱ wa ye , je ̱ r ssënak ji bäi ebä wa ̱ k pjoo .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Je kte wapakö , je waje ̱ rtäkiwo ̱ , je wau ̱ ño ka ̱ wei biköle ta . Ke ma je ̱ k ma ̱ k dokoitsanak yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Ba ku ̱ ijewa je ̱ r ja ̱ wo ̱ ñajäkcha ̱ wa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa yika , ka ̱ wei ta wa yika ijewa ktä ssäk , ssële ta ji biköle wa ̱ k bäi ,

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: ka sä shäk kuna yakei , ka kju ̱ atkäk kuna , se ̱ nak je ̱ r baa , ji biköle ska se ̱ nak ñajalecha ̱ wa ̱ ditsä biköle ra .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jekäi ñaebä saje wa bakle rä ka ka ̱ biketsäk ta kuna , ka sä ktä ssäk kuna , wäyölecha ̱ wa ̱ , kololecha ̱ wa ̱ ji tkerke ̱ sa ̱ ja ̱ mi wa ̱ , ji wà sä wäbätsäke ̱ saka saka wa ̱ ikjanaklä ye , sa kjami rä ji we ̱ wäsi ̱ wa sha ̱ na , sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka iar ijile ki ̱ sha ̱ na , dokoitsalewa ̱ , ka sa ̱ ki ̱ ñakiar a ̱ mi ji ̱ a a ̱ mi ji ̱ a .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Ata mika ̱ Säkeklä Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ je ̱ r dä bäi , je wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l , kjayina sa ̱ ia ̱ ra ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: ije te sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkaksa ̱ . Ka je rä sa wakwa te ji wá ̱ wämo ki ̱ ka kuna , ata ije rä je ̱ r bäi shäk ki ̱ ka , sa ̱ ko ̱ nani spa ̱ na sa pasuka ̱ naju ̱ mi oloi ja ̱ mi , ñakäi Wikblu Sikina te sa ̱ spa ̱ na tewa ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Je tkaju ̱ até ite shka ̱ ja ̱ si ̱ saje wa ki ̱ ka , Jesucristo Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: Je rä sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ wämo ije ̱ r bäi shä oloi ja ̱ mi , sä däkläwa ̱ däli ukä kukäk wa ye , se ̱ ne jekjeye ki ̱ ssënak je kukäkläwa ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Je kte rä bulee , ki ̱ ka yis ki ̱ ba shena ijewa paktäk je wà tkelewa ̱ därërë , je rä Säkeklä biketsäk wa ssënaklä ji bäi ebä wa ̱ k . Je rä bäi ebä kianak ditsä biköle ia ̱ .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Ata ma je ̱ k butsöksa ̱ ji ka wata pake sa ̱ ñawätji ̱ wa ̱ klä shtä yika , sa bakle mikle wa kie yöle tso ̱ pake yika , sa ̱ ñakju ̱ atkewa ̱ ke ̱ sa ̱ ñaktewa ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ wei bata ki ̱ ka je yika . Je rä ka wata , ka kiar ji a ̱ ni ye ki ̱ ka .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Yi te sa bala butseke ̱ ra , je paruö ba ku ̱ etaba kicha botäbä kicha . Jeska ra iju ̱ oksa ̱ ,

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: ba wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je shtä rä yakei telewa ̱ , je te rä ji yakei wakbleke ̱ ki ̱ ka . Je wakei rä je ̱ k ktei wabiketsaleksa ̱ buka ̱ nak .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Mika ̱ yie Artemas iräle Tíquico iräle patka demi bä wäki ̱ ra , bä bitä pjoo yis wäki ̱ Nicópolis ska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis te ibiketsa ka ̱ tse ̱ l ke ̱ i ki ̱ ssäk jeska ki ̱ ka .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Ba ku ̱ Zenas sä ktei shäk ka ̱ wei ta wa ia ̱ irä Apolos irä tsa ̱ tkö pjowa ̱ jile wà , ijewa shkäklä , ka ji a ̱ ni shenaklä ji ̱ a iki ̱ ka .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Saje cha wa kiana rä dulanak ji wa ̱ k bäi , yi ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ pjoo jewa tsa ̱ tkäklä iwa ̱ , ka ijewa ianakläwa ̱ kuna ka ji me ̱ le ta käi .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Yis da tso ̱ wa biköle te ba chakami . Sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bläk ijewa rä ji biketsäk etkabä ki ̱ ka , jewa chakami yie . Je ̱ r bäi yinopa bas biköle ia ̱ .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Pablo wätelewa ̱ Cristo Jesús ki ̱ ka , je te sä el Timoteo ra ñara jí yue mar ba Filemón sá wa ̱ shka ̱ ta , shka ̱ bläkña sá ra je ia ̱ ,

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: ñakäi sä kuta Apia ia ̱ , Arquipo sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk kju ̱ atkäkña sa ra je ia ̱ , ñakäi tapanak ba ju ska wa ia ̱ .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Säkeklä Sa Ká irä , Säkekewa Jesucristo irä , je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas ia ̱ , jewa ku ̱ bas je ̱ r ssëwo ̱ pa baa .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Yis te ba ktei sheke ̱ ka ̱ kie na ra , yie wekte sheke ̱ del yis Kekläí ia ̱ .

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , yie ipalei ssa ba te Säkekewa Jesús shka ̱ li ̱ bleke ̱ , ibiketseke ̱ , ñakäi ba wa ̱ sä sikii wa biköle shka ̱ l .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Yis ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ba ki ̱ , je rä ba rä ji biketsäk etkabä sá raña je wawa ̱ klä ba wa ̱ , ma je ̱ r ku ̱ a ji bäi biköle tso ̱ bas wa ̱ Cristo ia ̱ je te ki ̱ ka .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Yis ssëna a ̱ naa si ̱ , yis je ̱ r pabla ba wa ̱ sa ̱ shka ̱ l te . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , el dikä , sä sikii wa je ̱ r ssëwa ̱ ni bäi ba te ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Jekäi yis ia ̱ ka ̱ wä tso ̱ Cristo ja ̱ mi ba pakäk ji kiana o ̱ nak wa ̱ k ,

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: jeiräta , wë yis kjar ba ra sa ̱ ñashka ̱ l ki ̱ ka . Jekäi yis Pablo säkibii kja , ata ñaebä wätelewa ̱ Cristo Jesús ki ̱ ka ,

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: je te yis yaba Onésimo ale yis wa ̱ wätsikile yis wätelewa ̱ ska , je ktei she mar ba ia ̱ .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Mikle ije bakle ra ka ikiar bäi ba ia ̱ . Ata jira ije kiarke ̱ bäi , ba ia ̱ irä yis ia ̱ irä .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Jekäi yie ipatke marni ba ia ̱ , ata yis wa ̱ ishka ̱ l dä e ̱ e ̱ na .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Jekäi yis ssëna ikukäkwa ̱ yis da , iwa ̱ yis tsa ̱ tkäklä ba säkei ye jí yis wäter kate kte baa ki ̱ ka jeska .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Ata ka yis je ̱ r kine ije kukäk ka ka ̱ kile kuna ba ia ̱ käi . Je rä ka ba je ̱ r bäi shäklä patkele täkili wà kuna , ata je ̱ r wà .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Watalé itu ̱ nami ba yika berbena bala ta rä , je rä idäkläwa ̱ ni ba ia ̱ jekjeye ,

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: ka däkwa ̱ ni ba kjanaklä ye kuna , ata ba kjanaklä wa tsa ̱ ta , je rä idäkläwa ̱ bä el ma wa ̱ shka ̱ ta ye . Yis wakei ia ̱ ije rä jekäi , ata bäiwa ̱ si ̱ ba ia ̱ ra , iyaka ska irä Säkekewa ja ̱ mi ska irä .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Jekäi ikuna ba te yis biketse sä rä etka yebä ra , jera ije kiöwa ̱ jishtä yis käi .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Ikuna ite ji wakbla bä ukä ja ̱ mi räle , ije rä nui ta ba ia ̱ räle , jera we yis ebä ñanewo ̱ je ki ̱ .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Yis Pablo te jí yue yis wakei jula wà , yis te je tju ̱ emi . Ata bäi si ̱ ra , ba ne rä nui ta yis ia ̱ rä .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Jekäi irä el dikä , yis ia ̱ ji wo ̱ pa Säkekewa ja ̱ mi ; yis je ̱ r täkiwo ̱ Cristo ja ̱ mi .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Yie ibiketse iyina si ̱ ba te yis ktä ssëmi . Je ne ki ̱ ka yie jí yuami ba ia ̱ , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ba te iwe ̱ mi ki ̱ ta yie isha tsa ̱ ta .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Yie ba pakeke ̱ ka ̱ yuläk yis se ̱ naklä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ibiketse bas ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ki ̱ ka yis dämiksa ̱ ni bas ia ̱ .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Epafras , yis da wätelewa ̱ ña Cristo Jesús ki ̱ ka te ba chakami .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Yis da shka ̱ bläkña Marcos irä Aristarco irä Demas irä , Lucas irä te ba chakami .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Säkekewa Jesucristo je ̱ r bäi shöpa bas jerikä ska .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Ka ̱ mikle Säkeklä utäle sä kalí wa ra , jile bata shäk wa oloi ja ̱ mi ka ̱ raa , ji wá ̱ ite saka saka wà .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Ata jí sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata je kje ra , ikta sa ra iyaba oloi ja ̱ mi . Je ne kuka ite ji biköle kukäkwa ̱ däli ukä ye rä , je ne oloi ja ̱ mi ji biköle yuaksa ̱ ite rä .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Ije ne rä ioloi wäñirke ̱ rä , ije rä jishtä iwakei rä käi je su ̱ ta . Je te ji biköle wäkukete iwakei ktä täkili wà . Jekäi ite saje wa wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele siki tewa ̱ e ̱ ná ra , ije ̱ tkawa ̱ ka ̱ sha ̱ ka ale oloi bakleka ̱ ju ̱ je jula wämo kja ̱ ne .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Je dewa ̱ bakleka ̱ ju ̱ ángel wa tsa ̱ ta , je su ̱ ta ije ia ̱ kie me ̱ na rä bäi si ̱ ijewa ia ̱ kie me ̱ na tsa ̱ ta .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ¿ mane ángel wa ia ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ iyile : “ Ba ne rä yis yaba rä , jir yis ne te ba wätsikiwa ̱ rä . ” Ñakäi : “ Yis dämiwa ̱ ije ia ̱ iKá ye , ije dämiwa ̱ yis ia ̱ yis yaba ye ” ni rä na ? A ̱ ni .

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Ñakäi ite iyaba säkätä patke mar ka ̱ jiska ra , ite ishe rä : “ Säkeklä ángel í wa biköle ku ̱ ije oloitsö . ”

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Ite iángel wa she rä : “ Iángel í wa iawe ̱ ite si ̱ wa ̱ ye , ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa iawe ̱ ite yökö wäkaleka ̱ ye . ”

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Ata ite iyaba she rä : “ Säkeklä , ba je ̱ tkelewa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye je marämi rä sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi , ba kjëklik , ba wa ̱ sä wäsikewa ̱ klä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , je rä ji wämo kjëklik í .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Ba wäbatsa ji wämo wà , ñakäi ba te ji ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi kuna dokoitsa . Je ne ki ̱ ka Säkeklä , ba Kekläí te ssëne a ̱ naa tkaju ̱ até ma ki ̱ aceite ye ba wapebläk wa tsa ̱ ta . ”

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Ñakäi : “ Säkekewa , säkätä ra ba ne te ishäkä ñak wäkukäk tkawa ̱ rä . Ñakäi ka ̱ jöir etkä etkä rä yöle ba wakei jula wà .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Jewa weikarmiwa ̱ , ata ba a ̱ ta ̱ nami del . Jewa biköle kërcha ̱ miwa ̱ jishtä sua käi .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: Je butremiwa ̱ ba te , jishtä sa ̱ je ̱ k ki ̱ shönak käi . Je biköle manermiksa ̱ paiklä manewe ̱ käi . Ata ba ka manenakksa ̱ . Ba año ka e ̱ nakwa ̱ . ”

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: ¿ Mane iángel wa ia ̱ iwa ̱ iyile : “ Ma je ̱ tköwa ̱ yis jula wämo kja ̱ ne bikökje yie ba bolki wa tulacha ̱ wa ̱ bä klä tkäkläka ̱ iki ̱ ka kje ” ni rä na ? A ̱ ni .

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: ¿ Ka irä ángel wa biköle rä wikblu ji kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k wa , patkele mane wa ia ̱ tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ rä däkksa ̱ däli ukä ye , jewa tsa ̱ tkäk kuna na ?

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa kiana ji ssële sa ̱ wa ̱ je ssäk ki ̱ ta tsa ̱ na si ̱ ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ijäkläwa ̱ kuna .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna ji yina ángel wa oloi ja ̱ mi je rä o ̱ nak pjoo ra , ñakäi biköle je ukä ja ̱ mi ji wa ̱ k wa käi , ka je ssäk kuna wa käi , jewa buka ̱ na bulee je ja ̱ mi ra ,

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: ¿ maikäi sä kjämi shiri ikuna saje wa te jí tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ baa weikawa ̱ ra na ? Je tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ rä bata yile Säkekewa wa ̱ säkätä , je ki ̱ shani sa ̱ ia ̱ issäk wa te .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä te je ktei shaña ijewa ra , ji o ̱ le ijuenaklä ye wà , ji ka su ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ wà , jile saka saka o ̱ le täkii wà , ji bala pa ̱ le Wikblu Sikina wa ̱ ije ki ̱ ishena ja ̱ mi käi .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Jekäi ka Säkeklä wa ̱ ángel wa kolone kuna sa ̱ ke ̱ i datse ̱ ji ̱ a , ale sa ̱ wa ̱ pakanak , je ke ̱ i ska sa patkäk ye .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Ata etka iyöle ska yilé wa ̱ iktei yile te ishe : “ ¿ Jibä ditsä rä , ba je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä ijewa ska rä na ? ¿ Jibä ditsä yäbei rä , ba wa ̱ ijewa biketsäklä rä na ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Elkje bala ta ba te ijewa iawa ̱ wa ̱ ángel wa katäbäka , Ji baa wà , ikjeishe wà , ba te ijewa oloi kaka ̱ icorona ye .

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: Ba te ji biköle yatacha ̱ wa ̱ ijewa klä niki ̱ ka . ” Jekäi ji kalabe yatacha ̱ wa ̱ ite ijewa katäbäka ra , ka ji a ̱ ni ju ̱ neta ̱ na iwa ̱ ka yatälewa ̱ kuna ijewa katäbäka käi . Ata jira sa te isu ̱ a ka ji biköle kunaba yatälecha ̱ wa ̱ ijewa katäbäka .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Jeiräta sa te Jesús , elkje bala ta ialewa ̱ ángel wa katäbäka , je su ̱ ani sa te ji baa wà , ikjeishe wà oloi kaleka ̱ icorona ye , ite duewa ̱ shka ̱ l ssa ki ̱ ka . Je rä Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi sha sa ̱ ia ̱ iwa ̱ duewa ̱ shka ̱ l ssäklä sä biköle ki ̱ ka .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Jekäi yi ia ̱ ji biköle rä , ñakäi yi oloi ja ̱ mi ji biköle tso ̱ rä , je ia ̱ ra bäi rä tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ biketsäkksa ̱ iyabala ia ̱ wakei paruäkksa ̱ bulee weikane wà , iwa ̱ yabala chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wäsikäklämi oloi kanakka ̱ .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sä siki tewa ̱ k irä sä siki tele wa irä , biköle bitele rä eklabä ska . Je ki ̱ ka ka ije äinak jewa kiäk iel wa ni .

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Je te ishe : “ Yie ba kie bata shemi yis el wa ia ̱ . Yie ba ksetsemi sa tapar tso ̱ ska . ”

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Ietkä ska ite ishe : “ Yis je ̱ r blämiwa ̱ ijebä ja ̱ mi . ” Ñakäi ite ishe : “ Yis irä yis ia ̱ yabala me ̱ le Säkeklä wa ̱ irä su ̱ o . ”

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Jekäi jishtä je yabala rä yaka ta pi ta , je su ̱ ta ije dewa ̱ ña jekäi ñaebä . Je rä duewa ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi iwa ̱ ale täki ta sä weikäk duewa ̱ wà je weikäkläwa ̱ , je rä be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ,

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: ñakäi kololecha ̱ wa ̱ suane wa ̱ ikjanaklä ye suane duewa ̱ yika wa ̱ bikö ise ̱ rke ̱ käi , je yika iwa ̱ jewa bäkäkläksa ̱ .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Iwa rä ka iwa ̱ ángel wa kolone tsa ̱ tkenak kuna , ata ite rä Abraham batala ne kuka tsa ̱ tkenak .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ije ka ̱ wä ta däkwa ̱ iel wa käi ji biköle ska , idäkläwa ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sä dälänak shtä käi , ji rä o ̱ nak Säkeklä ia ̱ wa ̱ k bäi . Je rä iwa ̱ ji yakei wakblele sa ̱ wa ̱ je nui tsa ̱ tju ̱ a ju ̱ aklämi .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ we ̱ ji yakei te je shka ̱ l ssa ije wakei te , je ki ̱ ka ije rä täki ta sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ji yakei te jewa tsa ̱ tkäk .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Je ki ̱ ka el wa sikii wa kileña ka ̱ jöir ska , bas ku ̱ Jesús , ale kte baa bata shäk , ji yinak sa ̱ wa ̱ je chuií , jishtä ije rä je biketsö .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
