text2: Ije rä ji wa ̱ k bulee ikukäk ia ̱ , jishtä Moisés wa ̱ io ̱ le Säkeklä ju kalabe sha ̱ na käi .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Ata Jesús dä oloi bakleka ̱ Moisés tsa ̱ ta , jishtä ju yuäk rä oloi bakleka ̱ ju yöle iwa ̱ tsa ̱ ta käi .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Iwa rä ju biköle rä yuäk ta , ata ji biköle yuäkksa ̱ rä Säkeklä .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Jekäi Moisés bakle rä Säkeklä ju biköle kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k bäi kjanaklä ye . Je rä maiskale ji yirmi ji ̱ a ktei shäklä iwa ̱ .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Ata Cristo rä ije ju ju ̱ ñak bäi sa yaba käi . Je ju rä saje wa , ikuna ji biketsanak sa ̱ wa ̱ , ji ki ̱ ssënak sa ̱ wa ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ k ssäklä je kukawa ̱ ji ̱ a sä te ra .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka jishtä Wikblu Sikina te ishe käi : “ Jir bas te iktäke ̱ ssa ra ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: ke bas je ̱ r doloi tiawa ̱ jishtä ijewa käi , ale ijewa te yis wätji ̱ wa ̱ , ijewa te yis mabla su ̱ a ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska ra käi .

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Mai bas ká wa te yis mabla su ̱ a ta ̱ i irä , ijewa te yie ji wá ̱ cuarenta año bala na su ̱ a irä ska .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Je ne kju ̱ ei yis kju ̱ atkawa ̱ je sa bakle wa ra . Jera yie isha : ‘ Del ijewa shirir dami ije ̱ r ska . Ka ijewa je ̱ r ko ̱ ne yis ña ̱ le ̱ i ia ̱ . ’

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Jekäi yis kju ̱ atkawa ̱ te isha etkabä : ‘ Mik a ̱ ni ka ijewa kjäkwa ̱ yis wa ̱ je ̱ räklä tso ̱ ska . ’ ”

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: El wa , bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na bas mane a ̱ ni ka je ̱ r yakei tenakläwa ̱ ñabutsäkksa ̱ Säkeklä kseka yika ka ibiketsäk kuna ji ̱ a käi .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Ata bas ñaje ̱ rtäkiwo ̱ buliri buliri , iyir dami ji ̱ a “ jir ” ni dälei ja ̱ mi , ka bas mane a ̱ ni je ̱ r doloi tenaklä ji yakei te sä wäyue ki ̱ ka .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä rä delewa ̱ ña Cristo ja ̱ mi , ikuna ji biketsanak sa ̱ wa ̱ säkätä kukawa ̱ ji ̱ a sa te marä ibataje si ̱ ra .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Jekäi ite she rä : “ Jir iktäke ̱ ssa bas te ra , ke bas je ̱ r doloi tiawa ̱ , jishtä ijewa käi , ale ijewa te yis wätji ̱ wa ̱ ra . ”

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: ¿ Mane wa te Säkeklä ktä ssa kjepa ite iwätji ̱ wa ̱ ni rä na ? ¿ Ka je rä ale mineleksa ̱ julu Egipto ska Moisés oloi ja ̱ mi kuna na ?

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: ¿ Mane wa ra ikju ̱ atkawa ̱ cuarenta año bala na rä na ? ¿ Ka je rä ale ji yakei wakbläk wa , ale nu ̱ lda jololeta ̱ na ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo ska wa ra na ?

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: ¿ Mane wa ia ̱ Säkeklä kabla etkabä ka ijewa kjäkwa ̱ iwa ̱ je ̱ räklä tso ̱ ska ni rä na ? ¿ Ka je rä ale ka iktä dälätsäk kuna wa ia ̱ na ?

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ka ijewa baka ̱ newa ̱ , je rä ka ijewa wa ̱ iktä kolone iyina si ̱ ye ki ̱ ka .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Ikablele sä kiäkwa ̱ ije wa ̱ je ̱ räklä tso ̱ ska je rami ji ̱ a ra , bas suano iö bas sha ̱ manele a ̱ ta ̱ nakta ̱ na ka däkmi kuna käi .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je kte baa rä yile saje wa ia ̱ jishtä ijewa ia ̱ iyile käi , ata ji yina ijewa ia ̱ ssa ite ka wadeneksa ̱ pa ijewa ia ̱ , je rä ka ijewa ñawäjienewa ̱ ña ji biketsäk etkabä kte kukäk wa ra ki ̱ ka .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ata saje je kukäk wa , jewa je kjäke ̱ wa ̱ je je ̱ räklä ska , jishtä iwa ̱ iyile käi : “ Yis kju ̱ atkawa ̱ te isha etkabä : ‘ Mik a ̱ ni ka ijewa kjäkwa ̱ yis wa ̱ je ̱ räklä tso ̱ ska . ’ ” Jeiräta ije shka ̱ ble biköle je rä e ̱ le e ̱ ná ka ̱ biköle yöleksa ̱ ke ̱ i kje .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ka ̱ däke ̱ ka ̱ siete día ra , je rä yile iwa ̱ maile : “ Säkeklä te ishka ̱ ble biköle je ̱ retsawa ̱ , ka ̱ deka ̱ siete día ra . ”

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Ite je ebä shani : “ Mik a ̱ ni ka ijewa kjäkwa ̱ yis wa ̱ je ̱ räklä tso ̱ ska . ”

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Jeiräta manele sher ji ̱ a kjäkwa ̱ jeska , ata mane ia ̱ kte baa bata yina säkätäba jewa ka baka ̱ newa ̱ jeska , je rä ka ijewa ñajanewa ̱ iktä ssäk kju ̱ ei .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Je kju ̱ ei etäbä kicha Säkeklä te día etkä shani : “ Jir ” ni , je ̱ naapa David wa ̱ iyile oloi ja ̱ mi , jishtä sa te isha kja käi : “ Jir iktäke ̱ ssa bas te ra , ke bas je ̱ r doloi tiacha ̱ wa ̱ . ”

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Iwa rä Josué ku ̱ je ̱ räklä mo ̱ pa ijewa ia ̱ ra , je ukä ska ka Säkeklä wa ̱ día saka yineni .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka Säkeklä cha wa ia ̱ etka sábado je ̱ räkläí tso ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi kjawa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ je ̱ räklä tso ̱ ska ra , je te rä ishka ̱ ble ne je ̱ retseke ̱ , jishtä Säkeklä cha je ̱ retsa käi .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sä chichano sä kjäkläwa ̱ je je ̱ räklä ska , ka yi a ̱ ni ianacha ̱ kläwa ̱ kuna jishtä ijewa käi ka iktä ssäk kuna .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä ktä rä kseka , täkili ta , kayale espada ka ta boktaka biköle tsa ̱ ta , kjäkwa ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ rike , sä wikblu , ñakäi sä wäjienaklä , sä chichei ñe ̱ i bala tiäkksa ̱ kje . Je te sa ̱ je ̱ r ska ji biketseke ̱ sa te käi , ji sherke ̱ sa ̱ ki ̱ käi , je su ̱ eraksa ̱ .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Ji yöleksa ̱ ka kuna ka juenakwa ̱ ije wäna käi . Ata ji biköle tso ̱ rä ki ̱ tse ̱ leju ̱ mi atjä , ale yi ia ̱ sä rä je ̱ k shäkka ̱ je wakei wäna .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Sä rä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ta bäi si ̱ , bakleka ̱ ka ̱ jöir etkä etkä ektaka . Je rä Jesús Säkeklä yaba . Je ki ̱ ka ji ktei yinak sa ̱ wa ̱ kuköwa ̱ sa ̱ ku ̱ därërë .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka sa ̱ wa ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kuna ka iia ̱ sä rä ja ̱ lmalecha ̱ wa ̱ ssër kuna käi . Ata ije rä je ̱ r kile su ̱ le ji biköle wà saje wa käi ñaebä , ata ka ije wa ̱ ji yakei wakblene kuna .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ñasiköwa ̱ ka suale ta ije ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye je ̱ r bäi shäk ska . Je rä ije ̱ r ja ̱ mi sä dälänakläwa ̱ , ñakäi ije ̱ r bäi shäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk ji sherke ̱ wäsaka ra .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Jekäi chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa biköle rä kolole ditsä sha ̱ na sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk , ji rä o ̱ nak Säkeklä ia ̱ wà , jile ma ̱ k irä bewak ma ̱ kka ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele ki ̱ ka irä .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: Iwakwa rä ja ̱ lmalecha ̱ wa ̱ ka täkili ta ki ̱ ka , ijewa ia ̱ sä ka wa ̱ ji ju ̱ ñer wa , sä shirilecha ̱ wa ̱ wa tsa ̱ tkermi je ̱ r bäi wà .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Ijewa rä ja ̱ lmalewa ̱ kju ̱ ei ika ̱ wä ta jile ma ̱ kka ̱ iwakwa wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele ki ̱ ka , jishtä ite ditsä ia ̱ iwe ̱ ke ̱ käi .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Yi a ̱ ni rä ka jekäi je ̱ k oloi käkka ̱ kuna , ata yi rä kile Säkeklä wa ̱ je ebä , jishtä Aarón bakle rä käi .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Je su ̱ ta Cristo wakei ka je ̱ k oloi kaneka ̱ idäkläwa ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye kuna . Ata ije oloi käkka ̱ rä ale ishäk iia ̱ : “ Ba ne rä yis yaba rä , jir yis ne te ba wätsikiwa ̱ rä . ”

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Jishtä ietkä ska ite ishe käi : “ Ba rä chui jekjeyemi , jishtä Melquisedec käi . ”

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Cristo tso ̱ ji ̱ a yaka ja ̱ mi ra , ije te Säkeklä payula , ika ̱ kia a ̱ le täkii wa , ji ̱ eleksa ̱ wa , ale täki ta ije wetsäkksa ̱ duewa ̱ yika je ia ̱ . Jekäi je te iktä ssa ite idälätsawa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Ije rä iyaba , jeiräta ji shka ̱ l ssë wà idulana iktä ssäk .

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Jekäi ije deksa ̱ bulee ra , idewa ̱ rä iktä dälätsäk wa biköle ia ̱ tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ jekjeye ma ̱ k ye .

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Jekäi je tkelewa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i bäi si ̱ ye , je rä jishtä Melquisedec käi .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Je tso ̱ ji ̱ a sa ̱ wa ̱ yinak ta ̱ i , ata je waje ̱ rku ̱ e rä därërë , je rä bas ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ka je ̱ r ko ̱ nak kuna tjabana ki ̱ ka .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Ñera mikté bas dä tsi bas kianawa ̱ sa paktäk ye , jeiräta bas sher ji ̱ a pauta ̱ nakni yilé wa ̱ Säkeklä wa ̱ ji yile je ñak säkätä wà . Bas ianacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ rä tsu ne sherke ̱ , ka ji ñanak därërë shtä kuna .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , biköle yi tsu yäke ̱ ji ̱ a wa , jewa rä ka dulale kte wämo wà , ijewa rä dulunala ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Ata ñanak därërë rä sä këlecha ̱ wa ̱ kja wa ia ̱ , sä dulale ji ssër sa ̱ ia ̱ wà je ̱ r ko ̱ nak ji rä bäi ji rä yakei ia ̱ jewa ia ̱ .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ku ̱ sa paktäklä säkätä Cristo ktei wà jöwa ̱ ta ̱ na , sa ̱ minaklä jöikwä ta ma rä sä kënacha ̱ wa ̱ kje , ka iñak tkäkwa ̱ kunani spa ̱ na maikäi sä te ji we ̱ ki ̱ sä rä duäkwa ̱ je yika je ̱ k manewe ̱ ksa ̱ rä käi , maikäi Säkeklä biketse rä käi ,

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: maikäi wäoka ̱ ne rä käi , maikäi jula me ̱ ka ̱ sa saka ki ̱ rä käi , maikäi sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni rä käi , maikäi sä rä buka ̱ nak jekjeye rä käi ka je pakäkni .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Jekäi je ne we ̱ mi sä te rä , ikuna Säkeklä te ka ̱ ma ̱ ra .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , manele bakle wäji ̱ atkele käi , ji me ̱ nak ka ̱ jöir skaté kjei ssäk käi , delewa ̱ Wikblu Sikina kukäkña käi ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: Säkeklä ktei baa kjei ssäk käi , sa ̱ ke ̱ i däke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a je täkili kjei ssäk käi ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: jewa te ijawa ̱ ra , ka yi ia ̱ ibäinak ñamanewa ̱ kksa ̱ ni . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te Säkeklä yaba wätiaka ̱ ni cruz ja ̱ mi iwakwa je ̱ k ukä ja ̱ mi , ikaka ̱ ja ̱ ñetsanak biköle wa ̱ .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Ishäkä te ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ rke ̱ iki ̱ ka ̱ raa je yeke ̱ wa ̱ ra , je te ji wäwe ̱ kianak iwatkäk wa ia ̱ ra , je ia ̱ Säkeklä te ji we ̱ mi bäi ;

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: ata je te dika yäkä ebä kual yäkä ebä je ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ra , je rä ju ̱ nakksa ̱ , je tso ̱ kja rä yinakksa ̱ yakei , bata ska ra je rä dälänakwa ̱ .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Bas dikäla , sá te jekäi isheke ̱ , jeiräta sá te bas biketse bas wa ̱ rä ji bäi ne tso ̱ , je ki ̱ bas tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä rä ka ji wa ̱ k shi ̱ ana kuna , je ̱ r shenakwa ̱ bas shka ̱ ble ska , bas wa ̱ ji o ̱ le ikie shka ̱ l ki ̱ ka jeska käi kuna , je rä bas te sä sikii wa kja ̱ nei wá ̱ , ñakäi bas te je we ̱ rami ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Jekäi sá ki ̱ ishena rä bas me ekla ekla iwa ̱ k ji ̱ a jekäi marä ibataje , bas wa ̱ ki ̱ ssënak je däkläksa ̱ bas ia ̱ kalabe ,

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: ka ianakcha ̱ wa ̱ kuna ka ̱ nilbi wa ye , ata Säkeklä kablele ji ma ̱ k je kukäk däli ukä ye ji biketse etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi , ji katable oloi ja ̱ mi jewa mabläk .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä kabla Abraham ia ̱ ra , ikabla etkabä iwakei ktä wà , je rä ka isaka kuna bakleka ̱ ije tsa ̱ ta ikabläklä je ktä wà ki ̱ ka .

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: Je te isha : “ Iyina si ̱ yie ji bäi we ̱ mi ba ia ̱ bäi , ñakäi yie ba wawe ̱ mika ̱ waleka ̱ ta ̱ i . ”

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Jera Abraham te iki ̱ ssa je ̱ r baa wà , kjepa ikablele deksa ̱ iia ̱ .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa kablä etkabä rä yi rä bakleka ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ ta ne ktä wà . Jekäi sa kablä etkabä ijuenaklä iyina si ̱ irä , je rä ka ji ki ̱ sa ̱ ñaktewa ̱ klä kuna ji ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä ssëna ikablele kukäk wa ia ̱ ikjashäk tsa ̱ na si ̱ , iwa ̱ ji biketsale rä ka manenakksa ̱ kuna ni . Je ki ̱ ka ikabla kable etkabä wà .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: Jekäi ñe ikabla irä iji sha etkabä wà irä , je ka manenakni kju ̱ awa , je botkä sha ite je ka yinak ije ia ̱ ka ̱ yue ye , je botkä rä saje ñabläk ije ja ̱ mi wa je ̱ r pablenaklä ta ̱ i , ji tso ̱ sä wätsa ̱ k ki ̱ ssënak kukäkläwa ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ pjoo .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Je sa ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ssënak je te sä wäkukete tkelewa ̱ därërë , jishtä ko ̱ no wäkukäk käi , baklewa ̱ ija ̱ r bala tkeleksa ̱ sua wà je ja ̱ r ektaka ,

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: jeska Jesús kjawa ̱ ju ̱ sä wätsa ̱ kba saje wa bata ki ̱ ka , delewa ̱ jekjeye chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , jishtä Melquisedec käi .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Iwa rä je Melquisedec , Salem tsa ̱ ku ̱ i , ñakäi Säkeklä Ji Biköle Tsa ̱ ta je chuií , je mineju ̱ Abraham tu ̱ naka ̱ ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ki ̱ ka je daju ̱ kjani ña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k , te ji bäi sha iia ̱ o ̱ nak .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: Abraham te je ia ̱ ji baka ite biköle diezmoí ma ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sä kie Melquisedec ni je wà rä “ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i se ̱ nak wämo ” , ñaebä ije rä Salem Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ; je wà rä “ Sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i se ̱ nak bitaba ” ni .

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Je rä ka ká ta , ka a ̱ mi ta , ka isäkätä wa kie pakale ta , iko ̱ na díaí ka ju ̱ ñer yi wa ̱ , iduawa ̱ díaí ka ju ̱ ñer yi wa ̱ . Jekäi irä chui jekjeye , jishtä Säkeklä yaba käi .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Bas ku ̱ ibiketsö bikö je oloi kaleka ̱ rä käi , sa ká Abraham wa ̱ ji baka ite diezmoí ma ̱ klä iia ̱ .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Leví yäbeila kolole chui wa ye jewa pakana ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi diezmo kukäk sa ̱ sha ̱ na , jewa rä iwakwa saka wa , jeiräta ñaebä ijewa biteleté rä Abraham yaka ska .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Ata ka Melquisedec rä biteleña ijewa ja ̱ mi kuna , ata je te Abraham diezmo kukawa ̱ , te Säkeklä kablele kukäk wakei ia ̱ ji bäi sha o ̱ nak .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer sä oloi bakleka ̱ wa ne rä ji bäi shäk o ̱ nak oloi ja ̱ lewa ̱ wa ia ̱ rä .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Jekäi je diezmo kukäk wa rä ditsä duäkcha ̱ wa ̱ ebä , ata ñe jí ije ktei yile rä idami ji ̱ a kseka ni .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Jekäi Leví wa diezmo kukäk wa te sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä Melquisedec ia ̱ diezmo ma ̱ Abraham ra käi .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Melquisedec mineju ̱ iña ̱ le ̱ i tsa ̱ k ra , Leví tso ̱ ji ̱ a rä iká yaka ska .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Ka ̱ wei me ̱ na Israel wa ia ̱ , je rä wakja ̱ neio ̱ nak chui Leví wa wa ̱ , je kuna rä je oloi ja ̱ mi sä däwa ̱ parule bulee ra , ¿ jiye chui saka shena däkwa ̱ jishtä Melquisedec käi , ata ka kile kuna jishtä Aarón käi rä na ?

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Jekäi ikuna chui wa ditsei wä rä manewe ̱ ta ra , ika ̱ wei kiana manenak ñaebä .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ale yile jekäi , ka je rä jewa ditsei wä kuna . Jewa mane a ̱ ni rä ka bakle jile däläwa ̱ klä wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k kuna .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , saje wa Säkekewaí bitele rä Judá ditsei wä ja ̱ mi je ju ̱ ñer sa ̱ wa ̱ rä bäi , jewa ka yine Moisés wa ̱ däkwa ̱ chui ye .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Jekäi chui saka dewa ̱ ni Melquisedec käi ra , ki ̱ ta si ̱ sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ka ̱ wei shena manenak .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: Jekäi ka ije denewa ̱ chui ye rä ka ̱ wei te ishe je shtä ditsei ne sherke ̱ rä ki ̱ ka kuna , ata irä ka duäk kuna ne oloi ja ̱ mi idewa ̱ rä .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije ne ktei yile jikäi rä : “ Ba rä chui jekjeyemi , jishtä Melquisedec käi . ”

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Iwa rä säkätä sa pakale ji wa ̱ k je wäshawa ̱ ka irä täkili ta , ka ikiar ki ̱ ka .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je ka ̱ wei yile wa ̱ ka ji parunepa bulee , ata ji bäi si ̱ ki ̱ ssënak sa ̱ wa ̱ kjawa ̱ , je ne wà sa ̱ ñasikäke ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi rä .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Jekäi je o ̱ na rä kable etkabä wà .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: Ata isaka delewa ̱ chui ye rä ka ji she etkabä wà kuna . Ata ishäk : “ Säkekewa kabla etkabä , ka je manenak iwa ̱ : ‘ Ba rä chui jekjeyemi . ’ ” Je ishäk etkabä wà jekäi , je wakei ne oloi ja ̱ mi ije dewa ̱ chui ye rä .

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Jesús dewa ̱ rä sä kablele bäi si ̱ ñaia ̱ , je shäk iyina si ̱ je o ̱ rmi ni .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Jekäi chui wa bakle rä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ , je rä ka ijewa ia ̱ ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ klei ji ̱ a ijewa duächa ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: Ata Jesús dä delewa ̱ chui ye ka manenakksa ̱ kuna , je dami ji ̱ a jekjeyemi ki ̱ ka .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ije oloi ja ̱ mi däkwa ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi wa tsa ̱ tkerksa ̱ iia ̱ del . Je rä ije dul del ye ijewa ktei shäk ki ̱ ka .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Iwa rä ije rä wämo , ka nui ta , ka ñá telewa ̱ kuna , je ̱ k butsäleju ̱ mi ji yakei wakbläk wa yika , bakleka ̱ ka ̱ jöir etkä etkä ekta wà . Jeshtä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ne kiarke ̱ sa ̱ ki ̱ rä .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Ka ije shene kuna bewak ma ̱ kka ̱ buliri buliri säkätä iwakei nui ki ̱ ka , kjepa ditsä nui ki ̱ ka kuna , jishtä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa saka te iwe ̱ käi . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije te je wá ̱ etaba kicha yebä iwakei je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ wà .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ̱ wei te ditsä ka täkili ta wa kuke chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ye , ata ka ̱ wei me ̱ na itäkapa Säkeklä kabla etkabä . Je wà ije te iyaba kuka chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye , delewa ̱ bulee jekjeyemi .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Je biköle she datse ̱ sá te je wà rä jikäi : saje wa rä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ta , je rä je ̱ tkelewa ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska ale bakleka ̱ ju ̱ je je ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye jula wämo kja ̱ ne ,

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: ju dälätsalewa ̱ ale ju wäjienak si ̱ yöle Säkekewa wakei wa ̱ , ka ditsä wa ̱ kuna , je wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Jekäi biköle chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa rä kolole jile me ̱ le irä , bewak irä ma ̱ kka ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka ije ka ̱ wä ta ñaebä jile tsa ̱ kmi iwa ̱ me ̱ nakka ̱ .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Ata ije katke kuna ka ̱ jiska ra ka irä chui kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , chui wa tso ̱ kja e ̱ ná jile me ̱ le ma ̱ kka ̱ ka ̱ wei te ishe ja ̱ mi .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Ijewa te ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir je me ̱ i je oloi wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ ke ̱ , jishtä Moisés ia ̱ iyina tsa ̱ na , mika ̱ je ju wäyenak je yue e ̱ newe ̱ rawa ̱ kja ite ra käi . Je te isha : Issö , ji biköle yue ba te rä jishtä je ̱ ma ia ̱ ime ̱ i kjasha ka ̱ tsä ska je ja ̱ mi .

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Ata jira Jesús te ikja ̱ nei we ̱ bäi si ̱ kukawa ̱ . Jekäi ije rä sä kablele ñaia ̱ bäi si ̱ je ktei shäk a ̱ miki ̱ jiki ̱ , je o ̱ na rä Säkeklä kabla ji wa ̱ k bäi si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Iwa rä ikablele säkätä kuna rä ka yakei ta ra , jera ka ietkä biketsane patkenakwa ̱ ni kuna .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Ka jiye ite je ietkä biketsani rä kuna ta , ite ijewa uña te ishe : “ Säkekewa te ishe : ‘ Issö . Ike ̱ i dämiwa ̱ ji ̱ a yis kabläkläni spa ̱ na , Israel ju ska tso ̱ wa irä Judá ju ska tso ̱ wa irä ra ,

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: ata ka jishtä yis kablele iká wa ra , yis te ikukawa ̱ ijulaka ijäkläksa ̱ Egipto ska ra käi kuna . Ka ijewa chatkenewa ̱ yis kablele ja ̱ mi , je ki ̱ ka ka yis wa ̱ ijewa biketsane ji ̱ a . ’ Jekäi Säkekewa te ishe rä .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: ‘ Ata jikäi yis kablämini Israel ju ska tso ̱ wa ra je ke ̱ i kjaju ̱ ukä ska ra rä : Yis te yis ka ̱ wei tkemiwa ̱ ijewa je ̱ rike ska , yie je yuetkemi ijewa je ̱ r ska . Jekäi yis dämiwa ̱ ijewa Kekläí ye , ijewa dämiwa ̱ yis ia ̱ wa ye . ’ Jekäi Säkekewa te ishe rä .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: ‘ Ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ isaka wa pauta ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ñakäi ka yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ iyinak iel ia ̱ : “ Ba ku ̱ Säkekewa biketsöpa . ” Ka irä jiye kuna ta , biköle te yis biketsemi , sa ̱ emana wa marä sä bakleka ̱ waje .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yie ijewa jemiwa ̱ bitaba iji wá ̱ ka bäi kuna ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ka yis je ̱ r ja ̱ nak ji ̱ a ijewa wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele ska itjä . ’ ”

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Säkeklä te isha ikabläke ̱ ni spa ̱ na . Je ite isha “ spa ̱ na , ” je wà ra ite isäkätä ju ̱ aksa ̱ ka je kiar ji ̱ a . Jekäi ji rä këlewa ̱ ialewa ̱ miklee , je tso ̱ kja rä wätuinakwa ̱ .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä kablele säkätä , je rä ka ̱ weií ta iwakja ̱ neiwa ̱ klä , ñakäi je rä ju dälätsalewa ̱ ta ka ̱ jiska .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Je ju wäjienak yöle rä jikäi : Je ja ̱ r säkätä kie rä Dälätsalewa ̱ ni , jeska tsi ̱ ni wäkanak tuläkka ̱ kaldu , ñakäi mesa pan kjayinak ma ̱ tuläkläka ̱ katke .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Jeska ija ̱ r etkä bala tkeleksa ̱ sua wà je kie rä Dälätsalewa ̱ E ̱ e ̱ na Si ̱ ni .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Jeska perfume däläwa ̱ klä yöle oro wà katke . Ñakäi sä kablele ñaia ̱ cajón í ki ̱ wätele kalabe oro wà katke , je cajón ja ̱ rka u ̱ iá yöle oro wà kate maná ta , ñakäi je na Aarón kata peri je ̱ leksa ̱ irä , sä kablele ñaia ̱ jak takläí irä je kate .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Je bata ki ̱ ka querubín Säkeklä oloi ñileka ̱ se ̱ newa ̱ k wa me ̱ i kajali , itapa sa ̱ nui wäshewa ̱ kläwa ̱ ki ̱ kukäk . Ata jí kje ra ka je pakäklei sa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Jewa tso ̱ jäklele rä jikäi . Je ja ̱ r säkätä ska chui wa däke ̱ wa ̱ rä itso ̱ ye , ji rä iwa ̱ o ̱ nak je kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Ata ija ̱ r etkä ska chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ebä ne kjäke ̱ wa ̱ año wà etaba kichabä rä , ata ka iwa ̱ ji pi minene tulunak iwakei nui ki ̱ ra , ñakäi ji yakei wakblele ditsä wa ̱ ka ju ̱ ñele kuna iwa ̱ käi je biköle nui ki ̱ ra , ka imiwa ̱ kuna .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Je wà Wikblu Sikina te sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a je ju wäjienak säkätä tso ̱ ji ̱ a ra , maikäi sä kjäwa ̱ ija ̱ r Dälätsalewa ̱ E ̱ e ̱ na Si ̱ na rä ka kjayirba .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Je biköle rä jira sa ̱ tso ̱ wa je ̱ r ko ̱ naklä , jile me ̱ irä bewak me ̱ ka ̱ irä , ka je ia ̱ je ma ̱ k wa ssërke ̱ nui ta bäi tenak .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: Je sa pakale ji wa ̱ k , je rä sa yaka ska ebä , ji ñanak ji yanak käi , jile paskue kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa käi . Sa bakle kololewa ̱ je wa ̱ k bite rä imanenaksa ̱ ni spa ̱ na ke ̱ i kje .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Jekäi Cristo rä deleju ̱ e ̱ ná . Je rä ji bäi rä däkwa ̱ ji ̱ a je chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i . Je kjawa ̱ ju ju wäjienak bakleka ̱ deleksa ̱ bäi ebä ja ̱ rka , je rä ka yöle kuna jula wà , je rä ka jí ji yöleksa ̱ shtä kuna ,

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: jeska ra ikjawa ̱ ju ̱ ija ̱ r Dälätsalewa ̱ E ̱ e ̱ na Si ̱ ska etaba kicha yebä , je rä ka cabra jäyiri wa pi iräle toro yabala pi iräle oloi ja ̱ mi kuna , ta je rä iwakei ne pi oloi ja ̱ mi , je wà ite sa ̱ tsa ̱ tju ̱ a ju ̱ ami jekjeye .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Jekäi ikuna cabra jäyiri pi irä , toro pi irä , ñakäi vaca yabala alaki wa däläle muli ̱ täí irä , je tuleke ̱ sa ̱ tso ̱ ñá ye wa ki ̱ ka , je te sä siki tewe ̱ ke ̱ sa pa ki ̱ ka ra ,

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ Cristo je ̱ k ju ̱ leksa ̱ ka yakei ta Säkeklä ia ̱ Wikblu jekjeye oloi ja ̱ mi , je pi te sa ̱ wa ̱ ji o ̱ le ki ̱ sä rä duäkwa ̱ te sä ssëwe ̱ nui ta , je paskue ju ̱ emi , sa ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä kseka kja ̱ nei wa ̱ klä .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ije rä sa kablele ñaia ̱ Säkeklä ra spa ̱ na ktei shäk a ̱ miki ̱ jiki ̱ . Je rä sä kile wa wa ̱ Säkeklä kablele däli ukä jekjeye ma ̱ k je kukäkläwa ̱ . Cristo duawa ̱ wà ijewa bakanaksa ̱ sa kablele ñaia ̱ säkätä je ja ̱ mi ijewa dami ji ̱ a ra ishirile , je nui yika .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Iwa rä sä rä kablele däli ukä ma ̱ k ra , sä kabläk duawa ̱ ra , je sherke ̱ rä ju ̱ ñenakwa ̱ .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je kabläk duawa ̱ ne kjepa je ikablele wao ̱ rke ̱ rä . Ata ikatke ji ̱ a kseka ra , je ikablele ka kiar jiye .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa kablele ñaia ̱ säkätä ka wao ̱ nemi rä ka ji pi ta wà kuna .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , Moisés te ka ̱ wei wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k je biköle bata sha e ̱ ná ditsä kalabe ia ̱ ra , ite toro yabala pi irä , cabra jäyiri pi irä kukawa ̱ diklä ra ñara , je tula ite oveja kä bätsëë wà , ñakäi hisopo bata wà , je iäyëí ki ̱ ka irä , ditsä biköle ki ̱ ka irä .

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: Jekäi ite isha : “ Jí rä sa kabläke ̱ ñaia ̱ je pií . Säkeklä te bas paka rä je sa kabläke ̱ ñaia ̱ wawa ̱ k . ”

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Je su ̱ ta ite pi tula je ju wäjienak ki ̱ ka , ñakäi ji biköle tso ̱ jeska ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ klä je ki ̱ ka .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi ra , elkje ra ji biköle rä siki tele pi wà , ata ka ji pi kjeneju ̱ ra , ka sä rä janakwa ̱ bitaba kuna .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Jekäi je ji wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ klä tso ̱ yöle ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir je ja ̱ mi kiana rä siki tenak jekäi ji we ̱ wà , ata ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ia ̱ ibäi si ̱ ne sherke ̱ me ̱ nakka ̱ rä , je iwe ̱ jekäi tsa ̱ ta .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Jekäi Cristo ka baka ̱ newa ̱ ju ja ̱ r dälätsalewa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ yöle jula wà ja ̱ rka kuna . Je rä iwa si ̱ me ̱ i ebä . Ata ikjawa ̱ rä ka ̱ jöir si ̱ ska , jira je ̱ k kjashäk Säkeklä wäna saje wa ki ̱ ka ,

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: je rä ka ije ̱ k ju ̱ akläksa ̱ ka ̱ raa kuna , jishtä chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa kjäke ̱ wa ̱ año año wà je Ju Ja ̱ r Dälätsalewa ̱ E ̱ e ̱ na Si ̱ ska , jile pi wäkse käi kuna .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: Ikuna rä jekäi ra , ikiana rä ji shka ̱ l ssäk ka ̱ raa ji biköle yöleksa ̱ skaté , ata jira sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä e ̱ r dawa ̱ kja ra , ije juena etaba kicha yebä , je rä iwa ̱ sa ̱ nui wäshewa ̱ kläwa ̱ iwakei je ̱ k ma ̱ ka ̱ wà .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Jekäi jishtä sä biköle ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ na sä duäkläwa ̱ etaba kicha yebä , je ukä ska sä rä ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ ,

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: jekäi ñaebä Cristo ju ̱ naksa ̱ etaba kicha yebä iwa ̱ sä chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ nui tsa ̱ ju ̱ aklämi , je itäki ̱ ijuermini etäbä kicha , ka je rä sa ̱ nui ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä yi te idäke ̱ ki ̱ ssëke ̱ pjoo jewa tsa ̱ tkäkläksa ̱ iwa ̱ .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Iwa rä ka ̱ wei rä ji bäi däke ̱ ji ̱ a je me ̱ i ebä , ka je rä iwak si ̱ kuna . Je ne ki ̱ ka a ̱ ni ka je ia ̱ ñasikäkwa ̱ alemana wa parunak bulee , bewak me ̱ ka ̱ iku ̱ r käi ebä año año je oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Ikuna rä jekäi ra , ka iwa ̱ ime ̱ nakka ̱ ji ̱ a , ñera je wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k wa siki tena etaba kicha yebä ra , jera ka jewa ssënak ji ̱ a nui ta .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Ata je jile me ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ wà sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ rke ̱ año año wà sa ̱ nui ska .

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , toro pi irä cabra jäyiri wa pi irä , je ia ̱ ka sa ̱ nui tse ̱ nak ju ̱ nami kuna .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka idewa ̱ ju ̱ ka ̱ jiska ra , ite isha : “ Bewak me ̱ ka ̱ iräle jile me ̱ iräle ka je shene ba ki ̱ , ata ba te yis ia ̱ yaka ma ̱ .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Bewak däläwe ̱ wa ̱ iräle , jile ktewa ̱ sa ̱ nui ki ̱ iräle , ka je wà ba wäbatsa ̱ ne .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Jera yie isha : ‘ Säkeklä , yis deju ̱ e ̱ ná ba ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ je wa ̱ k , jishtä äyë butälewa ̱ ki ̱ yis ktei yöle katke käi . ’ ”

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Je ite isha säkätä : “ Bewak me ̱ ka ̱ iräle , jile me ̱ iräle , bewak däläwe ̱ wa ̱ iräle , jile kte wa ̱ sa ̱ nui ki ̱ iräle , ka je shene ba ki ̱ , ka je wà bä wäbatsane . ” Jeshtä me ̱ rä ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi .

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: Je itäki ̱ ite isha : “ Yis deju ̱ e ̱ ná ba ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ je wa ̱ k . ” Jekäi ije te isäkätä tsa ̱ ju ̱ ami iwa ̱ ietkä tkäkläwa ̱ ni .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Jekäi ije ki ̱ ji sherke ̱ o ̱ nak wà , sä rä siki tele Jesucristo yaka me ̱ naksa ̱ oloi ja ̱ mi etaba kicha yebä .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Chui wa biköle käjäklä rä buliri buliri ikja ̱ nei wa ̱ k , bewak me ̱ nakka ̱ ka ̱ raa ebä ma ̱ kka ̱ , ata je ia ̱ mik a ̱ ni ka sa ̱ nui tse ̱ nak ju ̱ nami kuna .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: Ata ije te jile me ̱ nakka ̱ ma ̱ ka ̱ sa ̱ nui ki ̱ rä etaba kicha yebä , kjepa ije ̱ tkawa ̱ Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Jeskami ije te iki ̱ ssëte ma rä ibolki wa tulunacha ̱ wa ̱ iklä tkäkläka ̱ ye kje .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jile me ̱ le etkabä wà , ite iwa ̱ siki tenak wa parua bulee , del ye .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Wikblu Sikina te je ktei she sa ̱ ia ̱ ñaebä . Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ite jikäi isha :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: “ Je ke ̱ i itä ska yis kablämi ijewa ra jikäi : Yie yis ka ̱ wei tkemiwa ̱ ijewa je ̱ r ska , yie je yuetkemi ijewa je ̱ rike ska , jekäi Säkekewa te ishe rä . ”

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Jeska ite iki ̱ sha ji ̱ a : “ Ijewa ji yakei wakblele , ijewa ji o ̱ le ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi kuna , jeska ka yis je ̱ r ja ̱ nak ji ̱ a a ̱ ni . ”

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Sa janawa ̱ bitaba jekäi ji ki ̱ ka ra , ka jiye ji sher ji ̱ a me ̱ nak sa ̱ nui ki ̱ ka .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Jekäi el wa , ka ̱ tso ̱ sä kjäkläwa ̱ ka suale ta ija ̱ r Dälätsalewa ̱ E ̱ e ̱ na Si ̱ ja ̱ rka Jesucristo pi oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: Je te ña ̱ la spa ̱ na kseka kjäya ja ̱ wa ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ , sä kjäkläwa ̱ julu ija ̱ r bala tkele sua wà ekta wà . Je ne rä iwakei yaka rä .

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: Ñakäi sä rä chui bakleka ̱ ta , je rä Säkeklä ju ska tso ̱ wa je wäsikäk .

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ñasiköwa ̱ je ̱ rike bulee wà , ji biketsale etkabä , je ̱ rike siki tele ka ssër ta ji ̱ a nui ta , yaka pasukle diklä yëë wà .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Sa ̱ ku ̱ ki ̱ ssënak sa ̱ wa ̱ ktei yinak sa ̱ wa ̱ je kuköwa ̱ därërë ka wäbuka ̱ nak kuna . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , kabläk sa ̱ ia ̱ te ji we ̱ rä bulee ki ̱ ka .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ ku ̱ ibiketsö maikäi ra sa ̱ ñaje ̱ rssëwa ̱ mi ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk käi , ji bäi wa ̱ k käi .

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: Ke sa ̱ ku ̱ ñatapawe ̱ jawa ̱ , jishtä moska wädular käi , ata bäi si ̱ ra bas ñaje ̱ rtäkiwo ̱ . Jekäi sa ̱ ku ̱ je wo ̱ pa ki ̱ ta si ̱ sa te ike ̱ i dawa ̱ ju ̱ kja su ̱ a ki ̱ ka .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna wäsi ̱ wa sa te ji yakei wakble sa te ji rä iyina ju ̱ ña ukä ska ra , ka ji kuna ji ̱ a me ̱ nakka ̱ sa ̱ nui ki ̱ .

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: Ata jekäi ra sa ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ ssënak rä däläna si ̱ , sa wabiketsarmiksa ̱ buka ̱ nak , ñakäi yökö wäkaleka ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na ibolki wa däläwa ̱ cha ̱ kläwa ̱ .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Yi te ji wá ̱ Moisés ka ̱ wei ukä ja ̱ mi ra , isu ̱ ak bol iräle mañal iräle te ishaka ̱ ra , je rä kota ̱ nakwa ̱ ka däläle ta sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ mi .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: Jera ¿ bikö bas ia ̱ ra Säkeklä yaba wätuäkwa ̱ klä wà , ñakäi sä kablele ñaia ̱ pií wà , irä siki tele je kukäkwa ̱ ka oloi ta , ñakäi Säkeklä wikblu je ̱ r bäi shäk kukäkwa ̱ diekjela , jewa buka ̱ nami rä na ?

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ale jikäi ishäk je wakei ju ̱ ñer sa ̱ wa ̱ : “ Yis ne rä sä kukäkwa ̱ nui ki ̱ rä . Yis ne te je nui kpemi rä . ” Ietkä rä : “ Säkekewa te iwakei cha wa ktei wabiketsemiksa ̱ buka ̱ nak . ”

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: ¡ Ji däläna si ̱ rä sä däwa ̱ Säkeklä kseka jula na buka ̱ nak !

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Jishtä bas dä säkätä ra jeska bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no . Bas wäji ̱ atkena ukä ska ra , bas te weikane sälwii ji ki ̱ je wäkuka .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: Maile ra bas kja yinak yakei , weikanak biköle wäna , ata maile ra bas dewa ̱ ña sa ̱ tso ̱ weikanak jekäi wa ra ñaebä .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bas je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sä wätelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa däläna , bas jile bakanaksa ̱ je katabla bas te je ̱ r ssële a ̱ naa . Bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas wa ̱ ji bäi si ̱ ka meräk kuna ne tso ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas wa ̱ biketsanak ke weikawa ̱ bas ku ̱ , je ne wà ji bäi si ̱ dämiksa ̱ bas ia ̱ rä ki ̱ ka .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Jekäi bas shena rä ji katabläk , je rä bas te Säkeklä ki ̱ ji shena je wá ̱ e ̱ ná ra , je wà bas wa ̱ iwakei kablele sa ̱ ia ̱ kukäkläwa ̱ .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , “ Kukjunabä ale däke ̱ ju ̱ té je däju ̱ rä , ka je wätkenak .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: ata ale wämo kolole yis wa ̱ , je se ̱ rmi ite ji biketsa etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi ; ikuna imineju ̱ ni je ̱ k itä wà ra , ka yis je ̱ r ssënak bäi ije ra . ”

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Ata ka saje wa rä sä minakmini je ̱ k itä wà weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ shtä wa kuna , ata saje wa rä sä ji biketsäk etkabä sa wakei se ̱ naklä ji ̱ a shtä wa .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Iwa rä ji biketse etkabä , je rä ji ki ̱ ssënak je biketsäk iyina si ̱ idämiksa ̱ , ji ka juenak kuna , je kukäk kte si ̱ ye .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Je ne wà sa ̱ mikle wa yina bäi rä .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä wà sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ a ite ji ke ̱ i biköle yöleksa ̱ rä Säkeklä ktä wà , jekäi ji juenak je yöleksa ̱ rä ji ka juenak kuna je ebä wà .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä wà Abel te ji bäi si ̱ ma ̱ ka ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ Caín cha tsa ̱ ta . Je wà ije yina ije rä wämo ni , je rä ji ma ̱ ka ̱ ite je sha Säkeklä te bäi . Iwakei rä dulewa ̱ , ata ije te ji biketsa etkabä wà ije ktäke ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka Enoc minetse ̱ mi ka iwa ̱ duewa ̱ su ̱ aklä kuna . Jekäi ka iko ̱ ne ji ̱ a , Säkeklä wa ̱ iminetse ̱ ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka imitse ̱ ba yika , iyile rä Säkeklä wäbatsa ije wa ni .

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: Ka sa ̱ wa ̱ ji biketsane etkabä ra , ka sa ̱ ia ̱ Säkeklä wäbätsenak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi ñasikäke ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi wa , jewa kiana ibiketsäk ije kaldu si ̱ , ñakäi ije ne rä ipayuläk wa ia ̱ ji ma ̱ k rä .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka Noé ia ̱ jile ka juerba bata yina ra , sualewa ̱ wà ite ko ̱ no yua iju ska tso ̱ wa tsa ̱ tkenakläksa ̱ . Je wà ite ka ̱ jiska wa kjatiawa ̱ , ñakäi je wà sä wabiketsarke ̱ ksa ̱ wämo ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka deksa ̱ iia ̱ däli ukä ye .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Säkeklä te Abraham kia ra , ite ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka ite issawa ̱ mineju ̱ mi ka ̱ me ̱ rke ̱ iia ̱ däli ukä ye ska . Jekäi imineju ̱ wa ̱ ka iju ̱ ñer mai imike ̱ räle käi .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka ise ̱ na ka ̱ etkä wa ye Säkeklä kablele ka ̱ ma ̱ k iia ̱ ska . Jeska ise ̱ na ju ji ̱ atkenak shtä na , jishtä Isaac irä Jacob irä se ̱ le käi . Jewa rä je ikablele kukäkña däli ukä ye .

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije te jukläyäkä ñak wäkukäklä ta bäi si ̱ ne ki ̱ ssa rä . Je ju me ̱ i yuäkksa ̱ , ñakäi iyuäkka ̱ rä Säkeklä .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Sara rä ko ̱ le ka yaba su ̱ ak kuna , jeiräta ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka itäkina ije batala wätsikiwa ̱ k , mika ̱ irä säkibi ra . Je rä ije te ibiketsa ale kabläk iia ̱ je rä ji wa ̱ k bulee ki ̱ ka .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka eklabä ale yaka ska dulewa ̱ kja käi , jeska ibatala chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wanaté jishtä bekwä tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska käi , jishtä däyë kse ̱ i ka shtao ̱ nak kje käi .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: Ijewa kalabe duacha ̱ wa ̱ ji biketsale etkabä ja ̱ mi , Säkeklä kablele ji ma ̱ k ka kolole käi . Ata ijewa te je su ̱ a ka ̱ miika , te issëwa ̱ baa sa damiju ̱ kja iska käi . Ñakäi ijewa te isha jí ka ̱ ki ̱ ka ra ijewa rä ka ̱ etkä wa ye ni , shkäk maitjä wa ye ni .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Yi te ishe jekäi ra , je wà sa ̱ je ̱ r ku ̱ e ite , ka ̱ saka ne yule rami ijewa te iwakwa cha ye rä .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Ikuna rä ijewa te ike ̱ i jalewa ̱ ta ̱ na iwa ̱ je biketse rami ji ̱ a ra , jera ka ̱ tso ̱ ijewa ia ̱ idäkläni jeska .

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: Ata ijewa wäbatsa rä ka ̱ bäi si ̱ ne wà , je rä sä te ishe ra ka ̱ jöir . Je ne ki ̱ ka Säkeklä ka äine ki ̱ nak ijewa Kekläí ni . Je rä ijewa ia ̱ iwa ̱ jukläyäkä tso ̱ yöle e ̱ ná ki ̱ ka .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Abraham mablena su ̱ na ra , ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka , ite Isaac ma ̱ ka ̱ . Ñe Säkeklä kablele kukäk , je wakei te iyaba eklabä ma ̱ ka ̱ .

text: Of whom it was said , That in Isaac shall thy seed be called :
text2: Ata je ne yile rä : “ Isaac ne ja ̱ mi ba batala kirmi rä . ”

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: Ata Abraham te ibiketsa Säkeklä rä täkili ta sä shki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni dulewa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , jekäi sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä jeska Isaac deksa ̱ ni iia ̱ rä .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä wà Isaac te Jacob irä Esaú irä ia ̱ ji bäi sha o ̱ nak ji o ̱ rmi ji ̱ a je ̱ na je ̱ napa je ja ̱ mi .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Jacob duärawa ̱ kja ra , ji biketse etkabä wà , ite José yabala ia ̱ ji bäi sha o ̱ nak ekla ekla iwakwa ja ̱ mi , ñakäi ite Säkeklä oloitsa kata ja ̱ mi je ̱ k ku ̱ lewa ̱ .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: Ike ̱ i dewa ̱ José duäkläwa ̱ ra , ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka , ite Israel batala wa rä minakksa ̱ ju ̱ lu je ktei sha , ñakäi ite ichichei mewe ̱ ke ̱ rä je ktei shata ̱ na .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Moisés ko ̱ na ra , iká irä , ia ̱ mi irä te ise ̱ newa ̱ blelewa ̱ tres mes bala na ijewa te ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te isu ̱ a ra je yaba rä baa si ̱ , jekäi ka isuane ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i te ka ̱ wei ma ̱ yika .

text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Moisés kënawa ̱ ra , ite ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka , ka iki ̱ ishene kinak ji ̱ a ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i yaba alaklä je yaba ni .

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: Ata ije ssëna ime weikarña Säkeklä cha wa ra ñara , ata ka ije ssëne ji yakei ssërke ̱ baa o ̱ nak kjäkju ̱ ebä wà ssënak a ̱ naa .

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: Ije te ibiketsa Säbäkäkksa ̱ kju ̱ ei weikane rä blune ta ̱ i , ji säkei ta tso ̱ Egipto ska biköle tsa ̱ ta , ije wä raa rä ji tso ̱ däkksa ̱ ska ki ̱ ka .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka ite Egipto jawa ̱ ta ̱ na , ka suale kuna ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i kju ̱ atkawa ̱ yika , jekäi ije chatkawa ̱ doloiebä sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä ite ale ka juenak kuna je su ̱ e rami käi .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä ki ̱ ka , ite sä ktäkwa ̱ bakleju ̱ ke ̱ i irä , pi tule irä ke ̱ i kjewa ̱ , je rä yabala säkätä wa ktäkcha ̱ wa ̱ wa ̱ ka jewa mewa ̱ klä kuna .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä wà , ijewa kjaksa ̱ julu Däyë Bätsëë na , sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä ka ̱ pjota ki ̱ ka käi , ata mika ̱ Egipto wa te imabla kjäksa ̱ julu jekäi ra , jewa wäitäbinacha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä wà , Jericó kjätkäklä minatkawa ̱ , ijewa te ipamanewa ̱ deka ̱ siete día ska ra .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: Ji biketse etkabä wà , alaklä pato ̱ nak shtä Rahab ka dunewa ̱ ña ka kte ssäk kuna wa ra . Je rä ite ka ̱ su ̱ ak wa patkele jewa kiawa ̱ je ̱ r baa wà ki ̱ ka .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: ¿ Jibä saka she ji ̱ a yie na ? Ka yis wä däkksa ̱ yis wa ̱ Gedeón irä , Barac irä , Sansón irä , Jefté irä , David irä , Samuel irä , ñakäi jile bata shäk wa irä , jewa pakäkläksa ̱ .

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: Ji biketse etkabä wà , ijewa te ke ̱ i ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ke ̱ i baka tulaksa ̱ , ijewa te ji wämo wá ̱ , Säkeklä kablele je kukawa ̱ ijewa te , na ̱ ma ̱ kà wäyitewa ̱ cha ̱ wa ̱ ijewa te ,

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: yökö oloo wäshtawa ̱ ijewa te , espada kà cha ̱ jolowa ̱ ijewa te . Ijewa ja ̱ lmanacha ̱ wa ̱ ska ra itäkili je ̱ nani . Ijewa täkina täkii ñakpäk . Ijewa te ka ̱ etkä wa guardiaí wa juluwa ̱ kjami .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Alaklä wa ia ̱ iyështä wa dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa shki ̱ na tulaka ̱ ni . Isaka weikana sälwii , ka jewa ssëne bakanakksa ̱ , iwa ̱ sa ̱ shki ̱ rke ̱ ka ̱ ni bäi si ̱ kukäkläwa ̱ .

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: Jekäi isaka kolonawa ̱ ja ̱ ñetsanak , buka ̱ nak ksabata wà , ka je ebä kuna , ata imo ̱ na cadena wà , iwätena sä jiäklä ska .

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: Manele tena jak wà , manele tenaksa ̱ serrucho wà , manele mablena su ̱ na , manele kota ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ espada wà . Ijewa kja jöina diana pajiele oveja kjuä cabra kjuä ebä wà , ka jita , weikalecha ̱ wa ̱ , su ̱ nak sälwii .

text: ( Of whom the world was not worthy : ) they wandered in deserts , and in mountains , and in dens and caves of the earth .
text2: Ka ̱ jiska wa rä ka bäi kuna ki ̱ ka ka ijewa ia ̱ ka ̱ kuna ijewa se ̱ newa ̱ klä ji ̱ a . Jekäi ijewa shkä rami ka ̱ ssi ̱ lewa ̱ pjoo na , ka ̱ tsä na , ishäkä wäja ̱ r na , ka ̱ wäja ̱ r na .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Ijewa biköle rä ktei yile bäi ijewa te ji biketsa etkabä ki ̱ ka , jeiräta ijewa ia ̱ Säkeklä kablele ji ma ̱ k je ka deneksa ̱ .

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä wa ̱ jile bäi si ̱ tso ̱ saje wa ia ̱ , je rä ka ijewabä däkläwa ̱ parule bulee , ata saje wa däkläwa ̱ ijewa raña .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Jekäi sa ̱ su ̱ ak wa tso ̱ sa pája ̱ mi chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ mo ̱ käi , je ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ku ̱ ji kirii biköle käi , ji yakei sä wäbutrewa ̱ k tjabana käi je tulöksa ̱ . Jekäi sä juluno ka jalewa ̱ ta , bikö sä wätsa ̱ k iña ̱ le ̱ i tso ̱ ji ̱ a je wà ,

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: wä tkelewa ̱ Jesús ale ji biketse etkabä wätsikiwa ̱ k , ñakäi ibata paruäk , je ebä su ̱ ak . Ssëne a ̱ naa tso ̱ kja iia ̱ ki ̱ ka ite cruz katabla , äine ka biketsane iwa ̱ . Jeska ra ije ̱ tkawa ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ tkäklä sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ye ska , jula wämo kja ̱ ne .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Ale weikale jekäi ji yakei wakbläk wa wa ̱ je katabläk je biketsö bas ku ̱ jishtä ije rä , je rä ka bas je ̱ r ska bas shtirinacha ̱ kläwa ̱ kuna , ka bas wätuina jolonaklä kuna .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas ñakpäke ̱ ji yakei ra , ka bas wa ̱ je wäkolorba sä pi kjaju ̱ kje .

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: ¿ Bas je ̱ r shenacha ̱ wa ̱ kja jiräni sa ̱ ia ̱ iyile jishtä yabala ia ̱ ji she käi ska na ? “ Yis yaba , Säkekewa te bä dulawe ̱ ke ̱ , ke je kukawa ̱ ka dälätsale ta käi , ite ba uñeke ̱ ra , ke ba dokona iyika .

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkekewa te iwa ̱ shka ̱ ta dulawe ̱ , ite iwa ̱ kolole iyabala ye jewa kpe . ”

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Je katablö bas dulanaklä . Säkeklä te bas dulawe ̱ iyabala käi . Ata ¿ mane yaba ka dulane iká wa ̱ rä na ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Ata ka ije wa ̱ bas dulane kuna ra , jera bas dä yabala ña ̱ la wä shtä wa , ka iyabala si ̱ kuna .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Sa ká wa ka ̱ jiska wa bakle sä dulawa ̱ k , jera sä te ijewa dälätsa . Ata jekäi ra , ¿ ka je tsa ̱ ta si ̱ sä shena je ̱ k jäwa ̱ sä wikblu káí yika , sa ̱ se ̱ naklä kseka rä na ?

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Ijewa te sä dulawa ̱ elkje bala ta , jishtä iwakwa wäna ijuer bäi käi , ata ije te sä dulawe ̱ ke ̱ iwa ̱ sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäklä , je rä sä däkläwa ̱ ña wämo iwakei ra .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Sä dularke ̱ mane a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka sä ssënak a ̱ naa sä dularke ̱ ra , ata je rä sa ̱ je ̱ r iawa ̱ k . Ata je ukä ska sä dulale wa ia ̱ idämiksa ̱ issënaklä baa ji wämo kju ̱ ei .

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Je ki ̱ ka bas ku ̱ bas jula ja ̱ lmalecha ̱ wa ̱ , bas köchöwä karalecha ̱ wa ̱ täkiwo ̱ ,

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
text2: ñakäi ña ̱ la paruöksa ̱ bulee bas klä tkäklä , je rä klä ialewa ̱ wa ka tena ja ̱ naklä , ata ibäinakläni .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Bas ñajöksa ̱ se ̱ nak bitaba biköle ra , ñakäi se ̱ nak wämo , ata ka jekäi kuna ra , yi a ̱ ni wa ̱ ka Säkekewa su ̱ nak .

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: Bas se ̱ no tsa ̱ na , ka mane a ̱ ni wa ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ jäkläwa ̱ ka kolole käi , ka ji a ̱ ni ñak kicha bächii tsikinaklä bas weikäk , je wà ka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ ianakläwa ̱ ñá ye .

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: Ke yi a ̱ ni kunapa ka ̱ wakbläk , ka ji dälätsäk jishtä Esaú käi . Je te ji rä me ̱ nak yaba säkätä ia ̱ je manewa ̱ ksa ̱ ñanakwa ̱ kjelabä wà ̱ .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , je ukä ska ra bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ije ̱ r ssëna ji bäi yirmi o ̱ nak je kukäkwa ̱ däli ukä ye , ata iju ̱ naksa ̱ . Ite je kia ji ̱ a ji ̱ eleksa ̱ wà , jeiräta ka iia ̱ ideneksa ̱ pa , ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ ko ̱ ne ji ̱ a ije ̱ k manewa ̱ kläksa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Ka bas kuna delewa ̱ rä ka ̱ tsä passënakwa ̱ ska , yökö wäkaleka ̱ ska , ka ̱ tuilewa ̱ yee ska , ka ̱ tuii ska , si ̱ wa ̱ täkii ska ,

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: kökö bularke ̱ ska , kte ssërke ̱ täkii ska . Jekäi je ssäk wa ka ̱ kia ka iktäklä ji ̱ a ijewa ra ki ̱ ta .

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa ia ̱ ka ̱ wei me ̱ na : “ Ikuna bewakbä jibä klä tkawa ̱ je ka ̱ tsä ja ̱ mi ra , je rä kota ̱ nakwa ̱ tele jak wà . ” Je ka wäkolor ji ̱ a ijewa ia ̱ .

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: Je ji juena rä däläna si ̱ , ki ̱ ka Moisés te isha : “ Yis suanawa ̱ , yis paju ̱ naka ̱ . ”

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: Ata bas dewa ̱ julu rä ka ̱ tsä Sión ska , Säkeklä kseka jukläyäkäí ska , Jerusalén ka ̱ jöir ska , ángel wa tapale a ̱ naa miles miles jeska ,

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: iyabala säkätä wa kie yöle tso ̱ ka ̱ jöir jewa tapar tso ̱ ska , Säkeklä sä biköle ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ska , sä wämo wa parule bulee wikblu tso ̱ ska ,

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: Jesús ale sa kablele ñaia ̱ spa ̱ na je ktei shäk a ̱ miki ̱ jiki ̱ ska , ñakäi ije pi ji shäk bäi si ̱ Abel pi te ji sha tsa ̱ ta , je tulule ska .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Tsa ̱ na , ke bas ku ̱ ale ktäke ̱ bas da je ju ̱ akksa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa je ̱ r ku ̱ ak ka ̱ jiska ka ssëne ijewa wa ̱ ki ̱ ka ijewa ka baka ̱ ne shiri ra , jera saje wa si ̱ ka kjäk shiri ji shäk ka ̱ jöir skaté yika ikuna sa te iktä ju ̱ aksa ̱ ra .

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: Ikta te je ke ̱ i ska ra ka ̱ wäkpaka ̱ , ata jira ikabla , te isha : “ Etäbä kicha yie ka ̱ wäkpemika ̱ ni , ka ka ̱ jiska ebä kuna , ata ñakäi ka ̱ jöir . ”

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: Je ite sha : “ Etäbä kichani , ” je wà rä ji rä wäbuka ̱ nak rä tse ̱ nakju ̱ mi , je rä ji yöleksa ̱ . Je rä ji ka wäbuka ̱ nak kuna a ̱ ta ̱ nakläta ̱ na .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Ata sa ̱ ia ̱ gobierno ka wäbuka ̱ nak kuna rä deleksa ̱ . Je ki ̱ ka sa ̱ ku ̱ wekte shö del , je wà sa ̱ ku ̱ Säkeklä kja ̱ nei wo ̱ iwäbätsäklä , dälätsalewa ̱ sualecha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , saje wa kekläí rä yökö ji däläwa ̱ kwa ̱ itjä .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö del ñaje ̱ keta wa käi .

text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers : for thereby some have entertained angels unawares .
text2: Ke bas je ̱ r shena sa saka kiäkwa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , manele te iwá ̱ jekäi , jera jewa te ángel wa ne kiawa ̱ ka ju ̱ ñele iwa ̱ rä .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no wätelecha ̱ wa ̱ ska , sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä bas dä wätelecha ̱ wa ̱ ña ijewa ra käi , ñakäi sä weikarke ̱ wa ska , sa ̱ me ̱ ishärä bas wakwa yaka ne weikarke ̱ rä käi .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Se ̱ lewa ̱ wa kiana rä dälätsalewa ̱ biköle wa ̱ ; ikäpäklä shena rä sikii ka yakei tele ta . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkeklä te ka ̱ wakblewa ̱ k wa irä , manenak wa irä , ktei wabiketsemiksa ̱ .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Bas kiana dulanak rä ka inaklä shka ̱ li ̱ bläk kuna ; ssënak a ̱ naa ji tso ̱ bas wa ̱ ebä wa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije wa ̱ iyile : “ Mik a ̱ ni ka yis wa ̱ ba janakwa ̱ , mik a ̱ ni ka yis wa ̱ ba ju ̱ nakta ̱ na . ”

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka sa te isheke ̱ ka suale ta : “ Säkekewa ne rä yis tsa ̱ tkäk rä . Ka yis suanakwa ̱ . ¿ Ji we ̱ mi ditsä te yis ukä ja ̱ mi na ? ”

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Bas je ̱ r ja ̱ no bas wäsikäk wa ska . Jewa te bas pakta Säkeklä ktä wà . Jekäi jishtä ijewa se ̱ le bakle je biketsö bas ku ̱ , ñakäi jishtä ijewa te ji biketse etkabä rä mablö bas ku ̱ .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: Jesucristo rä idel mikle irä , jira irä jekjeyemi irä .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Ke bas ñajawa ̱ sa pauta ̱ nake ̱ saka saka jaule ja ̱ mi minak . Ata ñaje ̱ rtäkiwa ̱ k Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ wà , je ne rä bäi rä ; ka irä ji ñanak wà kuna . Ka je kiar je shtä wa ̱ k wa ia ̱ ji a ̱ ni ye .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Saje wa rä jile däläwa ̱ klä ta kju ̱ awa , ata ju wäjienak wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k wa ia ̱ ka ka ̱ kuna je wame ̱ leka ̱ kätäk .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , bewak pi rä minakwa ̱ tse ̱ chui tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa ̱ , ija ̱ r dälätsalewa ̱ e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ska sa ̱ nui ki ̱ ka , ata iyaka rä dälänakwa ̱ ijewa ju ji ̱ atkele tso ̱ ektaka .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka Jesús te ji shka ̱ l ssa rä jukläyäkä kjäshtäklä ektaka , je wà iwa ̱ ditsä siki tewa ̱ klä iwakei pi wà .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Jekäi sä kjöksa ̱ julu minak ije wäki ̱ , ju ji ̱ atkele tso ̱ ektaka dokoitsanak ije käi .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Iwa rä ka sa ̱ wa ̱ jiska jukläyäkä kuna tkelewa ̱ jekjeye , ata saje wa te rä idäke ̱ wa ̱ ji ̱ a ne yule kate rä .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ije oloi ja ̱ mi sa ̱ ku ̱ Säkeklä kjeishö del , jile me ̱ ka ̱ iia ̱ ye . Je rä ikie ktei bata she sä kjäbata wà bäi .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Ke bas je ̱ r shenak ji bäi we ̱ ska , ñatsa ̱ tke jile wà ska . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ji me ̱ ka ̱ jekäi ne wà Säkeklä wäbätsä rä .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Bas ku ̱ bas wäsikäk wa ktä dälätsö , jewa yika bas ñajöcha ̱ wa ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te bas su ̱ eke ̱ tsa ̱ na , ijewa ka ̱ wä ta je ̱ k ktei shäk ji ̱ a jishtä ishkabla rä käi ki ̱ . Jekäi ijewa ktä dälätsö ijewa wa ̱ iwa ̱ klä ssële a ̱ naa wà , ka kteleka ̱ ta . Ata ka jekäi kuna ra , ka jiye je kiar bas ia ̱ .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Bas ka ̱ kiö sá ki ̱ ka . Sá te ibiketse sá je ̱ r ssër dä bäi ka nui ta , jekäi sá ssëna ñawäsikäk bäi ji biköle ska .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Jekäi ki ̱ ta yie bas pake je wa ̱ k , yis däkläksa ̱ ni mane mane bas ia ̱ .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Jekäi Säkeklä sä ssëwa ̱ k baa , sä kablele ñaia ̱ jekjeye pií ki ̱ ka , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús , ale oveja kjänanak bäi si ̱ , je tsa ̱ ktéka ̱ sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na ,

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: je ku ̱ bas tsa ̱ tköpa ji bäi biköle wà , bas wa ̱ ji sherke ̱ iki ̱ ka je wa ̱ klä , ñakäi ije ku ̱ ji rä bäi ije ia ̱ je kja ̱ nei wo ̱ pa sa wakwa ska , Jesucristo ale oloi kanakka ̱ sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi je oloi ja ̱ mi . Amén

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: El wa , yis te bas pake jí kte bas tsa ̱ tkäklä je wäkukäk , yis te iyua rä tsi ̱ ne ki ̱ ka .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Yis te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ eke ̱ sä el Timoteo yenaksa ̱ ni . Jekäi ikuna ideju ̱ mane mane ra , yis da idamiña bas su ̱ ak .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Bas te ishe bas wäsikäk wa biköle ia ̱ irä , sä sikii wa biköle ia ̱ irä yie ijewa chakami . Italia wa te bas chakami .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Je ̱ r bäi yinopa bas biköle ia ̱ .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Santiago , Säkeklä irä Säkekewa Jesucristo irä kjanaklä , te ji yue mar ditsei wä däka ̱ doce minelemi kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa wa ia ̱ . Bas ssënopa bäi .

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Bas yis el wa , mika ̱ bas mablerke ̱ jile saka saka wa ra , je sha ̱ na bas ssëno a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ ,

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer , bas mablerke ̱ bikö bas te ji biketse etkabä rä í ̱ ki ̱ ka , te sä dulawe ̱ jile katabläk .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
