text2: Jekäi je ji katable je wäkukö , ji wá ̱ ite e ̱ nawa ̱ kje , je rä bas däkläwa ̱ këlewa ̱ , deleksa ̱ ñawäsaka , ka kialewa ̱ ta ji a ̱ ni ska .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Jekäi ikuna bas manele ki ̱ je ̱ rike shena ji ̱ a ra , je ku ̱ ikiö Säkeklä ji ma ̱ k biköle ia ̱ shka ̱ ja ̱ ka wi ̱ le ta kuna wakei ia ̱ , jera je ia ̱ ime ̱ rmi .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: Ata je ku ̱ ikiö biketsale si ̱ , ka biketsale ta ka le io ̱ nak ni . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te ibiketsa ka le io ̱ nak ni ra , je rä jishtä däyë tjuäke ̱ ju ̱ e siwa ̱ te a ̱ miki ̱ jiki ̱ käi .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Je wakei ku ̱ ke ibiketsa Säkekewa te ji me ̱ mi iia ̱ ni .

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: Jekäi je ji biketsäk botkä te ji we ̱ rä ka tkelewa ̱ ye kuna mai idami biköle ska .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: Sä el ka jita , je je ̱ k ssöpa irä oloi kanakka ̱ wà .

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: Ata mane rä blu ra , je je ̱ k ssöpa irä oloi ja ̱ nakwa ̱ wà , ije rä kjäkju ̱ jishtä ka ̱ tsitsiwäí käi ki ̱ ka .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Ka ̱ wä deka ̱ ju ̱ ra , ibali täkili te je ka ̱ kä ssi ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ wa ̱ , te iwärukjei ja ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ksa ̱ , jera ka ijuerta ji ̱ a baa . Je su ̱ ta ñaebä blu wa ji ̱ alirmiwa ̱ , iji wa ̱ te sha ̱ na .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Bäije mablene katabläk wa rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , imablena deksa ̱ e ̱ ná bäi ra , Säkeklä kablele se ̱ ne kseka ma ̱ k ishka ̱ li ̱ bläk wa ia ̱ corona ye je dämiksa ̱ iia ̱ .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Ke yi a ̱ ni ku ̱ isha mika ̱ ije ̱ r kinawa ̱ ji yakei wakbläk ra : “ Säkeklä ne te yis je ̱ r ki ̱ wa ̱ iwa ̱ k rä ni . ” Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ji a ̱ ni yakei ia ̱ Säkeklä je ̱ r kinak , ñakäi ka irä yi a ̱ ni je ̱ r kiwa ̱ k ji yakei wa ̱ k kuna .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: Ata sa ̱ je ̱ r kirke ̱ ji yakei wa ̱ k ra , je rä sa wakei ja ̱ mi ji tkerke ̱ ne te sä wäsikewe ̱ ke ̱ , ñakäi sä wäbätsewe ̱ ke ̱ rä .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Jekjepa mika ̱ je ji tkerke ̱ sa ̱ ja ̱ mi tsikinaka ̱ ra , sa te ji yakei wakble mar . Je wakbla e ̱ ná sa te ra , je te sä wätse ̱ ke ̱ mi duäkwa ̱ .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: El wa shka ̱ ta yis wa ̱ , ke bas ñawäyuawa ̱ .

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Ji me ̱ nak bäi biköle , ji me ̱ le bulee biköle datse ̱ rä ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ka , patkele ji wäñinak tsikinewa ̱ k wakei wa ̱ . Ije rä ka manenakksa ̱ kuna , ka oloi iar ta kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kuna .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Ije wakei ki ̱ ishena ki ̱ ka , ije te sä wätsikiwa ̱ kte yina si ̱ wà . Je rä sä däkläwa ̱ ji yöleksa ̱ iwa ̱ tsa ̱ säkätä ye .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: El wa shka ̱ ta yis wa ̱ , bas je ̱ r ko ̱ nopa , sä biköle kiana ji ssäk rä bitaba , ata ka ji shäk kuna plaa , ñakäi ka kju ̱ atkäk kuna plaa .

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ kju ̱ atkä wà , ka sa ̱ manenakksa ̱ Säkeklä rä wämo käi .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ji ñá käi biköle , ji we ̱ mika ̱ wäsi ̱ wa ki ̱ ta käi , je ju ̱ oksa ̱ bas ku ̱ . Ata bas ku ̱ kte tkelema ̱ bas je ̱ r ska , täkili ta bas tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ , je kukö je ̱ k jalewa ̱ wà .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Jekäi bas kiana rä kte wawa ̱ k , ka issäk ssële ebä kuna . Ata ka jekäi kuna ra , je rä bas wakwa je ̱ k wäyuä .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna yile rä kte ssäk , ata ka irä iwawa ̱ k kuna ra , je rä jishtä ekla wäktä su ̱ a espejo na käi .

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: Ije ̱ k su ̱ a e ̱ ná mineju ̱ mi ra , plaabä ra ije ̱ r shenawa ̱ jishtä irä ska .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: Ata yi te ka ̱ wei bulee sä wetsäkksa ̱ je su ̱ e tsa ̱ na , ichatkäwa ̱ je ja ̱ mi ka issäk kjepa je ̱ r shenakwa ̱ kuna , ata iwawa ̱ k si ̱ ra , jera bäije jekäi iwa ̱ k rä .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Ikuna manele te ibiketse irä ka ̱ ju ̱ ñak ra , ata ka ikjä pakolone ji shäk ra , je rä iwakei je ̱ k wäyuä , ata ije ka ̱ ju ̱ ña rä ka wata .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe sikii , ka yakei tele ta Säkeklä Sa Ká wäna , je rä jikäi : shchul wa irä , alaklä wa chichö wa irä tsa ̱ tke ijewa weikarke ̱ sha ̱ na , ñakäi se ̱ nak ka pate ̱ leka ̱ kuna ka ̱ jiska ji tso ̱ wa ̱ .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Yis el wa , bas ku ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo baawa ̱ si ̱ biketsö , ka ji wa ̱ k kuna sa saka ia ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ekla daju ̱ bas ñatapawa ̱ ke ̱ ska anillo ta yöle oro wà , je ̱ k pajiele sua baa wà , jera ñakäi ekla ka jita daju ̱ je ̱ k pajiele sua tja ̱ ma ̱ a ̱ wà ra ,

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: jera bas te je sua ta baa su ̱ e je ̱ r baa wà , je ia ̱ bas te ishe : “ Jí je ̱ tkäklä bäi ska ma je ̱ tkö . ” Ata je ka jita ia ̱ bas te ishe : “ tsu jeka ba kaldu ” ni iräle , “ ma je ̱ tkö i ̱ ski ̱ yis klä säkätä ja ̱ mi ” ni iräle .

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: Jera ¿ ka irä je wà bas dä sa ̱ su ̱ ak kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa na ? ¿ Ka irä je wà bas ianacha ̱ wa ̱ sä wabiketsäk je ̱ rike yakei wà na ?

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: El wa shka ̱ ta yis wa ̱ , issö : ¿ Ka irä Säkeklä te ka ̱ jiska ka jita wa kuka blu ye ji biketse etkabä ska na , ñakäi ikablele yi wa ̱ ishka ̱ l wa ia ̱ igobiernoí ma ̱ kksa ̱ je kukäk däli ukä ye na ?

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: Ata bas te ka jita wa weike diekjela . ¿ Ata ka irä blu wa ne te bas wañeke ̱ kuna rä na ? ¿ Ka irä ijewa ne te bas sike jeke ̱ mi sä ktei wabiketsäklä ska rä na ?

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: ¿ Ka irä ijewa ne te ale bas kile kie baa ja ̱ mi je sheke ̱ kte yakei wà rä na ?

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: Sa ̱ Tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ka ̱ wei : “ Ba ku ̱ ba saka shka ̱ li ̱ blö jishtä ba wakei je ̱ k shka ̱ l käi ” , je wawá ̱ bas te iyina si ̱ iyöle ja ̱ mi ra , jera bas te iwá ̱ rä bäi .

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: Ata bas te ji we ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa sa saka ia ̱ ra , jewa bas te ji yakei wakbla , jera je ka ̱ wei te bas kjashemiwa ̱ jishtä ka idälätsäk kuna wa käi .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Iwa rä , yi te ka ̱ wei biköle wawá ̱ , ata etka ska ishirinawa ̱ ra , je rä ite ji wakbla ka ̱ wei biköle ukä ja ̱ mi .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ale ishäk : “ Ke ma manenak ” , je te ñaebä isha : “ Ke sa ktawa ̱ . ” Jekäi ka ba manene , ata ba te sa ktawa ̱ ra , ba ianawa ̱ rä ka ka ̱ wei dälätsäk kuna käi .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Jekäi bas ktö , jekäi bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ , jishtä sa ̱ tso ̱ kja wabiketsanakksa ̱ ka ̱ wei sä wetsäkksa ̱ ja ̱ mi jewa käi .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ka yi daläne ra , je wabiketsarmiksa ̱ ka däläle ta . Jekäi je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sä dälänak , je tu ̱ rmika ̱ ktei wabiketsaneksa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Yis el wa , ikuna yilé te ishe irä ji biketsäk etkabä ni , ata ka iwa ̱ iwao ̱ ne ra , ¿ jiye je kiar ? Jera ¿ baishe ite ji biketsa etkabä ia ̱ itsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ na ?

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Ikuna manele sä el wa iräle sä kuta wa iräle tso ̱ ka jienak ta , ji ñanak buliri buliri ka ta ra ,

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: jewa ia ̱ bas manele te ishe : “ Bas kjöpa bäi , bas je ̱ k pajiöpa baana , bas ji ñopa bäi ” , ata ji sherke ̱ iyaka ki ̱ ka me ̱ ne bas wa ̱ iia ̱ ra , jera ¿ jiye je kiar ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Je su ̱ ta sa te ji biketsa etkabä , ata ka sa ̱ wa ̱ iwao ̱ ne ra , jera sa te ji biketse etkabä je rä iwakei ebä ra dulewa ̱ käi .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: Ata manele te ishemi : “ Ba rä ji biketsäk etkabä , ata yis dä ji wa ̱ k iwà . ” Ba ku ̱ ba te ji biketse etkabä kjashö yis ia ̱ ka ji o ̱ le kuna iwà , jera yie ba ia ̱ yis te ji biketse etkabä kjashemi iwawe ̱ wà .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Ba te ibiketse Säkeklä rä eklabä . Ba te iwá ̱ rä bäi . Ata be te je biketse ñaebä , ñakäi ipaju ̱ rke ̱ iyika .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Jera ji biketse etkabä ka ji o ̱ le kuna iwà , ka kiar jiye , ¿ je ka ju ̱ ñakle ba ka je ̱ r ta te na ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Saje wa ká Abraham te iwakei yaba Isaac ma ̱ ka ̱ ji däläwa ̱ klä ki ̱ ka ra , ¿ ka irä je ite ji wá ̱ ne wà iwabiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye rä na ?

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: Jirje ba te isu ̱ a , ji biketse etkabä wawá ̱ ite rä ite ji wá ̱ ra ñara , ñakäi ji biketse ite etkabä parunakksa ̱ bulee ite ji wá ̱ wà .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Jekäi io ̱ na kte yöle te ishe käi : “ Abraham te Säkeklä biketsa , je wà ibiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye to ̱ ne käi ” , ñakäi ikina rä Säkeklä salibä .

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Je wà bas te isu ̱ a sä wabiketsarksa ̱ wämo ye rä sa te ji we ̱ ne wà , ka je rä ji biketse etkabä je ebä wà kuna .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Je su ̱ ta , ¿ ka irä ñakäi alaklä pato ̱ nak shtä Rahab wabiketsanaksa ̱ wämo ye rä ji wá ̱ ite wà na ? Je rä ite ka ̱ su ̱ ak wa kiawa ̱ ju naka , ñakäi jewa patka ite ña ̱ la saka wà ki ̱ ka .

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Jekäi jishtä sa yaka rä ka wikblu ta ra , sä rä dulewa ̱ , je su ̱ ta ji biketse etkabä ka ji o ̱ le iwà ra , je rä dulewa ̱ .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Yis el wa , ke bas ñakuka chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ sa paktäk ye , sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer saje wa buka ̱ nami e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , sä biköle rä shirir ta saka saka . Ikuna ka yilé shirine ite ji sheke ̱ ska ra , je rä deleksa ̱ bulee , je ia ̱ je ̱ k wätkermi iyaka kalabe ska .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Jekäi sa te caballo kà jie rä iwa ̱ sä ktä ssäklä , je ra je wà sa te iwakei kalabe wäsike .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Ibiketsö , je su ̱ ta ko ̱ no rä , irä ta ̱ i minaktse ̱ si ̱ wa ̱ täkii wa ̱ . Jeiräta je rä wämanewa ̱ klä ta tsi ̱ ne , je wà iju ̱ ak te iju ̱ eke ̱ mai iki ̱ ishena minak käi .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Je su ̱ ta sä kjäktä rä sä wäjienaklä tsi ̱ ne , ata ta ̱ i je je ̱ k ssä rä . ¡ Ibiketsö , jishtä yökö wäkata tsi ̱ ne te kal yäkä ta ̱ i däläwe ̱ rä !

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: Jekäi sä kjäktä rä yökö , je rä ji yakei ka ̱ jiska . Sä kjäktä rä tkelewa ̱ sä wäjienaklä ja ̱ mi , je ne rä sa yaka biköle yakei tewa ̱ kwa ̱ rä . Je wäkawe ̱ ke ̱ ka ̱ rä sä tuläklämi yököí te . Je wäkar marka ̱ bikö sa ̱ se ̱ rke ̱ ji ̱ a kseka kje .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Jekäi bewak biköle du käi , je ̱ k sikäk wa käi , däyë wak saka saka käi , jewa rä jurbä tenak , je rä jurbä tele sa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: Ata yi a ̱ ni ia ̱ ka sä kjäktä jurbä tenak . Je rä ji iräle yakei ka wätkenak kuna , päpäli sä ktäkwa ̱ ebä .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Je wà sa te Säkekewa Sa Ká kjeishe , je ebä wà sä te ditsä yöleksa ̱ Säkeklä wakei su ̱ ta shene yakei .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Sä kjä ja ̱ r ebä ska , sä she bäi irä , sä she yakei irä däke ̱ ksa ̱ . Yis el wa , ka jekäi ikiar o ̱ nak .

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: ¿ Baishe diklä tsikirke ̱ ska ebä , idäksa ̱ mi tse ̱ e ̱ irä bächii irä na ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Yis el wa : ¿ Baishe higuera ia ̱ wänermi olivo ye na , uva kicha ia ̱ wänermi higo ye na ? Ñaebä diklä tsikinak däyë ebä , ka jeska idäkksa ̱ tse ̱ ta .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: ¿ Yi rä bas sha ̱ na ka ̱ biketsäk , ñakäi je ̱ r ko ̱ le rä na ? Je ku ̱ irä ji wa ̱ k bäi kjashö ise ̱ r bäi wà , ka ̱ biketsä ta je ̱ k jalewa ̱ .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: Ata ikuna bas je ̱ r ska , je ̱ r ki ̱ ñaiane sälwii irä , je ̱ k ssë tu ̱ leka ̱ irä tso ̱ ra , ke bas je ̱ k ssa , ñakäi ji yina si ̱ ukä ja ̱ mi ke bas ka ̱ yua .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Jeshtä ka ̱ biketse ka dar dä ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je rä ka ̱ jiska ji tso ̱ ja ̱ mi , sä del ja ̱ mi , be ja ̱ mi .

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , sa ̱ je ̱ r ki ̱ ñaiarke ̱ ra , sa ̱ je ̱ k ssäke ̱ tu ̱ leka ̱ ra , jera sa ̱ ñawätji ̱ wa ̱ mi , sä ji wa ̱ mi shia ̱ na ebä saka saka .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: Ata ka ̱ biketse dar ka ̱ sha ̱ ki ̱ , je rä sa ̱ se ̱ r wämo , jeska ra je rä ji we ̱ tsa ̱ na , je ̱ r baa wà , ji dälässë , je ̱ r bäi she ebä , ji we ̱ bäi ebä , ka ji wa ̱ k kuna sa ̱ ia ̱ kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa , ka ji wa ̱ k kuna su ̱ nak ebä .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Ji wämo wäí je rä tkenak bitaba ji paruäk wa wa ̱ .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: ¿ Bas sha ̱ na kju ̱ atke käi , ñakpe käi mai je datse ̱ rä ? ¿ Ka je datse ̱ rä bas wakwa wäbätsäke ̱ ji wà ska , je ne kju ̱ atkäke ̱ bas wäjienaklä ska rä na ?

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Bas ja ̱ mi ji tkerke ̱ , ata ka bas wa ̱ ikuna . Bas te sä kteke ̱ wa ̱ , ñakäi bas je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka iarke ̱ ijile ki ̱ ebä , ata ka bas ia ̱ ji däkksa ̱ . Bas ñakpäke ̱ , bas kju ̱ atkäke ̱ , ata ka bas wa ̱ ikuna , je rä ka bas wa ̱ ikine ki ̱ ka .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Bas te ji kia , ata ka bas ia ̱ idäksa ̱ . Je rä bas te ikia yakei wà , bas wakwa wäbätsäke ̱ ji wà jeskabä e ̱ nenakwa ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: ¡ Bas manenak wa ! ¿ Ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer sa ̱ je ̱ k bawa ̱ wa ̱ ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska ra , jera je rä sa ̱ kju ̱ atkä Säkeklä ra na ? Yi kianakle je ̱ k bawa ̱ k ji tso ̱ ka ̱ jiska ra , je iarmiwa ̱ Säkeklä bolki ye .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Ata iyöle te ishe : “ Wikblu patkele iwa ̱ se ̱ nak sa ̱ ja ̱ mi , je ja ̱ mi saje wa ssërke ̱ kju ̱ eitketsalee ” , ¿ je rä ba ia ̱ ra ka wata na ?

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: Ata ije ̱ r bäi shä ki ̱ ta sa ̱ ia ̱ , ki ̱ ite ishe : “ Säkeklä kju ̱ atkäke ̱ je ̱ k ssäk wa ra , ata je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ ije ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ . ”

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ñajöwa ̱ Säkeklä yika . Bas kju ̱ atkö be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i ra , jera ije tu ̱ rmi bas yika .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: Bas ñasiköwa ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi , jera ije je ̱ k sikämiwa ̱ bas ja ̱ mi . Bas ji yakei wakbläk wa , bas jula skuö tulömi ; bas ji biketsäk botkä wa , bas je ̱ rike siki tewo ̱ .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Bas je ̱ r iano , bas kjoyino , bas ji ̱ o . Bas ja ̱ ñe manewo ̱ ksa ̱ ji ̱ e wà ; ñakäi bas ssër a ̱ naa manewo ̱ ksa ̱ je ̱ r iane wà .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Bas ñajöcho ̱ wa ̱ Säkekewa wäna , jera ije te bas oloi kemika ̱ .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: El wa , ke bas kta yakei ñaukä ja ̱ mi . Yi ktäke ̱ yakei iel ukä ja ̱ mi iräle , yi te iel wabiketseke ̱ ksa ̱ iräle ra , je kta yakei rä ka ̱ wei ne ukä ja ̱ mi , je te ka ̱ wei ne wabiketsaksa ̱ rä . Ata ikuna ba te ka ̱ wei wabiketsaksa ̱ ra , ka ba rä ka ̱ wei wawa ̱ k kuna , ata iwabiketsäksa ̱ bä .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Ekla ebä ne rä sa ̱ ia ̱ ka ̱ wei ma ̱ k rä , ñakäi sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ rä , täkili ta sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ rä , ñakäi sä weikäkwa ̱ rä . Ata ¿ yi ba rä te ba saka wabiketseksa ̱ rä na ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Ñekja bas ishäk : “ Jir iräle bulia iräle , sä marmi ñe jukläyäkä ska , jeska sä ji wa ̱ mi un año ; sä jile watju ̱ ami sä blurmi , ”

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: ka bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer jibä o ̱ rmi bulia räle , jishtä bas kjämi räle . Ata bas dä mo ̱ juer berbena kjepa ka ijuena ji ̱ a käi .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Bäi si ̱ ra , we bas te ishe rä : “ Ikuna Säkekewa ki ̱ ishena ra , sá se ̱ rmi sá te ji we ̱ mi jikäi iräle , ñe käi iräle . ”

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Ata jira bas je ̱ k ssäke ̱ bas je ̱ k ki ̱ käke ̱ ka ̱ wà . Ata je shtä je ̱ k ssë biköle rä yakei .

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka yi wa ̱ ji we ̱ bäi ju ̱ ñer , ata ka ite je we ̱ ra , je rä ite ji yakei wakble .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: ¡ Ñekja blu wa ! Bas ji ̱ o , bas kjoyino , ji bäline dämiwa ̱ bas ki ̱ ka kju ̱ ei .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Bas bluna tjabana tkawa ̱ , bas sua katá tkawa ̱ iwak te .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Bas oro , bas inaklä , kukaka ̱ kolña te . Ikolñaí te bas kjatiemika ̱ , je te bas yaka e ̱ newe ̱ miwa ̱ yökö käi . Ata bas te ji säkei ta tapawa ̱ sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ska .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Shka ̱ bläk wa te bas ka ̱ ki ̱ däli wä tia , je säkei ka me ̱ ne bas wa ̱ ijewa ia ̱ je kjoyir kate , ñakäi je däli wä kukäk wa a ̱ r ssëna deka ̱ guardia wa Säkekewaí ska kje .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Bas se ̱ na ka ̱ jiska rä jile ta ji wà bas wäbätsä käi . Ji tkena bas ja ̱ mi käi je wá ̱ bas te ka wätkelewa ̱ ta . Bas je ̱ r ska bas ñaowa ̱ tulaka ̱ sä ktächa ̱ kläwa ̱ díaí ska .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Bas te sä wämo ktei wabiketsaksa ̱ , kjepa bas te iktawa ̱ , ata ka ije kju ̱ atkene .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka el wa , bas ku ̱ ji wäkukö je ̱ r baa wà ma rä Säkekewa däke ̱ ni kje . Jishtä däli tkäk te ishäkä ki ̱ ka ka ̱ li ̱ säkätä irä ka ̱ li ̱ bata irä ja ̱ rke ̱ je te ishäkä wawäwe ̱ ke ̱ kianak bäi si ̱ je ki ̱ ssë je ̱ r baa wà käi .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas ku ̱ ji wäkukö je ̱ r baa wà , bas je ̱ r täkiwo ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkekewa däke ̱ ju ̱ ke ̱ i tkenawa ̱ alemana .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: El wa , ke bas ñadälänetsa , ka bas buka ̱ naklä . ¡ Issö ! Sä ktei wabiketsäksa ̱ kaldu kja ju kjäshtäklä ska ki ̱ ka .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: El wa , jishtä jile bata shäk wa ktäk Säkekewa kie oloi ja ̱ mi , jewa wa ̱ ji sälwii katablele , ji wäkolole je mablö bas ku ̱ .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: ¡ Issö ! Sa jewa te ji wäkukäk wa she rä bäije ijewa rä . Bas wa ̱ Job wa ̱ ji katablele pake ssële , ñakäi bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer ibata ska ra ji wá ̱ Säkekewa te iia ̱ rä käi . Je wà ra sa ̱ wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer Säkekewa je ̱ r ja ̱ mi sä rä dälänak ta ̱ i , ñakäi irä je ̱ r bäi shäk .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Ata yis el wa , ji e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ka o ̱ nak kuna ne rä , ke bas kabla etkabä ka ̱ jöir wäkata ska iräle , ka ̱ jiska wäkata ska iräle , kable etkabä saka wà iräle , ata bas kiana ishäk rä “ ta ” ra ta , “ kai ” ra kai , je rä ka bas ktei wabiketsanakläksa ̱ kuna buka ̱ nak .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: ¿ Bas sha ̱ na manele weikarke ̱ na ? Jera je ka ̱ kiö . ¿ Bas manele ssëna a ̱ naa na ? Jera je ksö salmo wà .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: ¿ Bas sha ̱ na manele duäke ̱ na ? Jera je ku ̱ ñatapawa ̱ k wäkiri wa kiöté ka ̱ kiäk iki ̱ ka , aceite tkäkka ̱ iki ̱ Säkekewa kie oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Jekäi ka ̱ kie biketsale etkabä wà ra , duë ta tsa ̱ tkermiksa ̱ . Jera Säkekewa te ije ̱ kewe ̱ mika ̱ ni . Ñakäi iwa ̱ ji yakei rä wakblele ra , je rä janakwa ̱ bitaba .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas wa ̱ ji yakei wakblele shöka ̱ ñaia ̱ , bas ka ̱ kiö ñaki ̱ ka , bas bäinakläni . Sä wämo ka ̱ kiäke ̱ je rä täki ta jile o ̱ naklä bäi si ̱ .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: Elías rä ditsä saje wa käi ñaebä , ata ika ̱ kia e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ ka ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ naklä kuna . Jekäi ka ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ ne ka ̱ biköle ska däka ̱ tres año y seis mes bala na kje .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Jekäi etäbä kicha ika ̱ kiani , jera ka ̱ jöir te ka ̱ li ̱ ja ̱ wa ̱ ni , ishäkä te ji wäwa ̱ ni .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Yis el wa , ikuna bas sha ̱ manele mineju ̱ kju ̱ awa ji rä iyina si ̱ yika ra , manele te iki ̱ ma idäkläwa ̱ ni ra ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: je je ̱ r ko ̱ nopa , yi te yakei wakbläk tsa ̱ tka idami shirilewa ̱ ska idäkläwa ̱ ni ra , je rä ite iwetsaksa ̱ duewa ̱ yika , ñakäi je rä ite ji yakei wakblele iwa ̱ ta ̱ i je wäshewa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: Pedro , Jesucristo ktei bata shäk te jí yue mar , bas minelemi Ponto ska , Galacia ska , Capadocia ska , Asia ska , ñakäi Bitinia ska , kju ̱ awa wa ye jewa ia ̱ ;

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: kolole jini säkätäba Säkeklä Sa Ká wa ̱ ibiketsale ja ̱ mi , siki tenak iwikblu wà , Jesucristo dälätsäk , ñakäi ipi tulunaklä iki ̱ ka . Je ̱ r bäi yinopa bas ia ̱ , bas je ̱ r ssënopa baa ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo Ká iKekläí , je kjeiyinopa . Ije ̱ r bäi shä rä ta ̱ i wà , ite sä wätsikiwa ̱ ni spa ̱ na ji kseka ki ̱ ssäk , Jesucristo shki ̱ naka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na je oloi ja ̱ mi ,

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: je rä däli ukä ka tjabanak kuna , ka yakei tenak kuna , ka ji ̱ alinak kuna tso ̱ blele ka ̱ jöir ska , je ne kukäkläwa ̱ bas wa ̱ .

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: Bas dä blele Säkeklä täkili wà ji biketse etkabä oloi ja ̱ mi , je rä tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ tso ̱ kja yolole kjayinak sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra , je däkläksa ̱ bas ia ̱ .

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: Je ne te bas ka ̱ ssëwe ̱ ke ̱ a ̱ naa rä . Ka je ebä kuna , ata elkje balana bas shena je ̱ r ianak mablene saka saka wa ̱ ra , jera del bas ka ̱ ssäke ̱ a ̱ naa .

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: Je rä bas ji biketsa etkabä däkläksa ̱ bäi , jishtä oro weikanakwa ̱ jeiräta je rä mablenak yökö wà je säkei tsa ̱ ta , sä kjeiyinaklä , sä oloi kanakläka ̱ , sä oloitsanaklä Jesucristo kjayirke ̱ ska .

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: Bas wa ̱ ije shka ̱ l , ka bas wa ̱ isu ̱ le käi . Jira ka bas wäna ijuer , ata bas te ije biketsa . Bas ka ̱ ssäke ̱ ssële a ̱ naa ka yinak kje , baawa ̱ si ̱ ,

text: Receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
text2: jiye wata bas te ji biketsa etkabä rä je wadäke ̱ ksa ̱ bas ia ̱ ki ̱ ka , je rä ñe bas tsa ̱ tkerke ̱ ksa ̱ .

text: Of which salvation the prophets have inquired and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
text2: Je tsa ̱ tkeneksa ̱ ktei waju ̱ ñeke ̱ wachakeke ̱ pjoo , jile bata shäk wa , ale je ̱ r bäi yirmi bas ia ̱ je bata shäkba wa te .

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: Jekäi Cristo wikblu se ̱ nak ijewa ja ̱ rka te Cristo weikarmi je itäki ̱ ioloi karmika ̱ ni je bata shaba ra , ijewa te ibiketsa ta ̱ i , yibä si ̱ je rä , ñakäi mane si ̱ ke ̱ i wà je o ̱ rmi rä .

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: Ijewa ia ̱ ikjayina rä kte bata yinak jira bas ia ̱ kte baa shäk wa wa ̱ Wikblu Sikina patkeleté ka ̱ jöir ska oloi ja ̱ mi , je wakja ̱ neiwe ̱ ke ̱ ijewa te rä ka iwakwa ia ̱ kuna , ata bas ne ia ̱ . Je wà ángel waje kaje ssërke ̱ je ̱ r ko ̱ nak .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas kukano bas je ̱ rike ska . Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ . Je ̱ r bäi yirmi bas ia ̱ Jesucristo kjayina ra je ebä ne ki ̱ ssö rä .

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Uketa ka bas wa ̱ ji ju ̱ ñerba ra , ji tkena bas ja ̱ mi , ke je wà bas ñadulawa ̱ k ji ̱ a , jishtä yabala sä ktä ssäk wa käi .

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: Ata jishtä ale bas kukäk se ̱ r dä wämo , je su ̱ ta ñaebä bas se ̱ no wämo ji biköle ska .

text: Because it is written , Be ye holy ; for I am holy .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , iyöle katke : “ Bas se ̱ no wämo , yis se ̱ r dä wämo ki ̱ ka . ”

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Ikuna bas wa ̱ a ̱ netsanak Papá ni rä sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ ji o ̱ le sa ̱ wa ̱ ekla ekla ja ̱ mi ka kju ̱ awa kju ̱ awa kuna ra , jera bas shkä dami ji ̱ a berbena bala na , bas ñawäsike ̱ wo ̱ ekla ekla sualecha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer bas to ̱ leksa ̱ bas se ̱ r ka wata biteleté bas kalí wa ska je yika rä , ka ji tjabanakwa ̱ oro käi , inaklä käi wà kuna ,

text: But with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot :
text2: ata je rä pi säkei ta je ne wà , jishtä oveja yaba ka pate ̱ leka ̱ kuna , ka medele ta pi käi , je rä Cristo pi .

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , ije rä biketsale ka ̱ jiska ka yörksa ̱ ba yikaté , ata jira sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä bata jekje kjepa je kjayina bas kju ̱ ei .

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: Ije oloi ja ̱ mi bas te Säkeklä ale ishki ̱ wa ̱ kka ̱ ni dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa sha ̱ na , iia ̱ oloi ma ̱ k , je biketsa rä . Je rä bas wa ̱ ji biketsäklä etkabä , bas wa ̱ ji ki ̱ ssäklä , Säkeklä ja ̱ mi .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Bas ñajacha ̱ wa ̱ ji rä iyina si ̱ dälätsäk , je wà bas je ̱ k siki tewa ̱ bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläklä si ̱ ñaje ̱ keta wa käi . Jekäi bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö a ̱ miji ̱ a a ̱ miji ̱ a , je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ñadäläle e ̱ e ̱ na wà , iyina si ̱ wà .

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: Jekäi bas dä wätsikileni spa ̱ na , ka je rä jile wä tjabanak shtä wà kuna , ata je rä ji ka tjabanak kuna shtä wà , je rä Säkeklä ktä kseka jekjeye wà .

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: Iwa rä : “ Sä biköle rä jishtä ka ̱ shche ̱ i käi , sä ji baa biköle rä jishtä ka ̱ shche ̱ i wärukjei käi . Ka ̱ shche ̱ i ssi ̱ rke ̱ wa ̱ ra , iwärukjei ja ̱ rke ̱ ksa ̱ .

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: Ata Säkekewa ktä rä tkelewa ̱ jekjeye . ” Je kte ne rä kte baa bata yile bas ia ̱ rä .

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ku ̱ ji we ̱ wäsi ̱ wa biköle käi , ñawäyue biköle käi , ji we ̱ su ̱ nak ebä käi , je ̱ r ki ̱ sa saka iane ijile ki ̱ käi , ñaki ̱ yue biköle käi ju ̱ oksa ̱ .

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: Bas ja ̱ mi tsu si ̱ ka yakei tele ta tkeno , jishtä yabala ko ̱ r plaa ra käi , je ja ̱ mi bas kibinaklä tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ ;

text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious .
text2: je rä bas te Säkekewa rä je ̱ r baa , je kjei ssa kja ki ̱ ka .

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Jak kseka ju ̱ leksa ̱ ditsä wa ̱ , ata Säkeklä ia ̱ ra säkei ta , ñakäi kolole iwa ̱ , je ja ̱ mi bas ñasiköwa ̱ .

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: Je su ̱ ta bas dä jishtä jak kseka käi , yönakka ̱ ju wikblu iá ye , bas däkläwa ̱ chui sikii wa ye , ji wikblu iá ma ̱ kka ̱ kianak Säkeklä ki ̱ Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Je ne yile iyöle ska : “ ¡ Issö ! Yie jak ju ñak wäkukäk , yolole säkei ta ta ̱ i , je tkawa ̱ Sión ska ; yi te ije biketsa ra , jera a ̱ ni ka je äinakwa ̱ . ”

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ije biketsäk wa ia ̱ ra , ije rä säkei ta ta ̱ i , ata ka ije biketsäk kuna wa ia ̱ ra , ije rä : “ Jak ju ̱ leksa ̱ ju yuäk wa wa ̱ , je ne dewa ̱ ju ñak wäkukäk ye rä ” ,

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: ñakäi : “ Je jak ianawa ̱ rä iklasku tkenaklä ye , ijolowa ̱ kcha ̱ wa ̱ ye . ” Ijewa klasku tkerke ̱ , ijewa rä ka kte ssäk kuna ki ̱ ka . Je ne ye ijewa bitele rä .

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: Ata bas dä ditsei wä eyaka kolole wa , chui sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i wa , ije cha sikii wa , deleksa ̱ iwakei ia ̱ wa . Je rä bas wa ̱ ale bas kiäkksa ̱ ka ̱ tuil yika ije oloi baaka , je ji baa bata shäklä .

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: Mikle ra bas dä ka yi cha wa kuna , ata jira bas dä Säkeklä cha wa . Bas ia ̱ ka je ̱ r bäi rä yile kuna , ata jira bas ia ̱ je ̱ r bäi yina .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Bas dikäla , yie bas pake jishtä ka ̱ etkä wa käi , shkäk kju ̱ awa ye wa käi , ñabutsäkksa ̱ ji tkerke ̱ sa yaka ja ̱ mi kju ̱ atkäke ̱ sa wakei ra je yika .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: Jekäi bas je ̱ k wäsikewo ̱ tsa ̱ na , ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna wa sha ̱ na . Ijewa te bas sheke ̱ jile ki ̱ ji yakei wakbläk wa käi . Ata bas te ji wà ̱ bäi su ̱ a ijewa te ra , je rä ijewa wa ̱ Säkeklä kjeishäklä , mika ̱ ije te bas yuleke ̱ je díaí ska ra .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Säkekewa bata ki ̱ ka bas ñajöcho ̱ wa ̱ ditsä ka ̱ wei ta wa biköle yika , sa ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i sa patkäk yika iräle ,

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: ka ̱ wäkiri wa patkele iwa ̱ ji yakei wakbläk wa kpäk , ata ji wa ̱ k wämo wa kjeishäk je yika iräle .

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jikäi Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena rä : Ji we ̱ bäi , je wà bas wa ̱ ka je ̱ r ta wa wa ̱ ka ji ju ̱ ñer , jewa siwa ̱ tiewa ̱ kläwa ̱ .

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: Bas se ̱ no jishtä yeleksa ̱ wa käi ; ata ka je rä yeleksa ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ ishäklä ka ̱ tso ̱ ji yakei wa ̱ kläni kuna , ata jishtä Säkeklä kjanaklä wa käi .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Bas ku ̱ biköle dälätsö , sa el wa shka ̱ li ̱ blö . Bas suano Säkeklä yika . Ñakäi ka ̱ tsa ̱ ku ̱ i dälätsö .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Kjanaklä wa , bas ñajöcho ̱ wa ̱ bas blui wa yika , ji biköle ska idälätsäk , ka irä manele rä bäi , je ̱ r baa ebä ki ̱ ka kuna , ata manele sälwii wa ñaebä .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ikuna manele te je ̱ r iane dälässa , iweikarke ̱ ije ̱ r kalme Säkeklä ska ki ̱ ka ka ji nui ta käi ra , je ne rä bäi rä .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: Ata bas te ji yakei wakbla ki ̱ ka bas buka ̱ na je katabla bas te ra , ¿ je wa ̱ ji tso ̱ bäi na ? Ata ikuna bas weikana bas te ji wá ̱ bäi ki ̱ ka , je katabla bas te ra , je ne rä Säkeklä wäna bäi rä .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Je ne ye bas kile rä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je su ̱ ta Cristo te ji shka ̱ l ssa bas kju ̱ ei , je kjasha ite bas ia ̱ , bas wa ̱ mablenak bas minaklä ije itä wà .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: Ka ije wa ̱ ji yakei wakblene , ñakäi ka iwa ̱ sä wäyöne ikjäbata wà .

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: Ije yina kte yakei wà ra , ka iwa ̱ ijewa kúkane kte yakei wà . Ije te ji dälär ssa ra , ka iwa ̱ ijewa pawi ̱ ne , ata ije je ̱ k ju ̱ aksa ̱ sä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ bulee ia ̱ .

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: Ije wakei te iyaka ska sa ̱ nui tsa ̱ mi kal ja ̱ mi , jeska ra sä duäkläwa ̱ sa ̱ nui yika , sa ̱ se ̱ nakläni ji wämo ia ̱ . Jekäi ije shka ̱ le wà bas dä bäileni .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: Jekäi bas bakle rä oveja shelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa käi , ata jira bas deni bas kjänanak , bas wäsikewa ̱ k je wäki ̱ .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Je su ̱ ta alaklä wa bas ñajöcho ̱ wa ̱ bas se ̱ naklä wa yika . Je wà ra bas te bas se ̱ naklä wa manele ka je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ kuna kte ssäk wa , je je ̱ r ssëwe ̱ mi issäk , ka ji yile ta iia ̱ käi , ialaklä wa se ̱ r tsa ̱ na oloi ja ̱ mi ,

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: ijewa te bas se ̱ r wämo , dälätsalewa ̱ su ̱ a ra .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Bas je ̱ k ki ̱ tke ke kunapa rä bas pa ki ̱ ka : tsa ̱ ku ̱ kä butre baa käi , ji yöle oro wà jie käi , je ̱ k pajie baa käi ;

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: ata ikunapa rä bas je ̱ r ska je ̱ k ki ̱ tkele ji ka tjabanak kuna wà , je ̱ r ssële je ̱ k jalewa ̱ käi , bitaba käi . Je ne rä säkei ta bäi si ̱ Säkeklä wäna rä .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je su ̱ ta alaklä wa wämo wa bakle mikle je ̱ r blele Säkeklä ja ̱ mi , jewa je ̱ k ki ̱ tka rä je ̱ k jewa ̱ ise ̱ naklä wa yika je wà .

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: Je ne käi Sara te Abraham dälätsa rä , je kia ite rä säkekewa ni . Jekäi bas dämiwa ̱ ije yabala ye , ikuna bas te ji wá ̱ bäi ra , ñakäi ikuna ka bas suar kuna sa pawi ̱ rke ̱ mane a ̱ ni yika ra .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Je su ̱ ta jäiyi wa bas se ̱ no bas alaklä wa ra je ̱ r ko ̱ le , ijewa rä jishtä jile jui ko ̱ nak tjabana käi , ijewa dälätsö jishtä se ̱ ne kseka me ̱ rke ̱ däli ukä ye kukäkña wa käi , je rä ji kieke ̱ bas te ka ̱ kie wà ka wätkenaklä kuna .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Bata ska ra , biköle ssëno etka ye ebä , je ̱ r shka ̱ nak ñara , ñashka ̱ li ̱ bläk ñaje ̱ keta wa käi , je ̱ r ja ̱ mi ñadälänak , ñajäkwa ̱ ñayika ,

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: ji wa ̱ k yakei , ka ukä ja ̱ mi ji wa ̱ kni yakei , sä shäk sälwii , ka ukä ja ̱ mi ji shäkni sälwii , ata tsa ̱ na ra , ji bäi shäk iia ̱ o ̱ nak . Ata je ne ye bas kile rä , je rä ji bäi yileta ̱ na o ̱ nak kukäkläwa ̱ bas wa ̱ däli ukä ye .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: “ Yi je ̱ r ssëna se ̱ nak ji ̱ a , ikjämi bäi ssäk ji ̱ a ra , je ku ̱ ikjäktä wätkewo ̱ ji yakei yika , ñakäi ke je ku ̱ ikjäbata wà ji sha ka ̱ yue wà .

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: Je je ̱ k tso ̱ ksa ̱ ji yakei yika , je ku ̱ ji bäi wo ̱ ; je ku ̱ se ̱ ne bitaba yulö , ichatköwa ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Säkekewa wäbala kalme rä sä wämo wa ska , ñakäi ikukä kalme rä ijewa ka ̱ kiäke ̱ ska , ata Säkekewa wäki ̱ ji wa ̱ k yakei wa iarke ̱ . ”

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Bas chichar ji bäi wa ̱ k pjoo ra ¿ yi te ji we ̱ mi yakei bas ukä ja ̱ mi na ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Ata ikuna bas te ji dälässa ji wämo kju ̱ ei ra , bäije bas dä , je ne ki ̱ ka ke bas su ̱ anak sualewa ̱ ijewa yika , ke bas male ̱ te ̱ nak .

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: Bäi si ̱ ra , bas ku ̱ Cristo dälätsö bas je ̱ r ska Säkekewa käi . Del bas se ̱ no kukale kja , je rä bas wa ̱ yi te bas ia ̱ ji ki ̱ ssënak bas wa ̱ ktei chakeke ̱ kúkäklä . Ata je wo ̱ je ̱ k jalewa ̱ , dälätsalewa ̱ ,

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: je ̱ r ssële bäi ka nui ta , je rä bas shäk yakei wa te bas ki ̱ yueke ̱ bas se ̱ rke ̱ bäi Cristo ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ka , jewa äinacha ̱ kläwa ̱ .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Iwa rä ji dälässë sä te ji bäi we ̱ ki ̱ ka , ikuna Säkeklä ki ̱ jekäi ishena ra , je ne rä bäi si ̱ ji yakei we ̱ ki ̱ ka sa te ji dälässë tsa ̱ ta rä .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , Cristo te ji shka ̱ l ssa etaba kicha yebä , ji yakei wakblele nui ki ̱ ka ; sä wämo te ji shka ̱ l ssa , ka sä wämo kuna wa bata ki ̱ ka , je rä sä däkläwa ̱ Säkeklä ia ̱ ye . Iyina si ̱ ra iyaka ska ikota ̱ nawa ̱ , ata iwikblu ska se ̱ ne kseka me ̱ na iia ̱ ,

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: je wà ñakäi idasta ̱ na sä wikblu tso ̱ wätelecha ̱ wa ̱ wa paktäk .

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: Jewa ne rä ale mikle ka kte ssäk kuna wa rä , je rä Noé bakle ke ̱ i ska Säkeklä ji katabläk te ike ̱ i ki ̱ ssa ji ̱ a ko ̱ no yör dami ji ̱ a dälei ja ̱ mi ra . Je ko ̱ no na elkje ocho ebä ne tsa ̱ tkenaksa ̱ diklä oloi ja ̱ mi rä .

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: Je rä ijuenaklä jishtä jira wäoka ̱ ne te bas tsa ̱ tkeke ̱ ksa ̱ Jesucristo shki ̱ leka ̱ ni oloi ja ̱ mi käi . Ka je rä sa pa tja ̱ me ̱ i tse ̱ na ju ̱ naklämi kuna , ata je rä je wäoka ̱ ne wà sa ̱ wa ̱ je ̱ r ssëne ka nui ta je kiäklä Säkeklä ia ̱ .

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: Ije rä mineleka ̱ ka ̱ jöir ska , je katke Säkeklä jula wämo kja ̱ ne . Je yika ángel wa irä , ka ̱ wei ta wa irä , täkili ta wa irä , jewa rä ñajalecha ̱ wa ̱ .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Cristo te ji shka ̱ l ssa iyaka ska , je ki ̱ ka bas je ̱ rikö ije je ̱ rika käi , je wà bas ñapajiöcho ̱ wa ̱ bas kju ̱ atkäklä ye . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yi te ji shka ̱ l ssa kja iyaka ska ra , je wa ̱ ji yakei wakble rä jalewa ̱ ,

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: je rä bikö ise ̱ rmi ji ̱ a iyaka ja ̱ mi dälei ja ̱ mi , ka ise ̱ naklä kuna ji tkerke ̱ ditsä ja ̱ mi je wa ̱ k , ata ise ̱ naklä ji sherke ̱ Säkeklä ki ̱ je wa ̱ k .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas bakle mikle , ka Säkeklä ja ̱ mi kuna wa ja ̱ mi ji tkerke ̱ je wa ̱ k , ji äina tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ka wätkelewa ̱ ta käi , ji tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi käi , se ̱ nak diyëë ebä käi , ka ̱ wakbläk di kabika käi , se ̱ nak di ye sha ̱ na jaree käi , jile kekläí kja ̱ nei wa ̱ k dokona käi , je o ̱ le bas wa ̱ je ne kjela isherke ̱ rä .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Ijewa ka je ̱ r ko ̱ r , jiye si ̱ ka bas te ji äina wakble ka wätkele ta shtä we ̱ ña ijewa ra rä je ia ̱ . Je kju ̱ ei ijewa te bas sheke ̱ yakei .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: Ata ijewa ñashä tulämika ̱ ale kaldu e ̱ ná , sä kseka wa irä sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa irä ktei wabiketsäkksa ̱ je ia ̱ .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , je ne ki ̱ sä dulecha ̱ wa ̱ wa ia ̱ kte baa bata yina rä , je rä ijewa yaka wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ditsä käi , ata iwikblu se ̱ naklä Säkeklä käi .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Ji biköle e ̱ nakläwa ̱ ke ̱ i dewa ̱ kja , je ki ̱ ka bas se ̱ no je ̱ rki ̱ i ̱ biketsalee , bas ka ̱ kiäklä .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Ji biköle tsa ̱ ta bas ñashka ̱ li ̱ blö ki ̱ ta si ̱ . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble wà ji nui ta ̱ i rä wäshäkwa ̱ .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Bas ñakiöwa ̱ ju naka ka ñayile ta jini yakei .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Bas ia ̱ täkili me ̱ le ekla ekla , je ja ̱ mi iwawo ̱ ñaia ̱ , Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ ji ma ̱ k saka saka je wakja ̱ neiwa ̱ k bäi .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Yi rä ji shäk ra , je ku ̱ ji shö jishtä Säkeklä wakei si ̱ te ji she kate käi . Yi rä sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäk ra , je ku ̱ je wo ̱ Säkeklä te täkili me ̱ ke ̱ wà . Je rä Säkeklä oloi kanakläka ̱ ji biköle ska Jesucristo oloi ja ̱ mi ; ije ne rä oloi kanakka ̱ , täkili kanakka ̱ sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi . Amén .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Bas dikäla , ke bas male ̱ te ̱ nak yökö wäkarke ̱ bas sha ̱ na bas mabläklä je yika , ibiketsäk je rä ji o ̱ rte ' s ukä ja ̱ mi rä í ̱ ni .

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: Ata bikö bas weikarke ̱ ña Cristo weikana käi ra , je ja ̱ mi bas ssëno a ̱ naa . Je rä bas weikana je ja ̱ mi bas ssënaklä a ̱ naawa ̱ si ̱ , ije oloi kjayirke ̱ ra .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Ikuna bas yirke ̱ yakei Cristo kie ki ̱ ka , jera bäije bas dä . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , jekäi ne ra Säkeklä wikblu baa si ̱ je katke bas ja ̱ mi rä .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Je ki ̱ ka ke bas mane a ̱ ni ku ̱ ji shka ̱ l ssöpa sä ktewa ̱ ki ̱ , jakble ki ̱ , yakei we ̱ ki ̱ , je ̱ k patke ji kju ̱ awa sha ̱ na ki ̱ .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: Ata ikuna yi te ji shka ̱ l ssëke ̱ irä Cristo ja ̱ mi ki ̱ ra , ke je äina , ata je ku ̱ Säkeklä oloi köka ̱ , Cristo kie ki ̱ ka .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Iwa rä ike ̱ i dewa ̱ sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ . Säkätä rä Säkeklä ju ska tso ̱ wa , jeska ra sä biköle . Jekäi ikuna saje wa ne rä säkätä wabiketsanakksa ̱ ra , ¿ jera ale ka je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ kuna Säkeklä ktei baa dälätsäk , jewa me dämi rä na ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: “ Jekäi ikuna sä wämo ne rä elkje ra ka tsa ̱ tkenakksa ̱ kuna rä ra , ¿ jera ka sä bäi kuna wa irä , sä yakei wakbläk irä , me dämi rä na ? ”

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka ji shka ̱ l ssäk Säkeklä ki ̱ isherke ̱ käi , jewa je ̱ k ju ̱ oksa ̱ ale ji biköle yuäkksa ̱ , ji wa ̱ k bulee , je wakei ia ̱ ji wa ̱ k bäi .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Jekäi sä wäkiri wa tso ̱ bas sha ̱ na jewa ia ̱ yis sä wäkiri ijewa ra ñaebä , Cristo weikale su ̱ akña , ñakäi ji baa tso ̱ kja kjayinak je kukäkña , je te ishe ,

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: Säkeklä oveja tso ̱ bas sha ̱ na kjänano bas ku ̱ , jewa pasu ̱ o ka patkele täkili wà kuna , ata je ̱ r wà Säkeklä ki ̱ ishena käi , ka inaklä ebä bata ki ̱ ka kuna , ata je ̱ r ssële iwa ̱ k si ̱ ;

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: bas wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak wa ka weikäk täkili wà kuna , ata se ̱ nak bäi je oveja wa wa ̱ mablenak .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Jekäi ra mika ̱ oveja kjänanak wa wäkirií si ̱ juena ra , bas ia ̱ corona baa ka ji ̱ alinak kuna me ̱ rmi .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Je su ̱ ta dulaklei wa , bas ñajöcho ̱ wa ̱ sä wäkiri wa yika ; ñakäi bas biköle ñapajiöcha ̱ wa ̱ ñajewa ̱ bitaba ñayika wà . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , “ Säkeklä kju ̱ atkäke ̱ je ̱ k ssäk wa ra , ata je ̱ k jäkwa ̱ wa ia ̱ ije ̱ r bäi shäke ̱ . ”

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka bas ñajöcho ̱ wa ̱ Säkeklä jula täkili ta yika , jewa ije wa ̱ bas oloi käkläka ̱ ike ̱ i deka ̱ ska ra .

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: Bas je ̱ r iawa ̱ k biköle jöwa ̱ ije wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak . Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ije je ̱ r ja ̱ mi bas dälärke ̱ ki ̱ ka .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Bas se ̱ no je ̱ r ki ̱ i ̱ , wäñilee . Bas bolki be tsa ̱ ku ̱ i a ̱ r dami jishtä na ̱ ma ̱ käi , sä pája ̱ mi sä yuläk , yi kätewa ̱ ite käi .

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: Ata bas ku ̱ je wätkewo ̱ därërë ji biketse etkabä wà , bas wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer je su ̱ ta bas el wa te weikane ssëte ka ̱ biköle ska rä ki ̱ ka .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Ata je ̱ r bäi she biköle Kekläí , ale bas kiäk oloi kanakka ̱ baa si ̱ jekjeye ije ra Cristo Jesús ja ̱ mi , je wakei te bas weikana elkje ukä ska ra , bas bäiwe ̱ mi kianak , bas tkemiwa ̱ därërë bas ki ̱ täkiwe ̱ mi , bas ssëwe ̱ mi chatkäkwa ̱ .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ije ne ktä dälätsanopa sa ̱ ke ̱ i etkä etkä jekjeyemi rä . Amén .

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: Silvano , ale sä el yis ia ̱ ra chatkelewa ̱ bulee , je te yis tsa ̱ tka jí äyë yuäk elkje bas ia ̱ , je wà yis wa ̱ bas pakäklä ji wa ̱ k , ñakäi iktei shäklä bas ia ̱ , jí ne rä Säkeklä je ̱ r bäi shä si ̱ rä . Je ja ̱ mi bas chatköwa ̱ därërë .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Ale alaklä dul Babilonia ska kololeña bas da , je te bas chakami , Marcos yis yaba te ñaebä .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Bas ñachakö ñawäjalassële ñashka ̱ li ̱ blele wà . Bas Cristo ja ̱ mi wa biköle je ̱ r ssënopa baa .

text: Simon Peter , a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ , to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ :
text2: Simón Pedro , Jesucristo kjanaklä ñakäi iktei bata shäk , je te jí yue mar , yi ia ̱ ji säkei ta biketsanak rä me ̱ le jishtä sá ia ̱ ime ̱ na käi jewa ia ̱ . Je me ̱ le rä saje wa Kekläí ñakäi Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ Jesucristo je ji wämo oloi ja ̱ mi .

text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God , and of Jesus our Lord ,
text2: Je ̱ r bäi yinopa bas ia ̱ ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta , bas ssënopa baa ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta , bikö bas je ̱ r ko ̱ r dami Säkeklä ia ̱ , ñakäi saje wa Säkekewaí Jesús ia ̱ je ja ̱ mi .

text: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness , through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue :
text2: Sä kiäk rä oloi kaleka ̱ ñakäi baawa ̱ si ̱ ki ̱ ka sa kia ite . Je ju ̱ ña sa te ki ̱ ka , itäkili datse ̱ Säkeklä ja ̱ mi , je wà ji biköle sherke ̱ sa ̱ ki ̱ sa ̱ se ̱ naklä , ñakäi ji wa ̱ klä wämo me ̱ na sa ̱ ia ̱ .

text: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises : that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
text2: Je ne wà sa ̱ ia ̱ ikablele ji säkei ta , ji kibiwa ̱ si ̱ ma ̱ k rä , je wà bas däkläwa ̱ ña Säkeklä del käi , je rä ka ̱ jiska sa yakei terke ̱ ji tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi kju ̱ ei , je cha ̱ jolowa ̱ bas te ki ̱ ka .

text: And beside this , giving all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; and to virtue knowledge ;
text2: Jekäi wata ki ̱ ka bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ tkelewa ̱ tsa ̱ na , bas te ji biketsa etkabä ska ra iki ̱ wäjiäk ji we ̱ bäi wà ; ji we ̱ bäi ska ra , je ̱ r ko ̱ ne wà ; je ̱ r ko ̱ ne ska ra ,

text: And to knowledge temperance ; and to temperance patience ; and to patience godliness ;
text2: je ̱ k wätkewe ̱ wà ; je ̱ k wätkewe ̱ ska ra , ji katable wà ; ji katable ska ra , ji wämo we ̱ wà ; ji wämo we ̱ ska ra ,

text: And to godliness brotherly kindness ; and to brotherly kindness charity .
text2: ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ñaje ̱ keta käi wà ; ñashka ̱ li ̱ ble ñaje ̱ keta käi ska ra , sa ̱ shka ̱ li ̱ bläk si ̱ wà .

text: For if these things be in you , and abound , they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , bas te je shtä wá ̱ , ñakäi bas te je wá ̱ ki ̱ ta ki ̱ ta ra , je wa ̱ ka bas ianakwa ̱ ka ji wa ̱ k kuna , ka wänak kuna käi , saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo ju ̱ ñe ja ̱ mi .

text: But he that lacketh these things is blind , and cannot see afar off , and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins .
text2: Ata yi wa ̱ ka jekäi io ̱ ne ra , je rä ka wä wajuenak kuna , wä wajuenak alemana ebä , ñakäi je ̱ r shelewa ̱ irä siki tele iwa ̱ ji yakei wakblele mikle ki ̱ ka jeska .

text: Wherefore the rather , brethren , give diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never fall :
text2: Je ne ki ̱ ka el wa , bas ku ̱ ji wo ̱ tkelewa ̱ tsa ̱ na , bas wa ̱ bas kile , bas kolole kjashäklä iyina si ̱ irä . Bas te iwá ̱ jekäi ra , ka bas klasku tkenacha ̱ wa ̱ a ̱ ni .

text: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
text2: Je ne käi ra bas ia ̱ ka ̱ me ̱ rmi je ̱ r bäi wà bas kjäkläwa ̱ saje wa Säkekewaí , Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ Jesucristo gobiernoí jekjeye ska rä .

text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things , though ye know them , and be established in the present truth .
text2: Bas wa ̱ je ju ̱ ñer kja . Bas dä chatkelewa ̱ je ji iyina si ̱ ja ̱ mi , jeiräta del yis kawäta bas je ̱ r ja ̱ wa ̱ k ji ̱ a je wà .

text: Yea , I think it meet , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
text2: Jekäi yis tso ̱ ji ̱ a jí ju wäjienak ja ̱ mi ra , yis te je wà bas je ̱ r ja ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ bas wäshki ̱ naklä , yis ia ̱ ra je ne rä bäi rä .

text: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle , even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , yis wa ̱ iju ̱ ñer kukjunabä ra jí yis ju wäjienak rä janakwa ̱ ta ̱ na yis wa ̱ , jishtä saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo wa ̱ yis je ̱ r ko ̱ le käi .

text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance .
text2: Jekäi yie ji we ̱ mi tkenawa ̱ , je rä yis mineju ̱ mi ukä ska ra , bas je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä ji ̱ a del jeska .

text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables , when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
text2: Sá te bas je ̱ r ku ̱ a saje wa Säkekewaí Jesucristo täkili irä , idäke ̱ ni irä je wà ra , ka sá wa ̱ je yine rä kje ka ̱ pake biketsale wà kuna , ata sá wakwa wäbala wà sá te ije oloi baa su ̱ a rä .

text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory , when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ka irä maikäi kuna ta , mika ̱ ije kjeisha , ioloi kaka ̱ Sa Ká Säkeklä te ra , ale Oloi Ta E ̱ e ̱ na Si ̱ te ishaté ije ia ̱ : “ Jí rä yis yaba shka ̱ ta , je ra yis ssëna a ̱ naa . ”

text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard , when we were with him in the holy mount .
text2: Sá wakwa te je kte ssënaté ka ̱ jöir ska je ssa , mika ̱ sá kajali ije ra je ka ̱ tsä sikina ska ra .

text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed , as unto a light that shineth in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the day star arise in your hearts :
text2: Ñaebä kte yile jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ rä iyina si ̱ , je tso ̱ sa ̱ wa ̱ . Bas kiana je ssäk tsa ̱ na , jishtä tsi ̱ ni oloi ñirka ̱ ka ̱ tuii shtä ska ma rä ka ̱ ñinawa ̱ kje käi , bekwä bäli deka ̱ ju ̱ bas je ̱ r ska kje .

text: Knowing this first , that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation .
text2: Jí ne kiana bas wa ̱ ju ̱ ñenak bäi si ̱ rä , ji yile jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ yöle , je mane a ̱ ni rä ka wabiketsanak kuna sa wakwa je ̱ rikä ja ̱ mi jiräni iwa rä käi .

text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man : but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ka ji yine jile bata shäk wa wa ̱ iwakwa ki ̱ ishena käi mik a ̱ ni , ata ditsä kta rä wäsikle Wikblu sikina wa ̱ Säkeklä säkei ye .

text: But there were false prophets also among the people , even as there shall be false teachers among you , who privily shall bring in damnable heresies , even denying the Lord that bought them , and bring upon themselves swift destruction .
text2: Sa ̱ sha ̱ na sä wäyuäk jile bata shäk wa ye bakle , je su ̱ ta bas sha ̱ na sä wäyuäk sa paktäk wa ye , ñajämika ̱ te jakika sä wäyuemi ka ̱ ju ̱ ñe kju ̱ awa sä weikanakläwa ̱ wà , je bata ska ra , ijewa te Sä Blui itju ̱ akksa ̱ dokoitsemiwa ̱ kje . Je wà ijewa te weikane kiemika ̱ däkwa ̱ plaa iwakwa ki ̱ ka .

text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways ; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of .
text2: Chu ̱ li ̱ i ̱ wa minami ji äina tker ijewa ja ̱ mi ka wätkelewa ̱ ta , je ja ̱ mi . Ñakäi ijewa bata ki ̱ ka ji rä iyina si ̱ ña ̱ le ̱ i yirmi kte yakei wà .

text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not , and their damnation slumbereth not .
text2: Inaklä bata ki ̱ ka ijewa te bas wañemiwa ̱ kte ka iyina si ̱ kuna wà . Mikleté ijewa rä ktei wabiketsaleksa ̱ kja buka ̱ nak ka je wätkenak , ijewa weikarmiwa ̱ je ka wäkäpäkwa ̱ kuna .

text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned , but cast them down to hell , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be reserved unto judgment ;
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ángel wa te ji yakei wakbla ra ka Säkeklä wa ̱ jewa janewa ̱ ka bukle kuna , ata je tulami ite sä weikanakläwa ̱ ska , tulaksa ̱ wätenakcha ̱ wa ̱ ka ̱ tuii na , blele ktei wabiketsanakksa ̱ ji ̱ a .

text: And spared not the old world , but saved Noah the eighth person , a preacher of righteousness , bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly ;
text2: Ñaebä ka iwa ̱ ka ̱ jiska mikle wa janewa ̱ ka bukle kuna . Ata ite Noé ji wämo ktei bata shäk bla , isaka siete wa ra , mika ̱ ite diklä talawa ̱ ka ka sä bäi kuna wa ke ̱ i ki ̱ ka ra .

text: And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly ;
text2: Ñaebä ite Sodoma irä Gomorra irä jukläyäkäí kpa iweikanakläwa ̱ muli ̱ tä ebä ta ̱ na , je rä je ukä ska mane wa se ̱ rmi ji ̱ a ka bäi kuna wa wäji ̱ atkäklä je wà .

text: And delivered just Lot , vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked :
text2: Ñaebä ite Lot ale wämo je wetsaksa ̱ . Je dokonawa ̱ ka ka ̱ wei dälätsäk kuna wa te ji äina tker sa ̱ ja ̱ mi ka wätkelewa ̱ ta we ̱ ke ̱ je yika .

text: ( For that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds ; )
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , je ekla wämo se ̱ na ijewa sha ̱ na ra , ji we ̱ ke ̱ ijewa te ka ka ̱ wei ja ̱ mi kuna je su ̱ eke ̱ je ssëke ̱ ite , je te buliri buliri ije ̱ rike wämo ska issëwe ̱ ke ̱ shi ̱ ana si ̱ .

text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations , and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished :
text2: Je wà ijuena Säkekewa wa ̱ se ̱ nak wämo wa wetseksa ̱ imablerke ̱ jile wà yika ju ̱ ñer , ñakäi ka sä wämo kuna wa ble buka ̱ nak sa wabiketsanakläksa ̱ ke ̱ i ska ju ̱ ñer ;

text: But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness , and despise government . Presumptuous are they , selfwilled , they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities .
text2: bäi si ̱ ra minak sa yaka ja ̱ mi ji tkerke ̱ te sa yakei tewe ̱ ke ̱ ja ̱ mi wa irä , ka ̱ wei ta wa dokoitsäk wa irä jewa ne ble bukanak ju ̱ ñer iwa ̱ rä . Ijewa rä ka suanak kuna ji yika , je ̱ k ssäk tuleka ̱ , ka paju ̱ nak kuna oloi kaleka ̱ wa shäk kte yakei wà .

text: Whereas angels , which are greater in power and might , bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord .
text2: Ángel wa rä bakleka ̱ oloi ta täkili ta ijewa tsa ̱ ta , ata ka jewa wa ̱ oloi kaleka ̱ wa kjatene kte yakei wà Säkekewa wäna .

text: But these , as natural brute beasts , made to be taken and destroyed , speak evil of the things that they understand not ; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption ;
text2: Ata ijewa rä jishtä bewak ka ka ̱ ta te ji we ̱ jishtä idel ja ̱ mi käi , ko ̱ le kolonakwa ̱ weikanakwa ̱ ebä . Ijewa te ji ia ̱ ka ije ̱ r ko ̱ ne sheke ̱ yakei , jewa weikarmiwa ̱ bewak weikarke ̱ wa ̱ käi .

text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness , as they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time . Spots they are and blemishes , sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you ;
text2: Ijewa te ji yakei ki ̱ ka ji yakei shka ̱ l ssëke ̱ to ̱ ne käi . Je rä ijewa te ibiketse baawa ̱ si ̱ ji ssërke ̱ sa ̱ ia ̱ baa wakble ka ̱ piana rä . Bas taparke ̱ yäkäk ska ra , ijewa te sä wäyueke ̱ ji ssërke ̱ iia ̱ baa wà , jekäi je wà ite sa pache ̱ ke ̱ sa yakei tewe ̱ ke ̱ .

text: Having eyes full of adultery , and that cannot cease from sin ; beguiling unstable souls : an heart they have exercised with covetous practices ; cursed children :
text2: Ijewa wä käjäklä rä manene ska ebä , ijewa te yakei wakbleke ̱ ka jalewa ̱ ta . Ñakäi ite ka chatkelewa ̱ bäi si ̱ kuna wa je ̱ r ki ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ . Ijewa rä ñadulale inaklä ebä ki ̱ biketsäk . Ijewa rä weikanakcha ̱ wa ̱ wa .

text: Which have forsaken the right way , and are gone astray , following the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ;
text2: Ijewa te ña ̱ la bulee jawa ̱ minemi kju ̱ awa Beor yaba Balaam ña ̱ le ̱ i ja ̱ mi , je rä ale to ̱ ne ji ka wämo ki ̱ säkei biketsäk .

text: But was rebuked for his iniquity : the dumb ass speaking with man ' s voice forbad the madness of the prophet .
text2: Ata je wi ̱ na ji wá ̱ ite yakei ki ̱ . Je rä bewak watse ̱ nak ka ktäk kuna , je ktaka ̱ ditsä käi , je te je jile bata shäk yuletenawa ̱ wätkewa ̱ wa ̱ .

text: These are wells without water , clouds that are carried with a tempest ; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever .
text2: Ijewa rä diklä tsikinaklä ka diklei ta käi , mo ̱ ju ̱ e si ̱ wa ̱ te käi . Ijewa ia ̱ ka ̱ tuil yee tso ̱ blele e ̱ ná .

text: For when they speak great swelling words of vanity , they allure through the lusts of the flesh , through much wantonness , those that were clean escaped from them who live in error .
text2: Ka irä jiye kuna ta , ijewa te kte ka wata pakeke ̱ je ̱ k ssë wà . Je wà ite se ̱ nak wäyölecha ̱ wa ̱ wa cha ̱ k jolowa ̱ k jirpa wa , jewa je ̱ r ki ̱ we ̱ ke ̱ ji tkerke ̱ sa yaka ja ̱ mi wà ji äina wa ̱ k ka wätkelewa ̱ ta .

text: While they promise them liberty , they themselves are the servants of corruption : for of whom a man is overcome , of the same is he brought in bondage .
text2: Jewa ia ̱ ite isheke ̱ rä jekäi ra sä dämiksa ̱ kjermita ni . Ata iwakwa rä kololecha ̱ wa ̱ ji rä sa yakei tewa ̱ k je wa ̱ . Iwa rä ji wa ̱ sä rä kololewa ̱ ra je ne rä sa patkäk rä .

text: For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , they are again entangled therein , and overcome , the latter end is worse with them than the beginning .
text2: Ka ̱ jiska ji te sa yakei tewe ̱ ke ̱ , je cha ̱ k jolowa ̱ k wa , saje wa Säkekewaí Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ Jesucristo ju ̱ ñe wà , jewa wäbuta ̱ nacha ̱ wa ̱ ni , ñakäi ikolonacha ̱ wa ̱ ni ra , ijewa iarmiwa ̱ rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ isäkätä tsa ̱ ta .

text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , after they have known it , to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them .
text2: Bäi si ̱ ra , ke ijewa ku ̱ ji wämo ña ̱ le ̱ i ju ̱ ñopa . Ata ijewa te je ju ̱ ña ukä ska , iñatsa ̱ kksa ̱ ni ka ̱ wei dälätsalewa ̱ me ̱ leta ̱ na ijewa ia ̱ yika ra , je rä e ̱ e ̱ na si ̱ .

text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb , The dog is turned to his own vomit again ; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire .
text2: Je o ̱ na ijewa ukä ja ̱ mi rä ishe käi : “ Chichi däni iwakei chöli ñak ” , ñakäi , “ Köchi pasukle däni ukäk döli na . ” Je rä iyina si ̱ .

text: This second epistle , beloved , I now write unto you ; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance :
text2: Bas dikäla , jí äyë rä yie etkä yuamini bas ia ̱ . Je äyë botkä wà , yis te bas je ̱ r ja ̱ we ̱ ni , je wà yis wa ̱ bas je ̱ rikä tsa ̱ na wäshki ̱ wa ̱ kläka ̱ .

text: That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour :
text2: Je rä bas je ̱ r ja ̱ naklä jile bata shäk wa sikii wa wa ̱ ji yile ska , ñakäi jini Säkekewa Sa ̱ tsa ̱ tkäkksa ̱ wa ̱ sa pakale ji wa ̱ k ktei sha bas ia ̱ iktei bata shäk wa te käi .

text: Knowing this first , that there shall come in the last days scoffers , walking after their own lusts ,
text2: Säkätä bas ku ̱ iju ̱ ñopa , sa ̱ ke ̱ i bata jekje ra , ji ja ̱ ñetsäk wäsi ̱ wa wa dämiwa ̱ ji ja ̱ ñetsäk , ji tkerke ̱ iwakwa ja ̱ mi ebä wa ̱ k .

text: And saying , Where is the promise of his coming ? for since the fathers fell asleep , all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation .
text2: Ijewa te ishemi : “ ¿ Mai rä ikabla däkni rä na ? Ñera sa ká wa kapacha ̱ wa ̱ skaté ji biköle dami iku ̱ r käi , jishtä ji yöleksa ̱ säkätä skaté käi . ”

text: For this they willingly are ignorant of , that by the word of God the heavens were of old , and the earth standing out of the water and in the water :
text2: Je rä ka ijewa je ̱ r ssëne iju ̱ ñak , ka ̱ mikleté ka ̱ jöir tso ̱ kja rä Säkeklä wakei ktä wà , ñakäi ishäkä tsikinaka ̱ diklä na diklä oloi ja ̱ mi rä Säkeklä wakei ktä wà .

text: Whereby the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished :
text2: Je ktä ebä wà je ke ̱ i ska wa weikanacha ̱ wa ̱ ki ̱ telewa ̱ diklä wa ̱ .

text: But the heavens and the earth , which are now , by the same word are kept in store , reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men .
text2: Je su ̱ ta je ktä ebä wà ka ̱ jöir irä ishäkä irä tso ̱ jira rä yökö ki ̱ ssäk , blele ma rä ka bäi kuna wa ktei wabiketsarke ̱ ksa ̱ weikarke ̱ wa ̱ ke ̱ i kje .

text: But , beloved , be not ignorant of this one thing , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
text2: Ata bas dikäla , etka ska ka bas je ̱ r sher kuna : Säkekewa ia ̱ ra un día rä mil año käi , ñakäi mil año rä un día käi .

text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise , as some men count slackness ; but is longsuffering to us - ward , not willing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
text2: Säkekewa kablele ji wa ̱ k ka wätkewe ̱ kuna ite , jishtä manele te ibiketse ite iwätkewe ̱ irä ni käi . Ata ije te bas katableke ̱ je ̱ r baa wà . Iwa rä ka ije ki ̱ yi a ̱ ni sher weikanakwa ̱ , ata ije ki ̱ biköle shena rä ñamanewa ̱ ksa ̱ .

text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night ; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat , the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up .
text2: Ata Säkekewa díaí dämiwa ̱ rä jishtä jakbläk wa däju ̱ käi . Jera ka ̱ jöir tse ̱ rju ̱ mi bularmi ta ̱ i kukluu . Jera ji tso ̱ käi weikarmiwa ̱ dälälewa ̱ . Jera ishäkä irä ji o ̱ le jeska irä je juermiwa ̱ atjä .

text: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved , what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness ,
text2: Ji biköle rä weikanakwa ̱ jekäi ra , ¿ ditsä mane shtä wa ye bas kiana rä ? ¿ Ka bas kiana rä se ̱ nak wämo , tsa ̱ na si ̱
